   oṃ	om
   tarkasaṃgrahadīpikāprakāśikā	tarka saMgraha dIpikA aprakASikA
   nāvalpākkam śrīrāmānujatātācāryaviracitayā	nAvalpAkkam SrI rAma anujatAt AcArya viracitayA
   bālapriyākhyavyākhyayā	bAla priya AKya vyAKyayA
   tiruppukkuli śrīkṛṣṇatātācāryaviracitayā	tiruppukkuli SrI kRzNa tAta AcArya viracitayA
   prasāraṇākhyavyākhyayā ca samullasitā	prasAraNa AKya vyAKyayA ca samullasitA
   śrīḥ	SrIH
   prastāvanā	prastAvanA
   tatra bhavatā	tatra BavatA
   annambhaṭṭena viracitaḥ tarkasaṃgrahaḥ tatkṛtadīpikākhyavyākhyānasahitaḥ	annamBawwena viracitaH tarka saMgrahaH tad kRta dIpikA AKya vyAKyAna sahitaH
   nyāyaśāstramadhijigāṃsamānaiḥ sarvairapi ādau paṭhyata iti	nyAya SAstram aDijigAMsamAnEH sarvEH api AdO paWyate iti
   viśvaprasiddham/ tarkasaṃgrahasya dīpikāvyatiriktāni padakṛtyam,	viSva prasidDam/ tarka saMgrahasya dIpikA vyatiriktAni pada kRtyam,
   nyāyabodhinī, vākyavṛttiḥ, niruktiḥ, paṭṭābhirāmaṭippaṇī	nyAya boDinI, vAkya vRttiH, niruktiH, pawwABirAma wippaNI
   ityādīni bahūni vyākhyānāni mudritānyamudritāni ca upalabhyante/	ityAdIni bahUni vyAKyAnAni mudrita ani a mudritAni ca upalaByante/
   tathā dīpikāyāḥ rāmarudrī, nīlakaṇṭhakṛtā prakāśikā,	taTA dIpikAyAH rAmarudrI, nIlakaNWa kRtA prakASikA,
   nṛsiṃhaśāstrikṛtā prakāśikā, paṭṭābhirāmakṛtā prakāśikā,	nRsiMhaSAstri kRtA prakASikA, pawwa aBirAma kRtA prakASikA,
   ityādayaḥ anekā vyākhyāḥ mudritā amudritāśca vartante/	ityAdayaH anekAH vyAKyAH mudritAH amudritAH ca vartante/
   tarkasaṃgrahavyākhyāsu nyāyabodhinyāḥ dīpikāvyakhyāsu	tarka saMgraha vyAKyAsu nyAya boDinyAH dIpikA vyaKyAsu
   nīlakaṇṭhīyaprakāśikāyāśca paṭhanapāṭhanapracāro 'sti/ saṃkṣiptaśailyā	nIlakaNWIya prakASikAyAH ca paWana pAWana pracAraH asti/ saMkzipta SElyA
   apekṣitasakalārthapratipādakatvarūpo viśeṣa eva	apekzita sakala arTa pratipAdaka tva rUpaH viSezaH eva
   paṭhanapāṭhanagocaratāyāṃ mukhyo hetuḥ/ tatrāpi nīlakaṇṭhaprakāśikā	paWana pAWana gocara tAyAm muKyaH hetuH/ tatra api nIlakaNWa prakASikA
   laghugādādharīti vyapadeśayogyā chātrāṇāṃ viduṣāṃ ca	laGu gAda aDarI iti vyapadeSa yogyA CAtrANAm viduzAm ca

   paricayo vartate ta eva prakāśikāyāḥ tātparyaṃ rasaṃ ca	paricayaH vartate te eva prakASikAyAH tAtparyam rasam ca
   jñātumanubhavituṃ ca śaknuvanti/	jQAtum anuBavitum ca Saknuvanti/
   tasyāḥ	tasyAH
   nīlakaṇṭhaprakāśikāyāḥ prativākyaṃ bhāvārthaspaṣṭīkaraṇacaṇā kācana	nIlakaNWa prakASikAyAH prativAkyam BAva arTa spazwI karaNa caNA kAcana
   vyākhyā cirāt nāvatīrṇā/ yadyapi nīlakaṇṭhaputreṇa kṛtā	vyAKyA cirAt na avatIrNA/ yadi api nIlakaNWa putreNa kRtA

   nirṇayasāgarayantrālayena mudrāpitā upalabhyate, tathāpi apekṣitasthale	nirNaya sAgara yantra Alayena mudrA pitA upalaByate, taTA api apekzita sTale
   samucitarītyā avyākhyānāta anapekṣitavistarakaraṇācca	samucita rItyA avyAKyAnAta anapekzita vistara karaNAt ca
   bālatārkikāṇāṃ nopakāriṇī sā/ pratyuta bahuṣu sthaleṣu	bAla tArkikANAm na upakAriNI sA/ pratyuta bahuzu sTalezu
   prakāśikāyāḥ hṛdayamanavagacchantī viparītatayā vyākhyāntī	prakASikAyAH hRdayam anavagacCantI viparIta tayA vyAKyAntI
   vyāmohameva janayati/ iyaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaputreṇa na kṛtā syādityapi	vyAmoham eva janayati/ iyam nIlakaNWa putreNa na kRtA syAt iti api
   tādṛśasthalānāṃ darśanena matiḥ samupajāyate/ ata eva mādṛśānāṃ	tAdRSa sTalAnAm darSanena matiH samupajAyate/ atas eva mAdRSAnAm
   bālatārkikāṇāṃ viduṣāṃ copakārāya samīcīnā kācana vyākhyā	bAla tArkikANAm viduzAm ca upakArAya samIcInA kAcana vyAKyA
   kartavyeti bahoḥ kālāt pūrvaṃ nāvalpākābhijanān paṇḍitapravarān	kartavyA iti bahoH kAlAt pUrvam na avalpAka aBijanAn paNxita pravarAn
   en. es. rāmānujatātācāryān prārthayam/ teṣāṃ savidhe	en. es. rAma anuja tAt a AcAryAn prArTayam/ tezAm saviDe
   nyāyaśāstraṃ mayādhītamitīmaṃ sambandhaṃ puraskṛtya prārthanāmakaravam/	nyAya SAstram mayA aDItam iti imam sambanDam puraskRtya prArTa nAmakaravam/
   te 'pi sadyaḥ prārthanāṃ svīkṛtya ekavarṣābhyantare bālapriyānāmnīṃ	te api sadyas prArTanAm svIkRtya eka varza aByantare bAla priyA nAmnIm
   prakāśikāyāḥ vyākhyāṃ nirmāya aduḥ/ tasyāḥ prakāśanasamayo 'dhunā	prakASikAyAH vyAKyAm nirmAya aduH/ tasyAH prakASana samayaH aDunA
   samupanata iti nitarāṃ momudyate cetaḥ/ anayā vyākhyayā	samupanataH iti nitarAm momudyate cetaH/ anayA vyAKyayA

   athabhāskarodayāyāṃvidyamānānyasāṃgatyāni	aTa BAskara udayAyAMvidyamAnAni asAMgatyAni
   sthālīpulākanyāyena pradarśayāmaḥ   	sTAlI pulAka nyAyena pradarSa yAmaH   
   prakāśikāyāṃ'tarkasyāpādakābhāvasādhakaviparyayapratiyogyāpādyakatvarūpaviparyaye	prakASikAyAM atarkasya ApAdaka aBAva sADaka viparyaya pratiyogi ApAdyaka tva rUpa viparyaye
   tatkoṭiparyavasāyitvaṃ darśayati   darśanābhāvānnāstīti' iti	tad kowi paryavasAyi tvam darSayati  darSana aBAvAt na asti iti a iti
   paṅktiḥ (pṛ. 142) dṛśyate/ asyāḥ paṅktervāstavārthaḥ ayam   'yadyatra	paFktiH (pR. 142) dRSyate/ asyAH paFkteH vAstava arTaH ayam  ayat yatra
   ghaṭaḥ syāttarhi bhūtalamiva ghaṭo 'drakṣyata' ityākārake tarke āpādako	GawaH syAt tarhi BU talam iva GawaH adrakzyata a iti AkArake tarke ApAdakaH 
   ghaṭaḥ tasyābhāvaḥ ghaṭābhāvastasya sādhako viparyayadarśanābhāvaḥ tasya	GawaH tasya aBAvaH Gawa aBAvaH tasya sADakaH viparyaya darSana aBAvaH tasya
   pratiyogi darśanameva āpādyamiti āpādakābhāvaḥ	pratiyogi darSanam eva ApAdyam iti ApAdaka aBAvaH
   sādhakaviparyayapratiyogyāpādyakatvaṃ tarkasyeti/	sADaka viparyaya pratiyogi ApAdyaka tvam tarkasya iti/

   tathā hibhāskārodayāpaṅktiḥ  'āpādakasya	taTA hiBAskAra udaya apaFktiH aApAdakasya

   nāstīti yo viparyayaḥ	na asti iti yaH viparyayaH

   satpratipakṣaprakaraṇe	sat pratipakza prakaraNe

   vyākhyānaṃ dṛśyate (pṛ. 116)/ atrānanvayādikaṃ viduṣāṃ spaṣṭam/	vyAKyAnam dRSyate (pR. 116)/ atra ananvaya Adikam viduzAm spazwam/
   prāmāṇyavādeprakāśikāyāṃ   'bhaṭṭamate tu jñānasyātīndriyatayā	prAmANya vAda IprakASikAyAm  aBawwa mate tu jQAnasya atIndriya tayA

   gṛhyate' iti paṅktirdṛśyate (pṛ. 239)/ atra jñānasya grahaḥ jñānagrahaḥ	gRhyate a iti paFktiH dRSyate (pR. 239)/ atra jQAnasya grahaH jQAna grahaH

   vyākhyātam (pṛ. 137)/	vyAKyAtam (pR. 137)/

   vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam/	vyAKyAnam kRtam/

   pratyakṣaḥ/	pratyakzaH/

   prati nodbhūtasparśaḥ kāraṇam/ tathā sati pakṣikāṇḍe calati	prati na udBUta sparSaH kAraNam/ taTA sati pakzi kANxe calati
   pūrvadeśavibhāgottaradeśasaṃyogayoḥ pratyakṣatā na syāt/	pUrva deSa viBAga uttara deSa saMyogayoH pratyakzatA na syAt /
   prabhāmaṇḍalātmakayoḥ pūrvottaradeśayoḥ udbhūtasparśaśūnyatvāt/ ata	praBA maNxala AtmakayoH pUrva uttara deSayoH udBUta sparSa SUnya tva at/ ata
   udbhūtarūpameva dravyapratyakṣatāyāṃ tantramiti saṃpradāyavidaḥ/	udBUta rUpam eva dravya pratyakzatAyAm tantram iti saMpradAya vidaH/
   tanmate 'pi udbhūtarūpaśūnyo vāyurapratyakṣa eveti maṇikārāḥ	tad mate api udBUta rUpa SUnyaH vAyuH apratyakzaH eva iti maNikArAH
   pratyapīpadan/	pratyapIpadan/
   evaṃ ca	evam ca
   bahirindriyajanyadravyapratyakṣaṃ prati udbhūtarūpasya kāraṇatve niścite	bahis indriya janya dravya pratyakzam prati udBUta rUpasya kAraNa tve niScite
   'vāyuḥ bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvā'	avAyuH bahis indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH pratyakza sparSa ASraya tvA a
   dityanumāne	diti anumAne
   pakṣadharmadravyatvāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakamudabhūtarūpavattvamupādhiḥ/	pakza Darma dravya tva avacCinna sADya vyApakam uda BUta rUpavat tvam upADiH/
   tathā ca	taTA ca

   bhavati, na punaryathā 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasati' ityatra vā	Bavati, na punar yaTA agaFgAyAm GozaH prativasati a iti atra vA

   tatsambandhānupapatteḥ tadavinābhāvena vā lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vā	tad sambanDa anupapatteH tad avinA BAvena vA lakzyamANa guNa yogena vA
   tīraṃ vāhīko vāvagamyate tathehāvagatiḥ/ api tu	tIram vAhIkaH vA avagamyate taTA iha avagatiH/ api tu
   yugapadevāvagatiḥ/ ato 'vagatirūpeṇa kāryeṇa kalpanīyā	yugapad eva avagatiH/ atas avagati rUpeNa kAryeNa kalpanIyA
   padaśaktistriṣu padārtheṃṣu viśrāmyati,	pada SaktiH trizu padArTeMzu viSrAmyati,
   trayāṇāmekakāle 'vagatyāviśeṣāditi/iyaṃ prācīnanyāyagrantharītiḥ/	trayANAm eka kAle avagatya aviSezAt iti/iyam prAcInanyAya granTarItiH/
   navyanaiyāyikāstu ghaṭādipadāt	navya nEyAyikAH tu Gawa Adi padAt

   ghaṭatvādeḥ śakyatve sati śakyatāvacchedakatvamapyaṅgīkriyate/	Gawa tva AdeH Sakya tve sati Sakya tA avat Cedaka tvam api aFgIkriyate/
   avayavasaṃyogaviśeṣarūpākṛteḥ śakyatve 'pi śakyatāvacchedakatvaṃ	avayava saMyoga viSeza rUpa AkRteH Sakya tve api Sakya tA avat Cedaka tvam
   nāṅgīkriyate, jāteriva sākṣātsaṃbandhena śakyavyaktyavṛttitvāt,	na aFgIkriyate, jAteH iva sAkzAt saMbanDena Sakya vyakti avRtti tvAt,
   svāśrayasamavetatvarūpaparamparāsaṃbandhenaiva śakyatāvacchedakatvaṃ	sva ASraya samaveta tva rUpa paramparA saMbanDena eva Sakya tA avacCedaka tvam
   vācyamiti gauravāt ityāhuḥ/	vAcyam iti gOravAt iti AhuH/
   anye tu	anye tu
   saṃsthānānupasthitāvapi gotvādinā gavādyanvayabodhāt	saMsTAna anupasTitO= api go tva AdinA gavA Adi anvaya boDAt

   śaktirityāhuḥ/ paraṃ tvasmin pakṣe sūtrasthamekavacanamasvarasaṃ bhavati/	SaktiH iti AhuH/ param tu asmin pakze sUtra sTam eka vacanam asvarasam Bavati/
   mīmāṃsakamatapariśīlanam	mImAMsaka mata pari SIlanam
   yattu mīmāṃsakaiḥ	yat tu mImAMsakEH

   āśrayapratītimantarā jātiguṇayorevāpratīteḥ/ vyaktirhi prathamato	ASraya pratItim antarA jAti guNayoH eva apratIteH/ vyaktiH hi praTamatas

   vyaṅgyāyāḥ jāteḥ	vyaFgyAyAH jAteH

   tasya ca saṃyogapūrvakatvāt dravyacākṣuṣatvāvacchinnaṃ prati	tasya ca saMyoga pUrvaka tvAt dravya cAkzuza tva avacCinnam prati

   śakyam/	Sakyam/
   nanu ayaṃ daṇḍīti	nanu ayam daNxI iti
   jñānavat ayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñānamapi viśiṣṭajñānatvāt	jQAna vat ayam GawaH iti jQAnam api viSizwa jQAna tvAt 
   viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakamāstheyam/ viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ ca na	viSezaNa jQAna pUrvakam AsTeyam/ viSezaNa jQAnam ca na
   viśiṣṭārthaviṣayakam, anavasthāprasaṅgāt/ ato jātimātraviṣayakaṃ	viSizwa arTa vizaya kam, anavasTA prasaFgAt/ atas jAti mAtra vizaya kam
   tadityavaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti jātyādeḥ prathamopasthitatvaṃ	tat iti avaSyam aFgIkaraNIyam iti jAti AdeH praTama upasTita tvam
   vaktavyamiti cet    satyaṃ viśiṣṭajñānaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānajanyamiti/	vaktavyam iti ced   satyam viSizwa jQAnam viSezaNa jQAna janyam iti/

   jātibhāsakasaṃnikarṣasya saṃyuktasamavāyarūpasya	jAti BAsaka saMnikarzasya saMyukta samavAya rUpasya
   tadāśrayavyaktibhāsakasaṃyogakhyasaṃnikarṣaghaṭitatayā tajjanyajñānasya	tad ASraya vyakti BAsaka saMyoga Kya saMnikarza Gawita tayA tad janya jQAnasya
   jātiviṣayakatvavat tadāśrayavyaktiviṣayakatvasyāpi durvāratvāt/ na	jAti vizaya ka tva vat tad ASraya vyakti vizayaka tvasya api durvAra tvAt/ na
   caivamanavasthā, viśeṣaṇajñānasya jātivyaktyubhayaviṣayakasyāpi	ca evam anavasTA, viSezaNa jQAnasya jAti vyakti uBaya vizayakasya api
   vaiśiṣṭyāviṣayakatayā viśiṣṭajñānatvābhāvana tatra	vESizwyA vizayaka tayA viSizwa jQAna tva aBAvana tatra
   viśeṣaṇajñānāntarasyānapekṣaṇāt/ ato viśeṣaṇajñānakāraṇatvabalāt	viSezaNa jQAna antarasya anapekzaNAt/ atas viSezaNa jQAna kAraNa tva balAt
   jāteḥ prathamopasthitatvaṃ bhavediti pratyāśā na kāryā/	jAteH praTama upasTita tvam Bavet iti pratyASA na kAryA/
   evaṃ lāghavājjātimātre	evam lAGavAt jAti mAtre

   vyaklikṣaṇāyāḥ kalpanīyatayā gauravāt/ tadapekṣayā viśiṣṭavyaktau	vyaklikzaNAyAH kalpanIya tayA gOrava at/ tad apekzayA viSizwa vyaktO
   śaktiṃ svīkṛtya kvācitkajātiparaprayogasya lākṣaṇikatāyā eva	Saktim svIkRtya kvAcid ka jAti para prayogasya lAkzaNika tAyAH eva
   yuktatvāt/ 'vrīhibhiryajeta' ityādividhivākyeṣu sarvatra	yukta tvAt/ avrIhiBiH yajeta a ityAdi viDi vAkyezu sarvatra
   vrīhyādipadānāṃ vyaktilākṣaṇikatve sati 'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ'	vrIhi Adi padAnAm vyakti lAkzaNika tve sati ana viDO paraH Sabda arTaH a
   iti nyāyavirodhaśca syāt/	iti nyAya viroDaH ca syAt /
   api ca śaktigrāhakeṣu	api ca Sakti grAhakezu
   vyākaraṇādiṣu gavādipadānāṃ jātimātraśaktau na kimapi pramāṇaṃ	vyAkaraNa Adizu gavA Adi padAnAm jAti mAtra SaktO na kim api pramANam
   paśyāmaḥ/ vyaktivācakatvamupajīvya pravṛtteṣu sarūpādisūtreṣu	paSyAmaH/ vyakti vAcaka tvam upajIvya pravRttezu sarUpa Adi sUtrezu

   'jātyākhyāyāmekasmin' (pā.sū. 1 2 58) ityādisutreṣu kvacideva	ajAti AKyAyAm ekasmin a (pA.sU. 1 2 58) ityAdi sutrezu kvacid eva

   vyakterabhidheyatvaṃ	vyakteH aBiDeya tvam
   gamyate/ 'cādayo 'sattve' (pā.sū.1 4 57) ityādiparyudāsācca	gamyate/ acAdayaH asattve a (pA.sU.1 4 57) ityAdi paryudAsAt ca
   dravyavācitvaṃ gamyate/ sādṛśyapratītimupajīvya pravartamānamupamānaṃ ca	dravya vAci tvam gamyate/ sAdRSya pratItim upajIvya pravartamAnam upamAnam ca
   na vyaktivācakatāmantareṇa ghaṭate/ 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ'	na vyakti vAcaka tAm antareNa Gawate/ ago sadRSaH gavayaH a

   gavayapadavācya iti śaktigrahaḥ/ liṅgaviśeṣanirṇayapuraskāreṇa	gavaya pada vAcyaH iti Sakti grahaH/ liFga viSeza nirNaya puraskAreNa
   pravṛttaḥ kośo 'pi tadyogyavyaktivācakatvameva kalpayati/ āptavākyaṃ ca	pravRttaH koSaH api tad yogya vyakti vAcaka tvam eva kalpayati/ Apta vAkyam ca
   'gāmānaya' 'na surāṃpiba' ityādikaṃ	agAmAnaya a anaH surAMpiba a iti Adikam

   gavānayanapravṛttyādirvyaktivācakatva evopapadyate/ vākyaśeṣāṃ'pi	gavAnayana pravRtti AdiH vyakti vAcaka tvaH eva upapadyate/ vAkya SezAM api
   'yatrānyā oṣadhayo mlāyanta' ityādiḥ	ayatra anyAH ozaDayaH mlAyanta a ityAdiH

   pākaṃ karotītyādi kriyādivyaktivācakatāpakṣasvarasam/	pAkam karoti ityAdi kriyA Adi vyakti vAcaka tA pakza svarasam/
   prasiddhapadasāṃnidhyamapi 'iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rauti'	prasidDa pada sAMniDyam api aiha sahakAratarO maDuram pikaH rOti a
   ityādikaṃ dravyavācakatva eva saṃgatam/ ato gavādiśabdānāṃ	iti Adikam dravya vAcaka tvaH eva saMgatam/ atas gavA Adi SabdAnAm
   jātiśaktatve na kimapi pramāṇaṃ svārasikam/ bādhakāni ca bhūyāṃsi	jAti Sakta tve na kim api pramANam svArasikam/ bADakAni ca BUyAMsi

   kiṃ ca jātireva yadi	kim ca jAtiH eva yadi
   gavādiśabdārthaṃstarhi gotvaṃ vyaktiniṣṭhamitivat	gavA Adi Sabda arTan= tarhi go tvam vyakti nizWam iti vat

   jātimātravivakṣayā prayoge tvatalādyapekṣā ca na syāt/ kiṃ ca khaṇḍo	jAti mAtra vivakzayA prayoge tu atala Adi apekzA ca na syAt/ kim ca KaNxaH

   tadanvaya iti/ tadapi na/ kutrāpi vākye	tad anvayaH iti/ tat api na/ kutra api vAkye

   yuktam iti naiyāyikāḥ/	yuktam iti nEyAyikAH/
   [ 12 ] prāmāṇyavicāraḥ	[ 12 ] prAmANya vicAraH

   jñānagataprāmāṇyajñānamapi pravṛttiheturiti vaktavyam/ na cedaṃ jñānaṃ	jQAna gata prAmANya jQAnam api pravRtti hetuH iti vaktavyam/ na ca idam jQAnam
   prameti jñānaṃ vināpi pravṛtterutpattyā vyatirekavyabhicārāt	pramA iti jQAnam vinA api pravRtteH utpattyA vyatireka vyaBicArAt 
   prāmāṇyajñānasya pravṛttihetutvaṃ nāstīti vācyam/	prAmANya jQAnasya pravRtti hetu tvam na asti iti vAcyam/
   bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhye yāgādau pravṛtteḥ prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vinā	bahu vitta vyaya AyAsa sADye yAga AdO pravRtteH prAmANya niScayam vinA
   asaṃbhavāt/ na ca tatrāpyāvaśyakārthaniśyādeva pravṛttiriti vācyam/	asaMBavAt/ na ca tatra api AvaSyaka arTa niSyAt eva pravRttiH iti vAcyam/
   yatsaṃśayaḥ yadvyatirekaniścayaśca yatpratibandhakau	yad saMSayaH yat vyatireka niScayaH ca yat pratibanDakO
   tanniścayastaddheturityavaśyaṃ svīkaraṇīyam/ yathā vyāptisaṃśaye vā	tat niScayaH tad hetuH iti avaSyam svIkaraNIyam/ yaTA vyApti saMSaye vA
   vyāptivyatirekaniścaye vā satyanumitirna jāyata iti	vyApti vyatireka niScaye vA sati anumitiH na jAyate iti

   prāmāṇyasaṃśaye vā prāmāṇyavyatirekaniścaye vā sati pravṛttirna	prAmANya saMSaye vA prAmANya vyatireka niScaye vA sati pravRttiH na
   jāyata iti pravṛttiṃ prati prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ kāraṇamiti sidhyati/ tathā	jAyate iti pravRttim prati prAmANya niScayaH kAraNam iti siDyati/ taTA
   ca jñānapramātyaniścayaṃ vinā pravṛttyasaṃbhava iti/ na ca jñāne	ca jQAna pramAti a niScayam vinA pravRtti asaMBavaH iti/ na ca jQAne
   prāmāṇyasaṃdehe	prAmANya saMdehe
   satyarthasaṃdehāt	satyarTa saMdehAt 
   arthaniścayarūpakāraṇābhāvādeva pravṛttyabhāvopapattau pravṛttiṃ prati	arTa niScaya rUpa kAraNa aBAvAt eva pravRtti aBAva upapattO pravRttim prati
   prāmāṇyasaṃdehasya pratibandhakatvābhāvenoktaniyamāpravṛttyā	prAmANya saMdehasya pratibanDaka tva aBAvena ukta niyama apravRttyA

   prāmāṇyasvatastvaparatastvavicāro 'navasara iti vācyam/ yatra	prAmANyasvataH tu aparataH tu avicAraH anavasaraH iti vAcyam/ yatra
   jñānaviśeṣe pramātvasaṃdeho tatra niṣkampapravṛttiḥ	jQAna viSeze pramAtu a saMdehaH tatra nizkampa pravRttiH
   idamitthamevetyavadhāraṇādeva saṃpādanīyā/ taccāvadhāraṇaṃ jñānasya	idam itTam eva iti avaDAraNAt eva saMpAdanIyA/ tat ca avaDAraNam jQAnasya
   pramātvaniścayaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti	pramAtva niScayam vinA na saMBavati iti
   pravṛttihetubhūtārthaniścayahetutayā prāmāṇyaniścayasya pravṛttiṃ prati	pravRtti hetu BUta arTa niScaya hetu tayA prAmANya niScayasya pravRttim prati
   prayojakatvāt prāmāṇyaniścayo 'pi saṃpādanīyaḥ/ sa ca svataḥ parato	prayojaka tvAt prAmANya niScayaH api saMpAdanIyaH/ sa ca svatas paratas 
   veti vicāro yukta eva/	vA iti vicAraH yuktaH eva/

   prathamaniruktimātraṃ	praTama nirukti mAtram
   dīpikāyāmanūditam/ jñānaṃ yayā sāmagyā jñāyate tayaiva jñānagataṃ	dIpikAyAm anUditam/ jQAnam yayA sAmagyA jQAyate tayA eva jQAna gatam
   pramātvamapi jñāyata iti jñānagrāhakasāmagrīgnāhyatvātmakaṃ prathamaṃ	pramAtvam api jQAyate iti jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI gna Ahya tva Atmakam praTamam
   svatastvam/ tatraprābhākarāḥ   ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyeva jñānākāraḥ/ tasya	svatas tvam/ tatra prABa AkarAH  Gawam aham jAnAmi iti eva jQAna AkAraH/ tasya

   bhāṭṭāḥ    jñānaṃ	BAwwAH   jQAnam
   jñātatayānumīyata iti jñātatāliṅgakānumitiḥ	jQAta tayA anumIyate iti jQAta tA liFgaka anumitiH
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahaḥ tadviṣayatvaṃ	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya grahaH tad vizaya tvam
   prāmāṇyasyetyācakṣate/murārimiśrāḥ    'ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ' iti jñānānantaraṃ	prAmANyasya iti Acakzate/mura ari miSrAH   aayam GawaHa iti jQAna anantaram
   'ghaṭamahaṃ jñānāmi' ityanuvyavasāyo jāyate/ tena jñāne	aGawam aham jQAnAmi a iti anuvyavasAyaH jAyate/ tena jQAne
   viṣayīkriyamāṇe tadgataṃ pramātvamapi viṣayīkriyate/ tathā ca	vizayI kriyamANe tad gatam pramAtvam api vizayIkriyate/ taTA ca
   jñānagrāhakānuvyavasāyagrāhyatvāt prāmāṇyasya	jQAna grAhaka anu vyavasAya grAhya tvAt prAmANyasya
   svatastvamityupavarṇayanti/ matatraye 'pi	svatas tvam iti upavarNayanti/ mata traye api
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrayāḥbhinnatve 'pi jñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvātmakaṃ	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrayAH Binna tve api jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tva Atmakam
   svatastvaṃ	svatas tvam
   sādhāraṇam/ atra	sADAraNam/ atra
   yatprāmāṇyāśraye jñāne doṣavaśādaprāmāṇyagrāhikā kācana sāmagrī tayā	yad prAmANya ASraye jQAne doza vaSAt aprAmANyagrAhikA kAcana sAmagrI tayA
   tatprāmāṇyasyāgrahāt svatastvabādhaḥ syāditi aprāmāṇyagrāhaketi	tad prAmANyasya agrahAt svatas tu abADaH syAt iti aprAmANya grAhaka iti
   sāmagrīviśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ evamapi idaṃ jñānamaprameti jñānaniṣṭhasya	sAmagrI viSezaNam deyam/ evam api idam jQAnam apramA iti jQAna nizWasya
   aprāmāṇyavati aprāmāṇyaprakārakatvarūpasya prāmāṇyasya	aprAmANyavati aprAmANya prakAraka tva rUpasya prAmANyasya
   aprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryaivaṃ grahaṇāt	aprAmANya grAhaka sAmagrya evam grahaNAt 
   aprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvātmakasvatastvasya tatra bādhaḥ syāditi	aprAmANya grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tva Atmakasvatastvasya tatra bADaH syAt iti
   tadvāraṇāya tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi vaktavyam/ tasmin aprāmāṇgrāhaketi	tad vAraNAya tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti vaktavyam/ tasmin aprAmANgrAhaka iti
   tadarthaṃḥ/ yādṛśaprāmāṇye svatastvamiṣyate	tad arTaMH/ yAdRSa prAmANye svatas tvam izyate
   tādṛśaprāmāṇyāśrayaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānajanaketi yāvat/	tAdRSa prAmANya ASraya viSezyakA prAmANya prakAraka jQAna janaka iti yAvat /
   idaṃ jñānamapremetyākārakajñānaniṣṭhaprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryāḥ/	idam jQAnam aprema iti AkAraka jQAna nizWa prAmANya grAhaka sAmagryAH/
   idañjñānaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyagrāhakatve 'pi prakṛtaprāmāṇyāśrayabhūtaṃ	idaQjQAna viSezyakA prAmANyagrAhaka tve api prakRta prAmANya ASraya BUtam
   yat idaṃ jñānamaprametyākārakaṃ jñānaṃ	yat idam jQAnam apramA ityAkArakam jQAnam
   tadviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyajñānājanakatvānna doṣaḥ/ naiyāyikairapi	tad viSezyakA prAmANya jQAna ajanaka tvAt na dozaH/ nEyAyikEH api
   jñānagrāhakaṃ yat idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt	jQAna grAhakam yat idam jQAnam pramA samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt 
   ityanumānaṃ tadgrāhyatvasya pramātve 'ṅgīkārāt	iti anumAnam tat grAhya tvasya pramAtve aFgIkArAt 
   svatastvāpattivāraṇāya yāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīti yāvattvaviśeṣaṇamapi	svatas tu Apatti vAraNAya yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagri iti yAvat tva viSezaNam api
   deyam/ tacca sāmāgryāṃ na viśeṣaṇam/ sarvābhirjñānasāmagrībhirekasya	deyam/ tat ca sAma agryAm na viSezaNam/ sarvABiH jQAna sAmagrIBiH ekasya
   jñānasyājananena yāvatsāmagrījanyagrahāprasiddhaṃḥ/ api tu	jQAnasya Ajananena yAvat sAmagrI janya graha aprasidDaMH/ api tu
   jñānaviśeṣaṇam/ tathā ca	jQAna viSezaNam/ taTA ca
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyayāvadgrahaviṣayatvamiti phalitam/	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya yAvat graha vizaya tvam iti Palitam/
   tādṛśayāvadgrahāntargatānuvyavasāyagrāhyatvasya prāmāṇye	tAdRSa yAvat graha antargata anuvyavasAya grAhya tvasya prAmANye
   naiyāyikairanaṅgīkārānna doṣaḥ/ yāvattvasya ca vyāpakatvarūpatvāt	nEyAyikEH anaFgIkArAt na dozaH/ yAvat tvasya ca vyApaka tva rUpa tvAt
   tadaprāmāṇyagrāhakatattaddharmaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahatvavyāpakaviṣayitānirūpakatvaṃ	tad aprAmANya grAhaka tad tad Darma prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha tva vyApaka vizayitA nirUpaka tvam
   svatastvamiti dīdhitikārairniṣkarṣaḥ kṛtaḥ/ sa niṣkarṣaḥ	svatas tvam iti dIDitikArEH nizkarzaH kRtaH/ sa nizkarzaH
   prakāśikāyāmanūditaḥ/	prakASikAyAm anUditaH/
   atha prāmāṇyavādasya tulanātmakadṛṣṭyā	aTa prAmANya vAdasya tulana Atmaka dRzwyA
   vicāraḥ	vicAraH
   pramātmakajñānagataṃ	pramA Atmaka jQAna gatam
   prāmāṇyaṃ apramātmakajñānagatamaprāmāṇyaṃ ca kiṃ svataḥ uta parata ityatra	prAmANyam apramA Atmaka jQAna gatam aprAmANyam ca kim svatas uta paratas iti atra
   tīrthakarā vipratipadyante/ tatra prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ cetyubhayaṃ svata	tIrTakarAH vipratipadyante/ tatra prAmANyam aprAmANyam ca iti uBayam svata
   iti sāṃkhyāḥ/ ubhayaṃ parata iti vaiśeṣikādayaḥ/ aprāmāṇyaṃ parata	iti sAMKyAH/ uBayam paratas iti vESezika AdayaH/ aprAmANyam parata
   iti bauddhāḥ/ prāmāṇyaṃ svataḥ aprāmāṇyaṃ parata iti mīmāṃsakāḥ	iti bOdDAH/ prAmANyam svatas aprAmANyam paratas iti mImAMsakAH
   vedāntinaśceti catvāraḥ pakṣāḥ/	vedAntinaH ca iti catvAraH pakzAH/
   sāṃkhyamatam	sAMKya matam
   jñāne	jQAne
   pūrvamavidyamānaṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā paścāt kāraṇabalādutpadyata	pUrvam avidyamAnam prAmANyam aprAmANyam vA paScAt kAraNa balAt utpadyata
   ityaṅgīkāre asatkāryavādo bhavediti bhītāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ	iti aFgIkAre asat kArya vAdaH Bavet iti BItAH sAMKyAH
   prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ cetyubhayamapi svābhāvikamiti/	prAmANyam aprAmANyam ca iti uBayam api svABAvikam iti/
   paraṃ tu ubhayamapi	param tu uBayam api
   hetuviśeṣaṃ vinā yadi svabhāvato bhavetām, tadā 'idaṃ jñānaṃ	hetu viSezam vinA yadi svaBAvataH Baveta Am, tadA aidam jQAnam
   pramāṇaṃ' 'idaṃ jñānamapramāṇam' iti vyavasthā na syāt iti	pramANama aidam jQAnam apramANam a iti vyavasTA na syAt iti
   asvārasyamasmin mate 'sti/	asvArasyam asmin mate asti/
   bauddhamatam	bOdDa matam
   aprāmāṇyaṃ svataḥ	aprAmANyam svatas 
   prāmāṇyaṃ parata iti manyante bauddhāḥ/ tathā hi     yadi prāmāṇyaṃ	prAmANyam paratas iti manyante bOdDAH/ taTA hi    yadi prAmANyam
   svata eva niścīyate, tarhi prāmāṇyarūpaikatarakoṭeḥ niścayāt idaṃ	svatas eva niScIyate, tarhi prAmANya rUpa ekatara koweH niScayAt idam
   jñānaṃ pramā apramā veti saṃśayo na syāt/ ataḥ kāraṇabhūtasya guṇasaya	jQAnam pramA apramA vA iti saMSayaH na syAt/ atas kAraNa BUtasya guNa saya
   jñānāt pravṛttisaṃvādācca prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyate/	jQAnAt pravRtti saMvAdAt ca prAmANyam niScIyate/
   taduktam    	tat uktam    
   'tasmin sadapi	atasmin sat api
   mānatvaṃ viniścetuṃ na śakyate/	mAna tvam viniScetum na Sakyate/
   uttarārthakriyājñānāt	uttara arTa kriyA jQAnAt
   kevalaṃ tat pratīyate//'	kevalam tat pratIyate// a
   iti/ aprāmāṇyaṃ tu	iti/ aprAmANyam tu
   svata evāvasīyate/ ata eva vedādutpannaṃ jñānaṃ viparyayarūpam/ ataḥ	svatas eva avasIyate/ atas eva vedAt utpannam jQAnam viparyaya rUpam/ atas 
   svato 'pramāṇaṃ vedāḥ iti bauddhānāmākūtam/	svatas apramANam vedAH iti bOdDAnAm AkUtam/
   idamatra dūṣaṇam/	idam atra dUzaNam/
   aprāmāṇyaṃ svābhāvikamiti vādināṃ mate 'pi bhramajñāne 'dhiṣṭhānāṃśe	aprAmANyam svABAvikam iti vAdinAm mate api Brama jQAne aDizWAna aMSe
   prāmāṇyasya svābhāvikatvaṃ vaktavyam/ anyathā	prAmANyasya svABAvika tvam vaktavyam/ anyaTA
   niradhiṣṭhānabhramaprasaṅgāt/ kiṃ ca 'pramāṇāt prameyasiddhiḥ'	niraDizWAna Brama prasaFga at/ kim ca apramANAt prameya sidDiH a
   'yuktiyuktaṃ vaco grāhyam' ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ sarvairapi vādibhiḥ	ayukti yuktam vacaH grAhyam a iti Adikam vacanam sarvEH api vAdiBiH
   svataḥ pramāṇamiti vaktavyam/ tathā nirvikalpakasya	svatas pramANam iti vaktavyam/ taTA nirvikalpakasya
   vāsanopaplavaśūnyasya svata eva prāmāṇyamupagacchanti/ savikalpakasyāpi	vAsanA upaplava SUnyasya svatas eva prAmANyam upagacCanti/ sa vikalpakasya api
   svāṃśe prāmāṇyaṃ viṣayāṃśe 'prāmāṇyaṃ ca vadanti/ tathā ca kutracit	sva aMSe prAmANyam vizaya aMSe aprAmANyam ca vadanti/ taTA ca kutracid 
   prāmāṇyasvatastvaṃ teṣāmapyavarjanīyam/ api ca sarveṣvapi jñāneṣu	prAmANyasvataH tvam tezAm api avarjanIyam/ api ca sarvezu api jQAnezu
   kiñcidaṃśe prāmāṇyasya sattvāt aprāmāṇyasyaiva kvācitkatvāt tadeva	kiQcid aMSe prAmANyasya sattvAt aprAmANyasya eva kvAcid ka tvAt tat eva
   kiṃśukādyupādhikāruṇyavat sahetukaṃ, prāmāṇyameva nirhetukamiti	kiMSuka Adi upADika aruNya vat sa hetukaM, prAmANyam eva nirhetukam iti
   vyavasthāpanāt iti mīmāṃsakāḥ/ naiyāyikāstu doṣataḥ aprāmāṇyaṃ	vyavasTApanAt iti mImAMsakAH/ nEyAyikAH tu dozataH aprAmANyam
   guṇataḥ prāmāṇyamityāhuḥ/ sarvathā aprāmāṇyasvatastvaṃ na ghaṭate/	guNataH prAmANyam iti AhuH/ sarvaTA aprAmANI asvataH tvam na Gawate/
   mīmāṃsakamatam/	mImAMsaka matam/
   prāmāṇyaṃ svata	prAmANyam svata
   evotpadyate jñāyate ca/ aprāmāṇyaṃ tu parata utpadyate jñāyate ceti	eva utpadyate jQAyate ca/ aprAmANyam tu paratas utpadyate jQAyate ca iti
   mīmāṃsakāḥ/ prāmāṇyaṃ svata utpadyata ityasya prāmāṇyāśrayajñānasya yā	mImAMsakAH/ prAmANyam svatas utpadyate iti asya prAmANya ASraya jQAnasya yA
   sāmagrī utpādikā tayaiva jñānagataṃ prāmāṇyamapyutpadyate, na tu	sAmagrI utpAdikA tayA eva jQAna gatam prAmANyam api utpadyate, na tu
   guṇādityarthaḥ/ tena ca vedādutpannasya jñānasya yat prāmāṇyaṃ tatra	guNAt iti arTaH/ tena ca vedAt utpannasya jQAnasya yat prAmANyam tatra
   vaktṛyathārthajñānarūpaguṇāpekṣāvirahāt vedasyāpauruṣeyatvaṃ sthiraṃ	vaktR yaTArTa jQAna rUpa guNa apekzA virahAt vedasya apOruzeya tvam sTiram
   bhavatīti teṣāmāśayaḥ/ prāmāṇyaṃ svato jñāyata ityasya	Bavati iti tezAm ASayaH/ prAmANyam svatas jQAyate iti asya
   prāmāṇyāśrayasya jñānasya yayā sāmagryā jñānaṃ bhavati tayaiva	prAmANya ASrayasya jQAnasya yayA sAmagryA jQAnam Bavati tayA eva
   tadgataprāmāṇyasyāpi jñānaṃ bhavati/ paścāttu	tad gata prAmANyasya api jQAnam Bavati/ paScAt tu
   bādhakajñānakāraṇadoṣajñānābhyāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhyate/ evaṃ ca apauruṣeye	bADaka jQAna kAraNa doza jQAnAByAm prAmANyam bADyate/ evam ca apOruzeye
   vede anāptapuruṣasaṃbandhakṛtadoṣāṇāmabhāvāt bādhakajñānābhāvācca	vede anApta puruza saMbanDa kRta dozANAm aBAvAt bADaka jQAna aBAvAt ca
   jñātaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate/ tathā ca vedaprāmāṇyasthirīkaraṇameva	jQAtam prAmANyam taTA eva avatizWate/ taTA ca veda prAmANya sTirIkaraNam eva
   jñaptau svatastvasādhanasya prayojanamiti/	jQaptO svatas tu asADanasya prayojanam iti/
   prāmāṇyaniścaye nyāyadarśanābhiprāyaḥ	prAmANya niScaye nyAya darSana aBiprAyaH
   yadyapi nyāyasūtre	yadi api nyAya sUtre
   prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyasvatastvaparatastvavicāraḥ na kṛtaḥ, tathāpi	prAmANya aprAmANI asvataH tu aparataH tu avicAraH na kRtaH, taTA api
   'mantrāyurvedaprāmāṇyavacca tatprāmāṇyamāptaprāmāṇyāt' (nyā0.sū0.	amantra Ayurveda prAmANya vat ca tad prAmANyam Apta prAmANyAt a (nyA0.sU0.
   2 1 68) iti sūtreṇa parataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sūcitameva/ nyāyabhāṣyakāraḥ	2 1 68) iti sUtreNa paratas prAmANyam sUcitam eva/ nyAya BAzya kAraH
   ārambhavākyameva prāmāṇyaparatastvakhyāpakaṃ vinyāsthat  	AramBa vAkyam eva prAmANya paratas tu aKyApakam vinyAsTat  
   'pramāṇator'thapratipattau pravṛttisāmarthyādarthavatpramāṇam' iti/	apramANator aTa pratipattO pravRtti sAmarTyAt arTavat pramANam a iti/
   idaṃ ca bhāṣyavākyaṃ vācaspatimiśraiḥ evamavatāritam   nanu	idam ca BAzya vAkyam vAcaspati miSrEH evam avatAritam  nanu
   yacchāstramanuṣṭhātumaśakyamupāyaṃ pratipādayati tadanarthakam, yathā	yat SAstram anuzWAtum aSakyam upAyam pratipAdayati tad anarTakam, yaTA
   jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnāharaṇopadeśakaṃ śāstram/ idaṃ	jvara hara takzaka cUxA ratna AharaNa upadeSakam SAstram/ idam
   nyāyaśāstramapi tādṛśameva/ tathā hi, ṣoḍaśapadārthatvajñānāddhi	nyAya SAstram api tAdRSam eva/ taTA hi, zoxaSa padArTa tva jQAnAt hi
   niḥśreyasayupadiśyate 'smin śāstre/ tadeva durlabham/ prameyādīnāṃ	niHSreyasayupadiSyate asmin SAstre/ tat eva durlaBam/ prameya AdInAm
   padārthānāṃ tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇatattvajñānāndhīnam/ na hi pramāṇaṃ	padArTAnAm tattva jQAnam pramANa tattva jQAnAn DInam/ na hi pramANam
   tattvenānirṇītaṃ san svaviṣayaṃ avadhārayitumalam/	tattvena anirNItam san sva vizayam avaDArayitum alam/
   pramāṇatattvāvadhāraṇaṃ ca pramātattvāvadhāraṇādhīnam/ na hi pramāṃ	pramANa tattva avaDAraNam ca pramAtattva avaDAraNa aDInam/ na hi pramAm
   tattvenānavadhārayan pramājanakasya tattvamavadhārayituṃ śaknoti/	tattvena anavaDArayan pramAjanakasya tattvam avaDArayitum Saknoti/
   pramāyāśca tattvamavyabhicāritvarūpaṃ svataḥ parato vā	pramAyAH ca tattvam avyaBicAri tva rUpam svatas paratas vA
   niścetumaśakyam/ ghaṭādiviṣayagocaraṃ jñānamātmānamapi	niScetum aSakyam/ Gawa Adi vizaya gocaram jQAnam AtmAnam api
   viṣayīkartumaśaknuvat kathaṃ hi nāma svagataṃ pramātvaṃ grahīṣyatīti	vizayIkartum aSaknu vat kaTam hi nAma sva gatam pramAtvam grahIzyati iti
   svataḥ pakṣaḥ tāvanna yuktaḥ/ jñānaṃ svayaṃprakāśam iti pakṣe 'pi	svatas pakzaH tAvat na yuktaH/ jQAnam svayaMprakASam iti pakze api
   kathañcit jñānasya svaviṣayakatvasambhave 'pi	kaTaQcid jQAnasya sva vizayaka tva samBave api
   svagatāvyabhicāritvarūpapramātvaviṣayakatvaṃ durūpapādam/ parataḥ	sva gata avyaBicAri tva rUpa pramAtva vizayaka tvam durUpa pAdam/ paratas 
   pramātvaṃ jñāyata iti pakṣe 'pi paraśabdena jñānaviṣayakajñānāntarasya	pramAtvam jQAyate iti pakze api para Sabdena jQAna vizaya ka jQAna antarasya
   vā arthakriyāviṣayakajñānasya vā anyasya vā vivakṣāyāṃ teṣāmapi	vE arTa kriyA vizayaka jQAnasya vA anyasya vA vivakzAyAm tezAm api
   svasmin pramātvānavadhāraṇe pūrvajñāne prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ jñātum	svasmin pramAtvA anavaDAraNe pUrva jQAne prAmANyam kaTam jQAtum
   śakyeta/ atasteṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñānāntarebhyaścet teṣāmapi	Sakyeta/ atas tezAm prAmANyam jQAna antareByaH ced tezAm api
   tathetyanavasthā/ teṣāṃ pramātvaṃ svata iti tu	taTA iti anavasTA/ tezAm pramAtvam svatas iti tu
   pūrvoktarītyānupapannam/ tathā ca svataḥ parato vā	pUrva ukta rItyA anupapannam/ taTA ca svatas paratas vA
   pramātattvānavadhāraṇāt pramāṇatattvāvadhāraṇaṃ na sambhavati/	pramAtattva anavaDAraNAt pramANa tattva avaDAraNam na samBavati/
   tadasaṃbhavācca prameyāditattvajñānamapi na saṃbhavati/ tasmāt	tad asaMBavAt ca prameya Adi tattva jQAnam api na saMBavati/ tasmAt 
   pramāṇādiṣoḍaśapadārthatattvajñānānniḥśreyasādhigama	pramANa Adi zoxaSa padArTa tattva jQAnAt niHSreyasa aDigama
   ityupadiśacchastramanarthakamityāśaṅkāyāḥ nirākaraṇārthaṃ"pramāṇato	iti upadiSat Sastram anarTakam iti ASaFkAyAH nirAkaraNa arTaM" pramANataH 
   arthapratipattau"	arTa pratipattO"
   ityādibhāṣyaṃ pravṛttamiti/	ityAdi BAzyam pravRttam iti/
   asya bhāṣyasyāyamarthaḥ  	asya BAzyasya ayam arTaH  
   prāmāṇamarthavaditi pratijñā/ pravṛttisāmarthyāditi hetuḥ/ pramāṇamiti	prAmANam arTavat iti pratijQA/ pravRtti sAmarTyAt iti hetuH/ pramANam iti
   karaṇārthakalyuḍantaḥ śabdaḥ/ arthavaditi nityayoge matup/ nityatā	karaNa arTa kalyuxantaH SabdaH/ arTavat iti nitya yoge matup/ nityatA
   cārthāvyabhicāritā/ arthāvyabhicāritvaṃ ca tadvati tatprakārakatvam/	ca arTa avyaBicAritA/ arTa avyaBicAri tvam ca tadvati tad prakAraka tvam/

   tathā ca devadattaḥ nīlotpalamānayatītyatra ditīyārthaḥ karma, tatra	taTA ca devadattaH nIlotpalam Anayati iti atra ditIya arTaH karma, tatra

   dhātvarthe 'nvayaḥ/ tiṅaḥ kartā arthaḥ/ tatrābhedasaṃbandhena	DAtu arTe anvayaH/ tiFaH kartA arTaH/ tatra aBeda saMbanDena
   prathamāntapadārthasya devadattasyānvayaḥ/ kartuṃrapi dhātvarthe	praTama anta padArTasya devadattasya anvayaH/ kartuMH api DAtu arTe
   ānayana'nvayaḥ/ tathā ca	Anayana anvayaH/ taTA ca

   cānayanamiti dhātvarthamukhyaviśeṣyako bodhaḥ/ atra pramāṇaṃ tu	ca Anayanam iti DAtu arTa muKya viSezyakaH boDaH/ atra pramANam tu
   'bhāvapradhānamākhyātam' iti niruktavacanaṃ 'kriyāpradhānamākhyātam'	aBAvapraDAnam AKyAtam a iti nirukta vacanam akriyA praDAnam AKyAtam a
   iti mahābhāṣyavacanaṃ cetyāhuḥ/	iti mahA BAzya vacanam ca iti AhuH/

   cakrādisahakṛtadaṇḍābhāvaḥ tatra ghaṭābhāva iti taṇḍābhāvavyāpako	cakra Adi saha kRta daNxa aBAvaH tatra GawABAvaH iti taNxa aBAva vyApakaH 
   ghaṭābhāvaḥ/ tathā ca svābhāvavyāpakakāryābhāvakatvāt daṇḍaḥ	Gawa aBAvaH/ taTA ca svABAva vyApaka kArya aBAvaka tvAt daNxaH
   niyatavyatirekasahacāravāniti bhāvaḥ/	niyata vyatireka sahacAravAn iti BAvaH/
   niścayarūpapratibandhakasattvāt maṅgalaṃ	niScaya rUpa pratibanDaka sattvAt maFgalam
   svavyāpakasamāptikamityākārakaniyatānvayasahacāraniścayo na bhavati/	sva vyApaka samAptikam iti AkAraka niyata anvaya sahacAra niScayaH na Bavati/
   evaṃ maṅgalarūpakāraṇābhāve 'pi kādambaryādau	evam maFgala rUpa kAraNa aBAve api kAdambarI AdO
   samāptirūpakāryadarśanāt maṅgalābhāvavyāpakatvaṃ samāptyabhāve	samApti rUpa kArya darSanAt maFgala aBAva vyApaka tvam samApti aBAve
   nāsti, maṅgalābhāvavati 1samāpteḥ sattvāt/ tathā ca maṅgalaṃ	nAsti, maFgala aBAvavati 1samApteH sattva at/ taTA ca maFgalam
   svābhāvāvyāpakasamāptyabhāvakamiti niścayarūpapratibandhakasattvāt	svABAvA vyApaka samApti aBAvakam iti niScaya rUpa pratibanDaka sattvAt 
   maṅgalaṃ svābhāvāvyāpakasamāptyabhāvakamiti	maFgalam svABAvA vyApaka samApti aBAvakam iti
   niścayarūpapratibandhakasattvāt maṅgalaṃ	niScaya rUpa pratibanDaka sattvAt maFgalam
   svābhāvavyāpakasamāptyabhāvakamityākārakaniyatavyatirekasahacāraniścayo	svABAva vyApaka samApti aBAvakam iti AkAraka niyata vyatireka sahacAra niScayaH 
   na bhavati/ tathā ca niyatānvayavyatirekasahacāraniścayarūpasya	na Bavati/ taTA ca niyata anvaya vyatireka sahacAra niScaya rUpasya
   kāraṇasyābhāvāt maṅgalaṃ samāptikāraṇamityākārakaḥ maṅgale	kAraNasya aBAvAt maFgalam samApti kAraNam iti AkArakaH maFgale
   samāptinirūpitakāraṇatvāvagāhī niścayo na bhavatīti/	samApti nirUpita kAraNa tva avagAhI niScayaH na Bavati iti/
   nanu kiraṇāvalyādau	nanu kiraNa Avalya AdO
   maṅgale satyapi samāptyabhāvāt anvayavyabhicāra iti śaṅkāyāḥ	maFgale sati api samApti aBAvAt anvaya vyaBicAraH iti SaFkAyAH
   samādhānārthaṃ hi 'kiraṇāvalyādau vighnabāhulyāt samāptyabhāvaḥ'	samADAna arTam hi akiraNa Avalya AdO viGna bAhulyAt samApti aBAvaH a
   iti granthaḥ prāvartata/ tena tu granthenānvayavyabhicāra eva dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ,	iti granTaH prAvartata/ tena tu granTena anvayavyaBicAraH eva dRXIkRtaH,
   kāraṇe maṅgale satyapi samāptyabhāvasya pratipādanāt ityāśaṅkya	kAraNe maFgale sati api samApti aBAvasya pratipAdanAt iti ASaFkya
   yathā tasmāt granthāt anvayavyabhicārasya parihāro labhyeta tathā	yaTA tasmAt granTAt anvaya vI aBicArasya parihAraH laByeta taTA
   tātparthaṃ kathayati  	tAtparTam kaTayati  
   vighnānyūnasaṅkhyākasyeti/	viGnAnyUna saFKyAkasya iti/
   maṅgalaṃ hi na sākṣāt samāptikāraṇam, kiṃ tu vighnadhvaṃsadvārā/	maFgalam hi na sAkzAt samApti kAraNam, kim tu viGna DvaMsa dvArA/
   vighnadhvaṃsaśca vighnānyūnasaṅkhyākāt balavattarādvā maṅgalāt	viGna DvaMsaH ca viGnAni Una saFKyAkAt balavattarAt vA maFgalAt 
   bhavati/ tathā ca vighnānyūnasaṅkhyākaṃ balavattaraṃ vā maṅgalaṃ	Bavati/ taTA ca viGnAni Una saFKyAkam balavattaram vA maFgalam
   samāptikāraṇam/ kiraṇāvalyādau ca vighnānāṃ bahutvāt tādṛśaṃ	samApti kAraNam/ kiraNa Avalya AdO ca viGnAnAm bahu tvAt tAdRSam
   maṅlaṃ nāstīti samāptirūpaṃ kāryaṃ nābhūt/ ataḥ kāraṇe sati	maFlam na asti iti samApti rUpam kAryam na aBUt/ atas kAraNe sati
   kāryābhāvātmakaḥ anvayavyabhicāro nāstīti bhāvaḥ/	kArya aBAva AtmakaH anvayavi aBicAraH na asti iti BAvaH/
   nighnasamasaṅkhyākasyetyuktau vighnādhikasaṅkhyākasya maṅgalasya	niGna sama saFKyAkasya iti uktO viGna aDika saFKyAkasya maFgalasya
   kāraṇatvamiṣṭaṃ nopapadyetetyata uktaṃ 	kAraNa tvam izwam na upapadyeta iti atas uktaM 
   vighnānyunasaṅkhyākasyeti/	viGnAnyuna saFKyAkasya iti/
   vighnāpekṣayānyūnasaṅkhyākamapi maṅgalaṃ balavattaraṃ cet tasya	viGna apekzayA anyUna saFKyAkam api maFgalam balavattaram ced tasya
   1. samāpteḥ	1. samApteH
   satvāditi/ tathā ca maṅgalābhāvavati samāptyabhāvābhāvarūpasamāpteḥ	satva at iti/ taTA ca maFgala aBAvavati samApti aBAva aBAva rUpa samApteH
   sattvāt tatpratiyogitvameva samāptyabhāvasyeti	sattvAt tad pratiyogi tvam eva samApti aBAvasya iti
   maṅgalābhāvavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ	maFgala aBAva vat nizWA ati anta aBAva apratiyogi tva rUpam
   maṅgalābhāvavyāpakatvaṃ samāptyabhāvasya nāstīti bhāvaḥ/	maFgala aBAva vyApaka tvam samApti aBAvasya na asti iti BAvaH/
   vighnanāśakatvamiṣyate/	viGna nASaka tvam izyate/
   vighnānyenasaṅkhyākasyetyuktau tatsaṅgraho na syādityālocyoktam	viGnAni ena saFKyAkasya iti uktO tad saFgrahaH na syAt iti Alocya uktam
    balavattarasya veti/ nanu kādambaryādau nāstikakṛte	 balavattarasya vA iti/ nanu kAdambarI AdO nAstika kRte
   granthe maṅgalābhāve 'pi samāptidarśanāt vyatirekavyabhicāra iti	granTe maFgala aBAve api samApti darSanAt vyatireka vyaBicAraH iti
   śaṅkāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ hi 'kādambaryādau granthādbahireva maṅgalaṃ	SaFkAyAH parihAra arTam hi akAt ambaryAdO granTAt bahis eva maFgalam
   kṛtamato na vyabhicāraḥ' iti dīpikāgranthaḥ pravṛttaḥ/ tena cabahireva	kRtam atas na vyaBicAraHa iti dIpikA granTaH pravRttaH/ tena cabahis eva
   granthārambhe maṅgalanibandhanamakṛtvā, maṅgalaṃ kṛtam,	granTa AramBe maFgala nibanDanam akRtvA, maFgalam kRtam,
   maṅgalanibandhanamave na kṛtam, maṅgalaṃ tu kṛtemevetyartho	maFgala nibanDa namave na kRtam, maFgalam tu kRtema iva iti arTaH 
   labhyate/ sa tu na yuktaḥ; nāstikena kādambaryādigranthapraṇetrā	laByate/ sa tu na yuktaH; nAstikena kAdambarI Adi granTa praNetrA
   īśvaranamaskārādirūpamaṅgalakaraṇāsambhavādityāśaṅkya	ISvara namaskAra Adi rUpa maFgala karaNA samBavAt ityASaFkya
   vyācaṣṭe bahireveti/janmāntaraṃ evetyarthaiti/ tathā ca	vyAcazwe  bahis eva iti/ janma antaram eva iti arTa eti/ taTA ca
   tādṛśagranthakartuḥ etajjnamani nāstikatve 'pi	tAdRSa granTa kartuH etat jnamani nAstika tve api
   janmāntare āstikatvāt tadānīṃ kṛtāt maṅgalāt asmin janmani	janma antare Astika tvAt tadAnIm kRtAt maFgalAt asmin janmani
   samāptiḥ/ ataḥ kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryarūpaḥ vyatirekavyabhicāro	samAptiH/ atas kAraNa aBAve api kArya rUpaH vyatireka vyaBicAraH 
   durvaca ityāśayaḥ/ nanu janmāntarīyamaṅgalasya tadānīmeva	durvacaH iti ASayaH/ nanu janma antarIya maFgalasya tadAnIm eva
   naṣṭatvāt etajjanmīyasamāptyavyavahitapūrvamasatastasya 1kathaṃ	nazwa tvAt etat janmIya samAptyavyavahita pUrvam asataH tasya 1kaTam
   kāraṇatvaṃ, kathaṃ vā vyatirekavyabhicāraparihāra ityāśaṅkya	kAraNa tvan, kaTam vA vyatireka vyaBicAra parihAraH iti ASaFkya
   svajanyavighnadhvaṃsavattvasambandhena maṅgalasya kāraṇatvāt	sva janya viGna DvaMsavat tva sambanDena maFgalasya kAraNa tvAt 
   maṅgalābhāve1pi tajjanyavighnadhvaṃsarūpadvārasattvāt	maFgala aBAve1pi tad janya viGna DvaMsa rUpa dvAra sattvAt
   kāraṇatvamupapadyate, yathā yāgasya nāśe 'pi tajjanyāpūrvarūpadvārasya	kAraNa tvam upapadyate, yaTA yAgasya nASe api tad janyA pUrvarUpa dvArasya
   svargāvyavahitapūrvaṃ sattvāt yāgasya svargakāraṇatvaṃ tadvadityāśayena	svarga avyavahita pUrvam sattvAt yAgasya svarga kAraNa tvam tadvat iti ASayena
   samādhatte   tādṛśamaṅgalasya	samADatte    tAdRSa maFgalasya
   vighnadhvaṃsadvāreti/evaṃ ca kāraṇatvaṃ sidhyatīti/ pūrvoktarītyā	viGna DvaMsa dvAra iti/evam ca kAraNa tvam siDyati iti/ pUrvokta rItyA
   anvayavyatirekavyabhicārayoḥ parihṛtatvāt	anvaya vyatireka vyaBicArayoH parihRta tvAt 
   anvayavyatirekavyabhicāraniścayarūpapratibandhakābhāvāt	anvaya vyatireka vyaBicAra niScaya rUpa pratibanDaka aBAvAt
   niyatānvayavyatirekasahacāraniścayarūpakāraṇasattvāt maṅgalasya	niyata anvaya vyatireka sahacAra niScaya rUpa kAraNa sattvAt maFgalasya
   samāptikāraṇatvaniścayo bhavatītyarthaḥ/ athavā evaṃ ca  	samApti kAraNa tva niScayaH Bavati iti arTaH/ aTavA evam ca  
   janmāntarīyamaṅgalasya vighnadhvaṃsadvārā sattvāt	janma antarIya maFgalasya viGna DvaMsa dvArA sattvAt 
   janmāntarīyamaṅgalasya	janma antarIya maFgalasya
   2samāptayavyavahitapūrvavūttitvarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ/	2samAptaya vyavahita pUrvavUtti tva rUpam kAraNa tvam siDyati iti BAvaH/
   1. kathaṃ kāraṇatvamiti/	1. kaTam kAraNa tvam iti/
   kāryāvyavahitaprākkṣaṇavṛttitvasyaiva kāraṇatvapadārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	kArya avyavahita prAkkzaNa vRtti tvasya eva kAraNa tva padArTa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   samāptyavyavahitetyādi/ tathā ca sākṣātsambandhena samavāyena samāpteḥ	samApti avyavahita ityAdi/ taTA ca sAkzAt sambanDena samavAyena samApteH
   pūrvaṃ maṅgalasyābhāve 'pi svajanyavighnadhvaṃsavattvasambandhena sattvāt	pUrvam maFgalasya aBAve api sva janya viGna DvaMsavat tva sambanDena sattvAt 
   samāptyavyavahitapūrvakṣaṇavṛttitvamastīti bhāvaḥ/	samApti avyavahita pUrvakzaNa vRtti tvam asti iti BAvaH/
   uktahetudvayādi	ukta hetu dvaya Adi
   ti   'kiraṇāvalyādau	ti  akiraNa Avalya AdO
   vighnabāhulyāt samāptyabhāvaḥ, kādambaryādau granthāt bahireva	viGna bAhulyAt samApti aBAvaH, kAdambarI AdO granTAt bahis eva
   maṅgalaṃ kṛtam' iti pūrvagranthoktahetudvayādityarthaḥ/svasāmagrīvaśāditi/	maFgalam kRtam a iti pUrva granTa ukta hetu dvayAt iti arTaH/ sva sAm agrI vaSAt iti/
   svasyāḥ  samāpteḥ sāmagrī  	svasyAH samApteH sAmagrI  
   buddhipratibhādikāraṇakalāpāḥ tadvaśāt tadadhīnatayetyarthaḥ/ satyapi	budDi pratiBA Adi kAraNa kalApAH tad vaSAt  tad aDIna tayA iti arTaH/ sati api
   maṅgale buddhipratibhādikāraṇakalāpābhāve granthasamāpterasambhavāt	maFgale budDi pratiBA Adi kAraNa kalApa aBAve granTa samApteH asamBavAt 
   buddhipratibhādikameva samāptiṃ prati kāraṇam/ maṅgalaṃ tu	budDi pratiBA Adikam eva samAptim prati kAraNam/ maFgalam tu
   samāptipratibandhakavighnotsāraṇe kāraṇam iti maṇikārāśayaḥ/	samApti pratibanDaka viGna utsAraNe kAraNam iti maNikAra ASayaH/
   maṅgalaṃ kartavyamiti	maFgalam kartavyam iti
   jñānamantarā maṅgalaṃ na ko 'pi kuryāt/ 1tadviṣayakakṛtiṃ prati	jQAnam antarA maFgalam na kaH api kuryAt/ 1tad vizayaka kRtim prati
   tadviśeṣyakakṛtisādhyatājñānasya kāraṇatvāt/ kartavyatvaṃ ca	tad viSezyaka kRti sADya ta ajQAnasya kAraNa tvAt/ kartavya tvam ca
   kṛtisādhyatvam/ maṅgalaṃ kartavyamiti jñānaṃ ca śiṣṭānāṃ granthārambhe	kRti sADya tvam/ maFgalam kartavyam iti jQAnam ca SizwAnAm granTa AramBe
   maṅgalānuṣṭhānarūpeṇa ācāreṇa anumitā yā 'samāptikāmo	maFgala anuzWAna rUpeNa AcAreNa anumitAH yA asamApti kAmaH 
   maṅgalamācareta' iti śrutiḥ tayā bhavati ityāśayena pūrvaṃ	maFgalam Acareta a iti SrutiH tayA Bavati iti ASayena pUrvam
   'śiṣṭācārānumitaśrutibodhitakartavyatākamiṣṭadevatānamaskārātmakaṃ	aSizwa AcAra anumita Sruti boDita kartavya tAkam izwa devatA namaskAra Atmakam
   maṅgalam' itidīpikāyāmuktam/ tena	maFgalam a iti dIpikAyAm uktam/ tena
   maṅgalasya kartavyatve śiṣṭācārānumitā śrutiḥ pramāṇamiti labhyate/	maFgalasya kartavya tve Sizwa AcAra anumitA SrutiH pramANam iti laByate/
   tadave śrutipramāṇakakartaṃvyatākatvaṃ maṅgalasya śaṅkāsamādhānarūpeṇa	tad ave Sruti pramANaka kartaMvyatAka tvam maFgalasya SaFkA samADAna rUpeNa
   sthāpayati 'nanu maṅgalasya kartavyatve kiṃ pramāṇam' ityādinā	sTApayati ananu maFgalasya kartavya tve kim pramANam a ityAdinA
   dīpikāgranthena/ tadetadāha	dIpikA granTena/ tat etat Aha

   vyavasthāpayitumiti/	vyavasTApayitum iti/
   nanu maṅgalasya	nanu maFgalasya
   kartavyatve 'samāptikāmo maṅgalamācareta' iti śrutirna	kartavya tve asamApti kAmaH maFgalam Acareta a iti SrutiH na
   pramāṇam/ tādṛśaśruteḥ paṭhyamānavede kutrāpyadarśanāt	pramANam/ tAdRSa SruteH paWyamAna vede kutra api adarSanAt
   ityāśaṅkāyāṃ śiṣṭācārānumiteti śruterviśeṣaṇamupāttaṃdīpikāyām/ yadyapi	iti ASaFkAyAm Sizwa AcAra anumitA iti SruteH viSezaNam upAttaMdIpikAyAm/ yadi api
   śrutiḥ na pratyakṣā tathāpi ācāreṇa	SrutiH na pratyakzA taTA api AcAreNa

   maṅgalakartavyatve pramāṇamiti	maFgala kartavya tve pramANam iti
   1. tadviṣayakakṛti	1. tad vizayaka kRti
   pratīti/ yathā yāgaviṣayakaprayatnaṃ prati 'yāgaḥ matkṛtisādhyaḥ'	pratIti/ yaTA yAga vizayaka prayatnam prati ayAgaH mad kRti sADyaH a
   ityākārakaṃ yāgaviśeṣyakaṃ kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ	iti AkArakam yAga viSezyakam kRti sADya tva prakArakam jQAnam
   kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	kAraNam iti BAvaH/
   tadāśayaḥ/	tad ASayaH/
   anumānaprakāraśca 'maṅgalaṃ vedabodhitakartavyatākam'	anumAna prakAraH ca amaFgalam veda boDita kartavyatAkam a
   ityādigranthena pradarśitaḥ/ tasmin anumāne	ityAdi granTena pradarSitaH/ tasmin anumAne
   vedabodhitakartavyatākatvaṃ hi sādhyam, na tu vedaḥ/ yat	veda boDita kartavya tAka tvam hi sADyam, na tu vedaH/ yat 
   anumānasādhyaṃ   anumitividheyaṃ tadevānumintamityucyate/ tathā	anumAna sADyam  anumiti viDeyam tat eva anumintam iti ucyate/ taTA
   ca	ca
   vedabodhitakartavyatākatvaṃ śiṣṭācārānumitaṃ na tu veda iti	veda boDita kartavya tAka tvam Sizwa AcAra anumitam na tu vedaH iti
   kathaṃ śruteḥ śiṣṭācārānumitatvamupapadyate?	kaTam SruteH Sizwa AcAra anumita tvam upapadyate?
   anumitividheyatāvacchedakasyāpi anumitiviṣayatvamātreṇa	anumiti viDeya tAvat Cedakasya api anumiti vizaya tva mAtreNa
   anumitividheyatvamaṅgīkṛtyānumitamiti vyavahāropapādane	anumiti viDeya tvam aFgIkRtya anumitam iti vyavahAra upapAdane
   vahnitvamanumitamityapi vyavahārāpatterityāśaṅkāyām	vahni tvam anumitam iti api vyavahAra ApatteH iti ASaFkAyAm
   āśayamāviṣkaroti  	ASayam Avizkaroti  
   atrāyamāśayaiti/	atra ayam ASaya eti/
   vedavodhitetyādi/ vedabodhitakartavyatākatvarūpaṃ	veda voDita ityAdi/ veda boDita kartavya tAka tva rUpam
   yat vakṣyamāṇaṃ vidheyaṃ sādhyaṃ tatkoṭipraviṣṭatve 'pi	yat vakzyamANam viDeyam sADyam tad kowi pravizwa tve api
   tadavacchedakatve 'pītyarthaḥ/apinā	tad avacCedaka tve api iti arTaH/apinA
   vidheyatāvacchedakasya	viDeya tAvat Cedakasya
   vidheyatvāsambhavarūpo virodho	viDeya tva asamBava rUpaH viroDaH 
   dyotyate/tadantarbhāveṇa  vidheyatāvacchedakāntarbhāveṇa/tacchruteḥ   	dyotyate/tad antar BAveNa   viDeya tAvacCedaka antarBAveNa/ tad SruteH   
   'sāmāptikāmo maṅgalamācareta' iti śruteḥ/anumiteḥpūrvamasiddhatvāditi/	asAm Apti kAmaH maFgalam Acareta a iti SruteH/anumiteH pUrvam asidDa tvAt iti/
   tathā ca anumiteḥ	taTA ca anumiteH
   pūrvamasiddhatvameva anumitividheyatāyāṃ prayojakam/ maṅgalasya	pUrvam asidDa tvam eva anumiti viDeya tAyAm prayojakam/ maFgalasya

   asti, tathā anumiteḥ pūrvamasiddhatvāta vidheyatāvacchedakabhūtāyāṃ	asti, taTA anumiteH pUrvam asidDa tvAta viDeya tAvat Cedaka BUtAyAm
   śrutāvapi	SrutO= api
   vidheyatākhyaviṣayatā aṅgīkriyate/ tataśca	viDeya tA AKya vizaya tA aFgIkriyate/ tatas ca

   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   anumitividheyatāvacchedakasyāpyanumitividheyatvāṅgīkāre	anumiti viDeya tAvacCedakasya api anumiti viDeya tva aFgIkAre
   'parvato vahnimān' iti anumitividheyatāvacchedakasya	aparvataH vahnimAna iti anumiti viDeya tAvat Cedakasya
   vahnitvasyāpi tādṛśānumitividheyatvaṃ syāt/ tathā ca	vahni tvasya api tAdRSa anumiti viDeya tvam syAt/ taTA ca
   vahnirdhūmānuminta iti	vahniH DUma anumintaH iti
   vyavahāravat vahnitvaṃ	vyavahAra vat vahni tvam
   dhūmānumitamiti vyavahāro 'pi prāmāṇikaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkāṃ	DUma anumitam iti vyavahAraH api prAmANikaH syAt iti ASaFkAm
   samādhatte eteneti/ anuminteḥ pūrvamasiddhasyaiva	samADatte etena iti/ anuminteH pUrvam asidDasya eva
   vidheyatāvacchedakasya anumitividheyatvāṅgīkāreṇetyarthaḥ/ tathā ca	viDeya tAvat Cedakasya anumiti viDeya tva aFgIkAreNa iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   vahnitvasyānamiteḥ pūrvaṃ siddhatayā nānumitividheyatvaprasaṅga	vahni tva sya anamiteH pUrvam sidDa tayA na anumiti viDeya tva prasaFga
   iti bhāvaḥ/anumitiviṣayatāmiti/	iti BAvaH /anumiti vizaya tAm iti/
   vidheyatāvacchedakatārūpāṃ viṣayatāmityarthaḥ/ viśeṣyatayā	viDeya tAvat Cedaka tA rUpAm vizaya tAm iti arTaH/ viSezya tayA
   viśeṣaṇatayā vā anumitiviṣayatvameva anumitatvavyavahāre	viSezaNa tayA vA anumiti vizaya tvam eva anumita tva vyavahAre
   prayojakamiti svīkāreṇetyarthaḥ/	prayojakam iti svIkAreNa iti arTaH/
   śrutauvidheyatvābhyupagameneti/ anumiteḥ pūrvamasiddhatvāditi	SrutOviDeya tva aByupagamena iti/ anumiteH pUrvam asidDa tvAt iti
   śeṣaḥ/tādṛśavyavahāra iti/ śrutiḥ anumitā iti vyavahāra	SezaH/tAdRSa vyavahAraH iti/ SrutiH anumitAH iti vyavahAra
   ityarthaḥ/bādhakābhāvāditi/	iti arTaH/ bADaka aBAvAt iti/
   anumitamiti	anumitam iti
   vyavahāre anumiteḥ pūrvaṃ siddhatvaṃ bādhakam, tadabhāvāt ityarthaḥ/	vyavahAre anumiteH pUrvam sidDa tvam bADakam, tad aBAvAt iti arTaH/
   nanu 'śrutereva pramāṇatvāt' ityatra evakārasya	nanu aSruteH eva pramANa tvAt a iti atra eva kArasya
   anyayogavyavacchedārthakatayā śrutyatiriktasya pramāṇatvaṃ vyavacchidyata	anya yoga vyavacCeda arTaka tayA Sruti atiriktasya pramANa tvam vyavacCidyata
   iti pratīyate/ tanna saṅgacchate, maṅgalakartavyatāyāṃ 'maṅgalaṃ	iti pratIyate/ tat na saFgacCate, maFgala kartavyatAyAm amaFgalam
   kartavyam samāptiphalakatvāt' ityanumānasyāpi	kartavyam samApti Palaka tvAt a iti anumAnasya api
   pramāṇatvādityāśaṅkāyāmāha  	pramANa tvAt iti ASaFkAyAm Aha  
   evakāro 'pyarthakaiti/	eva kAraH api arTaka eti/
   aperartho yasya saḥ apyarthakaḥ, apyarthasuccayārthaka ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca	apeH arTaH yasya saH api arTakaH, api arTa succaya arTakaH iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   śruterevetyasya śruterapītyarthaḥ/ apinā anumānasya pramāṇatvaṃ	SruteH eva iti asya SruteH api iti arTaH/ apinA anumAnasya pramANa tvam
   samuccīyate/ ato nāsaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ/	samuccIyate/ atas na asaFgatiH iti BAvaH/
   śruteranumitatvaṃ	SruteH anumita tvam
   anumitividheyatāvacchedake 'pi pūrvamasiddhe vidheyatvāṅgīkāreṇa	anumiti viDeya tAvat Cedake api pUrvam asidDe viDeya tva aFgIkAreNa
   upapāditaṃ prakāśikākāraiḥ/ etaṃ kleśaṃ śruteranumitatvam	upapAditam prakASika AkArEH/ etam kleSam SruteH anumita tvam
   upapādayatāṃ matamāha anye tvi	upapAdayatAm matam Aha anye tvi
   ti/ 'maṅgalaṃ	ti/ amaFgalam
   vedabodhitakartavyatākam' iti pratijñāyāḥ maṅgalaṃ	veda boDita kartavyatAkam a iti pratijQAyAH maFgalam
   svabodhitakartavyatākatvasambandhena vedaviśiṣṭam ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca	sva boDita kartavya tAka tva sambanDena veda viSizwam iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   tādṛśānumitau veda eva vidheya iti	tAdRSa anumitO vedaH eva viDeyaH iti
   vedasyānumitatvamanāyāsenopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/	vedasya anumita tvam anAyAsena upapadyate iti BAvaH/
   īdṛśaparamparāyāḥ sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhatve mānābhāvaḥ,	IdRSa paramparAyAH sADya tAvat Cedaka sambanDa tve mAna aBAvaH,
   yathāśrutamūlārthatyāgaścāsvarasaḥāhurityanena sūcitaḥ/	yaTA Sruta mUla arTa tyAgaH ca asvarasaH AhuH iti anena sUcitaH/
   dīpikāyāmalaukikāvigītaśiṣṭācāraviṣayatvāditi/ śiṣṭānāmācāraḥ śiṣṭācāraḥ	dIpikAyAm alOkikA vigIta Sizwa AcAra vizaya tvAt iti/ SizwAnAm AcAraH Sizwa AcAraH
   śiṣṭācārasya viṣayaḥ śiṣṭācāraviṣayaḥ, avigītaścāsau	Sizwa AcArasya vizayaH Sizwa AcAra vizayaH, avigItaH ca asO
   śiṣṭācāraviṣayaśca avigītaśiṣṭācāraviṣayaḥ, alaukikaścāsau	Sizwa AcAra vizayaH ca avigIta Sizwa AcAra vizayaH, alOkikaH ca asO
   avigītaśiṣṭācāraviṣayaśca alaukikāvigīntaśiṣṭācāraviṣayaḥ tasya	avigIta Sizwa AcAra vizayaH ca alOkikA vigInta Sizwa AcAra vizayaH tasya
   bhāvastattvam/ alaukikatve sati avigītatve sati śiṣṭācāraviṣayatvaṃ	BAvaH tattvam/ alOkika tve sati avigIta tve sati Sizwa AcAra vizaya tvam
   heturiti phalitam/ laukikatvaṃ vidhyatiriktapramāṇagamyatvam,	hetuH iti Palitam/ lOkika tvam viDi ati rikta pramANa gamya tvam,
   tadbhinnatvamalaiṅkikatvam/ hetau	tad Binna tvam alEFkika tvam/ hetO
   alaukikatvānupādāne	alOkika tva anupAdAne
   rāgaprāpte bhojanādau vedabodhitakartavyatākatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati	rAga prApte Bojana AdO veda boDita kartavya tAka tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati
   avigītaśiṣṭācāraviṣayatvarūpahetusattvāt vyabhicāraḥ syāt/	avigIta Sizwa AcAra vizaya tva rUpa hetu sattvAt vyaBicAraH syAt /
   tadvāraṇāya alaiṅkikatvamupāttam/ avigītatvaṃ dharmaśāstrāniṣiddhatvam/	tad vAraNAya alEFkika tvam upAttam/ avigIta tvam Darma SAstra anizidDa tvam/
   tadanupādāne vedabodhitakartavyatākatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati	tad anupAdAne veda boDita kartavya tAka tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati
   rātriśrāddhādau 1alaiṅkikaśiṣṭācāraviṣayatvarūpahetusattvāt	rAtri SrAdDa AdO 1alEFkika Sizwa AcAra vizaya tva rUpa hetu sattvAt
   vyabhicāraḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya avigītatvamupāttam/ rātriśrāddhādeḥ	vyaBicAraH syAt/ tad vAraNAya avigIta tvam upAttam/ rAtri SrAdDa AdeH
   'rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta' iti dharmaśāstraniṣiddhatvāt na tatra	arAtrO SrAdDam na kurvIta a iti Darma SAstra nizidDa tvAt na tatra
   vyabhicāraḥ/	vyaBicAraH/
   prakāśikāyāṃvidhimantareti/ liṅloṭtavyapratyayaghaṭitaṃ	prakASikAyAMviDim antarA iti/ liFlowtavya pratyaya Gawitam
   vedavākyaṃ vidhiḥ/vedoktatattvajñāneneti/	veda vAkyam viDiH/veda ukta tattva jQAnena iti/
   tṛtīyāyāḥ janyatvamarthaḥ karmakārītyatra kṛdhātvarthakṛtyanvayi/	tRtIyAyAH janya tvam arTaH karma kArI iti atra kRDAtu arTa kRti anvayi/
   vedoktaṃ yattattvaṃ tadviṣayakajñānajanyā yā	veda uktam yat tattvam tad vizayaka jQAna janyA yA
   vedavihitakarmaviṣayakakṛtiḥ tadāśrayaḥ śiṣṭa	veda vihita karma vizayaka kRtiH tad ASrayaH Sizwa
   ityarthaḥ/vedotthatattvajñāneneti kvacitpāṭhaḥ/ vedajanyaṃ yattattvajñānaṃ	iti arTaH/veda utTa tattva jQAnena iti kvacid pAWaH/ veda janyam yat tattva jQAnam
   tenetyarthaḥ/ sa eva pāṭhaśroyān/ vedavihitakarmakartā śiṣṭaḥ	tena iti arTaH/ saH eva pAWa SroyAn/ veda vihita karma kartA SizwaH
   ityetāvanmātroktau vedavihitāhiṃsādikarmakartuḥ bauddhasyāpi	iti etAvat mAtrA uktO veda vihita ahiMsA Adi karma kartuH bOdDasya api
   śiṣṭatvāpattiḥ/ tadvāraṇāyavedotthatattvajñāneneti/ bauddhasya yat	Sizwa tva ApattiH/ tad vAraNAyaveda utTa tattva jQAnena iti/ bOdDasya yat 
   ahiṃsāditattvajñānaṃ na tat vedajanyamiti	ahiMsA Adi tattva jQAnam na tat veda janyam iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ yadvāvedoktattvajñāneneti	na ati vyAptiH/ yat vA veda uktattva jQAnena iti
   pāṭhaḥ 2sādhīyān/ idaṃ vedoktamiti jñānapūrvakaṃ yaḥ vedavihitaṃ	pAWaH 2sADIyAn/ idam veda uktam iti jQAna pUrvakam yaH veda vihitam
   karma karoti sa śiṣṭaḥ/ bauddhastu vedavihitamahiṃsādikaṃ karma	karma karoti sa SizwaH/ bOdDaH tu veda vihitam ahiMsa Adikam karma
   kurvannapi idaṃ vedoktamiti buddhyā na karoti, tena	kurvan= api idam veda uktam iti budDyA na karoti, tena
   vedaprāmāṇyānabhyupagamāditi na tasya śiṣṭatvāpattiḥ/	veda prAmANya anaByupagamAt iti na tasya Sizwa tva ApattiH/
   nanu śiṣṭācārasyaiva	nanu Sizwa AcArasya eva
   hetutvamastu, kimācāraviṣayatvaparyantasya hetutvānudhāvanena/ na ca	hetu tvam astu, kim AcAra vizaya tva paryantasya hetu tva anuDAvanena/ na ca
   ācāraḥ kṛtiḥ, tasyā	AcAraH kRtiH, tasyAH 
   1. alaukiketi/	1. alOkikA iti/
   rātriśrāddhasya 'śrāddhaṃ kurvīta' iti vidhinaivāvagamāt	rAtri SrAdDasya aSrAdDam kurvIta a iti viDinA eva avagamAt
   vidhyatiriktapramāṇānavagamyatvarūpamalaukikatvamastīti bhāvaḥ/	viDi ati rikta pramANa an avagamya tva rUpam alOkika tvam asti iti BAvaH/
   2. sādhīyāniti/ tathā	2. sADIya aniti/ taTA
   ca vedoktatvaprakārakajñānajanyayāgādikarmānukūlakṛtimattvaṃ	ca veda ukta tva prakAraka jQAna janya yAga Adi karma anukUla kRtimat tvam
   śiṣṭatvamiti labhyate/	Sizwa tvam iti laByate/
   ātmaniṣṭhatvena	Atma nizWa tvena
   maṅgalarūpa pakṣaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt kathaṃ hetutvamiti vācyam/	maFgala rUpa pakza nizWatva aBAvAt kaTam hetu tvam iti vAcyam/
   kṛterviṃṣayatāsambandhena hetutvasambhavāt, samavāyena ātmaniṣṭhāyāḥ	kRteH viMzayatA sambanDena hetu tva samBavAt, samavAyena Atma nizWAyAH
   kṛteḥ viṣayatāsambandhena maṅgalaniṣṭhatayā	kRteH vizaya tA sambanDena maFgala nizWatayA
   hetutvasambhavādityāśaṅkyāhaācāraḥ	hetu tva samBavAt iti ASaFkya ahaA AcAraH
   kṛtirityādinā/ vṛttiḥ ādheyatā tanniyāmakaḥ	kRtiH iti AdinA/ vRttiH ADeya tA tad niyAmakaH
   sambandhaḥ vṛttiniyāmakaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogasamavāyādiḥ/ viṣayatā tu na	sambanDaH vRtti niyAmakaH sambanDaH saMyoga samavAya AdiH/ vizaya tA tu na
   vṛttiniyāmakasambandhaḥ/ viṣayatāsambandhena kṛtiḥ maṅgalavṛttiriti	vRtti niyAmaka sambanDaH/ vizaya tA sambanDena kRtiH maFgala vRttiH iti
   pratītyabhāvāt/ vṛttiniyāmakasambandha eva ca hetutāvacdedakasambandhaḥ	pratItyaBAvAt/ vRtti niyAmaka sambanDaH eva ca hetu tAvat dedaka sambanDaH
   na tu vṛttyaniyāmako viṣayatādiḥ/ tathā ca kṛteḥ	na tu vRtti aniyAmakaH vizayatA AdiH/ taTA ca kRteH
   viṣayatāsambandhāvacchinnahetutvāsambhavāt ācāraviṣayatvasya	vizaya tA sambanDa avacCinna hetutva asamBavAt AcAra vizaya tvasya
   hetutvānudhāvanam/ viṣayatvaṃ tu svarūpasambandhena hetuḥ,	hetu tva anuDAvanam/ vizaya tvam tu svarUpa sambanDena hetuH,
   svarūpasambandhastu vṛttiniyāmaka iti tena sambandhena	svarUpa sambanDaH tu vRtti niyAmakaH iti tena sambanDena
   ācāraviṣayatvasya hetutvaṃ sambhavatītyāśayaḥ/	AcAra vizaya tvasya hetu tvam samBavati iti ASayaH/
   ācāraviṣayatvapadasya	AcAra vizaya tvapadasya
   prayojanaṃ mūle 'nuktamiti svayaṃ tatprayojanaṃ	prayojanam mUle anuktam iti svayam tad prayojanam
   kathayati   svargādiphalaiti/ tathā ca hetau	kaTayati    svarga Adi PalA eti/ taTA ca hetO
   ācāraviṣayatvapadānupādāne alaukikatve sati avigītatvaṃ hetuḥ	AcAra vizaya tva pada anupAdAne alOkika tve sati avigIta tvam hetuH
   syāt/ svargādirūpe phale 'pi tatsattvāt	syAt/ svarga Adi rUpe Pale api tat sattvAt 
   vedabodhitakartavyatākatvarūpasādhyābhāvāt vyabhicāraḥ syāditi	veda boDita kartavya tAka tva rUpa sADya aBAvAt vyaBicAraH syAt iti
   tadvāraṇāyaācāraviṣayatvāt	tad vAraNa ayaa AcAra vizaya tvAt
   ityupāttam/ svargādestu	iti upAttam/ svarga AdeH tu
   kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ nāstīti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ/ nanu kṛteḥ	kRti vizaya tvam na asti iti na vyaBicAraH iti BAvaH/ nanu kRteH
   uddeśyaṃ vidheyam upādānamiti viṣayatrayamasti/ yāgaḥ vidheyaḥ svarga	uddeSyam viDeyam upAdAnam iti vizaya trayam asti/ yAgaH viDeyaH svarga
   uddeśyaḥ prayājādyaṅgajātamupādānam/ svarge	uddeSyaH prayAja Adi aFga jAtam upAdAnam/ svarge
   kṛtinirūpitoddeśyatākhyaviṣayatāyāḥ sattvāt	kRtinirUpita uddeSyatA AKya vizaya tAyAH sattvAt 
   kṛtiviṣayatvopādāne 'pi vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkyāha   vidheyatayā	kRti vizaya tva upAdAne api vyaBicAraH iti ASaFkya aha    viDeya tayA
   ācāraviṣayatvārthakami	AcAra vizaya tva arTa kami
   ti/ tṛtīyāyā abhedor'thaḥ/	ti/ tRtIyAyAH aBedoH aTaH/
   ācāranirūpitavidheyatvābhinnaviṣayatvaṃ hetuḥ/ svargādaiṃ	AcAra nirUpita viDeya tva aBinna vizaya tvam hetuH/ svarga AdEm
   kṛtinirūpitavidheyatākhyaviṣayatvābhāvāt na vyabhicāra iti	kRti nirUpita viDeya tA AKya vizaya tva aBAvAt na vyaBicAraH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   nanu vyāpyāropeṇa	nanu vyApya AropeNa
   vyāpakāropastarkaḥ/ tathā ca tarkasaṅgraha ityasya	vyApaka AropaH tarkaH/ taTA ca tarka saFgrahaH iti asya
   vyāpyāropajanyavyāpakāropātmakatarkapratipādakagrantha ityartho	vyApya Aropa janya vyApakAra upAtmaka tarka pratipAdaka granTaH iti arTaH 
   bhavati/ sa na yujyate, tarkasaṅgrahagranthena	Bavati/ sa na yujyate, tarka saFgraha granTena
   āropamātrasyāpratipādanāt, itarapadārthānāmapi	Ara upa mAtrasya apratipAdanAt, itara padArTAnAm api
   pratipādanādityāśaṅkya tarkaśabdena yathā	pratipAdanAt iti ASaFkya tarka Sabdena yaTA
   granthapratipādyasakalapadārthaḥ/	granTa pratipAdya sakala padArTaH/
   pratipādyeta tathā tarkaśabdo vyutpādyate	pratipAdyeta taTA tarka SabdaH vyutpAdyate
   dīpikāyāmityāha  tarkapadasyetyādinā/āropārthakatvabhramamiṃti/	dIpikAyAm iti Aha   tarka padasya ityAdinA A/Ara upArTaka tva Bramam iMti/
   vyāpyāropeṇa vyāpakāropārthakatvabhramamityarthaḥ/	vyApya AropeNa vyApakAra upArTaka tva Bramam iti arTaH/
   saṅgrahaśabdasyopādānamityapyartho 'sti/ so 'tra na sambhavati;	saFgraha Sabdasya upAdAnam iti api arTaH asti/ saH atra na samBavati;
   1guṇādipadārthānāṃ, dravyeṣvapi ākāśādināmupādānasyāsambhavāt/	1guNa Adi padArTAnAM, dravyezu api AkASa AdinAm upAdAnasya asamBavAt/
   upādānaṃ hi hastakaraṇakavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ/ tasmāt	upAdAnam hi hasta karaNa kavyApAra viSezaH/ tasmAt 
   saṅgrahapadasyasaṅkṣepeṇa svarūpakathanamityartho mūle varṇita	saFgraha padasya saFkzepeNa sva rUpa kaTanam iti arTaH mUle varNita
   ityāhaupādānarūpeti/ nanu svarūpakathanamityatra	iti Aha OpAdAna rUpa iti/ nanu svarUpa kaTanam iti atra
   kathanaśabdasyoccāraṇamarthaḥ/ uccāraṇaṃ nāma	kaTana Sabdasya uccAraNam arTaH/ uccAraNam nAma
   tālvoṣṭhapuṭasaṃyogānukūlavyāpāraḥ/ tasya śabdamātraviṣayakasya	tAlu ozWa puwa saMyoga anukUla vyApAraH/ tasya Sabda mAtra vizaya kasya
   dravyādipadārthasvarūpaviṣayakatvāsambhavāt svarūpakathanamiti śabdaḥ	dravya Adi padArTa svarUpa vizaya ka tva asamBavAt svarUpa kaTanam iti SabdaH
   katha	kaTa
   sādhurityāśaṅkyāha svarūpakathanaṃ	sADuH iti ASaFkya aha  svarUpa kaTanam
   svarūpajñajñanānukūlaḥśabda iti/ tathā ca prakṛte kathanaśabdasya	svarUpa jQa jQana anukUlaH SabdaH iti/ taTA ca prakRte kaTana Sabdasya
   noccāraṇamarthaḥ, kintu	na uccAraNam arTaH, kintu
   jñānānukūlaḥ śabdor'thaḥ/ jñāne svarūpaviṣayakatvānvayāt	jQAna anukUlaH SabdoH aTaH/ jQAne sva rUpa vizaya katva anvayAt
   padārthaṃsvarūpaviṣayakajñānānukūlaśabdaḥ svarūpakathanaśabdārtha iti	padArTaMsvarUpa vizayaka jQAna anukUla SabdaH sva rUpa kaTana Sabda arTaH iti
   nānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ/	na anupapattiH iti BAvaH/
   prekṣāvatāṃ	prekzAvatAm
   buddhipūrvakāriṇāṃ yā granthādhyayane pravṛttiḥ tatra	budDi pUrva kAriNAm yA granTa aDyayane pravRttiH tatra
   anubandhacatuṣṭayamaṅgam/ viṣayaprayojanasambandhādhikāriṇaḥ	anubanDa catuzwayam aFgam/ vizaya prayojana sambanDa aDikAriNaH
   catvāro 'nubandhāḥ/ anubadhnanti puruṣaṃ granthādhyayane	catvAraH anubanDAH/ anubaDnanti puruzam granTa aDyayane
   prerayantītyanubandhāḥ granthapratipādyo viṣayaḥ, granthādhyayanasya	prerayanti iti anubanDAH granTa pratipAdyaH vizayaH, granTa aDyayanasya
   prayojanam, granthasya viṣayasya ca sambandhaḥ, ganthādhyayane 'dhikārī	prayojanam, granTasya vizayasya ca sambanDaH, ganTa aDyayane aDikArI

   1. svaṃ viśeṣadharmaḥ	1. svam viSeza DarmaH

   vibhajate tatreti' itidīpikāgrantho 'nupapannaḥ/ tathā hi  	viBajate tatra iti a iti dIpikA granTaH anupapannaH/ taTA hi  
   dravyapadottaraikavacanasya	dravya pada uttara eka vacanasya
   ekatvamarthaḥ/ tasya prakṛtyarthe dravye 'nvayaḥ/ tasya dvitīyārthe	eka tvam arTaH/ tasya prakRti arTe dravye anvayaH/ tasya dvitIya arTe
   viśeṣyatve	viSezya tve
   ādheyatāsambandhenānvayaḥ/ viśeṣyatāyāḥ nirūpakatāsambandhena	ADeya tA sambanDena anvayaH/ viSezyatAyAH nirUpa katA sambanDena
   dhātvarthaikadeśajñāne anvayaḥ/ vipūrvakabhajadhātoḥ	DAtu arTa eka deSa jQAne anvayaH/ vipUrvaka Baja DAtoH

   tasyānukūlatāsambandhena ākhyātārthakṛtau, tasyāḥ āśrayatāsambandhena	tasya anukUla tA sambanDena AKyAta arTa kRtO, tasyAH ASrayatA sambanDena
   annambhaṭṭe anvaya iti	annamBawwe anvayaH iti
   ekatvaviśiṣṭadravyaviśeṣyakadravyatvavyāpyaparasparāsamānādhikaraṇa 	ekatva viSizwa dravya viSezyaka dravya tva vyApya paraspara asamAna aDikaraNa

   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   'tamaḥ daśamadravyam,	atamaH daSama dravyam,

   tamasaḥ daśamadravyatvaṃ siṣādhayiṣitam/ tatra hetau	tamasaH daSama dravya tvam sizADayizitam/ tatra hetO

   kriyāvattvācca'	kriyAvat tvAt ca a
   ityanumānena	iti anumAnena
   tamaso dravyatvaṃ sādhanīyam/ tatrāpi hetvasiddhiśaṅkā na kāryā;	tamasaH dravya tvam sADanIyam/ tatra api hetu asidDi SaFkA na kAryA;
   'nīlaṃ tamaḥ,' 'calati tamaḥ' ityākārikayā abādhitayā pratyakṣarūpayā	anIlam tamaHaH a acalati tamaH a iti AkArikayA abADitayA pratyakza rUpayA

   1pañcamyantasya rūpādhāratve kriyādhāratve cānvayaḥ/	1paQcamI antasya rUpa ADAra tve kriyADAra tve ca anvayaH/

   jñānasāmānyavācakapratītiśabdaḥ prakṛte pratyakṣātmakajñānaparaḥ,	jQAna sAmAnya vAcaka pratIti SabdaH prakRte pratyakza Atmaka jQAna paraH,

   prātyakṣikapratītibalāditi/	prAtyakzika pratIti balAt iti/

   2janyaguṇādāvapi kālikasambandhana rūpādhāratvasya kriyādhāratvasya ca	2janya guNa AdO= api kAlika sambanDana rUpa ADAra tvasya kriyADAra tvasya ca
   sattvādityāśaṅkyāha  samavāyenanīlarūpavatteyetyarthaiti/ tathā ca	sattvAt ityASaFkyA Aha  samavAyena nIla rUpa vatteyA iti arTa eti/ taTA ca

   vivakṣitam/ janyaguṇādau kālikasambandhāvacchinna	vivakzitam/ janya guNa AdO kAlika sambanDa avacCinna
   1. pratītibalāditi	1. pratIti balAt iti

   2. nityapadārtheṣu	2. nitya padArTezu
   kālikasambandhena kimapi nāsti, nityeṣu kālikāyogāditi	kAlika sambanDena kim api nAsti, nityezu kAlikA yogAt iti

   hetuḥ/	hetuH/

   svarūpasambandhena hetumāhetyarthaḥ/ yadi tamo vāyāvantarbhavet	svarUpa sambanDena hetum Aha iti arTaH/ yadi tamaH vAyO= antar Bavet

   vivakṣitaḥ/ sa ca na vāyāvasti, tatra samavāyena sparśasya sattvāt	vivakzitaH/ sa ca na vAyAvasti, tatra samavAyena sparSasya sattvAt

   tiṣṭhati'	tizWati a
   iti nyāyena sparśasyābhāvaḥ	iti nyAyena sparSasya aBAvaH
   1. rūpaniṣṭhā	1. rUpa nizWA
   kriyāniṣṭhā ca yā ādheyatā tannirūpitādhāratvamityarthaḥ/	kriyA nizWA ca yA ADeya tA tad nirUpita ADAra tvam iti arTaH/
   svarūpasambandhenāstīti	svarUpa sambanDena asti iti

   tatra tatra rūpavattvamiti rūpavattvanirūpitā vyāptistu vāyubhede na	tatra tatra rUpavat tvam iti rUpavat tva nirUpitA vyAptiH tu vAyu Bede na
   sambhavati, vāyubhedavatyākāśādau rūpavattvābhāvena vyabhicārāt/	samBavati, vAyu BedavatI AkASa AdO rUpavat tva aBAvena vyaBicAra at /

   ghaṭādau sparśasyaiva sattvāt/ 'tamaḥ vāyubhinnam,	Gawa AdO sparSasya eva sattva at/ atamaH vAyu Binnam,

   hetuḥ/ yatra yatra vāyubhedaḥ tatra tatra sadāgatimattvābhāva iti	hetuH/ yatra yatra vAyu BedaH tatra tatra sadAgati mat tva aBAvaH iti

   dīpikāyāṃ nāpi tejasīti/ 'tamaḥ tejasi nāntarbhavati	dIpikAyAm na api tejasi iti/ atamaH tejasi na antarBavati

   viṣamavyāptamiti ūhyam/	vizam avyAptam iti Uhyam/
   tamasaḥ dravyatvameva	tamasaH dravya tvam eva

   / tatra tejo 'bhāvapadena	/ tatra tejaH aBAva padena
   tejaḥpratiyogikābhāvavivakṣāyāṃ sūryāditejasvatyapi deśe	tejaH pratiyogika aBAva vivakzAyAm sUrya Adi tejasvatI api deSe
   tejo 'ntarapratiṃyogikābhāvasattvena tama iti pratītiprasaṅgaḥ/	tejaH antara pratiMyogikA BAva sattvena tamaH iti pratIti prasaFgaH/

   tejaḥparamāṇvādisattvena tejassāmānyābhāvasyāsattvena tama iti	tejaH paramANu Adi sattvena tejassAmAnya aBAvasya asattvena tamaH iti
   pratītyanupapattiḥ/ prakāśakaṃ yattejaḥ	prati iti anupapattiH/ prakASakam yat tejaH
   tattvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavivakṣaṇena tejaḥparamāṇvādīnāṃ	tattva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAva vivakzaNena tejaH paramANu AdInAm
   prakāśakatvābhāvāt pūrvoktadoṣavāraṇe 'pi	prakASaka tva aBAvAt pUrva ukta doza vAraNe api
   prakāśakatejastryaṇukakhadyotādimati pradeśe tamaḥpratītyanupapattiḥ/ ataḥ	prakASaka tejaH trI aNukaKa dyotA Adimati pradeSe tamaH prati iti anupapattiH/ atas 
   prauḍhaṃ prākaśakaṃ ca yattejaḥ tattvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvo	prOXam prAkaSakam ca yat tejaH tattva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH 
   vivakṣaṇīyaḥ/ prauḍhatvaṃ ca prakṛṣṭamahatvavattvam/	vivakzaNIyaH/ prOXa tvam ca prakRzwa mahatvavat tvam/
   tryaṇukādetādṛśaprauḍhatvābhāvāt tatsattve 'pi	tri aNukAt etAdRSa prOXa tva aBAvAt tad sattve api
   tamaḥpratīternānupapattiḥ/ tadetatsarvaṃ manasikṛtyāha	tamaH pratIteH na anupapattiH/ tat etat sarvam manasikRtya Aha
    prauḍhaprakāśaketi/ prakāśakapadaprayojanamāha  ataiti/	 prOXa prakASa keti/ prakASaka pada prayojanam Aha  atA eti/
   prauḍhaprakāśakatejastvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvastama	prOXa prakASaka tejaH tvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH tama
   ityuktau prakāśakapadaṃ vayartham/ tejaḥparamāṇūnāṃ	iti uktO prakASaka padam vayarTam/ tejaH paramANUnAm
   prakṛṣṭamahattvarūpaprauḍhatvābhāvādeva vāraṇasambhavāt/ ataḥ	prakRzwa mahat tva rUpa prOXa tva aBAvAt eva vAraNa samBavAt/ atas 
   hiraṇyāditejovāraṇāya prakāśakapadamiti vaktavyam/ evamapi	hiraNya Adi tejaH vAraNAya prakASaka padam iti vaktavyam/ evam api
   cakṣurāditejasvati	cakzuH Adi tejasvati
   pradeśe tamaḥpratītyanupapattiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya udbhūtarūpavattvamapi tejasi	pradeSe tamaH prati iti anupapattiH/ tad vAraNAya udBUta rUpavat tvam api tejasi
   viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ tathā ca	viSezaNam deyam/ taTA ca
   prakṛṣṭamahattvavatprakāśakodbhūtarūpavattejastvāvacchinnapratiyogi	prakRzwa mahat tva vat prakASaka udBUta rUpa vat tejaH tvA avacCinna pratiyogi
   tākābhāvastamaḥ/	tAkA BAvaH tamaH/
   atha vā pauḍhatvaṃ mahāprabhāvattvam/ tenaiva paramāṇūnāṃ hiraṇyādeśca	aTa vA pOXa tvam mahA praBAvat tvam/ tena eva paramANUnAm hiraNya AdeH ca
   vāraṇasambhavāt prakāśakapadamanupādeyam/	vAraNa samBavAt prakASaka padam anupAdeyam/
   mahāprabhāvattvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvastama iti phalitam/	mahA praBAvat tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH tamaH iti Palitam/
   tadetadabhisandhāyāha  digi	tat etat aBisanDAya Aha  digi
   ti/	ti/
   nanu tamaso	nanu tamasaH 
   rūpavattvena dravyatvasya pūrvaṃ prasādhitatvāt	rUpavat tvena dravya tvasya pUrvam prasADita tvAt 
   kathamabhāvarūpatvamityāśaṅkyadīpikāyāṃ'tamaḥ na	kaTam aBAva rUpa tvam iti ASaFkyadIpikAyAM atamaH na
   rūpidravyam' ityādyuktam/ atra tamaso rūpavattvābhāvaḥ dravyatvābhāvaśca	rUpi dravyam a iti Adi uktam/ atra tamasaH rUpavat tva aBAvaH dravya tva aBAvaH ca
   siṣādhayiṣitaḥ/ tamo yadi rūpavat dravyaṃ vā bhavet, tadā	sizA DayizitaH/ tamaH yadi rUpavat dravyam vA Bavet, tadA
   ālokasahakṛtenaiva cakṣuṣā gṛhyeta, yataḥ ālokāsāhakṛtena cakṣuṣā	Aloka saha kRtena eva cakzuzA gRhyeta, yatas AlokA sAha kRtena cakzuzA
   gṛhyate ataḥ tamo na rūpavat na vā dravyamiti/ yatra yatra	gRhyate atas tamaH na rUpavat na vA dravyam iti/ yatra yatra
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ tatra tatra rūpavadbhinnatvaṃ	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH grAhya tvam tatra tatra rUpavat Binna tvam
   dravyabhinnatvaṃ ca	dravya Binna tvam ca
   yathā ālokābhāve iti vyāptisadbhāvāt/ hetau	yaTA Aloka aBAve iti vyApti sadBAvAt/ hetO
   ālokāsahakṛteti viśeṣaṇānupādāne sādhyābhāvavati rūpavaddravye	Aloka asaha kRtA iti viSezaNa anupAdAne sADya aBAvavati rUpavat dravye
   ghaṭādaucakṣurgrāhyatvarūpahetusattvāt vyabhicāraḥ syāditi	Gawa At OcakzuH grAhya tva rUpa hetu sattvAt vyaBicAraH syAt iti
   tadupādānam/ ghaṭādirālokasahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyaḥ na	tad upAdAnam/ Gawa AdiH Aloka saha kRta cakzuH grAhyaH na
   tadasahakṛtacakṣurgrāhya iti na vyabhicāraḥ/ tadāha  ghaṭādāviti/	tad asaha kRta cakzuH grAhyaH iti na vyaBicAraH/ tat Aha  GawA dO= iti/
   nanu cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ nāma	nanu cakzuH grAhya tvam nAma
   cakṣurjanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvam/	cakzuH janya pratyakza vizaya tvam/
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurjanyatamoviṣayakapratyakṣe yatra	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH janya tamaH vizayaka pratyakze yatra
   jñānalakṣaṇapratyāsattyā	jQAna lakzaNa pratyAsattyA
   ghaṭo 'pi bhātaḥ, tatpratyakṣaviṣaye ghaṭādau vyabhicāra iti	GawaH api BAtaH, tad pratyakza vizaye Gawa AdO vyaBicAraH iti
   śaṅkāyāmāha  cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ	SaFkAyAm Aha cakzuH grAhya tvam
   cakṣurjanyajñānīyalaukikaviṣayatvamiti/tamasaścākṣuṣaiti/ tamoviṣayake	cakzuH janya jQAnIya lOkika vizaya tvam iti/tamasaH cAkzuza eti/ tamaH vizayake
   cakṣurjanyapratyakṣa	cakzuH janya pratyakza
   ityarthaḥ/upanayamaryādaye	iti arTaH/upanaya maryAdaye
   ti/ jñānalakṣaṇapratyāsattyetyarthaḥ/	ti/ jQAna lakzaNa pratyAsattyA iti arTaH/
   keṣucit kośeṣu"tena tamasaścākṣuṣe tamovān ghaṭa iti	kezucid koSa izu"tena tamasaH cAkzuze tamovAn GawaH iti
   ghaṭādināmupanayamaryādayā bhāne 'pi na kṣatiḥ"iti	Gawa AdinAm upanaya maryAdayA BAne api na kzatiH"iti
   pāṭho dṛśyate/ tatra 'tamovān ghaṭa iti' iti bhāgaḥ aprāmāṇikaḥ,	pAWaH dRSyate/ tatra atamovAn GawaH iti a iti BAgaH aprAmANikaH,
   upanītaṃ viśeṣaṇatayaiva bhāsate na tu viśeṣyatayeti	upanItam viSezaNa tayA eva BAsate na tu viSezyatayA iti
   siddhāntavirodhāt/ atastadbhāgarahitaḥ pāṭhaḥ eva kvacit dṛśyamānaḥ	sidDAnta viroDAt/ atas tad BAga rahitaH pAWaH eva kvacid dRSyamAnaH
   sādhuḥ/ atha vā 'ghaṭavattamaḥ iti' iti śodhayitvā paṭhanīyam/	sADuH/ aTa vA aGawa vat tamaH itia iti SoDayitvA paWanIyam/
   nanu	nanu
   tejassāmānyābhāvasya pakṣatayā tadantargatasya ālokābhāvasya	tejassAmAnya aBAvasya pakzatayA tad antargatasya Aloka aBAvasya
   dṛṣṭāntatvakathanaṃ na yuktam, pakṣātiriktasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvāt ityata	dRzwAnta tva kaTanam na yuktam, pakza atiriktasya eva dRzwAnta tvAt iti ata
   āha  viśeṣābhāvamiti/	Aha  viSeza aBAvam iti/
   sāmānyadharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadatiriktaḥ	sAmAnya Darma avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH pakzaH, tad atiriktaH
   viśeṣadharmāvacchinnābhāvo dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ ato nānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ/	viSeza Darma avacCinna aBAvaH dRzwAntaH/ atas na anupapattiH iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyatvarūpaheturastu rūpavaddravyabhedarūpasādhyaṃ	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH grAhya tva rUpa hetuH astu rUpavat dravya Beda rUpa sADyam
   māstu ityaprayojakaśaṅkāyāmuktaṃdīpikāyām  	mA astu iti aprayojaka SaFkAyAm uktaMdIpikAyAm  
   rūpidravyacākṣuṣapramāyāmityādi/ yadi rūpidravyabhedo na syāt tarhi	rUpi dravya cAkzuza pramAyAm ityAdi/ yadi rUpi dravya BedaH na syAt tarhi
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyaṃ na syāt/ arthāt yadi rūpidravyaṃ syāt	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH grAhyam na syAt/ arTAt yadi rUpi dravyam syAt 
   tarhi ālokasahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyaṃ syāditi tarkaḥ	tarhi Aloka saha kRta cakzuH grAhyam syAt iti tarkaH
   aprayojakaśaṅkānivārakaḥ vaktavyaḥ/ sa ca tarkaḥ	aprayojaka SaFkA nivArakaH vaktavyaH/ sa ca tarkaH
   rūpavattvaprakārakadravyaviśeṣyakacakṣurjanyapramātmakapratyakṣe ālokaḥ	rUpavat tva prakAraka dravya viSezyaka cakzuH janya pramA Atmaka pratyakze AlokaH
   kāraṇamiti kāryakāraṇabhāve sati syādityāśayena kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ	kAraNam iti kArya kAraNa BAve sati syAt iti ASayena kArya kAraNa BAvaH
   pradarśitaḥ/ tatra pramāpadasya prayojanamāha  ālokaṃ vineti/ tathā	pradarSitaH/ tatra pramApadasya prayojanam Aha  a Alokam vineti/ taTA
   ca pramāpadānupādāne ālokābhāve 'pi	ca pramApada anupAdAne Aloka aBAve api
   rūpavattvaprakārakatamoviśeṣyakabhramātmakapratyakṣotpattyā	rUpavat tva prakAraka tamaH viSezya ka Brama Atmaka pratyakza utpattyA
   vyatirekavyabhicāraḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya pramāpadamiti	vyatireka vyaBicAraH syAt/ tad vAraNAya pramApadam iti
   bhāvaḥ/anyatheti/rūpidravyacākṣuṣapramāyāmālokasya	BAvaH /anyaTA iti/ rUpi dravyacAkzuza pramAyAm Alokasya
   kāraṇatvābhāve ityarthaḥ/	kAraNa tva aBAve iti arTaH/
   nanu	nanu
   rūpidravyaviṣayakacākṣuṣapramāyāmālokasya kāraṇatvaṃ na sambhavati,	rUpi dravya vizaya kacAkzuza pramAyAm Alokasya kAraNa tvam na samBavati,
   ālokaṃ vināpi rūpavatastejodravyasya	Alokam vinA api rUpavataH tejaH dravyasya
   cākṣuṣapramāyāḥ utpattyā	cAkzuza pramAyAH utpattyA
   vyatirekavyabhiñcārāt/ na ca tejobhinnaṃ yat rūpidravyaṃ	vyatireka vyaBiQca arAt/ na ca tejaH Binnam yat rUpi dravyam
   tadviṣayakacākṣuṣapramāyāmevālokasya kāraṇatvam, ato na	tad vizaya kacAkzuza pramAyAm eva Alokasya kAraNa tvam, atas na
   vyatirekavyabhicāra iti vācyam/ tejobhinnatvavat	vyatireka vyaBicAraH iti vAcyam/ tejaH Binna tva vat
   tamobhinnatvamityapi viśeṣaṇaṃ dattvā tamobhinnaṃ tejobhinnaṃ ca yat	tamaH Binna tvam iti api viSezaNam dattvA tamaH Binnam tejaH Binnam ca yat 
   dravyaṃ	dravyam
   tadviṣayakacākṣuṣapramāyāmeva ālokaḥ kāraṇamiti svīkāreṇa ālokaṃ	tad vizaya kacAkzuza pramAyAm eva AlokaH kAraNam iti svIkAreNa Alokam
   vināpi tamasaścākṣuṣatvasambhavāt/ tathā ca	vinA api tamasaH cAkzuza tva samBavAt/ taTA ca
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurgrāṃhyatve 'pi kṣatyabhāvāt tamaso 'tiriktadravyatvaṃ	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH grAMhya tve api kzati aBAvAt tamasaH atirikta dravya tvam
   niṣpratyūhamevetyata āha digiti/ sarvāṃnūbhūyamānoṣṇasparśāśrayatayā	nizpratyUham eva iti atas Aha digiti/ sarvAnnUBUyamAna uzNa sparSa ASraya tayA
   tejodravyasyāvaśyaṃ svīkāryatayā tatpratyakṣanirvāhāya	tejaH dravyasya avaSyam svIkArya tayA tad pratyakza nirvAhAya
   kāryatāvacchedakakoṭau tejobhinnatvaniveśe 'pi	kArya tAvacCedaka kowO tejaH Binna tva niveSe api

   tathā ca	taTA ca
   tamaso dravyatve	tamasaH dravya tve
   ālokāsahakṛtacakṣurgrāhyatvānupapattyā tamo na rūpidravyamiti	Aloka asaha kRta cakzuH grAhya tva anupapattyA tamaH na rUpi dravyam iti
   suṣṭhūktamiti bhāvaḥ//	suzWu uktam iti BAvaH//
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   dravyalakṣaṇam	dravya lakzaNam
   dravyatvajātimattvaṃ guṇavattvaṃ vā dravyasāmānyalakṣaṇam/	dravya tva jAtimat tvam guNavat tvam vA dravya sAmAnya lakzaNam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   muktisādhanībhūtapadārthatattvajñānaṃ lakṣaṇajñānaṃ vinā nopapadyata	mukti sADanIBUta padArTa tattva jQAnam lakzaNa jQAnam vinA na upapadyata
   ityata āha  dravyatveti/ saṃyogajanakatāvacchedakatayā	iti atas Aha  dravya tva iti/ saMyoga janaka tA vacCedaka tayA
   dravyatvajātisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/	dravya tva jAti sidDiH iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   lakṣaṇalakṣyatāvacchedakayorabheda ityata āha	lakzaNa lakzya tAvacCedakayoH aBedaH iti atas Aha
    guṇavattvamiti/dravyasāmānyalakṣaṇami	 guNavat tvam iti/ dravya sAmAnya lakzaNam i
