   nyūnateti bhāvaḥ/	nyUna tA iti BAvaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   mūle	mUle
   dravyatvajātimattvaṃ dravyasya lakṣaṇamuktam/ tatra dravyatvajātau kiṃ	dravya tva jAtimat tvam dravyasya lakzaNam uktam/ tatra dravya tva jAtO kim
   mānamityāśaṅkyāha  saṃyogajanakatāvacchedakatayeti/ anena dravyatvajātau	mAnam iti ASaFkya Aha  saMyoga janaka tA avacCedaka tayA iti/ anena dravya tva jAtO
   anumānaṃ pramāṇamuktaṃ bhavati/ tathā hi	anumAnam pramANam uktam Bavati/ taTA hi
     dravyayoreva saṃyoga iti saṃyogaṃ prati dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇam/	 dravyayoH eva saMyogaH iti saMyogam prati dravyam samavAyi kAraNam/
   samavāyasambandhena saṃyogaṃ prati tādātmyasambandhena dravyaṃ kāraṇam/	samavAya sambanDena saMyogam prati tAdAtmya sambanDena dravyam kAraNam/
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnasaṃyoganiṣṭhakāryatānirupitatādātmyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatā	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna saMyoga nizWa kArya tA nirupita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tA
   dravye vartate/ tāṃ kāraṇatāṃ pakṣīkṛtya tatra kiñciddharmāvacchinnatvaṃ	dravye vartate/ tAm kAraNa tAm pakzIkRtya tatra kiQcid Darma avacCinna tvam
   kāraṇatātvena hetunā sādhanīyam/	kAraNa tA tvena hetunA sADanIyam/
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnasaṃyoganiṣṭhakāryatānirūpitādātmyasambandhāvacchinnadravyaniṣṭhakāraṇatā	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna saMyoga nizWa kArya tA nirUpitAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna dravya nizWa kAraNa tA
   kiñciddharmāvacchinnā kāraṇatātvāt, yā yā kāraṇatā sā sā kāraṇatā	kiQcid Darma avacCinnA kAraNa tA tvAt, yA yA kAraNa tA sA sA kAraNa tA
   kiñciddharmāvacchinnā yathā ghaṭaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitadaṇḍaniṣṭhakāraṇatā	kiQcid Darma avacCinnA yaTA Gawa nizWa kArya tA nirUpita daNxa nizWa kAraNa tA
   daṇḍatvāvacchinnā tadvat ityanumānena dravyaniṣṭhoktakāraṇatāyāṃ	daNxa tva avacCinnA tadvat iti anumAnena dravya nizWA ukta kAraNa tAyAm
   dravyatvarūpakiñciddharmāṃvacchinnatvasiddhau sidhyato dharmasya jātitve	dravya tva rUpa kiQcid DarmAMvacCinna tva sidDO siDyataH Darmasya jAti tve
   lāghavamiti lāghavajñānasahakāreṇa dravyatvākhyajātisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/	lAGavam iti lAGava jQAna sahakAreNa dravya tva AKya jAti sidDiH iti BAvaH/
   dravyasya guṇavattvaṃ	dravyasya guNavat tvam
   lakṣaṇāntaramuktaṃ mūle/ tatkathate bījamāha	lakzaNa antaram uktam mUle/ tat kaTate bIjam Aha
    lakṣaṇalakṣyatāvacchedakayorabheda iti/ dravyasya dravyatvaṃ	 lakzaNa lakzya tAvacCedakayoH aBedaH iti/ dravyasya dravya tvam
   lakṣaṇamitmukte lakṣyaṃ dravyam	lakzaNa m itmukte lakzyam dravyam
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ dravyatvam, lakṣaṇamapi dravyatvameveti	lakzya tA avacCedakam dravya tvam, lakzaNam api dravya tvam eva iti
   lakṣaṇalakṣyatāvacchedakayorabhedaḥ syāt/ nanvastu nāma tayorabhedaḥ,	lakzaNa lakzya tAvacCedakayoH aBedaH syAt/ nanu astu nAma tayoH aBedaH,
   tāvatā ko doṣa iti cet   śrūyatām/ lakṣaṇasya hi lakṣye	tAvatA kaH dozaH iti ced  SrUyatAm/ lakzaNasya hi lakzye
   itarabhedānumitiḥ prayojanam/ lakṣaṇaṃ	itara Beda anumitiH prayojanam/ lakzaNam
   lakṣyoddeśyaketarabhedavidheyakānumitijanakamiti yāvat/ yathā goḥ	lakzya uddeSya ketara Beda viDeyaka anumiti janakam iti yAvat/ yaTA goH
   sāsnāvattvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cet 'gauḥ svetarabhinnā, sāsnāvattvāt'	sAsnAvat tvam lakzaNam ced agOH sva itara BinnA, sAsnAvat tvAt a
   ityanumānena goḥ itarabhinnatvaṃ sidhyati/ tathā prakṛte 'pi	iti anumAnena goH itara Binna tvam siDyati/ taTA prakRte api
   dravyasya yadi dravyatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadā 'dravyam itarabhinnam, dravyatvāt'	dravyasya yadi dravya tvam lakzaNam tadA adravyam itara Binnam, dravya tvAt a
   ityanumānaṃ prayoktavyam/ tatra 'dravyam itarabhinnam'	iti anumAnam prayoktavyam/ tatra adravyam itara Binnam a
   ityanumitiḥ/	iti anumitiH/
   tāṃ prati itarabhedavyāpyadravyatvavat dravyamiti parāmarśaṃḥ kāraṇam/	tAm prati itara Beda vyApya dravya tva vat dravyam iti parAmarSanH kAraNam/
   vyāptiśca hetuvyāpakasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpā/ tathā ca	vyAptiH ca hetu vyApaka sADya sAmAnADikaraNya rUpA/ taTA ca
   dravyatvavyāpaketarabhedasamānādhikaraṇadravyatvavat dravyamiti	dravya tva vyApaketara Beda samAna aDikaraNa dravya tva vat dravyam iti
   parāmarśasya ākāraḥ sampannaḥ/ tatra dravyatve	parAmarSasya AkAraH sampannaH/ tatra dravya tve
   itarabhedasāmānādhikaraṇye bhāsamāne tulyavittivedyatayā	itara Beda sAmAnADikaraNye BAsamAne tulya vitti vedya tayA
   itarabhede dravyatvasāmānādhikaraṇyamapi bhāsate/ tulyavittivedyatā	itara Bede dravya tva sAmAnADikaraNyam api BAsate/ tulya vitti vedya tA
   nāma ekajñānaviṣayatvam/ anumittau ca pakṣavṛttitvātmakaṃ	nAma eka jQAna vizaya tvam/ anumittO ca pakza vRtti tva Atmakam
   pakṣatāvacchedakasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ sādhye bhāsate/ evaṃ ca	pakza tA avacCedaka sAmAnADikaraNyam sADye BAsate/ evam ca
   anumitiviṣayasya itarabhededravyavṛttitvasya parāmarśena	anumiti vizayasya itara Bededravya vRtti tvasya parAmarSena
   viṣayīkṛtatayā parāmarśasiddhasyaiva viṣayasya anumityā sādhanāt	vizayIkRta tayA parAmarSa sidDasya eva vizayasya anumityA sADanAt 
   siddhasādhanākhyo doṣaḥ prasajati/ anumiteḥ pūrvaṃ pakṣe	sidDasADana AKyaH dozaH prasajati/ anumiteH pUrvam pakze
   sādhyaniścayasattve siddhasādhanadoṣaḥ bhavati/ ato dravyasya yadi	sADya niScaya sattve sidDa sADana dozaH Bavati/ atas dravyasya yadi
   dravyatvajātimattvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadā siddhasādhanākhyadoṣaḥ prasajatīti	dravya tva jAtimat tvam lakzaNam tadA sidDa sADana AKya dozaH prasajati iti
   paryālocya lakṣaṇāntarānudhāvanaṃ kṛtamiti bhāvaḥ/	paryAlocya lakzaNa antara anuDAvanam kRtam iti BAvaH/
   sāmānyadharmajñānaṃ	sAmAnya Darma jQAnam
   vinā viśeṣadharmavijñāsāyā anudayāt vibhāgakaraṇamanucitamiti	vinA viSeza Darma vijQAsAyAH anudayAt viBAga karaNam anucitam iti
   śaṅkāparihārāyā mūle dravyasāmānyalakṣaṇamuktamityāha  evañceti/nyūnateti/	SaFkA parihArAyAH mUle dravya sAmAnya lakzaNa m uktam iti Aha  evaQcA iti/nyUna tA iti/
   lakṣaṇākathanarūpā nyūnatetyarthaḥ/	lakzaNa akaTana rUpA nyUna tA iti arTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   avyāptyādilakṣaṇam/	avyApti Adi lakzaNam/
   1lakṣaṇasya trīṇi	1lakzaNasya trINi
   dūṣaṇāni/ lakṣyaikadeśāvṛttitvamavyāptiḥ/ yathā goḥ kapilatvam/	dUzaNAni/ lakzya eka deSa AvRtti tvam avyAptiH/ yaTA goH kapila tvam/
   alakṣye lakṣaṇasya vartanamativyāptiḥ/ yathā goḥ śṛṅgitvam/	alakzye lakzaNasya vartanam ati vyAptiH/ yaTA goH SRFgi tvam/
   lakṣyamātrāvṛttitvamasambhavaḥ/ yathā gorekaśaphavattvam/	lakzya mAtrA vRtti tvam asamBavaH/ yaTA goH eka SaPavat tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   dūṣaṇatrayarahitadharmasyaiva lakṣaṇatvasya vakṣyamāṇatayā tajjñānaṃ	dUzaNa traya rahita Darmasya eva lakzaNa tvasya vakzyamANa tayA tat jQAnam
   viśeṣaṇībhūtadūṣaṇatrayarahitatvajñānaṃ vinā na sambhavati/	viSezaNI BUta dUzaNa traya rahita tva jQAnam vinA na samBavati/
   dūṣaṇatrayarahitatvajñānaṃ tu viśiṣya dūṣaṇatrayajñānādhīnam/	dUzaNa traya rahita tva jQAnam tu viSizya dUzaNa traya jQAna aDInam/
   abhāvabuddhiṃ prati pratiyogitāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapratiyogijñānasya	aBAva budDim prati pratiyogi ta avacCedaka viSizwa pratiyogi jQAnasya
   tantratvādityāśayena dūṣaṇatrayaṃ darśayati  lakṣyaikadeśāvṛttitvamiti/	tantra tvAt iti ASayena dUzaNa trayam darSayati  lakzya eka deSa AvRtti tvam iti/
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakatvābhimatasambandhena	lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka tva aBimata sambanDena
   kiñcillakṣyāvṛttitvamityarthaḥ/lakṣyamātreti/ mātrapadaṃ	kiQcid lakzya AvRtti tvam iti arTaH/lakzya mAtrA iti/ mAtra padam
   kṛtsnārthakaṃ	kRtsnA arTakam
   sambandhaviśeṣāvacchinnalakṣyavṛttitvasāmānyābhāvasphorakam/ekaśaphavattvamiti/	sambanDa viSeza avacCinna lakzya vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAva sPorakam /eka SaPavat tvam iti/
   na cātra	na ca atra
   alakṣyavṛttitvarūpātivyāpterapi sattvāt saṅkara iti vācyam/	alakzya vRtti tva rUpa ati vyApteH api sattvAt saFkaraH iti vAcyam/
   duṣṭasaṅkare 'pi doṣāsaṅkara iti nyāyāt/	duzwa saFkare api dozAsaFkaraH iti nyAyAt /
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   dravyasāmānyalakṣaṇamitidīpikāgranthaśravaṇānantaraṃ lakṣaṇaśabdārthaḥ	dravya sAmAnya lakzaNam iti dIpikA granTa SravaNa anantaram lakzaNa Sabda arTaH
   kaḥ? kiṃ nāma lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇam	kaH? kim nAma lakzaNasya lakzaNam
   iti śiṣyasya jijñāsā jāyate/ tacchāntaye lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam/	iti Sizyasya jijQAsA jAyate/ tad SAntaye lakzaNasya lakzaNam vaktavyam/
   tataḥ prāk avyāptyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇakathanamasaṅgatamityata āha	tatas prAk avyApti AdInAm lakzaNa kaTanam asaFgatam iti atas Aha
    dūṣaṇatrayetyādinā/ dūṣaṇatrayarahitadharmatvaṃ lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇam/	 dUzaNa traya ityAdinA/ dUzaNa traya rahita Darma tvam lakzaNasya lakzaNam/
   dūṣaṇatrayarahitatvaṃ ca dūṣaṇatrayābhāvavattvam/ tathā ca	dUzaNa traya rahita tvam ca dUzaNa traya aBAvavat tvam/ taTA ca
   dūṣaṇatrayābhāvaviśiṣṭadharmatvaṃ lakṣaṇalakṣaṇamiti paryavasitam/ tatra	dUzaNa traya aBAva viSizwa Darma tvam lakzaNa lakzaNam iti paryavasitam/ tatra
   viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāt	viSizwa budDO viSezaNa jQAnasya kAraNa tvAt 
   dūṣaṇatrayābhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānaṃ kāraṇam/ tādṛśaviśeṣaṇajñānaṃ ca	dUzaNa traya aBAva rUpa viSezaNa jQAnam kAraNam/ tAdRSa viSezaNa jQAnam ca
   dūṣaṇatrayajñānaṃ vinā na sambhavati, abhāvabuddhau pratiyogijñānasya	dUzaNa traya jQAnam vinA na samBavati, aBAva budDO pratiyogi jQAnasya
   kāraṇatvāt/ ataḥ dūṣaṇatrayaṃ	kAraNa tva at/ atas dUzaNa trayam
   1. lakṣaṇasya trīṇi	1. lakzaNasya trINi
   dūṣaṇānīti nṛsiṃhaprakāśikānumataḥ pāṭhaḥ/	dUzaNAni iti nR siMha prakASika anumataH pAWaH/
   lakṣaṇato darśaṃnīyam	lakzaNataH darSaMnIyam
   ityāśayenadīpikāyāṃavyāptyādidūṣaṇatrayasya lakṣaṇamuktamiti	iti ASayenadIpikAyAMa vyApti Adi dUzaNa trayasya lakzaNam uktam iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   viśiṣya dūṣaṇatrayajñānādhīnamiti/ atrāyamāśayaḥ   dūṣaṇatrayarahitatvaṃ	viSizya dUzaNa traya jQAna aDIna miti/ atra ayam ASayaH  dUzaNa traya rahita tvam
   nāma na dūṣaṇatrayatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvaḥ/ tathā sati	nAma na dUzaNa traya tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH/ taTA sati
   avyāptyādyekatamadūṣaṇavati kapilatvādidharme ekasattve 'pi trayaṃ	avyApti Adi ekatama dUzaNavati kapila tva Adi Darme eka sattve api trayam
   nāstīti nyāyena dūṣaṇatrayābhāvasattvena tadvataḥ kapilatvādeḥ dharmasya	na asti iti nyAyena dUzaNa traya aBAva sattvena tadvataH kapila tva AdeH Darmasya
   lakṣaṇatvāpatteḥ/ kiṃ tu avyāptyativyāptyasambhavarūpadūṣaṇāni	lakzaNa tva ApatteH/ kim tu avyApti ati vyApti asamBava rUpa dUzaNAni
   avyāptitvādinā viśiṣyopādāya tadavacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvatrayaṃ	avyApti tva AdinA viSizya upAdAya tad avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAva trayam
   dūṣaṇatrayarahitatvamiti vaktavyam/ tathā ca	dUzaNa traya rahita tvam iti vaktavyam/ taTA ca
   avyāptitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva  	avyApti tva avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva  
   ativyāptitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva  	ati vyApti tva avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva  
   asambhavatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva   etattrayaviśiṣṭo dharmo	asamBavatva avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva  etat traya viSizwaH DarmaH 
   lakṣaṇamiti phalitam/	lakzaNam iti Palitam/
   tatra abhāvabuddhau pratiyogitāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapratiyogijñānasya	tatra aBAva budDO pratiyogi ta avacCedaka viSizwa pratiyogi jQAnasya
   kāraṇatvāt avyāptitvādiviśiṣṭāvyāptyādijñānaṃ kāraṇamiti	kAraNa tvAt avyApti tva Adi viSizwa avyApti Adi jQAnam kAraNam iti
   tādṛśajñānotpādanāya ādau avyāptyādīnāṃ svarūpamāhadīpikāyāmiti/	tAdRSa jQAna utpAdanAya AdO avyApti AdInAm svarUpamAhadIpikAyAm iti/
   lakṣyaikadeśāvṛttitvamavyāptiriti/ kiñcillakṣyanirūpitādheyatvābhāvaḥ	lakzya eka deSa AvRtti tvam avyAptiH iti/ kiQcid lakzya nirUpita ADeya tva aBAvaH
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇakiñcinnirūpitavṛttitvābhāvaḥ	lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa kiQcid nirUpita vRtti tva aBAvaH
   avyāptisvarūpamityarthaḥ/ goḥ kapilatvaṃ lakṣaṇam ityukte lakṣyā	avyApti svarUpam iti arTaH/ goH kapila tvam lakzaNam iti ukte lakzyA
   gauḥ lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ	gOH lakzya tA avacCedakam
   gotvam, tadadhikaraṇaṃ śvetagauḥ tannirūpitavṛttitvābhāvaḥ	go tvam, tad aDikaraNam Sveta gOH tad nirUpita vRtti tva aBAvaH
   kapilatve 'stīti avyāpte dharme lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ nanu gotvādhikaraṇe	kapila tve asti iti avyApte Darme lakzaNa samanvayaH/ nanu go tva aDikaraNe
   śvetagavi kapilatvasya kālikasambandhena vartamānatayā	Sveta gavi kapila tvasya kAlika sambanDena vartamAna tayA
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇanirūpitavṛttitvābhāvo nāstīti avyāptadharme	lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa nirUpita vRtti tva aBAvaH na asti iti avyApta Darme
   avyāptalakṣaṇāsambhava ityāśaṅkyāha	avyApta lakzaNa asamBavaH iti ASaFkya Aha
    lakṣaṇatāvacchedakatvābhimatasambandheneti/ vṛttitvānvayi avacchinnatvaṃ	 lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka tva aBimata sambanDena iti/ vRtti tva anvayi avacCinna tvam
   tṛtīyārthaḥ/ tathā ca lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇanirūpita	tRtIya arTaH/ taTA ca lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa nirUpita
   1lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambanghāvacchinnavṛttitvābhāvaḥ avyāptasya lakṣaṇam,	1lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanGa avacCinna vRtti tva aBAvaH avyAptasya lakzaNam,
   avyāpteḥ svarūpam/ kapilatvaṃ kapilagavi samavāyena astīti	avyApteH sva rUpam/ kapila tvam kapila gavi samavAyena asti iti
   samavāyasambandhaḥ lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhaḥ/	samavAya sambanDaH lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDaH/
   1. lakṣaṇaṃ yena	1. lakzaNam yena
   sambandhena lakṣye vartate sa sambandhaḥ lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhaḥ/	sambanDena lakzye vartate sa sambanDaH lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDaH/
   gotvādhikaraṇaśvetagonirūpitakālikasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvasya	go tva aDikaraNa Sveta go nirUpita kAlika sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tvasya
   kapilatve sattve 'pi tannirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvābhāvāt	kapila tve sattve api tad nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tva aBAvAt
   kapilatve lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇatvaṃ ca	kapila tve lakzaNa samanvayaH/ lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa tvam ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpitādhiṅkaraṇatvam, tatrādheyatāyāṃ	lakzya tA avacCeda kanizWA ADeya tA nirUpita aDiFkaraNa tvam, tatra ADeya tAyAm
   1lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ anyathā	1lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ anyaTA
   sallakṣaṇe sāsnāvattvādau kālikasambandhena	sat lakzaNe sAsnAvattva AdO kAlika sambanDena
   lakṣyatāvacchedakagotvādhikaraṇaṃ yat mahiṣādi tadvṛttitvābhāvasattvena	lakzya tAvacCedaka go tva aDikaraNam yat mahiza Adi tad vRtti tva aBAva sattvena
   avyāptalakṣaṇasyātivyāpteḥ/ evaṃ lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇatve	avyApta lakzaNasya ati vyApteH/ evam lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa tve
   satītyapi avyāptalakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ anyathā asambhavagraste	satI iti api avyApta lakzaNe viSezaNam deyam/ anyaTA asamBava graste
   ekaśaphavattvādau avyāptalakṣaṇasyātivyāpteḥ/,	eka SaPa vat tva AdO avyApta lakzaNasya ati vyApteH/,
   gotvādhikaraṇanirūpitavṛttitvābhāvasya tatrāpi sattvāt/ tasmin	go tva aDikaraNa nirUpita vRtti tva aBAvasya tatra api sattva at/ tasmin
   viśeṣaṇe datte tu ekaśaphavattvādau nātivyāptiḥ, tasya	viSezaNe datte tu eka SaPa vat tva AdO na ati vyAptiH, tasya
   gotvādhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvāt/	go tva aDikaraNa vRtti tva aBAvAt/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇatvaṃ ca	lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa tvam ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatāvannirūpitavṛttitvam/	lakzya tA avacCeda kanizWA ADeya tA nirUpita aDikaraNa tAvat nirUpita vRtti tvam/
   tatra lakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatāyāṃ	tatra lakzya tA avacCeda kanizWA ADeya tAyAm
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ anyathā	lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ anyaTA
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasya gotvasya kālikasambandhena adhikaraṇe aśve	lakzya tAvacCedakasya go tvasya kAlika sambanDena aDikaraNe aSve
   ekaśaphavattvasya sattvena asambhavagrastadharme	eka SaPavat tvasya sattvena asamBava grasta Darme
   avyāptalakṣaṇasyātivyāpteḥ/	avyApta lakzaNasya ati vyApteH/
   tanniveśe tu tādṛśasamavāyasambandhena gotvādhikaraṇarṃ gaureva,	tad niveSe tu tAdRSa samavAya sambanDena go tva aDikaraNarm gOH eva,
   tannirūpitavṛttitvaṃ ekaśaphavattve nāstīti nātivyāptiriti/ evaṃ	tad nirUpita vRtti tvam eka SaPa vat tve na asti iti na ati vyAptiH iti/ evam
   vṛttitve lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ anyathā	vRtti tve lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ anyaTA
   ekaśaphavattvasya kālikasambandhena govṛttitayā pūrvoktadoṣāpatteḥ/ evaṃ	eka SaPa vat tvasya kAlika sambanDena go vRtti tayA pUrva ukta doza ApatteH/ evam
   ca	ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambanghāvacchinnalakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatāvannirūpitalakṣaṇatāvacche 	lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanGa avacCinna lakzya tAvacCeda kanizWA ADeya tA nirUpita aDikaraNa tAvat nirUpita lakzaNa tAvacCe 
   dakasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitve sati	daka sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tve sati
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnalakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpitā 	lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna lakzya tAvacCeda kanizWA ADeya tA nirUpitA 
   dhikaraṇatāvanniyapitalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvābhāvaḥ	DikaraNa tAvat niyapita lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tva aBAvaH
   avyāptasya lakṣaṇamiti phalitam/ adhikaṃ	avyAptasya lakzaNam iti Palitam/ aDikam
   paṭṭābhirāmaṭippaṇyādau draṣṭavyam/	pawwa aBirAma wippaNya AdO drazwavyam/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakadharmaḥ yena sambandhena lakṣye vartate sa sambandhaḥ	lakzya tAvacCedaka DarmaH yena sambanDena lakzye vartate sa sambanDaH
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhaḥ/	lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDaH/
   dīpikāyām   alakṣye lakṣaṇasya	dIpikAyAm  alakzye lakzaNasya
   vartanamativyāptiriti/	vartanam ativyAptiH iti/
   alakṣyamityasya lakṣyaniṣṭhapratiyogitākabhedavadityarthaḥ/ saptamyāḥ	alakzyam iti asya lakzya nizWa pratiyogi tAka Beda vat iti arTaH/ saptamyAH
   nirūpitatatvamarthaḥ/ tasya vartanaśabdārthe ādheyatve 'nvayaḥ/	nirUpita tatvam arTaH/ tasya vartana Sabda arTe ADeya tve anvayaH/
   lakṣyaniṣṭhapratiyogitākabhedavannirūpitavṛttitvamativyāptirityuktaṃ	lakzya nizWa pratiyogi tAka Beda vat nirUpita vRtti tvam ati vyAptiH iti uktam
   bhavatiṃ/ yathā goḥ śṛṅgitvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ cet idaṃ	BavatiM/ yaTA goH SRFgi tvam lakzaNam uktam ced idam
   lakṣaṇamativyāptiduṣṭaṃ bhavati, lakṣyā gauḥ	lakzaNam ati vyApti duzwam Bavati, lakzyAH gOH
   tanniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpakabhedavati mahiṣādau śṛṅgitvasya	tad nizWa pratiyogitA nirUpaka Bedavati mahiza AdO SRFgi tvasya
   vartanāt/ atra lakṣyaniṣṭhapratiyogitāyāṃ lakṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnatvaṃ	vartanAt/ atra lakzya nizWa pratiyogitAyAm lakzya tA avacCedaka avacCinna tvam
   niveśanīyam/ anyathā goniṣṭhapratiyogitākabheda ityanena	niveSanIyam/ anyaTA gonizWa pratiyogi tAka BedaH iti anena
   śvetagobhedasyāpi grahītuṃ śakyatayā tadvati kapilagavi kapilatvasya	Sveta go Bedasya api grahItum Sakya tayA tadvati kapila gavi kapila tvasya
   vartamānatayā avyāptadharme ativyāptalakṣaṇasyātivyāpteḥ/ tanniveśe tu	vartamAna tayA avyApta Darme ati vyApta lakzaNasya ati vyApteH/ tad niveSe tu
   lakṣyā gauḥ, lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ gotvaṃ,	lakzyA gOH, lakzya tAvacCedakam go tvaM,
   tadavacchinnagoniṣṭhapratiyogitākabhedaḥ 'gaurna' iti pratītisiddhaḥ	tad avacCinna gonizWa pratiyogi tAka BedaH agOH na a iti pratIti sidDaH
   gosāmānyabhedaḥ tadvān kapilagaurna bhavati, kiṃ tu mahiṣādikameva	go sAmAni aBedaH tadvAn kapila gOH na Bavati, kim tu mahiza Adikam eva
   tadvṛttitvaṃ kapilatve nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/	tad vRtti tvam kapila tve na asti iti na ati vyAptiH/
   evaṃ vṛttitāyāṃ	evam vRttitAyAm
   lakṣṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ anyathā gobhinne	lakzNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ anyaTA go Binne
   mahiṣādāvapi kālikasambandhena kapilatvasya vartamānatayā	mahiza AdO= api kAlika sambanDena kapila tvasya vartamAna tayA
   pūrvoktadoṣāpatteḥ/ tanniveśe tu lakṣaṇaṃ yena sambandhena lakṣye	pUrva ukta doza ApatteH/ tad niveSe tu lakzaNam yena sambanDena lakzye
   vartate se eva sambandhaḥ lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandha iti prakṛte	vartate se eva sambanDaH lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDaH iti prakRte
   samavāyasyaiva tādṛśatayā	samavAyasya eva tAdRSa tayA
   mahiśādinirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvasya	mahiSa Adi nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tvasya
   kapilatve 'bhāvāt na tatrātivyāptiḥ/ evamapi asambhavagraste	kapila tve aBAvAt na tatra ativyAptiH/ evam api asamBava graste
   ekaśaphavattvādau lakṣyagobhinnāśvavṛttitvasattvāt	eka SaPa vat tva AdO lakzya go Binna aSva vRtti tva sattvAt
   ativyāptalakṣṇasyātivyāptiriti tadvāraṇāya	ati vyApta lakzNasya ativyAptiH iti tat vAraNAya
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇamatrāpi deyam/	lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa tve satI iti viSezaNam atra api deyam /
   ekaśaphavattvasya lakṣyatāvacchedakagotvādhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvānna doṣaḥ/	eka SaPavat tvasya lakzya tAvacCedaka go tva aDikaraNa vRtti tva aBAvAt na dozaH/
   tathā ca	taTA ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnalakṣyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnalakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpitā 	lakzya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna lakzya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna lakzya tAvacCeda kanizWA ADeya tA nirUpitA 
   dhikaraṇatāvannirūpitalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitve sati	DikaraNa tAvat nirUpita lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tve sati
   lakṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnalakṣyaniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpakabhedavannirūpitalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvam	lakzya tAvacCedaka avacCinna lakzya nizWa pratiyogitA nirUpaka Beda vat nirUpita lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tvam
   ativyāptasya	ati vyAptasya
   lakṣaṇamiti phalitam/	lakzaNam iti Palitam/
   lakṣyamātrāvṛttitvamasambhavaiti/ sarvatra lakṣye avartanamasambhavaḥ/	lakzya mAtra AvRtti tvam asamBava eti/ sarvatra lakzye avartanam asamBavaH/
   kvacillakṣye avartanamavyāptadharme 'pyastīti sarvatretyuktam/ goḥ	kvacid lakzye avartanam avyApta Darme api asti iti sarvatra iti uktam/ goH
   ekaśaphavattvam lakṣaṇamuktaṃ cet tatsarvāsu govyaktiṣu nāstīti	eka SaPa vat tvam lakzaNam uktam ced tat sarvAsu go vyaktizu na asti iti
   asambhavadoṣadūṣitaṃ bhavati/	asamBava doza dUzitam Bavati/
   lakṣyanirūpitavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvo 'tra vivakṣitaḥ, na	lakzya nirUpita vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH atra vivakzitaH, na
   tu lakṣyavṛttitvapratiyogiko 'bhāvaḥ/ kapilatvādyavyāpyadharme 'pi	tu lakzya vRtti tva pratiyogikaH aBAvaH/ kapila tva Adi avyApya Darme api
   yatkiñcillakṣyaśvetagovṛttitvābhāvasya lakṣyavṛttitvapratiyogikasya	yat kiQcit lakzya Sveta go vRtti tva aBAvasya lakzya vRtti tva pratiyogikasya
   sattvenātivyāptyāpatteḥ/ tadvivakṣaṇe tu govṛttitvaṃ nāstīti	sattvena ati vyApti ApatteH/ tad vivakzaNe tu go vRtti tvam na asti iti
   pratītisiddhasya govṛttitvasāmānyābhāvasyaiva	pratIti sidDasya go vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAvasya eva
   lakṣyanirūpitavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākatayā tasya kapilatve	lakzya nirUpita vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tayA tasya kapila tve
   kapilagovṛttau virahāt nātivyāptiriti sūcanāya kṛtsnārthakaṃ	kapila go vRttO virahAt na ativyAptiH iti sUcanAya kRtsnA arTakam
   mātrapadam/ evaṃ lakṣyanirūpitavṛttitve	mAtra padam/ evam lakzya nirUpita vRtti tve
   lakṣṇatāvacchedakasambanghāvacchinnatvamapi niveśanīyam/ anyathā	lakzNa tAvacCedaka sambanGa avacCinna tvam api niveSanIyam/ anyaTA
   ekaśaphavattvāderapi kālikasambandhena govṛttitvena	eka SaPa vat tva AdeH api kAlika sambanDena go vRtti tvena
   tadvṛttitvābhāvavirahāt asambhavalakṣaṇe asambhavadoṣaḥ syāditi/ tathā	tad vRtti tva aBAva virahAt asamBava lakzaNe asamBava dozaH syAt iti/ taTA
   ca	ca
   lakṣyanirūpitalakṣṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvaḥ	lakzya nirUpita lakzNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH
   asambhava iti phalitam/ sarvamidamabhisandhāyāhaprakāśikāyām mātrapadaṃ	asamBavaH iti Palitam/ sarvam idam aBisanDAya aha prakASikAyAm mAtra padam
   kṛtsnārthakamiti/sambandhaviśeṣati/	kRtsnA arTaka miti/sambanDa viSezati/
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhetyarthaḥ/lakṣyavṛttitvasāmānyābhāveti/	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa iti arTaH/ lakzya vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAva iti/
   lakṣyavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvetyarthaḥ/	lakzya vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva iti arTaH/
   nanu asambhavagraste	nanu asamBava graste
   ekaśaphavattve alakṣyāśvṛttitvasattvena ativyāptyākhyadoṣasyāpi sattvāt	eka SaPavat tve alakzya aSvRtti tva sattvena ati vyApti AKya dozasya api sattvAt 
   ekatra anekadoṣasāṅkaryaṃ prasajatīti śaṅkate  na cātretyādinā/ śaṅkeyaṃ	ekatra aneka doza sAFkaryam prasajati iti SaFkate  na ca atra ityAdinA/ SaFkA iyam
   yathāśrutātivyāptilakṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa/	yaTA Sruta ati vyApti lakzaNa aBiprAyeNa/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇatve satīti viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya	lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa tve satI iti viSezaNa viSizwasya
   pūrvoktapariṣkṛtātivyāptisvarūpasya ekaśaphavattve virahāt/	pUrva ukta parizkRta ati vyApti svarUpasya eka SaPavat tve virahAt /
   doṣabhedāt/ duṣṭasyāpi bhedena bhavitavyamiti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ/	doza Beda at/ duzwasya api Bedena Bavitavyam iti SaFkituH BAvaH/
   samādhatte  duṣṭasaṅkare 'pī	samADatte  duzwa saFkare apI
   ti/ duṣṭasyaikatve 'pi doṣasya ekatvaṃ	ti/ duzwasya ekatve api dozasya eka tvam
   netyarthaḥ/ ekasmin anekadoṣāṇāṃ samāveśasambhavena doṣabhedāt	na iti arTaH/ ekasmin aneka dozANAm samAveSa samBavena doza BedAt 
   tadāśrayaduṣṭabhedāpattirneti samādhāturāśayaḥ/	tad ASraya duzwa Beda ApattiH na iti samADAtuH ASayaH/
   'upadheyasaṅkare 'pyupādherasaṅkaraḥ' iti	aupaDeya saFkare api upADeH asaFkaraHa iti
   maṇikāravacanasyāpyayamevārthaḥ/	maNikAra vacanasya api ayam eva arTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇavicāraḥ	lakzaNa lakzaNa vicAraH
   etaddūṣaṇatrayarahitadharmo lakṣaṇam/ yathā goḥ sāsnādimattvam/	etad dUzaNa traya rahita DarmaH lakzaNam/ yaTA goH sAsnAdimattvam/
   sa evāsādhāraṇadharma ityucyate/	saH eva asADAraNa DarmaH iti ucyate/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvamasādhāraṇatvam/ vyāvartakasyaiva	lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tvam asADAraNa tvam/ vyAvartakasya eva
   lakṣaṇatve	lakzaNa tve
   vyāvṛttāvabhidheyatvādau cātivyāptiḥ ataḥ tadvāraṇāya tadbhinnatvaṃ	vyAvRttO= aBiDeya tva AdO ca ativyAptiH atas tad vAraNAya tad Binna tvam
   dharmaviśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ vyavahārasyāpi lakṣaṇaprayojanatve tu tat na	Darma viSezaNam deyam/ vyavahArasya api lakzaNa prayojana tve tu tat na
   deyam/ vyāvṛtterapi vyavahārasādhanatvāt/	deyam/ vyAvRtteH api vyavahAra sADana tvAt/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   etaddūṣaṇatrayarahitaiti/ uktadūṣaṇābhāvatrayaviśiṣṭa	etad dUzaNa traya rahita eti/ ukta dUzaNa aBAva traya viSizwa
   ityarthaḥ/ nanvasādhāraṇadharmo lakṣaṇamiti hi siddhāntaḥ/ tasmāt	iti arTaH/ nanu asA DAraNa DarmaH lakzaNam iti hi sidDAntaH/ tasmAt 
   kāraṇāt kathaṃ dūṣaṇatrayarahito dharmo lakṣaṇamityata āha  sa	kAraNAt kaTam dUzaNa traya rahitaH DarmaH lakzaNam iti atas Aha  sa
   eveti/ityucyataiti/ abhiyuktairiti śeṣaḥ/ nanu	eva iti/iti ucyatA eti/ aBiyuktEH iti SezaH/ nanu
   sādhāraṇyasya lakṣyālakṣyavṛttitvarūpatayā	sADAraNyasya lakzya Alakzya vRtti tva rUpa tayA
   tadabhāvarūpāsādhāraṇyasyāvyāptyādidoṣagrastadharme 'pi sattvāt kathaṃ	tad aBAva rUpa asADa araNyasya avyApti Adi doza grasta Darme api sattvAt kaTam
   doṣatrayarahita evāsādhāraṇadharma ityāśaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ	dozatraya rahitaH eva asADAraNa DarmaH iti ASaFkAm parijihIrzuH
   asādhāraṇatvamanyādṛśaṃ nirvakti  lakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvamiti/	asADAraNa tvam anyAdRSam nirvakti  lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tvam iti/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatve sati	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tve sati
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvamityarthaḥ/ avyāptyasambhavagrastayorvāraṇāya	lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tvam iti arTaH/ avyAptya samBava grastayoH vAraNAya
   satyantam/ ativyāptasya vāraṇāya viśeṣyam/ dharmapadaṃ	satyantam/ ati vyAptasya vAraNAya viSezyam/ Darma padam
   lakṣaṇatāghaṭakasambandhena vyāpakatvāditātparyagrāhakamiti bhāvaḥ/	lakzaNa tA Gawaka sambanDena vyApaka tvAditAtparyagrAhakam iti BAvaH/
   atredaṃ bodhyam  	atra idam boDyam  
   etaddoṣā asādhāraṇatvasya vighaṭakāḥ/ ativyāptau	etad dozAH asADAraNa tvasya viGawakAH/ ati vyAptO
   vyāpyatvasyetarayośca vyāpakatvasya bhaṅgāt/ eteṣāṃ dūṣakatābījaṃ	vyApya tvasya itarayoH ca vyApaka tvasya BaFgAt/ etezAm dUzaka tA bIjam
   lakṣaṇena lakṣaṇena itarabhedasādhane 'tivyāptau vyabhicāraḥ,	lakzaNena lakzaNena itara Beda sADane ati vyAptO vyaBicAraH,
   itarayośca bhāgāsiddhisvarūpāsiddhī iti/ nanu	itarayoH ca BAga asidDi svarUpa asidDI iti/ nanu
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvasya lakṣaṇalakṣaṇatve lakṣaṇasya	lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tvasya lakzaNa lakzaNa tve lakzaNasya
   vyāvṛttireva	vyAvRttiH eva
   prayojanamiti mate vyāvartakasyaiva lakṣaṇalakṣaṇalakṣyatayā	prayojanam iti mate vyAvartakasya eva lakzaNa lakzaNa lakzya tayA
   vyāvṛttyādāvativyaptirityāśaṅkāṃ tanmatānusāreṇa nirākaroti  	vyAvRtti AdO= ativyaptiH iti ASaFkAm tad mata anusAreNa nirAkaroti  
   vyāvartakasyaiveti/ itarabhedānumitijanakasyaivetyarthaṃḥ/	vyAvartakasya eva iti/ itara Beda anumiti janakasya eva iti arTaMH/
   itarabhedavidheyakānumitijanaka	itara Beda viDeyaka anumiti janaka
   tāvacchedakaviṣayatāviśeṣāśrayasyaivetiyāvat/ etena	tAvat Cedaka vizaya tA viSeza ASrayasya eva itiyAvat/ etena
   vyāvahārikavyavacchedaḥ/lakṣaṇatvegavādilakṣaṇatve	vyAvahArika vyavacCedaH/lakzaNa tvegavAdi lakzaNa tve
   uktalakṣaṇalakṣaṇalakṣyatva iti yāvat/lakṣyatvaiti pāṭhe 'pyayamevārtho	ukta lakzaNa lakzaNa lakzya tvaH iti yAvat /lakzya tvA eti pAWe api ayam eva arTaH 
   bodhyaḥ/vyāvṛttāviti/	boDyaH/ vyAvRttO= iti/
   gavādītarabhede gotvādirūpalakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvasya	gavA Adi itara Bede go tva Adi rUpa lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tvasya
   abhidheyatvaprameyatvādau padārthatvasamaniyatatvasya ca	aBiDeya tva prameya tva AdO padArTa tva sama niyata tvasya ca
   sattvenātivyāptivāraṇāya vyāvṛttibhinnatvamabhidheyatvādibhinnatvaṃ ca	sattvena ati vyApti vAraNAya vyAvRtti Binna tvam aBiDeya tva Adi Binna tvam ca
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇe niveśanīyamityarthaḥ/ yadyapi vyāvṛtterapi	lakzaNa lakzaNe niveSanIyam iti arTaH/ yadi api vyAvRtteH api
   vyāvahārikatvasya vakṣyamāṇatayā tenaiva rūpeṇa vyāvahārikatvena	vyAvahArika tvasya vakzyamANa tayA tena eva rUpeNa vyAvahArika tvena
   sarveṣāṃ saṅgrahasambhavāt pṛthagabhidhānamanucitam, tathāpi	sarvezAm saFgraha samBavAt pRTak aBiDAnam anucitam, taTA api
   hetusādhyayoraikye hetumattāniścayakāle sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāyā	hetu sADyayoH Ekye hetu mattA niScaya kAle sADya saMSaya rUpa pakza tAyA
   asattvena	asattvena
   tānumitiriti	tAn umitiH iti
   prācīnamate itarabhedasya vyāvartakatvābhāvena tatrātivyāptiḥ/	prAcInamate itara Bedasya vyAvartaka tva aBAvena tatra ativyAptiH/
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭasiddhyabhāvaḥ pakṣatā iti siddhāntimate	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa sidDi aBAvaH pakzatA iti sidDAntimate
   tu vyāvṛtterapi vyāvartakatvena lakṣyatayā tatra	tu vyAvRtteH api vyAvartaka tvena lakzya tayA tatra
   lakṣaṇasaṅgamanasyeṣṭatvena nātivyāptirityāvedayituṃ	lakzaNa saFgamanasya izwa tvena na ati vyAptiH iti Avedayitum
   pṛthakkathanamiti dhyeyam/	pRTak kaTanam iti Dyeyam/
   nanu kimidaṃ nāma	nanu kim idam nAma
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇalakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ vyāvartakatvam/ na tāvat sāmānyato	lakzaNa lakzaNa lakzya tAvacCedakam vyAvartaka tvam/ na tAvat sAmAnyatas 
   bhedānumāpakatvam/ vyāvṛttyabhidheyatvāderapi	Beda anumApaka tvam/ vyAvRtti aBiDeya tva AdeH api
   yatkiñcidubhayatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedānumāpakatayā	yat kiQcid uBaya tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda anumApaka tayA
   tatrātivyāptikathanāsaṅgateḥ/ sarveṣāmapi vyatirekadharmāṇāṃ	tatra ati vyApti kaTanA saFgateH/ sarvezAm api vyatireka DarmANAm
   yatkiñcidvyāvartakatayā	yat kiQcidvyAvartaka tayA
   asādhāraṇyādighaṭakavyāpakatvādivairthyāpātācca/ nāpi viśiṣya	asADa araNya Adi Gawaka vyApaka tva At i vErTya apAtAt ca/ na api viSizya
   tattaddharmāvacchinnetarabhedānumāpakatvam/ tathā sati	tad tad Darma avacCinnA itara Beda anumApaka tvam/ taTA sati
   gotvāvacchinnetarabhedānumāpakasya sāsnādimattvasya	go tva avacCinna itara Beda anumApakasya sAsnAdimattvasya
   gotvasamaniyatatvaṃ lakṣaṇam ityevaṃ rītyā viśiṣya tattallakṣaṇasya	go tva sama niyata tvam lakzaNam iti evam rItyA viSizya tad tad lakzaNasya
   vaktavyatayā gotvādirūpalakṣyatāvacchedakatattaddharmasamanaiyatyasya	vaktavya tayA go tva Adi rUpa lakzya tAvacCedaka tad tad Darma sama nEyatyasya
   gotvāvacchinnetarabhedādirūpavyāvṛttau sattvenātivyāpteḥ	go tva avacCinna itara Beda Adi rUpa vyAvRttO sattvena ati vyApteH
   sambhave 'pyabhidhayatvādāvativyāptyalagnakatāpatteḥ duvaritvāt	samBave api aBiDaya tva At O= ati vyApti alagnaka tA ApatteH duvari tvAt 
   gotvādisamanaiyatyasya tatrāsattvāditi cet  	go tva Adi sama nEyatyasya tatra asattvAt iti ced  
   maivam   yataḥ	mA evam  yatas 
   sāsnādimattvaṃ pakṣīkṛtya gotvāvacchinnetarabhedānumāpakatve sādhye	sAsnAdimattvam pakzIkRtya go tva avacCinna itara Beda anumApaka tve sADye
   viśeṣavyāptau anvayadṛṣṭāntālābhena yadyaddharmasamaniyataṃ	viSeza vyAptO anvaya dRzwa anta alABena yat yat Darma sama niyatam
   tattandavacchinnavyāvartakamiti rītyā sāmānyamukhena	tad tandava= Cinna vyAvartakam iti rItyA sAmAnya muKena
   vyāpterabhyupagantavyatayā tatra	vyApteH aByupagantavya tayA tatra
   siddhasādhanāprasiddhibhyāmavyāvartaṅkayorvyāvṛttyabhidheyatvayoḥ	sidDa sADana aprasidDiByAm avyAvartaFkayoH vyAvRtti aBiDeya tvayoH
   tattaddharmasamanaiyatyarūpaprakṛtahetostattulyasya vā hetoḥ sattvena	tad tad Darma sama nEyatya rUpa prakRta hetoH tad tulyasya vA hetoH sattvena
   prakṛtasādhyasya tattulyasya vā sādhyasyāsattvena vyabhicāraḥ syāt/	prakRta sADyasya tad tulyasya vA sADyasya asattvena vyaBicAraH syAt /
   atastaddoṣavāraṇāya	atas tad doza vAraNAya
   tattaddharmāvacchinnetarabhedarūpavyāvṛttibhinnatvamabhidheyatvādibhinnatvaṃ	tad tad Darma avacCinnA itara Beda rUpa vyAvRtti Binna tvam aBiDeya tva Adi Binna tvam
   ca tādṛśalakṣaṇe niveśanīyamityabhiprāyako 'yaṃ grantha iti na	ca tAdRSa lakzaNe niveSanIyam iti aBiprAyakaH ayam granTaH iti na
   pūrvoktadoṣāvasaraḥ/ adhikavicārastu anyatrānusandheyaḥ/	pUrva ukta doza avasaraH/ aDika vicAraH tu anyatra anusanDeyaH/
   nanu lakṣaṇasya	nanu lakzaNasya
   vyavahāro 'pi prayojanam/ tena rūpeṇa vyavahartavyajñānaṃ vinā	vyavahAraH api prayojanam/ tena rUpeNa vyavahartavyajQAnam vinA
   tadrūpāvacchinnabodhakaśabdarūpavyavahārāsambhavāt/ evaṃ ca	tad rUpa avacCinna boDaka Sabda rUpa vyavahAra asamBavAt/ evam ca
   vyāvahārikalakṣaṇasyāpi lakṣyatvāt tadbhinnatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na	vyAvahArika lakzaNasya api lakzya tvAt tad Binna tvam viSezaNam na
   deyamityāha   vyavahārasyāpīti/ nanu vyāvṛttāvativyāptivāraṇāya	deyam iti Aha  vyavahArasya api iti/ nanu vyAvRttO= ati vyApti vAraNAya
   tadbhinnatvamāvaśyakam/ vyāvṛttervyāvahārikatvābhāvāditi bhramaṃ	tat Binna tvam AvaSya kam/ vyAvRtteH vyAvahArika tva aBAvAt iti Bramam
   vārayati   vyāvṛtterapīti/ apinā abhidheyatvādiparigraho	vArayati  vyAvRtteH apIti/ apinA aBiDeya tva Adi parigrahaH 
   dṛṣṭāntalābhāya/	dRzwAntalABAya/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanvetaddūṣaṇatrayarahitadharmo lakṣaṇam ityasya	nanu etat dUzaNa traya rahita DarmaH lakzaNam iti asya
   avyāptyativyāptyasambhavarūpadoṣatrayābhāvaviśiṣṭo dharmo	avyApti ati vyApti asamBava rUpa doza traya aBAva viSizwaH DarmaH 
   lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca 1ekadoṣavatyapi kapilatvādau doṣatrayaṃ	lakzaNam iti arTaH/ taTA ca 1eka dozavatI api kapila tva AdO dozatrayam
   nāstīti 2lakṣaṇatvāpattirityāśaṅkya vyācakṣṭe  	na asti iti 2lakzaNa tva ApattiH iti ASaFkya vyAcakzwe  
   uktadūṣaṇābhāvatrayaviśiṣṭa iti/ pratiyogini tritvaṃ na vivakṣitam,	ukta dUzaNa aBAva traya viSizwaH iti/ pratiyogini tritvam na vivakzitam,
   kiṃ tu abhāve iti bhāvaḥ/ ekadoṣavati	kim tu aBAve iti BAvaH/ eka dozavati
   itaradoṣābhāvadvayasattve 'pi doṣābhāvatrayaṃ nāstīti na	itara doza aBAva dvaya sattve api doza aBAva trayam na asti iti na
   3pūrvoktāpattiriti dhyeyam/	3pUrva ukta ApattiH iti Dyeyam/
   1. ekadoṣavatyapīti/	1. eka dozavatI api iti/
   avyāptirūpakaidoṣaviśiṣṭe 'pītyarthaḥ/	avyApti rUpa kEdoza viSizwe api iti arTaH/
   2. lakṣaṇatvāpattiriti/	2. lakzaNatva ApattiH iti/
   golakṣaṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ ityarthaḥ/	go lakzaNa tva prasaFgaH iti arTaH/
   3. pūrvoktāpattiriti/	3. pUrva uktApattiH iti/
   kapiṃlatvādergolakṣaṇatvāpattirityarthaḥ/	kapiMlatvAdeH go lakzaNa tva ApattiH iti arTaH/
   nanu na sādhāraṇaḥ	nanu na sADAraNaH
   asādhāraṇa iti karmadhārayasamāsāt asādhāraṇa ityasya	asADAraNaH iti karma DAraya samAsAt asADAraNaH iti asya
   sādhāraṇabhinna ityarthaḥ/ sādhāraṇa ityasya ca lakṣyavṛttitve sati	sADAraNa BinnaH iti arTaH/ sADAraNaH iti asya ca lakzya vRtti tve sati
   alakṣyavṛttirityarthaḥ/ lakṣyavṛttitvaviśiṣṭālakṣyavṛttitvavāniti	alakzya vRttiH iti arTaH/ lakzya vRtti tva viSizwa Alakzya vRtti tvavAn iti
   yāvat/ asādhāraṇa ityasya ca	yAvat/ asADAraNaH iti asya ca
   lakṣyavṛttitvaviśiṣṭālakṣyavṛttitvābhāvavānityarthaḥ/ avyāptigraste	lakzya vRtti tva viSizwa Alakzya vRtti tva aBAvavAn iti arTaH/ avyApti graste
   kapilatvādau alakṣyavṛttitvarūpaviśeṣyābhāvāt viśiṣṭābhāvo 'sti/	kapila tva AdO alakzya vRtti tva rUpa viSezya aBAvAt viSizwa aBAvaH asti/
   asambhavagrastaḥ ekaśaphavattvādiḥ lakṣyavṛttitvarūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt	asamBava grastaH eka SaPa vat tva AdiH lakzya vRtti tva rUpa viSezaNa aBAvAt
   viśiṣṭābhāvavān/ tatathā ca ubhayoḥ asādhāraṇatayā lakṣaṇatvāpattiḥ,	viSizwa aBAvavAn/ tataTA ca uBayoH asADAraNa tayA lakzaNa tva ApattiH,
   doṣavato 'pi asādhāraṇatayā doṣatrayarahita evāsādhāraṇa	dozavataH api asADAraNa tayA dozatraya rahitaH eva asADAraNa
   ityasaṅgatiśca ityāśaṅkya asādhāraṇaśabdārthaḥ	iti asaFgatiH ca iti ASaFkya asADAraNa Sabda arTaH
   prakārāntareṇocyate dīpikāyāmityāha   nanu sādhāraṇyasyeti/	prakAra antareNa ucyate dIpikAyAm iti Aha  nanu sADAraNyasya iti/
   anyādṛśamiti/ lakṣyavṛttitvaviśiṣṭālakṣyavṛttitvābhāvāt	anyAdRSam iti/ lakzya vRtti tva viSizwa Alakzya vRtti tva aBAvAt
   anyavidhamityarthaḥ/ lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatve satīti/	anyaviDam iti arTaH/ lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tve sati iti/
   lakṣyatāvacchadakaṃ	lakzya tA avacCadakam
   yatra yatra vartate tatra sarvatra vartamānatvaṃ	yatra yatra vartate tatra sarvatra vartamAna tvam
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvam/	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tvam/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ yatra nāsti tatrāvartamānatvaṃ	lakzya tA avacCedakam yatra na asti tatra AvartamAna tvam
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvam/ lakṣyā gauḥ, lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ gotvam,	lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tvam/ lakzyA gOH, lakzya tAvacCedakam go tvam,
   tatra yatra yatra govyaktau vartate tatra sarvatra sāsnādimattvamasti,	tatra yatra yatra go vyaktO vartate tatra sarvatra sAsnAdimattvam asti,
   gotvaṃ	go tvam
   yatra nāsti mahiṣādau tatra sāsnādimattvaṃ nāstīti	yatra na asti mahiza AdO tatra sAsnAdimattvam na asti iti
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatve sati	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tve sati

   bhavati, atastat goḥ lakṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	Bavati, atas tat goH lakzaNam iti BAvaH/ taTA ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatve sati lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvaṃ lakṣaṇasya	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tve sati lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tvam lakzaNasya
   lakṣaṇamityuktaṃ bhavati/ satyantasya prayojanamāha  	lakzaNam iti uktam Bavati/ satyantasya prayojanam Aha

   lakṣaṇabhinne lakṣyatāvacchedakagotvaśūnyamahiṣādyavṛttitvarūpaṃ	lakzaNa Binne lakzya tAvacCedaka go tva SUnya mahiza Adya vRtti tva rUpam
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvamastīti tatra lakṣaṇalakṣaṇasyātivyāptiḥ,	lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tvam asti iti tatra lakzaNa lakzaNasya ativyAptiH,
   tadvāraṇāya lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatve satītyuktam/ gotvavati	tad vAraNAya lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tve satI iti uktam/ go tvavati
   śvetagavikapilatvābhāvāt lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvaṃ tatra nāstīti	Sveta gavikapila tva aBAvAt lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tvam tatra na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ nanu uktarītyā	na ati vyAptiH/ nanu ukta rItyA

   tadvāraṇarūpaṃ prayojanaṃ na sambhavati/ asambhavagrastasya	tad vAraNa rUpam prayojanam na samBavati/ asamBava grastasya
   ekaśaphavattvādeḥ	eka SaPa vat tva AdeH

   yo 'tyantābhāvaḥ gotvābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvasyaiva gotve sattvena	yaH atyanta aBAvaH go tva aBAvaH tad pratiyogitvasya eva go tve sattvena

   ca	ca

   tacchūnyāvṛttitvarūpavyāpyatvaniveśamabhipretyetyavadheyam/	tat SUnyAvRtti tva rUpa vyApya tva niveSam aBipretya iti avaDeyam/
   1. tathā cetyādi/	1. taTA ca ityAdi/
   golakṣaṇe sāsnādimattve evaṃ samanvayaḥ   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhaḥ	go lakzaNe sAsna Adimattve evam samanvayaH  lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDaH
   samavāyaḥ tadavacchinnā yā sāsnādimattvaniṣṭhādheyatā	samavAyaH tad avacCinnA yA sAsnAdimattva nizWa ADeya tA
   tannirūpitādhikaraṇatāvatī gauḥ tanniṣṭho yo 'bhāvaḥ na samavāyena	tad nirUpita aDikaraNa tAvatI gOH tad nizWaH yaH aBAvaH na samavAyena
   gotvābhāvaḥ api tu samavāyena	go tva aBAvaH api tu samavAyena
   ghaṭatvābhāvaḥ	Gawa tva aBAvaH
   tannirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitvaṃ ghaṭe,	tad nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tvam Gawe,
   tādṛśapratiyogitvābhāvavat gotvarūpaṃ lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ tanniṣṭhā yā	tAdRSa pratiyogitva aBAva vat go tva rUpam lakzya tAvacCedakam tad nizWA yA
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnā ādheyatā tinnarūpitādhikaraṇatāvatī gauḥ	samavAya sambanDa avacCinnA ADeya tA tinna rUpita aDikaraNa tAvatI gOH
   tanniṣṭhātyantābhāvaḥ na samavāyena sāsnādyabhāvaḥ api tu ghaṭatvābhāvaḥ	tad nizWA atyanta aBAvaH na samavAyena sa AsnAdi aBAvaH api tu Gawa tva aBAvaH

     bhinnabhinnaśabdairnirdeśaḥ/ samādhatte   tathāpīti/ ayamatrāśayaḥ  	 Binna Binna SabdEH nirdeSaH/ samADatte  taTA apIti/ ayam atra ASayaH  
   lakṣyetarabhedarūpāyāḥ vyāvṛtteḥ	lakzya itara Beda rUpAyAH vyAvRtteH
   lakṣyoddeśyaketarabhedavidheyakānumitijanakatvaṃ sādhyasaṃśayaḥ pakṣatā	lakzya uddeSya ketara Beda viDeyaka anumiti janaka tvam sADya saMSayaH pakzatA
   iti prācīnamate na saṃbhavati/ tathā hi   itarabhedaḥ	iti prAcInamate na saMBavati/ taTA hi  itara BedaH
   itarabhedānumitijanaka ityukte sādhyahetvoraikyaṃ bhavati, 'gauḥ	itara Beda anumiti janakaH iti ukte sADya hetvA urEkyam Bavati, agOH
   itarabhinnā itarabhedāt' ityevānumānasya prayoktavyatvāt/	itara BinnAH itara BedAt a iti eva anumAnasya prayoktavya tvAt/

   ca parāmarśaḥ gavi itarabhedamavagāhamānaḥ	ca parAmarSaH gavi itara Bedam avagAhamAnaH

   itarabhedarūpavyāvṛtteḥ	itara Beda rUpa vyAvRtteH

   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇasya sattvādativyāptiḥ iti/	lakzaNa lakzaNasya sattvAt ativyAptiH iti/

   cātivyāptiḥ' ityuktaṃ dīpikāyāmiti/	ca ati vyAptiH a iti uktam dIpikAyAm iti/

   ayamatra praghaṭṭakārthaḥ   vyāvartaṅkasyaiva lakṣaṇasya	ayam atra praGawwaka arTaH  vyAvartaFkasya eva lakzaNasya

   pūrvapakṣaḥ/	pUrva pakzaH/
   1. na	1. na

   sāmānyamukhavyāptau ca prakṛtahetoḥ prakṛtahetutulyasya hetorvā	sAmAnya muKa vyAptO ca prakRta hetoH prakRta hetu tulyasya hetoH vA

   heturasti, prakṛtasādhyatulyaṃ	hetuH asti, prakRta sADya tulyam
   1. tathā	1. taTA
   lakṣyatāvacchedakamapyanumīyata iti/ prakāśikāyāṃ sāsnādimattvaṃ	lakzya tA avacCedakam api anumIyate iti/ prakASikAyAm sAsnAdimattvam

   padārthatvāvacchinnetarabhedānumāpakatvarūpaṃ sādhyaṃ nāsti	padArTa tva avacCinnA itara Beda anumApakatva rUpam sADyam na asti
   padārthetarasyāprasiddheriti vyabhicāraḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya	padArTa itarasya aprasidDeH iti vyaBicAraH syAt/ tad vAraNAya
   yaddharmasamaniyatatva rūpahetau vyāvṛttibhinnatve sati	yad Darma sama niyata tva rUpa hetO vyAvRtti Binna tve sati
   abhidheyatvādibhinnatve sati iti viśeṣaṇaṃ dātavyam/ tena yatra	aBiDeya tva Adi Binna tve sati iti viSezaNam dAtavyam/ tena yatra
   vyāvṛttibhinnatve sati abhidheyatvādibhinnatve sati	vyAvRtti Binna tve sati aBiDeya tva Adi Binna tve sati
   yaddharmaṃsamaniyatatvaṃ	yat DarmaMsam aniyata tvam
   tatra taddharmāvacchinnetarabhedānumitijanakatvamiti sāmānyamukhī	tatra tad Darma avacCinnA itara Beda anumiti janaka tvam iti sAmAnya muKI
   vyāptiḥ paryavasyati tatra ca na ko 'pi doṣa ityabhiprāyo	vyAptiH paryavasyati tatra ca na kaH api dozaH iti aBiprAyaH 
   dīpikāgranthasyeti/	dIpikA granTasya iti/
   atha kramaśaḥ	aTa kramaSas 
   paṅktīnāmartha ucyate/ sāmānyato bhedānumāpakatvamiti/	paFktInAm arTaH ucyate/ sAmAnyatas Beda anumApaka tvam iti/
   pratiyogiviśeṣanirdeśamantarā bhedatvena bhedaṃ niveśya	pratiyogi viSeza nirdeSam antarA Beda tvena Bedam niveSya
   kevalabhedavidheyakānumitijanakatvaṃ vyāvartakatvamiti vaktuṃ na	kevala Beda viDeyaka anumiti janaka tvam vyAvartaka tvam iti vaktum na
   śakyata ityarthaḥ/ vyāvṛttyabhidheyatvāderapīti/ 'gauḥ	Sakyate iti arTaH/ vyAvRtti aBiDeya tvAdeH api iti/ agOH
   goghaṭobhayabhinna gavetarabhedāt', 'padārthaḥ ghaṭapaṭobhayabhinnaḥ	go Gawa uBaya Bid na gavetara BedAt a, apadArTaH Gawa pawa uBaya BinnaH
   abhidheyatvāt' ityanumāne atra vivakṣite/	aBiDeya tvAt a iti anumAne atra vivakzite/
   ativyāptikathanāsaṅgateriti/ lakṣye lakṣaṇasattvasyeṣṭatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	ati vyApti kaTanA saFgateH iti/ lakzye lakzaNa sattvasya izwa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   vyatirekidharmāṇāmiti/ kevalānvayidharmāṇāmabhidheyatvādīnāṃ	vyatireki DarmANAm iti/ kevala anvayiDarmANAm aBiDeya tva AdInAm
   itarabhedānumāpakatvaṃ na sambhavati, abhidheyatvaśūnyasya	itara Beda anumApaka tvam na samBavati, aBiDeya tva SUnyasya
   itarasyābhāvāt 'ghaṭaḥ itarabhinnaḥ abhidheyatvāt' ityapi	itarasya aBAvAt aGawaH itara BinnaH aBiDeya tvAt a iti api
   prayoktuṃ na śakyate, padārthetarasyaivāprasiddheriti bhāvaḥ/	prayoktum na Sakyate, padArTa itarasya eva aprasidDeH iti BAvaH/
   asādhāraṇyaghaṭaketi/	asADa araNya Gawaka iti/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvarūpāsādhāraṇyaghaṭakaṃ	lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tva rUpa asADa araNya Gawakam
   yat vyāpakatvaṃ vyāpyatvaṃ ca tayorvaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt ityarthaḥ/	yat vyApaka tvam vyApya tvam ca tayoH vEyarTya prasaFgAt iti arTaH/
   nāpi viśiṣyeti/ viśiṣyetyasya bhede 'nvayaḥ/ atra	na api viSizya iti/ viSizya iti asya Bede anvayaH/ atra
   lakṣyatāvacchedakagotvādyavacchinne ityadhyāhṛtya	lakzya tAvacCedaka go tva Adi avacCinne iti aDyAhRtya
   gotvādyavacchinnoddeśyakagotvādyavacchinnetarabhedavidheyakānumitijanakatvamiti	go tva Adi avacCinna uddeSya ka go tva Adi avacCinna itara Beda viDeyaka anumiti janaka tvam iti
   vyākhyātavyam/ anyathā 'kapilagauḥ gavetarabhinnā kapilatvāt'	vyAKyAtavyam/ anyaTA akapilagOH gavetara BinnA kapila tvAt a
   ityanumānasambhavena pūrvoktadoṣasattvenāsya pakṣāntaratvānupapatteḥ/	iti anumAna samBavena pUrva ukta doza sattvena asya pakza antara tva anupapatteH/
   tādṛśalakṣaṇe niveśanīyamiti/ tādṛśalakṣaṇarūpe hetau	tAdRSa lakzaNe niveSanIyam iti/ tAdRSa lakzaNa rUpe hetO
   niveśanīyamityarthaḥ/	niveSanIyam iti arTaH/
   nanu lakṣaṇasya	nanu lakzaNasya
   vyavahāro 'pītyādi/ yathā lakṣaṇasya itarabhedānumitiḥ prayojanaṃ	vyavahAraH api ityAdi/ yaTA lakzaNasya itara Beda anumitiH prayojanam
   tathā śabdaprayogarūpo vyavahāro 'pi prayojanam/ kathamiti cet 	taTA Sabda prayoga rUpaH vyavahAraH api prayojanam/ kaTam iti ced  
   ittham/ purovarti govyaktau 'iyaṃ gauḥ'	itTam/ purovarti go vyaktO aiyam gOH a
   ityākārakagotvāvacchinnāvacakaśabdaprayogaṃ prati 'iyaṃ gauḥ'	iti AkAraka go tvA avacCinnA vacaka Sabda prayogam prati aiyam gOH a
   ityākārakaṃ gotvaprakārakaṃ goviśeṣyakaṃ jñānaṃ kāraṇam/	iti AkArakam go tva prakArakam go viSezyakam jQAnam kAraNam/
   taddharmāvacchinnabodhakaśabdaprayogarūpavyavahāraṃ prati	tad Darma avacCinna boDaka Sabda prayoga rUpa vyavahAram prati
   taddharmaprakārakavyavahartavyaviśeṣyakajñānasya kāraṇatvāt/ 'iyaṃ gauḥ'	tad Darma prakAraka vya vahartavya viSezyaka jQAnasya kAraNa tvAt/ aiyam gOH a
   ityākārakaṃ jñānaṃ ca gotvaparicāyakalakṣaṇajñānaṃ vinā na	iti AkArakam jQAnam ca go tva paricAyaka lakzaNa jQAnam vinA na
   sambhavatīti lakṣaṇasya	samBavati iti lakzaNasya
   svaviṣayakajñānajanyavyavahartavyaviṣayakajñānadvārā	sva vizayaka jQAna janya vyavahartavya vizaya ka jQAna dvArA
   vyavahāraḥ prayojanam/ tathā ca lakṣaṇaṃ vyāvahārikamapi bhavatīti	vyavahAraH prayojanam/ taTA ca lakzaNam vyAvahArikam api Bavati iti
   vyāvahārikalakṣaṇasyāpi lakṣyatāvacchedakasamaniyatatvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti	vyAvahArika lakzaNasya api lakzya tAvacCedaka sama niyata tvam lakzaNam iti
   vyāvahārikamapi lakṣyamiti vyāvṛttyabhidheyatvāderapi lakṣyatvāt tatra	vyAvahArikam api lakzyam iti vyAvRtti aBiDeya tva AdeH api lakzya tvAt tatra
   lakṣaṇasattvasyeṣṭatayā ativyāptyabhāvāt tadbhinnatvarūpaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na	lakzaNa sattvasya izwa tayA ati vyApti aBAvAt tad Binna tva rUpam viSezaNam na
   deyamiti bhāvaḥ/ tena rūpeṇa vyavahartavyajñānamiti/	deyam iti BAvaH/ tena rUpeNa vyavahartavyajQAnam iti/
   taddharmaprakārakavyavahartavyaviśeṣyakajñānamityarthaḥ/	tad Darma prakAraka vya vahartavya viSezyaka jQAnam iti arTaH/
   gotvādiprakārakagavādiviśeṣyakajñānamiti	go tva Adi prakAraka gava Adi viSezya ka jQAnam iti
   yāvat/	yAvat /
   vyāvahārikalakṣaṇasyāpi  	vyAvahArika lakzaNasya api  
   vyavahāraprayojanakavyāvṛttyabhidheyatvādirūpalakṣaṇasyāpi/ lakṣyatvāt	vyavahAra prayojana kavya AvRtti aBiDeya tva Adi rUpa lakzaNasya api/ lakzya tvAt 
      lakṣaṇalakṣaṇalakṣyatvāt/ tadbhinnatvam   	  lakzaNa lakzaNa lakzya tva at/ tad Binna tvam   
   vyāvṛttyabhidheyatvādibhinnatvam/ dṛṣṭāntalābhāyeti/ yathā	vyAvRtti aBiDeya tva Adi Binna tvam/ dRzwAntalABAya iti/ yaTA
   abhidheyatvādikaṃ vyavahārajanakaṃ tathā vyāvṛttirapi vyavahārajanikā	aBiDeya tva Adikam vyavahAra janakam taTA vyAvRttiH api vyavahAra janikA
   iti jñāpanāya iti bhāvaḥ//	iti jQApanAya iti BAvaH//
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   guṇavattvasya	guNavat tvasya
   dravyalakṣaṇatvasthāpanam	dravya lakzaNa tva sTApanam
   nanu guṇavattvaṃ na	nanu guNavat tvam na
   dravyalakṣaṇam, ādyakṣaṇāvacchinnadravye utpannavinaṣṭadravye cāvyāpteriti	dravya lakzaNam, Adi a kzaNa avacCinna dravye utpanna vinazwa dravye ca avyApteH iti
   cet   na/ guṇasamānādhikaraṇasattābhinnajātimattvasya vivakṣitatvāt/	ced  na/ guNa samAna aDikaraNa sattA Binna ja atimattvasya vivakzita tvAt/
   nanvevamapi 'ekaṃ rūpaṃ	nanu evam api aekam rUpam
   rasāt pṛthak' iti vyavahārāt rūpādāvativyāptiriti cet  	rasAt pRTak a iti vyavahArAt rUpa AdO= ativyAptiH iti ced  
   na/ ekārthasamavāyādeva tādṛśavyavahāropapattau guṇe	na/ eka arTa samavAyAt eva tAdRSa vyavahAra upapattO guNe
   guṇānaṅgīkārāt/	guNa an aFgIkArAt/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   nanu	nanu
   ādyakṣaṇāvacchinne dravye guṇavattvasyāsattve 'pi kālāntarāvacchinne tatra	Adi a kzaNa avacCinne dravye guNavat tvasya asattve api kAla antara avacCinne tatra
   tatsattvamakṣatam/ evaṃ ca guṇāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhvityata āha  	tat sattvam akzatam/ evam ca guNa ASraya tva lakzaNam sADu iti atas Aha  
   utpannavinaṣṭeti/ yādṛśadravyārambhakasaṃyogajanakakriyotpatteḥ	utpanna vinazwa iti/ yAdRSa dravya AramBaka saMyoga janaka kriyA utpatteH
   tṛtīyakṣaṇe 'vayavāntare tādṛśasaṃyoganāśikā kriyā jātā tādṛśadravya	tRtIyakzaNe avayava antare tAdRSa saMyoga nASikA kriyA jAtA tAdRSa dravya
   ityarthaḥ/ navīnāḥ punaḥ asamavāyikāraṇasya kāryasahabhāvena	iti arTaH/ navInAH punar asamavAyi kAraNasya kArya sahaBAvena
   kāraṇatāmavalambyotpannavinaṣṭaṃ nāṅgīkurvanti/	kAraNa tAm avalambya utpanna vinazwam na aFgIkurvanti/
   guṇādāvativyāptivāraṇāya guṇasamānādhikaraṇeti jātiviśeṣaṇam/	guNa AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa samAna aDikaraNa iti jAti viSezaNam/
   sattāmādāyātivyāptivāraṇāya sattābhinneti/	sattAm AdAya ati vyApti vAraNAya sattA aBinna iti/
   dravyaguṇānyataratvamādāyātivyāpitavāraṇāya jātīti/ samavāyena	dravya guNa anyatara tvam AdAya ati vyApita vAraNAya jAti iti/ samavAyena
   tādṛśadharmavattvatātparyagrāhakam/ ataḥ kālikādisambandhena	tAdRSa Darmavat tva tAtparya grAhakam/ atas kAlikA Adi sambanDena
   tadvattvamādāya nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	tadvat tvam AdAya na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   evamapīti/ uktavivakṣayā	evam api iti/ ukta vivakzayA
   avyāptivāraṇe 'pi ekārthasamavāyādeveti/ ekasminnarthe samavāyena	avyApti vAraNe api eka arTa samavAyAt eva iti/ ekasmin= arTe samavAyena
   sattvādevetyarthaḥ/ guṇānaṅgīkāraditi/ tathā ca kḷptena	sattvAt eva iti arTaH/ guNa an aFgIkAraditi/ taTA ca k?ptena
   samavāyaghaṭitasāmānādhirakaṇyenaiva guṇavattāvyavahāropapattau	samavAya Gawita sAmAnA DirakaNyena eva guNavat tA vyavahAra upapattO
   tatrākḷptaguṇavattvakalpanaṃ na sambhavati gauravāditi bhāvaḥ/	tatra Ak?pta guNavat tva kalpanam na samBavati gOravAt iti BAvaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   dravyatvajātimattvaṃ	dravya tva jAtimat tvam
   guṇavattvaṃ vā dravyalakṣaṇamiti pūrvamuktam/ tatra guṇavattvaṃ lakṣaṇam	guNavat tvam vA dravya lakzaNam iti pUrvam uktam/ tatra guNavat tvam lakzaNam
   na	na
   bhavitumarhati, utpattikṣaṇāvacchinne ghaṭe 'utpannaṃ dravyaṃ kṣaṇamaguṇaṃ	Bavitum arhati, utpatti kzaNa avacCinne Gawe autpannam dravyam kzaNam aguNam
   akriyaṃ ca tiṣṭhati' iti nyāyena guṇavattvābhāvena avyāptidoṣāt/	akriyam ca tizWati a iti nyAyena guNavat tva aBAvena avyApti dozAt/
   evaṃ yaḥ ghaṭaḥ prathamakṣaṇe utpannaḥ dvitīyakṣaṇe ca vinaṣṭaḥ, tatra	evam yaH GawaH praTama kzaNe utpannaH dvitIya kzaNe ca vinazwaH, tatra
   prathamakṣaṇe	praTama kzaNe
   'utpannaṃ dravyaṃ kṣaṇamaguṇam' iti nyāyena guṇo nāsti, dvitīyakṣaṇe	autpannam dravyam kzaNam aguNam a iti nyAyena guNaH nAsti, dvitIya kzaNe
   ca guṇinaḥ ghaṭasyavināśāt na guṇaḥ iti	ca guNinaH Gawasya vinASAt na guNaH iti
   utpannavinaṣṭaghaṭe 'vyāpteśca ityāśaṅkitaṃ dīpikāyām   nanu	utpanna vinazwa Gawe avyApteH ca iti ASaFkitam dIpikAyAm  nanu
   guṇavattvaṃ na dravyalakṣaṇamityādinā/ tatra dvitīyasthalānudhāvane	guNavat tvam na dravya lakzaNam ityAdinA/ tatra dvitIya sTala anuDAvane
   bījamāha   nanvādyakṣaṇāvacchinne dravya iti/ kālāntarāvacchinna iti/	bIjam Aha  nanu AdyakzaNa avacCinne dravyaH iti/ kAla antara avacCinnaH iti/
   dvitīyādikṣaṇavacchinna ityarthaḥ/ tatra tatsattvam   dravyaguṇasattvam/	dvitIya Adi kzaNa vacCinnaH iti arTaH/ tatra tat sattvam  dravya guNa sattvam/
   guṇaśrayatvamiti/ guṇādhāratvamityarthaḥ/ samavāyena guṇaḥ	guNa Sraya tvam iti/ guNa ADAra tvam iti arTaH/ samavAyena guNaH
   lakṣaṇamityukte yadyapyavyāptirasti, tathāpi guṇāśrayatvamityukte	lakzaNam iti ukte yadi api avyAptiH asti, taTA api guNa ASraya tvam iti ukte
   nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ yādṛśadravyārambhaketyādi/ kriyā, kriyāto	na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/ yAdRSa dravya AramBaka ityAdi/ kriyA, kriyAto
   vibhāgaḥ, vibhāgāt pūrvadeśasaṃyoganāśaḥ, tataḥ uttradeśasaṃyogaḥ,	viBAgaH, viBAgAt pUrva deSa saMyoga nASaH, tatas uttra deSa saMyogaH,
   tataḥ dravyotpattiriti kramaḥ/ atra vibhāgaḥ saṃyogaśca avayavānāṃ	tatas dravya utpattiH iti kramaH/ atra viBAgaH saMyogaH ca avayavAnAm
   pūrvottaradeśānāṃ ca/ ghaṭotpādakaḥ yaḥ caturthakṣaṇotpannaḥ	pUrva uttara deSAnAm ca/ Gawa utpAdakaH yaH caturTa kzaNa utpannaH
   uttaradeśasaṃyogaḥ tajjanikā kriyā prathamakṣaṇotpanna tasyāḥ tṛtīyakṣaṇaḥ	uttara deSa saMyogaH tad janikA kriyA praTama kzaNa utpanna tasyAH tRtIya kzaNaH
   pūrvadeśasaṃyoganāśakṣaṇaḥ tadānīṃ ārambhakasaṃyoganāśajanakakriyā	pUrva deSa saMyoganA Sa kzaNaH tadAnIm AramBaka saMyoga nASa janaka kriyA
   jāyate cet utpattyanantarakṣaṇe dravyasya nāśo bhavati/ tathā cāyaṃ kramaḥ	jAyate ced utpatti ananta rakzaNe dravyasya nASaH Bavati/ taTA ca ayam kramaH
     prathamakṣaṇe ghaṭotpādakakriyā, dvitīyakṣaṇe vibhāgaḥ, tṛtīyakṣaṇe	 praTama kzaNe Gawa utpAdaka kriyA, dvitIya kzaNe viBAgaH, tRtI yakzaNe
   pūrvadeśāsaṃyoganāśaḥ uttaradeśasaṃyoganāśakakriyā ca, caturthakṣaṇe	pUrva deSa asaMyoga nASaH uttara deSa saMyoga nASaka kriyA ca, catur Ta kzaNe
   uttaradeśasaṃyogaḥ vibhāgaśca, pañcamakṣaṇe ghaṭotpattiḥ	uttara deSa saMyogaH viBAgaH ca, paQca makzaNe Gawa utpattiH
   pūrvadeśaseyāṅganāśca, ṣaṣṭhakṣaṇe ghaṭanāśaḥ uttaradeśasaṃyogaśceti	pUrva deSa seya aFganAH ca, zazWa kzaNe Gawa nASaH uttara deSa saMyogaH ca iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   navīnāḥ punariti/	navInAH punar iti/
   tathā ca etanmate caturthakṣaṇe eva ghaṭo 'pi uttaradeśasaṃyogātmakena	taTA ca etat mate caturTa kzaNe eva GawaH api uttara deSa saMyoga Atmakena
   asamavāyikāraṇena saha utpadyate/ ghaṭanāśaśca tattṛtīyakṣaṇa eveti	asamavAyi kAraNena saha utpadyate/ Gawa nASaH ca tad tRtI yakzaNaH eva iti
   ghaṭotpattidvitīyakṣaṇe ghaṭanāśābhāvāt utpannavinaṣṭaghaṭo 'prāmāṇika	Gawa utpatti dvitI ya kzaNe Gawa nASa aBAvAt utpanna vinazwa GawaH aprAmANika
   iti bhāvaḥ/	iti BAvaH/
   dīpikāyām  	dIpikAyAm  
   guṇasamānādhikaraṇeti/ guṇasamānādhikaraṇā guṇādhikaraṇavṛttiḥ yā	guNa samAna aDikaraNa iti/ guNa samAna aDikaraNA guNa aDikaraNa vRttiH yA
   sattānyā jātiḥ tadvattvaṃ dravyasya lakṣaṇam/ bhavati hi dravyatvarūpā	sattA anyA jAtiH tadvat tvam dravyasya lakzaNam/ Bavati hi dravya tva rUpA
   jātiḥ	jAtiH
   guṇādhikaraṇapṛthivyādivṛttiḥ sattāto 'nyā ceti tadvattvamādāya dravye	guNa aDikaraNa pRTivI Adi vRttiH sattAtaH anyA ca iti tadvat tvam AdAya dravye
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   ādyakṣaṇāvacchinnaghaṭe utpannavinaṣṭaghaṭe ca guṇābhāve 'pi	Adi a kzaNa avacCinna Gawe utpanna vinazwa Gawe ca guNa aBAve api
   tatsamānādhikaraṇadravyatvajātisattvāt nāvyāptiḥ/ jātau	tad samAna aDikaraNa dravya tva jAti sattvAt na avyAptiH/ jAtO
   guṇasamānādhikaraṇeti viśeṣaṇānupādāne	guNa samAna aDikaraNa iti viSezaNa anupAdAne
   sattābhinnaguṇatvajātimattvasya guṇe sattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ/	sattA Binna guNa tva jAtimat tvasya guNe sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH/
   guṇasamānādhikaraṇeti	guNa samAna aDikaraNa iti
   viśeṣaṇe upātte tu guṇe guṇānaṅgīkārāt guṇādhikaraṇaṃ na	viSezaNe upAtte tu guNe guNa anaFgIkArAt guNa aDikaraNam na
   guṇaḥ, kiṃ tu dravyameva tadvṛttitvaṃ guṇatve nāstīti jātipadena	guNaH, kim tu dravyam eva tad vRtti tvam guNa tve na asti iti jAti padena
   guṇatvagrahaṇāsambhavāt nātivyāptiḥ/ guṇādhikaraṇadravyavṛttiḥ yā	guNa tva grahaNA samBavAt na ati vyAptiH/ guNa aDikaraNa dravya vRttiH yA
   sattājātiḥ tadvattvasya guṇe 'pi sattvādativyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya jātau	sattA jAtiH tadvat tvasya guNe api sattvAt ati vyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya jAtO
   sattābhinneti viśeṣaṇam/ jātipadasthāne dharmapadaṃ	sattA aBinna iti viSezaNam/ jAti pada sTAne Darma padam
   nikṣipya	nikzipya

   tathāpi spapratiyogighaṭavṛttitvaṃ nāstīti/ tathā ca	taTA api spapratiyogi Gawa vRtti tvam na asti iti/ taTA ca
   ākāśatvamuktobhayasambandhena bhedaviśiṣṭānyaditi tat	AkASa tva m ukta uBaya sambanDena Beda viSizwAn yat iti tat 
   svāśrayaikavyaktikam, atastat na jātiḥ/ jātitvaṃ hi nityatve	sva ASraya eka vyakti kam, atas tat na jAtiH/ jAti tvam hi nitya tve
   satyanekasamavetatvam/ anekasamavetatvaṃ ca uktobhayasambandhena	sati aneka samaveta tvam/ aneka samaveta tvam ca ukta uBaya sambanDena
   bhedaviśiṣṭatvam/ atra ca ākāśatvaṃ jātiḥ (uktobhayasambandhena	Beda viSizwa tvam/ atra ca AkASa tvam jAtiH (ukta uBaya sambanDena
   bhedaviśiṣṭam) iti buddhiṃ prati ākāśatvaṃ svāśrayaikavyaktikam	Beda viSizwam) iti budDim prati AkASa tvam sva ASraya eka vyaktikam
   (uktobhayasambandhena bhedaviśiṣṭānyat) iti jñānasya tadvattābuddhiṃ	(ukta uBaya sambanDena Beda viSizwAnyat) iti jQAnasya tadvat tA budDim
   prati tadabhāvavattājñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti rītyā pratibandhakatvāt	prati tad aBAvavat tA jQAnam pratibanDakam iti rItyA pratibanDaka tvAt 
   jātitvaviṣayakajñānapratibandhakajñānaviṣayatbasya vyakterabhede sattvāt	jAti tva vizaya ka jQAna pratibanDaka jQAna vizayat basya vyakteH aBede sattvAt 
   jātibādhakatvamityavadheyam/	jAti bADaka tvam iti avaDeyam/
   vyaktestulyatvam	vyakteH tulya tvam
   anyūnānatiriktavyaktikatvamiti/ anyūnānatiriktāśrayakatvamityarthaḥ/	anyUna anatirikta vyaktika tvam iti/ anyUna anatirikta ASrayaka tvam iti arTaH/
   ghaṭatvakalaśatvayorīdṛśatulyatvasattvāt tayorna bhinnajātitvam/	Gawa tva kalaSa tvayoH IdRSa tulya tva sattvAt tayoH na Binna jAti tvam/
   vastutastu	vastutas tu
   svabhinnajātyāśrayavyaktiniṣṭhasaṅkhyānyūnānatiriktasaṅkhyākavyaktikatvaṃ	sva Binna jAti ASraya vyakti nizWa saFKyA nyUna anatirikta saFKyAka vyaktika tvam
   svasamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogitānavacchekadakasvabhinnajātisamānādhikaraṇanyonyābhāvapratiyogitānavaccheda 	sva samAna aDikaraNAnyonya aBAva pratiyogitAna vat Ceka daka sva Binna jAti samAna aDikaraNa nyonya aBAva pratiyogita anavacCeda 
   katvarūpam	katva rUpam
   tulyatvamityarthaḥ/ idaṃ kambugrīvādimattvasya jātitve bādhakam/	tulya tvam iti arTaH/ idam kambu grIva Adimattvasya jAti tve bADakam/
   svam   kambugrīvādimattvaṃ,	svam  kambu grIva Adimat tvaM,
   tatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedikā svabhinnajātiḥ	tad samAna aDikaraNa anyonya aBAva pratiyogitA avacCedikA sva Binna jAtiH
   ghaṭatvajātiḥ	Gawa tva jAtiH
   tatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakatvaṃ	tad samAna aDikaraNAnyonya aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tvam

   nāsti/ evaṃ caitādṛśatulyatvajñānasya	nAsti/ evam ca etAdRSa tulya tva jQAnasya

   1. tatra jātitva	1. tatra jAti tva
   nāstīti/ yathā pṛthivyādimano 'ntānyatamatve/ svaṃ	na asti iti/ yaTA pRTivI Adi manaH anta anyatama tve/ svam
   pṛthivyādimanontānyatamatvaṃ, tadbhinnā jātiḥ dravyatvaṃ	pRTivI Adi manontA anyatama tvaM, tad BinnA jAtiH dravya tvam
   tatsamaniyatatvaṃ pṛthivyādimanontānyatamatve 'stīti tanna jātiḥ/	tad sama niyata tvam pRTivI Adi manontA anyatama tve asti iti tat na jAtiH/
   tathā ca svabhinnajātisamaniyatatvaṃ tulyatvam/	taTA ca sva Binna jAti sama niyata tvam tulya tvam/
   svabhinnajātisamavaniyatatvaṃ ca	sva Binna jAti samavani yata tvam ca

   saṅkaro nāma	saFkaraH nAma
   parasparaṃ vihāya vartamānayordharmayorekatra vṛttiḥ/	parasparam vihAya vartamAnayoH DarmayoH ekatra vRttiH/

   jātitvam/ 1svādhikaraṇavṛttitva svābhāvavadvṛttitva  	jAti tvam/ 1sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva  svABAva vat vRtti tva

   kiñciddharmaviśiṣṭatvaṃ saṅkara iti phalitam/ etādṛśasāṅkaryasya	kiQcid Darma viSizwa tvam saFkaraH iti Palitam/ etAdRSasA aFkaryasya

   2gaganamanassaṃyoga ityanumānāt bhūtatvasya jātitvābhāvasiddhau	2gagana manassaMyogaH iti anumAnAt BUta tvasya jAti tva aBAva sidDO
   bādhajñānavidhayā jātitvajñānapratibandhikā yā niruktānumitiḥ	bADa jQAna viDayA jAti tva jQAna pratibanDikA yA niruktA anumitiH
   tajjanakavyāptyādijñāne niruktasāṅkaryasya viṣayatvāt	tad janaka vyApti Adi jQAne niruktasAFkaryasya vizaya tvAt 
   sākṣātpratibandhakajñānaviṣayasyeva	sAkzAt pratibanDaka jQAna vizayasya iva
   1. svādhikaraṇetyādi/	1. sva aDikaraNa ityAdi/
   svaṃ bhūtatvaṃ svādhikaraṇaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ tadvṛttitvaṃ	svam BUta tvam sva aDikaraNam pRTivI Adi catuzwayam tad vRtti tvam
   mūrtatve 'sti/ evaṃ svaṃ bhūtatvaṃ svābhāvaḥ bhūtatvābhāvaḥ tadvat manaḥ	mUrta tve asti/ evam svam BUta tvam svABAvaH BUta tva aBAvaH tadvat manaH

   saṃkara ityarthaḥ/	saMkaraH iti arTaH/

   mūrtatvavaiśiṣṭyamiti heturasti jātitvābhāvarūpasādhyaṃ cāstīti	mUrta tva vESizwyam iti hetuH asti jAti tva aBAva rUpa sADyam ca asti iti
   gaganamanassaṃyogasya dṛṣṭāntatvam/	gagana manassaMyogasya dRzwAnta tvam/

   1tasya sāṅkarye 'kṣatatvāt/ atha vā	1tasya sAFkarye akzata tvAt/ aTa vA

   1. tasyeti/	1. tasya iti/

   karmavibhāgaḥ	karma viBAgaH
   AnTs_5 utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇākuñcanaprasāraṇagamanāni pañca karmāṇi //	AnTH _5 utkzepaNa avakzepaNa AkuQcana prasAraNa gamanAni paQca karmANi //
   utkṣepaṇa   apakṣepaṇa	utkzepaNa  apakzepaNa
     ākuñcana   prasāraṇa   gamanāni pañcakarmāṇi/	 AkuQcana  prasAraNa  gamanAni paQcakarmANi/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   karma vibhajate  	karma viBajate  
   utkṣepaṇeti/ saṃyogabhinnatve sati saṃyogasamavāyikāraṇaṃ karma	utkzepaNa iti/ saMyoga Binna tve sati saMyoga samavAyi kAraNam karma
   karmatvajātimadvā/ nanu bhramaṇāderapyatiriktasya karmaṇaḥ sattvāt	karma tva jAtim at vA/ nanu BramaNa AdeH api atiriktasya karmaNaH sattvAt 
   pañcetyanupapannamiti cet   na/ bhramaṇādīnāmapigamane 'ntarbhāvāt na	paQca iti anupapannam iti ced  na/ BramaNa AdInAm apigamane antarBAvAt na
   pañcatvavirodhaḥ/	paQcatva viroDaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   saṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇe saṃyoge 'tivyāptivāraṇāya	saMyoga asamavAyi kAraNe saMyoge ati vyApti vAraNAya
   saṃyogabhinnatve satīti/ saṃyogasamavāyikāraṇa	saMyoga Binna tve sati iti/ saMyoga samavAyi kAraNa
   dravye 'tivyāptivāraṇāya asamavāyīti/	dravye ati vyApti vAraNAya asamavAyIti/
   bhramaṇādīnām	BramaNa AdInAm
   ityādinā recanasyandanordhvajvalanatiryaggamanānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ/	ityAdinA recana syandana UrDva jvalana tiryak gamanAnAm saMgrahaH/
   gamane 'ntarbhāvāditi/ na cotkṣepaṇādīnāmapi	gamane antarBAvAt iti/ na ca utkzepaNa AdInAm api
   gamane 'natarbhāvo 'stviti śaṅkyam/ svatantrecchasya	gamane anatarBAvaH astu iti SaFkyam/ svatantra icCasya

   1. tadabhāvāditi/	1. tad aBAvAt iti/
   samavāyo 'bhāvo vānyatra samavāyasambandhena nāsti, ataḥ	samavAyaH aBAvaH vA anyatra samavAya sambanDena nAsti, atas 
   pratiyogitāsambandhena samavāyavattvaṃ samavāyābhāvayerna bhavati/ evaṃ	pratiyogitA sambanDena samavAyavat tvam samavAya aBAvayeH na Bavati/ evam
   samavāye 'bhāve vā anyat kimapi samavāyasambandhena nāsti, ataḥ	samavAye aBAve vE anyat kim api samavAya sambanDena nAsti, atas

   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   saṃyogabhinnatve	saMyoga Binna tve
   sati saṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ karmeti karmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam/	sati saMyoga asamavAyi kAraNam karma iti karmaNaH lakzaNam uktam/
   saṃyogabhinnatve satītyanuktau saṃyogasya	saMyoga Binna tve sati iti anuktO saMyogasya
   saṃyogo 'pyasamavāyikāraṇam; kāyapustakasaṃyogaṃ prati	saMyogaH api asamavAyi kAraNam; kAya pustaka saMyogam prati
   hastapusatakasaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvāt; ataḥ	hasta pusataka saMyogasya asamavAyi kAraNa tva at; atas 
   saṃyoge 'tivyāptiḥ/	saMyoge ati vyAptiH/
   tadvāraṇāya saṃyogabhinnatve satītyuktam/	tad vAraNAya saMyoga Binna tve sati iti uktam/
   saṃyogakāraṇamityetāvanmātroktau saṃyogasamavāyikāraṇe	saMyoga kAraNam iti etAvat mAtrA uktO saMyoga samavAyi kAraNe
   dravye 'tivyāptiḥ, tadvāraṇāya kāraṇe asamavāyīti viśeṣaṇam/	dravye ati vyAptiH, tad vAraNAya kAraNe asamavAyI iti viSezaNam/
   tadāhasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇa iti/	tadAha saMyoga asamavAyi kAraNaH iti/
   svatantrecchasyeti/	svatantra icCasya iti/
   svatantreccho muniḥ niyogaparyanuyogānarha iti sarvasaṃmata	svatantra icCaH muniH niyoga paryanuyogAn arhaH iti sarva saMmata
   ityarthaḥ/ niyogaḥ   ājñā/ paryanuyogaḥ   praśnaḥ/	iti arTaH/ niyogaH  AjQA/ paryanuyogaH  praSnaH/
   tarkasaṃṅgrahaḥ	tarka saMFgrahaH
   sāmānyavibhāgaḥ	sAmAnya viBAgaH
   AnTs_6 param aparaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ sāmānyam //	AnTH _6 param aparam ca iti dviviDam sAmAnyam //
   sāmānyaṃ dvividham   param aparam ceti/	sAmAnyam dviviDam  param aparam ca iti/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   sāmānyaṃ vibhajate	sAmAnyam viBajate
     paramiti/ param   adhikadeśavṛtti/ aparam   nyūnadeśavṛtti/	 param iti/ param  aDika deSa vRtti/ aparam  nyUna deSa vRtti/
   sāmānyādicatuṣṭaye jātirnāsti/	sAmAnya Adi catuzwaye jAtiH na asti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   paramityādi/	param ityAdi/
   sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ agre mūlakṛtaiva vakṣyata iti na nyūnateti dhyeyam/	sAmAnya lakzaNam agre mUla kRtA eva vakzyate iti na nyUna tA iti Dyeyam/
   sattāyā dravyatvādyapekṣayā adhikadeśavṛttitvena paratvameva/	sattAyAH dravya tva Adi apekzayA aDika deSa vRtti tvena paratvam eva/

   sattāto 'paratvam ghaṭatvāditaḥ paratvamiti vivekaḥ/	sattAtaH apara tvam Gawa tva At itas paratvam iti vivekaH/

   viśeṣavibhāgaḥ	viSeza viBAgaH

   viśeṣaṃ vibhajate  	viSezam viBajate

   samavāyalakṣaṇam	samavAya lakzaNam
   AnTs_8 samavāyas tv eka eva //	AnTH _8 samavAyaH tu ekaH eva //
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   samavāyasya bhedo nāstītyāha  	samavAyasya BedaH na asti iti Aha  
   samavāyastu iti/	samavAyaH tu iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   samavāyasya bhedo	samavAyasya BedaH 
   nāstīti/ na ca samavāyasyābhede sparśasamavāyavati vāyau	na asti iti/ na ca samavAyasya aBede sparSa samavAyavati vAyO
   rūpavattāpratītiḥ syāditi śaṅkyam/ rūpasamavāyasattve 'pi rūpābhāvena	rUpa vattA pratItiH syAt iti SaFkyam/ rUpa samavAya sattve api rUpa aBAvena
   tathā pratīterabhāvāditi dik/	taTA pratIteH aBAvAt iti dik/
   bālapiyā	bAla piyA
   rūpavattāpratītiḥ syāditi/	rUpa vattA pratItiH syAt iti/
   sparśasamavāyasattvena tadabhinnasya rūpasamavāyasyāpi sattvāt	sparSa samavAya sattvena tat aBinnasya rUpa samavAyasya api sattvAt 
   rūpasamavāyasyaiva rūpavattāpratītiniyāmakatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	rUpa samavAyasya eva rUpavattA pratIti niyAmaka tvAt iti BAvaH/
   rūpasamavāyo na rūpavattāpratītiniyāmakaḥ, api tu samavāyasambandhena	rUpa samavAyaH na rUpa vattA pratIti niyAmakaH, api tu samavAya sambanDena
   rūpam/	rUpam/
   vāyau tu na rūpamasti,	vAyO tu na rUpam asti,
   ato na rūpavattāpratītiprasaṅga ityāśayena samādhatte  	atas na rUpavattA pratIti prasaFgaH iti ASayena samADatte  
   rūpasamavāyasattve 'pīti/ nanu vāyau rūpasamavāyasattve rūpaṃ nāstīti	rUpa samavAya sattve api iti/ nanu vAyO rUpa samavAya sattve rUpam na asti iti
   vaktuṃ na śakyate sambandhasattāyāḥ sambandhisattāvyāpyatvādityāśaṅkyāha	vaktum na Sakyate sambanDa sattAyAH sambanDi sattA vyApya tvAt iti ASaFkya Aha
     digiti/ ayamāśayaḥ   vāyvanuyogikatvaviśiṣṭaḥ	 diS iti/ ayam ASayaH  vAyu anuyogika tva viSizwaH
   rūpapratiyogikatvaviśiṣṭaśca samavāyaḥ vāyau	rUpa pratiyogika tva viSizwaH ca samavAyaH vAyO
   rūpavattāpratītiniyāmakaḥ/ vāyvanuyogikatvaviśiṣṭasamavāye	rUpa vattA pratIti niyAmakaH/ vAyu anuyogika tva viSizwa samavAye
   rūpapratiyogikatvābhāvāt vāyū rūpavāniti pratītiḥ nāpādayituṃ	rUpa pratiyogika tva aBAvAt vAyuH rUpavAn iti pratItiH na apAdayitum
   śakya iti/ adhikaṃ muktāvalīmañjūṣādau draṣṭavyam/	SakyaH iti/ aDikam muktA AvalIm aQjUzA AdO drazwavyam/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   abhāvavibhāgaḥ	aBAva viBAgaH
   AnTs_9 abhāvaś caturvidhaḥ / prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo 'tyantābhāvo	AnTH _9 aBAvaH caturviDaH / prAc aBAvaH praDvaMsa aBAvaH atyanta aBAvaH 
   'nyonyābhāvaś ceti //	anyonya aBAvaH ca iti //

   pṛthivīnirūpaṇam	pRTivI nirUpaNam
   AnTs_10[1] gandhavatī pṛthivī / sā dvividhā nityānityā ca / nityā	AnTH _10[1] ganDavatI pRTivI / sA dviviDA nitya anityA ca / nityA
   paramāṇurūpā / anityā kāryarūpā / punas trividhā śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt	paramANu rUpA / anityA kArya rUpAH / punar triviDA SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt 
   / śarīram asmadādīnām / indriyaṃ gandhagrāhakaṃ ghrāṇaṃ nāsāgravarti /	/ SarIram asmad AdInAm / indriyam ganDa grAhakam GrANam nAsA agra varti /

   tatra gandhavatī pṛthivī/	tatra ganDavatI pRTivI/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   tatroddeśakramānusārāt prathamaṃ pṛthivyāḥ lakṣaṇamāha   tatreti/	tatra uddeSa krama anusArAt praTamam pRTivyAH lakzaNam Aha  tatra iti/

   niyāmikā/	niyAmikA/
   nanu	nanu
   surabhyasurabhyavayavārabdhe dravye parasparavirodhena	suraBya suraBI avayava ArabDe dravye paraspara viroDena
   gandhānutpādādavyāptiḥ/ na ca tatra gandhapratītyanupapattiriti vācyam/	ganDa an utpAdAt avyAptiH/ na ca tatra ganDa pratIti anupapattiH iti vAcyam/
   avayavagandhasyaiva tatra pratītisambhavena citragandhānaṅgīkārāt/ kiṃ	avayava ganDasya eva tatra pratIti samBavena citra ganDA anaFgIkArAt/ kim
   cotpannavinaṣṭaghaṭādāvavyāptiriti cet   na/	ca utpanna vinazwa Gawa AdO= avyAptiH iti ced  na/
   gandhasamānādhikaraṇadravyatvāparajātimattvasya vivakṣitatvāt/	ganDa samAna aDikaraNa dravya tva apara jAtimattvasya vivakzita tvAt/

   pṛthivīlakṣaṇasya	pRTivI lakzaNasya

   gandhasamavāyikāraṇatāvacchedakatayā pṛthivītvajātisiddhiriti	ganDa samavAyi kAraNa tAva= Cedaka tayA pRTivI tva jAti sidDiH iti

   pratipādakaśabde 'nveti/ tathā ca vastupratipādakanāmamātramuddeśa	pratipAdaka Sabde anveti/ taTA ca vastu pratipAdaka nAma mAtram uddeSa
   iti lakṣaṇaṃ paryavasyati/ atra ghaṭa iti pade 'tivyāptivāraṇāya	iti lakzaNam paryavasyati/ atra GawaH iti pade ati vyApti vAraNAya
   vastupadaṃ lakṣaṇīyavastuparam/ lakṣaṇīyasya pṛthivyādeḥ sāmānyataḥ	vastu padam lakzaNIya vastu param/ lakzaNIyasya pRTivI AdeH sAmAnyatas

   pratītyanupapattiriti/ ataścitragandha evāpratibadhyaḥ svīkārya iti	prati iti anupapattiH iti/ atas citra ganDaH eva apratibaDyaH svIkAryaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ avayavagandhasyaiveti/ svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhenetyādiḥ/	BAvaH/ avayava ganDasya eva iti/ sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena ityAdiH/
   tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyenāṅgīkṛtyāha   kiṃ ceti/	tuzyatu durjanaH iti nyAyena aFgIkRtya Aha  kim ca iti/

   bodhyam/	boDyam/

   gandhasamavāyikāraṇatāvacchedakatayeti/	ganDa samavAyi kAraNa tAva= CedakatayA iti/
   'samavāyasambandhāvacchinnagandhatvāvacchinnagandhāniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitatādātmyasambandhāvacchinnapṛthivīniṣṭhakāraṇatā	asamavAya sambanDa avacCinna ganDa tva avacCinna ganDA nizWa kArya tA nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna pRTivI nizWa kAraNa tA

   saṅkīrtanaśabdasya pratipādakaśabda ityarthaḥ/	saFkIrtana Sabdasya pratipAdaka SabdaH iti arTaH/

   padārthaśabdo vastuparaḥ/ nāmneti tṛtīyārthasya abhedasya	padArTa SabdaH vastu paraH/ nAmnA iti tRtIya arTasya aBedasya

   phalati/ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśakāladigātmamanāṃsītyatra	Palati/ pRTivI ap tejaH vAyu AkASa kAla diS Atma manAMsi iti atra

   tadvāraṇāya vastupadaṃ	tad vAraNAya vastu padam

   lakṣyatāvacchedakaprakārakalakṣyaviśeṣyakajñānajanaka  	lakzya tAvacCedaka prakAra kalakzya viSezyaka jQAna janakaH

   1prakāratvamarthaḥ/	1prakAra tvam arTaH/

   kasyāpi gandhasyānutpādādavyāptiḥ/ na ca	kasya api ganDasya anutpAdAt avyAptiH/ na ca
