   1. prakāratvamarya	1. prakAra tvam arya
   iti/ tathā ca	iti/ taTA ca
   prameyatvarūpasāmānyavarmaprakārakapṛthivyādiviśeṣyakajñānajanake	prameya tva rUpa sAmAnya varma prakAraka pRTivI Adi viSezyaka jQAna janake
   prameyapade ityarthaḥ/	prameya pade iti arTaH/
   surabhigandhaḥ	suraBi ganDaH
   asurabhigandho vā notpadyatām, citragandha utpadyatām, tena	asuraBi ganDaH vA na utpadyatAm, citraganDaH utpadyatAm, tena
   gandhapratītirupadyate, gandhavattāsattvādavyāptiśca neti vācyam/	ganDa pratItiH upadyate, ganDavat tA sattvAt avyAptiH ca na iti vAcyam/
   avayavagatagandhasyaiva svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena avayavini	avayava gata ganDasya eva sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena avayavini
   pratītisambhave citragandhasyānaṅgīkārāt/ tathā ca	pratIti samBave citra ganDasya anaFgIkArAt/ taTA ca
   tatrāvyāptitādavasthyam/ kiṃ ca yo ghaṭaḥ prathamakṣaṇe utpannaḥ atha	tatra avyApti tAdavasTyam/ kim ca yaH GawaH praTama kzaNe utpannaH aTa
   dvitīyakṣaṇe vinaṣṭaḥ tasmin ghaṭe avyāptiḥ, prathamakṣaṇe 'utpannaṃ	dvitIya kzaNe vinazwaH tasmin Gawe avyAptiH, praTama kzaNe autpannam
   dravyaṃ	dravyam
   kṣaṇamaguṇam' iti nyāyena gandhavirahāt/ dvitīyakṣaṇe dharmiṇa eva	kzaNam aguNam a iti nyAyena ganDa virahAt/ dvitIya kzaNe DarmiNaH eva
   nāśāt ityāśayena śaṅkate   dīpikāyām nanu	nASAt iti ASayena SaFkate  dIpikAyAm nanu
   surabhyasurabhīti/	suraBya suraBIti/
   gandhasamānādhikaraṇeti/ gandhādhikaraṇavṛttiḥ dravyatvavyāpyā ca	ganDa samAna aDikaraNa iti/ ganDa aDikaraNa vRttiH dravya tva vyApyA ca
   yā jātiḥ tadvattvaṃ pṛthivyāḥ lakṣaṇam/ gandhādhikaraṇaṃ puṣpāditadvṛttiḥ	yA jAtiH tadvat tvam pRTivyAH lakzaNam/ ganDa aDikaraNam puzpa Adi tad vRttiH
   dravyatvavyāpyā jātiḥ pṛthivītvajātiḥ tadvattvaṃ	dravya tva vyApyA jAtiH pRTivI tva jAtiH tadvat tvam
   surabhyasurabhyavayavārabdhe dravye utpannavinaṣṭaghaṭe cāstīti	suraBya suraBI avayava ArabDe dravye utpanna vinazwa Gawe ca asti iti
   nāvyāptiḥ/ dravyatvavyāpyajātimattvamātroktau dravyatvavyāpyā yā	na avyAptiH/ dravya tva vyApya jAtimat tva mAtra uktO dravya tva vyApyA yA
   jalatvajātiḥ tadvattvasya jale sattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ/ ato	jala tva jAtiH tadvat tvasya jale sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH/ atas 
   gandhasamānādhikaraṇeti/ jalatvasya gandhādhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvāt na	ganDa samAna aDikaraNa iti/ jala tvasya ganDa aDikaraNa vRtti tva aBAvAt na
   doṣaḥ/ gandhasamānādhikaraṇajātimattvamātroktau	dozaH/ ganDa samAna aDikaraNa jAtimattva mAtra uktO
   gandhādhikaraṇapṛthivīvṛttiḥ yā sattājātiḥ tadvattvasya jalādau sattvāt	ganDa aDikaraNa pRTivI vRttiH yA sattA jAtiH tadvat tvasya jala AdO sattvAt 
   ativyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya dravyatvavyāpyeti jātiviśeṣaṇam/ nanu	ativyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya dravya tva vyApya iti jAti viSezaNam/ nanu
   dravyatvavyāpyeti viśeṣaṇe datte 'pi	dravya tva vyApya iti viSezaNe datte api
   dravyatvajātimādāyajalādiṣvativyāptiḥ durvārā/ dravyatvasya	dravya tva jAtim AdAya jala Adizu ativyAptiH durvArA/ dravya tvasya
   gandhādhikaraṇapṛthivīvṛttitvāt dravyatvaśūnyavṛttitvācceti cet  	ganDa aDikaraNa pRTivI vRtti tvAt dravya tva SUnya vRtti tvAt ca iti ced  
   na/ prakṛte dravyatvavyāpyatvaṃ na dravyatvaśūnayāvṛttitvam kiṃ tu	na/ prakRte dravya tva vyApya tvam na dravya tva SUnayA AvRtti tvam kim tu
   dravyatvanyūnavṛttitvarūpam/ dravyatvaṃ ca na dravyatvanyūnavṛtti	dravya tva nyUna vRtti tva rUpam/ dravya tvam ca na dravya tva nyUna vRtti
   ityāśayāt/ dravyatvanyūnavṛttitvaṃ ca	iti ASayAt/ dravya tva nyUna vRtti tvam ca
   1dravyatvasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvam/ tadāha  	1dravya tva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvam/ tat Aha  
   prakāśikāyām jalatvādikamādāyetyādi/	prakASikAyAm jala tva Adikam AdAya ityAdi/
   dravyatvasamānādhikaraṇeti/ dravyatvādhikaraṇaṃ jalaṃ tadvṛttiryo bheda	dravya tva samAna aDikaraNa iti/ dravya tva aDikaraNam jalam tad vRttiH yaH Beda
   pṛthivībhedaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvāt pṛthivītvasya	pRTivI BedaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvAt pRTivI tvasya
   dravyatvanyūnavṛttitvam/ dravyatvaṃ tu na	dravya tva nyUna vRtti tvam/ dravya tvam tu na
   dravyatvādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ dravyabhedasya	dravya tva aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedakam dravya Bedasya
   dravyatvādhikaraṇāvṛttitvāditi dravyatvaṃ na dravyatvanyūnavṛttīti bhāvaḥ/	dravya tva aDikaraNa AvRtti tvAt iti dravya tvam na dravya tva nyUna vRtti iti BAvaH/
   dīpikāyām nanu	dIpikAyAm nanu
   jalādāvapi gandhapratīteriti/ tathā ca gandhavattvarūpasya	jala AdO= api ganDa pratIteH iti/ taTA ca ganDavat tva rUpasya
   pṛthivīlakṣaṇasya	pRTivI lakzaNasya
   jalādau ativyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ anvayavyatirekābhyāmiti/ jalādau	jala AdO ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/ anvaya vyatirekAByAm iti/ jala AdO
   gandhavatpṛthivīsaṃyogasattve gandhapratītiḥ tadabhāve tadabhāva	ganDavat pRTivI saMyoga sattve ganDa pratItiH tad aBAve tad aBAva
   ityanvayavyatirekābhyāmityarthaḥ/	iti anvaya vyatirekAByAm iti arTaH/
   prakāśikāyām	prakASikAyAm
   svāśrayasaṃyuktatvasambandheneti/ svaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ, svāśrayaḥ pṛthivī,	sva ASraya saMyukta tva sambanDena iti/ svam pRTivI ganDaH, sva ASrayaH pRTivI,
   tatsaṃyuktatvaṃ jalādau/	tad saMyukta tvam jala AdO/
   yathāśrutagrāhī  	yaTA Sruta grAhI  
   sambandhaviśeṣānavacchinnaṃ gandhavattvameva lakṣaṇamityabhimānavān/	sambanDa viSezAn avacCinnam ganDavat tvam eva lakzaNam iti aBimAnavAn/
   anugatarūpeṇasarvādhāratāprayojakasambandhabhinnasambanghatvenetyarthaḥ/	anugata rUpeNa sarva ADAra tA prayojaka sambanDa Binna sambanGa tvena iti arTaH/
   kālikādisambandhaḥ sarvādhāratāprayojakaḥ tadbhinnasambandhatvaṃ	kAlikA Adi sambanDaH sarva ADAra tA prayojakaH tad Binna sambanDa tvam
   samavāyādau/ lakṣaṇatāghaṭakasambandhāt lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhān	samavAya AdO/ lakzaNa tA Gawaka sambanDAt lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDAn
   samavāyādīn/ samavāyādīnāṃ samavāyatvādinaiva saṃsargatayeti/	samavAya AdIn/ samavAya AdInAm samavAya tva AdinA eva saMsargatayA iti/
   spaṣṭaṃ cedam vyadhikaraṇagādādharyām/	spazwam ca idam vyaDikaraNa gAda aDaryAm/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   pṛthivīvibhāgaḥ	pRTivI viBAgaH
   AnTs_10[2] sā dvividhā nityānityā ca / nityā paramāṇurūpā / anityā	AnTH _10[2] sA dviviDA nitya anityA ca / nityA paramANu rUpA / anityA
   kāryarūpā / punas trividhā śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīram asmadādīnām	kArya rUpAH / punar triviDA SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt / SarIram asmad AdInAm
   / indriyaṃ gandhagrāhakaṃ ghrāṇaṃ nāsāgravarti / viṣayo mṛtpāṣāṇādiḥ //	/ indriyam ganDa grAhakam GrANam nAsA agra varti / vizayaH mRd pAzANa AdiH //
   sā dvividhā  	sA dviviDAH  
   nityā anityā ceti/ nityā paramāṇurūpā/ anityā kāryarūpā/	nityA anityA ca iti/ nityA paramANu rUpA/ anityA kArya rUpA/
   punastrividhā   śarīra indriya viṣayabhedāt/ śarīraṃ	punar triviDA  SarIra indriya  vizaya Beda at/ SarIram
   asmadādīnām/ indriyaṃ gandhagrāhakaṃ ghrāṇam/ tacca nāsāgravarti/	asmad AdInAm/ indriyam ganDa grAhakam GrANam/ tat ca nAsA agra varti/
   viṣayo mṛtpāṣāṇādiḥ/	vizayaH mRd pAzANa AdiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   pṛthivīṃ vibhajate  	pRTivIm viBajate  
   sā dvividheti/ nityatvaṃ dhvaṃsāpratiyogitvam/ anityatvam	sA dviviDA iti/ nitya tvam DvaMsa apratiyogi tvam/ anitya tvam
   dhvaṃsapratiyogitvam/ prakārāntareṇa vibhajate   punariti/ ātmano	DvaMsa pratiyogi tvam/ prakAra antareNa viBajate  punar iti/ AtmanaH 
   bhogāyatanaṃ śarīram/ yadavacchinnātmani bhogo jāyate	Boga Ayatanam SarIram/ yad avacCinna Atmani BogaH jAyate
   tadbhogāyatanam/ sukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣātkāro bhogaḥ/	tad Boga Ayatanam/ suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzAtkAraH BogaH/
   śabdetarodbhūtaviśeṣaguṇānāśrayatve sati	Sabda itara udBUta viSeza guNAn ASraya tve sati
   jñānakāraṇamanassaṃyogāśrayatvaṃ indriyatvam/ śarīrendriyabhinno	jQAna kAraNa manassaMyoga ASraya tvam indriya tvam/ SarIra indriya Binno
   viṣayaḥ/ evaṃ ca gandhavaccharīraṃ pārthivaśarīram, gandhavadindriyaṃ	vizayaH/ evam ca ganDa vat SarIram pArTiva SarIram, ganDavat indriyam
   pārthivendriyam, gandhavān viṣayaḥ pārthivaviṣaya iti tattallakṣaṇaṃ	pArTiva indriyam, ganDavAn vizayaH pArTiva vizayaH iti tad tad lakzaNam
   bodhyam/ pārthivaśarīraṃ darśayati śarīramiti/ pārthivendriyaṃ	boDyam/ pArTiva SarIram darSayati  SarIra miti/ pArTiva indriyam
   darśayati   indriyamiti/ gandhagrāhakamiti prayojanakathanam/	darSayati  indriya miti/ ganDa grAhakam iti prayojana kaTanam/
   ghrāṇamiti saṃjñā/ nāsogretyāśrayoktiḥ/ evamuttaratra jñeyam/	GrANam iti saMjQA/ nAsA ugra iti ASrayoktiH/ evam uttaratra jQeyam/
   pārthivaviṣayaṃ darśayati   mṛtpāṣāṇādi iti/	pArTiva vizayam darSayati  mRd pAzANa Adi iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   nityapṛthivītvādirūpalakṣaṇagataṃ nityatvādi darśayati  	nitya pRTivI tva Adi rUpa lakzaNa gatam nitya tva Adi darSayati  
   nityatvamiti/ prakārāntareṇeti/ pṛthivīmityanuṣajyate/ atra	nitya tvamiti/ prakAra antareNa iti/ pRTivIm iti anuzajyate/ atra
   nityapṛthivyāḥ śarīrendriyabhinnatvarūpaviṣayalakṣaṇākrāntatvena	nitya pRTivyAH SarIra indriya Binna tva rUpa vizaya lakzaNa AkrAnta tvena
   viṣayāntargatatvamiti pṛthivyāstrividhatvam/ ata eva mūle	vizaya antargata tvam iti pRTivyAH triviDa tvam/ atas eva mUle
   punastrividhetyuktiḥ saṅgacchate iti dhyeyam/	punar triviDA iti uktiH saFgacCate iti Dyeyam/
   kecittu  	kecid tu  
   anityapṛthivyā eva traividhyaṃ varṇayanti/ uddeśakramānusāreṇa prathamaṃ	anitya pRTivyAH eva trEviDyam varNayanti/ uddeSa krama anusAreNa praTamam
   śarīralakṣaṇamāha   ātmana iti/ āyatanaṃ avacchedakam/ tathā ca	SarIra lakzaNam Aha  AtmanaH iti/ Ayatanam avacCedakam/ taTA ca
   militaṃ yādṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sampannaṃ tādṛśamāha   yadavacchinneti/	militam yAdRSam lakzaNam sampannam tAdRSam Aha  yat avacCinnA iti/
   sukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣātkārāvacchedakam iti yāvat/ atra	suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzAtkAra avacCedakam iti yAvat/ atra
   antyāvayavitve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ tena pādādīnāṃ	antya avayavi tve sati iti viSezaNam deyam/ tena pAda AdInAm
   avacchedakatve 'pi tatra na ativyāptiḥ/ yathā śarīratvaṃ na jātiḥ,	avacCedaka tve api tatra na ativyAptiH/ yaTA SarIra tvam na jAtiH,
   pṛthivītvādinā saṅkarāt tathā indriyatvaṃ na	pRTivI tva AdinA saFkarAt taTA indriya tvam na
   jātirityāśayenāha   śabdetarodbhūteti/	jAtiH iti ASayena Aha  Sabda itara udBUtA iti/
   ātmādāvativyāptivāraṇāya satyantam/ śrotre 'vyāptivāraṇāya	Atma AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya satyantam/ Srotre avyApti vAraNAya
   śabdetareti/ cakṣurādau viśeṣaguṇasyānudbhūtarūpādeḥ	Sabda itareti/ cakzuH AdO viSeza guNasya anudBUta rUpa AdeH
   sattvenāvyaptivāraṇāya udbhūteti/ udbhūtatvaṃ na jātiḥ	sattvena avyapti vAraNAya udBUta iti/ udBUta tvam na jAtiH
   śuklatvādinā sāṃkaryāt/ na ca śuklatvādivyāpyaṃ	Sukla tva AdinA sAMkaryAt/ na ca Sukla tva Adi vyApyam
   nānaivodbhūtatvamiti vācyam/ cākṣuṣādau udbhūtarūpatvādinā	nAnA eva udBUta tvam iti vAcyam/ cAkzuza AdO udBUta rUpa tva AdinA
   kāraṇatvānupapatteḥ/ kiṃ tu śuklatvādivyāpyaṃ anudbhūtatvaṃ nānā	kAraNatva anupapatteH/ kim tu Sukla tva Adi vyApyam anudBUta tvam nAnA
   tadabhāvakūṭavattvamudbhūtatvam/ tacca saṃyogādāvapi/ tathā ca	tad aBAva kUwa vat tvam udBUta tvam/ tat ca saMyoga AdO= api/ taTA ca
   śabdetarodbhūtaguṇaṃ saṃyogamādāya asambhavavāraṇāya viśeṣeti/	Sabda itara udBUta guNam saMyogam AdAya asamBava vAraNAya viSeza iti/
   kālādāvativyāptivāraṇāya viśeṣyadalam; tatraiva	kAla AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya viSezya dalam; tatra eva
   ativyāptivāraṇāya jñānakāraṇeti/ prācīnamate	ati vyApti vAraNAya jQAna kAraNA iti/ prAcInamate
   viṣayāvayavendriyāvayavasaṃyogasya pratyakṣakāraṇatayā tadāśrayasya	vizaya avayava indriya avayava saMyogasya pratyakza kAraNa tayA tad ASrayasya
   indriyāvayavasya, navīnamate kālādau rūpābhāvapratyakṣe	indriya avayavasya, navIna mate kAla AdO rUpa aBAva pratyakze
   sannikarṣaghaṭakatayā kāraṇībhūtacakṣussaṃyogāśrayasya kālādeśca	sannikarza Gawaka tayA kAraNIBUta cakzuH saMyoga ASrayasya kAla AdeH ca
   vāraṇāya manaḥ padam/ na ca ātmānyatve sati ityanenaiva ātmani	vAraNAya manaH padam/ na ca Atma anya tve sati iti anena eva Atmani
   ativyāptivāraṇasambhave kiṃ	ati vyApti vAraNa samBave kim
   gurutaraśabdetarodbhūtetyādiviśeṣaṇeneti vācyam/ tathā sati	gurutara Sabda itara udBUtA ityAdi viSezaNena iti vAcyam/ taTA sati
   carmamanassaṃyogasya jñānamātraṃ prati hetutvamate	carma mana ssaMyogasya jQAna mAtram prati hetutva mate
   tatrātivyāpterityalaṃ vistareṇa/ evaṃ ceti/ tattadarthaṃsya	tatra ati vyApteH iti alam vistareNa/ evam ca iti/ tat tad arTaMsya
   śarīrādisāmānyalakṣaṇatve cetyarthaḥ/ nanu gandhavattvapraveśenaiva	SarIra Adi sAmAnya lakzaNa tve ca iti arTaH/ nanu ganDavat tva praveSena eva
   tallakṣaṇasya sāmañjasye gandhagrāhakatvaniveśanamanucitam/ evaṃ ca	tad lakzaNasya sAmaQjasye ganDa grAhaka tva niveSanam anucitam/ evam ca
   indriyaṃ gandhagrāhakam iti mūlamanucitaṃ ityāśaṅkāṃ	indriyam ganDa grAhakam iti mUlam anucitam iti ASaFkAm
   parijihīrṣuḥ tanmūlaṃ tatprayojanakathanaparatayā	parijihIrzuH tad mUlam tad prayojana kaTana para tayA
   vyācaṣṭe gandhagrāhakamiti/ uttaratra indriyaṃ rasagrāhakam ityādau/	vyAcazwe ganDa grAhaka miti/ uttaratra indriyam rasa grAhakam iti AdO/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu 'punaḥ	nanu apunar 
   trividhā śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt' iti ganthena kiṃ	triviDA SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt a iti ganTena kim
   pṛthivīsāmānyasya tredhā vibhāga ucyate kiṃ vā anityapṛthivyāḥ/ nādyaḥ,	pRTivI sAmAnyasya treDA viBAgaH ucyate kim vE anitya pRTivyAH/ na AdyaH,
   pṛthivīsāmānyasya yadyayaṃ vibhāgaḥ syāt tarhi nityapṛthivyā api	pRTivI sAmAnyasya yadi ayam viBAgaH syAt tarhi nitya pRTivyAH api
   śarīrendriyaviṣayeṣu kvacidantarbhāvo vācyamaḥ/ sa ca na sambabhavati/	SarIra indriya vizayezu kvacid antarBAvaH vAcyamaH/ sa ca na sambaBavati/
   tathā hi   na tāvat nityapṛthivyāḥ śarīre 'ntarbhāvaḥ sambhavati, nāpi	taTA hi  na tAvat nitya pRTivyAH SarIre antarBAvaH samBavati, na api
   indriye/	indriye/
   tayorubhayorapyanityatvāt/ nāpi viṣaye, mṛtpāṣāṇādirūpasya	tayoH uBayoH api anitya tva at/ na api vizaye, mRd pAzANa Adi rUpasya
   viṣayasya nityatvābhāvāt/ na dvitīyaḥ, punastrividheti punaḥśabdena	vizayasya nitya tva aBAvAt/ na dvitIyaH, punar triviDA iti punar Sabdena
   pūrvaṃ vibhaktasyaiva vibhāgāntaraṃ kriyata iti sūcanāt	pUrvam viBaktasya eva viBAga antaram kriyate iti sUcanAt 
   ityāśaṅkya āha atra nityapṛthivyā ityādinā/ evaṃ ca	iti ASaFkye Aha atra nitya pRTivyAH ityAdinA/ evam ca
   pṛthivīsāmānyasyaiva punastredhā vibhāgaḥ/ nityapṛthivyāḥ	pRTivI sAmAnyasya eva punar treDAH viBAgaH/ nitya pRTivyAH
   śarīrendriyabhinnatvāt viṣaye antarbhāṃva iti nānupapattiriti	SarIra indriya Binna tvAt vizaye antarBAMvaH iti na anupapattiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   nanu kathañcidatra	nanu kaTaQcid atra
   nirvāhe 'pi tejaḥ prakaraṇe punastrividhamiti na saṅgacchate/	nirvAhe api tejaH prakaraNe punar triviDam iti na saFgacCate/
   nityatejasaḥ paramāṇurūpasya bhaumadivyodaryākarajeṣu caturṣu	nitya tejasaH paramANu rUpasya BOma divya udaryAkara jezu caturzu
   viṣayeṣvantarbhāvāsambhavāt/ janyatvaghaṭitabhaumatvādeḥ	vizayezu antarBAva asamBavAt/ janya tva Gawita BOma tva AdeH
   nityayejasyasaṃbhavāt/ ataḥ anityapṛthivyā evāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ/	nitya yejasi asaMBavAt/ atas anitya pRTivyAH eva ayam viBAgaH/
   punaḥśabdaśca vākyālaṅkāra iti nānupapattirityāśayānānāṃ	punar SabdaH ca vAkya alaFkAraH iti na anupapattiH iti ASayAnAnAm
   matamāha   kecittu iti/ kecidityasvarasodbhāvanam/ tadbījaṃ	matam Aha  kecid tu iti/ kecid iti a svarasa udBAvanam/ tad bIjam
   tu punaḥśabdāsvārasyāt nānityapṛthivyā ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ/ na ca sa	tu punar SabdAsu ArasyAt na anitya pRTivyAH ayam viBAgaH/ na ca sa
   vākyālaṅkāra iti	vAkya alaFkAraH iti
   vācyam/ vākyādau	vAcyam/ vAkya AdO
   prayuktasya punaḥśabdasya vākyālaṅkāratāyāḥ kutrāpyadṛṣṭacaratvāt/	prayuktasya punar Sabdasya vAkya alaFkAra tAyAH kutra api adRzwa cara tvAt/
   yatkiñcitpadottaraṃ prayujyamānasyaiva punaḥśabdasya	yat kiQcit pada uttaram prayujyamAnasya eva punar Sabdasya
   vākyālaṅkāratāyāstatra tatra dṛṣṭatvāt/ kiṃ ca punaśśabdasya	vAkya alaFkAra tAyAH tatra tatra dRzwa tva at/ kim ca punar Sabdasya
   prakārāntaraparatvameva annambhaṭṭasyāpi saṃmatam/ 'prakārāntareṇa	prakAra antara para tvam eva annamBawwasya api saMmatam/ aprakAra antareNa
   vibhajate   punastrividheti' ityavataraṇikādānāt/ na ca	viBajate  punar triviDA iti a iti avataraNikA dAnAt/ na ca
   pṛthivīsāmānyasyātra vibhāga iti kathañcit upapādane 'pi	pRTivI sAmAnyasya atra viBAgaH iti kaTaQcid upapAdane api
   tejaḥprakaraṇe 'nupapattiriti vācyam/ tatra bhaumādiśabdānāṃ	tejaH prakaraNe anupapattiH iti vAcyam/ tatra BOma Adi SabdAnAm
   bhūmisambandhi ityādyevārthaḥ, na tu bhūmijanyamiti/ tathā ca	BUmi sambanDi iti Adi eva arTaH, na tu BUmi janyam iti/ taTA ca
   paramāṇurūpatejaso 'pi bhūmisambandhitvāderakṣatatayā	paramANu rUpa tejasaH api BUmi sambanDi tva AdeH akzata tayA
   viṣayāntarbhāvo yujyata iti/	vizaya antarBAvaH yujyate iti/
   ātmano bhogāyatanaṃ	AtmanaH Boga Ayatanam
   śarīramiti śarīralakṣaṇam/ ātmapadottaraṣaṣṭhyāḥ samavetatvamarthaḥ/	SarIram iti SarIra lakzaNam/ Atma pada uttara zazWyAH samaveta tvam arTaH/
   tasya bhoge 'nvayaḥ/ bhogo nāma sukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣātkāraḥ/	tasya Boge anvayaH/ BogaH nAma suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzAtkAraH/
   āyatanamavacchedakam/ tathā ca	Ayatanam avacCedakam/ taTA ca
   ātmasamavetasukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣatkārāvacchedakaṃ śarīramityuktaṃ	Atma samaveta suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzatkAra avacCedakam SarIram iti uktam
   bhavati/ idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hastapādādau śarīrāvayave 'tivyāptam/	Bavati/ idam lakzaNam hasta pAda AdO SarIra avayave ati vyAptam/
   hastapādādyavacchedenāpi ātmani	hasta pAda Adi avacCedena api Atmani
   sukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣātkārasyotpādāt/ ataḥ antyāvayavitve satīti	suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzAtkArasya utpAdAt/ atas antya avayavi tve sati iti
   viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ antyāvayavitvaṃ nāma dravyānārambhakatve sati	viSezaNam deyam/ antya avayavi tvam nAma dravya anAramBaka tve sati
   avayavitvam/ hastādeḥ śarīrārambhakatayā satyantābhāvāt	avayavi tvam/ hasta AdeH SarIra AramBaka tayA satyanta aBAvAt
   nātivyāptiḥ/ tadāha   sukhaduḥkhānyatarasākṣātkārāvacchedakamiti	na ati vyAptiH/ tat Aha  suKa duHKa ani atara sAkzAtkAra avacCedakam iti
   yāvadityādinā pṛthivītvādinā saṅkarāditi/ śarīratvaṃ vihāya	yAvat ityAdinA pRTivI tva AdinA saFkarAt iti/ SarIra tvam vihAya
   pṛthivītvaṃ ghaṭādau, pṛthivītvaṃ vihāya śarīratvaṃ jalīyādiśarīre/	pRTivI tvam Gawa AdO, pRTivI tvam vihAya SarIra tvam jalIya Adi SarIre/
   ubhayoḥ pārthivaśarīre samāveśāt saṅkara iti bhāvaḥ/ tathā	uBayoH pArTiva SarIre samAveSAt saFkaraH iti BAvaH/ taTA
   indriyatvaṃ na jātiriti/ pṛthivītvaṃ vihāya indriyatvaṃ	indriya tvam na jAtiH iti/ pRTivI tvam vihAya indriya tvam
   rasanādau / indriyatvaṃ vihāya pṛthivītvaṃ ghaṭādau, ubhayoḥ	rasana AdO / indriya tvam vihAya pRTivI tvam Gawa AdO, uBayoH
   samāveśaḥ ghrāṇendriyo ityevaṃ pṛthivītvādinā saṅkarāt	samAveSaH GrANa indriyaH iti evam pRTivI tva AdinA saFkarAt 
   indriyatvaṃ na jātiriti bhāvaḥ/ ātmādāvativyāptivāraṇāya	indriya tvam na jAtiH iti BAvaH/ Atma AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya
   satyantamiti/	satyantam iti/
   jñānakāraṇamanassaṃyogāśrayatvamindriyatvamityetāvanmātroktau	jQAna kAraNa manassaMyoga ASraya tvam indriya tvam iti etAvat mAtrA uktO
   jñānakāraṇībhūto yaḥ manassaṃyogaḥ ātmamanassaṃyogaḥ tadāśrayatvaṃ	jQAnakAraNIBUtaH yaH manassaMyogaH Atma mana ssaMyogaH tad ASraya tvam
   ātmanyapyastīti tatrātivyāptiḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya satyantam/	Atmani api asti iti tatra ativyAptiH syAt/ tad vAraNAya satyantam/
   tanniveśe ca śabdetaro yaḥ udbhūtaviśeṣaguṇaḥ jñānasukhādiḥ	tat niveSe ca Sabda itaraH yaH udBUta viSeza guNaH jQAna suKa AdiH
   tadāśrayatvasyaivātmani sattvāt nātivyāptiḥ ityarthaḥ/	tad ASraya tvasya eva Atmani sattvAt na ativyAptiH iti arTaH/
   udbhūtaviśaṣaguṇe śabdetara iti viśeṣaṇādāne śabdarūpaḥ yaḥ	udBUta viSaza guNe Sabda itaraH iti viSezaNa AdAne Sabda rUpaH yaH
   udbhūtaviśeṣaguṇaḥ tadāśrayatvameva śrotrendriye 'sti na	udBUta viSeza guNaH tad ASraya tvam eva Srotra indriye asti na
   tadanāśrayatvamityavyāptiḥ/ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya śabdetareti	tat anASraya tvam iti avyAptiH/ syAt/ tad vAraNAya Sabda itara iti
   viśeṣaṇam/ viśeṣaguṇe udbhūteti viśeṣaṇādāne cakṣurādau	viSezaNam/ viSeza guNe udBUtA iti viSezaNa AdAne cakzuH AdO
   śabdetaraḥ yaḥ viśeṣaguṇaḥ anudbhūtarūpādiḥ	Sabda itaraH yaH viSeza guNaH anudBUta rUpa AdiH
   tadāśrayatvamevāstītyavyāptiḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya udbhūteti	tad ASraya tvam eva asti iti avyAptiH syAt/ tad vAraNAya udBUta iti
   viśeṣaṇam/ viśeṣapadamanupādāya	viSezaNam/ viSeza padam anupAdAya
   śabdetarodbhūtaguṇānāśrayatvamityetāvanmātroktau śabdetaraḥ yaḥ	Sabda itara udBUta guNAn ASraya tvam iti etAvat mAtrA uktO Sabda itaraH yaH
   saṃyogākhyaḥ sāmānyaguṇaḥ tadāśrayatvasyaiva sattvāt	saMyoga AKyaH sAmAnya guNaH tad ASraya tvasya eva sattvAt 
   cakṣurādīndriyeṣvasabhbhavaḥ syāt; tadvāraṇāya viśeṣapadam/	cakzuH Adi indriyezu asaBBavaH syAt; tad vAraNAya viSeza padam/
   nanu	nanu
   viśeṣapadānupādāne 'pi saṃyogo nopādātu śakyate/	viSeza pada anupAdAne api saMyogaH na upAdAtu Sakyate/
   tasyodbhūtatvābhāvāt udbhūtapadenaiva tadvāraṇāt	tasya udBUta tva aBAvAt udBUta padena eva tad vAraNAt
   ityāśaṅkyāha   udbhūtatvaṃ na jātirityādinā/ udbhūtatvaṃ	iti ASaFkya Aha  udBUta tvam na jAtiH ityAdinA/ udBUta tvam
   vihāya śuklatvaṃ anudbhūtaśukle, śuklatvaṃ vihāya udbhūtatvaṃ	vihAya Sukla tvam anudBUta Sukle, Sukla tvam vihAya udBUta tvam
   udbhūtanīle, ubhayoḥ udbhūtatvaśuklatvayoḥ udbhūtaśukle samāveśa	udBUta nIle, uBayoH udBUta tva Sukla tvayoH udBUta Sukle samAveSa
   iti sāṃkaryāt udbhūtatvaṃ na jātiḥ/	iti sAMkaryAt udBUta tvam na jAtiH/
   na ca śuklatvavyāpyam	na ca Sukla tva vyApyam
   udbhūtatvamanyat nīlatvavyāpyamudbhūtatvamānyat ityevaṃ	udBUta tvam anyat nIlatva vyApyam udBUta tvam Anyat iti evam
   śuklatvādivyāpyaṃ udbhūtatvaṃ nānaiva/ tathā ca śuklatvaṃ vihāya	Sukla tva Adi vyApyam udBUta tvam nAnA eva/ taTA ca Sukla tvam vihAya
   udbhūtatvaṃ nāstīti na saṃkara iti vācyam/ udbhūtatvasya	udBUta tvam na asti iti na saMkaraH iti vAcyam/ udBUta tvasya
   nānātve cākṣuṣādipratyakṣaṃ prati	nAnAtve cAkzuza Adi pratyakzam prati
   udbhūtarūpaṃ	udBUta rUpam
   kāraṇamityevamanugatakāryakāraṇabhāvasya bhaṅgaprasaṅgāt/ ataḥ	kAraNam iti evam anugata kArya kAraNa BAvasya BaFga prasaFgAt/ atas 
   śuklādibhedena tadvṛtti anudbhūtatvaṃ nānā/	Sukla Adi Bedena tad vRtti anudBUta tvam nAnA/
   anudbhūtatvābhāvakūṭavattvameva codbhūtatvam/ tadeva ca lakṣaṇe	anudBUta tva aBAva kUwa vat tvam eva ca udBUta tvam/ tat eva ca lakzaNe
   niveśitam/ tacca sayoge 'pyasti/ saṃyogo hi nānudbhūta iti	niveSitam/ tat ca sa yoge api asti/ saMyogaH hi na anudBUtaH iti
   anudbhūtatvābhāvakūṭavattvasya tatra sattvāt/ tathā ca	anudBUta tva aBAva kUwavat tvasya tatra sattva at/ taTA ca
   1niruktodbhūtatvāśrayasaṃyogāśrayatvamevendriyeṣvastītyasaṃbhavavāraṇāya	1nirukta udBUta tva ASraya saMyoga ASraya tvam eva indriyezu asti iti asaMBava vAraNAya
   viśeṣapadamiti bhāvaḥ/	viSeza padam iti BAvaH/
   kālādāvativyāptivāraṇāya viśeṣyadalamiti/	kAla AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya viSezya dalam iti/
   jñānakāraṇamanassaṃyogāśrayatvamiti viśeṣyadalasyānupādāne kāle	jQAna kAraNa manassaMyoga ASraya tvam iti viSezya dalasya anupAdAne kAle
   kasyāpi viśeṣaguṇasyābhāvāt	kasya api viSeza guNasya aBAvAt 
   śabdetarodbhūtaviśeṣaguṇānāśrayatvamastīti ativyāptiḥ syāt/	Sabda itara udBUta viSeza guNAn ASraya tvam asti iti ati vyAptiH syAt /
   viśeṣyadale upātte tu jñānakāraṇībhūto yaḥ manassaṃyogaḥ	viSezya dale upAtte tu jQAnakAraNIBUtaH yaH manassaMyogaH
   ātmamanassaṃyogaḥ manaindriyasaṃyogo vā tadāśrayatvaṃ kāle	Atma manassaMyogaH manEndriya saMyogaH vA tad ASraya tvam kAle
   nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ iti bhāvaḥ/ manassaṃyoge jñānakāraṇeti	na asti iti na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ manassaMyoge jQAna kAraNa iti
   viśeṣaṇasya prayojanamaha   tatraiveti/ kālasya vibhutayā vibhutvasya	viSezaNasya prayojanam aha  tatra eva iti/ kAlasya viBu tayA viBu tvasya
   sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogitvarūpatayā manassaṃyogāśrayatvamastīti kāle	sarva mUrta dravya saMyogi tva rUpa tayA manassaMyoga ASraya tvam asti iti kAle
   ativyāptivāraṇāya jñānakāraṇetyuktam/ kālānuyogikasya	ati vyApti vAraNAya jQAna kAraNA iti uktam/ kAla anuyogikasya
   manassaṃyogasya jñānakāraṇatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	manassaMyogasya jQAna kAraNa tva aBAvAt na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   manaḥpadasya matabhedena	manaH padasya mata Bedena
   prayojanamāha   prācīnamata iti/ manaḥpadamanupādāya	prayojanam Aha  prAcInam ataH iti/ manaH padam anupAdAya
   jñānakāraṇasaṃyogāśrayatvamityetāvanmātroktau prācīnamate viṣayasya	jQAna kAraNa saMyoga ASraya tvam iti etAvat mAtrA uktO prAcInamate vizayasya
   indriyāvayavasya ca yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tasyāpi jñānakāraṇatayā	indriya avayavasya ca yaH saMyogaH tasya api jQAna kAraNa tayA
   tadāśrayatvasya indriyāvayave sattvāt tatra ativyāptiḥ/ navīnamate	tad ASraya tvasya indriya avayave sattvAt tatra ati vyAptiH/ navIna mate
   viṣayendriyasaṃyogasyaiva jñānakāraṇatvamiti yadyapi	vizaya indriya saMyogasya eva jQAna kAraNa tvam iti yadi api
   indriyāvayave 'tivyāptiḥ na sambhavati/ tathāpi kāle rūpaṃ nāstīti	indriya avayave ativyAptiH na samBavati/ taTA api kAle rUpam na asti iti
   kālaviśeṣaṇakarūpābhāvaviśeṣyakapratyakṣe	kAla viSezaNaka rUpa aBAva viSezyaka pratyakze
   cakṣussaṃyuktakālanirūpitaviśeṣyatāyāḥ saṃnikarṣavidhayā	cakzussaMyukta kAla nirUpita viSezya tAyAH saMnikarza viDayA
   kāraṇatvāt	kAraNa tvAt 
   tadghaṭakacakṣussaṃyogasyāpi kāraṇatvāt jñānakāraṇībhūto yaḥ	tad Gawaka cakzu ssaMyogasya api kAraNa tvAt jQAnakAraNIBUtaH yaH
   cakṣussaṃyogaḥ tadāśrayatvaṃ kāle 'stītyativyāptiḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya	cakzussaMyogaH tad ASraya tvam kAle asti iti ativyAptiH syAt/ tad vAraNAya
   manaḥpadam/ tathā sati viṣayendriyāvayavasaṃyogasya vā	manaH padam/ taTA sati vizaya indriya avayava saMyogasya vA
   kālacakṣussaṃyogasya vā manassaṃyogatvaṃ nāstīti na tāvādāya	kAla cakzu ssaMyogasya vA manassaMyoga tvam na asti iti na tO= AdAya
   pūrvoktātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ pūrvaṃ satyantānupādāne ātmani	pUrva ukta ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/ pUrvam satyanta anupAdAne Atmani
   ativyāptirityuktam/ sā ca	ativyAptiH iti uktam/ sA ca
   niruktodbhūtatveti/ anudbhūtatvābhāvakūṭavattvarūpaṃ yat	nirukta udBUta tva iti/ anudBUta tva aBAva kUwa vat tva rUpam yat 
   udbhūtatvaṃ tadāśrayetyarthaḥ/	udBUta tvam tad ASrayA iti arTaH/
   ativyāptiḥ	ativyAptiH
   ātmānyatve satīti vaśeṣaṇadāne 'pi vārayituṃ śakyeti kimarthaṃ	Atma anya tve sati iti vaSezaNa dAne api vArayitum SakyA iti kim arTam
   śabdetaretyādigurutaraviśeṣaṇamiti śaṅkate   na ceti/ samādhatte  	Sabda itara iti Adi gurutara viSezaNam iti SaFkate  na ca iti/ samADatte  
   tathā satīti/ ātmānyatve sati	taTA sati iti/ Atma anya tve sati
   jñānakāraṇamanassaṃyogāśrayatvamityuktau carmaṇaḥ ātmānyatvāt	jQAna kAraNa manassaMyoga ASraya tvam iti uktO carmaNaH Atma anya tvAt
   jñānakāraṇībhūtaḥ yaḥ carmamanassaṃyogaḥ tadāśrayatvācca	jQAna kAraNIBUtaH yaH carma mana ssaMyogaH tad ASraya tvAt ca
   carmaṇyativyāptiḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya śabdetaretyādigurutaraṃ	carmaNi ati vyAptiH syAt/ tad vAraNAya Sabda itara iti Adi gurutaram
   viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityarthaḥ/	viSezaNam deyam iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   jalanirūpaṇama	jalanirUpaNam a
   AnTs_11 śitasparśavatya āpaḥ / tā dvividhāḥ nityā anityāś ca / ntyāḥ	AnTH _11 Sita sparSavatyaH ApaH / tAH dviviDAH nityAH anityAH ca / ntyAH
   paramāṇurūpāḥ / anityāḥ kāryarūpāḥ. / punas trividhāḥ.	paramANu rUpAH / anityAH kArya rUpAH. / punar triviDAH.
   śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīraṃ varuṇaloke / indriyaṃ rasagrāhakaṃ	SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt / SarIram varuNa loke / indriyam rasa grAhakam
   rasanaṃ jihvāgravarti / viṣayaḥ saritsamudrādiḥ //	rasanam jihvA agra varti / vizayaH sarit samudra AdiH //
   śītasparśavatya	SIta sparSavatya
   āpaḥ/ tāśca dvividhāḥ/ nityā anityāśceti/ nityāḥ paramāṇurūpāḥ/	ApaH/ tAH ca dviviDAH/ nityAH anityAH ceti/ nityAH paramANu rUpAH/
   anityāḥ kāryarūpāḥ/ punastrividhāḥ   śarīraindriya   viṣayabhedāt/	anityAH kArya rUpAH/ punar triviDAH  SarIra Endriya  vizaya BedAt/
   śarīraṃ varuṇaloke/ indriyaṃ rasagrāhakaṃ rasanam/ tacca	SarIram varuNa loke/ indriyam rasa grAhakam rasanam/ tat ca
   jihvāgravarti/ viṣayaḥ saritsamudrādiḥ/	jihvA agra varti/ vizayaH sarit samudra AdiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   apāṃ lakṣaṇamāha  	apAm lakzaNam Aha  
   śīteti/ utpannavinaṣṭajale 'vyāptivāraṇāya	SIta iti/ utpanna vinazwa jale avyApti vAraNAya
   śītasparśasamānādhikaraṇadravyatvāparajātimattvaṃ vivakṣitam/ 'śītaṃ	SIta sparSa samAna aDikaraNa dravya tva apara jAtimat tvam vivakzitam/ aSItam
   śilātalam' ityādau jalasambandhādeva śītasparśabhānamiti	SilA talam a ityAdO jala sambanDAt eva SIta sparSa BAnam iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ anyatsarvaṃ pūrvarītyā vyākhyeyam/	na ati vyAptiH/ anyat sarvam pUrva rItyA vyAKyeyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   śītasparśasamānādhikaraṇeti/ tatra viśeṣaṇaprayojanaṃ	SIta sparSa samAna aDikaraNa iti/ tatra viSezaNa prayojanam
   pūrvoktarītyā ūhyam/ jalatvajātisiddhistu	pUrva ukta rItyA Uhyam/ jala tva jAti sidDiH tu
   snehajanakatāvacchedakatayeti dhyeyam/ anyatsarve pūrvarītyeti/	sneha janaka tA avacCedaka tayA iti Dyeyam/ anyat sarve pUrvarItyeti/
   nityatvādikaṃ śarīrādilakṣaṇaṃ ca gandhavattvasthāne śītasparśavattvaṃ	nitya tva Adikam SarIra Adi lakzaNam ca ganDavat tva sTAne SIta sparSavat tvam
   niveśya pṛthivīnirūpaṇoktarītyerthaḥ/ evamagre 'pyūhyam/	niveSya pRTivI nirUpaNa uktarItyA IrTaH/ evam agre api Uhyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   pūrvoktarītyā	pUrva ukta rItyA
   ūhyamiti/ dravyatvavyāpyajātimattvamātroktau	Uhyam iti/ dravya tva vyApya jAtimat tva mAtra uktO
   dravyatvavyāpyapṛthivītvajātimatyāṃ pṛthivyāmativyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	dravya tva vyApya pRTivI tva jAti matyAm pRTivyAm ativyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya
   śītasparśasamānādhikaraṇeti jātiviśeṣaṇam/	SIta sparSa samAna aDikaraNa iti jAti viSezaNam/
   śītasparśavajjalavṛttisattājatimādāya pṛthivyādāvativyāptivāraṇāya	SIta sparSa vat jala vRtti sattA jatim AdAya pRTivI AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya
   dravyatvavyāpyeti/ dravyatvavyāpyatvaṃ ca dravyatvanyūnavṛttitvam na tu	dravya tva vyApya iti/ dravya tva vyApya tvam ca dravya tva nyUna vRtti tvam na tu
   tacchūnyāvṛttitvam/ ato dravyatvajātimādāya noktadoṣa iti	tat SUnyAvRtti tvam/ atas dravya tva jAtim AdAya na ukta dozaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ snehajanakatāvacchedakatayeti/	BAvaH/ sneha janaka tA avacCedakatayA iti/
   'samavāyasambandhāvacchinnasnehatvāvacchinnasnehaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitatādātmyasambandhāvacchinnajalaniṣṭhakāraṇatā	asamavAya sambanDa avacCinna sneha tva avacCinna sneha nizWa kArya tA nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna jala nizWa kAraNa tA
   kiñciddharmāvacchinnā kāraṇatātvāt' ityanumānena	kiQcid Darma avacCinnA kAraNa tA tvAt a iti anumAnena
   jalatvajātisiddhirityarthaḥ/	jala tva jAti sidDiH iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   tejonirūpaṇam	tejaH nirUpaNam
   AnTs_12 uṣṇasparśavat tejaḥ / tad dvividhaṃ nityam anityaṃ ca / niyyaṃ	AnTH _12 uzNa sparSa vat tejaH / tat dviviDam nityam anityam ca / niyyam
   paramāṇurūpam / anityaṃ kāryarūpam / punas trividhaṃ	paramANu rUpam / anityam kArya rUpam / punar triviDam
   śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīram ādityaloke / indriyaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ	SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt / SarIram Aditya loke / indriyam rUpa grAhakam
   cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇatārāgravarti / viṣayaś caturvidhaḥ /	cakzuH kRzNa tArA agra varti / vizayaH caturviDaH /
   bhaumadivyaudaryākarajabhedāt / bhaumaṃ vahnyādikam / abindhanaṃ divyaṃ	BOma divyOdaryAka raja BedAt / BOmam vahni Adikam / ap inDanam divyam
   vidyudādi / bhuktasya pariṇāmahetur audaryam. ākarajaṃ suvarṇādi //	vidyut Adi / Buktasya pariNAma hetuH Odaryam. Akara jam suvarNa Adi //
   uṣṇasparśavat	uzNa sparSa vat 
   tejaḥ/ tat dvividham   nityam anityam ceti/ nityaṃ	tejaH/ tat dviviDam  nityam anityam ceti/ nityam
   paramāṇurūpam/ anityaṃ kāryarūpam/ punastrividham   śarīraindriya	paramANu rUpam/ anityam kArya rUpam/ punar triviDam  SarIra Endriya
     viṣayabhedāt/ śarīramādityaloke/ indriyaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥ/	 vizaya Beda at/ SarIram Aditya loke/ indriyam rUpa grAhakam cakzuH/
   tacca kṛṣṇatārāgravarti/	tat ca kRzNa tArA agra varti/
   viṣayaścaturvidhaḥ  	vizayaH caturviDaH  
   bhauma divya udarya ākaraja bhedāt/ bhaumaṃ vahnyādi/ divyamabindhanaṃ	BOma  divya  udarI a  Aka raja  BedAt/ BOmam vahni Adi/ divyam abinDanam
   vidyudādi/ bhuktasya pariṇāmaheturudaryam/ ākarajaṃ suvarṇādi/	vidyut Adi/ Buktasya pariNAma hetuH udaryam/ Akara jam suvarNa Adi/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   tejaso lakṣaṇamāha   uṣṇasparśavaditi/	tejasaH lakzaNam Aha  uzNa sparSa vat iti/
   'uṣṇaṃ jalam' ityādipratīteḥ tejassaṃyogānuvidhāyitvāt	auzNam jalam a ityAdi pratIteH tejassaMyoga anuviDAyi tvAt
   nātivyāptiḥ/ viṣayaṃ vibhajate   bhaumeti/	na ati vyAptiH/ vizayam viBajate  BOma iti/
   suvarṇataijasatvavādaḥ	suvarNa tEjasa tva vAdaH
   nanu suvarṇaṃ	nanu suvarNam
   pārthivaṃ pītatvāt gurutvāt haridrāvat iti cet   na/	pArTivam pIta tvAt guru tvAt haridrAvat iti ced  na/
   atyantānalasaṃyoge sati ghṛtādau dravatvanāśadarśanena,	atyanta anala saMyoge sati GRta AdO drava tva nASa darSanena,
   jalamadhyasthaghṛtādau tannāśādarśanena ca asati pratibandhake	jala maDya sTa GRta AdO tad nASA darSanena ca asati pratibanDake
   pārthivadravatvanā śāgnisaṃyogayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇāt	pArTiva drava tvanA SAgni saMyogayoH kArya kAraNa BAva avaDAraNAt
   suvarṇasya atyantānalasaṃyoge sati anucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇatvena	suvarNasya atyanta anala saMyoge sati anucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNa tvena
   pārthivatvānupapatteḥ pītadravyadravatvanāśapratibandhakatayā	pArTiva tva anupapatteH pIta dravya drava tva nASa pratibanDaka tayA
   dravadravyāntarasiddhau naimittikadravatvādhikaraṇatayā jalatvānupapatteḥ	drava dravya antara sidDO nEmittika drava tva aDikaraNa tayA jala tva anupapatteH
   rūpavattayā vāyvādiṣu anantarbhāvāt taijasatvasiddhiḥ/	rUpavat tayA vAyu Adizu anantarBAvAt tEjasa tva sidDiH/
   tasyoṣṇasparśabhāsvararūpayoḥ upaṣṭambhakapārthivarūpasparśābhyāṃ	tasya uzNa sparSa BAsvara rUpayoH upazwamBaka pArTiva rUpa sparSAByAm
   pratibandhādanupalabdhiḥ/ tasmāt suvarṇaṃ taijasamiti siddham/	pratibanDAt anupalabDiH/ tasmAt suvarNam tEjasam iti sidDam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mūle	mUle
   abindhanamiti/ adbhiḥ indhanaṃ dīpanaṃ yasya tadityarthaḥ/ bhuktasyeti/	ap inDana miti/ adBiH inDanam dIpanam yasya tat iti arTaH/ Buktasya iti/
   bhuktasyaudanādeḥ pariṇāmaḥ paripākaḥ, tatra heturityarthaḥ/	Buktasya odana AdeH pariNAmaH paripAkaH, tatra hetuH iti arTaH/
   ākarajamiti/ ākaraḥ khaniḥ tatra jātamityarthaḥ/	Akarajam iti/ AkaraH KaniH tatra jAtam iti arTaH/
   suvarṇasya taijasatvaṃ	suvarNasya tEjasa tvam
   vyavasthāpayituṃ śaṅkate   dīpikāyām nanviti/ pārthivatvasādhakaṃ	vyavasTApayitum SaFkate  dIpikAyAm nanu iti/ pArTiva tva sADakam
   pītatvahetumuktvā taijasatvābhāvasādhakaṃ hetumāha   gurutvāditi/	pIta tva hetum uktvA tEjasa tva aBAva sADakam hetum Aha  guru tvAt iti/
   etena suvarṇarūpatejasi vijātīyapītarūpaṃ svīkriyate/ 'pītaṃ	etena suvarNa rUpa tejasi vijAtIya pIta rUpam svIkriyate/ api itam
   suvarṇaṃ' ityabādhitapratyakṣapratītibalāt/ evaṃ ca taijasatvasya	suvarNama iti abADita pratyakza pratIti bala at/ evam ca tEjasa tvasya
   nirbādhatayā pṛthivītvaṃ na sidhyatīti kasyacit bhrāntirnirastā/	nirbADa tayA pRTivI tvam na siDyati iti kasyacid BrAntiH nirastA/
   gurutvasyāpratyakṣatvena tathā vaktumaśakyatvāditi dik/ suvarṇasya	guru tvasya apratyakza tvena taTA vaktum aSakya tvAt iti dik/ suvarNasya
   pītimagurutvāśrayato 'tiriktatvaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ anumāne	pItim agurutva ASrayataH atirikta tvam vyavasTApayitum anumAne
   aprayojakaśaṅkāvāraṇāya kāryakāraṇabhāvamanukūlatarkaṃ vyavasthāpayati	aprayojaka SaFkA vAraNAya kArya kAraNa BAvam anukUla tarkam vyavasTApayati
     atyantānaleti/ suvarṇasyetyādiḥ/ anumānaprayogastu	 atyanta analeti/ suvarNasya ityAdiH/ anumAna prayogaH tu
   itthamavaseyaḥ   suvarṇaṃ apārthivam asati pratibandhake	itTam avaseyaH  suvarNam apArTivam asati pratibanDake
   atyantānalasaṃyoge sati anucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇatvāt yannaivaṃ	atyanta anala saMyoge sati anucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNa tvAt yat na evam
   tannaivam/ yathā pṛthivī/ jalamadhyasthaghṛtādau vyabhicāravāraṇāya asati	tat na evam/ yaTA pRTivI/ jala maDya sTa GRta AdO vyaBicAra vAraNAya asati
   pratibandhaka iti/ agnisaṃyogāsamānādhikaraṇadravatvavatighṛtādau	pratibanDakaH iti/ agni saMyoga asamAna aDikaraNa drava tvavati GRta AdO
   vyabhicāravāraṇāya atyantānalasaṃyoge sati iti/	vyaBicAra vAraNAya atyanta anala saMyoge sati iti/
   dravadravyāntarasiddhāviti/ 'atyantānalasaṃyogī pītimāśrayaḥ	drava dravya antara sidDO= iti/ aatyanta anala saMyogI pItim ASrayaH
   dravatvanāśapratibandhakadravadravyāntarasaṃyuktaḥ atyantānalasaṃyoge 'pi	drava tva nASa pratibanDaka drava dravya antara saMyuktaH atyanta anala saMyoge api
   anucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇatve sati gurutvāta	anucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNa tve sati guru tvAta
   jalamadhyasthaghṛtādivat' ityanumānena tatsiddhirdraṣṭavyā/	jala maDya sTa GRta Adivat a iti anumAnena tad sidDiH drazwavyA/
   jalādikamādāyānumānaparyavasānaṃ vārayati   naimittiketi/ nanu	jala Adikam AdAya anumAna paryavasAnam vArayati  nEmittika iti/ nanu
   uṣṇasparśabhāsvararūpayoḥ upalabdhyabhāvena suvarṇasya taijasatvaṃ	uzNa sparSa BAsvara rUpayoH upalabDi aBAvena suvarNasya tEjasa tvam
   anupapannaṃ ityata āha   tasyeti/ pratibandhāditi/	anupapannam iti atas Aha  tasya iti/ pratibanDAt iti/
   doṣavidhayetyādiḥ/	doza viDayA ityAdiH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   suvarṇaṃ pārthivaṃ	suvarNam pArTivam
   pītatvāt gurutvāt haridrāvat iti mūle pītatvagurutvābhyāṃ	pIta tvAt guru tvAt haridrAvat iti mUle pIta tva guru tvAByAm
   dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ suvarṇasya pārthivatvaṃ	dvAByAm hetuByAm suvarNasya pArTiva tvam
   pūrvapakṣiṇā	pUrva pakziNA
   sādhitam/ tatra pītatvarūpeṇa aikena hetunaiva	sADitam/ tatra pIta tva rUpeNa Ekena hetunA eva
   pṛthivītvasādhanasambhavāt gurutvarūpadvitīyahetūpanyāso vyartha	pRTivI tva sADana samBavAt guru tva rUpa dvitIya hetu upanyAsaH vyarTa
   ityāśaṅkyāha   pārthivatvasādhakamiti/ tathā ca pītatvaṃ	iti ASaFkya Aha  pArTiva tva sADaka miti/ taTA ca pIta tvam
   pārthivatvasādhakam/ gurutvaṃ tu tejobhinnatvasādhakam/ na ca	pArTiva tva sADakam/ guru tvam tu tejaH Binna tva sADakam/ na ca
   dvitīyānumānaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam/ paramatanirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ	dvitIya anumAnam vyarTam iti vAcyam/ parama tanirAkaraNa pUrvakam
   svasiddhāntasya kathanīyatayā parābhimatataijasatvanirākaraṇāya	sva sidDAntasya kaTanIya tayA para aBimata tEjasa tva nirAkaraNAya
   dvitīyānumānasya āvaśyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	dvitIya anumAnasya AvaSyaka tvAt iti BAvaH/
   nanu suvarṇasya	nanu suvarNasya
   pārthivatvasādhananaiva arthāt taijasatvābhāvanirṇaye	pArTiva tva sADanana eva arTAt tEjasa tva aBAva nirNaye
   anumānāntarapraṇayanavaiyarthyam/ ekenaiva pītatvahetunā	anumAna antara praNayana vEyarTyam/ ekena eva pIta tva hetunA
   pārthivatvataijasabhinnatvayoḥ sādhanasambhavāditi cet   atrāhuḥ/	pArTiva tva tEjasa Binna tvayoH sADana samBavAt iti ced  atra AhuH/
   'suvarṇaṃ pārthivam' ityādyanumāne suvarṇatvaṃ na pakṣatāvacchedakam/	asuvarNam pArTivam a iti Adi anumAne suvarNa tvam na pakza tA avacCedakam/
   tathā sati rajatasya pakṣatāvacchedakānākrāntatayā tatra	taTA sati rajatasya pakza tA avacCedakAn AkrAnta tayA tatra
   pārthivatvāsiddhiprasaṅgāt/ tadarthamanumānāntarapraṇayane gauravācca/	pArTiva tva asidDi prasaFga at/ tad arTam anumAna antara praNayane gOravAt ca/
   nāpi rajatasādhāraṇaṃ hiraṇyatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakam/ tathā sati	na api rajata sADAraNam hiraNya tvam pakza tA avacCedakam/ taTA sati
   pakṣatāvacchedakāśrayarajate pītatvarūpahetvabhāvena	pakza tA avacCedaka ASraya rajate pIta tva rUpa hetu aBAvena
   bhāgāsiddhiprasaṅgāt/ tasmāt gurutvahetvanusaraṇam/ gurutvaṃ tu	BAga asidDi prasaFgAt/ tasmAt guru tva hetu anusaraNam/ guru tvam tu
   rajate 'pyastīti na bhāgāsiddhiriti/	rajate api asti iti na BAga asidDiH iti/
   vastutastu atra	vastutas tu atra
   pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ suvarṇasya pārthivatvasādhane na nirbharaḥ/ suvarṇe	pUrva pakziNaH suvarNasya pArTiva tva sADane na nirBaraH/ suvarNe
   pārthivatvābhāvasya kenāpyanuktatayā tadabhāvarūpapṛthivītvamevāstu	pArTiva tva aBAvasya kena api anukta tayA tad aBAva rUpa pRTivI tvam eva astu
   iti pūrvapakṣasyāprasarāt/ 'ākarajaṃ suvarṇādi' iti granthakṛtā	iti pUrva pakzasya aprasarAt/ aAkara jam suvarNa Adi a iti granTa kRtA
   pūrvasuvarṇasya tejastvakathanāt tadupari suvarṇaṃ tejo na bhavatīti	pUrva suvarNasya tejaH tu akaTanAt tad upari suvarNam tejaH na Bavati iti
   pūrvapakṣasyaiva yuktatvāt/ ata eva 'tasmāt suvarṇaṃ taijasam' iti	pUrva pakzasya eva yukta tvAt/ atas eva atasmAt suvarNam tEjasam a iti
   siddhānte upasaṃhāro 'pi saṅgacchate/ evaṃ ca suvarṇasya	sidDAnte upasaMhAraH api saFgacCate/ evam ca suvarNasya
   tejobhinnatvamapyatra pūrvapakṣiṇā siṣādhayiṣitam/ suvarṇasya	tejaH Binna tvam api atra pUrva pakziNA sizADayizitam/ suvarNasya
   tejobhinnatvaṃ tu pītatvena hetunā na sādhayituṃ śakyate 'suvarṇaṃ	tejaH Binna tvam tu pIta tvena hetunA na sADayitum Sakyate asuvarNam
   pītam' ityākārakābādhitapratyakṣabalāt suvarṇasya tejastve 'pi	pItam a iti AkAraka AbADita pratyakza balAt suvarNasya tejaH tve api
   tatra pītatvasyopapatteḥ/ ato gurutvāditi dvitīyahetūpanyāsaḥ/	tatra pIta tvasya upapatteH/ atas guru tvAt iti dvitIya hetu upanyAsaH/
   'suvarṇaṃ guru' iti pratyakṣābhāvena suvarṇasya tejastve 'pi	asuvarNam guru a iti pratyakza aBAvena suvarNasya tejaH tve api
   gurutvamupapadyata iti vaktumaśakyam/ ato gurutvaṃ	guru tvam upapadyate iti vaktum aSakyam/ atas guru tvam
   tejobhinnatvasādhane samarthamiti bhāvo 'tra pratīyate/ spaṣṭīkṛtaśca	tejaH Binna tva sADane samarTam iti BAvaH atra pratIyate/ spazwIkRtaH ca
   ayaṃ bhāvaḥ 'etane' ityādigrantheneti/	ayam BAvaH aetane a ityAdi granTena iti/
   dīpikāyām  	dIpikAyAm  
   atyantānalasaṃyoge satītyādi/ ayamarthaḥ   ghṛtādipṛthivyāṃ yat	atyanta anala saMyoge sati ityAdi/ ayam arTaH  GRta Adi pRTivyAm yat 
   dravatvaṃ tasyātyantāgnisaṃyoge sati nāśo bhavati/ tena	drava tvam tasya atyanta agni saMyoge sati nASaH Bavati/ tena
   pārthivagatadravatvanāśaṃ prati atyantāgnisaṃyogaḥ kāraṇamiti	pArTiva gata drava tva nASam prati atyanta agni saMyogaH kAraNam iti
   kāryakāraṇabhāvo labhyate/ paraṃ tu tulamadhyasthaghṛtadravatvasya	kArya kAraNa BAvaH laByate/ param tu tula maDya sTa GRta drava tvasya
   atyantāgnisaṃyoge satyapi nāśo na	atyanta agni saMyoge sati api nASaH na
   bhavatītyanvayavyabhicāraśaṅgāvāraṇāya uktakāryakāraṇabhāve 'asati	Bavati iti anvaya vyaBicAra SaFgA vAraNAya ukta kArya kAraNa BAve aasati
   pratibandhake' iti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ tena	pratibanDake a iti viSezaNam deyam/ tena
   pratibandhakāsamavadhānakālīnaḥ atyantāgnisaṃyogaḥ pārthivadravatvanāśasya	pratibanDakAsam avaDAna kAlInaH atyanta agni saMyogaH pArTiva drava tva nASasya
   hetuḥ iti kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ phalati/ jalamadhyasthaghṛte tu jalasya	hetuH iti kArya kAraNa BAvaH Palati/ jala maDya sTa GRte tu jalasya
   pratibandhakatvāt na dravatvanāśaḥ/ tathā ca	pratibanDaka tvAt na drava tu a nASaH/ taTA ca
   pratibandhakāsamavahitāgnisaṃyogarūpakāraṇābhāvāt tatra	pratibanDa kAsam avahitAgni saMyoga rUpa kAraNa aBAvAt tatra
   dravatvanāśarūpakāryābhāva iti na pūrvoktānvayavyabhicāraḥ/ suvarṇe	drava tva nASa rUpa kArya aBAvaH iti na pUrva ukta anvaya vyaBicAraH/ suvarNe
   tu atyantāgnisaṃyoge satyapi tatra vidyamānapārthivabhāgasya yat	tu atyanta agni saMyoge sati api tatra vidyamAna pArTiva BAgasya yat 
   dravatvaṃ tannāśo na bhavati/ ataḥ taddravatvanāśapratibandhakaṃ kiñcit	drava tvam tad nASaH na Bavati/ atas tad drava tva nASa pratibanDakam kiQcid 
   dravyaṃ suvarṇe 'stīti vaktavyam/ tadeva tejaḥ/ tathā ca suvarṇe	dravyam suvarNe asti iti vaktavyam/ tat eva tejaH/ taTA ca suvarNe
   pṛthivyasādhāraṇānubhūyamānapītarūpagurutvayorāśrayabhūtaḥ	pRTivI asADAraNa anuBUyamAna pIta rUpa guru tvayoH ASraya BUtaH
   pārthivabhāgaḥ tadgatadravatvapratibandhakatejobhāga iti	pArTiva BAgaH tad gata drava tva pratibanDaka tejaH BAgaH iti
   bhāgadvayamaṅgīkāryam/ tathā anaṅgīkāre suvarṇasya kṛtsnasyāpi	BAga dvayam aFgIkAryam/ taTA anaFgIkAre suvarNasya kRtsnasya api
   pārthivatve tadgatadravatvaṃ naśyet/ evaṃ ca atyantāgnisaṃyoge	pArTiva tve tad gata drava tvam naSyet/ evam ca atyanta agni saMyoge
   pītimāśrayabhāgaḥ duvatvanāśapratibandhakadravadravyāntarasaṃyuktaḥ	pItim ASraya BAgaH duva tva nASa pratibanDaka drava dravya antara saMyuktaH
   atyantānalasaṃyoge satyapi avināśidravatvavattvāt	atyanta anala saMyoge sati api avinASi drava tvavat tvAt 
   jalamadhyasthaghṛtavat ityanumānena pratibandhakadravadravyāntarasiddhau	jala maDya sTa GRta vat iti anumAnena pratibanDaka drava dravya antara sidDO
   'tat dravyam na pārthivam asati pratibandhake 'tyantāgnisaṃyoge sati	atat dravyam na pArTivam asati pratibanDake atyanta agni saMyoge sati
   anucchidyamānadravatvavattvāt yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā pṛthivī'	anucCidyamAna drava tvavat tvAt yat na evam tat na evam yaTA pRTivI a
   ityanumānena tādṛśadravyāntarasya pṛthivībhinnatve siddhe tasya	iti anumAnena tAdRSa dravya antarasya pRTivI Binna tve sidDe tasya
   'tādṛśadravyāntaraṃ na jalam taimitikadravatvavattvāt' ityanumānena	atAdRSa dravya antaram na jalam tEmitika drava tvavat tvAt a iti anumAnena
   jalatvābhāve siddhe 'tādṛśadravyāntaraṃ na vāyvādikam rūpavattvāt'	jala tva aBAve sidDe atAdRSa dravya antaram na vAyu Adikam rUpavat tvAt a
   ityanumānena vāyvāditvābhāve ca sati tādṛśadravyaṃ taijasaṃ	iti anumAnena vAyu Aditva aBAve ca sati tAdRSa dravyam tEjasam
   pṛthivyādyaṣṭakānyatve sati dravyatvāt iti pariśeṣānumānena tasya	pRTivI Adi azwaka anya tve sati dravya tvAt iti pariSeza anumAnena tasya
   taijasatvaṃ sidhyatīti/ na ca tādṛśadravyasya rūpavattvamasiddhamiti	tEjasa tvam siDyati iti/ na ca tAdRSa dravyasya rUpavat tvam asidDam iti
   kathaṃ	kaTam
   tena hetunā vāyvādibhedaḥ sādhya iti vācyam/ tasya rūpaśūnyatve	tena hetunA vAyu Adi BedaH sADyaH iti vAcyam/ tasya rUpa SUnya tve
   vāyvādivat dravatvanāśapratibandhakatvānupapattyā rūpavattvasvīkārasya	vAyu Adi vat drava tva nASa pratibanDaka tva anupapattyA rUpavat tva svIkArasya
   āvaśyakatvāt ityāśayāt/ vastuto naimittikadravatvavattvenaiva	AvaSyaka tvAt iti ASayAt/ vastutas nEmittika drava tvavat tvena eva
   hetunā vāyvādibhedo 'pi śakyaḥ sādhayitum/ tathā ca tejastvena	hetunA vAyu Adi BedaH api SakyaH sADayitum/ taTA ca tejaH tu ena
   nirṇītaṃ pratibandhakaṃ dravyameva suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyamityādibhiḥ	nirNItam pratibanDakam dravyam eva suvarNam hiraNyam iti AdiBiH
   viśeṣaśabdaiḥ sāmānyaśabdaiśca vyavahriyata iti sidhyati/	viSeza SabdEH sAmAnya SabdEH ca vyavahriyate iti siDyati/
   atredaṃ tattvam  	atra idam tattvam  
   pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭaḥ atyantāgnisaṃyogaḥ pārthivadravatvanāśaṃ	pratibanDaka aBAva viSizwaH atyanta agni saMyogaH pArTiva drava tva nASam
   iti heturiti	iti hetuH iti
   kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ	kArya kAraNa BAvaH
   āvaśyakaḥ/ tatra suvarṇasthapārthivabhāgagatadravatvanāśarūpakāryābhāvaḥ	AvaSyakaH/ tatra suvarNa sTa pArTiva BAga gata drava tva nASa rUpa kArya aBAvaH
   pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭātyantāgnisaṃyogarūpakāraṇābhāvaprayukta iti	pratibanDaka aBAva viSizwa atyanta agni saMyoga rUpa kAraNa aBAva prayuktaH iti
   nirvivādam/ tatra tādṛśaviśiṣṭābhāvarūpaḥ kāraṇābhāvaḥ na	nirvivAdam/ tatra tAdRSa viSizwa aBAva rUpaH kAraNa aBAvaH na
   viśeṣyābhāvāt, atyantāgnisaṃyogarūpasya viśeṣyasya tatra sattvāt/	viSezya aBAva at, atyanta agni saMyoga rUpasya viSezyasya tatra sattva at /
   kiṃ tu pratibandhakābhāvarūpasya viśeṣaṇasyābhāvādeva vaktavya iti	kim tu pratibanDaka aBAva rUpasya viSezaNasya aBAvAt eva vaktavyaH iti
   pratibandhakaṃ kiñcit dravadravyāntaraṃ tatrāstīti vaktavyam/ tasyāpi	pratibanDakam kiQcid drava dravya antaram tatra asti iti vaktavyam/ tasya api
   pṛthivītve taddravatvanāśapratibandhakaṃ dravyāntaraṃ tasyāpi	pRTivI tve tad drava tva nASa pratibanDakam dravya antaram tasya api
   tathetyanavasthā syāt/ ataḥ pratibandhakāntaraṃ vinā	taTA iti anavasTA syAt/ atas pratibanDaka antaram vinA
   avinaśyaddravatvādeva tanna pṛthivī iti/ ayaṃ dīpikāgranthaḥ	avinaSyat drava tvAt eva tat na pRTivI iti/ ayam dIpikA granTaH
   pārthivabhāgasyāpi dravatvaṃ tejobhāgasyāpi dravatvamityaṅgīkṛtya	pArTiva BAgasya api drava tvam tejaH BAgasya api drava tvam iti aFgIkRtya
   pravṛtta iti pratīyate 'pītadravyadravatvanāśa' 'dravadravyāntara' iti	pravRttaH iti pratIyate apIta dravya drava tva nASa a adrava dravya antaraH a iti
   padayoḥ svārasyāt/ muktāvalyāṃ tu 'jalamadhyasthamaṣīkṣodavat	padayoH svArasya at/ muktAvalyAm tu ajala maDya sTa mazIkzoda vat
   tasyādrutatvāta' iti granthena pārthivabhāgasya dravatvābhāva eva	tasya adruta tvAta a iti granTena pArTiva BAgasya drava tva aBAvaH eva
   pratipāditaḥ/ tanmate suvarṇasya taijasatvasādhakānumānamanyadeveti/	pratipAditaH/ tad mate suvarNasya tEjasa tva sADaka anumAnam anyat eva iti/
   prakāśikāyām  	prakASikAyAm  
   suvarṇasya pītimagurutvāśrayato 'tiriktatvamiti/ suvarṇaśabdavācyasya	suvarNasya pItim agurutva ASrayataH atirikta tvam iti/ suvarNa Sabda vAcyasya
   bhāgaviśeṣasya pṛthivībhāgādatiriktatvamityarthaḥ/	BAga viSezasya pRTivI BAgAt atirikta tvam iti arTaH/
   anumāne 'prayojakaśaṅkāvāraṇāyeti/ suvarṇaśabdavācyasya	anumAne aprayojaka SaFkA AvAraNAya iti/ suvarNa Sabda vAcyasya
   bhāgaviśeṣasya pṛthivyatiriktatvasādhake 'suvarṇam apārthivam	BAga viSezasya pRTivI atirikta tva sADake asuvarNam apArTivam
   atyantāgnisaṃyoga sati anucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇatvāt'	atyanta agni saMyoga sati anucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNa tvAt a
   ityanumāne atyantāgnisaṃyoge sati	iti anumAne atyanta agni saMyoge sati
   anucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇatvarūpaheturastu apārthivatvarūpasādhyaṃ	anucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNa tva rUpa hetuH astu apArTiva tva rUpa sADyam
   māstu ityaprayojakaśaṅkāyāṃ tadvāraṇāya yadi suvarṇasya	mA astu iti aprayojaka SaFkAyAm tad vAraNAya yadi suvarNasya
   pārthivatvaṃ syāt tarhi atyantāgnisaṃyoge sati	pArTiva tvam syAt tarhi atyanta agni saMyoge sati
   ucchidyamānadravatvādhikaraṇameva syāt; pārthivadravatvanāśaṃ prati	ucCidyamAna drava tva aDikaraNam eva syAt; pArTiva drava tva nASam prati
   atyantāgnisaṃyogasya kāraṇatvāt	atyanta agni saMyogasya kAraNa tvAt 
   ityevaṃrūpamanukūlatarkamāhetyarthaḥ/ asati pratibandhake ityasya	iti evaMrUpam anukUla tarkam Aha iti arTaH/ asati pratibanDake iti asya
   pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭamityarthaḥ/ tasya dravatve 'nvayaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	pratibanDaka aBAva viSizwam iti arTaH/ tasya drava tve anvayaH/ vESizwyam ca
   saṃyogasamavāyaghaṭita ekakālāvacchinnaikādhikaraṇavṛttitvarūpasāmānādhi	saMyoga samavAya GawitaH eka kAla avacCinna eka aDikaraNa vRtti tva rUpa sAmAnADi
   karaṇyasambandhena/	karaNya sambanDena/
   atyantānalasaṃyoge sati ityasyāpi	atyanta anala saMyoge sati iti asya api
   samavāyaghaṭitoktasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	samavAya Gawita ukta sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   atyantāgnisaṃyogaviśiṣṭamityarthaḥ/ anvayaśca tasya dravatve eva/	atyanta agni saMyoga viSizwam iti arTaH/ anvayaH ca tasya drava tve eva/
   jalamadhyasthaghṛtādau vyabhicāravāraṇāyeti/	jala maDya sTa GRta AdO vyaBicAra vAraNAya iti/
   apārthivatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati tatra	apArTiva tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati tatra
   anucchidyamānadravatvarūpahetusattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	anucCidyamAna drava tva rUpa hetu sattvAt iti BAvaH/
   agnisaṃyogāsamānādhikaraṇadravatvavati ghṛtādāviti/	agni saMyoga asamAna aDikaraNa drava tvavati GRta AdO= iti/
   śikyasthaghṛtādau ityarthaḥ/	Sikya sTa GRta AdO iti arTaH/
   atyantānalasaṃyogītyādi/ pītimāśrayatvamātrasya	atyanta anala saMyogI ityAdi/ pItim ASraya tva mAtrasya
   pakṣatāvacchedakatve tadavacchedena ca anumiteruddeśyatve	pakza tA avacCedaka tve tad avacCedena ca anumiteH uddeSya tve
   agnisaṃyogarahitasyāpi pītimāśrayasya pakṣatāvacchedakākrāntatayā	agni saMyoga rahitasya api pItim ASrayasya pakza tAvat Cedaka AkrAnta tayA
   tatrāgnisaṃyogaghaṭitasya hetorabhāvāt bhāgāsiddhiḥ syāt iti	tatra agni saMyoga Gawitasya hetoH aBAvAt BAga asidDiH syAt iti
   tadvāraṇāya atyantānalasaṃyogīti pakṣaviśeṣaṇam/	tad vAraNAya atyanta anala saMyogI iti pakza viSezaNam/
   atyantānalasaṃyoginaḥ taijasabhāgasya sādhyaśūnyatvāt bādhaḥ syāt	atyanta anala saMyoginaH tEjasa BAgasya sADya SUnya tvAt bADaH syAt 
   iti tadvāraṇāya pītimāśraya iti/ dravadravyāntarasya apratibandhakatve	iti tad vAraNAya pItim ASrayaH iti/ drava dravya antarasya apratibanDaka tve
   tatkalpane 'pi prakṛte nopayoga iti sūcanāya	tad kalpane api prakRte na upayogaH iti sUcanAya
   dravatvanāśapratibandhaketi sādhyaviśeṣaṇam/ jalamadhyasthaghṛtādau	drava tva nASa pratibanDaka iti sADya viSezaNam/ jala maDya sTa GRta AdO
   pārthivadravatvanāśaṃ prati dravadravyasyaiva pratibandhakatvadarśanāt	pArTiva drava tva nASam prati drava dravyasya eva pratibanDaka tva darSanAt 
   prakṛte 'pi pratibandhakaṃ dravyaṃ dravameva syādityabhipretya draveti	prakRte api pratibanDakam dravyam dravam eva syAt iti aBipretya drava iti
   viśeṣaṇam/ anumānaparyavasānamiti/	viSezaNam/ anumAna paryavasAnam iti/
   ajijñāsitārthaṃsiddhirūpamarthāntaraṃ vārayitumityarthaḥ/	ajijQAsita arTaMsidDi rUpam arTa antaram vArayitum iti arTaH/
   nanu yadi suvarṇaṃ	nanu yadi suvarNam
   taijasaṃ bhavet tarhi tejoguṇayoḥ uṣṇasparśabhāsvaraśuklarūpayoḥ	tEjasam Bavet tarhi tejaH guNayoH uzNa sparSa BAsvara Sukla rUpayoH
   suvarṇe upalabdhiḥ syāt/ yataḥ na tayoḥ suvarṇe upalabdhiḥ ataḥ suvarṇaṃ	suvarNe upalabDiH syAt/ yatas na tayoH suvarNe upalabDiH atas suvarNam
   na taijasamiti śaṅkānirāsārthaḥ tasyeti grantha ityāha   nanu	na tEjasam iti SaFkA nirAsa arTaH tasya iti granTaH iti Aha   nanu
   uṣṇasparśeti/ vastutaḥ suvarṇe vidyamānayorapi uṣṇasparśaśuklarūpayoḥ	uzNa sparSA iti/ vastutas suvarNe vidyamAnayoH api uzNa sparSa Sukla rUpayoH
   pratyakṣaṃ prati pārthivagatasparśarūpe pratibandhake iti	pratyakzam prati pArTiva gata sparSa rUpe pratibanDake iti
   dīpikāyāmuktam/ tacca pratibandhakatvaṃ doṣavidhayā na tu tadvattābuddhiṃ	dIpikAyAm uktam/ tat ca pratibanDaka tvam dozaviDayA na tu tadvat tA budDim
   prati tadabhāvavattājñānavidhayetyabhipretyāha    	prati tad aBAvavat tA jQAnaviDayA iti aBipretya Aha    
   doṣavidhayetyādiriti/	doza viDayA iti AdiH iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   vāyunirūpaṇam	vAyu nirUpaNam
   AnTs_13 rūparahitasparśavān vāyuḥ / sa dvividho nityo 'nityaś ca / nityaḥ	AnTH _13 rUpa rahita sparSavAn vAyuH / sa dviviDaH nityaH anityaH ca / nityaH
   paramāṇurūpaḥ / anityaḥ kāryarūpaḥ / punas trividhaḥ	paramANu rUpaH / anityaH kArya rUpaH / punar triviDaH
   śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīraṃ vāyuloke / indriyaṃ sparśagrāhakaṃ	SarIra indriya vizaya BedAt / SarIram vAyu loke / indriyam sparSa grAhakam
   tvaksarvaśarīravarti / viṣayo vṛkṣādikampanahetuḥ // śarīrāntaḥsaṃcārī	tvac sarva SarIra varti / vizayaH vRkza Adi kampana hetuH // SarIra antar saMcArI
   vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ / sa caiko 'py upādhibhedāt prāṇāpānādisaṃjñā labhate //	vAyuH prANaH / sa ca ekaH api upADi BedAt prANa apAna Adi saMjQA laBate //
   rūparahitasparśavān vāyuḥ/ saḥ dvividhaḥ/ nityaḥ anityaśca	rUpa rahita sparSavAn vAyuH/ saH dviviDaH/ nityaH anityaH ca
   iti/ nityaḥ paramāṇurūpaḥ/ anityaḥ kāryarūpaḥ/ punastrividhaḥ    	iti/ nityaH paramANu rUpaH/ anityaH kArya rUpaH/ punar triviDaH    
   śarīra   indriya   viṣayabhedāt/ śarīram vāyuloke/ indriyaṃ	SarIra  indriyaH  vizaya Beda at/ SarIram vAyu loke/ indriyam
   sparśagrāhakaṃ tvak/ sarvaśarīravṛttiḥ/ viṣayo vṛkṣādikampanahetuḥ	sparSa grAhakam tvak/ sarva SarIra vRttiH/ vizayaH vRkza Adi kampana hetuH
   vāyuḥ/ śarīrāntassañcārī vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ/ sa caiko 'pi upādhibhedāt	vAyuH/ SarIra antassaQcArI vAyuH prANaH/ sa ca ekaH api upADi BedAt 
   prāṇāpānādisaṃjñāṃ labhate/	prANa apAna Adi saMjQAm laBate/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   vāyuṃ lakṣayati  	vAyum lakzayati  
   rūparahiteti/ ākāśādau ativyāptivāraṇāya sparśavāniti/	rUpa rahita iti/ AkASa AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya sparSavAn iti/
   pṛthivyādau ativyāptivāraṇāya rūparahiteti/ prāṇasya kutrāntarbhāva	pRTivI AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya rUpa rahita iti/ prANasya kutra antarBAva
   ityata āha   śarīreti/ sa ceti/ eka eva prāṇaḥ sthānabhedāt	iti atas Aha  SarIra iti/ sa ceti/ ekaH eva prANaH sTAna BedAt 
   prāṇāpānādiśabdaiḥ vyavahriyata ityarthaḥ/	prANa apAna Adi SabdEH vyavahriyate iti arTaH/
   sparśānumeyo vāyuḥ/	sparSa anumeyaH vAyuH/
   tathā hi   yo 'yaṃ vāyaiṃ vāti sati anuṣṇāśītasparśaṃ upalabhyate sa	taTA hi  yaH ayam vAyEm vAti sati anuzNa aSIta sparSam upalaByate sa
   kvacidāśritaḥ guṇatvāt rūpavat/ na cāsya āśrayaḥ pṛthivī,	kvacid ASritaH guNa tvAt rUpavat/ na ca asya ASrayaH pRTivI,
   udbhūtasparśaṃvatpārthivasya udbhūtarūpavattvaniyamāt/ na jalatejasī,	udBUta sparSaMvat pArTivasya udBUta rUpa vat tva niyamAt/ na jala tejasI,
   anuṣṇāśītasparśavattvāt/ na vibhucatuṣṭayam,	anuzNa aSIta sparSavat tva at/ na viBu catuzwayam,
   sarvatropalabdhiprasaṅgāt/ na manaḥ, paramāṇusparśasya atīndriyatvāt/	sarvatra upalabDi prasaFgAt/ na manaH, paramANu sparSasya atIndriya tvAt/
   tasmāt ya. pratīyamānasparśāśrayaḥ sa vāyuḥ (eva)/	tasmAt ya. pratIyamAna sparSa ASrayaH sa vAyuH (eva)/
   nanu vāyuḥ pratyakṣaḥ	nanu vAyuH pratyakzaH
   pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvāt ghaṭavat iti cet   na/	pratyakza sparSa ASraya tvAt Gawa vat iti ced  na/
   udbhūtarūpavattvasyopādhitvāt/ 'yatra dravyatve sati	udBUta rUpavat tvasya upADi tvAt/ ayatra dravya tve sati
   bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣatvam, tatra udbhūtarūpavattvam' iti	bahis indriya janya pratyakza tvam, tatra udBUta rUpavat tvam a iti
   sādhyavyāpakatvam/ pakṣe sādhanāvyāpakatvam/ na caivaṃ	sADya vyApaka tvam/ pakze sADana avyApaka tvam/ na ca evam
   taptavāristhatejaso 'pi apratyakṣatvāpattiḥ iṣṭatvāt/ tasmāt	tapta vAri sTa tejasaH api apratyakza tva ApattiH izwa tvAt/ tasmAt 
   rūparahitatvāt vāyuḥ apratyakṣaḥ/	rUpa rahita tvAt vAyuH apratyakzaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   śarīreti iti/	SarIra iti iti/
   tathā ca prāṇasya viṣaye antarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ/ sthānabhedāditi/ 'hṛdi	taTA ca prANasya vizaye antarBAvaH iti BAvaH/ sTAna BedAt iti/ ahRdi
   prāṇa' ityādikośoktasthānabhedādityarthaḥ/ mukhanāsikābhyāṃ	prANa a ityAdi koSa ukta sTAna BedAt iti arTaH/ muKa nAsikAByAm
   niṣkramaṇapraveśanāt prāṇaḥ/ malādīnāmadhonayanāt apānaḥ/ āhāreṣu	nizkramaNa praveSanAt prANaH/ mala AdInAm aDas nayanAt apAnaH/ AhArezu
   pākārthaṃ vahneḥ samunnayanāt samānaḥ/ ūrdhvanayanāt udānaḥ/	pAka arTam vahneH samunnayanAt samAnaH/ UrDva nayanAt udAnaH/
   nāḍīmukheṣu vitananāt vyānaḥ/	nAxI muKezu vitananAt vyAnaH/
   svamataṃ darśaṃyati   sparśānumeya iti/	sva matam darSaMyati  sparSa anumeyaH iti/
   asya   upalabhyamānasparśasya āśrayaḥ pṛthivī na ca ityanvayaḥ/	asya  upalaByamAna sparSasya ASrayaH pRTivI na ca iti anvayaH/
   catuṣṭayamiti/ idaṃ ākāśādipratyekabhedasādhanābhiprāyeṇa/	catuzwaya miti/ idam AkASa Adi pratyeka Beda sADana aBiprAyeNa/
   sarvatropalabdhiprasaṅgāditi/ sparśasyetyādiḥ/ ākāśādīnāṃ	sarvatra upalabDi prasaFgAditi/ sparSasya ityAdiH/ AkASa AdInAm
   vibhutvāditi bhāvaḥ/	viBu tvAt iti BAvaH/
   pratyakṣaḥ   bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayaḥ/	pratyakzaH  bahis indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH/
   anudbhūtasparśāśraye tvagindriye vyabhicāravāraṇāya pratyakṣeti/	anudBUta sparSa ASraye tvac indriye vyaBicAra vAraNAya pratyakza iti/
   upādhitvāditi/ tathā ca hetau upādhivyabhicāreṇa	upADitvA aditi/ taTA ca hetO upADi vyaBicAreNa
   sādhyavyabhicāronnayanasambhavāt na pratyakṣatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu	sADya vyaBicAra unnayana samBavAt na pratyakza tva sidDiH iti BAvaH/ nanu
   tādṛśapratyakṣatvasya guṇādāvapi sattvena tatrodbhūtarūpābhāvena	tAdRSa pratyakza tvasya guNa AdO= api sattvena tatra udBUta rUpa aBAvena
   sādhyāvyāpakatvāt kathaṃ tasyopādhikatvamityata āha   yatreti/ tathā	sADya avyApaka tvAt kaTam tasya upADika tvam iti atas Aha  yatra iti/ taTA
   ca pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 'yaṃ upādhiriti bhāvaḥ/	ca pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH ayam upADiH iti BAvaH/
   evaṃ pratyakṣasparśāśrayasyāpi udbhetarūpābhāvena pratyakṣatvānaṅgīkāre '	evaM pratyakza sparSa ASrayasya api udBeta rUpa aBAvena pratyakza tvA anaFgIkAre a
   apratyakṣatvāpattiriti/ udbhūtarūpābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/	apratyakza tva ApattiH iti/ udBUta rUpa aBAvAt iti BAvaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   na vibhucatuṣṭayam	na viBu catuzwayam

   upalabhyamānasparśāśrayaḥ ākāśādyātmāntānyatamabhinna iti artho	upalaByamAna sparSa ASrayaH AkASa Adi Atma anta anyatama BinnaH iti arTaH 
   vivakṣita ityāśayenāha  	vivakzitaH iti ASayena Aha

   sambhavati/ upādheḥ udbhūtarūpasya sādhyavyāpakatvābhāvāt	samBavati/ upADeH udBUta rUpasya sADya vyApaka tva aBAvAt
   bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvavati guṇādau udbhūtarūpābhāvāt	bahis indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tvavati guNa AdO udBUta rUpa aBAvAt
   ityāśaṅkate   nanu tādṛśapratyakṣatvasyetyādinā/	iti ASaFkate  nanu tAdRSa pratyakza tvasya ityAdinA/

   tadgatadharmaḥ dravyatvam tadavacchinnaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	tad gata DarmaH dravya tvam tad avacCinnam sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena

   ghaṭādāvevāsti/ tatra ca udbhūtarūpamastīti udbhūtarūpasya	Gawa AdO= eva asti/ tatra ca udBUta rUpam asti iti udBUta rUpasya
   pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvādupādhitvamupapadyata iti/ upādhirhi	pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApaka tvAt upADi tvam upapadyate iti/ upADiH hi
   kevalasādhyavyāpakaḥ, pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ,	kevala sADya vyApakaH, pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH,

   tryaṇukaṃ utpadyate/ evaṃ caturaṇukādikrameṇa mahatī pṛthivī, mahatya	tri aNukam utpadyate/ evam catur aNuka Adi krameNa mahatI pRTivI, mahati a
   āpaḥ, mahattejaḥ, mahāvāyuḥ utpadyate/ evamutpannasya kāryadravyasya	ApaH, mahat tejaH, mahA vAyuH utpadyate/ evam utpannasya kArya dravyasya

   cākṣuṣadravyatvādityasya	cAkzuza dravya tva Aditi asya

   1. tritvasaṃkhyāketi/	1. tritva saMKyAkA iti/

   aprayojakameva dvyaṇukasādhakatvenopanyastamanumānam	aprayojakam eva dvi aNuka sADaka tvena upanyastam anumAnam
   ityāśaṅkyāha   saṅkṣepa iti/	iti ASaFkya Aha  saFkzepaH iti/
   aṇuvyavahārasyāṇuparimāṇanibandhanatayā	aNu vyavahArasya aNu parimANa nibanDana tayA
   tadāśrayadvyaṇukākhyāṇuvastunaḥ avaśyāṅgīkaraṇīyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	tad ASrayat vyaNukA AKyANu vastunaH avaSya aFgIkaraNIya tvAt iti BAvaH/
   sarvabhāvakāryadhvaṃsaḥ	sarva BAva kArya DvaMsaH
   mahāpralaya iti/ mahāpralayānantaraṃ punaḥ sṛṣṭyanabhyupagamenedam/	mahApralayaH iti/ mahApralaya anantaram punar sRzwi anaByupagamena idam/
   tadabhyupagame tu punaḥ sṛṣṭyupayogidharmādharmayorāvaśyakatvāt	tad aByupagame tu punar sRzwi upayogi Darma aDarmayoH AvaSyaka tvAt
   sarvaṃbhāvakāryadhvaṃsarūpo mahāpralaya eva na syāt ityavadheyam/	sarvaMBAva kArya DvaMsa rUpaH mahApralayaH eva na syAt iti avaDeyam/
   'dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat' iti śrutistu	aDAtA yaTApUrvam akalpayat a iti SrutiH tu
   avāntarapralayānantarasṛṣṭiviṣayeti teṣāmāśayaḥ/ mahāpralaye 'pi	avAntara pralaya anantara sRzwi vizaya iti tezAm ASayaH/ mahApralaye api
   sattvāditi/ tathā ca sarvakāryāntargatadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃsābhāvāt	sattva aditi/ taTA ca sarva kArya antargata DvaMsasya DvaMsa aBAvAt
   sarvakāryadhvaṃsarūpalakṣaṇāsambhavaḥ syāt iti tadvāraṇāya	sarva kArya DvaMsa rUpa lakzaNA samBavaH syAt iti tat vAraNAya
   bhāvapadamiti bhāvaḥ/	BAva padam iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   ākāśanirūpaṇam	AkASa nirUpaNam
   AnTs_14 śabdaguṇam ākāśam / tac caikaṃ vibhu nityaṃ ca //	AnTH _14 Sabda guNam AkASam / tat ca ekam viBu nityam ca //
   śabdaguṇakamākāśam/ tacca ekam, vibhu, nityam ca/	Sabda guNakam AkASam/ tat ca ekam, viBu, nityam ca/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   ākāśaṃ lakṣayati  	AkASam lakzayati  
   śabdaguṇakamiti/ nanu ākāśamapi pṛthivyādivannānā kiṃ? netyāha  	Sabda guNakam iti/ nanu AkASam api pRTivI Adi vat nAnA kiM? na iti Aha  
   taccaikamiti/ bhede pramāṇābhāvāt ityarthaḥ/ ekatvādeva sarvatra	tat ca ekam iti/ Bede pramANa aBAvAt iti arTaH/ eka tvAt eva sarvatra
   śabdopalabdheḥ vibhutvaṃ aṅgīkartavyamityāha  vibhviti/	Sabda upalabDeH viBu tvam aFgIkartavyam iti Aha viBviti/
   sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogitvam vibhutvam/ mūrtatvam	sarva mUrta dravya saMyogi tvam viBu tvam/ mUrta tvam
   paricchinnaparimāṇavattvaṃ, kriyāvattvam vā/ vibhutvādeva ātmavat	paricCinna parimANavat tvan, kriyAvat tvam vA/ viBu tvAt eva Atma vat 
   nityaṃ ityāha   nityaṃ ceti/	nityam iti Aha  nityam ca iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   śabdaguṇakamityatra	Sabda guNakam iti atra
   śabdavaditi vaktavye tathākathanaṃ 'ākāśe śabda eva viśeṣaguṇa' iti	Sabda vat iti vaktavye taTAkaTanam aAkASe SabdaH eva viSeza guNa a iti
   dyotanāya/ ghaṭākāśo maṭhākāśa ityādivyavahārasyopādhikṛtatvena	dyotanAya/ Gawa AkASaH maWa AkASaH ityAdi vyavahArasya upADi kRta tvena
   asādhakatvāt ākāśasya anekatve pramāṇaṃ netyāha   bheda iti/	asADaka tvAt AkASasya aneka tve pramANam na iti Aha  BedaH iti/
   ekatvāditi/	eka tvAt iti/
   ākāśasyetyādiḥ/	AkASasya ityAdiH/
   nanvekatve 'pi avibhutvaṃmastu ityata āha   sarvatreti/	nanu eka tve api aviBu tvaMmaH tu iti atas Aha  sarvatra iti/
   sarvadigavacchedenetyarthaḥ/ paricchinnaparimāṇavattvamiti/ yadi	sarva diS avacCedena iti arTaH/ paricCinna parimANa vat tvam iti/ yadi
   paricchinnasya apakarṣāśrayatvātmakatayā paramaṇoraṇutaratvena	paricCinnasya apakarza ASraya tva Atmaka tayA paramaNoH aNutara tvena
   dvyaṇukaparimāṇāpekṣayā paramāṇuparimāṇasya apakṛṣṭatvābhāvāt	dvi aNuka parimANa apekzayA paramANu parimANasya apakRzwa tva aBAvAt
   paramāṇuṣu avyāptamidaṃ lakṣaṇamityucyate tadāpyāhakriyāvattvamiti/	paramANuzu avyAptam idam lakzaNam iti ucyate tat Api Aha kriyAvat tvam iti/
   vastutastu lāghavamevottarakalpānusaraṇe bījam iti dhyeyam/	vastutas tu lAGavam eva uttara kalpa anusaraNe bIjam iti Dyeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu ghaṭākāśaḥ	nanu Gawa AkASaH
   maṭhākāśa ityādivyavahārāt ākāśe 'pi bhedo 'stītyavagamyate/	maWa AkASaH ityAdi vyavahArAt AkASe api BedaH asti iti avagamyate/
   tathā ca bhede pramāṇābhāvāditi dīpikoktiḥ na saṅgacchate/	taTA ca Bede pramANa aBAvAt iti dIpikA uktiH na saFgacCate/
   uktavyavahārasyaiva ākāśasyānekatve pramāṇatvāt ityāśaṅkya	ukta vyavahArasya eva AkASasya aneka tve pramANa tvAt iti ASaFkya
   ghaṭamaṭhādirūpo ya ākāśasya avacchedakaḥ padārthaḥ tadgataṃ	GawamaWa Adi rUpaH yaH AkASasya avacCedakaH padArTaH tad gatam
   bhedamāśritya ghaṭākāśo maṭhākāśa ityādivyavahāraḥ, na tu	Bedam ASritya Gawa AkASaH maWa AkASaH ityAdi vyavahAraH, na tu
   ākāśagataṃ bhedam/ ataḥ sa na bhede pramāṇamiti samādhānaṃ abhiprayan	AkASa gatam Bedam/ atas sa na Bede pramANam iti samADAnam aBiprayan
   āha   ghaṭākāśa iti/ upādhikṛtatveneti/	Aha  Gawa AkASaH iti/ upADi kRta tvena iti/
   ghaṭamaṭhajñadirūpāvacchedakagatabhedānimittakatvenetyarthaḥ/	Gawa maWa jQa dirUpa avacCedaka gata Beda animittaka tvena iti arTaH/
   asādhakatvāditi/ ākāśabhedāsādhakatvādityarthaḥ/	asADaka tvAt iti/ AkASa Beda asADaka tvAt iti arTaH/
   aṇutaratveneti/	aNutara tvena iti/
   utkarṣāśrayāṇuparimāṇavattvenetyarthaḥ/	utkarza ASraya aNu parimANavat tvena iti arTaH/
   nanu paricchinnatvaṃ	nanu paricCinna tvam
   nāpakarṣāśrayatvam/ api tu paramamahatparimāṇabhinnatvam,	na apakarza ASraya tvam/ api tu parama mahat parimANa Binna tvam,
   ākāśādicatuṣṭayānyatamāsamavetatvaṃ vā/ tathā ca	AkASa Adi catuzwaya anyatama asamaveta tvam vA/ taTA ca
   paramamahatparimāṇānyaparimāṇavattvaṃ	parama mahat parimANAni aparimANavat tvam
   ākāśādicatuṣṭayānyatamāsamavetaparimāṇavattvaṃ vā mūrtatvam, tacca	AkASa Adi catuzwaya anyatama asamaveta parimANa vat tvam vA mUrta tvam, tat ca
   paramāṇuṣvapi vartata iti na tatrāvyāptiḥ/ ato	paramANuzu api vartate iti na tatra avyAptiH/ atas 
   dvitīyalakṣaṇānusaraṇe nāvyāptirheturityāśaṅkyāha   vastutasatu	dvitIya lakzaNa anusaraNe na avyAptiH hetuH iti ASaFkya Aha  vastu tasatu
   iti/	iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   kālanirūpaṇam	kAla nirUpaNam
   AnTs_15 atītādivyavahārahetuḥ kālaḥ / sa caiko vibhur nityaś ca //	AnTH _15 atIta Adi vyavahAra hetuH kAlaH / sa ca ekaH viBuH nityaH ca //
   atītādivyavahārahetuḥ kālaḥ/ sa ca ekaḥ vibhuḥ nityaśca/	atIta Adi vyavahAra hetuH kAlaH/ sa ca ekaH viBuH nityaH ca/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kālaṃ lakṣayati  	kAlam lakzayati  
   atīteti/ sarvādhāraḥ kālaḥ sarvaṅkāryanimittakāraṇam/	atIta iti/ sarva ADAraH kAlaH sarvaFkArya nimitta kAraNam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   atītādivyavahārahetuḥ kāla iti mūle ādinā	atIta Adi vyavahAra hetuH kAlaH iti mUle AdinA
   anāgatādiparigrahaḥ/ atītatvaṃ ca vartamānadhvaṃsapratiyogitvam/	anAgata Adi parigrahaH/ atIta tvam ca vartamAna DvaMsa pratiyogi tvam/
   varnamānatvam iha	varnamAna tvam iha
   śabdaprayogādhikaraṇakālavṛttivam/ bhaviṣyatvaṃ ca	Sabda prayoga aDikaraNa kAla vRtti vam/ Bavizya tvam ca
   vartamānaprāgabhāvapratiyogitvaṃ/ atra sarvatra kālasya ghaṭakatayā	vartamAna prAc aBAva pratiyogi tvan/ atra sarvatra kAlasya Gawaka tayA
   śabdaprayogarūpātītādivyavahāre hetutvaṃ tasya iti dhyeyam/ na ca	Sabda prayoga rUpa atIta Adi vyavahAre hetu tvam tasya iti Dyeyam/ na ca
   tādṛśavyavahāraḥ sūryaparispandopādhimādāya sambhavatīti vācyam/	tAdRSa vyavahAraH sUrya parispanda upADim AdAya samBavati iti vAcyam/
   anugatasya vyavahārasya anugataviṣayaṃ vinā asambhavena	anugatasya vyavahArasya anugata vizayam vinA asamBavena
   atiriktakālasvīkārāditi dik/ sarvādhāra iti/	atirikta kAla svIkArAt iti dik/ sarva ADAraH iti/
   kālikasambandhenetyādiḥ/ atra vibhinnakālikayoḥ	kAlika sambanDena ityAdiH/ atra viBinna kAlikayoH
   ādhārādheyabhāvavirahāt kriyādeḥ sarvādhāratvaśaṅkaiva	ADAra ADeya BAva virahAt kriyA AdeH sarva ADAra tva SaFkA eva
   nāvataratīti bhāvaḥ/	na avatarati iti BAvaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu ghaṭaḥ atītaḥ	nanu GawaH atItaH
   vartamānaḥ bhaviṣyan ityādiśabdaprayogaḥ kālasya yaḥ upādhiḥ	vartamAnaH Bavizyan ityAdi Sabda prayogaH kAlasya yaH upADiH
   avacchedakaḥ sūryaparispandaḥ taddhetukaḥ/ tathā ca atīta ityasya	avacCedakaH sUrya parispandaH tad hetukaH/ taTA ca atItaH iti asya
   śabdaprayogādhikaraṇasūryaparispandavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogītyarthaḥ/	Sabda prayoga aDikaraNa sUrya parispanda vRtti DvaMsa pratiyogI iti arTaH/
   vartamāna ityasya śabdaprayogādhikaraṇasūryaparispandavṛttirityarthaḥ/	vartamAnaH iti asya Sabda prayoga aDikaraNa sUrya parispanda vRttiH iti arTaH/
   bhaviṣyannityasya	Bavizyat niti asya
   śabdaprayogādhikaraṇasūryaparispandavṛttiprāgabhāvapratiyogītyarthaḥ/	Sabda prayoga aDikaraNa sUrya parispanda vRtti prAgaBAva pratiyogI iti arTaH/
   tathā ca na kālaḥ sidhyati ityāśaṅkate   na ca tādṛśavyavahāra	taTA ca na kAlaH siDyati iti ASaFkate  na ca tAdRSa vyavahAra
   iti/ samādhatte   anugatasyeti/ ekarūpaḥ atītaḥ ityādiḥ vyavahāraḥ	iti/ samADatte  anugatasya iti/ eka rUpaH atItaH ityAdiH vyavahAraH
   ekarūpaṃ viṣayaṃ vinā na sambhavati iti ekaḥ kālaḥ svīkaraṇīyaḥ/	eka rUpam vizayam vinA na samBavati iti ekaH kAlaH svIkaraNIyaH/
   sūryaparispandastu anekaḥ/ ataḥ kālaghaṭanayaiva atītatvādikaṃ	sUrya parispandaH tu anekaH/ atas kAla GawanayA eva atIta tva Adikam
   nirvācyaṃ iti bhāvaḥ/	nirvAcyam iti BAvaH/
   api ca sūryaparispandaḥ	api ca sUrya parispandaH
   atītādiviṣayeṣu sākṣātsambandhena nāsti/ ataḥ	atIta Adi vizayezu sAkzAt sambanDena nAsti/ atas 
   1svāśrayatapanasaṃyogisaṃyogādirūpaparamparāsambandhenaiva	1sva ASraya tapana saMyogi saMyoga Adi rUpa paramparA sambanDena eva
   sūryaparispandavṛttitvaṃ ghaṭādervaktavyam/ tadapekṣatā lāghavāt	sUrya parispanda vRtti tvam Gawa AdeH vaktavyam/ tad apekza tA lAGavAt 
   sākṣātsambandhaśālikālasvīkaraṇamevocitamityāśayenāha   digiti/	sAkzAt sambanDa SAli kAla svIkaraNam eva ucitam iti ASayena Aha  diS iti/
   viṣayatāsambandhena sarvādhāratvaṃ jñānasyāpyasti ityāśaṅkya	vizaya tA sambanDena sarva ADAra tvam jQAnasya api asti iti ASaFkya
   kālikasambandhenetyādiriti kathitam/	kAlika sambanDena ityAdiH iti kaTitam/
   sarvapadārthaniṣṭhakālikasambandhāvacchinnādheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatvaṃ	sarva padArTa nizWa kAlika sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA nirUpita aDikaraNa tvam
   sarvādhāratvamatra vivakṣitamiti bhāvaḥ/	sarva ADAra tvam atra vivakzitam iti BAvaH/
   1. svāśrayeti/ svaṃ	1. sva ASraya iti/ svam
   sūryaparispandaḥ tadāśrayaḥ sūryaḥ tatsaṃyogī kālaḥ tatsaṃyogī	sUrya parispandaH tad ASrayaH sUryaH tad saMyogI kAlaH tad saMyogI
   ghaṭasya/	Gawasya/

   tatsamakālavartisakalapadārthādhāratve 'pi	tad sama kAla varti sakala padArTa ADAra tve api

   AnTs_16 prācyādivyavahārahetur dik / sā caikā vibhvī nityā ca //	AnTH _16 prAcI Adi vyavahAra hetuH diS / sA ca ekA viBvI nityA ca //
   prācyādivyavahārahetuḥ dik/ sā ca ekā vibhvī nityā ca/	prAcyAdi vyavahAra hetuH dik/ sA ca ekA viBvI nityA ca/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   diśo lakṣaṇamāha  	diSaH lakzaNam Aha  
   prācīti/ digapi kāryamātranimittakāraṇam/	prAcIti/ diS api kArya mAtra nimitta kAraNam/

   ātmanirūpaṇam	Atma nirUpaNam
   AnTs_17[1] jñānādhikaraṇam ātmā / sa dvividhaḥ paramātmā jīvātmā ca /	AnTH _17[1] jQAna aDikaraNam AtmA / sa dviviDaH paramAtmA jIvAtmA ca /
   tatreśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ paramātmaika eva / jīvātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinno	tatra ISvaraH sarvajQaH paramAtmA ekaH eva / jIvAtmA pratiSarIram Binno
   vibhur nityaś ca //	viBuH nityaH ca //
   jñānādhikaraṇam ātmā/ saḥ dvividhaḥ jīvātmā paramātmā ceti/	jQAna aDikaraNam AtmA/ saH dviviDaH jIva AtmA paramAtmA ca iti/

   tatreśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ	tatra ISvaraH sarvajQaH

   jīvātmanirūpaṇam	jIvAtma nirUpaNam
   jīvastu	jIvaH tu
   pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ/ vibhuḥ nityaśca/	pratiSarIram BinnaH/ viBuH nityaH ca/
