   ātmano lakṣaṇamāha	AtmanaH lakzaNam Aha
     jñāneti/ ātmānaṃ vibhajate   sa dvividha iti/	 jQAna iti/ AtmAnam viBajate  sa dviviDaH iti/
   paramātmano lakṣaṇamāha	paramAtmanaH lakzaNam Aha
     tatreti/ nityajñānādhikaraṇatvam īśvaratvam/ nanu	 tatra iti/ nitya jQAna aDikaraNa tvam ISvara tvam/ nanu
   īśvarasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam? na tāvat pratyakṣam/ taddhi bāhyaṃ	ISvara sadBAve kim pramANam? na tAvat pratyakzam/ tat hi bAhyam
   āntaraṃ vā/ nādyaḥ, arūpidravyatvāt/ na dvitīyaḥ,	Antaram vA/ na AdyaH, arUpi dravya tvAt/ na dvitIyaH,
   ātmasukhaduḥkhādivyatiriktatvāt/ nāpyanumānam, liṅgābhāvāt/	Atma suKa duHKa Adi vyatirikta tvAt/ na api anumAnam, liFga aBAvAt/
   nāpyāgamaḥ, tathāvidhāgamābhāvāt iti cet   na/ 'aṅkurādikaṃ	na api AgamaH, taTAviDa Agama aBAvAt iti ced  na/ aaFkura Adikam
   sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāte ghaṭavat' ityanumānasyaiva pramāṇatvāt/	sa kartRkam kArya tvAte Gawavat a iti anumAnasya eva pramANa tva at/
   upādānagocarāparokṣajñānacikīrṣākṛtimattvaṃ kartṛtvam/ upādānaṃ	upAdAna gocara aparokza jQAna cikIrzA AkRtimat tvam kartR tvam/ upAdAnam
   samavāyikāraṇam/ sakalaparamāṇvādisūkṣmadarśitvāt sarvajñatvam/ 'yaḥ	samavAyi kAraNam/ sakala paramANu Adi sUkzma darSi tvAt sarvajQa tvam/ ayaH
   sarvajñaḥ sarvaṃvit' ityādyāgamo 'pi tatra pramāṇam/	sarvajQaH sarvaMvid a ityAdi AgamaH api tatra pramANam/
   jīvasya lakṣaṇamāha  	jIvasya lakzaNam Aha  
   jīva iti/ sukhādyāśrayatvaṃ jīvalakṣaṇam/ nanu 'manuṣyo 'ham',	jIvaH iti/ suKa Adi ASraya tvam jIva lakzaNam/ nanu amanuzyaH aham a,
   'brāhmaṇo 'ham' ityādau sarvatra ahaṃpratyaye śarīrasyaiva viṣayatvāt	abrAhmaNaH aham a ityAdO sarvatra ahaMpratyaye SarIrasya eva vizaya tvAt 
   śarīrameva ātmā iti cet   na/ śarīrasya ātmatve	SarIram eva AtmA iti ced  na/ SarIrasya Atma tve
   karapādādināśe śarīranāśāt ātmano 'pi nāśaprasaṅgāt/ nāpi	kara pAda Adi nASe SarIra nASAt AtmanaH api nASa prasaFgAt/ na api
   indriyāṇāṃ ātmatvam 'yo 'haṃ ghaṭaṃ adrākṣam so 'haṃ idānīṃ	indriyANAm Atma tvam ayaH aham Gawam adrAkzam saH aham idAnIm
   spṛśāmi' ityanusandhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt/ anyānubhūter'the	spRSAmi a iti anusanDAna aBAva prasaFgAt/ anya anuBUter aTe
   anyasyānusandhānāyogāt/ tasmāt dehendriyavyatiriktaḥ jīvaḥ	anyasya anusanDAna ayogAt/ tasmAt deha indriya vyatiriktaH jIvaH
   sukhaduḥkhādivaicitryāt pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ/ sa ca na paramāṇuḥ/	suKa duHKa Adi vEcitryAt pratiSarIram BinnaH/ sa ca na paramANuH/
   sarvaśarīravyāpisukhādyanupalabdhiprasaṅgāt/ na madhyamaparimāṇavān/	sarva SarIra vyApi suKa Adi anupalabDi prasaFgAt/ na maDyama parimANavAn /
   tathā sati anityatvaprasaṅgena kṛtahāna   akṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt/	taTA sati anitya tva prasaFgena kRta hAnaH  akRta aByAgama prasaFgAt/
   tasmāt nityaḥ vibhuḥ jīvaḥ/	tasmAt nityaH viBuH jIvaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mūle jñānādhikaraṇamiti/ samavāyena	mUle jQAna aDikaraNam iti/ samavAyena
   jñānavadityarthaḥ/ tatra   tayormadhye/ dīpikāyām	jQAna vat iti arTaH/ tatra  tayoH maDye/ dIpikAyAm
   nityajñānādhikaraṇatvamiti/ na ca '(nityaṃ) vijñānaṃ ānandaṃ brahma' iti	nitya jQAna aDikaraNa tvam iti/ na ca a(nityaM) vijQAnam Anandam brahma a iti
   śrutvā virodha iti vācyam/ ānandapadasya ānandavadarthakatāyā	SrutvA viroDaH iti vAcyam/ Ananda padasya Ananda vat arTaka tAyAH 
   iva vijñānapadasyāpi	iva vijQAna padasya api
   vijñānavadarthakatāsvīkāreṇa avirodhāt/ na ca ānandapadasyaiva	vijQAna vat arTaka tA svIkAreNa aviroDAt/ na ca Ananda padasya eva
   tādṛśārthakatvamasiddhamiti vācyam/ arśa ādyajantatvāṅgīkāreṇa	tAdRSa arTaka tvam asidDam iti vAcyam/ arSe Adya janta tva aFgIkAreNa
   tādṛśārthasiddheḥ/ anyathā napuṃsakatvānupapatteḥ/ atra ānandaḥ	tAdRSa arTa sidDeH/ anyaTA napuMsaka tva anupapatteH/ atra AnandaH
   'bhārāpagame sukhī saṃvṛtto 'ham' itivat duḥkhābhāve upacaryate/	aBAra apagame suKI saMvRttaH aham a iti vat duHKa aBAve upacaryate/
   navīnāstu nityasukhamīśvarasyāṅgīkurvanti ityalamadhikajalpanena/	navInAH tu nitya suKam ISvarasya aFgIkurvanti iti alam aDika jalpanena/
   arūpidravyatvāditi/ bāhyapratyakṣaṃ prati udbhūtarūpasya hetutvāditi	arUpi dravya tvAt iti/ bAhya pratyakzam prati udBUta rUpasya hetu tvAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ ātmasukhaduḥkhādīti/ vijātīyātmamanassaṃyogasya	BAvaH/ Atma suKa duHKa Adi iti/ vijAtIya Atma mana ssaMyogasya
   mānasapratyakṣahetoḥ īśvare 'bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/ pramāṇatvāditi/ na	mAnasa pratyakza hetoH ISvare aBAvAt iti BAvaH/ pramANa tvAt iti/ na
   cedaṃ aprayojakamiti śaṅyam/ aprayojakamiti śaṅkyam/	ca idam aprayojakam iti SaFyam/ aprayojakam iti SaFkyam/
   kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ prati kṛtitvāvacchinnasya hetutvena	kAryatva avacCinnam prati kRtitva avacCinnasya hetu tvena
   aprayojakatvābhāvāditi dik/ upādāneti/ yadyapi kartṛtvaṃ	aprayojaka tva aBAvAt iti dik/ upAdAna iti/ yadi api kartR tvam
   kṛtimattvameva saṃbhavati tathāpi aparokṣajñānādeḥ cikīrṣādikaṃ prati	kRtimat tvam eva saMBavati taTA api aparokza jQAna AdeH cikIrzA Adikam prati
   kāraṇatvapradarśanāya tathoktiriti dhyeyam/ sarvaviditi/	kAraNa tva pradarSanAya taTA uktiH iti Dyeyam/ sarva vid iti/
   vidadhātvartho viśeṣarūpeṇa jñānam/	vidaDAtu arTaH viSeza rUpeNa jQAnam/
   lakṣaṇamāheti/	lakzaNamAha iti/
   svarūpamāhetyarthaḥ/ mūle pratiśarīraṃ bhinna iti/ na	svarUpam Aha iti arTaH/ mUle pratiSarIram BinnaH iti/ na
   cāvayavopacayābhyāṃ tattaccaitrādiśarīrāṇāṃ vibhinnatve 'pi	ca avayava upacayAByAm tad tad cEtra Adi SarIrANAm viBinna tve api
   jīvabhedābhāvāt idamasaṅgatam/ evaṃ kāyavyūhasthale 'pīti	jIva Beda aBAvAt idam asaFgatam/ evam kAya vyUha sTale api iti
   vācyam/ samānakālikāyogajadharmājanyaśarīrabhedena jīvabhedasyaiva	vAcyam/ samAna kAlikA yoga ja Darma ajanya SarIra Bedena jIva Bedasya eva
   vivakṣitatayā adoṣāt/ evaṃ ca etaccharīrāvacchinnabhogavān	vivakzita tayA adoza at/ evam ca etat SarIra avacCinna BogavAn
   samānakālikayogajadharmājanyataccharīrāvacchinnabhogavadbhinna iti	samAna kAlika yoga ja Darma ajanya tad SarIra avacCinna Bogavat BinnaH iti
   rītyā pratiśarīraṃ jīvabhedaḥ sādhya ityalam/	rItyA pratiSarIram jIva BedaH sADyaH iti alam/
   śarīrasyaiveti/ anyathā	SarIrasya eva iti/ anyaTA
   manuṣyatvādīnāṃ śarīradharmatvena tathā pratyayasyaiva	manuzya tva AdInAm SarIra Darma tvena taTA pratyayasya eva
   asaṅgatirityabhimānaḥ nāśaprasaṅgāditi/ samavāyikāraṇanāśasya	asaFgatiH iti aBimAnaH nASa prasaFgAt iti/ samavAyi kAraNa nASasya
   dravyanāśakatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ yo 'hamiti/ bhūtakālikadarśanavati	dravya nASaka tvAt iti BAvaH/ yaH aham iti/ BUtakAlika darSanavati
   vartamānakālikaspārśanavattvaṃ pratyāyyate tacca bhavatāṃ mate na	vartamAna kAlika spArSanavat tvam pratyAyyate tat ca BavatAm mate na
   sambhavati cākṣuṣaspārśanavatorbhedāditi bhāvaḥ/	samBavati cAkzuza spArSana vatoH BedAt iti BAvaH/
   anusandhānāyogāditi/ anyathā caitreṇānubhūtasya vastunaḥ maitreṇa	anusanDAna ayogAt iti/ anyaTA cEtreNa anuBUtasya vastunaH mEtreNa
   smaraṇāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/	smaraNa ApatteH iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   sarvaśarīrāvacchedena ātmani sukhādisākṣātkāropapattaye	sarva SarIra avacCedena Atmani suKa Adi sAkzAtkAra upapattaye
   sarvaśarīravyāpitvaṃ ātmano 'stu/ tathāpi vibhutvāṅgīkāre	sarva SarIra vyApi tvam AtmanaH astu/ taTA api viBu tva aFgIkAre
   prayojanābhāva ityata āha   na madhyameti/ anityatvaprasaṅgeneti/	prayojana aBAvaH iti atas Aha  na maDyameti/ anitya tva prasaFgena iti/
   yanmadhyamaparimāṇaṃ tadanityam iti vyāpteriti bhāvaḥ/ kṛteti/	yat maDyama parimANam tat anityam iti vyApteH iti BAvaH/ kRtA iti/
   kṛtasya yāgādinā sampāditasya dharmāderhānaṃ nāśaḥ,	kRtasya yAga AdinA sampAditasya Darma AdeH hAnam nASaH,
   akṛtasyābhyāgamaḥ prāptiḥ tatprasaṅgādityarthaḥ/ kartuḥ ātmana	akRtasya aByAgamaH prAptiH tad prasaFgAt iti arTaH/ kartuH Atmana
   uttarajanmani asattvāt, akartuśca sattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	uttara janmani asattva at, akartuH ca sattvAt iti BAvaH/
   nanu jīvasya	nanu jIvasya
   aṇutvameva āstām, tāvatā noktadoṣaḥ/ sūkṣmadīpasya	aNu tvam eva AstAm, tAvatA na ukta dozaH/ sUkzma dIpasya
   sarvagṛhāvacchedeneva aṇurūpasyāpi jīvasya prabhāprasaraṇaṅgīkārāt	sarva gRha avacCedena iva aNu rUpasya api jIvasya praBA prasaraNaFgIkArAt 
   iti cet   na/ tathā sati kāyavyūhasthale	iti ced  na/ taTA sati kAya vyUha sTale
   sukhādisākṣātkārānupapatteriti dik/	suKa Adi sAkzAtkAra anupapatteH iti dik/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   samavāyena	samavAyena
   jñānavaditi/ kālikasambandhena jñānavati kāle 'tivyāptivāraṇāya	jQAna vat iti/ kAlika sambanDena jQAnavati kAle ati vyApti vAraNAya
   samavāyeneti/ sambandhaviśeṣāvacchinnādhāratāsūcanāyaiva	samavAyena iti/ sambanDa viSeza avacCinna aDAra tA sUcanAya eva
   adhikaraṇapadam/ anyathā jñānavān ātmā ityeva vadet iti	aDikaraNa padam/ anyaTA jQAnavAn AtmA iti eva vadet iti
   bhāvaḥ/ dīpikāyām   bāhmam   bahirindriyajanyam/ āntaram  	BAvaH/ dIpikAyAm  bAhmam  bahis indriya janyam/ Antaram  
   manojanyam/ arūpidravyatvāditi/ rūpavato dravyasyaiva	manaH janyam/ arUpi dravya tvAt iti/ rUpavataH dravyasya eva
   bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	bahis indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tvAt iti BAvaH/
   ātmasukhaduḥkhādivyatiriktatvāditi/ yasya jīvātmanaḥ svīyamanasā	Atma suKa duHKa Adi vyatirikta tvAt iti/ yasya jIvAtmanaH svIya manasA
   saṃyogo 'sti sa tasyaiva jīvātmanaḥ tatsamavetasukhādervā	saMyogaH asti sa tasya eva jIva AtmanaH tad samaveta suKa AdeH vA
   mānasapratyakṣaṃ janayet/ tajjīvātmatadīyasukhādivyatiriktaṃ	mAnasa pratyakzam janayet/ tad jIva Atma tadIya suKa Adi vyatiriktam
   tadīyamanassaṃyogajanyapratyakṣaviṣayo na bhavati/ ataḥ īśvaraḥ	tadIya manassaMyoga janya pratyakza vizayaH na Bavati/ atas ISvaraH
   jīvātmatatsukhātiriktaḥ tadīyamānasapratyakṣaviṣayo na bhavatītyāśayaḥ	jIva Atma tad suKa atiriktaH tadIya mAnasa pratyakza vizayaH na Bavati iti ASayaH
   liṅgābhāvāditi/ īśvaravyāpyasya liṅgasyābhāvādīśvare	liFga aBAva aditi/ ISvara vyApyasya liFgasya aBAvAt ISvare
   nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	na anumAnam pramANam iti BAvaH/
   nanu '(nityaṃ)	nanu a(nityaM)
   vijñānamānandaṃ brahma' iti śrutyā ātmanaḥ jñānasvarūpatvamātrāvagamāt	vijQAnam Anandam brahma a iti SrutyA AtmanaH jQAna svarUpa tva mAtra avagamAt
   jñānādhikaraṇatvaṃ na sambhavatīti śaṅkate   na ca nityamiti/ samādhatte	jQAna aDikaraNa tvam na samBavati iti SaFkate  na ca nityam iti/ samADatte
     ānandapadasyeti/ ānandārthakasya ānandaśabdasya	 Ananda padasya iti/ Ananda arTakasya Ananda Sabdasya
   nityapuṃlliṅgatvāt ānandamiti napuṃsakatvānupapatteḥ	nitya puMlliFga tvAt Anandam iti napuMsaka tva anupapatteH
   ānando 'syāstītyarthe ānandaśabdāt 'arśa ādibhyo 'c' ityacpratyaye	AnandaH asya asti iti arTe Ananda SabdAt aarSaH AdiByaH aca iti at pratyaye
   napuṃsaka ānandaśabdaḥ sampadyate/ tathā ca ānandamityasya	napuMsakaH Ananda SabdaH sampadyate/ taTA ca Anandam iti asya
   ānandavadityartha	Ananda vat iti arTa
   eva vaktavyaḥ/ tatsamabhivyāhṛtaḥ vijñānaśabdaḥ vijñānavadarthaka eva	eva vaktavyaH/ tad samaBivyAhRtaH vijQAna SabdaH vijQAna vat arTakaH eva
   yuktaḥ/	yuktaH/
   tathā ca jñānādhikaraṇatvameva tayā śrutyā īśvarasya bodhyata	taTA ca jQAna aDikaraNa tvam eva tayA SrutyA ISvarasya boDyata
   iti bhāvaḥ/	iti BAvaH/
   upacaryate   lakṣaṇayā prayujyate/	upacaryate  lakzaNayA prayujyate/
   vijātīyātmamanassaṃyogasyeti/ parātmavyāvṛttasya	vijAtIya Atma mana ssaMyogasya iti/ para Atma vyAvRttasya
   svātmamātravṛtteḥ manassaṃyogasyetyarthaḥ/ na cedamaprayojakamiti/	sva Atma mAtra vRtteH mana ssaMyogasya iti arTaH/ na cedam aprayojakam iti/
   kāryatvamastu kartṛjanyatvaṃ māstu iti śaṅkāyāḥ nivartakastarko	kAryatvam astu kartR janya tvam mA astu iti SaFkAyAH nivartakaH tarkaH 
   nāstīti bhāvaḥ/ na cedamaprayojakamiti/ kāryatvarūpaheturastu	na asti iti BAvaH/ na cedam aprayojaka miti/ kAryatva rUpa hetuH astu
   sakartṛkatvarūpasādhyaṃ māstu iti śaṅkāyā nivārako yastarkaḥ	sa kartRka tva rUpa sADyam mA astu iti SaFkAyAH nivArakaH yaH tarkaH
   tacchūnyamityarthaḥ/ kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ pratīti/ nanu sakartṛkatvaṃ hi	tat SUnyam iti arTaH/ kAryatva avacCinnam pratIti/ nanu sa kartRka tvam hi
   kartṛjanyatvam/ pakṣe tadabhāvo 'stu iti śaṅkāyāṃ yadi	kartR janya tvam/ pakze tad aBAvaH astu iti SaFkAyAm yadi
   kartṛjanyatvaṃ na syāt tarhi kāryatvamapi na syāt, kāryasāmānyaṃ	kartR janya tvam na syAt tarhi kAryatvam api na syAt, kArya sAmAnyam
   prati	prati
   kartuḥ	kartuH
   kāraṇatvādityevaṃ kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ prati kartā kāraṇamiti	kAraNa tvAt iti evam kAryatva avacCinnam prati kartA kAraNam iti
   kāryakāraṇabhāvākhyo 'nukūlatarka eva vaktavyaḥ na tu kāryatvāvacchinnasya	kArya kAraNa BAva AKyaH anukUla tarkaH eva vaktavyaH na tu kAryatva avacCinnasya
   kṛtitvāvacchinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ ityetādṛśa iti kathametaditi cet  	kRtitva avacCinnam kAraNam iti etAdRSaH iti kaTam etat iti ced  
   na/ sādhyaṃ sakartṛkatvaṃ na kartṛjayatvarūpam/ tathā sati kartṛtvasyaiva	na/ sADyam sa kartRka tvam na kartR jaya tva rUpam/ taTA sati kartR tvasya eva
   janakatāvacchedakatvaṃ syāt/ kartṛtvaṃ ca kṛtimattvarūpaṃ	janakatA avacCedaka tvam syAt/ kartR tvam ca kRtimat tva rUpam
   kṛtyātmakamiti anantānāṃ kṛtīnāṃ kāraṇatāvacchedakatve gauravaṃ	kRtya Atmakam iti anantAnAm kRtInAm kAraNa tAvacCedaka tve gOravam
   syāt/ ataḥ kṛtijanyatvameva sakartṛkatvam/ kṛtitvameva	syAt/ atas kRti janya tvam eva sa kartRka tvam/ kRti tvam eva
   janakatāvacchedakam kṛtitvaṃ tu jātirūpatayā ekamityāśayena	janakatA avacCedakam kRti tvam tu jAti rUpa tayA ekam iti ASayena
   kāryatvāvacchinne kṛtitvāvacchinnaṃ kāraṇam	kAryatva avacCinne kRti tva avacCinnam kAraNam
   ityetādṛśakāryakāraṇabhāvāśyatarkābhidhānāt/	iti etAdRSa kArya kAraNa BAva aSya tarka aBiDAnAt/
   nanu ghaṭatvāvacchinnaṃ	nanu Gawa tva avacCinnam
   prati kulālakṛtitvāvacchinnā hetuḥ iti viśiṣyaiva	prati kulAla kRtitva avacCinnAH hetuH iti viSizya eva
   kāryakāraṇabhāvādetādṛśasāmānyakāryakāraṇabhāve pramāṇābhāve	kArya kAraNa BAvAt etAdRSa sAmAnya kArya kAraNa BAve pramANa aBAve
   ityatrāha   digiti/	iti atra Aha  diS iti/
   ghaṭatvapaṭatvādibhedenānantakāryakāraṇabhāvakalpanāpekṣayā	Gawa tva pawa tva Adi Bedena ananta kArya kAraNa BAva kalpanA apekzayA
   kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ prati kṛtitvena ekahetuhetumadbhāvakalpanameva	kAryatva avacCinnam prati kRti tvena eka hetu hetumat BAva kalpanam eva
   ucitamiti bhāvaḥ/ dīpikāyām upādānagocareti/ upādānaṃ	ucitam iti BAvaH/ dIpikAyAm upAdAna gocareti/ upAdAnam
   samavāyikāraṇaṃ kapālādi tadviṣayakaṃ yat aparokṣajñānaṃ, evaṃ	samavAyi kAraNam kapAla Adi tat vizayakam yat aparokza jQAnan, evam
   samavāyikāraṇaviṣayiṇī yā cikīrṣā kapālena ghaṭaṃ kuryām	samavAyi kAraNa vizayiNI yA cikIrzA kapAlena Gawam kuryAm
   ityākārikā icchā, evaṃ samavāyikāraṇaviṣayiṇī yā kṛtiḥ	iti AkArikAH icCA, evam samavAyi kAraNa vizayiNI yA kRtiH
   tadvattvaṃ kartṛtvamityarthaḥ/ upādānagocaretyasya triṣvapyanvayāt/	tadvat tvam kartR tvam iti arTaH/ upAdAna gocareti asya trizu api anvayAt/
   yadyapītyādi/ 'jānāti', 'icchati', 'yatate', 'karoti' iti	yadi api ityAdi/ ajAnAti a, aicCati a, ayatate a, akaroti a iti
   kramāt kāryasāmānyaṃ prati yatnaḥ kāraṇam, yatne cikīrṣā kāraṇam,	kramAt kArya sAmAnyam prati yatnaH kAraNam, yatne cikIrzA kAraNam,
   cikīrṣāṃ prati jñānaṃ kāraṇamiti jñāpanāya dīpikāyāṃ tritayamuktam/	cikIrzAm prati jQAnam kAraNam iti jQApanAya dIpikAyAm tritayam uktam/
   sādhyaṃ tu kṛtijanyatvameveti bhāvaḥ/ nanu 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit'	sADyam tu kRti janya tvam eva iti BAvaH/ nanu ayaH sarvajQaH sarva vit a
   iti śrutau sarvajñaśabdasamānārthakatvāt sarvavitpadasya	iti SrutO sarvajQa Sabda samAna arTaka tvAt sarva vid padasya
   punaruktirityāśaṅkyāha   vidadhātvartha iti/ tathā ca sarvajñaśabdena	punaruktiH iti ASaFkya Aha  vidaDAtu arTaH iti/ taTA ca sarvajQa Sabdena
   sāmānyataḥ prameyatvādinā sarvaviṣayakajñānamucyate/ sarvavitpadena	sAmAnyatas prameya tva AdinA sarva vizaya ka jQAnam ucyate/ sarva vid padena
   ghaṭatvapaṭatvādinā viśeṣarūpeṇa sarvaviṣayakajñānamucyate/ ato na	Gawa tva pawa tva AdinA viSeza rUpeNa sarva vizaya ka jQAnam ucyate/ atas na
   punaruktiriti bhāvaḥ/	punaruktiH iti BAvaH/
   nanu jīvastu	nanu jIvaH tu
   'pratiśarīraṃ bhinna' iti mūle jīvasya pratiśarīraṃ bheda evocyate na	apratiSarIram Binna a iti mUle jIvasya pratiSarIram BedaH eva ucyate na
   lakṣaṇam/ tathā ca tasya mlasya 'jīvasya lakṣaṇamāha' ityavataraṇaṃ na	lakzaNam/ taTA ca tasya mlasya ajIvasya lakzaNam Aha a iti avataraNam na
   yuktam ityata āha   svarūpamāhetyartha iti/ śaṅkate   na ceti/	yuktam iti atas Aha  svarUpam Aha iti arTaH iti/ SaFkate  na ca iti/
   caitraśarīrasya avayavopacayābhyāṃ bhedasyāvaśyakatayā	cEtra SarIrasya avayava upacayAByAm Bedasya AvaSyaka tayA
   caitrīyabālaśarīrāpekṣayā tadīyayuvaśarīravṛddhaśarīrādīnāṃ bhedo	cEtrIya bAla SarIra apekzayA tadIya yuva SarIra vRdDa SarIra AdInAm BedaH 
   vaktavyaḥ/ tathā ca bālayuvādiśarīrabhede satyapi tadavacchinna ātmā eka	vaktavyaH/ taTA ca bAla yuvAdi SarIra Bede sati api tad avacCinnaH AtmA eka
   eva/ evaṃ saubhariprabhṛtīnāṃ ātmana ekatve 'pi	eva/ evam sOBari praBRtInAm AtmanaH eka tve api
   śarīrāsamūhāṅgīkārāt pratiśarīraṃ jīvabhedābhāvāt pratiśarīraṃ	SarIra asamUha aFgIkArAt pratiSarIram jIva Beda aBAvAt pratiSarIram
   jīvo bhinna iti kathaṃ saṅgacchata iti śaṅkāgranthasyārthaḥ/	jIvaH BinnaH iti kaTam saFgacCate iti SaFkA granTasya arTaH/
   kāyavyūhasthala iti/ ekena jīvena anekaśarīrādhiṣṭhānasthala	kAya vyUha sTalaH iti/ ekena jIvena aneka SarIra aDizWAna sTala
   ityarthaḥ/	iti arTaH/
   samādhatte  	samADatte  
   samānakāliketi/ samānakālikānāṃ yogajadharmājanyānāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ	samAna kAliketi/ samAna kAlikAnAm yoga ja Darma ajanyAnAm SarIrANAm
   bhedo yatra tatra jīvabheda ityeva mūle vivakṣitam/	BedaH yatra tatra jIva BedaH iti eva mUle vivakzitam/
   caitrīyabālayuvādiśarīrāṇāṃ samānakālikatvābhāvāt	cEtrIya bAla yuvAdi SarIrANAm samAna kAlika tva aBAvAt

   śarīrāṇāṃ	SarIrANAm
   yogajadharmajanyatvena tadajanyatvābhāvāt tādṛśaśarīrāṇāṃ bhedaḥ	yoga ja Darma janya tvena tad ajanya tva aBAvAt tAdRSa SarIrANAm BedaH
   nātmabhedavyāpyatayā mūlābhipreta iti nānupapattiḥ/ tathā ca	na Atma Beda vyApya tayA mUla aBipretaH iti na anupapattiH/ taTA ca
   samānakālikayogajadharmājanyaśarīrabhedavyāpakabhedapratiyogī jīva	samAna kAlika yoga ja Darma ajanya SarIra Beda vyApaka Beda pratiyogI jIva
   iti 'jīvastu pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ' iti mūlārthaḥ/ tādṛśaḥ	iti ajIvaH tu pratiSarIram BinnaHa iti mUla arTaH/ tAdRSaH
   śarīrabhedaḥ caitramaitrādiśarīreṣu tatrātmabhedo 'stīti bhāvaḥ/	SarIra BedaH cEtra mEtra Adi SarIrezu tatra Atma BedaH asti iti BAvaH/
   evaṃ cetyādi/	evam ca ityAdi/
   avacchedyatāsambandhena taccharīrabhinnaśarīravattvāditi hetuḥ pūraṇīyaḥ/	avacCedya tA sambanDena tad SarIra Binna SarIra vat tvAt iti hetuH pUraNIyaH/
   anyathetyādi/ 'ahaṃ manuṣya' ityādipratītyā ahamarthe ātmani	anyaTA ityAdi/ aaham manuzya a ityAdi pratItyE aham arTe Atmani
   munaṣyatvādidharmāḥ prakāratayā bhāsante/ śarīra eva manuṣyatvādayaḥ	munazya tva Adi DarmAH prakAra tayA BAsante/ SarIraH eva manuzya tva AdayaH
   bhavanti/ tasmāt	Bavanti/ tasmAt

   śarīramevātmā ityavagamayati/ yadi tu śarīrātiriktaḥ ātmā tarhi	SarIram eva AtmA iti avagamayati/ yadi tu SarIra atiriktaH AtmA tarhi
   manuṣyatvādirahite ātmani manuṣyatvādiprakārikā iyaṃ pratītiḥ	manuzya tva Adi rahite Atmani manuzya tva Adi prakArikA iyam pratItiH
   bhramarūpā syāt na pramātmiketi bhāvaḥ/ anyathā  	Brama rUpA syAt na pramAtmikA iti BAvaH/ anyaTA

   bhūtakālikacākṣuṣapratyakṣāśrayavartamānakālikaspārśanapratyakṣāśrayayoraikyamavagamyate/	BUta kAlika cAkzuza pratyakza ASraya vartamAna kAlika spArSana pratyakza ASrayayoH Ekyam avagamyate/

   abheda svānubhūtamarthaṃ ca anusandhātumarhatītyāśayena dīpikāyāḥ	aBeda sva anuBUtam arTam ca anusanDAtum arhati iti ASayena dIpikAyAH

   na syāditi bhāvaḥ/	na syAt iti BAvaH/

   manaso lakṣaṇamāha  	manasaH lakzaNam Aha

   uktamiti bhāvaḥ/	uktam iti BAvaH/
   "sādhanamityasya karaṇamityarthaḥ/	"sADanam iti asya karaNam iti arTaH/

   gauravāt"iti tu nṛsiṃhaśāstriṇaḥ prāhuḥ/ teṣāṃ	gOrava at"iti tu nRsiMha SAstriNaH prAhuH/ tezAm

   manolakṣaṇamāha"iti/ nanu vibhadvayasaṃyogaḥ katha bhavet? saṃyogaṃ prati	manaH lakzaNam Aha"iti/ nanu viBa dvaya saMyogaH kaTa Bavet? saMyogam prati
   kriyāyāḥ saṃyogasya ca hetutvāt/ vibhunośca kriyāśūnyatvāt	kriyAyAH saMyogasya ca hetu tvAt/ viBunoH ca kriyA SUnya tvAt

   kriyādītyatra ādiśabdena saṃyogo gṛhyate/ tathā ca janyasaṃyogaṃ	kriyA Adi iti atra Adi Sabdena saMyogaH gRhyate/ taTA ca janya saMyogam

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   rūpaṃ lakṣayati  	rUpam lakzayati  
   cakṣuriti/ saṅkhyādāvativyāptivāraṇāya mātrapadam/ rūpatve	cakzuH iti/ saFKyA dO= ati vyApti vAraNAya mAtra padam/ rUpa tve
   ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/ rūpaṃ vibhajate   tacceti/	ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/ rUpam viBajate  tat ca iti/
   nanu	nanu
   avyāpyavṛttinīlādisamudāya eva citrarūpam iti cet   na/ rūpasya	avyApya vRtti nIla Adi samudAyaH eva citra rUpam iti ced  na/ rUpasya
   vyāpyavṛttitvaniyamāt/ nanu citrapaṭe avayavarūpasyaiva	vyApya vRtti tva niyamAt/ nanu citra pawe avayava rUpasya eva
   pratītirastviti cet   na/ rūparahitatvena	pratItiH astu iti ced  na/ rUpa rahita tvena
   paṭasyāpratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt/ na ca rūpavatsamavetatvaṃ	pawasya apratyakza tva prasaFgAt/ na ca rUpa vat samaveta tvam
   pratyakṣatvaprayojakam, gauravāt/ tasmāt paṭasya pratyakṣatvānupapattyā	pratyakza tva prayoja kam, gOravAt/ tasmAt pawasya pratyakza tvA anupapattyA
   citrarūpasiddhiḥ/ rūpasyāśrayamāha   pṛthivīti/ āśrayaṃ vibhajya darśayati	citra rUpa sidDiH/ rUpasya ASrayam Aha  pRTivI iti/ ASrayam viBajya darSayati
     tatreti/	 tatra iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mātrapadamiti/	mAtra padam iti/
   yadyapi cakṣurmātragrāhyatvaṃ cakṣuritarāgrāhyatve sati cakṣurgrāhyatvam,	yadi api cakzuH mAtra grAhya tvam cakzuH itara agrAhya tve sati cakzuH grAhya tvam,
   tacca	tat ca
   na rūpe saṃbhavati; tathāpi tvagindriyāgrāhyatve sati cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ	na rUpe saMBavati; taTA api tvac indriya agrAhya tve sati cakzuH grAhya tvam
   taditi dhyeyam/ guṇapadamiti/ na caivamapi	tat iti Dyeyam/ guNa padam iti/ na ca evam api
   prabhābhittisaṃyoge 'tivyāptiriti vācyam,	praBA Bitti saMyoge ati vyAptiH iti vAcyam,
   tvagagrāhyacakṣurgrāhyaguṇavibhājakadharmavattve paryavasānena adoṣāt/ ata	tvac agrAhya cakzuH grAhya guNa viBAjaka Darmavat tve paryavasA anena adozAt/ ata
   eva paramāṇurūpādau nāvayāptiriti bodhyam/ samudāya eveti/	eva paramANu rUpa AdO na avayAptiH iti boDyam/ samudAyaH eva iti/
   evakāreṇātiriktacitrarūpavyavacchedaḥ/ vyāpyavṛttiveti/	eva kAreNa atirikta citra rUpa vyavacCedaH/ vyApya vRtti vA iti/
   daiśikavyāpyavṛttitvetyarthaḥ/	dESika vyApya vRtti tva iti arTaH/
   idamupalakṣaṇam  	idam upalakzaNam  
   ekaikacitrarūpasthale anekarūpāṇāṃ ekaikatattatprāgabhāvādisthale ca	ekEka citra rUpa sTale aneka rUpANAm eka eka tad tad prAgaBAva Adi sTale ca
   anekaprāgabhāvādīnāṃ kalpanena anekarūpeṣu citraḥ	aneka prAgaBAva AdInAm kalpanena aneka rUpezu citraH
   ityākārakapratītiviṣayatvakalpanena ca gauravamiti/	iti AkAraka pratIti vizaya tva kalpanena ca gOravam iti/
   rūparahitatveneti/ samavāyenetyādiḥ/ prasaṅgāditi/ dravyacākṣuṣaṃ	rUpa rahita tvena iti/ samavAyena ityAdiH/ prasaFgAt iti/ dravya cAkzuzam
   prati samavāyena rūpasya kāraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ rūpavatsamavetatvamiti/	prati samavAyena rUpasya kAraNa tvAt iti BAvaH/ rUpa vat samaveta tvam iti/
   spāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena rūpam/ pratyakṣatvaprayojakamiti/	spASraya samaveta tva sambanDena rUpam/ pratyakza tva prayojakam iti/
   pratyakṣaviṣayatvaprayojakamastu ityarthaḥ/ gauravāditi/	pratyakza vizaya tva prayojakam astu iti arTaH/ gOravAt iti/
   sākṣātsambandhena kāraṇatvāpekṣayā gauravādityarthaḥ/	sAkzAt sambanDena kAraNa tva apekzayA gOravAt iti arTaH/
   citrāvayavakāvayavakapālaiḥ ārabdhapaṭasya cākṣuṣatvānurodhena	citra avayavaka avayava kapAlEH ArabDa pawasya cAkzuza tva anuroDena
   svasamavāyisamavetasamavetasamavetatvasambandhena rūpasya	sva samavAyi samaveta samaveta samaveta tva sambanDena rUpasya
   tatprayojakatvamaṅgīkartavyam/ evaṃ ca truṭeḥ cākṣuṣatvānupapattirapi	tad prayojaka tvam aFgIkartavyam/ evam ca truweH cAkzuza tvA anupapattiH api
   draṣṭavyā/ pratyakṣatvānupapattyeti/ etena citrarūpavat citraraso 'pi	drazwavyA/ pratyakza tvA anupapattyeti/ etena citra rUpa vat citra rasaH api
   sidhyediti śaṅkānirastār/ davayalaukikarāsanasya aprasiddhyā	siDyet iti SaFkA nirasta ar/ davayalOkikarAsanasya aprasidDyA
   tadanupapattyabhāvena na citrarasāṅgīkāra iti saṅkṣepaḥ/	tad anupapatti aBAvena na citra rasa aFgIkAraH iti saFkzepaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   cakṣurmātragrāhyatvaṃ rūpe asambhavi/ cakṣuritarāgrāhyatve sati	cakzuH mAtra grAhya tvam rUpe asamBavi/ cakzuH itara agrAhya tve sati
   cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ	cakzuH grAhya tvam
   hi cakṣurmātragrāhyatvam/ jñānasāmānye manasaḥ kāraṇatvāt	hi cakzuH mAtra grAhya tvam/ jQAna sAmAnye manasaH kAraNa tvAt 
   cakṣuritaramanojanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvasyaiva rūpe sattvena	cakzuH itara manaH janya pratyakza vizaya tvasya eva rUpe sattvena
   cakṣuritarāgrāhyatvasya rūpe abhāvāditi śaṅkate   yadyapīti/	cakzuH itara agrAhya tvasya rUpe aBAvAt iti SaFkate  yadi api iti/
   cakṣuritarāgrāhyatvaṃ cakṣuritarajanyapratyakṣāviṣayatvam/	cakzuH itara agrAhya tvam cakzuH itara janya pratyakza avizaya tvam/
   cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ	cakzuH grAhya tvam
   cakṣurindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvam/ samādhatte   tathāpīti/	cakzuH indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tvam/ samADatte  taTA api iti/
   cakṣuritarapadena tvagindriyaṃ vivakṣitam/ tathā ca	cakzuH itara padena tvac indriyam vivakzitam/ taTA ca
   tvagindriyajanyapratyakṣāviṣayatve sati	tvac indriya janya pratyakzA vizaya tve sati
   cakṣurindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ	cakzuH indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tvam
   cakṣurmātragrāhyatvam/ asti cedaṃ rūpe iti nāsambhava iti bhāvaḥ/	cakzuH mAtra grAhya tvam/ asti ca idam rUpe iti na asamBavaH iti BAvaH/
   satyantānupādāne ekatvādisaṅkhyāyāmativyāptiḥ, tasyā api	satyanta anupAdAne eka tva Adi saFKyAyAm ati vyAptiH, tasyAH api
   cakṣurindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvāt/ tadupādāne tu saṅkhyāyāḥ	cakzuH indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tva at/ tad upAdAne tu saFKyAyAH
   tvagindriyoṇāpi grāhyatayā tvagindriyajanyapratyakṣāviṣayatvaṃ nāstīti	tvac indriyoNA api grAhya tayA tvac indriya janya pratyakzA vizaya tvam na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ atīndriye dharmādāvativyāptivāraṇāya viśeṣyam/ na	na ati vyAptiH/ atIndriye Darma AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya viSezyam/ na
   caivamapīti/ prabhābhittisaṃyogasya tvagindriyāgrāhyatvāt	ca evam api iti/ praBA Bitti saMyogasya tvac indriya agrAhya tvAt 
   cakṣurgrāhyatvācceti bhāvaḥ/ tvagagrāhyeti/	cakzuH grAhya tvAt ca iti BAvaH/ tvac agrAhya iti/
   tvagindriyajanyapratyakṣāviṣayaḥ	tvac indriya janya pratyakzA vizayaH
   cakṣurindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayaśca yaḥ guṇavibhājakadharmaḥ tadvattvaṃ	cakzuH indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH ca yaH guNa viBAjaka DarmaH tadvat tvam
   rūpasya	rUpasya
   lakṣaṇam/ guṇavibhājakadharmaḥ rūpatvajātiḥ/ sā ca tvagagrāhyā	lakzaNam/ guNa viBAjaka DarmaH rUpa tva jAtiH/ sA ca tvac agrAhyA
   cakṣurgrāhyā	cakzuH grAhyA
   ca, yo guṇaḥ yadindriyagrāhyaḥ tanniṣṭhā jātiḥ tadabhāvaśca	ca, yaH guNaH yat indriya grAhyaH tad nizWA jAtiH tad aBAvaH ca
   tadindriyagrāhyau iti nyāyāt/ rūpatvavattvaṃ ca rūpe astīti	tad indriya grAhyO iti nyAyAt/ rUpa tvavat tvam ca rUpe asti iti
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ prabhābhittisaṃyoge vighamānaḥ	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ praBA Bitti saMyoge viGamAnaH
   guṇavibhājakadharmaḥ	guNa viBAjaka DarmaH
   saṃyogatvam/ sa ca na tvagagrāhyo bhavati ghaṭapaṭasaṃyogādau	saMyoga tvam/ sa ca na tvac agrAhyaH Bavati Gawa pawa saMyoga AdO
   saṃyogatvasya tvagindriyeṇa grahaṇāt iti	saMyoga tvasya tvac indriyeNa grahaNAt iti
   prabhābhittisaṃyoge	praBA Bitti saMyoge
   nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ etādṛśajātighaṭitalakṣaṇakaraṇe	na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ etAdRSa jAti Gawita lakzaNa karaNe
   prabhābhittisaṃyoge ativyāpitavāraṇavat	praBA Bitti saMyoge ati vyApita vAraNa vat 
   paramāṇurūpe 'vyāptivāraṇamiti prayojanamitsayāha   ata eveti/	paramANu rUpe avyApti vAraNam iti prayojanam itsayA Aha  atas eva iti/
   paramāṇugatarūpasya atīndriyatayā tatra cakṣūrgrāhyatvābhāvāt/	paramANu gata rUpasya atIndriya tayA tatra cakzUH grAhya tva aBAvAt/
   yathāśrutalakṣaṇe	yaTA Sruta lakzaNe
   avyāptiḥ/ yathoktajātighaṭitalakṣaṇe tu paramāṇurūpe vidyamānaḥ	avyAptiH/ yaTA ukta jAti Gawita lakzaNe tu paramANu rUpe vidyamAnaH
   guṇavibhājakadharmaḥ rūpatvam/ sa tu ghaṭarūpe cakṣurgrāhya eva/ tathā ca	guNa viBAjaka DarmaH rUpa tvam/ sa tu Gawa rUpe cakzuH grAhyaH eva/ taTA ca
   cakṣargrāhyarūpatvavattayā paramāṇurūpe lakṣaṇasamanvayāt nāvyāptiriti	cakzargrAhya rUpatvavat tayA paramANu rUpe lakzaNa samanvayAt na avyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nanu utpattikṣaṇe ghaṭādau rūpābhāvena rūpasya	BAvaH/ nanu utpatti kzaNe Gawa AdO rUpa aBAvena rUpasya
   kālikāvyāpyavṛttitayā 'rūpasya vyāpyavṛttitvaniyamāt'	kAlikA vyApya vRtti tayA arUpasya vyApya vRtti tva niyamAt a
   ityasaṅgatamityata āha   daiśikavyāpyavṛttitveti/	iti asaFgatam iti atas Aha  dESika vyApya vRtti tva iti/
   nanu	nanu
   svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena paṭe tantugatarūpāṇāṃ sattvāt	sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena pawe tantu gata rUpANAm sattvAt 
   rūparahitatvena ityasaṅgatam ityata āha   samavāyenetayāditi/	rUpa rahita tvena iti asaFgatam iti atas Aha  samavAyena itayAt iti/
   viṣayatāsambandhena pratyakṣaṃ prati samavāyasambandhena rūpasya	vizaya tA sambanDena pratyakzam prati samavAya sambanDena rUpasya
   kāraṇatvāt	kAraNa tvAt 
   paṭe samavāyena rūpaṃ nāsti cet paṭasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ na syāditi	pawe samavAyena rUpam na asti ced pawasya pratyakza vizaya tvam na syAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nanu pratyakṣatvaṃ pratyakṣajñānavṛtti/ pratyakṣajñāne ca	BAvaH/ nanu pratyakza tvam pratyakza jQAna vRtti/ pratyakza jQAne ca
   rūpavatsamavetatvābhāvāt 'rūpavatsamavetatvaṃ pratyakṣatvaprayojakam'	rUpa vat samavetatva aBAvAt arUpa vat samaveta tvam pratyakza tva prayojakam a
   iti granthaḥ asaṅgata ityāśaṅkyāha  	iti granTaH asaFgataH iti ASaFkya Aha  
   pratyakṣaviṣayatvaprayojakamiti/ pratyakṣatvapadamatra	pratyakza vizaya tva prayojakamiti/ pratyakza tva padam atra
   pratyakṣaviṣayatvārthakamiti bhāvaḥ/ viṣayatāsambandhena dravyapratyakṣaṃ	pratyakza vizaya tva arTakam iti BAvaH/ vizaya tA sambanDena dravya pratyakzam
   prati	prati
   svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena rūpaṃ kāraṇam/ paṭe samavāyena	sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena rUpam kAraNam/ pawe samavAyena
   rūpābhāve 'pi 1svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena tanturūpaṃ tatra vartate/	rUpa aBAve api 1sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena tantu rUpam tatra vartate/
   ataḥ	atas 
   tasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ bhavati/ tasmāt citrarūpaṃ māstu ityāśayaḥ/	tasya pratyakza vizaya tvam Bavati/ tasmAt citra rUpam mA astu iti ASayaH/
   svasamavāyisamavetasamevatasamavatatvasambandheneti/ svaṃ citrarūpam/	sva samavAyi samaveta samevata samavata tva sambanDena iti/ svam citra rUpam/
   svasamavāyinaḥ ye avayavāḥ kapālāvayavāvayavāḥ, tatra samavetāḥ	sva samavAyinaH ye avayavAH kapAla avayava avayavAH, tatra samavetAH
   kapālāvayavāḥ, tatsamavetatvaṃ kapāle tatsamavetatvaṃ ghaṭe/ truṭeḥ	kapAla avayavAH, tad samaveta tvam kapAle tad samaveta tvam Gawe/ truweH
   cākṣuṣatvānupapattiriti/ paramāṇugatarūpasya tryaṇuke	cAkzuza tva anupapattiH iti/ paramANu gata rUpasya tri aNuke
   svasamavāyiparamāṇusamavetadvyaṇukasamavetatvasambandhena sattve 'pi	sva samavAyi paramANu samavetat vyaNuka samaveta tva sambanDena sattve api
   svasamavāyisamavetasamavetasamavetatvasambandhena asattvāt,	sva samavAyi samaveta samaveta samaveta tva sambanDena asattva at ,
   paramāṇoravayave satyeva tadrūpasya uktasambandhena tryaṇuke sambhavāt/	paramANoH avayave sati eva tad rUpasya ukta sambanDena tri aNuke samBavAt /
   tathā coktasambandhena tryaṇuke rūpābhāvena tryaṇukasya	taTA ca ukta sambanDena tri aNuke rUpa aBAvena tri aNukasya
   cākṣuṣapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ/ nanu citro rasa iti	cAkzuza pratyakza vizaya tvam na syAt iti BAvaH/ nanu citraH rasaH iti
   pratītyā atiriktacitrarasiddhirityata āha   saṅkṣepa iti/	pratItyE atirikta citra rasidDiH iti atas Aha  saFkzepaH iti/
   tādṛśapratīteḥ avayavagatanānāsairupapatteḥ	tAdRSa pratIteH avayava gata nAnAsEH upapatteH
   atiriktacitrarasatatprāgabhāvadhvaṃsādikalpane gauravāditi bhāvaḥ/	atirikta citra rasa tad prAgaBAva DvaMsa Adi kalpane gOravAt iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   rasanirūpaṇam	rasa nirUpaNam
   AnTs_20 rasanagrāhyo guṇo rasaḥ / sa ca	AnTH _20 rasana grAhyaH guNaH rasaH / sa ca
   madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyatiktabhedāt ṣaḍvidhaḥ / pṛthivyāṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ /	maDura amla lavaNa kawu kazAya tikta BedAt zaxviDaH / pRTivyAm zaxviDaH /
   jale madhura eva //	jale maDuraH eva //
   rasanagrāhyo guṇo	rasana grAhyaH guNa u
   rasaḥ/ sa ca madhura   amla   lavaṇa   kaṭu   kaṣāya   tiktabhedāt	rasaH/ sa ca maDuraH  amla  lavaNa  kawu  kazAya  tikta BedAt 
   ṣaḍvidhaḥ/ pṛthivījalavṛttiḥ/ tatra pṛthivyāṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ/ jale madhura	zaxviDaH/ pRTivI jala vRttiH/ tatra pRTivyAm zaxviDaH/ jale maDura
   eva/	eva/
   1. svāśrayeti/ svaṃ	1. sva ASraya iti/ svam
   tanturūpaṃ tasyāśrayaḥ tantuḥ tatsamavetatvaṃ paṭasya/	tantu rUpam tasya ASrayaH tantuH tad samaveta tvam pawasya/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   rasaṃ lakṣayati  	rasam lakzayati  
   rasaneti/ rasatve 'tivyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/ rasasyāśrayamāha	rasanA iti/ rasa tve ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/ rasasya ASrayam Aha
   pṛthivīti/ āśrayaṃ vibhajya darśayati   tatreti/	pRTivI iti/ ASrayam viBajya darSayati  tatra iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   rasatva iti/	rasa tvaH iti/
   rasanagrāhyaguṇavibhājakopādhimattve tātparyam/ evaṃ gandhalakṣaṇe 'pi/	rasana grAhya guNa viBAjaka upADimattve tAtparyam/ evam ganDa lakzaNe api/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu rasanāgrāhyatve	nanu rasanA grAhya tve
   sati guṇatvaṃ rasasya lakṣaṇam ityuktāvapi paramāṇurase avyāptiḥ,	sati guNa tvam rasasya lakzaNam iti uktO= api paramANu rase avyAptiH,
   tasya rasanendriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvābhāvāt ityāśaṅkyāha  	tasya rasanA indriya janya pratyakza vizaya tva aBAvAt iti ASaFkya Aha  
   rasanagrāhyeti/ rasanendriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayo yaḥ guṇavibhājako dharmaḥ	rasana grAhya iti/ rasanA indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH yaH guNa viBAjakaH DarmaH
   tadvattvaṃ rasalakṣaṇam/ phalādirase rasatvajātiḥ 'yo guṇaḥ'	tadvat tvam rasa lakzaNam/ Pala Adi rase rasa tva jAtiH ayaH guNaH a
   ityādinyāyena rasanendriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayo bhavati	ityAdi nyAyena rasanA indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH Bavati
   tādṛśarasatvajātimattvasya paramāṇurase 'pi sattvāt nāvyāptiriti	tAdRSa rasa tva jAtimat tvasya paramANu rase api sattvAt na avyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ evaṃ gandhalakṣaṇe 'pīti/ ghrāṇagrāhyaguṇavibhājakopādhimattvaṃ	BAvaH/ evam ganDa lakzaNe api iti/ GrANa grAhya guNa viBAja ka upADimat tvam
   gandhalakṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	ganDa lakzaNam iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   gandhanirūpaṇam	ganDa nirUpaNam
   AnTs_21 ghrāṇagrāhyo guṇo gandhaḥ / sa ca dvividhaḥ surabhirasurabhiś ca /	AnTH _21 GrANa grAhyaH guNaH ganDaH / sa ca dviviDaH suraBiH asuraBiH ca /
   pṛthivīmātravṛttiḥ /	pRTivI mAtra vRttiH /
   ghrāṇagrāhyo guṇo	GrANa grAhyaH guNa u
   gandhaḥ/ sa dvividhaḥ   surabhiḥ asurabhiśceti/ pṛthivīmātravṛtti/	ganDaH/ sa dviviDaH  suraBiH asuraBiH ceti/ pRTivI mAtra vRtti/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   gandhaṃ lakṣayati  	ganDam lakzayati  
   ghrāṇeti/ gandhatve ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/	GrANa iti/ ganDa tve ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   sparśanirūpaṇam	sparSanirUpaNam
   AnTs_22 tvagindriyamātragrāhyo guṇo saparśaḥ / sa ca trividhaḥ	AnTH _22 tvac indriya mAtra grAhyaH guNaH sa parSaH / sa ca triviDaH
   śitoṣṇānuṣṇāśītabhedāt / pṛthivyaptejovāyuvṛttiḥ / tatra śīto jale / uṣṇas	Sita uzNa anuzNa aSIta BedAt / pRTivI ap tejaH vAyu vRttiH / tatra SItaH jale / uzNa s
   tejasi / anuṣṇāśītaḥ pṛthivīvāyvoḥ //	tejasi / anuzNa aSItaH pRTivI ivAyvoH //
   tvagindriyamātragrāhyo guṇaḥ sparśaḥ/ saḥ trividhaḥ  	tvac indriya mAtra grAhyaH guNaH sparSaH/ saH triviDaH  
   śīta uṣṇa anuṣṇāśītabhedāt/ pṛthivyaptejovāyuvṛttiḥ/ tatra śītalaṃ	SIta  uzNa  anuzNa aSIta Beda at/ pRTivI ap tejaH vAyu vRttiH/ tatra SItalam
   jale/ uṣṇaḥ tejasi/ anuṣṇāśītaḥ pṛthivīvāyyoḥ/	jale/ uzNaH tejasi/ anuzNa aSItaH pRTivI ivAyyoH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   sparśaṃ lakṣayati  	sparSam lakzayati  
   tvagiti/ sparśatve ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/	tvagiti/ sparSa tve ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/
   saṃyogādāvativyāptivāraṇāya mātrapadam/	saMyoga AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya mAtra padam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mātrapadamiti/	mAtra padam iti/
   cakṣuragrāhyatvagindriyagrāhyaguṇavibhājakopādhimattvamiti phalitor'thaḥ/	cakzuH agrAhya tvac indriya grAhya guNa viBAja ka upADimattvam iti Palitor aTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   tvagindriyamātragrāhyatve sati guṇatvaṃ sparśasya lakṣaṇamityuktāvapi	tvac indriya mAtra grAhya tve sati guNa tvam sparSasya lakzaNam iti uktO= api
   paramāṇugatasparśe 'vyāptiḥ/ tasyātīndriyatayā	paramANu gata sparSe avyAptiH/ tasya atIndriya tayA
   tvagindriyagrāhyatvābhāvādityāśaṅkyāha   cakṣuragrāhyeti/	tvac indriya grAhya tva aBAvAt ityASaFkya Aha  cakzuH agrAhya iti/
   cakṣurindriyajanyapratyakṣāviṣayaḥ tvagindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣayaśca yo	cakzuH indriya janya pratyakzA vizayaH tvac indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH ca yaH 
   guṇavibhājako dharmaḥ tadvattvaṃ sparśasya lakṣaṇam/ ghaṭādisparśeṣu	guNa viBAjakaH DarmaH tadvat tvam sparSasya lakzaNam/ Gawa Adi sparSezu
   sparśatvajātiḥ cakṣuragrāhyā tvaggrāhya ca bhavati tadvattvaṃ	sparSa tva jAtiH cakzuH agrAhyA tvak grAhya ca Bavati tadvat tvam
   paramāṇugatasparśe 'pyastīti samanvayaḥ/ tvagindriyagrāhyaṃ	paramANu gata sparSe api asti iti samanvayaH/ tvac indriya grAhyam
   saṅkhyātvamādāya saṅkhyāyāṃ ativyāptivāraṇāya cakṣuragrāhyetyuktam/	saFKyA tvam AdAya saFKyAyAm ati vyApti vAraNAya cakzuH agrAhya iti uktam/
   cakṣuragrāhyaṃ atīndriyaṃ dharmatvādharmatvādikamādāya	cakzuH agrAhyam atIndriyam Darma tva aDarma tva Adikam AdAya
   dharmādharmādiṣvativyāptivāraṇāya tvagindriyagrāhyetyuktam/	Darma aDarma Adizu ati vyApti vAraNAya tvac indriya grAhya iti uktam/
   sparśaniṣṭhatayā gṛhyamāṇaṃ guṇatvaṃ cakṣuragrāhyaṃ tvaggrahyaṃ ca	sparSa nizWatayA gRhyamANam guNa tvam cakzuH agrAhyam tvak grahyam ca
   bhavatīti	Bavati iti
   tadbattvamādāya saḍkhyādau ativyāptivāraṇāya	tat battvam AdAya saxKya AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya
   guṇavibhājaketyupādhiviśeṣaṇam/ guṇatvaṃ tu na guṇavibhājakamiti	guNa viBAjaka iti upADi viSezaNam/ guNa tvam tu na guNa viBAjakam iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   pākaprakriyānirūpaṇam	pAka prakriyA nirUpaNam
   AnTs_23 rūpādicatuṣṭayaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pākajam anityaṃ ca / anyatrāpākajaṃ	AnTH _23 rUpa Adi catuzwayam pRTivyAm pAka jam anityam ca / anyatra apAka jam
   nityam antyaṃ ca / nityagataṃ nityam / anityagatam anityam //	nityam antyam ca / nitya gatam nityam / anitya gatam anityam //
   rūpādicatuṣṭayaṃ	rUpa Adi catuzwayam
   pṛthivyāṃ pākajaṃ anityam/ anyatra apākajaṃ nityamanityaṃ ca/	pRTivyAm pAka jam anityam/ anyatra apAka jam nityam anityam ca/
   nityagataṃ nityam/ anityagatamanityam/	nitya gatam nityam/ anitya gatam anityam /
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   pākajamiti/ pākaḥ	pAkaja miti/ pAkaH
   tejassaṃyogaḥ/ tena pūrvayapaṃ naśyati rūpāntaramutpadyata ityarthaḥ/	tejassaMyogaH/ tena pUrvayapam naSyati rUpa antaram utpadyate iti arTaH/
   tatra paramāṇuṣveva pākaḥ na dvyaṇukādau/ āmanikṣipte dhaṭe	tatra paramANuzu eva pAkaH na dvi aNuka AdO/ Ama nikzipte Dawe
   paramāṇuṣu rūpāntarotpattau śyāmaghaṭanāśe punaḥ dvyaṇukādikrameṇa	paramANuzu rUpa antara utpattO SyAma Gawa nASe punar dvi aNuka Adi krameNa
   raktaghaṭotpattiḥ/ tatra paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇam/ tejassaṃyogaḥ	rakta Gawa utpattiH/ tatra paramANavaH samavAyi kAraNam/ tejassaMyogaH
   asamavāyikāraṇam/ adṛṣṭādikaṃ nimittakāraṇam/ dvyaṇukādirūpe	asamavAyi kAraNam/ adRzwa Adikam nimitta kAraNam/ dvi aNuka Adi rUpe
   kāraṇarūpaṃ	kAraNa rUpam

   nāśaṃ vinaiva avayavini avayaveṣu ca paramāṇuparyanteṣu yugapat	nASam vinA eva avayavini avayavezu ca paramANu paryantezu yugapad 
   rūpāntarotpattiḥ iti piṭharapākavādino naiyāyikāḥ/ ata eva	rUpa antara utpattiH iti piWara pAka vAdinaH nEyAyikAH/ atas eva
   pārthivaparamāṇurūpādikaṃ anityamityarthaḥ/ anyatreti/ jalādāvityarthaḥ/	pArTiva paramANu rUpa Adikam anityam iti arTaH/ anyatra iti/ jala AdO= iti arTaH/
   nityagatamiti/ paramāṇugatamityarthaḥ/ anityagatamiti/	nitya gatamiti/ paramANu gatam iti arTaH/ anitya gatam iti/
   dvyaṇukādigatamityarthaḥ/ rūpādicatuṣṭayaṃ udbhūtaṃ pratyakṣam/	dvi aNuka Adi gatam iti arTaH/ rUpa Adi catuzwayam udBUtam pratyakzam/
   anudbhūtamapratyakṣam/ udbhūtatvaṃ pratyakṣatvaprayojako dharmaḥ/	anudBUtam apratyakzam/ udBUta tvam pratyakza tva prayojakaH DarmaH/
   tadabhāvaḥ anudbhūtatvam/	tad aBAvaH anudBUta tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   paramāṇuṣveva pāka	paramANuzu eva pAka
   iti/ paramāṇuṣveva pūrvarūpaparāvṛttyādijanakatejassaṃyoga	iti/ paramANuzu eva pUrvarUpa parAvRtti Adi janaka tejassaMyoga
   ityarthaḥ/ evakāravyavacchedyaṃ	iti arTaH/ eva kAra vyavacCedyam
   spaṣṭayati   na	spazwayati  na
   vdyaṇukādāviti/ āmanikṣipte ghaṭa iti/ ghaṭe āmanikṣipte sati	vdyaNuka AdO= iti/ Ama nikzipte GawaH iti/ Gawe Ama nikzipte sati
   śyāmaghaṭanāśe paramāṇuṣu rūpāntarotpattāvityanvayaḥ/ tatra	SyAma Gawa nASe paramANuzu rUpa antara utpattO= iti anvayaH/ tatra
   paramāṇurūpe/ avayavinipākānaṅgīkārādāha   kāraṇarūpamiti/	paramANu rUpe/ avayavi nipAka anaFgIkArAt Aha  kAraNa rUpam iti/
   paramāṇuṣveva pākaṃ vadatāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmayamāśayaḥ  	paramANuzu eva pAkam vadatAm vESezi kANAm ayam ASayaH  
   vegātiśayavatā tejasā paramāṇūnāmabhighātasaṃyoge sati avaśyaṃ	vega atiSayavatA tejasA paramANUnAm aBiGAta saMyoge sati avaSyam
   teṣu kriyā jāyate/ tatayo vibhāgaḥ, tata ārambhakasaṃyoganāśe sati	tezu kriyA jAyate/ tatayaH viBAgaH, tatas AramBaka saMyoga nASe sati
   avaśyaṃ yāvadavayavināśaḥ tataḥ svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu	avaSyam yAvat avayavi nASaH tatas svatantrezu paramANuzu
   rūpāntarotpattau	rUpa antara utpattO
   punaradṛṣṭādidhaṭitasāmagrīvaśāt paramāṇuṣu	punar adRzwa Adi Dawita sAmagrI vaSAt paramANuzu
   kriyāvibhāgādikrameṇa yathāsthitaṃ aparāvayaviparyantamutpattiriti/	kriyA viBAga Adi krameNa yaTAsTitam apara avaya viparyantam utpattiH iti/
   avayavinyapi pākaṃ	avayavinI api pAkam
   vadatāṃ naiyāyikānāṃ tu avamāśayaḥ   tejasā	vadatAm nEyAyikAnAm tu avamASayaH  tejasA

   avayavinyapi pākasvīkāra ucitaḥ/ ata eva 'so 'yaṃ ghaṭaḥ' iti	avayavinI api pAka svIkAraH ucitaH/ atas eva asaH ayam GawaHa iti
   pratyābhijñāpi saṅgacchate/ anantāvayavināśādyakalpanena lāghavaṃ ceti/	pratyABijQA api saFgacCate/ ananta avaya vinASa Adi akalpanena lAGavam ca iti/
   na cāvayavirūpaṃ prati avayavarūpasya, tannāśaṃ prati āśrayanāśasya ca	na ca avayavi rUpam prati avayava rUpasya, tad nASam prati ASraya nASasya ca
   hetutāyāṃ vyabhicāra iti vācyam/ kāryatāvacchedakakoṭau	hetutAyAm vyaBicAraH iti vAcyam/ kArya tAvacCedaka kowO
   vaijātyaniveśanena vyabhicāravāraṇasambhavāt/ anyatreti  	vEjAtya niveSanena vyaBicAra vAraNa samBavAt/ anyatra iti

   jātiḥ/ na ca śuklatvādinā sāṅkaryam/ guṇasāṅkaryaṃ na doṣa	jAtiH/ na ca Sukla tva AdinA sAFkaryam/ guNa sAFkaryam na doza

   kecittu  	kecid tu

   udbhūtatvamityāhuḥ/	udBUta tvam iti AhuH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA

   asamavāyikāraṇatvasambhavāt kāraṇarūpaṃ	asamavAyi kAraNa tva samBavAt kAraNa rUpam
   asamavāyikāraṇamityasaṅgatamityāśaṅkyāha   avayavini	asamavAyi kAraNam iti asaFgatam iti ASaFkya Aha  avayavini

   pākavaśāt pūrvarūpādiparāvṛttiyapāntarotpattyoḥ anaṅgīkārāt	pAka vaSAt pUrvarUpa Adi parAvRtti yapAntara utpattyoH anaFgIkArAt 
   tatra rūpāntaraṃ prati pākasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/	tatra rUpa antaram prati pAkasya asamavAyi kAraNa tvam na samBavati iti BAvaH/
   yāvadavayavināśa iti/ antyāvayaviparyantaṃ nāśa ityarthaḥ/	yAvat avayavi nASaH iti/ antya avayavi paryantam nASaH iti arTaH/
   ārambhakasaṃyogetyādi/ dvyaṇukādyārambhako yaḥ paramāṇusaṃyogaḥ	AramBaka saMyoga ityAdi/ dvi aNuka Adi AramBakaH yaH paramANu saMyogaH
   tatpratidvandvī tasya saṃyogasya vināśako yo vibhāgaḥ tajjanikā yā	tad pratidvandvI tasya saMyogasya vinASakaH yaH viBAgaH tad janikA yA
   kriyā tajjanakatva ityarthaḥ/ vaijātyaniveśaneneti/	kriyA tat janakatvaH iti arTaH/ vEjAtya niveSanena iti/

   avayavarūpaṃ āśrayanāśaśca heturiti bhāvaḥ/	avayava rUpam ASraya nASaH ca hetuH iti BAvaH/
   'anyatra apākajaṃ	aanyatra apAka jam

   gandharahitasya rūpāditrayasyaiva, tejasi gandharasarahitasya	ganDa rahitasya rUpa Adi trayasya eva, tejasi ganDa rasa rahitasya

   yadyapītyādinā/ yathāyogyamanvaya iti/ rūpādicatuṣṭayamityasya	yadi api iti AdinA/ yaTAyogyam anvayaH iti/ rUpa Adi catuzwayam iti asya

   bhavatīti nānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ/	Bavati iti na anupapattiH iti BAvaH/

   AnTs_24 ekatvādivyavahārahetuḥ saṃkhyā / navadravyavṛttir	AnTH _24 eka tva Adi vyavahAra hetuH saMKyA / nava dravya vRttiH 
   ekatvādiparārdhaparyantā / ekatvaṃ nityam anityaṃ ca / nityagataṃ nityam	eka tva Adi parArDa paryantA / ekatvam nityam anityam ca / nitya gatam nityam
   anityagatam anityam / dvitvādikaṃ tu sarvatrānityam eva //	anitya gatam anityam / dvi tva Adikam tu sarvatra anityam eva //

   AnTs_25 mānavyavahārakāraṇaṃ parimāṇaṃ / navadravyavṛtti / tac caturvidham	AnTH _25 mAna vyavahAra kAraNam parimANam / nava dravya vRtti / tat caturviDam
   / aṇu mahad dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti //	/ aNu mahat dIrGam hrasvam ca iti //

   parimāṇaṃ lakṣayati	parimANam lakzayati
     māneti/ parimāṇaṃ vibhajate   tacceti/ bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ/	 mAna iti/ parimANam viBajate  tad ceti/ BAva praDAnaH nirdeSaH/
   aṇutvaṃ mahatvaṃ dīrghatvaṃ hrasvatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ/	aNu tvam mahatvam dIrGa tvam hrasva tvam ca iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   parimāṇasya guṇibodhakaśabdaiḥ	parimANasya guNi boDaka SabdEH

   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu parimāṇasya	nanu parimANasya
   guṇatvāt tadvibhāgo 'pi guṇabodhakaiḥ aṇutvamahatvādiśabdaireva	guNa tvAt tad viBAgaH api guNa boDakEH aNu tva mahatva Adi SabdEH eva
   kartavyaḥ, na tu parimāṇaviśeṣarūpaguṇaviśiṣṭavācakaiḥ	kartavyaH, na tu parimANa viSeza rUpa guNa viSizwa vAcakEH
   aṇumahadādiśabdaiḥ iti śaṅkāyāṃ samādhānaṃ uktam   dīpikāyāṃ	aNu mahat Adi SabdEH iti SaFkAyAm samADAnam uktam  dIpikAyAm
   bhāvapradhāno nirdeśa iti/ aṇumahadādayaḥ śabdāḥ mūle	BAva praDAnaH nirdeSaH iti/ aNu mahat AdayaH SabdAH mUle
   dharmapradhānakāḥ/ tathā ca teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ aṇutvaṃ	Darma praDAnakAH/ taTA ca tezAm SabdAnAm aNu tvam
   mahattvamityādiparimāṇarūpaguṇā evārtha iti nānupapattiḥ/ tadāha  	mahat tvam ityAdi parimANa rUpa guNAH eva arTaH iti na anupapattiH/ tat Aha  
   parimāṇasyeti/	parimANasya iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   pṛthaktvanirūpaṇam	pRTaktva nirUpaNam
   AnTs_26 pṛthagvyavahārakāraṇaṃ pṛthagtvaṃ / sarvadravyavṛtti //	AnTH _26 pRTak vyavahAra kAraNam pRTak tvam / sarva dravya vRtti //
   pṛthagvyavahārāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ pṛthaktvam/ sarvadravyavṛtti/	pRTak vyavahArAsa ADAraNam kAraNam pRTaktvam/ sarva dravya vRtti/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   pṛthaktvaṃ lakṣayati  	pRTaktvam lakzayati  
   pṛthagiti/ 'idaṃ asmāt pṛthak' iti vyavahārakāraṇaṃ	pRTak iti/ aidam asmAt pRTak a iti vyavahAra kAraNam
   pṛthaktvamityarthaḥ/	pRTaktvam iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   saṃyoganirūpaṇam	saMyoga nirUpaNam
   AnTs_27 saṃyuktavyavahārahetuḥ saṃyogaḥ / sarvadravyavṛttiḥ //	AnTH _27 saMyukta vyavahAra hetuH saMyogaH / sarva dravya vRttiH //
   saṃyuktavyavahārahetuḥ saṃyogaḥ/ sarvadravyavṛttiḥ/	saMyukta vyavahAra hetuH saMyogaH/ sarva dravya vRttiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   saṃyogaṃ lakṣayati  	saMyogam lakzayati  
   saṃyukteti/ 'imau saṃyuktau' iti vyavahāraheturityarthaḥ/	saMyuktA iti/ aimO saMyuktO a iti vyavahAra hetuH iti arTaH/
   saṅkhyādilakṣaṇe sarvatra/ dikkālādau ativyāptivāraṇāya	saFKI A Adi lakzaNe sarvatra/ diS kAla AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya
   asādhāraṇeti viśeṣaṇīyam/	asADAraNa iti viSezaNIyam/
   saṃyogo dvividhaḥ  	saMyogaH dviviDaH  
   karmajaḥ saṃyogajaśceti/ ādyo hastakriyayā hastapustakasaṃyogaḥ/	karma jaH saMyoga jaH ceti/ AdyaH hasta kriyayA hasta pustaka saMyogaH/
   dvitīyo hastapustaka saṃyogāt kāyapusatakasaṃyogaḥ/ avyāpyavṛttiḥ	dvitIyaH hasta pustaka saMyogAt kAya pusataka saMyogaH/ avyApya vRttiH
   saṃyogaḥ/ svātyantābhāvasamānādhikaraṇatvaṃ avyāpyavṛttitvam/	saMyogaH/ svAtyanta aBAva samAna aDikaraNa tvam avyApya vRtti tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   asādhāraṇetīti/	asADAraNa iti iti/
   kālādeḥ sādhāraṇakāraṇatvena tatra nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	kAla AdeH sADAraNa kAraNa tvena tatra na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   svātyantābhāveti/ svapratiyogitva  	sva atyanta aBAva iti/ sva pratiyogitva  
   svasāmānādhikaraṇyobhayasambandhena abhāvavattvamiti niṣkarṣaḥ/	svasA mAnADi karaNya uBaya sambanDena aBAvavat tvam iti nizkarzaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   svapratiyogitveti/ svaṃ kapisaṃyogābhāvaḥ, tatpratiyogitvaṃ	sva pratiyogitva iti/ svam kapi saMyoga aBAvaH, tad pratiyogi tvam
   kapisaṃyoge, tathā svaṃ kapisaṃyogābhāvaḥ, tadadhikaraṇavṛkṣavṛttitvaṃ	kapi saMyoge, taTA svam kapi saMyoga aBAvaH, tad aDikaraNa vRkza vRtti tvam
   ca kapisaṃyoge/ tathā ca	ca kapi saMyoge/ taTA ca
   svapratiyogitvasvādhikaraṇavṛttitvobhayasambandhena	sva pratiyogi tva sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena
   kapisaṃyogābhāvaviśiṣṭatvaṃ kapisaṃyoge astīti	kapi saMyoga aBAva viSizwa tvam kapi saMyoge asti iti
   tasyāvyāpyavṛttitvam/ svapratiyogitvasambandhena ghaṭābhāvaviśiṣṭasya	tasya avyApya vRtti tvam/ sva pratiyogi tva sambanDena Gawa aBAva viSizwasya
   ghaṭasyāvyāpyavṛttitvavāraṇāya svasāmānādhikaraṇyaniveśaḥ/ ghaṭasya	Gawasya avyApya vRtti tva vAraNAya sva sA mAnADikaraNya niveSaH/ Gawasya
   ghaṭātyantābhāva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāstīti na doṣaḥ/	Gawa atyantA BAva sAmAnADikaraNyam na asti iti na dozaH/
   svādhikaraṇavṛttitvasambandhena ghaṭātyantābhāvaviśiṣṭasya	sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva sambanDena Gawa atyanta aBAva viSizwasya
   paṭasyāvyāpyavṛttitvavāraṇāya svapratiyogitvaniveśaḥ/ paṭasya	pawasya avyApya vRtti tva vAraNAya sva pratiyogi tva niveSaH/ pawasya
   ghaṭābhāvapratiyogitvāt na doṣaḥ/	Gawa aBAva pratiyogi tvAt na dozaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   vibhāganirūpaṇam	viBAga nirUpaNam
   AnTs_28 saṃyoganāśako guṇo vibhāgaḥ / sarvadravyavṛttiḥ //	AnTH _28 saMyoga nASakaH guNaH viBAgaH / sarva dravya vRttiH //
   saṃyoganāśako	saMyoga nASa ko
   guṇaḥ vibhāgaḥ/ sarvadravyavṛttiḥ/	guNaH viBAgaH/ sarva dravya vRttiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   vibhāgaṃ lakṣayati  	viBAgam lakzayati  
   saṃyogeti/ kālādau ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇa iti/ rūpādau	saMyoga iti/ kAla AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya guNaH iti/ rUpa AdO
   ativyāptivāraṇāya saṃyoganāśaka iti/	ati vyApti vAraNAya saMyoga nASakaH iti/
   vibhāgo 'ti dvividhaḥ  	viBAgaH ati dviviDaH  
   karmajaḥ, vibhāgajaśceti/ ādyaḥ hastakriyatā hastapustakāvibhāgaḥ/	karma jaH, viBAga jaH ceti/ AdyaH hasta kriyatA hasta pustaka aviBAgaH/
   dvitīyaḥ hastapusatakavibhāgāt kāyapustakavibhagāḥ/	dvitIyaH hasta pusata ka viBAgAt kAya pustaka viBagAH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   saṃyoganāśaka	saMyoga nASaka
   itīti/ na ca tathāpi saṃyoge ativyāptiḥ/ tasya pratiyogividhayā	iti iti/ na ca taTA api saMyoge ati vyAptiH/ tasya pratiyogi viDayA
   nāśaṃ prati kāraṇatvāditi vācyam/	nASam prati kAraNa tvAt iti vAcyam/
   pratiyogitāsambandhānavacchinnanāśaniṣṭhajanyatānirūpitajanakatvavivakṣaṇenādoṣāditi	pratiyogita asambanDa an avacCinna nASa nizWa janya tA nirUpita janaka tva vivakzaNena adozAt iti
   kecit/	kecid /
   pare tu	pare tu
   saṃyoganāśatvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatvam	saMyoga nASa tva avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tvam
   iti niṣkarṣaḥ/ etattatparyagrāhakaṃ guṇapadamityāhuḥ/	iti nizkarzaH/ etat tat paryagrAhakam guNa padam iti AhuH/
   vibhāga iti/	viBAgaH iti/
   ayamapyavyāpyavṛttiriti bodhyam/ ādyeti/ ādyatvamiha	ayam api avyApya vRttiH iti boDyam/ Adyeti/ Adya tvam iha
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikadhvaṃsāsamānakālikatvam/	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika DvaMsa asamAna kAlika tvam/
   dvitīyapatanādīnāṃ prāthamikapatanadhvaṃsasamānakālikatvāt	dvitIya patana AdInAm prATamika patana DvaMsa samAna kAlika tvAt
   nirāsa iti bhāvaḥ/	nirAsaH iti BAvaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   na ca tathāpi	na ca taTA api
   saṃyāga iti/ saṃyoganāśakatvaṃ hi saṃyoganāśajanakatvam/ dhvaṃsaṃ	saMyAgaH iti/ saMyoga nASaka tvam hi saMyoga nASa janaka tvam/ DvaMsam
   prati pratiyoginaḥ kāraṇatvāt saṃyoganāśaṃ prati saṃyogo 'pi	prati pratiyoginaH kAraNa tvAt saMyoga nASam prati saMyogaH api
   kāraṇam/ tathā ca saṃyoganāśajanakatvaṃ saṃyoge 'stīti	kAraNam/ taTA ca saMyoga nASa janaka tvam saMyoge asti iti
   ativyāptirityarthaḥ/ pratiyogividhayeti/ pratiyogitvenetyarthaḥ/	ativyAptiH iti arTaH/ pratiyogi viDayA iti/ pratiyogi tvena iti arTaH/
   pratiyogitāsambandhānavacchinneti/ pratiyogitāsambandhena nāśaṃ prati	pratiyogita asambanDa anavacCinnA iti/ pratiyogitA sambanDena nASam prati
   tādātmyasambandhena pratiyogī kāraṇamiti kāryakāraṇabhāvāt	tAdAtmya sambanDena pratiyogI kAraNam iti kArya kAraNa BAvAt
   saṃyoganāśaniṣṭhā yā pratiyogitāsambandhāvacchinna kāryatā	saMyoga nASa nizWA yA pratiyogitA sambanDa avacCinna kArya tA
   tannirūpitatādātmyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatāyāḥ saṃyoge sattve 'pi	tad nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAyAH saMyoge sattve api
   pratiyogitāsambandhānavacchinnasaṃyoganāśaniṣṭhajanyatānirūpitajanakatā	pratiyogitA sambanDa anavacCinna saMyoga nASa nizWa janya tA nirUpita janakatA
   nāstīti na saṃyoge 'tivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	na asti iti na saMyoge ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   pare tviti/	pare tu iti/
   svarūpasambandhena saṃyoganāśaṃ prati samavāyasambandhena vibhāgaḥ	svarUpa sambanDena saMyoga nASam prati samavAya sambanDena viBAgaH
   kāraṇamiti kāryakāraṇabhāvāt tadanusādeṇa svarūpasambandhāvacchinna  	kAraNam iti kArya kAraNa BAvAt tad anusAdeNa svarUpa sambanDa avacCinnaH  
   saṃyoganāśatvāvacchinna  	saMyoga nASa tva avacCin naH  
   kāryatānirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatvaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇaṃ atra	kArya tA nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tvam viBAga lakzaNam atra
   vivakṣitam/ saṃyoge tu	vivakzitam/ saMyoge tu
   saṃyoganāśaniṣṭhapratiyogitāsambandhāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitatādātmyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatāyāḥ	saMyoga nASa nizWa pratiyogitA sambanDa avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAyAH
   sattve 'pi uktavidhakāraṇatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	sattve api uktaviDa kAraNa tva aBAvAt na ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   etattātparyagrāhakamiti/	etat tAtparya grAhakam iti/
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatātātparyadyotakamityarthaḥ/	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAtAt paryadyotakam iti arTaH/
   ādyatvamiheti/	Adya tvam iha iti/
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikadhvaṃsasamānakālikaṃ yat yat	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika DvaMsa samAna kAlikam yat yat 
   tadbhinnatvaṃ ādyatvamityarthaḥ/	tad Binna tvam Adya tvam iti arTaH/
   svaṃ dvitīyapatanādi	svam dvitIya patana Adi
   tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ yat ādyapatanaṃ taddhvaṃsasamānakālikameva	tad samAna aDikaraNam yat Adya patanam tat DvaMsa samAna kAlikam eva
   dvitīyapatanādi tadbhinnatvaṃ cādyapatane astīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	dvitIya patana Adi tad Binna tvam ca Adya patane asti iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   paratvāparatvanirūpaṇam	paratva aparatva nirUpaNam
   AnTs_29 parāparavyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇe paratvāparatve /	AnTH _29 parApara vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNe paratva aparatve /
   pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayamanovṛttīti / te dvividhe dikkṛte kālakṛte ca /	pRTivI Adi catuzwaya manaH vRtti iti / te dviviDe dikkRte kAla kRte ca /
   dūrasthe dikkṛtaṃ paratvam / samīpasthe dikkṛtam aparatvam / jyeṣṭhe	dUra sTe diS kRtam paratvam / samIpa sTe diS kRtam aparatvam / jyezWe
   kālakṛthaṃ paratvam / kaniṣṭhe kālakṛtam aparatvam //	kAla kRTam paratvam / kanizWe kAla kRtam aparatvam //
   parāparavyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇe paratvāparatve/ te dvividhe  	parApara vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNe paratva aparatve/ te dviviDe  
   dikkṛte kālakṛte ceti/ dūrasthe dikkṛtaṃ paratvam/ samīpasthe	dikkRte kAla kRte ceti/ dUra sTe diS kRtam paratvam/ samIpa sTe
   dikkṛtaṃ aparatvam/ jyeṣṭhe kālakṛtaṃ paratvam/ kaniṣṭhe kālakṛtaṃ	diS kRtam aparatvam/ jyezWe kAla kRtam paratvam/ kanizWe kAla kRtam
   aparatvam/	aparatvam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   paratvāparatvayoḥ	paratva aparatvayoH
   lakṣaṇamāha   parāpareti/ paravyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ paratvam/	lakzaNam Aha  para apareti/ para vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNam paratvam/
   aparavyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ apanaratvam ityarthaḥ/ te vibhajate  	apara vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNam apanara tvam iti arTaH/ te viBajate  
   te dvividhe iti/ dikkṛtayorudāharaṇamāha   dūrastha iti/	te dviviDe iti/ dikkRtayoH udAharaNam Aha  dUra sTaH iti/
   kālakṛte udāharati   jyeṣṭha iti/	kAla kRte udAharati  jyezWaH iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   gurutvanirūpaṇam	guru tva nirUpaNam
   AnTs_30 ādyapatanāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ gurutvaṃ / pṛthivījalavṛtti //	AnTH _30 Adya patanA samavAyi kAraNam guru tvam / pRTivI jala vRtti //
   ādyapatanāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ gurutvam/ pṛthivījalavṛtti/	Adya patana asamavAyi kAraNam guru tvam/ pRTivI jala vRtti/
   dravatvanirūpaṇam	drava tva nirUpaNam
   AnTs_31 ādyasyandanāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ dravatvaṃ pṛthivyaptejovṛtti / tad	AnTH _31 Adya syandanA samavAyi kAraNam drava tvam pRTivI ap tejaH vRtti / tat 
   dvividhaṃ sāṃsiddhikaṃ naimittikaṃ ca / sāṃsiddhikaṃ jale naimittikaṃ	dviviDam sAMsidDikam nEmittikam ca / sAMsidDikam jale nEmittikam
   pṛthivītejasoḥ / pṛthivyāṃ ghṛtādāvagnisaṃyogajanyaṃ daravatvam / tejasi	pRTivI tejasoH / pRTivyAm GRta AdO= agni saMyoga janyam darava tvam / tejasi
   suvarṇādau //	suvarNa AdO //
   ādyasyandanāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ dravatvam/ pṛthivījalatejovṛtti/	Adya syandanA samavAyi kAraNam drava tvam/ pRTivI jala tejaH vRtti/
   tat dvividham   sāṃsiddhikaṃ naimittikaṃ ceti/ sāṃsidvikaṃ jale/	tat dviviDam  sAMsidDikam nEmittikam ceti/ sAMsi dvikam jale/
   naikittikaṃ pṛthivītejasoḥ/ pṛthivyāṃ ghṛtādau agnisaṃyogajaṃ	nEkittikam pRTivI tejasoH/ pRTivyAm GRta AdO agni saMyoga jam
   dravatvam/ tejasi suvarṇādau/	drava tvam/ tejasi suvarNa AdO/
   snehanirūpaṇam	sneha nirUpaNam
   AnTs_32 cūrṇādipiṇḍībhāvahetur guṇaḥ snehaḥ / jalamātravṛttiḥ //	AnTH _32 cUrNa Adi piNxIBAva hetuH guNaH snehaH / jala mAtra vRttiH //
   cūrṇādipiṇḍībhāvahetuḥ guṇaḥ snehaḥ/ jalamātravṛttiḥ/	cUrNa Adi piNxIBAva hetuH guNaH snehaH/ jala mAtra vRttiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   gurutvaṃ lakṣayati  	guru tvam lakzayati  
   ādyeti/ dvitīyādipatanasya vegāsamavāyikāraṇatvāt vege	Adyeti/ dvitIya Adi patanasya vega asamavAyi kAraNa tvAt vege
   ativyāptivāraṇāya ādyeti/	ati vyApti vAraNAya Adya iti/
   dravatvaṃ lakṣayati  	drava tvam lakzayati  
   ādyeti/ syandanam   prasravaṇam/ tejaḥsaṃyogajaṃ naimittikam/	Adyeti/ syandanam  prasravaNam/ tejaH saMyoga jam nEmittikam/
   tadbhinnaṃ sāṃsiddhikam/ pṛthivyāṃ naimittikamudāharati  	tat Binnam sAMsidDikam/ pRTivyAm nEmittikam udAharati  
   ghṛtādāviti/ tejasi tadāha   suvarṇādāviti/	GRta AdO= iti/ tejasi tat Aha  suvarNa AdO= iti/
   snehaṃ lakṣayati  	sneham lakzayati  
   cūrṇeti/ kālādau ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/	cUrNeti/ kAla AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/
   rūpādāvativyāptivāraṇāya cūrṇādipiṇḍībhāveti/	rUpa AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya cUrNa Adi piNxIBAva iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   tadāheti  	tadAha iti  
   naimittikamāha ityarthaḥ/	nEmittikam Aha iti arTaH/
   piṇḍībhāveti  	piNxIBAva iti  
   piṇḍībhāvaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ/	piNxIBAvaH saMyoga viSezaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   śabdanirūpaṇam	Sabda nirUpaNam
   AnTs_33 śrotragrāhyo guṇaḥ śabdaḥ / ākāśamātravṛttiḥ / sa dvividho	AnTH _33 Srotra grAhyaH guNaH SabdaH / AkASa mAtra vRttiH / sa dviviDaH 
   dvanyātmako varṇātmakaś ceti / dvanyātmako bheryādau / varṇātmakaḥ	dvanyAtmakaH varNa AtmakaH ca iti / dvanya AtmakaH BerI AdO / varNa AtmakaH
   saṃskṛtabhāṣādirūpaḥ //	saMskRta BAzA Adi rUpaH //
   śrotragrāhyo guṇaḥ	Srotra grAhyaH guNaH
   śabdaḥ/ ākāśamātravṛttiḥ/ saḥ dvividhaḥ dhvanyātmakaḥ varṇātmakaśceti/	SabdaH/ AkASa mAtra vRttiH/ saH dviviDaH Dvani AtmakaH varNa AtmakaH ca iti/
   dhvanyātmako bheryādau/ varṇātmakaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣādirūpaḥ/	Dvani AtmakaH BerI AdO/ varNa AtmakaH saMskRta BAzA Adi rUpaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   śabdaṃ lakṣayati  	Sabdam lakzayati  
   śrotreti/ śabdatve ativyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadam/	Srotra iti/ Sabda tve ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam/
   rūpādāvativyāptivāraṇāya śrotreti/ śabdaḥ trividhaḥ   saṃyogajaḥ	rUpa AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya Srotra iti/ SabdaH triviDaH  saMyoga jaH
   vibhāgajaḥ śabdajaśceti/ tatra ādyaḥ bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogajanyaḥ/ dvitīyo	viBAga jaH Sabda jaH ceti/ tatra AdyaH BerI daNxa saMyoga janyaH/ dvitIyaH 
   vaṃśe pāṭyamāne daladvayavibhāgajanyaḥ caṭacaṭaśabdaḥ/	vaMSe pAwyamAne dala dvaya viBAga janyaH cawacawa SabdaH/

   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   buddhinirūpaṇam	budDi nirUpaNam

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   buddheḥ lakṣaṇamāha  	budDeH lakzaNam Aha

   ativyāptivāraṇāya sarvavyavahāra iti/ 'jānāmi'	ati vyApti vAraNAya sarva vyavahAraH iti/ ajAnAmi a

   seti/ smṛteḥ lakṣaṇamāha   saṃskāreti/ bhāvanākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ/	sA iti/ smRteH lakzaNam Aha  saMskAra iti/ BAvanA AKyaH saMskAraH/

   pramāṇasiddhatvasūcanāya/ tathā hi   'ghaṭaṃ jānāmi'	pramANa sidDa tva sUcanAya/ taTA hi  aGawam jAnAmi a

   prakāratāvacchedakasambandhaḥ/ tena sambandhena rajatatvavat rajatameva,	prakAra tA avacCedaka sambanDaH/ tena sambanDena rajata tva vat rajatam eva,

   syāt/ tathā sati 'parvato vahnimān' iti pramāyāmativyāptiḥ/	syAt/ taTA sati aparvataH vahnimAna iti pramAyAm ati vyAptiH/
   tathā hi   tatpadena vahnirūpaḥ prakāraḥ gṛhītaścet tasya saṃyogena	taTA hi  tad padena vahni rUpaH prakAraH gRhItaH ced tasya saMyogena
   parvate sattve 'pi samavāyena sattā nāsti/ ataḥ	parvate sattve api samavAyena sattA nAsti/ atas 
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnavahnyabhāvavān yaḥ	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna vahni aBAvavAn yaH
   1. tathā apratīteriti/	1. taTA apratIteH iti/
   saṃyogāvacchedakatayā saṃyogābhāvasyāpratīterityarthaḥ/	saMyoga avacCedaka tayA saMyoga aBAvasya apratIteH iti arTaH/
   parvataḥ tadviśeṣyakatve	parvataH tad viSezyaka tve
   sati vahniprakārakatvaṃ 'parvato vahnimān' iti pramāyāmastīti/	sati vahni prakAraka tvam aparvataH vahnimAna iti pramAyAm asti iti/
   prakāratāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśe tu saṃyogasambandhasyaiva	prakAra tA avacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva niveSe tu saMyoga sambanDasya eva
   prakāratāvacchedakatayā tadavacchinnapratiyogitākavahnyabhāvavān	prakAra tA vacCedaka tayA tad avacCinna pratiyogi tAka vahni aBAvavAn
   viśeṣya parvato na bhavatīti	viSezya parvataH na Bavati iti
   prakāratāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatadabhāvavadviśeṣyakatvaṃ	prakAra tA avacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tada BAvavat viSezyaka tvam
   'parvato vahnimān' iti pramāyāṃ nāstīti nātivyāptiriti	aparvataH vahnimAna iti pramAyAm na asti iti na ati vyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   viśeṣyitvaprakāritvayoriti/ tathā ca	viSezyi tva prakAri tvayoH iti/ taTA ca
   viśeṣyitvaprakāritvayo avacchedyāvacchedakabhāvāvivakṣaṇe	viSezyi tva prakAritvayaH avacCedya avacCedaka BAva avivakzaNe
   tadabhāvavadviśeṣyakaḥ tatprakārakānubhavaḥ bhrama ityetāvanmātroktau	tad aBAva vat viSezyakaH tad prakAraka anuBavaH BramaH iti etAvat mAtrA uktO
   raṅge raṅgatvaṃ rajate rajatatvaṃ cāvagāhamānaḥ yaḥ 'ime	raFge raFga tvam rajate rajata tvam ca avagAhamAnaH yaH aime
   raṅgarajate' iti pramātmakānubhavaḥ tatra raṅgaṃ rajataṃ ca	raFgarajate a iti pramA Atmaka anuBavaH tatra raFgam rajatam ca
   viśeṣyam, raṅgatvaṃ rajatatvaṃ ca prakāra iti tatpadena	viSezyam, raFga tvam rajata tvam ca prakAraH iti tad padena
   raṅgatvagrahaṇe tadabhāvavat rajataṃ uktapramāyāṃ viśeṣyaṃ bhavati	raFga tva grahaNe tad aBAva vat rajatam ukta pramAyAm viSezyam Bavati
   raṅgatvaṃ ca prakāro bhevatīti raṅgatvābhāvavadrajataviśeṣyakatvaṃ	raFga tvam ca prakAraH Bevati iti raFga tvA aBAvavat rajata viSezyaka tvam
   raṅgatvaprakārakatvaṃ cāsti, evaṃ rajatatvābhāvavadraṅgaviśeṣyakatvaṃ	raFga tva prakAraka tvam ca asti, evam rajata tva aBAva vat raFga viSezyaka tvam
   rajatatvaprakārakatvaṃ cāstītyativyāpti syāt/ atastayoḥ	rajata tva prakAraka tvam ca asti iti ativyApti syAt/ atas tayoH
   avacchedyāvacchedakābhāvavivakṣā/ tathā ca tadabhāva	avacCedya avacCedaka aBAva vivakzA/ taTA ca tad aBAva
   vadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaṃ	vat viSezyaka tva avacCinnam
   yat tatprakārakatvaṃ tadviśiṣṭānubhavaḥ bhrama iti lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati/	yat tad prakAraka tvam tad viSizwa anuBavaH BramaH iti lakzaNam Bavati/
   uktasamūhālambanapramāyāṃ	ukta samUha Alambana pramAyAm
   raṅgatvaniṣṭhaprakārataraṅgatvavadraṅganiṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitā, na	raFga tu anizWa prakAra taraFga tva vat raFga nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitA, na
   tu raṅgatvābhāvavadrajataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitā, rajate	tu raFga tvA aBAvavat rajata nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitA, rajate
   raṅgatvasyāprakāratvāt/ evaṃ ca	raFga tu asya aprakAra tva at/ evam ca
   raṅgatvaniṣṭhaprakāratārajataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatayorniṃrūpya	raFga tu anizWa prakAra tAra jata nizWa viSezya tayoH niMrUpya
   nirūpakabhāvābhāvataraṅgatvaprakārakatvaraṅgatvābhāvavadrajataviśeṣyakatvayoḥ	nirUpaka BAva aBAva taraFga tva prakAraka tvaraFga tva aBAvavat rajata viSezyaka tvayoH
   avacchedyāvacchedakabhāvo nāsti/ yayorviṣayatayoḥ nirūpyanirūpakabhāvaḥ	avacCedya avacCedaka BAvaH nAsti/ yayoH vizaya tayoH nirUpya nirUpaka BAvaH
   tannirūpitaviṣayitayoreva avacchedyāvacchedakabhāva iti niyamāt/	tad nirUpita vizayitayoH eva avacCedya avacCedaka BAvaH iti niyamAt/
   evaṃ ca raṅgatvābhāvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaraṅgatvaprakārakatvasya	evam ca raFga tvA aBAvavat viSezyaka tva avacCinna raFga tva prakAraka tvasya
   rajatatvābhāvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnarajatatvaprakārakatvasya	rajata tva aBAvavat viSezyaka tva avacCinna rajata tva prakAraka tvasya
   coktasamūhālambanapramāyāṃ abhāvānnātivyāpitariti bhāvaḥ/	ca ukta samUha Alambana pramAyAm aBAvAt na ati vyApitar iti BAvaH/
   prakāratāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyatānirūpakatve satyanubhavatvaṃ bhramasya lakṣaṇam/	prakAra tA viSizwa viSezya tA nirUpaka tve sati anuBava tvam Bramasya lakzaNam/
   viśeṣyatāyāṃ prakāratāvaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	viSezyatAyAm prakAratA vESizwyam ca
   1svāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākasvāśrayābhāvavanniṣṭhatvasvanirūpitatvobhayasambandheneti	1svAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka sva ASraya aBAvavat nizWa tva svanirUpita tva uBaya sambanDena iti
   niṣkarṣaḥ/	nizkarzaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   yathārthānubhavavibhāgaḥ	yaTArTa anuBava viBAgaH
   AnTs_36 yathārthānubhavaś caturvidhaḥ pratyakṣānumityupamitiśabdabhedāt /	AnTH _36 yaTArTa anuBavaH caturviDaH pratyakza anumiti upamiti Sabda BedAt /
   tatkaraṇam api caturvidhaṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdabhedāt //	tad karaNam api caturviDam pratyakza anumAna upamAna Sabda BedAt //
   yathārthānubhavaḥ	yaTArTa anuBavaH
   caturvidhaḥ   pratyakṣa   anumiti   upamiti   śabdabhedāt/ tatkaraṇamapi	caturviDaH  pratyakza  anumiti  upam iti  Sabda Beda at/ tat karaNam api
   caturvidham   pratyakṣa   anumāna   upamāna   śabdabhedāt/	caturviDam  pratyakza  anumAnaH  upamAnaH  Sabda BedAt/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   yathārthānubhavaṃ	yaTArTa anuBavam
   vibhajate/ yathārtheti/ prasaṅgāt pramākaraṇaṃ vibhajate  	viBajate/ yaTArTa iti/ prasaFgAt pramAkaraNam viBajate  
   tatkaraṇamapīti/ prakākaraṇamityarthaḥ/ pramāyāḥ karaṇaṃ pramāṇam iti	tad karaNam api iti/ prakAkaraNam iti arTaH/ pramAyAH karaNam pramANam iti
   pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇam/	pramANa sAmAnya lakzaNam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prasaṅgāditi/	prasaFgAt iti/
   smṛtasya upekṣānarhatvaṃ prasaṅgaḥ tasmādityarthaḥ/	smRtasya upekzA an arha tvam prasaFgaH tasmAt iti arTaH/
   sāmānyato 'vagatasyaiva viśeṣarūpeṇa pratipādanaṃ saṃbhavatīti	sAmAnyatas avagatasya eva viSeza rUpeNa pratipAdanam saMBavati iti
   sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sphuṭayati   pramāyāḥ karaṇaṃ pramāṇamiti/	sAmAnya lakzaNam sPuwayati  pramAyAH karaNam pramANam iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   smṛtasyeti/	smRtasya iti/
   pramāyāḥ lakṣaṇe ukte tatkaraṇaṃ smṛtaṃ bhavatīti tasya upekṣā na yukteti	pramAyAH lakzaNe ukte tad karaNam smRtam Bavati iti tasya upekzA na yuktA iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   1. svāvacchedaketi/	1. sva avacCedaka iti/
   śuktāvidaṃ rajatamiti bhrame evaṃ samanvayaḥ   svaṃ	SuktO= idam rajatam iti Brame evam samanvayaH  svam
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā	rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA
   tadavacchedakasambandhaḥ samavāyasambandhaḥ tadavacchinnapratiyogitākaḥ	tad avacCedaka sambanDaH samavAya sambanDaH tad avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH
   svāśrayasya prakāratāśrayasya rajatatvasya abhāvaḥ tadvacchuktiniṣṭhatvaṃ	sva ASrayasya prakAratA ASrayasya rajata tvasya aBAvaH tadvat Sukti nizWa tvam
   viśeṣyatāyām; evaṃ svaṃ rajatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tannirūpitatvaṃ ca	viSezyata AyAm; evam svam rajatu anizWa prakAra tA tad nirUpita tvam ca
   śuktiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāyām/ tathā ca uktobhayasambandhena	Sukti nizWa viSezya tAyAm/ taTA ca ukta uBaya sambanDena
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratāviśiṣṭā yā śuktiniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā	rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA viSizwA yA Sukti nizWA viSezyatA
   tannirūpakatve sati anubhavatvaṃ idaṃ rajatamiti bhrame 'stīti/	tad nirUpaka tve sati anuBava tvam idam rajatam iti Brame asti iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   karaṇalakṣaṇam	karaNa lakzaNam
   AnTs_37 asādhāraṇam kāraṇaṃ karaṇam /	AnTH _37 asADAraNam kAraNam karaNam /
   (vyāpāravat)	(vyApAravat)
   asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ karaṇam/	asADAraNa kAraNam karaNam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   karaṇalakṣaṇamāha  	karaNa lakzaNam Aha  
   asādhāraṇeti/ sādhāraṇakāraṇe dikkālādau ativyāptivāraṇāya	asADAraNa iti/ sADAraNa kAraNe diS kAla AdO ati vyApti vAraNAya
   asādhāraṇeti/	asADAraNa iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   asādhāraṇetīti/	asADAraNa iti iti/
   dikkālādṛṣṭādeḥ kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ pratyeva kāraṇatvāt	diS kAla adRzwa AdeH kAryatva avacCinnam pratyeva kAraNa tvAt 
   anubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnapramāvṛttikāryatānirūpitakāraṇatvarūpāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvasya	anuBava tu a vyApya Darma avacCinna pramA vRtti kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tva rUpA sADAraNa kAraNa tvasya
   tatra asattvāt nātivyāptiḥ/	tatra asattvAt na ati vyAptiH/
   prācīnāstu 	prAcInAstu 
   'vyāpāravattve sati' ityapi vaktavyam/ ataḥ cakṣuḥ saṃyogādau	avyApAravat tve sati a iti api vaktavyam/ atas cakzuH  saMyoga AdO
   nātivyāptiḥ/ śrotramanassaṃyogaḥ śabdo vā vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavatyeveti	na ati vyAptiH/ Srotra manassaMyogaH SabdaH vA vyApAraH saMBavati eva iti
   na śrotrendriyo karaṇalakṣaṇāvyāptiḥ iti vadanti/	na Srotra indriyaH karaNa lakzaNa avyAptiH iti vadanti/
   "yadvilambāt prakṛtakāryānutpādaḥ	"yat vilambAt prakRta kArya anutpAdaH
   tatkāraṇatvasyaivāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvātmakatayā kālādiṣu	tad kAraNa tvasya eva asADAraNa kAraNa tva Atmaka tayA kAla Adizu
   tādṛśakāraṇatvābhāvāt na ativyāptiḥ/	tAdRSa kAraNa tva aBAvAt na ativyAptiH/
   vyāpāratvenābhimatendriyasaṃyogādikameva karaṇam/ etacca	vyApAra tvena aBimata indriya saMyoga Adikam eva karaNam/ etat ca
   'liṅgaparāmarśa evānumānam' iti mūle eva sphuṭībhaviṣyati/ ata	aliFga parAmarSaH eva anumAnam a iti mUle eva sPuwIBavizyati/ ata
   eva maṇikṛdbhiḥ uktam   'tacca liṅgaparāmarśaḥ' iti granthena"iti	eva maNi kRdBiH uktam  atat ca liFga parAmarSaH a iti granTena" iti
   tu navyāḥ/ adhikam asmadīyacintāmaṇiprabhāyāṃ anusandheyam/	tu navyAH/ aDikam asmadIya cintAmaNi praBAyAm anusanDeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   dikkālādṛṣṭāderiti/ pramānirūpitāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvaṃ	diS kAla adRzwa AdeH iti/ pramAni rUpita asADAraNa kAraNa tvam
   pramāṇasyalakṣaṇam/ pramāniṣṭhā yā anubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnā	pramANasya lakzaNam/ pramAnizWA yA anuBava tu a vyApya Darma avacCinnA
   kāryatā tannirūpitakāraṇatvamiti yāvat/ anubhavatvavyāpyadharmaḥ	kArya tA tad nirUpita kAraNa tvam iti yAvat/ anuBava tu a vyApya DarmaH
   pramātvam, kāryatāyāṃ	pramAtvam, kArya tAyAm
   anubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnatvasyāniveśe kāryasāmānyaṃ prati	anuBava tu a vyApya Darma avacCinna tvasya aniveSe kArya sAmAnyam prati
   dikkālādṛṣṭādeḥ kāraṇatvāt pramāṃ pratyapi kāraṇatvamastīti	diS kAla adRzwa AdeH kAraNa tvAt pramAm pratyapi kAraNa tvam asti iti
   pramāṇalakṣaṇasya dikkālādāvativyāptiḥ syāt/ tanniveśe tu	pramANa lakzaNasya diS kAla AdO= ativyAptiH syAt/ tad niveSe tu
   prabhāniṣṭhakāryatvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāyāḥ dikkālādau	praBA nizWa kAryatva avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tAyAH diS kAla AdO
   sattve 'pi pramāniṣṭhapramātvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatvaṃ nāstīti	sattve api pramAnizWa pramAtvA avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tvam na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ cakṣurāderiva tatsannikarṣāderapi	na ati vyAptiH/ cakzuH AdeH iva tad sannikarza AdeH api
   pratyakṣapramāhetutvāt pramāṇalakṣaṇasya vyāpāreṣu sannikarṣādiṣu	pratyakza pramA hetu tvAt pramANa lakzaNasya vyApArezu sannikarza Adizu
   ativyāptivāraṇāya vyāpāradvārakaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇe	ati vyApti vAraNAya vyApAra dvArakam kAraNa tvam lakzaNe
   niveśanīyam/ na ca	niveSanIyam/ na ca
   śrotrendriyo avyāptiḥ, śrotrasamavāyarūpasaṃnikarṣasya nityatvena	Srotra indriyaH avyAptiH, Srotra samavAya rUpa saMnikarzasya nitya tvena
   tajjanyatvaghaṭitavyāpāralakṣaṇābhāvāt vyāpāradvārakakāraṇatvarūpasya	tad janya tva Gawita vyApAra lakzaNa aBAvAt vyApAra dvAraka kAraNa tva rUpasya
   pramāṇalakṣaṇasya śrotrendriye 'bhāvāditi vācyam/	pramANa lakzaNasya Srotra indriye aBAvAt iti vAcyam/
   śrotramanassaṃyogasya	Srotra manassaMyogasya
   śabdasya vā śrotravyāpāratvāt taddvārakapratyakṣakāraṇatvasya śrotre 'pi	Sabdasya vA Srotra vyApAra tvAt tad dvAraka pratyakza kAraNa tvasya Srotre api
   sattvāt   iti prācīnamatam/	sattvAt  iti prAcInamatam/
   navīnamatamāha  	navIna matam Aha  
   yadvilambādityādinā/ na vyāpāravatkāraṇatvamasādhāraṇakāraṇatvam/	yat vilambAt itya AdinA/ na vyApAra vat kAraNa tvam asADAraNa kAraNa tvam/
   ati tu yadvilambāt prakṛtakāryānutpādaḥ tattvam/ kālādiṣu	ati tu yat vilambAt prakRta kArya anutpAdaH tattvam/ kAla Adizu

   prācīnābhimateṣu	prAcIna aBimatezu

   navīnamatam/	navIna matam/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH

   AnTs_38 kāryaniyatapūrvavṛtti kāraṇam /	AnTH _38 kArya niyata pUrva vRtti kAraNam /
   (ananyathāsiddhatve sati) kāryaniyatapūrvavṛtti kāraṇam/	(ananyaTA sidDa tve sati) kArya niyata pUrva vRtti kAraNam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kāraṇalakṣaṇamāha   kāryeti/ 'pūrvavṛtti	kAraNa lakzaNam Aha  kAryA iti/ apUrva vRtti
   kāraṇaṃ' ityukte rāsabhādau ativyāptiḥ syāt, ataḥ niyateti/	kAraNama iti ukte rAsaBa AdO ativyAptiH syAt, atas niyata iti/
   tāvanmātre kṛte kārye ativyāptiḥ, ataḥ pūrvavṛtti iti/	tAvat mAtre kRte kArye ati vyAptiH, atas pUrva vRtti iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   niyateti/	niyata iti/
   niyatatvaṃ hi vyāpakatvam/ tacca rāsabhādeḥ na saṃbhavatīti tatra na	niyata tvam hi vyApaka tvam/ tat ca rAsaBa AdeH na saMBavati iti tatra na
   ghaṭakāraṇatvātiprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ/ pūrvavṛttīti/ svavyāpakatvasya	Gawa kAraNa tva atiprasaktiH iti BAvaH/ pUrva vRtti iti/ sva vyApaka tvasya
   svasmin sattve 'pi spūrvakālavṛttitvasya asattvena nātiprasaṅga iti	svasmin sattve api spUrva kAla vRtti tvasya asattvena na ati prasaFgaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ kāryatāvacchedakasambandhena kāryādhikaraṇe	BAvaH/ kArya tAvat Cedaka sambanDena kArya aDikaraNe
   kāryāvyavahitaprākkṣaṇāvacchedena	kArya avyavahita prAkkzaNa avacCedena
   vidyamānātyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakataddharmavattvaṃ tena rūpeṇa	vidyamAna atyanta aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tad Darmavat tvam tena rUpeNa
   kāraṇatvamiti samuditār'tho bodhyaḥ/	kAraNa tvam iti samuditAr aTo boDyaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   kāryaniyatatve	kArya niyata tve
   sati kāryapūrvavṛttitvaṃ kāraṇasya lakṣaṇam/ kāryaniyatatvaṃ ca	sati kArya pUrva vRtti tvam kAraNasya lakzaNam/ kArya niyata tvam ca
   kāryavyāpakatvam/ kāryapūrvavṛttitvamātroktau	kArya vyApaka tvam/ kArya pUrva vRtti tva mAtra uktO
   rāsabhāderapikadācit ghaṭapūrvavartitvamastīti ghaṭakāraṇatvāpattiḥ/	rAsaBa AdeH apikadAcid Gawa pUrva varti tvam asti iti Gawa kAraNa tva ApattiH/
   tadvāraṇāya kāryavyāpakatvaniveśaḥ/ kāryasyāpi kāryavyāpakatvāt	tad vAraNAya kArya vyApaka tva niveSaH/ kAryasya api kArya vyApaka tvAt 
   tatrativyāptivāraṇāya kāryapūrvavartitatvaniveśaḥ/ tadāha niyatatvaṃ	tatrati vyApti vAraNAya kArya pUrva varti ta tva niveSaH/ tadA aha  niyata tvam
   hītyādīnā/ kāryavyāpakatvaśarīra eva kāryapūrvavartitvamapi niveśya	hi ityAdInA/ kArya vyApaka tva SarIraH eva kArya pUrva varti tvam api niveSya
   pariṣkaroti   kāryatāvacchedakasambandhenetyādinā/	parizkaroti  kArya tAvat Cedaka sambanDena ityAdinA/
   kāryatāvacchedakasambandhena saṃyogena kāryādhikaraṇe ghaṭādhikaraṇe	kArya tAvat Cedaka sambanDena saMyogena kArya aDikaraNe Gawa aDikaraNe
   pradeśe ghaṭapūrvakṣaṇāvacchedena vartamāno yo 'bhāvaḥ na	pradeSe Gawa pUrvakzaNa avacCedena vartamAnaH yaH aBAvaH na
   daṇḍacakrādyabhāvaḥ, api tu rāsabhādyabhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ	daNxa cakra Adi aBAvaH, api tu rAsaBa Adi aBAvaH tad pratiyogita avacCedakam
   rāsabhatvādi pratiyogitānavacchedakaṃ daṇḍatvādi, tadvattvaṃ	rAsaBa tva Adi pratiyogita an avacCedakam daNxa tva Adi, tadvat tvam
   taṇḍādiṣvastīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ kāryatāvacchedakasambandhenetyanuktau	taNxa Adizu asti iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/ kArya tAvat Cedaka sambanDena iti anuktO
   kālikasambandhena ghaṭādhikāraṇaṃ yatra ghaṭo notpadyate sa pradeśo 'pi	kAlika sambanDena Gawa aDikAraNam yatra GawaH na utpadyate sa pradeSaH api
   bhavati tadvṛttiryo 'bhāvaḥ daṇḍādyabhāvaḥ,	Bavati tat vRttiH yaH aBAvaH daNxa Adi aBAvaH,
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakadharmavattvameva daṇḍādāvasti na	tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka Darmavat tvam eva daNxa AdO= asti na
   tadanavacchekadharmavattvamityasambhavaḥ syāt/	tad anavat Seka Darma vat tvam iti asamBavaH syAt /
   tadvāraṇāya kārya tāvacchedakasambandheneti/	tad vAraNa aya  kArya  tAvat Cedaka sambanDena iti/
   kāryādhikaraṇavṛttyabhāvāpratiyogitvamātroktausaṃyogasambandhena	kArya aDikaraNa vRtti aBAva apratiyogi tva mAtra uktOsaMyoga sambanDena
   ghaṭādhikaraṇai vartate yo 'bhāvaḥ daṇḍatantūbhayābhāvaḥ	Gawa aDikaraNEH vartate yaH aBAvaH daNxa tantu uBayA BAvaH
   tatpratiyogitvameva daṇḍe astīti rītyā ubhayābhāvamādāya asambhavaḥ	tad pratiyogi tvam eva daNxe asti iti rItyAH uBaya aBAvam AdAya asamBavaH
   syāt/ tadvāraṇāya pratiyogitānavacchedakadharmavattvaniveśaḥ/	syAt/ tad vAraNAya pratiyogitAnavacCedaka Darma vat tva niveSaH/

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   anyathāsiddhinirūpaṇam	anyaTA sidDi nirUpaNam
   nanu tanturūpamapi	nanu tantu rUpam api

   anyathāsiddhiḥ trividhā   yena sahaiva yasya yaṃ prati	anyaTA sidDiH triviDA  yena saha eva yasya yam prati
   pūrvavṛttitvamavagamyate taṃ prati tena tadanyathāsiddham/ yathā tantunā	pUrva vRtti tvam avagamyate tam prati tena tad anyaTA sidDam/ yaTA tantunA

   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   kāraṇaṃ syāditi/	kAraNam syAt iti/
   tasya niyatapūrvavṛttitvāditi bhāvaḥ/ nibandhāntareṣu anyathāsiddheḥ	tasya niyata pUrva vRtti tvAt iti BAvaH/ nibanDa antarezu anyaTA sidDeH

   sahaivetyādi/ yena tantunā sahaiva yasya tatturūpasya tantutvasya ca yaṃ	saha eva ityAdi/ yena tantunA saha eva yasya tat turUpasya tantu tvasya ca yam
   paṭaṃ prati pūrvavṛttitvamavagamyate taṃ paṭaṃ prati tantanturūpaṃ	pawam prati pUrva vRtti tvam avagamyate tam pawam prati tad tantu rUpam
   tantutvaṃ ca tena tantunā anyathāsiddhamityarthaḥ/ atra sahitatvam	tantu tvam ca tena tantunA anyaTA sidDam iti arTaH/ atra sahita tvam
   ekajñānaviṣayatvaṃ bodhyam/ tanturūpasya paṭapūrvavṛttitvajñāne	eka jQAna vizaya tvam boDyam/ tantu rUpasya pawa pUrva vRtti tva jQAne
   anatiprasaktatanturūpatvenaiva viṣayatā vācyā/ tathā ca tanturūpaṃ	anatiprasakta tantu rUpa tvena eva vizaya tA vAcyA/ taTA ca tantu rUpam
   anyathāsiddhamiti/ evaṃ entutvasya pūrvavṛttitvajñānamapi	anyaTA sidDa miti/ evam entutvasya pUrva vRtti tva jQAnam api

   'svatantrānvayavyatirekaśālinā' iti 'yasya' ityasya ca	asvatantra anvaya vyatireka SAlinAa iti ayasya a iti asya ca

   atathābhūtena tantutvena tantoranyathāsiddhiḥ, na vā tantusaṃyogasya	ataTABUtena tantu tvena tantoH anyaTA sidDiH, na vA tantu saMyogasya

   saṅkṣepaḥ/"itarānvayavyatirekaprayuktānvayavyatirekaśāli yat yat	saFkzepaH /"itara anvaya vyatireka prayukta anvaya vyatireka SAli yat yat

   evaṃ	evam

   śarīrakṛtamupasthitikṛtaṃ saṃbandhakṛtam ca/ tatra prathamam  	SarIra kRtam upasTiti kRtam saMbanDa kRtam ca/ tatra praTamam  
   anekadravyasamavetatvāpekṣayā mahattve/ dvitīyam   gandhaṃ prati	aneka dravya samaveta tva apekzayA mahat tve/ dvitIyam  ganDam prati

   upasthitatvena śīghraṃ tadupasthiteḥ/ tṛtīyam  	upasTita tvena SIGram tad upasTiteH/ tRtIyam

   nirvāhe anyathāsiddhitrividha pañcavidhā ceti prapañco	nirvAhe anyaTA sidDi triviDa paQcaviDA ca iti prapaQcaH 
   vyutpattivaicitryāya/	vyutpatti vEcitryAya/
