   2viśeṣyatāvacchedakatayā viṣayatvamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ/	2viSezya tAvacCedaka tayA vizaya tvam AvaSyakam iti BAvaH/

   paṭapūrvavṛtti' iti jñāne tantutvasya viśeṣyatvāt jāteḥ yatra	pawa pUrva vRtti a iti jQAne tantu tvasya viSezya tvAt jAteH yatra

   tantutvatvena tantutvabhānaṃ vaktavyam/ tantutvatvaṃ ca	tantu tva tvena tantu tva BAnam vaktavyam/ tantu tva tvam ca

   tatkāryanirūpitetyādi/ tatkāryaṃ paṭaḥ tannirūpitaṃ yat	tad kArya nirUpita ityAdi/ tat kAryam pawaH tad nirUpitam yat

   viśeṣyatā tanturūpaniṣṭhā tantutvaniṣṭhā vā viśeṣyatā	viSezyatA tantu rUpa nizWA tantu tva nizWA vA viSezyatA
   tadavacchedakībhūtaḥ yaḥ svāśrayaḥ tanturūpasya tantutvasya vā āśrayaḥ	tad avacCedakIBUtaH yaH sva ASrayaH tantu rUpasya tantu tvasya vA ASrayaH
   tantuḥ tatkatvaṃ tanturūpe tanatutve cāstīti samanvayaḥ/	tantuH tat katvam tantu rUpe tanatu tve ca asti iti samanvayaH/
   viśeṣyatāvacchedakatayeti/ tanturūpamityasya samavāyasambandhena	viSezya tA avacCedakatayA iti/ tantu rUpam iti asya samavAya sambanDena
   tantuviśaṣṭa rūpamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca 'tanturūpaṃ paṭapūrvavṛtti' iti	tantu viSazwa rUpam iti arTaH/ taTA ca atantu rUpam pawa pUrva vRtti a iti
   jñāne viśeṣye rūpe tantūnāmapi viśeṣaṇatvāt	jQAne viSezye rUpe tantUnAm api viSezaNa tvAt 
   viśeṣyatāvacchedakatvamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ/	viSezya tAvacCedaka tvam AvaSyakam iti BAvaH/
   tantutvatvaghaṭakatayā	tantu tva tva Gawaka tayA
   tantūnāmarpiṃ bhānamavarjanīyam/ evaṃ ca	tantUnAm arpim BAnama varjanIyam/ evam ca
   tantutvaviśeṣyakapūrvavṛttitvajñānasya	tantu tva viSezyaka pUrva vRtti tva jQAnasya

   pūrvavṛttitvaprakārakajñānīyaṃ yadviśeṣyakatvaṃ tat anyathāsiddhamiti	pUrva vRtti tva prakAraka jQAnIyam yat viSezyaka tvam tat anyaTA sidDam iti
   yāvat/	yAvat /

   prayojanamāha   tena na atathābhūteneti/	prayojanam Aha  tena na ataTABUtena iti/

   niyamena sattvāt pākajagandhaṃ prati gandhaprāgabhāvavat	niyamena sattvAt pAka jaganDam prati ganDa prAgaBAva vat

   AnTs_41 tad etattrividhakāraṇamadhye yad asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad eva	AnTH _41 tat etat triviDa kAraNa maDye yat asADAraNam kAraNam tat eva
   karaṇam //	karaNam //
   tadetattrividhakāraṇamadhye yadasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva kāraṇam/	tat etat triviDa kAraNa maDye yat asADAraNam kAraNam tat eva kAraNam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kāraṇaṃ vibhajate  	kAraNam viBajate  
   kāraṇamiti/ samavāyikāraṇasya lakṣaṇamāha   yatsamavetamiti/ yasmin	kAraNam iti/ samavAyi kAraNasya lakzaNam Aha  yat samavetamiti/ yasmin
   samavetamityarthaḥ/ asamavāyikāraṇaṃ lakṣayatikāryeṇeti/ 'kāryeṇa'	samavetam iti arTaH/ asamavAyi kAraNam lakzayati kAryeNa iti/ akAryeNa a
   ityetadudāharati   tantusaṃyoga iti/ kāryeṇa paṭena saha	iti etat udAharati  tantu saMyogaH iti/ kAryeNa pawena saha
   ekasmin tantau samavetatvāt tantusaṃyogaḥ	ekasmin tantO samaveta tvAt tantu saMyogaH
   paṭasyāsamavāyikāraṇamityarthaḥ/ 'kāraṇena' ityetat udāharati  	pawasya asamavAyi kAraNam iti arTaH/ akAraNena a iti etat udAharati  
   tanturūpamiti/ kāraṇena paṭena saha ekasmin tantau samavetatvāt	tantu rUpam iti/ kAraNena pawena saha ekasmin tantO samaveta tvAt 
   tanturūpaṃ paṭarūpasyāsamavāyikāraṇamityarthaḥ/ nimittakāraṇaṃ lakṣayati	tantu rUpam pawa rUpasya asamavAyi kAraNam iti arTaH/ nimitta kAraNam lakzayati
     tadubhayeti/ samavāyyasamavāyibhinnakāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇamityarthaḥ/	 tat uBaya iti/ samavAyi asamavAyi Binna kAraNam nimitta kAraNam iti arTaH/
   kāraṇalakṣaṇamupasaṃharati   tadetaditi/	kAraNa lakzaNam upasaMharati  tat etat iti/
   prākāśikā	prAkASikA
   yasmin	yasmin
   samavetamityartha iti/ yaddharmāvacchinnaṃ yaddharmāvacchinne	samavetam iti arTaH iti/ yat Darma avacCinnam yat Darma avacCinne
   samavāyenotpadyate, taddharmāvacchinnaṃ prati taddharmāvacchinnaṃ	samavAyena utpadyate, tad Darma avacCinnam prati tad Darma avacCinnam
   samavāyikāraṇamiti paramārthaḥ/ kāraṇena paṭeneti/	samavAyi kAraNam iti parama arTaH/ kAraNena pawena iti/
   svakārya samavāyikāraṇena paṭena ityarthaḥ/ svaṃ tanturūpam/	sva kArya  samavAyi kAraNena pawena iti arTaH/ svam tantu rUpam/
   paṭādikaṃ prati turītantusaṃyogādīnāṃ asamavāyikāraṇatvavāraṇāya	pawa Adikam prati turI tantu saMyoga AdInAm asamavAyikAraNa tva vAraNAya
   tattadasamavāyikāraṇalakṣaṇe tattadbhinnatvaṃ deyamiti dik/	tad tad asamavAyi kAraNa lakzaNe tad tad Binna tvam deyam iti dik/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   yaddharmāvacchinnamiti/ samavāyasambandhāvacchinnaghaṭatvāvacchinna  	yat Darma avacCinna miti/ samavAya sambanDa avacCinna Gawa tva avacCinnaH  
   kāryatānirūpita tādātmyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatvaṃ	kArya tA nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tvam
   ghaṭasamavāyikāraṇasya lakṣaṇam/ samavāyena kāryasāmānyaṃ prati	Gawa samavAyi kAraNasya lakzaNam/ samavAyena kArya sAmAnyam prati
   tādātmyena dravyaṃ kāraṇamiti sāmānyakāryakāraṇabhāvo 'prāmāṇika	tAdAtmyena dravyam kAraNam iti sAmAnya kArya kAraNa BAvaH aprAmANika
   ityabhipretyaivamuktam/ tādṛśakāryaṅkāraṇabhāvasya prāmāṇikatve tu	iti aBipretya evam uktam/ tAdRSa kArI aFkAraNa BAvasya prAmANika tve tu
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnakāryatānirūpita tādātmyasambandhāvacchinna kāraṇatvamamiti	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita  tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tvamam iti
   sāmānyalakṣaṇamapi bhavitumarhati/ kāryatāyāṃ	sAmAnya lakzaNam api Bavitum arhati/ kArya tAyAm
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe viṣayatāsambandhena ghaṭapratyakṣaṃ	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe vizaya tA sambanDena Gawa pratyakzam
   prati	prati
   tādātmyasambandhena ghaṭasyanimittakāraṇatayā	tAdAtmya sambanDena Gawasya nimitta kAraNa tayA
   viṣayatāsambandhāvacchinna 	vizaya tA sambanDa avacCinna 
   ghaṭapratyakṣaniṣṭhakāryantānirūpita tādātmyasambandhāvacchinna kāraṇatāvati	Gawa pratyakza nizWa kArI antA nirUpita tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAvati
   ghaṭe ativyāptiḥ ataḥ tanniveśaḥ/ kāraṇatāyāṃ	Gawe ativyAptiH atas tad niveSaH/ kAraNa tAyAm
   tādātmyasambandhāvacchiṃnnatvāniveśe samavāyasambandhena ghaṭaṃ prati	tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCiMnna tva aniveSe samavAya sambanDena Gawam prati
   kapālasaṃyogasya samavāyasambandhena kāraṇatayā	kapAla saMyogasya samavAya sambanDena kAraNa tayA
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinna ghaṭaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatāvati	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna  Gawa nizWa kArya tA nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAvati
   ghaṭāsamavāyikāraṇe kapāladvayasaṃyoge ativyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	Gawa asamavAyi kAraNe kapAla dvaya saMyoge ati vyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya
   tanniveśaḥ/ evaṃ samavāyasambandhāvacchinna  	tad niveSaH/ evam samavAya sambanDa avacCinnaH  
   kāryatānirūpita samavāya svasamavāyisamavetatvānyatarasambandhavacchinnakāraṇatvaṃ	kArya tA nirUpita  samavAya  sva samavAyi samaveta tva anyatara sambanDa vacCinna kAraNa tvam
   asamavāyikāraṇatvam/ tatra kāryatāyāṃ	asamavAyi kAraNa tvam/ tatra kArya tAyAm
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe viṣayatāsambandhāvacchinna  	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe vizaya tA sambanDa avacCinnaH  
   ghaṭapratyakṣaniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitāsamavāyasambandhāvacchinna  	Gawa pratyakza nizWa kArya tA nirUpitA samavAya sambanDa avacCinnaH  
   nimittakāraṇatāvati ghaṭarūpe ativyāptiḥ/ kāraṇatāyāṃ	nimitta kAraNa tAvati Gawa rUpe ati vyAptiH/ kAraNa tAyAm
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe
   tādātmyasambandhāvacchinnakāraṇatāvati samavāyikāraṇe 'tivyāptiḥ/	tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna kAraNa tAvati samavAyi kAraNe ati vyAptiH/
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnatvamātrasya kāraṇatāyāṃ niveśe paṭarūpaṃ	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna tva mAtrasya kAraNa tAyAm niveSe pawa rUpam
   pratyasamavāyikāraṇe tanturūpe 'vyāptiḥ/ samavāyena paṭarūpaṃ prati	pratyasamavAyi kAraNe tantu rUpe avyAptiH/ samavAyena pawa rUpam prati
   tanturūpasya samavāyena akāraṇatvāt/ ataḥ	tantu rUpasya samavAyena akAraNa tvAt/ atas 
   svasamavāyisamavetatvasambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/ tāvanmātraniveśe	sva samavAyi samaveta tva sambanDa avacCinna tva niveSaH/ tAvat mAtra niveSe
   paṭaṃ prati asamavāyikāraṇe tantusaṃyoge 'vyāptiḥ/ ataḥ	pawam prati asamavAyi kAraNe tantu saMyoge avyAptiH/ atas 
   anyatarasambandhaniveśaḥ/ adhikamanyatra/	anyatara sambanDa niveSaH/ aDikam anyatra/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   pratyakṣalakṣaṇam	pratyakza lakzaNam
   AnTs_42 tatra pratyakṣajñānakaraṇaṃ pratyakṣam /	AnTH _42 tatra pratyakza jQAna karaNam pratyakzam /
   indriyārthasannikarṣajanyaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam /tad dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ	indriya arTa sannikarza janyam jQAnam pratyakzam /tat dviviDam nirvikalpakam
   savikalpakaṃ ceti / tatra nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ yathedaṃ	sa vikalpakam ca iti / tatra nirvikalpakam jQAnam nirvikalpakam yaTA idam
   kiṃcit / saparakārakaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ yathā ḍittho'yam brahmaṇo'yaṃ	kiMcid / sa para kArakam jQAnam sa vikalpakam yaTA xitTaH ayam brahmaNaH ayam
   śyāmo'yam iti //	SyAmaH ayam iti //
   tatra	tatra
   pratyakṣajñānakaraṇaṃ pratyakṣam/ indriyārthasannikarṣajanyaṃ jñānaṃ	pratyakza jQAna karaNam pratyakzam/ indriya arTa sannikarza janyam jQAnam
   pratyakṣam/	pratyakzam/
   tadvibhāga	tad viBAga
   taddvividham  	tat dviviDam  
   nirvakalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ceti/ niṣprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ nirvikalpakam/	nirvakalpakam sa vikalpakam ceti/ nizprakArakam jQAnam nirvikalpa kam/
   saprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakam/ yathā 'ḍitthaḥ ayam', 'brāhmaṇaḥ ayam',	sa prakArakam jQAnam sa vikalpa kam/ yaTA axitTaH ayam a, abrAhmaNaH ayam a,
   'śyāmaḥ ayam', 'pācakaḥ ayam' iti/	aSyAmaH ayam a, apAcakaH ayam a iti/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   pratyakṣapramāṇalakṣaṇamāha   tatreti/ pramāṇacatuṣṭayamadhya	pratyakza pramANa lakzaNam Aha  tatra iti/ pramANa catuzwaya maDya
   ityarthaḥḥ/ pratyakṣajñānasya lakṣaṇamāha   indriyeti/ indriyaṃ	iti arTaHH/ pratyakza jQAnasya lakzaNam Aha  indriya iti/ indriyam
   cakṣurādikam, arthaḥ ghaṭādiḥ, tayossaṃnikarṣaḥ saṃyogādiḥ, tajjanyaṃ	cakzuH Adikam, arTaH Gawa AdiH, tayossaMnikarzaH saMyoga AdiH, tat janyam
   jñānamityarthaḥ/	jQAnam iti arTaH/
   tadvibhajate  	tad viBajate  
   taddvividhamiti/ nirvikalpakasya lakṣaṇamāha   niṣprakārakamiti/	tat dviviDa m iti/ nirvikalpakasya lakzaNam Aha  nizprakArakam iti/
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasambandhānavagāhi jñānamityarthaḥ/ nanu nirvikalpake kiṃ	viSezaNa viSezya sambanDAn avagAhi jQAnam iti arTaH/ nanu nirvikalpake kim
   pramāṇamiti cet   na/ 'gauḥ' iti viśiṣṭajñānaṃ	pramANam iti ced  na/ agOHa iti viSizwa jQAnam
   viśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ, viśiṣṭajñānatvāt daṇḍīti jñānavat	viSezaNa jQAna janyan, viSizwa jQAna tvAt daNxI iti jQAna vat
   ityanumānasya pramāṇatvāt/ viśeṣaṇajñānasyāpi savikalpakatve	iti anumAnasya pramANa tvAt/ viSezaNa jQAnasya api sa vikalpaka tve
   anavasthāprasaṅgāt nirvikalpakasiddhiḥ/ savikalpakaṃ lakṣayati  	anavasTA prasaFgAt nirvikalpaka sidDiH/ sa vikalpakam lakzayati  
   saprakārakamiti/ nāmajātyādiviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasambandhāvagāhi	sa prakArakam iti/ nAma jAti Adi viSezaNa viSezya sambanDa avagAhi
   jñānamityarthaḥ/ savikalpakamudāharati   yatheti/	jQAnam iti arTaH/ sa vikalpakam udAharati  yaTA iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   nanu	nanu
   turīyaviṣayatānirūpakasya nirvikalpakajñānaspa nirūpakatāsambandhena	turIya vizaya tA nirUpakasya nirvikalpaka jQAna spa nirUpa katA sambanDena
   prakāratāśūnyatvamiva viśeṣyatāśūnyatvaṃ saṃsargatāśūnyatvamapi	prakAra tA SUnya tvam iva viSezyatA SUnya tvam saMsarga tA SUnya tvam api
   lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati, vinigamanāvirahāt ityataḥ lakṣaṇatrayaṃ darśayati	lakzaNam Bavati, vinigamanA virahAt iti atas lakzaNa trayam darSayati
    viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyeti/ viśeṣyādividhyā	 viSezaNa viSezya iti/ viSezya Adi viDyA
   viśeṣyādyanavagāhijñānamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca jñānatvaghaṭitaṃ	viSezya AdyanavagAhi jQAnam iti arTaH/ taTA ca jQAna tva Gawitam
   viśeṣyatāśūnyatvam, viśeṣaṇatāśūnyatvaṃ saṃsargatāśūnyatvaṃ ceti	viSezyatA SUnya tvam, viSezaNa tA SUnya tvam saMsarga tA SUnya tvam ca iti
   lakṣaṇatrayaṃ paryavasitamiti bhāvaḥ/	lakzaNa trayam paryavasitam iti BAvaH/
   kecittu   nanu	kecid tu  nanu
   niṣprakārakatvaṃ prakāratāśūnyatvam/ prakāratā ca	nizprakAraka tvam prakAratA SUnya tvam/ prakAra tA ca
   bhāsamānavaiśiṣṭyapratiyogitvam/ saṃsargāvacchinnaviṣayateti yāvat	BAsa mAna vESizwya pratiyogi tvam/ saMsarga avacCinna vizaya tA iti yAvat 
   tathā ca saṃsargānavagāhijñānatvameva saṃsargatāśūnyajñānatvena vā	taTA ca saMsargAn avagAhi jQAna tvam eva saMsarga tA SUnya jQAna tvena vA
   lakṣaṇamāstāṃ lāghavādityataḥ tathaiva	lakzaNam AstAm lAGavAt iti ataH taTA eva
   mūlārthamāha viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyetīnti ityāhuḥ/ taccintyam  	mUla arTamAha  viSezaNa viSezyA itInti  iti AhuH/ tat cintyam  
   siddhānte saṃsargatāyā iva prakāratāyā api	sidDAnte saMsarga tAyAH iva prakAratAyAH api
   vilakṣaṇaviṣayatātmakatvena niṣprakārakatvarūpalakṣaṇe	vilakzaNa vizaya tA Atmaka tvena nizprakAraka tva rUpa lakzaNe
   gauravānavakāśāditi dik/	gOrava anavakASAt iti dik/
   nirvikalpakajñānasya	nirvikalpaka jQAnasya
   atīndriyatayā tatra pratyakṣapramāṇāsambhavāt anumānaṃ pramāṇayati  	atIndriya tayA tatra pratyakza pramANA samBavAt anumAnam pramANayati  
   gauriti/ viśiṣṭajñānatvāditi/ viśiṣṭabuddhiṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānasya	gOriti/ viSizwa jQAna tvAt iti/ viSizwa budDim prati viSezaNa jQAnasya
   kāraṇatvāt nāprayojakatāśaṅketi bhāvaḥ/ anavasthāprasaṅgāditi/	kAraNa tvAt na aprayojaka tA ASaFkA iti BAvaH/ anavasTA prasaFgAt iti/
   savikalpakasya viśiṣṭabuddhitvena viśeṣaṇajñānajanyatvaniyamāditi	sa vikalpakasya viSizwa budDi tvena viSezaNa jQAna janya tva niyamAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ viśeṣaṇaviśeśyasambandhāvagāhīti/ atrāpyuktarītyā lakṣaṇatrayaṃ	BAvaH/ viSezaNa viSeSya sambanDa avagAhIti/ atra api ukta rItyA lakzaNa trayam
   bodhyam/	boDyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   turīyaviṣayatānirūpakasyeti/ prakāratā  	turIya vizaya tA nirUpakasya iti/ prakAra tA  
   viśeṣyatā saṃsargatātrayātiriktacaturthaviṣayatānirūpakasyetyarthaḥ/	viSezyatA saMsarga tA trayA atirikta caturTa vizaya tA nirUpakasya iti arTaH/
   viśeṣyādividhayeti/ viśeṣyatvādiprakāreṇetyarthaḥ/ nirvikalpake	viSezya Adi viDayA iti/ viSezya tva Adi prakAreNa iti arTaH/ nirvikalpake
   ghaṭaḥ ghaṭatvaṃ sambandhaśca bhāsate/ parantu viśeṣyatvaṃ  	GawaH Gawa tvam sambanDaH ca BAsate/ parantu viSezya tvam  
   viśeṣaṇatva saṃsargatvaiḥ ghaṭādikaṃ na bhāsate/ tathā ca mūle	viSezaNa tva  saMsarga tvEH Gawa Adikam na BAsate/ taTA ca mUle
   prakāraśabdaḥ viśeṣyatva viśeṣaṇatva saṃsargatvarūpaprakāraparaḥ/	prakAra SabdaH viSezya tva  viSezaNa tva  saMsarga tva rUpa prakAra paraH/
   niṣprakārakamityasya tādṛśaviśeṣyatvādiprakāraśūnyamityartha iti	nizprakArakam iti asya tAdRSa viSezya tva Adi prakAra SUnyam iti arTaH iti
   bhāvāḥ/ atrāpyuktarītyā lakṣaṇatrayamiti/ prakāratānirūpakatvaṃ	BAvAH/ atra api ukta rItyA lakzaNa traya miti/ prakAratA nirUpaka tvam
   viśeṣyatānirūpakatvaṃ saṃsargatānirūpakatvamiti lakṣaṇatrayamityarthaḥ/	viSezyatA nirUpaka tvam saMsarga tA nirUpaka tvam iti lakzaNa trayam iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   sannikarṣavibhāgaḥ	sannikarza viBAgaH
   AnTs_43 pratyakṣajñānahetur indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ / saṃyogaḥ	AnTH _43 pratyakza jQAna hetuH indriya arTa sannikarzaH zaxviDaH / saMyogaH
   saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samavetasamavāyo	saMyukta samavAyaH saMyukta samaveta samavAyaH samavAyaH samaveta samavAyaH 
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaś ceti / cakṣuṣā ghaṭapratyakṣajanane saṃyogaḥ	viSezaNa viSezya BAvaH ca iti / cakzuzA Gawa pratyakza janane saMyogaH
   sannikarṣaḥ / ghaṭarūpapratyakṣajanane saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ	sannikarzaH / Gawa rUpa pratyakza janane saMyukta samavAyaH sannikarzaH
   cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpasya samavāyāt / rūpatvasāmānyapratyakṣe	cakzuH saMyukte Gawe rUpasya samavAyAt / rUpa tva sAmAnya pratyakze
   saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpaṃ samavetaṃ	saMyukta samaveta samavAyaH sannikarzaH cakzuH saMyukte Gawe rUpam samavetam
   tatra rūpatvasya samavāyāt / śrotreṇa śabdasyākāśaguṇatvāt guṇaguṇinoś ca	tatra rUpa tvasya samavAyAt / SrotreNa Sabdasya AkASa guNa tvAt guNa guNinoH ca
   samavāyāt / śabdatvasākṣātkāre samavetasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ	samavAyAt / Sabda tva sAkzAtkAre samaveta samavAyaH sannikarzaH
   śrotrasamavete śabde śabdatvasya samavāyāt / abhāvaparatyakṣe	Srotra samavete Sabde Sabda tvasya samavAyAt / aBAva paratyakze
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sannikarṣo ghaṭābhāvavad bhṛtalam ity atra	viSezaNa viSezya BAvaH sannikarzaH Gawa aBAva vat BRtalam iti atra
   cakṣuḥsaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya viśeṣaṇatvāt / evaṃ	cakzuH saMyukte BU tale Gawa aBAvasya viSezaNa tvAt / evam
   snnikarṣaṣaṭkajanyaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam / tatkaraṇam indriyam / tasmād	snnikarza zawka janyam jQAnam pratyakzam / tad karaNam indriyam / tasmAt 
   indriyaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇam iti siddham //	indriyam pratyakza pramANam iti sidDam //
   pratyakṣajñānahetuḥ	pratyakza jQAna hetuH
   indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ/ saṃyogaḥ, saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ,	indriya arTa sannikarzaH zaxviDaH/ saMyogaH, saMyukta samavAyaH,
   saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ, samavāyaḥ, samavetasamavāyaḥ,	saMyukta samaveta samavAyaH, samavAyaH, samaveta samavAyaH,
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaśceti/ cakṣuṣā ghaṭapratyakṣajanane saṃyogaḥ	viSezaNa viSezya BAvaH ceti/ cakzuzA Gawa pratyakza janane saMyogaH
   sannikarṣaḥ/ ghaṭarūpapratyakṣe saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ/ cakṣussaṃyukte ghaṭe	sannikarzaH/ Gawa rUpa pratyakze saMyukta samavAyaH/ cakzussaMyukte Gawe
   rūpasya	rUpasya
   samavāyāt/ rūpatvasāmānyapratyakṣe saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ/	samavAyAt/ rUpa tva sAmAnya pratyakze saMyukta samaveta samavAyaH/
   cakṣussaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpaṃ samavetam/ tatra rūpatvasrū samavāyāt/	cakzussaMyukte Gawe rUpam samavetam/ tatra rUpa tvasrU samavAyAt/
   śrotreṇa śabdasākṣātkāre samavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ/ karṇavivaravṛttyākāśasya	SrotreNa Sabda sAkzAtkAre samavAyaH sannikarzaH/ karNa vivara vRtti AkASasya
   kṣotratvāt/ śabdasya ākāśaguṇatvāt/ guṇaguṇinoḥ samavāyāt/	kzotra tvAt/ Sabdasya AkASa guNa tva at/ guNa guNinoH samavAyAt/
   śabdatvasākṣātkāre samavetasamavāyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ/ śrotrasamavete śabde	Sabda tva sAkzAtkAre samaveta samavAyaH sannikarzaH/ Srotra samavete Sabde
   śabdatvasya samavāyāt/ abhāvapratyakṣe viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sannikarṣaḥ/	Sabda tvasya samavAyAt/ aBAva pratyakze viSezaNa viSezya BAvaH sannikarzaH/
   bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāvavat ityatra cakṣussaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya	BU talam Gawa aBAva vat iti atra cakzu ssaMyukte BU tale Gawa aBAvasya
   viśeṣaṇatvāt/	viSezaNa tva at/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   indriyārthaṃsannikarṣaṃ vibhajate  	indriya arTaMsat nikarzam viBajate  
   pratyakṣeti/ saṃyogasannikarṣamudāharati   cakṣuṣeti/ dravyapratyakṣe	pratyakza iti/ saMyoga sannikarzam udAharati  cakzuzA iti/ dravya pratyakze
   sarvatra saṃyogaḥ sannikarṣaḥ/ ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa,	sarvatra saMyogaH sannikarzaH/ AtmA manasA saMyujyate, manaH indriyeNa,
   indriyamarthena tataḥ pratyakṣajñānamutpadyate ityarthaḥ/	indriyam arTena tatas pratyakza jQAnam utpadyate iti arTaH/
   saṃyuktasamavāyamudāharati   ghaṭarūpeti/ tatra yuktimāha   cakṣussaṃyukta	saMyukta samavAyam udAharati  Gawa rUpa iti/ tatra yuktim Aha  cakzu ssaMyukta
   iti/ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyamudāharati  	iti/ saMyukta samavetasam avAyam udAharati  
   rūpatveti/	rUpa tva iti/
   samavāyamudāharati   śrotreṇeti/ tadupapādayati   karṇeti/ nana	samavAyam udAharati  SrotreNa iti/ tat upapAdayati  karNa iti/ nana
   dūrasthaśabdasya kathaṃ śrotrasambandha iti cet   na/	dUra sTa Sabdasya kaTam Srotra sambanDaH iti ced  na/
   vīcītaraṅgnyāyena kadambamukulanyāyena vā śabdāt	vIcI taraFgnyAyena kadamba mukula nyAyena vA SabdAt 
   śabdāntarotpattikrameṇa śrotradeśe jātasya śrotreṇa sambandhāt	Sabda antara utpatti krameNa Srotra deSe jAtasya SrotreNa sambanDAt

   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mana	mana
   indriyeṇeti/ saṃyujyate ityanenānvayaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/	indriyeNa iti/ saMyujyate iti anena anvayaH/ evam agre api/
   ātmapratyakṣasaṅgrahastu ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, tataḥ pratyakṣajñānaṃ	Atma pratyakza saFgrahaH tu AtmA manasA saMyujyate, tatas pratyakza jQAnam
   utpadyate iti yojanāntareṇa/ kathaṃ śrotrasambandha iti/ na ca	utpadyate iti yojana antareNa/ kaTam Srotra sambanDaH iti/ na ca
   śrotrasya nabhorūpatvena tatsamavāyaḥ dūrasthaśabde 'pyakṣata iti	Srotrasya naBaH rUpa tvena tad samavAyaH dUra sTa Sabde api akzataH iti
   śaṅkyam/ atiprasaṅgabhaṅgāya	SaFkyam/ atiprasaFga BaFgAya
   karṇavivarāvacchinnanabho 'nuyogikatvaviśiṣṭasamavāyasyaiva	karNa vivara avacCinna naBaH anuyogika tva viSizwa samavAyasya eva
   pratyakṣahetutvāṅgīkāreṇa tādṛśasambandhasya dūrasthaśabde 'bhāvāditi	pratyakza hetutva aFgIkAreNa tAdRSa sambanDasya dUra sTa Sabde aBAvAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ prathamataḥ bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena nabhasi śabda utpadyate, tena	BAvaH/ praTamatas BerI daNxa saMyogena naBasi SabdaH utpadyate, tena
   śabdāḥ,	SabdAH,
   taiśca punaḥ śabdāḥ ityevaṃ krameṇa nikhiladigavacchedena	tEH ca punar SabdAH iti evam krameNa niKila diS ava= Cedena
   śabdotpatteraṅgīkaraṇīyatayā tadaṃśe 'pi sāmyanirvāhāya āha  	Sabda utpatteH aFgIkaraNIya tayA tad aMSe api sAmya nirvAhAya Aha  
   kadamveti/ draṣṭavyamiti/	kadamva iti/ drazwavyam iti/
   atredamavadheyam  	atra idam avaDeyam  
   viśeṣaṇatānāṃ saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatāvādirūpeṇa bahuvidhatve 'pi	viSezaNatAnAm saMyukta viSezaNa tAva Adi rUpeNa bahuviDa tve api
   viśeṣaṇatātvenaiva parigaṇanāt ca ṣaḍvidhatvahāniḥ/ na caivaṃ	viSezaNa tA tvena eva parigaNanAt ca zaxviDa tva hAniH/ na ca evam
   samavāyatvenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyādīnāmanugamaḥ kuto na kṛta iti	samavAya tvena eva saMyukta samavAya AdInAm anugamaH kutas na kRtaH iti
   vācyam; svatantrecchasyetyādinyāyānusāreṇa adoṣāditi/	vAcyam; svatantra icCasya ityAdi nyAya anusAreNa adozAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   evamagre 'pīti/	evam agre api iti/
   'indriyamarthena' ityasyāpi 'saṃyujyata' ityanenānvaya iti	aindriyam arTena a iti asya api asaMyujyata a iti anena anvayaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ atiprasaṅgabhaṅgāteti/ sarveṣāmapi śabdānāṃ	BAvaH/ ati prasaFga BaFgA teti/ sarvezAm api SabdAnAm
   pratyakṣaprasaṅgavāraṇāyetyarthaḥ/ tathā ādyavīcī samīpadeśe	pratyakza prasaFga vAraNAya iti arTaH/ taTA Adya vIcI samIpa deSe
   taraṅgāntaraṃ janayati tattaraṅgaḥ samīpadeśe taraṅgāntaraṃ	taraFga antaram janayati tad taraFgaH samIpa deSe taraFga antaram
   janayati, evaṃ bheryādyasamavāyikāraṇakādyaśabdo 'pi	janayati, evam BerI Adi asamavAyi kAraNaka AdyaSabdaH api
   samīpadeśāvacchedena śabdāntaraṃ janayati, so 'pi śabdaḥ	samIpa deSa avacCedena Sabda antaram janayati, saH api SabdaH
   svasannihitadeśāvacchedena śabdāntaraṃ janayatīti rītyā	sva sat nihita deSa avacCedena Sabda antaram janayati iti rItyA
   karṇavivarāvacchedena utpannaśabdo gṛhyate iti vīcītaraṅganyāyena	karNa vivara avacCedena utpanna SabdaH gRhyate iti vIcI taraFga nyAyena
   śabdotpattikramaḥ/ yathā prathamataḥ utpannaṃ kadambamukulaṃ	Sabda utpatti kramaH/ yaTA praTamatas utpannam kadamba mukulam
   sarvadigavacchedena evadaivānekamukulāni janayati eva	sarva diS avacCedena eva dA eva aneka mukulAni janayati eva
   bheyādyākāśasaṃyāgāsamavāyikāraṇakādyaśabdo 'pi	Beya Adi AkASa saMyAga asamavAyi kAraNaka Adi aSabdaH api
   sarvadigavacchedena adhikaśabdān janayatīti/ paraṃ tu yaddigabhimukho	sarva diS avacCedena aDika SabdAn janayati iti/ param tu yat diS aBimuKaH 
   vāyuḥ taddigavacchedena adhikaśabdān janayatīti kadambamukulanyāyena	vAyuH tad diS ava= Cedena aDika SabdAn janayati iti kadamba mukula nyAyena
   śabdotpattikrama iti nṛsiṃhaprakāśikākārāḥ prāhuḥ/	Sabda utpatti kramaH iti nRsiMha prakASika AkArAH prAhuH/
   atredamavadheyamityādi/	atra idam avaDeyam ityAdi/
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nāma naikaḥ sannikarṣaḥ/ api tu viśeṣaṇatvaṃ	viSezaNa viSezya BAvaH nAma na ekaH sannikarzaH/ api tu viSezaNa tvam
   viśeṣyatvaṃ ceti sambandhadvayam/ tatrābhāvaviśeṣaṇakapratyakṣe	viSezya tvam ca iti sambanDa dvayam/ tatra aBAva viSezaNaka pratyakze
   viśeṣaṇatvaṃ saṃnikarṣaḥ/ abhāvaviśeṣyakapratyakṣe viśeṣyatvaṃ	viSezaNa tvam saMnikarzaH/ aBAva viSezyaka pratyakze viSezya tvam

   viśeśyatvamapi saṃyuktaviśeṣyatvam, saṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣyatvam,	viSeSya tvam api saMyukta viSezya tvam, saMyukta samaveta viSezya tvam,
   saṃyuktasamavetasamavetaviśeṣyatvame, samavetaviśeṣyatvam,	saMyukta samaveta samaveta viSezya tvam e, samaveta viSezya tvam,

   teṣāṃ krameṇa	tezAm krameNa
   udāharaṇāni   1bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāvavat, 2toyasparśaḥ uṣṇatvābhāvavān,	udAharaNAni  1BU talam Gawa aBAvavat, 2toya sparSaH uzNa tva aBAvavAn ,

   4vīṇāśabdaḥ	4vINA SabdaH

   7toyasparśe uṣṇatvābhāvaḥ, 8nīlatve śuklatvābhāvaḥ, 9vīṇāśabde	7toya sparSe uzNa tva aBAvaH, 8nIla tve Sukla tva aBAvaH, 9vINA Sabde

   viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvasya bahuvidhatve ṣoḍhā sannikarṣa iti kathamiti	viSezya viSezaNa BAvasya bahuviDa tve zoXA sannikarzaH iti kaTam iti
   vācyam/ viśeṣaṇatātvena pañcavidhaviśeṣaṇatānāṃ viśeṣyatātvena	vAcyam/ viSezaNa tA tvena paQcaviDa viSezaNatAnAm viSezyatA tvena
   pañcavidhaviśeṣyatānāmanugamaṃ kṛtvā	paQcaviDa viSezyatAnAm anugamam kRtvA
   viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣyatānyataratvena daśānāmapi parigaṇanāt	viSezaNa tA viSezyatA anyatara tvena daSAnAm api parigaNanAt 
   ṣaḍvidhatvasyāhāneḥ/ na ca samavāyarūpāṇāṃ saṃyuktasamavāya  	zaxviDa tvasya ahAneH/ na ca samavAya rUpANAm saMyukta samavAya

   samavāyatvena ekavargīkaraṇaṃ vidhāya saṃyogaḥ, samavāyaḥ,	samavAya tvena eka vargIkaraNam viDAya saMyogaH, samavAyaH,
   viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvaśceti tridhaiva sannikarṣaḥ kuto na vyabhātīte	viSezya viSezaNa BAvaH ca iti triDA eva sannikarzaH kutas na vyaBAtIte
   vācyam/ svatantrecchena muninā kṛte ṣoḍhā vibhāge	vAcyam/ svatantra icCena muninA kRte zoXA viBAge
   niyogaparyanuyogayoḥ kartumaśakyatvāt/ niyogaḥ ājñā,	niyoga paryanuyogayoH kartum aSakyatvAt/ niyogaH AjQA,
   paryanuyogaḥ praśnaḥ/	paryanuyogaH praSnaH/
   1. cakṣussaṃyuktaṃ	1. cakzussaMyuktam
   bhūtalaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ ghaṭābhāvasya/	BU talam tad viSezaNa tvam Gawa aBAvasya/
   2. cakṣussaṃyuktaṃ toyaṃ	2. cakzussaMyuktam toyam
   tatsamavetaḥ sparśaḥ tadviśeṣaṇatvam uṣṇatvābhāvasya/	tad samavetaH sparSaH tad viSezaNa tvam uzNa tva aBAvasya/
   3. cakṣussaṃyukto ghaṭaḥ	3. cakzussaMyuktaH GawaH
   tatsamaveto nīla tatsamavetaṃ nīlatvaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ	tad samavetaH nIla tad samavetam nIla tvam tad viSezaNa tvam

   8. cakṣussaṃyukto ghaṭaḥ	8. cakzussaMyuktaH GawaH
   tatsamaveto nīlaḥ tatsamavetaṃ nīlatvaṃ tannirūpitaviśeṣyatā	tad samavetaH nIlaH tad samavetam nIla tvam tad nirUpita viSezya tA
   śuklatvābhāvasya/	Sukla tva aBAvasya/
   9. śrotrasamaveto	9. Srotra samavetaH

   10. śrotrasamavetaḥ	10. Srotra samavetaH
   śabdaḥ tatsamavetaṃ śabdatvaṃ tannirūpitaviśeṣyatā bhedābhāvasya/	SabdaH tad samavetam Sabda tvam tad nirUpita viSezya tA Beda aBAvasya/
   maṇikārāstu  	maNikArAH tu  
   kevalaviśeṣaṇatā indriyasambaddhaviśeṣaṇatā ceti viśeṣaṇatā	kevala viSezaNa tA indriya sambadDa viSezaNa tA ca iti viSezaNa tA
   dvividhā/ indriyasambaddhaviśeṣaṇatā, pūrvoktarītyā pañcavidhā/	dviviDA/ indriya sambadDa viSezaNa tA, pUrva ukta rItyA paQcaviDA/

   śabdābhāvapratyakṣam   ityabhiprayanti/ 'viśeṣaṇatayā śabdābhāvasya,	Sabda aBAva pratyakzam  iti aBiprayanti/ aviSezaNa tayA Sabda aBAvasya,
   indriyasambaddhaviśeṣaṇatayā samavāyaghaṭābhāvādergrahaḥ' iti	indriya sambadDa viSezaNa tayA samavAya Gawa aBAva AdeH grahaH a iti

   pratyakṣapramāṇam iti siddham//	pratyakza pramANam iti sidDam//

   pratyakṣaparicchedaḥ/	pratyakza paricCedaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   anupalabdheḥ	anupalabDeH
   pramāṇāntaratvanirākaraṇam/	pramANa antara tva nirAkaraNam/
   etena anupalabdheḥ	etena anupalabDeH
   pramāṇāntaratvaṃ nirastam/ yadi atra ghaṭaḥ abhaviṣyat tarhi bhūtalamiva	pramANa antara tvam nirastam/ yadi atra GawaH aBavizyat tarhi BU talam iva
   adrakṣyata, darśanābhāvāt nāstīti	adrakzyata, darSana aBAvAt na asti iti
   tarkitapratiyogisattvavirodhyanupalabdhisahakṛtendriyeṇaiva	tarkita pratiyogi sattva viroDi anupalabDi saha kRta indriyeNa eva
   abhāvajñānopapattau anupalabdhaiḥ pramāṇāntaratvāsambhavāt/	aBAva jQAna upapattO anupalabDEH pramANa antara tva asamBavAt/
   adhikaraṇajñānārthamapekṣaṇīyendriyasyaiva karaṇatvopapattau anupalabdheḥ	aDikaraNa jQAna arTam apekzaNIya indriyasya eva karaNa tva upapattO anupalabDeH

   tādṛśabuddhau parāmarśasya viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakārakanirṇayatvenaiva	tAdRSa budDO parAmarSasya viSezaNa tAvacCedaka prakAraka nirNaya tvena eva
   hetutvena uktaparāmarśatvena hetutvābhāvāt/ tathāpi	hetu tvena ukta parAmarSa tvena hetu tva aBAvAt/ taTA api
   saṃśayottarapratyakṣe vyāpyapakṣavaiśiṣṭhyāvagāhijñānatvena	saMSaya uttara pratyakze vyApya pakza vESizWyA avagAhi jQAna tvena
   vyāpyadarśanajanyatvasattvāt ativyāpteḥ	vyApya darSana janya tva sattvAt ati vyApteH
   pakṣatāsahakṛtaparāmarśajanyatvavivakṣaṇanaiva bāraṇīyatā tenaiva	pakzatA saha kRta parAmarSa janya tva vivakzaNana eva bAraNIyatA tena eva
   viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhipratyakṣavāraṇasambhavāt	viSizwa vESizwyA avagAhi pratyakza vAraNa samBavAt
   uktaparāmarśatvāvacchinnajanakatā na niveśyeti bhāvaḥ/	ukta parAmarSa tvA avacCinna janakatA na niveSya iti BAvaH/
   dāhakāraṇatvavat	dAha kAraNa tva vat
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭasiddhyabhāvasyāpyanumitikāraṇatvam/	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa sidDi aBAvasya api anumiti kAraNa tvam/
   yadyapi sādhyasaṃśayasya	yadi api sADya saMSayasya
   pakṣatātve 'pi sādhyaniścayakāle anumitivāraṇaṃ sambhavati, tathāpi	pakzatAtve api sADya niScaya kAle anumiti vAraNam samBavati, taTA api
   ghanagarjitena meghānumitau vyabhicāraḥ/ ataḥ anyādṛśīṃ pakṣatāmāha  	Gana garjitena meGa anumitO vyaBicAraH/ atas anyAdRSIm pakzatAm Aha  
   siṣādhayiṣeti/ rsiṣādhayiṣāyāḥ sādhyānumitīcchāyāḥ samavāyena yaḥ	sizA DayizA iti/ rsizA DayizAyAH sADya anumiti icCAyAH samavAyena yaH
   abhāvaḥ svarūpasamavāyobhavaghaṭitasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	aBAvaH svarUpa samavAyaH Bava Gawita sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   tadviśiṣṭāyāḥ siddheḥ samavāyena abhāva ityarthaḥ/ sādhyasiddhiḥ  	tad viSizwAyAH sidDeH samavAyena aBAvaH iti arTaH/ sADya sidDiH  
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭe	pakza tA avacCedaka viSizwe
   sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭasādhyavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhiniścayaḥ/ siddhau	sADya tAvacCedaka viSizwa sADya vESizwya avagAhi niScayaH/ sidDO
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahavaiśiṣṭyaniveśanasya	sizA DayizA viraha vESizwya niveSanasya
   prayojanaṃ darśayati  	prayojanam darSayati  
   siddhisattve 'pīti/ atra siddhiśca 'parvato vahnimān	sidDi sattve api iti/ atra sidDiH ca aparvataH vahnimAn

   parāmarśasampattiriti dhyeyam/	parAmarSa sampattiH iti Dyeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   'sādhyasaṃśayaḥ	asADya saMSayaH
   pakṣatā' iti prācīnoktyupekṣāyāḥ bījamāha   yadyapītyādinā/	pakzatA a iti prAcInokti upekzAyAH bIjam Aha  yadi api iti AdinA/
   sādhyaniścayarūpasiddhikāle 'numitivāraṇaṃ hi pakṣatāyāḥ	sADya niScaya rUpa sidDi kAle anumiti vAraNam hi pakzatAyAH
   anumitihetutvāṅgīkārasya uddeśyam/ tattu sādhyasaṃśayasya	anumiti hetutva aFgIkArasya uddeSyam/ tat tu sADya saMSayasya
   pakṣatātve 'pi nirvahati/ sādhyaniścayakāle sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāyāḥ	pakzatA tve api nirvahati/ sADya niScaya kAle sADya saMSaya rUpa pakza tAyAH
   abhāvādeva nānumitiḥ ityevaṃrītyā anumitivāraṇasambhavāt tathā	aBAvAt eva na anumitiH iti evaMrItyE anumiti vAraNa samBavAt taTA
   ca sādhyasaṃśaya eva pakṣatā astu iti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ/ tathāpīti/	ca sADya saMSayaH eva pakzatA astu iti SaFkituH BAvaH/ taTA api iti/
   sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāyāḥ nānumitihetutvam/ vināpi sādhyasaṃśayaṃ	sADya saMSaya rUpa pakzatAyAH na anumiti hetu tvam/ vinA api sADya saMSayam
   ghanagarjanaśravaṇena 1meghānumitteḥ vyatirekavyabhicārāditi	Gana garjana SravaNena 1meGa anumitteH vyatireka vyaBicArAt iti
   samādhāturāśayaḥ/ vyabhicāra iti/ kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryotpattirūpo	samADAtuH ASayaH/ vyaBicAraH iti/ kAraNa aBAve api kArya utpatti rUpaH 
   vyatirekavyabhicāro 'tra	vyatireka vyaBicAraH atra
   vivakṣitaḥ/	vivakzitaH/
   anyādṛśīmiti/ sādhyasaṃśayādanyavidhāmityarthaḥ/	anyAdRSImiti/ sADya saMSayAt anyaviDAm iti arTaH/
   1. ayaṃ pradeśaḥ	1. ayam pradeSaH
   meghavān dhanagarjajavattvādityanumānamatra vivakṣitam/	meGavAn Dana garja javat tvAt iti anumAnam atra vivakzitam/
   dīpikāyām	dIpikAyAm
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭetyādi/ yatra sādhyaniścayarūpā siddhirasti	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa ityAdi/ yatra sADya niScaya rUpA sidDiH asti
   tatrāpi yadi 'pakṣe sādhyaṃ anuminuyām' ityākārā siṣādhayiṣā	tatra api yadi apakze sADyam anuminuyAm a iti AkArA sizA DayizA

   siddhereva	sidDeH eva
   tatra sattvāt/ atastatra	tatra sattva at/ atas tatra
   pakṣatāsampattaye siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭeti siddherviśeṣaṇaṃ dattam/	pakzatA sampattaye sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa iti sidDeH viSezaNam dattam/
   uktasthale siṣādhayiṣāyāḥ sattvena	ukta sTale sizA DayizAyAH sattvena

   evaṃ ca siṣādhayiṣā uttejiketi phalitam/ uttejakatvaṃ ca	evam ca sizA DayizA uttejikA iti Palitam/ uttejaka tvam ca

   siṣādhayiṣā cāsti tatra siṣādhayiṣāyāḥ saṃyogasambandhenābhāvāt	sizA DayizA ca asti tatra sizADayizAyAH saMyoga sambanDena aBAvAt

   sattvena tadabhāvarūpapakṣatā na syāt/ tanniveśe ca tatra	sattvena tad aBAva rUpa pakza tAH na syAt/ tad niveSe ca tatra

   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ niveśanīyam/ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca svādhikaraṇavṛttitvam/	vESizwyam niveSanIyam/ sAmAnADikaraNyam ca sva aDikaraNa vRtti tvam/

   samavāyasambandhena/ tathā ca	samavAya sambanDena/ taTA ca

   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭā yā siddhiḥ tadabhāvaḥ pakṣatā/ svaṃ  	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwA yA sidDiH tad aBAvaH pakzatA/ svam

   evaṃ siddhyabhāvaḥ siddhiniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpako 'bhāvaḥ/ tatra	evam sidDi aBAvaH sidDi nizWa pratiyogitAnirUpakaH aBAvaH/ tatra

   niveśanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/ siṃddheḥ samavāyenābhāva iti/	niveSanIyam iti BAvaH/ siMdDeH samavAyena aBAvaH iti/

   ityarthaḥ/ dravyatvena parvatāvagāhi 'dravyaṃ vahnimat'	iti arTaH/ dravya tvena parvata avagAhi adravyam vahnimat a
   ityākārakaniścayadaśāyāṃ 'parvato vahnimān'	iti AkAraka niScaya daSAyAm aparvataH vahnimAn a
   ityanumityutpatteḥ 'dravyaṃ vahnimat' ityākārakaniścayasya	iti anum iti utpatteH adravyam vahnimata iti AkAraka niScayasya
   'parvato vahnimān' ityanumitipratibandhakatvavāraṇāya	aparvataH vahnimAna iti anumiti pratibanDaka tva vAraNAya
   pakṣaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāyāṃ	pakza nizWa viSezya tAyAm
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/ evaṃ 'parvato dravyavān'	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna tva niveSaH/ evam aparvataH dravyavAn a
   ityākārakaniścayasya tādṛśānumitipratibandhakatvavāraṇāya	iti AkAraka niScayasya tAdRSa anumiti pratibanDaka tva vAraNAya

   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvamapi niveśanīyam/ anyathā 'parvataḥ	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam api niveSanIyam/ anyaTA aparvataH
   samavāyena vahnimān' iti niścayasyāpi 'parvataḥ saṃyogena	samavAyena vahnimAna iti niScayasya api aparvataH saMyogena
   vahnimān'	vahnimAn a
   ityanumitipratibandhakatvāpatteḥ/	iti anumiti pratibanDaka tva ApatteH/
   nanu siddhikāle yadi	nanu sidDi kAle yadi
   siṣādhayiṣā vartate tadānīmapi anumiteḥ upapādanārthaṃ hi siddhau	sizA DayizA vartate tadAnIm api anumiteH upapAdana arTam hi sidDO
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭeti viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam/ tacca tadaiva	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa iti viSezaNam dattam/ tat ca tadA eva
   sārthakaṃ bhavati yadi siddhi siṣādhayiṣā parāmarśānāmekakāle	sArTakam Bavati yadi sidDi sizA DayizA  parAmarSAnAm eka kAle
   samavadhānaṃ syāt/	samavaDAnam syAt /
   tacca durghaṭam/ tathā hi  yatra prathamaṃ siddhiḥ anantaraṃ siṣādhayiṣā,	tat ca durGawam/ taTA hi yatra praTamam sidDiH anantaram sizA DayizA,
   tataḥ parāmarśaḥ, tataḥ anumitiḥ, tatra parāmarśakṣaṇe siddhernāśādeva	tatas parAmarSaH, tatas anumitiH, tatra parAmarSakzaNe sidDeH nASAt eva
   pratibandhakābhāvāt anumityupapatteḥ vyarthaṃ	pratibanDaka aBAvAt anumiti upapatteH vyarTam
   siṣāṣayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭatvaviśeṣaṇam/ yatra krameṇa	sizAzayiza aviraha viSizwa tva viSezaNam/ yatra krameNa
   siṣādhayiṣā siddhi parāmarśāḥ tatra parāmarśakṣaṇe siṣādhayiṣāyāḥ	sizA DayizA  sidDi parAmarSAH tatra parAmarSakzaNe sizADayizAyAH
   nāśāt siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭasiddhereva sattvāt	nASAt sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa sidDeH eva sattvAt 
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭatvaniveśe 'pi pakṣatā na nirvahati/ yatra tu	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa tva niveSe api pakzatA na nirvahati/ yatra tu
   parāmarśaṃsiddhisiṣādhayiṣāḥ krameṇa bhavanti tatra siṣādhayiṣākṣaṇe	parAmarSaMsidDi sizA DayizAH krameNa Bavanti tatra sizA Dayiza akzaNe
   parāmarśanāśāt parāmarśarūpakāraṇavaikalyāt nānumitiḥ/	parAmarSa nASAt parAmarSa rUpa kAraNa vEkalyAt na anumitiH/
   jñānayorvā jñānecchayorvā ekakṣaṇotpattikatvaṃ tu nāṅgīkriyate/	jQAnayoH vA jQAna icCayoH vA eka kzaNa utpattika tvam tu na aFgIkriyate/
   tathā ca kathaṃ siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭatvasya	taTA ca kaTam sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa tvasya
   sārthakatvamityāśaṅkyāha   atra siddhiścetyādinā/ pakṣatāghaṭakībhūtā	sArTaka tvam iti ASaFkya Aha  atra sidDiH ca ityAdinA/ pakzatA GawakIBUtA
   siddhiśca vahnivahnivyāpyadhūmobhayāvagāhinī samūhālambanarūpā	sidDiH ca vahni vahni vyApya DUma uBayA avagAhinI samUha Alambana rUpA
   'parvato vahnimān vahnivyāpyadhūmavāṃśca' ityākārikā	aparvataH vahnimAn vahni vyApya DUmavAn= ca a iti AkArikA
   vivakṣitā/ ayameva sādhyaniścayarūpatvāt sādhyavyāpyaniścayarūpatvācca	vivakzitA/ ayam eva sADya niScaya rUpa tvAt sADya vyApya niScaya rUpa tvAt ca
   siddhyātmakaparāmarśa iti vyavahriyate/ tathā ca yatra ādau uktākāraḥ	sidDi Atmaka parAmarSaH iti vyavahriyate/ taTA ca yatra AdO ukta AkAraH
   siddhyātmakaparāmarśaḥ tataḥ siṣādhayiṣā tato 'numitiḥ tatra	sidDi Atmaka parAmarSaH tatas sizA DayizA tatas anumitiH tatra
   dvitīyakṣaṇe siddheḥ sattvāt siddhyabhāvamātrasya pakṣatātve pakṣatā na	dvitIya kzaNe sidDeH sattvAt sidDi aBAva mAtrasya pakzatAtve pakzatA na
   nirvahati/ ataḥ siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭatvaṃ siddheḥ viśeṣaṇam/ tatra	nirvahati/ atas sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa tvam sidDeH viSezaNam/ tatra
   tu siṣādhayiṣāsattvena siṣādhayiṣāviraharūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt	tu sizA DayizA sattvena sizA DayizA viraha rUpa viSezaNa aBAvAt
   viśiṣṭābhāvarūpā pakṣatā nirvahatītyevaṃ tadviśeṣaṇasya	viSizwa aBAva rUpA pakzatA nirvahati iti evam tad viSezaNasya
   sārthakyamupapādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/ ataḥ parāmarśasampattiriti/	sArTakyam upapAdanIyam iti BAvaH/ atas parAmarSa sampattiH iti/
   anumityavyavahitapūrvakṣaṇe siddhisiṣādhayiṣāparāmarśānāṃ	anumiti avyavahita pUrvakzaNe sidDi sizA DayizA aparAmarSAnAm
   melanamityarthaḥ/	melanam iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   parāmarśalakṣaṇam	parAmarSa lakzaNam
   vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānaṃ parāmarśaḥ/ yathā	vyApti viSizwa pakza Darma tA jQAnam parAmarSaH/ yaTA
   'vahnivyāpyadhūmavān ayaṃ parvataḥ' iti jñānaṃ parāmarśaḥ/ tajjanyaṃ	avahni vyApya DUmavAn ayam parvataH a iti jQAnam parAmarSaH/ tat janyam
   'parvato vahnimān' iti jñānamanumitiḥ/	aparvataH vahnimAna iti jQAnam anumitiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   parāmarśaṃ lakṣayati  	parAmarSam lakzayati  
   vyāptīti/ vyāptiviṣayakaṃ yat pakṣadharmatājñānaṃ sa parāmarśa	vyApti iti/ vyApti vizayakam yat pakza Darma tA jQAnam sa parAmarSa
   ityarthaḥ/ parāmarśamabhinīya darśayati   yatheti/ anumitimabhinīya	iti arTaH/ parAmarSam aBinIya darSayati  yaTA iti/ anumitim aBinIya
   darśayati   tajjanyamiti/ parāmarśajanyamityarthaḥ/	darSayati  tat janyam iti/ parAmarSa janyam iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   'vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānam' ityatra vyāptiviśiṣṭe	avyApti viSizwa pakza Darma tA jQAnam a iti atra vyApti viSizwe
   pakṣadharmatā vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatā tajjñānamiti	pakza Darma tA vyApti viSizwa pakza Darma tA tat jQAnam iti
   saptamītatpuruṣāṅgīkāre vyabhicāriliṅgakānumitau	saptamI tatpuruza aFgIkAre vyaBicAri liFgaka anumitO
   vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānajanyatvābhāvena avyāptiḥ; ataḥ	vyApti viSizwa pakza Darma tA jQAna janya tva aBAvena avyAptiH; atas 
   vyāptiviśiṣṭapadasya	vyApti viSizwa padasya
   vyāptiviṣayaketyarthamavalambya jñānāntapadena	vyApti vizayaka iti arTam avalambya jQAna antapadena
   karmadhārayamaṅgīkaroti   vyāptiviṣayakamiti/	karmaDArayam aFgIkaroti  vyApti vizayakam iti/
   vyāptyavacchinna prakāratānirūpita  	vyApti avacCinna  prakAra tA nirUpitaH  
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinna viśeṣyatāśāliniścayaḥ parāmarśa iti tu	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna  viSezya tA SAli niScayaH parAmarSaH iti tu
   nirgalitārthaḥ/ abhinīya   abhilāpakaśabdamuccārya/	nirgalita arTaH/ aBinIya  aBilApaka Sabdam uccArya/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānamityatretyādi/ yatra liṅgaṃ	vyApti viSizwa pakza Darma tA jQAnam iti atra ityAdi/ yatra liFgam
   sādhyavyabhicāri bhavati tatrāpi vyāptyaśe bhramātmakāt	sADya vyaBicAri Bavati tatra api vyApti aSe Brama AtmakAt 
   'dhūmavyāpyavahnimānayaṃ parvataḥ' iti parāmarśāt 'parvato	aDUma vyApya vahnimAnayam parvataH a iti parAmarSAt aparvataH 
   dhūmavān' ityanumitiḥ jāyate/ yadi tu vastuto vyāptiviśiṣṭe	DUmavAn a iti anumitiH jAyate/ yadi tu vastutas vyApti viSizwe
   pakṣadharmatvāvagāhi jñānaṃ parāmarśaḥ tajjanyatvaṃ anumiterlakṣaṇamucyeta	pakza Darma tva avagAhi jQAnam parAmarSaH tad janya tvam anumiteH lakzaNam ucyeta
   tarhi uktaparāmarśasya vyāptiviśiṣṭe tadavagāhitvābhāve	tarhi ukta parAmarSasya vyApti viSizwe tad avagAhitva aBAve
   parāmarśatvābhāvāt tajjanyajñānasya anumititvaṃ na syāt/ ataḥ	parAmarSa tva aBAvAt tad janya jQAnasya anumiti tvam na syAt/ atas 
   vyāptiviṣayakaṃ yat pakṣadharmatvāvagāhi jñānaṃ tat parāmarśaḥ/	vyApti vizayakam yat pakza Darma tva avagAhi jQAnam tat parAmarSaH/
   uktabhramātmakajñānasya vyāptiviṣayakatvamakṣatamiti parāmarśarūpatā, ata	ukta Brama Atmaka jQAnasya vyApti vizayaka tvam akzatam iti parAmarSa rUpa tA, atas 
   eva tajjanyajñānasya	eva tad janya jQAnasya
   parāmarśajanyatvarūpānumitilakṣaṇākrāntatayā anumititvamapyupapadyata	parAmarSa janya tva rUpa anumiti lakzaNa AkrAnta tayA anumiti tvam api upapadyata
   iti bhāvaḥ/	iti BAvaH/
   nanu vyāptiviṣayakaṃ	nanu vyApti vizaya kam
   pakṣasambandhāvagāhi ca jñānaṃ parāmarśa iti parāmarśalakṣaṇakathane 'pi	pakza sambanDa avagAhi ca jQAnam parAmarSaH iti parAmarSa lakzaNa kaTane api
   'dhūmo vahnivyāpyaḥ dhūmavāṃśca parvataḥ'	aDUmaH vahni vyApyaH DUmavAn= ca parvataH a
   ityākārakasamūhālambanajñānasyāpi vyāptiviṣayakatvāt	iti AkAraka samUha Alambana jQAnasya api vyApti vizayaka tvAt 
   pakṣasambandhaviṣayakatvācca parāmarśatvāpattirityata āha  	pakza sambanDa vizayaka tvAt ca parAmarSa tvApattiH iti atas Aha  
   vyāptyavacchinneti/ vyāptyavacchinna yā hetuniṣṭhā prakāratā	vyApti avacCinnA iti/ vyApti avacCinna yA hetu nizWA prakAra tA
   tannirūpitā yā pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnā pakṣaniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā	tad nirUpitA yA pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinnA pakza nizWA viSezyatA
   tannirūpako niścayaḥ parāmarśa ityarthaḥ/ bhavati ca	tad nirUpakaH niScayaH parAmarSaH iti arTaH/ Bavati ca
   'vahnivyāpyadhūmavān parvata' iti niścayaḥ tādṛśaḥ/	avahni vyApya DUmavAn parvata a iti niScayaH tAdRSaH/
   parvataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitāyāḥ dhūmaniṣṭhāyāḥ prakāratāyāḥ	parvata nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitAyAH DUma nizWAyAH prakAra tAyAH
   vyāptyavacchinnatvāt/ vyāptyavacchinnatvaṃ ca	vyApti avacCinna tvAt/ vyApti avacCinna tvam ca
   sādhyaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitavyāptiniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitatvam/ tena	sADya nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita vyApti nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita tvam/ tena
   'vyāpyadhūmavān parvataḥ' iti jñāne nātivyāptiḥ/ 'dhūmo	avyApya DUmavAn parvataH a iti jQAne na ati vyAptiH/ aDUmaH 
   vahnivyāpyaḥ dhūmavāṃśca parvataḥ' iti	vahni vyApyaH DUmavAn= ca parvataH a iti
   samūhālambanajñānīyadhūmaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ	samUha Alambana jQAnIya DUma nizWa prakAra tAyAm
   vyāptiniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitatvaṃ nāsti, dhūmāṃśe vyāpteḥ	vyApti nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita tvam nAsti, DUma aMSe vyApteH
   prakāratayā abhānāt/ ato na tatrātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	prakAra tayA aBAnAt/ atas na tatra ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/ taTA ca
   sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasādhyaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitavyāptiniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitahetutāvacchedakāvacchinna 	sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna sADya nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita vyApti nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita hetu tAvacCedaka avacCinna 
   hetuniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitapakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnapakṣaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāśāliniścayaḥ	hetu nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita pakza tAvacCedaka avacCinna pakza nizWa viSezya tA SAli niScayaH
   parāmarśa iti niṣkarṣaḥ/ tena 'dravyavyāpyadhmavān parvataḥ',	parAmarSaH iti nizkarzaH/ tena adravya vyApya DmavAn parvataH a,
   'vahnivyāpyadravyavān parvataḥ' 'vahnivyāpyadhūmavaddravyam'	avahni vyApya dravyavAn parvataH a avahni vyApya DUma vat dravyam a
   ityādiniścayānāṃ 'parvato vahnimān'	ityAdi niScayAnAm aparvataH vahnimAn a
   ityanumitihetubhūtaparāmarśatvaṃ na prasajyata ityavadheyam/	iti anumiti hetu BUta parAmarSa tvam na prasajyate iti avaDeyam/
   nirgalitārtha iti/ niṣkṛṣṭārtha ityarthaḥ/	nirgalita arTaH iti/ nizkRzwa arTaH iti arTaH/
   abhilāpakaśabdamuccāryeti/ ākārapradarśakaśabdamuccāryetyarthaḥ/	aBilApaka Sabdam uccArya iti/ AkAra pradarSaka Sabdam uccArya iti arTaH/
   kāyikaceṣṭārūpasyābhinayasyātrāsambhavāt/	kAyika cezwA rUpasya aBinaya sya atra asamBavAt/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   vyāptilakṣaṇam	vyApti lakzaNam
   yatra dhūmaḥ tatra	yatra DUmaH tatra
   agniḥ iti sāhacaryaniyamaḥ vyāptiḥ/	agniH iti sAhacarya niyamaH vyAptiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   vyāptilakṣaṇamāha  	vyApti lakzaNam Aha  
   yatreti/ yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti vyāpterabhinayaḥ/ sāhacaryaniyamaḥ	yatra iti/ yatra DUmaH tatra agniH iti vyApteH aBinayaH/ sAhacarya niyamaH
   iti lakṣaṇam/ sāhacaryaṃ sāmānādhiṅkaraṇyam, tasya niyamaḥ/	iti lakzaNam/ sAhacaryam sAmAna aDiFkaraNyam, tasya niyamaH/
   hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvāpratiyogisādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ	hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva apratiyogi sADya sAmAnADikaraNyam
   vyāptirityarthaḥ/	vyAptiH iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvādirūpaṃ na	niyata sAmAnADikaraNyam sADya aBAva vat avRtti tva Adi rUpam na
   sambhavati; 'idaṃ vācyam jñeyatvāt' ityādau avyāpteḥ/	samBavati; aidam vAcyam jQeya tvAt a ityAdO avyApteH/
   sādhyābhāvāprasiddherityālocyāha   hetusamānādhikaraṇeti/	sADya aBAva aprasidDeH iti Alocya Aha  hetu samAna aDikaraNa iti/
   'vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādau dhūmasamānādhikaraṇe yo 'tyantābhāvaḥ	avahnimAn DUmAt a ityAdO DUma samAna aDikaraNe yaH atyanta aBAvaH
   ghaṭātyantābhāvaḥ, tadapratiyogī vahniḥ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dhūme	Gawa atyanta aBAvaH, tad apratiyogI vahniH tad sAmAna ADikaraNyam DUme
   astīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ 'dhūmavān vahneḥ' ityādau tu	asti iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/ aDUmavAn vahneH a iti AdO tu
   dhūmasāmānyābhāvasyāpi hetusamānādhikaraṇatayā tatpratiyogyeva	DUma sAmAnya aBAvasya api hetu samAna aDikaraNa tayA tad pratiyogi eva
   dhūma iti nātivyāptiḥ/ na ca 'vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādau	DUmaH iti na ati vyAptiH/ na ca avahnimAn DUmAt a iti AdO
   tattadvahnyabhāvasya cālinīnyāyena dhūmasamānādhikaraṇatayā	tad tad vahni aBAvasya cAlinI nyAyena DUma samAna aDikaraNa tayA
   tādṛśābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ na kasyāpi vahnerityativyāptiriti	tAdRSa aBAva apratiyogi tvam na kasya api vahneH iti ativyAptiH iti
   vācyam, apratiyogisādhyetyasya	vAcyam, apratiyogi sADya iti asya
   pratiyogitānavacchedaka sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnetyarthatātparyaṅkatayādoṣāt/	pratiyogita an avacCedaka sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinnA iti arTa tAtparyaFka tayA dozAt/
   pratiyogitāyāṃ sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/	pratiyogitAyAm sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/
   tena 'vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādau samavāyena	tena avahnimAn DUmAt a ityAdO samavAyena
   vahnitvāvacchinna pratiyogitākābhāvasya dhūmasamānādhikaraṇatve 'pi na	vahni tva avacCinna  pratiyogi tAkA BAvasya DUma samAna aDikaraNa tve api na
   kṣatiḥ/ hetupadaṃ hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnaparam/ ataḥ 'dravyam	kzatiH/ hetu padam hetu tAvacCedaka avacCinna param/ atas adravyam
   viśiṣṭasattvāt' ityādau viśiṣṭasya śuddhānatirekitayā	viSizwa sattvAt a ityAdO viSizwasya SudDa anatirekitayA
   hetvadhikaraṇaguṇādiniṣṭhatve 'pi dravyatvābhāvasya nāvyāptiḥ/	hetu aDikaraNa guNa Adi nizWa tve api dravya tva aBAvasya na avyAptiH/
   hetvadhikaraṇatā	hetu aDikaraNa tA
   hetutāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnā grāhyā/ tena 'vahnimān dhūmāt'	hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinnAH grAhyA/ tena avahnimAn DUmAt a
   ityādau vahnisāmānyābhāvasya dhūmasamavāyiniṣṭhatve 'pi	ityAdO vahni sAmAnya aBAvasya DUma sama vAyi nizWatve api
   nāvyāptiḥ/ na caivamapi 'kapisaṃyogī evadvṛkṣatvāt' ityādau	na avyAptiH/ na ca evam api akapi saMyogI evat vRkza tvAt a iti AdO
   avyāptiḥ, sādhyasya	avyAptiH, sADyasya
   hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakāvacchinnatvāditi	hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCedaka avacCinna tvAt iti
   vācyam/ hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāve pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyasya	vAcyam/ hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAve pratiyogi vEyaDikaraNyasya
   niveśanīyatvāt/ kevalānvayisādhyake tādṛśasya ghaṭābhāvādeḥ	niveSanIya tva at/ kevala anvayi sADyake tAdRSasya Gawa aBAva AdeH
   prasiddhatvāt nāvyāptiriti/ adhikaṃ asmadīya maṇidīdhitivyākhyāyā	prasidDa tvAt na avyAptiH iti/ aDikam asmadIya maNi dIDiti vyAKyAyA
   buddhikuśalairanusandheyam/	budDi kuSalEH anusanDeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   sādhyābhāvāprasiddheriti/ sādhyasya vācyatvasya kevalānvayitvena	sADya aBAva aprasidDeH iti/ sADyasya vAcya tvasya kevala anvayitvena
   sarvatra vidyamānatayā tadabhāvasyāprasiddheḥ	sarvatra vidyamAna tayA tad aBAvasya aprasidDeH
   sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvarūpa1vyāptalakṣaṇasya	sADya aBAva vat avRtti tva rUpa1 vyApta lakzaNasya
   kevalānvayisādhyakasaddhetāvavyāptirityarthaḥ/	kevala anvayi sADyaka sat hetO= avyAptiH iti arTaH/
   ityarthatātparyakatayādoṣāditi/ tathā ca	iti arTa tAtparyaka tayA dozAt iti/ taTA ca
   hetvadhikaraṇavṛttyatyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakasādadhyatāvacchedakā 	hetu aDikaraNa vRtti atyanta aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka sAdaDyatAvacCedakA 
   vacchinnasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiḥ/ 'parvato vahnimān	vacCinna sADya sAmAnADikaraNyam vyAptiH/ aparvataH vahnimAn
   dhūmāt' ityādau hetuḥ dhūmaḥ, tadadhikaraṇaṃ parvataḥ,	DUmAt a ityAdO hetuH DUmaH, tad aDikaraNam parvataH,
   tadvṛttiryo 'tyantābhāvaḥ	tad vRttiH yaH atyanta aBAvaH
   ghaṭādyabhāva mahānasīyavahnyabhāvaśca tatpratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ	Gawa Adi aBAva mahAnasIya vahni aBAvaH ca tad pratiyogita avacCedakam
   ghaṭatva mahānasīyavahnitvādikam/ tatpratiyogitānavacchedakaṃ	Gawa tva  mahAnasIya vahni tva Adi kam/ tad pratiyogita anavacCedakam
   vahnitvarūpaṃ sādhyatāvacchedakam, tadavacchinna vahnisāmānādhikaraṇyasya	vahni tva rUpam sADya tA avacCeda kam, tad avacCinna  vahni sAmAnADikaraNyasya
   tādṛśavahnyadhikaraṇaparvatādivṛttitvarūpasya dhūme sattvāt	tAdRSa vahni aDikaraNa parvata Adi vRtti tva rUpasya DUme sattvAt 
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ parvato dhūmavān vahneḥ ityādau hetuḥ vahniḥ	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ parvataH DUmavAn vahneH ityAdO hetuH vahniH
   tadadhikaraṇam ayogālakam tadvṛttiryo 'tyantābhāvaḥ dhūmābhāvaḥ	tad aDikaraNam ayogAlakam tad vRttiH yaH atyanta aBAvaH DUma aBAvaH
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakameva dhūmatvarūpaṃ	tad pratiyogita avacCedakam eva DUma tva rUpam
   1. vyāpteḥ svarūpaṃ	1. vyApteH svarUpam
   vyāptasya lakṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	vyAptasya lakzaNam iti BAvaH/
   sādhyatāvacchedakamiti	sADya tAvacCedakam iti
   sādhyatāvacchedake	sADya tAvat Cedake
   hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakatvābhāvāt	hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tva aBAvAt
   nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ pratiyogitāyāṃ	na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ pratiyogitAyAm
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyamityādi/ 'parvanto	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam ityAdi/ aparvantaH 
   vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra dhūtādhikaraṇe parvate vartate	vahnimAn DUmAt a iti atra DUta aDikaraNe parvate vartate
   yo 'tyantābhāvaḥ samavāyena vahnirnāstītyākārakapratītisiddhaḥ	yaH atyanta aBAvaH samavAyena vahniH na asti iti AkAraka pratIti sidDaH
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnavahnitvāvacchinnapratiyogitāko 'bhāvaḥ/	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna vahni tva avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH aBAvaH/
   tatpratiyogitāyāṃ avacchedakameva vahnitvaṃ ityavyāptiḥ syāt/	tad pratiyogitAyAm avacCedakam eva vahni tvam iti avyAptiH syAt /
   tadvāraṇāya hetvadhikaraṇavṛttyabhāvīyapratiyogitāyāṃ	tad vAraNAya hetu aDikaraNa vRtti aBAvIya pratiyogitAyAm
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ niveśe ca	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ niveSe ca
   hetvadhikaraṇavṛttyabhāva ityanena yasyābhāvasyopādāne	hetu aDikaraNa vRtti aBAvaH iti anena yasya aBAvasya upAdAne
   tadīyapratiyogitāyāḥ sādhyatāvacchedakasaṃyogasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ	tadIya pratiyogitAyAH sADya tAvat Cedaka saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna tvam
   bhavet sa evopādeyaḥ iti saṃyogasambandhena ghaṭādyabhāva eva	Bavet saH eva upAdeyaH iti saMyoga sambanDena Gawa Adi aBAvaH eva
   tādṛśaḥ, na tu samavāyena vahnyabhāvaḥ tadīyapratiyogitāyāḥ	tAdRSaH, na tu samavAyena vahni aBAvaH tadIya pratiyogitAyAH
   saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnatvāsambhavāt/ tathā ca	saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna tva asamBavAt/ taTA ca

   ghaṭatvādi anavacchedakaṃ ca vahnitvaṃ bhavatīti nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ na	Gawa tva Adi anavacCedakam ca vahni tvam Bavati iti na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/ na

   nnapratiyogitānavacchedaka	nna pratiyogitAn avacCedaka

   hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnahetvadhikaraṇatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ guṇe	hetu tAvat Cedaka avacCinna hetu aDikaraNa tvam niveSanIyam/ guNe

   hetutāvacchedakaṃ yat guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattātvaṃ	hetu tAvat Cedakam yat guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattA tvam
   tadavacchinnādhikaraṇatvaṃ na sambabhavati/ guṇaḥ karma ca	tad avacCinna aDikaraNa tvam na sambaBavati/ guNaH karma ca

   tadvṛttiryo 'bhāvaḥ na dravyatvābhāvaḥ ati tu guṇatvādyabhāvaḥ	tad vRttiH yaH aBAvaH na dravya tva aBAvaH ati tu guNa tva Adi aBAvaH

   nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/ taTA ca

   2. evakāreṇa	2. eva kAreNa

   dhyavacchidyate/	DyavacCidyate/
   na caivamapīta/ 'ayaṃ	na ca evam api ita/ aayam
   vṛkṣaḥ kapisaṃyogī etadvṛkṣatvāt' ityatra hetuḥ etadvṛkṣatvaṃ	vRkzaH kapi saMyogI etat vRkza tvAt a iti atra hetuH etat vRkza tvam
   tadaghikaraṇametadvṛkṣaḥ tatra vartate yo 'bhāvaḥ kapisaṃyogābhāvo 'pi,	tat aGi karaNam etat vRkzaH tatra vartate yaH aBAvaH kapi saMyoga aBAvaH api,
   tadvṛkṣe agrabhāgāvacchedena kapisaṃyogasya sattve 'pi	tad vRkze agra BAga avacCedena kapi saMyogasya sattve api

   pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyasya niveśanīyatvāditi/ tathā ca vṛkṣavṛttiḥ	pratiyogi vEyaDikaraNyasya niveSanIya tvAt iti/ taTA ca vRkza vRttiH
   kapisaṃyogābhāvaḥ pratiyoginaḥ kapisaṃyogasyādhikaraṇe vṛkṣe	kapi saMyoga aBAvaH pratiyoginaH kapi saMyogasya aDikaraNe vRkze
   vartamānatayā pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇo na pratiyogivyadhikaraṇaḥ/	vartamAna tayA pratiyogi samAna aDikaraNaH na pratiyogi vyaDikaraNaH/
   ghaṭādyabhāva eva 1tādṛśaḥ tatpratiyogitānavacchedakaṃ kapisaṃyogatvaṃ	Gawa Adi aBAvaH eva 1tAdRSaH tad pratiyogitAnavacCedakam kapi saMyoga tvam
   bhavatīti nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvasya vyāptitve	Bavati iti na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/ sADya aBAva vat avRtti tvasya vyApti tve
   'idaṃ vācyaṃ jñeyatvāt' ityatroktā avyāptiḥ,	aidam vAcyam jQeya tvAt a iti atra uktA avyAptiH,
   prakṛtasiddhāntavyāptilakṣaṇe na prasajatītyāha   kevalānvayisādhyaka	prakRta sidDAnta vyApti lakzaNe na prasajati iti Aha  kevala anvayi sADyaka

   tadvṛttiryo 'bhāvaḥ ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ ghaṭatvādi	tad vRttiH yaH aBAvaH Gawa Adi aBAvaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedakam Gawa tva Adi

   1. tādṛśa iti/	1. tAdRSaH iti/
   pratiyogivyadhikaraṇa ityarthaḥ/	pratiyogi vyaDikaraNaH iti arTaH/
   ativyāptyāpatteriti/ saṃyogābhāvavati guṇādau sattāyāḥ sattvāt	ati vyApti ApatteH iti/ saMyoga aBAvavati guNa AdO sattAyAH sattvAt

   tanniṣṭho yo 'bhāvaḥ saṃyogābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakameva	tad nizWaH yaH aBAvaH saMyoga aBAvaH tad pratiyogita avacCedakam eva
   saṃyogatvarūpaṃ sādhyatāvacchedakamityativyāptirvāraṇīyā/ di tu	saMyoga tva rUpam sADya tAvacCedakam iti ati vyAptiH vAraNIyA/ di tu

   saṃyogābhāvasyāvyāpyavṛttitvena saṃyogādhikaraṇe dravye	saMyoga aBAvasya avyApya vRtti tvena saMyoga aDikaraNe dravye
   vartamānatayā pratiyogyadhikaraṇāvṛttiḥ saṃyogābhāvo na bhavati, api	vartamAna tayA pratiyogi aDikaraNa AvRttiH saMyoga aBAvaH na Bavati, api
   tu ghaṭādyabhāva eva, tatpratiyogitānavacchedakatvaṃ	tu Gawa Adi aBAvaH eva, tad pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tvam

   guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattābhāvasya	guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattA BAvasya

   ghaṭādyabhāvamādāya tatpratiyogitānavacchedakatvasya viśiṣṭasattātve	Gawa Adi aBAvam AdAya tad pratiyogita anavacCedaka tvasya viSizwa sattAtve

   niveśe tu	niveSe tu
   viśiṣṭasattātvarūpapratiyogitāvacchedakāvicchinnānadhikaraṇaṃ	viSizwa sattAtva rUpa pratiyogi ta avacCedaka avicCinnAn aDikaraNam
   guṇaḥ tadvṛttitayā viśiṣṭasattābhāvo 'pi lakṣaṇaghaṭakaḥ,	guNaH tad vRtti tayA viSizwa sattA BAvaH api lakzaNa GawakaH,
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakameva sādhyatāvacchedakam viśiṣṭasattātvamiti	tad pratiyogita avacCedakam eva sADya tAvacCedakam viSizwa sattAtvam iti

   neti bhāvaḥ/ dhūmāgnyoriti/ dhūmāgnyorvyāptigrahe utpatsyamāne	na iti BAvaH/ DUma agnyoH iti/ DUma agnyoH vyApti grahe utpatsyamAne

   sāmānyalakṣaṇetyādi/	sAmAnya lakzaNa ityAdi/

   pakṣatāvacchedakībhūtaparvatatvāvacchinnaviśeṣyakatvāt	pakza tAvacCedakIBUta parvata tva avacCinna viSezyaka tvAt 
   sādhyatāvacchedakībhūtavahnitvāvacchinnaprakārakatvācca tādṛśabodhajanake	sADya tAvacCedakIBUta vahni tva avacCinna prakAraka tvAt ca tAdRSa boDa janake
   parvato vahnimāniti vākye lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	parvataH vahnimAn iti vAkye lakzaNa samanvayaH/

   'dhūmavan vahnimān' ityākārakabodhasya jāyamānatayā tasya	aDUmavan vahnimAna iti AkAraka boDasya jAyamAna tayA tasya

   udāharaṇavākye 'tivyāptiḥ/	udAharaNa vAkye ati vyAptiH/

   doṣaḥ/ evaṃ	dozaH/ evam

   anvayamātravyāptikam kevalānvayi/ yathā ghaṭaḥ abhidheyaḥ	anvaya mAtra vyAptikam kevala anvayi/ yaTA GawaH aBiDeyaH

   vyatirekavyāptiḥ nāsti, sarvasyāpi prameyatvāt abhidheyatvācca/	vyatireka vyAptiH nAsti, sarvasya api prameya tvAt aBiDeya tvAt ca/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kevalānvayino	kevala anvayinaH 
   lakṣaṇamāha   anvayeti/ kevalānvayisādhyakaṃ liṅgaṃ kevalānvayi/	lakzaNam Aha  anvayeti/ kevala anvayi sADyakam liFgam kevala anvayi/
   [vṛttimat] ityantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ	[vRttimat] iti anta aBAva apratiyogi tvam
   kevalānvayitvam/ īśvarapramāviṣayatvaṃ sarvapadābhidheyatvaṃ ca	kevala anvayitvam/ ISvara pramA vizaya tvam sarva pada aBiDeya tvam ca
   sarvatra astīti vyatirekābhāvaḥ/	sarvatra asti iti vyatireka aBAvaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anvayamātravyāptikatvarūpakevalānvayilakṣaṇe mātrapadena	anvaya mAtra vyAptika tva rUpa kevala anvayi lakzaNe mAtrapadena
   vyatirekavyāptervyavacchedyatayā siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ vyāghāta	vyatireka vyApteH vyavacCet yatayA sidDi asidDiByAm vyAGAta
   ityālocya prakārāntareṇa pariṣkaroti   kevalānvayisādhyakamiti/	iti Alocya prakAra antareNa parizkaroti  kevala anvayi sADyakam iti/
   kevalānvayisādhyakavyatirekihetoḥ	kevala anvayi sADyaka vyatireki hetoH
   1. tathā ca	1. taTA ca
   anvayasahacārajñānajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimatve sati	anvaya sahacAra jQAna janya jQAna vizaya vyAptima tve sati
   vyatirekasahacārajñānajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimattvaṃ anvayavyatirekiṇo	vyatireka sahacAra jQAna janya jQAna vizaya vyAptimat tvam anvaya vyatirekiNaH 
   lakṣaṇam/ tatra satyantānupādāne kevalavyatirekiṇyativyāptiḥ/	lakzaNam/ tatra satyanta anupAdAne kevala vyatirekiNI ati vyAptiH/
   viśeśyānupādāne kevalānvayinyativyāptiḥ/	viSeSya anupAdAne kevala anvayinI ativyAptiH/
   vyatirekasahacāreṇāpyanvayavyāptireva gṛhyata iti mate	vyatireka sahacAreNa api anvaya vyAptiH eva gRhyate iti mate
   anavayasahacārajñānavyatirekasahacārajñānobhajajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimattvaṃ	anavaya sahacAra jQAna vyatireka sahacAra jQAna uBaja janya jQAna vizaya vyAptimat tvam
   anvayavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇam/	anvaya vyatirekiNaH lakzaNam/
   saṅgrahāya sādhye	saFgrahAya sADye
   kevalānvayitvaṃ niveśitam/ tadeva nirvakti   atyantābhāveti/	kevala anvayitvam niveSitam/ tat eva nirvakti  atyanta aBAva iti/
   niravacchinnavṛttimadatyantābhāvetyarthaḥ/	niravacCinna vRttimat atyanta aBAva iti arTaH/
   tena	tena
   gaganābhāvasaṃyogābhāvādisādhyakahetoḥ saṅgrahaḥ/	gagana aBAva saMyoga aBAva Adi sADyaka hetoH saFgrahaH/
   ghaṭapadābhidheyatvasya paṭādāvasattvena sarvataḥ sattvāsambhavādāha  	Gawa pada aBiDeya tvasya pawAdO= asattvena sarvatas sattva asamBavAt Aha  
   sarvapadābhidheyatvamiti/	sarva pada aBiDeya tvam iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   'anvayamātravyāptikaṃ kevalānvayī'ti mūlāt	aanvaya mAtra vyAptikam kevala anvayI ati mUlAt 
   vyatirekavyāptiśūnyatve sati anvayavyāptimattvaṃ kevalānvayino	vyatireka vyApti SUnya tve sati anvaya vyAptimat tvam kevala anvayinaH 
   lakṣaṇamiti pratīyate/ tathā sati kevalānvayini vyatirekavyāpteḥ	lakzaNam iti pratIyate/ taTA sati kevala anvayini vyatireka vyApteH
   prasiddhatve tacchūnyatvaṃ na sambhavati/ tasyāḥ aprasiddhatve sutarāṃ	prasidDa tve tat SUnya tvam na samBavati/ tasyAH aprasidDa tve sutarAm
   tacchūnyatvāprasiddhiriti lakṣaṇamidaṃ nopapadyata ityāśayena	tat SUnyatva aprasidDiH iti lakzaNam idam na upapadyate iti ASayena
   dīpikāyāṃ kevalānvayisādhyakaṃ kevalānvayi ityuktamityāha  	dIpikAyAm kevala anvayi sADyakam kevala anvayi iti uktam iti Aha  
   anvayamātreti/ kevalānvayisādhyakaḥ kevalānvayī hetuḥ 'idaṃ vācyaṃ	anvaya mAtrA iti/ kevala anvayi sADyakaH kevala anvayI hetuH aidam vAcyam
   jñeyatvāt' ityādiḥ yathā kevalānvayī, tathā kevalānvayisādhyakaḥ	jQeya tvAt a ityAdiH yaTA kevala anvayI, taTA kevala anvayi sADyakaH
   vyatirekī heturapi 'idaṃ vācyaṃ ghaṭatvāt' ityādiḥ	vyatirekI hetuH api aidam vAcyam Gawa tvAt a ityAdiH
   kevalānvayyeva/ tathā cobhayasaṅgrahāya hetau	kevala anvayi eva/ taTA ca uBaya saFgrahAya hetO
   kevalānvayitvamaniveśya kevalānvayisādhyakahetutvaṃ kevalānvayino	kevala anvayitvam aniveSya kevala anvayi sADyaka hetu tvam kevala anvayinaH 
   lakṣaṇaṃ	lakzaNam
   kathitamityāha  	kaTitam iti Aha  
   kevalānvayisādhyaketi/ vyatirekihetuḥ atyantābhāvapratiyogī	kevala anvayi sADya keti/ vyatireki hetuH atyanta aBAva pratiyogI
   hetuḥ/ tadeveti/ kevalānvayitvamevetyarthaḥ/ nanu	hetuH/ tat eva iti/ kevala anvayitvam eva iti arTaH/ nanu
   atyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ kevalānvayitvam, tatsādhyakahetutvaṃ	atyanta aBAva apratiyogi tvam kevala anvayitvam, tad sADyaka hetu tvam
   kevalānvayiliṅgatvamityuktau ākāśābhāvasādhyakasya	kevalAn vayi liFga tvam iti uktO AkASa aBAva sADyakasya
   ghaṭatvādihetoḥ saṅgraho na syāt ākāśābhāvasya	Gawa tva Adi hetoH saFgrahaH na syAt AkASa aBAvasya
   1ākāśarūpa ākāśābhāvātyantābhāvapratiyogitvena	1a AkASa rUpa AkASa aBAva atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tvena
   atyantābhāvāpratiyogitvābhāvāt/ evaṃ	atyanta aBAva apratiyogi tva aBAva at/ evam
   saṃyogābhāvasādhyakahetorapi	saMyoga aBAva sADyaka hetoH api
   saṅgraho na syāt	saFgrahaH na syAt 
   saṃyogābhāvasya 2saṃyogātmakātyantābhāvapratiyogitvāt ityata	saMyoga aBAvasya 2saMyoga Atmaka atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tvAt iti ata
   āha   niravacchinnetyādi/	Aha  niravacCinnA ityAdi/
   1. ākāśarūpaḥ yaḥ	1. AkASa rUpaH yaH
   ākāśābhāvātyantābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvenetyarthaḥ/ abhāvābhāvasya	AkASa aBAva atyanta aBAvaH tad pratiyogi tvena iti arTaH/ aBAva aBAvasya
   pratiyogisvarūpatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	pratiyogi svarUpa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   2. saṃyogarūpaḥ yaḥ	2. saMyoga rUpaH yaH
   saṃyogābhāvātyantabhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvādityarthaḥ/	saMyoga aBAva atyanta BAvaH tad pratiyogi tvAt iti arTaH/
   saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitayā sāvacchinnavṛttikatvāt	saMyogasya avyApya vRtti tayA sA avacCinna vRttika tvAt 
   niravacchinnavṛttimān abhāvaḥ na saṃyogātmakaḥ abhāvaḥ, api tu	niravacCinna vRttimAn aBAvaH na saMyoga AtmakaH aBAvaH, api tu
   ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ tadapratiyogitvaṃ saṃyogābhāve 'stīti tasya	Gawa Adi aBAvaH tad apratiyogi tvam saMyoga aBAve asti iti tasya
   kevalānvayitvopapattiḥ/ gaganarūpo 'bhāvastu na vṛttimān	kevala anvayitvA upapattiH/ gagana rUpaH aBAvaH tu na vRttimAn
   tasyāvṛttitvāt, api tu vṛttimān ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ tadapratiyogitvaṃ	tasya AvRtti tva at, api tu vRttimAn Gawa Adi aBAvaH tad apratiyogi tvam
   gaganābhāve 'stīti tasyāpi kevalānvayitvamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/ evaṃ	gagana aBAve asti iti tasya api kevala anvayitvam upapadyate iti BAvaH/ evam
   ca yat sarvatrāsti, na kvāpi tadabhāvaḥ tat kevalānvayīti labhyate/	ca yat sarvatra Asti, na kvApi tad aBAvaH tat kevala anvayI iti laByate/
   nanvabhidheyatvasya kathaṃ kevalānvayitvam/ abhidheyatvaṃ hi	nanu aBiDeya tvasya kaTam kevala anvayitvam/ aBiDeya tvam hi
   padaśaktimattvam/ tacca ghaṭapaṭādipadabhedena bhinnamiti	pada Saktimat tvam/ tat ca Gawa pawa Adi pada Bedena Binnam iti
   ghaṭapadābhidheyatvasya	Gawa pada aBiDeya tvasya
   paṭādiniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitvādityāśaṅkate   ghaṭapadeti/	pawa Adi nizWA atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tvAt ityASaFkate  Gawa padA iti/
   sarvapadābhidheyatvamiti/ sarva iti yat padaṃ tadabhidheyatvaṃ	sarva pada aBiDeya tvam iti/ sarve iti yat padam tad aBiDeya tvam
   sarvatrāstīti sarvapadābhidheyatvaṃ kevalānvayi/ tathā ca	sarvatra asti iti sarva pada aBiDeya tvam kevala anvayi/ taTA ca
   'ghaṭaḥ abhidheyaḥ	aGawaH aBiDeyaH
   prameyatvāt' iti prayoge sarvapadābhidheyatvaṃ sādhyaṃ iti	prameya tvAt a iti prayoge sarva pada aBiDeya tvam sADyam iti
   kevalānvayitvamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/	kevala anvayitvam upapadyate iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   kevalavyatirekinirūpaṇam	kevala vyatireki nirUpaNam
   vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatireki/ yathā pṛthivī	vyatireka mAtra vyAptikam kevala vyatireki/ yaTA pRTivI
   itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt/ yat itarebhyo na bhidyate na tat	itareByaH Bidyate ganDavat tva at/ yat itareByaH na Bidyate na tat 
   gandhavat yathā jalam/ na ceyaṃ tathā/ tasmāt na tathā iti/ atra yat	ganDa vat yaTA jalam/ na ca iyam taTA/ tasmAt na taTA iti/ atra yat 
   gandhavat tat itarabhinnam ityanvayadṛṣṭāntaḥ nāsti,	ganDa vat tat itara Binnam iti anvaya dRzwAntaH nAsti,
   pṛthivīmātrasya pakṣatvāt/	pRTivI mAtrasya pakza tvAt/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kavelavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇamāha   vyatireketi/ tadudāharati  	kavela vyatirekiNaH lakzaNam Aha  vyatireka iti/ tat udAharati  
   yatheti/ nanu itarabhedaḥ prasiddho vā na vā/ ādye yatra prasiddhaḥ tatra	yaTA iti/ nanu itara BedaH prasidDaH vA na vA/ Adye yatra prasidDaH tatra
   hetusattve anvayitvam, asattve asādhāraṇyam/ dvītīye	hetu sattve anvayitvam, asattve asADa araNyam/ dvItIye
   sādhyajñānābhāvāt kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭānumitiḥ/ viśeṣaṇajñānābhāve	sADya jQAna aBAvAt kaTam tad viSizwa anumitiH/ viSezaNa jQAna aBAve
   viśiṣṭajñānānadayāt pratiyogijñānābhāvāt	viSizwa jQAnAnadayAt pratiyogi jQAna aBAvAt
   vyatirekavyāptijñānamapi na syāditi cet   na/	vyatireka vyApti jQAnam api na syAt iti ced  na/
   jalāditrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ trayodaśasu pratyekaṃ prasiddhānāṃ	jala Adi trayodaSa anyonya aBAvAnAm trayodaSasu pratyekam prasidDAnAm
   melanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate/ tatra	melanam pRTivyAm sADyate/ tatra
   trayodaśatvāvacchinnabhedātmakasādhyasyaikādhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvāt	trayodaSa tvA avacCinna Beda Atmaka sADyasya eka aDikaraNa vRtti tva aBAvAt
   nānvayitvāsādhāraṇye/ pratyekādhikaraṇaprasiddhyā	na anvayitvA sADAraNye/ pratyeka aDikaraNa prasidDyA
   sādhyaviśiṣṭānumitiḥ vyatirekavyāptinirūpaṇaṃ ceti/	sADya viSizwa anumitiH vyatireka vyApti nirUpaNam ca iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mūle	mUle
   vyatirekamātravyāptikamiti/ niścitavyatirekamātravyāptikamityarthaḥ/	vyatireka mAtra vyAptika miti/ niScita vyatireka mAtra vyAptikam iti arTaH/
   tena 'pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt' ityādau	tena apRTivI itareByaH Bidyate ganDavat tvAt a iti AdO
   anvayavyāptessattve 'pi na lakṣaṇāsaṅgatiḥ/ itadabhedaḥ  	anvaya vyApteH sattve api na lakzaNa asaFgatiH/ itad aBedaH  
   pṛthivītaratvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedaḥ/ anvayitvamiti/	pRTivI itara tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka BedaH/ anvayitvam iti/
   anvayasahacāragrahagrāhyavyāptimattvaṃ syādityarthaḥ/ asādhāraṇyamiti/	anvaya sahacAra graha grAhya vyAptimat tvam syAt iti arTaH/ asADAraNyam iti/
   sapakṣavyāvṛttatvarūpāsādhāraṇalakṣaṇākrāntatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	sa pakza vyAvRtta tva rUpa asADAraNa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvAt iti BAvaH/
   aprasiddhasādhyake 'pi sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumitirevetyābhiprāyeṇāha  	aprasidDa sADyake api sADya viSezaNaka anumitiH eva itya aBiprAyeNa Aha  
   sādhyetyādi/ vyatirekavyāptīti/	sADya ityAdi/ vyatireka vyApti iti/
   sādhyābhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvarūpetyarthaḥ/	sADya aBAva vyApaka aBAva pratiyogi tva rUpA iti arTaH/
   pṛthivītarasāmānyabhedo na sādhyate, api tu jalādibhedakṛṭaṃ	pRTivI itara sAmAnya BedaH na sADyate, api tu jala Adi Beda kRwam
   sādhyate/ tathā ca toktadoṣāvasara ityāhajalādīti/ jalādīnāṃ ce	sADyate/ taTA ca tokta doza avasaraH iti Aha jala AdIti/ jala AdInAm ce
   trayodaśānyonyābhāvāsteṣāṃ kūṭaṃ sādhyata ityarthaḥ/ samudāyasya	trayodaSa anyonya aBAvAH tezAm kUwam sADyate iti arTaH/ samudAyasya
   prasiddhyasambhavādāha   pratyekamini/ trayodaśatvāvacchinneti/	prasidDi asamBavAt Aha  pratyekamini/ trayodaSa tvA avacCinna iti/
   anumiteḥ pūrvaṃ niścitasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnavato dharmiṇa	anumiteH pUrvam niScita sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinnavataH DarmiNa
   evāprasiddhyā na tatra hetoḥ sattvāsattvanibandhane anvayitvāsādhāraṇye	eva aprasidDyA na tatra hetoH sattva asattva nibanDane anvayitvA sADAraNye
   iti samuditārthaḥ/ pratyekaṃ prasiddhau	iti samudita arTaH/ pratyekam prasidDO
   apekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpasamudāyatvaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ sambhavati/	apekzA budDi viSeza vizaya tva rUpa samudAya tva viSizwa jQAnam samBavati/
   tathā ca viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakārakanirṇayasya sadbhāvāt	taTA ca viSezaNa tAvacCedaka prakAraka nirNayasya sadBAvAt
   sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhyanumitiḥ	sADya tAvacCedaka viSizwa vESizwyA avagAhya numitiH
   vyatirekavyāptijñānaṃ	vyatireka vyApti jQAnam
   ca sambhavatītyāha   pratyekādhikaraṇetyādinā/ yadyapi jalādi	ca samBavati iti Aha  pratyeka aDikaraNa ityAdinA/ yadi api jala Adi
   caturdaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ caturdaśasu	caturdaSa anyonya aBAvAnAm caturdaSasu
   pratyeka prasiddhānāmiti	pratyeka prasidDAnAm iti
   rītyā vaktumucitam, tathāpi arthāpatteḥ	rItyA vaktum ucitam, taTA api arTApatteH
   pramāṇāntaratvamaṅgīkurvantaṃ prābhākaramākṣeptuṃ	pramANa antara tvam aFgIkurvantam prABAkaram Akzeptum
   vyatirekavyāpteranumityaṅgatvasya pradarśanīyatayā	vyatireka vyApteH anumiti aFga tvasya pradarSanIya tayA
   tanmatasādhāraṇyena vyatirekavyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ	tad mata sADa araNyena vyatireka vyAptim pradarSayitum
   jalāditrayodaśetyādikathanam/ na ca tanmate caturdaśānyonyābhāvaḥ	jala Adi trayodaSa ityAdi kaTanam/ na ca tad mate caturdaSa anyonya aBAvaH
   prasiddhāḥ/ abhāvasyādhikaraṇātmakasya tenāṅgīkārāditi dhyeyam/	prasidDAH/ aBAvasya aDikaraNa Atmakasya tena aFgIkArAt iti Dyeyam/
   kecittu   jalamevādiḥ	kecid tu  jalam eva AdiH
   yeṣāṃ trayodaśānāmiti vigraheṇa jalādipratiyogikānāṃ	yezAm trayodaSAnAm iti vigraheNa jala Adi pratiyogikAnAm
   caturdaśānāmityarthaḥ/ trayodaśasviti/ jalādītyādiḥ/ uktavigraheṇa	caturdaSAnAm iti arTaH/ trayodaSasu iti/ jala Adi ityAdiH/ ukta vigraheNa
   caturdaśasvityarthaḥ/ agre 'pyevaṃ bodhyam ityāhuḥ/	caturdaSasu iti arTaH/ agre api evam boDyam iti AhuH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatirekītyasya anvayavyāptiśūnyatve	vyatireka mAtra vyAptikam kevala vyatirekIti asya anvaya vyApti SUnya tve
   sati vyatirekavyāptimattvaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ/ tathā	sati vyatireka vyAptimat tvam kevala vyatirekiNaH lakzaNam iti arTaH/ taTA
   ca 'pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt' ityatra	ca apRTivI itareByaH Bidyate ganDavat tvAt a iti atra
   kevalavyatirekiṇi vastuto 'nvayavyāpterapi sattvādasambhavaḥ	kevala vyatirekiNi vastutas anvaya vyApteH api sattvAt asamBavaH
   ityato vyācaṣṭe   niścitavyatireketi/ tathā coktasthale vastutaḥ	iti atas vyAcazwe  niScita vyatireka iti/ taTA ca ukta sTale vastutas 
   anvayavyāpteḥ sattve 'pi sādhyasyāprasiddhyā (ajñānena)	anvaya vyApteH sattve api sADyasya aprasidDyA (a jQAnena)
   hetuvyāpakasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpānvayavyāptiniścayo nāsti,	hetu vyApaka sADya sAmAnADikaraNya rUpa anvaya vyApti niScayaH nAsti,
   vyatirekavyāptiniścayastvastīti niścitavyatirekamātravyāptikatvasya	vyatireka vyApti niScayaH tu asti iti niScita vyatireka mAtra vyAptika tvasya
   sattvāt kevalavyatirekitvamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/	sattvAt kevala vyatireki tvam upapadyate iti BAvaH/
   yatkiñciditarabhedasya prasiddhatvāt prasiddho na veti vikalpasyaiva	yat kiQci dita raBedasya prasidDa tvAt prasidDaH na vA iti vikalpasya eva
   nāvasara ityataḥ vyācaṣṭe  	na avasaraH iti atas vyAcazwe  
   pṛthivītaratvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabheda iti/ pṛthivītareṣāṃ	pRTivI itara tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka BedaH iti/ pRTivI itarezAm
   sarveṣāṃ bheda ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca yadi pṛthivītareṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ	sarvezAm BedaH iti arTaH/ taTA ca yadi pRTivI itarezAm sarvezAm BedaH
   kvacit ghaṭādau jñātaḥ tarhi tatra hetusattve	kvacid Gawa AdO jQAtaH tarhi tatra hetu sattve
   sādhyahetvostatraivānvayasahacāragrahāt	sADya hetvoH tatra eva anvaya sahacAra grahAt
   tadgrāhyānvayavyāptimattvamastīti	tad grAhya anvaya vyAptimat tvam asti iti
   anvayavyatirekyanumānameva bhavet na kevalavyatireke/ yadi	anvaya vyatireki anumAnam eva Bavet na kevala vyatireke/ yadi
   tatra heturnāsti tarhi hetorniścitasādhyavadavṛttitvena	tatra hetuH na asti tarhi hetoH niScita sADya vada vRtti tvena
   sapakṣavyāvṛttatvarūpāsādhāraṇahetvābhāvalakṣaṇākrāntatayā	sa pakza vyAvRtta tva rUpA sADAraNa hetvABAva lakzaNa AkrAnta tayA
   hetorasādhāraṇatvāpattiḥ/ yadi	hetoH asADAraNa tva ApattiH/ yadi
   pṛthivītaratvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedarūpaṃ sādhyaṃ na jñātam tarhi	pRTivI itara tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda rUpam sADyam na jQAtam tarhi
   sādhyarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānābhāvāt sādhyaviśiṣṭapakṣajñānarūpā anumitirna	sADya rUpa viSezaNa jQAna aBAvAt sADya viSizwa pakza jQAna rUpAH anumitiH na
   syāt viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāt/ evaṃ	syAt viSizwa budDO viSezaNa jQAnasya kAraNa tva at/ evam
   sādhyasyājñātatve sādhyābhāvaghaṭitavyatirekavyāptijñānamapi na syāt/	sADyasya ajQAta tve sADya aBAva Gawita vyatireka vyApti jQAnam api na syAt /
   abhāvabuddhau pratiyogijñānasya kāraṇatvāditi	aBAva budDO pratiyogi jQAnasya kAraNa tvAt iti
   dīpikāsthaśaṅkāgranthārthaḥ/	dIpikA sTa SaFkA granTa arTaH/
   nanu	nanu
   aprasiddhasādhyakasthale sādhyaviśeṣaṇikā pakṣaḥ sādhyavānityākārāna	aprasidDa sADyaka sTale sADya viSezaNikA pakzaH sADyavAn iti AkArAn a
   anumitirmā bhūt viśeṣaṇajñānarūpakāraṇavirahāt/	anumitiH mA BUt viSezaNa jQAna rUpa kAraNa virahAt/
   pṛthivyāmitarabhedaḥ ityākārā sādhyaviśeṣyikā anumitiḥ	pRTivyAm itara BedaH iti AkArA sADya viSezyikA anumitiH
   bhavitumarhatyevetyāśaṅkyāha   aprasiddhasādhyake 'pīti/	Bavitum arhati eva iti ASaFkya Aha  aprasidDa sADyake api iti/
   sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumitireveti/ sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumitireva jāyata	sADya viSezaNaka anu mitiH eva iti/ sADya viSezaNaka anumitiH eva jAyata
   iti pakṣe viśeṣaṇajñānābhāvāt sā prakṛte na sambhavatīti	iti pakze viSezaNa jQAna aBAvAt sA prakRte na samBavati iti
   dūṣaṇam/ sādhyaviśeṣyakānumitirjāyata iti pakṣe	dUzaNam/ sADya viSezyaka anumitiH jAyate iti pakze
   pratiyogijñānābhāvāt vyatirekavyāptijñānarūpakāraṇābhāvāt na sā	pratiyogi jQAna aBAvAt vyatireka vyApti jQAna rUpa kAraNa aBAvAt na sA
   sambhabatīti bhāvo varṇanīyaḥ/ jalādibhedakūṭamiti/ jalādīnāṃ	samBabatI iti BAvaH varNanIyaH/ jala Adi Beda kUwamiti/ jala AdInAm
   pṛthivyatiriktānāṃ caturdaśānāṃ pratyekaṃ ye caturdaśa bhedāḥ	pRTivI atiriktAnAm caturdaSAnAm pratyekam ye caturdaSa BedAH
   tatsamūha ityarthaḥ/ jalādīnāṃ ye trayodaśānyonyābhāvā iti/	tad samUhaH iti arTaH/ jala AdInAm ye trayodaSa anyonya aBAvAH iti/
   nanu jalādyaṣṭadravyāṇāṃ guṇādiṣaṭpadārthānāṃ ca bhedaḥ pṛthivyāṃ	nanu jala Adi azwa dravyANAm guNa Adi zaz padArTAnAm ca BedaH pRTivyAm
   sādhanīyaḥ/ tathā ca jalādicaturdaśānyonyābhāveti vaktavye	sADanIyaH/ taTA ca jala Adi caturdaSa anyonyABAva iti vaktavye
   trayodaśetyabhidhānamanucitamiti cet atra	trayodaSa iti aBiDAnam anucitam iti cet atra
   kecit mīmāṃsakairabhāvasyādhikaraṇātmakatvasvīkāreṇa	kecit mI mAMsakEH aBAvasya aDikaraNa Atmaka tva svIkAreNa
   atiriktapadārthatvānaṅgīkārāt trayodaśānyonyābhāva iti	atirikta padArTa tva anaFgIkArAt trayodaSa anyonya aBAvaH iti
   tanmatānusāreṇa kathitam/	tad mata anusAreNa kaTitam/
   arthāpatteratiriktapramāṇatvamaṅgīkurvatastān pratyeva	arTApatteH atirikta pramANa tvam aFgIkurvataH tAn pratyeva
   kevalavyatirekyanumānasya pradarśanīyatvāt ityāhuḥ   tanna/	kevala vyatireki anumAnasya pradarSanIya tvAt iti AhuH  tat na/
   tādṛśatrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ jalādiṣu pratyekaṃ prasiddhānāṃ	tAdRSa trayodaSa anyonya aBAvAnAm jala Adizu pratyekam prasidDAnAm
   tanmate jalādirūpatayā jalādirūpatrayodaśabhedasya pṛthivyāmasattvena	tad mate jala Adi rUpa tayA jala Adi rUpa trayodaSa Bedasya pRTivyAm asattvena
   gandhavattvaliṅgena tatsādhanāsambhavāt/ pṛthivīniṣṭhasya	ganDavat tva liFgena tad sADana asamBavAt/ pRTivI nizWasya
   tādṛśatrayodaśabhedasya pṛthivīrūpatayā jalādiṣu pratyekaṃ	tAdRSa trayodaSa Bedasya pRTivI rUpa tayA jala Adizu pratyekam
   prasiddhyabhāvenāprasiddhyā uktarītyā vyatirekavyāptijñānāsambhavena	prasidDi aBAvena aprasidDyE ukta rItyA vyatireka vyApti jQAna asamBavena
   tatsādhanāsambhavāt/ ataḥ jalāditrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāmityasya	tad sADana asamBavAt/ atas jala Adi trayodaSa anyonya aBAvAnAm iti asya
   jalamādiryeṣāṃ tu jalādayaḥ, jalādayastrayodaśa jalāditrayodaśa	jalam AdiH yezAm tu jala AdayaH, jala AdayaH trayodaSa jala Adi trayodaSa
   teṣāmanyonyābhāvā iti vigrahaḥ/ jalāditayatra	tezAm anyonya aBAvAH iti vigrahaH/ jalAditayatra
   atadguṇasaṃvijñāno	atad guNa saMvijQAnaH 
   bahuvrīhiḥ/ ato	bahuvrIhiH/ atas

   iti vyākhyātavyam/ upari prakāśikāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ spaṣṭībhaviṣyati/	iti vyAKyAtavyam/ upari prakASikAyAm sarvam idam spazwIBavizyati/
   vastutastu jalādīnāṃ	vastutas tu jala AdInAm
   caturdaśānāṃ ye bhedāḥ caturdaśa te sarveṃ jalādiṣu na prasiddhāḥ/ tathā	caturdaSAnAm ye BedAH caturdaSa te sarvem jala Adizu na prasidDAH/ taTA
   hi   jalabhedaḥ	hi  jalaBedaH
   tejaḥprabhṛtiṣu	tejaH praBRtizu
   trayodaśasu prasiddhaḥ, na tejasi/ evaṃrītyā trayodaśasu prasiddhaḥ yaḥ	trayodaSasu prasidDaH, na tejasi/ evaMrItyA trayodaSasu prasidDaH yaH
   ekaikabhedaḥ teṣāṃ melanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate/ arthāt	ekEka BedaH tezAm melanam pRTivyAm sADyate/ arTAt
