   prasiddho yaḥ ekaikabhedaḥ tadghaṭitacaturdaśātmakasamudāyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ	prasidDaH yaH ekEka BedaH tad Gawita caturdaSa Atmaka samudAyaH pRTivyAm
   sādhyata iti yāvat/ evaṃ ca caturdaśatvaviśiṣṭabhedasya	sADyate iti yAvat/ evam ca caturdaSa tva viSizwa Bedasya
   kutrāpyaprasiddhatvāt nānvayitvaṃ na vā asādhāraṇyam/	kutra api aprasidDa tvAt na anvayitvam na vA asADAraNyam/
   sādhyaghaṭakaikābhāvasya trayodaśatvāvacchedena prasiddhatayā	sADya Gawaka eka aBAvasya trayodaSa tvA avacCedena prasidDa tayA
   sādhyarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānasattvena sādhyaviśiṣṭānumitirupapadyate/ evaṃ	sADya rUpa viSezaNa jQAna sattvena sADya viSizwa anumitiH upapadyate/ evam
   sādhyātmakapratiyogijñānasattve sādhyābhāvajñānasambhavāt	sADya Atmaka pratiyogi jQAna sattve sADya aBAva jQAna samBavAt 
   vyatirekavyāptijñānamapi sulabhamiti nṛsiṃhaśāstriṇaḥ prāhuḥ/	vyatireka vyApti jQAnam api sulaBam iti nRsiMha SAstriNaH prAhuH/
   niścitasādhyatāvacchedaketi/ sādhyatāvacchedakaṃ trayodaśatvaṃ	niScita sADya ta avacCeda ka iti/ sADya tAvacCedakam trayodaSa tvam
   caturdaśatvaṃ vā tadavacchinnāḥ bhedāḥ tadvata ityarthaḥ/ pratyekaṃ	caturdaSa tvam vA tad avacCinnAH BedAH tadvataH iti arTaH/ pratyekam
   prasiddhāviti/ jalabhedādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt tatra	prasidDO= iti/ jala Beda AdInAm prasidDa tvAt tatra
   apekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvātmakaṃ yat caturdaśatvaṃ tajjñānaṃ bhavati/	apekzA budDi viSeza vizaya tva Atmakam yat caturdaSa tvam tat jQAnam Bavati/
   tena caturdaśatvātmakaṃ yat viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaṃ tatprakārakaḥ	tena caturdaSa tva Atmakam yat viSezaNa tAvacCedakam tad prakArakaH
   nirṇayaḥ hame bhedāḥ caturdaśa ityākārakaḥ utpadyate/ tataḥ	nirNayaH hame BedAH caturdaSaH iti AkArakaH utpadyate/ tatas 
   caturdaśatvaviśiṣṭabhedavatī pṛthivī ityākārikā	caturdaSa tva viSizwa BedavatI pRTivI iti AkArikA
   viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhinī anumitiḥ sulabhā/	viSizwa vESizwyA avagAhinI anumitiH sulaBA/
   caturdaśatvaviśiṣṭabhedābhāvavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogi	caturdaSa tva viSizwa Beda aBAva vyApakIBUta aBAva pratiyogi
   gandhavattvamiti vyatirekavyāptijñānaṃ ca sulabhamiti bhāvaḥ/	ganDavat tvam iti vyatireka vyApti jQAnam ca sulaBam iti BAvaH/
   vastutastu	vastutas tu
   kevalavyatirekyanumānasthale sādhyaviśeṣyikaivānumitiḥ/ ataḥ pūrvaṃ	kevala vyatireki anumAna sTale sADya viSezyikA eva anumitiH/ atas pUrvam
   sādhyasyāprasiddhāvapi na kṣatiḥ/ evaṃ pṛthivītarabhedābhāvatvena rūpeṇa	sADyasya aprasidDO= api na kzatiH/ evam pRTivI itara Beda aBAva tvena rUpeNa
   sādhyābhāvasya vyatirekavyāptighaṭakatayā na praveśaḥ, yena	sADya aBAvasya vyatireka vyApti Gawaka tayA na praveSaH, yena
   pratiyogyapratisaddhyā abhāvāprasiddheḥ vyatirekavyāptijñānasya	pratiyogi apratisadDyA aBAva aprasidDeH vyatireka vyApti jQAnasya
   daurlabhyaṃ bhavet/ api tu pṛthivītaratvavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogi	dOrlaByam Bavet/ api tu pRTivI itara tva vyApakIBUta aBAva pratiyogi
   gandhavatī pṛthivī ityeva parāmarśaḥ/ ataḥ dīpikāyāmāśritaḥ	ganDavatI pRTivI iti eva parAmarSaH/ atas dIpikAyAm ASritaH
   prayāso viphala iti prāhuḥ/ 1pakṣatādīdhityādau spaṣṭametat/	prayAsaH viPalaH iti prAhuH/ 1pakzata AdIDitya AdO spazwam etat /
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   pakṣalakṣaṇam	pakza lakzaNam
   AnTs_49 saṃdigdhasādhyavān pakṣaḥ / yathā dhūmavattve hetau parvataḥ //	AnTH _49 saMdigDa sADyavAn pakzaH / yaTA DUmavat tve hetO parvataH //

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   pakṣalakṣaṇamāha  	pakza lakzaNam Aha  
   sandigdheti/ nanu śravaṇānantarabhāvimananasthale avyāptiḥ/ tatra	sandigDA iti/ nanu SravaNa anantara BAvi manana sTale avyAptiH/ tatra
   vedavākyairātmano niścitatvena sandehābhāvāt/ kiṃ ca pratyakṣe 'pi	veda vAkyEH AtmanaH niScita tvena sandeha aBAva at/ kim ca pratyakze api
   vahnau yatra icchayā anumitiḥ tatra avyāptiriti cet na/	vahnO yatra icCayA anumitiH tatra avyAptiH iti cet na/
   uktapakṣatāśrayatvasya pakṣalakṣaṇatvāt/	ukta pakzata ASraya tvasya pakza lakzaNa tvAt/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mūle	mUle
   sandigdhasādhyavāniti/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	sandigDa sADya vAn iti/ viSezyatA sambanDena
   sādhyaprakārakasaṃśayaviśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ/ sapakṣalakṣaṇādikamapyevaṃ	sADya prakAraka saMSaya viSizwaH iti arTaH/ sa pakza lakzaNa Adikam api evam
   pariṣkartavyam/ pakṣalakṣaṇasyāvyāptimāśaṅkte   dīpikāyāṃ nanviti/	parizkartavyam/ pakza lakzaNasya avyAptim ASaFkte  dIpikAyAm nanu iti/
   saṃśayavighaṭakaśābdabuddhisthale 'vyāptimuktvā pratyakṣasthale 'pi tāmāha	saMSaya viGawa ka SAbda budDi sTale avyAptim uktvA pratyakza sTale api tAm Aha
   kiñcati/ ukteti/	kiQcati/ uktA iti/

   prasiddhasādhyakasthale pakṣaviśeṣyikaivānumitiranubhūyate' iti	prasidDa sADyaka sTale pakzaviSezyikA eva anumitiH anuBUyate a iti

   sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumiteranupapattyā sādhyaviśeṣyakānumitirūpeyate'	sADya viSezaNaka anumiteH anupapattyA sADya viSezyaka anumitirUpeyate a
   ityādyuktaṃ draṣṭavyam/	ityAdi uktam drazwavyam/
   sādhyaprakārakatādṛśasaṃśayasya viśeṣyatāsambandhena parvate	sADya prakAraka tAdRSa saMSayasya viSezyatA sambanDena parvate
   sattvāt parvatasya pakṣatā/ prakāratāsambandhena tādṛśasaṃśayasya vahnau	sattvAt parvatasya pakzatA/ prakAratA sambanDena tAdRSa saMSayasya vahnO
   sattvāt vahneḥ pakṣatvavāraṇāya viśeṣyatāsambandhenetyuktam/	sattvAt vahneH pakza tva vAraNAya viSezyatA sambanDena iti uktam/
   sapakṣalakṣaṇādikamapyevaṃ pariṣkartavyamiti/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	sa pakza lakzaNa Adikam api evam parizkartavyam iti/ viSezyatA sambanDena
   sādhyaprakārakanirṇayaviśiṣṭaḥ sapakṣaḥ, viśeṣyatāsambandhena	sADya prakAraka nirNaya viSizwaH sa pakzaH, viSezyatA sambanDena
   sādhyābhāvaprakārakanirṇayaviśiṣṭaḥ	sADya aBAva prakAraka nirNaya viSizwaH
   vipakṣaḥ iti rītyā	vipakzaH iti rItyA
   pariṣkartavyamityarthaḥ/ saṃśayavighaṭaketi/ ātmā	parizkartavyam iti arTaH/ saMSaya viGawa ka iti/ AtmA
   dehendriyādivilakṣaṇo na veti sandehasya pratibandhakaḥ yaḥ	deha indriya Adi vilakzaNaH na vA iti sandehasya pratibanDakaH yaH
   vedavākyajanyaḥ śābdabodhaḥ ātmā dehendriyādivilakṣaṇaḥ	veda vAkya janyaH SAbda boDaH AtmA deha indriya Adi vilakzaNaH
   ityākārakaḥ tatra tādṛśaśābdabodhātmakaśravaṇānantaraṃ ātmā	iti AkArakaH tatra tAdRSa SAbda boDa Atmaka SravaNa anantaram AtmA
   dehendriyādivilakṣaṇa ityākārakānumitirūpaṃ mananaṃ na syāt/	deha indriya Adi vilakzaNaH iti AkAraka anumiti rUpam mananam na syAt /

   sādadhyaprakārakasandehavattvarūpapakṣatvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/	sAdaDya prakAraka sandeha vat tva rUpa pakzatva aBAvAt iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   sapakṣalakṣaṇam	sa pakza lakzaNam
   AnTs_50 niścitasādhyavān sapakṣaḥ / yathā tatraiva mahānasaḥ //	AnTH _50 niScita sADyavAn sa pakzaH / yaTA tatra eva mahAnasaH //

   vipakṣalakṣaṇam	vipakza lakzaNam
   AnTs_51 niścitasādhyābhāvavān vipakṣaḥ / yathā tatraiva mahāhradaḥ //	AnTH _51 niScita sADya aBAvavAn vipakzaH / yaTA tatra eva mahA hradaH //

   hetvābhāsanirūpaṇam	hetvABAsa nirUpaNam
   AnTs_52 savyabhicāraviruddhasatpakṣāsiddhabādhitāḥ pañca hetvābhāsāḥ //	AnTH _52 savyaBicAra virudDa sat pakzA sidDa bADitAH paQca hetvABAsAH //

   vipakṣalakṣaṇamāha  	vipakza lakzaNam Aha  
   niściteti/	niScitA iti/
   evaṃ saddhetūnnirūpya	evam sat hetUn nirUpya
   asaddhetūnnirūpayituṃ vibhajate   savyabhicāreti/	asat hetUn nirUpayitum viBajate  savyaBicAra iti/
   anumitipratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvam/	anumiti pratibanDaka yaTA arTa jQAna vizaya tvam hetvABAsa tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   saddhetūnnirūpya  	sat DetUn nirUpya  
   vyāptyādiviśiṣṭahetūnnirūpyetyarthaḥ/ saddhetunirūpaṇe	vyApti Adi viSizwa hetUn nirUpya iti arTaH/ sat hetu nirUpaNe
   asaddhetusmaraṇāta prasaṅgasaṅgatyā tannirūpaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/ mūle	asat hetu smaraNAta prasaFga saFgatyA tad nirUpaNam iti BAvaH/ mUle
   hetvābhāsā iti/ hetuvadābhāsanta iti hetvābhāsāḥ/	hetvABAsAH iti/ hetu vat ABAsantaH iti hetvABAsAH/
   duṣṭahetavo nirūpyanta ityarthaḥ/ nanu	duzwa hetavaH nirUpyantaH iti arTaH/ nanu
   sāmānyadharmaprakārakajñānamantarā viśeṣajijñāsānudayena	sAmAnya Darma prakAraka jQAnam antarA viSeza jijQAsA anudayena
   savyabhicāretyādinā vibhāgo 'nucita ityāśaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ	savyaBicAra ityAdinA viBAgaH anucitaH iti ASaFkAm parijihIrzuH
   doṣalakṣaṇe 'bhihite doṣavattvarūpaduṣṭalakṣaṇasyātisphaṭatvāt lābho	doza lakzaNe aBihite dozavat tva rUpa duzwa lakzaNasya ati sPawa tvAt lABaH 
   bhavatītyāśayena doṣasāmānyalakṣaṇamāha   anumitīti/	Bavati iti ASayena doza sAmAnya lakzaNam Aha  anumiti iti/
   hetvābhāsatvamiti/ hetorābhāsāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ hetuniṣṭhāḥ doṣāḥ,	hetvABAsa tvam iti/ hetoH ABAsAH hetvABAsAH hetu nizWAH dozAH,
   teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ tattvamityarthaḥ/ 'hrado vahnimān' ityādyanumitiṃ prati	tezAm BAvaH tattvam iti arTaH/ ahradaH vahnimAna ityAdi anumitim prati
   'vahnyabhāvavān hrada' ityādibādhaniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ/	avahni aBAvavAn hrada a iti Adi bADa niScayaH pratibanDakaH/
   pramātmakatādṛśaniścayaviṣayatvaṃ vahnyabhāvavaddhradādau akṣatamiti	pramA Atmaka tAdRSa niScaya vizaya tvam vahni aBAva vat hrada AdO akzatam iti
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ atrānumitipadaṃ ajahallakṣaṇayā	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ atra anumiti padam ajahat lakzaNayA
   anumititatkaraṇānyataraparam/ tena vyabhicārādijñānasya	anumiti tatkaraNa ani atara param/ tena vyaBicAra Adi jQAnasya
   parāmarśapratibandhakatayaiva nirvāhāt anumityapratibandhakatve 'pi	parAmarSa pratibanDaka tayA eva nirvAhAt anumityapratibanDaka tve api
   vyabhicārādiṣu nāvyāptiḥ/ 'parvato nirvahniḥ' iti bādhabhramasya	vyaBicAra Adizu na avyAptiH/ aparvataH nirvahniHa iti bADa Bramasya
   'parvato vahnimān' ityanumitipratibandhakatvāt	aparvataH vahnimAna iti anumiti pratibanDaka tvAt 
   tadviṣayavahnyabhāvādau ativyāptiḥ ataḥ yathārtheti/ bhramābhinnetyarthaḥ/	tad vizaya vahni aBAva AdO ativyAptiH atas yaTArTa iti/ Brama aBinnA iti arTaH/
   athaivamapi	aTa evam api
   vahnyabhāvavaddhradātmakabādhaikadeśe vahnyabhāvādau ativyāptiḥ/	vahni aBAvavat hrada Atmaka bADa eka deSe vahni aBAva AdO ativyAptiH/
   'vahnyabhāvavān hradaḥ' ityākārakayarthārthajñānaviṣayatvasya tatra	avahni aBAvavAn hradaH a iti AkArakayarTa arTa jQAna vizaya tvasya tatra
   sattvāditi cet na/ yadrūpāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānasāmānyaṃ	sattvAt iti cet na/ yad rUpa avacCinna vizaya ka jQAna sAmAnyam
   anumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ	anumiti pratibanDakam tad rUpa avacCinna tvam
   doṣatvamityarthaparyavasānenādoṣāt/	doza tvam iti arTa paryavasAnena adozAt/
   vahnyabhāvatvāvacchinnaviṣayakasya 'vahnyabhāvavān hradaḥ' iti	vahni aBAva tva avacCinna vizayakasya avahni aBAvavAn hradaH a iti
   jñānasyānumitipratibandhakatve 'pi tādṛśajñānasāmānyāntargatasya	jQAnasya anumiti pratibanDaka tve api tAdRSa jQAna sAmAnya antargatasya
   'vahnyabhāva' ityākārakajñānasya apratibandhakatvena vahnyabhāvatvādeḥ	avahnyaBAva a iti AkAraka jQAnasya apratibanDaka tvena vahni aBAva tva AdeH
   yadrūpapadenopādānāsambhavāt/ na ca tarhi yathārthapadaṃ vyartham/	yad rUpa padena upAdAna asamBavAt/ na ca tarhi yaTArTa padam vyarTam/
   'parvato nirvahniḥ' iti bhramaviṣaye 'pi vahnyabhāvādāvativyāpteḥ	aparvataH nirvahniHa iti Brama vizaye api vahni aBAva At O= ati vyApteH
   uktarītyaiva vāraṇāditi vācyam/ jñānapadasya	ukta rItyA eva vAraNAt iti vAcyam/ jQAna padasya
   jñānaviśeṣatātparyagrāhakatayā yathārthapadasārthakyāt/ evaṃ ca	jQAna viSeza tAtparya grAhaka tayA yaTArTa pada sArTakyAt/ evam ca
   yadrūpāvacchinnaviṣayakānāhāryāprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditaniścayasāmānyaṃ	yad rUpa avacCinna vizaya kAnAhAryA prAmANya jQA nAnAskandita niScaya sAmAnyam
   prakṛtānumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ doṣatvamityarthaḥ	prakRta anumiti pratibanDakam tad rUpa avacCinna tvam doza tvam iti arTaH
   paryavasitaḥ/ tena vahnyabhāvavaddhradaviṣayakasya āhāryasya	paryavasitaH/ tena vahni aBAva vat hrada vizayakasya AhAryasya
   aprāmāṇyajñānaviśiṣṭasya saṃśayasya ca anumityapratibandhakatve 'pi	aprAmANya jQAna viSizwasya saMSayasya ca anumityapratibanDaka tve api
   nāsambhava ityalaṃ pallavitena/	na asamBavaH iti alam pallavitena/
   pare tu   idaṃ	pare tu  idam
   duṣṭānāmeva lakṣaṇam/ parantu jñāyamānavyabhicārādeḥ	duzwAnAm eva lakzaNam/ parantu jQAyamAna vyaBicAra AdeH
   pratibandhakatvamabhyupetya/ tadarthastu anumitipratibandhakā ye	pratibanDaka tvam aByupetya/ tad arTaH tu anumiti pratibanDakAH ye
   vyabhicārādayaḥ ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhena	vyaBicAra AdayaH eka jQAna vizaya prakRta hetu tAvat Cedakavat tva sambanDena
   tatprakārakayathārthajñānaviśeṣyatvam/ 'dhūmavān vahneḥ' ityādau	tad prakAraka yaTa arTa jQAna viSezya tvam/ aDUmavAn vahneH a iti AdO
   dhūmābhāvavadvṛttitvaviśiṣṭavahniḥ vyabhicāraḥ,	DUma aBAvavat vRtti tva viSizwa vahniH vyaBicAraH,
   uktasambandhena 'tadvān	ukta sambanDena atadvAn
   vahniḥ' ityākārakayathārthañjñānaviśeṣyatvamastīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	vahniHa iti AkAraka yaTArTan jQAna viSezya tvam asti iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   anumitipadasya prakṛtānumitiparatayā saddhetau	anumiti padasya prakRta anumiti para tayA sat hetO
   anumitipratibandhakībhūtavyabhicārādīnāmaprasiddhatvāt nātivyāptiḥ/	anumiti pratibanDakIBUta vyaBicAra AdInAm aprasidDa tvAt na ati vyAptiH/
   yathārthapadānupādāne darśitasambandhena	yaTA arTa pada anupAdAne darSita sambanDena
   vyabhicāraprakārakabhramaviśeṣyatvasya saddhetāvapi sattvenātivyāptiḥ	vyaBicAra prakAraka Brama viSezya tvasya sat hetO= api sattvena ativyAptiH
   syāditi tanniveśa ityāhuḥ/	syAt iti tat niveSaH iti AhuH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   vyāptyādiviśiṣṭahetūniti/ ādipadena pakṣadharmatā gṛhyate/	vyApti Adi viSizwa hetUniti/ Adipadena pakza DarmatA gRhyate/
   tathā ca vyāpti pakṣadharmatāviśiṣṭahetutvaṃ saddhetorlakṣaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	taTA ca vyApti pakza DarmatA viSizwa hetu tvam sat hetoH lakzaNam iti BAvaH/
   hetuvadābhāsanta iti/ hetutvaprakārakabhramaviṣayāḥ ityarthaḥ/	hetu vat ABAsantaH iti/ hetu tva prakAraka Brama vizayAH iti arTaH/
   hetutvaṃ ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāviśiṣṭatvam/ tathā ca	hetu tvam ca vyApti pakza Darma tA viSizwa tvam/ taTA ca
   vyāptipakṣadharmatāviśiṣṭatvaprakārakabhramaviṣayatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvam/	vyApti pakza Darma tA viSizwa tva prakAraka Brama vizaya tvam hetvABAsa tvam/
   tattu duṣṭahetūnāmeva bhavati, saddhetūnāṃ tatpramāviṣayatvāditi	tat tu duzwa hetUnAm eva Bavati, sat hetUnAm tad pramAvizaya tvAt iti
   hetvābhāsaśabdaḥ duṣṭahetupara iti bhāvaḥ/ lakṣaṇasamanvaya iti/	hetvABAsa SabdaH duzwa hetu paraH iti BAvaH/ lakzaNa samanvayaH iti/
   tathā ca 'hrado vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra vahnyabhāvavaddhradātmakaḥ	taTA ca ahradaH vahnimAn DUmAt a iti atra vahni aBAva vat hrada AtmakaH
   bādhaḥ doṣaḥ/ tādṛśadoṣavattvaṃ ca hetoḥ dhūmasya	bADaH dozaH/ tAdRSa dozavat tvam ca hetoH DUmasya
   ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhenāstīti duṣṭatvam/	eka jQAna vizaya prakRta hetu tAvat Cedakavat tva sambanDena asti iti duzwa tvam/
   'vahnyabhāvavaddhradaḥ dhūmatvaṃ ca' ityekajñāne bādhasya dhūmatvasya ca	avahnyaBAvavat hradaH DUma tvam ca a iti eka jQAne bADasya DUma tvasya ca
   viṣayatvādityādikamūhanīyam/	vizaya tvAt ityAdikam UhanIyam/
   nanvanumitipratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvaṃ yadi doṣalakṣaṇaṃ	nanu anumiti pratibanDaka yaTA arTa jQAna vizaya tvam yadi doza lakzaNam
   tadā bādhasatpratipakṣayorevedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ samanviyāt/ bādhaniścayasya	tadA bADasat pratipakzayoH eva idam lakzaNam samanviyAt/ bADa niScayasya
   satpratipakṣaniścayasya ca 'hrado vahnyabhāvavān' ityākārakasya 'hrado	sat pratipakza niScayasya ca ahradaH vahni aBAvavAn a iti AkArakasya ahradaH 
   vahnyabhāvavyāpyaśaivālavān' ityākārakasya ca tadvattābuddhiṃ prati	vahni aBAva vyApya SEvAlavAn a iti AkArakasya ca tadvat tA budDim prati
   tadabhāvavattāniścayavidhayā tadabhāvavyāpyavattāniścayavidhayā ca	tad aBAvavat tA niScaya viDayA tad aBAva vyApya vattA niScaya viDayA ca
   pratibandhakatvāt, tadviṣayatvarūpalakṣaṇasattvāt/	pratibanDaka tvAt, tad vizaya tva rUpa lakzaNa sattvAt/
   vyabhicāravirodhasvarūpāsiddhiprabhṛtiṣu lakṣaṇamidaṃ na samanveti/	vyaBicAra viroDa svarUpA sidDi praBRtizu lakzaNam idam na samanveti/
   tajjñānānāmanumitipratibandhakatvābhāvāt,	tad jQAnAnAm anumiti pratibanDaka tva aBAvAt,
   anumitikaraṇaparāmarśapratibandhakatvasyaiva vyabhicārādijñāneṣu	anumiti karaNa parAmarSa pratibanDaka tvasya eva vyaBicAra Adi jQAnezu
   sattvādityata āha   atrānumitipadamiti/ tathā ca	sattvAt iti atas Aha  atra anumiti padam iti/ taTA ca
   anumititatkaraṇānyatarapratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvaṃ	anumiti tatkaraNa anyatara pratibanDaka yaTA arTa jQAna vizaya tvam
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇam/ parāmarśapratibandhakatayaiveti/ vyabhicārajñānaṃ	hetvABAsa lakzaNam/ parAmarSa pratibanDaka tayA eva iti/ vyaBicAra jQAnam
   parāmarśe vyāptibhānāṃśe pratibandhakam/ virodhajñānaṃ	parAmarSe vyApti BAna aMSe pratibanDakam/ viroDa jQAnam
   sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāṃśabhāne pratibandhakam/ svarūpāsiddhijñānaṃ	sADya sAmAna aDikaraNyA aMSa BAne pratibanDakam/ svarUpa asidDi jQAnam
   pakṣadharmatvabhāne pratibandhakamiti sarveṣāṃ	pakza Darma tva BAne pratibanDakam iti sarvezAm
   anumitikaraṇaparāmarśapratibandhakasattvāt nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	anumiti karaNa parAmarSa pratibanDaka sattvAt na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   nirvāhāditi/ lakṣaṇopapatterityarthaḥ/ yathārthapadaprayojanamāha  	nirvAhAt iti/ lakzaNa upapatteH iti arTaH/ yaTArTa pada prayojanam Aha  
   parvato nirvahniriti/ tathā ca yathārthapadānupādāne parvate	parvataH nirvahniH iti/ taTA ca yaTArTa pada anupAdAne parvate
   vahnyabhāvavānityākārakabhramasya 'parvato vahnimān'	vahni aBAva vAn iti AkAraka Bramasya aparvataH vahnimAn a
   ityanumitipratibandhakatvāt tādṛśabhramaviṣayasya vahnyabhāvasya	iti anumiti pratibanDaka tvAt tAdRSa Brama vizayasya vahni aBAvasya
   doṣatvaṃ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya yathārthapadam/ uktabhramasya	doza tvam syAt/ tad vAraNAya yaTArTa padam/ ukta Bramasya
   yathārthatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu	yaTArTa tva aBAvAt na ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/ nanu
   yathārthapadopādāne 'pi 'parvato vahnyabhāvavān' iti	yaTA arTa pada upAdAne api aparvataH vahni aBAvavAn a iti
   bhramavāraṇamaśakyam/ tasyāpi parvatatvavati parvatatvaprakārakatvena	Brama vAraNam aSakyam/ tasya api parvatatvavati parvata tva prakAraka tvena
   vahnyabhāvatvavati vahnabhāvatvaprakārakatvena ca tadvati	vahni aBAva tvavati vahna BAva tva prakAraka tvena ca tadvati
   tatprakārakatvarūpayathārthalakṣaṇākrāntatvena yathārthatvādityata āha  	tad prakAraka tva rUpa yaTa arTa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvena yaTArTa tvAt iti atas Aha  
   bhramabhinnetyartha iti/ tathā caprakṛtalakṣaṇaghaṭakaṃ yathārthapadaṃ	BramaBinnA iti arTaH iti/ taTA caprakRta lakzaNa Gawakam yaTArTa padam
   tadabhāvavati tatprakārakabhinnārthakam/ 'parvato vahnyabhāvavān' iti	tad aBAvavati tad prakAraka Binna arTa kam/ aparvataH vahni aBAvavAn a iti
   jñānaṃ tu vahnyabhāvābhāvavati vahnyabhāvaprakārakatayā bhramātmakam,	jQAnam tu vahni aBAva aBAvavati vahni aBAva prakAraka tayA Brama Atmakam,
   tadbhinnaṃ na bhavatīti na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ bhramabhinnatvameva sarvāṃśe	tat Binnam na Bavati iti na dozaH iti BAvaH/ Brama Binna tvam eva sarva aMSe
   pramātvamityucyate/ tacca 1svavyadhikaraṇaprakārāvacchinna yā yā	pramAtvam iti ucyate/ tat ca 1sva vyaDikaraNa prakAra avacCin na yA yA
   viśeṣyatā tattadanirūpakatvam/	viSezyatA tad tat anirUpaka tvam/
   1. svavyadhikaraṇeti/	1. sva vyaDikaraNa iti/
   svavyadhikaraṇetyasya svādhikaraṇāvṛttītyarthaḥ/ śuktau idaṃ rajatamiti	sva vyaDi karaNa iti asya sva aDikaraNa AvRtti iti arTaH/ SuktO idam rajatam iti
   bhramīyaśuktiniṣṭhaviśaṣyatāyā svapadena upādāne svādhikaraṇaṃ śuktiḥ	BramIya Sukti nizWa viSazya tAyA sva padena upAdAne sva aDikaraNam SuktiH
   tadavṛttiḥ yaḥ prakāraḥ rajatatvaṃ tadavacchinnā yā viśeṣyatā	tad avRttiH yaH prakAraH rajata tvam tad avacCinnA yA viSezyatA
   śuktiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatā tannirūpakatvam idaṃ rajatamiti bhrame	Sukti nizWa viSezya tA tad nirUpaka tvam idam rajatam iti Brame
   tadanirūpakatvaṃ idaṃ rajatamiti pramāyāmiti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	tat anirUpaka tvam idam rajatam iti pramAyAm iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   1svānirūpitatvasvāśrayābhāvavadvṛttitvobhayasambandhena	1svAnirUpita tva sva ASraya aBAvavat vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena
   prakāratāviśiṣṭā yā viśeṣyatā tadanirūpakatvamiti yāvat/	prakAra tA viSizwA yA viSezyatA tat anirUpaka tvam iti yAvat /
   adhikamudgrantheṣu/	aDikam udgranTa izu/
   śaṅkate  	SaFkate  
   athaivamapīti/ bhramabhinnārthakayathārthapadaniveśe 'pītyarthaḥ/ 'hrado	aTa evam api iti/ Brama Binna arTaka yaTa arTa pada niveSe api iti arTaH/ ahradaH 
   vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra 'hrado vahnyabhāvavān' iti niścayasya	vahnimAn DUmAt a iti atra ahradaH vahni aBAvavAn a iti niScayasya
   pratibandhakatayā tadviṣayatvaṃ vahnyabhāvavaddhra iva vahnyabhāve	pratibanDaka tayA tad vizaya tvam vahni aBAva vat hraH iva vahni aBAve
   'pyasti/	api asti/
   tathā ca anumitipratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvarūpasya	taTA ca anumiti pratibanDaka yaTA arTa jQAna vizaya tva rUpasya
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇasya bādhānātmake vahnyabhāve 'tivyāptirityarthaḥ/	hetvABAsa lakzaNasya bADAna Atmake vahni aBAve ati vyAptiH iti arTaH/
   samādhatte     yadrūpāvacchinneti/ tathā ca yadrūpapadena	samADatte    yad rUpa avacCinnA iti/ taTA ca yad rUpa padena
   vahnyabhāvatvasyopādāne tadavacchinnaviṣayakasya 'vahnyabhāvavān	vahni aBAva tvasya upAdAne tad avacCinna vizayakasya avahni aBAvavAn
   hradaḥ' iti	hradaH a iti
   jñānasyānumitipratibandhakatve 'pi	jQAnasya anumiti pratibanDaka tve api
   vahnyabhāvatvāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānasāmānyāntargatasya 'vahnyabhāvaḥ'	vahni aBAva tva avacCinna vizaya ka jQAna sAmAnya antargatasya avahnyaBAvaH a
   ityākārakajñānasya 'hrado vahnimān'	iti AkAraka jQAnasya ahradaH vahnimAn a
   ityākārakānumitipratibandhakatvaṃ nāsti/ ataḥ	iti AkAraka anumiti pratibanDaka tvam nAsti/ atas 
   vahnyabhāvavaddhradatvameva yadrūpapadena dhartavyam/	vahni aBAva vat hrada tvam eva yad rUpa padena Dartavyam/
   tadavacchinnaviṣayakajñānasāmānyasyānumitipratibandhakatvāt/	tad avacCinna vizaya ka jQAna sAmAnyasya anumiti pratibanDaka tvAt/
   tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ ca vahnyabhāvavaddhrada evāsti na vanhyabhāva iti	tad rUpa avacCinna tvam ca vahni aBAva vat hrade eva asti na vanhyaBAvaH iti
   nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ na ca tarhīti/ 'parvato vanhyabhāvavān' iti	na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ na ca tarhi iti/ aparvataH vanhi aBAvavAn a iti
   bhramaviṣaye vanhyabhāve 'tivyāptivāraṇāya hi yathārthapadamupāttam/	Brama vizaye vanhi aBAve ati vyApti vAraNAya hi yaTArTa padam upAttam/
   niruktapariṣkāre tu yadrūpapadena na vanhyabhāvatvamupādātuṃ	nirukta parizkAre tu yad rUpa padena na vanhyaBAva tvam upAdAtum
   śakyate/	Sakyate/

   1. svanirūpitatveti/	1. sva nirUpita tva iti/

   sādhyo vanhiḥ tanniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpako 'bhāvaḥ	sADyaH vanhiH tad nizWa pratiyogitAnirUpakaH aBAvaH
   mahānasīyavanhyabhāvo 'pi tadvān parvataḥ tannirūpitavṛttitvasya dhūme	mahAnasIya van hi aBAvaH api tadvAn parvataH tad nirUpita vRtti tvasya DUme
   sattvāditi/ sādhyatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnatvasya pratiyogitāyāṃ	sattva at iti/ sADya tAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna tvasya pratiyogitAyAm
   niveśe tu mahānasīyavanhyabhāvo grahītuṃ na śakyate, tasya	niveSe tu mahAnasIya van hi aBAvaH grahItum na Sakyate, tasya
   mahānasīyatvasahitavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākatve 'pi	mahAnasIya tva sahita van hitvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tve api
   kevalavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvābhāvāt/ api tu	kevala van hitvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tva aBAvAt/ api tu
   vanhirnāstīti pratītisiddhaḥ vanhisāmānyābhāva eva	vanhiH na asti iti pratIti sidDaH vanhi sAmAnya aBAvaH eva
   vanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākaḥ tadvān hradādiḥ tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ	vanhitvA avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH tadvAn hrada AdiH tad nirUpita ADeya tvam
   dhūme nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/ evaṃ sādhyaniṣṭhapratiyogitāyāṃ	DUme na asti iti na ati vyAptiH/ evam sADya nizWa pratiyogitAyAm
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe 'parvato vanhimān	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva aniva ISe aparvataH vanhimAn
   dhūmāt' ityatraiva samavāyena vanhirnāstīti pratītisiddhasya	DUmAt a iti atra eva samavAyena vanhiH na asti iti pratIti sidDasya
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvasyāpi	samavAya sambanDa avacCinnavan hitvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvasya api
   lakṣaṇaghaṭakatayā tadvān parvato 'pi tatra saṃyogena vanheḥ satve 'pi	lakzaNa Gawaka tayA tadvAn parvataH api tatra saMyogena vanheH satve api
   samavāyena vanherabhāvāt, parvatanirūpitavṛttitvasya ca dhūme	samavAyena vanheH aBAvAt, parvata nirUpita vRtti tvasya ca DUme
   sattvādativyāptiḥ/ sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśe tu	sattvAt ati vyAptiH/ sADya tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva niveSe tu
   saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhyabhāvasyaiva grāhyatayā tadvān hradādireva	saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna vanhi aBAvasya eva grAhya tayA tadvAn hrada AdiH eva
   tanniyapitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/ ādheyatāyāṃ	tad niyapita ADeya tvam DUme na asti iti na ati vyAptiH/ ADeya tAyAm
   hetutāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe	hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe
   saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhyabhāvavān dhūmāvayavo 'pi'	saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna vanhi aBAvavAn DUma avayavaH api a
   tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme 'stītyativyāptiḥ syāt/ tanniveśe tu	tad nirUpita ADeya tvam DUme asti iti ativyAptiH syAt/ tad niveSe tu
   dhūmāvayavanirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvasya dhūme sattve 'pi	DUma avayava nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tvasya DUme sattve api
   saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvaṃ nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/ hetumati	saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tvam na asti iti na ati vyAptiH/ hetumati
   parvatādāviti/ etacca hetoḥ	parvata AdO= iti/ etat ca hetoH
   sādhyābhāvavannirūpitādheyatvamevāstīti sūcanārthamuktam/	sADya aBAva vat nirUpita ADeya tvam eva asti iti sUcanA arTam uktam/
   tattatsādhyābhāvasyeti/ mahānasīyavanhyādyabhāvasyetyarthaḥ/	tad tad sADya aBAvasya iti/ mahAnasIya van hi Adi a BAvasya iti arTaH/
   sambandhāntarāvacchinnāsādhyasāmānyābhāvasyeti/	sambanDa antara avacCinnA asADya sAmAnya aBAvasya iti/
   sādhyatāvacchedakasaṃyogasambandhātiriktasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākavanhitvāvacchinnābhāvasyetyarthaḥ/	sADya tAvacCedaka saMyoga sambanDa atirikta samavAya sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka van hi tvA avacCinna aBAvasya iti arTaH/
   tatra ca	tatra ca
   sādhyābhāvavattāyāmityādi/ sādhyābhāvavattāyāṃ yadi	sADya aBAvavat tAyAm ityAdi/ sADya aBAvavat tAyAm yadi
   sambandhaviśeṣāvacchinnatvaṃ na niveśyate tarhi	sambanDa viSeza avacCinna tvam na niveSyate tarhi
   saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvasya	saMyoga sambanDa avacCinnavan hitvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvasya
   kālikasaṃbandhenādhikaraṇaṃ parvato 'pi bhavatīti tannirūpitādheyatvasya	kAlika saMbanDena aDikaraNam parvataH api Bavati iti tad nirUpita ADeya tvasya
   dhūme sattvāt saddhetāvativyāptiḥ/	DUme sattvAt sat hetO= ati vyAptiH/
   sādhyābhāvaniṣṭhasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnādheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatvaṃ	sADya aBAva nizWa svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA nirUpita aDikaraNa tvam
   sādhyābhāvavattvamiti vivakṣaṇe ca yadyapi vahnyabhāvasya	sADya aBAvavat tvam iti vivakzaNe ca yadi api vahni aBAvasya
   svarūpasambandhenādhikaraṇaṃ na parvataḥ, api tu hradādireva	svarUpa sambanDena aDikaraNam na parvataH, api tu hrada AdiH eva
   tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti ativyāptirvārayituṃ śakyate,	tad nirUpita ADeya tvam DUme na asti iti ati vyAptiH vArayitum Sakyate,
   tathāpi 'paṭaḥ ghaṭatvābhāvavān dravyatvāt' ityatra	taTA api apawaH Gawa tva aBAvavAn dravya tvAt a iti atra
   vyabhicāriṇyativyāptiḥ/ tathā hi  sādhyābhāvavati	vyaBicAriNI ati vyAptiH/ taTA hi sADya aBAvavati
   ghaṭatvābhāvābhāvavati ghaṭatvavati ghaṭe dravyatvasattvāt ayaṃ	Gawa tva aBAva aBAvavati Gawatvavati Gawe dravya tva sattvAt ayam
   sādhāraṇavyabhicārī hetuḥ/ atra sādhyābhāvaḥ ghaṭatvābhāvābhāvaḥ	sADAraNa vyaBicArI hetuH/ atra sADya aBAvaH Gawa tva aBAva aBAvaH
   ghaṭatvarūpaḥ tasya svarūpasambandhenādhikaraṇamaprasiddham/ bhāvānāṃ	Gawa tva rUpaH tasya svarUpa sambanDena aDikaraNam aprasidDam/ BAvAnAm
   svarūpasambandhena kvāpyavṛtterityavyāptiḥ/ ataḥ	svarUpa sambanDena kvApi avRtteH iti avyAptiH/ atas 
   sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakasambandhena sādhyābhāvavattvaṃ	sADya vat tA graha viroDitA niyAmaka sambanDena sADya aBAvavat tvam
   vivakṣaṇīyam/	vivakzaNIyam/
   1sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinna sādhyatāvacchedaka dharmāvicchinna sādhyaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpita 	1sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna  sADya tA avacCeda ka Darma avicCinna  sADya nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita 
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinna pakṣaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāśālibuddhitvāvacchinnaṃ	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna pakza nizWa viSezya tA Sa ali budDi tva avacCinnam
   prati	prati
   yatsambandhāvacchisādadhyābhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāśāliniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ	yad sambanDa avacCisA da Dya aBAva nizWa prakAra tA SAli niScayaH pratibanDakaH
   sa	sa
   sambandhaḥ sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmaka iti kathyate/ 'parvanto	sambanDaH sADya vat tA graha viroDitA niyAmakaH iti kaTyate/ aparvantaH 
   dhūmavān vanheḥ' ityatra 'parvataḥ saṃyogena dhūmavān' iti	DUmavAn vanheH a iti atra aparvataH saMyogena DUmavAn a iti
   buddhiṃ prati 'parvataḥ svarūpasambandhena dhūmābhāvavān' iti niścayaḥ	budDim prati aparvataH svarUpa sambanDena DUma aBAvavAn a iti niScayaH
   pratibandhakaḥ iti svarūpasambandha eva	pratibanDakaH iti svarUpa sambanDaH eva
   sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakaḥ tena sambandhena dhūmābhāvavān	sADya vat tA graha viroDitA niyAmakaH tena sambanDena DUma aBAvavAn
   ayogolakaḥ tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ vanhāvastīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	ayaH golakaH tad nirUpita ADeya tvam vanhO= asti iti lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   'parvato vanhimān dhūmāt' ityatra 'parvataḥ saṃyogasambandhena	aparvataH vanhimAn DUmAt a iti atra aparvataH saMyoga sambanDena
   vanhimān' iti buddhiṃ prati vanhyabhāvasya svarūpasaṃbandhenādhikaraṇaṃ	vanhimAna iti budDim prati vanhyaBAvasya svarUpa saMbanDena aDikaraNam
   parvata iti niścaya eva pratibandhakaḥ, na tu kālikasambandhena	parvataH iti niScayaH eva pratibanDakaH, na tu kAlika sambanDena
   vahnyabhāvādhikaraṇaṃ parvata iti niścayo 'pi tādṛśaniścayasattve 'pi	vahni aBAva aDikaraNam parvataH iti niScayaH api tAdRSa niScaya sattve api
   'parvataḥ saṃyogena vahnimān' iti buddherutpatteḥ/ tathā ca	aparvataH saMyogena vahnimAna iti budDeH utpatteH/ taTA ca
   svarūpasambandhasyaiva	svarUpa sambanDasya eva
   sādhyavattāgrahavirodhatāniyāmakatayā tena sambandhena	sADya vat tA graha viroDa tA niyAmaka tayA tena sambanDena
   vahnyabhāvādhikaraṇaṃ hradādireva tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti	vahni aBAva aDikaraNam hrada AdiH eva tad nirUpita ADeya tvam DUme na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ 'ghaṭatvābhāvavān dravyatvāt'	na ati vyAptiH/ aGawa tva aBAvavAn dravya tvAt a
   ityatra 'paṭo	iti atra apawaH 
   ghaṭatvābhāvavān' iti sādhyavattābuddhiṃ prati paṭaḥ	Gawa tva aBAvavAn a iti sADya vat tA budDim prati pawaH
   ghaṭatvābhāvābhāvavān (samavāyena ghaṭatvavān) ityākārakaḥ	Gawa tva aBAva aBAvavAn (samavAyena GawatvavAn) iti AkArakaH
   niścayaḥ pratibandhaka iti samavāyaḥ	niScayaH pratibanDakaH iti samavAyaH
   sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakasambandhaḥ tena sambandhena	sADya vat tA graha viroDita aniyAmaka sambanDaH tena sambanDena
   sādhyābhāvādhikaraṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ tannirūpitādadheyatvaṃ dravyatve 'stīti	sADya aBAva aDikaraNam GawaH tad nirUpitAdaDeya tvam dravya tve asti iti
   nāvyāptiḥ/ 'ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ kapisaṃyogī etadvṛkṣatvāt' ityatra 'vṛkṣaḥ	na avyAptiH/ aayam vRkzaH kapi saMyogI etat vRkza tvAt a iti atra avRkzaH
   kapisaṃyogī'ti buddhiṃ prati 'vṛkṣaḥ	kapi saMyogI ati budDim prati avRkzaH
   niravacchinnadaiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena kapisaṃyogābhāvavān'	niravacCinna dESika viSezaNatA sambanDena kapi saMyoga aBAvavAn a
   iti	iti
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhena sādhyatāvacchedakadharmeṇa ca	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDena sADya tAvacCedaka DarmeNa ca
   sādhyaprakārakajñānaṃ prati yena sambandhena sādhyābhāvaprakārakaniścayaḥ	sADya prakAraka jQAnam prati yena sambanDena sADya aBAva prakAraka niScayaH
   pratibandhakaḥ sa sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmaka iti kathyate/	pratibanDakaH sa sADya vat tAgraha viroDitA niyAmakaH iti kaTyate/
   tadeva pariṣkṛtyāha   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnetyādinā/	tat eva parizkRtya Aha  sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna ityAdinA/
   niścaya eva pratibandhakaḥ	niScayaH eva pratibanDakaH
   na tu sāvacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena kapisaṃyogābhāvavāniti	na tu sa avacCinna viSezaNatA sambanDena kapi saMyoga aBAvavAn iti
   niścayaḥ vṛkṣaḥ mūlāvacchedena kapisaṃyogābhāvavāniti niścaye	niScayaH vRkzaH mUla avacCedena kapi saMyoga aBAvavAn iti niScaye
   satyapi vṛkṣaḥ agre kapisaṃyogavāniti buddhyutpatteḥ/ tathā ca	sati api vRkzaH agre kapi saMyogavAn iti budDi utpatteH/ taTA ca
   sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakena niravacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena	sADya vat tA graha viroDitA niyAmakena niravacCinna viSezaNatA sambanDena
   kapisaṃyogābhāvavān 1guṇādireva tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ	kapi saMyoga aBAvavAn 1guNAdiH eva tad nirUpita ADeya tvam
   etadvṛkṣatve nāstīti	etat vRkza tve na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ tathā ca	na ati vyAptiH/ taTA ca
   sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnasādhyaniṣṭha 	sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna sADya nizWa 
   pratiyogitānirūpakābhāvaniṣṭhasādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakasambanadhāvacchinnādadheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatāvannirūpita 	pratiyogitA nirUpaka aBAva nizWa sADya vat tA graha viroDitA niyAmaka sambana DA ava= CinnAt aDeya tA nirUpita aDikaraNa tAvat nirUpita 
   hetutāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnādheyatāvān sādhāraṇa iti	hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tAvAn sADAraNaH iti
   phalitam/	Palitam/
   nanvevamapi 'ghaṭaḥ	nanu evam api aGawaH
   dravyaṃ guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattvāt' ityatra saddhetāvativyāptiḥ,	dravyam guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattvAt a iti atra sat hetO= ati vyAptiH,
   dravyatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati guṇe sattāyāḥ sattvena	dravya tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati guNe sattAyAH sattvena
   viśiṣṭaśuddhayoranatirekāt guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattāyāmapi	viSizwa SudDayoH anatirekAt guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattAyAm api
   sādhyābhāvavannirūpitādhayatāyāḥ sattvāt ityata āha   digiti/	sADya aBAva vat nirUpita ADayatAyAH sattvAt iti atas Aha  diS iti/
   sādhyābhāvavannirūpitādheyatāvacchedakahetutāvacchedakavattvaṃ	sADya aBAva vat nirUpita ADeya tAvacCedaka hetu tAvat Cedakavat tvam
   sādhāraṇatvamitivivakṣitam/ viśiṣṭasattāyāḥ sattātvenaiva rūpeṇa	sADAraNa tvam iti vivakzitam/ viSizwa sattAyAH sattA tvena eva rUpeNa
   guṇavṛttitayā sādhyābhāvavadguṇanirūpitādheyatāvacchedakaṃ	guNa vRtti tayA sADya aBAva vat guNa nirUpita ADeya tAvacCedakam
   sattātvameva na tu guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattātvarūpaṃ	sattAtvam eva na tu guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattAtva rUpam
   hetutāvacchedakamiti nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	hetu tAvat Cedakam iti na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   nanu 'śabdo nityaḥ	nanu aSabdaH nityaH
   kṛtakatvāt' ityatra viruddhe 'pi	kRtaka tvAt a iti atra virudDe api
   nityatvarūpasādhyābhāvavadghaṭavṛttitvaṃ kṛtakatve 'stīti	nitya tva rUpa sADya aBAva vat Gawa vRtti tvam kRtaka tve asti iti
   sādhāraṇalakṣaṇasyātivyāptiriti śaṅkate   na ca viruddha iti/	sADAraNa lakzaNasya ativyAptiH iti SaFkate  na ca virudDaH iti/
   upadheyasaṅkare 'pīti/ ekasmin aneke doṣāḥ saṃbhavantīti bhāvaḥ/	upaDeya saFkare api iti/ ekasmin aneke dozAH saMBavanti iti BAvaH/
   upadheyasaṅkare 'pi   duṣṭasya ekatve 'pi upādherasaṅkaraḥ  	upaDeya saFkare api  duzwasya eka tve api upADeH asaFkaraH  
   doṣasyabhinnatā/	dozasyaBinna tA/
   1. guṇādireveti/ na	1. guNa AdiH eva iti/ na
   tu vṛkṣaḥ, tatra mūlādyavacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambanadhanaiva	tu vRkzaH, tatra mUla Adi avacCinna viSezaNatA sambana DanA eva
   kapisaṃyogābhāvasattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	kapi saMyoga aBAva sattvAt iti BAvaH/
   asādhāraṇalakṣaṇe	asADAraNa lakzaNe
   sapakṣaśabdasya niścitasādhyavānityarthaḥ/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	sa pakza Sabdasya niScita sADyavAn iti arTaH/ viSezyatA sambanDena
   sādhyaprakārakaniścayavāniti yāvat/ sapakṣavṛttitvasāmānyābhāvavān	sADya prakAraka niScayavAn iti yAvat/ sa pakza vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAvavAn
   sapakṣavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavān asādhāraṇa iti	sa pakza vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvavAn asADAraNaH iti
   phalitam/ te 1saddhetorapi yatkiñcitsapakṣavṛttitvābhāvasattvāt	Palitam/ te 1sat hetoH api yat kiQcit sa pakza vRtti tva aBAva sattvAt 
   asādhāraṇatvaṃ syādityākṣepasya nāvasaraḥ/ śabdo 'nityaḥ śabdatvāt	asADAraNa tvam syAt iti Akzepasya na avasaraH/ SabdaH anityaH Sabda tvAt 
   ityatra saddhetau pakṣe śabde 'nityatvarūpasādhyasandehadaśāyāṃ	iti atra sat hetO pakze Sabde anitya tva rUpa sADya sandeha daSAyAm
   sādhyaprakārakaniścayavān śabdo na bhavati api tu ghaṭādireva,	sADya prakAraka niScayavAn SabdaH na Bavati api tu Gawa AdiH eva,
   tadavṛttitvaṃ śabdatve astīti śabdatvasya asādhāraṇatvam/ yadā tu	tad avRtti tvam Sabda tve asti iti Sabda tvasya asADAraNa tvam/ yadA tu
   śabde 'nityatvaniścayo 'sti tadā śabdo 'pi	Sabde anitya tva niScayaH asti tadA SabdaH api
   sādhyaprakārakaniścayavattvāt sapakṣaḥ tadavṛttitvaṃ śabdatve nāstīti	sADya prakAraka niScayavat tvAt sa pakzaH tad avRtti tvam Sabda tve na asti iti
   nāsādhāraṇyam/ tathā cāsādhāraṇyamanityadoṣa iti prācīnāḥ/	na asADAraNyam/ taTA ca asADa araNyam anitya dozaH iti prAcInAH/
   navīnāstu   saddhetoḥ kādācitkamasādhāraṇyaṃ necchanti/ tanmate	navInAH tu  sat hetoH kAdAcid kam asADAraNyam na icCanti/ tad mate
   sapakṣapadaṃ sādhyavanmātraparam/ sādhyavadvṛttitvasāmānyābhāvaḥ	sa pakza padam sADya vat mAtra param/ sADya vat vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAvaH
   asādhāraṇyam/ saddhetau pakṣe sādhyasandehadaśāyāmapi pakṣaḥ sādhyavān	asADa araNyam/ sat hetO pakze sADya sandeha daSAyAm api pakzaH sADyavAn
   bhavatīti tadavṛttitvaṃ	Bavati iti tad avRtti tvam
   hetau nāstīti nāsādhāraṇyam/	hetO na asti iti nAsADAraNyam /
   kiñcidviśeṣyaketi/	kiQcid viSezyaka iti/
   yatra kutrāpi sādhyaṃ niścitaṃ cet tadviśeṣyakaniścayaprakārībhūtaṃ	yatra kutra api sADyam niScitam ced tad viSezyaka niScaya prakArIBUtam
   sādhyaṃ bhavet/ sarvamabhidheyaṃ prameyatvādityatra tu sarvasya pakṣatvāt	sADyam Bavet/ sarvam aBiDeyam prameya tvAt iti atra tu sarvasya pakza tvAt 
   abhidheyatvaṃ na kvāpi niścitam/ ataḥ	aBiDeya tvam na kvApi niScitam/ atas 
   kiñcidviśeṣyakaniścayāprakārībhūtaṃ sādhyaṃ bhavati tādṛśasādhyakaśca	kiQcid viSezyaka niScaya aprakArIBUtam sADyam Bavati tAdRSa sADyakaH ca
   heturbhavati/ paraṃ tu atra sādhyābhāvasyāpratiddhatayā	hetuH Bavati/ param tu atra sADya aBAvasya apratidDa tayA
   kiñcidviśeṣyakaniścayāviṣayasādhyābhāvakatvamiti dalaṃ na samanveti/	kiQcid viSezyaka niScaya avizaya sADya aBAvaka tvam iti dalam na samanveti/
   ato navīnāḥ atyantābhāvāpratiyogisādhyādikatvamanupasaṃhāritvam	atas navInAH atyanta aBAva apratiyogi sADya Adika tvam anupasaMhAri tvam

   saddhetāvapi	sat hetO= api
   1. saddhetorapīti/	1. sat hetoH api iti/
   śabdo 'nityaḥ śabdatvādityatra ghaṭādirūpasapakṣavṛttitvābhāvasya śabdatve	SabdaH anityaH Sabda tvAt iti atra Gawa Adi rUpa sapakza vRtti tva aBAvasya Sabda tve
   sattvādityarthaḥ/ śabde 'nityatvaniścayadaśāyāmasya saddhetutvāt	sattvAt iti arTaH/ Sabde anitya tva niScaya daSa AyAmasya sat hetu tvAt

   nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/

   cet   na/ iṣṭāpatteḥ/ tatra anupasaṃhāritvajñānena	ced  na/ izwa ApatteH/ tatra anupasaMhAri tva jQAnena

   cet ittham/ sādhyam atyantābhāvāpratiyogi iti jñānakāle	cet itTam/ sADyam atyanta aBAva apratiyogi iti jQAna kAle

   bhavatīti/	Bavati iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   viruddhanirūpaṇam	virudDa nirUpaNam
   AnTs_54 sādhyābhāvavyāpto hetur viruddhaḥ / yatra śabdo nityaḥ kṛtakatvād	AnTH _54 sADya aBAva vyAptaH hetuH virudDaH / yatra SabdaH nityaH kRtaka tvAt

   AnTs_55 yasya sādhyabhāvasādhakaṃ hetvantaraṃ vidyate sa satpratipakṣaḥ /	AnTH _55 yasya sADya BAva sADakam hetu antaram vidyate sa sat pratipakzaH /

   AnTs_56 asiddhas trividhaḥ / āśrayāsiddhaḥ svarūpāsiddho vyāpyatvāsiddhaś	AnTH _56 asidDaH triviDaH / ASraya asidDaH svarUpa asidDaH vyApya tva asidDaH 
   ceti / āśrayāsiddho yathā gaganāravindaṃ surabhy aravindatvāt	ca iti / ASraya asidDaH yaTA gagana aravindam suraBi aravinda tvAt

   śabdasya śrāvaṇatvāt / sopādhiko vyāpyatvāsiddhaḥ / sādhyavyāpakatve sati	Sabdasya SrAvaNa tvAt / sa upADikaH vyApya tva asidDaH / sADya vyApaka tve sati
   sādhanāvyāpaka upādhiḥ / sādhyasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ	sADana avyApakaH upADiH / sADya samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva apratiyogi tvam

   ityanumitiṃ prati	iti anumitim prati

   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   virodhiparāmarśadvayakāla eva satpratipakṣatvamiti prāñcaḥ/	viroDi parAmarSa dvaya kAle eva sat pratipakza tvam iti prAQcaH/

   navīnāḥ/ tadāha   yatsambandhi yatsādhyamityādi/ yatsambandhītyasya	navInAH/ tat Aha  yad sambanDi yat sADyam ityAdi/ yat sambanDI iti asya
   yaddhetusambanadhītyarthaḥ/ tathā ca yaddhetusambandhi yatsādhyaṃ	yat hetusambana DI iti arTaH/ taTA ca yat hetu sambanDi yat sADyam

   śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ityatra kṛtakatvasambandhi anityatvarūpaṃ	SabdaH anityaH kRtaka tvAt iti atra kRtaka tva sambanDi anitya tva rUpam
   sādhyam, tādṛśānityatvābhāvavyāpyaśrāvaṇatvarūpaṃ hetvantar tajjñānaṃ	sADyam, tAdRSa anitya tva aBAva vyApya SrAvaNa tva rUpam hetu antar tat jQAnam
   śabdarūpe pakṣe 'stīti saḥ kṛtakatvahetuḥ satpratipakṣaḥ/	Sabda rUpe pakze asti iti saH kRtaka tva hetuH sat pratipakzaH/
   yādṛśahetusādhyatvenābhimatadharmābhāvavyāpyahetvantaravattājñānaviṣayaḥ	yAdRSa hetu sADya tvena aBimata Darma aBAva vyApya hetu antaravat tA jQAna vizayaH
   pakṣo bhavati tādṛśahetuḥ satpratipakṣa iti yāvat/	pakzaH Bavati tAdRSa hetuH sat pratipakzaH iti yAvat /
   hetvantaraviśeṣyakaprakṛtasādhyābhāvavyāpyatvaprakārakajñānakālīnaprakṛtasādhyavyāpyatvaprakārakajñānaviśeṣyabhūto	hetu antara viSezyaka prakRta sADya aBAva vyApya tva prakAraka jQAna kAlIna prakRta sADya vyApya tva prakAraka jQAna viSezya BUtaH 
   hetuḥ satpratipakṣa iti phalitor'thaḥ/ yatsambandhisādhyetyādi/	hetuH sat pratipakzaH iti Palitor aTaH/ yad sambanDi sADya ityAdi/
   yādṛśahetusambandhi yat sādhyaṃ tadabhāvavyāpyahetvantarasattvaṃ pakṣe	yAdRSa hetu sambanDi yat sADyam tad aBAva vyApya hetu antara sattvam pakze
   tādṛśo hetuḥ satpratipakṣaḥ/ kṛtakatvasambandhi anityatvaṃ tadabhāvaḥ	tAdRSaH hetuH sat pratipakzaH/ kRtaka tva sambanDi anitya tvam tad aBAvaH
   nityatvamaṃ tadvyāpyaṃ hetvantaram śrāvaṇatvam tat pakṣe	nitya tvamam tat vyApyam hetu antaram SrAvaNa tvam tat pakze
   śabde 'satīti kṛtakatvaṃ satpratipakṣam/	Sabde asati iti kRtaka tvam sat pratipakzam/
   āśrayāsiddhiśca pakṣe	ASraya asidDiH ca pakze
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviraha iti/ gaganāravindaṃ surabhītyatra	pakza tA avacCedaka virahaH iti/ gagana aravindam suraBIti atra
   gaganīyatvaviśiṣṭamaravindaṃ pakṣaḥ/ tatra pakṣe aravinde gaganīyatvaṃ	gaganIya tva viSizwam aravindam pakzaH/ tatra pakze aravinde gaganIya tvam
   pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ nāstīti aravindaniṣṭhaḥ gaganīyatvābhāvo vā	pakza tA avacCedakam na asti iti aravinda nizWaH gaganIya tva aBAvaH vA
   gaganīyatvābhāvaviśiṣṭamaravindaṃ vā āśrayāsiddhirityarthaḥ/	gaganIya tva aBAva viSizwam aravindam vA ASraya asidDiH iti arTaH/
   saviśeṣaṇe hīti nyāyeneti/ 'saviśeṣaṇe hi vidhiniṣedhau sati	sa viSezaNe hi iti nyAyena iti/ asa viSezaNe hi viDi nizeDO sati
   viśeṣye bādhe viśeṣaṇamupasaṃkrāmataḥ' iti nyāyaḥ/	viSezye bADe viSezaNam upasaMkrAmataH a iti nyAyaH/
   viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭhe vidhirvā niṣedho kriyamāṇaḥ viśeṣye	viSezaNa viSizWe viDiH vA nizeDaH kriyamANaH viSezye
   vidherniṣedhasya vā bādhe sati viśeṣaṇe vidhirvā niṣedho vā	viDeH nizeDasya vA bADe sati viSezaNe viDiH vA nizeDaH vA
   saṃkrāmatīti nyāyasyārthaḥ/ yathā śikhī dhvasta ityatra	saMkrAmati iti nyAyasya arTaH/ yaTA SiKI DvastaH iti atra
   śikhāviśiṣṭapuruṣe vidhīyamānaḥ dhvaṃsaḥ puruṣe bādhāt	SiKA viSizwa puruze viDIyamAnaH DvaMsaH puruze bADAt 
   viśeṣaṇabhūtāṃ śikhāmāskandatīti śikhī dhvasta iti vākyāt	viSezaNa BUtAm SiKAm Askandati iti SiKI DvastaH iti vAkyAt 
   śikhāyāṃ dhvastatvaṃ paryavasyati, tathā gaganāravindaṃ nāstītyukte	SiKAyAm Dvasta tvam paryavasyati, taTA gagana aravindam na asti iti ukte
   abhāvarūpo niṣedhaḥ aravinde bādhitatvāt	aBAva rUpaH nizeDaH aravinde bADita tvAt 
   gaganīyatvarūpaviśeṣaṇamāskandatīti 1gaganīyatvābhāvo paryavasyatīti	gaganIya tva rUpa viSezaNam Askandati iti 1gaganIya tva aBAvaH paryavasyati iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   nanu sopādhike	nanu sa upADike
   hetau upādhereva doṣatvamastu, kiṃ vyāpyatvāsiddheḥ	hetO upADeH eva doza tvam astu, kim vyApya tva asidDeH
   doṣatvenetyatrāha   upādherdeṣatvamasambhavīti/ vyaktībhaviṣyatīti/	doza tvena iti atra Aha  upADeH deza tvam asamBavIti/ vyaktIBavizyati iti/
   'upādhistu vyabhicārajñānadvārā vyāptijñānapratibandhakaḥ' iti	aupADiH tu vyaBicAra jQAna dvArA vyApti jQAna pratibanDakaH a iti
   grantheneti śeṣaḥ/	granTena iti SezaH/
   nanu	nanu
   sādhyāprasiddhisādhanāpratiddhyorapi hetvābhāsatvāt tayorakathanena	sADya aprasidDi sADana apratidDyoH api hetvABAsa tvAt tayoH akaTanena
   nyūnatetyāśaṅkya tayorvyāpyatvāsiddhāvantarbhāvamāha   atre	nyUna tA iti ASaFkya tayoH vyApya tva asidDO= antarBAvam Aha  atre
   damavadheyamiti/ kāñcanamayatvābhāvavān vahniḥ	dam avaDeyam iti/ kAQcana maya tva aBAvavAn vahniH
   ityākārakasādhyāprasiddhijñānadaśāyāṃ	iti AkAraka sADya aprasidDi jQAna daSAyAm
   kāñcanamayatvaviśiṣṭavahnijñānāsambhavāt	kAQcana maya tva viSizwa vahni jQAna asamBavAt
   'kāñcanamayatvaviśiṣṭavahnivyāpyadhūmavān' iti parāmarśe	akAQcana maya tva viSizwa vahni vyApya DUmavAn a iti parAmarSe
   kāñcanamayatvaviśiṣṭavahnibhānaṃ prati sādhyāprasiddhijñānaṃ	kAQcana maya tva viSizwa vahni BAnam prati sADya aprasidDi jQAnam
   pratibandhakam/ evaṃ	pratibanDakam/ evam
   kāñcanamayatvābhāvavān dhūma ityākarakasādhanāprasiddhijñānadaśāyāṃ	kAQcana maya tva aBAvavAn DUmaH iti Akaraka sADana aprasidDi jQAna daSAyAm
   'vahnivyāpyakāñcanamayadhūmavān parvata' iti parāmarśo na	avahni vyApya kAQcana maya DUmavAn parvata a iti parAmarSaH na
   sambhavati/ dhūmaviśeṣyakakāñcanamayatvaprakārakajñānaṃ prati	samBavati/ DUma viSezyaka kAQcana maya tva prakAraka jQAnam prati
   dhūmaviśeṣyakakāñcanamayatvābhāvaprakārakajñānasya pratibandhakatvāt/	DUma viSezyaka kAQcana maya tva aBAva prakAraka jQAnasya pratibanDaka tvAt /
   tathā ca anumitijanakaparāmarśapratibandhakajñānaviṣayatayā	taTA ca anumiti janaka para AmarSa pratibanDaka jQAna vizaya tayA
   sādhyāprasiddhisādhanāprasiddhyorhetvābhāsatvam/ kathaṃ	sADya aprasidDi sADana aprasidDyoH hetvABAsa tvam/ kaTam
   vyāpyatvāsiddhāvanayorantarbhāva iti cet śrūyatām/	vyApya tva asidDA= anayoH antarBAvaH iti cet SrUyatAm/
   hetutāvacchedakaviśiṣṭahetuvyāpakasādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭasādhyasāmānādh	hetu tAvat Cedaka viSizwa hetu vyApaka sADya tAvacCedaka viSizwa sADya sAmAnA aD
   ikaraṇyaṃ	ikaraNyam
   hi vyāptiḥ/ sādhanāprasiddhisthale	hi vyAptiH/ sADana aprasidDi sTale
   hetutāvacchedakaviśiṣṭahetvabhāvāt	hetu tAvat Cedaka viSizwa hetu aBAvAt
   tādṛśahetughaṭitavyāptyabhāvarūpaṃ vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ, sādhyāprasiddhisthale	tAdRSa hetu Gawita vyApti aBAva rUpam vyApya tva asidDiH, sADya aprasidDi sTale
   sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭasādhyābhāvāt	sADya tAvacCedaka viSizwa sADya aBAvAt
   tādṛśasādhyaghaṭitavyāptyabhāvavāt vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ ityevaṃ	tAdRSa sADya Gawita vyApti aBAvavAt vyApya tva asidDiH iti evam
   tayorvyāpyatvāsiddhāvantarbhāva iti/	tayoH vyApya tva asidDO= antarBAvaH iti/
   1. gaganīyatvābhāve	1. gaganIya tva aBAve
   paryavasyatīti/ etena paramamūle 'gaganāravindamāśrayaḥ, sa ca	paryavasi ati iti/ etena parama mUle agagana aravindam ASrayaH, sa ca
   nāsatyeva' iti vākyamasaṃgatam/ gaganāravindamityasya hi	na asatyeva a iti vAkyam asaMgatam/ gagana aravindam iti asya hi
   gaganīyatvaviśiṣṭamaravindamityarthaḥ/ tatrāravindasya sattvāt tatra	gaganIya tva viSizwam aravindam iti arTaH/ tatra aravindasya sattvAt tatra
   nāstitvabādhāt   iti śaṅkā nirākṛtā aravinde	nAstitva bADAt  iti SaFkA nirAkRtAH aravinde
   gaganīyatvābhāva ityeva 'sa ca nāstyeva' iti vākyasthārthaḥ	gaganIya tva aBAvaH iti eva asa ca na asti eva a iti vAkya sTArTaH
   paryavasitaḥ, tatra cānupapatyabhāvāditi/	paryavasitaH, tatra ca anupapati aBAvAt iti/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   upādhinirūpaṇam	upADi nirUpaNam
   sādhyavyāpakatve	sADya vyApaka tve
   sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ upādhitvam/	sati sADana avyApaka tvam upADi tvam/
   sādhyasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ sādhyavyāpakatvam/	sADya samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva apratiyogi tvam sADya vyApaka tvam/
   sādhanavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ sādhanāvyāpakatvam/ (yathā)	sADana vat nizWA atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tvam sADana avyApaka tvam/ (yaTA)
   parvataḥ dhūmavān vahneḥ ityatra ārdrendhanasaṃyogaḥ upādhiḥ/ yatra	parvataH DUmavAn vahneH iti atra Ardra inDana saMyogaH upADiH/ yatra
   dhūmaḥ tatra ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iti sādhyavyāpakatayā/ yatra vahniḥ tatra	DUmaH tatra Ardra inDana saMyogaH iti sADya vyApaka tayA/ yatra vahniH tatra
   ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iti nāsti/ ayogolake	Ardra inDana saMyogaH iti nAsti/ ayaH golake
   ārdrenadhanasaṃyogābhāvāt/ evaṃ sādhyavyāpakatve sati	Ardrena Dana saMyoga aBAva at/ evam sADya vyApaka tve sati
   sādhanāvyāpakatvāt ārdrendhanasaṃyoga upādhiḥ/ sopādhikatvāt	sADana avyApaka tvAt Ardra inDana saMyogaH upADiH/ sa upADika tvAt 
   vahnimattvaṃ vyāpyatvāsiddham/	vahnimat tvam vyApya tva asidDam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   upādherlakṣaṇamāha  	upADeH lakzaNam Aha  
   sādhyeti/ upādhiścaturvidhaḥ   kevala   sādhyavyāpakaḥ,	sADyeti/ upADiH caturviDaH  kevala  sADya vyApakaH,
   pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ, sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ,	pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH, sADana avacCinna sADya vyApakaH,
   udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaśceti/ ādyaḥ ārdrendhanasaṃyogaḥ/	udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH ceti/ AdyaH Ardra inDana saMyogaH/
   dvitīyo yathā   vāyuḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvāt ityatra	dvitIyaH yaTA  vAyuH pratyakzaH pratyakza sparSa ASraya tvAt iti atra
   bahirdravyatvāvacchinnapratyakṣatvavyāpakaṃ udbhūtarūpavattvam/ tṛtīyo	bahis dravya tva avacCinna pratyakza tva vyApakam udBUta rUpavat tvam/ tRtIyaH 
   yathā   prāgabhāvo vināśī janyatvāt ityatra	yaTA  prAgaBAvaH vinASI janya tvAt iti atra
   janyatvāvacchinnānityatvavyāpakaṃ bhāvatvam/ caturtho yathā   prāgabhāvo	janya tva avacCinna anitya tva vyApakam BAva tvam/ caturTaH yaTA  prAc aBAvaH 
   vināśī prameyatvāt ityatra janayatvāvacchinnānityatvavyāpakaṃ	vinASI prameya tvAt iti atra janayatvA avacCinna anitya tva vyApakam
   bhāvatvam/	BAva tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   sādhyavyāpakatva	sADya vyApaka tva
   iti/ sādhyavyāpakatvasādhanāvyāpakatve ekarūpeṇa ekasambandhena ca	iti/ sADya vyApaka tva sADana avyApaka tve eka rUpeNa eka sambanDena ca
   grāhye/ tena 'vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādau tattadvahnau vahnitvena	grAhye/ tena avahnimAn DUmAt a ityAdO tad tat vahnO vahni tvena
   sādhyavyāpakatvasya tattadvanhitvena sādhanāvyāpakatvasya ca sattve 'pi	sADya vyApaka tvasya tat tad vanhi tvena sADana avyApaka tvasya ca sattve api
   nātivyāptiḥ, na vā saṃyogena sādhyavyāpakasya vahneḥ samavāyena	na ati vyAptiH, na vA saMyogena sADya vyApakasya vahneH samavAyena
   sādhanāvyāpakatve 'pi tatrātivyāptiḥ/ mūloktopādhi lakṣaṇe 'vyāptiṃ	sADana avyApaka tve api tatra ativyAptiH/ mUla ukta upADi lakzaNe avyAptim
   vārayituṃ lakṣyabhedena lakṣaṇabhedaṃ pradarśayati   upādhiścaturvidha	vArayitum lakzya Bedena lakzaNa Bedam pradarSayati  upADiH caturviDa
   iti/ yaddharmaviśiṣṭasādhyavyāpakatvaṃ taddharmaviśiṣṭasādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ	iti/ yat Darma viSizwa sADya vyApaka tvam tad Darma viSizwa sADana avyApaka tvam
   lakṣaṇe niveśanīyam/ anyathā	lakzaNe niveSanIyam/ anyaTA
   parvatatvātmakapakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya kasyacit	parvata tva Atmaka pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakasya kasyacid 
   dhūmatvāvacchinnāvyāpakatvāt ativyāptiḥ syāditi dhyeyam/	DUma tva avacCinnA vyApaka tvAt ativyAptiH syAt iti Dyeyam/
   udāsīneti/ pakṣadharmasādhanadharmābhyāṃ bhinnetyarthaḥ/ bahirdravyatvam  	udAsIna iti/ pakza Darma sADana DarmAByAm BinnA iti arTaH/ bahis dravya tvam  
   ātmānyadravyatvam/ idaṃ kevalapratyakṣatvasyaiva sādhyatvānusāreṇa/	AtmA anya dravya tvam/ idam kevala pratyakza tvasya eva sADya tva anusAreNa/
   prāgabhāvo vināśī janyatvāditi/ atra janyatvaṃ pakṣadharmo na bhavatīti	prAgaBAvaH vinASI janya tvAt iti/ atra janya tvam pakza DarmaH na Bavati iti
   sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvaghaṭitalakṣaṇam/ anityatvavyāpakatiti/	sADana avacCinna sADya vyApaka tva Gawita lakzaNam/ anitya tva vyApaka titi/
   vināśitvavyāpakamityarthaḥ/ janyatvasyodāsīnatvaṃ sampādayituṃ	vinASi tu a vyApakam iti arTaH/ janya tvasya udAsIna tvam sampAdayitum
   prameyatvāditi/	prameya tvAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvarūpaṃ mūloktamupādhilakṣaṇam	sADya vyApaka tve sati sADana avyApaka tva rUpam mUla uktam upADi lakzaNam
   'parvato vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādisaddhetau tattadvahnau	aparvataH vahnimAn DUmAt a ityAdi sat hetO tad tat vahnO
   (mahānasīyādivahnau) ativyāptam/ mahānasīyavahnerapi vahnitvena	(mahAnasIya Adi vahnO) ati vyAptam/ mahAnasIya vahneH api vahni tvena
   rūpeṇa vahnisāmānyarūpasādhyavyāpakatvāt mahānasīyavahnitvena	rUpeNa vahni sAmAnya rUpa sADya vyApaka tvAt mahAnasIya vahni tvena
   rūpeṇa sādhanāvyāpakatvācca/ sādhanavati dhūmavati vartate	rUpeNa sADana avyApaka tvAt ca/ sADanavati DUmavati vartate
   mahānasīyavahnitvena rūpeṇa mahānasīyavahnerabhāvāt/ evaṃ tatraiva	mahAnasIya vahni tvena rUpeNa mahAnasIya vahneH aBAvAt/ evam tatra eva
   ālokasyopādhitvāpattiḥ/ vahnimati sarvatra saṃyogasambandhena	Alokasya upADi tva ApattiH/ vahnimati sarvatra saMyoga sambanDena
   ālokasya vidyamānayatā saṃyogasambandhena sādhyavyāpakatvāt/ evaṃ	Alokasya vidyam AnayatA saMyoga sambanDena sADya vyApaka tva at/ evam
   sādhanadhūmavati parvate samavāyasambandhena ālokasyāvidyamānatayā	sADana DUmavati parvate samavAya sambanDena Alokasya avidyamAna tayA
   samavāyasambandhena sādhanāvyāpakatvāccetyāśaṅkyāha  	samavAya sambanDena sADana avyApaka tvAt ca iti ASaFkya Aha  
   sādhyavyāpakatvasādhanāvyāpakatve iti/ tathā ca ye sambandhena yena	sADya vyApaka tva sADana avyApaka tve iti/ taTA ca ye sambanDena yena
   rūpeṇacopādheḥ sādhyavyāpakatvam, tenaiva sambandhena tenaiva rūpeṇa	rUpeNa copADeH sADya vyApaka tvam, tena eva sambanDena tena eva rUpeNa
   ca tasya sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ vivakṣitam/ ato vahnitvena	ca tasya sADana avyApaka tvam vivakzitam/ atas vahni tvena
   vahnivyāpakasya mahānasīyādivahneḥ mahānasīyavahnitvena	vahni vyApakasya mahAnasIya Adi vahneH mahAnasIya vahni tvena
   dhūmāvyāpakatve 'pi vahnitvena dhūmāvyāpakatvaṃ nāstīti	DUma avyApaka tve api vahni tvena DUma avyApaka tvam na asti iti
   nātivyāptiḥ/ evaṃ saṃyogena vahnivyāpakasya ālokasya samavāyena	na ati vyAptiH/ evam saMyogena vahni vyApakasya Alokasya samavAyena
   dhūmāvyāpakatve 'pi tenaiva saṃyogasambandhena dhūmāvyāpakatvaṃ	DUma avyApaka tve api tena eva saMyoga sambanDena DUma avyApaka tvam
   nāstīti nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ vahnitvena sādhyavyāpakatvasyeti/	na asti iti na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ vahni tvena sADya vyApaka tvasya iti/
   sādhyavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakavahnitvavattvasyetyarthaḥ/	sADya vat nizWA ati anta aBAva pratiyogita anavacCedaka vahni tva vat tvasya iti arTaH/
   tattadvahnitvena sādhanāvyāpakatvasyeti/	tad tad vahni tvena sADana avyApaka tvasya iti/
   sādhanavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatattadvahnitvavattvasyetyarthaḥ/	sADana vat nizWA atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tA avacCedaka tattat vahni tva vat tvasya iti arTaH/
   evaṃ saṃyogena sādhyavyāpakatvaṃ	evam saMyogena sADya vyApaka tvam
   sādhyavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvanirūpitasaṃyogasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitānavacchedakadharmavattvam/	sADya vat nizWA ati anta aBAva nirUpita saMyoga sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogitAnavacCedaka Darmavat tvam/
   samavāyena sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ	samavAyena sADana avyApaka tvam
   sādhanavanniṣṭhātyantābhāvanirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitāvacchedakadharmavattvamiti	sADana vat nizWA atyanta aBAva nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi ta avacCedaka Darmavat tvam iti
   bodhyam/ avyāptiṃ vārayitumiti/ 'vāyuḥ pratyakṣaḥ	boDyam/ avyAptim vArayitum iti/ avAyuH pratyakzaH
   pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvāt' ityatra udbhūtarūpavattvamupādhiḥ/ tatra	pratyakza sparSa ASraya tvAt a iti atra udBUta rUpavat tvam upADiH/ tatra
   mūloktaṃ sādhyavyāpakatvaghaṭitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti/	mUla uktam sADya vyApaka tva Gawitam lakzaNam nAsti/
   pratyakṣatvarūpasādhyavati	pratyakza tva rUpa sADyavati
   ātmani udbhūtarūpābhāvādityavyāptiḥ prasajyate/ tāṃ vārayituṃ	Atmani udBUta rUpa aBAvAt iti a vyAptiH prasajyate/ tAm vArayitum
   lakṣyabhedena lakṣaṇabhedo vaktavya iti upādhiḥ caturvindha	lakzya Bedena lakzaNa BedaH vaktavyaH iti upADiH caturvinDa
   ityādidīpikāyā āśaya iti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	iti Adi dIpikAyAH ASayaH iti BAvaH/ taTA ca
   kevalasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ kevalasādhyavyāpakatve sati	kevala sADya vyApakasya upADeH kevala sADya vyApaka tve sati
   sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇam/ pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ	sADana avyApaka tvam lakzaNam/ pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakasya upADeH
   pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati tadavacchinnasādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ	pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApaka tve sati tad avacCinna sADana avyApaka tvam
   lakṣaṇam/ sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ	lakzaNam/ sADana avacCinna sADya vyApakasya upADeH
   sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇam/	sADana avacCinna sADya vyApaka tve sati sADana avyApaka tvam lakzaNam/
   udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ	udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakasya upADeH
   udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati	udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApaka tve sati
   tadavacchinnasādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ	tad avacCinna sADana avyApaka tvam
   lakṣaṇamiti rītyā lakṣaṇabhedo vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ/	lakzaNam iti rItyA lakzaNa BedaH vivakzitaH iti BAvaH/
   tadāha yaddharmaviśiṣṭasādhyetyādi/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	tadA aha yat Darma viSizwa sADya ityAdi/ vESizwyam
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena/ dharmaikyavivakṣāyāḥ prayojanamāha  	sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena/ Darma Ekya vivakzAyAH prayojanam Aha  
   anyatheti/ 'parvato vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra parvatīyavahneḥ	anyaTA iti/ aparvataH vahnimAn DUmAt a iti atra parvatIya vahneH
   parvatatvātmako yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ tadviśiṣṭavahnivyāpakatvamasti	parvata tva AtmakaH yaH pakza DarmaH tad viSizwa vahni vyApaka tvam asti
   sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ cāsti/ dhūmavati mahānase parvatīyavahnerabhāvāt	sADana avyApaka tvam ca asti/ DUmavati mahAnase parvatIya vahneH aBAvAt 
   iti parvatīyavahnirupādhiḥ syāt/ dharmaikyavivakṣaṇe tu	iti parvatIya vahniH upADiH syAt/ Darma Ekya vivakzaNe tu
   parvatatvaviśiṣṭavahnivyāpakasya parvatīyavahneḥ parvatatvaviśiṣṭa	parvata tva viSizwa vahni vyApakasya parvatIya vahneH parvata tva viSizwa
   dhūmāvyāpakatvaṃ nāsti/ parvatatvaviśiṣṭadhūmavati parvate	DUma avyApaka tvam nAsti/ parvata tva viSizwa DUmavati parvate
   parvatīyavahneḥ sattvāt/ ato nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	parvatIya vahneH sattva at/ atas na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   dīpikāyāṃ ādyaḥ	dIpikAyAm AdyaH
   ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iti/ 'parvato dhūmavān vahneḥ' ityatra	Ardra inDana saMyogaH iti/ aparvataH DUmavAn vahneH a iti atra
   ādrendhanasaṃyoga upādhiḥ/ sa ca dhūmarūpasādhyavyāpakaḥ	Adra inDana saMyogaH upADiH/ sa ca DUma rUpa sADya vyApakaH
   vahnirūpasādhanāvyāpakaśceti kevalasādhyavyāpako 'yamupādhirityarthaḥ/	vahni rUpa sADana avyApakaH ca iti kevala sADya vyApakaH ayam upADiH iti arTaH/
   dvitīyo yatheti/ pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpaka upādhirityarthaḥ/	dvitIyaH yaTA iti/ pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH upADiH iti arTaH/
   'vāyuḥ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayasparśāśrayatvāt' ityatra	avAyuH pratyakza vizayaH pratyakza vizaya sparSa ASraya tvAt a iti atra
   udbhūtarūpavattvamupādhiḥ/ sa ca kevalasādhyavyāpako na bhavati	udBUta rUpavat tvam upADiH/ sa ca kevala sADya vyApakaH na Bavati
   pratyakṣaviṣayatvarūpasādhyavatyātmani udbhūtarūpavattvābhāvāt/ ataḥ	pratyakza vizaya tva rUpa sADyavatI Atmani udBUta rUpavat tva aBAvAt/ atas 
   pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 'yamupādhiḥ/ pakṣasya dharmaḥ	pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH ayam upADiH/ pakzasya DarmaH
   pakṣadharmaḥ	pakza DarmaH
   tadavacchinnaḥ tadviśiṣṭaḥ tatsamānādhikaraṇaḥ ya sādhyaḥ tadvyāpakaḥ/	tad avacCinnaH tad viSizwaH tad samAna aDikaraNaH ye sADyaH tad vyApakaH/
   prakṛte pakṣaḥ vāyuḥ tadvṛttidharmaḥ bahirdravyatvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ	prakRte pakzaH vAyuH tad vRtti DarmaH bahis dravya tvam tad viSizwam
   yatpratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ tat ātmani nāsti, ātmano	yad pratyakza vizaya tvam tat Atmani nAsti, AtmanaH 
   bahirdravyatvarūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt/ ato	bahis dravya tva rUpa viSezaNa aBAva at/ atas 
   bahirdravyatvaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ yatra yatrāsti pṛthivyādau tatra	bahis dravya tva viSizwa pratyakza vizaya tvam yatra yatra asti pRTivI AdO tatra
   sarvatra udbhūtarūpavattvasattvāt udbhūtarūpavattvaṃ	sarvatra udBUta rUpavat tva sattvAt udBUta rUpavat tvam
   pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakam/ tathā	pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakam/ taTA
   bahirdravyatvaviśiṣṭapratyakṣasparśāśrayatvarūpaṃ pakṣadharmāvacchinnaṃ	bahis dravya tva viSizwa pratyakza sparSa ASraya tva rUpam pakza Darma avacCinnam
   sādhanaṃ	sADanam
   yatrāstivāyau	yatra astivAyO
   tatra udbhūtarūpaṃ	tatra udBUta rUpam
   nāstīti pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakaṃ codbhūtarūpavattvaṃ bhavatīti	na asti iti pakza Darma avacCinna sADana avyApakam ca udBUta rUpavat tvam Bavati iti
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ tṛtīyo yatheti/	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ tRtIyaH yaTA iti/
   sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpaka upādhirityarthaḥ/ sādhanāvacchinnatvaṃ	sADana avacCinna sADya vyApakaH upADiH iti arTaH/ sADana avacCinna tvam
   ca sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena sādhanaviśiṣṭatvam/ 'prāgabhāvo	ca sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena sADana viSizwa tvam/ aprAgaBAvaH 
   vināśī janyatvāt' ityatra bhāvatvamupādhiriṣyate/ sa	vinASI janya tvAt a iti atra BAva tvam upADiH izyate/ sa
   kevalasādhyavyāpako na bhavati,	kevala sADya vyApakaH na Bavati,
   vināśitvarūpasādhyavati prāgabhāve bhāvatvābhāvāt/ ataḥ	vinASi tva rUpa sADyavati prAgaBAve BAva tva aBAvAt/ atas 
   sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 'yamupādhiḥ/ janyatvarūpasādhanaviśiṣṭaṃ	sADana avacCinna sADya vyApakaH ayam upADiH/ janya tva rUpa sADana viSizwam
   vināśitvaṃ yatra yatrāsti ghaṭādau tatra bhāvatvasadbhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/	vinASi tvam yatra yatra asti Gawa AdO tatra BAva tva sadBAvAt iti BAvaH/
   caturtho yatheti/ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpaka ityarthaḥ/	caturTaH yaTA iti/ udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH iti arTaH/
   'prāgabhāvo vināśī pramevayatvāt' ityatra bhāvatvamupādhiḥ/	aprAgaBAvaH vinASI pramevaya tvAt a iti atra BAva tvam upADiH/
   pakṣadharmāt sādhanāccānyo dharma udāsīnadharmaḥ/ janyatvaṃ hi pakṣe	pakza DarmAt sADanAt ca anyaH DarmaH udAsIna DarmaH/ janya tvam hi pakze
   prāgabhāve nāstīti na	prAgaBAve na asti iti na
   pakṣadharmaḥ/ evaṃ sādhanāt prameyatvāccānyat iti udāsīnadharmaḥ/	pakza DarmaH/ evam sADanAt prameya tvAt ca anyat iti udAsIna DarmaH/
   tadavacchinnaṃ janyatvaviśiṣṭaṃ vināśitvaṃ yatrāsti ghaṭādau tatra	tad avacCinnam janya tva viSizwam vinASi tvam yatra asti Gawa AdO tatra
   bhāvatvasattvāt janyatvaviśiṣṭaprameyatvavati prāgabhāve	BAva tva sattvAt janya tva viSizwa prameya tvavati prAc aBAve
   bhāvatvasyābhāvācca bhāvatvaṃ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ	BAva tvasya aBAvAt ca BAva tvam udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH
   udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakaścopādhiriti bhāvaḥ/	udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADana avyApakaH ca upADiH iti BAvaH/
   prakāśikāyām pakṣadharmasādhanadharmābhyāmiti/ pakṣavṛttirdharmaḥ	prakASikAyAm pakza Darma sADana Darma aByAm iti/ pakza vRttiH DarmaH
   pakṣadharmaḥ	pakza DarmaH
   sādhanarūpo dharmaṃḥ sādhanadharmaḥ/ bahirdravyatvam ityasya vivaraṇaṃ	sADana rUpaH DarmanH sADana DarmaH/ bahis dravya tvam iti asya vivaraNam
   ātmānyadravyatvamiti/ vāyuḥ pratyakṣa ityatra pratyakṣapadasya	AtmA anya dravya tvam iti/ vAyuH pratyakzaH iti atra pratyakza padasya
   bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣaya iti yadyarthaḥ tadodbhūtarūpavattvaṃ	bahis indriya janya pratyakza vizayaH iti yadi arTaH tadA udBUta rUpavat tvam
   1kevalasādhyavyāpaka evopādhiḥ/ yadā tu pratyakṣaviṣayatvamātraṃ sādhyaṃ	1kevala sADya vyApakaH eva upADiH/ yadA tu pratyakza vizaya tva mAtram sADyam
   2tadaiva pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpaka ityāśayenāha   idaṃ	2tadA eva pakza Darma avacCinna sADya vyApakaH iti ASayena Aha  idam
   kevalapratyakṣatvasyaiveti	kevala pratyakza tvasya eva iti
   bahirindriyajanyatvāghaṭitapratyakṣaviṣayatvamātrasyetyarthaḥ/ udāsīnatvaṃ	bahis indriya janya tva aGawita pratyakza vizaya tva mAtrasya iti arTaH/ udAsIna tvam
   sampādayitumiti/ yadi janyatvameva hetuḥ syāt tadā	sampAdayitum iti/ yadi janya tvam eva hetuH syAt tadA
   sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvamevopādherbhavet	sADana avacCinna sADya vyApaka tvam eva upADeH Bavet 
   nodāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvam/	na udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADya vyApaka tvam/
   sādhanādanyasyaivodāsīnaśabdārthatvāt/ ataḥ prameyatvasya	sADanAt anyasya eva udAsIna Sabda arTa tva at/ atas prameya tvasya
   hetutvānusaraṇam/ adhunā tu janyatvaṃ sādhanāt prameyatvādanyaditi	hetutva anusaraNam/ aDunA tu janya tvam sADanAt prameya tvAt anyat iti
   janyatvaviśiṣṭavināśitvaṃ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyamiti bhāvaḥ/	janya tva viSizwa vinASi tvam udAsIna Darma avacCinna sADyam iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   bādhitanirūpaṇam	bADita nirUpaNam
   AnTs_57 yasya sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ sa bādhitaḥ / yathā	AnTH _57 yasya sADya aBAvaH pramANa antareNa niScitaH sa bADitaH / yaTA
   vahnir anuṣṇo dravyatvād iti / atrānuṣṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tadabhāva uṣṇatvaṃ	vahniH anuzNaH dravya tvAt iti / atra anuzNa tvam sADyam tad aBAvaH uzNa tvam
   spārśanapratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti bādhitatvam //	spArSana pratyakzeNa gRhyate iti bADita tvam //
   yasya sādhyābhāvaḥ	yasya sADya aBAvaH
   pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ saḥ bādhitaḥ/ yathā vahniḥ anuṣṇaḥ	pramANa antareNa niScitaH saH bADitaH/ yaTA vahniH anuzNaH
   padārthatvāt/ atra anuṣṇatvaṃ sādhyam, tadabhāva uṣṇatvaṃ tvācapratyakṣeṇa	padArTa tva at/ atra anuzNa tvam sADyam, tad aBAvaH uzNa tvam tvAca pratyakzeNa
   gṛhyata iti bodhyam/ vyākhyātamanumānam/	gRhyate iti boDyam/ vyAKyAtam anumAnam/
   iti tarkasaṅgrahe	iti tarka saFgrahe
   anumānaparicchedaḥ	anumAna paricCedaH
   1. kevalasādhyavyāpaka	1. kevala sADya vyApaka
   iti/ bahirindrayajanyapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ yatra yatra ghaṭādau tatra	iti/ bahis indraya janya pratyakza vizaya tvam yatra yatra Gawa AdO tatra
   udbhūtarūpavattvasattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	udBUta rUpavat tva sattvAt iti BAvaH/

   yatra yatra pratyakṣaviṣayatvam ātmanyapi, tatrodbhūtarūpābhāvāt	yatra yatra pratyakza vizaya tvam Atmani api, tatra udBUta rUpa aBAvAt

   bādhitasya	bADitasya
   lakṣaṇamāha   yasyeti/	lakzaNam Aha  yasya iti/
   doṣāṇāmanumitipratibandhakatvaprakāraśodhanam	dozANAm anumiti pratibanDaka tva prakAra SoDanam
   atra bādhasya	atra bADasya
   grāhyābhāvaniścayatvena, satpratipakṣasya virodhijñānasāmagrītvena	grAhya aBAva niScaya tvena, sat pratipakzasya viroDi jQAna sAmagrI tvena
   sākṣādanumitipratibandhakatvam/ itareṣāṃ tu	sAkzAt anumiti pratibanDaka tvam/ itarezAm tu
   parāmarśapratibandhakatvam/ tatrāpi sādhāraṇasyāvyabhicārābhāvarūpatayā,	parAmarSa pratibanDaka tvam/ tatra api sADAraNasya avyaBicAra aBAva rUpa tayA,
   viruddhasya sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvatayā	virudDasya sAmAnADikaraNya aBAva tayA
   vyāpyatvāsiddhasya	vyApya tva asidDasya
   viśiṣṭavyāptyabhāvatayā, asādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇoḥ	viSizwa vyApti aBAva tayA, asADAraNAnupasaMhAriNoH
   vyāptisaṃśayādhāyakatvena vyāptijñānapratibandhakatvam/	vyApti saMSaya ADAyaka tvena vyApti jQAna pratibanDaka tvam/
   āchayāsiddhisvarūpāsiddhyoḥ pakṣadharmatājñānapratibandhakatvam/	ACayA sidDi svarUpa asidDyoH pakza Darma tA jQAna pratibanDaka tvam/
   upādhistu vyabhicārajñānadvārā vyāptijñānapratibandhakaḥ/ siddhasādhanaṃ	upADiH tu vyaBicAra jQAna dvArA vyApti jQAna pratibanDakaH/ sidDa sADanam
   tu	tu
   pakṣatāvighaṭakatayā āśrayāsiddhāvantarbhavatīti prāñcaḥ/	pakzatA viGawaka tayA ASraya asidDO= antarBavati iti prAQcaH/

   idaṃ prācīnamate/ vastutastu virodhiparāmarśasya	idam prAcInamate/ vastutas tu viroDi parAmarSasya
