   dhyeyam/	Dyeyam/
   itareṣām  	itarezAm  
   vyabhicārādigrahāṇām/ tatrāpi   vyabhicārādigraheṣvapi/	vyaBicAra Adi grahANAm/ tatra api  vyaBicAra Adi grahezu api/
   sādhāraṇasyeti/ bhāvapradhānanirdeśatayā sādhāraṇyasyetyarthaḥ/	sADAraNasya iti/ BAva praDAna nirdeSa tayA sADAraNyasya iti arTaH/
   avyabhicārābhāvarūpatayā/ tadgrahasyeti śeṣaḥ/	avyaBicAra aBAva rUpa tayA/ tad grahasya iti SezaH/
   vyāptijñānapratibandhakatvamityanenānvayaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ hetau	vyApti jQAna pratibanDaka tvam iti anena anvayaH/ evam agre api/ hetO
   sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvasyeva sādhyatāvacchedake	sADya aBAvavat vRtti tvasya iva sADya tAvat Cedake
   hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasyāpi	hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvasya api
   vyabhicāratayā tadgrahasya	vyaBicAra tayA tad grahasya
   hetusamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvābhāvarūpo	hetu samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva aBAva rUpaH 
   yo 'vyabhicāraḥ tadgrahapratibandhakateti bhāvaḥ/ hetau	yaH avyaBicAraH tad graha pratibanDaka tA iti BAvaH/ hetO
   sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvaprakārakagrahasya vyāptigrahapratibandhakatvaṃ tu	sADya aBAvavat vRtti tva prakAraka grahasya vyApti graha pratibanDaka tvam tu
   maṇimantrādinyāyena viśiṣṭavyāptyabhāvatayā  	maNi mantra Adi nyAyena viSizwa vyApti aBAva tayA  
   hetuvyāpakatāvacchedakasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvarūpatayā/	hetu vyApaka tAvacCedaka sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna sA mAna aDikaraNyA BAva rUpa tayA/
   vyāptisaṃśayādhāyakatveneti/	vyApti saMSaya ADAyaka tvena iti/
   hetāvasādhāraṇyādijñānadaśāyāṃ hetusādhyayoḥ	hetO= asADAraNI Adi jQAna daSAyAm hetu sADyayoH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyaniścayāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntarbhāvena ca	sAmAnADikaraNya niScaya asaMBavena pakza antarBAvena ca
   sādhyasaṃśayasattvena vyāptisaṃśayasambhavāt na vyāptinirṇaya iti	sADya saMSaya sattvena vyApti saMSaya samBavAt na vyApti nirNayaH iti
   prācīnamatamabhipretyedam/ pakṣadharmatājñānapratibandhakatvamiti/ pakṣe	prAcInamatam aBipretya idam/ pakza Darma tA jQAna pratibanDaka tvam iti/ pakze
   pakṣatāvacchedakavirahasya hetuvirahasya ca niścayadaśāyāṃ hetau	pakza tA avacCedaka virahasya hetu virahasya ca niScaya daSAyAm hetO
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapakṣavṛttitvagrahāsaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ/	pakza tA avacCedaka viSizwa pakza vRtti tva graha asaMBavAt iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   pañcatvoktirasaṅgatā, hetau upādhigrahadaśāyāmapi	paQcatva uktiH asaFga tA, hetO upADigraha daSAyAm api
   vyāptiniścayāsaṃbhavena upādhijñānasya vyāptiniścayapratibandhakatāyā	vyApti niScaya asaMBavena upADi jQAnasya vyApti niScaya pratibanDaka tAyAH 
   avaśyaṃ vaktavyatayā upādherapi hetvābhāsalakṣaṇākrāntatvādata āha  	avaSyam vaktavya tayA upADeH api hetvABAsa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvAt atas Aha  
   upādhistviti/ vyabhicārajñānadvāreti/ tathā ca hetvābhāsalakṣaṇe	upADiH tu iti/ vyaBicAra jQAna dvArA iti/ taTA ca hetvABAsa lakzaNe
   sākṣādanumititatkaraṇānyatarapratibandhakatvasyaiva niveśanīyatayā	sAkzAt anumiti tatkaraNa anyatara pratibanDaka tvasya eva niveSanIya tayA
   paramukhanirīkṣakasyopādherna hetvābhāsatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ nanu tathāpi	para muKa nirIkzakasya upADeH na hetvABAsa tvam iti BAvaH/ nanu taTA api
   siddhisattve 'numityanudayāt tadviṣayasya sādhyavatpakṣasyāpi	sidDi sattve anum iti anudayAt tad vizayasya sADya vat pakzasya api
   hetvābhāsatvamāvaśyakamityāśaṅkāṃ jarannaiyāyikānāṃ	hetvABAsa tvam AvaSyakam iti ASaFkAm jarat nEyAyikAnAm
   matamavalambyeṣṭāpattyā pariharati   siddhasādhanaṃ tviti/	matam avalambyezwa ApattyA pariharati  sidDa sADanam tu iti/
   pakṣatāvighaṭakatayeti/ tanmate pakṣatāyāḥ sādhyasaṃśayarūpatayā	pakzatA viGawaka tayA iti/ tad mate pakzatAyAH sADya saMSaya rUpa tayA
   tadvighaṭakatvaṃ sādhyaniścayasyākṣatamiti bhāvaḥ/ antarbhavatīti/ tathā	tad viGawaka tvam sADya niScayasya akzatam iti BAvaH/ antarBavati iti/ taTA
   ca	ca
   na vibhogavyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ/ darśitamatamatiśithilamityālocyāha	na viBoga vyAGAtaH iti BAvaH/ darSita matam atiSiTilam iti Alocya Aha
     nigraheti/ na ca siddhānte 'numitiṃ prati siddheḥ pratibandhakatayā	 nigraha iti/ na ca sidDAnte anumitim prati sidDeH pratibanDaka tayA
   tadviṣayasya kathaṃ hetvābhāsatā neti vācyam/ siṣādhayiṣāyāḥ	tad vizayasya kaTam hetvABAsa tA na iti vAcyam/ sizADayizAyAH
   siddhiniṣṭhapratibandhakatāyāṃ uttejakatayā kevala	sidDi nizWa pratibanDaka tAyAm uttejaka tayA kevala
   siṣādhayiṣāsahitasiddhau pratibandhakatvābhāvena tadviṣaye	sizA DayizA sahita sidDO pratibanDaka tva aBAvena tad vizaye
   uktahetvābhāsalakṣaṇāsaṃsparśāt/ adhikaṃ	ukta hetvABAsa lakzaNA saMsparSAt/ aDikam
   asmadīyābhinavadīdhitivyākhyāyāṃ	asmadIya aBinava dIDiti vyAKyAyAm
   tarkakarkaśavicāracāturīdhurīṇairanusandheyam//	tarka karkaSa vicAra cAturI DurINEH anusanDeyam//
   iti	iti
   prakāśikāyāmanumānaparicchedaḥ	prakASikAyAm anumAna paricCedaH
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   grāhyābhāvaniścayatveneti/ anumityā grāhyaṃ yat sādhyaṃ	grAhya aBAva niScaya tvena iti/ anumityA grAhyam yat sADyam
   tadabhāvaprakārakaniścayatvenetyarthaḥ/ tadvattābuddhiṃ prati	tad aBAva prakAraka niScaya tvena iti arTaH/ tadvat tA budDim prati
   tadabhāvavattāniścayavidhayeti yāvat/ satpratipakṣasya  	tad aBAvavat tA niScaya viDayA iti yAvat/ sat pratipakzasya  
   sādhyābhāvavyāpyapratihetumān pakṣa iti jñānasya/	sADya aBAva vyApya pratihetumAn pakzaH iti jQAnasya/
   virodhijñānasāmagrītvena   sādhyavattājñānavirodhi yat	viroDi jQAna sAmagrI tvena  sADya vat tA jQAna viroDi yat 
   sādhyābhāvavattājñānaṃ tajjanakatvena/ tathā ca satpratipakṣajñānaṃ	sADya aBAvavat tA jQAnam tad janaka tvena/ taTA ca sat pratipakza jQAnam
   sādhyābhāvavattājñānaṃ janayati tat sādhyānumitiṃ pratibadhnāti	sADya aBAvavat tA jQAnam janayati tat sADya anumitim pratibaDnAti
   ityevamanumitipratibandhakajñānotpādakatayā	iti evam anumiti pratibanDaka jQAna utpAdaka tayA
   satpratipakṣasyānumitipratibandhakatvamiti/ prācīnāḥ/ navīnāstu	sat pratipakzasya anumiti pratibanDaka tvam iti/ prAcInAH/ navInAstu
   sādhyābhāvavyāpyapratihetumān pakṣa ityākārakaṃ satpratipakṣajñānaṃ	sADya aBAva vyApya pratihetumAn pakzaH iti AkArakam sat pratipakza jQAnam
   'tadvattājñānaṃ prati tadabhāvavyāpyavattājñānaṃ pratibandhakam' iti	atadvat tA jQAnam prati tad aBAva vyApya vattA jQAnam pratibanDakam a iti
   rītyā anumitiṃ pratibadhnāti, na tu	rItyA anumitim pratibaDnAti, na tu
   anumitipratibandhakajñānotpādakatayā pratibadhnāti, sākṣādeva	anumiti pratibanDaka jQAna utpAdaka tayA pratibaDnAti, sAkzAt eva
   pratibandhakatvasambhavena gauravādityāhuḥ/	pratibanDaka tva samBavena gOravAt iti a AhuH/
   itareṣāmityādi/	itarezAm ityAdi/
   sādhyavyāpyahetumān pakṣa ityākārake parāmarśevyāptigrahāṃśe	sADya vyApya hetumAn pakzaH iti AkArake parAmarSevyApti graha aMSe
   sādhāraṇya virodha vyāpyatvāsiddhi asādhāraṇya anupasaṃhāritvajñānānāṃ	sADAraNya  viroDa  vyApya tva asidDi  a sADa araNya anupasaMhAri tva jQAnAnAm
   pratibandhakatvam/ 'hetumān pakṣa' iti pakṣadharmatājñanāṃśe	pratibanDaka tvam/ ahetumAn pakza a iti pakza Darma tA jQana aMSe
   āśrayāsiddhisvarūpāsiddhijñānayoḥ pratibandhakatvam/ tathā hi  	ASraya asidDi svarUpA sidDi jQAnayoH pratibanDaka tvam/ taTA hi  
   sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvaṃ hetorvyāpitariti pakṣe hetoḥ	sADya aBAva vat avRtti tvam hetoH vyApitar iti pakze hetoH
   sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvaṃ vyabhicāraḥ/ tathā ca 'parvato dhūmavān vahneḥ'	sADya aBAvavat vRtti tvam vyaBicAraH/ taTA ca aparvataH DUmavAn vahneH a
   ityatra 'dhūmābhāvavadvṛttirvahniḥ' ityākārakaṃ	iti atra aDUma aBAva vat vRttiH vahniH a iti AkArakam
   sādhāraṇyarūpavyabhicārājñānam 'dhūmābhāvavadavṛttivahnimān parvataḥ'	sADAraNya rUpa vyaBicAra ajQAnam aDUma aBAva vat avRtti vahnimAn parvataH a
   ityākārakaparāmarśe dhūmābhāvavadavṛttirvahniriti vyāptibhānāṃśe	iti AkAraka parAmarSe DUma aBAva vat avRttiH vahniH iti vyApti BAna aMSe
   tadvattābuddhiṃ prati tadabhāvavattāniścayavidhayā pratibandhakam/	tadvat tA budDim prati tad aBAvavat tA niScaya viDayA pratibanDakam/
   hetvadhikaraṇavṛttyatyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ	hetu aDikaraNa vRtti atyanta aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka sADya tAvacCedaka avacCin= a sADya sAmAnADikaraNyam
   vyāptiriti pakṣe	vyAptiH iti pakze
   sādhyatāvacchedake	sADya tAvat Cedake
   hetvadhikaraṇavṛttyatyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasyaiva	hetu aDikaraNa vRtti atyanta aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvasya eva
   vyabhicāratayā 'vahnyadhikaraṇavṛttyatyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ	vyaBicAra tayA avahni aDikaraNa vRtti atyanta aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCedakam
   dhūmatvam' ityākārakaṃ vyabhicārajñānam	DUma tvam a iti AkArakam vyaBicAra jQAnam
   'vahnyadhikaraṇavṛttyatyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakadhūmatvāvacchinnadhūmasamānādhikaraṇavahnimān	avahni aDikaraNa vRtti atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka DUma tva avacCinna DUma samAna aDikaraNa vahnimAn
   parvataḥ'	parvataH a
   ityākārakaparāmarśeṃ	iti AkAraka parAmarSem
   'pratiyogitānavacchedakaṃ dhūmatvam' ityaṃśabhānaṃ prati	apratiyogita anavacCedakam DUma tvam a iti aMSa BAnam prati
   pratibandhakam/ etādṛśasiddhāntavyāptiviṣayakaparāmarśaṃ prati	pratibanDakam/ etAdRSa sidDAnta vyApti vizaya ka parAmarSam prati
   'sādhyābhāvavadvṛttiḥ hetuḥ' ityākākavyabhicārajñānasya	asADya aBAvavat vRttiH hetuHa iti AkAka vyaBicAra jQAnasya
   grāhyābhāvānavagāhitayā nāsti pratibandhakatvam/	grAhya aBAvAnavagAhitayA na asti pratibanDaka tvam/
   tādṛśavyabhicārajñānakāle 'pi yadi	tAdRSa vyaBicAra jQAna kAle api yadi
   siddhāntavyāptijñānānutpattiranubhavasiddhā tarhi tasya	sidDAnta vyApti jQAna anutpattiH anuBava sidDA tarhi tasya
   maṇimantrādinyāyenaiva pratibandhakatā vaktavyā/ 'śabdo nityaḥ	maNi mantra Adi nyAyena eva pratibanDaka tA vaktavyA/ aSabdaH nityaH
   kṛtakatvāt' ityatra 'nityatvāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ kṛtakatvam'	kRtaka tvAt a iti atra anitya tva asamAna aDikaraNam kRtaka tvam a
   ityākārakasya sādhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyātmakavirodhajñānasya	iti AkArakasya sADyAsAmAnADikaraNya Atmaka viroDa jQAnasya
   'nityatvasamānādhikaraṇaṃ kṛtakatvam'	anitya tva samAna aDikaraNam kRtaka tvam a
   ityākārakavyāptighaṭakasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāvagāhibuddhiṃ prati	iti AkAraka vyApti Gawaka sADya sAmAnADikaraNyA avagAhi budDim prati
   pratibandhakatvam/ 'sādhyavyāpyatvābhāvavān hetuḥ'	pratibanDaka tvam/ asADya vyApya tva aBAvavAn hetuH a
   ityākārakavyāpyatvāsiddhijñānasya 'sādhyavyāpyahetumān pakṣaḥ'	iti AkAraka vyApya tva asidDi jQAnasya asADya vyApya hetumAn pakzaH a
   iti parāmarśeṃ hetau sādhyavyāpyatvajñānāṃśe pratibandhakatvam/ 'ayaṃ	iti parAmarSem hetO sADya vyApya tva jQAna aMSe pratibanDaka tvam/ aayam
   heturasādhāraṇaḥ iti vā anupasaṃhārī iti vā' jñānadaśāyāṃ	hetu rasADAraNaH iti vA anupasaMhArI iti vA a jQAna daSAyAm
   pakṣātirikte sādhyahetvoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyagrahāsaṃbhavena vyāptigraho	pakza atirikte sADya hetvoH sAmAnADikaraNya graha asaMBavena vyApti grahaH 
   na	na
   saṃbhavati/ pakṣe ca	saMBavati/ pakze ca
   sādhyasaṃśayāt hetau sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃśaya eva syāt na tu	sADya saMSayAt hetO sADya sAmAnADikaraNya saMSayaH eva syAt na tu
   niścaya iti rītyā	niScayaH iti rItyA
   vyāptiniścayapratibandhakatvamasādhāraṇyānupasaṃhāritvajñānayoḥ/	vyApti niScaya pratibanDaka tvam asADAraNyAnupasaMhAri tva jQAnayoH/
   'gaganāravindaṃ surabhi aravindatvāt' ityatra 'aravindaṃ	agagana aravindam suraBi aravinda tvAt a iti atra aaravindam
   gaganīyatvābhāvavat' ityākārakāśrayāsiddhijñānasya	gaganIya tva aBAvavat a iti AkAraka ASraya asidDi jQAnasya
   'surabhitvavyāpyāravindatvavat gaganīyāravindam'	asuraBi tva vyApya aravinda tva vat gaganIya aravindam a
   ityākārakaparāmarśeṃ	iti AkAraka parAmarSem
   pakṣatāvacchedakagaganīyatvaprakārakāravindaviśeṣyakajñānāṃśe	pakza tAvacCedaka gaganIya tva prakAraka aravinda viSezyaka jQAna aMSe
   pratibandhakatvam/ evaṃ 'hrado vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra	pratibanDaka tvam/ evam ahradaH vahnimAn DUmAt a iti atra
   'dhūmābhāvavān hradaḥ' ityākārakasya svarūpāsiddhijñānasya	aDUma aBAvavAn hradaH a iti AkArakasya svarUpa asidDi jQAnasya
   'vahnvyāpyadhmavān hradaḥ' iti parāmarśe 'dhūmavān hradaḥ' iti	avahnvyA api aDmavAn hradaH a iti parAmarSe aDUmavAn hradaH a iti
   pakṣadharmatābhānāṃśe pratibandhakatvamiti/ tadetatsarvamabhisandhāyāha  	pakza Darma tA ABAna aMSe pratibanDaka tvam iti/ tat etat sarvam aBisanDAya Aha  
   prakāśikāyāṃ hetau sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvasyetyādinā/	prakASikAyAm hetO sADya aBAvavat vRtti tvasya ityAdinA/
   nanu pañcaiva	nanu paQca eva
   hetvābhāsā iti kathanamayuktam/ hetau upādhijñānadaśāyāṃ	hetvABAsAH iti kaTanam ayuktam/ hetO upADi jQAna daSAyAm
   vyabhicāraniścayena vyāptiniścayābhāvāt	vyaBicAra niScayena vyApti niScaya aBAvAt
   anumitikaraṇavyāptiniścayapratibandhakajñānaviṣayatayā upādherapi	anumiti karaNa vyApti niScaya pratibanDaka jQAna vizaya tayA upADeH api
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇākrāntatvena hetvābhāsatvāt ṣaṭ hetvābhāsā iti	hetvABAsa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvena hetvABAsa tvAt zaw hetvABAsAH iti
   vaktavyatvādityāśaṅkate    nanu pañcatvoktirayukteti/ anumitau vā	vaktavya tvAt iti ASaFkate   nanu paQcatva uktiH ayuktA iti/ anumitO vA
   tatkaraṇaparāmarśeṃ vā sākṣāt yadviṣayakajñānasya pratibandhakatvaṃ	tad karaNa parAmarSem vA sAkzAt yat vizayaka jQAnasya pratibanDaka tvam
   tasyaiva	tasya eva
   hetvābhāsatvam/ upādhijñānaṃ tu vyabhicārajñānotpādanadvāraiva	hetvABAsa tvam/ upADi jQAnam tu vyaBicAra jQAna utpAdana dvArA eva
   parāmarśaṃ pratibadhnāti na sākṣāditi na tasya hetvābhāsatvam/ ato na	parAmarSam pratibaDnAti na sAkzAt iti na tasya hetvABAsa tvam/ atas na
   pañcatvoktivirodhaḥ/	paQcatva ukti viroDaH/
   tadāha   tathā ca	tat Aha  taTA ca
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇa iti/ sākṣādityasya pratibandhakatve 'nvayaḥ/	hetvABAsa lakzaNaH iti/ sAkzAdityasya pratibanDaka tve anvayaH/
   paramukhanirīkṣakasyeti/ parāmarśapratibandhakaṃ vyabhicārājñānaṃ	para muKa nirIkzakasya iti/ parAmarSa pratibanDakam vyaBicAra ajQAnam
   nirīkṣamāṇasyetyarthaḥ/ anena upādhijñānasya sākṣātpratibandhakatvābhāvaḥ	nirIkzamANasya iti arTaH/ anena upADi jQAnasya sAkzAt pratibanDaka tva aBAvaH
   sūcyate/ nanu yathā 'hrado vahnimāt dhūmāt' ityādau	sUcyate/ nanu yaTA ahradaH vahnimAt DUmAt a iti AdO
   vahnyabhāvavaddhradarūpabādhasya 'hrado vahnimān'	vahni aBAva vat hrada rUpa bADasya ahradaH vahnimAn a
   ityanumitipratibandhakaṃ yat 'hrado vahnyabhāvavān'	iti anumiti pratibanDakam yat ahradaH vahni aBAvavAn a
   ityākārakajñānaṃ tadviṣayatayā hetvābhāsatvam, tathā 'parvato	iti AkAraka jQAnam tad vizaya tayA hetvABAsa tvam, taTA aparvataH 
   vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādau 'parvato vahnimān'	vahnimAn DUmAt a ityAdO aparvataH vahnimAn a
   ityākārakasādhyaniścayadaśāyāṃ parvato vahnimānnaveti	iti AkAraka sADya niScaya daSAyAm parvataH vahnimAn nava iti
   sādhyasaṃśayānudayāt sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāviraheṇa 'parvato	sADya saMSaya anudayAt sADya saMSaya rUpa pakza tA viraheNa aparvataH 
   vahnimān' ityanumityanudayāt anumitipratibandhakasiddhiviṣayasya	vahnimAna iti anum iti anudayAt anumiti pratibanDaka sidDi vizayasya
   vahnimatparvatasyāpi hetvābhāsatvaṃ syāt,	vahnimat parvatasya api hetvABAsa tvam syAt ,
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇākrāntatvādityāśaṅkate   nanu tathāpīti/	hetvABAsa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvAt iti ASaFkate  nanu taTA api iti/
   tanmata ityāti/ tathā	tat mataH iti Ati/ taTA
   ca pracīnamate pakṣatāyāḥ sādhyasaṃśayarūpatayā	ca pracIna mate pakzatAyAH sADya saMSaya rUpa tayA
   anumitijanakapakṣatāpratibandhakajñānaviṣayatayā	anumiti janaka pakzatA pratibanDaka jQAna vizaya tayA
   hetvābhāsalakṣaṇākrāntatvena sādhyavatpakṣasya hetvābhāsatvamiṣṭameva/ na	hetvABAsa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvena sADya vat pakzasya hetvABAsa tvam izwam eva/ na
   ca pañcadhāvibhāgavyāghāta iti vācyam/ āśrayāsiddhe 'ntarbhāvāt/	ca paQcaDA viBAga vyAGAtaH iti vAcyam/ ASraya asidDe antarBAvAt/
   kathamantarbhāva iti cet    ittham/ āśrayāsiddhirdvividhā	kaTam antarBAvaH iti ced   itTam/ ASraya asidDiH dviviDA
   dharmisvarūpāprasiddhiḥ pakṣatvāprasiddhiśceti/ tatra pakṣatvāprasiddhau	Darmi svarUpa aprasidDiH pakzatvA aprasidDiH ceti/ tatra pakzatva aprasidDO
   siddhasādhanasyāntarbhāva iti/ taduktaṃ kusumāñjalau   "madhyamāpi	sidDa sADanasya antarBAvaH iti/ tat uktam kusumAQjalO   "maDyamA api
   āśrayasvarūpāpratītyā tadviśeṣaṇapakṣatvāpratītyā ceti	ASraya svarUpa apratItyA tad viSezaNa pakzatva apratItyA ca iti
   dvayī/ tatra caramā siddhasādhanamiti vyapadiśyate/ vyāptisthitau	dvayI/ tatra caramA sidDa sADanam iti vyapadiSyate/ vyApti sTitO
   pakṣatvasyāhatya vighaṭanāt"iti/ darśitamatamatiśithilamiti/	pakzatvasya Ahatya viGawana at"iti/ darSita matam ati SiTilam iti/
   pakṣatāyāḥ svarūpasatyāḥ pṛthak kāraṇatvāt	pakzatAyAH svarUpa satyAH pRTak kAraNa tvAt 
   siddhestatpratibandhakatve 'pi siddhasādhanasthale	sidDeH tad pratibanDaka tve api sidDa sADana sTale
   anumitikaraṇaparāmarśavighaṭanaṃ vā anumitividhaṭanaṃ vā nāstīti na	anumiti karaNa parAmarSa viGawanam vA anumiti viDawanam vA na asti iti na
   saddhisādhanasya hetvābhāsatvam/ pakṣatārūpahetvabhāvādanumitiḥ paraṃ	sadDi sADanasya hetvABAsa tvam/ pakza tA rUpa hetu aBAvAt anumitiH param

   pratibandhakatvam/ siddhisattve 'pi sā siddhiryadi siṣādhayiṣāsahitā	pratibanDaka tvam/ sidDi sattve api sA sidDiH yadi sizA DayizA sahitA

   bhavati nāsau gosadṛśaḥ, gosadṛśaścāyam, tasmāt gavayapadavācyaḥ'	Bavati na asO go sadRSaH, go sadRSaH ca ayam, tasmAt gavaya pada vAcyaH a
   ityunamānaprayogo 'tra vivakṣitaḥ/ tathā ca	iti una mAna prayogaH atra vivakzitaH/ taTA ca

   AnTs_59 āptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ / āptas tu yathārthavaktā / vākyaṃ padasamūhaḥ /	AnTH _59 Apta vAkyam SabdaH / AptaH tu yaTA arTa vaktA / vAkyam pada samUhaH /
   yathā gām ānayeti / śaktaṃ padam / asmāt padād ayam artho boddhavya	yaTA gAm Anaya iti / Saktam padam / asmAt padAt ayam arTaH bodDavya
   itīśvarasaṃketaḥ śaktiḥ //	iti ISvara saMketaH SaktiH //
   āptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ/	Apta vAkyam SabdaH/
   āptastu yathārthavaktā/	AptaH tu yaTArTa vaktA/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   śabdaṃ lakṣayati  	Sabdam lakzayati  
   āpteti/ āptaṃ lakṣayati   āptastviti/	Apta iti/ Aptam lakzayati  AptaH tu iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   śabdaṃ lakṣayatīti/	Sabdam lakzayati iti/
   upajīvyopajīvakatvasaṅgatyā śabdaṃ ni   payatītyarthaḥ/ atra	upajIvya upajIvaka tva saFgatyA Sabdam ni  payati iti arTaH/ atra
   jñāyamānaśabdasya śabdapramāṇatayā śabde upamānopajīvakatvābhāvāt	jQAyamAna Sabdasya Sabda pramANa tayA Sabde upamAna upajIvaka tva aBAvAt
   upamitiśābdabodharūphalayoḥ saṅgatirbodhyā/ tathā hi  	upamiti SAbda boDa rU PalayoH saFgatiH boDyA/ taTA hi  
   śaktiparicchittirevopamitiḥ/ tasyāśca śābdabodhopajīvyatvena	Sakti paricCittiH eva upamitiH/ tasyAH ca SAbda boDa upajIvya tvena
   phalayorupajīvyopajīvakatvasambhavaḥ/ tādṛśasaṅgateśca	PalayoH upajIvya upajIvaka tva samBavaH/ tAdRSa saFgateH ca
   phalaniṣṭhatve 'pi svāśrayakaraṇatvātmakaparamparāsambandhena	Pala nizWa tve api sva ASraya karaNa tva Atmaka paramparA sambanDena
   karaṇaniṣṭhatvāt karaṇayoranantarābhidhānaprayojakatvam/ śabdajñānasya	karaNa nizWa tvAt karaNayoH anantara aBiDAna prayojaka tvam/ Sabda jQAnasya
   pramāṇatvāṅgīkartṛnavīnamate tu upamiteḥ śaktapadaviṣayakatvena	pramANa tva aFgIkartR navIna mate tu upamiteH Sakta pada vizayaka tvena
   śabdapramāṇatayā tatra copamānajanyatvasyākṣatatayā svarūpayorapi	Sabda pramANa tayA tatra ca upamAna janya tvasya akzata tayA svarUpayoH api
   saṅgatiriti mantavyam/	saFgatiH iti mantavyam/
   mūle āptavākyaṃ śabda	mUle Apta vAkyam Sabda
   iti/ śabda iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ/ pramāṇaśabda iti tadarthaḥ/	iti/ SabdaH iti lakzya nirdeSaH/ pramANa SabdaH iti tad arTaH/
   āptavākyamiti lakṣaṇam/	Apta vAkyam iti lakzaNam/
   bhavati hi payasā	Bavati hi payasA
   siñcatītyādiśabdaḥ āptoktavākyam/ na tu vahninā	siQcati ityAdi SabdaH Apta ukta vAkyam/ na tu vahninA
   siñcatītyādiśabdaḥ, taduccāraṇakartuḥ	siQcati ityAdi SabdaH, tad uccAraNa kartuH
   yathārthavaktṛtvarūpāptatvābhāvāt/	yaTA arTa vaktR tva rUpa Apta tva aBAvAt/
   prakṛtavākyārthagocarayathārthajñānajanyavākyaṃ pramāṇaśabda iti tu	prakRta vAkya arTa gocara yaTa arTa jQAna janya vAkyam pramANa SabdaH iti tu
   niṣkarṣaḥ/ vākyaprayoge vākyārthañjñānasya hetutvāt lakṣaṇasaṅgatiḥ/	nizkarzaH/ vAkya prayoge vAkya arTan jQAnasya hetu tvAt lakzaNa saFgatiH/
   sphuṭametat śabdamaṇau/	sPuwam etat Sabda maNO/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   upajīvyopajīvakatvasaṅgatyeti/ upamānam upajīvyaṃ	upajIvya upajIvaka tva saFgatyeti/ upamAnam upajIvyam
   kāraṇam, śabdaḥ upajīvakaḥ kāryaḥ/ tathā ca śabdopamānayoḥ	kAraNam, SabdaH upajIvakaH kAryaH/ taTA ca Sabda upamAnayoH
   kāryakāraṇabhāvasadbhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpasaṅgatyā	kArya kAraNa BAva sadBAvAt kArya kAraNa BAva rUpa saFgatyA
   upamānānantaraṃ śabdanirūpaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/	upamAna anantaram Sabda nirUpaNam iti BAvaH/
   upajīvyopajīvakabhāvamevopapādayati   atretyādinā/	upajIvya upajIvaka BAvam eva upapAdayati  atra ityAdinA/
   ayaṃ	ayam
   bhāvaḥ pramāṇayorūpajīvyojīvakabhāvo 'tra durvacaḥ/ śabdapramāṇaṃ hi	BAvaH pramANayaH rUpa jIvyaH jIvaka BAvaH atra durvacaH/ Sabda pramANam hi
   jñāyamānaḥ vākyātmakaḥ śabdaḥ/ upamānapramāṇaṃ tu sādṛśyadarśanam/	jQAyamAnaH vAkya AtmakaH SabdaH/ upamAna pramANam tu sAdRSya darSanam/
   tatkāryatvaṃ tu śabde nāstīti/ śabdopamānātmakapramāṇayoḥ	tad kArya tvam tu Sabde na asti iti/ Sabda upamAna Atmaka pramANayoH
   kāryakāraṇabhāvo na sambhavati/	kArya kAraNa BAvaH na samBavati/
   śabdopamānajanyapramityorevātrakāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ/ śabdajanyāpramitiḥ	Sabda upamAna janya pramityoH eva atra kArya kAraNa BAvaH/ Sabda janyA pramitiH
   śābdabodhaḥ/ upamānajanyā pramitiḥ ayamasau gavayapadavācya	SAbda boDaH/ upamAna janyA pramitiH ayam asO gavaya pada vAcya
   ityādyākārakaḥ śaktigrāhaḥ/ śaktigrahajanyatvaṃ ca śābdabodhe vartata	ityAdya akArakaH Sakti grAhaH/ Sakti graha janya tvam ca SAbda boDe vartata
   iti/ na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvātmakasaṅgateḥ pramitidvayaniṣṭhatve 'pi	iti/ na ca kArya kAraNa BAva Atmaka saFgateH pramiti dvaya nizWa tve api
   pramāṇadvayaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt upamānapramāṇanirūpaṇānantaraṃ	pramANa dvaya nizWatva aBAvAt upamAna pramANa nirUpaNa anantaram
   śabdapramāṇanirūpaṇe tādṛśasaṅgaternopayoga iti vācyam/	Sabda pramANa nirUpaNe tAdRSa saFgateH na upayogaH iti vAcyam/
   upamitiśābdabodharūpapramitidvayaniṣṭhasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya	upamiti SAbda boDa rUpa pramiti dvaya nizWasya kArya kAraNa BAvasya
   svāśrayajanakatvasambandhena pramāṇaniṣṭhatvāt/ svaṃ   kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ,	sva ASraya janaka tva sambanDena pramANa nizWa tva at/ svam  kArya kAraNa BAvaH,
   svāśrayau upamitiśābdabodhau, tajjanakatvamupamānaśabdayoriti/ tathā	sva ASrayO upamiti SAbda boDO, tad janaka tvam upamAna SabdayoH iti/ taTA
   ca kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpasaṅgateḥ svāśrayajanakatvasambandheṃna	ca kArya kAraNa BAva rUpa saFgateH sva ASraya janaka tva sambanDeMna
   pramāṇaniṣṭhatvāt upamānānantaraṃ śabdanirūpaṇaṃ saṅgatamiti/ idaṃ	pramANa nizWa tvAt upamAna anantaram Sabda nirUpaNam saFgatamiti/ idam
   prācīnamatānusāreṇa/	prAcIna mata anusAreNa/
   navīnamate tu	navIna mate tu
   śabdajñānameva śabdapramāṇam/ upamitirapi gavayo gavayapadavācya	Sabda jQAnam eva Sabda pramANam/ upamitiH api gavayaH gavaya pada vAcya
   ityākārikā gavayadharmikā gavayapadavācyatvaprakārikā gavayapadaṃ	iti AkArikA gavaya DarmikA gavaya pada vAcya tva prakArikA gavaya padam
   gavayavācakamityākārikā gavayapadadharmikā gavayavācakatvaprakārikā vā	gavaya vAcakam iti AkArikA gavaya pada DarmikA gavaya vAcaka tva prakArikA vA
   pakṣaviṣayakatvāt śabdajñānarūpaiva/ sā ca	pakza vizayaka tvAt Sabda jQAna rUpA eva/ sA ca

   kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpā saṅgatirastīti/	kArya kAraNa BAva rUpA saFgatiH asti iti/
   upamānopajīvakatvābhāvāditi/	upamAna upajIvaka tva aBAvAt iti/
   upamānapramāṇajanyatvābhāvādityarthaḥ/ śaktiparicchittiriti/	upamAna pramANa janya tva aBAvAt iti arTaH/ Sakti paricCittiH iti/
   śaktiviṣayakajñānamityarthaḥ/ tasyāśca   śaktiparicchitteśca/	Sakti vizaya ka jQAnam iti arTaH/ tasyAH ca  Sakti paricCitteH ca/
   śābdabodhopajīvyatvena   śābdabodhajanakatvena/	SAbda boDa upajIvya tvena  SAbda boDa janaka tvena/
   karaṇayoranantarābhidhānaprayojakatvamiti/ karaṇayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ yat	karaNayoH anantara aBiDAna prayojaka tvam iti/ karaNayoH pramANayoH yat 
   anantarābhidhānaṃ paurvāparyeṃṇābhidhānaṃ tatprayojakatvaṃ taddhetutvaṃ	anantara aBiDAnam pOrvAparyeMNa aBiDAnam tad prayojaka tvam tad hetu tvam
   saṃgaterityarthaḥ/ āptoktavākyamiti/ āptakartṛkoccāraṇaviṣayabhūtaṃ	saMgateH iti arTaH/ Apta ukta vAkyamiti/ Apta kartRkA uccAraNa vizaya BUtam
   vākyamityarthaḥ/ āptastu yathārthavakteti	vAkyam iti arTaH/ AptaH tu yaTArTa vaktA iti

   bhavitumarhatītyāśayenāha   prakṛtavākyārtheti/	Bavitum arhati iti ASayena Aha  prakRta vAkya arTa iti/
   'artha buddhvā	aarTa budDvA
   śabdaracanā' iti nyāyāt vaktṛniṣṭhena	Sabda racanAa iti nyAyAt vaktR nizWena

   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ tadāha   vākyaprayoga iti/ sphuṭametat	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ tat Aha  vAkya prayogaH iti/ sPuwam etat 
   śabdamaṇāviti/ tattvacintāmaṇau śabdakhaṇḍe  	Sabda maNO= iti/ tattva cintAmaNO Sabda KaNxe

   padasamūhaḥ/ śaktaṃ padam/ asmāt padāt ayamartho boddhavya iti	pada samUhaH/ Saktam padam/ asmAt padAt ayam arTaH bodDavyaH iti
   īśvarasaṅgetaḥ śaktiḥ/	ISvara saFgetaH SaktiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   vākyalakṣaṇamāha  	vAkya lakzaNam Aha

   śaktinirūpaṇam	Sakti nirUpaNam
   arthasmṛtyanukūlapadapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ/ sā ca	arTa smRti anukUla pada padArTa sambanDaH SaktiH/ sA ca
   padārthāntaramiti mīmāṃsakāḥ/ tannirāsārthamāha   asmāditi/	padArTa antaram iti mImAMsakAH/ tad nirAsa arTam Aha  asmAt iti/
   ḍitthādīnāmiva ghaṭādīnāmapi saṅketa eva śaktiḥ, na tu	xitTa AdInAm iva Gawa AdInAm api saFketa eva SaktiH, na tu
   padārthāntaramityarthaḥ/	padArTa antaram iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   iha prayojakatvam/ tacca	iha prayojaka tvam/ tat ca
   kāraṇatāvacchedakapadapadārthasambanadhe 'pyakṣatam/	kAraNa tAvacCedaka pada padArTa sambanaDe api akzatam/
   ghaṭādipadatadarthayoranyasambandhavāraṇāya anukūlāntaṃ	Gawa Adi pada tad arTayoH anya sambanDa vAraNAya anukUla antam
   vivakṣitārthakam/ anyasambandhajñānasyārthasmṛtijanakatve 'pi	vivakzita arTa kam/ anya sambanDa jQAnasya arTa smRti janaka tve api
   śābdabodhajanakasmṛtijanakatvābhāvāt/ arthasmṛtyanukūlatvasya	SAbda boDa janaka smRti janaka tva aBAvAt/ arTa smRti anukUla tvasya
   adṛṣṭādisādhāraṇyāt viśeṣyamiti dhyeyam/ padārthāntaramiti/	adRzwa Adi sADa araNyAt viSezyam iti Dyeyam/ padArTa antaram iti/
   tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭavadityarthaḥ/ tenātiriktapadārthatvasya	tad tad padArTa tAvacCedaka aBAva kUwa vat iti arTaH/ tena atirikta padArTa tvasya
   anyamatāprasiddhatve 'pi na vyāghātaḥ/ asmāt padāt ayamartho boddhavya	anya mata aprasidDa tve api na vyAGAtaH/ asmAt padAt ayam arTaH bodDavya
   iti mūlasya 'etatpadajanyabodhaviṣayo 'yamarthaḥ'	iti mUlasya aetat pada janya boDa vizayaH ayam arTaH a
   ityākārakeśvarecchā śaktirityarthaḥ/	iti AkArakeSvara icCA SaktiH iti arTaH/
   na tu	na tu
   padārthāntaramiti/ na ceśvarīyajñānasyecchāyāḥ kṛtervā	padArTa antaram iti/ na ca ISvarIyajQAnasya icCAyAH kRteH vA
   śaktirūpatvamiti vinigamanāvirahāt atiriktaiva śaktiriti vācyam/	Sakti rUpa tvam iti vinigamanA virahAt atiriktA eva SaktiH iti vAcyam/
   ādhunikasaṅketasya icchārūpatayā śakterapi icchārūpatve	ADunika saFketasya icCA rUpatayA SakteH api icCA rUpa tve
   saṅketajñānasya anugatakāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati nānyathā ityevaṃ	saFketa jQAnasya anugata kArya kAraNa BAvaH samBavati na anyaTA iti evam
   vinigamakasaṃbhavena, icchāyā eva śaktitvasvīkārāt/	vinigamaka saMBavena, icCAyAH eva Sakti tva svIkArAt/
   na ca   bhagavadicchāyāḥ	na ca  Bagavat icCAyAH
   sakalaviṣayiṇyāḥ śaktitvasvīkāre	sakala vizayiNyAH Sakti tva svIkAre
   ghaṭapadaboddhavyatvaprakārakatadicchāyāḥ paṭe 'pi sattvāt	Gawa pada bodDavya tva prakAraka tad icCAyAH pawe api sattvAt 
   ghaṭapadavācyatvasya atiprasaṅgaḥ/ evaṃ	Gawa pada vAcya tvasya atiprasaFgaH/ evam
   gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakecchāyāḥ tīre 'pi sattvena	gaFgA pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakAraka icCAyAH tIre api sattvena
   śaktyaiva tadbodhasambhave lakṣaṇocchedāpattiriti   vācyam/ yataḥ	SaktyA eva tad boDa samBave lakzaNa ucCeda ApattiH iti  vAcyam/ yatas 
   tattatpadavācyatvaṃ	tad tad pada vAcya tvam
   tattatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpiteśvarecchīyaviśeṣyatāvattvam/	tad tad pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpita ISvara icCIya viSezya tAvat tvam/
   tādṛśaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena tadicchāvattvaṃ vā/ tathā ca	tAdRSa prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tA sambanDena tat icCAvat tvam vA/ taTA ca
   tādṛśasya ghaṭapadavācyatvasya paṭe 'sattvāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ/	tAdRSasya Gawa pada vAcya tvasya pawe asattvAt na ati prasaFgaH/
   gaṅgādipadajanyatvasya bodhāṃśe, bodhaviṣayatvasya ca tīrāṃśe,	gaFgA Adi pada janya tvasya boDa aMSe, boDa vizaya tvasya ca tIra aMSe,
   svātantryeṇa bhānamīśvarecchāyāṃ upeyate/ itthaṃ ca	svAtantryeNa BAnam ISvara icCAyAm upeyate/ itTam ca
   viśakalitabhānasthale nirūpyanirūpakabhāvāpannaviṣayatāyā abhāvena	viSakalita BAna sTale nirUpya nirUpaka BAva Apanna vizaya tAyAH aBAvena
   gaṅgāpadajanyatvaprakāratānirūpitabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpitav	gaFgA pada janya tva prakAra tA nirUpita boDa vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpita v
   iśeṣyatāsambandhena	iSa izyatA sambanDena
   icchāvattvasya tīre 'sattvena na kṣatiriti saṅkṣepaḥ/	icCAvat tvasya tIre asattvena na kzatiH iti saFkzepaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   śābdabodhajanaketi/ anekapadārthasaṃsargāvagāhijñānaṃ	SAbda boDa jana keti/ aneka padArTa saMsarga avagAhi jQAnam
   śābdabodhaḥ/ tasya janakaṃ padārthānāṃ smaraṇam, tadanukūlaḥ	SAbda boDaH/ tasya janakam padArTAnAm smaraNam, tad anukUlaH
   padapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ/ tadanukūlatvaṃ ca tajjanakajñānaviṣayatvam/	pada padArTa sambanDaH SaktiH/ tad anukUla tvam ca tad janaka jQAna vizaya tvam/
   tathā ca yasya padapadārthayoḥ sambandhajñānamasti tasyaiva	taTA ca yasya pada padArTayoH sambanDa jQAnam asti tasya eva
   vākyaghaṭakapadajñānāt tattatpadārthasmaraṇaṃ bhavati/ padajñānaṃ hi	vAkya Gawaka pada jQAnAt tad tad padArTa smaraNam Bavati/ pada jQAnam hi
   ekasambandhijñānamaparasambandhismārakamiti rītyā padārthasmṛtiṃ	eka sambanDi jQAnam apara sambanDi smArakam iti rItyA padArTa smRtim
   janayati/ yathā pūrvaṃ sambaddhatayā dṛṣṭayoḥ hastihastapakayordhadhye	janayati/ yaTA pUrvam sambadDa tayA dRzwayoH hasti hasta pakayoH DaDye
   paścāt kadācit ekasya hastipakarūpasambandhino darśanena aparasya	paScAt kadAcid ekasya hastipaka rUpa sambanDinaH darSanena aparasya
   hastirūpasya sambandhinaḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavati tadvat pūrvaṃ padapadārthayoḥ	hasti rUpasya sambanDinaH smaraNam Bavati tadvat pUrvam pada padArTayoH
   sambandhaṃ yaḥ jānāti sa eva ekasya padarūpasya sambandhinaḥ jñāne sati	sambanDam yaH jAnAti saH eva ekasya pada rUpasya sambanDinaH jQAne sati
   aparamartharūpaṃ sambandhinaṃ smartuṃ śaknoti/ tathā ca	aparam arTa rUpam sambanDinam smartum Saknoti/ taTA ca
   sambandhajñānasahakṛtāt padajñānāt padārthasmṛtiḥ tataḥ śābdabodha	sambanDa jQAna saha kRtAt pada jQAnAt padArTa smRtiH tatas SAbda boDa
   iti kramo 'tra	iti kramaH atra
   vivakṣitaḥ/	vivakzitaH/
   nanu	nanu
   'athasmṛtyanukūlapadapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ' iti dīpikāvākye	aaTa smRti anukUla pada padArTa sambanDaH SaktiH a iti dIpikA vAkye
   anukūlaśabdasya yadi kāraṇamityarthaḥ tadā	anukUla Sabdasya yadi kAraNam iti arTaH tadA
   padapadārthasambandhajñānasyārthasmṛtijanakatve 'pi	pada padArTa sambanDa jQAnasya arTa smRti janaka tve api
   padapadārthasambandhasyārthasmṛtijanakatvābhāvādasambhavaḥ/ ata āha  	pada padArTa sambanDasya arTa smRti janaka tva aBAvAt asamBavaH/ atas Aha  
   anukūlatvāmiha prayojakatvamiti prayojakatvaṃ ca	anukUla tvAm iha prayojaka tvam iti prayojaka tvam ca
   kāraṇakāraṇatāvacchedakobhayasādhārāṇam/	kAraNa kAraNa tAvacCedaka uBaya sADArANam/
   padapadārthasambandhajñānamityasya viṣayitāsambandheta	pada padArTa sambanDa jQAnam iti asya vizayitA sambanDeta
   sambandhaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca arthasmṛtikāraṇam	sambanDa viSizwa jQAnam iti arTaH/ taTA ca arTa smRti kAraNam
   sambandhaviśiṣṭajñānam/ tatra viṣayitāsambandhena vidyamānatayā	sambanDa viSizwa jQAnam/ tatra vizayitA sambanDena vidyamAna tayA
   padapadārthasambandhasya kāraṇatāvacchedakatvamakṣatam/ kāraṇe	pada padArTa sambanDasya kAraNa tAvacCedaka tvam akzatam/ kAraNe
   vidyamānasyaiva kāraṇatāvacchedakatvāt/ tathā ca padapadārthasambandhasya	vidyamAnasya eva kAraNa tAvacCedaka tvAt/ taTA ca pada padArTa sambanDasya
   arthasmṛtiprayojakatvāt tadanukūlatvaṃ sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	arTa smRti prayojaka tvAt tad anukUla tvam samBavati iti BAvaH/ taTA ca
   śābdabodhajanakārthasmṛtiprayojakatve sati padapadārthasambandhatvaṃ	SAbda boDa janaka arTa smRti prayojaka tve sati pada padArTa sambanDa tvam
   śakterlakṣaṇamiti paryavasannam/ tatra viśeṣyānupādāne	SakteH lakzaNam iti paryavasan= am/ tatra viSezya anupAdAne
   adṛṣṭādiṣvativyāptiḥ/ teṣāṃ kāryasāmānyaṃ prati kāraṇatayā	adRzwa Adizu ati vyAptiH/ tezAm kArya sAmAnyam prati kAraNa tayA
   arthasmṛtiṃ pratyapi kāraṇatvāt/ tadvāraṇāya viśeṣyopādānam/	arTa smRtim pratyapi kAraNa tvAt/ tad vAraNAya viSezya upAdAnam/
   adṛṣṭādeḥ padapadārthasambandhatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiḥ/	adRzwa AdeH pada padArTa sambanDa tva aBAvAt na ati vyAptiH/
   viśeṣaṇānupādāne ghaṭapadasya kambugrīvādimadrūpatadarthasya ca yaḥ	viSezaNa anupAdAne Gawa padasya kambu grIva Adimat rUpa tad arTasya ca yaH
   kālikādisambandhaḥ tatrātivyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya viśeṣaṇam/	kAlikA Adi sambanDaH tatra ativyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya viSezaNam/
   ghaṭapadatadarthayoḥ kālikasambandhasya kathañcit arthasmṛtyanukūlatve 'pi	Gawa pada tad arTayoH kAlika sambanDasya kaTaQcid arTa smRti anukUla tve api
   tasyāḥ smṛteḥ śābdabodhajanakatvaṃ nāsti/ ataḥ	tasyAH smRteH SAbda boDa janaka tvam nAsti/ atas 
   śābdabodhajanakārthasmṛtyanukūlatvasya kālikasambandhe 'bhāvāt	SAbda boDa janaka arTa smRti anukUla tvasya kAlika sambanDe aBAvAt 
   nātivyāptiḥ/ tadāha ghaṭādipadetyādinā/ vivakṣitārthakamiti/	na ati vyAptiH/ tat Aha Gawa Adi pada ityAdinA/ vivakzita arTakam iti/
   śābdabodhajanakasmṛtyanukūlatvārthakamityarthaḥ/	SAbda boDa janaka smRti anukUla tva arTakam iti arTaH/
   'sā ca padārthāntaram'	asA ca padArTa antaram a
   iti dīpikātaḥ śaktiḥ kḷptasaptapadārthātiriktaḥ padārthaḥ ityartho	iti dIpikAtaH SaktiH k?pta sapta padArTa atiriktaH padArTaH iti arTaH 
   labhyate/ tathā sati naiyāyikamate 'prasaddhiḥ/ kḷptapadārthātiriktatvasya	laByate/ taTA sati nEyAyika mate aprasadDiH/ k?pta padArTa atirikta tvasya
   aprasiddhatvāt/ tathā ca mīmāṃsakena naiyāyikaṃ prati tatsādhane	aprasidDa tvAt/ taTA ca mImAMsakena nEyAyikam prati tad sADane
   naiyāyikenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ udbhāvyatetyālocya	nEyAyikena aprasidDa viSezaNa tvam udBAvyata iti Alocya
   vyācaṣṭe tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭavadityartha iti/ pratyekaṃ	vyAcazwe  tad tad padArTa tAva= Cedaka aBAva kUwa vat iti arTaH iti/ pratyekam
   dravyādau prasiddhāḥ ye dravyatvādīnāmabhāvāḥ tadghaṭita samudāyavatī	dravya AdO prasidDAH ye dravya tva AdInAm aBAvAH tad Gawita samudAyavatI
   śaktirityarthaḥ/ anyamatāprasiddhatve 'pīti/ naiyāyikamate 'prasiddhatve	SaktiH iti arTaH/ anya mata aprasidDa tve api iti/ nEyAyika mate aprasidDa tve
   'pi	api
   ityarthaḥ/ na vyāghātaḥ   nānupapattiḥ/ asmāt padādityatra pañcamyāḥ	iti arTaH/ na vyAGAtaH  na anupapattiH/ asmAt padAt iti atra paQcamyAH
   janyatvamarthaḥ/ tasya budhadhātvarthabodhe 'nvayaḥ/ ṇyatpratyayasya	janya tvam arTaH/ tasya buDa DAtu arTa boDe anvayaH/ Nyat pratyayasya
   vaṣiyatvamarthaḥ/ tathā ca etatpadajanyabodhaviṣayo 'yamartha iti	vaziya tvam arTaH/ taTA ca etad pada janya boDa vizayaH ayam arTaH iti
   labhyate/ tadāha iti mūlasyeti/ ādhunikasaṅketasyetyādi/	laByate/ tadA aha iti mUlasya iti/ ADunika saFketasya ityAdi/
   ḍitthādipadādayamartho boddhavya	xitTa Adi padAt ayam arTaH bodDavya
   ityākārakādhunikecchārūpasaṅketagrahāt ḍitthādipadāt	iti AkArakADunikA icCA rUpasaFketa grahAt xitTa Adi padAt 
   vyaktiviśeṣabodho bhavatīti svīkāraṇīyam/ 'ghaṭadipadāt ayamartho	vyakti viSeza boDaH Bavati iti svIkAraNIyam/ aGawa dipadAt ayam arTaH 
   bodhya' ityākārakeśvarecchārūpasaṅketagrahāt ghaṭādipadāt	boDya a iti AkAraka ISvara icCA rUpa saFketa grahAt Gawa Adi padAt 
   ghaṭādibodha iti vaktavyam/ saṅketatvaṃ ca	Gawa Adi boDaH iti vaktavyam/ saFketa tvam ca
   tattatpadaboddhavyatvaprakārakādhunikecchā   īśvarecchayoḥsādhāraṇo	tad tad pada bodDavya tva prakArakADunikA icCA  ISvara icCayoH sADAraNaH 
   dharmaḥ/ tathā ceśvarecchāyāḥ śaktitve	DarmaH/ taTA ca ISvara icCAyAH Sakti tve
   ubhayasādhāraṇasṅketatvāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānatvena śābdabodhaṃ prati	uBaya sADAraNa sFketatva avacCinna vizaya ka jQAna tvena SAbda boDam prati
   ekavidhameva kāraṇatvam/ tattatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakasya	ekaviDam A iva kAraNa tvam/ tad tad pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakasya
   īśvarajñānasya īśvaraprayatnasya vā śaktitve tu ḍitthādipadasthale	ISvara jQAnasya ISvara prayatnasya vA Sakti tve tu xitTa Adi pada sTale
   icchārūpasaṅketajñānāt śābdabodhaḥ ghaṭādipadasthale tu	icCA rUpa saFketa jQAnAt SAbda boDaH Gawa Adi pada sTale tu
   īśvarajñānarūpā īśvarapratnarūpa vā yā śaktiḥ tajjñānādapi	ISvara jQAna rUpA ISvara pratna rUpa vA yA SaktiH tad jQAnAt api
   śābdabodha ityevaṃ aneke kāryakāraṇabhāvāḥ kalpanīyā iti	SAbda boDaH iti evam aneke kArya kAraNa BAvAH kalpanIyAH iti
   gauravam/ ataḥ īśvarecchaiva śaktirityarthaḥ/ vinigamakaṃ vinigamanā	gOravam/ atas ISvara icCA eva SaktiH iti arTaH/ vinigamakam vinigamanA
   iti padayoḥ anyatarapakṣasādhakayuktirityarthaḥ/	iti padayoH anyatara pakza sADaka yuktiH iti arTaH/
   na ca bhagavadicchāyā	na ca Bagavat icCAyA
   ityādi/ īśvarecchāyāḥ sarvaviṣayakatvamekatvaṃ cāṅgīkriyate/	ityAdi/ ISvara icCAyAH sarva vizayaka tvam eka tvam ca aFgIkriyate/
   sā cet śaktiḥ tarhi paṭāderapi 'ghaṭādipadavācyatvaṃ prasajyeta/ tathā	sA ced SaktiH tarhi pawa AdeH api aGawa Adi pada vAcya tvam prasajyeta/ taTA
   hi   viśeṣyatāsambandhena	hi  viSezyatA sambanDena
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakabhagavadicchāvatvaṃ	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakAraka Bagavat icCAva tvam
   ghaṭapadaśakyatvamiti	Gawa pada Sakyatvam iti
   vaktavyam/ 'ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayo ghaṭo bhavatu' ityākārikāyāṃ	vaktavyam/ aGawa pada janya boDa vizayaH GawaH Bavatu a iti AkArikAyAm
   bhagavadicchāyāṃ ghaṭo viśeṣyaḥ ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaṃ prakāraḥ/	Bagavat icCAyAm GawaH viSezyaH Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tvam prakAraH/
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakeSvara icCAyAH
   svanirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena ghaṭe sattvāt ghaṭasya	sva nirUpita viSezya tA sambanDena Gawe sattvAt Gawasya
   ghaṭapadaśakyatvam/ īśvarecchāyāśca ekatvāt tasyāḥ	Gawa pada Sakya tvam/ ISvara icCAyAH ca eka tvAt tasyAH
   'paṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayaḥ paṭo bhavatu', 'kuḍyapadajanyabodhaviṣayaḥ	apawa pada janya boDa vizayaH pawaH Bavatu a, akuxya pada janya boDa vizayaH
   kuḍyaṃ bhavatu' ityādyākārakatvamapyaṅgīkaraṇīyam/ tathā	kuxyam Bavatu a ityAdi AkAraka tvam api aFgIkaraNIyam/ taTA
   ceśvarecchāyāṃ paṭāderapi viśeṣyatvāt	ca ISvara icCAyAm pawa AdeH api viSezya tvAt 
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakeSvara icCAyAH viSezyatA sambanDena
   paṭādāvapi sattvāt paṭāderapi ghaṭapadavācyatvaprasaṅgaḥ/ evaṃ	pawa AdO= api sattvAt pawa AdeH api Gawa pada vAcya tva prasaFgaH/ evam
   'gaṅgāpadajanyabondhaviṣayaḥ pravāho bhavatu',	agaFgA pada janya bonDa vizayaH pravAhaH Bavatu a,
   'tīrapadajanyabodhaviṣayaḥ tīraṃ bhavatu' ityākārakatāyā	atIra pada janya boDa vizayaH tIram Bavatu a iti AkAraka tAyA
   apīśvarecchāyāḥ vaktavyatayā tatra gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaṃ	api ISvara icCAyAH vaktavya tayA tatra gaFgA pada janya boDa vizaya tvam
   prakāraḥtīraṃ viśeṣyamiti	prakAraH tIram viSezyam iti
   gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	gaFgA pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakeSvara icCAyAH viSezyatA sambanDena
   tīre 'pi sattvāt tīrasyāpi gaṅgāpadavācyatvāt	tIre api sattvAt tIrasya api gaFgA pada vAcya tvAt
   śaktyaiva gaṅgāpadāt	SaktyA eva gaFgA padAt 
   tīrasya bodhasambhavena tīre gaṅgāpadasya lakṣaṇā anāvaśyikīti	tIrasya boDa samBavena tIre gaFgA padasya lakzaNA anAvaSyikI iti
   lakṣaṇāyāḥ bhaṅgaśca prasajyeteti śaṅkāyāḥ āśayaḥ/	lakzaNAyAH BaFgaH ca prasajyeta iti SaFkAyAH ASayaH/
   ghaṭapadaboddhavyatvaprakārakatadicchāyā iti/	Gawa pada bodDavya tva prakAraka tad icCAyAH iti/
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyā ityarthaṃḥ/	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakeSvara icCAyAH iti arTaMH/
   yatastatpadavācyatvamityādi/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena	yatas tad pada vAcya tvam ityAdi/ viSezyatA sambanDena
   tatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāvattvaṃ na tatpadavācyatvam,	tad pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakArakeSvara icCAvat tvam na tad pada vAcya tvam,
   yena pūrvoktadoṣau syātām/ api tu	yena pUrva ukta dozO syAtAm/ api tu
   tatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā yā	tad pada janya boDa vizaya tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitA yA
   īśvarecchānirūpitā viśeṣyatā tadvattvam	ISvara icCA ni rUpitA viSezyatA tadvat tvam
   tatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhenaneśvarecchāvattvaṃvā	tad pada janya boDa vizaya tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tA sambanDenana ISvara icCAvat tvaMvA
   tatpadavācyatvam/ īśvarecchāyā ekatvena tasyāṃ sarvasya viśeṣyatve	tad pada vAcya tvam/ ISvara icCAyAH eka tvena tasyAm sarvasya viSezya tve
   prakāratve 'pi ca īśvarecchīyā tattatpadārthaniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā	prakAra tve api ca ISvara icCIyA tad tad padArTa nizWA viSezyatA
   prakārabhedena bhinnabhinnā bhavati/ evaṃ ca 'ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayo	prakAra Bedena Binna BinnA Bavati/ evam ca aGawa pada janya boDa vizayaH 
   ghaṭo bhavatu,' 'paṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayaḥ paṭo bhavatu'	GawaH Bavatu, a apawa pada janya boDa vizayaH pawaH Bavatu a
   ityadyākārakeśvarecchānirūpitā ghaṭaniṣṭhā viśeṣyataiva	iti adya AkAraka ISvara icCA nirUpitA Gawa nizWA viSezyatA eva
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā, na paṭaniṣṭhā	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitA, na pawa nizWA
   viśeṣyatā, paṭāṃśe ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvasyeśvarecchāyā	viSezyatA, pawa aMSe Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tvasya ISvara icCAyA
   anavagāhanāt/ ataḥ	anavagAhanAt/ atas 
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaya tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tA sambanDena
   īśvarecchāyāḥ ghaṭe eva sattvāt ghaṭasyaiva ghaṭapadavācyatvaṃ na	ISvara icCAyAH Gawe eva sattvAt Gawasya eva Gawa pada vAcya tvam na
   paṭādeḥ/ evaṃ lakṣaṇāsthale 'gaṅgāpadajanyo bodho bhavatu'	pawa AdeH/ evam lakzaNa asTale agaFgA pada janyaH boDaH Bavatu a
   'bodhaviṣayaḥ tīraṃ bhavatu' ityākārakatvameva	aboDa vizayaH tIram Bavatu a iti AkAraka tvam eva
   īśvarecchāyāmaṅgīkriyate/	ISvarecCAyAm aFgIkriyate/
   gaṅgāpadajanyatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpita  	gaFgA pada janya tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitaH  
   bodhaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpita  	boDa nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitaH  
   viṣayatva niṣṭhaprakāratānirūpita viśeṣyatāsambandhena	vizaya tva  nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita  viSezyatA sambanDena
   īśvarecchāvattvameva gaṅgāpadavācyatvam/	ISvara icCAvat tvam eva gaFgA pada vAcya tvam/
   pūrvapradarśitaviśakalitabhānātmikāyāmīśvarecchāyāṃ	pUrva pradarSita viSakalita BAnA AtmikAyAm ISvara icCAyAm
   bodhaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ	boDa nizWa prakAra tAyAm
   gaṅgāpadajanyatvāniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitatvaṃnāstīti	gaFgA pada janya tva anizWa prakAra tA nirUpita tvaMnA asti iti
   uktasambandheneśvarecchāvattvasya tīre 'bhāvāt gaṅgāpadavācyatvaṃ	ukta sambanDena ISvara icCAvat tvasya tIre aBAvAt gaFgA pada vAcya tvam
   tīrasya nāstīti tīre gaṅgāpadalakṣaṇāyāḥ svīkāryatayā/ na	tIrasya na asti iti tIre gaFgA pada lakzaNAyAH svIkArya tayA/ na
   lakṣaṇocchedāpattiśceti bhāvaḥ/ tadṛśasya ghaṭapadavācyatvasyeti/	lakzaNa ucCeda ApattiH ca iti BAvaH/ tadRSasya Gawa pada vAcya tvasya iti/
   ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣaśyatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandheneśvarecchāvattvarūpasya	Gawa pada janya boDa vizaSyatu anizWa prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tA sambanDena ISvara icCAvat tva rUpasya
   ghaṭapadavācyatvasyetyarthaḥ/ nātiprasaṅgaḥ   na paṭasya	Gawa pada vAcya tvasya iti arTaH/ na ati prasaFgaH  na pawasya
   ghaṭapadavācyatvaprasaṅgaḥ/	Gawa pada vAcya tva prasaFgaH/
   nanu śaktyā yatra	nanu SaktyA yatra
   padārthabodho bhavati tatraiveśvarecchāyāṃ āvaśyakatā/ lakṣaṇatā yatra	padArTa boDaH Bavati tatra eva ISvara icCAyAm AvaSyaka tA/ lakzaNa tA yatra
   bodhaḥ, tatra neśvarecchāyā āvaśyakatvam/	boDaH, tatra na ISvara icCAyAH AvaSyaka tvam/
   śakyasambandhamātrasyaivāpekṣitatvāt/ tathā ca 'gaṅgāpadajanyo bodho	Sakya sambanDa mAtrasya eva apekzita tvAt/ taTA ca agaFgA pada janyaH boDaH 
   bhavatu, bodhaviṣayastīraṃ bhavatu', ityadyākārakecchākalpanaṃ mudhā/	Bavatu, boDa vizayaH tIram Bavatu a, iti adya AkAraka icCA kalpanam muDA/
   tīrasya gaṅgāpadavācyatvaṃ tu prāguktaprakāreṇaiva vāryate/	tIrasya gaFgA pada vAcya tvam tu prAc ukta prakAreNa eva vAryate/
   vācyārthaṃpravāhasambandhamātreṇa tīrasya gaṅgāpadalakṣyatvopapatterityata	vAcya arTaMpravAha sambanDa mAtreNa tIrasya gaFgA pada lakzya tva upapatteH iti ata
   āha   saṅkṣepa iti/ kāryasāmānyaṃ prati īśvarecchāyāḥ	Aha  saFkzepaH iti/ kArya sAmAnyam prati ISvara icCAyAH
   kāraṇatvāt gaṅgāpadāt tīraviṣayakabodhaṃ pratyapi īśvarecchā	kAraNa tvAt gaFgA padAt tIra vizaya ka boDam pratyapi ISvara icCA
   kāraṇamiti vaktavyam/ tatra kimākārā īśvarecchā kāraṇamiti	kAraNam iti vaktavyam/ tatra kim AkArAH ISvara icCA kAraNam iti

   iti bhāvaḥ/	iti BAvaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   viśiṣṭaśaktisthāpanam	viSizwa Sakti sTApanam

   prathamamupasthitatvāt/ vyaktilābhastu ākṣepāditi kecit/ tanna  	praTamam upasTita tva at/ vyakti lABaH tu AkzepAt iti kecit/ tat na

   arthāpattipramāṇādityarthaḥ/ vyaktāveva sambhaveneti/	arTApatti pramANAt iti arTaH/ vyaktO= eva samBavena iti/

   padārthadvayasambandhasyaiva	padArTa dvaya sambanDasya eva

   gavānayanaṃ	gavAnayanam

   vākyajanyatvaṃ niścitya 'aśvamānaya, gāṃ badhāna' iti vākyāntare	vAkya janya tvam niScitya aaSvamAnaya, gAm baDAna a iti vAkya antare

   tatpadavācye sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭe	tad pada vAcye sarvajQa tva Adi viSizwe

   viśeṣaṇāṃśaparityāgaḥ/ tathā ca tatpadalakṣyasya śuddhasya	viSezaNa aMSa parityAgaH/ taTA ca tad pada lakzyasya SudDasya
   tvaṃpadalakṣyeṇa	tu aMpada lakzyeNa
   saha abhedānvayopapattirityabhiprāyaḥ/ idamudāharaṇaṃ tu	saha aBeda anvaya upapattiH iti aBiprAyaH/ idam udAharaNam tu
   jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ brahmavādināṃ matābhiprāyeṇa/ naiyāyikamate	jIva brahmaNoH Ekyam bruvatAm brahma vAdinAm mata aBiprAyeNa/ nEyAyika mate
   tasyāsaṃmatatvāt/ naiyāyikamatarītyā tu 'sāyam devadatta'	tasya asaMmata tvAt/ nEyAyikam atarItyA tu asAyam devadatta a
   ityādau tattāṃśasya idānīmasambhavāddhānam, idantvāṃśasya	ityAdO tat ta aMSasya idAnIm asamBavAt DAnam, idantvA aMSasya
   sambhavādahānamiti jahadajahallakṣaṇāmācakṣate/	samBavAt ahAnam iti jahat ajahat lakzaNAm Acakzate/
   pare tu   'ghaṭo	pare tu  aGawaH 
   nityaḥ' ityādau ghaṭatvasyeva 'so 'yam devadatta' ityādau	nityaH a ityAdO Gawa tvasya iva asaH ayam devadatta a iti AdO
   tattāṃśasyopalakṣaṇatayā bhāne na kiñcit bādhakamiti kiṃ	tat ta aMSasya upalakzaNa tayA BAne na kiQcid bADakam iti kim
   jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti vadanti/	jahat ajahat lakzaNayA iti vadanti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   saṃyogādirūpasambandhābhāvāditi/ tathā ca	saMyoga Adi rUpa sambanDa aBAvAditi/ taTA ca
   śakyasambandharūpalakṣaṇāyā asambhavāt lavaṇāśvayorūbhayoreva	Sakya sambanDa rUpa lakzaNAyAH asamBavAt lavaNa aSvayaH ru uBayoH eva
   saindhavapadasya śaktirityarthaḥ/	sEnDava padasya SaktiH iti arTaH/
   mañcasthapuruṣa iti/	maQca sTa puruzaH iti/
   mañcasthaśiśāviti yuktam, rodanādirūpakrośanakartṛtvasya tatraiva	maQca sTa SiSO= iti yuktam, rodana Adi rUpa kroSana kartR tvasya tatra eva
   svārasikatvādityāhuḥ/ vācyārthasyeti/ mañcapadaśakyārthasya mañcasya	svArasika tvAt iti AhuH/ vAcya arTasya iti/ maQca pada SakyA arTasya maQcasya
   samabhivyāhṛtakrośatipadārthakrośanakartṛtvānvayavirahāt	samaBivyAhRta kroSati padArTa kroSana kartR tva anvaya virahAt
   anvayānupapattirūpalakṣaṇābījasattvāt   mañcapadasya mañcasthe puruṣe	anvaya anupapatti rUpa lakzaNA bIja sattvAt  maQcapadasya maQca sTe puruze
   lakṣaṇeti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca yādṛśapade	lakzaNa iti BAvaH/ taTA ca yAdRSa pade
   vācyārthaviśeṣyaketarapadārthānvayaviṣayakaśābdabodhajanakatvaṃ na	vAcya arTa viSezya ketara padArTa anvaya vizaya kaSAbda boDa janaka tvam na
   sambhavati tatra pade jahallakṣaṇā, yā lakṣaṇā vācyārthaṃ tyajati sā	samBavati tatra pade jahat lakzaNA, yA lakzaNA vAcya arTam tyajati sA
   jahallakṣaṇā, jahatī ca sā lakṣaṇā ceti karmadhārayāt/ athavā śakyārthaṃ	jahat lakzaNA, jahatI ca sA lakzaNA ca iti karma DArayAt/ aTavA Sakya arTam
   jahataḥ tyajataḥ padasya lakṣaṇā jahallakṣaṇeti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ/ yatra	jahataH tyajataH padasya lakzaNA jahat lakzaNa iti zazWI tatpuruzaH/ yatra
   śakyārtho na parityajyate śakyārthāparityāgena lakṣyārthabodhaḥ tatra	Sakya arTaH na parityajyate Sakya arTa aparityAgena lakzya arTa boDaH tatra
   ajahallakṣaṇā/ 'yathā chatriṇo gacchanti' iti/ atra chatripadasya	ajahat lakzaNA/ ayaTA CatriNaH gacCanti a iti/ atra Catri padasya
   chatryacchatrighaṭitasamudāye lakṣaṇā/ ekasārthavāhitveneti/	Catri acCa tri Gawita samudAye lakzaNA/ eka sArTavAhi tvena iti/
   ekasamudāyaghaṭakatvenetyarthaḥ/ tṛtīyāyāḥ vaiśiṣṭyamarthaḥ/ tasya	eka samudAya Gawaka tvena iti arTaH/ tRtIyAyAH vESizwyam arTaH/ tasya
   chatryacchatriṣvanvayaḥ/ chatripadalakṣyeṣu ekasamudāyaghaṭakatvaviśiṣṭeṣu	Catri acCatrizu anvayaH/ Catri pada lakzyezu eka samudAya Gawaka tva viSizwezu
   chatryacchatriṣu gamanakartṛtvānvaya iti bhāvaḥ/	Catri acCatrizu gamana kartR tva anvayaH iti BAvaH/
   nanvanvayānupapattirna	nanu anvaya anupapattiH na
   lakṣaṇāyā bījam/ 'yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya' ityādau yaṣṭipadavācyānāṃ	lakzaNAyAH bIjam/ ayazwIH praveSaya a ityAdO yazwi pada vAcyAnAm
   yaṣṭīnāmapi	yazwInAm api
   praveśanakarmatvānvayasambhavenānvayānupapattirūpabījābhāvāt	praveSana karma tva anvaya samBavena anvaya anupapatti rUpa bIja aBAvAt
   yaṣṭipadasya yaṣṭidhare lakṣaṇāyā ayogādityata āha  	yazwi padasya yazwiDare lakzaNAyAH ayogAt iti ataH Aha  
   tātparyānupapattireva lakṣaṇābījamiti/ yaṣṭidharatātparyeṇaiva 'yaṣṭīḥ	tAtparyAnupapattiH eva lakzaNA bIja m iti/ yazwiDara tAtparyeNa eva ayazwIH
   praveśaya' iti vākyaprayogāt lakṣaṇānaṅgīkāre	praveSaya a iti vAkya prayogAt lakzaNa anaFgIkAre

   ekakāreṇānvayānupapattivyavacchedaḥ/	eka kAreNa anvaya anupapatti vyavacCedaH/
   nanu tārkikamate śaktaṃ	nanu tArkika mate Saktam
   padamiti padalakṣaṇāt chatrin iti vākyameva/ chatrapadasya chatre	padam iti pada lakzaNAt Catrin iti vAkyam eva/ Catra padasya Catre
   śaktatvāt inipratyayasya sambandhe śaktatvāt	Sakta tvAt inipratyayasya sambanDe Sakta tvAt 
   prakṛtipratyayarūpapadadvayasamūharūpatvāt chatripadasya/ vākye ca	prakRti pratyaya rUpa pada dvaya samUha rUpa tvAt Catri padasya/ vAkye ca
   śaktyabhāvāt vākyaśakyārthāprasiddhyā śakyasambandharūpā lakṣaṇā na	Sakti aBAvAt vAkya SakyA arTa aprasidDyA Sakya sambanDa rUpA lakzaNAH na
   sambhavati/ tathā ca chatrinnityasya ajahallakṣaṇodāharaṇatvaṃ na	samBavati/ taTA ca Catrit nityasya ajahat lakzaNa udAharaNa tvam na
   sambhavatīti	samBavati iti
   śaṅkate na ca chatrītyasyeti/ matubarthaketi/ sambandhārthaketyarthaḥ/	SaFkate na ca CatrI iti asya iti/ matu barTa keti/ sambanDa arTaka iti arTaH/
   pratipādyasambandha iti/ bodhyārthasambandha	pratipAdya sambanDaH iti/ boDya arTa sambanDa
   ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca	iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   chatrinniti vākyaśakyārthāprasiddhāvapi tādṛśavākyajanyabodhaviṣayo	Catrin= iti vAkya SakyA arTa aprasidDO= api tAdRSa vAkya janya boDa vizayaH 
   yor'thaḥ chatravāniti tatsambandhasya samudāye sattvāt vākye 'pi	yor aTaH CatravAn iti tad sambanDasya samudAye sattvAt vAkye api
   lakṣaṇopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/ anyatheti/ śakyasambandha eva lakṣaṇeti	lakzaNa upapadyate iti BAvaH/ anyaTA iti/ Sakya sambanDaH eva lakzaNa iti
   svīkāra ityarthaḥ/ kākataditareti/ kākataditarabiḍālādisādhāraṇaṃ	svIkAraH iti arTaH/ kAkatadita reti/ kAka taditara bixAla Adi sADAraNam
   yat dadhināśakatvaṃ tadavacchinne kākapadasya lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ/	yat daDi nASaka tvam tad avacCinne kAkapadasya lakzaNa iti arTaH/
   dadhināśakatvena rūpeṇa kākasyāpi bodhāt ajahallakṣaṇātvam/	daDi nASaka tvena rUpeNa kAkasya api boDAt ajahat lakzaNAtvam/
   padalakṣaṇayaiva nirvāhaṃ	pada lakzaNayA eva nirvAham
   vadatāṃ matamāha   kecittviti/ ekasārtha iti/ ekasamudāyatva	vadatAm matam Aha  kecid tu iti/ eka sArTaH iti/ eka samudAya tva
   ityarthaḥ/ chatriṇo gacchantītyasya ekasamudāyatvavavanto	iti arTaH/ CatriNaH gacCanti iti asya eka samudAyatvavavantaH 
   gacchantītyarthaḥ/ samudāyatvaṃ cāpekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvam/ atha vā	gacCanti iti arTaH/ samudAya tvam ca apekzA budDi viSeza vizaya tvam/ aTa vA
   chatrapadasya ekasamudāyor'thaḥ, ini pratyayasya	Catra padasya eka samudAyor aTaH, ini pratyayasya
   ghaṭakatvarūpasambandhaviśiṣṭor'thaḥ/ āhuḥ ityasvarasodbhāvanam/	Gawaka tva rUpa sambanDa viSizwoH aTaH/ AhuH iti asvarasa udBAvanam/
   tadbījaṃ tu chatrapadasya chatrighaṭitasamudāyatvārthakatve	tad bIjam tu Catra padasya Catri Gawita samudAya tva arTaka tve

   mukhyaviśeṣyatayā	muKya viSezya tayA
   bhānābhāvāt atratyalakṣaṇāyā ajahatsvārthatvānupapattiriti/	BAna aBAvAt atratya lakzaNAyAH ajahatsva arTa tva anupapattiH iti/
   atra tatpadavācya	atra tat pada vAcya
   ityādi/ tattvamasītyatra tatpadasya sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭacaitanyaṃ	ityAdi/ tat tvam asi iti atra tad padasya sarvajQa tva Adi viSizwa cEtanyam
   vācyor'thaḥ/ tvaṃpadasya antaḥkaraṇaviśiṣṭacaitanyaṃ vācyor'thaḥ/	vAcyor aTaH/ tvaMpadasya antaHkaraNa viSizwa cEtanyam vAcyor aTaH/
   samānavibhakterabhedor'thaḥ/ sa ca viśiṣṭayorbādhitaḥ/ ataḥ	samAna viBakteH aBedor aTaH/ sa ca viSizwayoH bADitaH/ atas 
   vācyārthaikadeśayoḥ sarvajñatva antaḥkaraṇarūpaviśeṣaṇayoḥ tyāgena	vAcya arTa eka deSayoH sarvajQa tva antaHkaraNa rUpa viSezaNayoH tyAgena
   caitanyamātraṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ lakṣyate/ so 'yaṃ devadatta	cEtanya mAtram dvAByAm padAByAm lakzyate/ saH ayam devadatta 
   ityādāviti/ tatpadasya taddeśatatkālavṛttitvaviśiṣṭor'thaḥ/	iti AdO= iti/ tad padasya tad deSa tad kAla vRtti tva viSizwoH aTaH/
   idaṃpadasya etaddeśaitatkālaviśiṣṭor'thaṃḥ/ viśiṣṭayoraikyaṃ ca	idaMpadasya etad deSa etad kAla viSizwoH aTaMH/ viSizwayoH Ekyam ca
   bādhitam/ ataḥ tatpadaśakyārthaviśiṣṭaikadeśasya	bADitam/ atas tad pada Sakya arTa viSizwa eka deSasya

   tatpadasya lakṣaṇā/ evaṃ ca yatra viśeṣaṇasya śakyaikadeśasya tyāgena	tad padasya lakzaNA/ evam ca yatra viSezaNasya Sakya eka deSasya tyAgena
   viśeṣyasya śakyaikadeśasya bodhastatra jahadajahallakṣaṇetyuktaṃ bhavati/	viSezyasya Sakya eka deSasya boDaH tatra jahat ajahat lakzaNa iti uktam Bavati/
   pare tviti/ yathā	pare tu iti/ yaTA
   ghaṭo 'nitya ityatra ghaṭatvaviśiṣṭe anityatvaviśiṣṭābhedo na	GawaH anityaH iti atra Gawa tva viSizwe anitya tva viSizwa aBedaH na
   sambhavati, ghaṭatve 'nityatvābhāvāditi	samBavati, Gawa tve anitya tva aBAvAt iti

   devadatta ityādāvapi tattopalakṣite idantvānvayenopapattyā	devadattaH iti AdO= api tad ta upa lakzite idantvA anvayena upapattyA

   śaktilakṣaṇāntarbhūtā, śabdaśaktimūlā, arthaśaktimūlā ca anumānādinā	Sakti lakzaNa antarBUtA, Sabda Sakti mUlA, arTa Sakti mUlA ca anumAna AdinA
   anyathāsiddhā/	anyaTA sidDA/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   vṛttyantaratvaṃ nirācaṣṭe   gauṇyapīti/ nanu 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa'	vRtti antara tvam nirAcazwe  gONI apIti/ nanu agaFgAyAm Goza a
   ityatra tīre śakyasya pravāhasyeva 'agnirmāṇavaka' ityādau	iti atra tIre Sakyasya pravAhasya iva aagniH mANavaka a iti AdO
   māṇavake śakyasya agneḥ sākṣātsambandho na saṃbhavati iti kathaṃ	mANavake Sakyasya agneH sAkzAt sambanDaH na saMBavati iti kaTam
   lakṣaṇayā nirvāha ityata āha   lakṣyamāṇeti/ lakṣyamāṇo yo guṇaḥ	lakzaNayA nirvAhaH iti atas Aha  lakzyamANA iti/ lakzyamANaH yaH guNaH

   ca	ca

   ālaṅkārikāḥ	AlaFkArikAH
   punarevamāhuḥ   'tīre ghoṣa' iti śabdaprayoge svāyatte	punar evam AhuH  atIre Goza a iti Sabda prayoge su Ayatte

   tava gamanottaraṃ mama prāṇanāśo bhaviṣyati/ ato na gantavyam'	tava gamana uttaram mama prANa nASaH Bavizyati/ atas na gantavyam a
   ityādyartho vyajyate/ na hyatra śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ nirvāhaḥ/ itthaṃ ca	iti Adi arTaH vyajyate/ na hi atra Sakti lakzaNAByAm nirvAhaH/ itTam ca

   mantavyam/	mantavyam/

   tatsajātīyaguṇavattvaṃ gauṇīvṛttirityarthaḥ/ agnirmāṇavaka ityatra	tad sajAtIya guNavat tvam gONI vRttiH iti arTaH/ agniH mANavakaH iti atra
   agnipadaśakyārthavahnivṛttiryo guṇaḥ śucitvaṃ	agni pada Sakya arTa vahni vRttiH yaH guNaH Suci tvam
   tatsajātīyaśucitvavān māṇavaka iti bodhaḥ/ nanvetādṛśyāḥ	tad sajAtIya Suci tvavAn mANavakaH iti boDaH/ nanu etAdRSyAH
   gauṇyā vṛtteḥ kathaṃ śakyasambandharūpalakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāva ityatrāha  	gONyAH vRtteH kaTam Sakya sambanDa rUpa lakzaNAyAm antarBAvaH iti atra Aha  
   ayamabhiprāya iti/ śakyārthapratiyogikaḥ sambandho lakṣaṇā/ sambandhaśca	ayam aBiprAyaH iti/ Sakya arTa pratiyogikaH sambanDaH lakzaNA/ sambanDaH ca
   sākṣātparamparāsādhāraṇaḥ/ gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau	sAkzAt paramparAsA DAraNaH/ gaFgAyAm GozaH iti AdO
   gaṅgāpadaśakyārthasya saṃyogarūpaḥ sākṣātsambandhastīre 'sti/	gaFgA pada SakyA arTasya saMyoga rUpaH sAkzAt sambanDaH tIre asti/
   agnirmāṇavaka ityatra tu śakyārthasyāgneḥ	agniH mANavakaH iti atra tu Sakya arTasya agneH
   svavṛttiguṇasajātīyaguṇavattvarūpaḥ paramparāsambandhaḥ māṇavake 'sti/	sva vRtti guNa sajAtIya guNavat tva rUpaH paramparA sambanDaH mANavake asti/
   ubhayorapi sambandhayorlakṣaṇātvameveti bhāvaḥ/	uBayoH api sambanDayoH lakzaNAtvam eva iti BAvaH/
   vyañjanākhyāmatiriktāṃ	vyaQjana AKyAm atiriktAm
   vṛttiṃ vadatāmālaṅkārikāṇāṃ matamanuvadati   ālaṅkārikāḥ	vRttim vadatAm AlaFkArikANAm matam anuvadati  AlaFkArikAH
   punariti/ yadi 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa' ityādau tīravṛttirghoṣa	punar iti/ yadi agaFgAyAm Goza a ityAdO tIra vRttiH Goza
   ityākārakabodho vivakṣitaḥ, tarhi tīravācakaṃ śabdameva prayuñjīta	iti AkAraka boDaH vivakzitaH, tarhi tIra vAcakam Sabdam eva prayuQjIta
   tīre ghoṣa iti/ ghoṣānanvitārthavācakaṃ gaṅgāpadaṃ ca prayuñjīta/	tIre GozaH iti/ GozAn anvita arTa vAcakam gaFgA padam ca prayuQjIta/
   ato 'tra śakyārthavṛttiśaityapāvanatvādirūpor'tho 'pi ghoṣe vivakṣitaḥ/	atas atra Sakya arTa vRtti SEtya pAvana tva Adi rUpor aTo api Goze vivakzitaH/
   sa ca 'tīre ghoṣa' ityato na budhyeta/ gaṅgāpadaprayoge tu	sa ca atIre Goza a iti atas na buDyeta/ gaFgA pada prayoge tu
   tatsāmarthyāt gaṅgāpravāhagataśaityapāvanatvādirvyajyata iti vaktuṃ	tad sAmarTyAt gaFgA pravAha gata SEtya pAvana tva AdiH vyajyate iti vaktum
   śakyate/ na ca gaṅgāpadasyaiva śaityapāvanatvādiviśiṣṭatīre	Sakyate/ na ca gaFgA padasya eva SEtya pAvana tva Adi viSizwa tIre
   lakṣaṇāstu, tathā ca lakṣaṇayaiva śaityapāvanatvādipratītyupapatteḥ	lakzaNAH tu, taTA ca lakzaNayA eva SEtya pAvana tva Adi prati iti upapatteH
   vyañjanayā na prayojanamiti vācyam/ anvayānupapattirhi lakṣaṇābījam/	vyaQjanayA na prayojanam iti vAcyam/ anvayAn upapattiH hi lakzaNAbIjam/
   sā ca tīralakṣaṇayaiva parihartuṃ śakyeti śaityapāvanatvādilakṣaṇāyāṃ	sA ca tIra lakzaNayA eva parihartum SakyA iti SEtya pAvana tva Adi lakzaNAyAm
   pramāṇābhāvāt/ tasmāt vyañjanākhyā atiriktā vṛttiḥ svīkaraṇīyā,	pramANa aBAvAt/ tasmAt vyaQjana AKyA atiriktA vRttiH svIkaraNIyA,
   yā śaktilakṣaṇābhyāmanavagamyamarthaṃ pratyāyayatītyālaṅkārikāṇāṃ	yA Sakti lakzaNAByAm anavagamyam arTam pratyAyayati iti AlaFkArikANAm
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   ayaṃ bhāva ityādi/	ayam BAvaH ityAdi/
   'dūrastho bhūdharo ramya' ityatra bhūdharaśabdavācyasya parvatasya	adUra sTaH BUDaraH ramya a iti atra BUDara Sabda vAcyasya parvatasya
   dūrasthitasya ramyatvaṃ prakṛtor'thaḥ/ asthiracittatvāt rājāno 'pi	dUra sTitasya ramya tvam prakRtoH aTaH/ asTira citta tvAt rAjAnaH api
   dūrasthā eva ramyā ityaprakṛtor'tho 'pyatra pratīyate/ sā ca pratītiḥ	dUra sTAH eva ramyAH iti aprakRtor aTo api atra pratIyate/ sA ca pratItiH
   bhūdharaśabdaśaktimūlā/ tathā ca nānārthasthale arthaprakaraṇādinā	BUDara Sabda Sakti mUlA/ taTA ca nAnA arTa sTale arTa prakaraNa AdinA
   nivāritasyāprakṛtārthasya pratītiḥ yadbalāt bhavati sā	nivAritasya aprakRta arTasya pratItiH yat balAt Bavati sA
   śabdaśaktimūlāvyañjanā ityālaṅkārikāḥ/ tatra bhūdharaśabdena	Sabda Sakti mUlA vyaQjanAH iti AlaFkArikAH/ tatra BUDara Sabdena
   parvatānāmiva rājñāmapi śabdaśaktyaiva pratītisambhavāt nāsti	parvatAnAm iva rAjQAm api Sabda SaktyA eva pratIti samBavAt na asti
   vyañjanāyāḥ	vyaQjanAyAH
   āvaśyakateti	AvaSyaka tA iti
   naiyāyikāḥ/ evaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau gaṅgāpadasya	nEyAyikAH/ evam gaFgAyAm GozaH iti AdO gaFgA padasya
   śaityapāvanatvādiviśiṣṭatīre lakṣaṇāṅgīkāreṇaiva	SEtya pAvana tva Adi viSizwa tIre lakzaNa aFgIkAreNa eva
   śaityādipratītirupapadyate/ yadyapyatrānvayānupapattirnāsti, tathāpi	SEtya Adi pratItiH upapadyate/ yadi api atra anvaya anupapattiH na Asti, taTA api
   tātparyānupapattirasti, śaityapāvanatvādibodhatātparyeṇaiva tīrapadaṃ	tAtparya anupapattiH asti, SEtya pAvana tva Adi boDatAtparyeNa eva tIra padam
   parityajya gaṅgāpadaprayogāt tasya tātparyasya lakṣaṇāṃ	parityajya gaFgA pada prayogAt tasya tAtparyasya lakzaNAm
   vinānupapatteḥ/ tātparyānupapattireva lakṣaṇābījam	vinA anupapatteH/ tAtparyAnupapattiH eva lakzaNAbIjam
   nānvayānupapattiriti pūrvamevoktaṃ vakṣyati ca dīpikāyām/ tathā ca	na anvayA an upapattiH iti pUrvam eva uktam vakzyati ca dIpikAyAm/ taTA ca
   kṛtaṃ vyañjanayeti bhāvaḥ/	kRtam vyaQjanaya iti BAvaH/
   śaṅkate   nanviti/	SaFkate  nanu iti/
   anyathāsiddhatve 'pi   śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā gatārthatve 'pi/	anyaTA sidDa tve api  SaktyA lakzaNayA vA gata arTa tve api/
   arthasāmarthyāt	arTa sAmarTyAt 
   yatrārthāntaraṃ pratīyate tatrārthaśaktimūlā vyañjanā/ yathā 'gaccha	yatra arTa antaram pratIyate tatra arTa Sakti mUlA vyaQjanA/ yaTA agacCa
   gacchasi	gacCasi
   cet' ityatra bhartā yatra gacchati tatra deśe nāyikāyāḥ janmakathanena	ced a iti atra BartA yatra gacCati tatra deSe nAyikAyAH janma kaTanena
   janmanaśca maraṇānantarakālikatvena janmarūpapadārthasāmarthyāt	janmanaH ca maraNa anantara kAlika tvena janma rUpa padArTa sAmarTyAt
   pravāsottarakālikamaraṇarūpor'tho 'bhivyajyate/ tena ca gamanābhāvo	pravAsa uttara kAlika maraNa rUpor aTo aBivyajyate/ tena ca gamana aBAvaH 
   vyajyate/ asyārthasya padavṛttyā śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā pratītyasambhavāt	vyajyate/ asya arTasya pada vRttyA SaktyA lakzaNayA vA prati iti asamBavAt 
   vyañjanākhyā vṛttiḥ svīkāryetyāśayaḥ śaṅkituḥ/ śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭam/	vyaQjana AKyA vRttiH svIkArya iti ASayaH SaFkituH/ Sizwam spazwam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   lakṣaṇābījanirūpaṇam	lakzaNA bIja nirUpaNam
   tātparyānupapattiḥ	tAtparya anupapattiH
   lakṣaṇābījam/ tatpratītīcchayoccaritatvaṃ tātparyam/ tātparyajñānaṃ ca	lakzaNA bIjam/ tat pratIti i= CayA uccarita tvam tAtparyam/ tAtparyajQAnam ca
   vākyārthajñāne hetuḥ nānārthānu rodhāt/ prakaraṇādikaṃ	vAkya arTa jQAne hetuH nAnA arTa anu roDAt/ prakaraNa Adikam
   tātparyagrāhakam/	tAtparya grAhakam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anvayānupapatteḥ	anvaya anupapatteH
   lakṣaṇābījatve yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya ityādau lakṣaṇānupapattiḥ/	lakzaNa AbIja tve yazwIH praveSaya ityAdO lakzaNa anupapattiH/
   tātparyānupapatteḥ tathātve tu tasyāstatrāpi sattvena yaṣṭipadasya	tAtparyAnupapatteH taTA tve tu tasyAH tatra api sattvena yazwi padasya
   yaṣṭidhare lakṣaṇā sambhavatītyāśayenāha   tātparyānupapattiriti/	yazwiDare lakzaNA samBavati iti ASayena Aha  tAtparyA anupapattiH iti/
   tatpratītīti/ tīrādirūpārthapratītītyarthaḥ/ nānārtheti/	tad pratIti iti/ tIra Adi rUpa arTa pratIti iti arTaH/ nAnA arTa iti/
   'saindhavamānaya' ityādinānārthakasthale saindhavapadasya aśve lavaṇe ca	asEnDavam Anayaa ityAdi nAnA arTaka sTale sEnDava padasya aSve lavaNe ca
   śakteḥ tulyatayā śābdabodhe tātparyagrahasya kāraṇatvamantarā	SakteH tulya tayA SAbda boDe tAtparyagrahasya kAraNa tvam antarA
   niyatakāle tattadbodhopapattiḥ nāstīti tatra	niyata kAle tad tad boDa upapattiH na asti iti tatra
   tatkāraṇatvasyāvaśyakatve tadanurodhena sarvatra tadāvaśyakateti bhāvaḥ/	tad kAraNa tvasya AvaSyaka tve tad anuroDena sarvatra tadA AvaSyaka tA iti BAvaH/
   na caṃ mauniślokādau śābdabodhānupapattiḥ/ tatra niruktatātparyasya	na cam mOni Sloka AdO SAbda boDa anupapattiH/ tatra nirukta tAtparyasya
   asattvāditi vācyam, tātparyasya tatpratītīcchārūpatvaparyavasānena tatra	asattvAt iti vAcyam, tAtparyasya tat pratIti i= CA rUpa tva paryavasAnena tatra
   tādṛśatātparyasya sattvenādoṣāt/ na ca tathāpi	tAdRSa tAtparyasya sattvena AdozAt/ na ca taTA api
   tatpratītīcchārahitaśukādyuccaritavākyādapi	tad pratIti icCA rahita Suka Adi uccarita vAkyAt api
   śābdabodhasyānubhavikatayā tatrānupapatteḥ parihārāsambhava iti	SAbda boDasya anuBavikatayA tatra anupapatteH parihAra asamBavaH iti
   śaṅkyam/ tatreśvarecchāmādāyaivānupapatteḥ parihārasambhavāt iti	SaFkyam/ tatra ISvara icCAm AdAya eva anupapatteH parihAra samBavAt iti
   śaṅkyam/ tatreśvarecchāmādāyaivānupapatteḥ parihārasambhavāt	SaFkyam/ tatra ISvara icCAm AdAya eva anupapatteH parihAra samBavAt 
   parihārasambhavāt ityalamadhikajalpanena/ prakaraṇādikamiti/ ādinā	parihAra samBavAt iti alam aDika jalpanena/ prakaraNa Adikamiti/ AdinA
   'saśaṅkhacakro hariḥ pūjyaḥ' ityādau hariśabdasya bhagavati	asa SaFKa cakraH hariH pUjyaHa ityAdO hari Sabdasya Bagavati
   tātparyanirṇāyakasya 'saśaṅkhacakra' iti viśeṣaṇādeḥ parigrahaḥ/	tAtparya nirNAyakasya asa SaFKa cakra a iti viSezaNa AdeH parigrahaH/
   kathaṃ prakaraṇādeḥ tātparyagrāhakatvamiti cet   ittham/ 'idaṃ	kaTam prakaraNa AdeH tAtparyagrAhaka tvam iti ced  itTam/ aidam
   saindhavapadaṃ lavaṇabodhecchayā uccaritam bhojanaprakaraṇe uktatvāt'	sEnDava padam lavaNa boDa icCayA uccaritam Bojana prakaraNe ukta tvAt a
   iti rītyā gṛhāṇa/	iti rItyA gRhANa/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   niyatakāla iti/	niyata kAlaH iti/
   kadācit lavaṇaviṣayakaḥ kadācit aśvaviṣayaka ityevaṃ	kadAcid lavaNa vizayakaH kadAcid aSva vizayakaH iti evam
   kālavyavasthetyarthaḥ/ tadanurodheneti/ nānārthakasthale śābdabodhe	kAla vyavasTA iti arTaH/ tad anuroDena iti/ nAnA arTaka sTale SAbda boDe
   tātparyajñānasya kāraṇatvānusāreṇetyarthaḥ/ tadāvaśyakateti/	tAtparyajQAnasya kAraNa tva anusAreNa iti arTaH/ tadA avaSyakatA iti/
   tātparyajñānasyāvaśvakatetyarthaḥ/ nanu	tAtparyajQAnasya avaSvakatA iti arTaH/ nanu
   tatpratītīcchayoccaritatvarūpatātparyajñānasya	tat prati iti i= CayA uccarita tva rUpa tAtparya jQAnasya
   śābdabodhahetutvasvīkāre maunikartṛkeṇa vākyabodhakalipyādinā	SAbda boDa hetu tva svIkAre mOni kartRkeNa vAkya boDa kalipya AdinA
   yatra śābdabodhastatra tatpratītīcchayoccaritatvarūpatātparyābhāvāt	yatra SAbda boDaH tatra tat pratIti i= CayA uccarita tva rUpa tAtparya aBAvAt
   tātparyajñānamasambhavīti śaṅkate   na ca mauniślokādāviti/	tAtparyajQAnam asamBavi iti SaFkate  na ca mOni Sloka AdO= iti/
   maunikartṛkavākyabodhakalipyādāvityarthaḥ/ nirūktatātparyasya  	mOni kartRka vAkya boDaka lipya AdO= iti arTaH/ nirUkta tAtparyasya  
   tatpratītīcchayā uccaritatvarūpatātparyasya/ tātparyaṃ	tad pratIti icCayA uccarita tva rUpa tAtparyasya/ tAtparyam
   tatpratītīcchāmātram/ tattu maunināmapyasti/ tajjñānācca lipyāditaḥ	tat pratIti icCA mAtram/ tat tu mOninAm api asti/ tad jQAnAt ca lipya Aditas 
   śābdabodha upapadyata ityāśayena samādhatte   tātparyasyeti/ nanu	SAbda boDaH upapadyate iti ASayena samADatte  tAtparyasya iti/ nanu
   tatpratītīcchāpi na tātparyam/ śukādeḥ tādṛśecchāvirahe 'pi	tat pratIti icCA api na tAtparyam/ Suka AdeH tAdRSa icCA virahe api
   śukādyuccāritavākyāt śābdabodhasyānubhavasiddhatvādityāśaṅkate  	Suka Adi uccArita vAkyAt SAbda boDasya anuBava sidDa tvAt iti ASaFkate  
   na ca tathāpīti/ īśvarecchāmiti/ śukoccāritādasmādvākyāt	na ca taTA api iti/ ISvara icCAmiti/ Suka uccAritAt asmAt vAkyAt 
   etādṛśārthabodho bhavatu ityākārakeśvarecchaiva tatra tātparyam/	etAdRSa arTa boDaH Bavatu iti AkArakeSvara icCA eva tatra tAtparyam/
   tajjñānācca śābdabodha iti bhāvaḥ/	tad jQAnAt ca SAbda boDaH iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   pramājanakaśukavākyādau īśvarecchāyāstātparyatve 'pi bhramajanake	pramAjanaka Suka vAkya AdO ISvara icCAyAH tAtparyatve api Brama janake
   'vahninā siñcati' ityādiśukavākye īśvarecchāyāstātparyatvaṃ na	avahninA siQcati a iti Adi Suka vAkye ISvara icCAyAH tAtparyatvam na
   sambhavati, tathā sajīśvarecchāyāḥ visaṃvāditvāpatterityatrāha  	samBavati, taTA sajISvara icCAyAH visaMvAdi tva ApatteH iti atra Aha  
   alamadhikajalpaneneti/ visaṃvādiśukavākye śikṣakasyecchaiva	alam aDika jalpanena iti/ visaMvAdi Suka vAkye Sikzakasya icCA eva
   tātparyam, ato na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/	tAtparyam, atas na dozaH iti BAvaH/
   ekārthavācakaśabdaghaṭitavākyāt śābdabodho yatra, tatra	eka arTa vAcaka Sabda Gawita vAkyAt SAbda boDaH yatra, tatra
   tātparyajñānasyānupayoge 'pi nānārthakasaindhavādipadaghaṭitāt	tAtparyajQAnasya anupayoge api nAnA arTaka sEnDava Adi pada GawitAt
   'saindhavamānaya' ityādivākyāt kadācidaśvānayanabodhaḥ	asEnDavam Anayaa ityAdi vAkyAt kadAcid aSva Anayana boDaH
   kadācillavaṇānayanabodhaḥ iti vyavasthāyāḥ tātparyajñānenaiva	kadAcid lavaNa Anayana boDaH iti vyavasTAyAH tAtparyajQAnena eva
   nirvāhāt tātparyajñānasya śābdabodhahetutvamāvaśyakam/	nirvAhAt tAtparyajQAnasya SAbda boDa hetu tvam AvaSya kam/
   saindhavapadasya asminnarthe tātparyamiti jñānaṃ ca prakaraṇādinā	sEnDava padasya asmin= arTe tAtparyam iti jQAnam ca prakaraNa AdinA
   bhavatīti	Bavati iti
   dīpikāyām	dIpikAyAm
   uktam/	uktam/
   tatrādipadagrāhyamāha   ādineti/ prakaraṇaṃ nāma	tatra Adipada grAhyam Aha  Adineti/ prakaraNam nAma
   bhojanagamanādiprastāvaḥ/ viśeṣaṇādaiḥ ityādipadane	Bojana gamana Adi prastAvaH/ viSezaNa AdEH ityAdi padane
   ābhimukhyādiparigrahaḥ/ bhojanaprakaraṇe uktatvāditi/ yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ	ABimuKya Adi parigrahaH/ Bojana prakaraNe ukta tvAt iti/ yat na evam tat na evam
   yathā pramāṇaprakaraṇe prayuktaṃ saindhavapadamiti śeṣaḥ pūraṇīyaḥ/ iti	yaTA pramANa prakaraNe prayuktam sEnDava padam iti SezaH pUraNIyaH/ iti
   rītyeti/ ityanumānavidhayetyarthaḥ/	rItyA iti/ iti anumAna viDayA iti arTaH/

   arthādhyāhārakhaṇḍanam	arTa aDyAhAra KaNxanam
   'dvāram'	advAram a
   ityādau 'pidhehi' iti śabdādhyāhāraḥ/ nanu arthajñānārthatvāt	ityAdO apiDehi a iti Sabda aDyAhAraH/ nanu arTa jQAna arTa tvAt
   śabdasyārthamavijñāya	Sabdasya arTam avijQAya
   śabdādhyāhārāsambhavāt arthādhyāhāra eva yukta iti cet na/	Sabda aDyAhAra asamBavAt arTa aDyAhAraH eva yuktaH iti cet na/
   padaviśeṣajanyapadārthopasthiteḥ śābdajñāne hetutvāt/ anyathā 'ghaṭaḥ	pada viSeza janya padArTa upasTiteH SAbda jQAne hetu tva at/ anyaTA aGawaH
   karmatvamānayanaṃ kṛtiḥ' ityatrāpi śābdajñānaprasaṅgāt/	karma tvam Anayanam kRtiH a iti atra api SAbda jQAna prasaFgAt/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prābhākaramataṃ	prABAkara matam
   nirākariṣyamāṇaḥ svasiddhāntaṃ darśayati   dvāramiti/	nirAkarizyamANaH sva sidDAntam darSayati  dvAram iti/
   arthajñānārthatvācchabdasyeti/ śabdajñānasya	arTa jQAna arTa tvAt Sabdasya iti/ Sabda jQAnasya
   arthajñānaphalakatvādityarthaḥ/	arTa jQAna Palaka tvAt iti arTaH/
   etāvatā prathamata evārthānusandhāne lāghavamiti sūcitam/ kiṃ ca 'arthaṃ	etAvatA praTamatas eva arTa anusanDAne lAGavam iti sUcitam/ kim ca aarTam
   buddhvā śabdaracanā' iti nyāyenārthajñānamantarā	budDvA Sabda racanAa iti nyAyena arTa jQAnam antarA

   kecittu itarānvite śaktirityasya kāryānvite śaktirityarthaṃ āhuḥ/	kecid tu itara anvite SaktiH iti asya kArya anvite SaktiH iti arTam AhuH/
   sayuktikaṃ	sa yuktikam
   naiyāyikamataṃ darśayati   anvayasyeti/ padārthasaṃsargasya	nEyAyika matam darSayati  anvayasya iti/ padArTa saMsargasya

   tādṛśasaṃsargāṃśe 'pi śaktirna kalpanīyeti samuditārthaniṣkarṣaḥ/	tAdRSa saMsarga aMSe api SaktiH na kalpanIyA iti samudita arTa nizkarzaH/
   ayamāśayaḥtattadviṣayakaśābdabuddhiṃ prati	ayam ASayaH tad tad vizaya ka SAbda budDim prati
   vṛttijñānādhīnatattadupasthititvena anugatakāryakāraṇabhāvo na	vRtti jQAna aDIna tad tad upasTiti tvena anugata kArya kAraNa BAvaH na
   sambhavati, śaktilakṣaṇobhayasādhāraṇasya vṛttitvasya durvacatvāt/ api	samBavati, Sakti lakzaNa uBaya sADAraNasya vRtti tvasya durvaca tvAt/ api

   ca tattatkāraṇāvyavahitottaratvaṃ tattatkāryatāvacchedakakoṭau	ca tad tad kAraNA vyavahita uttara tvam tad tad kArya tAvacCedaka kowO

   kimanvayāṃśe śaktikalpanena/	kim anvaya aMSe Sakti kalpanena/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   'itarānvite śaktiḥ iti prābhākarāḥ' ityayuktam/ 'kāryānvite	aitara anvite SaktiH iti prABAkarAH a iti ayuktam/ akArya anvite

   vākyaṃ na pramāṇam/ yathā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastī iti vākyaṃ na	vAkyam na pramANam/ yaTA gOH aSvaH puruzaH hastI iti vAkyam na
   pramāṇam/ ākāṅkṣāvirahāt/ agninā siñcatīti vākyaṃ na pramāṇam/	pramANam/ AkAFkzA virahAt/ agninA siQcati iti vAkyam na pramANam/

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   ākāṅkṣeti/	AkAFkza iti/

   syāt/ ākāṅkṣāṃ lakṣayati   padasyeti/ yogyatālakṣaṇamāha   artheti/	syAt/ AkAFkzAm lakzayati  padasya iti/ yogya tA lakzaNam Aha  arTa iti/

   AnTs_62 vākyaṃ dvividham / vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ ca / vaidikam īśvaroktatvāt	AnTH _62 vAkyam dviviDam / vEdikam lOkikam ca / vEdikam ISvara ukta tvAt

   anāditvāt kathamīśvaroktatvamiti cet   na/ 'vedaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ	anAdi tvAt kaTam ISvara ukta tvam iti ced  na/ avedaH pOruzeyaH

   īśvaroktāḥ vedāḥ/	ISvara uktAH vedAH/

   kartuṃrūpadeśe vivadantaṃ pratyāha   tasmāditi/	kartuMrUpa deSe vivadantam pratyAha  tasmAt iti/

   atra etatkālikagakāre pūrvakālikagakārābhedo bhāsate/ sa ca	atra etad kAlika gakAre pUrva kAlika gakAra aBedaH BAsate/ sa ca

   pratyabhijñāvirodha ityata āha   so 'yamiti/	pratyaBijQA viroDaH iti atas Aha  saH ayam iti/
   utpattivināśapratyayayoranyārthakatvakalpanāpekṣayā tatpratyayasya	utpatti vinASa pratyayayoH anya arTaka tva kalpanA apekzayA tad pratyayasya
   tathātvakalpane lāghavamiti hadayam/ 'agnimīle' ityādau ānupūrvīṃ	taTA tva kalpane lAGavam iti hadayam/ aagnimIle a iti AdO AnupUrvIm
     ākārottaragakārottaranatvādirūpā/	 AkAra uttara gakAra uttara na tva Adi rUpA/
   tatrottaratvamavyavahitottarakṣaṇavṛttitvaṃ vācyam/ itthaṃ ca varṇanāṃ	tatra uttara tvam avyavahita uttara kzaNa vRtti tvam vAcyam/ itTam ca varNanAm
   atityatvānaṅgīkāre 'pyanityakṣaṇaghaṭitāyā ānupūrvyā anityatvāt	atitya tva anaFgIkAre api anitya kzaNa GawitAyAH AnupUrvyA anitya tvAt 
   tadviśiṣṭavākyasamudāyatmakavedasya tvadabhimatamanityatvaṃ na	tad viSizwa vAkya samudAya tmaka vedasya tvad aBimatam anitya tvam na
   sidhyatīti varṇānāmanityatvamevocitamityāha varṇānāmiti/	siDyati iti varNAnAm anitya tvam eva ucitam iti Aha  varNAnAm iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   mīmāṃsaka iti/	mImAMsakaH iti/

   dīpikāyām pauruṣeyatvasiddheriti/ tathā coktānumānena vedānāṃ	dIpikAyAm pOruzeya tva sidDeriti/ taTA ca uktA anumAnena vedAnAm
   puruṣanirmitatvasiddhyā anāditvamasiddham/ ato 'nāditvāt	puruza nirmita tva sidDyA anAdi tvam asidDam/ atas anAdi tvAt 
   kathamīśvaroktatvamiti śaṅkāyā nāvasara iti bhāvaḥ/	kaTam ISvara ukta tvam iti SaFkAyAH na avasaraH iti BAvaH/
   upādhitvāditi/ yatrayatra pauruṣeyatvaṃ bhāratādau tatra	upADi tva aditi/ yatra yatra pOruzeya tvam BArata AdO tatra
   smaryamāṇakartṛkatvamastīti smaryamāṇakartṛkatvasya	smaryamANa kartRka tvam asti iti smaryamANa kartRka tvasya
   pauruṣeyatvarūpasādhyavyāpakatvam   yatra sādhanaṃ vākyasamūhatvamasti	pOruzeya tva rUpa sADya vyApaka tvam  yatra sADanam vAkya samUha tvam asti
   pakṣe vede tatra smaryamāṇakartṛkatvaṃ nāstīti tasya	pakze vede tatra smaryamANa kartRka tvam na asti iti tasya

   ityupadideśa, so 'pi svaśiṣyāya tathopadideśetyevaṃ	iti upadideSa, saH api sva SizyAya taTA upadideSa iti evam

   nāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ/	na apekzA iti BAvaH/
   anityatve na	anitya tve na
   sambhavatīti/ yadi varṇāḥ utpattivināśavantaḥ tarhi	samBavati iti/ yadi varNAH utpatti vinASavantaH tarhi
   pūrvakālikagakārasya naṣṭatvāt etatkālikagakāre tadabhedāvagāhinī	pUrva kAlika gakArasya nazwa tvAt etad kAlika gakAre tad aBeda avagAhinI

   ghaṭatvādinā smṛtasya saṃsargona sidhyet ataḥ samāriteti"iti	Gawa tva AdinA smRtasya saMsarga Una siDyet atas sa mAritA iti"iti
