   iti/ ghaṭaḥ karmatvam ānayanaṃ kṛtirityādau/	iti/ GawaH karma tvam Anayanam kRtiH iti AdO/
   kāryavailakṣṇyānurodheneti/ kāryamatrānuvyavasayaḥ anumitisthale	kArya vElakzNya anuroDena iti/ kAryam atra anuvyavasayaH anumiti sTale
   anuminomītyākārakaḥ śābdabodhasthapale	anuminomi iti AkArakaH SAbda boDa sTa pale
   śabdāt	SabdAt 
   pratyemītyekārakaḥ/ atha vā kāryaṃ anumitiḥ śābdabodhaśca	pratyemi iti ekArakaH/ aTa vA kAryam anumitiH SAbda boDaH ca
   tayorviṃlakṣaṇatvānusāreṇetyarthaḥ/	tayoH viMlakzaNa tva anusAreNa iti arTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   arthāpatyādīnāṃ	arTa apatya AdInAm
   pramāṇāntaratvanirāsaḥ	pramANa antara tva nirAsaH
   nanu arthāpattirapi	nanu arTApattiH api
   pramāṇāntaramasti, 'pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte' iti dṛṣṭe	pramANa antaram asti, apInaH devadattaH divA na BuFkte a iti dRzwe
   śrute vā pīnatvānyathānupapattyā rātribhojanaṃ arthāpattyā kalpyata	Srute vA pInatvA ani aTA anupapattyA rAtri Bojanam arTApattyA kalpyata
   iti cet   na/ 'devadatto rātrau bhuṅkte divābhuñjānatve sati	iti ced  na/ adevadattaH rAtrO BuFkte divA BuQjAna tve sati
   pīnatvāt' ityanumānenaiva rātribhojanasya siddhatvāt/	pIna tvAt a iti anumAnena eva rAtri Bojanasya sidDa tvAt/
   śatepañcāśaditi sambhavo 'pyanumānamave/ 'iha vaṭe yakṣastiṣṭhati'	SatepaQcASat iti samBavaH api anumAnam ave/ aiha vawe yakzaH tizWati a
   ityaitihyamapi ajñātamūlavaktṛkaśabda eva/ ceṣṭāpi śabdānumānadvārā	iti Etihyam api ajQAta mUla vaktRka SabdaH eva/ cezwA api Sabda anumAna dvArA
   vyavahāraheturiti na pramāṇāntaram/ tasmāt	vyavahAra hetuH iti na pramANa antaram/ tasmAt 
   pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ catvāryeva pramāṇāni/	pratyakza anumAna upamAna SabdAH catvAri eva pramANAni/
   iti dīpikāyāṃ	iti dIpikAyAm
   śabdaparicchedaḥ	Sabda paricCedaH
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   mīmāṃsakaḥ	mImAMsakaH
   śaṅkate   nanviti/ 'divā na bhuṅkte' ityarthe dṛṣṭe   pratyakṣato	SaFkate  nanu iti/ adivA na BuFkte a iti arTe dRzwe  pratyakzato
   jñāte, śrute   śabdādavagate/ etena dṛṣṭārthāpattiḥ	jQAte, Srute  SabdAt avagate/ etena dRzwa arTApattiH
   śrutārthāpattiścetyarthāpattidvaividhyaṃ sūcitam/	Sruta arTApattiH ca iti arTApatti dvEviDyam sUcitam/
   pīnatvānyathānupapattyeti/ pīnatvasyarātribhojanaṃ	pIna tvA ani aTA anupapattyA iti/ pIna tvasya rAtri Bojanam
   vinānupapattyetyarthaḥ/ atredamavadheyam   yadvinā yadanupapannaṃ	vinA anupapattyA iti arTaH/ atra idam avaDeyam  yat vinA yat anupapannam
   tattadupapādakamiti rātribhojanamupapādakam, pīnatvamupapādyam,	tat tad upapAdakam iti rAtri Bojanam upapAdakam, pIna tvam upapAdyam,
   upapādakajñānaṃ phalam, upapādyajñānaṃ karaṇam/	upapAdaka jQAnam Palam, upapAdya jQAnam karaNam/
   phalakaraṇayorarthāpattiśabdo vartate/ phale 'arthasya āpattiḥ kalpanā'	Pala karaNayoH arTApatti SabdaH vartate/ Pale aarTasya ApattiH kalpanA a
   iti vyutpattyā/ karaṇe tu 'arthasya āpattiḥ kalpanā yasmāt' iti	iti vyutpattyA/ karaNe tu aarTasya ApattiH kalpanA yasmAt a iti
   vyutpattyeti/ vyatirekyanumānenaiva gatārthatvāt arthāpatteḥ	vyutpattyA iti/ vyatireki anumAnena eva gata arTa tvAt arTApatteH
   pramāṇāntaratvaṃ anucitamiti samādhattedevadatta iti/	pramANa antara tvam anucitam iti samADattedevadattaH iti/
   divāmātrabhojini pīṃne vyabhicāravāraṇāya satyantam/	divA mAtra Bojini pIMne vyaBicAra vAraNAya satyantam/
   ahorātrābhojinyapīṃne vyabhicāravāraṇāya viśeṣyam/ tacca	ahorAtra aBojinya pIMne vyaBicAra vAraNAya viSezyam/ tat ca
   yogādyajanyapīnatvaparam/ tena bhojanaśūnye yogini pīne na	yoga At yajanya pIna tva param/ tena Bojana SUnye yogini pIne na
   vyabhicāraḥ/	vyaBicAraH/
   sambhavaitihyayoratiriktapramāṇatvaṃ vadatāṃ paurāṇikānāṃ mataṃ	samBava etihyayoH atirikta pramANa tvam vadatAm pOrANikAnAm matam
   dūṣayati   śate pañcāśadityādinā/ anumānameveti/ anumānameva, na	dUzayati  Sate paQcASat ityAdinA/ anumAnam eva iti/ anumAnam eva, na
   tu pramāṇāntaramityarthaḥ/ śatavānityukte pañcāśadvāniti jñānaṃ	tu pramANa antaram iti arTaH/ SatavAn iti ukte paQcASat vAn iti jQAnam
   sambhavati tasyānumānenaiva nirvāhāt/ śatasya	samBavati tasya anumAnena eva nirvAhAt/ Satasya
   pañcāśadvyāpyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ ajñātamūleti/	paQcASat vyApya tvAt iti BAvaH/ ajQAta mUlA iti/
   viśiṣyāniścitaprathamavaktṛkaḥ śabdaḥ na tu pramāṇāntaramityarthaḥ/	viSizya aniScita praTama vaktRkaH SabdaH na tu pramANa antaram iti arTaH/
   tādṛśaśabdasya yathārthatve śabdapramāṇamadhye 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ anyathā tu	tAdRSa Sabdasya yaTArTa tve Sabda pramANa maDye antarBAvaH/ anyaTA tu
   apramāṇameveti hṛdayam/ nanvanayā ceṣṭayā ayamartho boddhavya iti	apramANam eva iti hRdayam/ nanu anayA cezwayA ayam arTaH bodDavyaH iti
   saṅketitaceṣṭayā vijātīyapramājananāt ceṣṭāyā api	saFketita cezwayA vijAtIya pramAjananAt cezwAyAH api
   pramāṇāntaratvaṃ iti vadantaṃ nirasyati   ceṣṭāpīti/	pramANa antara tvam iti vadantam nirasyati  cezwA api iti/
   śabdānumānadvāreti/ śabdadvārā anumānadvārā vā, na tu	Sabda anumAna dvAra iti/ Sabda dvArAH anumAna dvArAH vA, na tu
   svātantryeṇetyarthaḥ/ ceṣṭayā kalpitasya śabdasya pramāpakatve gauravāt	svAtantryeNa iti arTaH/ cezwayA kalpitasya Sabdasya pramApaka tve gOravAt 
   anumānānusaraṇam/ vyavahāreti/ pramātmakajñānetyarthaṃḥ/ upasaṃharati  	anumAna anusaraNam/ vyavahAra iti/ pramA Atmaka jQAna iti arTaMH/ upasaMharati  
   tasmāditi/	tasmAt iti/
   iti prakāśikāyāṃ	iti prakASikAyAm
   śabdaparicchadaḥ	Sabda paricCadaH
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   ityartha iti/	iti arTaH iti/
   divā bhojanābhāvarūper'the ityarthaḥ/ dṛṣṭārthāpattiriti/ pratyakṣato	divA Bojana aBAva rUper aTe iti arTaH/ dRzwa arTa ApattiH iti/ pratyakzato
   jñātasya divā abhañjānaniṣṭhasya pīnatvasya yamarthaṃ rātribhojanākhyaṃ	jQAtasya divA aBaQjAna nizWasya pIna tvasya yam arTam rAtri Bojana AKyam
   vinānupapattiḥ tasya rātribhojanākhyasyārthasya kalpanaṃ dṛṣṭārthāpattiḥ/	vinA anupapattiH tasya rAtri Bojana AKyasya arTasya kalpanam dRzwa arTa ApattiH/
   śrutasya 'pīnāṃ devadatto	Srutasya apInAm devadattaH 
   divā na bhuṅkte'	divA na BuFkte a
   ityādivākyādavagatasya pīnatvasya yamarthaṃ vinānupapattiḥ tasya	ityAdi vAkyAt avagatasya pIna tvasya yam arTam vinA anupapattiH tasya
   rātribhojanasya kalpanaṃ śrutārthāpattiḥ/ nanvarthāpattipramiteḥ	rAtri Bojanasya kalpanam Sruta arTApattiH/ nanu arTa Apatti pramiteH
   arthāpattipramāṇasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam/ na hi tallakṣaṇamavijñāya	arTApatti pramANasya ca kim lakzaNam/ na hi tad lakzaNam avijQAya
   tatpramāṇāntaratvavicāraḥ kartuṃ śakya ityata āha  	tad pramANa antara tva vicAraH kartum SakyaH iti atas Aha  
   atredamavadheyamityādi/ yadvinā rātribhojanaṃ vinā yadanupapannaṃ	atra idam avaDeyam ityAdi/ yat vinA rAtri Bojanam vinA yat anupapannam
   pīnatvamanupapannam/ tat rātribhojanaṃ tadupapādakaṃ	pIna tvam anupapannam/ tat rAtri Bojanam tad upapAdakam
   pīnatvasyopapādakam/ upapādyajñānena upapādakajñānamarthāpattirūpā	pIna tvasya upapAdakam/ upapAdya jQAnena upapAdaka jQAnam arTApatti rUpA
   pramitiḥ/ upapādyasya pīnatvasya jñānena upapādakasya rātribhojanasya	pramitiH/ upapAdyasya pIna tvasya jQAnena upapAdakasya rAtri Bojanasya
   jñānaṃ bhavati iti	jQAnam Bavati iti
   samanvayaḥ/ na ca	samanvayaH/ na ca
   upapādyajñānaviṣayako yo 'nuvyavasāyaḥ pīnatvamahaṃ jānāmītyākārakaḥ	upapAdya jQAna vizayakaH yaH anuvyavasAyaH pIna tvam aham jAnAmi iti AkArakaH
   tasyāpi upapādyajñānaviṣayako yo 'nuvyavasāyaḥ pīnatvamahaṃ	tasya api upapAdya jQAna vizayakaH yaH anuvyavasAyaH pIna tvam aham
   jānāmītyākārakaḥ tasyāpi upapādyajñānajanyatvāt tatrātivyāptiriti	jAnAmi iti AkArakaH tasya api upapAdya jQAna janya tvAt tatra ati vyAptiH iti
   vācyam/ upapādyajñānatvenopapādyajñānajanyatvasya vivakṣitatvāt/	vAcyam/ upapAdya jQAna tvena upapAdya jQAna janya tvasya vivakzita tvAt/
   anuvyavasāyātmakamānasapratyakṣasya viṣayavidhayā upapādyajñānajanyatve	anuvyavasAya Atmaka mAnasa pratyakzasya vizaya viDayA upapAdya jQAna janya tve
   'pi	api
   upapādyajñānatvena tajjanyatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiḥ/ tathā	upapAdya jQAna tvena tad janya tva aBAvAt na ati vyAptiH/ taTA
   copapādyaviṣayakajñānatvāvacchinnajanakatānirūpitajanyatāśālijñānatvamarthāpattipramāyāḥ	ca upapAdya vizaya ka jQAna tva avacCinna jana katA nirUpita janya tA SAli jQAna tvam arTApatti pramAyAH
   lakṣaṇam ityuktaṃ bhavati/ tādṛśajñānakaraṇatvamarthāpattipramāṇasya	lakzaNam iti uktam Bavati/ tAdRSa jQAna karaNa tvam arTApatti pramANasya
   lakṣaṇam/ phalakaraṇayoriti/ pramitau pramāṇe cetyarthaḥ/	lakzaNam/ Pala karaNayoH iti/ pramitO pramANe ca iti arTaH/
   vyatirekyanumānenaiveti/"devadatto rātrau bhuṅkte divā	vyatirekyanumAnena eva iti/"devadattaH rAtrO BuFkte divA
   abhuñjānatve sati pīnatvāt yo rātrau na bhuṅkte sa divā	aBuQjAna tve sati pIna tvAt yaH rAtrO na BuFkte sa divA
   abhuñjānatve sati pīno na bhavati yathā rātrau divā cābhuñjānaḥ	aBuQjAna tve sati pInaH na Bavati yaTA rAtrO divA ca aBuQjAnaH
   kṛśo maharṣiḥ na tathā cāyam tasmānna tathā"iti prayogo 'tra	kRSaH mahA RziH na taTA ca ayam tasmAt na taTA"iti prayogaH atra
   vivakṣitaḥ/ kecitu   yo divā abhuñjānatve sati pīnaḥ saḥ rātrau	vivakzitaH/ kecitu  yaH divA aBuQjAna tve sati pInaH saH rAtrO
   bhuṅkte yathā pratinaktamātraṃ bhuñjāno yajñadattaḥ	BuFkte yaTA pratinakta mAtram BuQjAnaH yajQadattaH
   ityanvayyanumānenāpyarthāpattergantārthatāmāhuḥ/ satyantāmiti/	iti anvayi anumAnena api arTApatteH gantA arTa tAm AhuH/ satyantAm iti/
   satyantānupādāne rātribhojanarūpasādhyābhāvavati	satyanta anupAdAne rAtri Bojana rUpa sADya aBAvavati
   divāmātrabhojanakartari pīne yajñadatte pīnatvarūpahetusatvāt	divA mAtra Bojana kartari pIne yajQadatte pIna tva rUpa hetu satvAt
   vyabhicāraḥ/ tadvāraṇāya divā abhuñjānatve satīti viśeṣaṇam/ divā	vyaBicAraH/ tad vAraNAya divA aBuQjAna tve satI iti viSezaNam/ divA
   bhuñjānatvameva yajñadatte 'stīti na vyabhicāraḥ/ ahorātrābhojinīti/	BuQjAna tvam eva yajQadatte asti iti na vyaBicAraH/ ahorAtra ABojinIti/
   tathā ca pīnatvāditi viśeṣyānupādāne devadatto rātrau bhuṅkte	taTA ca pIna tvAt iti viSezya anupAdAne devadattaH rAtrO BuFkte
   divā abhuñjānatvādityeva hetuḥ syāt/ tathā sati yastāpasaḥ	divA aBuQjAna tvAt iti eva hetuH syAt/ taTA sati yaH tApasaH
   divāpi na bhuṅkte rātrāvapi na bhuṅkte ata eva kṛśaḥ tasmin	divA api na BuFkte rAtrO= api na BuFkte atas eva kRSaH tasmin
   rātribhojanarūpasādadhyābhāvavati divā abhuñjānatvarūpahetusatvāt	rAtri Bojana rUpa sAdaDyA aBAvavati divA aBuQjAna tva rUpa hetu satvAt
   tatra vyabhicāraḥ/ tadvāraṇāya pīnatvāditi/ tasmiṃstāpase ca	tatra vyaBicAraH/ tad vAraNAya pIna tvAt iti/ tasmin= tApase ca
   pīnatvābhāvāt na vyabhicāraḥ/ nanvevamapi yo yogī na bhuṅkte	pInatva aBAvAt na vyaBicAraH/ nanu evam api yaH yogI na BuFkte
   athāpi yogamāhātmyāt pīno bhavati, tasmin	aTa api yoga mAhAtmyAt pInaH Bavati, tasmin
   rātribhojanakartṛtvarūpasādhyābhāvavati divā abhuñjānatve sati	rAtri Bojana kartR tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati divA aBuQjAna tve sati
   pīnatvarūpahetusatvāt vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkyāha   tacca	pIna tva rUpa hetu satvAt vyaBicAraH iti ASaFkya Aha  tat ca
   yogādyajanyapīnatvaparamiti tathā ca yogini yat pīnatvaṃ tat	yoga At yajanya pIna tva param iti taTA ca yogini yat pIna tvam tat 
   yogajanyamiti yogajanyapīnatvābhāvāt na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ/	yoga janyam iti yoga janya pInatva aBAvAt na vyaBicAraH iti BAvaH/
   śatavānityukta	SatavAn iti ukta
   ityādi/ śatasaṅkhyākabrāhyaṇādhikaraṇe adhiveśane	ityAdi/ Sata saFKyAka brAhyaNa aDikaraNe aDiveSane
   pañcāśatsaṅkhyākabrāhmaṇāḥ santi na veti sandehānantaraṃ	paQcASat saFKyAka brAhmaNAH santi na vA iti sandeha anantaram
   śatatvasaṅkhyāvataḥ samūhasya pañcāśatsaṅkhyāvadghaṭitatvena	Sata tva saFKyAvataH samUhasya paQcASat saFKyA vat Gawita tvena
   śatavastvadhikaraṇe pañcāśadvastusambhava ityākārakajñānarūpāt	Satavastu aDikaraNe paQcASat vastu samBavaH iti AkAraka jQAna rUpAt
   sambhavapramāṇāt iha pañcāśat brāhmaṇāḥ santīti	samBava pramANAt iha paQcASat brAhmaNAH santi iti
   nirṇayātmakapramittyutpatyā sambhavo 'pi pramāṇāntaramiti kecit/ tanna	nirNaya Atmaka pramitti utpatyA samBavaH api pramANa antaram iti kecit/ tat na
     idamadhiveśanaṃ pañcāśadbrāhmaṇavat śatabrāhmaṇavatvāt yat	 idam aDiveSanam paQcASat brAhmaNa vat Sata brAhmaNava tvAt yat 
   śatasaṅkhyākavastumat tat pañcāśatsaṅkhyākavastumat yathā	Sata saFKyAka vastumat tat paQcASat saFKyAka vastumat yaTA
   śataghaṭādhikaraṇaṃ bhūtalam iti	Sata Gawa aDikaraNam BU talam iti
   sāmānyamukhavyāptiparāmarśajanyānumitirūpaiva sambhavātmikā	sAmAnya muKa vyApti parAmarSa janyA anumiti rUpA eva samBava AtmikA
   pramitiḥ, ato na sambhavaḥ pramāṇāntaramiti bhāvaḥ/ śatasya	pramitiH, atas na samBavaH pramANa antaram iti BAvaH/ Satasya
   pañcāśavdyāpyatvāditi/ yatra śatasaṅvyākapadārthāḥ tatra	paQcASavdyApya tvAt iti/ yatra Sata saFvyAka padArTAH tatra
   pañcāśatsaṅkhyākapadārthā iti vyāptiḥ/	paQcASat saFKyAka padArTAH iti vyAptiH/
   śabdadvāreti/ yathā	Sabda dvAra iti/ yaTA
   lipidarśanaṃ śabdasmṛtiṃ janayitvā śābdabodhaṃ prayojayatīti	lipi darSanam Sabda smRtim janayitvA SAbda boDam prayojayati iti
   paramparayā kāraṇatve 'pi karaṇatvābhāvāt na pramāṇam, tathā ceṣṭāpi	paramparayA kAraNa tve api karaNa tva aBAvAt na pramANam, taTA cezwA api
   dvitvabodhakaśabdasmṛtidvārā dvitvādibodhaprayojikā na tatkaraṇamiti	dvi tva boDaka Sabda smRti dvArA dvi tva Adi boDa prayojikA na tat karaNam iti
   na pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ/ anumānadvāreti/	na pramANam iti BAvaH/ anumAna dvAra iti/
   ceṣṭamānasyābhiprāyaviśeṣānumānadvāretyarthaḥ/ ayaṃ	cezwamAnasya aBiprAya viSeza anumAna dvAra iti arTaH/ ayam
   dvitvabodhatātparyavān	dvi tva boDa tAt paryavAn
   dvitvabodhakatvāvinābhūtavilakṣaṇaceṣṭāvatvādityanumānākāro	dvi tva boDaka tva avinABUta vilakzaNa cezwA ava tvAt iti anumAna AkAraH 
   vivakṣitaḥ/ nanu vyavahāraheturityatra vyavahārapadasya pravṛttiparatve	vivakzitaH/ nanu vyavahAra hetuH iti atra vyavahAra padasya pravRtti paratve
   taddhetutvaṃ dvitvādijñāna evāsti na tu paramparayā	tad hetu tvam dvi tva Adi jQAnaH eva asti na tu paramparayA
   jñānajanakaceṣṭāyāmityāśaṅkya vyavahārapadaṃ pramāparatayā vyācaṣṭe  	jQAna janaka cezwAyAm iti ASaFkya vyavahAra padam pramApara tayA vyAcazwe  
   pramātmakajñānetyartha iti/ vyavahriyate aneneti vyutpatyā	pramA Atmaka jQAnA iti arTaH iti/ vyavahriyate anena iti vyutpatyA
   vyavahārapadaṃ prakṛte pramātmakajñānārthakamityarthaḥ/	vyavahAra padam prakRte pramA Atmaka jQAna arTakam iti arTaH/
   iti	iti
   tarkasaṅgrahadīpikāprakāśikāvyāravyāyāṃ bālapriyāyāṃ	tarka saFgraha dIpikA prakASikA vyAravyAyAm bAla priyAyAm
   śabdaparicchedaḥ	Sabda paricCedaH

   tatprakārakatvaṃ svatogrāhyaṃ parato veti vicāryate/ tatra vipratipattiḥ	tad prakAraka tvam svatas grAhyam paratas vA iti vicAryate/ tatra vipratipattiH
     jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhakayāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyaṃ na vā	 jQAna prAmANyam tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhyam na vA
   iti/ atra vidhikoṭiḥ svatastvam niṣeghakoṭiḥ paratastvam/	iti/ atra viDi kowiH svatas tvam nizeGa kowiH paratas tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   pramāṇaprasaṅgāt	pramANa prasaFgAt 
   pramātvasya parato grāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyan āha   jñānānāmiti/	pramAtu asya paratas grAhya tvam vyavasTApayizyan Aha  jQAnAnAm iti/
   ṣaṣṭyartha ādheyatvam/ tasya cānvayaḥ tadvati tatprakārakatve/ tacca	zazwi arTaH ADeya tvam/ tasya ca anvayaH tadvati tad prakAraka tve/ tat ca
   tadvadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnatatprakārakatvam/ tacchabdārthoghaṭatvādirūpaḥ/	tadvat viSezyaka tva avacCinna tad prakAraka tvam/ tad Sabda arTaH Gawa tva Adi rUpaH/
   svatogrāhyamiti/ jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahaviṣaya ityarthaḥ/ parata	svatas grAhyam iti/ jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha vizayaH iti arTaH/ parata
   iti/ grāhyamityanuṣajyate/ anumānādijanyagrahaviṣaya ityarthaḥ/ tatra	iti/ grAhyam iti anuzajyate/ anumAna Adi janya graha vizayaH iti arTaH/ tatra
     vicāre/ prayojakatvaṃ saptamyarthaḥ vipratipattāvanveti/ kathaṃ tasyāḥ	 vicAre/ prayojaka tvam saptamI arTaH vipratipattO= anveti/ kaTam tasyAH
   vicāraprayojakatvamiti cet   atra vadanti/	vicAra prayojaka tvam iti ced  atra vadanti/
   viruddhārthapratipādakavākyadvayaṃ hi vipratipattiḥ/ tayā	virudDa arTa pratipAdaka vAkya dvayam hi vipratipattiH/ tayA
   aprāmāṇyaśaṅkākabalitatattadvākyārthabodhadvārā madhyasthasya saṃśayo	aprAmANya SaFkAka balita tad tad vAkya arTa boDa dvArAH maDyasTasya saMSayaH 
   janyata ityekatarakoṭiniścayāya nyāyaprayogādirūpo vicāraḥ/	janyate iti ekatara kowi niScayAya nyAya prayoga Adi rUpaH vicAraH/
   evaṃ ca vicāropayogisaṃśayajananyā	evam ca vicAra upayogi saMSaya jananyA
   vipratipattervicāropayogitvamakṣatamiti/ jñānaprāmāṇyamiti	vipratipatteH vicAra upayogi tvam akzatam iti/ jQAna prAmANyam iti
   pakṣanirdeśaḥ/ atra tadvati tatprakārakajñānatvarūpameva prāmāṇyaṃ pakṣaḥ,	pakza nirdeSaH/ atra tadvati tad prakAraka jQAna tva rUpam eva prAmANyam pakzaH,
   na	na
   tu pramitikaraṇatvarūpam iti	tu pramiti karaNa tva rUpam iti
   tātparyagrāhakaṃ	tAtparya grAhakam
   jñānapadam/ vastutastu tadvati tatprakārakatvasya	jQAna padam/ vastutas tu tadvati tad prakAraka tvasya
   ghaṭatvapaṭatvādirūpārthabhedena bhinnatayā kasyāpi prāmāṇyasya	Gawa tva pawa tva Adi rUpa arTa Bedena Binna tayA kasya api prAmANyasya
   yāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvaṃ na sambhavati ityato	yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam na samBavati iti atas 
   yaddharmaghaṭitaprāmāṇyaṃ yadā pakṣaḥ tadā	yad Darma Gawita prAmANyam yadA pakzaH tadA
   taddharmaprakārakajñānagrāhakayāvadgrāhyatvameva sādhanīyam/ na tu	tad Darma prakAraka jQAna grAhaka yAvat grAhya tvam eva sADanIyam/ na tu
   sāmānyato jñānagrāhakayāvadgrāhyatvamiti tātparyagrāhakaṃ jñānapadam/	sAmAnyatas jQAna grAhaka yAvat grAhya tvam iti tAtparyagrAhakam jQAna padam/
   tadaprāmāṇyetyādi/ tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhikā yāvatī jñānagrāhikā sāmagrī	tad aprAmANya ityAdi/ tad aprAmANyAgrAhikA yAvatI jQAnagrAhikA sAmagrI
   tajjanyagrahaviṣayo na vetyarthaḥ/ tādṛśagrahaḥ gurumate vyavasāyaḥ/	tad janya graha vizayaH na vA iti arTaH/ tAdRSa grahaH guru mate vyavasAyaH/
   murārimiśramate anuvyavasāyaḥ/ bhāṭṭamate ca	murAri miSra mate anuvyavasAyaH/ BAwwamate ca
   jñātatāliṅgakānumitiḥ/ atra gurumate sarvasminneva jñāne	jQAta tAliFgaka anumitiH/ atra guru mate sarvasmin= eva jQAne
   mitimātṛ meya etattrayaṃ bhāsate/ tanmate 'ghaṭatvena ghaṭaṃ ahaṃ	miti mAtR meya  etat trayam BAsate/ tad mate aGawa tvena Gawam aham
   jānāmi' ityākārakasyaiva vyavasāyasya utpatteḥ/ evaṃ ca vyavasāyasya	jAnAmia iti AkArakasya eva vyavasAyasya utpatteH/ evam ca vyavasAyasya
   svaprakāśātmakatayā svenaiva svagataprāmāṇyasya grahaṇāt bhavati	sva prakASa Atmaka tayA svena eva sva gata prAmANyasya grahaNAt Bavati
   prāmāṇyasya svatogrāhyatvam/ viśiṣṭabuddhiṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānasya	prAmANyasya svatas grAhya tvam/ viSizwa budDim prati viSezaNa jQAnasya
   kāraṇatāyāḥ tairanaṅgīkārāt anupasthitasyāpi prāmāṇyasya	kAraNa tAyAH tEH anaFgIkArAt anupasTitasya api prAmANyasya
   bhānasambhavāt/ miśramate 'ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ' ityākārakajñānānantaraṃ	BAna samBavAt/ miSra mate aayam GawaHa iti AkAraka jQAna anantaram
   'ghaṭatvena ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmi' iti	aGawa tvena Gawam aham jAnAmia iti
   jñānaviṣayakalaukikamānasamutpadyate, tena prāmāṇyasya grahaṇam/	jQAna vizaya kalOkika mAna samutpadyate, tena prAmANyasya grahaNam/
   bhaṭṭamate tu jñānasyātīndriyatayā jñātatāliṅgakānumitereva	Bawwa mate tu jQAnasya atIndriya tayA jQAta tA liFgaka anumiteH eva
   prāthamikajñānagraharūpatayā tayā prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyate/ anumānaprayogastu  	prATamika jQAna graha rUpa tayA tayA prAmANyam gRhyate/ anumAna prayogaH tu  
   ghaṭaḥ ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakajñānaviṣayaḥ	GawaH Gawa tva vat viSezyaka Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna vizayaH
   ghaṭatvaprakārakajñātatāvattvāt yannaivaṃ tannaivam iti/ jñātatā ca	Gawa tva prakAraka jQAta tAvat tvAt yat na evam tat na evam iti/ jQAta tA ca
   saviṣayako jñānajanyaḥ atirikta padārtha iti matavivekaḥ/	sa vizayakaH jQAna janyaH atirikta padArTaH iti mata vivekaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   etāvatā prabandhena	etAvatA prabanDena
   catvāri pramāṇāni nirūpitāni/ evaṃ ca pramāṇe jñāte 1tadghaṭakasya	catvAri pramANAni nirUpita ani/ evam ca pramANe jQAte 1tad Gawakasya
   pramātvasyopasthitiḥ bhavatīti	pramAtu asya upasTitiH Bavati iti
   smṛtasyopekṣānarhatvarūpaprasaṅgasaṅgatyā pramātvaviṣayakaṃ vicāraṃ	smRtasya upekzAnarha tva rUpa prasaFga saFgatyA pramAtva vizayakam vicAram
   pravartayatītyāha pramāṇaprasaṅgāditi/	pravartayati iti Aha pramANa prasaFgAt iti/
   pramāṇanirūpitaprasaṅgasaṅgatyetyarthaḥ/ vyavasthāpayiṣyanniti/	pramANa nirUpita prasaFga saFgatyA iti arTaH/ vyavasTApayizyan= iti/
   paramatanirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ sādhayiṣyan ityarthaḥ/ ṣaṣṭyartha	parama tanirAkaraNa pUrvakam sADayizyan iti arTaH/ zazwi arTa
   ādheyatvamityādi/ tathā ca ayaṃ ghaṭa ityādijñānaniṣṭhaṃ	ADeya tvam ityAdi/ taTA ca ayam GawaH ityAdi jQAna nizWam
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakārakatvādirūpapramātvaṃ	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakAraka tva Adi rUpa pramAtvam
   svatogrāhyaṃ parato veti vicāryata ityarthaḥ/	svatas grAhyam paratas vA iti vicAryate iti arTaH/
   icchādiniṣṭhapramātvasya mīmāṃsakairapi paratogrāhyatvasvīkākarāt	icCA Adi nizWa pramAtvasya mImAMsakEH api paratas grAhya tva svIkAkarAt
   tatra vivādo nāstīti tasya vicāro 'nāvaśyaka iti sūcanāya	tatra vivAdaH na asti iti tasya vicAraH anAvaSyakaH iti sUcanAya
   jñānaniṣṭhamiti pramātve viśeṣaṇamupāttam/	jQAna nizWam iti pramAtve viSezaNam upAttam/
   1. taddhaṭakasyeti/	1. tad hawakasya iti/
   pramātvaviśiṣṭapramājanakasya pramāṇaśabdārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	pramAtu a viSizwa pramAjanakasya pramANa Sabda arTa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   sakalajñānasādhāraṇamekaṃ pramātvaṃ nāsti, jātyatiriktasya	sakala jQAna sADAraNam ekam pramAtvam nAsti, jAti atiriktasya
   ghaṭatvādiviṣayaghaṭitasya tasya pratijñānaṃ bhinnatvāditi sūcanāya	Gawa tva Adi vizaya Gawitasya tasya pratijQAnam Binna tvAt iti sUcanAya
   jñānānāṃ iti bahuvacanam/ jñānagrāhaketi/ jñānaviṣayakajñānajanikā	jQAnAnAm iti bahuvacanam/ jQAna grAhaka iti/ jQAna vizaya ka jQAna janikA
   yā sāmagrī tajjanyaṃ yat jñānaṃ tadviṣaya ityarthaḥ/ asya	yA sAmagrI tat janyam yat jQAnam tat vizayaH iti arTaH/ asya
   samanvayaprakāraḥ paścādbhaviṣyati/ anumānādi ityādipadena	samanvaya prakAraH paScAt Bavizyati/ anumAna Adi ityAdi padena
   āptavākyarūpaḥ śabdo gṛhyate/ vākyadvayamiti/ pramātvaṃ svatogrāhyaṃ	Apta vAkya rUpaH SabdaH gRhyate/ vAkya dvayam iti/ pramAtvam svatas grAhyam
   ityekaṃ vākyam, pramātvaṃ parato grāhyam ityaparaṃ vākyam/ tatra	iti ekam vAkyam, pramAtvam paratas grAhyam iti aparam vAkyam/ tatra
   prathamaṃ mīmāṃsakasya, dvatīyaṃ naiyāyikasya/ etat	praTamam mImAMsakasya, dvatIyam nEyAyikasya/ etat 
   parasparaviruddhārthapratipādakavākyadvayaṃ śṛṇvataḥ madhyasthasya	paraspara virudDa arTa pratipAdaka vAkya dvayam SRNvataH maDyasTasya
   prathamaṃ	praTamam
   aprāmāṇyaśaṅkāviṣayabhūtaḥ tattadvākyārthabodho jāyate, tataḥ	aprAmANya SaFkA vizaya BUtaH tad tad vAkya arTa boDaH jAyate, tatas 
   pramātvaṃ svatogrāhyaṃ vā	pramAtvam svatas grAhyam vA
   paratogrāhyaṃ veti saṃśayo jāyate/ tataḥ madhyasthasya prathamaṃ	paratas grAhyam vA iti saMSayaH jAyate/ tatas maDyasTasya praTamam
   aprāmāṇyaśaṅkāviṣayabhūtaḥ tattadvākyārthabodho jāyate, tataḥ pramātvaṃ	aprAmANya SaFkA vizaya BUtaH tad tad vAkya arTa boDaH jAyate, tatas pramAtvam
   svatogrāhyaṃ vā paratogrāhyaṃ	svatas grAhyam vA paratas grAhyam
   veti saṃśayo jāyate/	vA iti saMSayaH jAyate/
   tataḥ madhyasthasya ekatarakoṭikaniścayamutpādayituṃ nyāyaprayogarūpo	tatas maDyasTasya ekatara kowika niScayam utpAdayitum nyAya prayoga rUpaH 
   vicāraḥ kriyate/ tathā ca	vicAraH kriyate/ taTA ca
   nyāyaprayogarūpavicāraṃ prati madhyasthasaṃśayaḥ kāraṇam/	nyAya prayoga rUpa vicAram prati maDyasTa saMSayaH kAraNam/
   madhyasthasaṃśayaṃ prati vipratipattiḥ kāraṇamiti vipratipatteḥ	maDyasTa saMSayam prati vipratipattiH kAraNam iti vipratipatteH
   vicāraprayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ atra"vicāro jalpaḥ,	vicAra prayojaka tvam iti BAvaH/ atra"vicAraH jalpaH,
   viparītodbhāvakaparavijigīṣayā nyāyaprayogarūpaḥ/	viparIta udBAvaka para vijigIzayA nyAya prayoga rUpaH/
   jijñāsāsampādanena tadaṅgasya tadupayogino madhyasthasaṃśayasya	jijQAsA sampAdanena tad aFgasya tad upayoginaH maDyasTa saMSayasya
   jananīrvipratipattīrityartha"iti gadādharagrantho 'nusandheyaḥ/	jananIH vipratipattIH iti arTa" iti gadADara granTaH anusanDeyaH/
   dīpikāyāṃ pradarśitaṃ vipratipattivākyaṃ tattanmatānuvādarūpaṃ	dIpikAyAm pradarSitam vipratipatti vAkyam tad tad mata anuvAda rUpam
   dīpikākārasyaivetyāhuḥ/ saṃśayajananyā iti/ saṃśayajanikāyā	dIpikA AkArasya eva iti AhuH/ saMSaya jananyA iti/ saMSaya janikAyAH 
   ityarthaḥ/	iti arTaH/
   nanu jñānaprāmāṇyamiti	nanu jQAna prAmANyam iti
   pakṣanirdeśa ityuktam/ tatra prāmāṇyamityeva pakṣanirdeśo 'stu,	pakza nirdeSaH iti uktam/ tatra prAmANyam iti eva pakza nirdeSaH astu,
   jñānapadaṃ kimarthamityāśaṅkāyāmāha atra tadvatīti/	jQAna padam kimarTam iti ASaFkAyAm Aha atra tadvatI iti/
   karaṇārthakalyuḍantāt pramāṇaśabdāt bhāveṣvajñā niṣpannasya	karaNa arTa kalyuxantAt pramANa SabdAt BAvezu ajQA nizpannasya
   prāmāṇyaśabdasya pramākaraṇatvamarthaḥ/ bhāvārthakalyuḍantāt	prAmANya Sabdasya pramAkaraNa tvam arTaH/ BAva arTa kalI uxantAt
   pramāṇaśabdāt bhāveṣyañā niṣpannasya prāmāṇyaśabdasya pramātvamarthaḥ/	pramANa SabdAt BAvezyaQA nizpannasya prAmANya Sabdasya pramAtvam arTaH/
   prakṛte ca pramātvarūpaḥ prāmāṇyapadārtha eva pakṣaḥ, na tu	prakRte ca pramAtva rUpaH prAmANya padArTaH eva pakzaH, na tu
   pramākaraṇatvarūpa	pramAkaraNa tva rUpa
   iti sūcanāya jñānapadam/ na ca pramākaraṇatvameva pakṣo 'stviti	iti sUcanAya jQAna padam/ na ca pramAkaraNa tvam eva pakzaH astu iti
   vācyam/ tatra svatogrāhyatvarūpasādhyābhāvena bādhāt/ na ca	vAcyam/ tatra svatas grAhya tva rUpa sADya aBAvena bADAt/ na ca
   jñānapadopādānena kathaṃ pramākaraṇatvavyāvṛttiḥ/ pramākaraṇatvasya	jQAna pada upAdAnena kaTam pramAkaraNa tva vyAvRttiH/ pramAkaraNa tvasya
   vyāptijñānasādṛśyajñānāditānaniṣṭhatvāt iti vācyam/ jñānasyaiva	vyApti jQAna sAdRSya jQAna AditAn anizWa tvAt iti vAcyam/ jQAnasya eva
   prāmāṇyaṃ jñānaprāmāṇyamityavadhāraṇasyābhipretatvāt	prAmANyam jQAna prAmANyam iti avaDAraNasya aBipreta tvAt 
   jñānamātravṛttiprāmāṇyaṃ pakṣatayābhimatam/ pramākaraṇatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ	jQAna mAtra vRtti prAmANyam pakzatayA aBimatam/ pramAkaraNa tva rUpam prAmANyam
   tu na jñānamātravṛtti, tasya 1manaḥ prabhṛtivṛttitvāt/ pramātvarūpaṃ	tu na jQAna mAtra vRtti, tasya 1manaH praBRti vRtti tva at/ pramAtva rUpam
   prāmāṇyaṃ tu jñānamātravṛttīti jñānapadena pramitikaraṇatvavyavaccheda	prAmANyam tu jQAna mAtra vRtti iti jQAna padena pramiti karaNa tva vyavacCeda
   ityāśayāt/	iti ASayAt/
   nanu jñānamātravṛttīti	nanu jQAna mAtra vRtti iti
   viśeṣaṇe datte 'pi vyāptijñānādiniṣṭhaṃ yat	viSezaNe datte api vyApti jQAna Adi nizWam yat 
   anumityādipramākaraṇatvaṃ tat jñānamātravṛttīti tadvyavacchedaḥ	anumiti Adi pramAkaraNa tvam tat jQAna mAtra vRtti iti tad vyavacCedaH
   kathamiti cet   atrāhuḥ/ viśeṣyatāvacchedakāvacchedena	kaTam iti ced  atra AhuH/ viSezya tAvacCedaka avacCedena
   viśeṣaṇānvayasyautsargikatvāt prakṛte	viSezaNa anvayasya Otsargika tvAt prakRte
   pramākaraṇatvatvarūpaviśeṣyatāvacchedakāvacchedena	pramAkaraNa tva tva rUpa viSezya tAvacCedaka avacCedena
   jñānamātravṛttitvānvayo vācyaḥ/ pramākaraṇatvatvākrānte	jQAna mAtra vRtti tva anvayaH vAcyaH/ pramAkaraNa tva tva AkrAnte
   pratyakṣapramākaraṇatve jñānamātravṛttitvabādhāt/ ataḥ pramātvamevātra	pratyakza pramAkaraNa tve jQAna mAtra vRtti tva bADAt/ atas pramAtvam eva atra
   prāmāṇyapadārthaḥ/ tadvati tatprakārakajñānatvatvarūpapramātvatvāvacchinne	prAmANya padArTaH/ tadvati tad prakAraka jQAna tva tva rUpa pramAtva tva avacCinne
   tu	tu
   jñānamātravṛttitvānvayaḥ/ sabhbhavatīti tadvalāt atra pramātvarūpaṃ	jQAna mAtra vRtti tva anvayaH/ saBBavati iti tad valAt atra pramAtva rUpam
   prāmāṇyameva gṛhyata iti/	prAmANyam eva gRhyate iti/
   nanu	nanu
   prāmāṇyapadārthatvena prāmāṇyapadārthasya pakṣatve bhavedevaṃ	prAmANya padArTa tvena prAmANya padArTasya pakza tve Bavet evam
   jñānapadasārthaṅkyam/ viśiṣya tadvati tatprakārakajñānatvasya pakṣatve	jQAna pada sArTaFkyam/ viSizya tadvati tad prakAraka jQAna tvasya pakza tve
   jñānapadaṃ vyarthamityatastātparyagrāhakatayā tatsārthakyamāha   vastuta	jQAna padam vyarTam iti atas tAtparya grAhaka tayA tat sArTakyam Aha  vastuta
   iti/ kasyāpi prāmāṇyasyeti / ghaṭatvavati	iti/ kasya api prAmANyasya iti / Gawatvavati
   ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānatvarūpaprāmāṇyasya	Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna tva rUpa prAmANyasya
   tadāśrayabhūtajñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrahyatve 'pi	tad ASraya BUta jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grahya tve api
   tadanāśrayayāvadantargatapaṭādijñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvaṃ nāstīti	tad anASraya yAvat antargata pawa Adi jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam na asti iti
   bādhaḥ	bADaH
   syāt/ ato ghaṭatvaghaṭitaṃ	syAt/ atas Gawa tva Gawitam
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakārakajñānatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna tva rUpam prAmANyam
   yadā	yadA
   pakṣaḥ tadā ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrīgāhyatvameva sādhyam/ na	pakzaH tadA Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI gAhya tvam eva sADyam/ na
   tu	tu
   jñānatvena sāmānyena jñānaghaṭitaṃ jñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvamiti	jQAna tvena sAmAnyena jQAna Gawitam jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam iti
   sūcanāya jñānapadamiti bhāvaḥ/ na tu sāmānyata iti/	sUcanAya jQAna padam iti BAvaH/ na tu sAmAnyatas iti/
   idamupalakṣaṇam, dharmāntaraprakārakajñānagrāhakayāvatsāmāgrīgrāhyatvaṃ na	idam upalakzaNam, Darma antara prakAraka jQAna grAhaka yAvat sAma agrI grAhya tvam na
   sādhyamiti lābhāyetyapi bodhyam/	sADyam iti lABAya iti api boDyam/
   1. manaḥ prabhṛtīti/	1. manaH praBRti iti/
   manasaḥ mānasapratyakṣarūpapramākaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	manasaH mAnasa pratyakza rUpa pramAkaraNa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   tadaprāmāṇyetyādi/	tad aprAmANya ityAdi/
   jñānaṃ yayā sāmagryā jñāyate tayaiva sāmagryā jñānagataṃ pramātvamapi	jQAnam yayA sAmagryA jQAyate tayA eva sAmagryAH jQAna gatam pramAtvam api
   jñāyate/ jñānaviṣayakajñāne eva jñānagataṃ pramātvamapi viṣaya ityarthaḥ/	jQAyate/ jQAna vizaya ka jQAne eva jQAna gatam pramAtvam api vizayaH iti arTaH/
   tatra prābhākaramate jñānaṃ tripuṭīrūpamaṅgīkriyate/ tripuṭītyasya	tatra prABAkara mate jQAnam tripuwI rUpam aFgIkriyate/ tripuwI iti asya
   jñātṛ jñeya jñānaitattritayaviṣayakamityarthaḥ/ tanmate ādau 'ayaṃ ghaṭa'	jQAtR  jQeya  jQAna etat tritaya vizayakam iti arTaH/ tad mate AdO aayam Gawa a
   iti vyavasāyātmakaṃ jñānaṃ tataḥ 'ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmi'	iti vyavasAya Atmakam jQAnam tatas aGawam aham jAnAmi a
   ityanuvyavasāyātmakaṃ jñānamiti nāṅgīkriyate/ api tu prathamata eva	iti anuvyavasAya Atmakam jQAnam iti na aFgIkriyate/ api tu praTamatas eva
   ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyākārakameva	Gawam aham jAnAmi iti AkArakam eva
   jñānaṃ jāyate, tadave	jQAnam jAyate, tadave
   vyavasāyātmakam/ tasmin jñāne viṣayaḥ ghaṭaḥ, jñātā ahamarthaḥ,	vyavasAya Atmakam/ tasmin jQAne vizayaH GawaH, jQAtAH aham arTaH,
   jñādhātvarthajñānaṃ ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ/ ata eva jñānasya	jQADAtu arTa jQAnam ca iti trayam vizayaH/ atas eva jQAnasya
   svaviṣayakatvarūpaṃ	sva vizaya ka tva rUpam
   svayaṃprakāśatvam/ tathā ca jñānaviṣayakaṃ svātmakaṃ jñānaṃ	svayaMprakASa tvam/ taTA ca jQAna vizayakam sva Atmakam jQAnam
   svagatapramātvamapi viṣayīkaroti, yathā jñānagataṃ jñānatvamapi	sva gata pramAtvam api vizayIkaroti, yaTA jQAna gatam jQAna tvam api
   viṣayīkaroti tadvat/ jñānatvaviśiṣṭajñānaviṣayakatvavat	vizayIkaroti tadvat/ jQAna tva viSizwa jQAna vizaya ka tva vat
   pramātvaviśiṣṭajñānaviṣayakatvamapi vyavasāyasya svīkriyate/ na ca	pramAtva viSizwa jQAna vizayaka tvam api vyavasAyasya svIkriyate/ na ca
   viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāt	viSizwa budDO viSezaNa jQAnasya kAraNa tvAt 
   pūrvamanupasthitasya	pUrvam anupasTitasya
   pramātvasya kathaṃ bhānamiti vācyam/ tādṛśakāraṇatāyā	pramAtu asya kaTam BAnam iti vAcyam/ tAdRSa kAraNa tAyA
   anaṅgīkārāt/ tathā ca	anaFgIkArAt/ taTA ca
   jñānaviṣayakajñānaviṣayatvasyaiva svatastvarūpatayā gurumate	jQAna vizaya ka jQAna vizaya tvasya eva svatas tu arUpa tayA guru mate
   jñānaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ svayameva tadviṣayatvaṃ pramātvasyāstīti	jQAna vizayakam jQAnam svayam eva tad vizaya tvam pramAtu asya asti iti
   svatastvopapattiḥ/	svatas tvA upapattiH/
   murārimiśrāṇāṃ mate	murAri miSrANAm mate
   ādau ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavasāyātmakaṃ jñānam, tataḥ ghaṭatvena ghaṭamahaṃ	AdO ayam GawaH iti vyavasAya Atmakam jQAnam, tatas Gawa tvena Gawam aham
   jānāmītyakārakaḥ anuvyavasāyaḥ/ tasya	jAnAmi iti akArakaH anuvyavasAyaH/ tasya
   ghaṭatvaprakārakaghaṭaviśeṣyakajñānavānityarthaḥ/ tathā ca tanmate	Gawa tva prakAraka Gawa viSezyaka jQAnavAn iti arTaH/ taTA ca tad mate
   jñānaviṣayakajñānamanuvyavasāyaḥ/ tena jñāne viṣayīkriyamāṇe	jQAna vizaya ka jQAnam anuvyavasAyaH/ tena jQAne vizayI kriyamANe
   tadviśeṣaṇatayā ghaṭatvaprakārakatvāvacchinnaghaṭaviśeṣyakatvarūpaṃ	tad viSezaNa tayA Gawa tva prakAraka tva avacCinna Gawa viSezyakatva rUpam
   pramātvamapi viṣayīkriyate/ ataḥ	pramAtvam api vizayIkriyate/ atas 
   jñānaviṣayakajñānaviṣayatvarūpasvatastvopapattiḥ/	jQAna vizaya ka jQAna vizaya tva rUpasvataH tva upapattiH/
   bhāṭṭānāṃ mate	BAwwAnAm mate
   jñānasyātīndriyatayā aindriyakaṃ ghaṭādijñānaṃ jñānaviṣayakaṃ na bhavatīti	jQAnasya atIndriya tayA Endriyakam Gawa Adi jQAnam jQAna vizayakam na Bavati iti
   prathamataḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa ityeva jñānamudeti/ tena jñānena ghaṭe	praTamatas ayam GawaH iti eva jQAnam udeti/ tena jQAnena Gawe
   jñātatāravyaḥ kaścit saviṣayako dharmo jāyate/ tayā jñātatayā	jQAta tAravyaH kaScid sa vizayakaH DarmaH jAyate/ tayA jQAta tayA
   jñānamanumīyate/ tathā ca jñātatāliṅgakānumitireva tanmate	jQAnam anumIyate/ taTA ca jQAta tAliFgaka anumitiH eva tad mate
   jñānaviṣayakajñānam/ tayā anumityā jñānagataṃ pramātvamapi	jQAna vizaya ka jQAnam/ tayA anumityA jQAna gatam pramAtvam api
   viṣayīkriyata iti jñānaviṣayatvarūpasvatastvopapattiḥ/	vizayIkriyate iti jQAna vizaya tva rUpasvataH tva upapattiH/
   1prāthamikajñānagrahaviṣayatvaṃ svatogrāhyatvamiti matatrayasādhāraṇaṃ	1prATamika jQAna graha vizaya tvam svatA ugrAhya tvam iti mata traya sADAraNam
   nirvācyam/ jñānagrahe prāthamikatvaviśeṣaṇāt	nirvAcyam/ jQAna grahe prATamika tva viSezaNAt
   naiyāyikasaṃmatapravṛttyādiliṅgakānumityātmakadvitīyajñānagraho	nEyAyika saMmata pravRtti Adi liFgaka anum iti Atmaka dvitIya jQAna grahaH 
   vyavacchidyate/	vyavacCidyate/
   vyavasāyasya	vyavasAyasya
   svaprakāśātmakatayeti/ svaviṣayakatayetyarthaḥ/ grahaṇāditi/	sva prakASa Atmaka tayA iti/ sva vizaya katayA iti arTaH/ grahaNAt iti/
   viṣayīkaraṇādityarthaḥ/ jñānaviṣayakalaukikamānasamiti/	vizayIkaraNAt iti arTaH/ jQAna vizaya kalOkika mAna samiti/
   jñānaviṣayakamātmamanassaṃyogarūpalaukikasannikarṣajanyaṃ	jQAna vizaya kam Atma mana ssaMyoga rUpa lOkika sannikarza janyam
   mānasapratyakṣamityarthaḥ/ idameva mānasam anuvyavasāya ityucyate/	mAnasa pratyakzam iti arTaH/ idam eva mAnasam anuvyavasAyaH iti ucyate/
   tena prāmāṇyasya grahaṇamiti/ tena mānasapratyakṣeṇa pramātvasya	tena prAmANyasya grahaNam iti/ tena mAnasa pratyakzeNa pramAtvasya
   viṣayīkaraṇamityarthaḥ/ jñānaviṣayakamānasapratyakṣanirūpitā	vizayIkaraNam iti arTaH/ jQAna vizaya ka mAnasa pratyakza nirUpitA
   pramātvaniṣṭhaviṣayateti yāvat/ tayā pramāṇyaṃ gṛhyate   anumityā	pramAtu anizWa vizaya tA iti yAvat/ tayA pramANyam gRhyate  anumityA
   prāmāṇyaṃ viṣayīkriyate/ ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyaketi/ tathā cāsyāmanumitau	prAmANyam vizayIkriyate/ Gawa tva vat viSezya keti/ taTA ca asyAm anumitO
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakajñānaṃ viṣaṃyaḥ, jñānaviśeṣaṇatayā	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka Gawa tva prakAraka jQAnam vizaMyaH, jQAna viSezaNa tayA
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpapramātvamapi viṣayaḥ/	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpa pramAtvam api vizayaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   svatastvaghaṭakadalaprayojanam	svatas tu aGawaka dala prayojanam
   anumānādigrāhyatvena siddhasādhanavāraṇāya yāvaditi/ 'idaṃ	anumAna Adi grAhya tvena sidDa sADana vAraNAya yAvat iti/ aidam
   jñānaṃ apramā' iti jñānena prāmāṇyāgrahāt bādhavāraṇāya	jQAnam apramAa iti jQAnena prAmANya agrahAt bADa vAraNAya
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi/ 'idaṃ jñānaṃ apramā'	aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti/ aidam jQAnam apramA a
   ityanuvyavasāyaniṣṭhaprāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpi	iti anuvyavasAya nizWa prAmANya grAhakasya api
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhakatvābhāvāt svatastvaṃ na syāt ataḥ taditi/ tasmin	aprAmANya agrAhaka tva aBAvAt svatas tvam na syAt atas tat iti/ tasmin
   grāhyaprāmāṇyāśraye aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketyarthaḥ/ udāhṛtasthale	grAhya prAmANya ASraye aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti arTaH/ udAhRta sTale
   vyavasāye 'prāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpyanuvyavasāye tadagrāhakatvāt	vyavasAye aprAmANya grAhakasya api anuvyavasAye tad agrAhaka tvAt 
   svatastvasiddhiḥ/	svatas tu asidDiH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   yāvattvaviśeṣaṇe	yAvat tva viSezaNe
   satyeva agrāhakāntaṃ sārthakamityabhipretya prathamatastasyaiva prayojanaṃ	sati eva agrAhaka antam sArTakam iti aBipretya praTamatas tasya eva prayojanam
   darśayati   anumāneti/ prāmāṇyasyetyādiḥ/ siddhasādhaneti/	darSayati  anumAna iti/ prAmANyasya ityAdiH/ sidDa sADana iti/
   naiyāyikamate 'pi 'idam jñānam pramā samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt'	nEyAyika mate api aidam jQAnam pramA samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt a
   1. prāthamiketi/	1. prATamikA iti/
   prāthamikaṃ yat jñānaviṣayakajñānaṃ tadviṣayatvamityarthaḥ/	prATamikam yat jQAna vizaya ka jQAnam tat vizaya tvam iti arTaH/
   ityanumānena	iti anumAnena
   'idam jñānam pramā' ityāptavākyena ca grāhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	aidam jQAnam pramAa iti Apta vAkyena ca grAhya tvAt iti BAvaH/
   naiyāyikamate 'pi niṣedhe sādhye bādhavāraṇāyetyapi bodhyam/	nEyAyika mate api nizeDe sADye bADa vAraNAya iti api boDyam/
   yāvaditīti/ nanu sāmagryāṃ yāvattvaviśeṣaṇamayuktam,	yAvat iti iti/ nanu sAmagryAm yAvat tva viSezaNam ayuktam ,
   yāvatsāmagrījanyagrahāprasiddheḥ/ na hi sarvābhiḥ jñānasāmagrībhiḥ ekaṃ	yAvat sAmagrI janya graha aprasidDeH/ na hi sarvABiH jQAna sAmagrIBiH ekam
   jñānaṃ janyate/ na ca yāvatīḥ sāmagīḥ viśiṣyopādāya	jQAnam janyate/ na ca yAvatIH sAma gIH viSizya upAdAya
   tattajjanyagrahaviṣayatvaṃ sādhyata iti vācyam/	tad tad janya graha vizaya tvam sADyate iti vAcyam/
   anuvyavavāyādisāmagrīṇāṃ tādrūpyeṇa niveśe	anuvyavavAya Adi sAmagrINAm tAdrUpyeNa niveSe
   matatrayasādhāraṇyānirvāhāditi cet   na/ yato yāvaditi phalato	mata traya sADAraNya anirvAhAt iti ced  na/ yatas yAvat iti Palato
   grahaviśeṣaṇm/ tathā ca jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyayāvadgrahaviṣayatvamiti	graha viSezaNm/ taTA ca jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya yAvat graha vizaya tvam iti
   phalitam/	Palitam/
   tattaddharmaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahatvavyāpakaviṣayitāpratiyogitvamiti	tad tad Darma prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha tva vyApaka vizayitA pratiyogitvam iti
   niṣkarṣa iti saṅkṣepaḥ/ prāmāṇyāgrahāditi/ vyavasāyaniṣṭhetyādiḥ/	nizkarzaH iti saFkzepaH/ prAmANya agrahAditi/ vyavasAya nizWa ityAdiH/
   prāmāṇyāviṣayīkaraṇādityarthaḥ/ aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketīti/ tathā ca	prAmANya avizayIkaraNAt iti arTaH/ aprAmANyAgrAhaketi iti/ taTA ca
   tādṛśajñānasāmagryāḥ sādhyakoṭyapraviṣṭatvāt tayā	tAdRSa jQAna sAmagryAH sADya kowya pravizwa tvAt tayA
   prāmāṇyasyāgrahaṇe 'pi na bādha iti bhāvaḥ/ anuvyavasāyaniṣṭhetyādi/	prAmANyasya agrahaNe api na bADaH iti BAvaH/ anuvyavasAya nizWA ityAdi/
   tādṛśānuvyavasāyaniṣṭhaṃ	tAdRSa anuvyavasAya nizWam
   yadaprāmāṇyavadviśeṣyakatvaviśiṣṭāprāmāṇyaprakārakatvarūpaprāmāṇyaṃ	yat aprAmANyavat viSezyaka tva viSizwa aprAmANya prakAraka tva rUpa prAmANyam
   tadgrāhakasyetyarthaḥ/ 'sāmānye napuṃsakam' iti napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ/	tad grAhakasya iti arTaH/ asAmAnye napuMsakam a iti napuMsaka nirdeSaH/
   svatastvaṃ na syāditi/ yadā niruktaprāmāṇyasya	svatas tvam na syAt iti/ yadA nirukta prAmANyasya
   pakṣatā, tadā	pakzatA, tadA
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhakaprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmāgryā eva sādhyakoṭau	aprAmANya AgrAhaka prAmANya grAhaka sAma agryAH eva sADya kowO
   niveśanīyatayā tādṛśasāmagryā aprasiddhatvāt tasya svatogrāhyatvaṃ na	niveSanIya tayA tAdRSa sAmagryAH aprasidDa tvAt tasya svatas grAhya tvam na
   sidhyedityarthaḥ/ saptamītatpuruṣamabhipretyāha   tasminniti/ etasyaiva	siDyet iti arTaH/ saptamI tatpuruzam aBipretya Aha  tasmin= iti/ etasya eva
   vivaraṇaṃ grāhyaprāmāṇyāśraya iti/ yādṛśaprāmāṇyaṃ	vivaraNam grAhya prAmANya ASrayaH iti/ yAdRSa prAmANyam
   prakṛtānumitavuddheśyaṃ	prakRta anumita vudDeSyam
   tādṛśaprāmāṇyāśrayaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānājanaketi	tAdRSa prAmANya ASraya viSezyakA prAmANya prakAraka jQAna ajanaka iti
   agrāhakāntārthaḥ/ idaṃ jñānaṃ apramā	agrAha kAnta arTaH/ idam jQAnam apramA
   ityanuvyavasāyaniṣṭhaprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryāḥ	iti anuvyavasAya nizWa prAmANya grAhaka sAmagryAH
   vyavasāyaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyagrahajanakatve 'pi	vyavasAya viSezyakA prAmANya graha janaka tve api
   anuvyavasāyaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyagrahājanakatvāt jñānagrāhakatvācca	anu vyavasAya viSezyakA prAmANya grahA janaka tvAt jQAna grAhaka tvAt ca
   aprāmāṇyavadviśeṣyakatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyasya svatogrāhyatvasiddhirityāha	aprAmANya vat viSezyaka tva Adi Gawita prAmANyasya svatas grAhya tva sidDiH iti Aha
     udāhṛtasthala iti/ idaṃ jñānaṃ aprametyatretyarthaḥ/ adhikaṃ	 udAhRta sTalaH iti/ idam jQAnam apramA iti atra iti arTaH/ aDikam
   asmadīyamaṇidīdhitivyākhyāyāmanusandheyam/	asmadIya maNi dIDiti vyAKyAyAm anusanDeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhakayāvajjñānagrahakasāmagrīgrāhyatvaṃ svatastvam	tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka yAvat jQAna grahaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam svatas tvam
   iti dīpikāyāmuktam/ tasmin aprāmāṇyāgrāhikā yāvatī	iti dIpikAyAm uktam/ tasmin aprAmANya agrAhikA yAvatI
   jñānagrāhikā sāmagrī tajjanyagrahaviṣayatvamiti tadarthaḥ/	jQAna grAhikA sAmagrI tad janya graha vizaya tvam iti tad arTaH/
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketyasya aprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānājanaketyarthaḥ/	aprAmANya agrAhaka iti asya aprAmANya prakAraka jQAna ajanaka iti arTaH/
   tadekadeśajñāne tasminniti saptamyantārthasya tadviśeṣyakatvasyānvayaḥ/	tad eka deSa jQAne tasmin= iti saptamI anta arTasya tat viSezyaka tvasya anvayaH/
   tacchabdena	tad Sabdena
   yādṛśaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ	yAdRSam prAmANyam
   anumityā grāhyaṃ tādṛśaprāmāṇyāśraya ucyate/ tathā ca	anumityA grAhyam tAdRSa prAmANya ASrayaH ucyate/ taTA ca
   grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyaprākarakajñānājanakajñānaviṣayakajñānajanakayāvatsāmagrījanyajñānaviṣayatvaṃ	grAhya prAmANya ASraya viSezyakA prAmANya prAkaraka jQAna ajanaka jQAna vizaya ka jQAna janaka yAvat sAmagrI janya jQAna vizaya tvam
   svatastvamiti paryavasannam/ ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ ityākārakajñāne idaṃ jñānaṃ	svatas tvam iti paryavasan= am/ ayam GawaH iti AkAraka jQAne idam jQAnam
   pramā samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt ityanumityā grāhyaṃ yat ghaṭatvavati	pramA samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt iti anumityA grAhyam yat Gawatvavati
   ghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpaṃ pramātvaṃ asti tadāśrayaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñānam,	Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpam pramAtvam asti tad ASrayaH ayam GawaH iti jQAnam,
   tadviśeṣyakaṃ yat apramātvaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ idaṃ jñānamaprametyākārakaṃ	tad viSezyakam yat apramAtva prakArakam jQAnam idam jQAnam aprametyAkArakam
   tadajanikā bhavati ghaṭajñānaviṣayakajñānajanikā sāmagrī, na hi tayā	tad ajanikA Bavati Gawa jQAna vizaya ka jQAna janikA sAmagrI, na hi tayA
   ghaṭajñānaviśeṣyakāpramātvajñānaṃ jāyata iti/ tādṛśasāmagrījanyaṃ	Gawa jQAna viSezyaka apramAtva jQAnam jAyate iti/ tAdRSa sAmagrI janyam
   jñānaṃ ca jñānaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ pūrvoktarītyā	jQAnam ca jQAna vizayakam jQAnam pUrva ukta rItyA
   vyavasāya anuvyavasāya anumityātmakaṃ matabhedena, tadviṣayatvaṃ	vyavasAya  anu vyavasAya  anum iti Atmakam mata Bedena, tad vizaya tvam
   pramātve 'stīti samanvayaḥ/ atra dalaprayojanakathanāvasare prathamaṃ	pramAtve asti iti samanvayaH/ atra dala prayojana kaTana avasare praTamam
   yāvatpadasya prayojanamuktvā tadanantaraṃ tadaprāmāṇyagrāhaketyasya	yAvat padasya prayojanam uktvA tad anantaram tad aprAmANya grAhaka iti asya
   prayojanamuktaṃ dīpikāyām/ tatra prathamopasthitasya agrāhakāntasya	prayojanam uktam dIpikAyAm/ tatra praTama upasTitasya agrAhaka antasya
   prathamaṃ prayojanamuktvā tadanantaramevānantaropasthitasya yāvatpadasya	praTamam prayojanam uktvA tad anantaram eva anantara upasTitasya yAvat padasya
   prayojanakathanaṃ nyāyyam/ tatparityajya kimarthaṃ viparyayeṇa	prayojana kaTanam nyAyyam/ tat parityajya kim arTam viparyayeNa
   prayojanamuktamityāśaṅkāyāmāha   yāvatvaviśeṣaṇe satyeveti/	prayojanam uktam iti ASaFkAyAm Aha  yAvatva viSezaNe satyeva iti/
   idaṃ tu dvayorapi viśeṣaṇayoḥ prayojane jñāte satyeva	idam tu dvayoH api viSezaNayoH prayojane jQAte sati eva
   spaṣṭīkartuṃ śakyat iti ādau tayoḥ prayojanaṃ pratipādyate/	spazwIkartum Sakyat iti AdO tayoH prayojanam pratipAdyate/
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi viśeṣaṇānupādāne	aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti viSezaNa anupAdAne
   yāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvaṃ svatastvamiti bhavet/ tathā ca 'idaṃ	yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam svatas tvam iti Bavet/ taTA ca aidam
   jñānaṃ apramā' ityākārakajñānamapi jñānaviṣayakayāvajjñānāntargataṃ	jQAnam apramAa iti AkAraka jQAnam api jQAna vizaya ka yAvat jQAna antargatam
   tadgrāhyatvabhapramātva evāsti, na tu pramātva iti bādhaḥ syāt/	tad grAhya tva BapramAtvaH eva asti, na tu pramAtvaH iti bADaH syAt /
   tadvāraṇāya sāmāgryāṃ aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi viśeṣaṇamupāttam/ idaṃ	tad vAraNAya sAma agryAm aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti viSezaNam upAttam/ idam
   jñānaṃ apramā ityākārako yo jñānagrahaḥ tajjanakasāmagrī	jQAnam apramA iti AkArakaH yaH jQAna grahaH tad janaka sAmagrI
   aprāmāṇyagrāhikaiva bhavet tādṛśagrahasyāprāmāṇyaviṣayakatayā	aprAmANyagrAhikA eva Bavet tAdRSa grahasya aprAmANya vizaya ka tayA
   tādṛśagrahajanakasāmagryāḥ aprāmāṇyagrāhakatvāvaśyambhāvāt/ tathā ca	tAdRSa graha janaka sAmagryAH aprAmANyagrAhaka tva avaSyamBAvAt/ taTA ca
   tādṛśasāmagryāḥ aprāmāṇyāgrāhakatvābhāvāt aprāmāṇyāgrāhikā	tAdRSa sAmagryAH aprAmANya agrAhaka tva aBAvAt aprAmANya AgrAhikA
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrī anuvyavasāyādisāmagryeva	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI anuvyavasAya Adi sAmagrI eva
   tajjanyānuvyavasāyādirūpajñānagrahaviṣayatvaṃ pramātve astīti na bādhaḥ/	tad janyA anuvyavasAya Adi rUpa jQAna graha vizaya tvam pramAtve asti iti na bADaH/
   yāvatpadānupādāne apramātvāgrāhikā yā jñānagrāhakasāmagrī	yAvat pada anupAdAne apramAtvA grAhikA yA jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI
   ityanena idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt	iti anena idam jQAnam pramA samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt 
   ityanumānarūpāṃ idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā ityāptavākyarūpāṃ vā	iti anumAna rUpAm idam jQAnam pramA iti Apta vAkya rUpAm vA
   sāmagrīmupādāya tajjanyānumiti śābdabodharūpayoḥ 'idaṃ jñānaṃ	sAmagrIm upAdAya tad janyA anumiti SAbda boDa rUpayoH aidam jQAnam
   pramā' ityākārakayoḥ jñānagrahayorviṣayatvaṃ pramātve	pramA a iti AkArakayoH jQAna grahayoH vizaya tvam pramAtve
   naiyāyikasyāpyabhimatamiti tatsādhane siddhasādhanaṃ syāditi	nEyAyikasya api aBimatam iti tad sADane sidDa sADanam syAt iti
   tadvāraṇāya yāvatpadam/ tathā sati vyavasāyānuvyavasāyādīnāmapi	tad vAraNAya yAvat padam/ taTA sati vyavasAya anuvyavasAya AdInAm api
   yāvajjñānagrahāntargatatayā tadviṣayatvasya pramātve 'naṅgīkārāt na	yAvat jQAna graha antargata tayA tad vizaya tvasya pramAtve anaFgIkArAt na
   siddhasādhanamiti dvayoḥ dalayoḥ prayojanasthitiḥ/ tatra yāvattvadale	sidDa sADanam iti dvayoH dalayoH prayojana sTitiH/ tatra yAvat tva dale
   satyeva aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi sārthakam/ anyathā	sati eva aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti sArTakam/ anyaTA
   jñānagrahakasāmagrījanyagrahaviṣayatvaṃ svatastvamityuktau na	jQAna grahaka sAmagrI janya graha vizaya tvam svatas tvam iti uktO na
   bādhaprasaktiḥ,	bADa prasaktiH,
   jñānagrahapadena vyavasāyasyānuvyavasāyasya jñātatāliṅgakānumitervā	jQAna graha padena vyavasAyasya anuvyavasAyasya jQAta tA liFgaka anumiteH vA
   grahaṇena tadviṣayatvasya pramātve sambhavāt/ tathā ca bādhāprasaktyā	grahaNena tad vizaya tvasya pramAtve samBavAt/ taTA ca bADA prasaktyA
   tadvāraṇaphalakamagrāhakāntaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt/ yāvatpade sati tu 'idaṃ	tad vAraNa Pala kam agrAha kAntam vyarTam syAt/ yAvat pade sati tu aidam
   jñānaṃ aprāmā' ityākārakagrahasyāpi yāvajjñānagrahāntargatatayā	jQAnam aprAmAa iti AkAraka grahasya api yAvat jQAna graha antargata tayA
   tadviṣayatvaṃ pramātve nāstīti bādhaḥ prasajyate, tadvārakatayā	tad vizaya tvam pramAtve na asti iti bADaH prasajyate, tad vAraka tayA
   cāgrāhakāntaṃ sārthakamityāśayena yāvatvaviśeṣaṇe satyeva	ca AgrAhaka antam sArTakam iti ASayena yAvatva viSezaNe sati eva
   agrāhakāntaṃ sārthakamityuktaṃ pramāśikayāmiti/	agrAhaka antam sArTakam iti uktam pramASikayAm iti/
   niṣedhe sādhye	nizeDe sADye
   bādhavāraṇāyeti/	bADa vAraNAya iti/
   tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhakayāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvābhāvaḥ naiyāyikasya	tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tva aBAvaH nEyAyikasya
   sādhyaḥ/	sADyaH/
   tatra yāvatyapadābhāve	tatra yAvati apada aBAve
   samarthapravṛttijanakatvaliṅgakānumāna āptavākyagrāhyatvāt	samarTa pravRtti janaka tva liFgaka anumAna  Apta vAkya grAhya tvAt
   tadabhāvarūpasādhyābhāvāt bādhaḥ	tad aBAva rUpa sADya aBAvAt bADaH
   tadvāraṇāya	tad vAraNAya
   yāvatpadamiti bhāvaḥ/ abhāvasādhyakasthalepakṣe pratiyogimattvameva bādha	yAvat padam iti BAvaH/ aBAva sADyaka sTalepakze pratiyogimat tvam eva bADa
   ityāśayenedam/ nanu sāmagryāmiti/ yāvatpadasya	iti ASayena idam/ nanu sAmagryAm iti/ yAvat padasya
   sāmagrīpadaviśeṣaṇatve yāvatyaḥ jñānagrahajanakasāmagryaḥ	sAmagrI pada viSezaNa tve yAvatyaH jQAna graha janaka sAmagryaH
   tajjanyagrahaviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamiti phalati/ tathā sati yāvatsāmagrījanyaḥ	tad janya graha vizaya tvam sADyam iti Palati/ taTA sati yAvat sAmagrI janyaH
   ekaḥ jñānagrahaḥ aprasiddha iti sādhyāprasiddhiḥ prasajyate/ yataḥ	ekaH jQAna grahaH aprasidDaH iti sADya aprasidDiH prasajyate/ yatas 
   anuvyavasāyajanaka vyavasāyajanaka jñātatāliṅgakānumitijanaka samarthapravṛttiliṅgakānumitijanakasāmagrīṇāṃ	anuvyavasAya janaka vyavasAya jana ka jQAta tA liFgaka anumiti jana ka  samarTa pravRtti liFgaka anumiti janaka sAma grINAm
   sarvāsāmapi pratyekaṃ jñānagrāhakatayā tādṛśayāvatsāmagrījanyaḥ eko	sarvAsAm api pratyekam jQAna grAhaka tayA tAdRSa yAvat sAmagrI janyaH ekaH 
   jñānagraho na bhavatīti/ sāmagrīṇāṃ yāvatvena na niveśaḥ, api tu	jQAna grahaH na Bavati iti/ sAmagrINAm yAva tvena na niveSaH, api tu
   viśiṣyaiva/ tathā ca	viSizya eva/ taTA ca
   tattajjñānagrahajanakatattatsāmagrījanyatattadgrahaviṣayatvaṃ	tad tad jQAna graha janaka tad tad sAmagrI janya tad tad graha vizaya tvam
   svatastvamiti	svatastvam iti
   pariṣkāreṇa	parizkAreNa
   sādhyāprasiddhivāraṇe 'pi matatrayasādhāraṇyaṃ na nirvahatīti	sADya aprasidDi vAraNe api mata traya sADAraNyam na nirvahati iti
   śaṅkāgranthārthaḥ/	SaFkA granTa arTaH/
   samādhatte   yato	samADatte  yatas 
   yāvaditi/ nanu jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanya yāvadgrahaviṣayatvasya	yAvat iti/ nanu jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya yAvat graha vizaya tvasya
   sādhyatve 'pi	sADya tve api
   paṭajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyayāvadgrahānatargatapaṭajñānajñānena	pawa jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya yAvat grahAn atargata pawa jQAna jQAnena
   ghaṭatvaghaṭitaprāmāṇyasyāgrahāt bādho durvāra ityāśaṅkya	Gawa tva Gawita prAmANyasya agrahAt bADaH durvAraH iti ASaFkya
   jñānagrāhaketyatra jñāne taddharmaprakārakatvaviśeṣaṇāt na doṣa iti	jQAna grAhaka iti atra jQAne tad Darma prakAraka tva viSezaNAt na dozaH iti
   samādhānaṃ vivakṣuḥ yāvatpadasya	samADAnam vivakzuH yAvat padasya
   svasamabhivyāhṛtapadārthatāvacchedakavyāpakatvabodhakatvavyutpattimapyabhisandhāya	sva samaBivyAhRta padArTa tAvacCedaka vyApaka tva boDaka tva vyutpattim api aBisanDAya
   phalitārthamāha   tattaddharmeti/ yaddharmaghaṭitaprāmāṇyaṃ pakṣaḥ	Palita arTam Aha  tad tad Darma iti/ yat Darma Gawita prAmANyam pakzaH
   taddharmaprakāretyarthaḥ/ tathā ca	tad Darma prakAra iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakārakatvaṃ	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakAraka tvam
   ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahatvavyāpakaviṣayitānirūpakamiti	Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha tva vyApaka vizayitAnirUpakam iti
   pratijñāvākyam/ ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānam ayaṃ ghaṭa ityākārakajñānaṃ	pratijQA vAkyam/ Gawa tva prakAraka jQAnam ayam GawaH iti AkAraka jQAnam
   tadviṣayakajñānajanakasāmagrī anuvyavasāyādisāmagrī tajjanyagrahatvaṃ	tad vizayaka jQAna janaka sAmagrI anuvyavasAya Adi sAmagrI tad janya graha tvam
   yatra	yatra
   yatra anuvyavasāyādau tatra	yatra anuvyavasAya AdO tatra
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakaghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpapramātvanirūpitaviṣay itāsti,	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpa pramAtu a nirUpita vizai itAsti,
   tādṛśaviṣayitānirūpakatvaṃ ca pramātve 'stīti samanvayaḥ/	tAdRSa vizayitA nirUpaka tvam ca pramAtve asti iti samanvayaH/
   nanu naiyāyikamate 'pi	nanu nEyAyika mate api
   prāmāṇyanirūpitaviṣayitāyāḥ	prAmANya nirUpita vizayitAyAH
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvanirūpitaprakāritātvena	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva nirUpita prakArita Atvena
   tādṛśagrahatvavyāpakatvābhāve 'pi ghaṭatvanirūpitaprākāritātvena	tAdRSa graha tva vyApaka tva aBAve api Gawa tva nirUpita prAkAritAtvena
   anuvyavasāyādisāmagrījanyagrahatvavyāpakatvāt siddhasādhanam/	anuvyavasAya Adi sAmagrI janya graha tva vyApaka tvAt sidDa sADanam/
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvanirūpitaprakāritātvena	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva nirUpita prakArita Atvena
   prāmāṇyaviṣayitāyāḥ vyāpakatvaṃ tu na vivakṣituṃ śakyam/	prAmANya vizayitAyAH vyApaka tvam tu na vivakzitum Sakyam/
   naiyāyikamate sādhyāprasiddheḥ/ 'ghaṭatvena imaṃ jānāmi'	nEyAyika mate sADya aprasidDeH/ aGawa tvena imam jAnAmi a
   ityākārakānuvyavasāye ghaṭatvanirūpitaprakāritātvenaiva	iti AkAraka anu vyavasAye Gawa tva nirUpita prakArita Atvena eva
   tādṛśaprakāritāyāḥ bhānāt na tu	tAdRSa prakAritAyAH BAnAt na tu
   ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakāritātvenetya śaṅkyāha  	Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakArita Atvena itya SaFkyA Aha  
   saṅkṣepa iti/	saFkzepaH iti/
   atra ghaṭatvavati	atra Gawatvavati
   ghaṭatvaprakārakatvaṃ	Gawa tva prakAraka tvam
   ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahaniṣṭhābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakadharmavadviṣayitānirūpakamiti	Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha nizWA aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka Darma vat vizayitAnirUpakam iti
   pratijñā na vivakṣitā, yenoktadoṣaḥ syāt/ apitu	pratijQA na vivakzitA, yena ukta dozaH syAt/ apitu
   ghaṭatvaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahaniṣṭhābhāvapratiyogitā,	Gawa tva prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha nizWA aBAva pratiyogitA,
   ghaṭatvavadbiśeṣyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpaprāmāṇyaviṣayakatvatvānavacchinnā	Gawa tva vat biSezyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpa prAmANya vizaya ka tva tvAnavacCinnA
   iti pratijñā vivakṣitā/ ato na sādhyāprasiddhyādikamiti bhāvaḥ/	iti pratijQA vivakzitA/ atas na sADya aprasidDi Adikam iti BAvaH/
   adhikaṃ prāmāṇyavādagādādharyāṃ draṣṭavyam/	aDikam prAmANya vAda gAdADaryAm drazwavyam/
   dīpikāyām idaṃ	dIpikAyAm idam
   jñānamaprameti jñāneneti/ tathā ca aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi	jQAnam apramA iti jQAnena iti/ taTA ca aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti
   sāmagrīviśeṣaṇānupādāne	sAmagrI viSezaNa anupAdAne
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanayayāvadgrahaviṣayatvaṃ svatastvamiti syāt/ tathā	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janayayA vat graha vizaya tvam svatas tvam iti syAt/ taTA
   sati rajate idaṃ rajatamiti vyavasāyānantaraṃ yat idaṃ	sati rajate idam rajatam iti vyavasAya anantaram yat idam
   jñānamaprameti bhramātmakaṃ jñānaṃ tasya jñānagraharūpatayā	jQAnam apramA iti Brama Atmakam jQAnam tasya jQAna graha rUpa tayA
   tajjanakasāmagrījanyayāvadgrahāntargatatādṛśajñānaviṣayatvamapramātva	tad janaka sAmagrI janya yAvat graha antargata tA dRSa jQAna vizaya tvam apramAtva
   evāsti na tu pramātvarūpapakṣa iti bādhaḥ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya	eva asti na tu pramAtva rUpa pakzaH iti bADaH syAt/ tad vAraNAya
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketiviśeṣaṇam/ apramātvagrāhājanaketi tadarthaḥ/	aprAmANya agrAhaka iti viSezaNam/ apramAtva grAha ajanaka iti tad arTaH/
   niruktajñānagrahasya apramātvaviṣayakatvena apramātvagraharūpatayā	nirukta jQAna grahasya apramAtva vizayaka tvena apramAtu a graha rUpa tayA
   niruktajñānagrahajanakasāmagryāḥ apramātvagrahajanakatvāt tadajanakatvaṃ	nirukta jQAna graha janaka sAmagryAH apramAtu a graha janaka tvAt tat ajanaka tvam
   nāstīti jñānagrahapadena 'idaṃ jñānamapramā' ityākārako jñānagraho	na asti iti jQAna graha padena aidam jQAnam apramAa iti AkArakaH jQAna grahaH 
   na grāhyaḥ, api tu 'rajatatvena imaṃ jānāmi'	na grAhyaH, api tu arajata tvena imam jAnAmi a
   ityanuvyavasāyādireva grāhyaḥ tajjanakasāmagryāḥ aprāmāṇyagrāhakatvāt	iti anuvyavasAya AdiH eva grAhyaH tad janaka sAmagryAH aprAmANya grAhaka tvAt 
   tajjanyānuvyavasāyādyātmakagrahaviṣayatvaṃ pramātve 'stīti na bādha iti	tad janyA anuvyavasAya Adi Atmaka graha vizaya tvam pramAtve asti iti na bADaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   prakāśikāyām	prakASikAyAm
   vyavasāyaniṣṭhetyādiriti/ idaṃ rajatam ityākārakavyasāyaniṣṭhaṃ	vyavasAya nizWA iti AdiH iti/ idam rajatam iti AkAra kavyasAya nizWam
   yat pramātvaṃ rajatatvavati rajatatvaprakārakatvarūpaṃ	yat pramAtvam rajatatvavati rajata tva prakAraka tva rUpam
   tadaviṣayakatvādityarthaṃḥ/ tathā ca pramātve	tad avizayaka tvAt iti arTaMH/ taTA ca pramAtve
   yāvadantargatatādṛśajñānāviṣayatvāt bādha iti bhāvaḥ/	yAvat antargata tA dRSa jQAna avizaya tvAt bADaH iti BAvaH/
   tādṛśajñānasāmagryā iti/ idaṃ jñānaṃ apramā	tAdRSa jQAna sAmagryAH iti/ idam jQAnam apramA
   ityākārakajñānajanakasāmagryā ityarthaḥ/	iti AkAraka jQAna janaka sAmagryAH iti arTaH/
   sādhyakoṭyapraviṣṭatvāditi/ apramātvagrāhakatvena	sADya kowya pravizwa tvAt iti/ apramAtu a grAhaka tvena
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhakatvarūpaviśeṣaṇānākrāntatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	aprAmANya AgrAhaka tva rUpa viSezaNa anAkrAnta tvAt iti BAvaH/
   tadaprāmāṇyagrāhaketyatra	tad aprAmANya grAhaka iti atra
   tatpadasya dīpikoktaṃ prayojanamevam   idaṃ	tad padasya dIpikA uktam prayojanam evam  idam
   rajatamitibhramātmakavyavasāyottara idaṃ	rajata miti Brama Atmaka vyavasAya uttara  idam
   jñānam apramā	jQAnam apramA
   ityāvakārakajñānaniṣṭhasya apramātvavati apramātvaprakārakajñānatvarūpasya	iti AvakAraka jQAna nizWasya apramAtu avati apramAtva prakAraka jQAna tva rUpasya
   pramātvasya apramātvagrāhakasāmagryaiva grahaṇāt	pramAtu asya apramAtva grAhaka sAmagrya eva grahaNAt 
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvātmakasvatastvabādhaḥ tādṛśapramātve	aprAmANya agrAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tva AtmakasvatastvabADaH tAdRSa pramAtve
   syāditi tadvāraṇāya tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhaketi tatpadam/	syAt iti tad vAraNAya tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti tat padam/
   tasmin	tasmin
   aprāmāṇyagrāhaketi tadarthaḥ/ yādṛśapramātve svatastvamiṣyate	aprAmANya grAhaka iti tad arTaH/ yAdRSa pramAtve svatas tvam izyate
   tādṛśapramātvāśrayaviśeṣyakāpramātvaprakārakajñānājanaketi	tAdRSa pramAtvA ASraya viSezyaka apramAtva prakAraka jQAna ajanaka iti
   tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhaketyasyārthaḥ/ idaṃ jñānaṃ apramā	tad aprAmANya agrAhaka iti asya arTaH/ idam jQAnam apramA
   ityākārakajñānaniṣṭhapramātvagrāhakasāmagryāḥ idañjñānapadena	iti AkAraka jQAna nizWa pramAtva grAhaka sAmagryAH idan jQAna padena
   vivakṣitaṃ yat idaṃ rajatam ityākārakajñānaṃ	vivakzitam yat idam rajatam iti AkAraka jQAnam
   tadviśeṣyakāpramātvagrāhakatve 'pi prakṛtasyāpramātvavati	tad viSezyaka apramAtu a grAhaka tve api prakRtasya apramAtvavati
   apramātvaprakārakatvarūpapramātvasya āśrayabhūtaṃ yat idaṃ jñānaṃ	apramAtva prakAraka tva rUpa pramAtvasya ASraya BUtam yat idam jQAnam
   aprametyākārakajñānaṃ tadviśeṣyakāpramātvaprakārakajñānajanakatvāt	apramA iti AkAraka jQAnam tad viSezyaka apramAtva prakAraka jQAna janaka tvAt 
   noktadoṣa iti/ idaṃ jñānaṃ aprametyanuvyavasāyaniṣṭheti/	na ukta dozaH iti/ idam jQAnam apramA iti anuvyavasAya nizWA iti/
   jñānaviṣayakatvādasya jñānasyānuvyavasāyaśabdena vyapadeśaḥ/ ataḥ	jQAna vizayaka tvAt asya jQAnasya anuvyavasAya Sabdena vyapadeSaH/ atas 
   jānāmītyādyākārakatāvirahāt kathamasyānuvyavasāyatvamiti	jAnAmi ityAdi AkAraka tA virahAt kaTam asya anuvyavasAya tvam iti
   nāśaṅkanīyam/	na aSaFkanIyam/
   nanu	nanu
   viśeṣyabhūtasāmagrīpadānusāreṇa prāmāṇyagrāhikāyā apīti vaktavye	viSezya BUta sAmagrI pada anusAreNa prAmANyagrAhikAyAH api iti vaktavye
   kathaṃ prāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpītyuktaṃ dīpikāyām ityāśaṅkyāha  	kaTam prAmANya grAhakasya api iti uktam dIpikAyAm iti ASaFkya Aha  
   sāmānye naṃpusakamiti/ (grāhakatvarūpa) sāmānyadharmāśrayavivakṣayā	sAmAnye naMpusaka m iti/ (grAhaka tva rUpa) sAmAnya Darma ASraya vivakzayA
   tadāśrayaviśeṣāvivakṣāyāṃ napuṃsakamityanuśāsanāt atra	tad ASraya viSeza avivakzAyAm napuMsakam iti anuSAsanAt atra
   napuṃsakatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ niruktaprāmāṇyasyeti/	napuMsaka tvam iti BAvaH/ nirukta prAmANyasya iti/
   aprāmāṇyavadviśeṣyakatvaviśiṣṭāprāmāṇyaprakārakatvarūpaprāmāṇyasyetyarthaḥ/	aprAmANyavat viSezyaka tva viSizwa aprAmANya prakAraka tva rUpa prAmANyasya iti arTaH/
   tasyeti/ niruktaprāmāṇyasyetyarthaḥ/ na sidhyediti/ tathā ca bādha iti	tasya iti/ nirukta prAmANyasya iti arTaH/ na siDyet iti/ taTA ca bADaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ svatogrāhyatvasiddhiriti/ tādṛśaprāmāṇyāśrayabhūtaḥ yaḥ idaṃ	BAvaH/ svatas grAhya tva sidDiH iti/ tAdRSa prAmANya ASraya BUtaH yaH idam
   jñānaṃ aprametyākārakānuvyavasāyaḥ tadviṣayakajñānajanakasāmagryāḥ	jQAnam apramA iti AkAraka anuvyavasAyaH tad vizayaka jQAna janaka sAmagryAH
   svāśrayatādṛśānuvyavasāyaviśeṣyakaprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānājanakatayā	sva ASraya tAdRSa anuvyavasAya viSezyaka prAmANi aprakAraka jQAna ajanakatayA
   tādṛśasāmagryāḥ prasiddhatvāt	tAdRSa sAmagryAH prasidDa tvAt 
   tajjanyānuvyavasāyaviṣayakajñānaviṣayatvasya anuvyavasāyaniṣṭhapramātve	tad janyA anuvyavasAya vizaya ka jQAna vizaya tvasya anuvyavasAya nizWa pramAtve
   satvāt na bādha iti bhāvaḥ//	satvAt na bADaH iti BAvaH//
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   prāmāṇyajñaptivādapūrvapakṣaḥ	prAmANyajQapti vAda pUrva pakzaH
   nanu svata eva	nanu svatas eva
   prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyate, 'ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmi' ityanuvyavasāyena	prAmANyam gRhyate, aGawam aham jAnAmia iti anuvyavasAyena
   ghaṭaghaṭatvayoriva tatsambanadhasyāpi viṣayīkaraṇāt	Gawa Gawa tvayoH iva tad sambana Dasya api vizayIkaraNAt 
   vyavasāyarūpapratyāsattestulyatvāt/ purovartini prakārasambandhasyaiva	vyavasAya rUpa pratyAsatteH tulya tva at/ purovartini prakAra sambanDasya eva
   pramātvapadārthatvāditi cet   	pramAtva padArTa tvAt iti cet   
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   itthaṃ	itTam
   vipratipattimupanyasya mīmāṃsakamatamupanyasyati   nanviti/ svata	vipratipattim upanyasya mImAMsaka matam upanyasyati  nanu iti/ svata
   evetyādi/ ghaṭatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyaṃ niruktasāmagrīta eva gṛhyata	eva ityAdi/ Gawa tva Adi Gawita prAmANyam nirukta sAma grItaH eva gRhyata
   ityarthaḥ/ apyarthakenaivakāreṇa anumānādiparigrahaḥ/	iti arTaH/ api arTakena evakAreNa anumAna Adi parigrahaH/
   anuvyavasāyeneti/ idaṃ ca miśramatābhiprāyeṇa/ matatrayasādhāraṇyena	anuvyavasAyena iti/ idam ca miSra mata aBiprAyeNa/ mata traya sADAraNyena
   tu prāthamikajñānagraheṇeti dhyeyam/ tatsambandhasyāpīti/	tu prATamika jQAna graheNa iti Dyeyam/ tad sambanDasya api iti/
   ghaṭaghaṭatvayoḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ tasyāpītyarthaḥ/ nanu anuvyavasāye kathaṃ	Gawa Gawa tvayoH yaH sambanDaH tasya api iti arTaH/ nanu anu vyavasAye kaTam
   sambandhasya bhānamityāśaṅkya yathā ghaṭaghaṭatvayoḥ	sambanDasya BAnam iti ASaFkya yaTA Gawa Gawa tvayoH
   vyavasāyarūpapratyāsattyā bhānam tathā tatsambandhasyāpi,	vyavasAya rUpa pratyAsattyA BAnam taTA tad sambanDasya api,
   vyavasāyarūpapratyāsatteraviśeṣādityāha   vyavasāyeti/ tāvatā kathaṃ	vyavasAya rUpa pratyAsatteH aviSezAt iti Aha  vyavasAya iti/ tAvatA kaTam
   prāmāṇyasya bhānamata āha   purovartini prakārasambandhasyaiveti/	prAmANyasya BAnam atas Aha  purovartini prakAra sambanDasya eva iti/
   purovartini yaḥ prakārasambandhaḥ tadghaṭitasyaivetyarthaḥ/	puras vartini yaH prakAra sambanDaH tad Gawitasya eva iti arTaH/
   ayamāśayaḥ   naiyāyikā	ayam ASayaH  nEyAyikA
   api anuvyavasāye viśeṣyatvaprakāratvayorbhānamaṅgīkurvanti,	api anuvyavasAye viSezya tva prakAra tvayoH BAnam aFgIkurvanti,
   purovartinaṃ ghaṭatvena jānāmītyākārakasyaiva anuvyavasāyasya	puras vartinam Gawa tvena jAnAmi iti AkArakasya eva anuvyavasAyasya
   tairaṅgīkārāt/ parantu purovartini ghaṭādau	tEraFgIkArAt/ parantu purovartini Gawa AdO
   ghaṭatvādirūpaprakārasambandhabhānaṃnāṅgīkurvanti/ atastatra	Gawa tva Adi rUpa prakAra sambanDa BAnaMna aFgIkurvanti/ atas tatra
   prakārasambandhabhānasya vyavasthāpane kimapi nāvaśiṣṭamiti prāmāṇyasya	prakAra sambanDa BAnasya vyavasTApane kim api na avaSizwam iti prAmANyasya
   bhānaṃ sidhyati, anupasthitayorapi viśeṣyatvaprakāratvayorbhānasya	BAnam siDyati, anupasTitayoH api viSezya tva prakAra tvayoH BAnasya
   sarvasaṃmatatvāditi/	sarva saMmata tvAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   ghaṭatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyamiti/	Gawa tva Adi Gawita prAmANyam iti/
   ghaṭatvavadviśeśyakatvāvacchinnaghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ	Gawa tva vat viSeSyaka tva avacCinna Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpam prAmANyam
   tadāśrayajñānagrāhakasāmagryaiva gṛhyata ityarthaḥ/ ayaṃ ghaṭa	tad ASraya jQAna grAhaka sAmagrya eva gRhyate iti arTaH/ ayam Gawa
   ityākārakavyavasāyaviṣayakaṃ yat jñānaṃ ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyākārakaṃ	iti AkAraka vyavasAya vizayakam yat jQAnam Gawam aham jAnAmi iti AkArakam
   tasmin ahamarthaḥ ātmā jñānaṃ ca ātmamanassaṃyogena	tasmin aham arTaH AtmA jQAnam ca Atma manassaMyogena
   manassaṃyuktasamavāyena ca bhāsete iti tadaṃśe laukikatvam/	manassaMyukta samavAyena ca BAsete iti tad aMSe lOkika tvam/
   ghaṭaghaṭatvayostu jñānalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā bhānam/	Gawa Gawa tvayoH tu jQAna lakzaNayA pratyAsattyAH BAnam/
   tādṛśānuvyavasāyāt pūrvaṃ ayaṃ ghaṭa ityākārakavyavasāyasya	tAdRSa anuvyavasAyAt pUrvam ayam GawaH iti AkAraka vyavasAyasya
   sattvāt vyavasāyasya ghaṭaghaṭatvobhayaviṣayakatvāt/ tathā ca	sattvAt vyavasAyasya Gawa Gawa tva uBaya vizayaka tvAt/ taTA ca
   ghaṭaghaṭatvaviṣayakavyavasāyātmakajñānalakṣaṇasannikarṣeṃṇa yathā vā	Gawa Gawa tva vizaya kavya vasAya Atmaka jQAna lakzaNa sannikarzeMNa yaTA vA
   'ghaṭamahaṃ	aGawam aham
   jānāmi' ityanuvyavasāye ghaṭaghaṭatvayorbhānam,	jAnAmia iti anuvyavasAye Gawa Gawa tvayoH BAnam,
   tathaiva ghaṭaghaṭatvayoḥ	taTA eva Gawa Gawa tvayoH
   yaḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyarūpaḥ tasyāpi bhānamāvaśyakam/ vyavasāye tasyāpi	yaH sambanDaH samavAya rUpaH tasya api BAnam AvaSya kam/ vyavasAye tasya api
   bhānena vyavasāyātmakasannikarṣāt tatsambandhabhānasyāvaśyambhāvāt/ na	BAnena vyavasAya Atmaka sannikarzAt tad sambanDa BAnasya avaSyamBAvAt/ na
   ca ghaṭaghaṭatvasambandho bhāsatām, tāvatā pramātvābhānāt	ca Gawa Gawa tva sambanDaH BAsa tAm, tAvatA pramAtvA ABAnAt 
   pramātvasya	pramAtu asya
   jñānaviṣayakagrahaviṣayatvāravyaṃ svatastvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyediti vācyam/	jQAna vizaya ka graha vizaya tva aravyam svatas tvam kaTam siDyet iti vAcyam/
   purovartini prakārasambandhasyaiva pramātvapadārthatvāt	puras vartini prakAra sambanDasya eva pramAtva padArTa tvAt
   sambandhabhānasyaiva pramātvabhānarūpatvāt/ etadeva kathamiti cet  	sambanDa BAnasya eva pramAtu aBAna rUpa tva at/ etat eva kaTam iti ced  
   śrūyatām   jñānasya prāmāṇye viśodhyamāne viṣayatathātva eva	SrUyatAm  jQAnasya prAmANye viSoDyamAne vizaya taTAtvaH eva
   tatparyavasyati/ viṣayo yādṛśadharmavattayā vyavasāye bhāsate	tad paryavasyati/ vizayaH yAdRSa Darmavat tayA vyavasAye BAsate
   tādṛśadharmasambandha eva viṣayasya tathātvam, tadeva ca pramātvamiti	tAdRSa Darma sambanDaH eva vizayasya taTA atvam, tat eva ca pramAtvam iti
   tasyānuvyavasāyena viṣayīkaraṇāt pramātvasya svatogrāhyatvamiti	tasya anuvyavasAyena vizayIkaraNAt pramAtu asya svatA ugrAhya tvam iti
   mīmāṃsakāśayaḥ/ sa eva dīpikāyāṃ prakāśikāyāṃ cānūdita	mImAMsaka ASayaH/ saH eva dIpikAyAm prakASikAyAm ca anUdita
   iti/ yadyapi	iti/ yadi api
   arthantathātvasya viṣayaniṣṭhasya jñānagatapramātvarūpatvaṃ na	arTan taTA tvasya vizaya nizWasya jQAna gata pramAtva rUpa tvam na
   sambhavatīti	samBavati iti
   tadvanniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpakatve sati tanniṣṭhaprakāratāśālijñānatvameva	tadvat nizWa viSezya tA nirUpaka tve sati tad nizWa prakAra tA SAli jQAna tvam eva
   pramātvaṃ vācyamiti śaṅkā avatarati, tathāpi naiyāyikaiḥ	pramAtvam vAcyam iti SaFkA avatarati, taTA api nEyAyikEH
   purovartiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpakatve sati	puras varti nizWa viSezya tA nirUpaka tve sati

   svīkriyate/ tatra viṃśeṣyatāprakāratayoranupasthitayo 'pi bhānam/	svIkriyate/ tatra viMSa izyata aprakAra tayoH anupasTitayaH api BAnam/
   purovartirajatatvayoḥ vyavasāyarūpapratyāsatyā bhānam, purovartini	puras varti rajata tvayoH vyavasAya rUpa pratyAsatyA BAnam, purovartini
   rajatatvavatvaṃ na bhāsate ityaṅgīkriyate/ mīmāṃsakāstu	rajata tvava tvam na BAsate iti aFgIkriyate/ mImAMsakAH tu
   vyavasāyarūpapratyāsattisāmyāt rajatatvavatvamapi bhāsata iti nirūpya	vyavasAya rUpa pratyAsatti sAmyAt rajatatvavatvam api BAsate iti nirUpya
   tadghaṭitapramātvaṃ anuvyavasāyena viṣayīkriyata iti nirūpayantīti	tad Gawita pramAtvam anuvyavasAyena vizayIkriyate iti nirUpayanti iti
   viśeṣaḥ/ purovartinaṃ ghaṭatvena jānāmītyākārakasyeti/	viSezaH/ purovartinam Gawa tvena jAnAmi iti AkArakasya iti/
   purovartiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpakaghaṭatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakajñānavānahamityarthaḥ/	puras varti nizWa viSezya tA nirUpaka Gawa tva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka jQAnavAn aham iti arTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   prāmāṇyajñaptivādasiddhāntaḥ	prAmANyajQaptivAda sidDAntaH
   svataḥprāmāṇyagrahe	svatas prAmANya grahe

   anuvyavasāyena prāmāṇyasya niścitatvāt/ tasmāt	anuvyavasAyena prAmANyasya niScita tvAt/ tasmAt

   jalajñānānantaraṃ pravṛttau satyāṃ jalalābhe sati pūrvotpannaṃ jalajñānaṃ	jala jQAna anantaram pravRttO satyAm jala lABe sati pUrva utpannam jala jQAnam
   pramā samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ, yathā apramā iti	pramA samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt yat na evam tat na evaM, yaTA apramA iti

   gṛhyate//	gRhyate//
   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   prāthamikajalajñānagrahottaradaśāyām/ anubhavasiddhaḥ pramātvasaṃśayo na	prATamika jala jQAna graha uttara daSa AyAm/ anuBava sidDaH pramAtu a saMSayaH na
   syādityarthaḥ/ niścitatvāditi/ tadvattāniścayasya tadabhāvavattājñānaṃ	syAt iti arTaH/ niScita tvAt iti/ tadvat tA niScayasya tad aBAvavat tA jQAnam
   prati pratibandhakatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ atra 'jñāto ghaṭa' iti pratīteḥ	prati pratibanDaka tvAt iti BAvaH/ atra ajQAtaH Gawa a iti pratIteH
   jñānaviṣayatāviṣayakatvakalpanenaiva nirvāhe atiriktajñātatā na	jQAna vizaya tA vizayaka tva kalpanena eva nirvAhe atirikta jQAta tA na
   kalpanīyā gauravāt mānābhāvācca iti tannirasanaprakāro	kalpanIyA gOravAt mAna aBAvAt ca iti tad nirasana prakAraH 
   bodhyaḥ/ tasmāditi/	boDyaH/ tasmAt iti/

   svatogrāhyatvābhāve 'nvayaḥ/ paratīgrāhyatvamiti/ prāmāṇyasyānumānāditi	svatas grAhya tva aBAve anvayaH/ paratI grAhya tvam iti/ prAmANyasya anumAnAt iti
   eva grāhyatvamityarthaḥ/ pravṛttau satyāmiti/	eva grAhya tvam iti arTaH/ pravRttO satyAm iti/
   etena	etena
   mīmāṃsakairabhyupagatāyāṃ prāmāṇyaniścayasya pravṛttihetutāyāṃ	mImAMsakEH aByupagatAyAm prAmANya niScayasya pravRtti hetu tAyAm
   vyabhicāro darśitaḥ/ na ca niṣkampapravṛttāveva prāmaṇyaniścasya	vyaBicAraH darSitaH/ na ca nizkampa pravRttO= eva prAmaNya niScasya
   hetutā, sakampapravṛttau tu pramāṇyasaṃśayasya, niṣkampatvaṃ sakampatvaṃ	hetutA, sa kampa pravRttO tu pramANi asaMSayasya, nizkampa tvam sa kampa tvam
   ca	ca
   viṣayitāviśeṣaḥ evaṃ ca tatra sakampapravṛttyaṅgīkāre 'pi	vizayitA viSezaH evam ca tatra sa kampa pravRtti aFgIkAre api
   prāmāṇyaniścayasya hetutāyāṃ kathaṃ vyabhicāra iti vācyam, tathāpi	prAmANya niScayasya hetutAyAm kaTam vyaBicAraH iti vAcyam, taTA api
   yatra prāmāṇyasyāprāmāṇyasya vā jñānaṃ nāsīt, āsīcca	yatra prAmANyasya aprAmANyasya vA jQAnam na AsIt, AsIt ca
   kevalajalādijñānaṃ tatra pravṛttipradarśanena prāmāṇyasaṃśayahetutāyāṃ	kevala jala Adi jQAnam tatra pravRtti pradarSanena prAmANya saMSaya hetutAyAm
   vyabhicārasya durvāratvāt/ na caivaṃ jalādijñāne aprāmāṇyaniścakāle	vyaBicArasya durvAra tvAt/ na ca evam jala Adi jQAne aprAmANya niScakAle
   pravṛttiḥsyāditi śaṅkanīyam/ agṛhītāprāmāṇyakajalādijñānatvena,	pravRttiHsyAt iti SaFkanIyam/ agRhIta aprAmANyaka jala Adi jQAna tvena,
   taddhetutāsvīkāreṇa adoṣāditi saṅkṣepaḥ/ jalalābhe satīti/	tad hetu tA svIkAreNa adozAt iti saFkzepaH/ jala lABe sati iti/
   etāvatā vakṣyamāṇasya prāmāṇyavyavasthāpakahetoḥ svarūpāsiddhiśaṅkā	etAvatA vakzyamANasya prAmANya vyavasTApaka hetoH svarUpA sidDi SaFkA
   nirākṛtā/ idānīṃ pakṣasyāsattvādāha   pūrvotpannamiti/ samartheti/	nirAkRtA/ idAnIm pakzasya asattvAt Aha  pUrva utpannamiti/ samarTa iti/
   tadvadviśeṣyakatatprakāraketyarthaḥ/ anvayyudāharaṇāsambhavāt	tadvat viSezyaka tad prakAraka iti arTaH/ anvayyudAharaNa asamBavAt
   vyatirekyudāharaṇaṃ sadṛṣṭāntamāha   yannaivaṃ tannaivamiti/ yadapramā	vyatireki udAharaNam sa dRzwAntam Aha  yat na evam tat na evam iti/ yat apramA
   tatsamarthapravṛtyajanakamityarthaḥ/ vyatirekiṇā   vyatirekavyāptimatā/	tat samarTa pravRtya janakam iti arTaH/ vyatirekiNA  vyatireka vyAptimatA/
   niścīyate   anumīyate/ dvitīyādijñāneṣu   dvitīyādijalajñāneṣu/	niScIyate  anumIyate/ dvitIya Adi jQAnezu  dvitIya Adi jala jQAna izu/
   tatsajātīyatvaliṅgena   pūrvajñānasajātīyatvarūpaliṅgena/	tad sa jAtIya tva liFgena  pUrva jQAna sajAtIya tva rUpa liFgena/
   samarthapravṛttijanakatveneti yāvat/ gṛhyata iti/ prāmāṇyamanumīyata	samarTa pravRtti janaka tvena iti yAvat/ gRhyate iti/ prAmANyam anumIyata
   ityarthaḥ/	iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   prāthamikajalajñānagrahottaradaśāyāmiti/ prāthamikaṃ yat	prATamika jala jQAna graha uttara daSAyAmiti/ prATamikam yat 
   jalajñānaṃ tadviṣayako yo grahaḥ jalamahaṃ	jala jQAnam tat vizayakaH yaH grahaH jalam aham
   jānāmītyākārakaḥ	jAnAmi iti AkArakaH
   taduttarakāle ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca prāthamikajalajñānagrahe yadi	tad uttara kAle iti arTaH/ taTA ca prATamika jala jQAna grahe yadi
   jalajñānaniṣṭhaṃ pramātvamapi gṛhītaṃ tarhi	jala jQAna nizWam pramAtvam api gRhItam tarhi
   jalajñānaṃ pramā na veti	jala jQAnam pramA na vA iti
   jalajñānadharmikapramātvasaṃśayo na syāt,	jala jQAna Darmika pramAtu asaMSayaH na syAt ,
   jalajñānadharmikapramātvaniścayātmakapratibanadhakasatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ jātu	jala jQAna Darmika pramAtu a niScaya Atmaka pratibana Daka satvAt iti BAvaH/ jAtu
   jalāśaye jalamālokya tatra vihitasnānapānādeḥ puṃsaḥ paradine	jalASaye jalam Alokya tatra vihita snAna pAna AdeH puMsaH para dine
   madhyāhne dūrāt tatra yajjaladarśanaṃ tat dvitīyaṃ jalajñānaṃ	maDyAhne dUrAt tatra yat jala darSanam tat dvitIyam jala jQAnam
   abhyāsadaśāpannamityucyate/ tasya	aByAsa daSA Apannam iti ucyate/ tasya
   gṛhītaprāmāṇyakapūrvajñānasajātīyatvānusandhānena idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā	gRhIta prAmANyaka pUrva jQAna sajAtIya tva anusanDAnena idam jQAnam pramA
   na vā iti saṃśayasya na prasaktiriti paryālocya	na vA iti saMSayasya na prasaktiH iti paryAlocya
   prāthamikajalajñānagrahottaramityuktam/ tadabhāvavattājñānaṃ/	prATamika jala jQAna graha uttaram iti uktam/ tad aBAvavat tA jQAnaM/
   pramātvasaṃśaye pramātvābhāvakoṭerapi bhānena tadaṃśajñānaṃ prati	pramAtu a saMSaye pramAtvA aBAva koweH api BAnena tad aMSa jQAnam prati
   pramātvaniścayasya pratibandhakatvādityarthaḥ/ tannirasanaprakāra iti/	pramAtu a niScayasya pratibanDaka tvAt iti arTaH/ tad nirasana prakAraH iti/
   jñātatānirāsaprakāra ityarthaḥ/	jQAta tA nirAsa prakAraH iti arTaH/
   eteneti/	etena iti/
   prāthamikajalajñānānantarameva pravṛttiriti kathanenetyarthaḥ/	prATamika jala jQAna anantaram eva pravRttiH iti kaTanena iti arTaH/
   mīmāṃsakairabhyupagatāyāmiti/ kasmiṃścit viṣaye jñāte sati jāte	mImAMsakEH aByupagatAya amiti/ kasmiMScid vizaye jQAte sati jAte
   jñāne prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vinā viṣaye pravṛttiḥ na bhavatīti	jQAne prAmANya niScayam vinA vizaye pravRttiH na Bavati iti
   tadviṣayakapravṛttiṃ prati	tad vizayaka pravRttim prati
   tadviṣayakajñānadharmikaprāmāṇyaniścayaḥ kāraṇamiti mīmāṃsakāḥ	tad vizaya ka jQAna Darmika prAmANya niScayaH kAraNam iti mImAMsakAH
   vadanti/ tanna yuktam/ jalajñānānantaraṃ idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā	vadanti/ tat na yuktam/ jala jQAna anantaram idam jQAnam pramA
   ityākārakajalajñānadharmikaprāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vināpi pravṛtterūtpattyā	iti AkAraka jala jQAna Darmika prAmANya niScayam vinA api pravRtteru utpattyA
   vyatirekavyabhicārāditi/ bhāvaḥ/ na ca niṣkampeti/ pravṛttirdvividhā  	vyatireka vyaBicAra at iti/ BAvaH/ na ca nizkampa iti/ pravRttiH dviviDA  
   niṣkampā sakampā ceti/ utkaṭā pravṛttiḥ niṣkampā, anutkaṭā pravṛttiḥ	nizkampA sa kampA ca iti/ utkawA pravRttiH nizkampA, anutkawA pravRttiH
   sakampā/ utkaṭatvānutkaṭatve pravṛttigatau viṣayitāviśeṣau/ tatra	sa kampA/ utkawa tvAnutkawa tve pravRtti gatO vizayitA viSezO/ tatra
   tadviṣayiṇīṃ utkaṭapravṛtti prati tadviṣayakajñāne prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ	tad vizayiNIm utkawa pravRtti prati tad vizaya ka jQAne prAmANya niScayaH
   kāraṇam, tadviṣayakānutkaṭapravṛttiṃ prati tu prāmāṇyasaṃśayaḥ kāraṇam/	kAraNam, tad vizayakAn utkawa pravRttim prati tu prAmANya saMSayaH kAraNam/
   prāmāṇyaniścayasya niṣkampapravṛttitvaṃ kāryatāvacchedakam,	prAmANya niScayasya nizkampa pravRtti tvam kArya tAvacCedakam,
   prāmāṇyasaṃśayasya sakampapravṛttitvaṃ kāryatāvacchedakam/ yatra	prAmANya saMSayasya sa kampa pravRtti tvam kArya tA avacCedakam/ yatra
   jalajñānānantaraṃ tatra prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vināpi pravṛttiḥ jāyate tatra sā	jala jQAna anantaram tatra prAmANya niScayam vinA api pravRttiH jAyate tatra sA
   pravṛttiḥ sakampetyaṅgīkriyate/ tasyāṃ ca	pravRttiH sa kampa iti aFgIkriyate/ tasyAm ca
   niṣkampapravṛttitvarūpakāryatāvacchedakavirahāt prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ vinā	nizkampa pravRtti tva rUpa kArya tAvacCedaka virahAt prAmANya niScayam vinA
   niṣkampapravṛttitvāvacchinnasyānupattyā na vyatirekavyabhicāra iti	nizkampa pravRtti tvA avacCinnasya anupattyA na vyatireka vyaBicAraH iti
   prāmāṇyaniścayasya pravṛttihetutvaṃ nirbādhamiti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ/	prAmANya niScayasya pravRtti hetu tvam nirbADam iti SaFkituH ASayaH/
   tathāpīti/ yatra prāmāṇyasya aprāmāṇyasya vā saṃśayo vā niścayo vā	taTA api iti/ yatra prAmANyasya aprAmANyasya vA saMSayaH vA niScayaH vA
   nābhūt jalajñānaṃ paramabhūt tatrāpi pravṛtterdarśanenasakampāyāḥ	na aBUt jala jQAnam param aBUt tatra api pravRtteH darSanenasa kampAyAH
   tādṛśapravṛtteḥ prāmāṇyasaṃśayaṃ vināpyutpatyā vyatirekavyabhicārāt	tAdRSa pravRtteH prAmANya saMSayam vinA api utpatyA vyatireka vyaBicArAt 
   prāmāṇyasaṃśayasya pravṛttihetutā na bhavatīti samādhāturāśayaḥ/ na	prAmANya saMSayasya pravRtti hetu tA na Bavati iti samADAtuH ASayaH/ na
   caivamiti/ prāmāṇyaniścayasya vā prāmāṇyasaṃśayasya vā pravṛttiṃ prati	ca evam iti/ prAmANya niScayasya vA prAmANya saMSayasya vA pravRttim prati

   nanu	nanu

   iti kecit/"tathāpyanuvyavasāyānantaraṃ vyavasāyasya	iti kecit/" taTA api anuvyavasAya anantaram vyavasAyasya

   prāmāṇyasaṃśayasya tadadhīnasyārthatadvattvasaṃśayasya copapatteḥ	prAmANya saMSayasya tad aDInasya arTa tadvat tva saMSayasya ca upapatteH

   ityādyūhanīyam/	ityAdyUhanIyam/
   1. ityāhuriti/	1. iti AhuH iti/

   bhramajanakapittādidoṣāṇāṃ ca vyudāsaḥ/	Brama janaka pitta Adi dozANAm ca vyudAsaH/
   apramāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvamapyevaṃ pariṣkartavyam/ caturvidhapramāyāṃ	apramAsa ADAraNa kAraNa tvam api evam parizkartavyam/ caturviDa pramAyAm
   hetubhūtaṃ guṇaṃ krameṇopapādayati tatreti/ caturvidhapramāmadhya	hetu BUtam guNam krameNa upapAdayati tatra iti/ caturviDa pramA maDye 
   ityarthaḥ/ ityādyūhanīyamiti/ 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' ityādibhrame	iti arTaH/ ityAdi UhanIyam iti/ api itaH SaFKaHa ityAdi Brame
   pittādidoṣaḥ, idaṃ rajatamityādibhrame ca cākacakyādiḥ iti	pitta Adi dozaH, idam rajatam iti Adi Brame ca ca AkacakyAdiH iti
   ūhanīyamityarthaḥ/	UhanIyam iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   pramātvādhikadeśavṛttīti/ pramātvavyāpakadharmānavacchinnā yā	pramAtvA aDika deSa vRtti iti/ pramAtva vyApaka DarmAn avacCinnA yA
   pramāniṣṭhā kāryatā tannirūpitakāraṇatvaṃ pramātvaprayojakasya guṇasya	pramAnizWA kArya tA tad nirUpita kAraNa tvam pramAtva prayojakasya guNasya
   lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ/ pramāniṣṭhakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatvamātroktau	lakzaNam iti arTaH/ pramAnizWa kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tva mAtra uktO
   jñānasāmānyaṃ prati hetubhūte ātmamanassaṃyogādāvativyāptiḥ/	jQAna sAmAnyam prati hetu BUte Atma mana ssaMyoga AdO= ativyAptiH/
   tadvāraṇāya kāryatāyāṃ	tad vAraNAya kArya tAyAm
   pramātvādhikadeśavṛttidharmānavacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/ ātmamanassaṃyogādau	pramAtvA aDika deSa vRtti DarmAn avacCinna tva niveSaH/ Atma mana ssaMyoga AdO
