   tadavacchinnakāryantānirūpitakāraṇatvamevāsti, na	tad avacCinna kAryantA nirUpita kAraNa tvam eva asti, na

   tatrānivyāptivāraṇāya kāryatāyāṃ pramāniṣṭhatvaniveśaḥ/ pittādeḥ	tatra anivyApti vAraNAya kArya tAyAm pramAnizWa tva niveSaH/ pitta AdeH

   prakārasambandhasya vyavasāyaviṣayatvāt	prakAra sambanDasya vyavasAya vizaya tvAt

   viśiṣṭajñānasyaiva kalpanāt/	viSizwa jQAnasya eva kalpanAt/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   netyarthaḥ/	na iti arTaH/

   saṃvādivisaṃvādisādhāraṇapravṛttijanakatayā tatra pravṛttireva na	saMvAdi visaMvAdi sADAraNa pravRtti janakatayA tatra pravRttiH eva na

   sambhavāditi/ tathā ca pravṛttiṃ prati viśiṣṭajñānatvena kāraṇataiva	samBavAt iti/ taTA ca pravRttim prati viSizwa jQAna tvena kAraNa tA eva

   'rajatasmṛtipurovartijñānābhyāmeva pravṛttisambhavāt'	arajata smRti puras varti jQAnAByAm eva pravRtti samBavAt a

   kḷptaniyatapūrvavartibhyāṃ idañjñānarajatasmaraṇābhyāmeva pravṛtteḥ	k?pta niyata pUrva vartiByAm idan jQAna rajata smaraNAByAm eva pravRtteH

   viśiṣṭajñānamanāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ/ viśiṣṭajñānatveneti/	viSizwa jQAnam anAvaSyakam iti BAvaH/ viSizwa jQAna tvena iti/

   nanvevamiti/ rajatasmṛtipurovartijñāne eva pravṛttikāraṇe;	nanu evamiti/ rajata smRti puras varti jQAne eva pravRtti kAraNe;
   viśiṣṭajñānaṃ tu na pravṛttikāraṇamityaṅgīkāra ityarthaḥ/ pravṛttiḥ	viSizwa jQAnam tu na pravRtti kAraNam iti aFgIkAraH iti arTaH/ pravRttiH
   syāditi/ rajatasmṛtipurovartijñānayoḥ sattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	syAt iti/ rajata smRti puras varti jQAnayoH sattvAt iti BAvaH/

   iti jñāne ghaṭatvamapi prakāraḥ paṭatvamapi prakāraḥ/	iti jQAne Gawa tvam api prakAraH pawa tvam api prakAraH/
   parantu	parantu
   ghaṭatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā virodhaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitā,	Gawatva nizWa prakAra tA viroDa nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitA,
   paṭatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā paṭaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitā/ dvayoḥ	pawatva nizWa prakAra tA pawa nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitA/ dvayoH
   ghaṭatvapaṭatvaniṣṭhaprakāratayoḥ ekadharminiṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvaṃ	Gawa tva pawa tva nizWa prakAra tayoH eka Darmi nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita tvam
   nāstīti tādṛśajñāne	na asti iti tAdRSa jQAne
   ekadharminiṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitanānādharmaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakatvābhāvāt	eka Darmi nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita nAnA Darma nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka tva aBAvAt
   nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ vibhinnarūpeṇeti/ 'parvato vahnimān dravyaṃ	na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ viBinna rUpeNa iti/ aparvataH vahnimAn dravyam
   vahnyabhāvavat' ityākārake samūhālambane parvatatvadravyatvābhyāṃ	vahni aBAvavat a iti AkArake samUha Alambane parvata tva dravya tvAByAm
   parvatarūpaikadharmiviśeṣyake 'tivyāptiḥ/	parvata rUpa eka Darmi viSezyake ati vyAptiH/
   parvataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitavahnitadabhāvarūpanānādharmaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakatvāditi	parvata nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita vahni tad aBAva rUpa nAnA Darma nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka tvAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ ekadharmāvacchinneti/ tathā ca	BAvaH/ eka Darma avacCinnA iti/ taTA ca
   ekadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitanānādharmaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakajñānatvaṃ	eka Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita nAnA Darma nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka jQAna tvam
   saṃśayasya lakṣaṇam/ 'parvato vahnimān, dravyaṃ vahnyabhāvavat' iti	saMSayasya lakzaNam/ aparvataH vahnimAn, dravyam vahni aBAvavat a iti
   jñāne vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā parvatatvāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitā	jQAne vahni nizWa prakAra tA parvata tva avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpitA
   vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratā dravyatvāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpiteti dvayoḥ	vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tA dravya tva avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpitA iti dvayoH
   prakāratayoḥ ekadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvaṃ nāstīti	prakAratayoH eka Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tvam na asti iti
   nātivyāpitariti bhāvaḥ/	na ati vyApitar iti BAvaH/
   nanvevamapi	nanu evam api
   ghaṭatadabhāvayoravyāpyavṛttitvajñānakālīne 'bhūtalaṃ ghaṭavat	Gawa tada BAvayoH avyApya vRtti tva jQAna kAlIne aBU talam Gawa vat 
   ghaṭābhāvavacca' ityākārake samuccaye 'tivyāptiḥ/ tasyāpi	Gawa aBAvavat ca a iti AkArake samuccaye ati vyAptiH/ tasya api
   bhūtalatvarūpaikadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaghaṭatadabhāvarūpanānādharma	BU tala tva rUpa eka Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita Gawa tada BAva rUpa nAnA Darma
     niṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakatvādityata āha digiti/	 nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka tvAt iti atas Aha diS iti/
   1svaghaṭitadharmāvacchinnapratibandhakatānirūpitapratibadhyatāvacchedakībhūtā	1sva Gawita Darma avacCinna pratibanDaka tA nirUpita pratibaDya tAvacCedakIBUtA
   yā	yA
   svanirūpakatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnanirūpitavirodhaviṣayitānirūpitā	sva nirUpaka tAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna nirUpita viroDa vizayitA nirUpitA
   prakāritā samānādhikaraṇyasambandhena tadviśiṣṭaprakāritaiva	prakAritA samAna aDikaraNya sambanDena tad viSizwa prakAritA eva
   saṃśayatvam/ tacca	saMSaya tvam/ tat ca
   samuccayavyāvṛttam/ samuccaye virodhābhānena	samuccaya vyAvRttam/ samuccaye viroDa ABAnena
   koṭidvayaviṣayitayoḥ virodhaviṣayitvānirūpitatvāt/ saṃśaye	kowi dvaya vizayitayoH viroDa vizayi tvA nirUpita tva at/ saMSaye
   cāntataḥ koṭyoḥ saṃsargatayā parasparavirodhabhānopagamena	ca antataH kowyoH saMsarga tayA paraspara viroDa BAna upagamena
   lakṣaṇasamanvaya iti bhāvaḥ/ etena samuccaye 'tivyāptivāraṇāya jñāne	lakzaNa samanvayaH iti BAvaH/ etena samuccaye ati vyApti vAraNAya jQAne
   virodhaviṣayakatvaviśeṣaṇadāne tata eva ghaṭapaṭāviti jñānasya dravyam	viroDa vizayaka tva viSezaNa dAne tatas eva Gawa pawO= iti jQAnasya dravyam
   iti jñānasya ca vāraṇasambhavāt ekadharmiviśeṣyakatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ dharme	iti jQAnasya ca vAraNa samBavAt eka Darmi viSezyaka tva viSezaNam Darme
   viruddhatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca vyartham/ tayorjñānayoḥ	virudDa tva viSezaNam ca vyarTam/ tayoH jQAnayoH
   virodhaviṣayakatvābhāvenaiva vāraṇāditi śaṅkāyāḥ nāvasaraḥ/	viroDa vizaya ka tva aBAvena eva vAraNAt iti SaFkAyAH na avasaraH/
   uktapariṣkāra eva prakṛtagranthatātparyāditi/	ukta parizkAraH eva prakRta granTa tAtparyAt iti/
   1. svaghaṭitetyādi/	1. sva GawitA ityAdi/
   svaṃ bhūtalaṃ ghaṭavanna veti saṃśayaniṣṭhā ghaṭanirūpitā prakāritā	svam BU talam Gawa vat na vA iti saMSaya nizWA Gawa nirUpitA prakAritA
   tadghaṭito dharmaḥ	tad GawitaH DarmaH
   ghaṭanirūpitaprakāritvāvacchinnabhūtalanirūpitaviśeṣyitāśālijñānatvaṃ	Gawa nirUpita prakAritvA avacCinna BU tala nirUpita viSezyitA SAli jQAna tvam
   tadavacchinnā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭavadityākārakajñānaniṣṭhā pratibandhakatā	tad avacCinnA BU talam Gawa vat iti AkAraka jQAna nizWA pratibanDaka tA
   tannirūpitā yā pratibadhyatā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāvavaditi jñānaniṣṭhā	tad nirUpitA yA pratibaDyatA BU talam Gawa aBAva vat iti jQAna nizWA
   tadavacchedakībhūtā ghaṭābhāvanirūpitā prakāritā, evaṃ svaṃ	tad avacCedakIBUtA Gawa aBAva nirUpitA prakAritA, evam svam
   ghaṭanirūpitaprakāritā tannirūpakatā ghaṭaniṣṭhā tadavacchedakadharmaḥ	Gawa nirUpita prakAritA tad nirUpaka tA Gawa nizWA tad avacCedaka DarmaH
   dhaṭatvaṃ tadavacchinnanirūpito yo virodhaḥ tanniṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpitā	Dawa tvam tad avacCinna nirUpitaH yaH viroDaH tad nizWa vizaya tA nirUpitA
   sā ghaṭābhāvanirūpitā prakāritā bhavati ekādhikaraṇavṛttitvasambandhena	sA Gawa aBAva nirUpitA prakAritA Bavati eka aDikaraNa vRtti tva sambanDena
   tadviśiṣṭaprakāritā ghaṭanirūpitaprakāritā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭavat na veti	tad viSizwa prakAritA Gawa nirUpita prakAritA BU talam Gawa vat na vA iti
   saṃśaye 'stīti samanvayaḥ/	saMSaye asti iti samanvayaH/
   tantrāntare  	tantra antare  
   advaitavedānte/ tathā ca mithyāviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ viparyaya ityuktau	advEta vedAnte/ taTA ca miTyA vizayakam jQAnam viparyayaH iti uktO
   brahmātiriktaviṣayakasya sarvasyāpi	brahmA atirikta vizayakasya sarvasya api
   jñānasya advaitimate	jQAnasya advEtimate
   mithyāviṣayakatvāt viparyayatvāpattiḥ, ataḥ mithyājñānamityasya	miTyA vizayaka tvAt viparyaya tva ApattiH, atas miTyAjQAnam iti asya
   tadabhāvavati tatprakārakanirṇaya iti vyākhyānaṃ kṛtamiti bhāvaḥ/	tad aBAvavati tad prakAraka nirNayaH iti vyAKyAnam kRtam iti BAvaH/
   pramāvāraṇāyedamiti/ tatprakārakanirṇayaḥ viparyayaḥ	pramAvAraNAya idam iti/ tad prakAraka nirNayaH viparyayaH
   ityetāvanmātroktau ayaṃ ghaṭa ityādipramāyāmativyāptiḥ tasyā	iti etAvat mAtrA uktO ayam GawaH iti Adi pramAyAm ati vyAptiH tasyAH 
   api ghaṭatvādiprakārakatvāt/ tadvāraṇāya tadabhāvavatīti viśeṣaṇam/	api Gawa tva Adi prakAraka tvAt/ tad vAraNAya tat aBAvavatI iti viSezaNam/
   ayaṃ ghaṭa ityādipramāyāḥ ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvena	ayam GawaH ityAdi pramAyAH Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tvena
   ghaṭatvābhāvavadviṣyakatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ na	Gawa tva aBAvavat vizyaka tva aBAvAt na ativyAptiH iti BAvaH/ na
   samūhālambane 'tiprasaṅga iti/ raṅgarajatayoḥ 'ime	samUha Alambane atiprasaFgaH iti/ raFga rajatayoH aime
   raṅgarajate' iti pramāyāṃ nātivyāpitarityarthaḥ/ tasyāḥ pramāyāḥ	raFgarajate a iti pramAyAm na ati vyApitariti arTaH/ tasyAH pramAyAH
   rajatatvābhāvavadraṅgaviśeṣyakatve rajatatvaprakārakatve ca	rajata tva aBAva vat raFga viSezyaka tve rajata tva prakAraka tve ca
   satyapi raṅgatvābhāvavadviśeṣyakatvāvacchinnarajatatvaprakārakatvaṃ	sati api raFga tvA aBAvavat viSezyaka tva avacCinna rajata tva prakAraka tvam
   nāsti,	nAsti,
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāḥ	rajata tva nizWa prakAra tAyAH
   rajatatvavadrajataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvena	rajata tva vat rajata nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita tvena
   rajatatvābhāvavadraṅganiṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvābhāvāt raṅgāṃśe	rajata tva aBAva vat raFga nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita tva aBAvAt raFga aMSe
   rajatatvasyāprakāratvāditi bhāvaḥ/ avaśiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ pratyakṣapariccheda	rajata tvasya aprakAra tvAt iti BAvaH/ avaSizwam sarvam pratyakza paricCeda
   evoktamityāśayenoktam saṅkṣepa iti/	eva uktam iti ASayena uktam saFkzepaH iti/
   vyāpyāropeṇa	vyApya AropeNa
   vyāpakāropastarkaḥ/ āropaśabdasya āhāryabhramaityarthaḥ/ āhāryatvaṃ	vyApaka Ara upaH tarkaH/ Aropa Sabdasya AhArI aBrama eti arTaH/ AhArya tvam
   ca bādhakālīnecchājanyatvam/ tṛtīyāyāḥ janyatvamarthaḥ/ tasya	ca bADaka AlIna icCA janya tvam/ tRtIyAyAH janya tvam arTaH/ tasya
   vyāpakārope 'nvayaḥ/ vyāpyasyāropaḥ vyāpyāropaḥ/ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ	vyApaka Arope anvayaH/ vyApyasya AropaH vyApya AropaH/ zazWyAH
   viṣayatvamarthaḥ/ tathā ca bādhakālīnecchājanyavyāpyaviṣayakabhramajanyaḥ	vizaya tvam arTaH/ taTA ca bADaka AlIna icCA janya vyApya vizayaka Brama janyaH
   bādhakālīnecchājanyavyāpakaviṣayako bhramastarka iti phalati/ yadi	bADakAlIna icCA janya vyApaka vizayakaH BramaH tarkaH iti Palati/ yadi
   parvato vahnyabhāvavān syāt tarhi dhūmābhāvavān syāt	parvataH vahni aBAvavAn syAt tarhi DUma aBAvavAn syAt 
   ityākārakastarkaḥ/ tatra vyāpyaḥ vahnyabhāvaḥ tadviṣayakaḥ āropaḥ	iti AkArakaH tarkaH/ tatra vyApyaH vahni aBAvaH tad vizayakaH AropaH
   parvato vahnyamāniti bādhakālīnayā icchayā janyaḥ bhramaḥ yadi	parvataH vahni amAn iti bADaka AlInayA icCayA janyaH BramaH yadi
   parvato vahnya bhāvavān syāt ityākārakaḥ, tajjanyaḥ vyāpakasya	parvataH vahnya BAvavAn syAt iti AkArakaH, tat janyaH vyApakasya
   dhūmābhāvasya āropaḥ tarhi dhūtābhāvavān syādityākārakaḥ/ sa eva	DUma aBAvasya AropaH tarhi DUta aBAvavAn syAt iti AkArakaH/ saH eva
   tarkaḥ/ vyāpyaviṣayakabhrame āhāryatvaviśeṣaṇādāne śākhāyāṃ	tarkaH/ vyApya vizayaka Brame AhArya tva viSezaNa AdAne SAKAyAm
   puruṣatvavyāpyakarabhramāt yatra ayaṃ puruṣa ityāhāryāropaḥ	puruza tva vyApya kara BramAt yatra ayam puruzaH iti AhArya AropaH
   tatrātivyāptiḥ tadvāraṇāya āhāryatvaviśeṣaṇam/ śākhāyāṃ karabhramaḥ na	tatra ativyAptiH tad vAraNAya AhArya tva viSezaNam/ SAKAyAm kara BramaH na
   āhārya iti nātivyāptiḥ/ vyāpakārope āhāryatvaviśeṣaṇādāne	AhArya iti na ati vyAptiH/ vyApaka Arope AhArya tva viSezaNa AdAne
   āhāryāt rajatatvavyāpyavat idamiti jñānāt jāyamāne idaṃ	AhAryAt rajata tva vyApya vat idam iti jQAnAt jAyamAne idam
   rajataṃ ityākārake anāhāryabhrame 'tivyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya tat/	rajatam iti AkArake anAhArya Brame ati vyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya tat/
   tadāha   āhāryavyāpyavattetyādi/ nāyaṃ puruṣa iti niścayasatva	tat Aha  AhArya vyApya vat tA ityAdi/ na ayam puruzaH iti niScaya satva
   iti/ 'ayaṃ puruṣa' iti bhramasya āhāryatvasampādanāyaitaduktm/	iti/ aayam puruzaH a iti Bramasya AhArya tva sampAdanAya etat uktm/
   rajatatvavyāpyavattājñānasya āhāryatvasampādanāya	rajata tva vyApyavattA jQAnasya AhArya tva sampAdanAya
   rajatatvavyāpyābhāvavattāgrahakāle iti/	rajata tva vyApya aBAva vat tA graha kAle iti/
   āpādyavyatirekaniścaya	ApAdi avyatireka niScaya
   iti/ āpādyaḥ prasañjanīyaḥ, dhūmābhāvaḥ tadvyatirekaḥ	iti/ ApAdyaH prasaQjanIyaH, DUma aBAvaH tad vyatirekaH
   dhūmābhāvābhāvaḥ dhūmarūpaḥ tanniścayaḥ, āpādyasya dhūmābhāvasya	DUma aBAva aBAvaH DUma rUpaH tat niScayaH, ApAdyasya DUma aBAvasya
   āpādakasya	ApAdakasya
   vahnyabhāvasya ca yā vyāptiḥ tanniścayaśca tarke kāraṇamityarthaḥ/	vahni aBAvasya ca yA vyAptiH tat niScayaH ca tarke kAraNam iti arTaH/
   kathamayathārthasya traividhyakathanamiti/ saṃśayo viparyayaśceti	kaTam ayaTArTasya trEviDya kaTanam iti/ saMSayaH viparyayaH ca iti
   dvaividhyakathanasyaiva yuktatvādityarthaḥ/ pratibandhakavighaṭanadvāreti/	dvEviDya kaTanasya eva yukta tvAt iti arTaH/ pratibanDaka viGawana dvAra iti/
   pratibandhakībhūtavyabhicāraśaṅkānivartanadvāretyarthaḥ/	pratibanDakIBUta vyaBicAra SaFkA nivartana dvAra iti arTaH/
   tarkātiriktaviparyayāṇāṃ tu nāsti pramāṇānugrāhakatvam, tarkasya tu	tarka atirikta viparyayANAm tu na asti pramANa anugrAhaka tvam, tarkasya tu
   tadastīti vailakṣaṇyasūcanāya viparyayayāntarbhūtasyāpi tarkasya	tat asti iti vElakzaNya sUcanAya viparyayaya antarBUtasya api tarkasya
   pṛthaṅnirdeśa ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca viparyaye tarkatvākāraḥ	pRTak nirdeSaH iti arTaH/ taTA ca viparyaye tarkatva AkAraH
   pramāṇānugrāhakatāvacchedakaḥ, viparyayatvaṃ tu na tatheti	pramANa anugrAhaka tAvacCedakaH, viparyaya tvam tu na taTA iti
   viśeṣajñāpanāya viparyayatvatarkatvābhyāṃ vibhāga iti bhāvaḥ/	viSeza jQApanAya viparyaya tva tarka tvAByAm viBAgaH iti BAvaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   smṛtinirūpaṇam	smRti nirUpaNam
   AnTs_65 smṛtir api dvividhā / yathārthāyathārthā ca pramājanyā yathārthā /	AnTH _65 smRtiH api dviviDA / yaTArTa ayaTa arTA ca pramAjanyA yaTArTAH /
   apramājanyāyathārthā //	apramA janyAyaTArTAH //
   smṛtirapi dbividhā   yathārthā ayathārthā	smRtiH api dbiviDA  yaTArTAH ayaTArTA
   ceti/ pramājanayā yathārthā/ apramājanyā ayathārthā/	ceti/ pramAjanayA yaTArTA/ apramA janyA ayaTArTA/
   sukhādinirūpaṇam	suKa Adi nirUpaNam
   AnTs_66 sarveśām anukūlatayā vedanīyaṃ sukham //	AnTH _66 sarva ISAm anukUla tayA vedanIyam suKam //
   AnTs_67 sarveśāṃ pratikūlatayā vedanīyaṃ duḥkham //	AnTH _67 sarva ISAm pratikUla tayA vedanIyam duHKam //
   AnTs_68 icchā kāmaḥ //	AnTH _68 icCA kAmaH //

   AnTs_72 niṣiddhakarmajanyas tv adharmaḥ //	AnTH _72 nizidDa karma janyaH tu aDarmaH //
   AnTs_73 buddhyādayo'ṣṭāv ātmamātraviśeṣaguṇāḥ //	AnTH _73 budDi AdayaH azwO Atma mAtra viSeza guNAH //
   AnTs_74 buddhīcchāprayatnā dvividhāḥ / nityā anityāś ca / nityā īśvarasya	AnTH _74 budDi icCA prayatnAH dviviDAH / nityAH anityAH ca / nityAH ISvarasya
   / anityā jīvasya //	/ anityAH jIvasya //
   sarveṣāṃ	sarvezAm
   anukūlatayā vedanīyaṃ sukham/ pratikūlatayā vedanīyaṃ duḥkham/	anukUla tayA vedanIyam suKam/ pratikUla tayA vedanIyam duHKam/
   icchā kāmaḥ/ krodho dveṣaḥ/ kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ/ vihitakarmajanyo dharmaḥ/	icCA kAmaH/ kroDaH dvezaH/ kRtiH prayatnaH/ vihita karma janyaH DarmaH/
   niṣiddhakarmajanyo 'dharmaḥ/ buddhyādayaḥ aṣṭau ātmamātraviśeṣaguṇāḥ/	nizidDa karma janyaH aDarmaH/ budDi AdayaH azwO Atma mAtra viSeza guNAH/
   buddhīcchāprayatnā	budDi icCA prayatnA
   nityā anityaśca/	nityAH anityaH ca/
   nityā īśvarasya/ anityā jīvasya/	nityAH ISvarasya/ anityAH jIvasya/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   smṛtiṃ vibhajate  	smRtim viBajate  
   smṛtiriti/ sukhaṃ lakṣayati   sarveṣāmiti/ 'sukhī aham'	smRtiH iti/ suKam lakzayati  sarvezAm iti/ asuKI aham a
   ityādyanuvyasāyagamyaṃ sukhatvādikameva lakṣaṇam/ yathāśrutaṃ tu	ityAdi anuvyasAya gamyam suKa tva Adikam eva lakzaNam/ yaTASrutam tu
   svarūpakathanamiti draṣṭavyam/	svarUpa kaTanam iti drazwavyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   nanu 'sarveṣāṃ	nanu asarvezAm
   anukūlatayā vedanīyam' ityādi mūlaṃ sukhādilakṣaṇaparaṃ na	anukUla tayA vedanIyam a ityAdi mUlam suKa Adi lakzaNa param na
   sambhavati, padadravnayopabhogādijanyasakhe sādhūnāṃ dveṣadarśanāt	samBavati, pada dravnayA upaBoga Adi janya saKe sADUnAm dveza darSanAt 
   avyāpterityāśaṅkāyāṃ 'sukhyaham' ityādipratyakṣasiddhaṃ	avyApteH iti ASaFkAyAm asuKI aham a ityAdi pratyakza sidDam
   sukhatvādikameva lakṣaṇamityāha   sukhī ahamityādyanuvyavasāyeti/	suKa tva Adikam eva lakzaNam iti Aha  suKI aham iti Adi anu vyavasAya iti/
   sukhatvādītyādinā dukhatvaparigrahaḥ/ yathāśrutaṃ tviti/	suKa tva Adi ityAdinA duKa tva parigrahaH/ yaTASrutam tu iti/
   sarveṣāmanukūlatayā ityādikamityarthaḥ/	sarvezAm anukUla tayA iti Adikam iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   sarveṣāṃ	sarvezAm
   anukūlatayā vedanīyaṃ sukham iti mūlāt	anukUla tayA vedanIyam suKam iti mUlAt 
   anukūlatvaprakārakajñānaviṣayatvaṃ sukhasya lakṣaṇamiti pratīyate/ tathā	anukUla tva prakAraka jQAna vizaya tvam suKasya lakzaNam iti pratIyate/ taTA
   sati parakīyadravyopabhogajanye sukhe sādhūnāṃ dveṣadarśanena	sati parakIya dravya upaBoga janye suKe sADUnAm dveza darSanena
   sādhuvṛttipratikūlatvaprakārakajñānaviṣayatvasyaiva	sADu vRtti pratikUla tva prakAraka jQAna vizaya tvasya eva
   tatra sattvena sarveṣāṃ	tatra sattvena sarvezAm
   anukūlatayā vedanīyatvasya tādṛśasukhe 'bhāvenāvyāptyāpatteḥ idaṃ	anukUla tayA vedanIya tvasya tAdRSa suKe aBAvena avyApti ApatteH idam
   lakṣaṇaṃ ayuktamiti śaṅkānivāraṇārthaḥ sukhyahamityādidīpikāgrantha	lakzaNam ayuktam iti SaFkA nivAraNa arTaH suKI aham iti Adi dIpikA granTa
   ityāha   nanu sarveṣāmityādinā/	iti Aha  nanu sarvezAm ityAdinA/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   saṃskāranirūpaṇam	saMskAra nirUpaNam
   AnTs_75 saṃskāras trividhaḥ / vego bhāvanā sthitisthāpakaś ceti / vegaḥ	AnTH _75 saMskAraH triviDaH / vegaH BAvanA sTiti sTApakaH ca iti / vegaH
   pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayamanovṛttiḥ / anubhavajanyā smṛtihetur	pRTivI Adi catuzwaya manaH vRttiH / anuBava janyA smRti hetuH 
   bhāvanātmamātravṛttiḥ / anyathā kṛtasya punas tadavasthāpādakaḥ	BAvanA Atma mAtra vRttiH / anyaTA kRtasya punar tad avasTApAdakaH
   sthitisthāpakaḥ kaṭādipṛthivīvṛttiḥ //	sTiti sTApakaH kawa Adi pRTivI vRttiH //
   saṃskāraḥ trividhaḥ  	saMskAraH triviDaH

   pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayamanovṛttiḥ/ anubhavajanyā smṛtihetuḥ bhāvanā/	pRTivI Adi catuzwaya manaH vRttiH/ anuBava janyA smRti hetuH BAvanA/
   ātmamātravṛttiḥ/ anyathā kṛtasya (sthitasya) punaḥ tādavasthyāpādakaḥ	Atma mAtra vRttiH/ anyaTA kRtasya (sTitasya) punar tAdavasTi ApAdakaH
   sthitasthāpakaḥ/ kaṭādipṛthivīmātravṛttiḥ/	sTita sTApakaH/ kawa Adi pRTivI mAtra vRttiH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   saṃskāraṃ vibhajate	saMskAram viBajate
     saṃskāra iti/ saṃskāratvajātimān saṃskāra/ vegasyāśrayamāha  	 saMskAraH iti/ saMskAra tva jAtimAn saMskAra/ vegasya ASrayam Aha  
   vega iti/ vegatvajātimān vegaḥ/ bhāvanāṃ lakṣayati   anubhaveti/	vegaH iti/ vega tva jAtimAn vegaH/ BAvanAm lakzayati  anuBava iti/
   anubhavadhvaṃse 'tivyāptivāraṇāya smṛtīti/	anuBava DvaMse ati vyApti vAraNAya smRti iti/
   ātmādāvativyāptivāraṇāya anubhaveti/ smṛterapi saṃskārajanakatvaṃ	Atma AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya anuBava iti/ smRteH api saMskAra janaka tvam
   navīnairuktam/ sthitasthāpakaṃ lakṣayati   anyatheti/ saṅkhyādayaḥ aṣṭau	navInEH uktam/ sTita sTApakam lakzayati  anyaTA iti/ saFKI A AdayaH azwO
   naimittikadravatvavegasthitasthāpakāḥ sāmānyaguṇāḥ/	nEmittika drava tva vega sTita sTApakAH sAmAnya guNAH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anubhavetīti/	anuBava iti iti/
   smṛtiṃ saṃskāraṃ prati ca anubhavatvenaiva kāraṇatvaṃ vadatāṃ prācāṃ	smRtim saMskAram prati ca anuBava tvena eva kAraNa tvam vadatAm prAcAm
   ayamabhiprāyaḥ   tattadviṣayakasmṛtiṃ prati tattadviṣayakasaṃskāraṃ prati	ayam aBiprAyaH  tad tad vizayaka smRtim prati tad tad vizayaka saMskAram prati
   ca	ca
   tattadviṣayakānubhavatvenaiva hetutā na tu tattadbiṣayakajñānatvena,	tad tad vizayaka anuBava tvena eva hetu tA na tu tad tad bizayaka jQAna tvena,
   anubhavatvasyāpi jātitvena jñānatvāpekṣayā gauravāsaṃbhavāt/ na ca	anuBava tu asya api jAti tvena jQAna tva apekzayA gOrava asaMBavAt/ na ca
   vinigamanāviraha iti śaṅkyam, vyāpyadharmapuraskāreṇa	vinigamanA virahaH iti SaFkyam, vyApya Darma puraskAreNa
   kāraṇatvasambhave vyāpakadharmasyānyathāsiddhinirūpakatvāditi/	kAraNa tva samBave vyApaka Darmasya anyaTA sidDi nirUpaka tvAt iti/
   navīnāḥ punaḥ  	navInAH punar  
   anubhavānāṃ tattadviṣayakasmṛtiṃ tādṛśasaṃskāraṃ prati ca	anuBavAnAm tad tad vizaya ka smRtim tAdRSa saMskAram prati ca
   tattadviṣayakajñānatvenaiva hetutā, na tu anubhavatvena, saṃskārasya	tad tad vizaya ka jQAna tvena eva hetutA, na tu anuBava tvena, saMskArasya
   phalanāśyatayā prathamasmaraṇenaiva anubhavajanyasaṃskārasya nāśena	Pala nASya tayA praTama smaraNena eva anuBava janya saMskArasya nASena
   sakṛtadanubhūtasya smaraṇottaraṃ asmaraṇaprasaṅgāt/ na ca	sakRtadanuBUtasya smaraNa uttaram asmaraNa prasaFgAt/ na ca
   svajanyasmaraṇasya saṃskāranāśakatve smṛtisādhāraṇena jñānatvena	sva janya smaraNasya saMskAra nASaka tve smRti sADAraNena jQAna tvena
   hetutve 'pi ghaṭapaṭādirūpanānāviṣayāvagāhinā anubhavena janitasya	hetu tve api Gawa pawa Adi rUpa nAnA vizaya avagAhinA anuBavena janitasya
   tāvadviṣayakasaṃskārasya ghaṭādyekaikagocarasmaraṇenāpi vināśāt	tAvat vizayaka saMskArasya Gawa Adi ekEka gocara smaraNena api vinASAt 
   taduttaraṃ paṭādismaraṇānupapattiḥ, tattadviṣayakasaṃskārābhāvāt/	tad uttaram pawa Adi smaraNa anupapattiH, tad tad vizayaka saMskAra aBAvAt/
   smṛtijanyapaṭādigocarasaṃskārasya ca bhinnarviṣayakatayā	smRti janya pawa Adi gocara saMskArasya ca Binnarvizaya ka tayA

   tattadvyaktitvena tattatsaṃskāranāśakatāyā aṅgīkartavyatayā	tad tad vyakti tvena tad tad saMskAra nASaka tAyAH aFgIkartavya tayA
   anubhavatvena	anuBava tvena
   janakatāyāmapi na doṣa iti vācyam/, anyūnaviṣayakasyaiva phalasya	janakatAyAm api na dozaH iti vAcyam/, anyUna vizayakasya eva Palasya
   nāśakatvāṅgīkāreṇa adoṣāt/ jāyate ca punaḥ punaḥ smaraṇāt	na aSaka tva aFgIkAreNa adozAt/ jAyate ca punar punar smaraNAt 
   dṛḍhataraḥ saṃskāraḥ/ dārḍhyaṃ ca saṃskāragataḥ jātiviśeṣaḥ jhaṭiti	dRXataraH saMskAraH/ dArXyam ca saMskAra gataH jAti viSezaH Jawiti

   ghaṭamātrasmaraṇena tatsaṃskāranyūnaviṣayakeṇa nāśo na bhavatīti kramaśaḥ	Gawa mAtra smaraNena tad saMskAra nyUna vizayakeNa nASaH na Bavati iti kramaSas

   ca saṃskāraviṣayatāvyāpakaviṣayatākatvam/ saṃskāraṃ prati	ca saMskAra vizaya tA vyApaka vizaya tAka tvam/ saMskAram prati

   ghaṭasmaraṇāt jhaṭiti	Gawa smaraNAt Jawiti

   ityanubhavasiddham/ tacca jñānatvena saṃskārahetutva eva saṅgacchate,	iti anuBava sidDam/ tat ca jQAna tvena saMskAra hetutvaH eva saFgacCate,
   smaraṇasyāpi jñānatvena tataḥ saṃskārotpattisambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ/	smaraNasya api jQAna tvena tatas saMskAra utpatti samBavAt iti BAvaH/
   udbodhakasamavadhānāditi/ udbodhakaṃ sambandhidarśanādi/	udboDaka samavaDAnAt iti/ udboDakam sambanDi darSana Adi/
   saṃskārātiśayakhṇḍana iti/ saṃskāragatadārḍhyākhyajātiviśeṣakhaṇḍana	saMskAra atiSaya KNxanaH iti/ saMskAra gata dArXya AKya jAti viSeza KaNxana
   ityarthaḥ/ abhyāsasyaivānāpatteriti/	iti arTaH/ aByAsasya eva anApatteH iti/
   saṃskāragatadārḍhyākhyajātiviśeṣakhaṇḍana ityarthaḥ/	saMskAra gata dArXya AKya jAti viSeza KaNxanaH iti arTaH/
   abhyāsasyaivānāpatteriti/ saṃskāradārḍhyārthameva abhyāsakaraṇāditi	aByAsasya eva anApatteH iti/ saMskAra dArXya arTam eva aByAsa karaNAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nanu jhaṭiti smṛtyarthaṃ jhaṭiti	BAvaH/ nanu Jawiti smRti arTam Jawiti
   smṛtiprayojakodbodhakasamavādhānārthaṃ vā śāstrābhyāsaḥ, na	smRti prayojaka udboDaka samavADAna arTam vA SAstra aByAsaH, na
   saṃskāradārḍhyārthaṃ ityataḥ doṣāntaramāha   kiṃ ceti/	saMskAra dArXya arTam iti atas doza antaram Aha  kim ca iti/
   niścitāvyabhicārakaṃ rūpamiti/ yaddharmāvacchinnai	niScitA avyaBicArakam rUpam iti/ yat Darma avacCinnE
   kāryāvyavahitapūrvavṛttyabhāvāpratiyogitvarūpāvyabhicāraniścayo 'sti	kArya avyavahita pUrva vRtti aBAva apratiyogi tva rUpa avyaBicAra niScayaH asti
   tādṛśaṃ dharmamityarthaḥ/	tAdRSam Darmam iti arTaH/
   kāryāvyavahitapūrvavṛttyabhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakatayā niścitaṃ	kArya avyavahita pUrva vRtti aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tayA niScitam
   dharmamiti yāvat/ gṛhyamāṇavyabhicārakeṇeti/ yaddharmāvacchinne	Darmam iti yAvat/ gRhyamANa vyaBicArakeNa iti/ yat Darma avacCinne
   vyabhicāro gṛhyate tena dharmeṇetyarthaḥ/ prakṛte	vyaBicAraH gRhyate tena DarmeNa iti arTaH/ prakRte
   smaraṇātpūrvamanubhavatvāvacchinnaṃ na niyamenāsti	smaraNAt pUrvam anuBava tva avacCinnam na niyamena asti
   dvitīyasmaraṇātpūrvamanubhavābhāvāt/ tathā cānubhavatvāvacchinnaṃ	dvitIya smaraNAt pUrvam anuBava aBAvAt/ taTA ca anuBava tva avacCinnam
   gṛhyamāṇavyabhicārakam/ dvitīyasmaraṇātpūrvamapi jñānatvāvacchinnasya	gRhyamANa vyaBicArakam/ dvitIya smaraNAt pUrvam api jQAna tva avacCinnasya
   prathamasmaraṇasya sattvāt jñānatvaṃ	praTama smaraNasya sattvAt jQAna tvam
   niścitāvyabhicārakam/ ataḥ niścitāvyabhicāreṇa jñānatvenaiva	niScita avyaBicArakam/ atas niScita avyaBicAreNa jQAna tvena eva
   smṛtihetutvam, na gṛhītavyabhicāroṇānubhavatveneti bhāvaḥ/ nanu	smRti hetu tvam, na gRhIta vyaBicAroNa anuBava tvena iti BAvaH/ nanu
   navīnamate anubhavasyeva smṛterapi saṃskāraṃ prati hetutayā	navIna mate anuBavasya iva smRteH api saMskAram prati hetu tayA
   smṛtijanye saṃskāre 'nubhavajanyatvābhāvāt 'anubhavajanyāsmṛtihetuḥ	smRti janye saMskAre anuBava janya tva aBAvAt aanuBava janyA smRti hetuH
   bhāvanā' iti lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāvyāptamityata āha   etanmata iti/ tathā ca	BAvanA a iti lakzaNam tatra avyAptam iti atas Aha  etat mataH iti/ taTA ca
   etanmate jñānajanyatve sati smṛtihetutvameva saṃskārasya lakṣaṇam/	etat mate jQAna janya tve sati smRti hetu tvam eva saMskArasya lakzaNam/
   smṛtijanyasaṃskāre 'pi smṛtirūpajñānajanyatvamastīti nāvyāptiriti	smRti janya saMskAre api smRti rUpa jQAna janya tvam asti iti na avyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇam	viSeza guNa lakzaNam
   anye rūpādayo	anye rUpa AdayaH 
   viśeṣaguṇāḥ/	viSeza guNAH/
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇāvṛttijātimadguṇatvaṃ	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa AvRtti jAti mat guNa tvam
   viśeṣaguṇatvam/	viSeza guNa tvam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   dravyavibhājakopādhīti/ pṛthivītvajalatvādirūpaṃ	dravya viBAja ka upa aDIti/ pRTivI tva jala tva Adi rUpam
   yaddravyavibhājakopādhidvayaṃ pratyekaṃ tatsamānādhikaraṇāḥ	yad dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayam pratyekam tad samAna aDikaraNAH
   dvitvapṛthaktvasaṃyogādayaḥ tadavṛttijātimadguṃṇatvamityarthaḥ/	dvi tva pRTaktva saMyoga AdayaH tad avRtti jAti mat guMNa tvam iti arTaH/
   rūpādviṣu caturṣu nīlatvādikam, [rūpatvādikam?] sāṃsiddhikadravatve ca	rUpAt vizu caturzu nIla tva Adi kam, [rUpa tva Adikam?] sAMsidDika drava tve ca
   dravatvāvāntarajātim, snehādiṣu daśasu	drava tvOvAntara jAtim, sneha Adizu daSasu
   snehatvādikam, bhāvanāyāṃ saṃskāratvāvāntarajātiṃ cādāya	sneha tva Adi kam, BAvanAyAm saMskAra tva avAntara jAtim ca AdAya
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ nanu idaṃ lakṣaṇa ekatvādiṣvativyāptam ekatvatvādi	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ nanu idam lakzaNaH eka tva Adizu ati vyAptam eka tva tva Adi
   jāterapi tādṛśatvāt/ na ca	jAteH api tAdRSa tvAt/ na ca
   tādṛśopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇavṛttiguṇatvanyūnavṛttijātiśūnyaguṇatvam iti	tAdRSa upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa vRtti guNa tva nyUna vRtti jAti SUnya guNa tvam iti
   tadarthaḥ/ evaṃ caikatvādiṣu saṅkhyātvādeḥ sattvāt	tad arTaH/ evam ca eka tva Adizu saFKyA tvAdeH sattvAt 
   tādṛśajātiśūnyatvasyāsattvena nātivyāptiriti vācyam/ evamapi	tAdRSa jAti SUnya tvasya asattvena na ati vyAptiH iti vAcyam/ evam api
   parimāṇādiṣvativyāpteḥ/ parimāṇatvādeḥ tādṛśajātitvāsambhavāt	parimANa Adizu ati vyApteH/ parimANa tva AdeH tAdRSa jAti tva asamBavAt
   iti cet  	iti ced  
   atra	atra
   pravadantyabhijñāḥ  	pravadanti aBijQAH  
   yadyadrūpāvacchinnasamānādhikaraṇaṃ yatkiñciddravyavibhājakopādhidvayaṃ	yat yad rUpa avacCinna samAna aDikaraNam yat kiQcid dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayam
   tattadbhinnā sthitasthāpakavṛttibhinnā ca yā jātiḥ tadvattve sati	tad tad BinnA sTita sTApaka vRtti BinnA ca yA jAtiH tadvat tve sati
   guṇatvamiti tadarthaḥ/ yadrūpāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyasya	guNa tvam iti tad arTaH/ yad rUpa avacCinna sAmAnADikaraNyasya
   samavāyasambandhaghaṭitasyaiva niveśanīyatayā yadrūpapadena	samavAya sambanDa Gawitasya eva niveSanIya tayA yad rUpa padena
   ghaṭatvāderdhartumaśakyatvāt ghaṭādau ativyāptiḥ, ato viśeṣyam/	Gawa tva AdeH DaRtum aSakyatvAt Gawa AdO ati vyAptiH, atas viSezyam/
   sthitasthāpake 'tivyāptivāraṇāya sthitasthāpakavṛttibhinneti/	sTita sTApake ati vyApti vAraNAya sTita sTApaka vRtti Bid na iti/
   sthitasthāpakasya pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayavṛttitvamate tu na deyam/	sTita sTApakasya pRTivI Adi catuzwaya vRtti tva mate tu na deyam/
   rūpatvādeḥ yadrūpapadena dhartuṃ aśakyatve 'pyavāntarajātimādāya	rUpa tva AdeH yad rUpa padena Dartum aSakya tve api avAntara jAtim AdAya
   rūpādiṣu lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ pārthivānuṣṇāśītasparśasya vāyavīyāpekṣayā	rUpa Adizu lakzaNa samanvayaH/ pArTiva an uzNa aSIta sparSasya vAyavIya apekzayA
   vijātīyasyaiva anubhavasiddhatvāt/ saṅkhyādayastu sāmānyaguṇā	vijAtIyasya eva anuBava sidDa tvAt/ saFKI A AdayaH tu sAmAnya guNA
   iti na tatra vaijātyaṃ jalapṛthivyādibhedena siddhāntasiddham, ataḥ	iti na tatra vEjAtyam jala pRTivI Adi Bedena sidDAnta sidDam, atas 
   tatra nātivyāptiḥ/ tādṛśajātimadbhinnaguṇatvameva sāmānyaguṇānāṃ	tatra na ati vyAptiH/ tAdRSa jAtimat Binna guNa tvam eva sAmAnya guNAnAm
   lakṣaṇamavaseyam/	lakzaNam avaseyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nanu	nanu
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇāvṛttijātimadguṇatvaṃ	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa AvRtti jAti mat guNa tvam
   viśeṣaguṇasya dīpikāyāṃ lakṣaṇamuktam/ tatra dravyavibhājakopādhidvayaṃ	viSeza guNasya dIpikAyAm lakzaNam uktam/ tatra dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayam
   pṛthivītvajalatvādi tadadhikaraṇamaprasiddham,	pRTivI tva jala tva Adi tad aDikaraNam aprasidDam,
   pṛthivītvajalatvayorekatrāsattvāt, tathā ca lakṣaṇamidamasambhavītyato	pRTivI tva jala tvayoH ekatra asat tva at, taTA ca lakzaNam idam asamBavi iti atas 
   vyācaṣṭe   pṛthivītvajalatvādirūpamiti/ pṛthivītvajalatvayorubhayoḥ	vyAcazwe  pRTivI tva jala tva Adi rUpa miti/ pRTivI tva jala tvayoH uBayoH
   adhikaraṇasyāprasiddhatve 'pi pratyekaṃ tayoradhikaraṇaṃ pṛthivī jalaṃ ca	aDikaraNasya aprasidDa tve api pratyekam tayoH aDikaraNam pRTivI jalam ca
   prasiddham/ tadvṛttayaḥ dvitvapṛthaktvasaṃyogādayaḥ tadavṛttirjātiḥ	prasidDam/ tad vRttayaH dvi tva pRTaktva saMyoga AdayaH tad avRttiH jAtiH
   rūpatvarasatvādiḥ tadvān guṇaḥ rūparasādiriti	rUpa tva rasa tva AdiH tadvAn guNaH rUpa rasa AdiH iti
   tādṛśajātimadguṇatvasya rūparasādau sattvāt lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	tAdRSa jAtimat guNa tvasya rUpa rasa AdO sattvAt lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   rūpādikaṃ tu dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇaṃ na bhavati,	rUpa Adikam tu dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNam na Bavati,
   dravyavibhājakapṛthivītvajalatvadvayādhikaraṇapṛthivījalayoḥ ekasya	dravya viBAjaka pRTivI tva jala tva dvaya aDikaraNa pRTivI jalayoH ekasya
   rūpasya rasādeḥ vā avṛtteḥ/ ato dviniṣṭhaṃ dvitvādikameva tādṛśaṃ	rUpasya rasa AdeH vA avRtteH/ atas dvi nizWam dvi tva Adikam eva tAdRSam
   tadavṛttitvaṃ rūpatvādijātāvastīti bhāvaḥ/ atra pratyekamityasya	tad avRtti tvam rUpa tva Adi jAtO= asti iti BAvaH/ atra pratyekam iti asya
   tatsamānādhikaraṇetyatrādhikaraṇa evānvayaḥ na tu	tad samAna aDikaraNa iti atra aDikaraNaH eva anvayaH na tu
   tadadhikaraṇavṛttitve 'pītyavadheyam/ nīlatvādikamiti/ ādipadena	tad aDikaraNa vRtti tve api iti avaDeyam/ nIla tva Adika miti/ Adipadena
   rasatvavyāpyaṃ madhuratvādi sparśatvavyāpyaṃ anuṣṇāśītatvādi ca	rasa tva vyApyam maDura tva Adi sparSa tu a vyApyam anuzNa aSIta tva Adi ca
   gṛhyate/ na ca rūpatvarasatvādijātimādāyaiva samanvayasambhave	gRhyate/ na ca rUpa tva rasa tva Adi jAtim AdAya eva samanvaya samBave
   tadvyāpyanīlatvādijātimādāya samanvayakaraṇaṃ kimarthamiti	tad vyApya nIla tva Adi jAtim AdAya samanvaya karaNam kimarTam iti
   vācyam/"atra pravadantī"tyādinā vakṣyamāṇapariṣkāra eva	vAcyam /"atra pravadanti i"tyAdinA vakzyamANa parizkAraH eva
   lakṣaṇasyāsya tātparyāt tatra rūpatvādivyāpyajātimādāyaiva	lakzaNasya asya tAtparyAt tatra rUpa tva Adi vyApyajAtim AdAya eva
   samanvayasya kartavyatvāt/ dravatvāvāntarajātimiti/ dravatvatvavyāpyāṃ	samanvayasya kartavya tva at/ drava tvOvAntara jAti miti/ drava tva tva vyApyAm
   sāṃsiddhikadravatvatvarūpāṃ jātimityarthaḥ/ snehādiṣu daśasviti/	sAMsidDi ka drava tvatva rUpAm jAtim iti arTaH/ sneha Adizu daSasu iti/
   snehaśabdabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmeṣvityarthaḥ/	sneha Sabda budDi suKa duHKa icCA dveza prayatna Darma aDarmezu iti arTaH/
   saṃskāratvāvāntarajātimiti/ saṃskāratvavyāpyāṃ	saMskAra tva avAntara jAti miti/ saMskAra tva vyApyAm
   bhāvanātvajātimityarthaḥ/	BAvanA tva jAtim iti arTaH/
   śaṅkate   nanvidamiti/	SaFkate  nanu idam iti/
   pṛthivītvajalatvarūpayoḥ dravyavibhājakayordvayorupādhyoḥ	pRTivI tva jala tva rUpayoH dravya viBAjakayoH dvayoH upADyoH
   pratyekamadhikaraṇe pṛthivyāṃ jale ca ekatvaṃ nāsti/	pratyekam aDikaraNe pRTivyAm jale ca eka tvam nAsti/
   pṛthivīvṛttyekatvasya jalavṛttyekatvasya ca bhinnatvena ekasya ekatvasya	pRTivI vRtti ekatvasya jala vRtti eka tvasya ca Binna tvena ekasya eka tvasya
   ubhayatrāvṛtteḥ/ tathā ca tādṛśopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇāḥ	uBayatra AvRtteH/ taTA ca tAdRSa upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNAH
   dvitvasaṃyogādaya eva, tadavṛttiḥ yā jātiḥ ekatvatvarūpā jātiḥ	dvi tva saMyoga AdayaH eva, tad avRttiH yA jAtiH eka tva tva rUpA jAtiH
   tadvadguṇatvaṃsyaikatve sattvāt	tadvat guNa tvaMsya eka tve sattvAt 
   viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇasya	viSeza guNa lakzaNasya
   sāmānyaguṇe ekatve 'tivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ tādṛśatvāditi/	sAmAnya guNe eka tve ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ tAdRSa tvAt iti/
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇāvṛttitvādityarthaḥ/ na ca	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa AvRtti tvAt iti arTaH/ na ca
   tādṛśeti/ tādṛśetyasya dravyavibhājaketyarthaḥ/ tathā ca	tAdRSA iti/ tAdRSa iti asya dravya viBAjaka iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayaṃ pṛthivītvajalatvādi pratyekaṃ	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayam pRTivI tva jala tva Adi pratyekam
   tadadhikaraṇapṛthivījalavṛttiḥ dvitvapṛthaktvādiḥ tadvṛttiḥ	tad aDikaraNa pRTivI jala vRttiH dvi tva pRTaktva AdiH tad vRttiH
   guṇatvavyāpyajātiḥ saṅkhyātva pṛthaktvatvādiḥ tacchūnyaguṇatvaṃ	guNa tva vyApya jAtiH saFKyA tva  pRTaktva tva AdiH tat SUnya guNa tvam
   rūpādāvasti/ ekatve tu nāsti, saṅkhyātvarūpatādṛśajātimattvasyaiva	rUpAt Avasti/ ekatve tu nAsti, saFKyA tva rUpa tAdRSa jAtimat tvasya eva
   sattvāt/ ato nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ guṇatvanyūnavṛttīti/	sattva at/ atas na ati vyAptiH iti BAvaH/ guNa tva nyUna vRtti iti/
   guṇatvavyāpyetyarthaḥ/ evamapīti/	guNa tva vyApya iti arTaH/ evam api iti/
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇavṛttiguṇatvavyāpyajātiśūnyaguṇatvasya	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa vRtti guNa tva vyApya jAti SUnya guNa tvasya
   viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇatve 'pītyarthaḥ/ parimāṇādiṣvativyāpteriti/	viSeza guNa lakzaNa tve api iti arTaH/ parimANa Adizu ati vyApteH iti/
   aṇutvamahattvādirūpaṃ parimāṇaṃ pratyekavṛtti na vyāsajyavṛtti/ ataḥ	aNu tva mahat tva Adi rUpam parimANam pratyeka vRtti na vyAsa jya vRtti/ atas 
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇaṃ na parimāṇam, api tu	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNam na parimANam, api tu
   dvitvādikameva tadvṛttiryā guṇatvavyāṣyajātiḥ saṅkhyātvādiḥ	dvi tva Adikam eva tad vRttiH yA guNa tva vyAzya jAtiH saFKyAtu AdiH
   tacchūnyatve sati guṇatvasya parimāṇe sattvāt tatrātivyāptiriti	tat SUnya tve sati guNa tvasya parimANe sattvAt tatra ati vyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ tādṛśajātitvāsambhavāditi/	BAvaH/ tAdRSa jAti tva asamBavAt iti/
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasamānādhikaraṇavṛttiguṇatvavyāpyajātitvāsambhavādityarthaḥ/	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvaya samAna aDikaraNa vRtti guNa tva vyApya jAti tva AsamBavAt iti arTaH/
   yadyadrūpeti/ yadyadrūpaṃ	yat yad rUpeti/ yat yat rUpam
   saṃyogatvapṛthaktvatvādikaṃ tadavacchinnasaṃyogapṛthaktvāderadhikaraṇe	saMyoga tva pRTaktva tva Adikam tad avacCinna saMyoga pRTaktva AdeH aDikaraNe
   jale pṛthivyāṃ ca pratyekaṃ	jale pRTivyAm ca pratyekam
   vartamānaṃ	vartamAnam
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayaṃ jalatvapṛthivītvarūpam, tattadbhinnā	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayam jala tva pRTivI tva rUpam, tad tad BinnA
   saṃyogatvapṛthaktvatvādibhinnā yā jātiḥ nīlatvādiḥ tadvattve sati	saMyoga tva pRTaktva tva Adi BinnA yA jAtiH nIla tva AdiH tadvat tve sati
   guṇatvaṃ nīlādiṣvastīti samanvayaḥ/ atra guṇatvarūpaviśeṣyadalasya	guNa tvam nIla Adizu asti iti samanvayaH/ atra guNa tva rUpa viSezya dalasya
   prayojanamāha   yadrūpāvacchinneti/ tathā ca yadrūpapadena ghaṭatvaṃ	prayojanam Aha  yad rUpa avacCinnA iti/ taTA ca yad rUpa padena Gawa tvam
   nopādātuṃ śakyam/ tadavacchinnasya ghaṭasyādhikaraṇe kapāle	na upAdAtum Sakyam/ tad avacCinnasya Gawasya aDikaraNe kapAle
   dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasya jalatvapṛthivītvadvayasyāsattvāt/ ataḥ	dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayasya jala tva pRTivI tva dvayasya asattva at/ atas 
   saṃyogatvādikameva yadrūpapadenopādeyam, tadbhinna yā	saMyoga tva Adikam eva yad rUpa padena upAdeyam, tat Bid na yA
   ghaṭatvajātiḥ tadvattvasya ghaṭe sattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ, tadvāraṇāya	Gawa tva jAtiH tadvat tvasya Gawe sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH, tad vAraNAya
   guṇapadam/ na ca yadrūpapadena ghaṭatvamapyupādātuṃ śakyate	guNa padam/ na ca yad rUpa padena Gawa tvam api upAdAtum Sakyate
   tadavacchinnasya ghaṭasya kālikasambandhenādhikaraṇe kāle	tad avacCinnasya Gawasya kAlika sambanDena aDikaraNe kAle
   kālikasambandhena jalatvapṛthivītvātmakopādhidvayasattvāt	kAlika sambanDena jala tva pRTivI tva Atmaka upADi dvaya sattvAt
   tadbhinnatvaṃ ca ghaṭatve nāstīti kathaṃ ativyāptiprasaktiriti vācyam/	tad Binna tvam ca Gawa tve na asti iti kaTam ati vyApti prasaktiH iti vAcyam/
   śuklatvāvacchinnasya kālikasambandhenādhikaraṇe jale pṛthivyāṃ ca	Sukla tva avacCinnasya kAlika sambanDena aDikaraNe jale pRTivyAm ca
   jalatvapṛthivītvadvayasattvāt tadṛbhinnatvaṃ śuklatvādijātau	jala tva pRTivI tva dvaya sattvAt tad RBinna tvam Sukla tva Adi jAtO
   nāstītyasambhavavāraṇāya samavāyasambandhena yadrūpāvacchinnādhikaraṇe	na asti iti asamBava vAraNAya samavAya sambanDena yat rUpa avacCinna aDikaraNe
   samavāyasambandhena vartamānamityarthasyaiva	samavAya sambanDena vartamAnam iti arTasya eva
   yadrūpāvacchinnasamānādhikaraṇamityanena vivakṣitatvāt kāle	yad rUpa avacCinna samAna aDikaraNam iti anena vivakzita tvAt kAle
   ghaṭatvāvacchinnasya samavāyenāsattvāt kālo na samavāyena	Gawa tva avacCinnasya samavAyena asattvAt kAlaH na samavAyena
   ghaṭatvāvacchinnādhikaraṇam, api tu kapāla eveti tadvṛttitvasya	Gawa tva avacCinna aDikaraNam, api tu kapAlaH eva iti tad vRtti tvasya
   jalatvapṛthivītvadvaye 'bhāvāt yadrūpapadena	jala tva pRTivI tva dvaye aBAvAt yad rUpa padena
   ghaṭatvasyopādātumaśakyatayā saṃyogatvādikamupādāya tadbhinnā ya	Gawa tvasya upAdAtum aSakya tayA saMyoga tva Adikam upAdAya tad BinnA ya
   ghaṭatvajātiḥ tadvattvāt ghaṭe 'tivyāptiprasaktirityāśayāt/	Gawa tva jAtiH tadvat tvAt Gawe ati vyApti prasaktiH iti ASayAt /
   sthitasthāpaka iti/	sTita sTApakaH iti/
   sthitasthāpakatvāvacchinnādhikaraṇakaṭādau jalatvapṛthivītvobhayābhāvena	sTita sTApakatva avacCinna aDikaraNa kawAdO jala tva pRTivI tva uBaya aBAvena
   yadrūpapadena sthitasthāpakatvaṃ nopādātuṃ śakyate, api tu	yad rUpa padena sTita sTApaka tvam na upAdAtum Sakyate, api tu
   saṃyogatvādikameva tadbhinnā yā jātiḥ sthitasthāpakatvarūpā jātiḥ	saMyoga tva Adikam eva tad BinnA yA jAtiH sTita sTApaka tva rUpA jAtiH
   tadvadguṇatvasya sthitasthāpake sattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	tadvat guNa tvasya sTita sTApake sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya
   jātau sthitasthāpakavṛttibhinneti viśeṣaṇam/ sthitasthāpakatvaṃ tu	jAtO sTita sTApaka vRtti Binna iti viSezaNam/ sTita sTApaka tvam tu
   sthitasthāpakavṛtti, na tadṛbhinnamiti na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ na	sTita sTApaka vRtti, na tadRBinnam iti na dozaH iti BAvaH/ na
   deyamiti/ tanmate sthitasthāpakādhikaraṇaṃ jalaṃ pṛthivī ca tadvṛttitvaṃ	deyam iti/ tad mate sTita sTApaka aDikaraNam jalam pRTivI ca tad vRtti tvam
   jalatvapṛthivītvayorastīti yadrūpapadena sthitasthāpakatvamapi grahītuṃ	jala tva pRTivI tvayoH asti iti yad rUpa padena sTita sTApaka tvam api grahItum
   śakyate tadbhinnatvaṃ nāsti tasyetyata eva ativyāptivāraṇasambhavāt	Sakyate tat Binna tvam na asti tasya iti atas eva ati vyApti vAraNa samBavAt 
   sthitasthāpakavṛttibhinneti viśeṣaṇaṃ na deyamiti bhāvaḥ/	sTita sTApaka vRtti Binna iti viSezaNam na deyam iti BAvaH/
   nanu yadrūpapadena rūpatvamapi grahatuṃ	nanu yad rUpa padena rUpa tvam api grahatum
   śakyam, rūpatvāvacchinnarūpādhikaraṇe jale pṛthivyāṃ ca	Sakyam, rUpa tva avacCinna rUpa aDikaraNe jale pRTivyAm ca
   jalatvapṛthivītvadvayasattvāt tadbhinnā rūpatvabhinnā rūpatvajātiḥ na	jala tva pRTivI tva dvaya sattvAt tad BinnA rUpa tva BinnA rUpa tva jAtiH na
   bhavatīti kathaṃ rūpe lakṣaṇasamanvaya ityata āha   rūpatvāderiti/ tathā	Bavati iti kaTam rUpe lakzaNa samanvayaH iti atas Aha  rUpa tva Aderiti/ taTA
   ca rūpatvabhinnāṃ nīlatvādijātimādāya nīlādau samanvaya iti	ca rUpa tva BinnAm nIla tva Adi jAtim AdAya nIla AdO samanvayaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nanu sparśe kathaṃ lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ na tāvat sparśatvamādāya/	BAvaH/ nanu sparSe kaTam lakzaNa samanvayaH/ na tAvat sparSa tvam AdAya/
   tasyāpi yadrūpapadenopādātuṃ śakyatvāt/ tathā hi yadrūpaṃ	tasya api yad rUpa padena upAdAtum Sakya tvAt/ taTA hi yat rUpam
   sparśatvam tadavacchinnādhikaraṇaṃ jalaṃ pṛthivī ca, tadvṛtti	sparSa tvam tad avacCinna aDikaraNam jalam pRTivI ca, tad vRtti
   jalatvapṛthivītvadvayaṃ bhavati, ataḥ spaśabtvabhinnā sparśatvajātiḥ na	jala tva pRTivI tva dvayam Bavati, atas spa Sabtu aBinnA sparSa tva jAtiH na
   bhavati iti sparśatvamādāya samanvayaḥ kartumaśakyaḥ/ nāpi	Bavati iti sparSa tvam AdAya samanvayaH kartum aSakyaH/ na api
   anuṣṇāśītasparśatvādikamādāya, tatra śītoṣṇatve ādāya	anuzNa aSIta sparSa tva Adikam AdAya, tatra SIta uzNa tve AdAya
   śītoṣṇasparśayoḥ samanvayasambhave 'pi anuṣṇāśītatvamādāya	SIta uzNa sparSayoH samanvaya samBave api anuzNa aSIta tvam AdAya
   anuṣṇāśīte samanvayo na sambhavati, yadrūpapadena	anuzNa aSIte samanvayaH na samBavati, yad rUpa padena
   anuṣṇāśītatvamapyupādātuṃ śakyate tadavacchinnādhikaraṇe pṛthivyāṃ	anuzNa aSIta tvam api upAdAtum Sakyate tad avacCinna aDikaraNe pRTivyAm
   vāyau ca dravyavibhājakopādhidvayasya vāyutvapṛthivītvarūpasya sattvāt	vAyO ca dravya viBAjaka upADi dvayasya vAyu tva pRTivI tva rUpasya sattvAt 
   tadrūpabhinnatvaṃ anuṣṇāśītatve nāstītyāśaṅkyāha  	tad rUpa Binna tvam anuzNa aSIta tve na asti iti ASaFkya Aha  
   pārthivānuṣṇāśītarspaśasyeti/ tathā ca anuṣṇāśītatvavyāpyā	pArTivAn uzNa ASI tarspaSasya iti/ taTA ca anuzNa aSIta tva vyApyA
   pārthivānuṣṇāśītasparśe, vāyavīyasparśe 'vidyamānā kācana	pArTiva an uzNa aSIta sparSe, vAyavIya sparSe avidyamAnA kAcana
   vilakṣaṇajātirasti, evaṃ vācavīyānuṣṇāśītasparśe ca	vilakzaNa jAtiH asti, evam vAcavIya an uzNa aSIta sparSe ca
   pārthivasparśe 'vidyamānā kācana jātirasti/ tāṃ tāmādāya pāthivasparśe	pArTiva sparSe avidyamAnA kAcana jAtiH asti/ tAm tAm AdAya pATiva sparSe
   vācavīyasparśe ca samanvayaḥ/ tathā hi   yadrūpapadena sā jātiḥ na	vAcavIya sparSe ca samanvayaH/ taTA hi  yad rUpa padena sA jAtiH na
   grahaṇayogyā tādṛśajātyavacchinnādhikaraṇe pṛthivyāṃ	grahaNa yogyA tAdRSa jAti avacCinna aDikaraNe pRTivyAm
   vāyutvapṛthivītvarūpopādhidvayāsattvāt api tu saṃyogatvādireva	vAyu tva pRTivI tva rUpa upADi dvaya asattvAt api tu saMyoga tva AdiH eva
   grāhyā, tadbhinnatvaṃ ca pārthiṃvasparśagatavijātau vartate tadvatvāt	grAhyA, tad Binna tvam ca pArTiMva sparSa gata vijAtO vartate tadvatvAt 
   pārthiṃvasparśeṃ samanvayaḥ/	pArTiMva sparSem samanvayaH/
   evaṃ vāyavīyasparśe 'pi samanvayo bodhya iti bhāvaḥ/	evam vAyavIya sparSe api samanvayaH boDyaH iti BAvaH/
   nanvevaṃ pṛthivīgataikatve	nanu evam pRTivI gata eka tve
   jalīyaikatve 'vidyamānā kācana jātirastīti svīkṛtya	jalIya eka tve avidyamAnA kAcana jAtiH asti iti svIkRtya
   ekatve 'tivyāptiprasaktirityata āha   saṅkhyādayastu sāmānyaguṇā	eka tve ati vyApti prasaktiH iti atas Aha  saFKI A AdayaH tu sAmAnya guNA
   iti/ tathā caikatve vaijātyābhāvāt sakalaikatvasādhāraṇamekatvatvaṃ	iti/ taTA ca eka tve vEjAtya aBAvAt sakala eka tva sADAraNam ekatva tvam
   yadrūpapadenopādeyam tadavacchinnādhikaraṇaṃ jalaṃ pṛthivī ca tadvṛtti	yad rUpa padena upAdeyam tad avacCinna aDikaraNam jalam pRTivI ca tad vRtti
   jalatvapṛthivītvarūpopādhidvayam/ atastadbhinnā ekatvatvabhinnā	jala tva pRTivI tva rUpa upADi dvayam/ atas tad BinnA ekatva tva BinnA
   ekatvatvajātiḥ na bhavatīti naikatve 'tivyāptirityāśayaḥ/	eka tva tva jAtiH na Bavati iti na ekatve ati vyAptiH iti ASayaH/
   tādṛśajātimadbhinnaguṇatvamiti/	tAdRSa jAtimat Binna guNa tvam iti/

   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   karmanirūpaṇam	karma nirUpaNam

   karmaṇo lakṣaṇamāha	karmaNaH lakzaNam Aha

   nityatvaṃ prāgabhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ dhvaṃsāpratiyogitvaṃ vā,	nitya tvam prAc aBAva apratiyogi tvam DvaMsa apratiyogi tvam vA,

   iti/ nityadravyāṇāṃ paraspara bhedasādhakā ityarthaḥ atha	iti/ nitya dravyANAm paraspara Beda sADakAH iti arTaH aTa

   vācyam, ekatvādivyaktereva bhedakatvasaṃmbhavāt iti cet   na/	vAcyam, eka tva Adi vyakteH eva Bedaka tva saMmBavAt iti ced  na/

   aparāśritamevāvatiṣṭhate tau ayutasiddhau/ yathā avayavāvayavinau,	apara ASritam eva avatizWate tO ayuta sidDO/ yaTA avayavO= ayavinO,

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   samavāyaṃ lakṣayati  	samavAyam lakzayati  
   nityeti/ saṃyoge ativyāptivāraṇāya nityeti/	nityeti/ saMyoge ati vyApti vAraNAya nitya iti/
   ākāśādāvativyāptivāraṇāya sambandheti/ ayutasiddhalakṣaṇamāha  	AkASa AdO= ati vyApti vAraNAya sambanDa iti/ ayutasidDa lakzaNam Aha  
   yayoriti/ nīlo ghaṭa iti	yayoH iti/ nIlaH GawaH iti

   daṇḍīti viśiṣṭabuddhivat iti samavāyasiddhiḥ/	daNxI iti viSizwa budDi vat iti samavAya sidDiH/

   avayavi/	avayavi/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   vaiśeṣikamatasādhāraṇyena samavāye anumānaṃ pramāṇayati   nīla	vESezika mata sADAraNyena samavAye anumAnam pramANayati  nIla
   iti/ samavāyikāraṇatvasya antyāvayavini sattvāt dravyeti/	iti/ samavAyikAraNa tvasya antyAvayavini sattvAt dravya iti/
   paramāṇuvāraṇāya janyeti/ avinaśyadavasthamaparāritamevāvatiṣṭhate	paramANu vAraNAya janyA iti/ avinaSyat avasTam aparAritam eva avatizWate
   vinaśyadavasthaṃ tvanāśritaṃ kṣaṇamavatiṣṭhate yathā tantvādināśe	vinaSyat avasTam tu anASritam kzaNam avatizWate yaTA tantu Adi nASe
   paṭādiriti manasikṛtya mūle avinaśyadityuktam/	pawAdiH iti manasikRtya mUle avinaSyat iti uktam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   'dravyasamavāyikāraṇam avayavaḥ' iti dīpikātaḥ	adravya samavAyi kAraNam avayavaH a iti dIpikAtaH
   dravyanirūpitasamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ avayavasya lakṣaṇamiti labhyate/	dravya nirUpita samavAyi kAraNa tvam avayavasya lakzaNam iti laByate/
   ghaṭarūpadravyasamavāyikāraṇatvasya kapāle sattvāt lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	Gawa rUpa dravya samavAyi kAraNa tvasya kapAle sattvAt lakzaNa samanvayaH/
   tatra	tatra
   samavāyikāraṇatvamātroktau avayavini ghaṭe 'pi	samavAyi kAraNa tva mAtra uktO avayavini Gawe api
   tatsamavetarūpādisamavāyikāraṇatvasattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ/	tad samaveta rUpa Adi samavAyikAraNatva sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH/
   tadvāraṇāya samavāyikāraṇatve dravyanirūpiteti viśeṣaṇam/	tad vAraNAya samavAyi kAraNa tve dravya nirUpitA iti viSezaNam/
   avayavinaḥ ghaṭasya guṇādinirūpitasamavāyikāraṇatvasattve 'pi	avayavinaH Gawasya guNa Adi nirUpita samavAyi kAraNatva sattve api
   dravyanirūpitasamavāyikāraṇatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiḥ/ tadāha  	dravya nirUpita samavAyi kAraNa tva aBAvAt na ati vyAptiH/ tat Aha  
   samavāyikāraṇatvasyeti/ kapālarūpe 'vayavini avayavatvasyeṣṭatayā	samavAyi kAraNa tvasya iti/ kapAla rUpe avayavini avayava tvasya izwa tayA
   tatrātivyāptirneti sūcanāya antyāvayavinītyuktam/ janyaṃ	tatra ativyAptiH na iti sUcanAya antyAvayavini iti uktam/ janyam
   dravyamavayavīti granthena janyatve sati dravyatvam avayavino	dravyam avayavI iti granTena janya tve sati dravya tvam avayavinaH 
   lakṣaṇamuktam/ tatra janyatvamātroktau janyaguṇadāvativyāptiḥ/	lakzaNam uktam/ tatra janya tva mAtra uktO janya guNa dA= ativyAptiH/
   tadvāraṇāya dravyatvamupāttam/ dravyatvamātroktau avayave	tad vAraNAya dravya tvam upAttam/ dravya tva mAtra uktO avayave
   paramāṇāvativyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya janyatvamupāttm/ tadāha  	paramANO= ati vyAptiH/ tad vAraNAya janya tvam upAttm/ tat Aha  
   paramāṇuvāraṇāyeti/ paramamūle 'yayormadhye	paramANu vAraNAya iti/ parama mUle ayayoH maDye
   ekamavinaśyadavasthamaparāśritamevāvatiṣṭhate tāvayutasiddhau' iti	ekam avinaSyat avasTam apara ASritam eva avatizWate tO= ayuta sidDO a iti
   granthena ayutasiddhayorlakṣaṇamuktam/ yayormadhye tantupaṭayormadhye	granTena ayuta sidDayoH lakzaNam uktam/ yayoH maDye tantu pawayoH maDye
   ekaḥ paṭaḥ tantvāśrita evāvatiṣṭhate iti tau tantupaṭāvayutasiddhau/	ekaH pawaH tantu ASritaH eva avatizWate iti tO tantu pawO= ayuta sidDO/
   tatra vinaśyadavastha ityasya nāśapūrvakṣaṇasya ityarthaḥ/	tatra vinaSyat avasTaH iti asya nASa pUrvakzaNasya iti arTaH/
   avinaśyadavastha	avinaSyat avasTa
   ityasya nāśāvyavahitapūrvakṣaṇāt pūrvakṣaṇeṣu vidyamāna ityarthaḥ/	iti asya nASA vyavahita pUrva kzaNAt pUrva kzaNezu vidyamAnaH iti arTaH/
   svāvyavahitapūrvakṣaṇavṛttitva svapratiyogitvobhayasambandhena	svAvyavahita pUrva kzaNa vRtti tva  sva pratiyogitva uBaya sambanDena
   nāśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vinaśyadavasthatvamiti yāvat/ tatra	nASa viSizwa tvam vinaSyat avasTa tvam iti yAvat/ tatra
   avinaśyadavasthamiti viśeṣaṇasya prayojanamāha  	avinaSyat avasTam iti viSezaNasya prayojanam Aha  
   avinaśyadavasthamityādinā/ ayamatrāśayaḥ yadi ekamityasya	avinaSyat avasTam ityAdinA/ ayam atra ASayaH yadi ekam iti asya
   avinaśyadavasthamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ na dīyate, tarhi yayormadhye	avinaSyat avasTam iti viSezaNam na dIyate, tarhi yayoH maDye
   ekamaparāśritamevāvatiṣṭhate tāvayutasiddhāviti ayutasiddhalakṣaṇaṃ	ekam apara ASritam eva avatizWate tO= ayuta sidDO= iti ayuta sidDa lakzaNam
   syāt/ tathā sati tantupaṭayoravyāptiḥ/ tantupaṭayormadhye ekasya	syAt/ taTA sati tantu pawayoH avyAptiH/ tantu pawayoH maDye ekasya
   paṭasya tantvāśritatayaivāvasthānamiti niyamābhāvāt, yadā	pawasya tantu ASrita tayA eva avasTAnam iti niyama aBAvAt, yadA
   tantunāśāt paṭanāśaḥ tadā tantunāśakṣaṇe paṭasya	tantu nASAt pawa nASaH tadA tantunA SakzaNe pawasya
   tantvanāśritasyaivāvasthānāt/ ataḥ paṭasya avinaśyadavasthetiṃ	tantu anASritasya eva avasTAnAt/ atas pawasya avinaSyat avasTA itim
   viśeṣaṇam/ tantunāśakṣaṇasthaḥ paṭaḥ vinaśyadavasthaḥ, uttarakṣaṇe paṭasya	viSezaNam/ tantunA SakzaNa sTaH pawaH vinaSyat avasTaH, uttarakzaNe pawasya
   nāśāt,	nASAt,
   nāśāvyavahitapūrvakṣaṇasthatvarūpavinaśyadavasthalakṣaṇākrāntatvāt/ ataḥ	nASA vyavahita pUrva kzaNa sTa tva rUpa vinaSyat avasTa lakzaNa AkrAnta tvAt/ atas 
   avinaśyadavasthaḥ paṭaḥ tantunāśapūrvakṣaṇāvacchinnapaṭaḥ tasya tu	avinaSyat avasTaH pawaH tantu nASa pUrva kzaNa avacCinna pawaH tasya tu
   tantvāśritatayaivāvasthānāt nāvyāptiriti/ tantvādināśa iti/	tantu ASrita tayA eva avasTAnAt na avyAptiH iti/ tantu Adi nASaH iti/
   tantvādināśakṣaṇe ityarthaḥ/	tantu AdinA SakzaNe iti arTaH/
   tarkasaṅgrahaḥ	tarka saFgrahaH
   abhāvanirūpaṇam	aBAva nirUpaNam
   AnTs_80 anādiḥ sāntaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ / utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ kāryasya / sādir	AnTH _80 anAdiH sa antaH prAc aBAvaH / utpatteH pUrvam kAryasya / sAdiH 
   anantaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ / utpattyanantaraṃ kāryasya /	anantaH praDvaMsaH / utpatti anantaram kAryasya /

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   prāgabhāvaṃ lakṣayati	prAgaBAvam lakzayati
     anādiriti/ ākāśādau ativyāpitavāraṇāya sānta iti/ ghaṭādau	 anAdiH iti/ AkASa AdO ati vyApita vAraNAya sa antaH iti/ Gawa AdO
   ativyāpitavāraṇāya anādiriti/ pratiyogisamavāyikāraṇavattiḥ	ati vyApita vAraNAya anAdiH iti/ pratiyogi samavAyi kAraNa vattiH
   pratiyogijanako bhaviṣyatīti vyavahārahetuḥ prāgabhāvaḥ/ dhvaṃsaṃ	pratiyogi janakaH Bavizyati iti vyavahAra hetuH prAgaBAvaH/ DvaMsam

   pratiyogisamavāyikāraṇavṛttiḥ dhvasta iti vyavahārahetuḥ dhvaṃsaḥ/	pratiyogi samavAyi kAraNa vRttiH DvastaH iti vyavahAra hetuH DvaMsaH/

   traikāliketi/	trEkAlikA iti/
   anyonyābhāve ativyāptivāraṇāya saṃsargeti/	anyonya aBAve ati vyApti vAraNAya saMsarga iti/
   dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorativyāptivāraṇāya traikālika iti/	DvaMsa prAgaBAvayoH ati vyApti vAraNAya trEkAlikaH iti/

   kevaladevadattābhāvāt 'daṇḍyabhāva' iti pratītyā viśiṣṭābhāvaḥ,	kevala devadatta aBAvAt adaNxya BAva a iti pratItyA viSizwa aBAvaH,
   'ekasattvepi dvau na staḥ' iti pratītyā dvitvāvacchinnābhāvaḥ,	aeka sattva ipi dvO na staH a iti pratItyA dvi tva avacCinna aBAvaH,
   saṃyogena ghaṭavati samavāyena ghaṭābhāvaḥ, tattadghaṭābhāvāt	saMyogena Gawavati samavAyena Gawa aBAvaH, tad tad GawA BAvAt
   ghaṭatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākasāmānyābhāvaśca atiriktaḥ/	Gawa tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka sAmAnya aBAvaH ca atiriktaH/
   evamanyonyābhāvo 'pi/	evam anyonya aBAvaH api/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prāgabhāve	prAc aBAve
   pramāṇamāha   bhaviṣyatīti/ saṃsargeti/ tādātmyātiriktasaṃsargetyarthaḥ/	pramANam Aha  Bavizyati iti/ saMsarga iti/ tAdAtmya atirikta saMsarga iti arTaH/
   dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorapi pratiyogitāvacchedakasambandhaḥ vartata iti	DvaMsa prAc aBAvayoH api pratiyogi ta avacCedaka sambanDaH vartate iti

   traikāliketi siddhānte 'pi sārthakaṃ traikālikatvamiha nityatvarūpam/	trEkAlikA iti sidDAnte api sArTakam trEkAlika tvam iha nitya tva rUpam/
   mūle bhūtale ghaṭo	mUle BU tale Gawo
   nāstīti/ atra ghaṭābhāvāṃśe bhūtalasya viśeṣyatvaṃ sambandhaḥ,	na asti iti/ atra Gawa aBAva aMSe BU talasya viSezya tvam sambanDaH,
   ghaṭābhāvavat bhūtalam ityatra tu bhūtalāṃśe abhāvasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ	Gawa aBAva vat BU talam iti atra tu BU tala aMSe aBAvasya viSezaNa tvam
   saṃsarga iti vadatāṃ prācāṃ ayamabhiprāyaḥ   viśeṣyatvaviśeṣaṇatve	saMsargaH iti vadatAm prAcAm ayam aBiprAyaH  viSezya tva viSezaNa tve
   svarūpasambandhaviśeṣau na jñānīyaviṣayatāviśeṣau/ na ca	svarUpa sambanDa viSezO na jQAnIya vizaya tA viSezO/ na ca
   viśeṣaṇatākhyaḥ svarūpasambandha eka eva astu, 'bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti'	viSezaNatA AKyaH svarUpa sambanDaH ekaH eva astu, aBU tale GawaH na asti a
   iti pratītau 'bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāvavat' iti pratītito vailakṣaṇyasya	iti pratItO aBU talam Gawa aBAvavat a iti pratItitaH vElakzaNyasya
   viśeṣaṇatvāvacchinnādheyatāviṣayakatvakalpanenaiva nirvāhāditi	viSezaNa tva avacCinna ADeya tA vizaya ka tva kalpanena eva nirvAhAt iti
   vācyam/ tādṛśapratītyoḥ vailakṣaṇyāya prathamāyāṃ	vAcyam/ tAdRSa pratItyoH vElakzaNyAya praTamAyAm
   viśeṣaṇatvāvacchinnādheyatā sannikarṣaḥ, dvitīyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatā	viSezaNa tva avacCinna ADeya tA sannikarzaH, dvitIyAyAm viSezaNa tA
   saṃsargaḥ iphayupeyate; kiṃ vā prathamāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatā saṃsargaḥ,	saMsargaH iPayupeyate; kim vA praTamAyAm viSezaNa tA saMsargaH,
   dvitīyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatvāvacchinnādhāratā ityatra vinigamakasya	dvitIyAyAm viSezaNa tva avacCinnA DAra tA iti atra vinigamakasya
   durlabhatvāt/ na ca tādṛśapratītyoḥ saṃsargāṃśe 'vilakṣaṇatve 'pi	durlaBa tvAt/ na ca tAdRSa pratItyoH saMsarga aMSe avilakzaNa tve api
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvabhedāt vailakṣaṇyopapattiḥ ityubhayatra	viSezaNa viSezya BAva BedAt vElakzaNya upapattiH iti uBayatra
   viśeṣaṇatāyā eva sambandhatāstviti vācyam/ tāvatāpi 'bhūtale ghaṭo	viSezaNa tAyAH eva sambanDa tA aH tu iti vAcyam/ tAvatA api aBU tale GawaH 
   nāsti' 'bhūtalavān ghaṭābhāvaḥ' ityanayoḥ 'bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāvavat'	na asti a aBUtalavAn Gawa aBAvaH a iti anayoH aBU talam Gawa aBAvavat a
   'ghaṭābhāve bhūtalam' ityanayośca pratītyoḥ vailakṣaṇyānirvrāhāt/	aGawa aBAve BU talam a iti anayoH ca pratItyoH vElakzaNya anirvrAhAt/
   tasmāt viśeṣyatvaviśeṣaṇatvanāmakayoḥ ubhayoḥ	tasmAt viSezya tva viSezaNa tva nAmakayoH uBayoH
   svarūpasambandhaviśeṣayoḥ saṃsargatā/ tathā ca 'bhūtalavān ghaṭābhāvaḥ'	svarUpa sambanDa viSezayoH saMsargatA/ taTA ca aBUtalavAn Gawa aBAvaH a
   ityatra ghaṭābhāvāṃśe bhūtalasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ saṃsargaḥ, ghaṭābhāve	iti atra Gawa aBAva aMSe BU talasya viSezaNa tvam saMsargaH, Gawa aBAve
   bhūtalam ityatra ca bhūtalāṃśe 'bhāvasya viśeṣyatāsaṃsargaḥ bhāsate/ sa	BU talam iti atra ca BU tala aMSe aBAvasya viSezyatA saMsargaH BAsate/ sa
   ca tatra abādhita iti abhramatvanirvāha iti saṅkṣepaḥ/	ca tatra abADitaH iti aBrama tva nirvAhaH iti saFkzepaH/
   dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayoriva	DvaMsa prAc aBAvayoH iva
   ekapratiyogikayoḥ atyantābhāvānyonyābhāvayoḥ kim ekavidhatvaṃ,	eka pratiyogikayoH atyanta aBAva anyonya aBAvayoH kim ekaviDa tvaM,
   netyāha   pratiyogiteti/ āropyeti/ prācīnamatābhiprāyeṇa/ atra	na iti Aha  pratiyogita iti/ Aropya iti/ prAcIna mata aBiprAyeNa/ atra

   draṣṭavyam/ tadeva darśayati kevaleti/ kevaladevadattābhāvāt	drazwavyam/ tat eva darSayati kA ivala iti/ kevala devadatta aBAvAt
   viśiṣṭābhāvo 'tirikta ityanvayaḥ/ anyathā kevaladevadattavati 'daṇḍī	viSizwa aBAvaH atiriktaH iti anvayaH/ anyaTA kevala devadattavati adaNxI
   nāsti' iti pratyayānāpatteḥ/ ubhayābhāvasyātiriktatve pratītiṃ	na asti a iti pratyaya anApatteH/ uBaya aBAvasya atirikta tve pratItim
   pramāṇayati   ekasattve 'pīti/ ghaṭapaṭau dvau na sva ityādau ghaṭatvaṃ	pramANayati  eka sattve api iti/ Gawa pawO dvO na svaH ityAdO Gawa tvam
   paṭatvaṃ ubhayatvaṃ caitattritayaṃ pratiyogitāvacchedakam, kevalaghaṭavati	pawa tvam uBaya tvam ca etat tritayam pratiyogita avacCeda kam, kevala Gawavati
   kevalapaṭavati yatkiñcidubhayavati ca tathā pratyayāt/	kevala pawavati yat kiQcid uBayavati ca taTA pratyayAt /
   sambandhabhedenābhāvasyātiriktatvaṃ darśayati   saṃyogeneti/	sambanDa Bedena aBAvasya atirikta tvam darSayati  saMyogena iti/
   sāmānyaviśeṣābhāvayoḥ bhedaṃ darśayati   tattaditi/ atirikta iti/	sAmAnya viSeza aBAvayoH Bedam darSayati  tad tat iti/ atiriktaH iti/
   anyathā yatkiñcit ghaṭavati ghaṭo nāstīti pratyayāpatteḥ/	anyaTA yat kiQcit Gawavati GawaH na asti iti pratyaya ApatteH/

   ubhayabhedaḥ ghaṭabhedaśca atirikta ityarthaḥ/	uBaya BedaH GawaBedaH ca atiriktaH iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   "traikālikaḥ saṃsargābhāvaḥ atyantābhāvaḥ"iti	"trEkAlikaH saMsarga aBAvaH atyanta aBAvaH" iti
   mūlam/ saṃsarṅgābhāva ityasya saṃsargāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva	mUlam/ saMsarFga aBAvaH iti asya saMsarga avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva
   ityarthaḥ/ tatra	iti arTaH/ tatra
   traikālikatvamātroktau anyonyābhāve 'tivyāptiḥ, tasyāpi	trEkAlika tva mAtra uktO anyonya aBAve ati vyAptiH, tasya api
   nityatvāt/ tadvāraṇāya saṃsargāvacchinnapratiyogitāka ityuktam/ na	nitya tva at/ tad vAraNAya saMsarga avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH iti uktam/ na
   ca saṃsargāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvaniveśe 'pi anyonyābhāvasya	ca saMsarga avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tva niveSe api anyonya aBAvasya

   traikālika iti/ nanu samavāyena ghaṭādhikaraṇe saṃyogena	trEkAlikaH iti/ nanu samavAyena Gawa aDikaraNe saMyogena
   ghaṭo nāsti,	GawaH nAsti,

   upekṣānarhatvarūpaprasaṅgasaṅgatyetyarthaḥ/	upekzAnarha tva rUpa prasaFga saFgatyA iti arTaH/
   pratiyogitāvacchedakadharmasaṃbandhabhedādiva	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka Darma saMbanDa BedAt iva
   pratiyogitāvacchedakadharmagatāt	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka Darma gatAt
   pratiyogitāsāmānādhikaraṇyatadasamānādhikaraṇyabhedādapi abhāvabhedaḥ	pratiyogi tAsA mAnADikaraNya tad asamAna aDikaraNya BedAt api aBAva BedaH
   bhavati, tathaiva	Bavati, taTA eva
   vyadhikaraṇasamānādhikaraṇadharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākayorabhāvayorbhedasiddhedityāśaṅkya	vyaDikaraNa samAna aDikaraNa Darma avacCinna pratiyogi tA kayoH aBAvayoH Beda sidDet iti ASaFkya
   vyadhikaraṇadharmavacchinnābhāva eva nāsti, kutastadarthaṃ	vyaDikaraNa Darma vat Cinna aBAvaH eva nAsti, kutas tad arTam

   nṛsiṃhaśāstricaraṇāḥ prāhuḥ/	nRsiMhaSAH tri caraNAH prAhuH/
   dīpikāyām ghaṭatvena paṭo nāstītyādi/	dIpikAyAm Gawa tvena pawaH na asti ityAdi/

   vyadhikaraṇadharmāvacchinnābhāvo nāsmābhiraṅgīkriyate/ tādṛśapratīteḥ	vyaDikaraNa Darma avacCinna aBAvaH na asmABiH aFgIkriyate/ tAdRSa pratIteH

   vyadhikaraṇadharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākaḥ	vyaDikaraNa Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH
   samānādhikaraṇadharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākaśceti/	samAna aDikaraNa Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAkaH ca iti/
   pratiyogitāśrayāvṛttirdharmaḥ vyadhikaraṇadharmaḥ/	pratiyogita ASraya AvRttiH DarmaH vyaDikaraNa DarmaH/
   pratiyogitāśrayavṛttirdharmaḥ samānādhikaraṇadharmaḥ/ 'ghaṭatvena paṭo	pratiyogita ASraya vRttiH DarmaH samAna aDikaraNa DarmaH/ aGawa tvena pawo
   nāsti' ityatra pratiyogitāśrayaḥ paṭaḥ tadavṛttirdharmaḥ ghaṭatvaṃ	na asti a iti atra pratiyogita ASrayaH pawaH tad avRttiH DarmaH Gawa tvam
   tadavacchinnā yā paṭaniṣṭhā pratiyogitā tannirūpako 'bhāvaḥ	tad avacCinnA yA pawa nizWA pratiyogitA tat nirUpakaH aBAvaH

   tatkhaṇḍanaprakāramāha prakāśikāyām  	tad KaNxana prakAram Aha prakASikAyAm

   nātiśete'	na atiSete a

   vibhaktyartharūpeṇa sambandhenānvaya iṣṭa eva/ ata eva dinakaryām	viBakti arTa rUpeNa sambanDena anvayaH izwaH eva/ atas eva dinakaryAm

   bhānasyaivocitatvāt	BAnasya eva ucita tvAt

   dīpikā	dIpikA

   ghaṭātyantābhāvapratyakṣaṃ prati bhūtalaghaṭasaṃyogaprāgabhāvaḥ	Gawa atyanta aBAva pratyakzam prati BU tala Gawa saMyoga prAgaBAvaH

   praghaṭṭakārthaḥ/	praGawwaka arTaH/

   samādhānāntaramāha   tattatkālāvacchinneti/ yasmin ghaṭaśūnyakāle	samADAna antaram Aha  tad tad kAla avacCinnA iti/ yasmin Gawa SUnya kAle

   tasmin adhikaraṇe paṭādyabhāvatvakalpanenaiva tathā pratītinirvāhāt,	tasmin aDikaraNe pawa Adya BAva tva kalpanena eva taTA pratIti nirvAhAt,

   gurumatamāśaṅkya	guru matam ASaFkya

   ityarthaḥ/"ātmaśarīrendriyārthabuddhimanaḥ	iti arTaH/"Atma SarIra indriya arTa budDi manaH

   dvādaśabidhaṃ prameyam/ pravṛttiḥ dharmādharmau/ rāgadveṣamohāḥ doṣāḥ/	dvAdaSa biDam prameyam/ pravRttiH Darma aDarmO/ rAga dveza mohAH dozAH/
   rāgaḥ icchā/ dveṣaḥ manyuḥ/ mohaḥ śarīrādau ātmabhramaḥ/	rAgaH  icCA/ dvezaH manyuH/ mohaH  SarIra AdO Atma BramaH/
   pretyabhāvaḥ maraṇam/ phalam bhogaḥ/ apavargaḥ mokṣaḥ/ sa ca	pretyaBAvaH maraNam/ Palam  BogaH/ apavargaH mokzaH/ sa ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇuduḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnaduḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ/	sva samAna aDika raNu duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna duHKa DvaMsaH/
   prayojanam sukhaprātiptaḥ duḥkhahāniśca/ dṛṣṭāntaḥ mahānasādiḥ/	prayojanam suKa prAtiptaH duHKa hAniH ca/ dRzwAntaH mahAnasa AdiH/
   prāmāṇikatvena abhyupagator'thaḥ siddhāntaḥ/ nirṇayaḥ niścayaḥ/ sa ca	prAmANika tvena aByupagator aTaH sidDAntaH/ nirNayaH  niScayaH/ sa ca
   pramāṇaphalam/	pramANa Palam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   paramakāruṇikena	parama kAruNikena
   muninā duḥkhapaṅkanimagnaṃ janaṃ uddidhīrṃṣuṇā	muninA duHKa paFka nimagnam janam uddiDIrMzuNA
   praṇītam"pramāṇaprameya"ityādisūtraṃ, tadvirodhaṃ parihartuṃ	praNItam "pramANa prameya "iti Adi sUtran, tad viroDam parihartum
   ākṣipati   nanviti/ pratyakṣapramāṇasya dravye, anumānādīnāṃ ca	Akzipati  nanu iti/ pratyakza pramANasya dravye, anumAna AdInAm ca
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvasya sphuṭatvāt prameyādīnāṃ dravyādiṣvantarbhāvamāha  	guNe antarBAvasya sPuwa tvAt prameya AdInAm dravya Adizu antarBAvam Aha  
   ātmetyādinā/ ātmaśarīrendriyāṇāṃ dravye, arthasya pṛthivyādirūpasya	AtmA ityAdinA/ Atma SarIra indriyANAm dravye, arTasya pRTivI Adi rUpasya
   dravyādiṣu, buddheḥ guṇe, antarindriyasya manasaḥ dravye 'ntarbhāvaḥ/	dravya Adizu, budDeH guNe, antar indriyasya manasaH dravye antarBAvaH/
   evamagre 'pi yathāyathamantarbhāvaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ/ dharmādharmau iti/	evam agre api yaTAyaTam antarBAvaH drazwavyaH/ Darma aDarmO iti/
   tajjaniketyarthaḥ/ etacca sphuṭamākare/ rāgaḥ / icchāviśeṣaḥ/	tad janikA iti arTaH/ etat ca sPuwam Akare/ rAgaH / icCA viSezaH/
   maraṇamiti/ maraṇānantarabhāvi jananamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca padavyutpattiḥ	maraNamiti/ maraNa anantara BAvi jananam iti arTaH/ taTA ca pada vyutpattiH
   pretya mṛtvā bhāvaḥ jananamitiḥ/ caramaprāṇaśarīrasaṃyogadhvaṃsaḥ	pretya mRtvA BAvaH janana mitiH/ carama prANa SarIra saMyoga DvaMsaH
   maraṇam/ ādyaśarīraprāṇasaṃyogaḥ jananam/ muktātmasaṃyogadhvaṃsavataḥ	maraNam/ Adya SarIra prANa saMyogaH jananam/ mukta Atma saMyoga DvaMsavataH
   ghaṭasya muktatvāpattivāraṇāya   duḥkhadhvaṃsa iti/ duḥkhadhvaṃsavatāṃ	Gawasya mukta tva Apatti vAraNAya  duHKa DvaMsaH iti/ duHKa DvaMsavatAm
   asmadādīnāmapi muktatvāpattivāraṇāya kālīnāntam/	asmad AdInAm api mukta tva Apatti vAraNAya kAlIna antam/
   anyadīyaduḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālikaduḥkhadhvaṃsavatāṃ	anyadIya duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlika duHKa DvaMsavatAm
   śukādyātmanāmapyamuktatvaprasaṅgāt svasamānādhikaraṇeti	Suka Adi AtmanAm api amukta tva prasaFgAt sva samAna aDikaraNa iti
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvaviśeṣaṇam/ na ca	duHKa prAc aBAva viSezaNam/ na ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakalīnetyanenaiva	sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa asamAna kalInA iti anena eva
   suṣuptikālikaduḥkhadhvaṃsasyāpi agrimaduḥkhakṣaṇavṛttervāraṇāt	suzupti kAlika duHKa DvaMsasya api agrima duHKa kzaNa vRtteH vAraNAt 
   prāgabhāveti vyarthamiti vācyam/ yathāsanniveśe vaiyarthyābhāvāditi	prAgaBAva iti vyarTam iti vAcyam/ yaTA AsanniveSe vEyarTya aBAvAt iti
   dik/ saṃśayasya nirūpitatvāt prayojanasvarūpaṃ darśayati  	dik/ saMSayasya nirUpita tvAt prayojana svarUpam darSayati

   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   pratyakṣapramāṇasya	pratyakza pramANasya
