   rasanāyāḥ jale, ghrāṇasya pṛthivyām, tvacaḥ vāyau, śrotrasya	rasanAyAH jale, GrANasya pRTivyAm, tvacaH vAyO, Srotrasya
   ākāśe 'ntarbhāvāt manasaḥ pṛthak dravyatvācca pratyakṣapramāṇasya	AkASe antarBAvAt manasaH pRTak dravya tvAt ca pratyakza pramANasya
   dravye 'ntarbhāva ityarthaḥ/ anumānādīnāṃ ca guṇa iti/	dravye antarBAvaH iti arTaH/ anumAna AdInAm ca guNaH iti/
   vyāptijñānamanumānam, sādṛśyajñānamupamānam, padajñānaṃ śabda	vyApti jQAnam anumAnam, sAdRSya jQAnam upamAnam, pada jQAnam Sabda
   ityevamanumānādīnāṃ jñānarūpe guṇe 'ntarbhāva ityarthaḥ/	iti evam anumAna AdInAm jQAna rUpe guNe antarBAvaH iti arTaH/
   evamagre 'pīti/	evam agre api iti/
   pravṛttidoṣādīnāmapi yathāyathaṃ sapatasvevāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ/ nanu	pravRtti doza AdInAm api yaTAyaTam sapatasu a iva antarBAvaH iti arTaH/ nanu
   pravṛtteḥ prayatnaviśeṣarūpatvāt dharmādharmayostu	pravRtteH prayatna viSeza rUpa tvAt Darma aDarmayoH tu
   adṛṣṭaviśeṣarūpatvāt 'pravṛttiḥ dharmādharmau' iti	adRzwa viSeza rUpa tvAt apravRttiH Darma aDarmO a iti
   dīpikāgrantho 'saṅgata ityata āha   tajjaniketyartha iti/	dIpikA granTaH asaFgataH iti atas Aha  tad janikA iti arTaH iti/
   dharmādharmayorjanikā pravṛttirityarthaṃḥ/ kārye kāraṇopacāra iti	Darma aDarmayoH janikA pravRttiH iti arTaMH/ kArye kAraNa upacAraH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca pravṛtteḥ guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ sphuṭamākara	BAvaH/ taTA ca pravRtteH guNe antarBAvaH/ sPuwam Akara
   iti/"pravṛttisādhano dharmādharmau pravṛttiśabdenoktau yathā annasādhanāḥ	iti/" pravRtti sADanaH Darma aDarmO pravRtti Sabdena uktO yaTA anna sADanAH
   prāṇāḥ"iti dvitīyasūtre bhāṣye,"pravṛttiphale dharmādharmau	prANAH"iti dvitIya sUtre BAzye," pravRtti Pale Darma aDarmO
   āsmin sūtre pravṛttirityucyete/ kasmāt, tatsādhanatvāt annaṃ vai	Asmin sUtre pravRttiH iti ucyete/ kasmAt, tad sADana tvAt annam vE
   prāṇinaḥ prāṇā iti yathā"iti saptadaśasūtre vārtike coktatvāt	prANinaH prANAH iti yaTA"iti saptadaSa sUtre vArtike ca ukta tvAt 
   pravṛtterdharmādharmajanakatvaṃ mūlagrantheṣu spaṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ/	pravRtteH Darma aDarma janaka tvam mUla granTezu spazwam iti BAvaH/
   icchāviśeṣa iti/ utkaṭecchetyarthaḥ/ tathā ca rāgasyecchātmake	icCA viSezaH iti/ utkawa icCA iti arTaH/ taTA ca rAgasya icCA Atmake
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ, dveṣasya guṇe, mithyājñānarūpasya mohasya ca	guNe antarBAvaH, dvezasya guNe, miTyAjQAna rUpasya mohasya ca
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ mithyājñānaṃ nāma bhramātmakajñānam/ maraṇānantareti/	guNe antarBAvaH/ miTyAjQAnam nAma Brama Atmaka jQAnam/ maraNa anantarA iti/
   pretya mṛtvā bhāvaḥ/ jananamiti vyutpattyā maraṇānantarakālikajanya	pretya m RtvA BAvaH/ jananam iti vyutpattyA maraNa anantara kAlika janya
   pretyabhāvaśabdārthaḥ/ caramasya prāṇaśarīrasaṃyogasya dhvaṃsaḥ maraṇam/	pretyaBAva Sabda arTaH/ caramasya prANa SarIra saMyogasya DvaMsaH maraNam/
   ādyaḥ śarīraprāṇasaṃyogaḥ janmaḥ/ tathā ca pretyabhāvasya saṃyogarūpe	AdyaH SarIra prANa saMyogaH janmaH/ taTA ca pretyaBAvasya saMyoga rUpe
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ prāṇaśarīrasaṃyoge caramatvaṃ ca	guNe antarBAvaH/ prANa SarIra saMyoge carama tvam ca
   svasajātīyaśarīravṛttiprāṇasaṃyogaprāgabhāvānadhikaraṇatvam/ ādyatvaṃ ca	svasa jAtIya SarIra vRtti prANa saMyoga prAc aBAvAn aDikaraNa tvam/ Adya tvam ca
   svasajātīyaśarīravṛttiprāṇasaṃyogadhvaṃsānadhikaraṇatvam/	svasa jAtIya SarIra vRtti prANa saMyoga DvaMsa an aDikaraNa tvam/
   dīpikāyām phalaṃ	dIpikAyAm Palam
   bhoga iti/ bhogo nāma sukhaduḥkhānubhavaḥ/ tathā ca phalasya	BogaH iti/ BogaH nAma suKa duHKa anuBavaH/ taTA ca Palasya
   anubhavarūpajñānātmake gaṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ svasamānādhikaraṇeti/	anuBava rUpa jQAna Atmake gaNe antarBAvaH/ sva samAna aDikaraNa iti/
   svasamānādhikaraṇaḥ yaḥ duḥkhaprāgabhāvaḥ/ tadasamānakālīna duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ	sva samAna aDikaraNaH yaH duHKa prAgaBAvaH/ tad asamAna kAlIna duHKa DvaMsaH
   mokṣa ityarthaḥ/ idānīmasmākaṃ vidyamānaḥ yatkiñcidduḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ	mokzaH iti arTaH/ idAnIm asmAkam vidyamAnaH yat kiQcit duHKa DvaMsaH
   bhaviṣyadduḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālikaḥ/ muktau yaḥ duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ saḥ	Bavizyat duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlikaH/ muktO yaH duHKa DvaMsaH saH
   dukhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālikaḥ punarduḥkhasyājaniṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	duKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlikaH punar duHKasya ajanizyamANa tvAt iti BAvaH/
   apavargalakṣaṇaghaṭakadalānāṃ prayojanamāha prakāśikāyām  	apavarga lakzaNa Gawaka dalAnAm prayojanam Aha prakASikAyAm  
   muktātmasaṃyogetyādinā/ duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ ityatra duḥkhapadānupādāne	mukta Atma saMyoga ityAdinA/ duHKa DvaMsaH iti atra duHKa pada anupAdAne
   svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnaḥ dhvaṃsaḥ mokṣa iti	sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlInaH DvaMsaH mokzaH iti
   etāvanmātroktau muktātmano ghaṭasya ca yaḥ saṃyogaḥ taddhvaṃso 'pi	etAvat mAtrA uktO mukta AtmanaH Gawasya ca yaH saMyogaH tad DvaMsaH api
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīna iti tādṛśasaṃyogadhvaṃsavato	duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlInaH iti tAdRSa saMyoga DvaMsavataH 
   ghaṭasyāpi muktatvaṃ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya duḥkhadhvaṃsa ityuktam/	Gawasya api mukta tvam syAt/ tad vAraNAya duHKa DvaMsaH iti uktam/
   saṃyogadhvaso na duḥkhadhvaṃsa iti tasya na muktitvamiti bhāvaḥ/	saMyoga DvasaH na duHKa DvaMsaH iti tasya na mukti tvam iti BAvaH/
   nanu muktātmano	nanu mukta AtmanaH 
   vibhutvāt yāvadghaṭasthiti ghaṭe muktātmasaṃyogo 'styeveti	viBu tvAt yAvat Gawa sTiti Gawe mukta Atma saMyogaH asti eva iti
   taddhvaṃsavatvaṃ ghaṭasya kathaṃ bhavet/ ghaṭe naṣṭe tu	tad hvaMsava tvam Gawasya kaTam Bavet/ Gawe nazwe tu
   muktātmaghaṭasaṃyogadhvaṃsasattve 'pi ghaṭasyābhāvāt sutarāṃ na ghaṭasya	mukta Atma Gawa saMyoga DvaMsa sattve api Gawasya aBAvAt sutarAm na Gawasya
   muktatvamiti kathamiyamāśaṅkā? atrocyate   ghaṭaḥ ādau kutrañcit	mukta tvam iti kaTam iyam ASaFkA? atra ucyate  GawaH AdO kutraQcid 
   pradeśe 'sti, tadā tatpradeśāvacchedena muktātmaghaṭasaṃyogo 'sti/ sa	pradeSe asti, tadA tad pradeSa avacCedena mukta Atma Gawa saMyogaH asti/ sa
   eva ghaṭaḥ pradeśāntaraṃ nītaścet pūrvapradeśāvacchinnātmasaṃyogo	eva GawaH pradeSa antaram nItaH ced pUrva pradeSa avacCinna Atma saMyogaH 
   naśyati, pradeśāntarāvacchedena anyaḥ saṃyogo jāyate/ tathā cānaṣṭe	naSyati, pradeSa antara avacCedena anyaH saMyogaH jAyate/ taTA ca anazwe
   eva ghaṭe	eva Gawe
   pradeśaviśeṣāvacchinnamuktātmasaṃyogadhvaso 'stīti ghaṭasya	pradeSa viSeza avacCinna mukta Atma saMyoga DvasaH asti iti Gawasya
   muktatvaprasaṅga ityāśayāt/ duḥkhadhvaṃsavatāmiti/ tathā ca	mukta tva prasaFgaH iti ASayAt/ duHKa DvaMsavatAm iti/ taTA ca
   duḥkhadhvaṃso mokṣa ityetāvanmātroktau saṃsāriṇāmasmadādīnāmapi	duHKa DvaMsaH mokzaH iti etAvat mAtrA uktO saMsAriNAm asmad AdInAm api
   suṣuptikāle duḥkhadhvaṃsasattvāt muktatvāpattiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	suzupti kAle duHKa DvaMsa sattvAt mukta tva ApattiH/ tad vAraNAya
   kālīnāntam/ adya vidyamānasya asmadīya duḥkhadhvaṃsasya	kAlIna antam/ adya vidyamAnasya asmadIya duHKa DvaMsasya
   śvobhāviduḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnatvāt	Svas BA vi duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna tvAt
   tādṛśaduḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvaṃ nāstīti na muktitvamiti	tAdRSa duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna tvam na asti iti na mukti tvam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ anyadīyeti/ tathā ca duḥkhaprāgabhāve svasamānādhikaraṇeti	BAvaH/ anyadIyA iti/ taTA ca duHKa prAgaBAve sva samAna aDikaraNa iti
   viśeṣaṇānupādāne muktānāṃ śukādīnāṃ yo duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ saḥ	viSezaNa anupAdAne muktAnAm Suka AdInAm yaH duHKa DvaMsaH saH
   śukādyanyasaṃsāryātmavṛtti yat bhāvi duḥkhaṃ	Suka Adi anya saMsArya Atma vRtti yat BAvi duHKam
   tatprāgabhāvasamānakālīnameva bhavatīti	tad prAgaBAva samAna kAlInam eva Bavati iti
   tadasamānakālīnaduḥkhadhvaṃsavatvābhāvāt śukādīnāmamuktatvaṃ syāt/	tad asamAna kAlIna duHKa DvaMsava tva aBAvAt Suka AdInAm amukta tvam syAt /
   tadvāraṇāya svasamānādhikaraṇeti viśeṣaṇam/ tadupādāne ca svaṃ	tad vAraNAya sva samAna aDikaraNa iti viSezaNam/ tad upAdAne ca svam
   śukātmavṛttiḥ duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ tadadhikaraṇaṃ śukātmā tadvattitvaṃ	Suka Atma vRttiH duHKa DvaMsaH tad aDikaraNam Suka AtmA tadvat ti tvam
   anyadīyaduḥkhaprāgabhāve nāstīti na tatsamānakālīnatvamādāya	anyadIya duHKa prAgaBAve na asti iti na tad samAna kAlIna tvam AdAya
   pūrvoktadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ/	pUrva ukta dozaH iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakālīnetyevāstu, kiṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa asamAna kAlIna iti eva astu, kim
   tādṛśaduḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīneti viśeṣaṇena/ na ca asmākaṃ	tAdRSa duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna iti viSezaNena/ na ca asmAkam
   suṣuptau yo duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ tasya duḥkhasamānakālīnatvaṃ nāsti,	suzuptO yaH duHKa DvaMsaH tasya duHKa samAna kAlIna tvam nAsti,
   suṣuptau duḥkhābhāvāt/ tathā ca	suzuptO duHKa aBAvAt/ taTA ca
   duḥkhāsamānakālīnaduḥkhadhvaṃsasatvāt asmākaṃ muktatvāpattibhavet	duHKa asamAna kAlIna duHKa DvaMsa satvAt asmAkam mukta tva Apatti Bavet
   duḥkhāsamānakālīnetyuktau/ duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnetyuktau tu	duHKa asamAna kAlIna iti uktO/ duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna iti uktO tu
   suṣuptau asmāsu bhāviduḥkhaprāgabhāvo 'stīti tadātanaduḥkhadhvaṃsasya	suzuptO asmAsu BAvi duHKa prAgaBAvaH asti iti tad Atana duHKa DvaMsasya
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnatvāt vāraṇamiti vācyam/ dhvaṃsasya	duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna tvAt vAraNam iti vAcyam/ DvaMsasya
   dhvaṃsāsambhavena suṣupitakāliko yo duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ tasya	DvaMsa asamBavena suzupita kAlikaH yaH duHKa DvaMsaH tasya
   jāgratkṣaṇe 'pyanuvartamānatayā jāgratkāle yaddukhaṃ	jAgrat kzaNe api anuvartamAna tayA jAgrat kAle yat duKam
   tatsamānakālīnatvamastīti	tad samAna kAlIna tvam asti iti
   samānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakālīnatvābhāvāt vāraṇaṃ bhavatīti	samAna aDikaraNa duHKa asamAna kAlInatva aBAvAt vAraNam Bavati iti
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvaparyantasyānāvaśyakatvāt ityāśayena	duHKa prAgaBAva asa mAna kAlIna tva paryantasya anAvaSyaka tvAt iti ASayena
   śaṅkate   na ca sbasamānādhikaraṇeti/	SaFkate  na ca sbasamAna aDikaraNa iti/
   samādhatte  	samADatte  
   yathāsaṃniveśa iti/ yadyapi duḥkhāsamānakālīnatvaviśeṣaṇena vāraṇaṃ	yaTA saMniveSaH iti/ yadi api duHKa asamAna kAlIna tva viSezaNena vAraNam
   bhavati, tathāpi duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvenāpi vāraṇasambhavāt	Bavati, taTA api duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna tvena api vAraNa samBavAt 
   tasya na vaiyarthyathmati bhāvaḥ/ na ca laghunāduḥkhāsamānakālīnatvenaiva	tasya na vEyarTyaTmati BAvaH/ na ca laGunA duHKa asamAna kAlIna tvena eva
   vāraṇe guruṇaḥ duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvaviśiṣaṇasya	vAraNe guruNaH duHKa prAgaBAva asa mAna kAlIna tva viSizaNasya
   vaiyarthyameveti vācyam/ yatra gurudharmaghaṭakena laghudharmeṇa nirvāhaḥ	vEyarTyam eva iti vAcyam/ yatra guru Darma Gawakena laGu DarmeNa nirvAhaH
   tatraiva gurudharmasya vaiyarthyam/ prakṛte tu	tatra eva guru Darmasya vEyarTyam/ prakRte tu
   duḥkhāsamānakālīnatvatvāvacchinnābhāvaḥ duḥkhāsamānakālīnatvam/	duHKa asamAna kAlIna tva tva avacCinnA BAvaH duHKa asamAna kAlIna tvam/
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnatvatvāvacchinnābhāvaḥ	duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna tva tva avacCinnA BAvaH
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvam/ anayoścābhāvayoḥ	duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna tvam/ anayoH ca aBAvayoH
   pratiyogitāvacchedakabhedena bhinnatvāt ekasmin abhāve 'nyasya	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka Bedena Binna tvAt ekasmin aBAve anyasya
   ghaṭakatvābhāvāt na vaiyathyavikāśa ityāśayāt/ nanu	Gawaka tva aBAvAt na vEyaTya vikASaH iti ASayAt/ nanu
   svatvasyānanugatatayā tadghaṭitamukterapyanekatvena muktipadasya	sva tvasya ananugata tayA tad Gawita mukteH api aneka tvena mukti padasya
   nānārthakatvāpattiḥ ityata āha   digiti/ atrānuyogini svatvaṃ na	nAnA arTaka tva ApattiH iti atas Aha  diS iti/ atra anuyogini sva tvam na
   vivakṣitam, kiṃ tu pratiyogini/ tathā ca	vivakzitam, kim tu pratiyogini/ taTA ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnaṃ yadyatsvaṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa prAgaBAva samAna kAlInam yat yat svam
   tattadvyaktibhedaviśiṣṭaduḥkhadhvaṃso mokṣaḥ/ evaṃ ca	tad tad vyakti Beda viSizwa duHKa DvaMsaH mokzaH/ evam ca
   tādṛśabhedakūṭaviśiṣṭatvopalakṣitaduḥkhadhvaṃsatvasya	tAdRSa Beda kUwa viSizwa tva upalakzita duHKa DvaMsa tvasya
   sakalamuktisādhāraṇatayā na muktipadasya nānārthakatāpattiriti bhāvaḥ/	sakala mukti sADAraNa tayA na mukti padasya nAnA arTaka tA ApattiH iti BAvaH/
   irttha cāpavargasya mokṣe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ saṃśayasya	irtTa ca apavargasya mokze antarBAvaH/ saMSayasya
   ayathārthānubhavarūpatvasya pūrvamuktatvāt jñānarūpe guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ ukta	ayaTArTa anuBava rUpa tvasya pUrvam ukta tvAt jQAna rUpe guNe antarBAvaH ukta
   ityāśayena mūle saṃśayasyākathanam/ tadāha   saṃśayasya	iti ASayena mUle saMSayasya akaTanam/ tat Aha  saMSayasya
   nirūpitatvāditi/ sukhaprāptirnāma sukhameva/ duḥkhahāniśca	nirUpita tvAt iti/ suKa prAptiH nAma suKam eva/ duHKa hAniH ca
   duḥkhadhvaṃsaḥ/ tathā ca prayojanasya guṇe 'bhāve cāntarbhāṃvaḥ/	duHKa DvaMsaH/ taTA ca prayojanasya guNe aBAve ca antar BAMvaH/
   dṛṣṭāntasya	dRzwAntasya
   yathāyathaṃ dravyaguṇādiṣvantarbhāvaḥ/ siddhānto 'pi dravyādirūpa eva/	yaTAyaTam dravya guNa Adizu antarBAvaH/ sidDAntaH api dravya Adi rUpaH eva/
   prāmāṇikatvena svīkṛtārthasyaiva siddhāntatvāt/ nirṇayasya jñānarūpe	prAmANika tvena svIkRtArTasya eva sidDAnta tvAt/ nirNayasya jQAna rUpe
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/ avayavānāṃ śabdarūpatayā prāguktatvāt	guNe antarBAvaH/ avayavAnAm Sabda rUpa tayA prAk ukta tvAt 
   guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ, tarkasyāroparūpatāyā uktatvāt	guNe antarBAvaH, tarkasya Aropa rUpa tAyAH ukta tvAt 
   bhramātmakajñāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ iti tayoḥ atrākathanam/	Brama Atmaka jQAne antarBAvaH iti tayoH atra akaTanam/
   vādajalpavitaṇḍānāṃ śabdarūpatayā guṇe 'ntarbhāvaḥ/	vAda jalpa vitaNxAnAm Sabda rUpa tayA guNe antarBAvaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   kathānirūpaṇam	kaTA nirUpaNam
   tattvabubhutsoḥ	tattva buButsoH
   kathā vādaḥ/ ubhayasādhanavatī vijigīṣukathā jalpaḥ/ svapakṣasthāpanāhīnā	kaTA vAdaH/ uBaya sADanavatI vijigIzu kaTA jalpaH/ sva pakza sTApana ahInA
   aparapakṣavidalanamātrāvasānā vitaṇḍā/ kathā nāma	apara pakza vidalana mAtra avasAnA vitaNxA/ kaTA nAma
   nānāvaktṛkapūrvottarapakṣapratipādakavākyasandarbhaḥ/	nAnA vaktRka pUrva uttara pakza pratipAdaka vAkya sandarBaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   ubhayasādhanavatīti/	uBaya sADanavati iti/
   parapakṣanirākaraṇasvapakṣasādhanavatī/ idaṃ ca vitaṇḍāyāṃ	para pakza nirAkaraNa sva pakza sADanavatI/ idam ca vitaNxAyAm
   ativyāptivāraṇāyeti dhyeyam/ svapakṣeti/ atra vijigīṣu	ati vyApti vAraNAya iti Dyeyam/ sva pakza iti/ atra vijigIzu
   kathetyanuvartate/ nāneti/ ekena pūrvapakṣaḥ kriyate, anyena ca	kaTA iti anuvartate/ nAnA iti/ ekena pUrva pakzaH kriyate, anyena ca
   samādhānam, evaṃ krameṇa	samADAnam, evam krameNa
   nānākartṛkatvaṃ	nAnA kartRka tvam
   vākyasamūhasyāvaseyam/	vAkya samUhasya avaseyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   parapakṣetyādi/	para pakza ityAdi/
   vijigīṣukathā jalpaḥ ityetāvanmātroktau vitaṇḍāyāmativyāptiḥ/	vijigIzu kaTA jalpaH iti etAvat mAtrA uktO vitaNxAyAm ati vyAptiH/
   ataḥ svapakṣasādhanavatītyuktam/	atas svapakza sADanavatI iti uktam/
   parapakṣanirākaraṇasvapakṣasādhanavatītyatra	para pakza nirAkaraNa sva pakza sADanavatI iti atra
   parapakṣanirākaraṇamapi jalpe āvaśyakamiti sūcanāya antarbhāvitam,	para pakza nirAkaraNam api jalpe AvaSyakam iti sUcanAya antarBAvitam,
   nātivyāptyādivāraṇāya/ vijigīṣupadenaiva vādasya vāraṇasambhavāta/	na ati vyApti Adi vAraNAya/ vijigIzu padena eva vAdasya vAraNa samBavAta/
   duṣṭaheturūpāṇāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ yathāyathaṃ dravyādiṣvantarbhāvaḥ/	duzwa hetu rUpANAm hetvABAsAnAm yaTAyaTam dravya Adizu antarBAvaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   chalanirūpaṇam	Cala nirUpaNam
   abhiprāyāntareṇā	aBiprAya antareNA
   pratyuktasyārthāntaraṃ parikalpya dūṣaṇaṃ chalam/	pratyuktasya arTa antaram parikalpya dUzaNam Calam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   chalamiti/ yathā	Cala miti/ yaTA
   'navakambalo 'yaṃ devadattaḥ' iti nūtanatātparyeṇa prayuktasya	anavakambalaH ayam devadattaH a iti nUtanatAtparyeNa prayuktasya
   navatvasaṅkhyāviśiṣṭamarthāntaraṃ parikalpya kaścit dūṣayati 'nāsya	nava tu a saFKyA viSizwam arTa antaram parikalpya kaScid dUzayati anAsya
   nava kambalāḥ santi ati daridratvāt' ityādi/	nava kambalAH santi ati daridra tvAt a ityAdi/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   chalamapi	Calam api
   śabdarūpatvāt guṇe 'ntarbhavati/	Sabda rUpa tvAt guNe antarBavati/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   jātinirūpaṇam	jAti nirUpaNam
   asaduttaraṃ jātiḥ/	asat uttaram jAtiH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   asaduttaramiti/	asat uttaram iti/
   uttarasya asatvaṃ tu svāsādhakatāsādhāraṇyena parāsādhakatāsādhakatayā	uttarasya asatvam tu sva asADaka tA sADa araNyena parAsADaka tA sADaka tayA
   svavyāghātakatvam/ tathā ca svavyāghātamuttaraṃ jātiriti lakṣaṇaṃ	sva vyAGAtaka tvam/ taTA ca sva vyAGAtam uttaram jAtiH iti lakzaNam
   paryavasyati/	paryavasyati/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   svāsādhakatāsādhāraṇyeneti/ paramatāsādhakatvasādhanāya hi	svAsa aDaka tA sADAraNyena iti/ parama tA sADaka tva sADanAya hi
   jātirūpamuttaramucyate/ taccet svamatāsādhakatāmapi sādhayet tadā	jAti rUpam uttaram ucyate/ tat ced sva mata asADaka tAm api sADayet tadA
   jātirityarthaḥ/ parakīyahetoḥ parāsādhakatve sādhyamāne	jAtiH iti arTaH/ parakIya hetoH para asADaka tve sADyamAne
   svakīyahetoḥ svāsādhakatvamapi yena bhavati tat	svakIya hetoH sva asADaka tvam api yena Bavati tat 
   jātyuttaramiti bhāvaḥ/	jAti uttaram iti BAvaH/
   paramatabādhanārthaṃ ucyamānamuttaraṃ svamatamapi vihanti cet	para mata bADana arTam ucyamAnam uttaram sva matam api vihanti ced 
   tādṛguttaraviśeṣo jātiriti phalitor'thaḥ/	tAdRS uttara viSezaH jAtiH iti Palitor aTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   sādharmya 	sADarmya 
   vaidharmya utkarṣa 	vEDarmya utkarza 
   apakarṣa varṇya avarṇya vikalpa sādhya prāpti aprāpti prasaṅga prati	apakarza varNya avarNya  vikalpa  sADya  prApti aprApti prasaFga  prati
   dṛṣṭānta anutpatti	dRzwAnta anutpatti
    saṃśaya prakāraṇa ahetu  arthāpatti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi  	 saMSaya  prakAraNa a hetu arTApatti  a viSeza  upapatti  upalabDi  
   anupalabdhi   nitya   anitya   kāryaṃ akārya samā jātayāḥ/	anupalabDi  nitya  anityaH  kAryaM a kArya  samAH jAtayAH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   sādharmyasamālakṣaṇam	sADarmya samAlakzaNam
   tadabāntarabhedāt	tad abAntara BedAt 
   darśayati   sādharmyetyādinā/ dvandvānte śruyamāṇasya samāśabdasya	darSayati  sADarmya ityAdinA/ dvandva ante SruyamANasya samA Sabdasya
   pratyekaṃ yogaḥ/ sādharmyasamā vaidharmyasametyādayaḥ caturviśatiḥ	pratyekam yogaH/ sADarmya samAH vEDarmya sama itya AdayaH catur viSatiH
   jātayaḥ/ sādharmyeṃṇa sthānāhetudūṣakamuttaram sādharmyasamā/ yathā	jAtayaH/ sADarmyeMNa sTAna ahetu dUzakam uttaram sADarmya samA/ yaTA
   ātmā	AtmA
   sakriyaḥ	sa kriyaH
   kriyāhetuguṇavattvātṛ loṣṭavat, kriyā hetuguṇaścātra	kriyA hetu guNavat tvAtR lozwavat, kriyA hetu guNaH ca atra
   kriyājanakavāyusaṃyogādireveti sthāpanāyamuttaram   'yadi	kriyA janaka vAyu saMyoga AdiH eva iti sTApanAyam uttaram  ayadi
   sakriyasādharmyāt sakriyaḥ tadā vibhutvarūpaniṣkrayasādharmyāt niṣkriya	sa kriya sADarmyAt sa kriyaH tadA viBu tva rUpa nizkraya sADarmyAt nizkriya
   eva kiṃ na syāta/ na ca atra kiṃñcit vinigamakamasti' iti/	eva kim na syAta/ na ca atra kiMQcid vinigama kamasti a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   sādharmyasamāyāḥ	sADarmya samAyAH
   sodāharaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamāha   sādharmyeṇeti/ vādinā svasādhyasādhanārthaṃ	sa udAharaNam lakzaNam Aha  sADarmyeNa iti/ vAdinA sva sADya sADana arTam
   hetau prayukte sati prativādinaḥ dṛṣṭāntasādṛśyamātrāvaṣṭabdhena	hetO prayukte sati prativAdinaH dRzwAnta sAdRSya mAtra avazwabDena
   hetunā vādyabhimatasādhyābhāvasādhanamukhena vādyuktahetoḥ	hetunA vAdi aBimata sADya aBAva sADana muKena vAdyukta hetoH
   svasādhyāsādhakatvasādhakamuttaraṃ sādharmyasametyathaiḥ/ yathā ātmetyādi/	svasADya asADaka tva sADakam uttaram sADarmya sametyaTEH/ yaTA AtmA ityAdi/
   yo yaḥ kriyāhetubhūtaguṇavān sa kriyāvān;	yaH yaH kriyA hetu BUta guNavAn sa kriyAvAn;
   yathā loṣṭaḥ	yaTA lozwaH
   kriyāhetubhūtavāyusaṃyogarūpaguṇavattvāt kriyāvān tadvat	kriyA hetu BUta vAyu saMyoga rUpa guNavat tvAt kriyAvAn tadvat 
   ātmāpi tādṛśaguṇavattvāt kriyāvān iti vādinokte sati,	AtmA api tAdRSa guNavat tvAt kriyAvAn iti vAdinA ukte sati,
   prativādī vadati 'yadi kriyāhetuguṇavattvena rūpeṇa loṣṭasādṛśyāt	prativAdI vadati ayadi kriyA hetu guNavat tvena rUpeNa lozwa sAdRSyAt 
   ātmanaḥ kriyāvattvaṃ tarhi yathā paramamahatparimāṇavataḥ ākāśasya	AtmanaH kriyAvat tvam tarhi yaTA parama mahat parimANavataH AkASasya
   niṣkriyatvaṃ tathā ātmano 'pi paramamahatparimāṇavattvāt niṣkriyatvaṃ	nizkriya tvam taTA AtmanaH api parama mahat parimANavat tvAt nizkriya tvam
   kiṃ na syāt; ātmā niṣkriyaḥ paramamahatparimāṇavattvāt	kim na sya at; AtmA nizkriyaH parama mahat parimANavat tvAt
   ākāśavadityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt' iti dūṣayati/ etādṛśaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ	AkASa vat iti api vaktum Sakya tvAt a iti dUzayati/ etAdRSam dUzaNam
   sādharmyasametyarthaḥ/	sADarmya sama iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   vaidharmyasamālakṣaṇam	vEDarmya samAlakzaNam
   vaidharmyeṇa	vEDarmyeNa
   dūṣakamuttaram vaidharmyasamā/ yathā tatraiva kriyāvato loṣṭasya	dUzakam uttaram vEDarmya samA/ yaTA tatra eva kriyAvataH lozwasya
   sādharmyāt yadi kriyāvānātmā, tadā vibhutvarūpatadvaidharmyāt	sADarmyAt yadi kriyAvAn AtmA, tadA viBu tva rUpa tad vEDarmyAt 
   niṣkriya eva kiṃ na syāt/ na hi tatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyam,	nizkriyaH eva kim na syAt/ na hi tat sADarmyAt kriyAvatA Bavitavyam,
   tadvaidharmyāt niṣkriyeṇa na bhavitavyam ityatra kiñcit	tad vEDarmyAt nizkriyeNa na Bavitavyam iti atra kiQcid 
   niyāmakamasti iti/	niyAmakam asti iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   evaṃ	evam
   dṛṣṭāntāvṛttidharmavattvarūpeṇa dṛṣṭāntavaidhārmyeṇa vādyuktahetoḥ	dRzwAnta AvRtti Darmavattva rUpeNa dRzwAnta vEDArmyeNa vAdI ukta hetoH
   svasādhyāsādhakatvakathanaṃ vaidharmyaṃsamā/ vibhutvarūpeti/ vibhutvaṃ	svasADya asADaka tva kaTanam vEDarmi aMsamA/ viBu tva rUpa iti/ viBu tvam
   paramamahatparimāṇavattvam/ tathā ca vādinā ātmā kriyāvān	parama mahat parimANa vat tvam/ taTA ca vAdinA AtmA kriyAvAn
   kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt loṣṭavat ityukte, ātmā niṣkriyaḥ	kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt lozwa vat iti ukte, AtmA nizkriyaH
   sakriyaloṣṭavidharmatvāt iti prativādī vadati/ sakriye loṣṭe	sa kriya lozwa viDarma tvAt iti prativAdI vadati/ sa kriye lozwe
   vidyamānasya dharmasya sattvāt	vidyamAnasya Darmasya sattvAt 
   ātmā loṣṭavat	AtmA lozwa vat 
   sakriyaścet loṣṭe avidyamānasya vibhutvasya ātmani sattvāt ātmā	sa kriyaH ced lozwe avidyamAnasya viBu tvasya Atmani sattvAt AtmA
   niṣkriya eva kuto na syāditi dūṣanaṃ vaidharmyasametyuktaṃ bhavati/	nizkriyaH eva kutas na syAt iti dUzanam vEDarmya sameti uktam Bavati/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   utkarṣasamālakṣaṇam	utkarza samAlakzaNam
   paroktasādhanādeva	para ukta sADanAt eva
   tadavyāpakasya dharmasya pakṣe āpādanam utkarṣasamā/ yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ	tat avyApakasya Darmasya pakze ApAdanam utkarza samA/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH
   kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat ityādau kaścidevamāha 'yadi kṛtakatvena	kRtaka tvAt Gawa vat iti AdO kaScid evam Aha ayadi kRtaka tvena
   hetunā śabdaḥ ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāt, tarhi tenaiva śabdaḥ	hetunA SabdaH Gawa vat anityaH syAt, tarhi tena eva SabdaH
   ghaṭavadaśrāvaṇo 'pi syāt' iti/	Gawa vat aSrAvaNaH api syAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   utkarṣasamāyā	utkarza samAyA
   lakṣaṇamāha   paroktasādhanādeveti/ pareṇa svasādhyasādhanāya yo	lakzaNam Aha  para ukta sADanAt eva iti/ pareNa sva sADya sADanAya yaH 
   heturucyate tenaiva tādṛśahetoravyāpako yaḥ dharmaḥ tasya pakṣe	hetuH ucyate tena eva tAdRSa hetoH avyApakaH yaH DarmaH tasya pakze
   prasañjanaṃ utkarṣasametyarthaḥ/ yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvādityatra	prasaQjanam utkarza samA iti arTaH/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH kRtaka tva At iti atra
   kaścidāha   yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā śabdaḥ ghaṭavadanityaḥ tarhi	kaScid Aha  yadi kRtaka tvena hetunA SabdaH Gawa vat anityaH tarhi
   tenaiva hetunā śabdaḥ ghaṭavad aśrāvaṇo 'pi syāditi/ atra hetoḥ	tena eva hetunA SabdaH Gawa vat aSrAvaNaH api syAt iti/ atra hetoH
   kṛtakatvasya avyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ aśrāvaṇatvaṃ tasya pakṣe āpādanaṃ kriyate/	kRtaka tvasya avyApakaH DarmaH aSrAvaNa tvam tasya pakze ApAdanam kriyate/
   īdṛśamuttaraṃ utkarṣasamā/"vyāptimapuraskṛtya	IdRSam uttaram utkarza samA/" vyAptim apuraskRtya
   pakṣadṛṣṭāntānyatarasmin sādhyasādhanānyatareṇa	pakza dRzwAnta anyatarasmin sADya sADana anyatareNa
   avidyamānadharmaprasañjanaṃ	avidyamAna Darma prasaQjanam
   utkarṣasamaḥ/ yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt iti sthāpanāyām	utkarza samaH/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH kRtaka tvAt iti sTApanAyAm
   anityatvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ ca ghaṭe rūpasahacaritam, ataḥ śabdo 'pi rūpavān	anitya tvam kRtaka tvam ca Gawe rUpa sahacaritam, atas SabdaH api rUpavAn
   syāt/ evaṃ śrāvaṇaśabdasādharmyāt kṛtakatvāt ghaṭo 'pi śrāvaṇaḥ	syAt/ evam SrAvaNa Sabda sADarmyAt kRtaka tvAt GawaH api SrAvaNaH
   syādaviśeṣāt"iti viśvanāthaḥ/	syAt aviSezAt"iti viSvanATaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   apakarṣasamālakṣaṇam	apakarza samAlakzaNam
   paroktadṛṣṭāntasādharmyeṇa pakṣe parābhimatadharmāntarasya	para ukta dRzwAnta sADarmyeNa pakze para aBimata Darma antarasya
   abhāvasādhanam apakarṣasamā/ yathā tasminneva anumāne 'yadi	aBAva sADanam apakarza samA/ yaTA tasmin= eva anumAne ayadi
   kṛtakatvena śabdaḥ ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāt tarhiṃ tenaiva śabdo	kRtaka tvena SabdaH Gawa vat anityaH syAt tarhim tena eva SabdaH 
   ghaṭavadaśrāvaṇo 'pi syāt' iti/	Gawa vat aSrAvaNaH api syAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   avidyamānadharmaprasañjanaṃ utkarṣaṃsamā/ vidyamānadharmābhāvaprasañjanaṃ	avidyamAna Darma prasaQjanam utkarzaMsamA/ vidyamAna Darma aBAva prasaQjanam
   apakarṣasamā/ tadāha   paroktadṛṣṭāntasādharmyeṇeti/ pareṇa vādinā	apakarza samA/ tat Aha  para ukta dRzwAnta sADarmyeNa iti/ pareNa vAdinA
   ukto yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatsādharmyeṇa pakṣe vādyabhimatasya	uktaH yaH dRzwAntaH tat sADarmyeNa pakze vAdI aBimatasya
   arthāntarasyābhāvasādhanam apakarṣasamā/ yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ	arTa antarasya aBAva sADanam apakarza samA/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH
   kṛtakatvāt iti vādinokte prativādī vadati   yadi	kRtaka tvAt iti vAdinA ukte prativAdI vadati  yadi
   kṛtakatvarūpāt ghaṭasādharmyāt śabdo ghaṭavadanityaḥ tarhi tasmādeva	kRtaka tva rUpAt Gawa sADarmyAt SabdaH Gawa vat anityaH tarhi tasmAt eva
   hetoḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭavat aśrāvaṇo 'pi syāditi/ atra pakṣe śabde	hetoH SabdaH Gawa vat aSrAvaNaH api syAt iti/ atra pakze Sabde
   anityatvavat vādyabhimataṃ arthāntaraṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ tadabhāvasya	anitya tva vat vAdI aBimatam arTa antaram SrAvaNa tvam tad aBAvasya
   prasañjanaṃ	prasaQjanam
   kriyate iti samanvayaḥ/"sādhye dharmābhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntāt	kriyate iti samanvayaH/" sADye Darma aBAvam dRzwAntAt 
   prasajato 'pakarṣasamaḥ"iti bhāṣyam/	prasajataH apakarza samaH"iti BAzyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   varṇyasamālakṣaṇam	varNya samAlakzaNam
   varṇyasya	varNyasya
   sthāpanīyasya dṛṣṭāntadharmasya pakṣe sādhanam varṇyasamā/ yathā	sTApanIyasya dRzwAnta Darmasya pakze sADanam varNya samA/ yaTA
   pūrvoktānumāne 'kriyājanakanodanākhyasaṃyogavattvāt loṣṭādeḥ	pUrva ukta anumAne akriyA jana kanodana AKya saMyogavat tvAt lozwa AdeH
   bhavatu kriyāvattvam/ ātmanastu kriyāvattve	Bavatu kriyAvat tvam/ AtmanaH tu kriyAvat tve
   tajjanakanodanākhyasaṃyogavattvamapi syāt' iti/	tad janakanodana AKya saMyogavat tvam api syAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   varṇyasamāṃ lakṣayati	varNya samAm lakzayati
     varṇyasyeti/ dṛṣṭānte vidyamānasya pakṣe sthāpanīyasya sādhanaṃ	 varNyasya iti/ dRzwAnte vidyamAnasya pakze sTApanIyasya sADanam
   varṇyasamā/ yathā ātmā kriyāvān kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt	varNya samA/ yaTA AtmA kriyAvAn kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt
   loṣṭavaditi vādinokte prativādī uttarayati loṣṭādeḥ	lozwa vat iti vAdinA ukte prativAdI uttarayati lozwa AdeH
   kriyājanakanodanākhyasaṃyogavattvāt kriyāvattvaṃ bhavatu/ ātmanastu	kriyA jana kanodana AKya saMyogavat tvAt kriyAvat tvam Bavatu/ AtmanaH tu
   kriyāvattve loṣṭavat kriyājanakanodanākhyasaṃyogavānātmā	kriyAvat tve lozwa vat kriyA jana kanodana AKya saMyogavAn AtmA
   bhavediti/ īdṛśamuttaraṃ varṇyasamā/"khyāpanīyo varṇyo	Bavet iti/ IdRSam uttaram varNya samA/"KyApanIyaH varNyaH 
   viparyayādavarṇyaḥ"iti bhāṣyam/	viparyayAt avarNyaH"iti BAzyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   avarṇyasamālakṣaṇam	avarNya samAlakzaNam
   sādhyahetvordharmayorapi pakṣe tulyatāsādhanam avarṇyasamā/	sADya hetvoH DarmayoH api pakze tulya tA sADanam avarNya samA/
   yathā tatraivānumāne loṣṭādigatanodanādirūpakriyāhetuguṇavattvaṃ	yaTA tatra eva anumAne lozwa Adi gata nodana Adi rUpa kriyA hetu guNavat tvam
   ātmanyasiddham/ tathā ca tulyatayā yathā asiddhena kriyāhetuguṇena	Atmani asidDam/ taTA ca tulya tayA yaTA asidDena kriyA hetu guNena
   ātmanikriyāvattvaṃ sādhyate, tathā tādṛśena kriyāvattvena	Atma nikriyAvat tvam sADyate, taTA tAdRSena kriyAvat tvena
   tajjanakaguṇavattvamapi kimiti na sādhyate niyāmakābhāvāt iti/	tad janaka guNavat tvam api kim iti na sADyate niyAmaka aBAvAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   avarṇyasamāmāha   sādhyahetvoriti/ pakṣe	avarNya samAm Aha  sADya hetvoH iti/ pakze
   sādhyahetvordvayorapi tulyatvāt yat vādidūṣakamuttaraṃ	sADya hetvoH dvayoH api tulya tvAt yat vAdi dUzakam uttaram
   tadavarṇyasamā/ yathā ātmā sakriyaḥ kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt loṣṭavat	tad avarNya samA/ yaTA AtmA sa kriyaH kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt lozwa vat 
   ityanumāne eva ātmani kriyāvattvamapi asiddham,	iti anumAne eva Atmani kriyAvat tvam api asidDam,
   kriyāhetunodanākhyasaṃyogavattvamapyasiddham/ tatrāsiddhena	kriyA hetunodana AKya saMyogavat tvam api asidDam/ tatra asidDena
   nodanākhyena kriyāhetuguṇena ātmanaḥ sakriyatvaṃ sādhyate cet	nodana AKyena kriyA hetu guNena AtmanaH sa kriya tvam sADyate ced 
   asiddhena kriyāvattvena kriyājanakanodanākhyasaṃyogavattvamapi kuto na	asidDena kriyAvat tvena kriyA janakanodana AKya saMyogavat tvam api kutas na
   sādhyate niyāmakābhāvāt ityevaṃ yaduttaraṃ tadavarṇyasametyarthaḥ/	sADyate niyAmaka aBAvAt iti evam yat uttaram tat avarNya samA iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   vikalpasamālakṣaṇam	vikalpa samAlakzaNam
   dṛṣṭāntavikalpaṃ	dRzwAnta vikalpam
   pradarśya dārṣṭāntikavikalpakathanaṃ vikalpasamā/ yathā tatraiva anumāne	pradarSya dArzwa antika vikalpa kaTanam vikalpa samA/ yaTA tatra eva anumAne
   'kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit laghu, yathāsa vāyuḥ, evaṃ	akriyA hetu guNa yuktam kiQcid laGu, yaTAsa vAyuH, evam
   kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit kriyāvat syāt yathā loṣṭādi	kriyA hetu guNa yuktam kiQcid kriyAvat syAt yaTA lozwa Adi
   kiñcidakriyam yathā ātmā/ pūrvavikalpo bhavati ayaṃ tu na	kiQcid akriyam yaTA AtmA/ pUrva vikalpaH Bavati ayam tu na
   bhavatītyatra kiṃ nayāmakaṃ syāt' iti/	Bavati iti atra kim na yAmakam syAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   vikalpasamāmāha  	vikalpa samAm Aha  
   dṛṣṭāntāvikalpaṃ pradarśyeti/ dṛṣṭānte vividhaṃ kalpaṃ pradarśya	dRzwAnta avikalpam pradarSya iti/ dRzwAnte viviDam kalpam pradarSya
   dārṣṭāntike 'pi vividhakalpapradarśanaṃ vikalpasametyarthaḥ/ yathā	dArzwa antike api viviDa kalpa pradarSanam vikalpa sama iti arTaH/ yaTA
   pūrvokte ātmā sakriyaḥ kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt ityanumāne eva	pUrva ukte AtmA sa kriyaH kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt iti anumAne eva
   kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcit guru yathā	kriyA hetu guNa yuktam kiQcid guru yaTA
   loṣṭādi kiñcillaghu	lozwa Adi kiQcid laGu
   yathā vāyuḥ, evaṃ kiṃyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcitsakriyaṃ yathā ghaṭādi,	yaTA vAyuH, evam kiMyA hetu guNa yuktam kiQcid sakriyam yaTA Gawa Adi,
   kiñcidakriyaṃ yathā ātmā/ tatra pūrvo vikalpa eva samīcīṃnaḥ ayaṃ tu	kiQcid akriyam yaTA AtmA/ tatra pUrvaH vikalpaH eva samIcIMnaH ayam tu
   vikalpaḥ na samīcīnaḥ ityatra niyāmakaṃ kimapi nāsti/ tathā ca	vikalpaH na samIcInaH iti atra niyAmakam kim api nAsti/ taTA ca
   kriyāhetuguṇavattve samāne 'pi kasyacit sakriyatvamityapi	kriyA hetu guNavat tve samAne api kasyacid sa kriya tvam iti api
   sambhavatīti tena hetunā ātmano niṣkriyattvamevāstu iti rītyā	samBavati iti tena hetunA AtmanaH nizkriyat tvam eva astu iti rItyA
   yaduttaraṃ tat vikalpasamā/	yat uttaram tat vikalpa samA/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   sādhyasamālakṣaṇam	sADya samAlakzaNam
   dṛṣṭāntasya	dRzwAntasya
   pakṣatulyatākathanam sādhyasamā/ sādhyaśabdo 'tra pakṣavācī/ yathā	pakza tulya tA kaTanam sADya samA/ sADya SabdaH atra pakza vAcI/ yaTA
   tatraiva	tatra eva
   yadi 'yathā loṣṭaḥ tathā ātmā' iti tvayā ucyate tadā 'yathā ātmā	yadi ayaTA lozwaH taTA AtmA a iti tvayA ucyate tadA ayaTA AtmA
   tathā loṣṭaḥ' ityapyāyātam/ tathā ca yadyātmani kriyāvattvaṃ sādhyate	taTA lozwaHa iti api AyAtam/ taTA ca yadi Atmani kriyAvat tvam sADyate
   tarhi loṣṭe 'pi tatsādhanīyam neti cettarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathā	tarhi lozwe api tad sADanIyam na iti ced tarhi yaTA lozwaH taTA
   ātmeti na vācyam/ 'loṣṭasadṛśa ātmā, nātmasadṛśo	AtmA iti na vAcyam/ alozwa sadRSaH AtmA, na Atma sadRSaH 
   loṣṭaḥ' ityatra	lozwaH a iti atra
   niyāmakābhāvāt iti/	niyAmaka aBAvAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   sādhyasamāmāha  	sADya samAm Aha  
   dṛṣṭāntasya pakṣatulyatākathanamiti/ sādhyate 'sminniti vyutpattyā	dRzwAntasya pakza tulya tA kaTanam iti/ sADyate asmin= iti vyutpattyA
   sādhyaśabdaḥ pakṣavācī/ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pakṣatulya ityāpādanaṃ sādhyasamā/	sADya SabdaH pakza vAcI/ dRzwAntaH pakza tulyaH iti ApAdanam sADya samA/
   śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭam/"hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tra	Sizwam spazwam/"hetu Adi avayava sAmarTya yogI DarmaH sADyaH tra
   dṛṣṭānte prasajataḥ sādhyasamaḥ/ yadi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathā ātmā,	dRzwAnte prasajataH sADya samaH/ yadi yaTA lozwaH taTA AtmA,
   prāptastarhi yathā ātmā tathā loṣṭa iti/ sādhyaścāyamātmā	prAptaH tarhi yaTA AtmA taTA lozwaH iti/ sADyaH ca ayam AtmA
   kriyāvāniti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ/ atha naivam, na tarhi yathā	kriyAvAn iti kAmam lozwaH api sADyaH/ aTa na evam, na tarhi yaTA
   loṣṭaḥ tathā ātmā"iti bhāṣyam/	lozwaH taTA AtmA" iti BAzyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prāptisamālakṣaṇam	prApti samAlakzaNam
   prāptyā	prAptyA
   pratyavasthānam prāptisamā/ prāptiśca sādhyahetvoḥ	pratyavasTAnam prApti samA/ prAptiH ca sADya hetvoH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyam/ yathā tatraiva kriyāhetuguṇavattvenaiva kimiti	sAmAnADikaraNyam/ yaTA tatra eva kriyA hetu guNavat tvena eva kim iti
   kriyāvattvaṃ sādhyate kimiti kriyāvattvena tādṛśaguṇavattvaṃ na	kriyAvat tvam sADyate kim iti kriyAvat tvena tAdRSa guNavat tvam na
   ubhayoraviśeṣāt iti/	uBayoH aviSezAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   prāptisamāmāha  	prApti samAm A Aha  
   prāptyā pratyavasthānamiti/ sādhyena saha ekādhikaraṇavṛttitvaṃ	prAptyA pratyavasTAnam iti/ sADyena saha eka aDikaraNa vRtti tvam
   hetorasti cet hetunā sākaṃ ekādhikaraṇavṛttitvaṃ	hetoH asti ced hetunA sAkam eka aDikaraNa vRtti tvam
   sādhyasyāpyastītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam/ tathā ca sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ	sADyasya api asti iti aFgIkaraNIyam/ taTA ca sADya sAmAnADikaraNyam
   puraskṛtya hetunā sādhyaṃ sādhyate cet hetusāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ	puraskRtya hetunA sADyam sADyate ced hetu sAma anADikaraNyam
   puraskṛtya sādhyenaiva hetuḥ sādhyatām/ evaṃ ca ātmā kriyāvān	puraskRtya sADyena eva hetuH sADya tAm/ evam ca AtmA kriyAvAn
   kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt itivat ātmā kriyāhetuguṇavān	kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt iti vat AtmA kriyA hetu guNavAn
   kriyāvattvāt ityapi sādhyatām aviśeṣāt iti pratyavasthānaṃ	kriyAvat tvAt iti api sADya tAm aviSezAt iti pratyavasTAnam
   prāptisametyarthaḥ/ ubhayoraviśeṣāditi/ ubhayoḥ	prApti sama iti arTaH/ uBayoH aviSezAt iti/ uBayoH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyāviśeṣādityarthaḥ/	sAmAnADikaraNyA viSezAt iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   aprāptisamālakṣaṇam	aprApti samAlakzaNam
   aprāptyā	aprAptyA
   pratyavasthānam aprāptisamā/ yathā tatraiva pūrvoktadoṣādaprāptasya	pratyavasTAnam aprApti samA/ yaTA tatra eva pUrva ukta dozAt aprAptasya
   hetoḥ sādhyasādhakatvaṃ vācyam, tathā cāprāptatvāviśeṣāt sarvaḥ	hetoH sADya sADaka tvam vAcyam, taTA ca aprApta tva aviSezAt sarvaH
   sarvaṃ sādhayet iti/ ayameva hetuḥ sādhyābhāvaṃ kimiti na	sarvam sADayet iti/ ayam eva hetuH sADya aBAvam kim iti na
   sādhayet/ sādhyameva tu sādhayedityatra vinigamakābhāvāt iti/	sADayet/ sADyam eva tu sADayet iti atra vinigamaka aBAvAt iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   aprāptisamāmāha  	aprApti samAm Aha  
   aprāptyā pratyavasthānamiti/ aprāptiḥ sādhyahetvoḥ	aprAptyA pratyavasTAnam iti/ aprAptiH sADya hetvoH
   asāmānādhikaraṇyam/ atraivaṃ vikalpaḥ kartavyaḥ/ ātmā kriyāvān	asAmAna aDikaraNyam/ atra evam vikalpaH kartavyaH/ AtmA kriyAvAn
   kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt ityukte ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyasamānādhikaraṇaḥ	kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt iti ukte ayam hetuH sADya samAna aDikaraNaH
   san sādhyaṃ sādhayati vā? sādhyāsamānādhikaraṇaḥ san sādhyaṃ sādhayati	san sADyam sADayati vA? sADya asamAna aDikaraNaH san sADyam sADayati
   vā? ādye sāmānādhikaraṇyāviśeṣāt sādhyenāpi kuto na hetuḥ	vA? Adye sAmAnADikaraNyA viSezAt sADyena api kutas na hetuH
   sādhyata iti pratyavasthānāt prāptisamā/ dvitīye	sADyate iti pratyavasTAnAt prApti samA/ dvitIye
   asāmānādhikaraṇyāviśeṣāt sādhyamiva anyat sarvaṃmapi hetuḥ kuto	asAmAnADikaraNyA viSezAt sADyam iva anyat sarvaMmapi hetuH kuto
   na sādhayet/ tathā ca sarvaḥ sarvaṃ sādhayet/ tathā heturyathā	na sADayet/ taTA ca sarvaH sarvam sADayet/ taTA hetuH yaTA
   sādhyenāsamānādhikaraṇo 'pi sādhyaṃ sādhayati tathā	sADyena asamAna aDikaraNaH api sADyam sADayati taTA
   sādhābhāvenāsamānādhikaraṇatvāt sādhyābhāvameva kuto na	sADABAvena asamAna aDikaraNa tvAt sADya aBAvam eva kutas na
   sādhayet? iti rītyā pratyavasthānam   dūṣaṇakathanam	sADayet? iti rItyA pratyavasTAnam  dUzaNa kaTanam
   aprāptisametyarthaḥ/	aprApti sama iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prasaṅgasamālakṣaṇam	prasaFga samAlakzaNam
   sādhanaparamparāpraśnaḥ prasaṅgasamā/ yathā kriyāvattve	sADana paramparA praSnaH prasaFga samA/ yaTA kriyAvat tve
   kriyāhetuguṇavattvaṃ sādhanam/ tatra kiṃ sādhanam? na hi sādhanaṃ vinā	kriyA hetu guNavat tvam sADanam/ tatra kim sADanam? na hi sADanam vinA
   kasyacit siddhirasti/ evaṃ tatrāpi kiṃ sādhanamityādi/	kasyacid sidDiH asti/ evam tatra api kim sADanam ityAdi/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   prasaṅgasamāṃ	prasaFga samAm
   lakṣayati   sādhanaparamparāpraśna iti/ sādhanaparamparā viṣayakaḥ praśnaḥ	lakzayati  sADana paramparA praSnaH iti/ sADana paramparA vizayakaH praSnaH
   prasaṅgasamā/"sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyamiti	prasaFga samA/" sADanasya api sADanam vaktavyam iti
   prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ"iti bhāṣyam/ śiṣṭaṃ	prasaFgena pratyavasTAnam prasaFga samaH" iti BAzyam/ Sizwam
   spaṣṭam/	spazwam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   pratidṛṣṭāntasamālakṣaṇam	pratidRzwAnta samA lakzaNam
   dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa	dRzwAnta antareNa
   sādhyābhāvasādhanam pratidṛṣṭāntasamā/ yathā 'tatraiva loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena	sADya aBAva sADanam pratidRzwAnta samA/ yaTA atatra eva lozwa dRzwAntena
   kriyāvattve sādhite niṣkriyākāśadṛṣṭāntena ātmano niṣkriyattvameva	kriyAvat tve sADite nizkriya AkASa dRzwAntena AtmanaH nizkriyat tvam eva
   kiṃ na syāt/ loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena kriyāvattvaṃ ākāśadṛṣṭāntena	kim na syAt/ lozwa dRzwAntena kriyAvat tvam AkASa dRzwAntena
   niṣkriyattvaṃ na ityatra	nizkriyat tvam naH iti atra
   niyāmakābhāvāt' iti/	niyAmaka aBAvAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   pratidṛṣṭāntasamāmāha   dṛṣṭāntāntareṇeti/ ātmā kriyāvān	pratidRzwAnta samAm Aha  dRzwAnta antareNa iti/ AtmA kriyAvAn
   kriyāhetuguṇayuktatvāt loṣṭavat iti loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena	kriyA hetu guNa yukta tvAt lozwa vat iti lozwa dRzwAntena
   kriyāvattvaṃ sādhyate cet ātmā niṣkriyaḥ	kriyAvat tvam sADyate ced AtmA nizkriyaH
   kriyāhetuvāyusaṃyogavattvāt ākāśavat ityākāśadṛṣṭāntena	kriyA hetu vAyu saMyogavat tvAt AkASa vat iti AkASa dRzwAntena
   kuto na sādhayituṃ śakyata iti prakṛtasādhyaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ pradarśya	kutas na sADayitum Sakyate iti prakRta sADya SUnyam dRzwAntam pradarSya
   dūṣaṇodbhāvanaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamā/"kriyāvān ātmā	dUzaNa udBAvanam pratidRzwAnta samA/" kriyAvAn AtmA
   kriyāhetuguṇayogāt loṣṭavat ityukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate	kriyA hetu guNa yogAt lozwa vat iti ukte pratidRzwAntaH upAdIyate
   kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭathmati/ kaḥ punarākāśasyaṃ	kriyA hetu guNa yuktam AkASam nizkriyam dRzwaTmati/ kaH punar AkASasyam
   kriyāhetuguṇaḥ, vāyunā saṃyogaḥ"iti bhāṣyam/	kriyA hetu guNaH, vAyunA saMyogaH" iti BAzyam/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anutpattisamālakṣaṇam	anutpatti samAlakzaNam
   anutpattyā	anutpattyA
   pratyavasthānam anutpattisamā/ yathā 'ghaṭo na nityaḥ janyaikātvāt'	pratyavasTAnam anutpatti samA/ yaTA aGawaH na nityaH janyA ekAtvAt a
   ityādau kaścidāha   yadi janyaikatvaṃ anityatve pramāṇam tadā ghaṭe	iti AdO kaScid Aha  yadi janyA ekatvam anitya tve pramANam tadA Gawe
   ekatvotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tadabhāvāt nityatvam/ nityaścet tarhi anutpanna	ekatva utpatteH pUrvam tad aBAvAt nitya tvam/ nityaH ced tarhi anutpanna
   eveti/	eva iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   anutpattisamāmāha  	anutpatti samAm Aha  
   anutpattyā pratyavasthānamiti/ janyaikatvāditi/ janyaṃ ca tat ekatvaṃ ca	anutpattyA pratyavasTAnam iti/ janyA ekatvAt iti/ janyam ca tat eka tvam ca
   janyaikatvam, tasmāt/ anutpanna eveti/ tathā ca anityatvaṃ	janyA eka tvam, tasmAt/ anutpannaH eva iti/ taTA ca anitya tvam
   bādhitāmiti bhāvaḥ/"tathā ca sādhanāṅgapakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāṃ	bADitAm iti BAvaH/"taTA ca sADana aFga pakza hetu dRzwAntAnAm
   utpatteḥ prāk hetvabhāva ityanutpattyā pratyavasthānaṃ anutpattisamaḥ/	utpatteH prAk hetu aBAvaH iti anutpattyA pratyavasTAnam anutpatti samaH/
   utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ hetvādyabhāvena pratyavasthānasyaiva lakṣaṇatvāt"iti	utpatteH pUrvam hetu Adi aBAvena pratyavasTAnasya eva lakzaNa tvAt"iti
   viśvanārthaḥ/	viSvana arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   saṃśayasamālakṣaṇam	saMSaya samAlakzaNam
   sādhāraṇadharmaṃ	sADAraNa Darmam
   pradarśyaṃ saṃśayodbhāvanaṃ saṃśayasamā/ yathā 'śabdo 'nityaḥ	pradarSyam saMSaya udBAvanam saMSaya samA/ yaTA aSabdaH anityaH
   kāryatvāt' ityādau 'śabdasya anityaghaṭena saha kāryatvarūpaṃ	kArya tvAt a ityAdO aSabdasya anitya Gawena saha kAryatva rUpam
   sādharmyaṃ yathā asti tathā nityena śabdatvena saha	sADarmyam yaTA asti taTA nityena Sabda tvena saha
   śrāvaṇapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ	SrAvaNa pratyakza vizaya tvam
   sādharmyaṃ astīti ubhayasādharmyadarśanāt saṃśayaḥ syāt/ ekapariśeṣe	sADarmyam asti iti uBaya sADarmya darSanAt saMSayaH syAt/ eka pariSeze
   niyāmakābhāvāt' iti/	niyAmaka aBAvAt a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   saṃśayasamāmāha  	saMSaya samAm Aha  
   sādhāraṇadharmaṃ pradarśyeti/ spaṣṭārtham/"nityānityasādharmyāditi	sADAraNa Darmam pradarSya iti/ spazwa arTa m/"nitya anitya sADarmyAt iti
   saṃśayakāraṇopalakṣaṇam/ tena samānadharmadarśanādi	saMSaya kAraNa upalakzaNam/ tena samAna Darma darSana Adi
   yatkiñcitsaṃśayakāraṇabalāt saṃśayena pratyavasthānaṃ saṃśayasamaḥ"iti	yat kiQcit saMSaya kAraNa balAt saMSayena pratyavasTAnam saMSaya samaH" iti
   viśvanāthaḥ/	viSvanATaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prakaraṇasamālakṣaṇam	prakaraNa samAlakzaNam
   vādyuktahetoḥ	vAdI ukta hetoH
   sādhyaviparītasādhakahetvantarodbhāvanam prakaraṇasamā/	sADya viparIta sADaka hetu antara udBAvanam prakaraNa samA/
   satpratipakṣodāharaṇameva atrodāharaṇaṃ bodhyam/	sat pratipakza udAharaNam eva atra udAharaNam boDyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   prakaraṇasamāmāha	prakaraNa samAm Aha
   vādyaktahetoriti/ śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat iti vādinā	vAdyakta hetoH iti/ SabdaH anityaH kRtaka tvAt Gawa vat iti vAdinA
   anityatvasādhanāya kṛtakatvahetau ukte sati tādṛśahetusādhyasya	anitya tva sADanAya kRtaka tva hetO ukte sati tAdRSa hetu sADyasya
   anityatvasya viparītaṃ yat śabdaḥ nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavat	anitya tvasya viparItam yat SabdaH nityaH SrAvaNa tvAt Sabda tva vat 
   ityevaṃ prayujyamānaṃ hetvantaram śrāvaṇatvākhyaṃ tadudbhāvanena	iti evam prayujyamAnam hetu antaram SrAvaNa tva AKyam tad udBAvanena
   pratyavasthānaṃ prakaraṇasametyarthaḥ/	pratyavasTAnam prakaraNa sama iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   ahetusamālakṣaṇam	ahetu sama alakzaNam
   kālatraye 'pi	kAla traye api
   hetutvāsambhavena ahetutvakathanam ahetusamā/ yathā	hetu tva asamBavena ahetu tva kaTanam ahetu samA/ yaTA
   'kāryatvādirūpasādhanaṃ sādhyādanityatvāt pūrvakālavṛtti cet	akArya tva Adi rUpa sADanam sADyAt anitya tvAt pUrva kAla vRtti ced 
   tadānityatvarūpasādhyasya tadānīmabhāvāt kasya sādhakam/ atha	tadA anitya tva rUpa sADyasya tadAnIm aBAvAt kasya sADakam/ aTa
   paścātkālavṛtti cet tadā pūrvakāle sādhanābhāvāt kasya	paScAt kAla vRtti ced tadA pUrva kAle sADana aBAvAt kasya
   sādhyamanityatvam/ yadi ca ubhayaṃ ekakālavṛtti tadā kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ	sADyam anitya tvam/ yadi ca uBayam eka kAla vRtti tadA kim kasya sADanam
   kiṃ kasya sādhyam/ vinigamakābhāvāditi/ hetusameti pāṭhe tu	kim kasya sADyam/ vinigamaka aBAvAditi/ hetu samA iti pAWe tu
   kālatraye 'pi hetutvasya asambhavakathanaṃ hetusametyarthaḥ/	kAla traye api hetu tvasya asamBava kaTanam hetu samA iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   ahetusamāṃ	ahetu samAm
   lakṣayati   kālatraye 'pīti/ kālatraye 'pi hetutvāsambhavakathanapūrvakaṃ	lakzayati  kAla traye api iti/ kAla traye api hetu tva asamBava kaTana pUrvakam
   ahetutvakathanam ahetusamā/	ahetu tva kaTanam ahetu samA/
   kasya sādhakamiti/	kasya sADakam iti/
   anityatvasya kāryatvaṃ na sādhakamityarthaḥ/ pūrvakālāvacchedena	anitya tvasya kArya tvam na sADakam iti arTaH/ pUrva kAla avacCedena
   avidyamānasya sādhyasya hetuḥ kathaṃ	avidyamAnasya sADyasya hetuH kaTam
   sādhako bhavet	sADakaH Bavet 
   iti bhāvaḥ/ kasya sādhyamanityatvamiti/ anityatvaṃ kāryatvasya sādhyaṃ	iti BAvaH/ kasya sADyam anitya tvam iti/ anitya tvam kAryatvasya sADyam
   na bhavatītyarthaḥ/ kālatrayaśabdena kāryakālatatpūrvakālatatpaścātkālāḥ	na Bavati iti arTaH/ kAla traya Sabdena kArya kAla tad pUrva kAla tad paScAt kAlAH
   vivakṣitāḥ/"heturahetunā na viśiṣṭayate/ ahetunā	vivakzitAH/" hetuH ahetunA na viSizwayate/ ahetunA

   arthāpattisamālakṣaṇam	arTApatti samAlakzaNam

   arthāpattyā siddhaṃ nityasādharmyāt nityatvamapi ekatarāvadhāraṇe	arTApattyA sidDam nitya sADarmyAt nitya tvam api ekatara avaDAraNe
   niyāmakābhāvāt"iti/	niyAmaka aBAvAt"iti/

   anityena ghaṭena kṛtakatvasādharmyāt śabdaḥ anityaḥ ityukte	anityena Gawena kRtaka tva sADarmyAt SabdaH anityaH iti ukte
   arthādāpadyate nityasādharmyāt nitya iti/ asti ca nityena ākāśena	arTAt Apadyate nitya sADarmyAt nityaH iti/ asti ca nityena AkASena
   asparśatvarūpaṃ sādharmyaṃ śabdasya iti śabdo nitya eva kiṃ na	asparSa tva rUpam sADarmyam Sabdasya iti SabdaH nityaH eva kim na
   syādityevam arthāpattipūrvakaṃ dūṣaṇodbhāvanaṃ	syAt iti evam arTApatti pUrvakam dUzaNa udBAvanam
   arthāpattisametyarthaḥ/"arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayataḥ	arTApatti sama iti arTaH/"arTa ApattyA pratipakzam sADayataH
   arthāpattisamaḥ/ yadi prāyatnānantarīyakatvāt anityasādharmyāt	arTApatti samaH/ yadi prAyatna anantarIyaka tvAt anitya sADarmyAt 
   anityaḥ śabda iti, tadā arthādāpadyate nityasādharmyāt nitya iti/	anityaH SabdaH iti, tadA arTAt Apadyate nitya sADarmyAt nityaH iti/
   asti tvasya nityena sādharmyaṃ asparśatvam"iti bhāṣyam/	asti tu asya nityena sADarmyam asparSa tvam "iti BAzyam/
   ekatarāvadhāraṇa iti/ anityasādharmyādanityatvamevetyavadhāraṇa	ekatara avaDAraNaH iti/ anitya sADarmyAt anitya tvam eva iti avaDAraNa
   ityarthaḥ/	iti arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   aviśeṣasamālakṣaṇam	aviSeza samAlakzaNam

   'yadi kṛtakatvādinā anityaghaṭādisādharmyeṇa śabdasya anityatvaṃ tadā	ayadi kRtaka tva AdinA anitya Gawa Adi sADarmyeNa Sabdasya anitya tvam tadA
   prameyatvādirūpeṇa tatsādharmyeṇa sarvasyaivānityatvaṃ syāt/	prameya tva Adi rUpeNa tat sADarmyeNa sarvasya eva anitya tvam syAt /
   maduktasādharmyeṇa tatsidhyati, na tu tvaduktenetyatra niyāmakābhāvāt'	mad ukta sADarmyeNa tat siDyati, na tu tvad uktena iti atra niyAmaka aBAvAt a

   kṛtakatvāt ityatra ekasya dharmasyaś kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde ghaṭe ca	kRtaka tvAt iti atra ekasya DarmasyaH kRtaka tva AdeH Sabde Gawe ca
   sattvāt yadi śabdaghaṭayoranityatvenāviśeṣa ucyate, tadā	sattvAt yadi Sabda GawayoH anitya tvena aviSezaH ucyate, tadA
   sarveṃṣāmaviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ/ sattvaprameyatvādirūpasya ekasya dharmasya	sarveMzAm aviSeza prasaFgaH/ sattva prameya tva Adi rUpasya ekasya Darmasya
   sarveṣu sattvāt/ tathā ca	sarvezu sattva at/ taTA ca

   pakṣādivibhāgo na syāt/ sarveṣāmekajātīyatve 'vāntarajātyucchedaḥ,	pakza Adi viBAgaH na syAt/ sarvezAm eka jAtIya tve avAntara jAti ucCedaH,
   sarveṣāmanityatve jātyādivilaya iti viśvanāthaḥ nirūpayati/	sarvezAm anitya tve jAti Adi vilayaH iti viSvanATaH nirUpayati/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   upapattisamālakṣaṇam	upapatti samAlakzaNam

   kāryatvamupapadyata iti śabdasyānityatvaṃ tadā nityatvasādhanamapi	kAryatvam upapadyate iti Sabdasya anitya tvam tadA nitya tva sADanam api
   kiñcidupapadyata iti nityatvaṃ kiṃ na syāt' iti/	kiQcid upapadyate iti nitya tvam kim na syAt a iti/

   upapattisameti yāvat/	upapatti sameti yAvat /

   upalabdhisamālakṣaṇam	upalabDi samAlakzaNam

   upalabdhisamā/ yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ prayatnānuvidhāyitvāt ghaṭavat	upalabDi samA/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH prayatna anuviDAyi tvAt Gawa vat 
   ityatra prayatnaṃ vināpi vāyunodanavāśāt vṛkṣaśākhābhaṅgajanyasya	iti atra prayatnam vinA api vAyunA udana vASAt vRkza SAKA BaFga janyasya
   śabdasya upalabdheḥ	Sabdasya upalabDeH
   na	na
   prayatnānuvidhāyitvaṃ śabde 'sti iti/	prayatna anuviDAyi tvam Sabde asti iti/

   upalabdhisamāṃ	upalabDi samAm
   sodāharaṇaṃ lakṣayati   vādyakteti/ vādinā nirdiṣṭasya	sa udAharaNam lakzayati  vAdyaktA iti/ vAdinA nirdizwasya
   kāraṇasyābhāve 'pi sādhyopalambhāt pratyavasthānam upalabdhisamaḥ/ tathā	kAraNasya aBAve api sADya upalamBAt pratyavasTAnam upalabDi samaH/ taTA
   hi   parvato vahnimān dhūmāt ityādikaṃ vahnyavadhāraṇārthaṃ	hi  parvataH vahnimAn DUmAt iti Adikam vahni avaDAraNa arTam
   ucyate, na tatsambhavati, dhūmaṃ vinā ālokādito 'pi vahnisiddheḥ/	ucyate, na tad samBavati, DUmam vinA Aloka AditaH api vahni sidDeH/
   tathā ca na tasya sādhakatvamiti pratikūlatarkaḥ iti viśvanāthaḥ/	taTA ca na tasya sADaka tvam iti pratikUla tarkaH iti viSvanATaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anupalabdhisamālakṣaṇam	anupalabDi samAlakzaNam
   vādinānupalabdhivaśāt kasyacit padārthasya anaṅgīkāre	vAdinA anupalabDi vaSAt kasyacid padArTasya anaFgIkAre
   anupalabdhivaśādeva vādyabhimatasyāpi yatkiñcitpadārthasya abhāvasādhanam	anupalabDi vaSAt eva vAdI aBimatasya api yat kiQcit padArTasya aBAva sADanam
   anupalabdhisamā/ yathā   'jalādeḥ vidyamānasyāpi āvaraṇavaśāt	anupalabDi samA/ yaTA  ajala AdeH vidyamAnasya api AvaraNa vaSAt 
   yathānupalabdhiḥ tathā uccāraṇātpūrvaṃ śabdasya vidyamānasyāpi	yaTA anupalabDiH taTA uccAraNAt pUrvam Sabdasya vidyamAnasya api
   āvaraṇavaśāt anupalabdhiḥ ityetanmataṃ vādināṃ	AvaraNa vaSAt anupalabDiH iti etat matam vAdinAm
   dūṣyate yadyāvaraṇavaśāt śabdo nopalabhyete, tadā jalādyāvaraṇamiva	dUzyate yadi AvaraNa vaSAt SabdaH na upalaByete, tadA jala Adi AvaraNam iva
   śabdādyāvaraṇamapyupalabhyeteti/ atrottaram yadi bhavadbhiḥ	Sabda Adi AvaraNam api upalaByeta iti/ atra uttaram  yadi BavadBiH
   anupalabdhita āvaraṇaṃ nābhyupeyate tadā anupalabdherapi	anupalabDitaH AvaraNam na aByupeyate tadA anupalabDeH api
   anupalabdhyābhāvo siddhe tadabhāvāt āvaraṇābhāvāsiddhau	anupalabDyA aBAvaH sidDe tad aBAvAt AvaraNa aBAva asidDO
   āvaraṇasiddhiḥ' iti/	AvaraNa sidDiH a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   anupalabdhisamāṃ	anupalabDi samAm
   lakṣayati   vādineti/ naiyāyikaistāvat śabdānityatvaṃ evaṃ sādhyate	lakzayati  vAdinA iti/ nEyAyikEH tAvat Sabda anitya tvam evam sADyate
     yadi śabdaḥ nityaḥ syāt tarhi uccāraṇāt prāk kuto	 yadi SabdaH nityaH syAt tarhi uccAraNAt prAk kuto
   nopalabhyate/ na hi ghaṭādyāvaraṇakuḍyādivat śabdasyāvaraṇamasti,	na upalaByate/ na hi Gawa Adi AvaraNa kuxya Adi vat Sabdasya AvaraNam asti,
   tadanupalabdheriti/ tatraivaṃ jātivādī	tad anupalabDeH iti/ tatra evam jAti vAdI
   pratyavatiṣṭhate yadyāvaraṇānupalabdheḥ āvaraṇābhāvaḥ sidhyati tadā	pratyavatizWate yadi AvaraNa anupalabDeH AvaraNa aBAvaH siDyati tadA
   āvaraṇānupalabdherapyanupalambhāt āvaraṇānupalabdherapyabhāvaḥ	AvaraNa anupalabDeH api anupalamBAt AvaraNa anupalabDeH api aBAvaH
   sidhyet/ tathā ca anupalabdhipramāṇakaḥ āvaraṇābhāvo na syāt api tu	siDyet/ taTA ca anupalabDi pramANakaH AvaraNa aBAvaH na syAt api tu
   āvaraṇopapattireva syāditi śabdanityatve noktaṃ bādhakaṃ yuktamiti/	AvaraNa upapattiH eva syAt iti Sabda nitya tve na uktam bADakam yuktam iti/
   itthaṃ ca evaṃrūpeṇa pratyavasthānam anupalabdhisametyartha iti	itTam ca evaMrUpeNa pratyavasTAnam anupalabDi sama iti arTaH iti
   viśvanāthaḥ/	viSvanATaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   nityasamālakṣaṇam	nitya samAlakzaNam
   dharmasya	Darmasya
   nityatvānityatvavikalpāt dharmiṇo nityatvasādhanam nityasamā/ yathā	nitya tva anitya tva vikalpAt DarmiNaH nitya tva sADanam nitya samA/ yaTA
   'śabdasya yat anityatvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ ucyate tat nityaṃ anityaṃ vā/	aSabdasya yat anitya tvam BavadBiH ucyate tat nityam anityam vA/
   yadi nityaṃ tadā śabdavṛttereva tasya sadātanatvāt śabdasyāpi	yadi nityam tadA Sabda vRtteH eva tasya sadAtana tvAt Sabdasya api
   tathātvamāgatam/ atha anityaṃ tadā śabde kadācit	taTAtvam Agatam/ aTa anityam tadA Sabde kadAcid 
   anityatvābhāvo 'stīti nitya eva śabda ityubhayathāpi śabdasya	anitya tva aBAvaH asti iti nityaH eva SabdaH iti uBayaTA api Sabdasya
   nityatvam' iti/	nitya tvam a iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   nityasamāṃ lakṣayati	nitya samAm lakzayati
     dharmasyeti/ śabdasyāpi tathātvamāgatamiti/ śabdasyāpi nityatvaṃ	 Darmasya iti/ Sabdasya api taTAtvam Agatamiti/ Sabdasya api nitya tvam
   prasaktamityarthaḥ/ dharmiṇaṃ vinā dharmasya sthityabhāvena	prasaktam iti arTaH/ DarmiNam vinA Darmasya sTiti aBAvena
   dharmasyānityatvasya	Darmasya anitya tvasya
   nityatve sadātanatve dharmī śabdo 'pi nityaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ/ śabde	nitya tve sadAtana tve DarmI SabdaH api nityaH syAt iti BAvaH/ Sabde
   anityatvasya nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ svīkāre anitye śabde nityatvaṃ	anitya tvasya nityam sarvakAlam svIkAre anitye Sabde nitya tvam
   syādityāpādanaṃ nityasamā iti viśvanārthaḥ/	syAt iti ApAdanam nitya samAH iti viSvana arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   anityasamālakṣaṇam	anitya samAlakzaNam
   anityadṛṣṭāntasādharmyāt sarvānityatvaprasaṅgodbhāvanam	anitya dRzwAnta sADarmyAt sarva anitya tva prasaFga udBAvanam
   anityasamā/ yathā 'yadi anityena ghaṭane sādṛśyāt śabdaḥ anityaḥ	anitya samA/ yaTA ayadi anityena Gawane sAdRSyAt SabdaH anityaH
   ityucyate tadā yena kenacit dharmeṃṇa sarvasyaiva tatsadṛśatvāt	iti ucyate tadA yena kenacid DarmeMNa sarvasya eva tad sadRSa tvAt 
   sarvasyānityatvaprasaṅgaḥ' iti/	sarvasya anitya tva prasaFgaHa iti/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   anityasamāṃ	anitya samAm
   lakṣayati   anityadṛṣṭānteti/ anityena ghaṭena sādharmyāt	lakzayati  anitya dRzwa anta iti/ anityena Gawena sADarmyAt 
   (kṛtakatvarūpāt) anityaḥ śabda iti bruvataḥ asti ghaṭenānityena	(kRtaka tva rUpAt) anityaH SabdaH iti bruvataH asti Gawena anityena
   sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyaṃ (sattvādirūpam) iti sarvasya	sarva BAvAnAm sADarmyam (sattva Adi rUpam) iti sarvasya
   anityatvamaniṣṭaṃ sampadyate/ so 'yaṃ anityatvena pratyavasthānāt	anitya tvam anizwam sampadyate/ saH ayam anitya tvena pratyavasTAnAt 
   anityasama iti bhāṣyam/ vyāptimapuraskṛtya	anitya samaH iti BAzyam/ vyAptim apuraskRtya
   yatkiñciddṛṣṭāntasādharmyeṇa sarvasya	yat kiQcit dRzwAnta sADarmyeNa sarvasya
   sādhyavattvāpādanāt	sADyavat tva ApAdanAt 
   anityasamā/ sādhyapadādaviśeṣasamāto vyavacchedaḥ tatra sarvāviśeṣa	anitya samA/ sADya padAt aviSeza samAtaH vyavacCedaH tatra sarva aviSeza
   evāpadyate na tu sarvasya sādhyavattvam iti viśvanārthaḥ/	eva Apadyate na tu sarvasya sADyavat tvam iti viSvana arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   kāryasamālakṣaṇam	kArya samAlakzaNam
   vādyuktahetoḥ	vAdI ukta hetoH
   anyakoryeṇāpi sambhavābhidhānaṃ kāryaṃsamā/ yathā tatraiva	anya koryeNa api samBava aBiDAnam kAryaMsamA/ yaTA tatra eva
   prayatnānuvidhāyitvaṃ ubhayathāpi sambhavati ghaṭādivat	prayatna anuviDAyi tvam uBayaTA api samBavati Gawa Adi vat 
   śabdasvarūpotpattau jalādivat āvarakanivṛttau ca ubhayatrāpi	Sabda svarUpa utpattO jala Adi vat Avaraka nivRttO ca uBayatra api
   prayatnānuvidhāyitvadarśanāt/ tathā ca tasya	prayatna anuviDAyi tva darSanAt/ taTA ca tasya
   āvarakanivṛttirūpakāryāntarasya sambhavāt nānityatvaniyatatvaṃ	Avaraka nivRtti rUpa kArya antarasya samBavAt na anitya tva niyata tvam
   iti/ kvacit kāraṇasameti pāṭhaḥ/ tasyāpi 'kāraṇasya	iti/ kvacid kAraNa sameti pAWaH/ tasya api akAraNasya
   prayatnānuvidhāyitvasya ubhayatra śabdasyotpattau tadāvarakanivṛttau ca	prayatna anuviDAyi tvasya uBayatra Sabdasya utpattO tadA avaraka nivRttO ca
   samatvābhidhānam' iti rītyā ukta evārthe paryavasānamavaseyam/ atra	samatva aBiDAnam a iti rItyE uktaH eva arTe paryavasAnam avaseyam/ atra
   granthagauravabhayāt sūkṣmaprakārāḥ na darśitāḥ ityabhiyuktairanyatra	granTa gOrava BayAt sUkzma prakArAH na darSitAH iti aBiyuktEH anyatra
   te 'nusandheyāḥ/	te anusanDeyAH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   kāryasamāṃ lakṣayati	kArya samAm lakzayati
     vādyuktahetoriti/ yathā śabdaḥ anityaḥ prayatnānuvidhāyitvāt	 vAdI ukta hetoH iti/ yaTA SabdaH anityaH prayatna anuviDAyi tvAt
   ityatra prayatnānuvidhāyitvaṃ kāryadvaye 'sti svarūpotpattau	iti atra prayatna anuviDAyi tvam kArya dvaye asti svarUpa utpattO
   āvarakanivṛttau ceti/ tatra svarūpotpattyabhiprāyeṇa vādinokte	Avaraka nivRttO ceti/ tatra svarUpa utpatti aBiprAyeNa vAdinA ukte
   jātivādala āha āvarakanivṛttāveva prayatnānuvidhāyitvasyopayogaḥ	jAtivAdalaH Aha Avaraka nivRttO= eva prayatna anuviDAyi tvasya upayogaH
   na svarūpotpattāviti śabdasyānityatvaṃ na sidhyatīti/ evaṃrītyā	na svarUpa utpattO= iti Sabdasya anitya tvam na siDyati iti/ evaMrItyA
   pratyavasthānaṃ kāryasametyarthaḥ/	pratyavasTAnam kArya samA iti arTaH/
   atredamavadheyam keṣucit grantheṣu	atra idam avaDeyam  ka izucid granTezu
   sādharmyasamā vaidharmyasamā ityādirūpeṇa strīliṅgatayā samaśabdaḥ	sADarmya samAH vEDarmya samAH ityAdi rUpeNa strI liFga tayA sama SabdaH
   prayujyate, keṣucittu sādharmyasamaḥ vaidharmyasamaḥ ityādirūpeṇa	prayujyate, kezucid tu sADarmya samaH vEDarmya samaH ityAdi rUpeNa
   pulliṅgatayā prayujyate/ tatra jāterviśeṣyatvavivakṣāyāṃ samaśabdasya	put liFga tayA prayujyate/ tatra jAteH viSezya tva vivakzAyAm sama Sabdasya
   strīliṅgatvam/ nyāyasūtrakārastu 'sādharmyavaidharmyasamau'	strI liFga tvam/ nyAya sUtra kAraH tu  asADarmya vEDarmya samO a
   ityādirūpeṇa pulliṅgatayaiva nirdiśati/ tasyāyaṃ bhāvaḥ   vādyaktasya	ityAdi rUpeNa pulliFga tayA eva nirdiSati/ tasya ayam BAvaH  vAdyaktasya
   pratiṣedhaḥ kila jātivādinā kriyate, tatra pratiṣeghaśabdaḥ pulliṅga	pratizeDaH kila jAti vAdinA kriyate, tatra pratizeGa SabdaH put liFga
   iti tadanurodhena samaśabdasya pulliṅgeteti/ taduktaṃ	iti tad anuroDena sama Sabdasya pulliFgeta iti/ tad uktam
   nyāyapariśuddhau vedāntadeśikaiḥ  "akṣapādīyeṣu ca	nyAya pariSudDO vedAnta deSikEH  "akzapAdIyezu ca
   jātiviśeṣalakṣaṇasūtreṣu pulliṅgāntasamaśabdanirdeśaḥ	jAti viSeza lakzaNa sUtrezu pulliFga anta sama Sabda nirdeSaH
   svapakṣasthāpanaparapakṣapratikṣeparūpeṇa vibhāge pratyavasthāne	sva pakza sTApana para pakza pratikzepa rUpeNa viBAge pratyavasTAne
   pratiṣedhabhāgenātra jātitvaṃ vivakṣitam	pratizeDa BAgena atra jAti tvam vivakzitam
   ityuktarūpajātiviśeṣābhiprāya ityāhuḥ"iti/ nyāyabhāṣyakārādayo 'pīti	iti ukta rUpa jAti viSeza aBiprAyaH iti AhuH "iti/ nyAya BAzya kAra AdayaH api iti
   pratiṣedhaśabdasya sūtre	pratizeDa Sabdasya sUtre
   bahulaṃ prayogāt pratiṣedhaśabdamādāyeva samaśabde	bahulam prayogAt pratizeDa Sabdam AdAya iva sama Sabde
   pulliṅganirvāhaṃ manyante/ viśvanāthanyāyapañcānanastu	put liFga nirvAham manyante/ viSva nATa nyAya paQcAnanaH tu
   'sādharmyasamādayo jātivikalpāḥ/ vividhaḥ kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ prabhedaḥ'	asADarmya samAdayaH jAti vikalpAH/ viviDaH kalpaH vikalpaH praBedaH a
   iti vadan vikalpaśabdānusāreṇa samaśabdasya pulliṅgatāṃ	iti vadan vikalpa Sabda anusAreNa sama Sabdasya pulliFga tAm
   nirvahati/ evaṃ vādinā sādhane kriyāmāṇe tatra prativādinā	nirvahati/ evam vAdinA sADane kriyAmANe tatra prativAdinA
   udbhāvyamānaḥ asaduttaraviśeṣaḥ jātiḥ/ tasya jātiśabdavācyatā	udBAvyamAnaH asat uttara viSezaH jAtiH/ tasya jAti Sabda vAcya tA
   jāyamānatvanibandhanā/ tathā ca"sādharmyavaidharmyābhyām	jAyamAna tva nibanDanA/ taTA ca" sADarmya vEDarmyAByAm

   yaḥ kaścit	yaH kaScid 
   hetvābhāsaḥ avaśāt āgataḥ jāyamāna eva bhavati na tu jātaḥ san	hetvABAsaH avaSAt AgataH jAyamAnaH eva Bavati na tu jAtaH san
   kāryakaro 'pītyāśayena avadhāraṇārthatayā jātiśabdaḥ pravartata iti	kArya karaH api iti ASayena avaDAraNa arTa tayA jAti SabdaH pravartate iti
   uttamūruvīrarāghavācāryasvāminaḥ nirūpayanti/ te eva svāminaḥ	uttam Uru vIra rAGava AcArya svAminaH nirUpayanti/ te eva svAminaH
   sāmyārthakasamaśabdaghaṭanasya tātparyamevaṃ varṇayanti  	sAmya arTaka sama Sabda Gawanasya tAtparyam evam varNayanti

   sāmyaṃ ca samaśabdena lakṣyate/ sūtre samaśabdaḥ	sAmyam ca sama Sabdena lakzyate/ sUtre sama SabdaH
   pratiṣedharūpahetuviśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ hetugataṃ sāmyaṃ darśayati/ athāpi	pratizeDa rUpa hetu viSezaNIBUtaH hetu gatam sAmyam darSayati/ aTa api
   vaktṛgatasāmyamapi vivakṣitam/ tadāha vārtikakāraḥ  "samīkaraṇārthaṃ	vaktR gata sAmyam api vivakzitam/ tat Aha vArtikakAraH  " samIkaraNa arTam

   nirākaraṇaṃ sāmyāpādanaṃ vā bhavati/ kena kasya samīkaraṇamiti cet	nirAkaraNam sAmya ApAdanam vA Bavati/ kena kasya samIkaraNam iti ced 
     vādinā prativādinaḥ samīkaraṇam/ tathā ca prativādinā	 vAdinA prativAdinaH samIkaraNam/ taTA ca prativAdinA
   svāpakarṣaparihārārthamantataḥ samīkaraṇārthaṃ jātiprayogaḥ kriyata	sva apakarza parihAra arTam antatas samIkaraNa arTam jAti prayogaH kriyata
   ityuktaṃ bhavati/ deśikacaraṇāstu nyāyapariśuddhau jātiprayogaḥ	iti uktam Bavati/ deSika caraNAH tu nyAya pariSudDO jAti prayogaH
   kriyata ityuktaṃ bhavati/ deśikacaraṇāstu nyāyapariśuddhau	kriyate iti uktam Bavati/ deSika caraNAH tu nyAya pariSudDO
   jātivādiprayuktahetoḥ paraghātakatvavat svavyāghātakatvamapyastīti	jAti vAdi prayukta hetoH para GAtaka tva vat sva vyAGAtaka tvam api asti iti
   tadeva sāmyaṃ samaśabdena pratipādyata iti nirvahanti/	tat eva sAmyam sama Sabdena pratipAdyate iti nirvahanti/
   evaṃ caturviśatidhā nirdiṣṭadāsu jātiṣu	evam caturviSatiDA nirdizwa dAsu jAtizu
   kāsāṃcit jātīnāṃ lakṣaṇeṣu pariśīralyamāneṣu samānatvaṃ	kAsAMcid jAtInAm lakzaNezu pariSIralyamAnezu samAna tvam
   sthūladṛṣṭyā pratīyate/ tataḥ nāmabhedamātramiti śaṅkā avatarati/	sTUla dRzwyA pratIyate/ tatas nAma Beda mAtram iti SaFkA avatarati/
   tatrāpi sūṣmadṛṣṭyā vicāryaṃmāṇe lakṣaṇeṣu bhado 'vagantuṃśakyate/	tatra api sUzma dRzwyA vicAryaMmANe lakzaNezu BadaH avagantuMSakyate/

   saviśeṣametadakhilaṃ pravyaktamuktaṃ rahaḥ"//	sa viSezam etat aKilam pravyaktam uktam rahaH"//

   pratipāditam/ tatra prativādinā yat asaduttaramucyate tadeva	pratipAditam/ tatra prativAdinA yat asat uttaram ucyate tat eva

   tu nyāyapariśiṣṭe tatra tatra sūcitameva/ sarvamidaṃ vistarabhayāt	tu nyAya pariSizwe tatra tatra sUcitam eva/ sarvam idam vistara BayAt

   prakāśikā	prakASikA

   vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinnatti idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate tasminnavasite	vyAsajya kaTAm vyavacCinnatti idam me karaNIyam vidyate tasmin= avasite

   matānujñālakṣaṇam	mata anujQA lakzaNam

   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/

   sāmānyādītyatra ādiśabdena viśeṣasamavāyābhāsava gṛhyata/ evaṃ ceti/	sAmAnya Adi iti atra Adi Sabdena viSeza samavAya ABAsava gRhyata/ evam ca iti/
   pūvauktānumānairarthāpattyā cānugṛjahītena śaktiḥ atiriktaḥ padārthaḥ	pUvOkta anumAnEH arTApattyA ca anugRja hItena SaktiH atiriktaH padArTaH

   'pratibandhakābhāvasya kāryaṃmātre kāraṇatvena śakteranupayogāt'	apratibanDaka aBAvasya kAryaMmAtre kAraNa tvena SakteH anupayogAt a
   iti dīpikāgranthaḥ śakteḥ padārthatvakhaṇḍanāya pravṛttaḥ/ kāryamātre	iti dIpikA granTaH SakteH padArTa tva KaNxanAya pravRttaH/ kArya mAtre
   pratibandhakābhāvasya kāraṇatvamastu nāma/ tāvatā śakteḥ padārthatvaṃ	pratibanDaka aBAvasya kAraNa tvam astu nAma/ tAvatA SakteH padArTa tvam
   kuto na bhavatī iti śaṅkāyāṃ dīpikāyāḥ	kutas na BavatI iti SaFkAyAm dIpikAyAH
   tātparyamāha pratibandhakatvaṃ neti/ tacceti/ pratibandhakatvaṃ	tAtparyamAha  pratibanDaka tvam na iti/ tad ceti/ pratibanDaka tvam
   cetyarthaḥ/	ca iti arTaH/
   maṇyabhāvasya hetutvādeveti/ evakāreṇa	maNya BAvasya hetu tvAt eva iti/ eva kAreNa
   kāryānukūlaśaktivighaṭakatvavyavacchedaḥ/ tathā ca maṇeḥ	kArya anukUla Sakti viGawaka tva vyavacCedaH/ taTA ca maNeH
   kāryānukūlaśaktivighaṭakatvābhāve 'pi kāraṇībhūto yo maṇyabhāvaḥ	kArya anukUla Sakti viGawaka tva aBAve api kAraNIBUtaH yaH maNya BAvaH
   tatpratiyogitvāt pratibandhakatvamupapadyate/ tathā ca	tad pratiyogi tvAt pratibanDaka tvam upapadyate/ taTA ca
   anyathānupapattirūpārthāpattipramāṇasyābhāvāt na śaktisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/	anyaTA anupapatti rUpa arTApatti pramANasya aBAvAt na Sakti sidDiH iti BAvaH/
   tadabhāvarūpakāraṇāntarābhāvādeveti/ maṇyabhāvarūpaṃ yat kāraṇāntaraṃ	tad aBAva rUpa kAraNa antara aBAvAt eva iti/ maNya BAva rUpam yat kAraNa antaram
   tadabhāvādevetyarthaḥ/ atra antaraśabdaprayogāt dāhaṃ prati vahniḥ	tad aBAvAt eva iti arTaH/ atra antara Sabda prayogAt dAham prati vahniH
   maṇyabhāvaśca ityubhayaṃ pṛthak kāraṇam, na tu	maNya BAvaH ca iti uBayam pRTak kAraNam, na tu
   maṇyabhāvaviśiṣṭavahniḥ kāraṇam/ vahniviśiṣṭamaṇyabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vā	maNya BAva viSizwa vahniH kAraNam/ vahni viSizwa maNya BAvaH kAraNam vA
   maṇyabhāvaviśiṣṭavahniḥ kāraṇaṃ ceti viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāve	maNya BAva viSizwa vahniH kAraNam ca iti viSezya viSezaNa BAve
   vinanigamanāviraheṇa gurubhūtakāryakāraṇabhāvadvayāpatteriti	vinanigamanA viraheNa guru BUta kArya kAraNa BAva dvaya ApatteH iti
   sūcitam/	sUcitam/
   nanu	nanu
   pratibandhakatvānyathānupapattyā śaktyasiddhāvapi	pratibanDaka tvA ani aTa anupapattyA Sakti asidDO= api
   vyavahārānyathānupapattyā	vyavahArAni aTa anupapattyA
   śakt sidhyatīti śaṅkate   nanu dāhotpāda iti	Sakt siDyati iti SaFkate  nanu dAha utpAdaH iti
   śaktirūpātiriktapadārtha vināpi kḷptena kāraṇatvarūpapadārthenaiva	Sakti rUpa atirikta padArTa vinA api k?ptena kAraNa tva rUpa padArTena eva
   vyavahārasyopapattyā na vyavahārānupapattirastītyāha   tasyāḥ	vyavahArasya upapattyA na vyavahAra anupapattiH asti iti Aha  tasyAH
   kāraṇatārūpatve 'pīti/ nanu kāraṇatvaṃ kathaṃ nātiriktaṃ iti cet  	kAraNa tA rUpa tve api iti/ nanu kAraNa tvam kaTam na atiriktam iti ced  
   atrāhuḥ/ kāraṇatvamiti āgnitvā udijātau vā abhāva vā	atra AhuH/ kAraNa tvam iti AgnitvA udijAtO vE aBAva vA
   kāraṇatvasyāntarbhāva iti/ spaṣṭamidaṃ kusumāñjalādau/	kAraNa tvasya antar BAvaH iti/ spazwam idam kusumAQjala AdO/
   śaṅkate    nanu	SaFkate   nanu
   maṇyādyabhāvasya hetutva iti/ candrakāntamaṇiḥ dāhapratibandhakaḥ	maNyAdi aBAvasya hetutvaH iti/ candrakAnta maNiH dAha pratibanDakaH
   tadabhāvaḥ dāhahetuḥ/ yatra vahnau candrakāntamaṇisaṃyogakāle	tad aBAvaH dAha hetuH/ yatra vahnO candrakAnta maNi saMyoga kAle
   sūryakāntamaṇisaṃyogo vā mantroddheśyatvaṃ vā asti tadā dāho	sUryakAnta maNi saMyogaH vA mantra udDeSya tvam vA asti tadA dAhaH 
   jāyate/ tatra candrakāntamaṇyabhāvarūpasya kāraṇasyābhāvāt tava mate	jAyate/ tatra candrakAnta maNya BAva rUpasya kAraNasya aBAvAt tava mate
   kathaṃ dāhaḥ? mama mate tu maṇyabhāvaḥ na dāhakāraṇam/ api tu	kaTam dAhaH? mama mate tu maNya BAvaH na dAha kAraNam/ api tu
   śaktiviśiṣṭavahnireva kāraṇam/ candrakāntamaṇinā	Sakti viSizwa vahniH eva kAraNam/ candrakAnta maNinA
   vahnigataśakternāśe 'pi sūryakāntamaṇimantrādisamavadhānadaśāyāṃ punaḥ	vahni gata SakteH nASe api sUryakAnta maNi mantra Adi samavaDAna daSAyAm punar 
   vahnau dāhānukūlaśaktyantaramutpadyata iti svīkāreṇa	vahnO dAha anukUla Sakti antaram utpadyate iti svIkAreNa

   aṅgīkaraṇīyeti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ/ atra uttejakaśabdena	aFgIkaraNIyA iti SaFki tuH BAvaH/ atra uttejaka Sabdena

   bhavati/	Bavati/
   samādhatte   	samADatte

   dāhotpattirūpapadyata iti śakteranupayoga iti bhāvaḥ/	dAha utpatti rUpapadyate iti SakteH anupayogaH iti BAvaH/

   uttejakābhāvānāṃ kāraṇatāvacchedakakukṣau praveśāditi bhāvaḥ/	uttejaka aBAvAnAm kAraNa tAvacCedaka kukzO praveSAt iti BAvaH/
   dāhānukūlaśaktiṃ pratīti/ maṇisattve	dAha anukUla Saktim pratIti/ maNi sattve

   maṇimattve śaktināśāt uttejake sati śakterutpatteśca	maNimat tve Sakti nASAt uttejake sati SakteH utpatteH ca
   uttejakābhāvaviśiṣṭamaṇyabhāvaḥ śaktiṃ prati kāraṇamiti vācyam/	uttejaka aBAva viSizwa maNya BAvaH Saktim prati kAraNam iti vAcyam/
   tadapekṣayā dāhaṃ pratyeva tasya kāraṇatvamastu kiṃ anantānāṃ śaktīnāṃ	tad apekzayA dAham pratyeva tasya kAraNa tvam astu kim anantAnAm SaktInAm

   vahnyādhikaraṇe deśe tadabhāvasattvāt sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	vahnyADikaraNe deSe tad aBAva sattvAt sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   taduttejakābhāvaviśiṣṭamaṇisattvāt dāhānutpādaprasaṅgaḥ/ kiṃ ca	tad uttejaka aBAva viSizwa maNi sattvAt dAha anutpAda prasaFgaH/ kim ca
   saṃyogavat saṃyogena dravyasyāpi avyāpyavṛttitayā maṇisattvepi	saMyoga vat saMyogena dravyasya api avyApya vRtti tayA maNi sattvepi
   kiñcidavacchedena saṃyogena	kiQcid avacCedena saMyogena
   maṇyabhāvasattvāt	maNya BAva sattvAt

   abhāvīyaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena dāhatvāvacchinnaṃ prati	aBAvIya viSezaNatA sambanDena dAha tva avacCinnam prati
