   pūrvatanabhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃso 'stīti śuddhatvāpattiḥ/ ataḥ	pUrvatana Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsaH asti iti SudDa tva ApattiH/ atas 
   yāvattvaniveśaḥ/ tadānīṃ yāvadabhāvāntargatasya	yAvat tva niveSaH/ tadAnIm yAvat aBAva antargatasya
   yādṛśāspṛśyavastusparśo 'sti tadabhāvasya asattvāt na doṣaḥ/ na	yAdRSAspRSya vastu sparSaH asti tad aBAvasya asattvAt na dozaH/ na
   cābhāve yāvattvaniveśāpekṣayā aspṛśyavastusparśattvāvacchinnābhāva eva	ca aBAve yAvat tva niveSa apekzayA aspRSya vastu sparSattvA avacCinna aBAvaH eva
   niveśyatāmiti vācyam/ vijātīyeṣvanekeṣu	niveSyatAm iti vAcyam/ vijAtIyezu anekezu
   aspṛśyavastuṣvanugatadharmasyābhāvāt pratiyogitāvacchedakasya	aspRSya vastuzu anugata Darmasya aBAvAt pratiyogi ta avacCedakasya
   sāmānyadharmasyātrāsambhavāt/ saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitayā	sAmAnya Darmasya atra asamBava at/ saMyogasya avyApya vRtti tayA
   kāṃsyādāvaspṛśyavastusaṃyogakāle 'pi kiñcidavacchedena tadabhāvasya	kAMsya AdO= aspRSya vastu saMyoga kAle api kiQcid avacCedena tad aBAvasya
   daiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena sattvāt tadviśiṣṭaṃ	dESika viSezaNatA sambanDena sattvAt tad viSizwam
   pūrvakālīnabhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsamādāya śuddhatvāpattivāraṇāya	pUrva kAlIna Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsam AdAya SudDa tva Apatti vAraNAya
   sāmānādhikaraṇyaghaṭakādheyatāya	sAmAnADikaraNya Gawaka ADeya tAya
   niravacchinnadaiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśyam/ yatra	niravacCinna dESika viSezaNa tA sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSyam/ yatra
   kāṃsyādipātre	kAMsya Adi pAtre
   bhasamādisaṃyogaḥ aspṛśyasparśaśca ekakāle utpannau vinaṣṭau ca tatra	Basam Adi saMyogaH aspRSya sparSaH ca eka kAle utpannO vinazwO ca tatra
   bhasamādisaṃyogadhvaṃsaḥ aspṛśyasparśābhāvaviśiṣṭo bhavatīti pātrasya	Basam Adi saMyoga DvaMsaH aspRSya sparSa aBAva viSizwaH Bavati iti pAtrasya
   tadvataḥ śuddhatvāpattivāraṇāya aspṛśyasparśapratiyogikābhāve	tadvataH SudDa tva Apatti vAraNAya aspRSya sparSa pratiyogika aBAve
   bhasmādisaṃyogasamānakālīnatvaviśeṣaṇam/	Basma Adi saMyoga samAna kAlIna tva viSezaNam/
   bhasmādisaṃyogāvacchedakakṣaṇāvacchedena bhasmādisaṃyogādhikaraṇe	Basma Adi saMyoga avacCeda kakzaNa avacCedena Basma Adi saMyoga aDikaraNe
   vidyamāna iti tadarthaḥ/ evaṃ ca tatra vidyamānasya aspṛśyasparśābhāvasya	vidyamAnaH iti tad arTaH/ evam ca tatra vidyamAnasya aspRSya sparSa aBAvasya
   bhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsakālikatve 'pi bhasmādisaṃyogakṣaṇāvacchedena	Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsa kAlika tve api Basma Adi saMyoga kzaNa avacCedena
   vidyamānatvaṃ nāstīti na doṣaḥ/ evaṃ ca	vidyamAna tvam na asti iti na dozaH/ evam ca
   bhasmādisaṃyogāvacchedakakṣaṇāvacchinnatadadhikaraṇavṛttikāspṛśyaspaśarpratiyogikayāvadabhāvaniṣṭhaniravacchinna 	Basma Adi saMyoga avacCeda kakzaNa avacCinna tad aDikaraNa vRttikA spRSya spa Sar pratiyogikayA vadaBAva nizWa niravacCinna 
   daiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃbandhāvacchinnādheyatāniyapitādhikaraṇatāvadvṛtti  	dESika viSezaNa tA saMbanDa avacCinna ADeya tA niyapita aDikaraNa tAvat vRtti  
   bhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsa śuddhiriti phalitam/ tadāha   yatra	Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsa SudDiH iti Palitam/ tat Aha  yatra
   kāṃsyādāvityādinā/ saṃbandhaviśeṣaniyantritamiti/	kAMsya AdO= ityAdinA/ saMbanDa viSeza niyantritam iti/
   niravacchinnadaiśikāviśeṣaṇa tāsambandhaghaṭitamityarthaḥ/	niravacCinna dESikA viSezaNa tAsambanDa Gawitam iti arTaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   svatvasyātiriktapadārthatvakhaṇḍanam	sva tvasya atirikta padArTa tva KaNxanam
   svatvamapi na	sva tvam api na
   padārthāntaram, yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatvasya svatvarūpatvāt/	padArTa antaram, yaTezwa viniyoga yogya tvasya sva tva rUpa tvAt/
   tadavacchedakaṃ ca pratigrahādilabdhatvameveti/	tad avacCedakam ca pratigraha Adi labDa tvam eva iti/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   'caitrasya idaṃ	acEtrasya idam
   dhanam' ityādau dhanādau yatsvatvaṃ pratīyate tatpadārthāntaramiti	Danam a ityAdO Dana AdO yat sva tvam pratIyate tad padArTa antaram iti
   mataṃ nirasyati   svatvamapīti/ apinā anuktasamuccānayakena	matam nirasyati  sva tvam api iti/ apinA anukta samucca Anayakena
   pratiyogitvādiparigrahaḥ/ nanu tarhi svatvaṃ kiṃsvarūpam ityata āha	pratiyogi tva Adi parigrahaH/ nanu tarhi sva tvam kiMsvarUpam iti atas Aha
     yatheṣṭeti/ tadavacchedakaṃ ceti/ tādṛśayogyatvaprayojakamityarthaḥ/	 yaTA izwa iti/ tad avacCedakam ca iti/ tAdRSa yogya tva prayojakam iti arTaH/
   pratiyogitvaṃ pratiyogirūpaṃ pratiyogitāvacchedakarūpaṃ vetyādikaṃ	pratiyogi tvam pratiyogi rUpam pratiyogi ta avacCedaka rUpam vA ityAdikam
   bahutaramūhanīyam/	bahutaram UhanIyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   yatsvatvaṃ pratīyata	yat sva tvam pratIyata
   iti/ ṣaṣṭhyeti śeṣaḥ/ tatpadārthantaramiti/ svatvaṃ na dravyātmakam	iti/ zazWyA iti SezaH/ tad padArTantaram iti/ sva tvam na dravya Atmakam
   guṇādivṛttitvāt/ ata eva na guṇakarmānyatarātmakam/ na ca	guNa Adi vRtti tva at/ atas eva na guNa karma anyatara Atmakam/ na ca
   sāmānyādirūpam, nityatvaprasaṅgāt/ mama svatvaṃ utpannam, tava	sAmAnya Adi rUpam, nitya tva prasaFgAt/ mama sva tvam utpannam, tava
   svatvaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ ityādi pratītyā svatvasyānityatvāvagamena	sva tvam vinazwam ityAdi pratItyA sva tvasya anitya tva avagamena
   iṣṭāpatteḥ kartumaśakyatvāt/ nāpyabhāvātmakam, bhāvatvena	izwa ApatteH kartum aSakyatvAt/ na api aBAva Atmakam, BAva tvena
   pratīyamānatvāt/ ataḥ kḷptapadārthānantarbhūtatvāt svatvaṃ	pratIyamAna tva at/ atas k?pta padArTa anantarBUta tvAt sva tvam
   padārthāntaramiti pūrvapakṣaḥ/ yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatāniyāmakaṃ	padArTa antaram iti pUrva pakzaH/ yaTA izwa viniyoga yogya tA niyAmakam
   pratigrahādinā labdhatvameva svatvam/ tacca saṃyogādirūpam,	pratigraha AdinA labDa tvam eva sva tvam/ tat ca saMyoga Adi rUpam,
   nātiriktapadārtha iti siddhāntaḥ/	na atirikta padArTaH iti sidDAntaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   vidhivādaḥ	viDivAdaH
   atha vidhiḥ nirūpyate   	aTa viDiH nirUpyate   
   prayatnajanakacikīrṣājanakajñānaviṣayo vidhiḥ/ tatpratipādakaḥ	prayatna janaka cikIrzA janaka jQAna vizayaH viDiH/ tad pratipAdakaH
   liṅādirvā/ kṛtyasādhye pravṛttyadarśanāt kṛtisādhye	liFAdiH vA/ kRtya sADye pravRtti adarSana at kRti sADye
   pravṛttidarśanāt kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ pravartakam/ na ca viṣabhakṣaṇādau	pravRtti darSanAt kRti sADya tA jQAnam pravartakam/ na ca viza BakzaNa AdO
   pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, iṣṭasādhanatāliṅgakakṛtisādhyatājñānasya	pravRtti prasaFgaH, izwa sADana tA liFgaka kRti sADya ta ajQAnasya
   kāmyasthale vihitakālaśucijīvitvanimittajñānajanyasya	kAmya sTale vihita kAla Suci jIvi tva nimitta jQAna janyasya
   nityanaimittikasthale pravartakatvāt/ na cānanugamaḥ,	nitya nEmittika sTale pravartaka tvAt/ na ca ananugamaH,
   svaviśeṣaṇavattāpratisandhānajanyatvasyānugatatvāditi guravaḥ/ tanna  	sva viSezaNa vat tA pratisanDAna janya tvasya anugata tvAt iti guravaH/ tat naH  
   lāghavena	lAGavena
   kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatājñānasyaiva cikīrṣādvārā prayatnajanakatvāt/ na	kRti sADya izwa sADana tA jQAnasya eva cikIrzA dvArA prayatna janaka tvAt/ na
   ca nityanaimittikasthale	ca nitya nEmittika sTale
   iṣṭasādhanatvābhāvāt apravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, tatrāpi	izwa sADana tva aBAvAt apravRtti prasaFgaH, tatra api
   pratyavāyaparihārasya pāpakṣayasya ca phalatvakalpanāt/ tasmāt	pratyavAya parihArasya pApa kzayasya ca Pala tva kalpanAt/ tasmAt 
   kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatvameva liṅādyarthaḥ/	kRti sADya izwa sADana tvam eva liFA Adi arTaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   sarveṣāṃ	sarvezAm
   padārthānāṃ uktapadārtheṣu yathāyathamantarbhāvaṃ nirūpya mūlanyūnatāṃ	padArTAnAm ukta padArTezu yaTAyaTam antarBAvam nirUpya mUla nyUna tAm
   parihartuṃ vidhiṃ nirūpayiṣyamāṇaḥ śiṣyāvadhānāya tannirūpaṇaṃ	parihartum viDim nirUpayizyamANaH Sizya avaDAnAya tad nirUpaNam
   pratijānīte    atheti/ svaparamatasādhāraṇaṃ vidhitvaṃ tāvat nirvakti	pratijAnIte   aTa iti/ sva paramatasADAraNam viDi tvam tAvat nirvakti
     prayatneti/ prayatnajanikā yā cikīrṣā tajjanakaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadviṣaya	 prayatnA iti/ prayatna janikA yA cikIrzA tad janakam yat jQAnam tat vizaya
   ityarthaḥ/ gurumate kṛtisādhyatājñānasya, svamate	iti arTaH/ guru mate kRti sADya tA jQAnasya, sva mate
   kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatājñānasya cikīrṣādvārā	kRti sADya tva viSizwa izwa sADana tA jQAnasya cikIrzA dvArA
   prayatnajanakatvāt tanmate kṛtisādhyatve svamate	prayatna janaka tvAt tad mate kRti sADya tve sva mate
   kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭesādhanatve ca lakṣaṇasaṅgatiḥ/ abhidhāyakasya	kRti sADya tva viSizwa IsA Dana tve ca lakzaNa saFgatiH/ aBiDAyakasya
   vidhimatābhiproyaṇāha   tatpratīti/	viDi mata aBiproyaNa Aha  tat prati iti/
   tādṛśajñānaviṣayakāryatvādipratipādakaliṅādirityarthaḥ/	tAdRSa jQAna vizaya kArya tva Adi pratipAda kaliFA AdiH iti arTaH/
   liṅādirityādinā loṭtavyādisaṅgrahaḥ/ vākāro 'nāsthāyām/	liFA AdiH iti AdinA lowtavya Adi saFgrahaH/ vA AkAraH anAsTAyAm/
   gurumatamāśaṅkate    kṛtyasādhya iti/ kṛtyasādhyatvenāvagata	guru matam ASaFkate   kRtya sADyaH iti/ kRtya sADya tvena avagata
   ityarthaḥ/ pravartakamiti/ cikīrṣādvārā pravṛttijanakamityarthaḥ/ na ca	iti arTaH/ pravartakam iti/ cikIrzA dvArA pravRtti janakam iti arTaH/ na ca
   kṛtyasādhyatvajñānābhāva eva pravartako 'stviti śaṅkyam,	kRtyasADya tva jQAna aBAvaH eva pravartakaH astu iti SaFkyam,
   kṛtyasādhyatvajñānābhāvatvena tattve gauravāt/	kRtya sADya tva jQAna aBAva tvena tattve gOravAt/
   kṛtisādhyatvābhāvakṛtisādhyabhedatattadvyāpyādidarśanānāṃ pravṛttau	kRti sADya tva aBAva kRti sADya Beda tad tad vyApyAdi darSanAnAm pravRttO
   pratibandhakatvakalpanena mahāgauravācca iti dik/	pratibanDaka tva kalpanena mahA gOravAt ca iti dik/
   nanu viṣabhakṣaṇādau	nanu viza BakzaNa AdO
   pravṛttyāpattiḥ/ kṛtisādhyatājñānasya tatrāpi sattvādityāśaṅkāṃ	pravRtti ApattiH/ kRti sADya tA jQAnasya tatra api sattvAt iti ASaFkAm
   nirācaṣṭe    na cetyādinā/ iṣṭasādhanatāliṅgaketi/ 'ayam	nirAcazwe   na ca ityAdinA/ izwa sADana tA AliFgaka iti/ aayam
   matkṛtisādhyaḥ, matkṛtiṃ vinā anupapadyamānatve sati	mad kRti sADyaH, mad kRtim vinA anupapadyamAna tve sati
   madiṣṭasādhanatvāt' ityānumāniketyarthaḥ/ kāmyasthala iti/	mad izwa sADana tvAt a iti AnumAnikA iti arTaH/ kAmya sTalaH iti/
   pravartakatvādityanenānvayaḥ/ jyotiṣṭomayāgādāvityarthaḥ/	pravartaka tvAt iti anena anvayaH/ jyotizwoma yAga AdO= iti arTaH/
   vihitakāletyādi/	vihita kAla ityAdi/
   vihitakālaśucitīvitvajñānādhīnasya kṛtisādhyatājñānasya nitye	vihita kAla Suci tIvi tva jQAna aDInasya kRti sADyatA jQAnasya nitye
   sandhyāvandanādau, āśaucādirūpanimittajñānādhīnasya tasya naimittike	sanDyA vandana AdO, ASOca Adi rUpa nimitta jQAna aDInasya tasya nEmittike
   snānādau pravartakatvādityarthaḥ/ 'aham	snAna AdO pravartaka tvAt iti arTaH/ aaham
   etatkālikakṛtisādhyasandhyāvandanakaḥ, etatkālikaśucijīvitvāt'	etad kAlika kRti sADya sanDyA vandanakaH, etad kAli kaSuci jIvi tvAt a
   ityevaṃrītyā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya	iti evaMrItyA kRti sADya tva jQAnasya
   vihitakālaśucijīvitvādijñānajanyatvamavaseyam/	vihita kAla Suci jIvi tva Adi jQAna janya tvam avaseyam/
   ananugama iti/	ananugamaH iti/
   pravṛttisāmānyaprayojakasya ekasyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/	pravRtti sAmAnya prayojakasya ekasya aBAvAt iti BAvaH/
   svaviśeṣaṇavattevyādi/ svaṃ pravartamānapuruṣaḥ, tasya viśeṣaṇaṃ	sva viSezaNa vat tevyAdi/ svam pravartamAna puruzaH, tasya viSezaNam
   tanniṣṭho dharmaḥ kāmanādiḥ, tadvattāyāḥ svaviṣayasādhanatvādirūpasya	tad nizWaH DarmaH kAmanAdiH, tadvat tAyAH sva vizaya sADana tva Adi rUpasya
   tatsambandhasya pratisandhānaṃ jñānaṃ tajjanyatvasyetyarthaḥ/ lāghaveneti/	tad sambanDasya pratisanDAnam jQAnam tat janya tvasya iti arTaH/ lAGavena iti/
   kāraṇatāvacchedakalāghavenetyarthaḥ/ tanmate kāraṇatāvacchedakasya	kAraNa tAvacCedaka lAGavena iti arTaH/ tad mate kAraNa tAvacCedakasya
   janyatvādighaṭitatvāt gauravamiti bhāvaḥ/	janya tva Adi Gawita tvAt gOravam iti BAvaH/
   kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanateti/ tatra	kRti sADya izwa sADana tA iti/ tatra
   balabadaniṣṭānanubandhitvamapyantarbhāvanīyam/ tena na kṛtisādhyatvena	bala bada nizwa an anubanDi tvam api antar BAvanIyam/ tena na kRti sADya tvena
   tṛptirūpeṣṭasādhatvena cāvagate viṣasaṃpṛkte bhojanādau	tRpti rUpa izwa sADatvena ca avagate viza saMpRkte Bojana AdO
   pravṛttyāpattiḥ/ viśiṣṭajñānatvāvacchinnasya kāraṇatvakathanaṃ tu prācāṃ	pravRtti ApattiH/ viSizwa jQAna tva avacCinnasya kAraNa tva kaTanam tu prAcAm
   matena/ navyamate kṛtisādhyatvādijñānānāṃ pṛthageva	matena/ navya mate kRti sADya tva Adi jQAnAnAm pRTak eva
   daṇḍacakrādinyāyenana kāraṇatvāt/ prayatneti/ pravṛttītyarthaḥ/	daNxa cakra Adi nyAyena na kAraNa tvAt/ prayatnA iti/ pravRtti iti arTaH/
   pratyavāyeti/ pratyavāyasya parihāraḥ prāgabhāvaḥ, tasya	pratyavAya iti/ pratyavAyasya parihAraH prAgaBAvaH, tasya
   duḥkhajanakābhāvatayā tannāśasyaiva iṣṭatvena phalatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ na ca	duHKa janaka aBAva tayA tad nASasya eva izwa tvena Pala tvam iti BAvaH/ na ca
   kathaṃ tatprāgabhāvasya phalatvaṃ tasyājanyatvāditi vācyam; yatsattve	kaTam tad prAgaBAvasya Pala tvam tasya ajanya tvAt iti vAcyam; yat sattve
   yatsattvamiti vyavahāralabhyasya svarūpasaṃbandharūpasya	yat sattvam iti vyavahAra laByasya svarUpa saMbanDa rUpasya
   sandhyāvandanaprayojyatvasya tatra sattvena phalatvākṣaterityavadheyam/	sanDyA vandana prayojya tvasya tatra sattvena Pala tva akzateH iti avaDeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   mūlanyūnatāṃ	mUla nyUna tAm
   parihartumiti/ na ca vidhyanirūpaṇena kathaṃ mūlasya nyūnatā, saptānāṃ	parihartum iti/ na ca viDi anirUpaNena kaTam mUlasya nyUna tA, saptAnAm
   ṣoḍaśānāṃ vā padārthānāṃ nirūpaṇenaiva 'kriyate tarkasaṃgrahaḥ' iti	zoxaSAnAm vA padArTAnAm nirUpaNena eva akriyate tarka saMgrahaH a iti
   pratijñāyāḥ nirūḍhatvāditi vācyam/ sarvaprameyasaṃgrāhake 'tra	pratijQAyAH nirUXa tvAt iti vAcyam/ sarva prameya saMgrAhake atra
   maṇyādigrantheṣu vistareṇa nirūpitasya vidheranirūpaṇe	maNyAdi granTezu vistareNa nirUpitasya viDera nirUpaNe
   nyūnataivetyāśayāt/ prayatnajaniketyādi/ pravṛttirūpaprayatnaṃ prati	nyUna tA eva iti ASayAt/ prayatna janikA ityAdi/ pravRtti rUpa prayatnam prati
   'idaṃ kuryām' ityākārikā cikīrṣā kāraṇam/ cikīrṣāṃ prati	aidam kuryAm a iti AkArikA cikIrzA kAraNam/ cikIrzAm prati
   gurumate 'idaṃ matkṛtisādhyam' ityākārakaṃ kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ	guru mate aidam mad kRti sADyam a iti AkArakam kRti sADya tA jQAnam
   kāraṇam/ naiyāyikamate 'idaṃ matkṛtisādhyatve sati	kAraNam/ nEyAyika mate aidam mad kRti sADya tve sati
   madiṣṭasādhanam' ityākārakaṃ jñānaṃ kāraṇam, tadviṣayatvaṃ	mad izwa sADanam a iti AkArakam jQAnam kAraNam, tad vizaya tvam
   kṛtisādhyatve, kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatve cāstīti	kRti sADya tve, kRti sADya tva viSizwa izwa sADana tve ca asti iti
   vidhilakṣaṇasya tayoḥ samanvaya ityarthaḥ/ abhidhāyakasyeti/	viDi lakzaNasya tayoH samanvayaH iti arTaH/ aBiDAyakasya iti/
   vidhivācakasya liṅāderapi vidhiśabdavācyatvamiti	viDivAcakasya liFa AdeH api viDi Sabda vAcya tvam iti
   matābhiprāyeṇetyarthaḥ/ tathā ca vātsyāyanabhāṣyam   "yadvākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ	mata aBiprAyeNa iti arTaH/ taTA ca vAtsyAyana BAzyam   "yat vAkyam viDAyakam
   codakaṃ sa vidhiḥ" [nyāṇsū 2 9 63] iti"yadvākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ deśakaṃ sa	ca udakam sa viDiH" [nyANsU 2 9 63] iti"yat vAkyam viDAyakam deSakam sa
   vidhiḥ"iti tatra vārtikam/ vākāro 'nāsthāyāmiti/	viDiH"iti tatra vArtikam/ vA AkAraH anAsTAyAm iti/
   vidhinimantraṇetyādipāṇinisūtrasvārasyāt liṅādyabhidheye eva	viDi ni mantraNA ityAdi pANinisUtra svArasyAt liFa Adi aBiDeye eva
   vidhiśabdaḥ pravartate, na	viDi SabdaH pravartate, na
   tvabhidhāyake	tu aBiDAyake
   ityavagamāt iti bhāvaḥ/ 'nanu kṛtyasādhye pravṛttyadarśanāt'	iti avagamAt iti BAvaH/ ananu kRtya sADye pravRtti adarSanAt a
   iti dīpikoktamayuktam/ kṛtyasādhye 'pi kṛtisādhyatābhrameṇa	iti dIpikA uktam ayuktam/ kRtya sADye api kRti sADya tA BrameNa
   pravṛttidarśanādityata āha    kṛtyasādhyatvenāvagata ityartha iti/	pravRtti darSanAt iti ataH Aha   kRtya sADya tvena avagataH iti arTaH iti/
   kṛtyasādhye kṛtisādhyatvabhramāt pravṛttāvapi kṛtyasādhyatvajñāne sati	kRtya sADye kRti sADya tva BramAt pravRttO= api kRtya sADya tva jQAne sati
   na pravṛttiḥ ataḥ nāsaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu pravṛttiṃ prati cikīrṣāyā	na pravRttiH atas na asaFgatiH iti BAvaH/ nanu pravRttim prati cikIrzAyA
   eva kāraṇatvāt kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ pravartakamiti na saṅgatamityata	eva kAraNa tvAt kRti sADyatA jQAnam pravartakam iti na saFgatam iti ata
   āha    cikīrṣādvārā pravṛttijanakamityartha iti/ na ca	Aha   cikIrzA dvArA pravRtti janakam iti arTaH iti/ na ca
   kṛtyasādhyatveti/ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānakāle pravṛttivāraṇāya hi	kRtI asADya tva iti/ kRtyasADya tva jQAna kAle pravRtti vAraNAya hi
   kṛtisādhyatājñānasya pravṛttihetutvamuktam/ pravṛttiṃ prati	kRti sADya tA jQAnasya pravRtti hetu tvam uktam/ pravRttim prati
   kṛtyasādhtājñānābhāvaḥ kāraṇamityuktyaiva kṛtyasādhyatvajñānakāle	kRtya sADta ajQAna aBAvaH kAraNam iti uktyA eva kRtyasADya tva jQAna kAle
   pravṛttivariyituṃ śakyate/ na ca lāghavānavakāśa iti vācyam/	pravRtti variyitum Sakyate/ na ca lAGava an avakASaH iti vAcyam/
   pratibandhakābhāvasya kāryasāmānye kāraṇatāyāḥ kḷptatvāt	pratibanDaka aBAvasya kArya sAmAnye kAraNa tAyAH k?pta tvAt 
   kṛtyasādhyatājñānābhāvasya kāraṇatvaṃ na kalpanīyam iti lāghavam,	kRtya sADyatA jQAna aBAvasya kAraNa tvam na kalpanIyam iti lAGavam,
   kṛtisādhyatājñānasya tu akḷptaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ kalpanīyam iti	kRti sADya tA jQAnasya tu ak?ptam kAraNa tvam kalpanIyam iti
   gauravamiti śaṅkiturāśayāt/ samādhatte   	gOravam iti SaFki turASayAt/ samADatte   
   kṛtyasādhyatājñānābhāvatveneti/ kṛtisādhyatājñānatvāpekṣayā	kRtya sADyatA jQAna aBAva tvena iti/ kRti sADya tA jQAna tva apekzayA
   kṛtyasādhyatājñānābhāvatvasya kāraṇatāvacchedakasya gurutvādityarthaḥ/	kRtya sADyatA jQAna aBAva tvasya kAraNa tAvacCedakasya guru tvAt iti arTaH/
   kṛtisādhyatvābhāveti/ pravṛttiṃ prati kṛtisādhyatvābhāvajñānasya	kRti sADya tva aBAva iti/ pravRttim prati kRti sADya tva aBAva jQAnasya
   kṛtisādhyabhedajñānasya kṛtisādhyatvābhāvavyāpyavattājñānasya	kRti sADya Beda jQAnasya kRti sADya tva aBAva vyApyavat tA jQAnasya
   kṛtisādhyabhedavyāpyavattājñānasya ca pratibandhakatvāt teṣāṃ ye 'bhāvāḥ	kRti sADya Beda vyApya vattA jQAnasya ca pratibanDaka tvAt tezAm ye aBAvAH
   teṣāṃ api kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyamiti mahāgauravam/ tadapekṣayā	tezAm api kAraNa tvam vaktavyam iti mahA gOravam/ tad apekzayA
   kṛtisādhyatājñānasyaikasya kāraṇatve lāghavamiti bhāvaḥ/	kRti sADya tA jQAnasya ekasya kAraNa tve lAGavam iti BAvaH/
   dīpikāyām	dIpikAyAm
   iṣṭasādhanatāliṅgaketyādi/ kāmyakarmasu pravṛttiṃ prati	izwa sADana tA AliFgaka ityAdi/ kAmya karmasu pravRttim prati
   iṣṭasādhanatvaliṅgakakṛtisādhyatvavidheyakānumityātmakaṃ	izwa sADana tva liFgaka kRti sADya tva viDeyakAnum iti Atmakam
   kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ hetuḥ/ 'idava jyotiṣṭomādirūpaṃ kāmyakarma	kRti sADya tva jQAnam hetuH/ aidava jyotizwoma Adi rUpam kAmya karma
   matkṛtisādhyam matkṛtiṃ vinā asattve sati madiṣṭasādhanatvāt	mad kRti sADyam mad kRtim vinA asattve sati mad izwa sADana tvAt 
   yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā caityavandanam' ityanumānaṃ draṣṭavyam/	yat na evam tat na evam yaTA cEtya vandanam a iti anumAnam drazwavyam/
   sandhyāvandanādinityanaimittikakarmasu pravṛttiṃ prati	sanDyA vandana Adi nitya nEmittika karmasu pravRttim prati
   nimittarūpaliṅgajñānajanyakṛtisādhtvavidheyakānumityātmakaṃ	nimitta rUpa liFga jQAna janya kRti sADtva viDeyaka anum iti Atmakam
   kṛtisādhyatājñānaṃ kāraṇam/ vihitakāle śucitve sati jīvitvaṃ	kRti sADya tA jQAnam kAraNam/ vihita kAle Suci tve sati jIvitvam
   sandhyāvandanādinityakarmasu nimittam/ snānādirūpanaimittikakarmasu	sanDyA vandana Adi nityakarmasu nimittam/ snAna Adi rUpa nEmittika karmasu
   aśucittve sati jīvitvaṃ nimittam/ tathā ca tatra 'aham	aSucit tve sati jIvitvam nimittam/ taTA ca tatra aaham
   idānīntanakṛtisādhyasandhyāvandanakaḥ etatkāle śucitve sati	idAnIntana kRti sADya sanDyA vandanakaH etad kAle Suci tve sati
   jīvitvāt yo naivam sa naivam yathā bauddhaḥ', 'aham	jIvitvAt yaH na evam sa na evam yaTA bOdDaH a, aaham
   etatkālikakṛtisādhyasnānakaḥ etatkāle aśucitve sati jīvitvāt	etad kAlika kRti sADya snAnakaH etad kAle aSuci tve sati jIvitvAt 
   yo naivaṃ sa naivaṃ yathā nāstikaḥ ityanumānaṃ pravartate/ na ca	yaH na evam sa na evam yaTA nAstikaH iti anumAnam pravartate/ na ca
   kvacit iṣṭasādhanatāliṅgakakṛtisādhyatājñānasya	kvacid izwa sADana tA liFgaka kRti sADya ta ajQAnasya
   kvacidvihitakālikaśucijīvitvādiliṅgakakṛtisāṃdhyatājñānasya ca	kvacid vihita kAli kaSuci jIvi tva Adi liFgaka kRti sAMDyata ajQAnasya ca
   pravṛttihetutve tayoḥ parasparaṃ vināpi pravṛtterjāyamānatayā	pravRtti hetu tve tayoH parasparam vinA api pravRtteH jAyamAna tayA
   vyatirekavyabhicārāt pravṛttisāmānyaṃ prati kṛtisādhyatājñānasya	vyatireka vyaBicArAt pravRtti sAmAnyam prati kRti sADyata ajQAnasya
   hetutvaṃ na sambhavati, abhayasādhāraṇasyaikasya	hetu tvam na samBavati, aBaya sADAraNasya ekasya
   kāraṇatāvacchedakadharmasyābhāvāditi vācyam/	kAraNa tAvacCedaka Darmasya aBAvAt iti vAcyam/
   svaviśeṣaṇavattājñānajanyatvasyānugatasya kāraṇatāvacchedakasya	sva viSezaNa vat tA jQAna janya tvasya anugatasya kAraNa tAvacCedakasya
   sadbhāvāt/ svaṃ pravartamānaḥ puruṣaḥ tasya viśeṣaṇaṃ tadvṛttidharmaḥ	sadBAvAt/ svam pravartamAnaH puruzaH tasya viSezaNam tad vRtti DarmaH
   phalakāmanā tadvattvaṃ tadviṣayaphalasādhanatvarūpaḥ tatsambandhaḥ	Pala kAmanA tadvat tvam tad vizaya Pala sADana tva rUpaH tad sambanDaH
   tajjñānaṃ	tat jQAnam
   'kāmyaṃ iṣṭasādhanam' ityākārakaṃ tajjanyatvaṃ	akAmyam izwa sADanam a iti AkArakam tat janya tvam
   iṣṭasādhanatāliṅgakakṛtisādhyatājñona, evaṃ svaṃ pravartamānapuruṣaḥ	izwa sADana tA liFgaka kRti sADya tAjQona, evam svam pravartamAna puruzaH
   tadviśeṣaṇa vihitakālikaśucitvaviśiṣṭajīvitvam	tad viSezaNa vihita kAlika Suci tva viSizwa jIvi tvam
   aśucitvaviśiṣṭajīvitvaṃ ca tadvattājñānaṃ 'tādṛśadharmavānaham'	aSuci tva viSizwa jIvi tvam ca tadvat tA jQAnam atAdRSa DarmavAn aham a
   ityākārakajñānaṃ tajjanyatvaṃ sandhyā	iti AkAraka jQAnam tat janya tvam sanDyA
   vandanasnānādinityanaimittikakarmaviśeṣyakakṛtisādhyatājñāne	vandana snAna Adi nitya nEmittika karma viSezya ka kRti sADyatA jQAne
   nimittaliṅgakānumityātmake 'stīti	nimitta liFgaka anum iti Atmake asti iti
   svaviśeṣaṇavattājñānajanyatvasyānugatakāraṇatāvacchedakatvamiti bhāvaḥ/	sva viSezaNa vat tA jQAna janya tvasya anugata kAraNa tAvacCedaka tvam iti BAvaH/
   prakāśikāyām ayaṃ	prakASikAyAm ayam
   matkṛtisādhya ityādi/ ayam kāmyaḥ jyotiṣṭomādiḥ/ atra hetau	mad kRti sADyaH ityAdi/ ayam kAmyaH jyotizwoma AdiH/ atra hetO
   madiṣṭasādhanatvamātropādāne matkṛtisādhyatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati	mad izwa sADana tva mAtra upAdAne mad kRti sADya tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati
   vṛṣṭyādau madiṣṭasādhanatvarūpahetusattvāt vyabhicāraḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	vRzwi AdO mad izwa sADana tva rUpa hetu sattvAt vyaBicAraH/ tad vAraNAya
   satyantam/ vṛṣṭyādeḥ matkṛtiṃ vināpi sattvāt matkṛtiṃ vinā asattvaṃ	satyantam/ vRzwi AdeH mad kRtim vinA api sattvAt mad kRtim vinA asattvam
   nāstīti na vyabhicāraḥ/ anupapadyamānatve sati ityasya asattve	na asti iti na vyaBicAraH/ anupapadyamAna tve sati iti asya asattve
   satītyarthaḥ/ matkṛtiṃ vinetyatra matpadānupādāne madiṣṭasādhane	sati iti arTaH/ mad kRtim vinA iti atra mad pada anupAdAne mad izwa sADane
   parakṛtapākādau matkṛtisādhyatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati kṛtiṃ vanā	para kRta pAka AdO mad kRti sADya tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati kRtim vanA
   anupapadyamānatve sati madiṣṭasādhanatvarūpahetusattvāt vyabhicāraḥ/	anupapadyamAna tve sati mad izwa sADana tva rUpa hetu sattvAt vyaBicAraH/
   tadvāraṇāya tatra matpadam/ parakṛtapākasya matkṛtiṃ vināpi	tad vAraNAya tatra mad padam/ para kRta pAkasya mad kRtim vinA api
   parakīyakṛtyā upapadyamānatayā satyantābhāvāt na vyabhicāraḥ/	parakIya kRtyAH upapadyamAna tayA satyanta aBAvAt na vyaBicAraH/
   duḥkhaviśeṣarūpe śrame svecchādhīnakṛtisādhyatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati	duHKa viSeza rUpe Srame sva icCA DIna kRti sADya tva rUpa sADya aBAvavati
   matkṛtiṃ vinā asattvarūpahetusattvāt vyabhicāraḥ/ tadvāraṇāya	mad kRtim vinA asattva rUpa hetu sattvAt vyaBicAraH/ tad vAraNAya
   iṣṭasādhanatvāditi viśeṣyam/ madīyaśrame	izwa sADana tvAt iti viSezyam/ madIya Srame
   macchatroriṣṭasādhanatvāt vyabhicāratādavasthyam/ tadvāraṇāya	mad CatroH izwa sADana tvAt vyaBicAra tAdavasTyam/ tad vAraNAya
   madiṣṭasādhanatvāditi/ madīyaśramasya macchatrviṣṭasādhanatve 'pi	mad izwa sADana tvAt iti/ madIya Sramasya mad Satru izwa sADana tve api
   madiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ nāstīti na vyabhicāraḥ/	mad izwa sADana tvam na asti iti na vyaBicAraH/
   atra sādhye kṛtau	atra sADye kRtO
   svecchādhīnatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyam/ anyathā nāntarīyakaśrame 'pi	sva icCA aDIna tvam viSezaNam deyam/ anyaTA na antarIyaka Srame api
   uktahetujñānajanyakṛtisādhyatājñānasattvena taduddeśena pravṛttyāpatteḥ/	ukta hetu jQAna janya kRti sADyatA jQAna sattvena tad uddeSena pravRtti ApatteH/
   svapadaṃ yatra pravartate tatparam/ nāntarīyakaśrame tu na	sva padam yatra pravartate tat param/ na antarIyaka Srame tu na
   tadviṣayakecchādhīnakṛtisādhyatājñānamiti na tatra pravṛttyāpattiḥ/ evaṃ	tad vizayaka icCA aDIna kRti sADya tA jQAnam iti na tatra pravRtti ApattiH/ evam
   ca	ca
   hetāvapi matkṛtiṃ vinetyatrāpi kṛtau svecchādhīnatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ	hetO= api mad kRtim vinA iti atra api kRtO sva icCA aDIna tvam viSezaNam
   deyam/ anyathā anyecchādhīnamatkṛtisādhye madiṣṭasādhane	deyam/ anyaTA anya icCA aDInamad kRti sADye mad izwa sADane
   nāntarīyakajalasaṃyogādau vyabhicārāpatteḥ/ na caivaṃ sati	na antarIyaka jala saMyoga AdO vyaBicAra ApatteH/ na ca evam sati
   nāntarīyakaśrame svecchādhīnamatkṛtiṃ vinā sattvena satyantābhāvādeva	na antarIyaka Srame sva icCA aDInamatkRtim vinA sattvena satyanta aBAvAt eva
   vyabhicāravāraṇasambhave iṣṭasādhanatvāditi viśeṣyadalavaiyarthyam	vyaBicAra vAraNa samBave izwa sADana tvAt iti viSezya dala vEyarTyam
   iti vācyam/ iṣṭāpatteḥ/ asya hetvantaratvāt na doṣa iti	iti vAcyam/ izwa ApatteH/ asya hetu antara tvAt na dozaH iti
   vadanti/ vihitakālaśucijīvitvajñānādhīnasyeti/ vihitakālikaṃ	vadanti/ vihita kAla Suci jIvi tva jQAna aDInasya iti/ vihita kAlikam
   yat śucitvaviśiṣṭajīvitvaṃ tadviṣayakajñānajanyasyetyarthaḥ/	yat Suci tva viSizwa jIvi tvam tad vizayaka jQAna janyasya iti arTaH/
   āśaucam/ aśucitvam/ tasya kṛtisādhyatājñānasya/	ASOcam/ aSuci tvam/ tasya kRti sADya tA jQAnasya/
   pravṛttisāmānyaprayojakasyeti/	pravRtti sAmAnya prayojakasya iti/
   pravṛttitvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāvacchedakasyetyarthaḥ/	pravRtti tvA avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tAvacCedakasya iti arTaH/
   kāraṇatāvacchedakalāghavenetyartha iti/	kAraNa tAvacCedaka lAGavena iti arTaH iti/
   svaviśeṣaṇavattājñānajanyatvāpekṣayā	sva viSezaNa vat tA jQAna janya tva apekzayA
   kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvajñānatvarūpasya kāraṇatāvacchedakasya	kRti sADya tva viSizwa izwa sADana tva jQAna tva rUpasya kAraNa tAvacCedakasya
   laghutvenetyarthaḥ/ laghutvamevopapādayati     tanmata iti/ gurumata	laGutvena iti arTaH/ laGu tvam eva upapAdayati    tat mataH iti/ guru mata
   ityarthaḥ/ janyatvādighaṭitatvādityatra ādipadena kāryatājñānatvaṃ	iti arTaH/ janya tva Adi Gawita tvAt iti atra Adipadena kArya tA ajQAna tvam
   parāmṛśyate/ tathā hi    svaviśeṣaṇavattājñānajanyatvamātraṃ na	parAmRSyate/ taTA hi   sva viSezaNa vat tA jQAna janya tva mAtram na
   pravṛttikāraṇatāvacchedakam, tādṛśajñānaviṣayakānuvyavasāyasyāpi	pravRtti kAraNa tAvacCedakam, tAdRSa jQAna vizayaka anu vyavasAyasya api
   tajjanyatvena pravṛttiṃ prati kāraṇatvāpatteḥ/ api tu	tat janya tvena pravRttim prati kAraNa tva ApatteH/ api tu
   svaviśeṣaṇavattājñānajanyakṛtisādhyatājñānatvenaiva kāraṇatvaṃ vācyam/	sva viSezaNa vat tA jQAna janya kRti sADya ta ajQAna tvena eva kAraNa tvam vAcyam/
   tatra ca niyamaghaṭitajanyatvasya kṛtisādhtājñānatvasya ca praveśāt	tatra ca niyama Gawita janya tvasya kRti sADta ajQAna tvasya ca praveSAt 
   gauravamiti bhāvaḥ/	gOravam iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaprakārakajñānasya pravṛttihetutve	kRti sADya tva viSizwa izwa sADana tva prakAraka jQAnasya pravRtti hetu tve
   madhuviṣasampṛktānnabhojane 'pi idaṃ matkṛtisādhyatve sati	maDu viza sampRkta anna Bojane api idam mad kRti sADya tve sati
   mattṛptirūpeṣṭasādhanamiti jñānasattvāt pravṛttyāpattirityata āha   atra	mad tRpti rUpa izwa sADanam iti jQAna sattvAt pravRtti ApattiH iti atas Aha  atra
   balavadaniṣṭeti/ tathā ca	balavat anizwa iti/ taTA ca
   balavadaniṣṭājanakatvaviśiṣṭakṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaprakārakajñānaṃ	balavat anizwA janaka tva viSizwa kRti sADya tva viSizwa izwa sADana tva prakAraka jQAnam
   pravṛttihetuḥ/ madhuviṣasampṛktānnabhojane tu tatkāle	pravRtti hetuH/ maDu viza sampRkta anna Bojane tu tad kAle
   tṛptirūpeṣṭasādhanatve 'pi kālāntare	tRpti rUpa izwa sADana tve api kAla antare
   maraṇarūpabalavadaniṣṭasādhanamitijñānasyaiva sattvena tatra na	maraNa rUpa balavat anizwa sADanamiti jQAnasya eva sattvena tatra na
   pravṛttiriti	pravRttiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvaṃ nāma	BAvaH/ balavat anizwAn anubanDi tvam nAma
   iṣṭotpattināntarīyakaduḥkhādhikaduḥkhājanakatvam/	izwa utpattinA antarIyaka duHKa aDika duHKa Ajanaka tvam/
   balavaddveṣaviṣayaduḥkhājanakatvaṃ vā/ nanu	balavat dveza vizaya duHKa Ajanaka tvam vA/ nanu
   balavadaniṣṭājanakatvaviśiṣṭakṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭesādhanatājñānasya	balavat anizwA janaka tva viSizwa kRti sADya tva viSizwa Isa aDana tA jQAnasya
   kāraṇatve balavadaniṣṭājanakatvādīnāṃ viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāve	kAraNa tve balavat anizwA janaka tva AdInAm viSezya viSezaNa BAve
   vinigamanāvirahāt gurubhūtāḥ aneke kāryakāraṇabhāvāḥ prasajyanta	vinigamanA virahAt guru BUtAH aneke kArya kAraNa BAvAH prasajyanta
   iti kathaṃ tatkāraṇatvaṃ dīpikākāreṇoktamityāśaṅkya	iti kaTam tad kAraNa tvam dIpikA AkAreNa uktam iti ASaFkya
   prācīnamatānusāreṇa tathoktamityāha   viśiṣṭajñānatvāvacchinnsyeti/	prAcIna mata anusAreNa taTA uktam iti Aha  viSizwa jQAna tva avacCinnsyA iti/
   navyamata iti/ pūrvoktāsvārasyāt na viśiṣṭajñānatvāvacchinnasya	navyam atas iti/ pUrva ukta Asu ArasyAt na viSizwa jQAna tva avacCinnasya
   kāraṇatvam/ kintu balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvajñānatvāvacchinnasya	kAraNa tvam/ kintu balavat anizwAn anubanDi tva jQAna tva avacCinnasya
   kṛtisādhyatājñānatvāvacchinnasya iṣṭasādhanatājñānatvāvacchinnasya ca	kRti sADya tA jQAna tva avacCinnasya izwa sADana tA jQAna tva avacCinnasya ca
   pṛthageva kāraṇatvam/ yathā daṇḍacakrādīnāṃ ghaṭaṃ prati	pRTak eva kAraNa tvam/ yaTA daNxa cakra AdInAm Gawam prati
   daṇḍatvacaktatvādinā pṛthageva kāraṇatvam na tu	daNxa tva cakta tva AdinA pRTak eva kAraNa tvam na tu
   daṇḍaviśiṣṭacakratvādinā tadvaditi bhāvaḥ/niṣphale pravṛttyabhāvāt	daNxa viSizwa cakra tva AdinA tadvat iti BAvaH/ nizPale pravRtti aBAvAt 
   iṣṭasādhanatājñānasyaiṣṭasādhanatvena jñāyamāne 'pi	izwa sADana tA jQAnasya ezwa sADana tvena jQAyamAne api
   madhuviṣasampṛktānnabhojane apravṛtteḥ balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvajñānasya,	maDu viza sampRkta anna Bojane apravRtteH balavat anizwa an anubanDi tva jQAnasya,
   kṛtyasādhye sumeruśṛṅgānayanādau pravṛttyabhāvāt	kRtya sADye sumeru SRFga Anayana AdO pravRtti aBAvAt 
   kṛtisādhyatājñānasya ceti trayāṇāmapi pravṛttihetutvamāvaśyakamiti	kRti sADya tA jQAnasya ca iti trayANAm api pravRtti hetu tvam AvaSyakam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nivṛttyātmakaprayatnavyāvartanāyoktam pravṛttītyartha iti/ na	BAvaH/ nivRtti Atmaka prayatna vyAvartanAya uktam pravRtti iti arTaH iti/ na
   hi nivṛttirūpayatnaṃ prati kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatājñānasya hetutvamiti	hi nivRtti rUpa yatnam prati kRti sADya izwa sADana tA jQAnasya hetu tvam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ duḥkhajanakābhāvatayeti/	BAvaH/ duHKa janaka aBAvatayA iti/
   duḥkhajanakapratiyogikābhāvatayetyarthaḥ/ pratyavāyasya duḥkhajanakatayā	duHKa janaka pratiyogika aBAvatayA iti arTaH/ pratyavAyasya duHKa janakatayA
   tadabhāvasya duḥkhajanakābhāvatvam/ svarūpasambandharūpasyeti/ siddhasya	tad aBAvasya duHKa janaka aBAva tvam/ svarUpa sambanDa rUpasya iti/ sidDasya
   saṃrakṣaṇarūpo yaḥ tatkāraṇatvamatra vivakṣitam/ ataḥ	saMrakzaNa rUpaH yaH tad kAraNa tvam atra vivakzitam/ atas 
   pratyavāyaprāgabhāvasattārūpaḥ kṣemaḥ sandhyāvandana prayojyatvenābhimata	pratyavAya prAgaBAva sattA rUpaH kzemaH sanDyA vandana prayojya tvena aBimata
   iti bhāvaḥ/	iti BAvaH/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   apūrvasya	apUrvasya
   lirṅthatvakhaṇḍanam	lirFTa tva KaNxanam
   nanu	nanu
   'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityatra liṅāsvargasādhanamapūrvaṃ	ajyotizwomena svarga kAmaH yajeta a iti atra liFAsvarga sADanam apUrvam
   kāryaṃ pratīyate/ yāgasya āśutaravināśinaḥ	kAryam pratIyate/ yAgasya ASutara vinASinaH
   kālāntarabhāvisvargasādhanatvāyogāt tadyogyaṃ sthāyi	kAla antara BAvi svarga sADanatva ayogAt tad yogyam sTAyi
   kāryaṃmapūrvameva liṅādyarthaḥ/ kāryaṃ kṛtisādhyam/ kṛteḥ	kAryaMma pUrvam eva liFA Adi arTaH/ kAryam kRti sADyam/ kRteH
   saviṣayatvāt viṣayākāṅkṣāyāṃ yāgo viṣayatvenānveti/ 'kasya	sa vizaya tvAt vizaya AkAFkzAyAm yAgaH vizaya tvena anveti/ akasya
   kāryam' iti niyojyākāṅkṣāyāṃ svargakāmapadaṃ	kAryam a iti niyojya AkAFkzAyAm svarga kAma padam
   niyojyaparatayānveti/ kāryabāddhā niyojyaḥ/ tena	niyojya para tayA anveti/ kArya bAdDA niyojyaH/ tena
   'jyotiṣṭomanāmakayāgaviṣayakam svargakāmasya kāryam' iti	ajyotizwoma nAmaka yAga vizayakam svarga kAmasya kAryam a iti
   vākyārthaḥ sampadyate/ vaidikaliṅtvāt 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ	vAkya arTaH sampadyate/ vEdika liFtvAt ayAvat jIvam agni hotram
   juhuyāt' iti nityavākye 'pyapūrvameva	juhuyAt a iti nitya vAkye api apUrvam eva
   vācyam kalpyate/	vAcyam kalpyate/
   'ārogyakāmo bheṣajapānam kuryāt' ityādi laukikaliṅḥ	aArogya kAmaH Bezaja pAnam kuryAt a ityAdi lOkika liFH
   kriyākāryeṃ lakṣaṇā iti cet   na/	kriyA kAryem lakzaNAH iti ced  na/
   yāgasyāpyayogyatāniścayābhāvena iṣṭasādhanatayā pratītyanantaraṃ	yAgasya api ayogya tA niScaya aBAvena izwa sADana tayA prati iti anantaram
   tannirvāhārtham avāntaravyāpāratayā apūrvakalpanāt/ kīrtanādinā	tad nirvAha arTam avAntara vyApAra tayA apUrva kalpanAt/ kIrtana AdinA
   nāśaśruteḥ na yāgadhvaṃso vyāpāraḥ/	nASa SruteH na yAga DvaMsaH vyApAraH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   liṅādeḥ kārya eva	liFA AdeH kAryaH eva
   śaktiriti gurumataṃ āśaṅkate   nanviti/ icchāviśeṣarūpasya	SaktiH iti guru matam ASaFkate  nanu iti/ icCA viSeza rUpasya
   yāgasya āśutaravināśinaḥ svargasādhanatvena bhānaṃ na sambhavati,	yAgasya ASutara vinASinaH svarga sADana tvena BAnam na samBavati,
   ayogyatvādityapūrvarūpa eva kārye śaktiraṅgīkāryetyāha  	ayogya tva Aditya pUrvarUpaH eva kArye SaktiH aFgIkArya iti Aha  
   yāgasyeti/ āśutaravināśinaḥ   tṛtīyakṣaṇavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyoginaḥ/	yAgasya iti/ ASutara vinASinaH  tRtIya kzaNa vRtti DvaMsa pratiyoginaH/
   sthāyi   phalaparyantasthāyi/ anvayaprakāraṃ darśayati   kāryaṃ	sTAyi  Pala paryanta sTAyi/ anvaya prakAram darSayati  kAryam
   kṛtisādhyamiti/ yāge kṛtisādhyatvaṃ sākṣāt/ apūrvaṃ tu	kRti sADya miti/ yAge kRti sADya tvam sAkzAt/ apUrvam tu
   yāgadvāreti bodhyam/ kāryaboddheti/ idam matkṛtisādhyamiti	yAga dvAra iti boDyam/ kArya bodDa iti/ idam mad kRti sADyam iti
   jñānavānityarthaḥ/ vidhyarthamukhyaviśeṣyakaṃ śābdabodhaṃ darśayati  	jQAnavAn iti arTaH/ viDi arTa muKya viSezyakam SAbda boDam darSayati  
   teneti/ svargakāmasya liṅarthe kārye tadekadeśe ca yāgasya	tena iti/ svarga kAmasya liFarTe kArye tad eka deSe ca yAgasya
   anvayenetyarthaḥ/ nyāyamate tu tatra	anvayena iti arTaH/ nyAya mate tu tatra
   'kṛtisādhyabalavadaniṣṭājanakeṣṭasādhanayāgānukūlakṛtimān	akRti sADya balavat anizwa ajanaka izwa sADana yAga anukUla kRtimAn
   svargakāmaḥ' iti vākyārthabodhaḥ/ nanu apūrvasya	svarga kAmaH a iti vAkya arTa boDaH/ nanu apUrvasya
   pūrvamunapasthitatvāt kathaṃ tatra śaktigraha iti cet, atra pravadanti	pUrva munapa sTita tvAt kaTam tatra SaktigrahaH iti cet, atra pravadanti
   abhijñāḥ   tanmate taddharmāvacchinnaviṣayakaśābdabodhaṃ prati	aBijQAH  tad mate tad Darma avacCinna vizaya kaSAbda boDam prati
   taddharmāvacchinnaviṣayakaśaktigrahasya tādṛśopasthiteśca hetutā, na tu	tad Darma avacCinna vizayaka Sakti grahasya tAdRSa upasTiteH ca hetutA, na tu
   samānaviṣayakatvena hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ/ evaṃ ca kāryatvāvacchinne yatra	samAna vizayaka tvena hetu hetum at BAvaH/ evam ca kAryatva avacCinne yatra
   kutracit śaktigrahaḥ/ yogyatābalācca aparvūrūpakāryasya śābdabodhe	kutracid Sakti grahaH/ yogya tA balAt ca aparvU rUpa kAryasya SAbda boDe
   bhānaṃ, na hi yāgaviṣayakamanyatkāryaṃ sambhavatīti/ nanu nitye	BAnaM, na hi yAga vizayakam anyat kAryam samBavati iti/ nanu nitye
   phalābhāvāt kathaṃ tatra apūrvabodhakatā ityata āha   yāvajjīvamiti/	Pala aBAvAt kaTam tatra apUrva boDaka tA iti atas Aha  yAvat jIvam iti/
   apūrvameveti/ kāryatvenetyādiḥ/ paṇḍāpūrvamityarthaḥ/ laukikasthale	apUrvam eva iti/ kAryatvena ityAdiH/ paNxApUrvam iti arTaH/ lOkika sTale
   apūrvabhānāsambhavādāha   ārogyeti/ kriyākārya iti/	apUrva BAnA samBavAt Aha  Arogya iti/ kriyA kAryaH iti/
   dhātvarthaniṣṭhakāryatva ityarthaḥ/ laukikālaukikasādhāraṇyena	DAtu arTa nizWa kAryatvaH iti arTaH/ lOkika alOkika sADa araNyena
   kāryatvādāveva liṅādeḥ śaktiraṅgīkāryetyāśayena samādhatte  	kAryatva AdO= eva liFA AdeH SaktiH aFgIkAryA iti ASayena samADatte  
   yāgasyeti/ ayogyatvāt yāgasya svargasādhanatvena bhānaṃ na	yAgasya iti/ ayogya tvAt yAgasya svarga sADana tvena BAnam na
   sambhavatītyuktadoṣaṃ nirācṣṭe   ayogyeti/ ayogyatāsaṃśayasattve 'pi	samBavati iti ukta dozam nirAczwe  ayogyA iti/ ayogyatA saMSaya sattve api
   tasyāvighaṭakatvāt śābdabodho bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ/	tasya aviGawaka tvAt SAbda boDaH Bavati eva iti BAvaH/
   vākyādiṣṭasādhanatvena yoge 'vagate	vAkyAt izwa sADana tvena yoge avagate
   tasyāśutaravināśinaḥ	tasya aSutara vinASinaH
   vyāpāraṃ vinā phalajanakatvāsambhavāt tannirvāhāya aparvūṃ kalpyata	vyApAram vinA Pala janakatva asamBavAt tat nirvAhAya aparvUm kalpyata
   ityāha   tannirvāhārthamiti/ nanu yāgadhvaṃsasyaiva vyāpāratvamastu	iti Aha  tad nirvAha arTam iti/ nanu yAga DvaMsasya eva vyApAra tvam astu
   kimapūrvakalpanenetyata āha kīrtanādineti/ ādinā	kim apUrva kalpanena iti atas Aha kIrtana AdinA iti/ AdinA
   "karmanāśājalasparśātkaratoyāvilaṅghanāt/	"karma nASA jala sparSAt kara toya avilaFGanAt/
   gaṇḍakībāhutaraṇāt	gaNxakI bAhu taraNAt
   dharmaḥ kṣarati kīrtanāt//"	DarmaH kzarati kIrtanAt//"

   vyāpāratve svargadhārāpattirityapi dūṣaṇāntaraṃ vibhāvanīyam/	vyApAra tve svargaDArApattiH iti api dUzaNa antaram viBAvanIyam/
   karmanāśā, karatoyā, gaṇḍakī iti nadīviśeṣāḥ/	karma nASA, karatoyA, gaNxakI iti nadI viSezAH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   mūle apūrvaṃ kāryaṃ	mUle apUrvam kAryam
   pratīyata iti/ apūrvaṃ kāryatvena pratīyata ityarthaḥ/ liṅo hi	pratIyate iti/ apUrvam kAryatvena pratIyate iti arTaH/ liFaH hi
   kāryatvāvacchinne śaktiḥ/ prakāśikāyām ayogyatvāditi/	kAryatva avacCinne SaktiH/ prakASikAyAm ayogya tvAt iti/
   svargasādhanatvānvayayogyatāvirahādityarthaḥ/	svarga sADanatva anvaya yogya tA virahAt iti arTaH/
   dvitīyakṣaṇavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogitvarūpasya kṣaṇikatvasya	dvitIya kzaNa vRtti DvaMsa pratiyogi tva rUpasya kzaNika tvasya
   bauddherevāṅgīkārādāha tṛtīyakṣaṇeti/	bOdDeH eva aFgIkArAt Aha tRtI ya kzaNa iti/
   māsādiparyantasthāyitvasyānupayogādāha   phalaparyantasthāyīti/	mAsa Adi paryanta sTAyitu asya anupayogAt Aha  Pala paryanta sTAyi iti/
   svargotpattiparyantaṃ vartamānamityarthaḥ/ vidhyarthamukhyaviśeṣyakamiti/	svarga utpatti paryantam vartamAnam iti arTaH/ viDi arTa muKya viSezyakam iti/
   liṅarthakāryamukhyaviśeṣyakamityarthaḥ/ svargakāmasyetyādi/ liṅaḥ	liFarTa kArya muKya viSezyakam iti arTaH/ svarga kAmasya ityAdi/ liFaH
   kṛtisādhyamityarthaḥ/ kṛtau svargakāmasya samavetātvasambandhenānvayaḥ,	kRti sADyam iti arTaH/ kRtO svarga kAmasya samavetA tva sambanDena anvayaH,
   viṣayatāsambandhena yāgasyānvayaḥ/ tathā ca svargakāmasamavetā	vizaya tA sambanDena yAgasya anvayaH/ taTA ca svarga kAma samavetA
   yāgaviṣayiṇī yā kṛtiḥ tatsādhyam (apūrvam) ityākārako bodha	yAga vizayiNI yA kRtiH tat sADyam (apUrvam) iti AkArakaH boDa
   ityāśayaḥ/ svargaṅkāmasya kārye 'nvaya ityuktāvapi	iti ASayaH/ svargaFkAmasya kArye anvayaH iti uktO= api
   prāptāprāptavivekena kṛtāvanvaya eva vivakṣitaḥ/ tadekadeśa iti/	prApta aprApta vivekena kRtO= anvayaH eva vivakzitaH/ tat eka deSaH iti/
   kāryaikadeśe kṛtāvityarthaḥ/ nyāyamate tviti/ tanmate liṅtvena	kArya eka deSe kRtO= iti arTaH/ nyAya mate tu iti/ tad mate liFtvena
   rūpeṇa liṅā kṛtisādhyatvaṃ balavadaniṣṭājanakatvaṃ iṣṭasādhanatvaṃ ca	rUpeNa liFA kRti sADya tvam balavat anizwA janaka tvam izwa sADana tvam ca
   abhidhīyate/ ākhyātatvena rūpeṇa kṛtirabhidhīyate kṛtisādhyatvādīnāṃ	aBiDIyate/ AKyAta tvena rUpeNa kRtiH aBiDIyate kRti sADya tva AdInAm
   trayāṇāṃ dhātvarthe yoge āśrayatāsambandhenānvayaḥ/	trayANAm DAtu arTe yoge ASrayatA sambanDena anvayaH/

   kṛterāśrayatāsambandhena prathamāntārthe svargakāme 'nvayaḥ/ tathā ca	kRteH ASrayatA sambanDena praTama anta arTe svarga kAme anvayaH/ taTA ca
   kṛtisādhyatva balavadaniṣṭajanakatva iṣṭasādhanatvāśraya yāgānukūlakṛtimān	kRti sADya tva  balavat anizwa janaka tva  izwa sADanatva ASraya  yAga anukUla kRtimAn
   svargakāma iti bodhaḥ/ na tu samānaviṣayakatveneti/	svarga kAmaH iti boDaH/ na tu samAna vizayaka tvena iti/
   taddharmāvacchinnatadviṣayakaśābdabodhaṃ prati	tad Darma avacCinna tad vizaya kaSAbda boDam prati

   kutraciditi/ yāgādikriyāyāmityarthaḥ/ yogyatābalāditi/	kutracid iti/ yAga Adi kriyAyAm iti arTaH/ yogya tA balAt iti/
   svargasādhanatvānvayayogyatābalādityarthaḥ/ paṇḍāpūrvamiti/	svarga sADanatva anvaya yogya tA balAt iti arTaH/ paNxApUrvam iti/

   prayojanatvaṃ prābhākarerucyate/ kriyārūpasya kāryasya dhātunaiva	prayojana tvam prABAkareH ucyate/ kriyA rUpasya kAryasya DAtunA eva
   lābhāt tatra lakṣaṇoktirasaṅgatetyata āha   dhātvarthaniṣṭhakāryatva	lABAt tatra lakzaNa uktiH asaFgatA ityatas Aha  DAtu arTa nizWa kArya tva
   iti/ kāryaśaktasya liṅaḥ tatra kāryatve lakṣaṇetyatheḥ/	iti/ kArya Saktasya liFaH tatra kAryatve lakzaNa iti aTeH/
   'bheṣajapānarūpakriyājanye	aBezaja pAna rUpa kriyA janye
   ārogyasādhanabheṣajapratiyogināḍīniṣṭhavilakṣaṇasaṃyoge	Arogya sADana Bezaja pratiyogi nAxI nizWa vilakzaNa saMyoge
   lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ' iti nṛsiṃhaśāstriṇaḥ prāhuḥ/	lakzaNa iti arTaH a iti nRsiMha SAstriNaH prAhuH/
   vākyādiṣṭasādhanatvenetyādi/ 'jyotiṣṭomeva svargakāmo yajeta'	vAkyAt izwa sADana tvena ityAdi/ ajyotizwomA iva svarga kAmaH yajeta a
   iti vākyāt 'jyotiṣṭomayāgaḥ svargaṃsādhanam' iti	iti vAkyAt ajya utizwoma yAgaH svargaMsADanam a iti
   śābdabodhaḥ ādau jāyate/ tadanantaraṃ dvikṣaṇāvasthāyino yāgasya	SAbda boDaH AdO jAyate/ tad anantaram dvi kzaNa avasTAyinaH yAgasya
   śrutibodhitaṃ svargasādhanatvaṃ anupapannamityanupapattipratisandhānāt	Sruti boDitam svarga sADana tvam anupapannam iti anupapatti pratisanDAnAt
   kalpitasya apūrvasya prathamotpannaśābdabodhāviṣayatayā apūrvasya	kalpitasya apUrvasya praTama utpanna SAbda boDA vizaya tayA apUrvasya
   liṅarthatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tātparyam/ karmanāśeti/ karmanāśā,	liFarTa tvam na samBavati iti tAtparyam/ karma nASa iti/ karma nASA,

   dīpikā	dIpikA
   ākhyātasya	AKyAtasya
   yatnārthakatvasthāpanam	yatna arTaka tva sTApanam
   lokavyutpattibalāt kriyāyāmeva kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ	loka vyutpatti balAt kriyAyAm eva kRti sADya izwa sADana tvam
   liṅā bodhyata iti liṅatvena vidhyarthakatvam, ākhyātatvena	liFA boDyate iti liFatvena viDi arTaka tvam, AKyAta tvena
   yatnārthakatvam/ pacati pākaṃ karotīti vivaraṇadarśanāt, kiṃ	yatna arTaka tvam/ pacati pAkam karoti iti vivaraNa darSanAt, kim
   karoti iti praśne pacatītyuttarācca ākhyātasya	karoti iti praSne pacati iti uttarAt ca AKyAtasya
   prayatnārthakatvaniścayāt/ ratho gacchatītyādau anukūlavyāpāre	prayatna arTaka tva niScayAt/ raTaH gacCati ityAdO anukUla vyApAre
   lakṣaṇā/ 'devadattaḥ pacita', 'devadattena pacyate taṇḍulaḥ' ityādau	lakzaNA/ adevadattaH pacita a, adevadattena pacyate taNxulaHa ityAdO
   kartṛkarmaṇoḥ nākhyātārthatvam/ kintu tadgataikatvādīnāmeva/	kartR karmaNoH na AKyAta arTa tvam/ kintu tad gata eka tva AdInAm eva/
   tayorākṣepādeva lābhaḥ/	tayoH AkzepAt eva lABaH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   lokavyutpattīti/	loka vyutpatti iti/
   lokavyavahāretyarthaḥ/ sa ca yo yatra pravartate sa	loka vyavahAra iti arTaH/ sa ca yaH yatra pravartate sa
   kṛtisādhyatveneṣṭasādhanatvena ca tajjñānavānityevaṃrūpaḥ/ kecittu	kRti sADya tvena izwa sADana tvena ca tat jQAnavAn iti evaMrUpaH/ kecid tu
   yadicchayā yatra pravṛttiḥ tattatsādhanamiti lokavyavahāra ityāhuḥ/	yat icCayA yatra pravRttiH tat tad sADanam iti loka vyavahAraH iti AhuH/
   navyāḥ punaḥ loke pacetetyādiliṅādisamabhivyāhārasthale	navyAH punar loke paceta ityAdi liFA Adi samaBivyAhAra sTale
   kriyāyāmeva kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭesādhanatvabodha iti	kriyAyAm eva kRti sADya tva viSizwa IsA Dana tva boDaH iti
   niyamabalāditi tadarthaḥ/ sarvatreti śeṣa iti vyācakhyuḥ/	niyama balAt iti tad arTaH/ sarvatra iti SezaH iti vyAcaKyuH/
   ākhyātatveneti/ tacca saṅketasambandhenākhyātapadavattvaṃ	AKyAta tvena iti/ tat ca saFketa sambanDena AKyAta padavat tvam
   tiptvādikameva śaktatāvacchedakamiti tu navyāḥ/ yatnārthakatvam  	tiptvA Adikam eva Sakta tAvacCedakam iti tu navyAH/ yatna arTaka tvam  
   kṛtitvāvacchinnavācakatvam/ kiṃ karotīti/ kṛtitvāvacchinne	kRti tva avacCinna vAcaka tvam/ kim karoti iti/ kRtitva avacCinne
   jijñāsitasambandhabodhakatva eva	jijQAsita sambanDa boDaka tvaH eva
   tannivartakatvaṃ	tad nivartaka tvam
   nānyatheti bhāvaḥ/ nanu ratho gacchati ityādau ākhyātasya	na anyaTA iti BAvaH/ nanu raTaH gacCati iti AdO AKyAtasya
   kṛtibodhakatvāsambhavāt tadanurodhena vyāpāra eva śaktiḥ	kRti boDaka tva asamBavAt tad anuroDena vyApAraH eva SaktiH
   vaktavyetyata āha   ratho gacchatītyādāviti/ vyāpāre	vaktavyA iti atas Aha  raTaH gacCati iti AdO= iti/ vyApAre
   anukūlatvotkīrtanaṃ tu tena sambandhena vyāpāre	anukUla tva utkIrtanam tu tena sambanDena vyApAre
   gamanasyānvayalābhāya/ navyāḥ punaḥ gacchatītyatra ākhyātasya	gamanasya anvayalABAya/ navyAH punar gacCati iti atra AKyAtasya
   jānātītyādāviva āśrayatve nirūḍhalakṣaṇā/ na cāśrayatāsambandhenaiva	jAnAti ityAdO= iva ASraya tve nirUXa lakzaNA/ na ca ASrayatA sambanDena eva
   prathamāntārthe gamanāderanvayena nirvāhe āśrayatve nirūḍhalakṣaṇākalpanaṃ	praTama anta arTe gamana AdeH anvayena nirvAhe ASraya tve nirUXa lakzaNa akalpanam
   nirarthakamiti/ vācyam/ nāmārthayoriva	nirarTakam iti/ vAcyam/ nAma arTayoH iva
   dhātvarthanāmārthayorabhedātiriktasambandhenānvayasyāvyutpannatvāt tatra	DAtu arTa nAma arTayoH aBeda atirikta sambanDena anvayasya avyutpanna tvAt tatra
   tathānvayāsambhavāt/ stokaṃ pacatītyādau stokādeḥ dhātvarthe	taTA anvaya asamBavAt/ stokam pacati ityAdO stoka AdeH DAtu arTe
   poke 'nvayāt abhedātirikteti dhyeyam/ vaiyākaraṇamataṃ nirācaṣṭe	poke anvayAt aBeda atiriktA iti Dyeyam/ vEyAkaraNa matam nirAcazwe
     devadatta iti/ nākhyātārthatvamiti/ ākhyātasya kartrādau	 devadattaH iti/ na AKyAta arTa tvam iti/ AKyAtasya kartR AdO
   śaktisvīkāre 'nantakṛtyādeḥ śakyatāvacchedakatvamaṅgīkartavyam/	Sakti svIkAre ananta kRtya AdeH Sakya tA avacCedaka tvam aFgIkartavyam/
   kṛtyādau śaktisvīkāre tu kṛtitvādijāteḥ śakyatāvacchedakatvāt	kRtya AdO Sakti svIkAre tu kRti tva Adi jAteH Sakya tA avacCedaka tvAt 
   lāghavamiti bhāvaḥ/ tadgataikatvādīnāmeveti/ ākhyātārthatvamiti	lAGavam iti BAvaH/ tad gata eka tva AdInAm eva iti/ AKyAta arTa tvam iti
   pūrveṇānvayaḥ/ ādinā kṛtyādiparigrahaḥ/ nanu tarhi kartṛkarmaṇoḥ	pUrveNa anvayaH/ AdinA kRtyA Adi parigrahaH/ nanu tarhi kartR karmaNoH
   kathaṃ lābha ityata āha   tayoriti/ ākṣepādeveti/ paramatena/	kaTam lABaH iti atas Aha  tayoH iti/ AkzepAt eva iti/ para matena/
   svamate tu prathamantapadenaiva tallābhāt/ 'devadattaḥ taṇḍulaṃ pacati'	sva mate tu praTamantapadena eva tad lABAt/ adevadattaH taNxulam pacati a
   ityatra 'taṇḍulakarmakapākānukūlakṛtimān devadattaḥ'	iti atra ataNxula karmaka pAka anukUla kRtimAn devadattaH a
   ityanvayabodhaḥ/ 'devadattena pacyate taṇḍula' ityatra tu	iti anvaya boDaH/ adevadattena pacyate taNxula a iti atra tu
   'devadattasamavetakṛtijanyapākakarmībhūtastaṇḍulaḥ' iti śābdabodhaḥ/	adeva datta samaveta kRti janya pAka karmIBUtaH taNxulaH a iti SAbda boDaH/
   na ca 'devadattaḥ pacati' ityatra tṛtīyā, 'taṇḍulaḥ pacyate' ityatra	na ca adevadattaH pacati a iti atra tRtIyA, ataNxulaH pacyate a iti atra
   ca dvitīyā syāt/ tatra kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ākhyātenānabhidhānāditi	ca dvitIyA syAt/ tatra kartR karmaNoH AKyAtena anaBiDAnAt iti
   vācyam/ anabhihite kartṛtve tṛtīyāyāḥ tādṛśe ca karmatve	vAcyam/ anaBihite kartR tve tRtIyAyAH tAdRSe ca karma tve
   dvitīyāyā vidhānenādoṣāditi dhyeyam/	dvitIyAyAH viDAnena adozAt iti Dyeyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   yo yatreti/ yaḥ	yaH yatra iti/ yaH
   puruṣaḥ yatra yāgādau pravartate sa puruṣaḥ	puruzaH yatra yAga AdO pravartate sa puruzaH
   kṛtisādhyatva iṣṭasādhanatvaprakārakayāgaviśeṣyakajñānavānityevaṃrūpāt	kRti sADya tva  izwa sADana tva prakAraka yAga viSezyaka jQAnavAn iti evaMrUpAt
   lokavyavahārāt yāgādikriyāyāmeva liṅā	loka vyavahArAt yAga Adi kriyAyAm eva liFA
   kṛtisādhyatkmiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ cāvagamyata ityarthaḥ/ vyavahāraparatayā	kRti sADyat kmizwa sADana tvam ca avagamyate iti arTaH/ vyavahAra para tayA
   vyutpattipadaṃ vyākhyāya, niyamaparatayā vyutpattipadaṃ vyācakṣāṇānāṃ	vyutpatti padam vyAKyAya, niyama para tayA vyutpatti padam vyAcakzANAnAm
   navyānāṃ matamāha   navyāḥ panuriti/ tacca saṅketasaṃbandheneti/	navyAnAm matam Aha  navyAH panuH iti/ tat ca saFketa saMbanDena iti/
   ākhyātapadasya yatra tibādau pāṇinyādīnāṃ icchāviśeṣātmakaḥ	AKyAta padasya yatra tibAdO pANini AdInAm icCA viSeza AtmakaH
   saṅketo 'sti sa tibādiḥ saṅketasaṃbandhena ākhyātapadavān/	saFketaH asti sa tibAdiH saFketa saMbanDena AKyAta padavAn /
   ākhyātapadavattvaṃ	AKyAta padavat tvam
   tibādiniṣṭham/ tat	tiba Adi nizWam/ tat 
   śaktatāvacchedakamityarthaḥ/ yathā tibādiṣu aṣṭādaśasu ākhyātapadasya	Sakta tAvacCedakam iti arTaH/ yaTA tiba Adizu azwAdaSasu AKyAta padasya
   pāṇineranyasya vā saṅketaḥ tathā śabdāntarasaṃketasyāpi	pANineH anyasya vA saFketaH taTA Sabda antara saMketasya api
   anyapuruṣīyasya sambhavāt tattacchabdavattvasyāpi vinigamanāviraheṇa	anya puruzIyasya samBavAt tad tat Sabdavat tvasya api vinigamanA viraheNa
   śaktatāvacchedakatvaṃ syādityālocya navīnāḥ tiptvādikameva	Sakta tAvat Cedaka tvam syAt iti Alocya navInAH tiptvA Adikam eva
   kṛtiśaktatāvacchedakamityāhuḥ/ tanmatamāha   tiptvādikameveti/ atra	kRti Sakta tAvacCedakam iti AhuH/ tat matam Aha  tiptvA Adikam eva iti/ atra
   "tibodereva yatra vācakatāgrahaḥ tadanurodhena	"ti bodeH eva yatra vAcaka tA grahaH tad anuroDena
   pacatītyādyānupūrvījñānasya tibādijanyopasthitisahakāreṇa	pacati ityAdi a AnupUrvI jQAnasya tibAdi janya upasTiti sahakAreNa
   śābdabodhopadhāyakatākalpanasya āvaśyakatayā tibādereva tādrūpyeṇa	SAbda boDa upaDAyaka tA kalpanasya AvaSyaka tayA tibAdeH eva tAdrUpyeNa
   śaktatākalpanāyāḥ ucitatvam"iti vyutpattivādagrantho 'nusandheyaḥ/	Sakta tA kalpanAyAH ucita tvam "iti vyutpatti vAda granTaH anusanDeyaH/
   kartrarthakatvāpekṣayā yatnārthakatve śakyatāvacchedakalāghavamastīti	kartR arTaka tva apekzayA yatna arTaka tve Sakya tA avacCedaka lAGavam asti iti
   sūcanāya kṛtitvāvacchinnavācakatvaṃ ityuktam/ dīpikāyāṃ pacati	sUcanAya kRti tva avacCinna vAcaka tvam iti uktam/ dIpikAyAm pacati
   pākaṃ karotīti/ tatsamānārthakapadāntareṇa tadarthakathanaṃ vivaraṇam/	pAkam karoti iti/ tad samAna arTaka pada antareNa tad arTa kaTanam vivaraNam/
   'pacati' iti vivaraṇīyapade pac ti iti bhāgadvayamasti/ 'pākaṃ	apacati a iti vivaraNIya pade pad ti iti BAga dvayam asti/ apAkam
   karoti' iti vivaraṇavākye 'pākam' ityanena dhātoḥ	karoti a iti vivaraNa vAkye apAkam a iti anena DAtoH
   vivaraṇam, 'karoti' ityanena 'ti' ityākhyātasya vivaraṇam/	vivaraNam, akaroti a iti anena ati a iti AKyAtasya vivaraNam/
   yatnaḥ kṛdhātorarthaḥ/ tathā ca karotinā vivaraṇāt ākhyātasya	yatnaH kRDAtoH arTaH/ taTA ca karotinA vivaraNAt AKyAtasya
   yatnārthakatvam/ evaṃ 'kiṃ karoti' iti praśnasya pacati ityuttaraṃ	yatna arTaka tvam/ evam akim karoti a iti praSnasya pacati iti uttaram
   dīyate/ tatra praśnavākye kiṃ śabdasya jijñāsāviṣayadharmāvacchinnor'thaḥ/	dIyate/ tatra praSna vAkye kim Sabdasya jijQAsA vizaya Darma avacCinnor aTaH/
   dvitīyāyāḥ viṣayatvamarthaḥ/ tatrādheyatāsambandhena kiṃpadārthasyānvayaḥ/	dvitIyAyAH vizaya tvam arTaH/ tatra ADeya tA sambanDena kiMpadArTasya anvayaH/
   viṣayatvasya nirūpakatāsambandhena kṛtāvanvayaḥ/ tathā ca	vizaya tvasya nirUpa katA sambanDena kRtO= anvayaH/ taTA ca
   jijñāsāviṣayadharmavacchinnaniṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpakakṛtiriti bodho	jijQAsA vizaya Darma vat Cinna nizWa vizaya tA nirUpaka kRtiH iti boDaH 
   jāyate/ 'pacati' iti vākyena pākaniṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpakakṛtiriti	jAyate/ apacati a iti vAkyena pAka nizWa vizaya tA nirUpaka kRtiH iti
   bodho bhavati/ tathā ca jijñāsitadharmāvacchinnaviṣayakakṛtivācakasya	boDaH Bavati/ taTA ca jijQAsita Darma avacCinna vizaya ka kRti vAcakasya
   praśnasya viśeṣadharmāvacchinnaviṣayakayatnavācakaśabda evottaraṃ	praSnasya viSeza Darma avacCinna vizaya ka yatna vAcaka SabdaH eva uttaram
   bhavitumarhatīti ākhyātasya yatnavācakatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ prakāśikāyām	Bavitum arhati iti AKyAtasya yatna vAcaka tvam iti BAvaH/ prakASikAyAm
   jijñāsitasambandhabodhakamiti/	jijQAsita sambanDa boDakam iti/
   jijñāsāviṣayadharmāvacchinnapratiyogikaviṣayatvarūpasambandhabodhakam	jijQAsA vizaya Darma avacCinna pratiyogika vizaya tva rUpa sambanDa boDakam
   ityarthaḥ/	iti arTaH/
   pākasambandhabodhakatva iti/ pākaviṣayakatvabodhakatva ityarthaḥ/	pAka sambanDa boDaka tvaH iti/ pAka vizayaka tva boDaka tvaH iti arTaH/
   tannivartakatvamiti/ jijñāsānivartakatvamityarthaḥ/	tad nivartaka tvam iti/ jijQAsA nivartaka tvam iti arTaH/
   kṛtibodhakatvāsambhavāditi/ acetane rathe	kRti boDaka tva asamBavAditi/ acetane raTe
   yatnarūpakṛterbādhitatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ nanu ratho gacchatītyādau	yatna rUpa kRteH bADita tvAt iti BAvaH/ nanu raTaH gacCati ityAdO
   ākhyātasyānukūlavyāpāre lakṣaṇetyuktirna yuktā/ anukūlatvasya	AKyAtasya anukUla vyApAre lakzaNa iti uktiH na yuktA/ anukUla tvasya
   saṃsargatayā bhānasambhavena tadaṃśe śabdavṛtteranāvaśyakatvāt	saMsarga tayA BAna samBavena tad aMSe Sabda vRtteH anAvaSyaka tvAt
   vyāpāramātre lakṣaṇāyāḥ vaktumucitatvādityāśaṅkya dīpikāyā api	vyApAra mAtre lakzaNAyAH vaktum ucita tvAt iti ASaFkya dIpikAyAH api
   tathaiva tātparyamityāha   vyāpāre anukūlatvotkīrtanamiti/ navyāḥ	taTA eva tAtparyam iti Aha  vyApAre anukUla tva utkIrtanam iti/ navyAH
   punariti/ dīghitikārādayaḥ ityarthaḥ/ maṇikṛnmatamāśaṅkate   na	punar iti/ dIGiti kAra AdayaH iti arTaH/ maNi kRt matam ASaFkate  na
   cāśrayatāsambandhenaiveti/ avyutpannatvāditi/ anyathā 'caitraḥ pacyate'	ca ASrayatA sambanDena eva iti/ avyutpanna tvAt iti/ anyaTA acEtraH pacyate a
   ityatra dhātvarthapākasya kartṛtāsambandhena caitre, taṇḍulaḥ	iti atra DAtu arTa pAkasya kartR tA sambanDena cEtre, taNxulaH
   pacatītyādau karmatāsambandhena taṇḍulasya dhātvarthe	pacati ityAdO karma tA sambanDena taNxulasya DAtu arTe
   pāke 'nvayāpattariti bhāvaḥ/	pAke anvaya Apattar iti BAvaH/
   vaiyākaraṇamatamiti/	vEyAkaraNam atam iti/
   'devadattaḥ taṇḍulaṃ pacati' ityatra taṇḍulapadottaradvitīyāyāḥ karma	adevadattaH taNxulam pacati a iti atra taNxula pada uttara dvitIyAyAH karma
   arthaḥ tatrābhedena taṇḍulasyānvayaḥ/ karmaṇaḥ	arTaH tatra aBedena taNxulasya anvayaH/ karmaNaH
   svaniṃṣṭhakarmatānirūpakatvasambandhena dhātvarthe pāke 'nvayaḥ/ 'pacati'	sva niMzWa karmatA nirUpaka tva sambanDena DAtu arTe pAke anvayaH/ apacati a
   ityatra tipaḥ kartā arthaḥ/ tatra devadattasyābhedenānvayaḥ/ kartuḥ	iti atra tipaH kartA arTaH/ tatra devadattasya aBedena anvayaH/ kartuH
   dhātvarthapāke svaniṣṭhakartṛtānirūpakatvasambandhenānvayaḥ/ tathā ca	DAtu arTa pAke sva nizWa kartRtA nirUpaka tva sambanDena anvayaH/ taTA ca
   devadattābhinnakartṛkaḥ taṇḍulābhinnakarmakaḥ pākaḥ iti	devadatta aBinna kartRkaH taNxulA Binna karmakaH pAkaH iti
   dhātvarthamukhyaviśeṣyako bodhaḥ/ devadattena pacyate taṇḍulaḥ ityatra	DAtvarTa muKya viSezyakaH boDaH/ devadattena pacyate taNxulaH iti atra
   tṛtīyāyāḥ kartā arthaḥ/ tatra devadattasya abhedenānvayaḥ, kartuśca	tRtIyAyAH kartA arTaH/ tatra devadattasya aBedena anvayaH, kartuH ca
   pāke 'nvayaḥ/ ākhyātasya karma arthaḥ tatra taṇḍulasyābhedena karmaṇaśca	pAke anvayaH/ AKyAtasya karma arTaH tatra taNxulasya aBedena karmaNaH ca
   dhātvarthe 'nvayaḥ/ devadattābhinnakartṛkaḥ taṇḍulābhinnakarmakaḥ pāka iti	DAtu arTe anvayaH/ devadatta aBinna kartRkaH taNxulA Binna karmakaH pAkaH iti
   śābdabodhaḥ/	SAbda boDaH/
   naiyāyikamate tu	nEyAyika mate tu
   devadattaḥ taṇḍulaṃ pacati ityatra dvitīyāyāḥ karmatvamarthaḥ/	devadattaH taNxulam pacati iti atra dvitIyAyAH karma tvam arTaH/
   tatrādheyatāsambandhena taṇḍulasyānvayaḥ/ karmatvasya	tatra ADeya tA sambanDena taNxulasya anvayaH/ karma tvasya
   nirūpakatāsambandhena	nirUpa katA sambanDena
   dhātvarthe pāke 'nvayaḥ/ ākhyātasya kṛtirarthaḥ/ tatrānukūlatāsambandhena	DAtu arTe pAke anvayaH/ AKyAtasya kRtiH arTaH/ tatra anukUla tA sambanDena
   dhātvarthapākasyānvayaḥ/ kṛterāśrayatāsambandhena devadatte 'nvaya iti	DAtu arTa pAkasya anvayaH/ kRteH ASrayatA sambanDena devadatte anvayaH iti
   taṇḍulaniṣṭhakarmatānirūpakapākānukūlakṛtimān devadatta iti	taNxula nizWa karmatA nirUpaka pAka anukUla kRtimAn devadattaH iti
   prathamāntārthamukhyaviśeṣyako bodhaḥ/ devadattena pacyate taṇḍula	praTama anta arTa muKya viSezyakaH boDaH/ devadattena pacyate taNxula
   ityatra tṛtīyāyāḥ kṛtirarthaḥ/ tatra devadattasya samavāyenānvayaḥ/	iti atra tRtIyAyAH kRtiH arTaH/ tatra devadattasya samavAyena anvayaH/
   kṛterjanyatāsambandhena dhātvarthapāke 'nvayaḥ/ ākhyātasya	kRteH janya tA sambanDena DAtu arTa pAke anvayaH/ AKyAtasya
   karmatvamarthaḥ/	karma tvam arTaH/
   tatra nirūpitatvasambandhena pākasyānvayaḥ/ karmatvasyāśrayatāsambandhena	tatra nirUpita tva sambanDena pAkasya anvayaH/ karma tvasya aSrayatA sambanDena
   prathamāntārthe taṇḍule 'nvaya iti	praTama anta arTe taNxule anvayaH iti
   devadattasamevatakṛtijanyapākanirūpitakarmatāvān taṇḍula iti	devadatta samevata kRti janya pAka nirUpita karma tAvAn taNxulaH iti
   bodhaḥ/	boDaH/
   bhāṭṭamīmāṃsakānāṃ	BAwwamI mAMsakAnAm
   mate devadattaḥ odanaṃ pacati ityatrākhyātasya kṛtirūpā bhāvanā	mate devadattaH odanam pacati iti atra AKyAtasya kRti rUpA BAvanA
   arthaḥ/ odanapadottaradvitīyāyāḥ akhaṇḍopādhirūpaṃ karmatvamarthaḥ/	arTaH/ odanapada uttara dvitIyAyAH aKaNxa upADi rUpam karma tvam arTaH/
   tatrādheyatāsambandhena taṇḍulasyānvayaḥ/ karmatvasya	tatra ADeya tA sambanDena taNxulasya anvayaH/ karma tvasya
   svanirūpakadhātvarthapākānukūlatvasambandhena ākhyātārthakṛtāvanvayaḥ/	sva nirUpaka DAtu arTa pAka anukUla tva sambanDena AKyAta arTa kRtO= anvayaH/
   devadattasyāpi tatraivānvayaḥ/ dhātvarthapākasya	devadattasya api tatra eva anvayaH/ DAtu arTa pAkasya
   karaṇatvasambandhena	karaNa tva sambanDena
   kṛtāvanvayaḥ/ svaniṣṭhakaraṇatānirūpakaudanoddeśyakatvasambandhena	kRtO= anvayaH/ sva nizWa karaNa tA nirUpaka odana uddeSyaka tva sambanDena
   pākasya kṛtāvanvaya iti paryavasyati/ tathā ca devadattasamavetā	pAkasya kRtO= anvayaH iti paryavasyati/ taTA ca devadatta samavetA
   taṇḍulakarmakapākānukūlā pākakaraṇikā kṛtiriti bodhaḥ/ aiteṣāṃ	taNxula karmaka pAka anukUlA pAka karaNikA kRtiH iti boDaH/ EtezAm
   mate ākhyātarthakṛtiḥ śābdabodhe mukhyaviśeṣyatayā bhāsate/ pākasya	mate AKyAtarTa kRtiH SAbda boDe muKya viSezya tayA BAsate/ pAkasya
   kṛtau karaṇatvaṃ ca kṛtiṃ prati uddeśyabhūtaudanakaraṇatvāt/ yatra tu	kRtO karaNa tvam ca kRtim prati uddeSya BUta odana karaNa tva at/ yatra tu
   dvitīyāntaṃ vinā pacati ityetāvanmātramuktam tatra dhātvarthapākasya	dvitIya antam vinA pacati iti etAvat mAtram uktam tatra DAtu arTa pAkasya
   karmatāsambanadhena kṛtāvanvayaḥ/ devadattasamavetā pākakarmikā	karma tA sambanaDena kRtO= anvayaH/ devadatta samavetA pAka karmikA
   kṛtiriti bodhaḥ/ caitreṇa odanaḥ pacyate ityatrāpi tṛtīyāyāḥ	kRtiH iti boDaH/ cEtreNaH odanaH pacyate iti atra api tRtIyAyAH
   kartṛtvamarthaḥ/ tasya svanirūpakapākānukūlatvasambandhena	kartR tvam arTaH/ tasya sva nirUpaka pAka anukUla tva sambanDena
   ākhyātārthakṛtāvanvayaḥ/ dhātvarthasya pākasya	AKyAta arTa kRtO= anvayaH/ DAtu arTasya pAkasya
   svakaraṇakaudanoddeśyakatvasambandhena kṛtāvanvayaḥ/ ākhyātasya tatra	sva karaNa ka odana uddeSyaka tva sambanDena kRtO= anvayaH/ AKyAtasya tatra
   karmatvaṃ bhāvanā cārthaḥ/ karmatve odanasyānvayaḥ/ karmatvasya	karma tvam BAvanA ca arTaH/ karma tve odanasya anvayaH/ karma tvasya
   svanirūpakapākānukūlatvasambandhena bhāvanāyāmanvayaḥ/ tathā ca	sva nirUpaka pAka anukUla tva sambanDena BAvanAyAm anvayaH/ taTA ca
   devadattakartṛkapākānukūlā odanakarmakapākānukūlā	deva datta kartRka pAka anukUlA odana karmaka pAka anukUlA
   pākakaraṇakaudanoddeśyikā bhāvenati śābdabodha iti/	pAka karaNa ka odana uddeSyikA BAvenati SAbda boDaH iti/
   pūrveṇānvaya iti/	pUrveNa anvayaH iti/
   tathā ca ca kartṛkarmagatā ekatvādisaṅkhyā kṛtiḥ kālaśca ākhyātārthaḥ/	taTA ca ca kartR karma gatA eka tva Adi saFKyA kRtiH kAlaH ca AKyAta arTaH/
   asmin mate anabhihite iti sūtrasya	asmin mate anaBihite iti sUtrasya
   kartṛkarmagatasaṅkhyāyāmanabhihitāyāmityarthaḥ/ atha vā kartṛtve	kartR karma gata saFKyAyAm anaBihitAyAm iti arTaH/ aTa vA kartR tve
   karmatve cānabhihite ityarthaḥ/ nātaḥ devadattaḥ pacati ityatra	karma tve ca anaBihite iti arTaH/ na atas devadattaH pacati iti atra
   devadattapadottaraṃ tṛtīyāyāḥ, taṇḍulaḥ pacyate ityatra	devadatta pada uttaram tRtIyAyAH, taNxulaH pacyate iti atra
   taṇḍulapadottaraṃ dvitīyāyā vā apattiḥ/ agre ca spaṣṭamidam/	taNxula pada uttaram dvitIyAyAH vA apattiH/ agre ca spazwam idam/
   kṛtyādiparigraha iti/ ādinā kālo gṛhyate/ paramateneti/	kRtyA Adi parigrahaH iti/ AdinA kAlaH gRhyate/ para matena iti/
   mīmāṃsakamatenetyarthaḥ/ 'kartā cākṣepalabhyaḥ' iti nyāyaprakāśādau	mImAMsaka matena iti arTaH/ akartA ca Akzepa laByaH a iti nyAya prakASa AdO
   nirūpitatvāt/	nirUpita tvAt/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   upasargāṇāṃ	upasargANAm
   dyotakatvam	dyotaka tvam
   prajayati ityādau	prajayati iti AdO
   dhātoreva prakarṣe śaktiḥ/ upasargāṇāṃ dyotakatvameva, na tatra śaktiḥ/	DAtoH eva prakarze SaktiH/ upasargANAm dyotaka tvam eva, na tatra SaktiH/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   upasargāṇāṃ	upasargANAm
   vācakatvamataṃ nirasyati prajayatītyādāviti/ nanu dhātunaiva	vAcaka tva matam nirasyati prajayati iti AdO= iti/ nanu DAtunA eva
   prakarṣāderbodhe praśabdādervaiyarthyamata āha	prakarza AdeH boDe praSabda AdeH vEyarTyam atas Aha
     upasargāṇāmiti/	 upasargANAm iti/
   dyotakatvam   tātparyagrāhakatvam/ tena 'itaranipātānām	dyotaka tvam  tAtparyagrAhaka tvam/ tena aitara nipAtAnAm
   vācakatvam' iti sūcitam/ tathā hi ekakārasya	vAcaka tvam a iti sUcitam/ taTA hi ekakArasya
   ayogavyavacchedor'thaḥ 'śaṅkhaḥ pāṇḍura eva' ityādau,	ayoga vyavacCedor aTaH aSaFKaH pANxuraH eva a iti AdO,
   anyayogavyavacchedaśca 'pārtha eva dhanurdhara' ityādau ityādikaṃ	anya yoga vyavacCedaH ca apArTaH eva DanurDara a iti AdO iti Adikam
   bahutaramūhanīyam/	bahutaram UhanIyam/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   tātparyagrāhakatvam	tAtparya grAhaka tvam
     yatra pra iti upasargaḥ dhātunā saha uccāryate tatra dhātoḥ prakarṣe	 yatra pra iti upasargaH DAtunA saha uccAryate tatra DAtoH prakarze
   tātparyamiti graho bhavati/ ataḥ dhātorarthaviśeṣe	tAtparyam iti grahaH Bavati/ atas DAtoH arTa viSeze
   tātparyagrahajanakatvamupasargāṇāmiti bhāvaḥ/ itaranipātānāmiti/	tAtparya graha janaka tvam upasargANAm iti BAvaH/ itara nipAtAnAm iti/
   upasargātiriktanipātānāmityarthaḥ/ ityādikaṃ	upasarga atirikta nipAtAnAm iti arTaH/ iti Adikam
   bahutaramūhanīyamiti/ 'nīlam sarojaṃ bhavatyeva' ityādau	bahutaram UhanIyam iti/ anIlam sarojam Bavati eva a ityAdO
   evakārasya atyantāyogavyavacchedor'tha ityūhanīyamityarthaḥ/	eva kArasya atyanta ayoga vyavacCedor aTa iti UhanIyam iti arTaH/
   atredaṃ bodhyam  	atra idam boDyam  
   evakārārthastrividhaḥ anyayogavyavacchedaḥ, ayogavyavacchedaḥ,	eva kAra arTaH triviDaH  anya yoga vyavacCedaH, ayoga vyavacCedaH,
   atyantāyogavyavacchedaśceti/ viśeṣyasaṅgataivakārasya	atyanta ayoga vyavacCedaH ca iti/ viSezya saFga tA eva kArasya
   anyayogavyavacchedor'thaḥ/ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdhara ityādau	anya yoga vyavacCedor aTaH/ yaTA pArTaH eva DanurDaraH iti AdO
   pārthānyasmin dhanurdhaṃratvayogo vyavacchidyate/ tatra anyaḥ, yogaḥ,	pArTAni asmin DanuH DaMratva yogaH vyavacCidyate/ tatra anyaH, yogaH,
   abhāvaśceti trayaḥ evakārasya pṛthak śakyāḥ/ anyaśabdārthaḥ bhedavān/	aBAvaH ca iti trayaH eva kArasya pRTak SakyAH/ anya Sabda arTaH BedavAn /
   bhede pārthasya pratiyogitāsambandhenānvayaḥ/ sambandharūpe yoge	Bede pArTasya pratiyogitA sambanDena anvayaH/ sambanDa rUpe yoge
   prakṛte tādātmyātmake pratiyogitvena dhunardhaṃrasyānvayaḥ/	prakRte tAdAtmya Atmake pratiyogi tvena DunarDaMrasya anvayaH/
   yogasyābhāve pratiyogitvenānvayaḥ/ abhāvasya svarūpasambandhena	yogasya aBAve pratiyogi tvena anvayaH/ aBAvasya svarUpa sambanDena
   anyasminnanvayaḥ/ evaṃ dhanurdharasya abhedasambandhena pārthe 'nvayaḥ/	anyasmin= anvayaH/ evam DanurDarasya aBeda sambanDena pArTe anvayaH/
   tathā ca	taTA ca
   pārthapratiyogikabhedavān (pārthānyaḥ)	pArTa pratiyogika BedavAn (pArTa anyaH)
   dhanurdharapratiyogikatādātmyābhāvavān (dhanurdharatvābhāvavān)	DanurDara pratiyogika tAdAtmya aBAvavAn (DanurDaratva aBAvavAn )
   pārthaḥ dhanurdharābhinnaśceti śābdabodho jāyate/ pārthasya	pArTaH DanurDara aBinnaH ca iti SAbda boDaH jAyate/ pArTasya
   viśeṣyatayā anyaviśeṣaṇatayā ca dvirbhānam/ evaṃ dhunardharasya	viSezya tayA anya viSezaNa tayA ca dvis BAnam/ evam DunarDarasya
   evakārārthayogaviśeṣaṇatayā pārthaviśeṣaṇatayā ca dvirbhānam/	eva kAra arTa yoga viSezaNa tayA pArTa viSezaNa tayA ca dvis BAnam/
   viśeṣaṇasaṅgataivakārasya ayogavyavacchedor'thaḥ/ yathā	viSezaNa saFga tA eva kArasya ayoga vyavacCedoH aTaH/ yaTA
   'śaṅkhaḥ pāṇḍara eva' ityādau śaṅkhe pāṇḍarāyogo vyavacchidyate/	aSaFKaH pANxaraH eva a ityAdO SaFKe pANxara ayogaH vyavacCidyate/
   tatraivakārasya yogābhāve abhāve ca śaktiḥ/ sambandhātmake yoge	tatra evakArasya yoga aBAve aBAve ca SaktiH/ sambanDa Atmake yoge
   pāṇḍarasya pratiyogitayā anvayaḥ/ yogābhāvasya pratiyogitayā	pANxarasya pratiyogi tayA anvayaH/ yoga aBAvasya pratiyogi tayA
   abhāve 'nvayaḥ/ abhāvasya svarūpasaṃbandhena śaṅkhe 'nvayaḥ/ tathā ca	aBAve anvayaH/ aBAvasya svarUpa saMbanDena SaFKe anvayaH/ taTA ca
   śaṅkhaḥ	SaFKaH
   pāṇḍarayogābhāvābhāvavān iti śābdabodhaḥ/	pANxara yoga aBAva aBAvavAn iti SAbda boDaH/
   kriyāsaṅgataivakārasya	kriyA saFga tEva kArasya
   atyantāyogavyavacchedor'thaḥ/ yathā 'nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva'	atyanta ayoga vyavacCedor aTaH/ yaTA anIlam sarojam Bavati eva a
   ityādau saroje	ityAdO saroje
   nīlabhavanātyantāyogo vyavacchidyate/ atyantatvaṃ abhāvaśca tatra	nIla Bavana atyanta ayogaH vyavacCidyate/ atyanta tvam aBAvaH ca tatra
   evakārārthaḥ/ atyantatvaṃ ca vyāpakatvam/ tacca	eva kAra arTaH/ atyanta tvam ca vyApaka tvam/ tat ca
   bhedapratiyogitānavacchedakatvam/ bhede	Beda pratiyogita anavacCedaka tvam/ Bede
   sarojasyādheyatāsambandhenānvayaḥ/ bhedapratiyogitānavacchedakatvasya	sarojasi ADeya tA sambanDena anvayaH/ Beda pratiyogita an avacCedaka tvasya
   pratiyogitayā	pratiyogitayA
   abhāve 'nvayaḥ/ abhāvasya	aBAve anvayaH/ aBAvasya
   svarūpasambandhena ayoge 'nvayaḥ/ evaṃ nīlakartṛkabhavanasya	svarUpa sambanDena ayoge anvayaH/ evam nIlakartRka Bavanasya
   nīlatvātmakasya ayogaikadeśe yoge pratiyogitvenānvayaḥ/ tathā ca	nIlatva Atmakasya ayoga eka deSe yoge pratiyogi tvena anvayaH/ taTA ca
   sarojaniṣṭhabhedapratiyogitānavacchedakatvābhāvavān	saroja nizWa Beda pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tva aBAvavAn
   nīlatvapratiyogikasambandhābhāvaḥ iti śābdabodhaḥ/	nIlatva pratiyogika sambanDa aBAvaH iti SAbda boDaH/
   nīlatvasambandhābhāve sarojatvavyāpakatvasyāsambhavena	nIlatva sambanDa aBAve saroja tu a vyApaka tvasya asamBavena
   sarojatvavyāpakatvaviśiṣṭāyogābhāvasya bodhayitumaśakyatvāt	saroja tu a vyApaka tva viSizwa ayoga aBAvasya boDayitum aSakyatvAt 
   ayoge sarojatvavyāpakatvavyavacchedabodho varṇita iti/ adhikam	ayoge saroja tu a vyApaka tva vyavacCeda boDaH varNitaH iti/ aDikam
   dīdhikārīyaivakārārthavivecane	dIDikArIya evakAra arTa vivecane
   jayarāmanyāyapañcānanakṛtapadārthamālāyāṃ ca draṣṭavyam/	jaya rAma nyAya paQcAnana kRta padArTa mAlAyAm ca drazwavyam/
   dīpikā	dIpikA
   padārthatattvajñānasya mokṣahetutvanirūpaṇam	padArTa tattva jQAnasya mokza hetu tva nirUpaNam
   padārthajñānasya	padArTa jQAnasya
   paramaprayojanaṃ mokṣaḥ/ tathā hi   'ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo	parama prayojanam mokzaH/ taTA hi  aAtmA vAre drazwavyaH SrotavyaH 
   mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' iti śrutyā śravaṇādīnāṃ	mantavyaH nidiDyAsitavyaH a iti SrutyA SravaNa AdInAm
   ātmasākṣātkārahetutvabodhanāt śruttā dehādivilakṣaṇātmajāne	Atma sAkzAtkAra hetu tva boDanAt SruttAH deha Adi vilakzaNa AtmajAne
   satyapyasambhāvanānivṛtteḥ yuktyanusandhānarūpamananasādhyatvāt/	sati api asamBAvanA nivRtteH yukti anusanDAna rUpamananasADya tvAt/
   mananopayogipadārthanirūpaṇadvārā śāstrasyāpi mokṣopayogitvam/	manana upayogi padArTa nirUpaNa dvArA SAstrasya api mokza upayogi tvam/
   tadanantaraṃ śrutyupadiṣṭayogavidhinā nididhyāsane kṛte tadanantaraṃ	tad anantaram Sruti upadizwa yoga viDinA nidiDi Asane kRte tad anantaram
   dehādiṃvilakṣaṇātmasākṣātkāre sati dehādau	deha AdiMvilakzaNa Atma sAkzAtkAre sati deha AdO
   ahamityabhimānarūpamithyājñānanāśe doṣābhāvāt pravṛttyabhāve	aham iti aBimAna rUpa miTyA ajQAna nASe doza aBAvAt pravRtti aBAve
   dharmādharmayorabhāve janmābhāve pūrvadharmādharmayoranubhavena nāśe	Darma aDarmayoH aBAve janma aBAve pUrva Darma aDarmayoH anuBavena nASe
   caramaduḥkhadhvaṃsalakṣaṇamokṣo jāyate/ jñānameva mokṣasādhanam/	carama duHKa DvaMsa lakzaNa mokzaH jAyate/ jQAnam eva mokza sADanam/
   mithyājñānanivṛtterjñānamātrasādhyatvāt/ 'tamevaṃ	miTyAjQAna nivRtteH jQAna mAtra sADya tva at/ atam evam
   viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti śrutyā	viditvA atimRtyum eti na anyaH panTAH vidyate ayanAya a iti SrutyA
   sādhanāntaraniṣedhācca/	sADana antara nizeDAt ca/
   prakāśikā	prakASikA
   prekṣāvatpravṛttaye	prekzAvat pravRttaye
   sakalakāmanāviṣayamuktiprayojanakatāṃ granthasya darśayati  	sakala kAmanA vizaya mukti prayojanaka tAm granTasya darSayati  
   padārthajñānasyeti/ padārthatattvajñānasyetyarthaḥ/	padArTa jQAnasya iti/ padArTa tattva jQAnasya iti arTaH/
   anyeṣāmavāntaraprayojanānāmapi sadbhāvādāha   parameti/	anyezAm avAntara prayojanAnAm api sadBAvAt Aha  parama iti/
   śruterayamarthaḥ    are mumukṣuṇā ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ mumukṣoḥ	SruteH ayam arTaH   are mumukzuNA AtmA drazwavyaH mumukzoH
   ātmadarśanamiṣṭasādhanamiti yāvat/ ātmadarśanopāyaṃ darśayati    	Atma darSanam izwa sADanam iti yAvat/ Atma darSana upAyam darSayati    
   śrotavya ityādinā/ ārtha krameṇa śābdakramaḥ tyakto bhavati,	SrotavyaH ityAdinA/ ArTa krameNa SAbda kramaH tyaktaH Bavati,
   'agnihotraṃ juhoti' 'yāvagūṃ pacati' ityādivat/	aagnihotram juhoti a ayAvagUm pacati a ityAdivat/
   asambhāvanānivṛtteriti/ aprāmāṇyajñānanivṛtterityarthaḥ/	asamBAvanA nivRtteH iti/ aprAmANya jQAna nivRtteH iti arTaH/
   yuktyanusandhāneti/ ayaṃ bhāvaḥ    yuktibhiranucintanaṃ mananam/ tacca	yukti anusanDAna iti/ ayam BAvaH   yuktiBiH anucintanam mananam/ tat ca
   ātmana itarabhinnatvenānumānam/ tacca	AtmanaH itara Binna tvena anumAnam/ tat ca
   bhedapratiyogītarajñānasādhyam/ tadarthaṃ sakalapadārthanirūpaṇamiti/	Beda pratiyogI itara jQAna sADyam/ tad arTam sakala padArTa nirUpaNam iti/
   mokṣopayogitvaṃ viśadayati     tadanantaramiti/	mokza upayogi tvam viSadayati    tad anantaram iti/
   mananānantaramityarthaḥ/	mananA anantaram iti arTaH/
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   sakalakāmanāviṣayeti/ apunarbhavarūpatvāt sarveṣāmapīṣṭaḥ yo	sakala kAmanA vizaya iti/ apunarBava rUpa tvAt sarvezAm api izwaH yaH 
   mokṣaḥ tatprayojanakatvamityarthaṃḥ/ yadapekṣayā anyat prayojanaṃ na	mokzaH tad prayojanaka tvam iti arTaMH/ yad apekzayA anyat prayojanam na
   bhavati tat paramaprayojanam/ yadapekṣayā anyat prayojanaṃ bhavati	Bavati tat parama prayojanam/ yad apekzayA anyat prayojanam Bavati
   tat avāntaraprayojanam/ prayojanāntarāsādhanatve sati prayojanatvaṃ	tat avAntara prayojanam/ prayojana antara asADana tve sati prayojana tvam
   paramaprayojanatvam/ prayojanāntarasādhanatve sati prayojanatvaṃ	parama prayojana tvam/ prayojana antara sADana tve sati prayojana tvam
   avāntaraprayojanatvam/ nanu"ātmā vā are	avAntara prayojana tvam/ nanu"AtmA vE are
   draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ"iti	drazwavyaH SrotavyaH"iti
   śrutau pāṭhakramānusāreṇa darśanasyaiva śravaṇasādhanatvamavagamyate na tu	SrutO pAWa krama anusAreNa darSanasya eva SravaNa sADana tvam avagamyate na tu
   śravaṇāderdarśanasādhanatvamityāśaṅkyāha   ārthakrameṇeti/	SravaNa AdeH darSana sADana tvam iti ASaFkya Aha  ArTa krameNa iti/
   prayojanavaśena yaḥ kramaḥ saḥ ārthakramaḥ/ yathā agnihotrayavāgūpākayoḥ/	prayojana vaSena yaH kramaH saH ArTa kramaH/ yaTA agni hotra yavAgU pAkayoH/
   atra hi yavāgvāḥ homaprayojanakatvena tatpākaḥ prayojanavaśena	atra hi yavAgvAH homa prayojanaka tvena tad pAkaH prayojana vaSena
   pūrvamanuṣṭhīyate/ padārthabodhakavākyānāṃ yaḥ kramaḥ saḥ pāṭhakramaḥ/	pUrvam anuzWIyate/ padArTa boDaka vAkyAnAm yaH kramaH saH pAWa kramaH/
   tena ca padārthānāṃ kamaḥ āśrīyate/ aprāmāṇyajñānanivṛtteriti/	tena ca padArTAnAm kamaH ASrIyate/ aprAmANya jQAna nivRtteH iti/
   śrutivāvayajanye dehādivilakṣaṇātmaviṣayakaśābdabodhātmakaśravaṇe	Sruti vAvayajanye deha Adi vilakzaNa Atma vizaya kaSAbda boDa Atmaka SravaNe

   'bhārāpagame sukhī saṃvṛtto 'ham' itivat duḥkhābhāve upacaryate/	aBAra apagame suKI saMvRttaH aham a iti vat duHKa aBAve upacaryate/

   balavattarasyeti/	balavattarasya iti/

   kāryatāvacchedakāvacchinnādhikaraṇaparam/ dvitīyasvapadaṃ	kArya tA avacCedaka avacCinnA aDikaraNa param/ dvitIya sva padam
   kāraṇatāvacchedakaparam/ evamuparitanasvapadāni	kAraNa tAvacCedaka param/ evam uparitana sva padAni
   kāraṇatāvacchedakadharmaparāṇi/	kAraNa tAvacCedaka Darma parANi/
   vyabhicāragrahauceti/ anvayavyabhicāragrahaḥ	vyaBicAra grahOceti/ anvaya vyaBicAra grahaH
   anvayasahacāragrahapratibandhakaḥ, vyatirekavyabhicāragrahaḥ	anvaya sahacAra graha pratibanDakaH, vyatireka vyaBicAra grahaH
   vyatirekasahacāragrahapratibandhaka ityarthaḥ/	vyatireka sahacAra graha pratibanDakaH iti arTaH/
   vighnadhvaṃsadvāreti/	viGna DvaMsa dvAra iti/
   svajanyavighnadhvaṃsasambandhenetyarthaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ ata eva	sva janya viGna DvaMsa sambanDena iti arTaH/ evam agre api/ atas eva
   vighnabahutve 'pi yatra balavattaramekaṃ maṅgalaṃ vartante tatrāpi	viGna bahu tve api yatra balavattaram ekam maFgalam vartante tatra api
   samāptirbhavati/ balavattaratvaṃ ca vaijātyaviśeṣaḥ/	samAptiH Bavati/ balavattara tvam ca vEjAtya viSezaH/
   [3] āhuḥ ityasvarassūcitaḥ/ tadbījantu	[3] AhuH iti asvarassu ucitaH/ tat bIjantu
   'sakṛduccaritaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛdevārthaṃ gamayati' iti nyāyāt ata	asakRt uccaritaH SabdaH sakRt eva arTam gamayati a iti nyAyAt ata
   ityādipadānāmāvṛttānāmarthadvayabodhakatvānupapattireva/ nanu	ityAdi padAnAm AvRttAnAm arTa dvaya boDaka tva anupapattiH eva/ nanu
   śiṣṭācārānumitaśrutibodhikartavyatākamityanena	Sizwa AcAra anumita Sruti boDi kartavya tAkam iti anena

   maṅgalakartavyatābodhakaśrutyanumāpakatvaṃ labhyate/ tacca noṃpapadyate/	maFgala kartavyatA boDaka Sruti anumApaka tvam laByate/ tat ca na uMpapadyate/
   śiṣṭācāramātrasya	Sizwa AcAra mAtrasya
   śrutibodhitāpravṛttapravṛttiviṣayatvalakṣaṇakartavyatārahitabhojanasādhāraṇatvāt/	Sruti boDita apravRtta pravRtti vizaya tva lakzaNa kartavya tA rahita Bojana sADAraNa tvAt/
   'snātvā bhuñjīta' ityādiḥ tatkartavyatābodhiketi vācyam/ tasyāḥ	asnAtvA BuQjIta a ityAdiH tad kartavyatA AboDikA iti vAcyam/ tasyAH
   bhojane snānottarakālīnatāmātravidhānaparatvāt/ bhojanasya	Bojane snAna uttara kAlI natA mAtra viDAna paratvAt/ Bojanasya
   rāgaprāptatayā tadvidhiparatvāsambhavāt/ 'aprāpte hi śāstramathavat'	rAga prApta tayA tad viDi paratva asamBavAt/ aaprApte hi SAstram aTavat a
   iti nyāyenetyāśayena śaṅkate   [1] nanu maṅgalasya kartavyatva	iti nyAyena iti ASayena SaFkate  [1] nanu maFgalasya kartavya tva
   iti/ kartavayatve kṛtividheyatve/ kiṃ śabdaḥ kṣepe/ tathā ca	iti/ kartavayatve kRti viDeya tve/ kim SabdaH kzepe/ taTA ca
   maṅgalakartavyatāpramitikaraṇaṃ na kimapītyarthaḥ/	maFgala kartavya tA pramiti karaNam na kim api iti arTaH/
   śiṣṭācārasyoktayuktyā śrutyanumāpakatvāsambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ/	Sizwa AcArasya ukta yuktyA Sruti anumApakatva asamBavAt iti BAvaH/
   yattu kartavyatvaṃ kṛtividheyatāprayojakatvamityarthaḥ iti,	yat tu kartavya tvam kRti viDeya tA prayojaka tvam iti arTaH iti,
   tadapahāsyam/ viṣayatātmakagauṇakarmārthakasya tavyādipratyayasya	tad apahAsyam/ vizaya tA Atmaka gONa karma arTakasya tavya Adi pratyayasya
   viṣayatāprayojakadharmavadarthakatāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt/ anyathā	vizaya tA prayojaka Darma vat arTaka tAyAm pramANa aBAva at/ anyaTA
   boddhavyaśabdādāvapi tathā prasaṅgāt/ ata eva [3] maṅgalasya	bodDavya Sabda AdO= api taTA prasaFga at/ atas eva [3] maFgalasya
   śrutibodhitakartavyatākatvaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ	Sruti boDita kartavya tAka tvam vyavasTApayitum
   śaṅkata ityavataraṇikādānamapi saṅgacchate/	SaFkataH iti avataraNikA dAnam api saFgacCate/
   aprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditaniścayānukūlasamīcīnayuktikathanaṃ	aprAmANyajQAnAnAskandita niScaya anukUla samIcIna yukti kaTanam
   vyavasthāpanam/ tumunaḥ icchaivārthaḥ/ tasya	vyavasTApanam/ tumunaH icCA eva arTaH/ tasya
   1svaviṣayasamānakartṛkatvasvaprayojyecchāviṣayatvobhayasambandhena	1sva vizaya samAna kartRka tva sva prayojya icCA vizaya tva uBaya sambanDena
   śaṅkāyāmanvayaḥ/	SaFkAyAm anvayaH/
   1. svaviṣayetyādi/	1. sva vizaya ityAdi/
   svaṃ vvavasthāpanecchā tadviṣayaḥ vyavasthāpanaṃ tatsamānakartṛkatvaṃ	svam vvavasTApana icCA tad vizayaH vyavasTApanam tad samAna kartRka tvam
   śaṅkāyām, tathā svaṃ vyavasthāpanecchā tatprayojyā	SaFkAyAm, taTA svam vyavasTApana icCA tat prayojyA
   śaṅgāviṣayakecchā tadviṣayatvaṃ ca śaṅkāyām/ maṅgalasya	SaFgA vizayaka icCA tad vizaya tvam ca SaFkAyAm/ maFgalasya

   kuryāmiti pūrvapakṣecchā jāyata iti bhāvaḥ/	kuryAm iti pUrva pakza icCA jAyate iti BAvaH/
   dīpikāyāṃ samādhatte 	dIpikAyAm samADatte 
   [1] śiṣṭetyādi/ hetusādhyādipradarśanapūrvakamanumānasvarūpaṃ	[1] Sizwa ityAdi/ hetu sADya Adi pradarSana pUrvakam anumAna svarUpam
   vivṛṇoti   [1] tathāhītyalaukikāvigītaśiṣṭācāraviṣayatvāditi/	vivRNoti  [1] taTA ahi iti alOkikA vigIta Sizwa AcAra vizaya tvAt iti/
   atrālaukikatvasamānādhikaraṇāvigītatvasamānādhikaraṇaśiṣṭācāraviṣayatvādityāśayaḥ/	atra alOkika tva samAna aDikaraNa avigIta tva samAna aDikaraNa Sizwa AcAra vizaya tvAt iti ASayaH/
   karmadhārayopari śrūyamāṇabhāvapratyayasya	karma DAraya upari SrUyamANa BAva pratyayasya
   pūrvapadārthatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇottarapadārthatāvacchedakabodhakatvavyutpatteḥ/	pUrva padArTa tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa uttara padArTa tAvacCedaka boDaka tva vyutpatteH/
   nanu śiṣṭācārānumitaśruterityatra	nanu Sizwa AcAra anumita SruteH iti atra

   bodhitaṃ na saṃghaṭate/ 'maṅgalaṃ śrutibodhitakartavyatākam'	boDitam na saMGawate/ amaFgalam Sruti boDita kartavyatAkam a
   ityanumitividheyatvasya śrutibodhitakartavyatākatva eva sattvāt/	iti anumiti viDeya tvasya Sruti boDita kartavya tAkatvaH eva sattva at /

   vidheyatvaṃ na svīkartuṃ śakyam/ tathā sati vahnitvamanumitamiti	viDeya tvam na svIkartum Sakyam/ taTA sati vahni tvam anumitam iti

   [3] atrāyamāśaya ityādinā/ anumiteḥ pūrvamasiddhatvāditi/	[3] atra ayam ASayaH ityAdinA/ anumiteH pUrvam asidDa tvAt iti/

   parvatīyavahnyādivadityavadheyam/	parvatIya vahni Adi vat iti avaDeyam/
   nanu [1] śiṣṭācāranumitarutereveti dīpikāvākyasthenaivakāreṇa	nanu [1] Sizwa AcAra numita ruteH eva iti dIpikA vAkya sTena evakAreNa
   tādṛśaśrutyatiriktasya maṅgalakartavyatāyāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ vyavacchidyate/	tAdRSa Sruti atiriktasya maFgala kartavyatAyAm pramANa tvam vyavacCidyate/

   anvayaḥ/ atra ca vidheḥ	anvayaH/ atra ca viDeH

   śrutibodhitakartavyatvavirahe vidhimantarā rāgataḥ prāptatvena	Sruti boDita kartavya tva virahe viDim antarA rAgataH prApta tvena

   ādipadena niṣphalatvapramāsaṅgrahaḥ/ tena 'nu kuryāt niṣphalam'	Adipadena nizPala tva pramAsaFgrahaH/ tena anu kuryAt nizPalam a
   ityādeḥ anuvādarūpatve vyutkramakṛtadarśādau na vyabhicāraḥ/	ityAdeH anuvAda rUpa tve vyutkrama kRta darSa AdO na vyaBicAraH/
   etatsarvamabhipretyāgre [4] saṅkṣepa ityuktam/	etat sarvam aBipretya agre [4] saFkzepaH iti uktam/
