   karoti tadvāraṇāya vedoktatvajñānaṃ pramārūpamiti bhāvaḥ/ [3]	karoti tad vAraNAya veda ukta tva jQAnam pramA rUpam iti BAvaH/ [3]
   ahiṃsādikartarīti/ 1atrāhiṃsāśabdena hiṃsāvirodhivyāpāro	ahiMsA Adi kartarIti/ 1atra ahiMsA Sabdena hiMsA viroDi vyApAraH

   svaviṣayasamānakartṛkatvasvaprayojyecchāviṣayatvobhayasaṃbandhena	sva vizaya samAna kartRka tva sva prayojya icCA vizaya tva uBaya saMbanDena

   vaiśiṣṭye tṛtīyā, tacca kathanānvitam/	vESizwye tRtIyA, tat ca kaTana anvitam/
   1. atrāhiṃsāśabdeneti/	1. atra ahiMsA Sabdena iti/

   [15] padasambandhitvāṃśasyeti/ na ca	[15] pada sambanDitva aMSasya iti/ na ca

   1abhidhānirūpitaviṣayatvasyāpi viṣayasya sattvāt abhidhīyaviṣayatvasya	1aBiDA nirUpita vizaya tvasya api vizayasya sattvAt aBiDIya vizaya tvasya

   vaktumucitamiti	vaktum ucitam iti
   tasyāḥ prakāravidhayā niveśo viphalaḥ, tathāpi"vyāvṛttirvyavahāro vā	tasyAH prakAra viDayA niveSaH viPalaH, taTA api"vyAvRttiH vyavahAraH vA
   lakṣaṇasya prayojanam"ityuktarītyā vyavahārasādhane viṣayatāyāḥ	lakzaNasya prayojanam "iti ukta rItyA vyavahAra sADane vizaya tAyAH
   vṛttyaniyāmakatayā hetutāvacchedakasambandhatvaṃ savivādamityabhiprāyaḥ/	vRtti aniyAmaka tayA hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa tvam sa vivAdam iti aBiprAyaH/
   na caivaṃ	na ca evam
   svasamānādhikaraṇavyāpyatāvacchedakaviṣayatārūpadharmāntaraghaṭitatvāt	sva samAna aDikaraNa vyApya tAvacCedaka vizaya tA rUpa Darma antara Gawita tvAt
   abhidheyatvatvasya vyāpyatānavacchedakatayā vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti	aBiDeya tva tvasya vyApya tAnavacCedaka tayA vyApya tva asidDiH iti
   vācyam/ abhidhāviṣayatvasya nirūpitatvasambandhenābhidhāviśiṣṭatvena	vAcyam/ aBiDA vizayatu asya nirUpita tva sambanDena aBiDA viSizwa tvena
   lakṣaṇatvādityāśayāditi/	lakzaNa tvAt iti a ASayAt iti/
   dīpikāyām [15] padārthān vibhajate iti/ vipūrvakabhajadhātoḥ	dIpikAyAm [15] padArTAn viBajate iti/ vipUrvaka Baja DAtoH
   svasamabhivyāhṛtadvitīyāntapadopasthāpyatāvacchedakavyāpyadharmaprakārakajñānajanakaśabdor'thaḥ/	sva samaBivyAhRta dvitIya anta pada upasTApya tAvacCedaka vyApya Darma prakAraka jQAna janaka Sabdor aTaH/
   dvitīyāntapadaupasthāpyatāvacchedakatvamupalakṣaṇam/ evamuttaratrāpi	dvitIya anta padOpasTApya tAvacCedaka tvam upalakzaNam/ evam uttaratra api
   bodhyam/ nanu pṛthivyādipadārthānāmanantatvāt kathaṃ padārthānāṃ	boDyam/ nanu pRTivI Adi padArTAnAm ananta tvAt kaTam padArTAnAm
   saptatvakathanaṃ saṃgrahe saṅgacchata ityāśaṅkya saptapadasya	saptatva kaTanam saMgrahe saFgacCate iti ASaFkya sapta padasya
   dravyatvādirūpasaptopādhyanyatamatatparatayā samādhatte prakāśikāyām	dravya tva Adi rUpa sapta upADi anyatama tatpara tayA samADatte prakASikAyAm
   [15] dravyatvādirūpā iti/ saptopādhaya iti/ nanvatropādhiṣu	[15] dravya tva Adi rUpA iti/ sapta upADayaH iti/ nanu atra upADizu
   kiṃ nāma saptatvam? na tāvat saṅkhyārūpaṃ sambhavati uktayukteḥ/	kim nAma sapta tvam? na tAvat saFKyA rUpam samBavati ukta yukteH/
   ekatvasya saṅkhyārūpatve 'pi dravyatvādiviśeṣaṇasaptatvasya	eka tvasya saFKyA rUpa tve api dravya tva Adi viSezaNa saptatvasya
   saṅkhyārūpatvāyogāt/ na ca bhramamādāya tadapapattiriti vācyam/	saFKyA rUpa tva ayogAt/ na ca Bramam AdAya tat apapattiH iti vAcyam/
   abhrāntānāṃ tādṛśabhramāsambhavena teṣāmupādhiṣu	aBrAntAnAm tAdRSa Brama asamBavena tezAm upADizu
   saptavyavahārānupapattiprasaṅgāt/ tathāpi ekamātravṛttidharma ekatvam/	sapta vya vahAra anupapatti prasaFgAt/ taTA api eka mAtra vRtti DarmaH eka tvam/
   ekamātravṛttitvaṃ ca	eka mAtra vRtti tvam ca
   1. abhidhānirūpiteti/	1. aBiDAni rUpitA iti/
   abhidhayā anirūpitaṃ viṣayatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ/	aBiDayA anirUpitam vizaya tvam yasya iti arTaH/
   abhidhīyaviṣayatvasyeti/ abhidhayā nirūpitaṃ yat viṣayatvaṃ	aBiDIya vizaya tvasya iti/ aBiDayA nirUpitam yat vizaya tvam
   tasyetyarthaḥ/	tasya iti arTaH/
   svavṛttitvasvabhinnavṛttitvobhayasambandhena	sva vRtti tva sva Binna vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena
   kiñcidviśiṣṭānyatvam/	kiQcid viSizwa anyatvam/
   svapratiyogivṛttitvasvānuyogivṛttitvobhayasambandhena	sva pratiyogi vRtti tva sva anuyogi vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena
   bhedavadanyatvaṃ vā/ tathā cāyamanugamaḥ	Beda vat anya tvam vA/ taTA ca ayam anugamaH
    svīyaikatvaprakāratānirūpitadravyatvaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatvasvīyaikatvaprakāratānirū	 svIya ekatva prakAra tA nirUpita dravya tva nizWa viSezya tva svIya eka tva prakAra tA nirU
   pitaguṇaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatvādyanyatamavaddharmaviśiṣṭatvaṃ saptatvam/	pita guNa nizWa viSezya tva Adi anyatama vat Darma viSizwa tvam sapta tvam/
   athātra	aTa atra
   svīyaikatvaprakāratānirūpitadravyatvādiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatvādisambandhāvacchinna	svIyA ekatva prakAra tA nirUpita dravya tva Adi nizWa viSezya tva Adi sambanDa avacCinna
   svaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedasaptakavattvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena	sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Beda saptakavat tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena
   viśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyam/ evaṃ ca tatrāpi bhedeṣu saptatvasyoktarityā	viSizwa tvam vAcyam/ evam ca tatra api Bedezu sapta tvasya ukta rityA
   apekṣābuddhiviśeṣasyaiva vaktavyatayā anavasthāprasaṅgāditi cet   na/	apekzA budDi viSezasya eva vaktavya tayA anavasTA prasaFgAt iti ced  na/
   atrāpekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvaṃ ca	atra apekzA budDi viSeza vizaya tvam ca
   dravyatvaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpita ekatvaniṣṭhaprakāratvaviśiṣṭaṃ	dravya tva nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitaH ekatva nizWa prakAra tva viSizwam
   yadguṇatvaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpita ekatvaniṣṭhaprakāratvaviśiṣṭaṃ	yat guNa tva nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitaH ekatva nizWa prakAra tva viSizwam
   tadādiviśiṣṭā ya buddhiḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhenatadvattvaṃ,	tad Adi viSizwA yaH budDiH viSezyatA sambanDenatadvat tvaM,
   viśiṣṭāyāstasyāḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhena dravyatvādāveva	viSizwAyAH tasyAH viSezyatA sambanDena dravya tva AdO= eva
   sattvopagamāt na samūhālambanajñānamādāyātiprasaṅgaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	sattva upagamAt na samUha Alambana jQAnam AdAya atiprasaFgaH/ vESizwyam
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandheneti/ [15]	sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena iti/ [15]

   dravyāṇītyādiretyarthaḥ/ dīpikāyām	dravyANi ityAdira iti arTaH/ dIpikAyAm
   adhikasaṃkhyāvyavacchedārthakatvāditi/ atrādhikasaṃkhyāśabdaḥ	aDika saMKyA vyavacCeda arTaka tvAt iti/ atra aDika saMKyA SabdaH
   aṣṭamapadārthaparaḥ/ vyavacchedo nāma niṣedhasiddhiḥ/ tathā ca 'trīn	azwama padArTa paraH/ vyavacCedaH nAma nizeDa sidDiH/ taTA ca atrIn
   brāhmaṇān ānaya' ityādau caturthādibrāhmaṇaniṣedhavat	brAhmaNAn Anaya a ityAdO caturTa Adi brAhmaNa nizeDa vat

   1svāśrayavṛttitvasvānāśrayavṛttitvobhayasambandhena	1sva ASraya vRtti tva svAn ASraya vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena
   prakṛtasaptatvaviśiṣṭasaṃkhyā adhikasakhyāpadārthaḥ/ [15] nanvatiriktaḥ	prakRta sapta tva viSizwa saMKyA aDika saKyA padArTaH/ [15] nanu atiriktaH
   padārtha iti/ yadyapi	padArTaH iti/ yadi api
   atiriktapadārtharūpadharmyaprasiddhiḥ pramitatvābhāvakoṇṭyaprasiddhiśceti	atirikta padArTa rUpa Darmya prasidDiH pramita tva aBAva koNwya prasidDiH ca iti
   vikalpo 'yaṃ nopapadyate, tathāpi pramitaḥ padārthaḥ	vikalpaH ayam na upapadyate, taTA api pramitaH padArTaH
   padārthavibhājakadharmaḥ atirikto vā na vetyarthaḥ/	padArTa viBAjaka DarmaH atiriktaH vA na vA iti arTaH/
   1. svāśrayavṛttitveti/	1. sva ASraya vRtti tva iti/
   svaṃ saptatvasaṃkhyā svāśrayāḥ saptapadārthāḥ tadvṛttitvaṃ	svam sapta tva saMKyA sva ASrayAH sapta padArTAH tad vRtti tvam
   aṣṭatvasaṃkhyāyām, evaṃ svaṃ saptatvaṃ tadanāśrayaḥ aṣṭamapadārthaḥ	azwatva saMKyA AyAm, evam svam sapta tvam tad anASrayaH azwama padArTaH
   tadvṛttitvaṃ aṣṭatvasaṃkhyāyām/	tad vRtti tvam azwatva saMKyAyAm/
   atiriktatvaṃ ca	atirikta tvam ca
   dravyatvādyabhāvatvāntānyatamādhikaraṇavṛttitvam/ tathā ca	dravya tva Adi aBAva tva anta anyatama aDikaraNa vRtti tvam/ taTA ca
   padārthavibhājakadharmaḥ tādṛśādhikaraṇavṛttirnavetyartho labhyata iti	padArTa viBAjaka DarmaH tAdRSa aDikaraNa vRttiH na vA iti arTaH laByate iti
   dharmiprasiddhyā koṭiprasiddhyā ca vikalpasiddhiḥ/	Darmi prasidDyA kowi prasidDyA ca vikalpa sidDiH/
   yattu	yat tu
   'dravyādibhedakūṭavattvasya tādṛśabhedakṭātmakasya	adravya Adi Beda kUwavat tvasya tAdRSa Beda kwa Atmakasya
   kūṭaghaṭakapratyekānatiriktatayā pramitapadārthavṛttitvābhāvasya	kUwa Gawaka pratyeka anatirikta tayA pramita padArTa vRtti tva aBAvasya
   durghaṭatvāt/ vikalpe 'nyatarakoṭerabādhitatvaniyamāt	durGawa tvAt/ vikalpe anyatara koweH a bADita tva niyamAt

   tādṛśakūṭādhikaraṇatvasya cāprasiddhatvāt kūṭatvasya durvacatvācca/	tAdRSa kUwa aDikaraNa tvasya ca aprasidDa tvAt kUwa tvasya durvaca tvAt ca/

   na/ bhedānāmekaviśiṣṭāparatvena niveśe 'prasiddhiprasaṅgena	na/ BedAnAm eka viSizwa aparatvena niveSe aprasidDi prasaFgena

   vyavacchedārthakatvāditi/	vyavacCeda arTaka tvAt iti/

   iti śaṅkanīyam/ ṣoḍaśapadārthānāṃ kḷptapadārthāntarbhāvasādhane	iti SaFkanIyam/ zoxaSa padArTAnAm k?pta padArTa antarBAva sADane
   tādṛśavyāptiniścayasyāvaśyāpekṣitatvāt/ [15] saṃgrahe dravyaguṇetyādi/	tAdRSa vyApti niScayasya avaSya apekzita tva at/ [15] saMgrahe dravya guNa ityAdi/

   vyutpattivaicitryāt/ 'padārthatvaṃ dravyādisaptānyatamatvavyāpyam'	vyutpatti vEcitryAt/ apadArTa tvam dravya Adi sapta anyatama tva vyApyam a

   cedadasmābhiranyatra/	cedat asmABiH anyatra/

   sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhena dravyabhedaviśiṣṭo yo guṇabhedaḥ	sAmAnADikaraNya saMbanDena dravya Beda viSizwaH yaH guNa BedaH

   tadviśiṣṭo yo 'yaṃ viśeṣabhedaḥ tadviśiṣṭo yo 'yaṃ samavāyabhedaḥ	tad viSizwaH yaH ayam viSeza BedaH tad viSizwaH yaH ayam samavAya BedaH

   tasyābhāvatvāvacchinnānuyogitākasvarūpasaṃbandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva	tasya aBAva tva avacCinna anuyogi tAka svarUpa saMbanDa avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva

   pratyekaṃ vartate/ asmatpakṣe tu tādṛśabhedaṃ prati	pratyekam vartate/ asmat pakze tu tAdRSa Bedam prati
   tādṛśasaṃbandhasya	tAdRSa saMbanDasya
   vyadhikaraṇatayā	vyaDikaraNa tayA

   sudhībhiḥ vibhāvanīyam/ [16] vastutastvityādi/ idamatra	suDIBiH viBAvanIyam/ [16] vastutas tu ityAdi/ idam atra

   upapādanāyaiva/	upapAdanAya eva/
   dravyavibhāgaḥ	dravya viBAgaH
   [22] dravyamiti jātyekavacanamiti/ nanvatra kiṃ	[22] dravyam iti jAti eka vacanam iti/ nanu atra kim

   itāvacchedaka 	itAvat Cedaka

   prakṛtyarthe 'nvayaḥ/ sā ca svāśrayāśrayatvasambandhena/ ekatvamanyatrāpi	prakRti arTe anvayaH/ sA ca sva ASraya ASraya tva sambanDena/ eka tvam anyatra api
   bodhyam/	boDyam/
   1. svāśrayatveti/ svaṃ	1. sva ASrayatva iti/ svam
   ekatvam, tadāśrayatvaṃ prakṛtyarthe paśau, evaṃ svaṃ ekatvaṃ tadvṛttiḥ	eka tvam, tad ASraya tvam prakRti arTe paSO, evam svam eka tvam tad vRttiH
   paśumadbhedaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ ca paśau/ svakaraṇaketyatra	paSumadBedaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam ca paSO/ sva karaNa ka iti atra

   [24] mīmāṃsakamatamityādi/ dūṣaṇaṃ	[24] mImAMsakamatam iti Adi/ dUzaNam
   anupapannatvaprakārakajñānānukūlayuktikathanam/ tumuna icchaivārthaḥ,	anupapanna tva prakAraka jQAna anukUla yukti kaTanam/ tumunaH icCA eva arTaH,
   tasyāḥ upanyāse 1pūrvavadevānvayaḥ/ [24] atiriktatvaṃ	tasyAH upanyAse 1pUrvavat eva anvayaH/ [24] atirikta tvam
   vyasthāpayitum ityatrāpi uktarītireva/ nirākaraṇaṃ tu	vyasTApayitum iti atra api ukta rItiH eva/ nirAkaraNam tu
   abhāvaprakārakajñānānukūlaśabdaḥ/ [24] antarbhāvamityatra	aBAva prakAraka jQAna anukUla SabdaH/ [24] antarBAvam iti atra
   dvitīyāyāḥ pratiyogitvamarthaḥ/ tasya nirākaraṇaikadeśe 'bhāve 'nvayaḥ/	dvitIyAyAH pratiyogi tvam arTaH/ tasya nirAkaraNa eka deSe aBAve anvayaH/
   dīpikāyāñ [24] pratītibalādityatra balaśabdena	dIpikAyAn [24] pratIti balAt iti atra bala Sabdena
   viṣayasādhakatvaṃ dyotyate/ ataḥ tasyā bhramatve na viṣayasādhakatvamiti	vizaya sADaka tvam dyotyate/ atas tasyAH Brama tve na vizaya sADaka tvam iti
   śaṅkānirāsāyābādhitetyuktam/ nīletyādi/ atra ca	SaFkA nirAsAya AbADitA iti uktam/ nIla ityAdi/ atra ca
   dravyasādhakahetudvayakathanaṃ 2nyūnādhikadṛṣṭāntamabhisandhāya/ [24]	dravya sADaka hetu dvaya kaTanam 2nyUna aDika dRzwAntam aBisanDAya/ [24]
   kālikādisambandheneti/ atrādipadena viṣayatāsambandhasya	kAlikA Adi sambanDena iti/ atra Adi padena vizaya tA sambanDasya
   parigrahaḥ/ na tu daiśikaviśeṣaṇatāyāḥ, tathā sati mūrteṣu	parigrahaH/ na tu dESika viSezaNa tAyAH, taTA sati mUrtezu
   sādhyasattvena vyabhicārānavakāśāt/ [24] atiprasaktatve 'pīti/	sADya sattvena vyaBicAra anavakASAt/ [24] ati prasakta tve api iti/
   janyaguṇadāvityādiḥ/ dravyatve siddhe satīti/ atra dravyatva iti	janya guNa dO= itya AdiH/ dravya tve sidDe satIti/ atra dravya tvaH iti
   saptamyāḥ anumitirūpasiddhirarthaḥ/ tasyā uttarakālīnatvasambandhena	saptamyAH anumiti rUpa sidDiH arTaH/ tasyAH uttaraka AlIna tva sambanDena
   nirākaraṇe 'nvayaḥ/ dīpikāyām [23] tamaso	nirAkaraNe anvayaH/ dIpikAyAm [23] tamasaH 
   nākāśādipañcake 'ntarbhāva iti/	na AkASa Adi paQcake antarBAvaH iti/

   ākāśādyanantarbhūntatvasādhakatvaṃ sambhavati, 3vyabhicārāt/	AkASa Adi anantarBUnta tva sADaka tvam samBavati, 3vyaBicArAt/

   1. pūrvavadevānvaya	1. pUrvavat eva anvaya

   sādhyābhāvavati ākāśādau sparśābhāvasattvāt vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ/	sADya aBAvavati AkASa AdO sparSa aBAva sattvAt vyaBicAraH iti arTaH/
   [24] viṣamavyāptamiti/ viṣamavyāptatvaṃ ca	[24] vizam avyAptam iti/ vizama vyApta tvam ca

   [33] lakṣaṇatāvacchedakatvābhimatasaṃbandhena	[33] lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka tva aBimata saMbanDena
   yatkiñcillakṣyāvṛttitvamityartha iti/	yat kiQcit lakzya AvRtti tvam iti arTaH iti/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇābhāvīyalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitve	lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa aBAvIya lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tve
   sati	sati
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇanirūpitalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasaṃbandhenādheyatvamavyāptiriti	lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa nirUpita lakzaNa tAvacCedaka saMbanDena ADeya tvam avyAptiH iti
   niṣkarṣaḥ/ anyathā yathāśrute	nizkarzaH/ anyaTA yaTASrute
   lakṣyaikadeśamātrasādhāraṇānugatānatiprasaktasya durvacatayā	lakzya eka deSa mAtra sADAraNa anugata anati prasaktasya durvacatayA
   asambhavāpatteḥ/ asambhavino vāraṇāya dvitīyadalam,	asamBava ApatteH/ asamBavinaH vAraNAya dvitIya dalam,
   gandhādisallakṣaṇavāraṇāya prathamadalam, pṛthivyādaiṃ saṃyogādinā	ganDa Adi sat lakzaNa vAraNAya praTama dalam, pRTivI AdEm saMyoga AdinA
   gandhādyabhāvasya sattvāt abhāvapratiyogitāyāṃ	ganDa Adi aBAvasya sattvAt aBAva pratiyogitAyAm
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/ kālikasambandhena	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva niveSaH/ kAlika sambanDena
   gavāvṛttāvekaśaphādau tadvāraṇāya dvitīyadalaghaṭakādheyatāyāṃ	gavAvRttO= eka SaPa AdO tad vAraNAya dvitIya dala Gawaka ADeya tAyAm
   tatsambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/	tad sambanDa avacCinna tva niveSaH/
   na caivamapi	na ca evam api
   gandhaghaṭobhayābhāvaghaṭādivṛttitvaviśiṣṭagandhādyabhāvāderghaṭādau	ganDa Gawa uBaya aBAva Gawa Adi vRtti tva viSizwa ganDa Adi aBAva AdeH Gawa AdO
   sattvāt taddoṣatādavasthyamiti vācyam/	sattvAt tad doza tAdavasTyam iti vAcyam/
   tādṛśābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaḥ tādṛśādheyatāvacchedakaśca yo	tAdRSa aBAva pratiyogi tAvacCedakaH tAdRSa ADeya tAvacCedakaH ca yaH 
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakadharmaḥ tasya vivakṣitatvāt/ yadyapi	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka DarmaH tasya vivakzita tva at/ yadi api
   tādṛśābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ ghaṭatvagandhatvādikamapi, tathāpi	tAdRSa aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCedakam Gawa tva ganDa tva Adikam api, taTA api
   tādṛśapratiyogitāvacchedakatāparyāptyadhikaraṇatvavivakṣayā na doṣaḥ/	tAdRSa pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tA paryApti aDikaraNa tva vivakzayA na dozaH/
   [33] alakṣye lakṣaṇasyeti/ 1viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣeṇa	[33] alakzye lakzaNasya iti/ 1viSezaNa tA viSezeNa
   lakṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedavannirūpitalakṣaṇatāghaṭakasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvamityarthaḥ/	lakzya tAvacCedaka avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda vat nirUpita lakzaNa tA Gawaka sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tvam iti arTaH/
   ghaṭādau ghaṭādibhedāsattvāt gandhādaiṃ nātivyāptiḥ/ na vā kālikena	Gawa AdO Gawa Adi Beda asattvAt ganDa AdEm na ati vyAptiH/ na vA kAlikena
   jalādau gandhasattvamādāya/	jala AdO ganDa sattvam AdAya/
   viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣeṇetyasya bhedavatve 'nvayaḥ/	viSezaNa tA viSezeNa iti asya Bedava tve anvayaH/
   nāpi pṛthivyādāveva	na api pRTivI AdO= eva
   pṛthivyādibhedasya kālikasaṃbandhena sattvāt taddoṣatādavasthyam/	pRTivI Adi Bedasya kAlika saMbanDena sattvAt tad doza tAdavasTyam/
   lakṣyamātrāvṛttitvamiti dīpikāvākyāt	lakzya mAtra AvRtti tvam iti dIpikA vAkyAt 
   mātrapadasyetaravyavacchedaparatve	mAtra padasya itara vyavacCeda paratve
   lakṣyetarāvṛttitvaviśiṣṭalakṣyavṛttitvaṃ syābhāvaḥ asambhava iti	lakzya itara AvRtti tva viSizwa lakzya vRtti tvam syABAvaH asamBavaH iti
   labhyate/ tacca na yujyate   ativyāptadharme 'tiprasaṅgāt ityataḥ	laByate/ tat ca na yujyate  ati vyApta Darme ati prasaFgAt iti atas 
   prakāśikāyāṃ mātrapadaṃ kṛtsnārthakatayā vyācaṣṭe [33] mātrapadamiti/ [33]	prakASikAyAm mAtra padam kRtsnA arTaka tayA vyAcazwe [33] mAtra pada miti/ [33]
   sambandhaviśeṣetyādi/	sambanDa viSeza ityAdi/
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnodheyatāpratiyogitākasvarūpamevātrasaṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ/	lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna uDeya tA pratiyogi tAka svarUpam eva atra saMbanDa viSezaH/
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnādheyatāpratiyogikasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnalakṣyavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākā 	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA pratiyogika svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna lakzya vRtti tva tva avacCinna pratiyogitAkA 
   bhāvo 'sambhava iti	BAvaH asamBavaH iti
   paryavasitam/ tena dvitvādyavacchinnādheyatāpratiyogitākasvarūpasya	paryavasitam/ tena dvi tva Adi avacCinna ADeya tA pratiyogi tAka svarUpasya
   guṇādivṛttitvaṃ prati vyadhikaraṇatvāt/ atra ca mātrapadasya	guNa Adi vRtti tvam prati vyaDikaraNa tvAt/ atra ca mAtrapadasya
   samabhivyāhṛtapadārthatāvacchedakavyāpakatvārthakatayā	samaBivyAhRta padArTa tAvacCedaka vyApaka tva arTaka tayA
   nirūpakatāsambandhāvacchinnalakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvaṃ ādheyatve	nirUpa katA sambanDa avacCinna lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tvam ADeya tve
   labhyate/ tathā satyativyāptadharme 'tiprasaṅgāt	laByate/ taTA satyati vyApta Darme ati prasaFgAt 
   yāvatyo lakṣyavyaktayaḥ	yAvatyaH lakzya vyaktayaH
   tattadvyaktitvābhāvakūṭavattvaṃ tu durjñeyam, vinigamanāvirahābhyāṃ	tad tad vyakti tva aBAva kUwa vat tvam tu durjQeyam, vinigamanA virahAByAm
   vivakṣitumaśakyaṃ cetyālocya etat [33]	vivakzitum aSakyam ca iti AlocyaH etat [33]
   lakṣyavṛttitvasāmānyābhāvasphorakamiti/	lakzya vRtti tva sAmAnya aBAva sPorakam iti/
   vastutastu	vastutas tu
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakābhāvīyalakṣaṇatāghaṭasambandhāvacchinnaprati	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka aBAvIya lakzaNa tA Gawa sambanDa avacCinna prati
   yogitāvacchedakalakṣaṇatāvacchedaka 	yogi tA avacCedaka lakzaNa tAvacCedaka 
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakadharmavattvamasambhavaḥ/ lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvaṃ	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka Darmavat tvam asamBavaH/ lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tvam
   ca	ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakadhamravattvam,	lakzya tAvacCedaka samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka Damravat tvam,
   na tu tādṛśābhāvāpratiyogitvam; sarveṣāmeva	na tu tAdRSa aBAva apratiyogi tvam; sarvezAm eva
   dvitvādyavacchinnapratiyogitayā asambhavāpatteḥ/ etena viśeṣarūpeṇa	dvi tva Adi avacCinna pratiyogi tayA asamBava ApatteH/ etena viSeza rUpeNa
   saṃsargatvānabhyupagame 'pi na kṣatiḥ/	saMsarga tva anaByupagame api na kzatiH/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakatāghaṭakasambandhādinā	lakzyatA avacCedaka tA Gawaka sambanDa AdinA
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādiprakāreṇaivādhikaraṇapraveśaḥ/ tena sambandhāntareṇa	lakzya tAvacCedaka Adi prakAreNa eva aDikaraNa praveSaH/ tena sambanDa antareNa
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādyadhikaraṇamādāya na doṣaḥ/ na vānavasthā/	lakzya tAvacCedaka Adi aDikaraNam AdAya na dozaH/ na vA anavasTA/
   [33] ekaśaphavattvamitīti/ yadyapi śate	[33] eka SaPa vat tvam iti iti/ yadi api Sate
   pañcāśannyāyena gavāderapyekaśaphavattvamakṣatam, tathāpyekatvamatra na	paQcASat nyAyena gavA AdeH api eka SaPavat tvam akzatam, taTA api eka tvam atra na
   saḍkhyārūpam/ api tu svāśrayapādavṛttitvasvabhinnatvobhayasambandhena	saxKyA rUpam/ api tu sva ASraya pAda vRtti tva su a Binna tva uBaya sambanDena
   śaphaviśiṣṭānyatvarūpaṃ pāribhāṣikaṃ jñeyam/ ativyāptiśarīre	SaPa viSizwa anyatva rUpam pAriBAzikam jQeyam/ ati vyApti SarIre
   lakṣyavṛttitvaniveśanamanāvaśyakamityabhiprāyeṇa [33] duṣṭasaṅkarepīti,	lakzya vRtti tva niveSanam anAvaSyakam iti aBiprAyeNa [33] duzwa saFkara Ipi iti,
   nyāyāditi/ duṣṭasvarūpaikye 'pi	nyAyAt iti/ duzwa svarUpa Ekye api
   doṣasvarūpayoḥ parasparaṃ bhinnatvāt tanniveśanamanāvaśyakamiti	doza svarUpayoH parasparam Binna tvAt tat niveSanam anAvaSyakam iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   atra kvacit	atra kvacid 
   prācīnagrantheṣu digiti dṛśyate/ tatra cāyaṃ bhāvaḥ  	prAcIna granTezu diS iti dRSyate/ tatra ca ayam BAvaH  
   asambhavinyekaśaphavattvādau 'idamatrātivyāptam' iti	asamBavinI eka SaPa vat tva AdO aidam atra ati vyAptam a iti
   vyavahārābhāvāt lakṣyavṛttitvamavaśyaṃ niveśanīyamiti na	vyavahAra aBAvAt lakzya vRtti tvam avaSyam niveSanIyam iti na
   tatroktanyāyāvakāśaḥ/ ekatrāsambhavina evānyatra vyavahāre	tatra ukta nyAya avakASaH/ ekatra asamBavinaH eva anyatra vyavahAre
   bādhakābhāvāt tatroktanyāyāvakāśa iti/	bADaka aBAvAt tatra ukta nyAya avakASaH iti/
   lakṣaṇalakṣaṇavicāraḥ	lakzaNa lakzaNa vicAraH
   nanu [30] 'etaddūṣaṇatrayarahito dharma' iti dīpikāvākyāt	nanu [30] aetat dUzaNa traya rahitaH Darma a iti dIpikA vAkyAt 
   tādṛśadoṣatrayatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāva eva lakṣaṇalakṣaṇamiti	tAdRSa dozatraya tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvaH eva lakzaNa lakzaNam iti
   labhyate/ tacca na yujyate/ avyāptyādipratyekadoṣagrastadharmeṃ'pi	laByate/ tat ca na yujyate/ avyApti Adi pratyeka doza grasta DarmeM api
   tatsattvenātivyāpteḥ ityata āha [38] uktadūṣaṇābhāvatrayaviśiṣṭa	tad sattvena ati vyApteH iti atas Aha [38] ukta dUzaNa aBAva traya viSizwa
   ityartha iti/ yāvat pratyekādhikaraṇasyaiva kūṭādhikaraṇatvāt na	iti arTaH iti/ yAvat pratyeka aDikaraNasya eva kUwa aDikaraNa tvAt na
   doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ [38] avyāptyādītyādipadenāsambhavaparigrahaḥ/	dozaH iti BAvaH/ [38] avyApti Adi iti Adi padena asamBava parigrahaH/
   [38] anyādṛśamiti/ tathā ca asādhāraṇapadaṃ vakṣyamāṇārthe	[38] anyAdRSam iti/ taTA ca asADAraNa padam vakzyamANa arTe
   pāribhāṣikamiti/ sādhāraṇaṃ na bhavatītyasādhāraṇaṃ iti vyutpattyā	pAriBAzika miti/ sADAraNam na Bavati iti asADAraNam iti vyutpattyA
   sādhāraṇapadārthaḥ lakṣyavṛttitvaviśiṣṭālakṣyavṛttitvarūpaḥ	sADAraNa padArTaH lakzya vRtti tva viSizwa Alakzya vRtti tva rUpaH
   tadabhāvarūpāsādhāraṇapadārthasya yaugikasyāvyāptyasambhavagrastayoḥ	tad aBAva rUpa asADAraNa padArTasya yOgikasya avyApti asamBava grastayoH
   sattvena tādṛśārthānupapattiḥ, kiṃ ca 'etaddūṣaṇatrayarahitadharmo	sattvena tAdRSa arTa anupapattiH, kim ca aetat dUzaNa traya rahita DarmaH 
   lakṣaṇam'	lakzaNam a
   iti granthena virodhaśca ityasvārasyadvayaṃ manasi nidhāya	iti granTena viroDaH ca iti asvArasya dvayam manasi niDAya
   pāribhāṣikaṃ nirvaktītyapi bodhyamiti	pAriBAzikam nirvakti iti api boDyam iti
   prakāśikāvataraṇikātātparyam/ 'avyāptyasambhavagrastayorvāraṇāya	prakASikAvataraNi kAtAt paryam/ aavyApti asamBava grastayoH vAraNAya
   satyantam' iti	satyantam a iti
   pāṭhaḥ prāmādikaḥ/	pAWaH prAmAdikaH/
   ekaśaphavattvādirūpasyāsambhavinaḥ	eka SaPa vat tva Adi rUpasya asamBavinaH
   svavyāpakatatkatvarūpalakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvaviraheṇa	sva vyApaka tatkatva rUpa lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApya tva viraheNa
   tatrāvyāptyaprasakteḥ/ [38] avyāptasyeti prācīnakośeṣu pāṭho	tatra avyAptyaprasakteH/ [38] avyAptasya iti prAcInakoSezu pAWaH 
   dṛśyate/ sa eva yuktaḥ/	dRSyate/ saH eva yuktaH/
   yattu   pṛthivyādikaṃ	yat tu  pRTivI Adikam
   samavāyena lakṣaṇamityādāvasambhavini gaganadāvativyāptiḥ/	samavAyena lakzaNam iti AdO= asamBavini gagana dO= ati vyAptiH/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakābhāvavadvṛttitvarūpasya lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvasya	lakzya tAvacCedaka aBAvavat vRtti tva rUpasya lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tvasya
   tatra	tatra
   sattvāt ityavyāptyasambhavagrastayoriti pāṭho 'pi sādhuriti   tanna	sattvAt iti avyApti asamBava grastayoH iti pAWaH api sADuH iti  tat na
     abhidheyatvādāvativyāpteḥ vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ asaṅgatiprasaṅgāt	 aBiDeya tva At O= ati vyApteH vakzyamANAyAH asaFgati prasaFgAt 
   svavyāpakatatkatvarūpavyāpyatvasyāvaśyaṃ niveśanīyatayā	sva vyApaka tatkatva rUpa vyApya tvasya avaSyam niveSanIya tayA
   tatpāṭhasādhutvāsambhavāt/ yadi ca tatpāṭhasādhutve 'pyāgrahaḥ, tadā	tad pAWa sADutva asamBavAt/ yadi ca tad pAWa sADu tve api AgrahaH, tadA
   svābhāvavadvṛttitvasambandhāvacchinna	svABAvavat vRtti tva sambanDa avacCinna
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhapratiyogitāvacchedakaniṣṭhābhāvīyasvasamānādhikaraṇabheda 	lakzya tA avacCeda kanizWa pratiyogi ta avacCeda kanizWA BAvIya svasamAna aDikaraNa Beda 
   pratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitvarūpavyāpyatvasya	pratiyogita avacCedaka tva sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tva rUpa vyApya tvasya
   niveśena tadupapādanīyam/ [38]	niveSena tad upapAdanIyam/ [38]
   sa evāsādhāraṇa dharma ityucyata	saH eva asADAraNa DarmaH iti ucyata
   iti dīpikāvākyāt asādhāraṇatve sati dharmatvamiti labhyate, tatra	iti dIpikA vAkyAt asADAraNa tve sati Darma tvam iti laByate, tatra
   dharmatvāṃśasya niveśanamaphalam avṛttigaganādeḥ	Darma tva aMSasya niveSa nam aPalam avRtti gagana AdeH
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvavirahāt tatrāvyāpteraprasarāt ataḥ	lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tva virahAt tatra avyApteH aprasarAt atas 
   tatpadasya sārthakyamāha   [38] dharmapadamiti/ [38]	tad padasya sArTakyam Aha  [38] Darma pada miti/ [38]
   lakṣaṇatāghaṭakasambandheneti/ lakṣyatāvacchedakasambandhena	lakzaNa tA Gawaka sambanDena iti/ lakzya tAvacCedaka sambanDena
   lakṣyatāvacchedakādhikaraṇavṛttyabhāvīyalakṣaṇatāvacchedakasaṃbandhāvacchinnapratiyogitānavacchedakaḥ	lakzya tAvacCedaka aDikaraNa vRtti aBAvIya lakzaNa tAvacCedaka saMbanDa avacCinna pratiyogitAnavacCedakaH
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasambandhena	lakzaNa tAvat Cedaka sambanDena
   svāvacchinnādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitānavacchedaka	sva avacCinna aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogitAn avacCedaka
   kṣyatāvacchedakakaśca yo lakṣaṇatāvacchedakadharmaḥ tadvattvaṃ	kzyatA avacCedakakaH ca yaH lakzaNa tAvacCedaka DarmaH tadvat tvam
   vivakṣaṇīyamityarthaḥ/ [38] vyāpakatvādityādinā vyāpyatvaparigrahaḥ/	vivakzaNIyam iti arTaH/ [38] vyApaka tvAt ityAdinA vyApya tva parigrahaH/
   tathā ca lakṣyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭa lakṣaṇatāvacchedakavattvaṃ	taTA ca lakzya tAvacCedaka viSizwa lakzaNa tA avacCedakavat tvam
   asādhāraṇatvamiti niṣkarṣaḥ/ vaiśiṣyaṃ ca	asADAraNa tvam iti nizkarzaH/ vESizyam ca
   svavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasvādhikaraṇavṛttyabhāvīyatādṛśapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhā 	sva vRtti Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sva aDikaraNa vRtti aBAvIyatAdRSa pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA 
   vacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvobhayasambandhena/	vacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva uBaya sambanDena/
   1avacchedakatvaṃ lakṣaṇatāghaṭakasambandhena	1avacCedaka tvam lakzaNa tA Gawaka sambanDena
   1. avacchadekatvamiti/	1. avacCat eka tvam iti/
   prathamasambandhaghaṭakamavacchedakatvamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca	praTama sambanDa Gawakam avacCedaka tvam iti arTaH/ taTA ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedake	lakzya tAvacCedake
   gotve yo bhedaḥ sāsnāditvavadbhedaḥ, tathā hi svaṃ sāsnāditvarūpaṃ	go tve yaH BedaH sAsnAdi tva vat BedaH, taTA hi svam sa AsnAdi tva rUpam
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakaṃ tadavacchinnasya sāsnādeḥ	lakzaNa tAvacCedakam tad avacCinnasya sAsnAdeH
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakasamavāyasambandhena yadadhikaraṇaṃ goḥ	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka samavAya sambanDena yat aDikaraNam goH
   tadvṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasya gotve 'bhāvāt	tad vRtti Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvasya go tve aBAvAt 
   tādṛśabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakattvasambandhena na sāsnāditvavat	tAdRSa Beda pratiyogita avacCeda kattva sambanDena na sAsnAdi tva vat 
   gotvaṃ iti gotvavṛttiḥ sāsnāditvavadbhedaḥ bhavati	go tvam iti go tva vRttiH sAsnAdi tva vat BedaH Bavati
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ sāsnāditve/ evaṃ svaṃ gotvaṃ	tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam sAsnAdi tve/ evam svam go tvam
   tadadhikaraṇavṛtyabhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ sāsnādittve nāstīti	tad aDikaraNa vRtya BAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvam sAsnA Adi ttve na asti iti
   tādṛśapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhena gotvavadbhedaḥ	tAdRSa pratiyogita avacCedaka tva sambanDena gotva vat BedaH
   sāsnāditve 'stīti ubhayasambandhena lakṣyatāvacchedakagotvaviśiṣṭatvaṃ	sAsnAdi tve asti iti uBaya sambanDena lakzya tAvacCedaka go tva viSizwa tvam
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedake sāsnāditve draṣṭavyam/ evaṃ ca	lakzaNa tAvat Cedake sa AsnAdi tve drazwavyam/ evam ca
   prathamadvitīyatṛtīyasva padāni lakṣyatāvacchedakaparāṇi, caturthasvapadaṃ	praTama dvitIya tRtIyasva padAni lakzya tAvacCedaka parANi, caturTa sva padam
   lakṣaṇatāvacchedakaparamiti vivekaḥ/	lakzaNa tAvacCedaka param iti vivekaH/
   svāvacchinnādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhena/	sva avacCinna aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva saMbanDena/
   saṃyogādināṃ gandhādyabhāvavāraṇāya vyāpakatāyāṃ	saMyoga AdinAm ganDa Adi aBAva vAraNAya vyApaka tAyAm
   lakṣaṇatāghaṭakasaṃbandhāvacchinnatvaniveśaḥ/ jalādau kālikādinā	lakzaNa tA Gawaka saMbanDa avacCinna tva niveSaH/ jala AdO kAlikA AdinA
   gandhādisattvāt vyāpyatāyāṃ tanniveśaḥ/ anyacca svayamūhyam/ [38]	ganDa Adi sattvAt vyApyatAyAm tad niveSaH/ anyat ca svayam Uhyam/ [38]
   asādhāraṇatvasya vighaṭakā iti/ atra vipūrvaghaṭadhātoḥ	asADAraNa tvasya viGawakAH iti/ atra vipUrva Gawa DAtoH
   abhāvor'thaḥ/ ṇvulassampādakaḥ/ tathā ca	aBAvoH aTaH/ NvulassampAdakaH/ taTA ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvasahitalakṣyatāvacchedaka1vyāpyatvarūpaviśiṣṭābhāvasampādakā	lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApaka tva sahita lakzya tAvacCedaka1vyApya tva rUpa viSizwa aBAva sampAdakA
   ityarthaḥ/ tādṛśābhāvaścātivyāpte2viśeṣyābhāvaprayuktaḥ/	iti arTaH/ tAdRSa aBAvaH ca ati vyApte2 viSezya aBAva prayuktaH/
   avyāptyasambhavinośca viśeṣaṇābhāvaprayukta ityabhipretyāha   [38]	avyAptya samBavinoH ca viSezaNa aBAva prayuktaH iti aBipretya Aha  [38]
   ativyāptāviti/ pakṣatāvacchedakasāmānādhikaraṇyamātreṇa	ati vyAptO= iti/ pakza tA avacCedaka sAmAna aDikaraNya mAtreNa
   hetvabhāvavattvaṃ bhāgāsiddhiḥ/ tadavacchedena tadabhāvavattvaṃ	hetu aBAvavat tvam BAga asidDiH/ tad avacCedena tat aBAvavat tvam
   svarūpāsiddhiriti vivekaḥ/ atra ca bhāgāsiddheḥ avacchedakāvacchedena	svarUpa asidDiH iti vivekaH/ atra ca BAga asidDeH avacCedaka avacCedena
   pakṣe hetumattājñānavirodhitayā, svarūpāsiddheḥ avacchedakāvacchedena	pakze hetu matta ajQAna viroDitayA, svarUpa asidDeH avacCedaka avacCedena
   sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca pakṣe hetumattājñānavirodhitayā dvayorapi	sAmAnADikaraNyena ca pakze hetumattA jQAna viroDitayA dvayoH api
   pakṣadharmatājñānaṃ prati virodhitayā hetvābhāsatvamiti dhyeyam/	pakza Darma tA jQAnam prati viroDitayA hetvABAsa tvam iti Dyeyam/
   [39] vyāvṛttireveti/ ayamāśayaḥ  	[39] vyAvRttiH eva iti/ ayam ASayaH  
   'vyāvṛttirvyavahāro vā lakṣaṇasya prayojanam' iti/ vyāvṛttiḥ	avyAvRttiH vyavahAraH vA lakzaNasya prayojanam a iti/ vyAvRttiH
   itarabhedaḥ/ vyavahāraḥ jñānajanakaśabdaḥ/ prayojanaṃ jñāpyam/ tathā ca	itara BedaH/ vyavahAraH jQAna janaka SabdaH/ prayojanam jQApyam/ taTA ca
   vyāvartakatvam itarabhedānumāpakatvam/ vyāvahārikatvaṃ	vyAvartaka tvam itara Beda anumApaka tvam/ vyAvahArika tvam
   vyavahārānumāpakatvam/ prakṛte ca vyāvṛttireva lakṣaṇajñāpyā	vyavahAra anumApaka tvam/ prakRte ca vyAvRttiH eva lakzaNa jQApyA
   ityekaṃ matam/ vyāvṛttivyavahārobhayaṃ jñāpyamityaparaṃ matam/	iti ekam matam/ vyAvRtti vyavahAra uBayam jQApyam iti aparam matam/
   tatrādyapakṣe vyāvartakatvasyaiva lakṣyatāvacchedakatayā vakṣyamāṇarītyā	tatra Adya pakze vyAvartaka tvasya eva lakzya tAvacCedaka tayA vakzyamANa rItyA
   ativyāptiriti/ vyāvartakasyetyatra	ati vyAptiH iti/ vyAvartakasya iti atra
   vyāpyatvarūpaviśiṣṭeti/ vyāpyatvarūpaṃ yat viśiṣṭaṃ	vyApya tva rUpa viSizwa iti/ vyApya tva rUpam yat viSizwam
   tadabhāvasaṃpādakāḥ/	tad aBAva saMpAdakAH/
   2. viśeṣyābhāveti/	2. viSezya aBAva iti/
   lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvarūpaṃ yadviśeṣyaṃ tadabhāvaprayukta ityarthaḥ/	lakzya tA avacCedaka vyApya tva rUpam yat viSezyam tad aBAva prayuktaH iti arTaH/
   viśeṣaṇābhāveti/ lakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpakatvarūpaṃ yadviśeṣaṇaṃ	viSezaNa aBAva iti/ lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApaka tva rUpam yat viSezaNam
   tadabhāvaprayukta ityarthaḥ/	tad aBAva prayuktaH iti arTaH/
   vyāṅpūrvakavṛtudhātoritarabhedor'thaḥ/	vyAFpUrvaka vRtu DAtoH itaraBedor aTaH/
   akapratyayasyānumitijanaka ityabhiprāyeṇāha [39]	aka pratyayasya anumiti janakaH iti aBiprAyeNa Aha [39]

   liṅgaparāmarśasyaiva, na tu parāmṛśyamānaliṅgasya/ tathā ca	liFga parAmarSasya eva, na tu parAmRSyamAna liFgasya/ taTA ca
   gandhādervyāvartaṅkatvānupapattiḥ/ na	ganDa AdeH vyAvartaFkatva anupapattiH/ na
   cetarabhedānumitijanakajñānaviṣayatvaṃ vyāvartakatvamiti na doṣa	ca itara Beda anumiti janaka jQAna vizaya tvam vyAvartaka tvam iti na doza
   iti vācyam/ evamapi	iti vAcyam/ evam api
   samūhālambanaparāmarśaviṣayodāsīnāvaraṇāt,	samUha Alambana parAmarSa vizaya udAsInAvaraNAt,
   abhidheyatvādāvativyāptikathanāsaṅgateśca/ tasyāpyuktarītyā	aBiDeya tva At O= ati vyApti kaTanA saFgateH ca/ tasya api ukta rItyA
   lakṣyatvāt/ na ca tādṛśajanakatāvacchedakaviṣayatāśrayatvaṃ taditi	lakzya tvAt/ na ca tAdRSa janaka tA avacCedaka vizaya tA ASraya tvam tat iti
   vācyam/ evamapi itarabhedavyāptidhaṭakābhāvādāvativyāpteḥ	vAcyam/ evam api itara Beda vyApti Dawaka aBAva AdO= ati vyApteH
   gotvādyavacchedena gavetarabhedavyāpakakapilarūpavatī gauḥ	go tva Adi avacCedena gavetara BedavyApaka kapila rUpavatI gOH
   ityādyākārakabhramātmakaparāmarśaviṣayatāmādāya kapilarūpāderapi	ityAdya akAraka Brama Atmaka parAmarSa vizaya tAm AdAya kapila rUpa AdeH api
   vyāvartakatāpatteśca/ tathā ca dharmatvameva lakṣaṇalakṣaṇamityāśaṅkāyāṃ	vyAvartaka tA ApatteH ca/ taTA ca Darma tvam eva lakzaNa lakzaNam iti ASaFkAyAm
   niṣkarṣārthamāha [39] itarabhedavidheyetyādi/	nizkarza arTam Aha [39] itara Beda viDeya ityAdi/
   itarabhedavidheyakānumitijanakajñānīya	itara Beda viDeyaka anumiti janaka jQAnIya
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaviṣayatetyarthaḥ/	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita vizaya tA iti arTaH/
   yattu  	yat tu  
   bhramīyaviṣayatāmādāya doṣavāraṇāya bhramānirūpitatvaṃ niveśyamiti  	BramIya vizaya tAm AdAya doza vAraNAya Brama anirUpita tvam niveSyam iti  
   tadasat/ samānākārakajñāneṣu viṣayatābhedābhāvena udāsīnāṃśe	tat asat/ samAna AkAraka jQAnezu vizaya tA Beda aBAvena udAsIna aMSe
   samūhālaṃbanamādāyāsambhavasya durvāratvāt/	samUha AlaMbanam AdAya asamBavasya durvAra tvAt/

   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacnnitvaniveśaḥ/ kiñcidavacchinnatvaniveśe 'pi	pakza tA avacCedaka avacnnitva niveSaH/ kiQcid avacCinna tva niveSe api
   pakṣasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaghaṭakatvena taddeṣatādavasthyamiti	pakzasya sAmAnADikaraNya Gawaka tvena tad deza tAdavasTyam iti
   madupekṣitam/ vastutastu mukhyaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvameva	mad upekzitam/ vastutas tu muKya viSezya tA nirUpita tvam eva

   bhāvatvābhāvahetukānumitijanakatāvacchedakavyāptiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitaprakāratāmādā 	BAva tva aBAva hetuka anu miti janaka tA avacCedakavyApti nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita prakAra tAm AdA 
   yādheyatve 'tiprasaṅgāt/ atra	yADeya tve ati prasaFgAt/ atra
   cetarabhedaviṣayakatvasyānumitau niveśe 'itarabhedaḥ prameyaḥ	ca itara Beda vizaya ka tvasya anumitO niveSe aitara BedaH prameyaH
   abhidheyatvāt' ityanumitijanakatāṃ ādāya abhidheyatvādau	aBiDeya tvAt a iti anumiti janaka tAm AdAya aBiDeya tva AdO
   vyāvartakatāprasaṅgaḥ/ ata itarabhedavidheyakatvasya tatra niveśaḥ/	vyAvartaka tA prasaFgaH/ atas itara Beda viDeyaka tvasya tatra niveSaH/
   itarabhedatvāvacchinnavidheyatākatvaṃ vivakṣaṇīyam/ 'ghaṭaḥ	itara Beda tva avacCinna viDeya tAka tvam vivakzaNIyam/ aGawaH
   svarūpasambandhena abhidheyatvavān prameyatvāt'	svarUpa sambanDena aBiDeyatvavAn prameya tvAt a

   niveśyam/ atyathā	niveSyam/ atyaTA
   gotvādisāmānādhikaraṇyamātrāvagāhigauritarabhinnetyākārakānumitihetubhūtapramātmakatādṛśaparā 	go tva Adi sA mAna aDikaraNya mAtra avagAhi gOritara Binna iti AkAraka anumiti hetu BUta pramA Atmaka tAdRSa parA

   niveśyā/ anthā pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchedena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamātreṇa	niveSyA/ anTA pakza tAvacCedaka avacCedena tad sAmAnADikaraNya mAtreNa
   cetarabhedāvagāhisamūhālambanānumitijanakasāmānādhikaraṇyamātrāvagāhi	ca itara Beda avagAhi samUha Alambana anumiti janaka sAmAna aDikaraNya mAtra avagAhi
   parāmarśīyajanakatāmādāya	parAmarSIya janakatAm AdAya

   kālikādisambandhena	kAlikA Adi sambanDena

   kalpanīyānumitijanakatāmādāya	kalpanIya anumiti janakatAm AdAya

   iti vācyam/ evamapi	iti vAcyam/ evam api

   tathātvāt/ tādṛśānumityanupadhāyakajñānavṛttitvasya	taTA tvAt/ tAdRSa anum iti anupaDAyaka jQAna vRtti tvasya

   niveśāsaṃbhavāt/ iti cenna/	niveSa asaMBava at/ iti ced na/

   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	vESizwyam
   svanirūpitajanakatāvacchedakatvasvāśrayānumityupadhāyakāprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditajñānīyatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpita janaka tA vacCedaka tva sva ASrayAnumiti upaDAyakA prAmANyajQA nAnAskandita jQAnIya tva uBaya sambanDena/

   saṃsargaviśiṣṭānya prakāratānirūpakatvamiti madekapariśīlitaḥ	saMsarga viSizwAnya prakAratA anirUpaka tvam iti mad eka pariSIlitaH

   [39] eveneti/ evakāreṇetyarthaḥ/ nanu	[39] eva ina iti/ eva kAreNa iti arTaH/ nanu

   pṛṣṭhatāḍanena daṇḍabhaṅganyāyāt; ata āha [39] uktalakṣaṇeti [39]	pRzWa tAxanena daNxa BaFga nyAyAt; atas Aha [39] ukta lakzaNa iti [39]

   lakṣaṇagamanāt/ ato	lakzaNa gamanAt/ atas

   nnapratiyogitvarūpalakṣyatāvacchedakavyāpyatvasya	nna pratiyogi tva rUpa lakzya tAvacCedaka vyApya tvasya
   vivakṣitatvāditi/ [39] na tāvatsāmānyato bhedānumāpakatvamiti/	vivakzita tvAt iti/ [39] na tAvat sAmAnyataH Beda anumApaka tvam iti/

   ghaṭapaṭobhayabhinnaḥ abhidheyatvāt', 'pṛthivī ghaṭapaṭobhayabhinnā	Gawa pawa uBaya BinnaH aBiDeya tvAt a, apRTivI Gawa pawa uBaya BinnA
   pṛthivītarabhedāt' ityādyanumitijanakatāmādāya tatra	pRTivI itara BedAt a ityAdi anumiti janakatAm AdAya tatra

   jātyanāśrayavṛttipadārthavibhājakopādhiparamparāropādhīnajātiviśiṣṭabuddhinirūpitata 	jAti ana ASraya vRtti padArTa viBAja ka upa aDi paramparA Ara upADIna jAti viSizwa budDi nirUpitata 
   ttajjātijñānakāraṇatānantyarūpāniṣṭaprasañjanarūpeha vivakṣitā/	ttad jAti jQAna kAraNa tA Anantya rUpa anizwa prasaQjana rUpA iha vivakzitA/
   tasyāśca tadāpādakakāpattividhayā	tasyAH ca tad ApAdaka kApatti viDayA
   jātirjātimatītyākārakajñānavirodhitvam/	jAtiH jAtimatI iti AkAraka jQAna viroDi tvam/
   rūpahāniḥ	rUpa hAniH
   svatovyāvṛttatvarūpalakṣaṇasvarūpasya hāniḥ/ svatovyāvṛttatvaṃ ca	sva tas vyAvRtta tva rUpa lakzaNa svarUpasya hAniH/ sva tas vyAvRtta tvam ca
   viśeṣāṇāṃ svataḥsiddhaparasparabhedavattvam tasya viśeṣāṇāṃ	viSezANAm svatas sidDa paraspara Bedavat tvam tasya viSezANAm
   jātimattve 'nupapattiḥ/ sajātīyānāṃ padārthānāṃ parasparaṃ bhedaḥ	jAtimat tve anupapattiH/ sajAtIyAnAm padArTAnAm parasparam BedaH
   pratyakṣeṇa vyāvartakāntareṇa vā siddhyatīti nyāyāt viśeṣo yadi	pratyakzeNa vyAvartaka antareNa vA sidDyati iti nyAyAt viSezaH yadi
   jātimān syāt svatovyāvṛttattvavān na syāt	jAtimAn syAt sva tas vyAvRttattvavAn na syAt 
   ityāpattiviṣayatayā viśeṣasya jātimattve bādhakatvam/ 'ayaṃ	iti Apatti vizaya tayA viSezasya jAtimat tve bADaka tvam/ aayam
   paramāṇuḥ tatparamāṇubhinnaḥ etadviśeṣāt' ityanumānena viśeṣasya	paramANuH tad paramANu BinnaH etad viSezAt a iti anumAnena viSezasya
   jātimattve jātyāśrayasya jātipuraskāreṇaiva vyāvartakatvaṃ iti	jAtimat tve jAti ASrayasya jAti puraskAreNa eva vyAvartaka tvam iti
   niyamena jātipuraskāreṇaiva vyāvartakatāyā vyabhicārāpatteḥ/	niyamena jAti puraskAreNa eva vyAvartaka tAyAH vyaBicAra ApatteH/
   asaṃbandhaḥ	asaMbanDaH
   asamavetatvam/ tacca bahuvrīhibalāt	asamaveta tvam/ tat ca bahuvrIhi balAt

   nityānekasamavetarūpajātimattājñānavirodhitvam/	nitya aneka samaveta rUpa jAti mattA jQAna viroDi tvam/
   etatsarvamabhipretyaiva [57] saṅkṣepa ityuktam/ dīpikāyām [56] laghutvasya	etat sarvam aBipretya eva [57] saFkzepaH iti uktam/ dIpikAyAm [56] laGu tvasya
   gurutvābhāvarūpatvāditi/ na ca gurutvasya	guru tva aBAva rUpa tvAt iti/ na ca guru tvasya

   karmavibhāgaḥ	karma viBAgaH
   [62] asamavāyīti/ na cātra saṃyogabhinnatve sati	[62] asamavAyIti/ na ca atra saMyoga Binna tve sati

   ativyāptivāraṇāya saṃyogāṃśasyāpi sārthakyāt/	ati vyApti vAraNAya saMyoga aMSasya api sArTakyAt/
   sāmānyavibhāgaḥ	sAmAnya viBAgaH
   [63] sattāyāḥ dravyatvāpekṣayetyādi/	[63] sattAyAH dravya tva apekzayA ityAdi/

   vaiśiṣṭyam/ adhikadeśavṛttitvaṃ ca	vESizwyam/ aDika deSa vRtti tvam ca
   svapratiyogyadhikaraṇavṛttitvasvādhikaraṇavṛttitvobhayasambandhenābhāvaviśiṣṭatvam/	sva pratiyogi aDikaraNa vRtti tva sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena aBAva viSizwa tvam/
   sakadeśe 'bhāve	saka deSe aBAve

   adhikadeśavṛttitvenetyatra tṛtīyāyā abhedor'thaḥ/	aDika deSa vRtti tvena iti atra tRtIyAyAH aBedoH aTaH/

   tacca	tat ca

   [63] viśeṣāsatvanantā eveti vākye anantatvaṃ	[63] viSeza asatu anantA eva iti vAkye ananta tvam
   ca na vidyate antaḥ	ca na vidyate antar 
   saṅkhyātvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnaprakāratākāsmadādisamavetaniścayaḥ	saFKyAtu a vyApya Darma avacCinna prakAra tAkA asmad Adi samaveta niScayaH

   prakāśikāyām [63]	prakASikAyAm [63]
   1. svāśrayeti/ svaṃ	1. sva ASraya iti/ svam

   dravyatve iti dravyatvasya sattāto 'paratvamiti bhāvaḥ/	dravya tve iti dravya tvasya sattAtaH apara tvam iti BAvaH/
   viveka iti/ tathā ca	vivekaH iti/ taTA ca
   sāmānyaṃ trividham     kevalaparam, kevalāparam, parāparam ceti/	sAmAnyam triviDam    kevala param, kevala aparam, parAparam ca iti/

   samavāyalakṣaṇam	samavAya lakzaNam
   [64] samavāyastveka evetyatra saṅgrahapaṅktau samavāyasyaikatvaṃ	[64] samavAyaH tu ekaH eva iti atra saFgraha paFktO samavAyasya eka tvam

   īdṛśapāribhāṣikatve tātparyagrahaḥ/ yadvā ekatvamubhayāvṛttidharmaḥ/	IdRSa pAriBAzika tve tAtparya grahaH/ yat vA eka tvam uBaya AvRtti DarmaH/

   vidheyatāvacchedakatvābhimatasambandhāvacchinnāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvasambandhe 	viDeya tAvat Cedaka tva aBimata sambanDa avacCinna avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tva sambanDe 
   nābhāve 'nvayaḥ/	na aBAve anvayaH/

   iti bodhaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇāvatārayati   dīpikāyām [64] samavāyasya bhedo	iti boDaH iti aBiprAyeNa avatArayati  dIpikAyAm [64] samavAyasya BedaH

   1. taparāparatvāditi/	1. taparA paratvAt iti/

   rītyā parāparatvamiti bhāvaḥ/	rItyA parAparatvam iti BAvaH/

   punarāvṛttyā	punarAvRttyA

   tādṛśānusāraprayojyajalādilakṣaṇakathanaprākkālīnābhinnapṛthivyādisamudāyaghaṭakībhūtapṛthivīviśeṣyakalakṣaṇaprakāraka 	tAdRSa anusAra prayojya jala Adi lakzaNa kaTana prAk kAlIna aBinna pRTivI Adi samudAya GawakIBUta pRTivI viSezya ka lakzaNa prakAraka

   [66] mātrapadamitīti/ atra kecit    	[66] mAtra padam iti iti/ atra kecid

   tallabhyatvāt/ lakṣyatāvacchedaketarasaṃbandhavyavacchedabodhakatāyāṃ	tad laBya tva at/ lakzya tAvacCeda ka itara saMbanDa vyavacCeda boDaka tAyAm

   śābdābodharūpatayā antataḥ prakṛtyarthasaṃṅkhyāprakārakasyāpi	SAbda aboDa rUpa tayA antatas prakRti arTa saMFKyA prakArakasya api

   lakṣyatāvacchedaketarāprakārakaśābdabodhāprasiddheśca/ evaṃ ca	lakzya tA avacCeda ka itara aprakAra kaSAbda boDa aprasidDeH ca/ evam ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaprakārakaśābdajanakatāvacchedakayatkiñcijjñānīyaviṣayatāśrayavarṇatvavyāpakasamudāyatvam	lakzya tAvacCedaka prakAra kaSAbda janakatA avacCeda kayat kiQcit jQAnIya vizaya tA ASraya varNa tva vyApaka samudAya tvam
   uddeśalakṣaṇam/ ato na pṛthivyādibhāge 'tivyāptiḥ/	uddeSa lakzaNam/ atas na pRTivI Adi BAge ati vyAptiH/
   tādṛśasamudāyatvaṃ ca	tAdRSa samudAya tvam ca
   tādṛśasamudāyatvaniṣṭhanyūnavṛttitānirūpakatvena viśeṣaṇīyam/ tena	tAdRSa samudAya tva nizWa nyUna vRtti tA nirUpaka tvena viSezaNIyam/ tena
   na lakṣaṇādivākye 'tivyāptiḥ/ tādṛśasamudāyatvaṃ ca vyāptisambandhena	na lakzaNa Adi vAkye ati vyAptiH/ tAdRSa samudAya tvam ca vyApti sambanDena
   uddeśapadapravṛttinimittam/ tenāśrayatayā tasyaikadeśasādhāraṇatve 'pi	uddeSa pada pravRtti nimittam/ tena ASraya tayA tasya eka deSa sADAraNa tve api
   na kṣatiḥ/ samudāyatvasya vyāsajyavṛttitvena niveśaḥ/ ataḥ	na kzatiH/ samudAya tvasya vyAsa jya vRtti tvena niveSaH/ atas 
   dhīviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpasya tasyānanugame 'pi na kṣatiḥ/ yadi ca	DI viSeza vizaya tva rUpasya tasya ananugame api na kzatiH/ yadi ca
   viṣayatvamavyāsajyavṛttīti nāyaṃ prakāraḥ sādhīyānityucyate, tadā	vizaya tvam avyAsa jya vRtti iti na ayam prakAraH sADIyAn iti ucyate, tadA
   tādṛśavarṇatvavyāpakadharmavattvamevoddeśalakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam/	tAdRSa varNa tva vyApaka Darmavat tvam eva uddeSa lakzaNam vaktavyam/
   tādṛśadharmatvena ca	tAdRSa Darma tvena ca
   viśeṣyatāvacchedakadharmabodhakatvavyutpatteḥ	viSezya tAvacCedaka Darma boDaka tva vyutpatteH
   svīkārānnātiprasaṅgāvakāśaḥ/ yadyapi paryāyapadāntarādhīnaśābdabodhe	svIkArAt na ati prasaFga avakASaH/ yadi api paryAya pada antara aDIna SAbda boDe
   vyabhicāravāraṇāya tattatpadajñānāvyavahitottaratvasya	vyaBicAra vAraNAya tad tad pada jQAna avyavahita uttaratvasya
   kāryatāvacchedakakoṭau avaśyaṃ niveśyatayā tatra viṣayaniveśe	kArya tAvacCedaka kowO avaSyam niveSya tayA tatra vizaya niveSe
   prayojanāyojyaśabdānukūlakṛtimāniti bodhaḥ/ prakāśikāyām [65] prāthamye  	prayojana Ayojya Sabda anukUla kRtimAn iti boDaH/ prakASikAyAm [65] prATamye  
   prathamavaktavyatve/ [66] lakṣaṇīyavasatuparamiti/	praTama vaktavya tve/ [66] lakzaNIyavasatu param iti/
   prakṛtalakṣaṇāśrayayāvadvastuparimityarthaḥ/ tena na ghaṭādipade	prakRta lakzaNa ASraya yAvat vastu parimiti arTaH/ tena na Gawa Adi pade
   prakṛtalakṣaṇāśrayaghaṭādipratipādake 'tiprasaṅgatādavasthyam/ tathā ca	prakRta lakzaNa ASraya Gawa Adi pratipAdake ati prasaFga tAdavasTyam/ taTA ca
   prakṛtalakṣaṇāśrayayāvadvastuniṣṭhaviṣayatāśālitvaṃ bodhaviśeṣaṇaṃ	prakRta lakzaNa ASraya yAvat vastu nizWa vizaya tA SAli tvam boDa viSezaNam
   deyamiti bhāvaḥ/	deyam iti BAvaH/
   [66] mātrapadamitīti/ atra kecit    	[66] mAtra padam iti iti/ atra kecid    
   lakṣyatāvacchedaketarāprakārakatvaṃ mātrapadalabhyam/ lakṣaṇavākyasya	lakzya tA avacCeda ka itara aprakAraka tvam mAtra pada laByam/ lakzaNa vAkyasya
   taditaralakṣaṇapratipādakatvānna tatrātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ  ityāhuḥ/	tad itara lakzaNa pratipAdaka tvAt na tatra ativyAptiH iti BAvaH iti AhuH/
   tattuccham/ mātrapadasya	tat tucCam/ mAtrapadasya
   samabhivyāhṛtapadārthentarasaṃbandhavyavacchedabodhakatāyā 'atra	samaBivyAhRta padArTa intara saMbanDa vyavacCeda boDaka tAyAH aatra
   bhūtale ghaṭo 'sti' ityādau vyutpannatayā śabde	BU tale GawaH astia ityAdO vyutpanna tayA Sabde
   lakṣaṇāpratipādakatvasyaiva tallabhyatvāt/	lakzaNa apratipAdaka tvasya eva tad laBya tva at/

   vyutpattivirodhasya spaṣṭatvāt/ padārthadvayasaṃsargabodhasyaiva	vyutpatti viroDasya spazwa tva at/ padArTa dvaya saMsarga boDasya eva
   śābdabodharūpatayā antataḥ prakṛtyarthasaṅkhyāprakārakasyāpi	SAbda boDa rUpa tayA antatas prakRti arTa saFKyA prakArakasya api
   pṛthivyādiviśeṣyakaśābdabodhasya saṃbhavāt	pRTivI Adi viSezya kaSAbda boDasya saMBavAt 
   lakṣyatāvacchedaketarāprakārakaśābbodhāprasiddheśca/ evaṃ ca	lakzya tA avacCeda ka itara aprakAraka SAbboDa aprasidDeH ca/ evam ca
   lakṣyatāvacchedakaprakārakaśābdajanakatāvacchedakayatkiñcijjñānīyaviṣayatāśrayavarṇatvavyāpakasamudāyatvam	lakzya tAvacCedaka prakAra kaSAbda janakatA avacCeda kayat kiQcit jQAnIya vizaya tA ASraya varNa tva vyApaka samudAya tvam
   uddeśalakṣaṇam/ ato na pṛthivyādibhāge 'tivyāpti/ tādṛśasamudāyatvaṃ	uddeSa lakzaNam/ atas na pRTivI Adi BAge ati vyApti/ tAdRSa samudAya tvam
   ca tādṛśasamudāyatvaniṣṭhanyūnavṛttitānirūpakatvena viśeṣaṇīyam/	ca tAdRSa samudAya tva nizWa nyUna vRtti tA nirUpaka tvena viSezaNIyam/
   tena na lakṣaṇādivākye 'tivyāptiḥ/ tādṛśasamudāyatvaṃ ca	tena na lakzaNa Adi vAkye ati vyAptiH/ tAdRSa samudAya tvam ca

   vyāsajyavṛttitvena niveśaḥ/ ataḥ dhīviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpasya	vyAsajya vRtti tvena niveSaH/ atas DI viSeza vizaya tva rUpasya

   prakāraḥ sādhīyānityucyate, tadā	prakAraH sADIyAn iti ucyate, tadA
   tādṛśavarṇatvavyāpakadharmavattvamevoddeśalakṣaṇaṃ vaktamavyam/	tAdRSa varNa tva vyApaka Darmavat tvam eva uddeSa lakzaNam vaktam avyam/
   tādṛśadharmatvena ca viśeṣyatāvacchedakadharmabodhakatvavyutpatteḥ	tAdRSa Darma tvena ca viSezya tAvacCedaka Darma boDaka tva vyutpatteH
   svīkārānnatiprasaṅgāvakāśaḥ/ yadyapi	svIkArAt nati prasaFga avakASaH/ yadi api
   paryāyapadāntarādhīyanaśābdabodhe vyabhicāravāraṇāya	paryAya pada antara ADIyana SAbda boDe vyaBicAra vAraNAya

   janyatāyāmasaṃbhavaḥ/ tathāpi	janyatAyAm asaMBavaH/ taTA api
   tattatpadajñānāvyavahitottaraśābdatvāvacchinnajanyataiva lakṣaṇe niveśyā,	tad tad pada jQAna avyavahita uttaraSAbda tva avacCinna janya tA eva lakzaNe niveSyA,
   ato na doṣaḥ/	atas na dozaH/
   pṛthivīpadajñānāvyavahitottaraśābdatvāvacchinnajanyatānirūpitajanakatāvacchedakayatkiñcijjñā	pRTivI pada jQAna avyavahita uttara SAbda tva avacCinna janya tA nirUpita janaka tA avacCedakayat kiQcijjQA
      nīyaviṣayatāśrayavarṇatvavyāpakaḥ	  nIya vizaya tA ASraya varNa tva vyApakaH
   tādṛśavyāpakasamudāyaniṣṭhanyūnavṛttitānirūpitaśca yo 'yaṃ dharmaḥ sa	tAdRSa vyApaka samudAya nizWa nyUna vRtti tAni rUpitaH ca yaH ayam DarmaH sa
   eva pṛthivyuddeśalakṣaṇamitirītyā tattaduddeśalakṣaṇaṃ bodhyam/ na ca	eva pRTivI uddeSa lakzaNam itirItyA tad tad uddeSa lakzaNam boDyam/ na ca
   kiñcittvaniveśādananugama iti vācyam/	kiQcit tva niveSAt ananugamaH iti vAcyam/
   tādṛśajanakatānirūpitādhikaraṇatāviśiṣṭadharmavattvasya vivakṣitatvāt/	tAdRSa jana katA nirUpita aDikaraNa tA viSizwa Darmavat tvasya vivakzita tvAt/
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vESizwyam ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhāvacchinnasvani	sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sambanDa avacCinna svani
   ṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena	zWAvacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena
   svādhikaraṇatāsvaviśiṣṭaviśiṣṭaviṣayatāśrayavarṇantvasambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa tA su aviSizwa viSizwa vizayatA ASraya varNantu asambanDena/
   viṣayatāyāṃ svaviṣiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vizaya tAyAm sva vizizwa vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpakajanakatāvacchedakatvasvāśrayajñānīyatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpaka janaka tAvacCedaka tva sva ASraya jQAnIya tva uBaya sambanDena/

   svaviśiṣṭadharmaviśiṣṭatvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasaṃbandhaḥ	sva viSizwa Darma viSizwa tva saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva saMbanDaH
   paryavasitaḥ/ ata eva 'pṛthivī gandhavatī' iti vākye nātiprasaṅga	paryavasitaH/ atas eva apRTivI ganDavatI a iti vAkye na ati prasaFga

   [65] nanu surabhyasurabhyavayavārabdha iti	[65] nanu suraBya suraBI avayava ArabDaH iti

   ādyakṛtibodhakatvāt/ ktapratyayasya vidheyatvamarthaḥ/ taccāsaṅgatam/	Adya kRti boDaka tvAt/ kta pratyayasya viDeya tvam arTaH/ tat ca asaFgatam/
   kṛteḥ ātmamātradharmatvādityata āha   [66] ārabdhe janya u iti/ [66]	kRteH Atma mAtra Darma tvAt iti atas Aha  [66] ArabDe janyaH u iti/ [66]
   parasparavirodhenetīti/ virodhaḥ pratībandhakatvam, tatra	paraspara viroDena iti iti/ viroDaH pratIbanDaka tvam, tatra

   sattāvāraṇāya kuto na niveśyata ityata āha   [66] teneti/ [66]	sattA vAraNAya kutas na niveSyate iti atas Aha  [66] tena iti/ [66]
   dravyatvavyudāsa iti/ dravyatvasya	dravya tva vyudAsaH iti/ dravya tvasya

   doṣāprasakteśca/	doza aprasakteH ca/

   nityatvaviraheṇaiva vāraṇaṃ bodhyam/ [66]	nitya tva viraheNa eva vAraNam boDyam/ [66]
   svāśrayasaṃyuktatvasaṃbandhenetyādiriti/ atrāpi pūrvavadevārtho	sva ASraya saMyukta tva saMbanDena iti AdiH iti/ atra api pUrvavat eva arTaH 
   varṇanīyaḥ/ [66] anugatarūpeṇa  	varNanIyaH/ [66] anugata rUpeNa

   tatsaṃyuktatvaṃ pārthivabhāge, svaṃ tejobhāgaḥ tatpratibadhyo yo	tad saMyukta tvam pArTiva BAge, svam tejaH BAgaH tad pratibaDyaH yaH 
   dravatvanāśaḥ tatpratiyogidravatvaṃ tatsamavāyavattvaṃ pārthivabhāge, svaṃ	drava tva nASaH tad pratiyogi drava tvam tat samavAyavat tvam pArTiva BAge, svam
   tejobhāgaḥ tadasamavetā pṛthivītvajātiḥ tadvavattvaṃ pārthivabhāge	tejaH BAgaH tad asamavetA pRTivI tva jAtiH tat vavat tvam pArTiva BAge
   iti samanvayaḥ/	iti samanvayaH/
   vāyunirūpaṇam	vAyu nirUpaNam
   dīpikāyāñ [82] sparśānumeyo vāyuriti/ atra ca sparśapadaṃ sparśatvaparam/	dIpikAyAn [82] sparSa anumeyaH vAyuH iti/ atra ca sparSa padam sparSa tu a param/
   tena parvatānumayo vahniriti	tena parvata anumayaH vahniH iti
   vyavahāravāraṇāya	vyavahAra vAraNAya
   tṛtīyāyāḥ viśeśyatārthakatvamapahāya	tRtIyAyAH viSeSyata arTaka tvam apahAya

   'upalabhyamānasparśaḥ kvacidāśritaḥ sparśatvāt, tādātmyena sparśādvā,	aupalaByamAna sparSaH kvacid ASritaH sparSa tvAt, tAdAtmyena sparSAt vA,

   [na] yuktam; sparśānumeya ityatra prāguktaviroghāt; tathāpi	[na] yuktam; sparSa anumeyaH iti atra prAk ukta viroGAt; taTA api

   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   [82] udbhūtasparśavadityādi/ atra ca ghrāṇendriye	[82] udBUta sparSa vat ityAdi/ atra ca GrANa indriye

   dravyatve 'pi sattvāt taddoṣa ityataḥ sparśapadam/ vāyau tadvāraṇāya	dravya tve api sattvAt tad dozaH iti atas sparSa padam/ vAyO tad vAraNAya

   [83] na vibhucatuṣṭayamiti/	[83] na viBu catuzwayam iti/

   varṇayanti/ tanmatamākṣeptumanuvadati   [83] nanu vāyuḥ pratyakṣa	varNayanti/ tat matam Akzeptum anuvadati  [83] nanu vAyuH pratyakza
   ityādinā/ nanu pratyakṣatvaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ, tathā ca vāyorapi	ityAdinA/ nanu pratyakza tvam pratyakza vizaya tvan, taTA ca vAyoH api

   taddoṣatādavasthyam, tathāpi mānasānirūpitalaukikaviṣayatvasya	tad doza tAdavasTyam, taTA api mAnasAnirUpita lOkika vizaya tvasya

   copadarśitaparāmarśāt viśiṣṭavyabhicārasiddhau na kiñcidapi bādhakaṃ	ca upadarSita parAmarSAt viSizwa vyaBicAra sidDO na kiQcid api bADakam

   prāṇasya,	prANasya,
   vāyāvantarbhāve 'pi kāryavānucāturvidhyaṃ vā prasajyeteti bhāvaḥ/	vAyO= antarBAve api kArya vAnucAturviDyam vA prasajyeta iti BAvaH/
   śarīretyādiviśeṣaṇena	SarIra ityAdi viSezaNena
   śarīrendriyabhinnatvarūpaviṣayalakṣaṇākrāntatvāt na caturvidhyam,	SarIra indriya Binna tva rUpa vizaya lakzaNa AkrAnta tvAt na caturviDyam,
   vāyvantarbhāvācca na daśamadravyatvamityāśaya iti bhāvaśca/"sa	vAyu antarBAvAt ca na daSama dravya tvam iti ASayaH iti BAvaH ca/" sa

   'labhata' ityatra dhātvarthasambandhe 'nvayaḥ/ sa ceha vācyatvarūpaḥ/	alaBata a iti atra DAtu arTa sambanDe anvayaH/ sa ca iha vAcya tva rUpaH/
   eko 'pītyatra ekatvaṃ prāṇatvanyūnavṛttidharmaśūnyatvam/ apiratra	ekaH api iti atra eka tvam prANa tva nyUna vRtti Darma SUnya tvam/ apiH atra
   virodhārthakaḥ/ virodhaśca	viroDa arTakaH/ viroDaH ca
   samabhivyāhṛtapadārthantāvacchedakaikatvādhikaraṇanirūpitopādhibhedānavacchi	samaBivyAhRta padArTanta avacCedaka eka tva aDikaraNa nirUpita upADi Beda an avacCi
   nnavṛttikatvābhāvaḥ/	nnavRttika tva aBAvaH/
   tasya ca sambandhe anvayaḥ/ tathā ca	tasya ca sambanDe anvayaH/ taTA ca
   ekatvaviruddhopādhibhedaprayuktaprāṇāpānādisaṃjñānirūpitasaṃbadhāśrayaḥ	ekatva virudDa upADi Beda prayukta prANa apAna Adi saMjQA nirUpita saMbaDa ASrayaH
   sa iti bodhaḥ/	saH iti boDaH/
   kecittu apiśabdasya	kecid tu api Sabdasya
   virodhārthakatāmāhuḥ/ tadasat/ dharmiṇi	viroDa arTaka tAm AhuH/ tat asat/ DarmiNi

   ekatvāvirodhalābhena pṛthakkathanavaiyarthyāt/ asmanmate tu	ekatva aviroDa lABena pRTak kaTana vEyarTyAt/ asmad mate tu

   tatsārthakyāt/ ke te upādhaya ityāśaṅkāyāmupādhiśabdārthamāha	tat sArTakyAt/ ke te upADayaH iti ASaFkAyAm upADi Sabda arTam Aha
   dīpikāyām [82] sthāneti/ tatra pramāṇamāha prakāśikāyām	dIpikAyAm [82] sTAna iti/ tatra pramANam Aha prakASikAyAm
   [82] hṛdi prāṇa ityādi iti/	[82] hRdi prANaH ityAdi iti/
   sṛṣṭisaṃhāraprakriyā	sRzwi saMhAra prakriyA
   dīpikāyām [85] cikīrṣāvaśāditi/ yadyapīśvarecchā nityaiva/ tathāpyetatkāle	dIpikAyAm [85] cikIrzA vaSAt iti/ yadi api ISvara icCA nityA eva/ taTA api etad kAle

   saṃjihīrṣāvaśādityatrāpi bodhyam/ cākṣuṣadravyatvādityatra cākṣuṣaṃ	saMjihIrzA avaSAt iti atra api boDyam/ cAkzuza dravya tvAt iti atra cAkzuzam

   'navasthāprasaṅgāditi/	anavasTA prasaFgAt iti/

   vyavahartavyabhedasyaiva niyāmakatvāt/ tathā ca 'ghaṭākāśavyavahāraḥ	vyavahartavyaBedasya eva niyAmaka tvAt/ taTA ca aGawa AkASa vyavahAraH

   vā nopādeyameva tat/	vA na upAdeyam eva tat/

   'sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogitvam'ityasya sarvāṇi yāni mūrtadravyāṇi	asarva mUrta dravya saMyogi tvam aityasya sarvANi yAni mUrta dravyANi

   1. tulyayuktyeti/	1. tulya yuktyA iti/
   bhūtapadavācyatāvacchedakatayetyarthaḥ/ prāgukteti/	BUta pada vAcya tAvacCedakatayA iti arTaH/ prAk uktA iti/
   svasāmānādhikaraṇyasvābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyasvasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitvaitattritayasaṃbandhenetyarthaḥ/	svasA mAnADikaraNya svABAva sAmAnADikaraNya sva samAna aDikaraNa atyanta aBAva pratiyogi tva etat tritaya saMbanDena iti arTaH/
   utpannavinaṣṭapṛthivyāderapi tadāśrayatayā	utpanna vinazwa pRTivI AdeH api tad ASraya tayA
   sarvamūrtānatargatatvena tatpratiyogikasaṃyogāprasiddhyā na	sarva mUrtAn atargata tvena tad pratiyogika saMyoga aprasidDyA na

   vācyam/ dravyapadasya saṃyogavadarthakatāyāḥ prāgevāveditatayā	vAcyam/ dravya padasya saMyoga vat arTaka tAyAH prAk eva Avedita tayA
   tādṛśapṛthivyādyasaṃgrahāt mūrtapadasya kriyāvatparatve	tAdRSa pRTivI Adi asaMgrahAt mUrta padasya kriyAvat paratve
   sutarāmadoṣācceti/ tattuccham/ apekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpasya	suta rA Am a dozAt ceti/ tat tucCam/ apekzA budDi viSeza vizaya tva rUpasya
   ākāśādicatuṣṭayaghaṭakapratyekamātrasamavetasaṃyogasamudāyaparyāptasamudāyatvasya	AkASa Adi catuzwaya Gawaka pratyeka mAtra samaveta saMyoga samudAya paryApta samudAya tvasya
   bhinnabhinnatayā tādṛśaikaikasamudāyatvāvacchinnavattvasya	Binna Binna tayA tAdRSa ekEka samudAya tva avacCinnavat tvasya
   vibhusāmānyalakṣaṇatvopagame vācyatāsambandhena	viBu sAmAnya lakzaNa tva upagame vAcya tA sambanDena
   vibhupadavattvarūpalakṣyatāvacchedakavatyanyasmin tasyāsattvāt avyāpteḥ/	viBu padavat tva rUpa lakzya tAvacCedakavati anyasmin tasya asattvAt avyApteH/
   tattatsamudāyacatuṣṭayavattvasya lakṣaṇatve asaṃbhavāpatteḥ/ tasya	tad tad samudAya catuzwayavat tvasya lakzaNa tve asaMBava ApatteH/ tasya
   kutrāpyasattvāt/ tāvadanyatamavattvasya tathātve tādṛśānyatamatvasya	kutra api asattva at/ tAvat anyatamavat tvasya taTA tve tAdRSa anyatamatvasya
   tattatsamudāyatvāvacchinnebhedacatuṣṭayavadanyatvarūpatayā	tad tad samudAya tva avacCinnA iBeda catuzwaya vat anya tva rUpa tayA
   vyāsajyavṛttidharmāvacchinnānuyogitākābhāvānupagame asambhavāpatteḥ/	vyAsa jya vRtti Darma avacCinna anuyogi tAkA BAva anupagame asamBava ApatteH/
   tadupagame ca ghaṭākāśādisaṃyogasyāpi tādṛśānyatamatvāśrayatayā	tad upagame ca Gawa AkASa Adi saMyogasya api tAdRSA anyatamatva ASraya tayA
   ghaṭādāvativyāpteḥ kathamidaṃ saṃgacchate/	Gawa AdO= ati vyApteH kaTam idam saMgacCate/
   yadapi	yat api
   'sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogitvam' ityanena mūrtadravye	asarva mUrta dravya saMyogi tvam a iti anena mUrta dravye
   gaganādisaṃyuktatvaṃ nāstīti labhyate/ evaṃ ca svāsaṃyuktamūrtadravyakaṃ	gagana Adi saMyukta tvam na asti iti laByate/ evam ca sva asaMyukta mUrta dravya kam
   yadyatsvaṃ tattadvyaktitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedakṛṭavattvaṃ lakṣaṇa	yat yat svam tad tad vyakti tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda kRwavat tvam lakzaNa

   svāsaṃyuktaguṇāditvādasambhavavāraṇāya mūrteti/ mūrtatvajātipakṣe	sva asaMyukta guNa Adi tvAt asamBava vAraNAya mUrta iti/ mUrta tva jAti pakze

   saṃyogyarthakaṃ dravyapadam/ tādṛśaghaṭādeśca gaganādyasaṃyuktatve 'pi	saMyogi arTakam dravya padam/ tAdRSa Gawa AdeH ca gagana Adi asaMyukta tve api
   saṃyogitvavirahānnāsambhavaḥ/ na caivaṃ mūrtapadavaiyarthyam,	saMyogi tva virahAt na asamBavaH/ na ca evam mUrta pada vEyarTyam,

   dravyatvaniveśena tadvāraṇe 'pi utpannavinaṣṭapṛthivyādāvativyāpteḥ/	dravya tva niveSena tad vAraNe api utpanna vinazwa pRTivI AdO= ati vyApteH/

   ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ghaṭatvādikulālādikṛtitvābhyāmeva	iti anvaya vyatirekAByAm Gawa tva Adi kulAla Adi kRti tvAByAm eva
   kāryakāraṇabhāvassidhyati, tathāpi yadviśeṣayoritivyāptibalāt	kArya kAraNa BAva ssiDyati, taTA api yad viSezayoH iti vyApti balAt
   kāryatvāvacchinnaṃ prati kṛtitvena kāraṇatvamapyāvaśyakam/ evaṃ	kAryatva avacCinnam prati kRti tvena kAraNa tvam api AvaSya kam/ evam

   [93] aparokṣajñānāderityādipadena cikirṣāparigrahaḥ/ [93]	[93] aparokza jQAna AdeH iti Adi padena cikirzA parigrahaH/ [93]

   nanu [92] jīvasya lakṣaṇamāha   jīva itīti dīpikāyām [91] jīvastu	nanu [92] jIvasya lakzaNam Aha  jIvaH iti iti dIpikAyAm [91] jIvaH tu

   svarūpaparatvamabhisandhāya vyācaṣṭe   [93] svarūpamāhesyartha iti/	svarUpa para tvam aBisanDAya vyAcazwe  [93] svarUpam Ahesi arTaH iti/
   [93] mūle prati śarīraṃ bhinna iti/ atra ca	[93] mUle prati SarIram BinnaH iti/ atra ca
   pratipadasamabhivyāhṛtadvitīyāyāḥ	pratipada samaBivyAhRta dvitIyAyAH

   purītannāḍīpradeśāvacchinnātmānuyogikaḥmanaḥpratiyogikasaṃyogaḥ na	purI tat nAxI pradeSa avacCinna Atma anuyogi kaHmanaH pratiyogika saMyogaH na

   kṛtyādāvevākhyātasya śaktiḥ, āśrayatvādau tu nirūḍhalakṣaṇeti	kRtyA AdO= eva AKyAtasya SaktiH, ASraya tva AdO tu nirUXa lakzaNa iti
   sarvānumatam/ tatra svapidhātusamabhivyāhṛtapratyayasyānuyogitva	sarva anumatam/ tatra su apiDAtu samaBivyAhRta pratyayasya anuyogi tva
   evānāditātparyaṃ kalpyate/ ato na doṣaḥ/	eva anAditAt paryam kalpyate/ atas na dozaH/
   athānuyogitvādessaṃsargatayā bhānenaivopapattau	aTa anuyogi tva AdessaMsarga tayA BAnena eva upapattO

   anyathā tatsaṃsargasyāpi śābdabodhaviṣayatvakalpanāpattyā gauravāt/ na	anyaTA tad saMsargasya api SAbda boDa vizaya tva kalpanA pattyA gOravAt/ na
   caivaṃ caitro na svapitītyādau nañarthābhāvānvayānupapattiḥ/	ca evam cEtraH na svapiti ityAdO naQarTa aBAva anvaya anupapattiH/
   pratiyogitāvadanuyogitāyāṃ api	pratiyogi tA vat anuyogitAyAm api
   vṛttyaniyāmakatvenābhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakatvāditi vācyam/	vRtti aniyAmaka tvena aBAva pratiyogita anavacCedaka tvAt iti vAcyam/
   vṛttyaniyāmakasyāpyabhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatāghaṭakasambandhatvopagamenādoṣāt/	vRtti aniyAmakasya api aBAva pratiyogi ta avacCeda ka tA Gawaka sambanDa tva upagamena AdozAt/
   na ca vṛttyaniyāmakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvasyātiriktasya	na ca vRtti aniyAmaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvasya atiriktasya
   kalpane gauravamiti vācyam/	kalpane gOravam iti vAcyam/
   tādṛśasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatadabhāvasya	tAdRSa sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tada BAvasya
   tadīyatādṛśasambandhābhāvasamaniyatatvena tadabhinnatayā	tadIyata adRSa sambanDa aBAva sama niyata tvena tad aBinnatayA
   atiriktakalpanāvirahāt/ na caivamapi	atirikta kalpanA virahAt/ na ca evam api
   vṛttyaniyāmakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākalpane gauravamiti	vRtti aniyAmaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogitA kalpane gOravam iti
   vācyam/ bhavanmate 'pi prāguktagauravasattvena sāmyāt/ na ca	vAcyam/ Bavat mate api prAc ukta gOrava sattvena sAmya at/ na ca
   rājapuraṣavādoktayuktyānuyogitvasya śābdabodhe	rAja purazavAda ukta yuktyA anuyogi tvasya SAbda boDe
   prakāratvamāvaśyakamiti vācyam/ tādṛśayuktīnāṃ	prakAra tvam AvaSyakam iti vAcyam/ tAdRSa yuktInAm
   vistareṇānyatrāsmābhirnirastatvāt/ svapitītyetāvanmātrasya	vistareNa anyatra asmABiH nirasta tva at/ svapiti iti etAvat mAtrasya
   bodhakatvopapattaye ākhyātāderanuyogitārthakatāyā āvaśyakatvāt/	boDaka tva upapattaye AKyAta AdeH anuyogita arTaka tAyAH AvaSyaka tvAt/
   yadyapi caitraḥ svapitītyādau anuyogitāyāḥ padārthatve 'pi śābbodhe	yadi api cEtraH svapiti ityAdO anuyogitAyAH padArTa tve api SAbboDe
   saṃsargatayā bhāne na ko 'pi dāṣaḥ/ tathāpi	saMsarga tayA BAne na kaH api dAzaH/ taTA api
   tātparyārthaviśeṣānurodhena tatsaṃsargako vā tatprakārako vā	tAtparya arTa viSeza anuroDena tad saMsargakaH vA tad prakArakaH vA
   bodho bhāvatviti na tatrāsmākamāgrahaḥ/	boDaH BAvatu iti na tatra asmAkam AgrahaH/
   caitro	cEtraH 
   jānātītyādāvapyevameva bodhyam/ evaṃ bhavanmate purītat	jAnAti ityAdO= api evam eva boDyam/ evam Bavat mate purItat
   svapitītyādiprayogasya prāmāṇyaṃ durvāram/ asmanmate tu neti	svapiti ityAdi prayogasya prAmANyam durvAram/ asmad mate tu na iti
   madekapariśīlitaḥ panthāḥ/	mad eka pariSIlitaH panTAH/
   [98] sukhādyupalabdhisādhanamindriyaṃ mana iti	[98] suKa Adi upalabDi sADanam indriyam manaH iti
   saṅgrahaḥ/ atra ca ghaṭādyupalabdhisādhanībhūtacakṣurādinirāsāya	saFgrahaH/ atra ca Gawa Adi upalabDi sADanIBUta cakzuH Adi nirAsAya
   sukhādīti/ ātmanyativyāptivāraṇāya viśeṣyam/ yadi ca	suKa adIti/ Atmani ati vyApti vAraNAya viSezyam/ yadi ca
   tādṛśopalabdhisādhanatvaṃ	tAdRSa upalabDi sADana tvam
   tādṛśopalabdhiniṣṭhānubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnajanyatānirūpitajanakatvam,	tAdRSa upalabDi nizWa anuBava tva vyApya Darma avacCinna janya tA nirUpita janaka tvam,
   anyathā kālavidhayā tajjanake cakṣurādāvativyāpteḥ/ tathā ca	anyaTA kAla viDayA tad janake cakzuH AdO= ati vyApteH/ taTA ca
   nātmanyativyāptiriti indriyatvaviśeṣeṇaṃ vyarthamiti vibhāvyate,	na Atmani ativyAptiH iti indriya tva viSezeNam vyarTam iti viBAvyate,
   tadāpyāha   prakāśikāyām ātmamanoyogāditi/ ādipadena	tadA api Aha  prakASikAyAm Atma manaH yoga aditi/ Adipadena
   sukhādiparigrahaḥ/ tathā ca sukhādimānasatvāvacchinnaṃ prati manasaḥ	suKa Adi parigrahaH/ taTA ca suKa Adi mAnasatva avacCinnam prati manasaH
   karaṇatā nirvāharthaṃ ātmamanoyogasyātmasamevatayogyaviśeṣaṇatvena	karaNa tA nirvAharTam Atma manaH yogasya Atma samevata yogya viSezaNa tvena
   sukhādervā vyāparatākalpanasyāvaśyakatayā tadvāraṇāya tatsārthakyamiti	suKa AdeH vA vyAparatAkalpanasya AvaSyaka tayA tad vAraNAya tat sArTakyam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ [99] aṇutvasiddhiriti/ idamatra	BAvaH/ [99] aNu tva sidDiH iti/ idam atra
   pramāṇābhimatam 'manaḥ aṇutvatadabhāvānyataravat prameyatvāt'	pramANa aBimatam amanaH aNu tva tadaBAva anyatara vat prameya tvAt a
   ityanumānaṃ manaso 'naṇutve uktarītyā suṣuptyanupapattiriti	iti anumAnam manasaH anaNu tve ukta rItyA suzupti anupapattiH iti
   tarkasahakṛtamiti/	tarka saha kRtam iti/
   rūpanirūpaṇam	rUpa nirUpaNam
   [100] cakṣurmātragrāhyo guṇo rūpamiti	[100] cakzuH mAtra grAhyaH guNaH rUpam iti
   saṃgrahavākyam/ atra ca cakṣurmātragrāhya ityanane	saMgraha vAkyam/ atra ca cakzuH mAtra grAhyaH iti anane
   cakṣurviśiṣṭadharmāśrayagrāhya iti bodhaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	cakzuH viSizwa Darma ASraya grAhyaH iti boDaH/ vESizwyam ca
   laukikapratyāsattyā	lOkika pratyAsattyA
   svagrāhyarūpagrāhakendriyavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhāvacchinna	sva grAhya rUpa grAhaka indriya vRtti Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva saMbanDa avacCinna
   svaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvacakṣuṣṭvaniṣṭhādheyatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva cakzuzwu a nizWA Deya tva uBaya sambanDena/
   adhikam anyatra prapañcitaṃ asmābhiḥ/ prakāśikāyām [101] na	aDikam anyatra prapaQcitam asmABiH/ prakASikAyAm [101] na
   rūpe sambhavatīti/ rūpasyātmamanogrāhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ [101] tathāpi	rUpe samBavati iti/ rUpasya Atma manaH grAhya tvAt iti BAvaH/ [101] taTA api
   tvagindriyeti/ yadyapi	tvac indriyA iti/ yadi api
   cakṣuritaranirūpitajñānatvānavacchinnajanyatāśrayajñānīyalaukikaviṣayatāśūnya	cakzuH itara nirUpita jQAna tvAnavacCinna janya tA ASraya jQAnIya lOkika vizaya tA SUnya
   tvarūpacakṣuritarāgrāhyatvavivakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ/ tathāpi tvagādeḥ	tu arUpa cakzuH itara agrAhya tva vivakzaNe na dozaH/ taTA api tvac AdeH
   cākṣuṣapratyakṣaṃ prati kālādividhayā	cAkzuza pratyakzam prati kAla Adi viDayA
   janakatāmādāyāsambhavavāraṇāya janakatāyāṃ	janakatAm AdAya asamBava vAraNAya janakatAyAm
   kālatvādyanavacchinnatvasya vā janyatāyāmevava vā	kAla tva Adi anavacCinna tvasya vA janyatAyAm evava vA
   jñānatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnatvasya vā vivakṣaṇīyatayā	jQAna tva vyApya Darma avacCinna tvasya vA vivakzaNIyatayA
   cakṣussaṃyuktasamavāyamādāyāsambhavavāraṇāya cakṣuritarasya dravyatvena	cakzussaMyukta samavAyam AdAya asamBava vAraNAya cakzuH itarasya dravya tvena
   viśeṣaṇīyatayā ca gauravamityālocya tatparityāgaḥ/ [101]	viSezaNIya tayA ca gOravam iti Alocya tad parityAgaH/ [101]
   tvagagrāhyatvetyādi/ tvācanirūpitalaukikaviṣayatāśūnyatvaṃ	tvac agrAhya tva ityAdi/ tvAca ni rUpita lOkika vizaya tA SUnya tvam
   cākṣuṣanirūpitalaukikaviṣayatāvatvaṃ ca jātiviśeṣaṇamatra vaktavyam/	cAkzuza nirUpita lOkika vizaya tAva tvam ca jAti viSezaNam atra vaktavyam/
   tena tvācapratyakṣe yapatvasyopanayamaryādayā bhāne 'pi tvacaśca	tena tvAca pratyakze yapatu asya upanaya maryAdayA BAne api tvacaH ca
   kālavidhayā rūpacākṣuṣajñānajanakatve 'pi na kṣatiḥ/ evaṃ gurutvādeḥ	kAla viDayA rUpa cAkzuza jQAna janaka tve api na kzatiH/ evam guru tva AdeH
   cākṣuṣe upanayamaryādayā bhāne 'pi nātivyāptiḥ/ atra rasādivāraṇāya	cAkzuze upanaya maryAdayA BAne api na ati vyAptiH/ atra rasa Adi vAraNAya
   cākṣuṣeti/ prabhādivāraṇāya guṇavibhājaketi/ guṇatvavyāpyetyarthaḥ/	cAkzuza iti/ praBA Adi vAraNAya guNa viBAjaka iti/ guNa tva vyApya iti arTaH/
   nanu prabhābhittisaṃyoge 'tivyāptivāraṇāya guṇapadameva	nanu praBA Bitti saMyoge ati vyApti vAraNAya guNa padam eva
   viśeṣaguṇaparaṃ kiṃ noktamityaśaṅkāyām āha  [101] ata	viSeza guNa param kim na uktam iti aSaFkAyAm Aha [101] ata
   evetyādi/ tathā ca darśitātivyāptivāraṇā	eva ityAdi/ taTA ca darSita ati vyApti vAraNA
   cakṣurmātragrāhlayasāṃsiddhikadravatvaviśeṣe 'tivyāptinirāsāya ca	cakzuH mAtra grAhlaya sAMsidDi kadrava tva viSeze ati vyApti nirAsAya ca
   jātighaṭitapariṣkārasyāvaśyakatayā tvagagrāhyatvādeḥ/	jAti Gawita parizkArasya AvaSyaka tayA tvac agrAhya tva AdeH/
   tadviśeṣaṇatayaivopapattau lakṣaṇe viśeṣatvaniveśanaṃ gauravāvahamiti	tad viSezaNa tayA eva upapattO lakzaNe viSeza tva niveSanam gOrava Avaham iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   dīpikāyām [100] avyāpyavṛttinīlādīti/ atrāvyāptivṛttitvaviśeṣaṇaṃ	dIpikAyAm [100] avyApya vRtti nIlA dIti/ atra avyApti vRtti tva viSezaNam
   parasparavaiyadhikaraṇyāśaṅkānirāsāya daiśikāvyāpyavṛttitvamiha	paraspara vEyaDikaraNyA SaFkA nirAsAya dESika avyApya vRtti tvam iha
   vivakṣitam/ tacca	vivakzitam/ tat ca
   1svapratiyogitvasvādhikaraṇanirūpitakiñciddeśāvacchinnādheyatvobhayasaṃbandhenābhāvaviśiṣṭatvam/	1sva pratiyogi tva sva aDikaraNa nirUpita kiQcid deSa avacCinna ADeya tva uBaya saMbanDena aBAva viSizwa tvam/
   nanu [100] rūpasya vyāpyavṛttitvaniyamāditi dīpikoktirasaṅgatā/	nanu [100] rUpasya vyApya vRtti tva niyamAt iti dIpikA uktiH asaFga tA/
   utpannaṃ dravyamiti nyāyena rūpādīnāṃ	utpannam dravyam iti nyAyena rUpa AdInAm
   kālikāvyāpyavṛttitvasyāvaśyakatvādityata āha   prakāśikāyām [101]	kAlikA vyApya vRtti tvasya AvaSyaka tvAt iti atas Aha  prakASikAyAm [101]
   vyāpyavṛttitveti/ daiśikavyāpyavṛttitvetyartha	vyApya vRtti tva iti/ dESika vyApya vRtti tva iti arTa
   iti/	iti/
   daiśikavyāpyavṛttitvaṃ ca pūrvoktobhayasambandhanābhāvaviśiṣṭānyatvam/	dESika vyApya vRtti tvam ca pUrva ukta uBaya sambanDana aBAva viSizwa anyatvam/
   svapratiyogitvetyādi/ svaṃ kapisaṃyogābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvaṃ	sva pratiyogitva ityAdi/ svam kapi saMyoga aBAvaH tad pratiyogi tvam
   kapisaṃyoge, evaṃ svaṃ kapisaṃyogābhāvaḥ tadadhikaraṇaṃ vṛkṣaḥ	kapi saMyoge, evam svam kapi saMyoga aBAvaH tad aDikaraNam vRkzaH
   tannirūpitāgradeśāvacchinnavṛttitvaṃ kapisaṃyoge 'stīti samanvayaḥ/	tad nirUpita agra deSa avacCinna vRtti tvam kapi saMyoge asti iti samanvayaH/
   1atra ca	1atra ca
   nīlādisamudāyaḥ nitrarūpamiti pratītiviṣayatvatadabhāvānyataravān	nIla Adi samudAyaH nitra rUpam iti pratIti vizaya tva tadaBAva anyataravAn
   prameyatvādityanumānaṃ nīlādisamudāyo yadi pratītiviṣayaḥ syāt	prameya tvAt iti anumAnam nIla Adi samudAyaH yadi pratIti vizayaH syAt 
   tarhyavyāpyavṛttiḥ syāditi tarkasahakṛtaṃ pramāṇaṃ vācyam/ tatra rūpasya	tarhi avyApya vRttiH syAt iti tarka saha kRtam pramANam vAcyam/ tatra rUpasya
   vyāpyavṛttitvaniyame vipratipannaṃ prati dūṣaṇāntaramāha   [101]	vyApya vRtti tva niyame vipratipannam prati dUzaNa antaram Aha  [101]
   idamupalakṣaṇamityādinā/ evaṃ ca	idam upalakzaNam ityAdinA/ evam ca
   darśitagauravajñānasahakṛtamuktānumānameva citrarūpasyātiriktatve	darSita gOrava jQAna saha kRta muktA anumAnam eva citra rUpasya atirikta tve
   pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ/ prāgabhāvādītyādinā dhvaṃsaparigrahaḥ/ nanu	pramANam iti BAvaH/ prAc aBAva Adi ityAdinA DvaMsa parigrahaH/ nanu
   citrapaṭe rūpavattāpratīteḥ	citrapawe rUpavattA pratIteH
   2sāmānādhikaraṇsambandhenāvayavarūpamādāyopapatteḥ atiriktacitrarūpaṃ	2sAmAna aDikaraNsambanDena avayava rUpam AdAya upapatteH atirikta citra rUpam
   nopeyate/ parasparavirodhena vyāpyavṛttinīlādisamudāyo 'pi na	na upeyate/ paraspara viroDena vyApya vRtti nIlA Adi samudAyaH api na
   tatrotpattumarhatīti āśaṅkate [100] nanu citretyādinā	tatra utpattum arhati iti ASaFkate [100] nanu citra ityAdinA
   dīpikāyām/ sāmānādhikaraṇyena tatra rūpasattvādāha   prakāśikāyām	dIpikAyAm/ sAmAnADikaraNyena tatra rUpa sattvAt Aha  prakASikAyAm
   [101] samavāyenetyādiriti/ 3samavetatvīyasambandhasya svarūpasya	[101] samavAyena iti AdiH iti/ 3samaveta tvIya sambanDasya svarUpasya
   kāraṇatāvacchedakatvākalpanayā lāghavamabhisandhāyāha   [101]	kAraNa tAvacCedaka tva akalpanayA lAGavam aBisanDAya Aha  [101]
   svāśrayasamavetatvasambandhena rūpamiti/ jñānagatapratyakṣatvajātau	sva ASraya samaveta tva sambanDena rUpam iti/ jQAna gata pratyakza tva jAtO
   prayojakatvāsambhavādāha   [101]	prayojaka tva asamBavAt Aha  [101]
   pratyakṣaviṣayatveti/ nanu	pratyakza vizaya tva iti/ nanu

   kāraṇatve citrapaṭasthale 'tiriktarūpatatprāgabhāvataddhvaṃsānāṃ kalpanayā	kAraNa tve citra pawa sTale ati rikta rUpa tad prAgaBAva tad DvaMsAnAm kalpanayA
   mahāgauravamiti tadapekṣayā svaśrayasamavetatvasambandhenaiva rūpasya	mahA gOravam iti tad apekzayA sva Sraya samaveta tva sambanDena eva rUpasya
   kāraṇatvamucitamityato dūṣaṇāntaramāha   [101] citrāvayavāvayavaketyādinā/	kAraNa tvam ucitam iti atas dUzaNa antaram Aha  [101] citra avayava avayavaka iti AdinA/
   dīpikāyām [101] tasmāt paṭasyetyādi/ ayamatra bhāvaḥ     ayaṃ paṭaḥ	dIpikAyAm [101] tasmAt pawasya ityAdi/ ayam atra BAvaH    ayam pawaH
   rūpatadabhāvānyataravān prameyatvādityanumānena yadyayaṃ rūpaśūnyaḥ	rUpa tad aBAva anyataravAn prameya tvAt iti anumAnena yadi ayam rUpa SUnyaH
   syāt tarhyapratyakṣaḥ syāditi tarkasahakṛtena siddhaṃ rūpaṃ	syAt tarhi apratyakzaH syAt iti tarka saha kRtena sidDam rUpam
   1. atra ceti/	1. atra ca iti/
   nīlīdisamudāyasya citrarūpatvābhāva ityarthaḥ/ yadvā rūpasya	nIlI di samudAyasya citra rUpa tva aBAvaH iti arTaH/ yat vA rUpasya
   vyāpyavṛttitva ityarthaḥ/ athavā citrarūpasyātiriktatva ityarthaḥ/	vyApya vRtti tvaH iti arTaH/ aTavA citra rUpasya atirikta tvaH iti arTaH/
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandheneti/ svādhikaraṇavṛttitvasaṃbandhenetyarthaḥ/	sAmAnADikaraNya saMbanDena iti/ sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva saMbanDena iti arTaH/
   svaṃ avayavatanturūpaṃ tadadhikaraṇaṃ tantavaḥ tadvṛttitvaṃ paṭastheti	svam avayava tantu rUpam tad aDikaraNam tantavaH tad vRtti tvam pawa sTa iti
   tena	tena
   saṃbandhena paṭasya tanturūpavattvam/	saMbanDena pawasya tantu rUpavat tvam/
   3. samavetatvīyeti/	3. samaveta tvIyA iti/
   rūpavatsamavetatvasya pratyakṣatvaprayojakatve tasya svarūpasaṃbandhenaiva	rUpa vat samaveta tvasya pratyakza tva prayojaka tve tasya svarUpa saMbanDena eva
   prayojakatvaṃ vācyamiti samavetatvapratiyogikasvarūpasaṃbandhasya	prayojaka tvam vAcyam iti samaveta tva pratiyogika svarUpa saMbanDasya
   kāraṇatāvacchedakasaṃbandhatvaṃ vaktavyam/ svāśrayasamavetatvasaṃbandhena	kAraNa tAvacCedaka saMbanDa tvam vaktavyam/ sva ASraya samaveta tva saMbanDena
   rūpasya	rUpasya
   kāraṇatve tu	kAraNa tve tu
   samavetatvameva kāraṇatāvacchedakasaṃbandhaḥ na tu tadīyasvarūpamiti	samaveta tvam eva kAraNa tAvacCedaka saMbanDaH na tu tadIya svarUpam iti
   lāghavamiti/ kāraṇatāvacchedakadharmalāghavamapyatra bodhyam/	lAGavamiti/ kAraNa tAvacCedaka Darma lAGavam api atra boDyam/
   pūrvoktayuktyā	pUrva ukta yuktyA
   atiriktatvasiddheḥ citrarūpamiti vyavahriyata iti/ citrarasāsiddhau	atirikta tva sidDeH citra rUpam iti vyavahriyate iti/ citra rasa asidDO
   hetumāha   [101] dravyalaukiketyādi/ tathā cāyaṃ	hetum Aha  [101] dravya lOkika ityAdi/ taTA ca ayam
   rasatadabhāvānyataravān	rasa tad aBAva anyataravAn
   prameyatvādityanumānamanukūlatarkavirahādaprayojakamiti bhāvaḥ/ atra	prameya tvAt iti anumAnam anukUla tarka virahAt aprayojakam iti BAvaH/ atra
   ca nānārasavadavayavadvayārabdhe vastuni atra rasa iti pratītyupapattaye	ca nAnA rasa vat avayava dvaya ArabDe vastuni atra rasaH iti prati iti upapattaye
   citrarasāṅgīkāra āvaśyaka iti tvanāśaṅkanīyam/	citra rasa aFgIkAraH AvaSyakaH iti tu anASaFkanIyam/
   tatrāvayavarasasyaiva 1sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhānābhyupagamāt/ yatra ca	tatra avayava rasasya eva 1sA mAna aDikaraNyena BAna aByupagamAt/ yatra ca
   nānārasavatparamāṇudvayārabdhadvyaṇukādikrameṇa mahāvayaviparyantaṃ	nAnA rasa vat paramANu dvaya ArabDa dvi aNuka Adi krameNa mahA vaya viparyantam
   utpannaṃ tatra rasapratītirnopeyata eva/ dharmiṇaḥ rāsanapratyakṣe	utpannam tatra rasa pratItiH na upeyate eva/ DarmiNaH rAsana pratyakze
   upanayamaryādayaiva bhānābhyupagamāt/ paramāṇurasasyāpi	upanaya maryAdayA eva BAna aByupagamAt/ paramANu rasasya api
   viśeṣyavidhayālaukikapratyakṣāsambhavāt/ upanītaṃ viśeṣaṇatayaiveti	viSezya viDayA alOkika pratyakzA samBava at/ upanItam viSezaNa tayA eva iti
   naiyāyikasiddhāntāditi/ vastutastu tasasya vyāpyavṛttitvaniyame	nEyAyika sidDAntAditi/ vastutas tu tasasya vyApya vRtti tva niyame
   pramāṇābhāvāt deśabhedāvacchedena ekasminneva vastuni	pramANa aBAvAt deSa Beda avacCedena ekasmin= eva vastuni
   nānārasotpattisambhavāt samavāyenātra rasa iti pratīteḥ	nAnA rasa utpatti samBavAt samavAyena atra rasaH iti pratIteH
   pramārūpāyā nānupapattiḥ/ sarvamidamabhisandhāyoktam [101] saṅkṣepa iti/	pramA rUpAyAH na anupapattiH/ sarvam idam aBisanDAya uktam [101] saFkzepaH iti/
   rasanirūpaṇam	rasa nirUpaNam
   nanu [103] rasanagrāhyo guṇo rasa iti lakṣaṇavākye	nanu [103] rasana grAhyaH guNaH rasaH iti lakzaNa vAkye
   paramāṇurase 'vyāptiḥ/ rasanagrāhyajātimattvavivakṣāyāmapi	paramANu rase avyAptiH/ rasana grAhya jAtimattva vivakzAyAm api
   sattādikamādāya	sattA Adikam AdAya
   rūpādāvativyāptirata āha   [104]	rUpa AdO= ati vyAptiH atas Aha  [104]
   rasanetyādi/ [104] guṇavibhājaketi/ 2guṇatvanyūnavṛttitvaṃ vivakṣitam/	rasanA ityAdi/ [104] guNa viBAjaka iti/ 2guNa tva nyUna vRtti tvam vivakzitam/
   sparśanirūpaṇam	sparSanirUpaNam
   nanu tvagindrayamātragrāhya	nanu tvac indraya mAtra grAhya
