   paramāṇusparśe 'vyāptiḥ/ tvagragrāhyatvāt ityata āha   [104]	paramANu sparSe avyAptiH/ tu agra grAhya tvAt iti atas Aha  [104]
   cakṣuragrāhyetyādi/	cakzuH agrAhya ityAdi/
   sāmānādhikaraṇyeneti/ svāśrayasamavetatvasaṃbandhenetyarthaḥ/	sAmAnADikaraNyena iti/ sva ASraya samaveta tva saMbanDena iti arTaH/
   2. nanu	2. nanu
   guṇavibhājakatvaṃ guṇatvavyāpyatvam, tacca guṇatvasyāpyakṣatamiti	guNa viBAjaka tvam guNa tva vyApya tvam, tat ca guNa tvasya api akzatam iti
   tadādāya rūpādāvativyāptirityata āha   guṇatvanyūnavṛttitvaṃ	tat AdAya rUpa AdO= ati vyAptiH iti atas Aha  guNa tva nyUna vRtti tvam
   vivakṣitamiti/ guṇatvanyūnavṛttitvaṃ ca guṇatvasamānādhikaraṇatve	vivakzitam iti/ guNa tva nyUna vRtti tvam ca guNa tva samAna aDikaraNa tve
   sati guṇatvasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvam/ tacca	sati guNa tva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvam/ tat ca
   guṇatvasya nāstīti bhāvaḥ	guNa tvasya na asti iti BAvaH
   cakṣuragrāhyatvaṃ ca	cakzuH agrAhya tvam ca
   cākṣuṣanirūpitalaukikaviṣayatāśūnyatvam/ tvagindriyagrāhyatvaṃ ca	cAkzuza nirUpita lOkika vizaya tA SUnya tvam/ tvac indriya grAhya tvam ca
   tvācanirūpitalaukikaviṣayatāvattvam/ nātaḥ 1pūrvavaddoṣaḥ/	tvAca nirUpita lOkika vizaya tAvat tvam/ na atas 1pUrvavat dozaH/
   guṇavibhājakatvaṃ ca vāyupratyakṣatāvādinavīnamate	guNa viBAjaka tvam ca vAyu pratyakza tA vAdi navIna mate
   vāyutvajātimādāya vāyāvativyāptivāraṇāya upāttam/	vAyu tva jAtim AdAya vAyO= ati vyApti vAraNAya upAttam/
   pākaprakriyānirūpaṇam	pAka prakriyA nirUpaNam
   [106] parāvṛttyādītyādinā rūpāntaraparigrahaḥ/	[106] parAvRtti Adi ityAdinA rUpa antara parigrahaH/
   nanu [105] āmanikṣipte ghaṭa iti dīpikāvākye	nanu [105] Ama nikzipte GawaH iti dIpikA vAkye
   saptamyantaghaṭapadasyottaratrānvayāsambhavāt asaṅgatirityato	saptamI anta Gawa padasya uttaratra anvayA samBavAt asaFga tiriti atas 
   yojanāmāha    [106] ghaṭe āmanikṣipte satīti/ tathā ca	yojanAm Aha   [106] Gawe Ama nikzipte satIti/ taTA ca
   ghaṭapadottarasaptamyā āmasaṃyogor'thaḥ/ tasya	Gawa pada uttara saptamyAH Ama saMyogoH aTaH/ tasya
   cottarakālīnatvasaṃbandhena śyāmaghaṭanāśe anvaya iti bhāvaḥ/	ca uttarakAlIna tva saMbanDena SyAma Gawa nASe anvayaH iti BAvaH/
   nanu paramāṇuṣu	nanu paramANuzu
   rūpotpattau śyāmaghaṭanāśa iti dīpikāvākyāt śyāmaghaṭanāśe	rUpa utpattO SyAma Gawa nASaH iti dIpikA vAkyAt SyAma Gawa nASe
   paramāṇuniṣṭharūpotpattyuttarakālīnatvaṃ labhyate/ taccayuktam  	paramANu nizWa rUpa utpatti uttara kAlIna tvam laByate/ tat ca yuktam  
   avayavināśānantarameva paramāṇuṣu rūpāntarotpatteḥ vaiśeṣikaiḥ	avayavi nASa anantaram eva paramANuzu rUpa antara utpatteH vESezikEH
   svīkārāt ato yojanayā anvayamāha    [106] śyāmaghaṭanāśa ityādi/	svIkArAt atas yojanayA anvayam Aha   [106] SyAma Gawa nASaH ityAdi/
   jāti iti śeṣaḥ/ tathā ca nāśapadottarasaptamyāḥ utpattirarthaḥ/	jAti iti SezaH/ taTA ca nASa pada uttara saptamyAH utpattiH arTaH/
   tasyāścottarakālīnatvasambandhena rūpāntarotpattāvanvaya iti bhāvaḥ/	tasyAH ca uttarakAlIna tva sambanDena rUpa antara utpattO= anvayaH iti BAvaH/
   [106] svatantreṣviti/ viśakaliteṣvityarthaḥ/	[106] svatantrezu iti/ viSakalitezu iti arTaH/
   ārambhakasaṃyogarahiteṣviti yāvat/ [106] aparāvayavīti/	AramBaka saMyoga rahitezu iti yAvat/ [106] aparAvayavI iti/
   pūrvavinaṣṭāvayavivyatiriktāvayavītyarthaḥ/ [106] ata	pUrva vinazwa avaya vi vyatirikta avayavI iti arTaH/ [106] ata
   eveti/ avayavinyapi paramāṇuvat pākāṅgīkārādevetyarthaḥ/ nanu	eva iti/ avayavinI api paramANu vat pAka aFgIkArAt eva iti arTaH/ nanu
   so 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti	saH ayam GawaH iti
   pratyabhijñāsājātyamavalambate/ nirvāpitāropitadīpe seyaṃ	pratyaBijQAsA jAtyam avalambate/ nirvApita Aropita dIpe sA iyam
   dīpajvāleti pratyabhijñāvat na tvekasyā eva vyakteḥ kāladvayasambandham/	dIpa jvAlA iti pratyaBijQAvat na tu ekasyAH eva vyakteH kAla dvaya sambanDam/
   ato na virodha ityato dūṣaṇāntaramāha   [105] anantāvayavītyādi/	atas na viroDaH iti atas dUzaNa antaram Aha  [105] ananta avayavI ityAdi/

   prāgabhāvaparigrahaḥ/	prAc aBAva parigrahaH/

   1. pūrvavaddoṣa iti/	1. pUrvavat dozaH iti/

   [107] yathāyogyamiti/ tathā ca	[107] yaTAyogyam iti/ taTA ca

   jātirūpatāyā indriyalakṣaṇāvasare nirastatvāt atra ca	jAti rUpa tAyAH indriya lakzaNa avasare nirasta tvAt atra ca
   jātirūpatvokteḥ pūrvottaragranthavirodha ityāśaṅkya	jAti rUpa tva ukteH pUrva uttara granTa viroDaH iti ASaFkya
   matabhedanobhayagranthasaṅgatiriti tasya jātirūpatvamevetyāha   [107]	mata Bedana uBaya granTa saFgatiH iti tasya jAti rUpa tvam eva iti Aha  [107]
   udbhūtatvaṃ jātirityādinā/ guṇagateti/ guṇaghaṭitetyarthaḥ/	udBUta tvam jAtiH ityAdinA/ guNa gata iti/ guNa GawitA iti arTaH/

   sāṅkaryasya jātibādhakatāyāṃ pramāṇabhūte dharmaśāstre	sAFkaryasya jAti bADaka tAyAm pramANa BUte Darma SAstre

   bodhayatīti bhāvaḥ/	boDayati iti BAvaH/
   saṃyoganirūpaṇam	saMyoga nirUpaNam

   yadyatsvaṃ tāvadanyatamatvaṃ tu sarvajñenaiva jñeyam, mahāgauravaṃ, ca ato	yat yat svam tAvat anyatama tvam tu sarvajQena eva jQeyam, mahA gOravaM, ca atas 
   niṣkṛṣṭārthamāha    [110] svapratiyogitvetyādi/ yadyapi	nizkRzwa arTam Aha   [110] sva pratiyogitva ityAdi/ yadi api
   svātyantābhāvasamānādhikaraṇatvatādātmyobhayasaṃbandhena	svAtyanta aBAva samAna aDikaraNa tva tAdAtmya uBaya saMbanDena
   prameyaviśiṣṭatvamanugatam, tathāpi	prameya viSizwa tvam anugatam, taTA api

   athātra	aTa atra
   saṃyogādisambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitāka ghaṭatvādyabhāvādyadhikaraṇe	saMyoga Adi sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Gawa tva Adi aBAva Adi aDikaraNe
   samavāyādinā ghaṭatvādessattvāt tatrātivyāptiḥ/ na ca	samavAya AdinA Gawa tva AdeH sattvAt tatra ativyAptiH/ na ca

   na cābhāvaviśiṣṭatvaṃ	na ca aBAva viSizwa tvam
   tat, vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca svapratiyogitvasvaviśiṣṭādheyatvobhayasaṃbandhena/	tat, vESizwyam ca sva pratiyogi tva sva viSizwa ADeya tva uBaya saMbanDena/

   svābhāvaniṣṭhapratiyogitāvacchedakasvarūpasaṃbandhena paṭādau	svABAva nizWa pratiyogi ta avacCedaka svarUpa saMbanDena pawa AdO
   tatsattvāt/	tad sattvAt/
   na ca svasmin	na ca svasmin

   adhikaraṇatāviśiṣṭatvaṃ tat, vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	aDikaraNa tA viSizwa tvam tat, vESizwyam ca

   svāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvasvanirūpakābhāvādhikaraṇanirūpitatvobhayasambandheneti	svAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva sva nirUpaka aBAva aDikaraNa nirUpita tva uBaya sambanDena iti
   vācyam/	vAcyam/
   evamapi	evam api
   dravyānyatvaviśiṣṭasattābhāvādāvativyāpteḥ/	dravya anyatva viSizwa satta aBAva AdO= ati vyApteH/
   tadabhāvarūpaviśiṣṭasattāyāḥ śuddhasattānatiriktatayā tadadhikaraṇe	tad aBAva rUpa viSizwa sattAyAH SudDa satta anatirikta tayA tad aDikaraNe
   ghaṭādau tatsattvāt/ na cābhāvatvaviśiṣṭatvaṃ adhikaraṇatāviśiṣṭatvaṃ	Gawa AdO tad sattva at/ na ca aBAva tva viSizwa tvam aDikaraNa tA viSizwa tvam
   vā tat/ prathame vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vA tat/ praTame vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpitapratiyogitvasvaviśiṣṭādheyatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpita pratiyogi tva sva viSizwa ADeya tva uBaya sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchinnādhikaraṇanirūpitatvasvanirūpitapratiyogitāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvobhayasambandhena/	sva avacCinna aDikaraNa nirUpita tva sva nirUpita pratiyogi ta avacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva uBaya sambanDena/
   dvitīye adhikaraṇatā svanirūpitapratiyogitātvasambandhena/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	dvitIye aDikaraNa tA sva nirUpita pratiyogitAtva sambanDena/ vESizwyam
   ca svāśrayāśrayatvasvaviśiṣṭādheyatvobhayasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	ca sva ASraya ASraya tva sva viSizwa ADeya tva uBaya sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpakābhāvatvāvacchinnādhikaraṇanirūpitatvasvāśrayāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpaka aBAva tva avacCinna aDikaraNa nirUpita tva sva ASraya avacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva uBaya sambanDena/
   ato na doṣaḥ/ atra dravyānyatvaviśiṣṭasattābhāvo nāstītyapratyayāt	atas na dozaH/ atra dravya anyatva viSizwa sattA BAvaH na asti iti apratyayAt 
   guṇādau tādṛśasattābhāvābhāvatvena vṛttyanupagamāditi vācyam/	guNa AdO tAdRSa sattA BAva aBAva tvena vRtti anupagamAt iti vAcyam/
   evamapyabhāvatvasyānugatākhaṇḍopādhirūpatāyā anyatra vyavasthāpitatvena	evam api aBAva tvasya anugata aKaNxa upADi rUpa tAyAH anyatra vyavasTApita tvena
   tasya sarvatrābhinnatayā taddoṣatādavasthyāt/	tasya sarvatra aBinnatayA tad doza tAdavasTyAt/
   atrocyate  	atra ucyate  
   adhikaraṇatāviśiṣṭatvamavyāpyavṛttitvam/ adhikaraṇatā ca	aDikaraNa tA viSizwa tvam avyApya vRtti tvam/ aDikaraNa tA ca
   svaviśiṣṭapratiyogitātvasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva viSizwa pratiyogi tAtva sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca
   svaviśiṣṭābhāvanirūpitatvasvanirūpita  	sva viSizwa aBAva nirUpita tva svanirUpitaH  
   kiñciddharmāvacchinnaprakāratānirūpitasaṃsargatvobhayasambandhena/ abhāve	kiQcid Darma avacCinna prakAra tA nirUpita saMsarga tva uBaya sambanDena/ aBAve
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca svāśrayatva1svasetyādibhedavattvobhayasambandhena/	sva vESizwyam ca sva ASraya tva1 svasa ityAdi Bedavat tva uBaya sambanDena/
   svādhikaraṇatā ca svāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa tA ca sva avacCeda ka tA sambanDena/
   svasetyādibhedavattveti/	svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva iti/
   svādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvetyarthaḥ/	sva aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva iti arTaH/
   bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā ca ādheyatāsambandhena/	Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tA ca ADeya tA sambanDena/
   adhikaraṇatāviśiṣṭatvaṃ	aDikaraNa tA viSizwa tvam
   svāśrayāśrayatvasvaviśiṣṭādheyatvobhayasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva ASraya ASraya tva sva viSizwa ADeya tva uBaya sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca
   svāśrayāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaviśiṣṭādhikaraṇanirūpitatvībhayasambandhena/	sva ASraya avacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva viSizwa aDikaraNa nirUpita tvI Baya sambanDena/
   adhikaraṇe svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca svasetyādibhedavattvasambandhena/	aDikaraNe sva vESizwyam ca svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva sambanDena/
   svādhikaraṇatvaṃ ca svanirūpakaviṣayatāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa tvam ca sva nirUpaka vizaya tAvat Cedaka tA sambanDena/
   bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā	Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tA
   svarūpasambandhāvacchinnādheyatāvacchedakatāsambandhena/ yadyapi	svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tAvat Ceda ka tA sambanDena/ yadi api
   kālikasambandhena ghaṭatvābhāvādiviśiṣṭasya dhvaṃsasya ghaṭādau	kAlika sambanDena Gawa tva aBAva Adi viSizwasya DvaMsasya Gawa AdO
   sambhavāt atiprasaṅgaḥ, tathāpi svaviśiṣṭādhikaraṇanirūpitatvasthāne	samBavAt atiprasaFgaH, taTA api sva viSizwa aDikaraNa nirUpita tva sTAne
   svaviśiṣṭādhikaraṇatāvannirūpitatvaṃ niveśyam/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva viSizwa aDikaraNa tAvat nirUpita tvam niveSyam/ sva vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedanirūpitatvasvasetyādibhedavattvobhayasambandhena/	sva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda nirUpita tva svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva uBaya sambanDena/
   bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā svaviśiṣṭāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tA sva viSizwa avacCeda katA sambanDena/
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vESizwyam ca
   svāśrayanirūpitasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvanirūpitatvasvanirūpakaviṣayatāvacchedakatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvobhayasambandhena/	sva ASraya nirUpita svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tva nirUpita tva sva nirUpaka vizaya tAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva uBaya sambanDe
   vastutastu	vastutas tu
   1pratiyogitāviśiṣṭatvamavyāpyavṛttitvam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	1pratiyogitA viSizwa tvam avyApya vRtti tvam/ vESizwyam ca
   svāśrayatvasvaviśiṣṭādheyatvobhayasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva ASraya tva sva viSizwa ADeya tva uBaya sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvasvāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnatvasvanirūpakābhāvādhikaraṇanirūpitatvatritayasambandhena/	svAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva svAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna tva sva nirUpaka aBAva aDikaraNa nirUpita tva tritaya sambanDena/
   2tena viśiṣṭasattvasya nāvyāpyavṛttitvamiti dhyeyam/	2tena viSizwa sattvasya na avyApya vRtti tvam iti Dyeyam/
   pratiyogitāviśiṣṭatvamityādi/ pratiyogitā kapisaṃyoganiṣṭhā	pratiyogitA viSizwa tvam ityAdi/ pratiyogitA kapi saMyoga nizWA
   tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ kapisaṃyoge svāśrayatvasaṃbandhenāsti, kapisaṃyogasya	tad viSizwa tvam kapi saMyoge sva ASraya tva saMbanDena Asti, kapi saMyogasya
   pratiyogitāśrayatvāt/ evaṃ	pratiyogita ASraya tva at/ evam
   pratiyogitāvacchedakasamavāyasaṃbandhāvacchinnā	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka samavAya saMbanDa avacCinnA
   pratiyogitāvacchedakakapisaṃyogatvāvacchinnā	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka kapi saMyoga tva avacCinnA
   pratiyogitānirūpakakapisaṃyogābhāvādhikaraṇavṛkṣanirūpitā ca	pratiyogitA nirUpaka kapi saMyoga aBAva aDikaraNa vRkza nirUpitA ca
   kapisaṃyoganiṣṭhādheyatā bhavati iti tritayasaṃbandhena	kapi saMyoga nizWA ADeya tA Bavati iti tritaya saMbanDena
   pratiyogitāviśiṣṭamādheyatvaṃ ca kapisaṃyoge 'stīti	pratiyogitA viSizwam ADeya tvam ca kapi saMyoge asti iti
   kapisaṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitvam/	kapi saMyogasya avyApya vRtti tvam/
   2. tena	2. tena
   viśiṣṭasattvasyeti/ viśiṣṭasattāniṣṭhāyāḥ	viSizwa sattvasya iti/ viSizwa sattA nizWAyAH
   viśiṣṭasattāniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpakābhāvādhikaraṇaguṇanirūpitādheyatāyāḥ	viSizwa sattA nizWa pratiyogitA nirUpaka aBAva aDikaraNa guNa nirUpita ADeya tAyAH
   pratiyogitāvacchedakaviśiṣṭasattātvāvacchinnatvavirahāt	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka viSizwa sattAtva avacCinna tva virahAt
   uktatritayasambandhena pratiyogitāviśiṣṭatvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ	ukta tritaya sambanDena pratiyogitA viSizwa tva aBAvAt iti BAvaH
   vibhāganirūpaṇam	viBAga nirUpaNam
   [111] kecidityasvarasassūcitaḥ/ tadbījantu	[111] kecid iti a svarasassUcitaH/ tat bIjantu
   janyamātrasya kālatvapakṣe janyarūpādāvativyāptiriti/ pare tvityādi/	janya mAtrasya kAla tva pakze janya rUpa AdO= ati vyAptiH iti/ pare tu ityAdi/
   atra cāvacchinnāntena janyatāviśeṣaṇena ghaṭitamekaṃ lakṣaṇam/	atra ca avacCinna antena janyatA viSezaNena Gawitam ekam lakzaNam/
   samavāyasambandhāvacchinnatvena kāraṇatāviśeṣaṇena ghaṭitamaparaṃ	samavAya sambanDa avacCinna tvena kAraNa tA viSezaNena Gawitam aparam
   lakṣaṇam iti vivekaḥ/ anyathā ekatra lakṣaṇe ubhayaniveśane	lakzaNam iti vivekaH/ anyaTA ekatra lakzaNe uBaya niveSane
   prayojanābhāvāt/ tattaddhvaṃsavyaktitvāvacchinnaṃ prati tādātmyena	prayojana aBAva at/ tad tad DvaMsa vyakti tva avacCinnam prati tAdAtmyena
   tattatpratiyogivyakteḥ kāraṇatayaiva saṃyogā   [dya]	tad tad pratiyogi vyakteH kAraNa tayA eva saMyogAH  [dya]
   (di)tivyāptivāraṇāditi bodhyam/	(di)ti vyApti vAraNAt iti boDyam/
   nanu kāryasāmānyaṃ	nanu kArya sAmAnyam
   prati tādātmyena hetubhūte kālādau ativyāptivirahāt	prati tAdAtmyena hetu BUte kAla AdO ati vyApti virahAt 
   guṇapadavaiyarthyamityāśaṅkāṃ tasya	guNa pada vEyarTyam iti ASaFkAm tasya
   darśitārthatātparyagrāhakatvopagamena pariharati   [111] etattātparyeti/	darSita arTa tAtparya grAhaka tva upagamena pariharati  [111] etat tAtparyeti/
   paratvāparatvanirūpaṇam	paratva aparatva nirUpaNam
   nanu	nanu
   parāparavyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇe paratvāparatve iti	parApara vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNe paratva aparatve iti
   saṅgrahavākyāt ubhayavyavahārāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvamubhayalakṣaṇamiti	saFgraha vAkyAt uBaya vyavahArAsa ADAraNa kAraNa tvam uBaya lakzaNam iti
   labhyate/ taccāsambhavi, paratvādeḥ	laByate/ tat ca asamBavi, paratva AdeH
   pratyekamaparavyavahārādyasādhāraṇakāraṇatvavirahāt, ato vyācaṣṭe  	pratyekam apara vyavahAra Adya sADAraNa kAraNa tva virahAt, atas vyAcazwe  
   [112] dīpikāyāṃ paravyavahāretyādi/ asamavāyikāraṇatvamātrasya	[112] dIpikAyAm para vyavahAra ityAdi/ asamavAyikAraNa tva mAtrasya
   gurutvalakṣaṇatve tantudvayasaṃyogādāvativyāptiḥ/ patanakāraṇatvasya	guru tva lakzaNa tve tantu dvaya saMyoga AdO= ativyAptiH/ patana kAraNa tvasya
   tathātve 'pi āśrayatayā patanasamavāyikāraṇe phalādāvativyāptiḥ	taTA tve api ASrayatayA patana samavAyi kAraNe Pala AdO= ati vyAptiH
   sphuṭaivetyālocyādyapadasya kṛtyamāha   [113] dvitīyādīti/	sPuwA eva iti Alocya Adya padasya kRtyam Aha  [113] dvitIya Adi iti/
   nanvādyatvamihādau bhavamiti vyutpattyā pūrvakālotpannatvaṃ, tacca	nanu Adya tvam iha AdO Bavam iti vyutpattyA pUrva kAla utpanna tvan, tat ca
   dvitīyādipatanasyāpi tṛtīyādipatanapūrvakālotpannatayā akṣatamiti	dvitIya Adi patanasya api tRtIya Adi patana pUrva kAla utpanna tayA akzatam iti
   kathaṃ tadvāraṇasambhava ityata ādyatvamanyādṛśaṃ nirvakti   [111]	kaTam tat vAraNa samBavaH iti atas Adya tva m anyAdRSam nirvakti  [111]
   prakāśikāyām ādyatvamiheti/ svasamānādhikaraṇetyādi/ athātra	prakASikAyAm Adya tvam iha iti/ sva samAna aDikaraNa ityAdi/ aTa atra
   svapadamanuyogiparam vā pratiyogiparam vā/ nādyaḥ,	sva padam anuyogi param vA pratiyogi param vA/ na AdyaH,
   ādyapatanavyaktīnāmānantyāt/ tenaikopādāne itarāsaṅgrahāt/	Adya patana vyaktInAm AnantyAt/ tena eka upAdAne itara asaFgrahAt/
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikadhvaṃsāsamānakālīnaṃ yadyatsvaṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika DvaMsa asamAna kAlInam yat yat svam
   tāvadanyatamattvaṃ tu asarvajñadurjñeyam/ anyatamattvaghaṭakabhedānāṃ	tAvat anyatamat tvam tu asarvajQa durjQeyam/ anyatamat tva Gawaka BedAnAm
   mitho	miTas 
   viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāve vinigamanāvirahaśca/ nāpyuttaraḥ,	viSezaNa viSezya BAve vinigamanA virahaH ca/ na api uttaraH,
   tādṛśayatkiñcidekapatanavyaktibhedasya dvitīyādipatanasādhāraṇatvāt/	tAdRSayat kiQcid ekapatana vyakti Bedasya dvitIya Adi patana sADAraNa tvAt/
   tādṛśaṃ yadyatsvaṃ tattadvyaktitvāvacchinnabhedakūṭavattvasya	tAdRSam yat yat svam tad tad vyakti tva avacCinna Beda kUwavat tvasya
   tāvadanyatamatvāvacchinnabhedavattvasya vā prāguktadoṣadūṣitatvāt/	tAvat anyatama tva avacCinna Bedavat tvasya vA prAc ukta doza dUzita tvAt/
   atrocyate  	atra ucyate  
   1tādātmyasvasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikadhvaṃsasamānakālīnatvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacche 	1tAdAtmya sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika DvaMsa samAna kAlIna tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA vacCe 
   dakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvobhayasambandhena	daka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva uBaya sambanDena
   patanaviśiṣṭatvamādyatvamiti anuyogini svatvāntarbhāve	patana viSizwa tvam Adya tvam iti anuyogini sva tva antarBAve
   sthūlānugamaḥ/	sTUla anugamaH/
   2svasamānādhikaraṇapatanadhvaṃsasamānakālīnatvasambandhāvacchinnasvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvāśrayatvobhayasaṃbandhenabhedaviśiṣṭatvamiti	2svasamAna aDikaraNa patana DvaMsa samAna kAlIna tva sambanDa avacCinna sva pratiyogita avacCedaka tva ASraya tva uBaya saMbanDena Beda viSizwa tvam iti
   sūkṣmānugamaḥ/ 3pratiyogini svatvādare tu	sUkzma anugamaH/ 3pratiyogini sva tva Adare tu
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanadhvaṃsasamānakālikatvavādātmyobhayasaṃbandhena	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana DvaMsa samAna kAlika tva vAdAtmya uBaya saMbanDena
   patanaviśiṣṭānyatvamiti sthūlānugamaḥ/	patana viSizwa anyatvam iti sTUla anugamaH/
   4svasamānakālīkatvasvasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikatvasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvobhayasambandhena	4svasa mAna kAlIka tva svasamAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika tva sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tva uBaya sambanDena
   1. tādātmyetyādi svaṃ	1. tAdAtmya ityAdi svam
   prathamapatanaṃ tatsamānādhikaraṇam yat dvitīyapatanaṃ	praTama patanam tad samAna aDikaraNam yat dvitIya patanam
   taddhvaṃsasamānakālikatvaṃ prathamapatane nāstīti	tad DvaMsa samAna kAlika tvam praTama patane na asti iti
   tādṛśasamānanakālikatvasambandhena svavadbhinnatvasya svatādātmyasya ca	tAdRSa samAna na kAlika tva sambanDena sva vat Binna tvasya sva tAdAtmyasya ca
   prathamapatane sattvāt tasya ādyatvopapattiḥ/	praTama patane sattvAt tasya Adya tva upapattiH/
   svasamānādhikaraṇetyādi/ prathamasvaśabdaḥ ādyapatanaparaḥ/	sva samAna aDikaraNa ityAdi/ praTama sva SabdaH Adya patana paraH/
   dvitīyasvaśabdaḥ	dvitIya sva SabdaH
   ādyapatanavadbhedaparaḥ/ ādyapatanasamānādhikaraṇaṃ yat dvitīyapatanaṃ	Adya patana vat Beda paraH/ Adya patana samAna aDikaraNam yat dvitIya patanam
   tatpratiyogikadhvaṃsasamānakālikatvasambandhena yaḥ ādyapatanavadbhedaḥ	tad pratiyogika DvaMsa samAna kAlika tva sambanDena yaH Adya patana vat BedaH
   tadāśrayatvaṃ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ cādyapatane 'stīti samanvayaḥ/	tad ASraya tvam tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam ca Adya patane asti iti samanvayaH/
   3. pratiyoginītyādi/	3. pratiyoginI ityAdi/
   svaṃ dvitīyapatanaṃ tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ yat prathamapatanaṃ	svam dvitIya patanam tad samAna aDikaraNam yat praTama patanam
   taddhvaṃsasamānakālikatvaṃ tādātmyaṃ ca dvitīyapatane 'stīti	tad DvaMsa samAna kAlika tvam tAdAtmyam ca dvitIya patane asti iti
   uktobhayasambandhena dvitīyapatanaviśiṣṭaṃ tadeva, tadanyatvaṃ	ukta uBaya sambanDena dvitIya patana viSizwam tat eva, tad anya tvam
   prathamapatane 'stīti samanvayo bodhyaḥ/	praTama patane asti iti samanvayaH boDyaH/
   svasamānakālikatvetyādi/ dhvaṃsapadena prathamapatanadhvaṃso grāhyaḥ/	sva samAna kAlika tva ityAdi/ DvaMsa padena praTama patana DvaMsaH grAhyaH/
   tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ dvitīyapatane tadanyatvaṃ prathamapatana iti samanvayo	tad viSizwa tvam dvitIya patane tad anya tvam praTama patanaH iti samanvayaH 
   vācyaḥ/ tathāhi   prathamasvapadaṃ prathamapatanadhvaṃsaparam/	vAcyaH/ taTA hi  praTama sva padam praTama patana DvaMsa param/
   tādṛśadhvaṃsasamānakālikatvaṃ dvitīyapatane 'sita/ dvitīyasvapadaṃ	tAdRSa DvaMsa samAna kAlika tvam dvitIya patane asita/ dvitIya sva padam
   dvitīyapatanaparam/ dvitīyapatanaṃ hi	dvitIya patana param/ dvitIya patanam hi
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikatvasambandhena prathamapatanadhvaṃse	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika tva sambanDena praTama patana DvaMse
   'sti	asti
   iti dvitīyapatananiṣṭhā prathamapatanadhvaṃsanirūpitā ādheyatā	iti dvitIya patana nizWA praTama patana DvaMsa nirUpitA ADeya tA
   svasamānādhikaraṇapatanapratiyogikatvasambandhāvacchinnā bhavati/ tathā ca	sva samAna aDikaraNa patana pratiyogika tva sambanDa avacCinnA Bavati/ taTA ca
   tādṛśādheyatāsambandhena prathamapatanadhvaṃsaviśiṣṭaṃ dvitīyapatanaṃ	tAdRSa ADeya tA sambanDena praTama patana DvaMsa viSizwam dvitIya patanam
   tadanyatvamādyapatane iti bodhyam/	tad anya tvam Adyapatane iti boDyam/
   dhvaṃsaviśiṣṭānyatvamiti sūkṣmānugamaḥ/ tādṛśādheyatvasthāne	DvaMsa viSizwa anyatvam iti sUkzma anugamaH/ tAdRSa ADeya tva sTAne
   1svapratiyogipatanasamānādhikaraṇatvaṃ vā niveśyamiti na ko 'pi	1sva pratiyogi patana samAna aDikaraNa tvam vA niveSyam iti na kaH api
   doṣaḥ/ evamanyatrāpi/ yadyapi vṛkṣāt saudhe patitasya phalādeḥ	dozaH/ evam anyatra api/ yadi api vRkzAt sODe patitasya Pala AdeH
   saudhātpatanadaśāyāṃ tatra niruktamādyatvamasambhavi/ tathāpi tatra	sODAt patana daSAyAm tatra niruktam Adya tvam asamBavi/ taTA api tatra
   saudhāvadhikapatanaṃ tādṛśaphalādigatam na tāvat sāmānyata ādyam,	sODO= aDika patanam tAdRSa Pala Adi gatam na tAvat sAmAnyatas Adyam,
   parantu saudhāvadhikapataneṣu prāthamikapatanasyādyatvaṃ sambhavati/ tacca	parantu sODO= aDika patanezu prATamika patanasya adya tvam samBavati/ tat ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇasaudhāvadhikapatanadhvaṃsamānakālīnatvādirūpamityavadhiviśeṣaghaṭitamādyatvaṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa sODO= aDika patana DvaMsa mAna kAlIna tva Adi rUpam iti avaDi viSeza Gawitam Adya tvam
   vācyam/ evaṃ ca vṛkṣāvadhikapatanasya	vAcyam/ evam ca vRkzO= aDika patanasya
   svasamānādhikaraṇavṛkṣāvadhikapatanaprāgabhāvāsamānākālīnatvādirūpaṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa vRkzO= aDika patana prAgaBAva asamAnA kAlIna tva Adi rUpam
   avadhiviśeṣaghaṭitameva caramatvaṃ nirvācyam/	avaDi viSeza Gawitam eva carama tvam nirvAcyam/
   prakāśikoktamavadhiviśeṣāghaṭitamādyatvantu	prakASikA uktam avaDi viSeza AGawitam Adyatvantu
   sambhavasthalābhiproyaṇetyavadheyam/	samBava sTala aBiproyaNa iti avaDeyam/
   śabdanirūpaṇam	Sabda nirUpaNam
   dīpikāyām [113] guṇapadamiti/ na caivamadṛṣṭavāraṇāya	dIpikAyAm [113] guNa padam iti/ na ca evam adRzwa vAraNAya
   piṇḍībhāvāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvasya vivakṣaṇīyatayā guṇapadamiti	piNxIBAvAsA DAraNa kAraNa tvasya vivakzaNIyatayA guNa padam iti
   vyarthamiti vācyam/ asamavāyikāraṇabhūtacūrṇādivāraṇāya	vyarTam iti vAcyam/ asamavAyi kAraNa BUta cUrNa Adi vAraNAya
   tadāvaśyakatvāt/ prakāśikāyām [113] piṇḍībhāvassaṃyogaviśeṣa iti/	tad AvaSyaka tvAt/ prakASikAyAm [113] piNxIBAva ssaMyoga viSezaH iti/
   dhāraṇakarṣaṇādiyogya	DAraNa karzaNa Adi yogya
   ityarthaḥ/ śabdamātre ākāśasya samavāyikāraṇatāyāḥ spaṣṭatvādāha  	iti arTaH/ Sabda mAtre AkASasya samavAyikAraNa tAyAH spazwa tvAt Aha  
   [113] ādye asamavāyikāraṇamityādi/	[113] Adye asamavAyikAraNam ityAdi/
   buddhinirūpaṇam	budDi nirUpaNam
   nanu [114] sarvavyavahāraheturjñānaṃ buddhiriti saṃgrahavākye	nanu [114] sarva vyavahAra hetuH jQAnam budDiH iti saMgraha vAkye
   sarvavyavahārahetutvaṃ buddhilakṣaṇaṃ phalitam/ tacca na ghaṭate/	sarva vyavahAra hetu tvam budDi lakzaNam Palitam/ tat ca na Gawate/
   śukādyuccaritavyavahārahetutvasya buddhāvabhāvāt/	Suka Adi uccarita vyavahAra hetu tvasya budDO= aBAvAt/
   bubodhayiṣādhīnavyavahāraṃ prati hetutvoktyā vyabhicāravirahe 'pi	buboDayizA aDIna vyavahAram prati hetutva uktyA vyaBicAra virahe api
   yena jñānena pratibandhakavaśāt vyavahāro na janitaḥ tasya	yena jQAnena pratibanDaka vaSAt vyavahAraH na janitaH tasya
   vyavahāropadhāyakatvābhāvāt tatrāvyāptiḥ/	vyavahAra upaDAyaka tva aBAvAt tatra avyAptiH/
   svarūpayogyatārūpahetutvasya niveśe 'pi ghaṭādijñāneṣu	sva rUpa yogya tAru upahetu tvasya niveSe api Gawa Adi jQAnezu
   paṭādivyavahārahetutvābhāvāt naikajñānasya	pawa Adi vyavahAra hetu tva aBAvAt na eka jQAnasya
   sarvavyavahārahetutvamityata āha   [114] jñānatvamātraṃ lakṣaṇamiti/	sarva vyavahAra hetu tvam iti atas Aha  [114] jQAna tva mAtram lakzaNam iti/
   nanu tarhiṃ saṅgrahe sarvavyavahāraheturiti	nanu tarhim saFgrahe sarva vyavahAra hetuH iti
   1. svapratiyogīti/ atra	1. sva pratiyogIti/ atra
   svapadaṃ prathamapatanadhvaṃsaparam/ tatpratiyogi prathamapatanam,	sva padam praTama patana DvaMsa param/ tad pratiyogi praTama patanam,
   tatsamānādhikaraṇatvaṃ dvitīyapatane/	tad samAna aDikaraNa tvam dvitIya patane/
   kimarthamuktamityatrāha  	kim arTam uktam iti atra Aha  
   idaṃ ceti/ [114] saṃskārasya trividhatvāditi/ tathā ca iha	idam ceti/ [114] saMskArasya triviDa tvAt iti/ taTA ca iha
   saṃskārapadena vegasthitasthāpakayorvivakṣaṇe smṛtāvasambhava iti	saMskAra padena vega sTita sTApakayoH vivakzaNe smRta avasamBavaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ [114] bhāvanākhya itīti/ tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ	BAvaH/ [114] BAvanA AKyaH iti iti/ taTA ca BAvanAyAH
   smṛtihetutvāt nāyaṃ doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ [114] saṃskārajanyatvasya sattveneti/	smRti hetu tvAt na ayam dozaH iti BAvaH/ [114] saMskAra janya tvasya sattvena iti/
   ayaṃ bhāvaḥ   jñānapratyāsatteḥ	ayam BAvaH  jQAna pratyAsatteH
   anudbuddhasaṃskārānyasaviṣayakatvena hetutvamāvaśyakam, anyathā	anudbudDa saMskAra anyasa vizayaka tvena hetu tvam AvaSya kam, anyaTA
   icchādyanuvyavasāyena ghaṭādibhānānupapatteḥ/ evaṃ ca saṃskārasyāpi	icCA Adi anuvyavasAyena Gawa Adi BAna anupapatteH/ evam ca saMskArasya api
   upanayavidhayā hetutvamiti saṃskārajanayatvamiti tena	upanaya viDayA hetu tvam iti saMskAra janayatvam iti tena
   nānumityādāvativyāptiṃriti bhāvaḥ/ [114] tathāpi cakṣurādīti/ na	na anum iti AdO= ati vyAptiMH iti BAvaH/ [114] taTA api cakzuH AdIti/ na
   cātra manojanyatvābhāvāniveśe 'yo 'haṃ ghaṭamadrākṣam so 'haṃ	ca atra manaH janya tva aBAva aniveSe ayaH aham Gawam adrAkzam saH aham
   idānīṃ spṛśāmi' imi mānasapratyabhijñāyāmativyāptiḥ/ tanniveśe	idAnIm spRSAmi a imi mAnasa pratyaBijQAyAm ati vyAptiH/ tad niveSe
   tvasambhavaḥ/ jñānasāmānye manasaḥ karaṇatvāt/ evaṃ cakṣurādeḥ	tu asamBavaH/ jQAna sAmAnye manasaH karaNa tva at/ evam cakzuH AdeH
   kālādividhayā smṛtihetutvādasambhavaśceti vācyam/	kAla Adi viDayA smRti hetu tvAt asamBavaH ca iti vAcyam/
   cākṣuṣatvamānasatvādirūpajātyavacchinnapratiyogitākabhedakūṭavattvasya	cAkzuza tva mAna satva Adi rUpa jAti avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda kUwavat tvasya
   pratyakṣatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedasya vā niveśyatvāt/	pratyakza tvA avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Bedasya vA niveSya tva at/
   idamatra cintyam  	idam atra cintyam  
   mātrapadaghaṭitayathāśrutaśabdalabhyasya	mAtra pada Gawita yaTA Sruta Sabda laByasya

   laghoḥ niveśenaivopapattau uktarītyā bhedaniveśe	laGoH niveSena eva upapattO ukta rItyA Beda niveSe
   udakṣaratāpattiriti/	udakzara tApattiH iti/
   yathārthānubhavalakṣaṇam	yaTArTa anuBava lakzaNam
   jñānatvaniveśenāpīcchādivāraṇasambhavādāha   smṛtīti/ [116]	jQAna tva niveSena api icCA Adi vAraNa samBavAt Aha  smRti iti/ [116]
   etatphalamanubhavatvaniveśaprayojanam/ [116] yatretīt i/ atra ca	etat Palam anuBava tu a niveSa prayojanam/ [116] yatra itIt i/ atra ca
   'ghaṭapaṭobhayaṃ ghaṭa' ityādijñānānāmapi	aGawa pawa uBayam Gawa a ityAdi jQAnAnAm api
   āṃśikapramātvasyeṣṭatvāt na tatrātivyāptiśaṅketi bhāvaḥ/	AMSika pramAtu asya izwa tvAt na tatra ati vyApti SaFkA iti BAvaH/
   kecittu 'ghaṭapaṭobhayaṃ	kecid tu  aGawa pawa uBayam
   ghaṭa'ityādijñānasyālakṣyatve 'pi tatra nātiprasaṅgaḥ/	Gawa aityAdi jQAnasya alakzya tve api tatra na ati prasaFgaH/
   tatsambandhāvacchinnatadadhikaraṇatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatāniveśāt	tad sambanDa avacCinna tad aDikaraNa tAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna viSezya tA niveSAt
   tatpratiyogikatatsambandhānuyogitāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatāniveśādvā	tad pratiyogika tad sambanDa anuyogi tA avacCedaka Darma avacCinna viSezya tA niveSAt vA
   ghaṭapaṭobhayatvādeḥ niruktādhikaraṇatānavacchedakatvāt	Gawa pawa uBaya tva AdeH nirukta aDikaraNa tA anavacCedaka tvAt

   tādṛśādhikaraṇatādyata vacchedakadharmānavacchinnaviśeṣyatāniveśāt/ na	tAdRSa aDikaraNa tAdyata vacCedaka DarmAn avacCinna viSezya tA niveSAt/ na
   ca tathā	ca taTA
   sati	sati

   anye tu  	anye tu

   viśeṣyitvamiti/ yadvā bhūtalaṃ vahnimāt, parvato	viSezyi tvam iti/ yat vA BU talam vahni mAt, parvataH

   1svāvacchedakasaṃbandhena	1svAvacCedaka saMbanDena

   2svanirūpitatvasvaviśiṣṭapratiyogitānirūpitānuyogitāśrayaniṣṭhatvobhayasaṃbandhena/	2svanirUpita tva sva viSizwa pratiyogitA nirUpita anuyogita ASraya nizWatva uBaya saMbanDena/
   1. svāvacchedaketyādi/	1. sva avacCedaka ityAdi/
   rajate idaṃ rajatamiti jñāne samanvayaḥ kriyate/ svaṃ	rajate idam rajatam iti jQAne samanvayaH kriyate/ svam
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tadavacchedakasaṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ tena	rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA tad avacCedaka saMbanDaH samavAyaH tena
   saṃbandhena	saMbanDena
   prakāratāśrayarajatatvavat rajataṃ tanniṣṭhatvaṃ viśeṣyatāyām, evaṃ svaṃ	prakAratA ASraya rajatatva vat rajatam tad nizWa tvam viSezyata AyAm, evam svam
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tannirūpitattvaṃ ca viśeṣyatāyām iti	rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA tad nirUpi tattvam ca viSezyatAyAm iti
   tādṛśaviśeṣyatānirūpakānubhavatvaṃ idaṃ rajatamiti jñāne 'stīti/	tAdRSa viSezya tA nirUpaka anuBava tvam idam rajatam iti jQAne asti iti/
   dvitīyānugame svaṃ prakāritā rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā	dvitIya anugame svam prakAritA rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitA
   jñānaniṣṭha tadavacchinnatvaṃ	jQAna nizWa tad avacCinna tvam
   ratajaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitajñānaṣṭhiviśeṣyitāyāmasti, evaṃ svaṃ	rata janizWa viSezya tA nirUpita jQAna zWi viSezyitAyAm asti, evam svam
   prakāritā tannirūpitā yā rajatatvaniṣṭhā prakāratā	prakAritA tad nirUpitA yA rajata tva nizWA prakAra tA
   tadavacchedakasamavāyasambandhena	tad avacCedaka samavAya sambanDena

   viśeṣyitāyāmasti,	viSezyitAyAm asti,
   tadāśrayānubhavatvam	tad ASraya anuBava tvam
   idaṃ rajatamiti pramāyāmastīti samanvayaḥ/	idam rajatam iti pramAyAm asti iti samanvayaH/
   svanirūpitatvetyādi/ svaṃ rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tannirūpitatvaṃ	sva nirUpita tva ityAdi/ svam rajata tva nizWa prakAra tA tad nirUpita tvam
   rajataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāyām/ evaṃ svaṃ prakāratā tadviśiṣṭā	rajata nizWa viSezya ta AyAm/ evam svam prakAra tA tad viSizwA
   rajatatvaniṣṭhā pratiyogitā (samavāyasaṃbandhanirūpitā) tannirūpitā	rajata tu a nizWA pratiyogitA (samavAya saMbanDa nirUpitA) tad nirUpitA
   anuyogitā rajataniṣṭhā rajatatvasamavāyaṃ prati	anuyogitA rajata nizWA rajatatva samavAyam prati
   rajatasyānuyogitvāt tadāśrayarajataniṣṭhatvaṃ viśeṣyatāyām/	rajatasya anuyogi tvAt tad ASraya raja ta nizWa tvam viSezyatAyAm/
   rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratāvaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	rajata tu a nizWa prakAra tA vESizwyam ca
   rajatatvaniṣṭhapratiyogitāyamevamupapādanīyam   svaṃ prakāratā	rajata tu a nizWa pratiyogitAyam evam upapAdanIyam  svam prakAra tA
   svāśrayaḥ rajatatvaṃ tanniṣṭhatvaṃ pratiyogitāyām/ evaṃ svaṃ prakāratā	sva ASrayaH rajata tvam tad nizWa tvam pratiyogitAyAm/ evam svam prakAra tA
   tasyāḥ svāvacchedakatāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhenādhikaraṇaṃ samavāyatvaṃ,	tasyAH sva avacCedaka tAvat Ceda ka tA saMbanDena aDikaraNam samavAya tvaM,
   tanniṣṭho yo bhedaḥ svanirūpakatāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhena	tad nizWaH yaH BedaH sva nirUpaka tA avacCeda ka tA saMbanDena
   pratiyogitāvadbhedo na bhavati, samavāyasya	pratiyogi tA vat BedaH na Bavati, samavAyasya
   rajatatvaniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpakatayā samavāyatve	rajata tu a nizWa pratiyogitA nirUpaka tayA samavAya tve
   rajatatvaniṣṭhapratiyogitānirūpakatāvacchedakatvasattvāt tena	rajata tu a nizWa pratiyogitA nirUpaka tAvacCedaka tva sattvAt tena
   saṃbandhena pratiyogitāvati samavāyatve tadvadbhedāsaṃbhavāt/ api	saMbanDena pratiyogitA= ati samavAya tve tadvat Beda asaMBavAt/ api
   tu anyo bhedaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ pratiyogitāyāṃ	tu anyaH BedaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam pratiyogitAyAm
   nāstīti svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhena	na asti iti sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva saMbanDena
   svavadbhinnatvarūpaṃ svasetyādibhedavattvaṃ ca pratiyogitāyāmasti/	sva vat Binna tva rUpam svasA ityAdi Bedavat tvam ca pratiyogitAyAm asti/
   tathā yoktobhayasaṃbandhena prakāratāviśiṣṭā pratiyogitā bhavatīti/	taTA yokta uBaya saMbanDena prakAra tA viSizwA pratiyogitA Bavati iti/
   evamuttaratrāpi ūhanīyam/	evam uttaratra api UhanIyam/
   pratiyogitāyāṃ	pratiyogitAyAm
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca svāśrayaniṣṭhatvasvasetyādibhedavattvobhayasambandhena/	sva vESizwyam ca sva ASraya nizWa tva svasA ityAdi Bedavattva uBaya sambanDena/
   svādhikaraṇatvaṃ ca svāvacchedakatāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa tvam ca svAvacCedaka tAvat Cedaka tA sambanDena/
   bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatāsvanirūpakatvīyavilakṣaṇāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tA svanirUpaka tvIya vilakzaNa avacCeda ka tA sambanDena/
   tena samavāyaikyavādiprācīnamate 'vāyuḥ samavāyena rūpavān' iti	tena samavAya Ekya vAdi prAcInamate avAyuH samavAyena rUpavAn a iti
   bhrame nātivyāptiḥ/ na vā 'guṇādyanyatvaviśiṣṭasattāvān guṇa'	Brame na ati vyAptiH/ na vA aguNa Adi anyatva viSizwa sattAvAn guNa a
   ityādibhrame viśiṣṭanirūpitatvāvacchinnasamavāyasya	ityAdi Brame viSizwa nirUpita tva avacCinna samavAyasya
   saṃsargatāpakṣe 'tivyāptiḥ/ yadyapi saṃyogasamavāyādīnāṃ svarūpataḥ	saMsarga tA pakze ati vyAptiH/ yadi api saMyoga samavAya AdInAm svarUpataH
   saṃsargatāpakṣe 'sambhavaḥ, tathāpi tanmate	saMsarga tA pakze asamBavaH, taTA api tad mate
   svāvacchedakasaṃbandhanirūpitatvameva pratiyogitāyāṃ niveśyam/	svAvacCedaka saMbanDa nirUpita tvam eva pratiyogitAyAm niveSyam/
   viśiṃṣṭasattāvāniti bhrame tu	viSiMzwa sattAvAn iti Brame tu
   vaiśiṣṭyāvacchinnasamavāyaniṣṭhanirūpakatākādhikaraṇatāyā eva	vESizwyA avacCinna samavAya nizWa nirUpaka tAka aDikaraNa tAyAH eva
   vilakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃsargatvamiti	vilakzaNAyAH saMsarga tvam iti
   nātiprasaṅgaḥ/ yadi	na ati prasaFgaH/ yadi
   caivaṃ sati saṃyogasamavāyobhayasambandhena	ca evam sati saMyoga samavAya uBaya sambanDena
   ghaṭatvādiprakārakajñāne 'tivyāptiḥ	Gawa tva Adi prakAraka jQAne ati vyAptiH
   tādṛśobhayasambandhāvacchinnaprakāratāmādāya durvāretyucyate/ tadā	tAdRSaH Baya sambanDa avacCinna prakAra tAm AdAya durvAra iti ucyate/ tadA
   pratiyogitāyāṃ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	pratiyogitAyAm sva vESizwyam ca
   svāśrayaniṣṭhatvasvasetyādibhedavattvobhayasambandhena/ svādhikaraṇatā	sva ASraya nizWa tva svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva uBaya sambanDena/ sva aDikaraNa tA
   svāvacchedakasaṃsargatāsambandhena/ bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā	svAvacCedaka saMsarga tA sambanDena/ Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tA
   svanirūpakatāsambandhena/	sva nirUpa katA sambanDena/
   yattu  	yat tu  
   pratiyogitāyāṃ svavaiśiṣṭyaṅghaṭakatayā	pratiyogitAyAm sva vESizwi aFGawaka tayA
   svāvacchedakaparyāptāvacchedakatāvatvaṃ niveśyam/ tacca	sva avacCedaka paryApta avacCedaka tAva tvam niveSyam/ tat ca
   svasetyādibhedavattvaparyavasitam/ svādhikaraṇāvacchedakatā ca	svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva paryavasitam/ svADikaraNa avacCedaka tA ca
   avacchedakatāsambandhena na	avacCeda katA sambanDena na
   caivamanavacchinnaghaṭatvādiprakāratākapramāyāmavyāptiriti vācyam/	ca evam anavacCinna Gawa tva Adi prakAra tAka pramAyAm avyAptiH iti vAcyam/
   niruktasvasetyādisambandhena svavaiśiṣṭyamaniveśya	nirukta svasa ityAdi sambanDena sva vESizwyam aniveSya
   svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhāvacchinnasvani	sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sambanDa avacCinna svani
   ṣṭhapratiyogitākātyantābhāvavattvasambandhena	zWa pratiyogitAkA atyanta aBAvavat tva sambanDena
   svavaiśiṣṭyaniveśanādoṣāt/ anavacchinnaprakāratāṃ pratyuktasaṃbandhasya	sva vESizwi a niveSa nAda uzAt/ anavacCinna prakAra tAm pratyukta saMbanDasya
   vyadhikaraṇatvāt/ tathā ca viśiṣṭasattāvā niti bhrame nātiprasaṅgaḥ/	vyaDikaraNa tvAt/ taTA ca viSizwa sattAvA niti Brame na ati prasaFgaH/
   atha vā pratiyogitāyāṃ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	aTa vA pratiyogitAyAm sva vESizwyam ca
   svāśrayaniṣṭhatvasvāvacchedakasambandhanirūpitatvasvaniṣṭhabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvatritayasaṃbandhena/	sva ASraya nizWatva sva avacCedaka sambanDa nirUpita tva sva nizWa Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tva tritaya saMbanDena/
   avacchedakatvaṃ svaviśiṣṭadharmāvacchinnatvasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	avacCedaka tvam sva viSizwa Darma avacCinna tva sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam
   cāvacchedakatāsambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena/	ca avacCeda katA sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena/
   svānavacchedakadharmānavacchinnatvaṃ tu na śakyaniveśam/	svAnavacCedaka DarmAn avacCinna tvam tu na Sakya niveSam/
   svānavacchedakatvasya svāvacchedakabhinnatvarūpatve	sva anavacCedaka tvasya sva avacCedaka Binna tva rUpa tve
   svāvacchedakāprasiddhyā prāguktapramāyāmavyāpteḥ/	svAvacCedaka aprasidDyA prAk ukta pramAyAm avyApteH/
   avacchedakasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhapratiyogitākābhāvarūpatve 'pi	avacCedaka saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWa pratiyogi tAkA BAva rUpa tve api
   pratiyogitāyāṃ tādṛśadharmāvacchinnatvasattvane taddoṣānirāsāditi/	pratiyogitAyAm tAdRSa Darma avacCinna tva sattvane tad doza anirAsAt iti/
   tanna/	tat na/
   'viśiṣṭasattāvān guṇa' ityādibhrame 'tivyāpteḥ/	aviSizwa sattAvAn guNa a ityAdi Brame ati vyApteH/
   guṇādyanyatvopalakṣitasattāvān guṇa ityādijñānasya pramārūpatāyāḥ	guNa Adi anyatva upalakzita sattAvAn guNaH ityAdi jQAnasya pramAru upa tAyAH
   sarvasaṃmatatayā guṇādyanyatvavaiśiṣṭyasyāpi	sarva saMmata tayA guNa Adi anyatva vESizwyasya api
   guṇādinirūpitādheyatāvacchedakatvānapāyāt/	guNa Adi nirUpita ADeya tAvacCedaka tva anapAyAt/
   ādheyatādiviśeṣaṇasyaiva ādheyatādyavacchedakatvāt/ ata eva	ADeya tA Adi viSezaNasya eva ADeyatA Adi avacCedaka tva at/ atas eva
   viśiṣṭābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakasambandhatvādikaṃ	viSizwa aBAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka sambanDa tva Adikam
   viśiṣṭanirūpitatvāvacchinnasamavāyasyopalakṣitābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakasambandhatvādikam	viSizwa nirUpita tva avacCinna samavAyasya upalakzita aBAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka sambanDa tva Adikam
   anavacchinnasamavāyasya ca svīkṛtaṃ gadādhareṇa siddhāntalakṣaṇe/ anyathā	anavacCinna samavAyasya ca svIkRtam gadADareNa sidDAnta lakzaNe/ anyaTA
   viśeṣaṇasya pratiyogitāvacchedakatvatadabhāvābhyāmeva	viSezaNasya pratiyogita avacCedaka tva tad aBAvAByAm eva
   viśiṣṭābhāvopalakṣitābhāvayoḥ vailakṣaṇyanirvāhe darśitarītyā	viSizwa aBAva upalakzita aBAvayoH vElakzaNya nirvAhe darSita rItyA
   tadupapādanasyāsaṅgatatvāpātāt/	tad upapAdanasya asaFga tatva ApAtAt/
   guṇādyanyatvaviśiṣṭasattāvānityākārakaguṇādyanyatvavaiśiṣṭyopalakṣitasamavāyasaṃsargakapratītyāderaprāmāṇikatayā	guNa Adi anyatva viSizwa sattAvAn iti AkAraka guNa Adi anyatva vESizwya upalakzita samavAya saMsargaka pratIti AdeH aprAmANika tayA
   manmate	mad mate
   darśitadoṣānavakāśāt/ anyathā uktarītyā avyavasthāpattyā	darSita doza anavakASAt/ anyaTA ukta rItyA avyavasTApattyA
   siddhāntalakṣaṇavirodhāpatteriti dhyeyam/	sidDAnta lakzaNa viroDa ApatteH iti Dyeyam/
   [116] pramāṇāntaratāpatteriti/	[116] pramANa antara tA ApatteH iti/
   pratyakṣādicatuṣṭayātiriktapramāṇatāpatterityarthaḥ/	pratyakza Adi catuzwaya atirikta pramANa tA ApatteH iti arTaH/
   bhāvanārūpasaṃskārātmakavyāpāravattve sati asādhāraṇakāraṇatvasya tatra	BAvanA rUpa saMskAra Atmaka vyApAravat tve sati asADAraNa kAraNa tvasya tatra
   sattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	sattvAt iti BAvaH/
   ayathārthānubhavanirūpaṇam	ayaTArTa anuBava nirUpaNam
   [119] saṅgrahe tadabhāvavatītyādi/ atra ca	[119] saFgrahe tat aBAvavatI ityAdi/ atra ca
   prakāratāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyatānirūpakatvaviśeṣitaṃ	prakAra tA viSizwa viSezya tA nirUpaka tva viSezitam
   prakāritāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyitāvattvaviśeṣitaṃ vānubhavatvaṃ bhramatvam/	prakArita aviSizwa viSezyi tAvat tva viSezitam vA anuBava tvam Brama tvam/
   prathame vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	praTame vESizwyam ca
   1svaviśiṣṭaikamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavanniṣṭhatvasvan	1sva viSizwa eka mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva vat nizWatu a svan
   irūpitatvobhayasambandhena/	irUpita tva uBaya sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva vESizwyam ca
   1svaviśiṣṭaikamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavanniṣṭhatvasvan	1sva viSizwa eka mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva vat nizWatu a svan
   irūpitatvobhayasambandhena/	irUpita tva uBaya sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvasvāśrayaniṃṣṭhatvobhayasambandhena/	svAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva sva ASraya niMzWatva uBaya sambanDena/
   dvitīye	dvitIye
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ coktarītyā 2svayamūhyam/ atra saṃsargamadhye svāśraye	vESizwyam ca ukta rItyA 2svayam Uhyam/ atra saMsarga maDye su a ASraye
   vyāpyavṛttitvasya niveśanīyatayā	vyApya vRtti tvasya niveSanIya tayA
   nāvyāpyavṛttiprakārakapramāyāmatiprasaṅgaḥ/ vastutastu	na avyApya vRtti prakAraka pramAyAm atiprasaFgaH/ vastutas tu
   niravacchinnādhikaraṇatāyāmabhāvīyatvena niveśāt na ko 'pi	niravacCinna aDikaraNa tA AyAm aBAvIya tvena niveSAt na kaH api
   doṣa iti sāram/ svābhāvasya svāvacchedakatayā bhrame	dozaH iti sAram/ svABAvasya svAvacCedaka tayA Brame
   bhānavirahādāha   dīpikāyām [120] saṃyogābhāveti/ nanu	BAna virahAt Aha  dIpikAyAm [120] saMyoga aBAva iti/ nanu
   tadabhāvāvacchedakadeśāvacchinnaviśeṣyatetyādibhramalakṣaṇasya śuktāvidaṃ	tad aBAva avacCedaka deSa avacCinna viSezya tA ityAdi Brama lakzaNasya SuktO= idam
   rajatamityādivyāpyavṛttirajatatvādiprakārakabhrame 'vyāptirityaha āha  	rajatam iti Adi vyApya vRtti rajata tva Adi prakAraka Brame avyAptiH iti aha Aha  
   [120] atredamavadheyamityādi/ idamatra cintanīyam  	[120] atra idam avaDeyam ityAdi/ idam atra cintanIyam  
   prakāratāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyatānirūpakānubhavatvamiti rītyā	prakAra tA viSizwa viSezya tA nirUpaka anuBava tvam iti rItyA
   vyāpyāvyāpyavṛttiprakārabhede 'pi lakṣaṇekyasya suvacatayā tadbhedena	vyApya avyApya vRtti prakAra Bede api lakzaNekyasya su vacatayA tad Bedena
   lakṣaṇabhedavarṇanamayuktatamam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	lakzaNa Beda varNanama yuktatamam/ vESizwyam ca
   3svanirūtipatvasvaviśiṣṭādhikaraṇaniṣṭhatvobhayasambandhena/	3sva nirUti patva sva viSizwa aDikaraNa nizWatva uBaya sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca svaviśiṣṭābhāvavattāsambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca abhāve	sva vESizwyam ca sva viSizwa aBAva vattA sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca aBAve
   svāvacchedakasambandhena	svAvacCedaka sambanDena
   svāśrayānadhikaraṇavṛttitvasvaviśiṣṭapratiyogitākatvobhayasambandhena/	sva ASrayAn aDikaraNa vRtti tva sva viSizwa pratiyogi tAka tva uBaya sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvasvāśrayaniṣṭhatvobhayasambandhena/	svAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva sva ASraya nizWatva uBaya sambanDena/
   1. svaviśiṣṭeti/	1. sva viSizwa iti/
   svaviśiṣṭetyasya ekamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnapratiyogitāyāmanvayaḥ/	sva viSizwa iti asya eka mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAyAm anvayaH/
   tathā ca svaṃ rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tadavacchedakasaṃbandhaḥ	taTA ca svam rajata tva nizWa prakAra tA tad avacCedaka saMbanDaH
   samavāyasaṃbandhaḥ tadavacchinnā rajatatvaniṣṭhā pratiyogitā evaṃ sā	samavAya saMbanDaH tad avacCinnA rajata tu a nizWA pratiyogitA evam sA
   prakāratāśrayaniṣṭhā ca bhavati iti prakāratāviśiṣṭā pratiyogitā	prakAratA ASraya nizWA ca Bavati iti prakAra tA viSizwA pratiyogitA
   rajatatvatvarūpaikamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnā tannirūpābhāvavanniṣṭhatvaṃ	rajata tvatva rUpa eka mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinnA tad nirUpa aBAva vat nizWa tvam
   viśeṣyatāyāmiti rītyā samanvayaḥ kāryaḥ/	viSezyatAyAm iti rItyA samanvayaH kAryaH/
   2. svayamūhyamiti/	2. svayam Uhyam iti/
   prakāritāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyitāvadanubhavatvaṃ bhramatvam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	prakArita aviSizwa viSezyi tA vat anuBava tvam Brama tvam/ vESizwyam ca
   svāvacchinnasvanirūpitaprakāratāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvobhayasaṃbandhena/	sva avacCinna sva nirUpita prakAra tA viSizwa viSezya tA nirUpita tva uBaya saMbanDena/
   viśeṣyatāyāṃ prakāratāvaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	viSezyatAyAm prakAratA vESizwyam ca
   svaviśiṣṭaikamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavanniṣṭhatvasvani	sva viSizwa eka mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna pratiyogitAkA BAva vat nizWa tva svani
   rūpitatvobhayasaṃbandhena/	rUpita tva uBaya saMbanDena/
   pratiyogitāyāṃ svaviśiṣṭatvaṃ ca	pratiyogitAyAm sva viSizwa tvam ca
   svāvacchedakasaṃbandhāvacchinnatvasvāśrayaniṣṭhatvobhayasambandhenetyūhyamityarthaḥ/	svAvacCedaka saMbanDa avacCinna tva sva ASraya nizWatva uBaya sambanDena iti Uhyam iti arTaH/
   svanirūpitatvetyādi/ atrānugabhe svaśabdāḥ sarve 'pi prakāratāparāḥ/	sva nirUpita tva ityAdi/ atra anugaBe sva SabdAH sarve api prakAra tA parAH/
   samanvayaḥ pūrvavadūhyaḥ/	samanvayaH pUrvavat UhyaH/
   yattu   daśitasambandhena	yat tu  daSita sambanDena
   svaviśiṣṭaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvatādātmyobhayasambandhena	sva viSizwa viSezya tA nirUpita tva tAdAtmya uBaya sambanDena
   prakāratāviśiṣṭaprakāratānirūpakānubhavatvaṃ	prakAra tA viSizwa prakAra tA nirUpaka anuBava tvam
   tadititadasat prakāratvasya dvidhā niveśenādhikasya tādātmyasya ca	tad iti ta dasat  prakAra tvasya dviDA niveSena aDikasya tAdAtmyasya ca
   praveśena mahāgauravaprasaṅgāt/ na ca [120] yadavacchedena ityādi	praveSena mahA gOrava prasaFgAt/ na ca [120] yat avacCedena ityAdi
   dīpikāvākyasvarasyānurodhera tathāvarṇanamiti vācyam/	dIpikA vAkya svarasya anuroDera taTA AvarNanam iti vAcyam/
   tādṛśadīpikāvākyasya lakṣaṇabhedaparatve mūlopalakṣito vṛkṣaḥ	tAdRSa dIpikA vAkyasya lakzaNa Beda paratve mUla upalakzitaH vRkzaH
   kapisaṃyogītyādipramāyāmativyāpteḥ/	kapi saMyogI ityAdi pramAyAm ati vyApteH/

   asmaduktarītyā	asmad ukta rItyA
   bhramalakṣaṇapariṣkārābhiprāyeṇāvyāpyavṛttiprakārakabhrame 'vyāptimāśaṅkya	Brama lakzaNa parizkAra aBiprAyeNa avyApya vRtti prakAraka Brame avyAptim ASaFkya

   svaṃ ghaṭotpattyabhāvaḥ	svam Gawa utpatti aBAvaH
   tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ daṇḍe iti tasyāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvam/ svaṃ	tad viSizwa tvam daNxe iti tasya asADAraNa kAraNa tvam/ svam
   ghaṭotpattyabhāva tatprayojakībhūto 'bhāvaḥ daṇḍabhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvaṃ	Gawa utpatti aBAva tad prayojakIBUtaH aBAvaH daNxa BAvaH tad pratiyogi tvam
   daṇḍe/ evaṃ svaṃ ghaṭotpattyabhāvaḥ tadadhikaraṇakṣaṇe vartate yaḥ bhedaḥ	daNxe/ evam svam Gawa utpatti aBAvaH tad aDikaraNa kzaNe vartate yaH BedaH
   daṇḍavadbhedaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ ca daṇḍe/	daNxa vat BedaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam ca daNxe/
   daṇḍavadbhedaśabdenātra	daNxa vat Beda Sabdena atra
   svetaraprakṛtakāryakāraṇādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitānirūpitādheyatāsambandhāvacchinnāvacchedakatāsambandhena	svetara prakRta kArya kAraNa aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogitAnirUpita ADeya tA sambanDa avacCinna avacCeda katA sambanDena
   daṇḍavadbhedo	daNxa vat BedaH 
   grāhyaḥ/	grAhyaH/
   daṇḍetaraghaṭakāraṇādhikaraṇapradeśasya	daNxa itara Gawa kAraNa aDikaraNa pradeSasya
   ghaṭotpattyabhāvādhikaraṇakṣaṇavṛttitvaniyamāt tādṛśapradeśe vartamānaḥ	Gawa utpatti aBAva aDikaraNa kzaNa vRtti tva niyamAt tAdRSa pradeSe vartamAnaH
   bhedaḥ ādheyatāsambandhena ghaṭotpattyabhāvādhikaraṇakṣaṇavadbhedaḥ na	BedaH ADeya tA sambanDena Gawa utpatti aBAva aDikaraNa kzaNa vat BedaH na
   bhavati, ataḥ	Bavati, atas 
   svetaraprakṛtakāryakāraṇadhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyotāvacchedakatvaṃ	svetara prakRta kArya kAraNaDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyota avacCedaka tvam
   tādṛśakṣaṇe nāstīti tādṛśāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhena daṇḍavān	tAdRSakzaNe na asti iti tAdRSa avacCeda katA saMbanDena daNxavAn
   tādṛśakṣaṇo na bhavati/ ataḥ daṇḍavadbhedaḥ tādṛśakṣaṇavṛttiḥ/	tAdRSakzaNaH na Bavati/ atas daNxa vat BedaH tAdRSa kzaNa vRttiH/
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ daṇḍe 'stīti uktobhayasaṃbandhena	tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam daNxe asti iti ukta uBaya saMbanDena
   ghaṭotpattyabhāvaviśiṣṭatvāt daṇḍasva ghaṭāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvanirvāhaḥ/	Gawa utpatti aBAva viSizwa tvAt daNxasva GawAsADAraNa kAraNa tva nirvAhaH/
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vESizwyam ca
   1svasetyādibhedattvasaṃbandhena/ svādhikaraṇatvādikaṃ prāgvaditi rītyā	1svasA ityAdi Bedat tva saMbanDena/ sva aDikaraNa tva Adikam prAgvat iti rItyA
   anugamaḥ/ sa tu tādātmyādiniveśena gauravadūṣitatvādanādaraṇīyaḥ/	anugamaH/ sa tu tAdAtmya Adi niveSena gOrava dUzita tvAt anAdaraNIyaH/
   kāraṇalakṣaṇam	kAraNa lakzaNam
   nanu	nanu
   svabhinnatvaniveśanenāpi svavāraṇasambhavaḥ/ evaṃ saṃyogādinā	sva Binna tva niveSanena api sva vAraNa samBavaH/ evam saMyoga AdinA
   ghaṭādyadhikaraṇe bhūtalādau tādātmyādisambandhena kapālābhāvasattvāt	Gawa Adi aDikaraNe BU tala AdO tAdAtmya Adi sambanDena kapAla aBAva sattvAt

   rāsabhādāvatiprasaktam,	rAsaBa At O= ati prasaktam,
   ato niṣkarṣamāha   [126] kāryatāvacchedakasaṃbandhenetyādi/ atra	atas nizkarzam Aha  [126] kArya tAvat Cedaka saMbanDena ityAdi/ atra
   cābhāvetyataḥ paraṃ pratiyogitetyataḥ	ca aBAva iti atas param pratiyogita iti atas 
   prākkāraṇatāghaṭakatvenābhimatasambandhāvacchinneti pūraṇīyam/ tena na	prAk kAraNa tA Gawaka tvena aBimata sambanDa avacCinnA iti pUraNIyam/ tena na
   sambandhāntarāvacchinnakāraṇābhāvamādāya doṣa iti dhyeyam/	sambanDa antara avacCinna kAraNa aBAvam AdAya dozaH iti Dyeyam/
   anyathāsiddhinirūpaṇam	anyaTA sidDi nirUpaNam
   [127] yena sahetyādi dīpikāvākye	[127] yena saha ityAdi dIpikA vAkye
   tṛtīyāntayatpadaṃ kāraṇatāvacchedakatvābhimatatantutvādyavacchinnaparam/	tRtIyA antayat padam kAraNa tA ava= Cedakatva aBimata tantu tva Adi avacCinna param/
   ṣaṣṭhyantayatpadaṃ anyathāsiddhatvābhimatatantutvādiparam/	zazWI antayat padam anyaTA sidDa tva aBimata tantu tva Adi param/

   svasetyādibhedavattvasaṃbandheneti/	svasA ityAdi Bedavattva saMbanDena iti/
   svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyotākabhedavattvasambandhenetyarthaḥ/	sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA vacCedaka tAka pratiyotAka Bedavat tva sambanDena iti arTaH/
   manasi nidhāyārthamāha	manasi niDAya arTam Aha
     [127] yena tantunetyādi/ atra ca sahaśabdaḥ sāhityam/	 [127] yena tantunA ityAdi/ atra ca saha SabdaH sAhityam/
   taccaikakriyānvayaḥ/ kriyā ca dhātuta eva labhyata ityanvaya eva	tat ca eka kriyA anvayaH/ kriyA ca DAtutaH eva laByate iti anvayaH eva
   sahaśabdārthaḥ/ 'ananyalabhyaśabdārthaḥ' iti nyāyāt/ sa cātra	saha Sabda arTaH/ aanani alaBya Sabda arTaH a iti nyAyAt/ sa ca atra
   prakāratānirūpakatvarūpaḥ/ yeneti tṛtīyāyāḥ	prakAratA nirUpaka tva rUpaH/ yena iti tRtIyAyAH
   prakāratānvitamādheyatvamarthaḥ/ viśeṣaṇasaṅgataivakāramahimnā	prakAratA anvitam ADeya tvam arTaH/ viSezaNa saFga tA evakAra mahimnA
   yaddharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyakaprakṛtakāryaniyatapūrvavṛttitvaprakārakajñānatvavyāpakatvaviśiṣṭasvarūpasaṃbandhena	yat Darma avacCinna viSezyaka prakRta kArya niyata pUrva vRtti tva prakAraka jQAna tva vyApaka tva viSizwa svarUpa saMbanDena

   bodhaḥ/ evaṃ ca	boDaH/ evam ca

   phalitam/	Palitam/

   svasetyādibhedavattvasambandhena/ svādhikaraṇatā	svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva sambanDena/ sva aDikaraNa tA

   atra ca paṭādīnāṃ tanatutvādeḥ	atra ca pawa AdInAm tanatu tva AdeH

   [128] tantuviṣayakameveti/	[128] tantu vizaya kam eva iti/

   tanatutvasya prakṛte tanatutvattvenaiva viśeṣyatvāt tantutvattvasya ca	tanatu tvasya prakRte tana tu tvat tvena eva viSezya tvAt tantu tvat tvasya ca

   [127] saṅkṣepa iti/ yadyapi tantunā	[127] saFkzepaH iti/ yadi api tantunA

   bodhyā/ ata eva yatpadasya yaddharmāvacchinnaparatayā vyākhyānādeva	boDyA/ atas eva yat padasya yat Darma avacCinna para tayA vyAKyAnAt eva
   tantutvena tantoranyathāsiddhivāraṇasambhavaḥ/ tantuḥ	tantu tvena tantoH anyaTA sidDi vAraNa samBavaH/ tantuH

   ca śūnyāntaviśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthathmati śaṅkā nirastā/	ca SUnya anta viSezaNam vyarTaTmati SaFkA nirastA/
   tantutvatvaviśiṣṭena	tantu tva tva viSizwena

   1. tādṛśasattetyādi/	1. tAdRSa sattA ityAdi/
   prakṛtakāryasattāprayojakasattāviśiṣṭatve sati	prakRta kArya sattA prayojaka sattA viSizwa tve sati

   draṣṭavyaḥ/	drazwavyaH/
   1vastutastu	1vastutas tu
   svāśrayānvayavyatirekaprayuktatvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena	sva ASraya anvaya vyatireka prayukta tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena

   tādātmyādirūpādhikapadārthaniveśanagauravādupekṣaṇīyamiti	tAdAtmya Adi rUpa aDika padArTa niveSana gOravAt upekzaNIyam iti
   dhyeyam/	Dyeyam/
   yattu   'yenaiva yasya	yat tu  ayena eva yasya
   yaṃ prati pūrvavṛttitvamavagamyate' ityādyuktyaiva sāmañjasye	yam prati pUrva vRtti tvam avagamyate a ityAdi uktyA eva sAmaQjasye
   sahaśabdaveyarthyamiti   tanna   tathā sati sasyeti	saha Sabda veyarTyam iti  tat naH  taTA sati sasya iti
   ṣaṣṭyarthaviśeṣyatvānvayinaḥ avacchinnatvasya tṛtīyārthatyā	zazwi arTa viSezya tva anvayinaH avacCinna tvasya tRtIya arTatyA
   prakṛtakāryaniyatapūrvavṛttitvajñānīyayanniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāsāmānyaṃ	prakRta kArya niyata pUrva vRtti tva jQAnI yayannizWa viSezya tA sAmAnyam
   yadavacchinnamiti lakṣaṇaṃ sampadyate/ tatra	yat avacCinnam iti lakzaNam sampadyate/ tatra
   cāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭasyāvacchedakatvānādare daṇḍatvādāvavyāpteḥ/	ca avacCedaka kowi pravizwasya avacCedaka tva anAdare daNxa tva AdO= avyApteH/
   sahaśabdopādāne cāsmaduktārthaparyavasānena doṣavirahāditi/ ata	saha Sabda upAdAne ca asmad ukta arTa paryavasAnena doza viraha at iti/ ata
   eva tanatusamavetatvādiviśiṣṭarūpādestantutvādinānyathāsiddhiṃrapi	eva tanatu samaveta tva Adi viSizwa rUpa AdeH tantutva AdinA anyaTA sidDiMH api

   tacca viṣayatā, ṇinipratyayārtho nirūpakam, vidhayetyatra	tat ca vizaya tA, Ninipratyaya arTaH nirUpa kam, viDayA iti atra
   tṛtīyārtho 'bhedaḥ viṣayatānvayi nirūpakasya nañarthabhede 'nvayaḥ/ tathā	tRtIya arTaH aBedaH vizaya tA anvayi nirUpakasya naQarTa Bede anvayaH/ taTA
   ca viśeṣyatvādyabhinnaviśeṣyādiniṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpakabhinnatvalābhaḥ/	ca viSezya tva Adi aBinna viSezya Adi nizWa vizaya tA nirUpaka Binna tva lABaH/
   tatra	tatra
   cābhedatādṛśaniṣṭhatvāṃśayorvyarthatvāt	ca aBeda tAdRSa nizWatvA aMSayoH vyarTa tvAt 
   viśeṣyatādinirūpakābhinnamātraṃ lakṣaṇamityabhiprāyeṇāha   [136] tathā	viSezyata Adi nirUpaka aBinna mAtram lakzaNam iti aBiprAyeNa Aha  [136] taTA
   ceti/ [136] jñānatvaghaṭitamiti/	ceti/ [136] jQAna tva Gawitam iti/
   ghaṭādiṣvativyāptivāraṇāya idamuktam/ [135]	Gawa Adizu ati vyApti vAraNAya idam uktam/ [135]
   viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇasambandhānavagāhītyatra dīpikāvākye na dvandvaḥ/	viSezya viSezaNa sambanDAn avagAhi iti atra dIpikA vAkye na dvandvaH/
   api tu viśeṣyaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yassasaṃmbandha ityabhiprāyeṇa	api tu viSezyaNa viSezyayoH yassa saMmbanDaH iti aBiprAyeNa
   vyācakṣāṇānāṃ matamāha   [136] kecittviti/ [136] bhāsamāneti/	vyAcakzANAnAm matam Aha  [136] kecid tu iti/ [136] BAsamAnA iti/
   viṣayatāśrayetyarthaḥ/ tajjñānīyaviṣayatāśrayavaiśiṣṭyapratiyogitvaṃ	vizayatA ASraya iti arTaH/ tad jQAnIya vizaya tA ASraya vESizwya pratiyogi tvam
   tajjñāne prakāratvamityarthaṃḥ/ tena nātiprasaṅgaḥ/ nanu	tad jQAne prakAra tvam iti arTaMH/ tena na ati prasaFgaH/ nanu
   ghaṭabhūtalasaṃyogā iti jñāne ghaṭasya prakāratāpattiḥ/ ata āha   [136]	Gawa BU tala saMyogAH iti jQAne Gawasya prakAra tA ApattiH/ atas Aha  [136]
   saṃsargāvacchinneti/ nanu pūrvoktayuktyā nirvikalpake 'pi	saMsarga avacCinna iti/ nanu pUrva ukta yuktyA nirvikalpake api
   saṃsargabhānasyāvaśyakatvāt asambhava ityata āha    [136] saṃsargateti/	saMsarga BAnasya AvaSyaka tvAt asamBavaH iti atas Aha   [136] saMsarga tA iti/
   lāghavādityasya	lAGava Adityasya
   saṃsargāvacchinnaviṣayatāśanyatvarūpalakṣaṇāpekṣayetyādiḥ/ tathā ca	saMsarga avacCinna vizaya tA Sanya tva rUpa lakzaNa apekzayA ityAdiH/ taTA ca
   saṃsargānavagāhitvaṃ saṃsarganiṣṭhaviṣayatvānirūpakatvam/	saMsargAn avagAhi tvam saMsarga nizWa vizaya tva anirUpaka tvam/
   saṃsargāvacchinnaviṣayatāśūnyatvaṃ ca	saMsarga avacCinna vizaya tA SUnya tvam ca
   saṃsarganirūpitāvacchinnatvavadviṣayatāśūnyatvam/ tatra ca	saMsarga nirUpitA avacCinna tva vat vizaya tA SUnya tvam/ tatra ca
   nirūpitatvasyādheyatvasthānīyatve 'pi avacchinnatvasyādhikasya niveśāt	nirUpita tvasya ADeya tva sTAnIya tve api avacCinna tvasya aDikasya niveSAt 
   saṃsargāvacchinnetyādilakṣaṇāpekṣayā gauravam/	saMsarga avacCinna ityAdi lakzaNa apekzayA gOravam/
   saṃsargatāśūnyatvalakṣaṇamapekṣya tu tādṛśalakṣaṇasya gauravaṃ	saMsarga tA SUnyatva lakzaNam apekzya tu tAdRSa lakzaNasya gOravam
   sphaṭameveti	sPawam eva iti
   bhāvaḥ/ [136] bodhyamiti/ anyathā uktarītyā	BAvaH/ [136] boDyam iti/ anyaTA ukta rItyA
   nirvikalpake 'tivyāpteriti bhāvaḥ/ [136] digiti/ ayamatra bhāvaḥ  	nirvikalpake ati vyApteH iti BAvaH/ [136] diS iti/ ayam atra BAvaH  
   viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇasaṃbandhānavagāhītyatra ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣāśrayaṇe saṃbandhena	viSezya viSezaNa saMbanDAn avagAhi iti atra zazWI tatpuruza ASrayaNe saMbanDena
   viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇaniṣṭhatvaniveśanaṃ viphalamiti	viSezya viSezaNa nizWa tva niveSanam viPalam iti
   dīpikāvākyāsvārasyam/ asmanmate tu lakṣaṇatrayalābhārthatayā na	dIpikA vAkyAsu Arasyam/ asmad mate tu lakzaNa traya lABa arTa tayA na
   taduktivaiphalyamiti/ 'nanu viśiṣṭabuddhirviśeṣaṇajñānajanyā	tad ukti vEPalyam iti/ ananu viSizwa budDiH viSezaNa jQAna janyA
   viśiṣṭabuddhitvāt' ityanumānamaprayojakam	viSizwa budDi tvAt a iti anumAnam aprayojakam
   anukūlatarkavirahādityāśaṅkya viśiṣṭabuddhiviśeṣaṇajñānayoḥ	anukUla tarka virahAt iti ASaFkya viSizwa budDi viSezaNa jQAnayoH
   kāryakāraṇabhāvabhaṅgaprasaṅgalakṣaṇastarko 'trāstīti	kArya kAraNa BAva BaFga prasaFga lakzaNaH tarkaH atra asti iti
   nāsyāprayojakatvamitayāśayenāha   [136]	na asya aprayojaka tva mitayA ASayena Aha  [136]
   viśiṣṭabuddhiṃ	viSizwa budDim
   pratītyādi/ atra [yadi] viśiṣṭabuddhitvaṃ	prati iti Adi/ atra [yadi] viSizwa budDi tvam
   viśeṣaṇajanyatvavyabhicāri syāt tarhi viśeṣaṇajñānajanyatāvacchedakaṃ	viSezaNa janya tva vyaBicAri syAt tarhi viSezaNa jQAna janya tAvacCedakam
   na syāditi tarko 'bhimata ityāśayenāha   [136] bhāva iti/ dīpikāyāñ [136]	na syAt iti tarkaH aBimataH iti ASayena Aha  [136] BAvaH iti/ dIpikAyAn [136]
   anavasthāprasaṅgāditi/	anavasTA prasaFgAt iti/
   janyajñānatvavyāpakaṃ svanirūpakajñānajanyatvaṃ	janya jQAna tva vyApakam sva nirUpaka jQAna janya tvam

   viṣayatāviśiṣṭatvamiti avyavasthitaparamparāropāt	vizaya tA viSizwa tvam iti avyavasTita paramparA AropAt
   suṣuptyādyanupapattirūpāniṣṭaprasañjanasahitāt niṣprakārakatvena	suzupti Adi anupapatti rUpA anizwa prasaQjana sahitAt nizprakAraka tvena
   jñānamanumitau bhāsate/ athavā viśeṣaṇaniṣṭhāyāṃ	jQAnam anumitO BAsate/ aTavA viSezaNa nizWAyAm
   viṣayatāyāmanavacchinnatvaṃ	vizaya tAyAm anavacCinna tvam
   viṣayatānirūpitatvasāmānyābhāvarūpamuktatarkasaṃgrahabalāt tatra bhāsata	vizaya tA nirUpita tva sAmAnya aBAva rUpa m ukta tarka saMgraha balAt tatra BAsata
   iti bhāvaḥ/ [136] gauritīti/ idaṃ ca svasmin	iti BAvaH/ [136] gOH itIti/ idam ca svasmin
   yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayakadhījanyatvarūpasādhyaviśeṣalābhāyābhihitam/	yat viSezaNam tad vizaya kaDI janyatva rUpa sADya viSeza lABAya aBihitam/
   anyathā yadviśeṣaṇaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ	anyaTA yat viSezaNa prakArakam jQAnam
   tadanyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyatvasiddhimādāyārthāntaratāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/	tad anya viSezaNa jQAna janya tva sidDim AdAya arTa antara tA ApatteH iti BAvaH/
   saṅgrahe [135] indriyārthasannikarṣajanyamityādi/ idaṃ ca	saFgrahe [135] indriya arTa sannikarza janyam ityAdi/ idam ca
   janyapratyakṣasyaiva	janya pratyakzasya eva
   lakṣyatvābhiprāyeṇa/ teneśvarapratyakṣasya nityatvāt	lakzya tva aBiprAyeNa/ tena ISvara pratyakzasya nitya tvAt 
   tatrāvyāptiśaṅkānirāsaḥ/ tasyālakṣyatvāt/ anyathā	tatra avyApti SaFkA nirAsaH/ tasya alakzya tvAt/ anyaTA
   purarindriyārthasannikarṣājanyatvajanyatvobhayābhāvañjanyaniṣṭhasvābhāvavattāsaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasaṃbandhena	purarindriya arTa sannikarzA janya tva janya tva uBayA BAvan janya nizWasva aBAvavattA saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedav
   indriyārthasannikarṣajanyatāviśiṣṭatvaparyavasitaṃ niveśya	indriya arTa sannikarza janya tA viSizwatva paryavasitam niveSya
   tatsaṅgraho bodhyaḥ/ atra yadyapi ātmamanaḥsaṃyogasya	tad saFgrahaH boDyaH/ atra yadi api Atma manaH saMyogasya
   jñānasāmānyahetutvāt anumityādāvativyāptiḥ/ manasa	jQAna sAmAnya hetutvAt anumiti AdO= ati vyAptiH/ manasa
   indriyatvāt ātmanaścārthatvāt tathāpi	indriya tvAt AtmanaH ca arTa tvAt taTA api
   janyatāyāmanubhavatvavyāpyadharmāvacchinnatvaniveśāt na doṣaḥ/	janyatAyAm anuBava tu avyApya Darma avacCinna tva niveSAt na dozaH/
   yathāśrute jñānapadametattātparyagrāhakam/	yaTA aSrute jQAna padam etat tAtparya grAhakam/
   niruktobhayābhāvaniveśane tvākāśādivāraṇāya jñānapadam/	nirukta uBaya aBAva niveSane tu AkASa Adi vAraNAya jQAna padam/
   kecittu    janyanityapratyakṣasādhāraṇaṃ jñānākaraṇakatve sati	kecid tu   janya nitya pratyakza sADAraNam jQAna akaraNaka tve sati
   jñānatvaṃ lakṣaṇam/	jQAna tvam lakzaNam/
   anumityādīnāṃ vyāptyādijñānakaraṇakatvāt na tatrātivyāptiḥ/	anumiti AdInAm vyApti Adi jQAna karaNaka tvAt na tatra ativyAptiH/
   īśvarapratyakṣasyājanyatvāt/ janyapratyakṣe tu indriyasyaiva	ISvara pratyakzasya ajanya tvAt/ janya pratyakze tu indriyasya eva
   karaṇatvācca lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ nirvikalpakasya savikalpakāraṇatvāt	karaNa tvAt ca lakzaNa samanvayaH/ nirvikalpakasya sa vikalpa kAraNa tvAt
   karaṇatvaṃ niveśitamityāhuḥ/	karaNa tvam niveSitam iti AhuH/
   sannikarṣavibhāgaḥ	sannikarza viBAgaH
   dīpikāyām [137] dravyapratyakṣa ityādi/ atra ca	dIpikAyAm [137] dravya pratyakzaH ityAdi/ atra ca
   dravyavṛttilaukikaviṣayatāsaṃbandhena cākṣuṣaṃ prati samavāyena	dravya vRtti lOkika vizaya tA saMbanDena cAkzuzam prati samavAyena
   cakṣussaṃyogasya kāraṇatvaṃ vācyam/ tatra rūpādau vyabhicārāvāraṇāya	cakzu ssaMyogasya kAraNa tvam vAcyam/ tatra rUpa AdO vyaBicAra AvAraNAya
   kāryadiśi dravyavṛttitvaniveśanam/	kArya diSi dravya vRtti tva niveSanam/
   ghaṭatvādisāmānyapratyāsattijanyacakṣurasambaddhātītānāgataghaṭādiviṣayakālaukikacākṣuṣamādāya	Gawa tva Adi sAmAnya pratyAsatti janya cakzuH asambadDa atIta anAgata Gawa Adi vizaya kAlOkika cAkzuzam AdAya
   vyabhicāravāraṇāya laukikatvapraveśaḥ/ evaṃ daṇḍādyaṃśe	vyaBicAra vAraNAya lOkika tva praveSaH/ evam daNxa Adi aMSe
   jñānapratyāsattijanye pūrvadaṇḍavānayamāsīditi cākṣuṣe 'pi	jQAna pratyAsatti janye pUrva daNxavAn ayam AsIt iti cAkzuze api
   tadbodhyam/ evaṃ davyasamavetavṛttilaukikaviṣayatāsaṃbandhena	tat boDyam/ evam davya samaveta vRtti lOkika vizaya tA saMbanDena
   cākṣuṣaṃ prati svarūpasaṃbandhena cakṣussaṃyuktasamavāyasya kāraṇatvam/	cAkzuzam prati svarUpa saMbanDena cakzussaMyukta samavAyasya kAraNa tvam/
   atra	atra
   cāvayavaparamparāyāḥ tryaṇukaparyantaviśrāmapakṣe tryaṇuke	ca avayava paramparAyAH tri aNuka paryanta viSrAma pakze tri aNuke
   vyabhicāranirāsāya kāryadiśi vṛttyantam/ yadyapi	vyaBicAra nirAsAya kArya diSi vRtti antam/ yadi api
   dravyamavetavṛttitvaniveśane 'pi paramāṇusvīkārapakṣe	dravyam aveta vRtti tva niveSane api paramANu svIkAra pakze
   tadavasthodoṣaḥ/ tathāpi dravyānyatvasya	tad avasTodozaH/ taTA api dravya anyatvasya
   samavetaviśeṣaṇatvābhyupagamāt na doṣaḥ/ vṛttyantaṃ ca	samaveta viSezaNa tva aByupagamAt na dozaH/ vRtti antam ca
   rūpatvādijātipratyakṣe vyabhicāravāraṇāya bodhyam/	rUpa tva Adi jAti pratyakze vyaBicAra vAraNAya boDyam/
   rūpatvādisāmānyapratyāsattijanyātītādirūpādiviṣayakālaukikacākṣuṣamādāya	rUpa tva Adi sAmAnya pratyAsatti janya atIta Adi rUpa Adi vizaya kAlOkika cAkzuzam AdAya
   tadvāraṇāya viṣayatāyāṃ laukikatvaniveśaḥ/ evaṃ nīlādyaṃśe	tad vAraNAya vizaya tAyAm lOkika tva niveSaH/ evam nIla Adi aMSe
   jñānapratyāsattijanyapūrvaṃnīlarūpavānayamāsīditipratyakṣe 'pi	jQAna pratyAsatti janya pUrvaMnIla rUpavAn ayam AsIt iti pratyakze api
   cakṣussaṃyogaviśiṣṭanirūpitasamavāyavirahāt vyabhicāravāraṇāyāpi	cakzu ssaMyoga viSizwa nirUpita samavAya virahAt vyaBicAra vAraNAya api
   tathā/ evaṃ dravyasamavetasamavetavṛttilaukikaviṣayatāsaṃbandhena	taTA/ evam dravya samaveta samaveta vRtti lOkika vizaya tA saMbanDena
   cākṣuṣaṃ prati cakṣussaṃyuktasamavetasamavāyasya kāraṇatvam/	cAkzuzam prati cakzussaMyukta samaveta samavAyasya kAraNa tvam/
   yogajadharmaṃpratyāsattijanyanikhilaviṣayakayogicākṣuṣe	yoga ja DarmaMpratyAsatti janya niKila vizayaka yogi cAkzuze
   jātitvasāmānyapratyāsattijanyanikhilajāticākṣuṣe ca	jAti tva sAmAnya pratyAsatti janya niKila jAti cAkzuze ca
   vyabhicāravāraṇāyātra laukikatvaniveśaḥ/ svatantratryaṇukapakṣe	vyaBicAra vAraNAya atra lOkika tva niveSaH/ svatantra tri aNuka pakze
   tryaṇukatadrūpādau vyabhicāravāraṇāya vṛttyantam/ matāntare 'pi	tri aNuka tad rUpa AdO vyaBicAra vAraNAya vRtti antam/ mata antare api
   tādṛśaviṣayatāyā ākasmikatāvāraṇāya tanniveśyameva/	tAdRSa vizaya tAyAH Akasmika tA AvAraNAya tat niveSyam eva/
   śabdavṛttilaukikaviṣayatāsaṃbandhena śrāvaṇapratyakṣaṃ prati	Sabda vRtti lOkika vizaya tA saMbanDena SrAvaNa pratyakzam prati
   śrotrasamavāyasya kāraṇatvam, śabdatvādau vyabhicāravāraṇāya	Srotra samavAyasya kAraNa tvam, Sabda tva AdO vyaBicAra vAraNAya
   vṛttyantam/ śabdatvasāmānyapratyāsattijanye atītādiśabdaviṣayake	vRtti antam/ Sabda tva sAmAnya pratyAsatti janye atIta Adi Sabda vizayake
   yogajapratyāsattijanyatādṛśapratyakṣe ca vyabhicāranirasāya	yoga ja pratyAsatti janya tAdRSa pratyakze ca vyaBicAra nirasAya
   laukikatvaniveśanam/ śabdasamavetavṛttilaukikaviṣayatāsaṃbandhena	lOkika tva niveSanam/ Sabda samaveta vRtti lOkika vizaya tA saMbanDena
   śrāvaṇaṃ prati śrotrasamavetasamavāyasya kāraṇatvam/ śabde	SrAvaNam prati Srotra samaveta samavAyasya kAraNa tvam/ Sabde
   vyabhicāravāraṇāya vṛttitvaviśeṣaṇam/	vyaBicAra vAraNAya vRtti tva viSezaNam/
   jātitvasāmānyapratyāsattyātītānāgatakakārādivṛttikatvādijātipratyakṣe	jAti tva sAmAnya pratyAsattyA atIta anAgata kakAra Adi vRttika tva Adi jAti pratyakze
   vyabhicāravāraṇāya laukikatvaniveśaḥ/ evamanyatrāpi bodhyam/	vyaBicAra vAraNAya lOkika tva niveSaH/ evam anyatra api boDyam/
   nanu viśeṣaṇatānāṃ	nanu viSezaNa tAnAm
   saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣaṇatādibhedena nānātvāt	saMyukta viSezaNa tA saMyukta samaveta viSezaNa tA Adi Bedena nAnAtvAt 
   kathaṃ sannikarṣaṃṣāḍvidhyam/ yadi ca tāsāṃ viśeṣaṇatātvenānugamaḥ	kaTam sannikarzaMzAxviDyam/ yadi ca tAsAm viSezaNa tA tvena anugamaH
   tarhi saṃyuktasamavāyādīnāṃ samavāyatvenānugamaḥ/ kiṃ na	tarhi saMyukta samavAya AdInAm samavAya tvena anugamaH/ kim na
   syādityāśaṃṅkāṃ nirākaroti    [138] atredamavadheyamityādinā/	syAt iti ASaMFkAm nirAkaroti   [138] atra idam avaDeyam ityAdinA/
   anupalabdheḥpramāṇāntaratvanirākaraṇam	anupalabDeH pramANa antara tva nirAkaraNam
   [142] viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasannikarṣeti/	[142] viSezaNa viSezya BAva sannikarza iti/
   viśeṣyatvaviśeṣaṇatvānyatarasannikarṣetyarthaḥ/ [142]	viSezya tva viSezaNatva anyatara sat nikarzA iti arTaH/ [142]
   ghaṭopalabdhidaśāyāmityādi/	Gawa upalabDi daSAyAm ityAdi/
   laukikasannikarṣājanyatadabhāvavattābuddhiṃ pratyeva tadvattāniścayasya	lOkika sannikarzA janya tad aBAvavat tA budDim pratyeva tadvat tA niScayasya
   pratibandhakatayā laukikasannikarṣajanyaghaṭābhāvapratyakṣasya	pratibanDaka tayA lOkika sannikarza janya Gawa aBAva pratyakzasya
   ghaṭavattāniścayadaśāyāmāpattiḥ/ na ca ghaṭābhāvarūpaviṣayavirahādeva na	Gawa vat tA niScaya daSAyAm ApattiH/ na ca Gawa aBAva rUpa vizaya virahAt eva na
   ghaṭavati deśe ghaṭābhāvapratyakṣaprasaṃgaḥ/ ghaṭāsattve kathaṃ	Gawavati deSe Gawa aBAva pratyakza prasaMgaH/ Gawa asattve kaTam
   ghaṭavattāniścayasaṃbhava iti vācyam/ ghaṭaśūnyadeśe 'pi	Gawa vat tA niScaya saMBavaH iti vAcyam/ Gawa SUnya deSe api
   dharmyantaraghaṭitasannikarṣeṇa bhramātmakaghaṭavattāniścayasambhavena	Darmi antara Gawita sannikarzeNa Brama Atmaka Gawa vattA niScaya samBavena
   tatra	tatra
   ghaṭābhāvapratyakṣāpattisambhavāt/ ghaṭādimati deśe 'pi	Gawa aBAva pratyakzA patti samBavAt/ Gawa Adimati deSe api
   dharmyantaraghaṭitasannikarṣabalena ghaṭābhāvapratyakṣāpattisaṃbhavācceti/	Darmi antara Gawita sannikarza balena Gawa aBAva pratyakzApatti saMBavAt ca iti/
   [141] pramāṇāntaratvamityādi/ yadyapyanyat pramāṇaṃ pramāṇāntaramiti	[141] pramANa antara tvam ityAdi/ yadi api anyat pramANam pramANa antaram iti

   tasyā abhāvarūpāyā evābhāvapramākaraṇatvasya tairabhyupagamāt,	tasyAH aBAva rUpAyAH eva aBAva pramAkaraNa tvasya tEH aByupagamAt,
   tathāpyantarapadavyatyāsamupagamya pratyakṣādyatiriktā yā pramā	taTA api antarapada vyatyAsam upagamya pratyakza Adi atiriktA yA pramA
   tatkaraṇatvaṃ	tad karaNa tvam
   pratyakṣādipramitivijātīyapramitikaraṇatvaparyavasitaṃ vivakṣitamiti na	pratyakza Adi pramiti vijAtIya pramiti karaNa tva paryavasitam vivakzitam iti na
   ko 'pi doṣaḥ/ abhāvapramiteḥ pratyakṣarūpāyā eva naiyāyikairupagamāt/	kaH api dozaH/ aBAva pramiteH pratyakza rUpAyAH eva nEyAyikEH upagamAt/

   1anumānapadasyānumānapadārthatvāvacchinnalākṣaṇikatayā tatpuruṣe	1anu mAna padasya anumAna padArTa tva avacCinna lAkzaNika tayA tatpuruze

   dīpikāvākyamasaṅgatam/	dIpikA vAkyam asaFgatam/
