   ityasvarasasūcanam/ tadbījantu	iti asvarasa sUcanam/ tat bIjantu
   sthāṇutvatadabhāvakoṭikasaṃśayasya prathamaṃ vivakṣitatve puruṣa eveti	sTANu tva tada BAva kowika saMSayasya praTamam vivakzita tve puruzaH eva iti
   pratyakṣajananādityuttaragranthavirodhaḥ/ sthāṇureveti pratyakṣajananāditi	pratyakza jananAt iti uttara granTa viroDaH/ sTANuH eva iti pratyakza jananAt iti
   vaktavyatvāt/ ataḥ tādṛśagranthaparyālocanayā	vaktavya tva at/ atas tAdRSa granTa paryAlocanayA
   sathāṇupuruṣasuśayānantaramiti vākye saṃśayadvayaṃ na vivakṣitam,	saTA aNu puruza suSaya anantaram iti vAkye saMSaya dvayam na vivakzitam,
   kintu eka eva saṃśaya iti/	kintu ekaH eva saMSayaH iti/
   1. teneti/ ātmādeḥ	1. tena iti/ Atma AdeH
   anumitiniṣṭhajñānatvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāśrayatve 'pi	anumiti nizWa jQAna tva avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tA ASraya tve api
   anumititvāvacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇatāśrayatvābhāvannātivyāptiriti	anumiti tva avacCinna kArya tA nirUpita kAraNa tA ASraya tva aBAvat na ati vyAptiH iti
   bhāvaḥ/	BAvaH/
   taccaitanmate na ghaṭata	tat ca etad mate na Gawata
   iti/ nanu puruṣa iti pratyakṣajananāditi vaktavyam	iti/ nanu puruzaH iti pratyakza jananAt iti vaktavyam
   kimevakāropādānenetyāśaṅyāha   [148] puruṣa evetīti/ nanu	kim evakAra upAdAnena iti ASaFyAha  [148] puruzaH eva iti iti/ nanu
   'puruṣaṃ anuminomī'tyanuvyavasāyasattve anumititvamapi tatra	apuruzam anuminomI ati anuvyavasAya sattve anumiti tvam api tatra
   svīkāryaṃ syādityata āha   [148]	svIkAryam syAt iti atas Aha  [148]
   idamupalakṣaṇamiti/ [148] idaṃ bādhakayuktipradarśanam/ [148] upalakṣaṇam	idam upalakzaNa miti/ [148] idam bADaka yukti pradarSanam/ [148] upalakzaNam
   bādhakayuktyantarasyāpi sūcakam/ nanu	bADaka yukti antarasya api sUcakam/ nanu
   saṃśayottarapratyakṣe 'tivyāptivāraṇātha	saMSaya uttara pratyakze ati vyApti vAraNa aTa
   1parāmarśajanyatvaśarīrapraviṣṭajanakatāyāṃ	1parAmarSa janya tva SarIra pravizwa janaka tAyAm
   viśiṣṭaparāmarśatvāvacchinnatvameva kuto na niveśitam/	viSizwa parAmarSa tva avacCinna tvam eva kutas na niveSitam/
   saṃśeyottarapratyakṣe ca puruṣatvavyāpyakarādimānayamiti parāmarśasya	saMSeya uttara pratyakze ca puruza tva vyApya kara Adi mAnayam iti parAmarSasya
   2viśakalitajñānasādhāraṇyānurodhena 3jñānaviśiṣṭajñānatvenaiva	2viSa kalita jQAna sADa araNya anuroDena 3jQAna viSizwa jQAna tvena eva
   kāraṇatvopagamāt/ evaṃ viśeṣapadarśanasya	kAraNa tva upagamAt/ evam viSeza padarSanasya
   viparītajñānapratibanadhakatāyāṃ uttejakatāmate uktaviśeṣaṇaṃ viphalaṃ	viparIta jQAna pratibana Daka tAyAm uttejaka tA mate ukta viSezaNam viPalam
   syāt/ saṃśayottarapratyakṣe 4ativyāpteranavakāśādintyata āha   [148]	syAt/ saMSaya uttara pratyakze 4ati vyApteH anavakASa Adinti atas Aha  [148]
   eteneti/ janakatāyāṃ	etena iti/ janakatAyAm
   tādṛśadharmāvacchinnatvamaniveśya	tAdRSa Darma avacCinna tvam aniveSya
   pakṣatāsahakṛtaparāmarśajanyatvasyaiva vivakṣaṇenetyarthaḥ/ [148]	pakzatA saha kRta parAmarSa janya tvasya eva vivakzaNena iti arTaH/ [148]
   viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakārakanirṇayavidhayetyanena	viSezaNa tAvacCedaka prakAraka nirNaya viDayA iti anena
   viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhibuddheḥ	viSizwa vESizwya avagAhi budDeH
   tādṛśaviśiṣṭaparāmarśatvāvacchinnajanakatākatvamastīti sūcitam/	tAdRSa viSizwa parAmarSa tva avacCinna janakatAka tvam asti iti sUcitam/
   saṅkṣepa iti/ atrāyamāśayaḥ     pakṣatāsahakṛtasyaiva parāmarśasya	saFkzepaH iti/ atra ayam ASayaH    pakzatA sahakRtasya eva parAmarSasya
   viśeṣadarśanatvena saṃśayottarapratyakṣe hetutvāt	viSeza darSana tvena saMSaya uttara pratyakze hetu tvAt 
   taddoṣatādavasthyamiti pakṣatājanyatve sati parāmarśajanyatvamiti	tad doza tAdavasTyam iti pakzatA janya tve sati parAmarSa janya tvam iti
   tadartho vaktavyaḥ/ evaṃ pakṣatāpratyakṣe ativyāptivāraṇāya	tad arTaH vaktavyaH/ evam pakzatA pratyakze ati vyApti vAraNAya
   parāmarśajanyatvopādānam/	parAmarSa janya tva upAdAnam/
   1. parāmarśajanyatveti/	1. parAmarSa janya tva iti/
   parāmarśaniṣṭhajanakatānirūpitajanyatvetyarthaḥ/	parAmarSa nizWa janakatA nirUpita janya tvA iti arTaH/
   2. viśakalitajñāneti/	2. viSakalita jQAna iti/
   'puruṣatvavyāpyaṃ karādi', 'karādimāṃścāyam' iti	apuH uza tva vyApyam kara Adi a, akara AdimAn= ca ayam a iti
   jñānadvayasādhāraṇyānurodhenetyarthaḥ/	jQAna dvaya sADa araNya anuroDena iti arTaH/
   jñānaviśiṣṭajñānatveneti/	jQAna viSizwa jQAna tvena iti/
   karādiviśeṣyakapuruṣatvavyāpyatvaprakārakajñānaviśiṣṭakaradiṃprakārakedantvāvacchinnaviśeṣyakajñānatvenetyarthaḥ/	kara Adi viSezyaka puruza tva vyApya tva prakAraka jQAna viSizwa kara diMprakArakedantvA avacCinna viSezya ka jQAna tvena iti arTaH/
   ativyāpteranavakāśāditi/	ati vyApteH anavakASAt iti/
   jñānaviśiṣṭajñānatvāvacchinnakāraṇatānirūtipakāryatānirūpitakāryatāyāḥ	jQAna viSizwa jQAna tva avacCinna kAraNa tA nirUti pa kArya tA nirUpita kArya tAyAH
   sattve 'pi parāmarśatvāvacchinnakāraṇatānirūpitakāryatāyāḥ	sattve api parAmarSa tvA avacCinna kAraNa tA nirUpita kArya tAyAH
   virahāditi bhāvaḥ/	virahAt iti BAvaH/
   yadyapi	yadi api
   pakṣatāparāmarśobhayaviṣayakasamūhālambanapratyakṣe 'tivyāptirevamapi	pakzatA aparAm arSaH Baya vizayaka samUha Alambana pratyakze ati vyAptiH evam api
   sambhavati, tathāpi	samBavati, taTA api
   pakṣatājanyatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnaparāmarśajanyatāvivakṣaṇāt 1na	pakzatA janya tAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna parAmarSa janya tA vivakzaNAt 1na
   doṣaḥ/ pakṣatāpratyakṣatvaparāmarśapratyakṣatvoḥ avacchedakayoḥ	dozaH/ pakzatA pratyakza tva parAmarSa pratyakza tvoH avacCedakayoH
   bhedādityādikaṃ anumitigranthādau vistareṇoktaṃ draṣṭavyamiti/	BedAt iti Adikam anumiti granTa AdO vistareNa uktam drazwavyam iti/
   pakṣatālakṣaṇam	pakzatA lakzaNam
   nanu	nanu
   sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāsahakṛtatvaṃ kuto nātra niveśayituṃ	sADya saMSaya rUpa pakza tA saha kRta tvam kutas na atra niveSayitum
   śakyamityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate   [150] yadyapīti/ ghanagarjanena	Sakyam iti aBiprAyeNa SaFkate  [150] yadi api iti/ Gana garjanena
   suptotthitasya meghānumitau sādhyasaṃśayarūpakāraṇābhāvena	supta utTitasya meGa anumitO sADya saMSaya rUpa kAraNa aBAvena
   vyabhicārāpattyā sādhyasaṃśayasyānumitihetubhūtapakṣatārūpatvaṃ na	vyaBicAra ApattyA sADya saMSayasya anumiti hetu BUta pakzatA rUpa tvam na
   sambhavatīti nātṛ tadvivakṣaṇaṃ śakyamityabhiprāyeṇa samādhatte   [150]	samBavati iti nAtR tad vivakzaNam Sakyam iti aBiprAyeNa samADatte  [150]
   tathāpīti/ [150] sādhyānumitīcchāyā iti/ atra	taTA api iti/ [150] sADya anumiti icCAyAH iti/ atra
   cecchāmātraniveśe siddhisattve ghaṭo bhūyāt	ca icCA mAtra niveSe sidDi sattve GawaH BUyAt 
   itīcchādaśāyāmanumityāpattiḥ/ anumityasāniveśe 'pi	iti icCAdaSAyAm anum iti ApattiH/ anumiti asA niveSe api
   ghaṭānumitiḥ bhūyāt itīcchāyā vāraṇāsambhavaḥ/	GawAnumitiH BUyAt iti icCAyA vAraNAsamBavaH/
   sādhyānumitiviṣayakecchāniveśe 'pi ghaṭānumitiḥ	sADya anumiti vizaya ka icCA niveSe api Gawa anumitiH
   bhūyāditīcchāvāraṇaṃ na sambhavati/	BUyAt iti icCA vAraNam na samBavati/
   2ghaṭasādhyobhayasamūhālambanānumiterviṣayatvasambhavāt/ ataḥ	2Gawa sADya uBaya samUha Alambana anumiteH vizaya tva samBavAt/ atas 
   prakṛtasādhyakatvaviśeṣitānumititvaprakārikecchāyā iti tadartho	prakRta sADyaka tva viSezita anumiti tva prakArikA icCAyAH iti tad arTaH 
   bodhyaḥ/ abhāvapratiyogitāyāṃ ca tādṛśecchātvāvacchinnatvaṃ	boDyaH/ aBAva pratiyogitAyAm ca tAdRSa icSAtvA avacCinna tvam
   niveśyam, tena tādṛśecchāghaṭobhayābhāvādikamādāya 3na doṣaḥ/	niveSyam, tena tAdRSa icCA Gawa uBaya aBAva Adikam AdAya 3na dozaH/
   tādṛśecchātvāvacchinnatvaṃ ca tādṛśecchātvaparyāptāvacchedakatākatvam/	tAdRSa icCAtvA avacCinna tvam ca tAdRSa it SAtu aparyApta avacCedaka tAka tvam/
   tacca 4tādaśecchātvetaradharmānavacchinnatvaparyavasitam/ tena caitrasya	tat ca 4tAdaSa icCA tvA itara Darma an avacCinna tva paryavasitam/ tena cEtrasya
   siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ sattve	sidDi sizA DayizayoH sattve
   1. na doṣa iti/	1. na dozaH iti/
   samūhālambanapratyakṣaniṣṭhāyāḥ parāmarśajanyatāyāḥ	samUha Alambana pratyakza nizWAyAH parAmarSa janya tAyAH
   parāmarśaviṣayakapratyakṣatvāvacchinnatve 'pi pakṣatāyāḥ	parAmarSa vizayaka pratyakza tva avacCinna tve api pakzatAyAH
   janyatāvacchedakaṃ	janya tA avacCedakam
   yat pakṣatāpratyakṣatvaṃ tadavacchinnatvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/	yat pakzatA pratyakza tvam tad avacCinna tva aBAvAt iti BAvaH/
   2. ghaṭasādhyeti/	2. Gawa sADya iti/
   'ghaṭavahnyubhayānumitirbhūyāt' iti icchā atra vivakṣitā/	aGawa vahni uBaya anumitiH BUyAt a iti icCA atra vivakzitA/
   3. na doṣa iti/	3. na dozaH iti/
   siddhisiṣādhayiṣobhayasattvakāle na pakṣatānupapattirityarthaḥ/	sidDi sizA Dayiza uBaya sattva kAle na pakzatA anupapattiH iti arTaH/
   tādṛśecchātvetyādi/ tathā ca ghaṭavahnyubhayānumitirbhūyāditīcchāyāḥ	tAdRSa icCAtvA ityAdi/ taTA ca Gawa vahni uBaya anumitiH BUyAt iti icCAyAH
   yo 'bhāvaḥ tadīyapratiyogitāyāḥ	yaH aBAvaH tadIya pratiyogitAyAH
   tādṛśecchātvetaraghaṭasādhyakatvādyavacchinnatayā tadanavacchinnatvābhāvāt	tAdRSa icCAtvA itara Gawa sADyaka tva Adi avacCinna tayA tad anavacCinna tva aBAvAt
   tādṛśābhāvasya na uttejakābhāvarūpatetyāśaya/	tAdRSa aBAvasya naH uttejaka aBAva rUpa tA iti ASaya/
   maitravṛttitvaviśiṣṭasiṣādhayiṣayā abhāvamādāya	mEtra vRtti tva viSizwa sizA DayizayA aBAvam AdAya
   nānumityanupapattiḥ/ evamagre 'pi pratiyogitāyāṃ	na anum iti anupapattiH/ evam agre api pratiyogitAyAm
   viśiṣṭasiddhitvetaradharmāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśyam/ tena	viSizwa sidDi tva itara Darma avacCinna tvam niveSyam/ tena
   viśiṣṭasiddhighaṭobhayādyabhāvasya	viSizwa sidDi Gawa uBaya Adi aBAvasya
   yatkiñcidātmavṛttitvaviśiṣṭatādṛśasiddhyabhāvasya ca vyudāsaḥ/	yat kiQcit Atma vRtti tva viSizwa tAdRSa sidDi aBAvasya ca vyudAsaH/
   anyathā siṣādhayiṣāṃ vinā siddhisattve 'numityāpatteḥ/ yadyapi	anyaTA sizA DayizAm vinA sidDi sattve anum iti ApatteH/ yadi api
   tādṛśecchātvetaradharmaḥ tādṛśānumititvaprakārakatvarūpa iti	tAdRSa icCAtvA itara DarmaH tAdRSa anumiti tva prakAraka tva rUpaH iti
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahasyaivāsaṃgrahaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ tathāpi	sizA DayizA virahasya eva asaMgrahaH/ evam agre api/ taTA api
   1tādṛśaprakārakatvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinna  	1tAdRSa prakAraka tva nizWA avacCedaka tA Bid naH  
   icchātvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinnāvacchedakatvānirūpakatvaṃ	icCA tu a nizWA avacCedaka tA Binna avacCedaka tva anirUpaka tvam
   vivakṣaṇīyam/ evaṃ	vivakzaNIyam/ evam
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahavaiśiṣṭyaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinnasiddhitvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinnāvacchedakatvānirūpakatvamagrimapratiyogitāyāṃ	sizA DayizA viraha vESizwi a nizWA avacCedaka tA Binna sidDi tva nizWA avacCedaka tA Binna avacCedaka tva anirUpaka tvam agrima pratiyogitAyAm
   niveśyamiti/ evamanyatrāpi bodhyam/ [151] samavāyenābhāva iti/	niveSya miti/ evam anyatra api boDyam/ [151] samavAyena aBAvaH iti/
   siṣādhayiṣāsiddhyoḥ sattvadaśāyāṃ	sizA DayizA sidDyoH sattva daSAyAm
   saṃyogasaṃbandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākasiṣādhayiṣāvirahasyātmani	saMyoga saMbanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka sizA DayizA virahasya Atmani
   sattvāt anumityanupapattiḥ ataḥ samavāyenetyuktam/	sattvAt anumiti anupapattiH atas samavAyena iti uktam/
   avacchinnapratiyogitākatvamabhāvānvayi tṛtīyārthaḥ/ nanu	avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tvam aBAva anvayi tRtIya arTaH/ nanu
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahasya svarūpasaṃbandhena siddhiviśeṣaṇatve	sizA DayizA virahasya svarUpa saMbanDena sidDi viSezaNa tve
   siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ sattve 'numittyanupapattitādavasthyam/	sidDi sizA DayizayoH sattve anum itti anupapatti tAdavasTyam/
   siṣādhayiṣāyāḥ samavāyenātmanyeva sattvāt ityata āha   [151] svarūpetyādi/	sizA DayizAyAH samavAyena Atmani eva sattvAt iti atas Aha  [151] svarUpa ityAdi/
   tathā ca siṣādhayiṣāvirahavaiśiṣṭyaṃ siddhau na	taTA ca sizA DayizA viraha vESizwyam sidDO na
   svarūpasambandhena, yenoktadoṣaḥ syāt/ api tu	svarUpa sambanDena, yena ukta dozaH syAt/ api tu
   svaniṣṭhasvarūpasaṃbandhāvacchinnādheyatānirūpakanirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnādheyatāsambandhena	sva nizWa svarUpa saMbanDa avacCinna ADeya tA nirUpaka nirUpita samavAya sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA sambanDena
   tathā ca noktadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ [151] tadviśiṣṭāyāssaddheriti	taTA ca na ukta dozaH iti BAvaH/ [151] tad viSizwAyAssadDeH iti
   vyāsena lekhanāt siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭasiddhyabhāva iti	vyAsena leKanAt sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa sidDi aBAvaH iti
   dīpikāvākyasthasamastapade viśiṣṭāntaṃ siddhyabhāvaviśeṣaṇamiti	dIpikA vAkya sTa samasta pade viSizwa antam sidDi aBAva viSezaNam iti
   bhramo nirastaḥ/ tathā sati siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ	BramaH nirastaH/ taTA sati sidDi sizA DayizayoH
   tādṛśaprakārakatveti/	tAdRSa prakAraka tvA iti/
   tatsādhyaviśiṣṭatatpakṣaviṣayakānumititvaprakārakatvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinnā	tad sADya viSizwa tad pakza vizayaka anumiti tva prakAraka tva nizWA avacCedaka tA BinnA
   icchātvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatābhinnā va yā avacchedakatā tadanirūpikā yā	icCA tu a nizWA avacCedaka tA BinnA va yA avacCedaka tA tad anirUpikA yA
   siṣādhayiṣāniṣṭhā pratiyogitā tannirūpakābhāvaḥ	sizA DayizA nizWA pratiyogitA tad nirUpaka aBAvaH
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahapadena vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ/	sizA DayizA viraha padena vivakzitaH iti BAvaH/
   sattve 'numityanupapattitādavasthyāt/	sattve anum iti anupapatti tAdavasTyAt/
   siddhyabhāvarūpaviśeṣyavirahāditi dhyeyam/ [151] siddhessamavāyenābhāva	sidDi aBAva rUpa viSezya virahAt iti Dyeyam/ [151] sidDessamavAyena aBAva
   ityartha iti/	iti arTaH iti/
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭasiddheḥ saṃyogenābhāvamādāya	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa sidDeH saMyogena aBAvam AdAya
   viśiṣṭasiddhidaśāyāmanumitivāraṇāya samavāyenetyuktam/ atra	viSizwa sidDi daSA AyAm anumiti vAraNAya samavAyena iti uktam/ atra
   sāmānādhikaravyaśarīre prathamādheyatāyāṃ	sAmAnADika ravya SarIre praTama ADeya tAyAm
   svarūpasaṃbandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ sattve 'pi	svarUpa saMbanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe sidDi sizA DayizayoH sattve api
   ātmani siṣādhayiṣāvirahasya 1svapratiyogimattvasaṃbandhena	Atmani sizA DayizA virahasya 1sva pratiyogimattva saMbanDena
   sattvādanumityanupapattiḥ, ataḥ tanniveśaḥ/	sattva at anum iti anupapattiH, atas tad niveSaH/
   anavacchinnasvarūpasaṃbandhāvacchinnatvaṃ tadarthaḥ/ tena	anavacCinna svarUpa saMbanDa avacCinna tvam tad arTaH/ tena
   ghaṭādyavacchedena	Gawa Adi avacCedena
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahasya siṣādhayiṣāvatyapyātmani sattve 'pi na kṣatiḥ/	sizA DayizA virahasya sizADayizA avati api Atmani sattve api na kzatiH/
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahavati kāle kālikaviśeṣaṇatayā siddhisattvāt 2sa	sizA DayizA virahavati kAle kAlika viSezaNa tayA sidDi sattvAt 2sa
   eva doṣa iti dvitīyādheyatānavacchinnasvarūpasambandhena kāraṇatvaṃ	eva dozaH iti dvitIya ADeya tAn avacCinna svarUpa sambanDena kAraNa tvam
   vaktavyam/ anyathā siddhisattve ghaṭādyavacchedena tadabhāvasattvāt	vaktavyam/ anyaTA sidDi sattve Gawa Adi avacCedena tad aBAva sattvAt
   viśiṣṭasiddhidaśāyāmanumityāpatteḥ/ [151] sādhyasiddhiḥ	viSizwa sidDi daSA AyAmanum iti ApatteH/ [151] sADya sidDiH
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭa ityādi/	pakza tA avacCedaka viSizwaH ityAdi/
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitasādhyatāvacchedakadharmasaṃbandhāvacchinnaprakāratāśālisaṃśayānyajñānamityarthaṃḥ/	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita sADya tAvacCedaka Darma saMbanDa avacCinna prakAra tA SAli saMSayAni ajQAnam iti arTaMH/
   atra ca pāṣāṇamayaḥ saṃyogena vahnimānityādeḥ, parvataḥ saṃyogena	atra ca pAzANa mayaH saMyogena vahnimAn itya AdeH, parvataH saMyogena
   dravyavān ityādeḥ, parvataḥ kālikādinā vahnimānityādeśca	dravyavAn iti AdeH, parvataH kAlikA AdinA vahnimAn itya AdeH ca
   niścayasya sattve 'pi anumityanupapattiḥ syāditi	niScayasya sattve api anumiti anupapattiH syAt iti
   pakṣatāvacchedakāderniveśanam/	pakza tA avacCedaka AdeH niveSanam/
   viśeṣyatāprakāratayornirūpyanirūpakabhāvaniveśanaṃ ca parvato	viSezyatA prakAra tayoH nirUpya nirUpaka BAva niveSanam ca parvataH 
   ghaṭavān, hradaśca vahnimānityādisamūhālaṃbananirṇayasya parvato	GawavAn, hradaH ca vahnimAn itya Adi samUha AlaMbana nirNayasya parvataH 
   vahnimānityādyanumitivirodhitāvāraṇāyeti bodhyam/ parvato	vahnimAn itya Adi anumiti viroDita AvAraNAya iti boDyam/ parvataH 
   vahnimān naveti saṃśayasya pratibandhakatāvāraṇāya	vahnimAn navA iti saMSayasya pratibanDaka tA vAraNAya
   saṃśayānyatvaniveśanam/ tacca na sāmānyataḥ saṃśayabhinnatvama, tathā	saMSaya anyatva niveSanam/ tat ca na sAmAnyatas saMSaya Binna tvam a, taTA
   sati parvataḥ saṃyogena vahnimān bhūtaṃ ghaṭavān	sati parvataH saMyogena vahnimAn BUtam GawavAn
   svapratiyogamattveti/ svaṃ siṣādhayiṣāvirahaḥ tatpratiyogi	sva pratiyoga mattva iti/ svam sizA DayizA virahaH tad pratiyogi
   siṣādhayiṣā tadvattvamātmanaḥ/	sizA DayizA tadvat tvam AtmanaH/
   2. sa eva doṣa iti/	2. saH eva dozaH iti/
   siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ sattve 'pi anumityanupapattirityarthaḥ/	sidDi sizA DayizayoH sattve api anumiti anupapattiH iti arTaH/
   navetyādi	nava ityAdi
   samūhālambanajñānasyāṃśikasaṃśayarūpasyāpratibandhakatvaprasaṅgāt,	samUha Alambana jQAnasya aMSika saMSaya rUpasya apratibanDaka tva prasaFgAt,
   kintu	kintu
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvāprakārakatvam/	sADya tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAva aprakAraka tvam/
   yadyapi atra vahnitvādinā padārthānatarāvagāhinaḥparvataḥ saṃyogena	yadi api atra vahni tva AdinA padArTAnatara avagAhinaH parvataH saMyogena
   vahnimān navetyādisaṃśayasyāpi tādṛśatvamasti	vahnimAn nava ityAdi saMSayasya api tAdRSa tvam asti
   sādhyatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnasādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnaprat	sADya tAvacCedaka Darma avacCinna sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna prat
   iyogitāsambandhāvacchinnaprakāratānirūpitābhāvatvāvacchinnaprakāratānirūpakatvābhāvavivakṣāyāmapi	iyogitA sambanDa avacCinna prakAra tA nirUpita aBAva tva avacCinna prakAra tA nirUpaka tva aBAva vivakzAyAm api
   parvatā vahnimān hradaśca	parvatAH vahnimAn hradaH ca
   vahnyabhāvavānityādigrahasyāpratibandhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ/ tathāpi	vahni aBAvavAn iti Adi grahasya apratibanDaka tva prasaFgaH/ taTA api
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitā yā	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpitA yA
   tādṛśābhāvatvāvacchinnaprakāratātannirūpakatvābhāvavivakṣaṇāt na doṣaḥ/	tAdRSa aBAva tva avacCinna prakAra tA tad nirUpaka tva aBAva vivakzaNAt na dozaH/
   abhāvatvāvacchinnaprakāratāyāṃ	aBAva tva avacCinna prakAra tAyAm
   svarūpasambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ anyathā parvataḥ	svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna tvam niveSanIyam/ anyaTA parvataH
   saṃyogena vahnimānkālikādinā sambandhena	saMyogena vahnimAn kAlika AdinA sambanDena
   vahnyabhāvavāṃścetyādiniścayasyāpi virodhitāpattiḥ/	vahni aBAvavAn= ca ityAdi niScayasya api viroDita ApattiH/
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinanaviśeṣyatānirūpitasādhyavadbhedatvāvacchinnasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnaprakāratākatvābhāvo	pakza tA avacCedakA vacCinana viSezya tA nirUpita sADya vat Beda tva avacCinna svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna prakAra tAka tva aBAvaH 
   'pi	api
   niveśyaḥ/ anyathā parvato vahnimān vahnimadanyo veti saṃśayasya	niveSyaH/ anyaTA parvataH vahnimAn vahni mat an yaH vA iti saMSayasya
   virodhitāpattirityalamadhikena/	viroDita ApattiH iti alam aDikena/
   nanu siddhau	nanu sidDO
   siṣādhayiṣāvirahaviśiṣṭatvaniveśaprayojanaṃ 'siddhisattve 'pī'tyādi	sizA DayizA viraha viSizwa tva niveSa prayojanam asidDi sattve apI atyAdi
   dīpikāgranthoktaṃ siddhisiṣādhayiṣāparāmarśānāṃ yaugapadya eva	dIpikA granTa uktam sidDi sizA DayizA parAmarSAnAm yOgapadya eva
   sambhavati/ tadeva ca na ghaṭate/ yogyavibhuviśeṣaguṇānāṃ	samBavati/ tat eva ca na Gawate/ yogya viBu viSeza guNAnAm
   svottarotpannaguṇanāśyatvaniyamena teṣāṃ yugapadavasthānāsambhavāt,	sva uttara utpanna guNa nASya tva niyamena tezAm yugapad ava sTAna asamBavAt,
   ataḥ tatprayojanakathanamasaṅgatamityāśaṅkya	atas tad prayojana kaTanam asaFgatam iti ASaFkya
   siddhyātmakaparāmarśasthale tat saṅgamayati   [151] atra	sidDi Atmaka parAmarSa sTale tat saFgamayati  [151] atra
   siddhiścetyādinā/ [151] ataḥ samūhālambanaparyantānudhāvanāt/	sidDiH ca ityAdinA/ [151] atas samUha Alambana paryanta anuDAvanAt/
   parāmarśeti/ anyathā yatra prathamaṃ parāmarśaḥ tataḥ siddhiḥ, tataḥ	parAmarSa iti/ anyaTA yatra praTamam parAmarSaH tatas sidDiH, tatas 
   siṣādhayiṣā, tataḥ anumitiḥ na jāyata eva/ parāmarśasya pūrvaṃ	sizA DayizA, tatas anumitiH na jAyate eva/ parAmarSasya pUrvam
   naṣṭatvāt ato nātra prayojanaṃ sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca	nazwa tvAt atas na atra prayojanam samBavati iti BAvaH/ taTA ca
   viśeṣaṇābhāvaprayuktaviśiṣṭābhāvasambhavāt na siddhisiṣādhayiṣayoḥ	viSezaNa aBAva prayukta viSizwa aBAva samBavAt na sidDi sizA DayizayoH
   sattve vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ/	sattve vyaBicAraH iti BAvaH/
   parāmarśalakṣaṇam	parAmarSa lakzaNam
   prakāśikāyām	prakASikAyAm
   [155] saptamītatpuruṣāṅgīkāra iti/ nanvatra vyāptiviśiṣṭasya	[155] saptamI tatpuruza aFgIkAraH iti/ nanu atra vyApti viSizwasya
   pakṣadharmateti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ kuto nāśritaḥ, sa eva cāśrayaṇīyaḥ/	pakza Darma tA iti zazWI tatpuruzaH kutas na ASritaH, saH eva ca ASrayaNIyaH/
   kārakādhikārīyāt 'saptamyadhikaraṇe ce'ti sūtrādasāmarthyena	kAraka aDikArIyAt asaptamI aDikaraNe ce ati sUtrAt asAmarTyena
   samāsānupapattibhiyā samastapadapraviṣṭakriyāsamabhivyāhārasya	samAsa anupapatti BiyA samasta pada pravizwa kriyA samaBivyAhArasya
   durvañcatvena saptamyanupapatteriti cet   na/	durvaQca tvena saptamI anupapatteH iti ced  na/
   śaiṣikaṣaṣṭhīprasaktāvapi akārakādhikaraṇavācipadādapi kvacit saptamī	SEzika zazWI prasaktO= api akAraka aDikaraNa vAci padAt api kvacid saptamI
   sādhuriti sūcanāyaiva iha saptamīsamāsādaraḥ/ tatra pramāṇaṃ	sADuH iti sUcanAya eva iha saptamI samAsa AdaraH/ tatra pramANam
   coktasūtre cakāropādānameva/ anyathā tadvaiyarthyāpatteriti/ spaṣṭaṃ	ca ukta sUtre cakAra upAdAnam eva/ anyaTA tad vEyarTya ApatteH iti/ spazwam
   cedam vyutpattivāde saptamyarthavicāre/ nanu	ca idam vyutpatti vAde saptamI arTa vicAre/ nanu
   vyāptiviṣayakapakṣadharmatājñānasya parāmarśarūpatve dhūmo vahnivyāpyaḥ	vyApti vizaya kapakza Darma tA jQAnasya parAmarSa rUpa tve DUmaH vahni vyApyaH
   dhūmavān parvata iti jñānayoḥ vyāvṛttiḥ yadyapi sambhavati, tathāpi	DUmavAn parvataH iti jQAnayoH vyAvRttiH yadi api samBavati, taTA api
   hetuḥ sādhyavyāpyaḥ hetumān pakṣa iti samūhālambanasya	hetuH sADya vyApyaH hetumAn pakzaH iti samUha Alambanasya

   vyāptyavacchinnetyādinā/ atra ca vyabhicāristhale	vyApti avacCinna ityAdinA/ atra ca vyaBicAri sTale

   bhramīyaviṣayatāsādhāraṇanirūpyanirūpakabhāvāpannaviṣayataiva	BramIya vizaya tA sADAraNa nirUpya nirUpaka BAva Apanna vizaya tA eva
   vyāptighaṭakatāvatpadārthānāṃ niveśanīyā/ tathā ca	vyApti Gawaka tAvat padArTAnAm niveSanIyA/ taTA ca

   tasāmānādhikaraṇyaprakāratānirūpitetyarthaḥ/	tasA mAna aDikaraNya prakAra tA nirUpitA iti arTaH/

   niveśyā/ vahnivyāpyadhūvān hradaḥ, parvato ghaṭavāniti	niveSyA/ vahni vyApya DUvAn hradaH, parvataH GawavAn iti

   svāśrayāśrayatvarūpaparamparāsambandhanaiva vācyamiti vyāpya ityādau sa	sva ASraya ASraya tva rUpa paramparA sambanDana eva vAcyam iti vyApyaH ityAdO sa

   tasya viśeṣaṇatve tu	tasya viSezaNa tve tu

   niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃmiti phalitārthakathanama;	niyata sAmAnADikaraNyaMm iti Palita arTa kaTanama;
   1. viśeṣyamiti/	1. viSezyam iti/

   śabdārthakathanamiti tattvam/ tathā ca niyatasāmānādhikaraṇśarīre	Sabda arTa kaTanam iti tattvam/ taTA ca niyata sAmAna aDikaraz SarIre

   bhāvaḥ/ tathātve doṣamāha    [157]	BAvaH/ taTA tve dozam Aha   [157]

   sādhyatāvacchedaketaradharmānavacchinnasādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvaparyantamiti	sADya tAvacCedaka itara DarmAn avacCinna sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAva paryantam iti
   vikalpaṃ manasi nidhāyādye vācyatvaghaṭobhayādyabhāvamādāya	vikalpam manasi niDAya Adye vAcya tva Gawa uBaya Adi aBAvam AdAya

   [157] sādhyābhāvāpratisaddheriti/ [157]	[157] sADya aBAva apratisad heriti/ [157]
   pratiyogitānavacchedakasādhyatāvacchedakāvicchannetyartha iti/	pratiyogitAnavacCedaka sADya tAvacCedaka avicCanna iti arTaH iti/
   dhūmavān vahnerityādau prameyatvadravyatvādikamādāya	DUmavAn vahneH iti AdO prameya tva dravya tva Adikam AdAya
   ativyāptivāraṇāya viśiṣya sādhyatāvacchedakapraveśaḥ/ yadyapi	ati vyApti vAraNAya viSizya sADya tAvacCedaka praveSaH/ yadi api
   mahānasīyavahnyādyabhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ vahnitvāderapyadhikaṃ	mahAnasIya vahni Adi a BAva pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tvam vahni tva AdeH api aDikam
   tviti nyāyādakṣatam/ tathāpi tādṛśapratiyogitānavacchedaketyādinā	tu iti nyAyAt akzatam/ taTA api tAdRSa pratiyogitAnavacCedaka ityAdinA
   1hetusamānādhikaraṇābhāvaviśiṣṭānyasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviṣayatāvattvavivakṣayā	1hetu samAna aDikaraNa aBAva viSizwAni asADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna vizaya tAvat tva vivakzayA
   na doṣaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ svasetyādibhedavattvasaṃbandhena/ svādhikaraṇatā	na dozaH/ vESizwyam svasA ityAdi Bedavattva saMbanDena/ sva aDikaraNa tA
   svapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhena bhedapratiyogitāvacchekatā	sva pratiyogita avacCedaka tva sambanDena Beda pratiyogi tA vat Seka tA
   avacchedakatāsaṃbandhena/ tathā ca mahānasīyatvādau	avacCeda ka tA saMbanDena/ taTA ca mahAnasIya tva AdO
   tādṛśaviṣayatāvacchedakatāvirahāt lakṣaṇasaṅgatiḥ/ viṣayatāyāṃ	tAdRSa vizaya tAvat Cedaka tA virahAt lakzaNa saFgatiH/ vizaya tAyAm
   sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnatvaṃ caikamātravṛttidharmasya	sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna tvam ca eka mAtra vRtti Darmasya
   sādhyatāvacchedakatve tanniṣṭhāvacchedakatākatvam, dharmadvayādaḥ tathātve	sADya tAvacCedaka tve tad nizWA avacCedaka tAka tvam, Darma dvaya AdaH taTA tve
   hetusamānādhikaraṇābhāvaviśiṣṭānyā yā	hetu samAna aDikaraNa aBAva viSizwA anyA yA
   sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviṣayatā tadvattvamityarthaḥ/ svapadena	sADya tA avacCedaka avacCinna vizaya tA tadvat tvam iti arTaH/ sva padena
   hetusamānādhikaraṇaḥ ghaṭādyabhāvo grāhyaḥ/ svasetyādibhedavattvaṃ nāma	hetu samAna aDikaraNaH Gawa Adi aBAvaH grAhyaH/ svasA ityAdi Bedavat tvam nAma
   svādhikaraṇavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvam/	sva aDikaraNa vRtti Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tvam/
   svaṃ ghaṭābhāvaḥ svapratiyogitāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhena	svam Gawa aBAvaH sva pratiyogita avacCeda ka tA saMbanDena
   ghaṭābhāvādhikaraṇaṃ ghaṭatvaṃ, tatra yo bhedaḥ avacchedakatāsaṃbandhanena	Gawa aBAva aDikaraNam Gawa tvaM, tatra yaH BedaH avacCeda ka tA saMbanDanena
   vahnitvāvacchinnaviṣayatāvadbhedaḥ tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ	vahni tva avacCinna vizaya tAvat BedaH tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam
   vahnitvāvacchinnaviṣayatāyāṃmiti	vahni tva avacCinna vizaya tAyAMm iti
   tādṛśabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhena ghaṭābhāvavatī	tAdRSa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCeda ka tA saMbanDena Gawa aBAvavatI
   vahnitvāvacchinnaviṣayatā tena saṃbandhena ghaṭābhāvavadbhinnā ca	vahni tva avacCinna vizaya tA tena saMbanDena Gawa aBAvavat BinnA ca
   ghaṭatvāvacchinnaviṣayateti svasetyādibhedavattvasaṃbandhena	Gawa tva avacCinna vizaya tA iti svasA ityAdi Bedavattva saMbanDena
   ghaṭābhāvaviśiṣṭā ghaṭatvāvacchinnaviṣayatā, tadanyā	Gawa aBAva viSizwA Gawa tva avacCinna vizaya tA, tad anyA
   vahnitvāvacchinnaviṣayateti samanvayo bodhyaḥ/	vahni tva avacCinna vizaya tA iti samanvayaH boDyaH/
   tu	tu
   dharmadvayāderviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatāvacchedakabhāvena yādṛśaṃ vilakṣaṇa	Darma dvaya AdeH viSezaNa viSezya tAvacCedaka BAvena yAdRSam vilakzaNa
   avacchedakatvaṃ tannirūpakatvarūpamiti na kṣatiriti/ na	avacCedaka tvam tat nirUpaka tva rUpam iti na kzatiH iti/ na
   caivamiti	ca evam iti
   saṃyogasamavāyobhayasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākavahnyādyabhāvamādāya	saMyoga samavAya uBaya sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka vahni Adi aBAvam AdAya
   taddoṣatādavasthyamiti vācyam/	tad doza tAdavasTyam iti vAcyam/
   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhamātrāvacchinnatvasya	sADya tAvat Cedaka sambanDa mAtra avacCinna tvasya
   taditarasambandhānavacchinnatvaparyavasitasya vivakṣitatvāt/ [158]	tad itara sambanDAn avacCinna tva paryavasitasya vivakzita tva at/ [158]
   hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnaparamiti/	hetu tAvat Cedaka avacCinna param iti/
   1prakṛtahetutāvacchedakatāvyāpakatāvacchedakatākanirūpakatākaparami	1prakRta hetu tAvat Cedaka tA vyApaka tAvacCedaka tAka nirUpaka tAka parami
   tyarthaḥ/	tyarTaH/
   tādṛśanirūpakatākatvamadhikaraṇatānvayi/ tena viśiṣṭasattāhetuke	tAdRSa nirUpaka tAka tvam aDikaraNa tA anvayi/ tena viSizwa sattA hetuke
   sattātvasyāpi hetutāvacchedakatāyā taddoṣatādavasthyamiti śaṅkā	sattAtvasya api hetu tAvat Cedaka tAyA tad doza tAdavasTyam iti SaFkA
   parāstā/	parAH tA/
   vastutastu ekadharmasya	vastutas tu eka Darmasya
   hetutāvacchedakatve tanniṣṭhāvacchedakatākatvamevādhikaraṇatāyāṃ	hetu tAvat Cedaka tve tad nizWA avacCedaka tAka tvam eva aDikaraNa tAyAm
   niveśyam/ yatra	niveSyam/ yatra
   dharmadvayādeḥ tathātvaṃ	Darma dvaya AdeH taTA tvam
   tatra pūrvoktarītyā vilakṣaṇāvacchedakatākatvamiti na kiñcidavahīnam/	tatra pUrva ukta rItyA vilakzaNa avacCedaka tAka tvam iti na kiQcid avahInam/
   atraiva [158] hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnaparamityasyāpi	atra eva [158] hetu tAvat Cedaka avacCinna param iti asya api
   tātparyamiti dhyeyam/ [158] viśiṣṭeti/	tAtparyam iti Dyeyam/ [158] viSizwa iti/
   2svarūpasamavāyobhayaghaṭitasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	2svarUpa samavAya uBaya Gawita sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭetyarthaḥ/ nanu viśiṣṭaśuddhayorbhendāt kathaṃ	guNa karma anyatva viSizwa iti arTaH/ nanu viSizwa SudDayoH BendAt kaTam
   hetvadhikaraṇatva guṇāderityata āha   [158] viśiṣṭasyeti/	hetu aDikaraNa tva guNa AdeH ityataH Aha  [158] viSizwasya iti/
   dravyatvābhāvasya hetvadhikaraṇaguṇādiniṣṭhatve 'pīti yojanā/	dravya tva aBAvasya hetu aDikaraNa guNa Adi nizWa tve api iti yojanA/
   guṇādītyādinā karmādisaṅgrahaḥ/ [158] nāvyāptiriti/	guNa Adi ityAdinA karma Adi saFgrahaH/ [158] na avyAptiH iti/
   tanniṣṭhādhikaraṇatānirūpakatāvacchedakaṃ yat	tad nizWA aDikaraNa tA nirUpaka tAvacCedakam yat 
   1. nirūpakatāpadenātra	1. nirUpaka tA padena atra
   ādheyatā vivakṣitā/ tathā ca prakṛtahetutāvacchedakatāvyāpikā yā	ADeya tA vivakzitA/ taTA ca prakRta hetu tA avat Cedaka tA vyApikA yA
   ādheyatāvacchedakatā tannirūpakādheyatānirūpakatvamadhikaraṇatāyāṃ	ADeya tAvat Cedaka tA tad nirUpaka ADeya tA nirUpaka tvam aDikaraNa tAyAm
   vivakṣitam/ tena dravyaṃ viśiṣṭasattvāt ityatra hetutāvacchedakatā	vivakzitam/ tena dravyam viSizwa sattvAt iti atra hetu tAvat Cedaka tA
   viśiṣṭasattātve, tatra	viSizwa sattAtve, tatra
   guṇaniṣṭhādhikaraṇatānirūpitādheyatāvacchedakatā nāsti, 'guṇo	guNa nizWa aDikaraNa tA nirUpita ADeya tAvacCedaka tA nAsti, aguNo
   guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattāvān' iti pratītivirahāt/ api tu	guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattAvAn a iti pratIti virahAt/ api tu
   dravyaniṣṭhābhikaraṇatānirūpitadheyatāvacchedakatā asti, 'dravyaṃ	dravya nizWA aBikaraNa tA nirUpita Deya tAvacCedaka tA asti, adravyam
   guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattāvat' iti pratīteḥ/ ataḥ	guNa karma anyatva viSizwa sattAvat a iti pratIteH/ atas 
   hetutāvacchedakatāvyāpakāvacchedakatākādheyatākādhikaraṇatāvat	hetu tAvat Cedaka tA vyApaka avacCedaka tAka ADeya tAkA aDikaraNa tAvat 
   dravyameva, tadvṛttyatyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ dravyatve 'stīti	dravyam eva, tad vRtti atyanta aBAva apratiyogi tvam dravya tve asti iti
   nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/	na avyAptiH iti BAvaH/
   svarūpasamavāyobhayaghaṭitasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāma	svarUpa samavAya uBaya Gawita sAmAnADikaraNyam nAma
   svarūpasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhādheyatānirūpakādhikaraṇanirūpitasamavāyasaṃbandhāvacchinnavṛttitvam/	svarUpa saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA Deya tA nirUpaka aDikaraNa nirUpita samavAya saMbanDa avacCinna vRtti tvam/
   tasyaiva	tasya eva
   tadavacchinnanirūpitādhikaraṇatāvattvena guṇāderatathātvāditi bhāvaḥ/	tad avacCinna nirUpita aDikaraNa tAvat tvena guNa AdeH ataTA tvAt iti BAvaH/
   yadyapi hetvadhikaraṇatāyāṃ hetutāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe	yadi api hetu aDikaraNa tAyAm hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa avacCinna tva aniveSe
   kālikādinā dhūmādyabhikaraṇe hradādau	kAlikA AdinA DUma Adi aBikaraNe hrada AdO
   saṃyogādyavacchinnavahnyādyabhāvasattvāt apyavyāptisambhavaḥ/ tathāpi	saMyoga Adi avacCinna vahni Adi aBAva sattvAt api avyApti samBavaH/ taTA api
   janyamātrasya kālatvānupagame naiṣa doṣaḥ sambhavatīti tatra tanniveśasya	janya mAtrasya kAla tva anupagame na eza dozaH samBavati iti tatra tat niveSasya
   prakārāntareṇa phalamāha   [158] nāvyāptiriti/ ātmabhinnaṃ	prakAra antareNa Palam Aha  [158] na avyAptiH iti/ Atma Binnam
   jñānavadanyatvādityādau ātmanaḥ kenāpi sambandhena	jQAna vat anya tvAt ityAdO AtmanaH kena api sambanDena
   hetvadhikaraṇatāviraheṇa lakṣaṇasamanvayasambhavāt nāsambhavo darśitaḥ/	hetu aDikaraNa tA viraheNa lakzaNa samanvaya samBavAt na asamBavaH darSitaH/
   saṃyogasāmānyābhāvasya vṛkṣe savivādatvādāha    [158] kapīti/ [158]	saMyoga sAmAnya aBAvasya vRkze savivAda tvAt Aha   [158] kapIti/ [158]
   pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyasyeti/ yadyapi	pratiyogi vEyaDikaraNyasya iti/ yadi api
   sāmānyataḥ pratiyoginiveśe tādṛśaviśeṣaṇākrāntābhāvāprasiddhiḥ/	sAmAnyatas pratiyogi niveSe tAdRSa viSezaNa AkrAnta aBAva aprasidDiH/
   svapratiyoginiveśe svatvasya tattadvyaktiviśrāntatayā	sva pratiyogi niveSe sva tvasya tad tad vyakti viSrAnta tayA
   vyāpterasarvajñadurjñeyatāpattiḥ/ tathāpi	vyApteH asarvajQa durjQeya tA ApattiH/ taTA api
   1tādātmyasvapratiyogyadhikaraṇavṛttitvobhayasaṃbandhena	1tAdAtmya sva pratiyogi aDikaraNa vRtti tva uBaya saMbanDena
   abhāvaviśiṣṭānyatvaṃ nirūpakatvasvāśrayādhikaraṇavṛttitvobhayasaṃbandhena	aBAva viSizwa anya tvam nirUpaka tva sva ASraya aDikaraNa vRtti tva uBaya saMbanDena
   pratiyogitāviśiṣṭānyatvaṃ vā sthūlasūkṣmarītibhyāmanugatamabhāve	pratiyogita aviSizwa anya tvam vA sTUla sUkzma rItiByAm anugatam aBAve
   niveśyamiti na doṣaḥ/ atra ca svapratiyogyadhikaraṇāvṛttitvasya	niveSyam iti na dozaH/ atra ca sva pratiyogi aDikaraNa AvRtti tvasya
   pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyaśabdārthatve kapisaṃyogī sattvādityādau	pratiyogi vEyaDi karaNya Sabda arTa tve kapi saMyogI sattvAt ityAdO
   vyabhicāriṇyatiprasaṅgaḥ/ adhikaraṇabhedenābhāvabhedaviraheṇa	vyaBicAriNI ati prasaFgaH/ aDikaraNa Bedena aBAva Beda viraheNa
   sādhyābhāvasya vyāpakatāghaṭakatvāsambhavāt/	sADya aBAvasya vyApaka tA Gawaka tva asamBavAt /
   svapratiyogyanadhikaraṇavṛttitvasya niveśe ca kapisaṃyogī	sva pratiyogi anaDikaraNa vRtti tvasya niveSe ca kapi saMyogI
   etattvādityādau avyāpitatādavasthyamiti hetvadhikaraṇe	etat tvAt ityAdO avyApita tAdavasTyam iti hetu aDikaraNe
   svapratiyogyanadhikaraṇatvaṃ niveśanīyamityādikaṃ manasi nidhāyāha  	sva pratiyogi anaDikaraNa tvam niveSanIyam iti Adikam manasi niDAya Aha  
   [158] adhikamiti/	[158] aDikam iti/
   1. abhāvapadena	1. aBAva padena
   saṃyogābhāvo grāhyaḥ tādātmyasaṃbandhena	saMyoga aBAvaH grAhyaH tAdAtmya saMbanDena
   svapratiyogyadhikaraṇavṛttitvasambandhena ca tadviśiṣṭaḥ sa eva, tadanyo	sva pratiyogi aDikaraNa vRtti tva sambanDena ca tad viSizwaH saH eva, tad anyaH 
   ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ/ evaṃ prayitogitā saṃyoganiṣṭhā, tannirūpakaḥ	Gawa Adi aBAvaH/ evam prayitA ugitA saMyoga nizWA, tad nirUpakaH
   saṃyogābhāvaḥ tathā svaṃ pratiyogitā tadāśrayaḥ saṃyogaḥ	saMyoga aBAvaH taTA svam pratiyogitA tad ASrayaH saMyogaH
   tadadhikaraṇavṛttiśca	tad aDikaraNa vRttiH ca
   saṃyogābhāva iti uktobhayasambandhena pratiyogitāviśiṣṭaḥ	saMyoga aBAvaH iti ukta uBaya sambanDena pratiyogitA viSizwaH
   saṃyogābhāvaḥ tadanyaḥ ghaṭādyabhāva iti samanvayo draṣṭavyaḥ/	saMyoga aBAvaH tad anyaH Gawa Adi aBAvaH iti samanvayaH drazwavyaH/
   anumānavibhāgaḥ	anumAna viBAgaH
   saṅgrahe [164] svayamevetyādi/ asya vākyasya	saFgrahe [164] svayam eva ityAdi/ asya vAkyasya
   parānadhīnabhūyodarśanajanyamahānasādinirūpitasvāśrayāśrayatvarūpaparamparāsambandhāvacchinnādheyatāśrayaḥ	para anaDIna BUyas darSana janya mahAnasa Adi nirUpita sva ASraya ASraya tva rUpa paramparA sambanDa avacCinna ADeyatA ASrayaH
   yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti	yatra DUmaH tatra agniH iti
   vyāptiviṣayakapratyakṣottarakālīnaparvatasamīpakarmakagamanāśrayaḥ	vyApti vizayaka pratyakza uttara kAlIna parvata samIpa karmaka gamana ASrayaH
   parvatavṛttivahniviṣayakasandehavān	parvata vRtti vahni vizaya ka sandehavAn
   parvatadharmikadhūmaprakārakacākṣuṣāśrayaḥ yatra	parvata Darmika DUma prakAraka cAkzuza ASrayaH yatra
   dhūmastatrāgnirityākārakavyāptiviṣayakasmaraṇāśraya ityakhaṇḍabodhaḥ/	DUmaH tatra agniH iti AkAraka vyApti vizaya ka smaraNa ASrayaH iti aKaNxa boDaH/
   tatra	tatra
   dhūmaṃ paśyan	DUmam paSyan
   smaratītyanena dhūmadarśanajanyatvaṃ vyāptismaraṇe labhyate/	smarati iti anena DUma darSana janya tvam vyApti smaraNe laByate/
   uddeśyavidheyabhāvasthale	uddeSya viDeya BAva sTale
   uddeśyatāvacchedakavidheyayorjanyajanakabhāvasambandhabhānasya dhanavān	uddeSya tAvacCedaka viDeyayoH janya janaka BAva sambanDa BAnasya DanavAn
   sukhītayādau dṛṣṭatvāt/ tathā ca kathaṃ vyāptismaraṇahetutvaṃ	suKItayA AdO dRzwa tvAt/ taTA ca kaTam vyApti smaraNa hetu tvam
   dhūmadarśanasyetyāśaṅkāyāṃ tadupapādayati prakāśikāyām [165]	DUma darSanasya iti ASaFkAyAm tat upapAdayati prakASikAyAm [165]
   ekasaṃnbadhīti/	eka saMnbaDI iti/
   svārthānumānanirūpaṇam	sva arTa anumAna nirUpaNam
   bhūyodarśanena	BUyas darSanena
   vyāptiṃ gṛhītveti saṅgrahavākyāt bhūyodarśanasya vyāptigrāhakatā	vyAptim gRhItvA iti saFgraha vAkyAt BUyas darSanasya vyApti grAhaka tA
   labhyate/ tacca nopapadyate/ anvayavyabhicārādityāśaṅkate  	laByate/ tat ca na upapadyate/ anvaya vyaBicArAt ityASaFkate  
   dīpikāyāñ [164] nanviti/	dIpikAyAn [164] nanu iti/
   vyāptigrahopāyanirūpaṇam	vyApti graha upAya nirUpaNam
   nanu	nanu
   vyabhicārajñānadaśāyāmapi bhūyodarśanena vyāptiniścayaḥ svīkriyate	vyaBicAra jQAna daSAyAm api BUyas darSanena vyApti niScayaH svIkriyate
   itīṣṭāpattiḥ kuto na sambhavati ityata āha   [165]	iti izwApattiH kutas na samBavati iti atas Aha  [165]
   vyabhicārajñānadaśāyāmityādi/ tathā cānubhavavirodha iti	vyaBicAra jQAna daSAyAm ityAdi/ taTA ca anuBava viroDaH iti
   bhāvaḥ/ yadi cānubhavavirodhamapyanādṛtya iṣṭāpattiḥ svīkriyate	BAvaH/ yadi ca anuBava viroDam api anAdRtya izwApattiH svIkriyate
   tadāpyāha   [165] idamupalakṣaṇamiti/	tadA api Aha  [165] idam upalakzaNam iti/
   idaṃ vyabhicārajñānadaśāyāṃ	idaM vI aBicAra jQAna daSAyAm
   vyāptiniścayāpattirūpātiprasaṅgakathanam	vyApti niScaya Apatti rUpa ati prasaFga kaTanam
   upalakṣaṇam vakṣyamāṇadūṣaṇāntarasūcakam/ [165] rasābhādisādhāraṇyād iti/	upalakzaNam  vakzyamANa dUzaNa antara sUcakam/ [165] rasa ABa Adi sADAraNyAt iti/
   idamupalakṣaṇam	idam upalakzaNam
   sāmānya pratyāsattyanupagamapakṣe parvatīyavahnidhūmayoḥ	sAmAnya  pratyAsatti anupagama pakze parvatIya vahni DUmayoH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasyāsannikṛṣṭatayā mahānasādau vyāptipratyakṣe	sAmAnADikaraNyasya AsannikRzwa tayA mahAnasa AdO vyApti pratyakze
   bhānāsambhavāt parvatādau dhūmādidarśanānantaraṃ	BAnAsamBavAt parvata AdO DUma Adi darSana anantaram
   vyāptismaraṇānupapattirityapi draṣṭavyam/ hetutāvacchedakaparyaṃntasya	vyApti smaraNa anupapattiH iti api drazwavyam/ hetu tAvacCedaka paryaMntasya
   vyāptitve dhūmatvādikamevāvacchedakaṃ avacchedyaṃ ca bhavatīti	vyApti tve DUma tva Adikam eva avacCedakam avacCedyam ca Bavati iti
   avacchedyāvacchedakayoraikyaprasaṅgaḥ/ na ceṣṭāpattiḥ/	avacCedya avacCedakayoH Ekya prasaFgaH/ na cezwApattiH/
   avacchedyaprakārakajñāne 'vacchedakaprakārakajñānasya kāraṇatayā	avacCedya prakAraka jQAne avacCedaka prakAraka jQAnasya kAraNa tayA
   ātmāśrayaprasaṅgāt/ ātmāśrayaśca prakṛte	Atma ASraya prasaFga at/ Atma ASrayaH ca prakRte
   svajñānahetutvāpādanajanyasvajñānabhedāropātmakaḥ/ yadi svajñānaṃ	sva jQAna hetu tva ApAdana janya sva jQAna BedAra upa AtmakaH/ yadi sva jQAnam
   svajñānahetuḥ syāt tarhi svajñānavyatiriktaṃ syāditi tarka iti	sva jQAna hetuH syAt tarhi sva jQAna vyatiriktam syAt iti tarkaH iti
   yāvat/ yadvā yadi svaṃ svahetuḥ syāt tarhi svabhinnaṃ syādityādi	yAvat/ yat vA yadi svam sva hetuH syAt tarhi sva Binnam syAt ityAdi
   tarkarūpaḥ/ svajñānādihetutvasya svajñānādivyatiriktatvavyāpyatayā	tarka rUpaH/ sva jQAna Adi hetu tvasya sva jQAna Adi vyatirikta tva vyApya tayA
   āpādyāpādakayorvyāptisattvāt āha   [165] dhūmatvāderiti/ [165] na	ApAdya ApAdakayoH vyApti sattvAt Aha  [165] DUma tva Aderiti/ [165] na
   kṣatiriti/ tathā ca tādṛśadhūmatvatvāvacchinnaprakāratāśālijñānaṃ	kzatiH iti/ taTA ca tAdRSa DUma tva tva avacCinna prakAra tA SAli jQAnam
   kāryam; dhūmatvādiniṣṭhānavacchinnaprakāratākajñānaṃ kāraṇamiti	kAryam; DUma tva Adi nizWAnavacCinna prakAra tAka jQAnam kAraNam iti
   kāryakāraṇayoḥ bhedāt nātmāśraya ityarthaḥ/ iṣṭāpattidoṣeṇa	kArya kAraNayoH BedAt na Atma ASrayaH iti arTaH/ izwApatti dozeNa
   tarkānutthānāditi bhāvaḥ/	tarka anutTAnAt iti BAvaH/
   nanu	nanu
   vyabhicārajñānābhāvaḥ sahacāragrahaśca vyāptigrahaheturityuktam tatra	vyaBicAra jQAna aBAvaH sahacAra grahaH ca vyApti graha hetuH iti uktam tatra

   kutropayoga ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tadupapādayati [165] itthaṃ cetyādinā/ [165]	kutra upayogaH iti ASaFkAyAm tat upapAdayati [165] itTam ca ityAdinA/ [165]
   viśeṣaṇajñānavidhayeti/ hetuḥ	viSezaNa jQAna viDayA iti/ hetuH
   sādhyasamānādhikaraṇa iti jñānaṃ vinā hetutāvacchedake	sADya samAna aDikaraNaH iti jQAnam vinA hetu tAvat Cedake
   sādhyasamānādhikaraṇavṛttitvasya durgrahatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	sADya samAna aDikaraNa vRtti tvasya durgraha tvAt iti BAvaH/

   dhūmatvatveti/ dhūmatvatvasya	DUma tvatvA iti/ DUma tvatvasya

   [166] digiti/ ayamāśayaḥ  	[166] diS iti/ ayam ASayaH  
   hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnaprakāratānirūpitavyāpakatvaprakāratānirūpita	hetu tAvat Cedaka avacCinna prakAra tA nirUpita vyApaka tva prakAra tA nirUpita

   lāghavam/ evaṃ	lAGavam/ evam

   dravyavyāpyadhūmavānityādyupanajanyabodhīyapakṣaviśeṣyatānirūpitaprakāratāyāḥ	dravya vyApya DUmavAn iti Adi upana janya boDIya pakza viSezya tA nirUpita prakAra tAyAH

   bhāvaḥ/ kālikasaṃyogābhyāṃ vahnyādereva hetusādhyabhāvasthale	BAvaH/ kAlika saMyogAByAm vahni AdeH eva hetu sADya BAva sTale

   nigamanaghaṭake sādhyavānayamiti	nigamana Gawake sADyavAn ayam iti

   yasmin iti vyutpattyā	yasmin iti vyutpattyA

   viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakāṃśe saṃśayātmakajñānasya	viSezaNa tAvacCedaka aMSe saMSaya Atmaka jQAnasya

   liṅgaviśeṣitaparāmarśatvenaiva	liFga viSezita parAmarSa tvena eva
   kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyamityatra niyāmakābhāvenetyarthaḥ/ uddeśyatāsaṃbandhena	kAraNa tvam vaktavyam iti atra niyAmaka aBAvena iti arTaH/ uddeSyatA saMbanDena
   anumitiṃ prati hetutāvacchedakasaṃbandhena saṃyogādinā	anumitim prati hetu tAvat Cedaka saMbanDena saMyoga AdinA

   anvayavyatirekinirūpaṇam	anvaya vyatireki nirUpaNam
   anvayena	anvayena
   vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimaditi saṃgrahe 'nvayaśabdaḥ	vyatirekeNa ca vyAptimat iti saMgrahe anvaya SabdaH
   hetusādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpānvayasahacāraparaḥ/ grahagrāhyatvaṃ	hetu sADya sAmAnADikaraNya rUpa anvaya sahacAra paraH/ graha grAhya tvam
   tṛtīyārthaḥ/ ata eva kevalavyatirekinirāsaḥ/ vyatirekeṇetyatrāpi	tRtIya arTaH/ atas eva kevala vyatireki nirAsaH/ vyatirekeNa iti atra api
   vyatireko vyatirekasahacāraḥ/ sādhyābhāvahetvabhāvayoḥ	vyatirekaH vyatireka sahacAraH/ sADya aBAva hetu aBAvayoH
   sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ/ tṛtīyārthaḥ pūrvavat prakāśikāyām	sAmAnADikaraNya rUpaH/ tRtIya arTaH pUrvavat prakASikAyAm
   anvayasahacāretyādi/ kevalavyatirekivāraṇāya satyantam/	anvaya sahacAra ityAdi/ kevala vyatireki vAraNAya satyantam/

   'pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate ganadhavattvāt'	apRTivI itareByaH Bidyate ganaDavat tvAt a
   ityādivyatirekivāraṇāsambhavaḥ/ uktapariṣkāre	ityAdi vyatireki vAraNA samBavaH/ ukta parizkAre

   iti na doṣaḥ/ viśeṣyadale tu viśiṣṭayaiva vyāptirupādeyā/ na	iti na dozaH/ viSezya dale tu viSizwayA eva vyAptiH upAdeyA/ na
   tu tādṛśagrahagrāhyatvenāpīti bodhyam/ saṃgrahe [180] vahnau sādhya iti/	tu tAdRSa graha grAhya tvena api iti boDyam/ saMgrahe [180] vahnO sADyaH iti/
   vahniniṣṭhasādhyatānirūpakaṃ	vahni nizWa sADyatA nirUpakam

   yatretyanurodhāt/	yatra iti anuroDAt/
   kevalānvayinirūpaṇam	kevala anvayini rUpaNam

   kṣatiḥ/ tathā ca gaganādeḥ vṛttimattvābhāvāt saṃyogādiniṣṭhavṛtteḥ	kzatiH/ taTA ca gagana AdeH vRttimat tva aBAvAt saMyoga Adi nizWa vRtteH

   gandhavatvāt ityādau hetau sattvāt	ganDava tvAt ityAdO hetO sattvAt

   niściteti/	niScitA iti/

   1. svaṃ vṛttimān	1. svam vRttimAn
   atyantābhāvaḥ ghaṭābhāvaḥ tadviśiṣṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ tadanyatvaṃ abhidheyatvādeḥ/	atyanta aBAvaH Gawa aBAvaH tad viSizwaH GawaH tad anya tvam aBiDeya tva AdeH/

   tadasambhavāt ityata āha   [184 ]	tad asamBavAt iti atas Aha  [184 ]

   dhyeyam/ [184] anumityaṅgatvam anumitiprayojakatvam/	Dyeyam/ [184] anumiti aFga tvam anumiti prayojaka tvam/
   [185] agre 'pi   jalāditrayodaśatvāvacchinnabhedātmakasādhyasyetyatrāpi/	[185] agre api  jala Adi trayodaSa tva avacCinna Beda Atmaka sADyasya iti atra api/
   asmaduktarītyā yathāśrutārthasyaiva upapatteḥ/ jalādīti	asmad ukta rItyA yaTASruta arTasya eva upapatteH/ jala Adi iti

   anumitītyādilakṣaṇavākyārthastvityarthaḥ/ [191] eketi/ svaviṣayaketyarthaḥ	anumiti ityAdi lakzaNa vAkya arTaH tu iti arTaH/ [191] eka iti/ sva vizayaka iti arTaH
   jñānaviśeṣaṇam/ lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ grāhayati   [191] dhūmavānityādinā/ [191]	jQAna viSezaNam/ lakzye lakzaNam grAhayati  [191] DUmavAn ityAdinA/ [191]
   ukteti/	uktA iti/
   ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakadharmavattvarūpetyarthaḥ/ evamagre	eka jQAna vizaya prakRta hetu tAvat Cedaka Darmavat tva rUpA iti arTaH/ evam agre
   'pi	api
   [191] darśitetyasya/ [191] taditi/	[191] darSita iti asya/ [191] tat iti/
   dhūmābhāvavadvṛttitvaviśiṣṭavahnyādirūpavyabhicāretyarthaḥ/	DUma aBAvavat vRtti tva viSizwa vahni Adi rUpa vyaBicAra iti arTaH/
   nanu iha	nanu iha
   lakṣaṇe 'numitisāmānyasya praveśāt parvato vahnimān	lakzaNe anumiti sAmAnyasya praveSAt parvataH vahnimAn

   yo vyabhicāraḥ dhūmābhāvavadvṛttitvaviśiṣṭavahnyādirūpaḥ	yaH vyaBicAraH DUma aBAvavat vRtti tva viSizwa vahni Adi rUpaH
   prāguktasaṃbandhena tatprakārakapramāviśeṣyatvasya dhūmādisaddhetau	prAc ukta saMbanDena tad prakAraka pramA viSezya tvasya DUma Adi sat hetO
   sattvāt ityāśaṅkāṃ nirārakaroti [191] prakṛteti/	sattvAt iti ASaFkAm nirArakaroti [191] prakRtA iti/
   prakṛtapakṣakaprakṛtasādhyakaprakṛtahetuketyarthaḥ/ [191] saddhetāvit i/	prakRta pakzaka prakRta sADyaka prakRta hetukA iti arTaH/ [191] sat heta avid i/
   nātivyāptirityanena sambandhaḥ/ [191] yathārthapadānupādāna ityādi/	na ati vyAptiH iti anena sambanDaH/ [191] yaTArTa pada anupAdAnaH ityAdi/
   yadyapyanupadameva parvato	yadi api anupadam eva parvataH 
   vahnimān dhūmādityādisthale tādṛśavyabhicārādyaprasiddhyā	vahnimAn DUmAt ityAdi sTale tAdRSa vyaBicAra AdyaprasidDyA
   nātiprasaṅgaprasaktirityuktatvāt/ kathametatprayojanakathanasaṅgatiḥ/	na ati prasaFga prasaktiH iti ukta tvAt/ kaTam etat prayojana kaTana saFgatiH/
   tathāpi dhūmavān vahnerityatraiva	taTA api DUmavAn vahneH iti atra eva
   rāsabhādidharmikadarśitasaṃsargakatādṛśavyabhicārādirūpatatsthalapras	rAsaBa Adi Darmika darSita saMsargaka tAdRSa vyaBicAra Adi rUpa tad sTala pras
   iddhadoṣaprakārakabhramaviṣeṣyatāmādāya	idDa doza prakAraka Brama vizezya tAm AdAya
   rāsabhādāvatiprasaṅga ityāśayāt na doṣaḥ/ na caivaṃ	rAsaBa AdO= atiprasaFgaH iti ASayAt na dozaH/ na ca evam
   saddhetāvityuktirayukteti vācyam/ iha saddhetupadasya	sat hetOviti uktiH ayuktA iti vAcyam/ iha sat hetu padasya
   prakṛtahetubhinnaparatvāt/ tathā ca saddhetāvapi pakṛtahetubhinne 'pi	prakRta hetu Binna para tvAt/ taTA ca sat hetO= api pakRta hetu Binne api
   rāsabhādāviti śeṣaḥ/ apinā prakṛtahetusaṃgrahaḥ/ dṛṣṭāntatayā	rAsaBa AdO= iti SezaH/ apinA prakRta hetu saMgrahaH/ dRzwAnta tayA
   bhramapramāsādhāraṇyenaiva jñānasya lakṣaṇe niveśāditi bhāvaḥ/ [191]	Brama pramAsADAraNyena eva jQAnasya lakzaNe niveSAt iti BAvaH/ [191]
   taditi/ yathārthapadetyarthaḥ/ [191] āhuriti/ atrāyamasvarasaḥ	tat iti/ yaTArTa padA iti arTaH/ [191] AhuH iti/ atra ayamasvarasaH
       anumitītyāderdeṣalakṣaṇatve doṣavattvaṃ duṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ	   anumiti iti AdeH deza lakzaNa tve dozavat tvam duzwAnAm lakzaNam
   sphuṭatayā labhyate/ uktarītyā tasya duṣṭalakṣaṇatve tu doṣalakṣaṇaṃ naiva	sPuwa tayA laByate/ ukta rItyA tasya duzwa lakzaNa tve tu doza lakzaNam na eva
   labhyata iti śiṣyadhīvaiśadyāsiddhiḥ/ yadyapyanumitipratibandhaketyanena	laByate iti Sizya DI vESadyA sidDiH/ yadi api anumiti pratibanDaka iti anena
   anumitipratibandhakatvaṃ tallakṣaṇa labhyate tathāpi	anumiti pratibanDaka tvam tat lakzaNa laByate taTA api

   pratibandhakayathārthajñānetyādyukterasvārasyamiti/	pratibanDaka yaTA arTa jQAna ityAt i ukteH asvArasyam iti/
   savyabhicāranirūpaṇam	savyaBicAra nirUpaNam
   saṅgrahe [195] sādhyābhāvavadvṛttiriti/ atra kecit   vahnimān	saFgrahe [195] sADya aBAva vat vRttiH iti/ atra kecid  vahnimAn
   dhūmādityādau ativyāptiḥ/ sādhyābhāvavatī yā dhūmādhikaraṇatā	DUmAt ityAdO ati vyAptiH/ sADya aBAvavatI yA DUma aDikaraNa tA
   tannirūpitādheyatvasya dhūmādau sattvāt/ na ca	tad nirUpita ADeya tvasya DUma AdO sattva at/ na ca
   sādhyābhāvavanniṣṭhādhikaraṇatānirūpitādheyatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti na doṣa	sADya aBAva vat nizWA aDikaraNa tA nirUpita ADeya tvam vivakzitam iti na doza
   iti vācyam/ evamapi dhūmādhikaraṇatā parvatānyā	iti vAcyam/ evam api DUma aDikaraNa tA parvatA anyA
   dhūmādhikaraṇatātvādityādau ativyāpteḥ/ tatra sādhyābhāvavān	DUma aDikaraNa tA tvAt ityAdO ati vyApteH/ tatra sADya aBAvavAn
   parvataḥ tanniṣchaṭhā yā dhūmādhikaraṇatā tannirūpitādheyatvasya	parvataH tad nizCaWA yA DUma aDikaraNa tA tad nirUpita ADeya tvasya
   dhūmādhikaraṇatātve sattvāt/ na ca sādhyābhāvavannirūpitatve sati	DUma aDikaraNa tA tve sattva at/ na ca sADya aBAva vat nirUpita tve sati
   sādhyābhāvavanniṣṭhādhikaraṇatānirūpitā yā ādheyatā iti	sADya aBAva vat nizWA aDikaraNa tA nirUpitA yAH ADeya tA iti
   vivakṣaṇāt 1na doṣa iti vācyam/ evamapi dhūmādhikaraṇatā	vivakzaNAt 1na dozaH iti vAcyam/ evam api DUma aDikaraNa tA
   adhikaraṇatābhinnatvaparvatānyatvobhayavatī dhūmādhikaraṇatātvāt	aDikaraNa tA aBinna tva parvata anyatva uBayavatI DUma aDikaraNa tA tvAt
   2ityatrātivyāpteḥ/	2iti atra ati vyApteH/
   1. na doṣa iti/	1. na dozaH iti/
   dhūmādhikaraṇatātvaniṣṭhāyāmādheyatāyāṃ	DUma aDikaraNa tAtva nizWAyAm ADeya tAyAm

   sādhyabhāvavatparvatanirūpitatvābhāvādauditi bhāvaḥ/	sADya BAvavat parvata nirUpita tva aBAvAt Oditi BAvaH/
   ityatrātivyāpteriti/ tatra hi sādhyābhāvavān parvataḥ	iti atra ati vyApteH iti/ tatra hi sADya aBAvavAn parvataH
   dhūmādhikaraṇatā ca bhavati sādhyābhāvavatpadena parvatasyopādāne	DUma aDikaraNa tA ca Bavati sADya aBAva vat padena parvatasya upAdAne
   tanniṣṭhā yā adhikaraṇatā dhūmādhikaraṇatā tannirūpitatvaṃ	tad nizWA yA aDikaraNa tA DUma aDikaraNa tA tad nirUpita tvam

   evaṃ	evam
   sādhyābhāvavatpadena dhūmādhikaraṇatārūpāyāḥ adhikaraṇatāyāḥ upādāne	sADya aBAva vat padena DUma aDikaraNa tArUpAyAH aDikaraNa tAyAH upAdAne

   ityativyāpterityarthaḥ/	iti ati vyApteH iti arTaH/

   sādhyābhāvavadviśiṣṭādheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sADya aBAvavat viSizwa ADeya tvam vivakzitam/ vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpitatvasvaniṣṭhādhikaraṇatānirūpitatvobhayasambandhena/ ato na	sva nirUpita tva sva nizWA aDikaraNa tA nirUpita tva uBaya sambanDena/ atas na

   rūpitatvobhayasambandhena/	rUpita tva uBaya sambanDena/

   uktapariṣkārāsambhavāt/	ukta parizkAra asamBavAt/

   tattulyayuktyā adhikaraṇe vartate, adhikaraṇatāyāṃ vartata	tad tulya yuktyA aDikaraNe vartate, aDikaraNa tAyAm vartata

   ativyāptiḥ/	ativyAptiH/
   śuddhaviśeṣaṇatāyāstādṛśatvādityata āha   kapīti/ [196] digiti/	SudDa viSezaNa tAyAH tAdRSa tvAt iti atas Aha  kapIti/ [196] diS iti/
   ākāśābhāvatvāvacchinnakālikaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃbandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavān	AkASa aBAva tva avacCinna kAlika viSezaNatA saMbanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAkA BAvavAn
   ātmatvādityādau kālikaviśeṣaṇataiva	Atma tvAt ityAdO kAlika viSezaNa tA eva

   'adhikaṃ tu' ityādi nyāyena	aaDikam tu a ityAdi nyAyena
   niravacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃsargakakapisaṃyogābhāvaprakārakaniścayamādāya	niravacCinna viSezaNatA saMsargaka kapi saMyoga aBAva prakAraka niScayam AdAya
   taddoṣatādavasthyamityucyate/ tadā	tad doza tAdavasTyam iti ucyate/ tadA
   yaddharmaparyāptāvacchedakatākasaṃsargatānirūpitasādhyābhāvaprakāratākaniściyaḥ	yat Darma paryApta avacCedaka tAka saMsarga tA nirUpita sADya aBAva prakAra tAka niSciyaH
   pratibandhakaḥ taddharmaparyāptādheyatāvacchedakatāniveśāt na doṣaḥ/ na	pratibanDakaH tad Darma paryApta aDeya tAvat Cedaka tA niveSAt na dozaH/ na
   caivamapi tādṛśasamūhālambanajñānamādāya taddoṣatādavasthyamiti	ca evam api tAdRSa samUha Alambana jQAnam AdAya tad doza tAdavasTyam iti
   vācyam/ tādṛśaniścayasāmānyaṃ pratibandhakamityarthavivakṣaṇāt/ tathā	vAcyam/ tAdRSa niScaya sAmAnyam pratibanDakam iti arTa vivakzaNAt/ taTA
   ca jñānatvavṛttidharmaparyāptāvacchedakatākatvaṃ niveśyam/ vṛttiśca	ca jQAna tva vRtti Darma paryApta avacCedaka tAka tvam niveSyam/ vRttiH ca
   svasetyādi bhedavattvasaṃbandhena/ svādhikaraṇatā	svasA ityAdi Bedavat tva saMbanDena/ sva aDikaraNa tA
   svaparyāptāvacchedakatākasaṃsargatākasādhyābhāvaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāvacchedakatānirūpakaniścayatvasaṃbandhena/	sva paryApta avacCedaka tAka saMsarga tAka sADya aBAva prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tAvacCedaka tA nirUpaka niScaya tva saMbanDena/

   sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhena sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnavattvam, tena	sADya tAvacCedaka sambanDena sADya tA avacCedaka avacCinnavat tvam, tena
   saṃbandhāntareṇa sādhyādhikaraṇamādāya na doṣaḥ/ na vā	saMbanDa antareNa sADya aDikaraNam AdAya na dozaH/ na vA
   viśiṣṭasattāvān jāterityādau dravyatvāderūpādhitānupapattiḥ/ evaṃ	viSizwa sattAvAn jAteH iti AdO dravya tvAt eru upADita anupapattiH/ evam
   sādhanavattvamapi sādhanatāvacchedakasambandhena	sADanavat tvam api sADana tAvacCedaka sambanDena
   sādhanatāvacchedakāvacchinnavattvam/ tena	sADana tAvacCedaka avacCinnavat tvam/ tena
   saṃbandhāntareṇa	saMbanDa antareNa
   sādhanādhikaraṇamādāya na doṣaḥ/ na vā dravyaṃ viśiṣṭasattvādityādau	sADana aDikaraNam AdAya na dozaH/ na vA dravyam viSizwa sattvAt ityAdO
   guṇāderupādhitāpattiḥ evaṃ vyāvṛttyantaramavaseyam/ kasyaciditi/	guNa AdeH upADita ApattiH evam vyAvRtti antaram avaseyam/ kasyacid iti/
   parvatīyadhūmādherityarthaḥ/ [208]	parvatIya DUma ADeH iti arTaH/ [208]
   idaṃ bahirdravyasya	idaM bahis dravyasya
   pakṣadharmatākathanam/ tena bāhyapratyakṣaviṣayatvasya sādhyatāyāṃ	pakza Darma tA kaTanam/ tena bAhya pratyakza vizaya tvasya sADya tAyAm
   dravyatvamātrameva pakṣadharma iti sūcitam/ [208] anityatvavyāpakamiti/	dravya tva mAtram eva pakza DarmaH iti sUcitam/ [208] anitya tva vyApakam iti/
   dīpikāvākye 'nityatvapadasya	dIpikA vAkye anitya tva padasya
   janyatvavināśitvasādhāraṇatvāt prakṛtānuguṇyārthamāha     [208]	janya tva vinASi tva sADAraNa tvAt prakRta anuguNya arTam Aha    [208]
   vināśitveti/ anyathā tādṛśasādhyavyāpakatvopādanaparatvaṃ	vinASi tvA iti/ anyaTA tAdRSa sADya vyApaka tva upAdana para tvam
   tādṛśagranthasya na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ/	tAdRSa granTasya na saMBavati iti BAvaH/
   bādhitanirūpaṇam	bADita nirUpaNam
   [208] yasya sādhyābhāva iti saṃgrahapaṅktau pakṣa	[208] yasya sADya aBAvaH iti saMgraha paFktO pakza
   ityadhyāhāryam/ tathā	iti aDyAhAryam/ taTA
   cānumānātiriktapramāṇajanyapakṣadharmikaniścaprakārībhūtaḥ	ca anumAna atirikta pramANa janya pakza Darmika niSca prakArIBUtaH
   yaddhetusaṃbandhi yat sādhyaṃ tadabhāva ityarthaḥ/ sambandhaśca	yat hetu saMbanDi yat sADyam tad aBAvaH iti arTaH/ sambanDaH ca
   hetusādhyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ/ atra bādhādiniścayānāṃ kutra kena rūpeṇa	hetu sADya BAva lakzaNaH/ atra bADa Adi niScayAnAm kutra kena rUpeNa
   pratibandhakatvamityāśaṅkāyāmāha   dīpikāyām bādhasyetyādinā/	pratibanDaka tvam iti ASaFkAyAm Aha  dIpikAyAm bADasya ityAdinA/
   doṣāṇāmanumitipratibandhakatvaprakāraśodhanam	dozANAm anumiti pratibanDaka tva prakAra SoDanam
   bādhaśabdasya	bADa Sabdasya
   doṣaviśeṣe 'pi prayogādāha     prakāśikāyām [212] bādhasya	doza viSeze api prayogAt Aha    prakASikAyAm [212] bADasya
   sādhyābhāvavattāniścayasyeti/ dīpikāyām [212] satpratipakṣasya	sADya aBAvavat tA niScayasya iti/ dIpikAyAm [212] sat pratipakzasya
   virodhijñānajanakasāmagrītveneti/ satpratipakṣasya	viroDi jQAna janaka sAmagrI tvena iti/ sat pratipakzasya
   satpratipakṣajñānasya/ virodhijñānajanakasāmagrītvena	sat pratipakza jQAnasya/ viroDi jQAna janaka sAmagrI tvena
   tadabhāvavattājñānajanakasāmagrītvena/	tad aBAvavat tA jQAna janaka sAmagrI tvena/
   atra navīnāḥ    	atra navInAH    
   sāmagrītvamekakāraṇaviśiṣṭāparakāraṇatvamiti	sAmagrI tvam eka kAraNa viSizwa apara kAraNa tvam iti
   pratibandhakatāvacchedakagarbhe kāraṇāntarapraveśo niṣphalaḥ	pratibanDaka tAvat Cedaka garBe kAraNa antara praveSaH nizPalaH
   gauravasampādakaśceti viśeṣyabhūtajñānasya	gOrava sampAdakaH ca iti viSezya BUta jQAnasya
   tadabhāvavyāpyavattājñānatvenaiva pratibandhakatvamucitam, lāghavāt/	tad aBAva vyApya vattA jQAna tvena eva pratibanDaka tvam ucitam, lAGavAt /
   evaṃ pratihetuvyāpakaḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ pratihetumān pakṣa iti	evam pratihetu vyApakaH sADya aBAvaH pratihetumAn pakzaH iti
   viśakalitajñānadbayasādhāraṇatayā jñānaviśiṣṭajñānatvenaiva	viSakalita jQAnadbaya sADAraNa tayA jQAna viSizwa jQAna tvena eva
   virodhitvamāvaśyakam/ etena virodhijñānajanakatvena	viroDi tvam AvaSya kam/ etena viroDi jQAna janaka tvena
   virodhitvamityapi pratyuktamiti prāhuḥ/ tanmataṃ darśaṃyati    	viroDi tvam iti api pratyuktam iti prAhuH/ tat matam darSaMyati    
   prakāśikāyām [212] vastutastviti/ nanu dīpikāyām	prakASikAyAm [212] vastutas tu iti/ nanu dIpikAyAm
   sādhāraṇasya ityādyasaṅgatam, duṣṭahetorevasādhāraṇaśabdārthatayā	sADAraNasya iti Adya saFgatam, duzwa hetoH eva sADAraNa Sabda arTa tayA
   tasyāvyabhicārābhāvarūpatvāsambhavāt ityata āha  [292]	tasya avyaBicAra aBAva rUpa tva asamBavAt iti atas Aha [292]
   bhāvapradhānanirdeśatayeti/ vaiśiṣṭye tṛtīyā/ [212] evamagre 'pīti/	BAva praDAna nirdeSa tayA iti/ vESizwye tRtIyA/ [212] evam agre api iti/
   viruddhasyetyādāvityarthaḥ/ vastutastu	virudDasya ityAdO= iti arTaH/ vastutas tu
   viruddhasyetyatra bhāvekta pratyayamaṅgīkṛtya virodhasyetyarthaḥ sulabha	virudDasya iti atra BAvekta pratyayam aFgIkRtya viroDasya iti arTaH sulaBa
   iti dhyeyam/ nanu sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvajñānasya hetudharmikasya	iti Dyeyam/ nanu sADya aBAvavat vRtti tva jQAnasya hetu Darmikasya
   sattve 'pi hetusamānādhikaraṇetyādivyāptiḥ na hetau gṛhyata	sattve api hetu samAna aDikaraNa ityAdi vyAptiH na hetO gRhyata
   ityanubhavasiddham, tacca nopapadyate/ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvajñānasya	iti anuBava sidDam, tat ca na upapadyate/ sADya aBAvavat vRtti tva jQAnasya
   grāhyābhāvānavagāhitvena tādṛśavyāptijñānavirodhitvāsambhavāt	grAhya aBAva an avagAhi tvena tAdRSa vyApti jQAna viroDi tvA samBavAt
   ityāśaṅkyāha   [212] hetāviti/ vyāptīti/	iti ASaFkya Aha  [212] hetO= iti/ vyApti iti/
   hetusamānādhikaraṇetyādivyāptītyarthaḥ/ [212] maṇimantrādinyāyeneti/	hetu samAna aDikaraNa ityAdi vyApti iti arTaH/ [212] maNi mantra Adi nyAyena iti/
   tena grāhyābhāvānavagāhitvena	tena grAhya aBAva anavagAhi tvena
   tādṛśavyabhicāragrahasya	tAdRSa vyaBicAra grahasya
   tādṛśavyāptigrahāvirodhitve 'pi na taddaśāyāṃ tadāpattiriti bhāvaḥ/	tAdRSa vyApti graha aviroDi tve api na tad daSAyAm tad ApattiH iti BAvaH/
   [212] viśiṣṭavyāptyabhāvatayetyādi/ athātra dhūmavān vahnerityādau	[212] viSizwa vyApti aBAvatayA ityAdi/ aTa atra DUmavAn vahneH iti AdO
   hetuvyāpakasādhyāprasiddhyā tadghaṭitaviśiṣṭavyāpateraprasiddhyā	hetu vyApaka sADya aprasidDyA tad Gawita viSizwa vyApateH aprasidDyA
   tadabhāvasya sutarāmaprasiddhyā kathamābhāsatā/ na ca  	tad aBAvasya suta rAma prasidDyA kaTam ABAsa tA/ na ca  
   svavyāpakatāvacchedakasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhāvacchinnahetuniṣṭhapratiyogitākātyantābhāva	sva vyApaka tAvacCedaka sADya tAvacCedaka avacCinna sA mAna aDikaraNya sambanDa avacCinna hetu nizWa pratiyogi tAkA atyanta aBAva
   eva hetuniṣṭhaḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti na doṣaḥ/	eva hetu nizWaH vyApya tva asidDiH iti na dozaH/
   tādṛśasāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhena hetuviśiṣṭahetumān pakṣa iti	tAdRSa sAmAnADikaraNya saMbanDena hetu viSizwa hetumAn pakzaH iti
   jñānasyaiva cānumitihetutvam ato na tasyābhāsatānupapattiriti	jQAnasya eva ca anumiti hetu tvam atas na tasya ABAsatA anupapattiH iti
   vācyam/ tathā sati	vAcyam/ taTA sati
   prāguktavyabhicārādīnāmābhāsatānupapateraśakyaparihāratvāditi/	prAk ukta vyaBicAra AdInAm ABAsata anupapateH aSakya parihAra tvAt iti/
   maivam/ yataḥ	mA evam/ yatas 
   svavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasvāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyobhayasambandhena	sva vRtti Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tva sva avacCinna sAmAnADikaraNyA uBaya sambanDena
   sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭahetumān pakṣa iti	sADya tAvacCedaka viSizwa hetumAn pakzaH iti
   jñānamevānumitiheturūpeyate bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā	jQAnam eva anumiti hetu rUpeyate Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tA
   svasetyādyavacchedakatvasambandhena/	svasA ityAdi avacCedaka tva sambanDena/
   uktasvavṛttibhedapratiyogitvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasādhyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhapratiyogitākābhāvavaddhetureva	ukta sva vRtti Beda pratiyogi tva saMbanDa avacCinna sADya tA avacCeda kanizWa pratiyogitAkA BAva vat hetuH eva
   vyabhicāraḥ/	vyaBicAraH/
   svāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhāvacchinnasādhyatāvacchedakaniṣṭhapratiyogitākātyantābhāvavaddhetureva	sva avacCinna sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDa avacCinna sADya tA avacCeda kanizWa pratiyogi tAkA atyanta aBAva vat hetuH eva
   vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ/ uktagranthasyāpyatraiva tātparyam/ ato na dhūmavān	vyApya tva asidDiH/ ukta granTasya api atra eva tAtparyam/ atas na DUmavAn
   vahnerityādau uktarītyā tadaprasiddhiriti madekapariśīlitaḥ panthā/	vahneH iti AdO ukta rItyA tad aprasidDiH iti mad eka pariSIlitaH panTA/
   kecittu  	kecid tu  
   sādhyatāvacchedakaniṣṭha	sADya tAvacCedaka nizWa
   hetuvyāpakatāvacchedakatvahetvadhikaraṇavṛttitāvacchendakatvobhayābhāvo	hetu vyApaka tAvacCedaka tva hetu aDikaraNa vRtti tA avacCendaka tva uBayA BAvaH 
   vivakṣita iti nāprasiddhiriti vadanti/ tattuccham     dhūmavān	vivakzitaH iti na aprasidDiH iti vadanti/ tad tucCam    DUmavAn
   vahnerityādau hetuvyāpakasādhyasamānādhikaraṇahetumān pakṣa	vahneH iti AdO hetu vyApaka sADya samAna aDikaraNa hetumAn pakza
   u iti jñānasya sādadhyatāvacchedake	u iti jQAnasya sAdaDyatAvacCedake
   hetvadhikaraṇavṛttitāvacchedakatvānavagāhitayā darśitobhayābhāvasya	hetu aDikaraNa vRtti tAvat Cedaka tvAn avagAhitayA darSita uBaya aBAvasya
   tadvirodhitayā hetvābhāsatāyā durvañcatvāt/ darśitajñāne	tad viroDi tayA hetvABAsatAyAH durvaQca tvAt/ darSita jQAne
   tulyavittivedyatānyāyena niyamatastadbhāne mānābhāvāt/ pratyakṣarūpe	tulya vitti vedya tA nyAyena niyamataH tad BAne mAna aBAvAt/ pratyakza rUpe
   tādṛśajñāne kathañcit tasya tathā bhāne 'pi	tAdRSa jQAne kaTaQcid tasya taTA BAne api
   anumitau śābde ca	anumitO SAbde ca
   tadbhāne niyāmakābhāvena tādṛśābhāvagrahadaśāyāṃ	tad BAne niyAmaka aBAvena tAdRSa aBAva graha daSAyAm
   tādṛśaparāmarśasambhavāt anumityutpādasambhavena tādṛśābhāvasya	tAdRSa parAmarSa samBavAt anumiti utpAda samBavena tAdRSa aBAvasya
   hetvābhāsatāyā ayuktatvāt/ tādṛśaparāmarśasya	hetvABAsa tAyAH ayukta tvAt/ tAdRSa parAmarSasya
   tulyarūpobhayānavagāhitvena	tulya rUpa uBayAnavagAhi tvena
   tādṛśobhayābhāvagrahapratibadhyatvāyogāt/ tādṛśaparāmarśe	tAdRSaH Baya aBAva graha pratibaDya tva ayogAt/ tAdRSa parAmarSe
   dhūmatvādirūpasādhyatāvacchedakasya svarūpata eva bhānena	DUma tva Adi rUpa sADya tAvacCedakasya svarUpataH eva BAnena
   vyāpakatāvacchedakatvādyaṃśe tasya niyamato 'vacchedakakatvena sutarāṃ	vyApaka tAvacCedaka tva Adi aMSe tasya niyamataH avacCedakaka tvena sutarAm
   viparītaniścayapratibadhyatvāsaṃbhavācca/	viparIta niScaya pratibaDya tva asaMBavAt ca/
   dhūmatvatvādirūpeṇadhūmatvādibhānopagame ca	DUma tva tva Adi rUpeNa DUma tva Adi BAna upagame ca
   dhūmatvatvādyanavacchinnavidheyatāvacchedakatākānumityanupapattiprasaṅgāt/	DUma tva tva Adi anavacCinna viDeya tAvat Cedaka tAka anum iti anupapatti prasaFgAt/
   yadapi	yat api
   hetuvyāpakatāvacchedakatvahetvadhikaraṇavṛttitāvacchedakatvobhayaviśi	hetu vyApaka tAvacCedaka tva hetu aDikaraNa vRtti tAvacCedaka tva uBaya viSi
   ṣṭasādhyatāvacchedakahetumān	zwasA aDya tAvacCedaka hetumAn
   pakṣa iti parāmarśasyānumitihetutvaṃ svīkriyate, nāto doṣa	pakzaH iti parAmarSasya anumiti hetu tvam svIkriyate, na atas doza
   iti     tadapi na sat/ kāraṇatāvacchedakagarbhe	iti    tat api na sat/ kAraNa tAvacCedaka garBe
   hetutāvacchedakāvacchinnaviṣayatāyāḥ tredhā niveśena	hetu tAvat Cedaka avacCinna vizaya tAyAH treDA niveSena
   vyāpyatvāsiddheḥ/ [212] viśiṣṭavyāptyabhāvatayeti dīpikāvākyena	vyApya tva asidDeH/ [212] viSizwa vyApti aBAvatayA iti dIpikA vAkyena
   hetuniṣṭhābhāvasyaiva doṣatāpratīteḥ tāvatāpi tadanupapādanācca/	hetu nizWA BAvasya eva doza tA pratIteH tAvatA api tad anupapAdanAt ca/
   hetubhūtaparāmarśe bahuvrīhyarthasya sambandhasyādhikasya bhānena	hetu BUta parAmarSe bahu vrIhi arTasya sambanDasya aDikasya BAnena
   mahāgauravācca iti sarvamanavadyam/	mahA gOravAt ca iti sarvam anavadyam/
   dīpikāyām [212] vyāptisaṃśayādhāyakatveneti/ ādhāyakatvaṃ prayojakatvam/	dIpikAyAm [212] vyApti saMSaya ADAyaka tvena iti/ ADAyaka tvam prayojaka tvam/
   nanu	nanu
   vyāptisaṃśayaprayojakatvaṃ kathaṃ tayorityataḥ tadupapādanayati    	vyApti saMSaya prayojaka tvam kaTam tayoH iti atas tat upapAdanayati    
   prakāśikāyām [213] hetāvasādhāraṇyādīti/ ādinā	prakASikAyAm [213] hetO= asADAraNya adIti/ AdinA
   anupasaṃhāritvasaṃgrahaḥ/ prācīneti/ navīnamataṃ tu prāgevoktamiti	anupasaMhAri tva saMgrahaH/ prAcIna iti/ navIna matam tu prAk eva uktam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ [213] vyāptijñānapratibandhakaḥ   	BAvaH/ [213] vyApti jQAna pratibanDakaH   
   vyāptijñānavirodhidhīviṣayaḥ/ paramukhanirīkṣakasyetyatra pratibandha	vyApti jQAna viroDi DI vizayaH/ para muKa nirIkzakasya iti atra pratibanDa
   ityādiḥ/ [213] tathā cetyādi/ atrāyamāśayaḥ    	ityAdiH/ [213] taTA ca ityAdi/ atra ayam ASayaH    
   hetvābhāsasāmānyalakṣaṇe	hetvABAsa sAmAnya lakzaNe
   niviṣṭamanumititatkaraṇānyatarapratibandhakatvam na tāvat	nivizwam anumiti tatkaraNa anyatara pratibanDaka tvam na tAvat 
   tadanutpādaprayojakatvam/ vyabhicāritāsambandhena	tad anutpAda prayojaka tvam/ vyaBicArita asambanDena
   upādhiviśiṣṭahetāvatiprasaṅgāt/ evaṃ ca	upADi viSizwa hetO= ati prasaFga at/ evam ca
   hetāvupādhiprakārakajñānābhāvasya parāmarśakāraṇatāvirahāt	hetO= upADi prakAraka jQAna aBAvasya parAmarSa kAraNa tA virahAt
   nātivyāptiriti/ śithilam ayuktam/	na ati vyAptiH iti/ SiTilam ayuktam/
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapakṣagrahāvirodhitvasyaivāśrayāsiddhilakṣaṇatayā	pakza tA avacCedaka viSizwa pakza graha aviroDi tvasya eva ASrayA sidDi lakzaNa tayA
   sādhyavatpakṣe tadabhāvāt uktalakṣaṇe ca sādhyasaṃśayāṃśaniveśasya	sADya vat pakze tad aBAvAt ukta lakzaNe ca sADya saMSaya aMSa niveSasya
   viphalatvena saṃśayasya pakṣatātvanirāsācca darśitasya śithilatvamiti	viPala tvena saMSayasya pakzatAtva nirAsAt ca darSitasya SiTila tvam iti
   bhāvaḥ/ dīpikāyām/ [212] āśrayāsiddhāvantarbhavatīti/ ayaṃ bhāvaḥ  	BAvaH/ dIpikAyAm/ [212] ASraya asidDO= antar Bavati iti/ ayam BAvaH  
   āśrayasya pakṣatāviśiṣṭasyāsiddhiḥ ceneti vigrahaḥ/ tathā ca	ASrayasya pakzatA viSizwasya asidDiH cena iti vigrahaH/ taTA ca
   sādhyaniścayadaśāyāṃ sādhyasaṃśayarūpapakṣatāviraheṇa tadviśiṣṭasya	sADya niScaya daSAyAm sADya saMSaya rUpa pakza tA viraheNa tad viSizwasya
   pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnasya tadānīmasiddheḥ/ sādhyavatpakṣasya	pakza tA avacCedaka avacCinnasya tad AnIma sidDeH/ sADya vat pakzasya
   tatrāntarbhāva	tatra antarBAva
   ucita iti bhāvaḥ/ siddhasādhanasyāśrayāsiddhyantarbhāvaprayojakaṃ	ucitaH iti BAvaH/ sidDa sADanasya ASraya asidDi antarBAva prayojakam
   pakṣatāvighaṭakatvamupapādayati     [213] prakāśe tanamata iti/	pakzatA viGawaka tvam upapAdayati    [213] prakASe tanam atas iti/
   prācīnamata ityarthaḥ/ ayaṃ bhāvaḥ    pakṣatāvighaṭakatvaṃ	prAcInam ataH iti arTaH/ ayam BAvaH   pakzatA viGawaka tvam
   āśrayāsiddhitvam/ vighaṭakatvaṃ ca virodhigrahaviṣayatvam/ pakṣatā ca	ASraya asidDi tvam/ viGawaka tvam ca viroDi graha vizaya tvam/ pakzatA ca
   pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapakṣadharmakasādhyasaṃśayātmikā	pakza tA avacCedaka viSizwa pakza Darmaka sADya saMSaya AtmikA
   prācīnamate/ tathā ca pakṣaniṣṭhapakṣatāvacchedakavirahasnya	prAcInamate/ taTA ca pakza nizWa pakza tA avacCedaka viraha snya
   sādhyavatpakṣasya	sADya vat pakzasya
   ca niścayadaśāyāmuktapakṣatāyā asambhavāt/ ubhayorapi	ca niScaya daSAyAmukta pakza tAyAH asamBava at/ uBayoH api
   tathātvamavyāhatamiti sādhyavatpakṣasya	taTA atvam avyAhatam iti sADya vat pakzasya
   siddhasādhanarūpasyāśrayāsiddhirūpatayā nādhikyāpattiriti na	sidDa sADana rUpasya ASrayA sidDi rUpa tayA na ADikya ApattiH iti na
   vibhāgavyāghātaśaṅketi bhāvaḥ/ siddheḥ pūrvaṃ parato vā yatra	viBAga vyAGAta SaFkA iti BAvaH/ sidDeH pUrvam paratas vA yatra
   siṣādhayiṣā tatra siṣādhayiṣāvirahakālāvacchedena siddheḥ/	sizA DayizA tatra sizA DayizA viraha kAla avacCedena sidDeH/
   pratibandhakatāyā āvaśyakatvena sādhvatpakṣātiprasaṅgatādavasthyamiti	pratibanDaka tAyAH AvaSyaka tvena sADvat pakza atiprasaFga tAdavasTyam iti
   śaṅkānirāsāyoktañ [213] kevalamiti/ anena siddheḥ	SaFkA nirAsAya uktan [213] kevalam iti/ anena sidDeH
   siṣādhayiṣāsāhityābhāvavyavacchedaḥ/ tathā ca siddheḥ pūrvaṃ parataśca	sizA DayizA sA hitya aBAva vyavacCedaH/ taTA ca sidDeH pUrvam paratas ca
   yatra siṣādhayiṣā jātā tatra siddheratāthātvāt nātiprasaṅga	yatra sizA DayizA jAtA tatra sidDeH atATAtvAt na ati prasaFga
   ityarthaḥ//	iti arTaH//
   // iti	// iti
   prasaraṇākhyāyāṃ dīpikāprakāśavyākhyāyāmanumānaparicchedaḥ//	prasaraNa AKyAyAm dIpikA prakASa vyAKyAyAm anumAna paricCedaH//
   samāptaḥ	samAptaH
   upamānaparicchedaḥ	upamAna paricCedaH
   [218] kutaścidāraṇyakapuruṣādityādisaṅgrahavākye pañcamyāḥ	[218] kutaScid AraNyaka puruzAt ityAdi saFgraha vAkye paQcamyAH
   prayojyatvamarthaḥ/ tasya śrudhātvarthaśābdabodhe anvayaḥ/ iti śabdasya	prayojya tvam arTaH/ tasya SruDAtu arTa SAbda boDe anvayaH/ iti Sabdasya
   śabdānvayītyākārakatvamarthaḥ/ sphuṭamanyat/ yattu itiśabdaḥ	Sabda anvayI iti AkAraka tvam arTaH/ sPuwam anyat/ yat tu iti SabdaH
   tādṛśānupūrvyavacchinnavākyaparaḥ, śrudhātoḥ śrāvaṇapratyakṣamarthaḥ/	tAdRSa AnupUrvi avacCinna vAkya paraH, SruDAtoH SrAvaNa pratyakzam arTaH/
   tatra	tatra
   viṣayitayā vākyasyānvayaḥ iti   tattuccham  	vizayi tayA vAkyasya anvayaH iti  tad tucCam  
   smarannityuktasmṛtisāmagrīpraviṣṭāvaśyakaśābdarūpānubhavapratipādanaparatvasambhave	smaran= iti ukta smRti sAmagrI pravizwa AvaSya ka SAbda rUpa anuBava pratipAdana paratva samBave
   tatparityāgenānupayuktānyathāsiddhavākyasākṣātkārapratipādanaparatāyā	tad parityAgena anupayuktAnyaTA sidDa vAkya sAkzAtkAra pratipAdana para tAyA
   anyāyyatvāt/ prakāśe [218] avasarasaṅgatyeti/	anyAyya tva at/ prakASe [218] avasara saFgatyeti/

   tṛtīyārthādikaṃ sarvamapi pūrvavat/	tRtIya arTa Adikam sarvam api pUrvavat /
   nanu [218] saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhajñānamupamitiriti saṅgrahavākyena upamiteḥ	nanu [218] saMjQA saMjQi saMbanDa jQAnam upamitiH iti saFgraha vAkyena upamiteH
   padapadārthasambandhaviṣayakajñānatvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktam   tanna yujyate/	pada padArTa sambanDa vizaya ka jQAna tvam lakzaNam uktam  tat na yujyate/
   tādṛśānumityādāvativyāpteḥ/ atastādṛśasaṅgrahavākyaṃ	tAdRSa anumiti AdO= ati vyApteH/ atas tAdRSa saFgraha vAkyam
   nopamiterlakṣaṇakathanaparam api tu tatsvarūpamātrapradarśanaparamityāha	na upamiteH lakzaNa kaTana param api tu tad svarUpa mAtra pradarSana param iti Aha
     [218] upamitisvarūpamiti/ kiṃ tarhi tasyā lakṣaṇamityākāṅkṣāyām	 [218] upamiti svarUpam iti/ kim tarhi tasyAH lakzaNam iti AkAFkzAyAm
   āha   [218]	Aha  [218]
   lakṣaṇaṃ tviti/	lakzaNam tu iti/
   gamyetyantam upamititvasya jātirūpatāyāṃ pramāṇasūcanāya/ [218] etena	gamya iti antam upamiti tvasya jAti rUpa tAyAm pramANa sUcanAya/ [218] etena
   smaranniti vartamānanirdeśena/ [218] āhuriti/ atra ca saṃgrahakārasya	smaran= iti vartamAna nirdeSena/ [218] AhuH iti/ atra ca saMgraha kArasya
   kutaścidāraṇyakādityādyabhihitavataḥ	kutaScid AraNyakAt ityAdi aBihitavataH

   vyāpāraḥ  upamitiḥ phalamiti matapradarśanamevābhimatam, na tu	vyApAraH upamitiH Palam iti mata pradarSanam eva aBimatam, na tu
   sādṛśyādiviśiṣṭapiṇḍadarśanaṃ karaṇaṃ tādṛśasmaraṇaṃ vyāpāraḥ	sAdRSya Adi viSizwa piNxa darSanam karaNam tAdRSa smaraNam vyApAraH

   svādhīnatvena smariṣyanniti piṇḍaṃ paśyatīti brūyāt, ataḥ	svADIna tvena smarizyan= iti piNxam paSyati iti brUyAt, atas 
   smarannityādyuktisvārasyaparyālocanayā pūrvamatamevābhimatam, na tu	smarat nityAt i ukti svArasya paryAlocanayA pUrva matam eva aBimatam, na tu
   dvitīyaṃ matamiti tatpradarśanaparatayā	dvitIyam matam iti tad pradarSana para tayA
   tādṛśagranthavyākhyānānaucityamarucibījam/ saṃgrahe vākyeti/	tAdRSa granTa vyAKyAna anOcityam aruci bIjam/ saMgrahe vAkya iti/
   gosadṛśo gavayapadavācya iti svarūpātideśetyādiḥ/ [218] udbodhakāntareti/	go sadRSaH gavaya pada vAcyaH iti svarUpa atideSa ityAdiH/ [218] udboDaka antarA iti/
   sādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍadarśanātiriktādṛṣṭādirūpodbodhaketyarthaḥ/	sAdRSya viSizwa piNxa darSana atirikta adRzwa Adi rUpa udboDaka iti arTaH/
   [219] sādṛśya(viśiṣṭapiṇḍa)darśanānantaramityādi/ atropamiteḥayaṃ	[219] sAdRSya( viSizwa piNxa) darSana anantaram ityAdi/ atra upamiteHayam
   gavayapadavācya ityānakāratvopagame gavayavyaktyantaradarśanānantaraṃ	gavaya pada vAcyaH iti AnakAra tva upagame gavaya vyakti antara darSana anantaram
   tatra padavācyatāyāḥ smaraṇānupapattiḥ, gosadṛśo gavayapadavācya	tatra padavAcya tAyAH smaraNa anupapattiH, go sadRSaH gavaya pada vAcya
   ityākārakatvasyopagame ca sādṛśyasya	iti AkAraka tvasya upagame ca sAdRSyasya
   tadbhedasamānādhikaraṇatadgatadharmavattvarūpasya gurutvena	tad Beda samAna aDikaraNa tadgata Darma vat tva rUpasya guru tvena
   padavācyatāvacchedakatvāsambhavāt tasyā bhramatvāpattirityālocya	pada vAcya tAvacCedakatva asamBavAt tasyAH BramatvApattiH iti Alocya
   gavayo gavayapadavācya ityākārikaiva	gavayaH gavaya pada vAcyaH iti AkArikA eva

   śabdalakṣaṇam	Sabda lakzaNam

   cāvyavahitatvam/ tacca pūrvāparasādhāraṇam/	ca avyavahita tvam/ tat ca pUrva aparasADAraNam/

   bodhyam/	boDyam/
   nanu [222] āptavākyaṃ śabda iti saṃgrahe śabdatvasya lakṣyatāvacchedakatve	nanu [222] Apta vAkyam SabdaH iti saMgrahe Sabda tvasya lakzya tAvacCedaka tve
   vahninā siñcatītyādyapramāṇavākye 'vyāptiḥ;	vahninA siQcati ityAdya pramANa vAkye avyAptiH;
   āptoccaritatvavirahādityata āha   [222] pramāṇaśabda iti/ tathā	Apta uccarita tva virahAt iti atas Aha  [222] pramANa SabdaH iti/ taTA

   iti sūcitam/ [222] yathārthavaktṛtvarūpeti/ etena āptatvaṃ	iti sUcitam/ [222] yaTA arTa vaktR tva rUpa iti/ etena Apta tvam
   hīṣṭatvam/ tathā ca vahninā siñcatīti vākye 'tivyāptitādavasthyam/	hi izwa tvam/ taTA ca vahninA siQcati iti vAkye ati vyApti tAdavasTyam/

   vahninā siñcatītyādiprayokturapi kadācit	vahninA siQcati ityAdi prayoktuH api kadAcid

   kathamativyāptivāraṇamityata āha    [222] prakṛtavākyārtheti/ [222]	kaTam ati vyApti vAraNam iti atas Aha   [222] prakRta vAkya arTa iti/ [222]
   niṣkarṣa iti/ ayaṃ bhāvaḥ   	nizkarzaH iti/ ayam BAvaH   
   tādātmya1svapratipādyārthagocarayathārthajñānajanyatvobhayasambandhena	tAdAtmya1 sva pratipAdya arTa gocara yaTa arTa jQAna janya tva uBaya sambanDena
   1. svapratipādyetyādi/	1. sva pratipAdya ityAdi/
   svaṃ jalena siñcatītyādivākyaṃ tatpratipādyo yo 'thaḥ	svam jalena siQcati ityAdi vAkyam tad pratipAdyaH yaH aTaH
   jalakaraṇakasekakartā tadviṣayakaṃ yat yathārthajñānaṃ	jala karaNaka seka kartA tad vizayakam yat yaTArTa jQAnam

   śabdaracanā' iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ/	Sabda racanAa iti nyAyAt iti BAvaH/
   vākyaviśiṣṭavākyatvaṃ	vAkya viSizwa vAkya tvam

   śaktinirūpaṇam	Sakti nirUpaNam
   nanu [225] arthasmṛtyanukūletyādinā dīpikāyām	nanu [225] arTa smRti anukUla ityAdinA dIpikAyAm

   [225] mīmāṃsaketyādi/ [225] nirāsakatveneti/ prayojanatayā	[225] mImAMsaka ityAdi/ [225] nirAsaka tvena iti/ prayojana tayA
   hetutvavivakṣayā tṛtīyā/ agra ityavatāraṇānvayi/ avatāraṇaṃ	hetu tva vivakzayA tRtIyA/ agre iti avatAraNa anvayi/ avatAraNam
   pravṛttyanukūlo vyāpāraḥ/ sa ca śaṅkāgranthapravṛttiḥ/ [225] taditi/	pravRtti anukUlaH vyApAraH/ sa ca SaFkA granTa pravRttiH/ [225] tat iti/

   prāmāṇikatayā	prAmANika tayA
