   tadvṛttirūpavattvam/ rūpaṃ cārthetyādyuktam/ śaktipadārthānvitaṃ	tad vRtti rUpavat tvam/ rUpam ca arTa iti Adi uktam/ Sakti padArTa anvitam
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	vESizwyam
   tṛtīyārthaḥ/ sphuṭamanyat/ dīpikāsthaśaktirityasya śaktipadārtha	tRtIya arTaH/ sPuwam anyat/ dIpikA sTa SaktiH iti asya Sakti padArTa
   ityarthasūcanāya [225] śaktipadārthamityuktam/ dīpikāyām	iti arTa sUcanAya [225] Sakti padArTam iti uktam/ dIpikAyAm
   anukūletyantaṃ saṃbandhaviśeṣaṇam/ nanu	anukUlA iti antam saMbanDa viSezaNam/ nanu
   dīpikoktaśaktipadārthalakṣaṇer'thasmṛtyanukūlatvaniveśane 'pi	dIpikA ukta Sakti padArTa lakzaNer aTasmRti anukUla tva niveSane api
   ghaṭādipadākāśayoḥ samavāye 'tiprasaṅgaḥ tadavasthaḥ/	Gawa Adi pada AkASayoH samavAye ati prasaFgaH tad avasTaH/
   svaniṣṭhatvasvārthaniṣṭhatvobhayasambandhena	sva nizWa tvasva arTa nizWatva uBaya sambanDena
   padaviśiṣṭatvaniveśane 'pyākāśapadākāśayossamavāyavāraṇamadhakyam	pada viSizwa tva niveSane api AkASa pada AkASayossamavAya vAraNam aDakyam
   tasyāpi tadubhayasambandhatvāt arthassṛtyanukūlatvāccetyata āha   [225]	tasya api tad uBaya sambanDa tvAt arTa ssRtya nukUla tvAt ca iti atas Aha  [225]
   śābdabodhajanaketi/ smṛtiviśeṣaṇametat/ tathā ca	SAbda boDa jana keti/ smRti viSezaNam etat/ taTA ca
   samavāyajñānādhīna  	samavAya jQAna aDInaH  
   ākāśādirūpārthasmṛteśśābdabodhajanakatvābhāvāt nātiprasaṅga	AkASa Adi rUpa arTa smRteH Sa abda boDa janaka tva aBAvAt na ati prasaFga
   iti bhāvaḥ/ nanu anukūlatvaṃ janakatvam, tacca saṃbandhe bādhitam	iti BAvaH/ nanu anukUla tvam janakatvam, tat ca saMbanDe bADitam
   tajjñānasyaiva smṛtijanakatvādityata āha   [225] anukūlatvamiheti/ [225]	tad jQAnasya eva smRti janaka tvAt iti atas Aha  [225] anukUla tvam iha iti/ [225]
   viśeṣyamitīti/ yadyapi svaprayojakādṛṣṭavattvāderātmapadaṃ prati	viSezyam iti iti/ yadi api sva prayojaka adRzwa vat tva AdeH Atma padam prati
   ātmani sambandhatvamasti, tathāpi smṛtiniṣṭhā yā śābdabodhajanakatā	Atmani sambanDa tvam asti, taTA api smRti nizWA yA SAbda boDa janaka tA
   tannirūpitā yā janyatāsambandhāvacchinnā jñānaniṣṭhāvacchedakatā	tad nirUpitA yA janyatA sambanDa avacCinnA jQAna nizWA avacCedaka tA
   tadavacchedakasaṃsargatāśrayatvamiti niṣkarṣāt na doṣaḥ/	tad avacCedaka saMsargatA ASraya tvam iti nizkarzAt na dozaH/
   1. svajanyatvetyādi/	1. sva janya tva ityAdi/
   svaṃ jalena siñcatītyādivākyārthaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ tajjanyatvaṃ	svam jalena siQcati ityAdi vAkya arTa vizayakam jQAnam tat janya tvam
   tādṛśavākye, evaṃ svaṃ tādṛśavākyārthajñānaṃ tadviṣayo yor'thaḥ	tAdRSa vAkye, evam svam tAdRSa vAkya arTa jQAnam tad vizayaH yor aTaH
   vākyārthaḥ tatpratipādakatvaṃ ca tasmin vākye iti samanvayaḥ/	vAkya arTaH tad pratipAdaka tvam ca tasmin vAkye iti samanvayaH/
   1janyatāsambandhena	1janyata asambanDena
   tattadarthadharmikatattatpadaprakārakaśaktisaṃsargakajñānaviśiṣṭatattadarthasmṛtitvena	tad tad arTa Darmika tad tad pada prakAraka Sakti saMsargaka jQAna viSizwa tad tad arTa smRti tvena
   śābdabodhahetutvopagamāt	SAbda boDa hetu tva upagamAt
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ evaṃ	lakzaNa samanvayaH/ evam
   saṃbandhāntarajñānajanyārthasmṛteḥ śābdabodhahetutāvirahāt na doṣa	saMbanDa antara jQAna janyA arTa smRteH SAbda boDa hetu tA virahAt na doza
   iti/	iti/
   nanu anyaḥ padārthaḥ	nanu anyaH padArTaH
   padārthāntaramiti vyutpattyā padārthāntarapadaṃ	padArTa antaram iti vyutpattyA padArTa antara padam
   kḷptapadārthātiriktaparam,	k?pta padArTa atirikta param,
   pratiyogiviśeṣasamarpakapadāsamabhivyāhṛtātiriktādipadānāṃ	pratiyogi viSeza samarpaka padA sam aBivyAhRta atirikta Adi padAnAm
   svasamabhivyāhṛtapadārthatāvacchedakāśrayatvena	sva samaBivyAhRta padArTa tAvacCedaka ASraya tvena
   kḷptatattaddharmipratiyogikabhedakūṭavadbodhakatāyāḥ 'citramatiriktaṃ	k?pta tad tad Darmi pratiyogika Beda kUwa vat boDaka tAyAH acitram atiriktam
   rūpa'mityādau dṛṣṭatvāt/ tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ śakterapi	rUpa am iti AdO dRzwa tvAt/ taTA ca mImAMsakEH SakteH api
   padārthatvāṅgīkārāt	padArTa tva aFgIkArAt
   tādṛśabhedakūṭavatpadārthāprasiddhirityāśaṅkyāha   [225] tattaditi/ tathā	tAdRSa Beda kUwa vat padArTa aprasidDiH iti ASaFkya Aha  [225] tad tat iti/ taTA
   ca śaktitvātiriktānāṃ dravyatvādīnāmeva	ca Saktitva atiriktAnAm dravya tva AdInAm eva
   grahaṇāt nāprasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/ [225] vyāghātaḥ   virodhaḥ/	grahaNAt na aprasidDiH iti BAvaH/ [225] vyAGAtaH  viroDaH/
   aprasiddhiriti yāvat/ athavā naiyāyikamate śaktiḥ na padārthāntaramiti	aprasidDiH iti yAvat/ aTavA nEyAyika mate SaktiH na padArTa antaram iti
   niṣedho nopapadyate/ pratiyogyaprasiddherata āha   [225]	nizeDaH na upapadyate/ pratiyogi aprasidDeH atas Aha  [225]
   tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭavadityartha iti/ atra ca	tad tad padArTa tAvacCedaka aBAva kUwa vat iti arTaH iti/ atra ca
   padārthānāṃ tattatpadārthatāvacchedakānāṃ anataramabhāvakūṭaḥ atrāstīti	padArTAnAm tad tad padArTa tAvacCedakAnAm anataram aBAvakUwaH atra asti iti
   padārthāntaramiti arśādyajanyatāyā upagamenoktārthalābhāt na	padArTa antaram iti arSa Adi ajanyatAyAH upagamena ukta arTa lABAt na
   padārthāntaramityatra ca nañaḥ	padArTa antaram iti atra ca naQaH
   prakṛtipratyayārthayorantarābhāsamānārthakatāyā anyatra darśanāt	prakRti pratyaya arTayoH antarABAsamAna arTaka tAyAH anyatra darSanAt 
   prakṛte 'pi antarapadārthasyābhāvakūṭasya nañarthābhāve	prakRte api antara padArTasya aBAvakUwasya naQarTa aBAve
   pratiyogitayānvayena tattatpadārthatāvacchedakavirahakūṭābhāvāśraya	pratiyogitayA anvayena tad tad padArTa tAvacCedaka viraha kUwa aBAva ASraya
   ityarthaṃ manasi nidhāyāha   [225]	iti arTam manasi niDAya Aha  [225]
   na vyāghāta iti/ vyāghāta ityataḥ	na vyAGAtaH iti/ vyAGAtaH iti atas 
   prāk siddhyasiddhibhyāṃmityādiḥ/ [227] anyeti naiyāyiketyarthaḥ/	prAk sidDi asidDiByAMm iti AdiH/ [227] anyA iti nEyAyikA iti arTaH/
   tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭasya pratyekaṃ prasiddhatvāt	tad tad padArTa tAvacCedaka aBAva kUwasya pratyekam prasidDa tvAt 
   pratiyogitāvacchedakaviśiṣṭapratiyogijñānasambhavena naiyāyikamate	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka viSizwa pratiyogi jQAna samBavena nEyAyika mate
   niṣedhopapatteriti bhāvaḥ/ yadyapyatra kūṭatvaṃ durvacam/ aprasiddhyā	nizeDa upapatteH iti BAvaH/ yadi api atra kUwa tvam durvacam/ aprasidDyA
   ekābhāvaviśiṣṭāparābhāvaniveśaśca na	eka aBAva viSizwa aparABAva niveSaH ca na
   janyatāsaṃbandhenetyasya jñānaviśiṣṭetyatrānvayaḥ/	janyatA saMbanDena iti asya jQAna viSizwa iti atra anvayaH/
   sambhavati/ tathāpi	samBavati/ taTA api
   tattadabhāvaviṣayakadhīviṣayatvavadityarthāṅgīkārāt na doṣaḥ/	tad tad aBAva vizayaka DI vizayatva vat iti arTa aFgIkArAt na dozaH/
   viṣayatvavattvaṃ cādheyatāsambandhāvacchinnasvavyāpakatāsambandhena/	vizaya tvavat tvam ca ADeya tA sambanDa avacCinna sva vyApaka tA sambanDena/
   tatsambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatadabhāvaprasiddhyā niṣedhopapatteḥ/	tad sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tada BAva prasidDyA nizeDa upapatteH/
   [225] atiriktaiveti/ kḷptayorvinigamanāvirahe 'kḷptamanyat	[225] atiriktA eva iti/ k?ptayoH vinigamanA virahe ak?ptam anyat 
   siddhyatīti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ/ [225] yata ityādi/ atra kalpe	sidDyati iti nyAyAt iti BAvaH/ [225] yatas ityAdi/ atra kalpe
   vācya ityādau dhātostādṛśaviśeṣyatvamarthaḥ/ pratyayasya āśraya iti	vAcyaH ityAdO DAtoH tAdRSa viSezya tvam arTaH/ pratyayasya ASrayaH iti
   bodhyam/ nanvevaṃ sati vācya	boDyam/ nanu evam sati vAcya
   ityādivākyajanyaśābdabodhe āśrayatvarūpādhikapadārthabhānasya	ityAdi vAkya janya SAbda boDe ASraya tva rUpa aDika padArTa BAnasya
   vaktavyatayā gauravam/ evaṃ viśeṣyatāyāmicchāsambandhatayā	vaktavya tayA gOravam/ evam viSezyatAyAm icCA sambanDa tayA
   nirūpitatvasya niveśanīyatayāpi tathetyāśaṅkya kalpāntaramāha  	nirUpita tvasya niveSanIya tayA api taTA iti ASaFkya kalpa antaram Aha  
   [226] tādṛśeti/ tattatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhetyarthaḥ/ [226] taditi/	[226] tAdRSa iti/ tad tad pada janI aboDa vizaya tva nizWA iti arTaH/ [226] tat iti/
   īśvaretyarthaḥ/ evaṃ cātra kalpe	ISvara iti arTaH/ evam ca atra kalpe
   dhātorīśvarecchaivārthaḥ, pratyayasya	DAtoH ISvara icCA eva arTaH, pratyayasya
   padajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāvānārthaḥ,	pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpita viSezya tAvAn a arTaH,
   viśeṣyatāyāṃ ca nirūpitatvasambandhena icchānvaya iti bhāvaḥ [226] nāti	viSezyatAyAm ca nirUpita tva sambanDena icCA anvayaH iti BAvaH [226] na ati
   prasaṅga iti/ ghaṭādipadajanyabodhaviṣayatvādeḥ	prasaFgaH iti/ Gawa Adi pada janya boDa vizaya tva AdeH
   īśvarecchāyāṃ ghaṭādāveva bhānāt tadviṣayatayoreva	ISvara icCAyAm Gawa AdO= eva BAnAt tad vizaya tayoH eva
   nirūpyanirūpakabhāvasattvāditi bhāvaḥ/	nirUpya nirUpaka BAva sattvAt iti BAvaH/
   nanu gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa	nanu gaFgAyAm Goza
   ityādau gaṅgāpadāditaḥ tīrādibodhotpattyā tīrādigatasya	ityAdO gaFgA pada AditaH tIra Adi boDa utpattyA tIra Adi gatasya
   tādṛśabodhaviṣayatvāderapi īśvarecchayā viṣayīkaraṇamāvaśyakam/	tAdRSa boDa vizaya tva AdeH api ISvara icCayA vizayIkaraNam AvaSyakam/
   tasyāḥ vidyamānayāvaddharmaviṣayakatvaniyamāt/ tathā ca tīraṃ	tasyAH vidyamAnayAvat Darma vizayaka tva niyamAt/ taTA ca tIram
   gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayo bhavatvityākārakatvamapi tasyā astīti	gaFgA pada janya boDa vizayaH Bavatu iti AkAraka tvam api tasyAH asti iti
   prāguktarītyā lakṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgatādavasthyamityata āha   [226]	prAgukta rItyA lakzaNa ucCeda prasaFga tAdavasTyam iti atas Aha  [226]
   gaṅgāpadajanyatvasyeti/ gaṅgāpadajanyo bodhaḥ bodhaviṣayo	gaFgA pada janya tvasya iti/ gaFgA pada janyaH boDaH boDa vizayaH 
   bhavatu tīramityākārakatvameva īśvarecchāyāṃ svīkriyate, tāvataiva	Bavatu tIram iti AkAraka tvam eva ISvara icCAyAm svIkriyate, tAvatA eva
   tasyā uktaniyamopapatteḥ/ bodhaviṣayatātvarūpeṇa	tasyAH ukta niyama upapatteH/ boDa vizaya tA tva rUpeNa
   gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvāderapi tatra bhānasambhavādityarthaḥ/ [226]	gaFgA pada janya boDa vizaya tva AdeH api tatra BAna samBavAt iti arTaH/ [226]
   abhāveneti/ anyathā	aBAvena iti/ anyaTA
   viśiṣṭākārecchāviśakalitākārecchayoravailakṣaṇyaprasaṅgāditi	viSizwa AkAra icCA viSa kalita AkAret SayoH avElakzaNya prasaFgAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ [226] gaṅgāpadajanyatvaprakāratānirūpitetyādi/	BAvaH/ [226] gaFgA pada janya tva prakAra tAnirUpitA ityAdi/
   etena bodhaviṣayo bhavatu tīramityākārakatvasya	etena boDa vizayaH Bavatu tIram iti AkAraka tvasya
   tādṛśecchāyāmupagamāt/ bodhaviṣayatātvena	tAdRSa icCAyAm upagamAt/ boDa vizaya tA tvena
   gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpitatvaṃ tīraviśeṣyatāyā	gaFgA pada janya boDa vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpita tvam tIra viSezya tAyAH 
   apyakṣatamityatiprasaṅgatādavasthyamiti śaṅkā nirastā/	api akzatam iti atiprasaFga tAdavasTyam iti SaFkA nirastA/
   viśakalitecchīyaviśeṣyatāprakāratayoraikyāsambhavena	viSakalita icCIya viSezya tA prakAra tayoH EkyA samBavena

   lakṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgaḥ/ [206] svātantryeṇa bhānamiti/ vaiśiṣṭye tṛtīyā	lakzaNa ucCeda prasaFgaH/ [206] svAtantryeNa BAnam iti/ vESizwye tRtIyA

   cārthaviśeṣyatānirūpitaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpitabodhaprakāratānirūpitatvābhāvaḥ/	ca arTa viSezya tA nirUpita vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpita boDa prakAra tA nirUpita tva aBAvaH/
   padaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitajanyatvaprakāratānirūpitabodhaprakāratāni	pada nizWa prakAra tA nirUpita janya tva prakAra tA nirUpita boDa prakAratAni

   īśvarecchāyāṃ tīraṃ gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayo	ISvara icCAyAm tIram gaFgA pada janya boDa vizayaH 
   bhavatvityākārakatvamanabhyupagamya	Bavatu iti AkAraka tvam anaByupagamya

   śaṅkanīyam/ tathāsati abhrāntānāṃ ghaṭo ghaṭapadavācya iti	SaFkanIyam/ taTA asati aBrAntAnAm GawaH Gawa pada vAcyaH iti
   vyavahāraprasaṅgāt/ bādhakatarkābhāvaviśiṣṭasyaiva	vyavahAra prasaFgAt/ bADaka tarka aBAva viSizwasya eva

   tadasiddheḥ/ evaṃ ghaṭo ghaṭapadasya vācya ityādau pratyayārthe	tad asidDeH/ evam GawaH Gawa padasya vAcyaH ityAdO pratyaya arTe

   bodhaprakāratānirūpitaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpakatvaviśiṣṭecchārthaḥ/	boDa prakAra tA nirUpita vizaya tva prakAra tA nirUpaka tva viSizwa icCA arTaH/
   ṣaṣṭhyarthasya bodhaprakāratāyāṃ nirūpitatvasambandhenānvayaḥ/	zazWI arTasya boDa prakAra tAyAm nirUpita tva sambanDena anvayaH/

   viśeṣaṇāvacchinnanirūpitatvasambandhenānvayaḥ/ evaṃ prathamakalpo 'pi	viSezaNa avacCinna nirUpita tva sambanDena anvayaH/ evam praTama kalpaH api
   sādhureveti/ evaṃ	sADuH eva iti/ evam

   viśiṣṭaśaktisthāpanam	viSizwa Sakti sTApanam
   [230] viśiṣṭe śaktimityādi/	[230] viSizwe Saktim ityAdi/
   viśiṣṭaviśeṣyakaśaktiprakārakāprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditaniścayānukūlavyāpāraviṣayakecchāviśiṣṭaḥ	viSizwa viSezyaka Sakti prakArakA prAmANyajQA nAnAskandita niScaya AnukUla vyApAra vizaya ka icCA viSizwaH
   mīmāṃsakamataviṣayakajñānajanakaśabdapratiyogikadhvaṃsaviśiṣṭaḥ	mImAMsaka mata vizaya ka jQAna janaka Sabda pratiyogika DvaMsa viSizwaH
   mīmāṃsakamataviśeṣyakānupapannatvaprakārakajñānajanakaśabdaḥ	mImAMsaka mata viSezyaka anupapanna tva prakAraka jQAna janaka SabdaH
   tadanukūlakṛtimānityakhaṇḍabodhaḥ/ dvitīyaṃ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	tad anukUla kRtimAnitya KaNxa boDaH/ dvitIyam vESizwyam
   svapratiyogisamānākartṛkatvasvāśrayakālavṛttitvobhayasambandhena/	sva pratiyogi samAna AkartRka tva sva ASraya kAla vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena/
   sphuṭamanyat/ [230] arthāpattīti/ arthāpattiśca ānayanakarmatvasya	sPuwam anyat/ [230] arTApatti iti/ arTApattiH ca Anayana karma tvasya
   sākṣātsambandhena goniṣṭhatvamantarā	sAkzAt sambanDena gonizWa tvam antarA
   svāśrayavṛttitvarūpaparamparāsambandhena	sva ASraya vRtti tva rUpa paramparA sambanDena
   gotvavṛttitvamunapapannamityākārikā bodhyā/	go tva vRtti tva munapapannam iti AkArikA boDyA/
   nanu	nanu
   jātyāśrayavyaktāveva śaktisvīkāre gavādipadajanyaśābdabodhe	jAti ASraya vyaktO= eva Sakti svIkAre gavA Adi pada janya SAbda boDe
   gotvāditatsambandhayoḥ kathaṃ bhānasambhavaḥ/ āśakyasnapaya śābdabodhe	go tva Adi tad sambanDayoH kaTam BAna samBavaH/ ASakyasnapaya SAbda boDe
   bhānaṃ nāstīti niyamāt/ na ca tādṛśaniyame mānābhāva iti	BAnam na asti iti niyamAt/ na ca tAdRSa niyame mAna aBAvaH iti
   vācyam/ tathā sati gavādipadajanyaśābdabodhe ghaṭādīnāṃ	vAcyam/ taTA sati gavA Adi pada janya SAbda boDe Gawa AdInAm
   bodhāpatteḥ/ yattu   nīlo ghaṭa ityādau abhedasya evaṃ sati	boDa ApatteH/ yat tu  nIlaH GawaH ityAdO aBedasya evam sati
   śābdabodhe bhānaṃ na syāditi   tanna   padārthadvaya  	SAbda boDe BAnam na syAt iti  tat naH  padArTa dvaya  
   saṃsargātiriktasyeti viśeṣaṇādityāśaṅkya	saMsarga atiriktasya iti viSezaNAt ityASaFkya
   prācīnābhimatasamādhānamāha   [231]	prAcIna aBimata samADAnam Aha  [231]
   atredaṃ bodhyamityādinā/ navīnāstu	atra idam boDyam ityAdinA/ navInAstu

   śaktitadavacchedakatadavacchedakatāghaṭakasambandhatvānāmeva śābdabodhe	Sakti tad avacCedaka tad avacCedaka tA Gawaka sambanDa tvAnAm eva SAbda boDe
   bhānaniyāmakatvāṅgīkārāt/ evaṃ ca jātitadvaiśiṣṭyāyoḥ	BAna niyAmaka tva aFgIkArAt/ evam ca jAti tad vESizwyAyoH
   śaktirnābhyupeyeti vadanti/ tanmataṃ darśayati   navyāstviti/	SaktiH na aByupeya iti vadanti/ tat matam darSayati  navyAH tu iti/
   śaktigrahopāyapratipādanam	Sakti graha upAya pratipAdanam
   nanu	nanu
   apyekadantetyādikośādau ekadantādiśabdānāṃ	api ekadanta ityAdi koSa AdO eka danta Adi SabdAnAm
   dvandvasamāso 'nupapannaḥ/ samasyamānapadārthānāṃ mitho bhedasattva eva	dvandva samAsaH anupapannaH/ samasyamAna padArTAnAm miTas Beda sattvaH eva
   dvandvasya sādhutvādiha tadabhāvādityata āha   [234] tatreti/ [235]	dvandvasya sADu tvAt iha tad aBAvAt iti atas Aha  [234] tatra iti/ [235]
   vyavahārataḥ/ pravṛtterityarthaḥ/ [234] vṛddhavyavahāreṇeti dīpikāvākye	vyavahArataH/ pravRtteH iti arTaH/ [234] vRdDa vyavahAreNa iti dIpikA vAkye
   'pi vṛddhasya vyutpannasya	api vRdDasya vyutpannasya
   vyavahāreṇa pravṛttyetyarthaḥ/ nanu dīpikāstha [237] nanvityādivākye	vyavahAreNa pravRttyA iti arTaH/ nanu dIpikA sTa [237] nanu iti Adi vAkye

   rūḍhiśaktijñānajanyayogaśaktijñānājanyārthaviṣayakabodhajanakatve sati	rUXi Sakti jQAna janya yoga Sakti jQAna ajanya arTa vizaya ka boDa janaka tve sati

     vipratipattiniṣṭhavicāraprayojakatvaviṣaye [268] akṣatamiti	 vipratipatti nizWa vicAra prayojaka tva vizaye [268] akzatam iti

   [268] viruddhetyādi/ [268] kabaliteti/	[268] virudDa ityAdi/ [268] kabalitA iti/
   viṣayībhūtetyarthaḥ/	vizayIBUta iti arTaH/
   bodhaviśeṣaṇam/ [268] vicāra iti/ pravartaka iti śeṣaḥ/ [268] evaṃ ca  	boDa viSezaNam/ [268] vicAraH iti/ pravartakaH iti SezaH/ [268] evam ca  
   uktarītyā vicārapravṛttau ca/ [268] vicāropayogitvamiti/	ukta rItyA vicAra pravRttO ca/ [268] vicAra upayogi tvam iti/
   vipratipatterityādiḥ/ atra	vipratipatteH iti AdiH/ atra
   jñānaprāmāṇyamiti pakṣanirdeśaḥ/ ghaṭakatvaṃ saptamyarthaḥ	jQAna prAmANyam iti pakza nirdeSaH/ Gawaka tvam saptamI arTaH
   jñānapadānvitam/	jQAna pada anvitam/
   [239] tādṛśeti/ aprāmāṇyāgrāhakajñānagrāhakayāvatsāmagrījanyetyarthaḥ/	[239] tAdRSa iti/ aprAmANya agrAhaka jQAna grAhaka yA vat sAmagrI janyA iti arTaH/
   [269] atrauktamatatraye/ ghaṭakatvaṃ saptamyarthaḥ gurumatānvayi/ [269]	[269] atra Okta mata traye/ Gawaka tvam saptamI arTaH guru mata anvayi/ [269]
   taditi/ gurvityarthaḥ/ [269]	tat iti/ guru iti arTaH/ [269]
   evaṃ ca uktarītyā vyavasthāpane ca/ nanu	evam ca ukta rItyA vyavasTApane ca/ nanu
   tatprakārakabuddhau tadjñānasya kāraṇatvāt uktavyavasāyāt prāk	tad prakAraka budDO tad jQAnasya kAraNa tvAt ukta vyavasAyAt prAk 
   prāmāṇyānupasthiteḥ kathaṃ darśitavyavasāye prāmāṇyabhānasambhava ityata	prAmANya anupasTiteH kaTam darSita vyavasAye prAmANya BAna samBavaH iti ata
   āha     [239] viśiṣṭeti/ [239] viśeṣaṇeti/	Aha    [239] viSizwa iti/ [239] viSezaNa iti/
   tadrūpetyādiḥ/ yāvaditi sāmagrīviśeṣaṇam/ ata evāgre	tad rUpa ityAdiH/ yAvat iti sAmagrI viSezaNam/ atas eva agre
   jñānagrāhakayāvadityuktam/ pramitikaraṇatvarūpaprāmāṇyasya paraiḥ	jQAna grAhaka yAvat iti uktam/ pramiti karaNa tva rUpa prAmANyasya parEH
   svatogrāhyatvānupagamena tatra vicārāsambhavādāha [268] vastutastviti/	svatA ugrAhya tva anupagamena tatra vicAra asamBavAt Aha [268] vastutas tu iti/
   yattu   jñānapadena	yat tu  jQAna padena
   pramitikaraṇatvavyāvṛttiḥ na sambhavati/ parāmarśādeḥ	pramiti karaNa tva vyAvRttiH na samBavati/ parAmarSa AdeH
   pramitikaraṇatvāt ata āha   vastutastviti iti vyākhyānam  	pramiti karaNa tvAt atas Aha  vastutas tu iti iti vyAKyAnam  
   tadasat/ jñānasyaiva prāmāṇyamityavadhāraṇavivakṣā	tat asat/ jQAnasya eva prAmANyam iti avaDAraNa vivakzA
   pramitikaraṇatvasyendiyasādhāraṇasya vyāvṛttisambhavāt/ sarvaṃ	pramiti karaNa tvasya indiyasA DAraNasya vyAvRtti samBavAt/ sarvam
   vākyamiti nyāyena śabdenaiva tādṛśārthalābhāt/ nanu viśiṣṭa	vAkyam iti nyAyena Sabdena eva tAdRSa arTa lABAt/ nanu viSizwa
   yāvajjñānavyaktīnāṃ durgahatvāt tanniveśo na sambhavatītyata	yAvat jQAna vyaktInAm durgaha tvAt tat niveSaH na samBavati iti ata
   āha   [268] taddharmeti/ yāvatpadasya	Aha  [268] tad Darma iti/ yAvat padasya
   samabhivyāhṛtapadārthatāvacchedakavyāpakatvaparatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ [274]	samaBivyAhRta padArTa tAvacCedaka vyApaka tva paratvAt iti BAvaH/ [274]

   sāmānyarūpeṇa/	sAmAnya rUpeNa/

   jñānānvayini vaiśiṣṭye tasil/ anyathā ghaṭatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyasya	jQAna anvayini vESizwye tasil/ anyaTA Gawa tva Adi Gawita prAmANyasya
   ghaṭatvādiprakārakajñānagrāhakagrāhyatvābhāvena vidhau bādhāpatteḥ/ idaṃ	Gawa tva Adi prakAraka jQAna grAhaka grAhya tva aBAvena viDO bADApatteH/ idam
   jñānaṃ prameti	jQAnam pramA iti
   jñānena	jQAnena
   svātmakānuvyavasāyaniṣṭhaprāmāṇyagrahāt prāmāṇyāgrahāditi	sva Atmaka anuvyavasAya nizWa prAmANya grahAt prAmANya agrahAt iti
   dīpikāvākyamasaṅgatam ata āha   [274] vyavasāyaniṣṭhetyādiḥ/	dIpikA vAkyam asaFgatam atas Aha  [274] vyavasAya nizWa ityAdiH/

   iti strīliṅganirdeśa eva kārya ityata āha   [274] sāmānya iti/ tathā ca	iti strI liFga nirdeSaH eva kAryaH iti atas Aha  [274] sAmAnyaH iti/ taTA ca
   liṅgaviśeṣāvivakṣāyāṃ	liFga viSeza avivakzAyAm
   napuṃsakasyaiva nirdeṣṭavyatayā noktadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ/	napuMsakasya eva nirdezwavyatayA na ukta dozaH iti BAvaH/
   tasyāprāmāṇyamiti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣabhramavāraṇāya [274] saptamīti/ [274]	tasya aprAmANyam iti zazWI tatpuruza Brama vAraNAya [274] saptamIti/ [274]

   1svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	1su asamAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCeda ka tA sambanDena/

   svaviśiṣṭataddharmaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyatānatvasambandhena/	sva viSizwa tad Darma prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janyatAnatva sambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ svaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena/	sva vESizwyam sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena/
   1. atra sarvatra svaśabdaḥ	1. atra sarvatra sva SabdaH
   taddharmaghaṭitaprāmāṇyaparaḥ/ svaviśiṣṭetyasya	tad Darma Gawita prAmANya paraH/ sva viSizwa iti asya
   jñānagrāhakasāmagryāmanvayaḥ/	jQAna grAhaka sAmagryAm anvayaH/
   svāśrayaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitāprāmāṇyaniṣṭhaprakāratāśālijñānajanakatvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasaṃbandhena	sva ASraya nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitA prAmANI a nizWa prakAra tA SAli jQAna janaka tva saMbanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Beda vat 
   svaviśiṣṭā yā taddharmaprakārakajñānagrāhakasāmagrī	sva viSizwA yA tad Darma prakAraka jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI
   tajjanyajñānaniṣṭhabhedapratiyogitānirūpitā yā	tad janya jQAna nizWa Beda pratiyogitA nirUpitA yA
   svanirūpitaviṣayitāsaṃbandhāvacchinnāvacchedakatā	sva nirUpita vizayitA saMbanDa avacCinna avacCedaka tA
   tatsaṃbandhāvacchinnā yā svavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā tena	tad saMbanDa avacCinnA yA sva vRtti Beda pratiyogi tAvacCedaka tA tena
   saṃbandhena tādātmyasaṃbandhena ca kiñcidviśiṣṭaṃ	saMbanDena tAdAtmya saMbanDena ca kiQcid viSizwam
   taddharmaghaṭitaprāmāṇyamiti phalitam/ etatsamanvayaprakāraḥ	tad Darma Gawita prAmANyam iti Palitam/ etad samanvaya prakAraH
   ittham   svaṃ ghaṭatvavati ghaṭatvaprakārakatvarūpaṃ pramātvaṃ tadāśrayaḥ/	itTam    svam Gawatvavati Gawa tva prakAraka tva rUpam pramAtvam tad ASrayaH/
   ayaṃ ghaṭa iti pramā; tadviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānajanakatvaṃ athaṃ	ayam GawaH iti pramA; tad viSezyakA prAmANya prakAraka jQAna janaka tvam aTam
   ghaṭa iti jñānagrāhakasāmagryāṃ nāstīti sā sāmagrī	GawaH iti jQAna grAhaka sAmagryAm na asti iti sA sAmagrI
   svāśrayetyāditādṛśajanakatvasaṃbandhāvacchinnasva (pramātva)	sva ASraya iti AditAdRSa janakatva saMbanDa avacCinnasva (pramAtva)
   niṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavatī bhavati/	nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka BedavatI Bavati/
   atastādṛśabhedavacvasaṃbandhena svaviśiṣṭā yā uktasāmagrī tajjanyo yat	atas tAdRSa Beda vacu asaMbanDena sva viSizwA yA ukta sAmagrI tat janyaH yat 
   jñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ tanniṣṭho yo bhedaḥ	jQAnam Gawa jQAna vizayakam jQAnam tad nizWaH yaH BedaH
   svanirūpitaviṣayitāsaṃbandhena ghaṭatvaghaṭitapramātvavadbhedo na	sva nirUpita vizayitA saMbanDena Gawa tva Gawita pramAtva vat BedaH na
   bhavati, tena saṃbandhena tādṛśapramātvavattvāt; api tvanyabhedaḥ	Bavati, tena saMbanDena tAdRSa pramAtvavat tva at; api tu anya BedaH
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ ghaṭatvaghaṭitapramātve nāstīti	tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam Gawa tva Gawita pramAtve na asti iti
   tādṛśāvacchedakatāsaṃbandhena pramātvavadbhedaḥ tādṛśapramātvaniṣṭhaḥ	tAdRSa avacCeda katA saMbanDena pramAtva vat BedaH tAdRSa pramAtu a nizWaH
   tatpratiyogitāvacchedakatvaṃ ghaṭatvaghaṭitapramātve, tattādātmyaṃ ca	tad pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tvam Gawa tva Gawita pramAtve, tad tAdAtmyam ca
   tatreti saṃbandhadvayopapattiriti/ paścāttaneṣvanugameṣvapyevamūhyam/	tatra iti saMbanDa dvaya upapattiH iti/ paScAt tanezu anugamezu api evam Uhyam/

   bhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatā svanirūpitaviṣayitāsambandhena/ yadvā	Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tA sva nirUpita vizayitA sambanDena/ yat vA

   tenānantānāṃ	tena anantAnAm

   niruktakiñcidviśiṣṭatvaṃ na susādhamiti/ śaṅkate    [274] nanviti/	nirukta kiQci d viSizwa tvam na susADa miti/ SaFkate   [274] nanu iti/
   aprasiddhimupapādayati    [274] na hīti/ [264] ekam   ekajātīyam/ [274]	aprasidDim upapAdayati   [274] na hi iti/ [264] ekam  eka jAtIyam/ [274]
   na janyata ityanvayaḥ/ atra ca	na janyate iti anvayaH/ atra ca

   prathamopāttasyāgrāhakāntasyaiva prathamaṃ prayojanaṃ vaktavyamiti	praTama upAttasya AgrAhaka antasya eva praTamam prayojanam vaktavyam iti
   tadupekṣya	tad upekzya

   aprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagrīvāraṇam, tacca sāmagryāṃ yāvattvāpraveśe na	aprAmANya grAhaka sAmagrI vAraNam, tat ca sAmagryAm yAvat tva apraveSe na
   nirvahati/ prāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagīmādāya prāmāṇye svatastvasya	nirvahati/ prAmANya grAhaka sAmagIm AdAya prAmANye svatas tvasya
   sūpapādatvāt/ tatra tadviśeṣaṇasattve tu aprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryā api	sUpa pAda tvAt/ tatra tad viSezaNa sattve tu aprAmANya grAhaka sAmagryAH api

   prathamataḥ   agrāhakāntaprayojanakathanāt prāk/	praTamatas  agrAhaka anta prayojana kaTanAt prAk /
   sāmāgrīgatayāvattvaviśeṣaṇena vāraṇīyaṃ siddhasādhanamupapādayati  	sAma agrI ga tayAvat tva viSezaNena vAraNIyam sidDa sADanam upapAdayati  
   [273] naiyāyiketi/ yadyapiṃ vidhikoṭau yāvattvaviśeṣaṇasya	[273] nEyAyika iti/ yadi apim viDi kowO yAvat tva viSezaNasya
   siddhasādhanavāraṇaphalasambhave 'pi niṣedhakoṭau na tatsambhavaḥ/ tathāpi	sidDa sADana vAraNa Pala samBave api nizeDa kowO na tad samBavaH/ taTA api
   bādhavāraṇameva phalaṃ niṣedhakoṭau sambhavatītyāha   [274] naiyāyiketi/	bADa vAraNam eva Palam nizeDa kowO samBavati iti Aha  [274] nEyAyika iti/
   [274] vākyena cetyanena	[274] vAkyena ca iti anena
   anumānādītyādipadārtha uktaḥ/ [273]	anumAna Adi ityAdi padArTaH uktaH/ [273]
   idaṃ jñānamaprameti jñānena	idam jQAnam apramA iti jQAnena
   prāmāṇyāgrahādityatra tādṛśajñānaprayuktaprāmāṇyagrahābhāvādityarthaḥ	prAmANya agrahAt iti atra tAdRSa jQAna prayukta prAmANya graha aBAvAt iti arTaH
   yathāśruto labhyate/ sa ca prakṛtānupayuktaḥ, bādhasyaiva prakṛte	yaTA aSrutaH laByate/ sa ca prakRta anupayuktaH, bADasya eva prakRte
   vaktavyatvāt, ataḥ prāmāṇyāgrahādityasya	vaktavya tva at, atas prAmANya agraha Adityasya
   prāmāṇyāviṣayīkaraṇādityarthamāha   [274] prāmāṇyetyādi/ [274] tādṛśeti/	prAmANya avizayIkaraNAt iti arTam Aha  [274] prAmANya ityAdi/ [274] tAdRSa iti/
   idaṃ jñānamaprametyākāraketyarthaḥ/ [274] tayā uktajñānāsāmagryā/ [274]	idam jQAnam apramA ityAkAraka iti arTaH/ [274] tayA ukta jQAna asAm agryA/ [274]
   viśiṣṭeti/ avacchinnetyarthaḥ/ yadyapi	viSizwa iti/ avacCinnA iti arTaH/ yadi api
   idaṃ jñānamaprameti jñāne prāmāṇyaṃ pratiyogitayā viṣayaḥ tathāpi	idam jQAnam apramA iti jQAne prAmANyam pratiyogi tayA vizayaH taTA api
   jñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahīyapratiyogitāsambandhāvacchinnaviṣayatvaṃ	jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya grahIya pratiyogitA sambanDa avacCinna vizaya tvam
   svatogrāhyatvam, athavā	svatas grAhya tvam, aTavA
   svāśrayaniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitasvaniṣṭhaprakāratākatvasambandhena	sva ASraya nizWa viSezya tA nirUpita sva nizWa prakAra tAka tva sambanDena
   vyāpakatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti nāsaṅgatiḥ/ [280] svata eva gṛhyata iti/	vyApaka tvam vivakzitam iti na asaFgatiH/ [280] svatas eva gRhyate iti/
   idamatra cintyam atra evakāraḥ gṛhyata ityanantaraṃ yojanayā 'gṛhyata	idam atra cintyam  atra eva kAraH gRhyate iti anantaram yojanayA agRhyata
   eve'tyarthaḥ/ tathā cāyaṃ kriyāsaṅgata evakāraḥ nīlaṃ sarojaṃ	eve atyarTaH/ taTA ca ayam kriyA saFgataH eva kAraH nIlam sarojam
   bhavatyevetivat/ ato na virodha iti tasya	Bavati eva itivat/ atas na viroDaH iti tasya
   apyarthakatākathanamanupapannamiti/ idamatra bodhyam   sāmagryāṃ	api arTaka tAkaTanam anupapannamiti/ idam atra boDyam  sAmagryAm
   yāvattvapraveśe jñānaviśiṣṭatvaṃ sūkṣmānugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	yAvat tva praveSe jQAna viSizwa tvam sUkzma anugamaH/ vESizwyam
   viṣayatvasvavṛttibhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvobhayasambandhena/	vizaya tva sva vRtti Beda pratiyogita avacCedaka tva uBaya sambanDena/
   avacchedakatā svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatāsambandhena/	avacCedaka tA sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCeda ka tA sambanDena/
   svādhikaraṇatvādikaṃ pūrvavat/ [274] viśiṣya  	sva aDikaraNa tva Adikam pUrvavat/ [274] viSizya  
   tattatkāraṇakūṭatvena/ evamagre 'pi/ tādrūpyeṇetyatra jñāne	tad tad kAraNa kUwa tvena/ evam agre api/ tAdrUpyeNa iti atra jQAne
   yāvattvapraveśe bhedaviśiṣṭatvamiti sūkṣmānugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	yAvat tva praveSe Beda viSizwa tvam iti sUkzma anugamaH/ vESizwyam
   svapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasvāśrayatvobhayasambandhena/ avacchedakatvaṃ	sva pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sva ASraya tva uBaya sambanDena/ avacCedaka tvam
   svasamānādhikaraṇabhedapratiyogitāvacchedakatvasambandhāvacchinnam/	sva samAna aDikaraNa Beda pratiyogi ta avacCedaka tva sambanDa avacCinnam/
   svādhikaraṇatā svaviśiṣṭajñānagrāhakasāmagrījanyagrahatvasayambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa tA sva viSizwa jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI janya graha tva sayambanDena/
   svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	sva vESizwyam
   svāśrayaviśeṣyakāprāmāṇyaprakārakajñānajanakatvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena/	sva ASraya viSezyakA prAmANya prakAraka jQAna janaka tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva sambanDena/

   purovartinītyādidīpikāvākyasaṅgatirityata āha   [280] purovartinīti/ nanu	puras vartinI ityAdi dIpikA vAkya saFgatiH iti atas Aha  [280] purovartini iti/ nanu

   tannirasanaprakāro bodhya iti/ na ca tathāsati ghaṭaṃ jānāmītayādau	tad nirasana prakAraH boDyaH iti/ na ca taTA asati Gawam jAnAmItayA AdO

   karmatārūpatvāditi, tatra dvitīyānupapattiriti vācyam/	karma tA rUpatvAt iti, tatra dvitIya anupapattiH iti vAcyam/

   1. svādhikaraṇetyādi/	1. sva aDikaraNa ityAdi/
   svādhikaraṇavṛttitva  	sva aDikaraNa vRtti tva

     [292] koṭyoriti/ nanu ghaṭatvaviruddhapaṭatvavāniti jñāne 'pi	 [292] kowyoH iti/ nanu Gawa tva virudDa pawatvavAn iti jQAne api

   vahnimān dravyaṃ	vahnimAn dravyam

   svanirūpitaviśeṣyatāsamānādhikaraṇatvasthale	sva nirUpita viSezya tA samAna aDikaraNa tva sTale
   svanirūpitāviśeṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvaṃ	sva nirUpitA viSezya tAvacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tvam
   niveśya 2anyat pūrvavat bodhyamiti/ [293] digiti/	niveSya 2anyat pUrvavat boDya miti/ [293] diS iti/
   prakāratāviśiṣṭetyādi/ parvato vahnimān na veti saṃśaye vahniḥ	prakAra tA viSizwa ityAdi/ parvataH vahnimAn na vA iti saMSaye vahniH
   tadabhāvaśca prakāraḥ/ vahnitadabhāvayorvirodhaḥ saṃsargatayā bhāsate/	tad aBAvaH ca prakAraH/ vahni tadaBAvayoH viroDaH saMsarga tayA BAsate/
   vahniniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā parvataniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā anyā,	vahni nizWa prakAra tA nirUpitA parvata nizWA viSezyatA anyA,
   vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratanirūpitā pavataniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā anyā, iti	vahni aBAva nizWa prakArata nirUpitA pavata nizWAH viSezyatA anyA, iti
   sthitiḥ/ etāṃ manasikṛtya anugamasya samanvayo jñeyaḥ/ tathā hi   svaṃ	sTitiH/ etAm manasikRtya anugamasya samanvayaH jQeyaH/ taTA hi  svam
   vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā tannirūpakatvaṃ uktasaṃśayātmakajñāne, evaṃ svaṃ	vahni nizWa prakAra tA tad nirUpaka tvam ukta saMSaya Atmaka jQAne, evam svam
   vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā tadavacchinnā yā vahniniṣṭhā viṣayatā	vahni nizWa prakAra tA tad avacCinnA yA vahni nizWA vizaya tA
   (virodhaniṣṭhaviṣayatānirūpitaviṣayatā) tannirūpitāyā	(viroDa nizWa vizaya tA nirUpita vizaya tA) tad nirUpitAyAH 
   virodhaniṣṭhā viṣayatā tannirūpitaviṣayatā vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaviṣayatā	viroDa nizWA vizaya tA tad nirUpita vizaya tA vahni aBAva nizWa vizaya tA
   tadavacchinnatvaṃ vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ svaṃ vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā	tad avacCinna tvam vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tAyAm svam vahni nizWa prakAra tA
   tannirūpitā yā parvataniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā tatsamānādhikaraṇā yā	tad nirUpitA yA parvata nizWA viSezyatA tad samAna aDikaraNA yA
   viśeṣyatā parvataniṣṭhāṃ vahnyabhāvaprakāratā nirūpitā viśeṣyatā	viSezyatA parvata nizWAm vahni aBAva prakAra tA nirUpitA viSezyatA
   tannirūpitatvaṃ ca vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāmiti ubhayasaṃbandhena	tad nirUpita tvam ca vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tAyAm iti uBaya saMbanDena
   vahniniṣṭhaprakāratāviśiṣṭhā yā prakāratā vahnayabhāvaniṣṭhā	vahni nizWa prakAra tA viSizWA yA prakAratA vahnaya BAva nizWA
   tannirūpakatvaṃ ca parvato vahnimānna veti saṃśaye 'stīti/ atra	tad nirUpaka tvam ca parvataH vahnimAn na vA iti saMSaye asti iti/ atra
   vahniniṣṭhā virodhaniṣṭhasaṃsargatākhyaviṣayatānirūpitā viṣayatā	vahni nizWA viroDa nizWa saMsargatA AKya vizaya tA nirUpitA vizaya tA
   parvataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirūpitayā vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā avacchidyate,	parvata nizWa viSezya tA nirUpitayA vahni nizWa prakAra tA avacCidyate,
   vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhā yā parvataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatānirupitaprakāratā sa	vahni aBAva nizWA yA parvata nizWa viSezya tA nirupita prakAra tA sa
   virodhaniṣḍaṭhaviṣayatānirupitavahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaviṣayatayā avacchidyate,	viroDa nizxaWa vizaya tA nirupita vahni aBAva nizWa vizaya tayA avacCidyate,
   antarābhāsamānapadārthaniṣṭhaviṣayatayoravacchedyāvacchedakabhāva iti	antarABAsamAna padArTa nizWa vizaya tayoH avacCedyAvacCedaka BAvaH iti
   iti siddhantādityapi dhyeyam/	iti sidDantAt iti api Dyeyam/
   2. anyat pūrvavaditi/	2. anyat pUrvavat iti/
   tathā ca prakāratāviśiṣṭajñānatvaṃ saṃśayatvam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	taTA ca prakAra tA viSizwa jQAna tvam saMSaya tvam/ vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpakatva svāvacchinnviṣayatānirūpitavirodhaviṣayatānirūpitaviṣayatāvacchinnatva,	sva nirUpaka tva  sva avacCin= vizayatA nirUpita viroDa vizaya tA nirUpita vizaya tA avacCinna tva,
   svanirūpitaviśeṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvobhayasaṃbandhena	sva nirUpita viSezya tAvacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tva uBaya saMbanDena
   svaviśiṣṭaprakāratānirūpakatvobhayasaṃbandheneti bhāvaḥ/	sva viSizwa prakAra tA nirUpaka tva uBaya saMbanDena iti BAvaH/
   ayaṃ bhāvaḥ  yadyapi	ayam BAvaH yadi api
   pratyekaṃ dharmaṃyorekatvamasti tathāpi	pratyekam DarmaMyoH eka tvam asti taTA api
   1svāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatanniṣṭhaprakāratākatvasvāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatadabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratākatvobhayasambandhena	1sva avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tad nizWa prakAra tAka tva sva avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tadaBa ava nizWa prakAra tAka tva uBaya sambanDena
   dharmaviśiṣṭajñānatvaṃ, prakāratāviśiṣṭaprakāratāśālijñānatvaṃ vā	Darma viSizwa jQAna tvan, prakAra tA viSizwa prakAra tA SAli jQAna tvam vA
   saṃśayatvam/ dvitīye vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	saMSaya tvam/ dvitIye vESizwyam
   2svanirūpitaviśeṣyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvasvāvacchedakāvacchinnaviṣayatānirūpitavirodhaviṣayatānirūpitatvasvānavacchedakāvacchinnatvatritayasambandhena/	2svanirUpita viSezya tAvacCedaka avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tva sva avacCedaka avacCinna vizaya tA nirUpita viroDa vizaya tA nirUpita tva svAn avac
   ato na doṣa iti/ [293] tantrāntare   advaitaśāstre/ [293]	atas na dozaH iti/ [293] tantra antare  advEta SAstre/ [293]
   tatprakārakatvetyādi ityādināṃ	tad prakAraka tvA ityAdi ityAdinAm
   tadabhāvavanniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāniyapitatanniṣṭhaprakāratākatvaparigrahaḥ/	tad aBAva vat nizWa viSezya tA niyapita tad nizWa prakAra tAka tva parigrahaH/
   [293] saṅkṣepa iti/ ayamāśayaḥ    yadyapi idaṃ rajatam bhūtalaṃ	[293] saFkzepaH iti/ ayam ASayaH   yadi api idam rajatam BU talam
   ghaṭavata navetyādyāṃśikasaṃśaye 'vyāptirasti, tathāpi tadaṃśe	Gawavata nava iti Adya aMSika saMSaye avyAptiH asti, taTA api tad aMSe
   saṃśayānyatvaniveśāt na doṣaḥ/ tadaṃśe saṃśayatvaṃ caikasmin	saMSaya anyatva niveSAt na dozaH/ tad aMSe saMSaya tvam ca ekasmin
   dharmiṇi tattadabhāvobhayaprakāratakatvamiti/ [293] śākhādāvityādi/	DarmiNi tad tad aBAva uBaya prakArataka tvamiti/ [293] SAKA AdO= ityAdi/
   idamupalakṣaṇam   puruṣatvaniścayasyāhāryatvopapattaye	idam upalakzaNam  puruza tva niScayasya AhArya tva upapattaye
   puruṣatvaniścayo jāyatāmitīcchāyā vācyatvāt/ anyathā	puruza tva niScayaH jAyatAm iti icCAyA vAcya tva at/ anyaTA
   bādhakālīlanecchājanyajñānatvalakṣaṇasyāhāryatvasya tatrāsambhavāt/	bADaka AlIlana icCA janya jQAna tva lakzaNasya AhArya tvasya tatra asamBavAt/
   jñānecchayoḥ yugapadutpādamate tādṛśabhramadaśāyāmeva	jQAna icCayoH yugapad utpAda mate tAdRSa Brama daSAyAm eva
   icchādisambhavāditi dhyeyam/ [293] upayogitvam	icCA Adi samBavAt iti Dyeyam/ [293] upayogi tvam
   prayojakatvam/ [298] vedanīyamityādi ityādinā	prayojaka tvam/ [298] vedanIyam ityAdi ityAdinA
   pratikūlatayā vedanīyaṃ duḥkhamityasya saṅgrahaḥ/ [298] sukhādītyādinā	pratikUla tayA vedanIyam duHKam iti asya saFgrahaH/ [298] suKa Adi ityAdinA
   duḥkhaparigrahaḥ/ [298] avyāpteriti/	duHKa parigrahaH/ [298] avyApteH iti/
   idamupalakṣaṇam/ asādhūnāṃ paradravyopabhogādijanyanarakādidukhe	idam upalakzaNam/ asADUnAm para dravya upaBoga Adi janya naraka Adi duKe
   dveṣādarśanāt avyāpterityapi	dveza adarSanAt avyApteH iti api
   1. svāvacchinnetyādi/	1. sva avacCinna ityAdi/
   svaṃ parvatatvaṃ	svam parvata tvam
   tadavacchinnaviśeṣyatānirupitavahniniṣṭhaprakāratānirupakatvaṃ 'parvato	tad avacCinna viSezya tA nirupita vahni nizWa prakAra tA nirupaka tvam aparvataH 
   vahnimānnave'ti saṃśaye, evaṃ svaṃ pavatatvaṃ	vahnimAn nave ati saMSaye, evam svam pavata tvam
   tadavacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitavahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpakatvaṃ ca	tad avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tA nirUpaka tvam ca
   tādṛśayasaṃśaye iti samabanvayaḥ/	tAdRSayasaMSaye iti sama banvayaH/
   2. svanirūpitetyādi/	2. sva nirUpitA ityAdi/
   svaṃ vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā	svam vahni nizWa prakAra tA
   tannirūpitaparvataniṣṭhaviśeṣyatāvacchedakaṃparvatatvaṃ	tad nirUpita parvata nizWa viSezya tAvacCeda kaMparvata tvam
   tadavacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitatvaṃ vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ, evaṃ	tad avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita tvam vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tAyAn evam
   svaṃ vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā tadavacchedakaṃ vahnitvaṃ	svam vahni nizWa prakAra tA tad avacCedakam vahni tvam
   tadavacchinnaviṣayatānirūpitā yā virodhaniṣṭhaviṣayatā	tad avacCinna vizaya tA nirUpitA yA viroDa nizWa vizaya tA
   tannirūpitatvaṃ vahnyabhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ, evaṃ sva	tad nirUpita tvam vahni aBAva nizWa prakAra tAyAn evam sva 
   vahniniṣṭhaprakāratā svānavacchedakaṃvahnyabhāvatvaṃ tadavacchinnatvaṃ ca	vahni nizWa prakAra tA sva anavacCeda kaMvahni aBAva tvam tad avacCinna tvam ca
   vahnbhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāyām taccadālijñānatvaṃ saṃśaye 'stīti	vahnBa ava nizWa prakAra tAyAm tad cadAli jQAna tvam saMSaye asti iti
   samanvayaḥ/	samanvayaH/
   draṣṭavyam/ [298] sukhyahamityādītyādinā duḥkhyahamityasya saṅgrahaḥ/	drazwavyam/ [298] suKI aham iti Adi ityAdinA duHKI aham iti asya saFgrahaH/
   evamagre 'pi/	evam agre api/
   smṛtinirūpaṇam	smRti nirUpaNam
   anubhavajanyetyasya	anuBava janyA iti asya
   prayojanamāha   dīpikāyām [299]	prayojanam Aha  dIpikAyAm [299]
   ātmādāviti/ nanu	Atma AdO= iti/ nanu
   janyatvaniveśamātreṇātmakādivāraṇe 'nubhavetyaṃśo viphala	janya tu a niveSa mAtreNa Atmaka Adi vAraNe anuBava iti aMSaH viPala
   ityāśaṅkāyāṃ uktam   ādāviti/	iti ASaFkAyAm uktam  AdO= iti/
   ādipadenātmamanoyogaparigrahaḥ/ anubhavatvaṃ nāma	Adi padena Atma manaH yoga parigrahaH/ anuBava tvam nAma

   smṛtibhinnatvapraveśe gauravāt jñānatvamātreṇa lāghavāt	smRti Binna tva praveSe gOravAt jQAna tva mAtreNa lAGavAt 
   kāraṇatvamucitamityāśaṅkāyāmāha   prakāśikāyām/ [300] anubhavatvasyāpīti/	kAraNa tvam ucitam iti ASaFkAyAm Aha  prakASikAyAm/ [300] anuBava tu asya api iti/

   iveti dhyeyam/ [300] anyathāsiddhinirūpakatvāditi/	iva iti Dyeyam/ [300] anyaTA sidDi nirUpaka tvAt iti/

   [300] svajanyeti/ svaṃ saṃskāraḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ punaranubhavāntareṇa	[300] sva janyA iti/ svam saMskAraH/ evam agre api/ punar anuBava antareNa

   caramatvamatra	carama tvam atra

   svaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnatva svajanakasaṃskārajanyatva svasamānaviṣayakatvatritayasambandhena	sva prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna tva  sva janaka saMskAra janya tva  sva samAna vizaya ka tva tritaya sambanDena

   [303] pṛthivītvetyādi/	[303] pRTivI tva ityAdi/

   dravyavibhājakopādhiviśiṣṭāvṛttijātimadguṇattvamiti phalitam/ atra	dravya viBAjaka upADi viSizwa AvRtti jAtimat guNattvam iti Palitam/ atra

   svaviśiṣṭavṛttiguṇatvanyūnavṛttijātimattvasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	sva viSizwa vRtti guNa tva nyUna vRtti jAtimattva sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam
   svādhikaraṇavṛttintvasvabhinnadravyavibhājakopādhyadhikaraṇavṛttitvobhayasambandhena/	sva aDikaraNa vRttintu a sva Binna dravya viBAjaka upADi aDikaraNa vRtti tva uBaya sambanDena/
   [303] saṃkhyātvādessattvāditi/ saṅkhyātvādeḥ tādṛśadvitvādivṛtteḥ	[303] saMKyA tva AdeH sattvAt iti/ saFKyA tu AdeH tAdRSa dvi tva Adi vRtteH
   vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ/ [303] nīlatvādikamityādi/ yadyapi idānīṃ	vidyamAna tvAt iti arTaH/ [303] nIlatva Adikam ityAdi/ yadi api idAnIm
   rūpatvādikamādāyāpi lakṣaṇagamanasambhavaḥ/ tathāpi	rUpa tva Adikam AdAya api lakzaNa gamana samBavaH/ taTA api
   vakṣyamāṇapariṣkārānusaraṇena rūpatvādikamupekṣitam/ atra	vakzyamANa parizkAra anusaraNena rUpa tva Adikam upekzitam/ atra
   nyūnavṛttitvaviśeṣaṇaṃ	nyUna vRtti tva viSezaNam
   guṇatvādikamādāyāsambhavavāraṇāya/ [303] yadrūpavāvacchinnetyādi/	guNa tva Adikam AdAya asamBava vAraNa aya/ [303] yat rUpavA avacCinnA ityAdi/
   ayamarthaḥ    	ayam arTaH    
   dravyavibhājakopādhiviśiṣṭānyasthitasthāpakavṛttijātimadguṇatvaṃ	dravya viBAjaka upADi viSizwa anyasTita sTApaka vRtti jAti mat guNa tvam
   viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	viSeza guNa lakzaNam/ vESizwyam ca
   svādhikaraṇavṛttitāvacchedakatvasvabhinnadravyavibhājakopādhyadhikaraṇavṛttitāvacchedakatvobhayasaṃbandhena/	sva aDikaraNa vRtti tAvacCedaka tva sva Binna dravya viBAjaka upADi aDikaraNa vRtti tAvacCedaka tva uBaya saMbanDena/
   tena na bhedakūṭaniveśanibandhanagauravam/	tena na Beda kUwa niveSa nibanDana gOravam/
   tādṛśopādhidvayatvāvacchedena	tAdRSa upADi dvaya tva avacCedena
   sāmānādhikaraṇyānvayasvārasyavyāvartakakiñcitvaniveśakṛtānanugamaśca/	sAmAnADikaraNya anvayasva Arasya vyAvartaka kiQci tva niveSa kRtAn anugamaH ca/
   tādṛśayatkiñcidekabhedaniveśane ekatvatvādibhedamādāya	tAdRSayat kiQcid eka Beda niveSane ekatva tva Adi Bedam AdAya
   dvitvādāvatiprasaṅgaḥ/ evaṃ dravyatvādirūpopādhau saṅkhyārūpasya	dvi tva AdO= ati prasaFgaH/ evam dravya tva Adi rUpa upADO saFKyA rUpasya
   dvitvasyāsambhavāt apekṣādhīnaviṣayatvarūpasya tasya vācyatvena	dvi tvasya asamBavAt apekza aDIna vizaya tva rUpasya tasya vAcya tvena
   mahāgauravasya yattvatattvapraveśena lakṣaṇasya viśiṣṭaikārthantāvirahāt	mahA gOravasya yat tva tattva praveSena lakzaNasya viSizwa eka arTantA virahAt
   rūpaṃ viśeṣaguṇaityādau vākyabhedaprasaṅgasya ca nāvakāśa iti/	rUpam viSeza guNa etya AdO vAkya Beda prasaFgasya ca na avakASaH iti/
   [303] samavāyasaṃbandhaghaṭitasyaiveti/ nyathā	[303] samavAya saMbanDa Gawitasya eva iti/ nyaTA
   kālikādisambandhaghaṭitasāmānādhikaraṇyamādāyāsambhavāpatteḥ/ [304]	kAlikA Adi sambanDa Gawita sAmAnADikaraNyam AdAya asamBava ApatteH/ [304]
   na deyamiti/	na deyam iti/
   sthitasthāpakatvasya yadrūpapadena dhartumaśakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/	sTita sTApaka tvasya yad rUpa padena Dartum aSakyatvAt iti BAvaH/
   nanvanuṣṇāśītaḥ pṛthivīvāyvorityuktatvāt anuṣṇāśītatvasya	nanu anuzNASItaH pRTivI ivAyvoH iti ukta tvAt anuzNa aSIta tvasya
   yadrūpapadena dhartuṃ śakyatayā anuṣṇāśītasparśe 'vyāptirityatrāha    	yad rUpa padena Dartum Sakya tayA anuzNa aSIta sparSe avyAptiH iti atra Aha    
   [304] pārthiveti/ tathā ca tatrāpi vaijātyaviśeṣamādāya	[304] pArTiva iti/ taTA ca tatra api vEjAtya viSezam AdAya
   lakṣaṇagamanamiti bhāvaḥ/ [304] tatra    saṅkhyādiṣu/ evamagre 'pi/ [304]	lakzaNa gamanam iti BAvaH/ [304] tatra   saFKI A Adizu/ evam agre api/ [304]
   tādṛśeti/ uktobhāyasambandhena	tAdRSa iti/ ukta uBAya sambanDena

   yattu kenaciduktam  	yat tu kenacid uktam  
   tādṛśajātimattve sati guṇatvameva lakṣaṇamāstām, kiṃ	tAdRSa jAtimat tve sati guNa tvam eva lakzaNam AstAm, kim

   sāmānyalakṣaṇe	sAmAnya lakzaNe

   saṅkhyārūpam ata ekamātravṛttidharmaḥ/ nādyaḥ, guṇādau guṇādyanupagamena	saFKyA rUpam atas eka mAtra vRtti DarmaH/ na AdyaH, guNa AdO guNa Adi anupagamena
   guṇatvādau lakṣaṇagamena'pi dravyatvādāvavyāpteḥ/ nottaraḥ;	guNa tva AdO lakzaNa gamena api dravya tva AdO= avyApteH/ na uttaraH;
   tādṛśadharmaspaya kevalānvayitayā	tAdRSa Darmaspaya kevala anvayitayA
   tadavacchinnapratiyogitākabhedāprasiddheḥ/ maivam     yato 'tra	tad avacCinna pratiyogi tAka Beda aprasidDeH/ mA evam    yatas atra
   prameyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ bhedaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā anekasamavetatvam/ prathame	prameya viSizwa tvam Beda viSizwa tvam vA aneka samaveta tvam/ praTame
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ svasamavetatvasvabhinnasamavetatvobhayasambandhena/ dvitīye	vESizwyam sva samaveta tva sva Binna samavetatva uBaya sambanDena/ dvitIye
   svapratiyogisamavetatvasvānuyogisamavetatvobhayasambandhena/ ato na	sva pratiyogi samaveta tva sva anuyogi samavetatva uBaya sambanDena/ atas na
   doṣa iti/	dozaH iti/
   viśeṣanirūpaṇam	viSeza nirUpaNam
   [309] parasparamiti/ parasparatvaṃ ca	[309] parasparam iti/ paraspara tvam ca

   sphuṭīkṛtam/ [309] na ca sugrahamityanvayaḥ/ atra ca prāguktarītyā	sPuwIkRtam/ [309] na ca sugraham iti anvayaH/ atra ca prAgukta rItyA

   parasparamityatrāpi pūrvavadeva bodhyam/ [309] tatrāpi   viśeṣe 'ti	parasparam iti atra api pUrvavat eva boDyam/ [309] tatra api  viSeze ati
   nānavastheti/ atra vaktavyam prāgreva prapañcitam/	na anavasTA iti/ atra vaktavyam prAgreva prapaQcitam/
   samavāyanirūpaṇam	samavAya nirUpaNam
   [310] nīlo ghaṭa iti viśaṣṭapratītirityādi/	[310] nIlaH GawaH iti viSazwa pratItiH ityAdi/
   ayamatrānumānapariṣkāraḥ    	ayamatra anumAna parizkAraH    
   ghaṭādiviśeṣyatānirūpitanīlarūpādiprakāratā	Gawa Adi viSezya tA nirUpita nIla rUpa Adi prakAra tA
   kiñcinniṣṭhasaṃsargatānirūpikā prakāratātvāt	kiQcid nizWa saMsarga tA nirUpikA prakAra tAtvAt 
   saṃyoganiṣṭhasaṃsargatānirūpakadaṇḍādiviśeṣyatānirūpitadaṇḍādiprakāratāvaditi	saMyoga nizWa saMsarga tA nirUpaka daNxa Adi viSezya tA nirUpita daNxa Adi prakAra tAvat iti
   rītyā bodhyaḥ/ atra saṃyogādeḥ bādhaniścayasahāyabalāt	rItyA boDyaH/ atra saMyoga AdeH bADa niScaya sahAya balAt

   saṃbandhaḥ samavāyaśabdita iti dhyeyam/ nanu samavāyasadbhāve	saMbanDaH samavAya SabditaH iti Dyeyam/ nanu samavAya sadBAve
   nīlo ghaṭa ityādipratyakṣameva pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti	nIlaH GawaH ityAdi pratyakzam eva pramANam Bavizyati iti
   anumānaparyanatānudhāvanavaiphalyamityata āha   [311] vaiśeṣiketyādi/	anumAna paryanata anuDAvana vEPalyam iti atas Aha  [311] vESezika ityAdi/

   durnirūpatvāt/ nāpi	durnirUpa tvAt/ na api

   ekamaparāśritamevāvatiṣṭhate tattvamayutasiddhatvamiti vācyam/	ekam apara ASritam eva avatizWate tattvam ayuta sidDa tvam iti vAcyam/

   atra kecit   dvitvaviśiṣṭadvitvamevāyutasiddham/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	atra kecid  dvi tva viSizwa dvi tvam eva ayuta sidDam/ vESizwyam

   svaviśiṣṭavṛttitvasambandhena/ svavaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	sva viSizwa vRtti tva sambanDena/ sva vESizwyam ca

   ca svaniṣṭhapratiyogitākātyantābhāvavattvasambandhena/ pratiyogitā	ca sva nizWa pratiyogitAkA atyanta aBAvavat tva sambanDena/ pratiyogitA
   cādheyatāsambandhāvacchinnā ghaṭakapālādigatadvitvasya svapadenopādāne	ca ADeya tA sambanDa avacCinnA Gawa kapAla Adi gata dvi tvasya sva padena upAdAne
   tadāśrayībhūtakapālādivyaktīnāmādheyatāsambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhapratiyogitākātyantābhāvavattvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvasambandhena/	tad ASrayIBUta kapAla Adi vyaktInAm ADeya tA sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWa pratiyogitAkA atyanta aBAvavat tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCeda ka tAka
   kapāladiviśiṣṭaghaṭādau vṛttitvasya tādātmyasya coktadvitve sattvāt	kapAla di viSizwa Gawa AdO vRtti tvasya tAdAtmyasya ca ukta dvi tve sattvAt 
   lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/	lakzaNa samanvayaH/

   yogitākatvobhayasambandhena/	yogi tAka tva uBaya sambanDena/

   vadanti/	vadanti/
   tanna kālikādisambandhamādāyātiprasaṅgavyudāsāya	tat na kAlika Adi sambanDam AdAya ati prasaFga vyudAsAya
   samavāyasambandhena tasya pravṛttinimittatāyā vācyatvena prācīnamate	samavAya sambanDena tasya pravRtti nimitta tAyAH vAcya tvena prAcInamate
   avayavāvayavināvayutasiddhāvityādivākyasya nirākāṅkṣatāpatteḥ/	avayava a= ayavinO= ayuta sidDO= iti Adi vAkyasya nirAkAFkzata ApatteH/

   apekṣādhīviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpatve ca apekṣābuddheḥ	apekzA DI vi Seza vizaya tva rUpa tve ca apekzA budDeH
   viṣayaviśeṣaniyantritatayā ananugamāpatteḥ/	vizaya viSeza niyantrita tayA ananugamApatteH/
   svāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaikatvaprakāratākatvasvabhinnadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaikatvaprakāratākatvobhayasambandhena	sva avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita eka tva prakAra tAka tva sva Binna Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita eka tva prakAra tAka tva uBaya sambanDena
   dharmaviśiṣṭabuddhitvenānugame ca	Darma viSizwa budDi tvena anugame ca
   svāśrayadharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaikatvaprakāratākatvasvapratiyogidharmāvacchinnaviśeṣyatānirūpitaikatvaprakāratākatvobhayasambandhena	sva ASraya Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita eka tva prakAra tAka tva su a pratiyogi Darma avacCinna viSezya tA nirUpita eka tva prakAra tAka tva uBaya samba
   bhedaviśiṣṭabuddhitvādinā anugamamādāya vinigamanāvirahāpattyā	Beda viSizwa budDi tva AdinA anugamam AdAya vinigamanA viraha ApattyA
   ayutasiddhapadārthatāvacchedakanānātvāpatteḥ/ tanniṣkarṣastu	ayuta sidDa padArTa tAvacCedaka nAnAtva ApatteH/ tad nizkarzaH tu
   asmābhiranyatra prapañcitaḥ/	asmABiH anyatra prapaQcitaH/
   abhāvanirūpaṇam	aBAva nirUpaNam

   dhvaṃsādivāraṇe nityatvaviśeṣaṇavaitharthyamityatrāha   [313]	DvaMsa Adi vAraNe nitya tva viSezaNa vETarTyam iti atra Aha  [313]
   dhvaṃsetyādi/ siddhānṛte dhvaṃsādipratiyogitāyāḥ	DvaMsa ityAdi/ sidDa anRte DvaMsa Adi pratiyogitAyAH
   saṃbandhāvacchinnatvānaṅgīkartṛnavyamate granthāntaroktaṃ manasi	saMbanDa avacCinna tva anaFgIkartR navya mate granTa antara uktam manasi
   nidhāyāha    [314] saṅkṣepa iti/ [314] dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorityādi/	niDAya Aha   [314] saFkzepaH iti/ [314] DvaMsa prAgaBAvayoH ityAdi/
   dhvaṃsaprāgabhāvayorekapratiyogikayorapi ekarūpatvameva/ tadvadiha	DvaMsa prAgaBAvayoH eka pratiyogikayoH api eka rUpa tvam eva/ tadvat iha
   netyarthaḥ/ dīpikāyām [313] pratiyogitāvacchedakāropyetyādi/	na iti arTaH/ dIpikAyAm [313] pratiyogita avacCedaka Aropya ityAdi/
   pratiyogitāvacchedakaśca āropyasaṃsargaśca tayorbhedāt ityarthaḥ/	pratiyogi ta avacCedakaH ca Aropya saMsargaH ca tayoH BedAt iti arTaH/
   āropyaṃ ca pratiyogyāropaviṣayatvam/ abhāvabuddhau	Aropyam ca pratiyogi Ara upavizaya tvam/ aBAva budDO
   pratiyogyāropahetutāyāḥ navīnairanabhyupagamādāha  	pratiyogyAropa hetutAyAH navInEH anaByupagamAt Aha  
   prakāśikāyām [314] āropyetīti/ nanvanyonyābhāvabhede	prakASikAyAm [314] Aropya iti iti/ nanu anyonya aBAva Bede
   pratiyogitāvacchedakasaṃsargabhedo na niyāmakaḥ, anyonyābhāvasya	pratiyogi ta avacCedaka saMsarga BedaH na niyAmakaH, anyonya aBAvasya
   tādātmyasambandhāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvaniyamāt/ atra [314]	tAdAtmya sambanDa avacCinna pratiyogi tAka tva niyamAt/ atra [314]
   yathāyogamiti [314] avacchedakabhedādatirikta ityanvayaḥ [322]	yaTAyogam iti [314] avacCedaka BedAt atiriktaH iti anvayaH [322]
   prasaṅgāditi/ svavṛttyabhāvatvavattvamatra prasaṅgaḥ/ [322]	prasaFgAt iti/ sva vRtti aBAva tvavat tvam atra prasaFgaH/ [322]
   tacchabdollikhiteti/ tacchabdajanyabodhasamānārthaketyarthaḥ/ [322]	tad Sabda ulliKitA iti/ tad Sabda janya boDa samAna arTaka iti arTaH/ [322]
   svātantryeṇa pratiyogini abhāsamānatayā/	svAtantryeNa pratiyogini aBAsamAna tayA/
   ṣoḍaśapadārthānāṃ	zoxaSa padArTAnAm
   saptapadārtheṣvantarbhāvaḥ	sapta padArTezu antarBAvaH
   pramāṇaprameyetyādisūtre prathamataḥ kathitasya	pramANa prameya ityAdi sUtre praTamatas kaTitasya
   kḷpte yatra kutracidantarbhāvamanumuktvā dvitīyata uktasya prameyasya	k?pte yatra kutracid antar BAvam anumuktvA dvitIyataH uktasya prameyasya
   dvādaśavidhasya yathāyathaṃ kḷptāntarbhāvakathanamanupapannamityatrāha 	dvAdaSaviDasya yaTAyaTam k?pta antar BAva kaTanam anupapannam iti atra Aha 
   [331] pratyakṣeti/ cakṣurādīndriyarūpasyetpayādiḥ/	[331] pratyakza iti/ cakzuH Adi indriya rUpasyet paya AdiH/
   [331] anumānādīnāmiti ādinopamānaśabdayoḥ	[331] anumAna AdInAm iti Adina upamAna SabdayoH
   saṅgrahaḥ/ [331] dravya iti antarbhāva ityanena sambandhaḥ/	saFgrahaH/ [331] dravyaH iti antarBAvaH iti anena sambanDaH/
   [331] evamagre 'pīti/ pravṛttidoṣādirūpe prameye 'pītyarthaḥ/ nanu	[331] evam agre api iti/ pravRtti doza Adi rUpe prameye api iti arTaH/ nanu
   prayatnaviśeṣaḥ pravṛttiriti tasyāḥ	prayatna viSezaH pravRttiH iti tasyAH
   dharmādharmarūpatvakathanamanupapannamityata āha   [331] taditi/	Darma aDarma rUpa tva kaTanam anupapannam iti atas Aha  [331] tat iti/
   dharmādharmetyarthaḥ/ svoktārthe pūrvagranthasammatimāha  	Darma aDarmA iti arTaH/ sva ukta arTe pUrva granTa sammatim Aha  
   [331] etacceti/ dharmādharmāvityasya tajjaniketyarthakathanaṃ cetyarthaḥ/	[331] etat ca iti/ Darma aDarmO= iti asya tad janikA iti arTa kaTanam ca iti arTaH/
   [331] ākāre bhāṣye/	[331] AkAre BAzye/
   nanu pretyabhāvo	nanu pretyaBAvaH 
   maraṇamiti dīpikāvākyamasaṅgatam/ propasṛṣṭaiṇ dhātumātreṇa	maraNam iti dIpikA vAkyam asaFgatam/ propasRzwEN DAtu mAtreNa
   maraṇabodhatanāt pretyabhāvaśabdaghaṭakasya lyapaḥ bhāvaśabdasya	maraNa boDatanAt pretyaBAva Sabda Gawakasya lyapaH BAva Sabdasya
   cārthākathanāt pretyabhāva iti samudāyasya	ca arTa akaTanAt pretyaBAvaH iti samudAyasya
   maraṇarūpārthābodhakatvāccetyatrāha   [331] maraṇānantareti/	maraNa rUpa arTa AboDaka tvAt ca iti atra Aha  [331] maraNa anantarA iti/
   anantaratvaṃ uttarakālikatvam/ uktārthasya	anantara tvam uttarakAlika tvam/ ukta arTasya
   pretyabhāvaśabdavyutpattyanuguṇyaṃ darśayati   [331] tathāceti/	pretyaBAva Sabda vyutpatti anuguNyam darSayati  [331] taTA ceti/
   pretyabhāvaśabdasyoktārthaparatve cetyarthaḥ/	pretyaBAva Sabdasya ukta arTa paratve ca iti arTaH/
   maraṇajananaśabdārthau krameṇa darśayati   [331] carametyādinā/ carameti	maraNa janana Sabda arTO krameNa darSayati  [331] carama ityAdinA/ carama iti
   saṃyogaviśeṣaṇam/ evamagre 'pi/ [331] ādyeti	saMyoga viSezaNam/ evam agre api/ [331] AdyA iti
   saṃyogaviśeṣaṇam/ caramatvaṃ	saMyoga viSezaNam/ carama tvam
   svasamānādhikaraṇatādṛśasaṃyogaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnatvam/ yadyapi	sva samAna aDikaraNa tAdRSa saMyoga prAgaBAva asamAna kAlIna tvam/ yadi api
   atrānuyogini svatvapraveśe	atra anuyogini sva tva praveSe
   svasamānādhikaraṇatādṛśaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnabhinnaṃ yattattvaṃ	sva samAna aDikaraNa tA dRSa prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna Binnam yat tat tvam
   caramatvamiti caramasaṃyogavyaktīnāmānantyādananugamaḥ/ pratiyogini	carama tvam iti carama saMyoga vyaktInAm AnantyAt ananugamaH/ pratiyogini
   svatvapraveśe ca	sva tva praveSe ca
   svāsamānādhikaraṇatādṛśasaṃyogaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnaṃ yat	sva asamAna aDikaraNa tAdRSa saMyoga prAgaBAva samAna kAlInam yat 
   tādṛśaikavyaktibhedapreveśe idānīntanasyāpi	tAdRSa eka vyakti Beda preveSe idAnIntanasya api
   tādṛśasaṃyogasyoktacaramatvaṃ syāditi tasya dhvaṃsamādāyedānīmapi	tAdRSa saMyogasya ukta caramatvam syAt iti tasya DvaMsam AdAya idAnIm api
   maraṇāpattiḥ/ tādṛśaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnaṃ yadyat	maraNa ApattiH/ tAdRSa prAgaBAva samAna kAlInam yat yat
   tattadvyaktibhedakūṭaniveśe ca caramatvasya yattvatattvaghaṭitatvena	tad tad vyakti Beda kUwa niveSe ca caramatvasya yattva tattva Gawita tvena
   viśiṣṭaikārtharūpatābhaṅgaḥ/ viśiṣya	viSizwa eka arTa rUpa tA BaFgaH/ viSizya
   tattadvyaktīnāmasarvajñadurvijñeyatāprasaṅgaḥ/	tad tad vyaktInAm asarvajQa durvijQeya tA prasaFgaH/
   kūṭatvasyaikaviśiṣṭāparatvarūpatvena svatvapraveśe prameyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ	kUwa tvasya eka viSizwa aparatva rUpa tvena sva tva praveSe prameya viSizwa tvam
   caramatvamiti sthūlo 'nugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	carama tvam iti sTUlaH anugamaH/ vESizwyam ca
   tādātmyasvasamānādhikaraṇatādṛśasaṃyogaprāgabhāvasamānakālīnatvasambandhāvacchinnasvaniṣṭhāvacchedakatākapratiyogitākabhedavattvobhayasambandhena	tAdAtmya sva samAna aDikaraNa tAdRSa saMyoga prAgaBAva samAna kAlIna tva sambanDa avacCinna sva nizWA avacCedaka tAka pratiyogi tAka Bedavat tva uBayaH 
   bhedaviśiṣṭatvamiti sūkṣmo 'nugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	Beda viSizwa tvam iti sUkzmaH anugamaH/ vESizwyam
   svāśrayatvasvapratiyogitāvacchedakatvobhayasambandhena/ avacchedakatvaṃ	sva ASraya tva svapratiyogita avacCedaka tva uBaya sambanDena/ avacCedaka tvam
   svasamānādhikaraṇatādṛśasaṃyogaprāgabhāvasamānakālīlanatvasambandhena/	sva samAna aDikaraNa tAdRSa saMyoga prAgaBAva samAna kAlI lana tva sambanDena/
   pratiyogini svatvapraveśe ca tādṛśasaṃyogaprāgabhāvaviśiṣṭānyatvaṃ	pratiyogini sva tva praveSe ca tAdRSa saMyoga prAc aBAva viSizwa anyatvam
   caramatvam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	carama tvam/ vESizwyam
   svasamānakālikatvasvasāmānādhikaraṇyobhayasambandhena,	sva samAna kAlika tva svasA mAnADi karaNyA uBaya sambanDena,
   ekakṣaṇāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena vā/ tacca	eka kzaNa avacCinna sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena vA/ tat ca
   svaniṣṭhasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnādheyatāviśiṣṭasamavāyāvacchinnādheyatārūpam/	sva nizWa svarUpa sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA viSizwa samavAya avacCinna ADeya tA rUpam/
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca	vESizwyam ca
   svanirūpakanirūpitatvasvāvacchedakakṣaṇāvacchinnatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpaka nirUpita tva sva avacCeda kakzaNa avacCinna tva uBaya sambanDena/
   ādyatvaṃ ca svasamānādhikaraṇatādṛśasaṃyodhvaṃsāsamānākālikatvam/	Adya tvam ca sva samAna aDikaraNa tAdRSa saMyoDvaMsa asamAnAkAlika tvam/
   atrāpi, prameyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ bhedaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā	atra api, prameya viSizwa tvam Beda viSizwa tvam vA
   tādṛśasaṃyogadhvaṃsaviśiṣṭānyatvaṃ vā prāgabhāvasthale dhvaṃsaṃ niveśya	tAdRSa saMyoga DvaMsa viSizwa anya tvam vA prAc aBAva sTale DvaMsam niveSya
   nirvācyam/ anyat pūrvaṃvat/ dīpikāyām [331] sa	nirvAcyam/ anyat pUrvaMvat/ dIpikAyAm [331] sa
   ca mokṣaśca/ yadyapi caramaṃ yadduḥkhaṃ taddhvaṃso mokṣa ityanyatra	ca mokzaH ca/ yadi api caramam yat duHKam tat DvaMsaH mokzaH iti anyatra
   pratipāditam, tathāpi duḥkhaviśeṣaṇena kālīnāntena caramapadārtha	pratipAditam, taTA api duHKa viSezaNena kAlIna antena carama padArTa
   eva vivṛta iti na virodhaḥ/ anugamastu pūrvavadeva bodhyaḥ/	eva vivRtaH iti na viroDaH/ anugamaH tu pUrvavat eva boDyaH/
   prāguktasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	prAk ukta sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   duḥkhaprāgabhāvaviśiṣṭānyatvādirūpaḥ/ atra ca	duHKa prAc aBAva viSizwa anyatva Adi rUpaH/ atra ca
   svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhaprāgabhāvāsamānakālīnaḥ yaḥ kaścana padārthaḥ	sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa prAgaBAva asamAna kAlInaH yaH kaScana padArTaH
   taddhvaṃso mokṣa iti tatra dhvaṃsapratiyogitayā	tad DvaMsaH mokzaH iti tatra DvaMsa pratiyogi tayA
   duḥkhāṃśopādānavaiyarthyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tadupādānasya	duHKa aMSa upAdAna vEyarTyam iti ASaFkAyAm tad upAdAnasya
   prayojanamāha   prakāśikāyām [331] muktātmeti/ atra ca	prayojanam Aha  prakASikAyAm [331] mukta AtmA iti/ atra ca
   prāgabhāvāṃśamanupādāya svasamānādhikaraṇaduḥkhāsamānakālīnatvam	prAc aBAva aMSam anupAdAya sva samAna aDikaraNa duHKa asamAna kAlIna tvam
   ekakṣaṇāvacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	eka kzaNa avacCinna sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   duḥkhaviśiṣṭānyatvādirūpameva caramatvaṃ suvacam/ na ca tasya	duHKa viSizwa anyatva Adi rUpam eva carama tvam su vacam/ na ca tasya
   duḥkhaviśeṣaṇatve 'prasiddhiḥ/ idānīṃ tasya	duHKa viSezaNa tve aprasidDiH/ idAnIm tasya
   dhvaṃsaviśeṣaṇatvopagamāt/ na ca tathā sati suṣuptidaśāyāṃ	DvaMsa viSezaNa tva upaga mAt/ na ca taTA sati suzupti daSAyAm
   asmadādīnāmapi muktatvaprasaṅgaḥ/ tadānīmasmadādyātmani	asmad AdInAm api mukta tva prasaFgaH/ tadAnIm asmad Adi Atmani
   duḥkhavirahāt, tadātanasya duḥkhadhvaṃsasya	duHKa virahAt, tadAtanasya duHKa DvaMsasya
   niruktaviśeṣaṇakrāntatvāditi śaṅkyam/ suṣuptikālīnasya	nirukta viSezaNa krAnta tvAt iti SaFkyam/ suzupti kAlInasya
   tādṛśaduḥkhadhvaṃsasya	tAdRSa duHKa DvaMsasya
   suṣuptyuttarakālikaduḥkhasamānakālīnatvenādoṣatvādityāśaṅkate  	suzupti uttara kAlika duHKa samAna kAlIna tvena adoza tvAt iti ASaFkate  
   [331] na ceti/ [331] agrimeti/ [331] suṣuptītyādiḥ/	[331] na ceti/ [331] agrimeti/ [331] suzupti ityAdiH/

   prāgabhāvānupagame uktarītyā tādṛśaduḥkhāsamānakālīnatvaghaṭita	prAc aBAva anupagame ukta rItyA tAdRSa duHKa asamAna kAlIna tva Gawita
   evādaraṇīyaḥ/ evaṃ pakṣatāgranthoktarītyā	eva AdaraNIyaH/ evam pakza tA granTa ukta rItyA

   saṃśayasyeti/ ubhayasādhanavatītyasya prayojanamāha    [335] idaṃ ceti/	saMSayasya iti/ uBaya sADanavati iti asya prayojanam Aha   [335] idam ca iti/

   nānāvaktṛtvoktirayuktāpūrvapakṣavākyasya uttaravākyasya vaikasya	nAnA vaktR tva uktiH ayuktA pUrva pakza vAkyasya uttara vAkyasya vA ekasya
   nānāvaktṛkatvavirahādityata āha   [335] ekeneti/ chalaṃ udāharati	nAnA vaktRka tva virahAt iti atas Aha  [335] ekena iti/ Calam udAharati
     [336] yatheti/ [336] itīti/ uktaśabdasyetayarthaḥ/ [336] arthāntaram  	 [336] yaTA iti/ [336] iti iti/ ukta Sabdasya itayarTaH/ [336] arTa antaram  
   nūtanārūpārthāntiriktamartham/ [336] na santītyanvayaḥ/ iti	nUtanA rUpArTa antiriktam arTam/ [336] na santi iti anvayaH/ iti
   dūṣayatītyanvayaḥ/ [336] svāsādhakatāsādhāraṇyeneti/	dUzayati iti anvayaH/ [336] sva asADaka tA sADa araNyena iti/
   sādhāraṇyamādheyatvam/ vaiśiṣṭye tṛtīyā/ tasya	sADAraNyam ADeya tvam/ vESizwye tRtIyA/ tasya
   parāsādhakatāsādhakatayetyatra samāsaghaṭakaṣaṣṭyarthanirūpakatve 'nvayaḥ/	parAsADaka tA sADaka tayA iti atra samAsa Gawaka zazwi arTa nirUpaka tve anvayaH/

   svam dūṣaṇavaktā/ paraḥ anumānavaktā/ [336] svavyāghātakatvāditi/	svam dUzaNa vaktA/ paraH anumAna vaktA/ [336] sva vyAGAtaka tvAt iti/
   asattvānvayini prayojyatve pañcamī/ [336] tathā ca uktarītyā uttarasya	asattva anvayini prayojya tve paQcamI/ [336] taTA ca ukta rItyA uttarasya
   svavyāghātakatvasiddhau ca/ [336] taditi/ uktalakṣaṇajātītyarthaḥ [336]	sva vyAGAtaka tva sidDO ca/ [336] tat iti/ ukta lakzaNa jAti iti arTaH [336]
   pratyekamiti/ tṛtīyābahuvacanāntamavyayam/	pratyekam iti/ tRtIyA bahuvacana antam avyayam/
   sādharmyavaidharmyādiśabdairityarthaḥ/ [337] yogaḥ   sambandhaḥ/	sADarmya vEDarmya Adi SabdEH iti arTaH/ [337] yogaH  sambanDaH/
   jātinirūpaṇam	jAti nirUpaNam
   krameṇa jātīnāṃ	krameNa jAtInAm

   sādharmyeṇetyādi uttaramityantaṃ sādharmyasamālakṣaṇam/ sādharmyam	sADarmyeNa ityAdi uttaram iti antam sADarmya samAlakzaNam/ sADarmyam
   sādṛśyam/ sthāpanā sthāpakānumānam/ sādharmyasamāyā udāharaṇamāha  	sAdRSyam/ sTApanA  sTApaka anumAnam/ sADarmya samAyAH udAharaNam Aha  
   yatheti/ sakriyaḥ kriyāvān/ atra kriyāhetuguṇavattvarūpahetuśarīre/	yaTA iti/ sa kriyaH kriyAvAn/ atra kriyA hetu guNavat tva rUpa hetu SarIre/
   tralartho ghaṭakatvaṃ guṇānvitam/ janaketi saṃyogādiviśeṣaṇam/	tralarTaH Gawaka tvam guNa anvitam/ janaka iti saMyoga Adi viSezaNam/
   sakriyo yadi	sa kriyaH yadi
   tadetyanvayaḥ/ na	tadA iti anvayaH/ na
   cāstītyanvayaḥ/ atra sakriyasādharmyayaprayuktasakriyatvamātre,	ca asti iti anvayaH/ atra sa kriya sADarmyaya prayukta sakriya tva mAtre,
   niṣkriyasādharmyaprayuktaniṣkriyatvamātre vā/ vinigamakaṃ niyāmakam/	nizkriya sADarmya prayukta nizkriya tva mAtre vA/ vinigamakam niyAmakam/
   vaidharmyasamālakṣaṇamāha	vEDarmya samAlakzaNam Aha
     [338] vaidharmyeṇeti/ vaidharmyaṃ vyāvṛttadharmaḥ/ taditi/	 [338] vEDarmyeNa iti/ vEDarmyam vyAvRtta DarmaH/ tat iti/
   sthāpanāhetvityarthaḥ/ vaidharmyasamāyā udāharaṇamāha   yatheti/ tatraiva	sTApanA hetu iti arTaH/ vEDarmya samAyAH udAharaNam Aha  yaTA iti/ tatra eva
   ātmā sakriya ityādi prāguktānumāna eva/ niṣkriya eveti/	AtmA sa kriyaH ityAdi prAk ukta anumAnaH eva/ nizkriyaH eva iti/
   ātmetyanuṣajyate/ nāstītyanvayaḥ/ taditi/ loṣṭetyarthaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/	AtmA iti anuzajyate/ na asti iti anvayaH/ tad iti/ lozwA iti arTaH/ evam agre api/
   utkarṣasamāṃ lakṣayati  	utkarza samAm lakzayati  
   [338] parokteti/ taditi/ paroktasādhanetyarthaḥ/ etadudāharaṇamāha  	[338] paroktA iti/ tad iti/ para ukta sADana iti arTaH/ etat udAharaNam Aha  
   yatheti/ syādyadītyanvayaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ tenaiva   kṛtakatvenaiva/	yaTA iti/ syAt yadi iti anvayaH/ evam agre api/ tena eva  kRtaka tvena eva/
   evamagre 'pi/ [338] sāvayava iti/	evam agre api/ [338] sa avayavaH iti/
   samavāyikāraṇatāviśiṣṭatvaṃ sāvayavatvam/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	samavAyikAraNa tA viSizwa tvam sAvayava tvam/ vESizwyam
   svanirūpakadravyatvasambandheneti niṣkarṣaḥ/ tādṛśaṃ ca sāvayavatvaṃ	sva nirUpaka dravya tva sambanDena iti nizkarzaH/ tAdRSam ca sAvayava tvam
   kāryatvarūpam kṛtakatvaṃ pratyavyāpakameva	kAryatva rUpam kRtaka tvam pratyavyApakam eva

   'kaścidevamāhe'ti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ/	akaScid evamAhe ati pUrveNa sambanDaH/
   apakarṣasamāṃ lakṣayati  	apakarza samAm lakzayati  
   [339] parokteti/ dharmāntarasya  	[339] paroktA iti/ Darma antarasya

     yatheti/ tasminneva   śabdo nitya ityādyupadarśitarūpa eva/ 'iti	 yaTA iti/ tasmin= eva  SabdaH nityaH iti Adi upadarSita rUpaH eva/ aiti

   evamagre 'pi/	evam agre api/

   [340] varṇyasyeti/ evamagre 'pi/ etadudāharati   yatheti/ pūrvokteti/	[340] varNyasya iti/ evam agre api/ etat udAharati  yaTA iti/ pUrva uktA iti/
   ātmā sakriyaḥ kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt loṣṭavat ityevaṃrūpetyarthaḥ/	AtmA sa kriyaH kriyA hetu guNavat tvAt lozwa vat iti evaMrUpA iti arTaH/
   taditi/ kriyetyarthaḥ/	tat iti/ kriyA iti arTaH/
   avarṇyasamāṃ lakṣayati  	avarNya samAm lakzayati  
   [350] sādhyeti/ tāmudāharati    yatheti/ tataiva   ātmā sakriya	[350] sADyeti/ tAm udAha rati   yaTA iti/ tatA eva  AtmA sa kriya
   ityādirūpa eva/ sādhanam   sādhyāpattipratipādakamuttaram/	ityAdi rUpaH eva/ sADanam  sADya Apatti pratipAdakam uttaram/
   evamagre 'pi/ gateti rūpeti ca guṇaviśeṣaṇam/ tathā ca	evam agre api/ gatA iti rUpa iti ca guNa viSezaNam/ taTA ca
   uktaguṇavattvasyātmanyasiddhatve ca/ tulyatayā	ukta guNavat tvasya Atmani asidDa tve ca/ tulya tayA

   [357] tacca/ avijñātārthakarūpanigrahasthānaṃ ca/	[357] tat ca/ avijQAta arTaka rUpa nigraha sTAnam ca/
   kliṣṭānvayam/ dūrānvayam/ aprasiddhārthakam   1"bhūstanaṃ	klizwa an vayam/ dUra anvayam/ aprasidDa arTakam  1"BUstanam
   himabheṣajavat'ityādirūm/ ityādītyādinā	hima Bezajavat aityAdiH Um/ iti Adi ityAdinA
   mṛdūccaritasaṅgrahaḥ/	mRdu uccarita saFgrahaH/
   aprāptakālalakṣaṇam	aprApta kAla lakzaNam
   [357] vyutkrameṇa  	[357] vyutkrameNa  
   śāstrasaṅketasiddhakramātiriktakrameṇa/	SAstra saFketa sidDa krama atirikta krameNa/
   adhikalakṣaṇam	aDika lakzaNam
   hetvādītyādinā	hetu Adi ityAdinA
   dṛṣṭāntahetutāvacchedakasambandhavyāptidvayādisaṅgrahaḥ/	dRzwAnta hetu tAvat Cedaka sambanDa vyApti dvaya Adi saFgrahaH/
   apasiddhāntalakṣaṇam	apasidDAnta lakzaNam
   dānamiha kathanam/	dAnam iha kaTanam/
   maṇyāderityataḥ paraṃ dāhādikaṃ pratīti śeṣaḥ  	maNyAdeH iti atas param dAha Adikam prati iti SezaH  
   śakteratiriktapadārthatvakhaṇḍanam	SakteH atirikta padArTa tva KaNxanam
   [362] sā ca    maṇyādiniṣṭhā	[362] sA ca   maNyAdi nizWA
   dāhādipratibandhakatā ca/ kuta ityatrāha   pratibandhakatāyā iti/	dAha Adi pratibanDaka tA ca/ kutas iti atra Aha  pratibanDaka tAyAH iti/
   anukūleti/ anukūlatvamiha janakatāvacchedakatvam/ vighaṭakatveti/	anukUla iti/ anukUla tvam iha janakatA avacCedaka tvam/ viGawaka tvA iti/
   vighaṭakatvaṃ ca nāśajanakatvam/ taditi/	viGawaka tvam ca nASa janaka tvam/ tat iti/
   kāryānukūlaśaktivighaṭakatvarūpapratibandhakatetyarthaḥ/ arthāpattyeti/	kArya anukUla Sakti viGawaka tva rUpa pratibanDaka tA iti arTaH/ arTApattyA iti/
   arthāpattipramāṇātmikayeti śeṣaḥ/ siddhyanvitaṃ janyatvaṃ tṛtīyārthaḥ/	arTApatti pramANa AtmikayA iti SezaH/ sidDi anvitam janya tvam tRtIya arTaH/
   siddhiratrārthāpattipramitirūpā/ sā ca vahniḥ	sidDiH atra arTApatti pramiti rUpA/ sA ca vahniH
   dāhānukūlaśaktimānityākārikā bodhyā/	dAha anukUla Sakti mAn iti AkArikA boDyA/
   1. bhūstanamityasya	1. BUstanam iti asya
   parvata ityarthaḥ/ himabheṣajavadityasya agnimānityarthaḥ/	parvataH iti arTaH/ hima Bezaja vaditi asya agnimAn iti arTaH/
   'agninarhimasya bheṣajam' iti śrutiḥ/ pavataḥ bhūmisvanamiti	aagninarhimasya Bezajam a iti SrutiH/ pavataH BUmi svanam iti
   vadanti/	vadanti/
   pramāṇarūpā cārthāpattiḥ	pramANa rUpA ca arTApattiH
   vahnerdāhānukūlaśaktimattvamantarā maṇyādipratibadhyadāhajanakatvaṃ	vahneH dAha anukUla Saktimat tvam antarA maNyAdi pratibaDya dAha janaka tvam
   nopapadyate ityevamādirūpā/ pratibadhyatvaṃ ca nāśyaśaktiprayuktatvam/	na upapadyate iti evamAdi rUpA/ pratibaDya tvam ca nASya Sakti prayukta tvam/
   kecittu   yathāśrutagranthamanusṛtya vahnerdāṃhānukūlaśaktimattvamantarā	kecid tu  yaTASruta granTam anusRtya vahneH dAMha anukUla Saktimat tvam antarA
   maṇerdāhānukūlaśaktivighaṭakatvarūpapratibandhakatvamanupapannamityādirūpamarthāpattipramāṇamūcuḥ/	maNeH dAha anukUla Sakti viGawaka tva rUpa pratibanDaka tvam anupapannam ityAdi rUpam arTApatti pramANam UcuH/
   tattuccham     upapādyopapādakayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavirahāt/ iti	tad tucCam    upapAdya upapAdakayoH sAmAnADikaraNya virahAt/ iti
   śaṅkate ityanvayaḥ/ atiriktatvāditi/ kḷptebhyaḥ dravyādibhya	SaFkate iti anvayaH/ atirikta tvAt iti/ k?pteByaH dravya AdiBya
   ityādiḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ evam   uktayuktyā/ tasyāḥ   śakteḥ/ ata eva  	ityAdiH/ evam agre api/ evam  ukta yuktyA/ tasyAH  SakteH/ atas eva  
   guṇādivṛttitvādeva/ utpattītyādi/ utpattiścārthāpattyā sidhyati/	guNa Adi vRtti tvAt eva/ utpatti ityAdi/ utpattiH ca arTApattyA siDyati/
   arthāpattiśca śaktermaṇyapasaraṇāvacchinnotpattimantarā	arTApattiH ca SakteH maNi apasaraNa avacCinna utpattim antarA
   tādṛśakṣaṇottarakṣaṇāvacchinnadāhānukūlatvamanupapannamityevamātmikā/	tAdRSa kzaNa uttara kzaNa avacCinna dAha anukUla tvam anupapannam iti evam AtmikA/
   evaṃ nāśo 'pyarthāpattyā sidhyati/ sā ca   śaktiḥ	evam nASaH api arTa ApattyA siDyati/ sA ca  SaktiH
   maṇyā/pasaraṇāvacchinnanāśavattvamantarā	maNyA/ pasaraNa avacCinna nASavat tvam antarA
   tādṛśakṣaṇottarakṣaṇāvacchinnadāhānanukūlatvamanupapannamityevaṃrūpā/	tAdRSa kzaNa uttara kzaNa avacCinna dAhAnanukUla tvam anupapannam iti evaMrUpA/
   tena utpattyādihetoḥ nāsiddhiśaṅkāprasaktiḥ/ evaṃ ca uktarītyā	tena utpatti Adi hetoH na asidDi SaFkA prasaktiH/ evam ca ukta rItyA
   śakterdravyādyanantarbhāvasiddhau ca/ atirikteti/ atredaṃ	SakteH dravya Adi anantarBAva sidDO ca/ atiriktA iti/ atra idam
   pariśeṣānumānamavaseyam   śaktiḥ dravyādi bhedakūṭavatī	pariSeza anumAnam avaseyam  SaktiH dravya Adi Beda kUwavatI
   dravyādyanantarbhāvādityevaṃrūpam/ dravyādibhedakūṭavattvaṃ	dravya Adi anantarBAvAt iti evaMrUpam/ dravya Adi Beda kUwavat tvam
   hīhātiriktatvam/	hi iha atirikta tvam/
   etādṛśānumānahetubhūtadravyādyanantarbhāvaśarīrapraviṣṭayorviṃśeṣaṇav	etAdRSa anumAna hetu BUta dravya Adi anantarBAva SarIra pravizwayA uH viMSezaNa v
   iśeṣyayorasiddhiśaṃṅkāṃ	iSezyayoH asidDi SaMFkAm
   ca yata	ca yata
   ityādinā	ityAdinA
   nirākṛtā/ tacca   kāraṇībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ ca/ maṇyādyabhāvasya	nirAkRtA/ tat ca  kAraNIBUta aBAva pratiyogi tvam ca/ maNi Adi aBAvasya
   kāraṇātāpakṣe maṇisattvasamaye dāhānutpattimupapādayati    maṇīti/	kAraNAtA pakze maNi sattva samaye dAha an utpattim upapAdayati   maNi iti/
   taditi/ maṇītyarthaḥ/ kāraṇāntareti/	tat iti/ maNi iti arTaH/ kAraNa antarA iti/
   vahnyādirūpakāraṇavyatiriktakāraṇetyarthaḥ/ etadviśeṣaṇaṃ	vahni Adi rUpa kAraNa vyatirikta kAraNA iti arTaH/ etat viSezaNam
   rūpeti/ itthaṃ ca     pratibandhakatvasyoktarītyā	rUpa iti/ itTam ca    pratibanDaka tvasya ukta rItyA
   kāryānukūlaśaktivighaṭakatvādanyādṛśatve ca/ vyavahārānyathānupapattyā	kArya anukUla Sakti viGawaka tvAt anyAdRSa tve ca/ vyavahArAni aTa anupapattyA
     vyavahārasyānyathā śaktirūpātiriktapadārthānupagame anupapattyā	 vyavahArasya anyaTA Sakti rUpa atirikta padArTa anupagame anupapattyA
   saviṣayakatvāsambhavena/ nanūttejakamaṇyubhayasattve 'pi vahnau	sa vizaya ka tva asamBavena/ nanu uttejaka maNyu Baya sattve api vahnO
   dāhānukūlaśaktivirahāt kathaṃ tvanmate 'pi dāhopapattirityatrāha    	dAha anukUla Sakti virahAt kaTam tvad mate api dAha upapattiH iti atra Aha    
   maditi/ prābhākaraparamidam/ evamagre 'pi tavetyapi/ śaktyantareti/	maditi/ prABAkara param idam/ evam agre api tava iti api/ Sakti antarA iti/
   maṇyādyapasaraṇadaśābhāviśaktivyatiriktaśaktītyarthaḥ/ viśiṣṭeti	maNya Adi apasaraNa daSA ABAvi Sakti vyatirikta Sakti iti arTaH/ viSizwa iti
   maṇiviśeṣaṇam/ evamagre 'pi/	maNi viSezaNam/ evam agre api/
   ananugatatvāt anugatarūpeṇābhāvapratiyogitayā	ananugata tvAt anu gata rUpeNa aBAva pratiyogi tayA
   kāraṇatāvacchedakakoṭau niveśayitumaśakyatvāt/ etādṛśeti/	kAraNa tAvacCedaka kowO niveSayitum aSakyatva at/ etAdRSa iti/
   tattaduttejakābhāvaviśiṣṭamaṇyādyabhāvāvacchinnetyarthaḥ/ tavāpīti/	tad tad uttejaka aBAva viSizwa maNya Adi aBAva avacCinnA iti arTaH/ tava api iti/
   apitaratra naiyāyikasamuccāyakaḥ dṛṣṭāntatayā/ āvaśyakatvāditi/	apitaratra nEyAyika samuccAyakaH dRzwAnta tayA/ AvaSyaka tvAt iti/
   anyathā tattaduttejakamaṇyubhayadaśāyāṃ dāhānukūlaśaktyanutpādāpatteḥ,	anyaTA tad tad uttejaka maNI u Baya daSAyAm dAha anukUla Sakti anutpAda ApatteH,
   maṇimātrasattve śaktyutpādāpatteśceti bhāvaḥ/ nanu	maNi mAtra sattve Sakti utpAda ApatteH ca iti BAvaH/ nanu

   mīmāṃsakaśaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣurāha     ananteti/ tattadityādi/	mImAMsaka SaFkAm parijihIrzuH Aha    ananta iti/ tat tat ityAdi/
   tatpadadvayamatra śaktiparam/	tad pada dvayam atra Sakti param/
   ādheyaśaktinirāsaḥ	ADeya Sakti nirAsaH
   [338] evamapi uktayuktyā anukūlaśaktinirāse 'pi/ sparśa iti/	[338] evam api ukta yuktyA anukUla Sakti nirAse api/ sparSaH iti/
   sparśo 'tra sarvatra saṃyogarūpaḥ grantha eva spaṣṭaḥ/ rūpeti	sparSaH atra sarvatra saMyoga rUpaH granTaH eva spazwaH/ rUpa iti
   kāryaviśeṣaṇam/ arhateti/ bhavatīti śeṣaḥ/ na bhavatītyanvayaḥ/ kuta	kArya viSezaNam/ arhatA iti/ Bavati iti SezaH/ na Bavati iti anvayaH/ kuta
   ityatrāha  śaktimaditi/ taditi/ bhojanādiyapakāryetayarthaḥ/	iti atra aha   Saktimat iti/ tad iti/ Bojana Adii apakAryetayarTaH/
   evamagre 'pi evaṃ ca kāṃsyādau bhojanādirūpakāryārhatvatadabhāvasiddhau	evam agre api evam ca  kAMsi a AdO Bojana Adi rUpa kArya arha tva tadaBAva sidDO
   ca/ kāṃsyādāviti/ kāṃsyādiniṣṭhapratyāsattyetyarthaḥ/ pratyāsanniśca	ca/ kAMsya AdO= iti/ kAMsya Adi nizWa pratyAsattyA iti arTaH/ pratyAsanniH ca
   pratibadhyatāvacchedikā ādhāratā pratibandhakatāvacchedikā tu samavāya	pratibaDya ta avacCedikA ADAratA pratibanDaka tA avacCedikA tu samavAya
   iti dhyeyam/ upapattāviti/	iti Dyeyam/ upapattO= iti/
   kāṃsyādigatabhojanādirūpakāryārhatvatadabhāyorityādiḥ/ taditi/	kAMsya Adi gata Bojana Adi rUpa kArya arha tva tadaBAyoH ityAdiH/ tat iti/

   saṃyogātirikto guṇa iti kathaṃ tasya	saMyoga atiriktaH guNaH iti kaTam tasya
   saṃyogarūpatetyatrāha  prakṛte ceti/	saMyoga rUpa tA iti atra aha   prakRte ca iti/
   kāṃsyādigatabhojanādikāryāspṛśyasparśayoḥ	kAMsya Adi gata Bojana Adi kArya aspRSya sparSayoH
