   saṃyogarūpāspṛśyasparśetyarthaḥ/ nanu bhasmādisaṃyogasambhave	saMyoga rUpa aspRSya sparSA iti arTaH/ nanu Basma Adi saMyoga samBave
   iṣṭāpattirityatrāha   antareti/ vinetyarthaḥ/	izwa ApattiH iti atra Aha   antara iti/ vinA iti arTaH/
   bhojanādyarhatāpattiriti/ kāṃsyāderityādiḥ/ iti evaṃ rūpeṇa/	Bojana Adi arhatApattiH iti/ kAMsya AdeH iti AdiH/ iti evam rUpeNa/
   punaḥ prāguktātiriktaprakāreṇa/ prathamena bhasmādinetyatra	punaH  prAk ukta atirikta prakAreNa/ praTamena  Basma AdinA iti atra
   praviṣṭenetyarthaṃḥ/ dvitīyena ceti/ ādiśabdenetyanuṣajyate/	pravizwena iti arTaMH/ dvitIyena ceti/ Adi Sabdena iti anuzajyate/
   kāṃsyādāvityatra praviṣṭenetyarthaḥ/ kḷpteti/	kAMsya AdO= iti atra pravizwena iti arTaH/ k?ptA iti/
   dravyādyabhāvāntasapatapadārthāṃntargatatayā saṃpratipannetyarthaḥ/	dravya Adi aBAva anta sapata padArTAn= targata tayA saMpratipannA iti arTaH/
   dhvaṃsaviśeṣeṇaiveti/ dhvaṃse viśeṣatvaṃ ca	DvaMsa viSezeNa eva iti/ DvaMse viSeza tvam ca
   bhasmādisaṃyogakālīnāspṛśyasparśapratiyogikayāvadabhāvasahitatve	Basma Adi saMyoga kAlIna aspRSya sparSa pratiyogika yA vat aBAva sahita tve
   sati bhasmādisaṃyogapratiyogikatvam/ tatrāpīti/	sati Basma Adi saMyoga pratiyogika tvam/ tatra api iti/
   kāṃsyādāvityunaṣajyate/ bhasmādiviśeṣaṇatābhramavāraṇāya dhvaṃseti/	kAMsya AdO= iti unaza jyate/ Basma Adi viSezaNa tA Brama vAraNAya DvaMsa iti/
   atra  darśitaśuddhipadārthaśarīre/ sambandhaviśeṣeti/	atra darSita SudDi padArTa SarIre/ sambanDa viSeza iti/
   abhāvīyaviśeṣaṇatāviśeṣetyarthaḥ/ niyantritaṃ ghaṭitam/ anyathā	aBAvIya viSezaNa tA viSeza iti arTaH/ niyantritaM Gawitam/ anyaTA
   aspṛśyasparśavati kāṃsyādau svapratiyogimattāsambandhena	aspRSya sparSavati kAMsya AdO sva pratiyogi matta asambanDena
   tādṛśasparśapratiyogikayāvadabhāvavattvasambhavāt tādṛśayāvadabhāvavati	tAdRSa sparSa pratiyogika yAvat aBAvavat tva samBavAt tAdRSa yAvat aBAvavati
   kāṃsyādau bhasmādyasaṃyukte bhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsasya kālikādināṃ	kAMsya AdO Basma Adi asaMyukte Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsasya kAlikA AdinAm
   sattvāt tādṛśayāvadabhāvaviśiṣṭabhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsasya	sattvAt tAdRSa yAvat aBAva viSizwa Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsasya
   yatretyādyuktakāṃsyādisādhāraṇyāt atiprasaṅgatādavasthyāpātāt/	yatra ityAdi ukta kAMsya Adi sADAraNyAt ati prasaFga tAdavasTyA pAtAt/
   sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti/ etacca sambandhavidhayaivaṃ niveśyam/	sAmAnADikaraNyamiti/ etat ca sambanDa viDayA evam niveSyam/
   tadīyasambandhāpraveśena lāghavāt/ tathā ca	tadIya sambanDa apraveSena lAGavAt/ taTA ca
   svaniṣṭhadaiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhāvacchinnādheyatānirūpakanirūpitādheyatārūpatādṛśasāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena	sva nizWa dESika viSezaNatA sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tA nirUpaka nirUpita ADeya tA rUpa tA dRSa sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena
   tādṛśayāvadabhāvaviśiṣṭabhasmādisaṃyogadhvaṃsaḥ śuddhariti niṣkarṣaḥ/	tAdRSa yAvat aBAva viSizwa Basma Adi saMyoga DvaMsaH SudDar iti nizkarzaH/
   nanu aspṛśyasparśapratiyogikābhāvamātraniveśenaivopapattau kiṃ	nanu aspRSya sparSa pratiyogika aBAva mAtra niveSena eva upapattO kim
   yāvattvapraveśena/ na ca tādṛśayatkiñcidabhāvamādāya	yAvat tva praveSena/ na ca tAdRSayat kiQcid aBAvam AdAya
   yatretyādyuktasthale 'tiprasaṅgatādavasthyaṃ śaṅkanīyam/	yatra ityAdi ukta sTale ati prasaFga tAdavasTyam SaFkanIyam/
   aspṛśyavastutvena tādṛśavastūnyanugamayya	aspRSya vastu tvena tAdRSa vastUni anugamayya
   tādṛśavastusparśatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvaniveśenādoṣādityatrāha   aspṛśyeti/	tAdRSa vastu sparSa tva avacCinna pratiyogi tAka aBAva niveSena adoza Aditya trAha    aspRSya iti/
   yatkiñcidityabhāvaviśeṣaṇam/ yāvaditīti/ tatra yatretyādinā	yat kiQci diti aBAva viSezaNam/ yAvat iti iti/ tatra yatra ityAdinA
   prāguktakāṃsyādau/ taditi/ śuddhītyarthaḥ/ nanu yatretyādyuktakāṃsyādau	prAc ukta kAMsya AdO/ tat iti/ SudDi iti arTaH/ nanu yatra ityAdi ukta kAMsya AdO
   uktātiprasaṅgatādavasthyam/ saṃyogarūpasya	uktA atiprasaFga tAdavasTyam/ saMyoga rUpasya
   tādṛśasparśasyāvyāpyavṛttitvena tadabhāvasayāpi tadadhikaraṇe sattvādata	tAdRSa sparSasya avyApya vRtti tvena tad aBAvasayA api tad aDikaraNe sattva Adata
   āha  tatreti/ yatretyādyuktakāṃsyādāvityarthaḥ/ niravacchinneti/ tathā ca	Aha  tatra iti/ yatra ityAdi ukta kAMsya AdO= iti arTaH/ niravacCinnA iti/ taTA ca
   niruktasāmānādhikaraṇyaghaṭakaprathamādheyatāyāṃ	nirukta sAmAnADikaraNya Gawaka praTama ADeya tAyAm
   niravacchinnadaiśikaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhāvacchinnatvaṃ	niravacCinna dESika viSezaNa tA sambanDa avacCinna tvam
   niveśanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/ ukteti/ śuddhyāpattirūpetyarthaḥ/	niveSanIyam iti BAvaH/ uktA iti/ SudDi Apatti rUpA iti arTaH/
   abhāvakṭasāmānādhikaraṇyaviśiṣṭeti/	aBAvakwa sAmAnA aDikaraNya viSizwa iti/
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhenābhāvakūṭaviśiṣṭetyarthaḥ dhvaṃsaviśeṣaṇam/	sAmAnADikaraNya saMbanDena aBAva kUwa viSizwA iti arTaH DvaMsa viSezaNam/
   bhasmādītyādi/ tatra    	Basma Adi ityAdi/ tatra    
   bhasmādisaṃyogādikaraṇe/ yadyapi	Basma Adi saMyoga Adi karaNe/ yadi api
   bhasmādisaṃyogakālāvacchinnabhasmādisaṃyogādhikaraṇanirūpitādheyatvarūpaṃ	Basma Adi saMyoga kAla avacCinna Basma Adi saMyoga aDikaraNa nirUpita ADeya tva rUpam
   yathāśrutaṃ yatra	yaTASrutam yatra
   bhasmādisaṃyogāspṛśyasparśāvityādyuktasthalīyatādṛśayāvadabhāvasādhāraṇaṃ	Basma Adi saMyoga aspRSya sparSO= ityAdi ukta sTalIyatA dRSa yAvat aBAva sADAraNam
   bhasmādisaṃyoganāśakāle tatra tādṛśayāvadabhāvasambhave 'pi	Basma Adi saMyoga nASa kAle tatra tAdRSa yAvat aBAva samBave api
   tādṛśābhāvānāmadhikaraṇāntaravṛttibhasamādi	tAdRSa aBAvAnAm aDikaraNa antara vRtti Ba samAdi
   saṃyogāvacchedakatadadhikaraṇavṛttipūrvakālīnabhasmādisaṃyoganāśakṣaṇāvacchedena	saMyoga avacCedaka tad aDikaraNa vRtti pUrva kAlIna Basma Adi saMyoganA Sa kzaNa avacCedena
   pūrvakālīnabhasmādisaṃyogāśraye tadadhikaraṇe	pUrva kAlIna Basma Adi saMyoga ASraye tad aDikaraNe
   sattvādityuktātiprasaṅgatādasthyaśaṅkā/ tathāpi	sattvAt iti ukta atiprasaFga tAdasTya SaFkA/ taTA api
   bhasmādisaṃyogaviśiṣṭatvaṃ kālīnāntārtha iti na doṣaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	Basma Adi saMyoga viSizwa tvam kAlIna anta arTaH iti na dozaH/ vESizwyam
   svaniṣṭhasamavāyasasbandhāvacchinnādheyatāviśiṣṭaniravacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃbandhāvacchinnādheyatāsaṃbandhena/	sva nizWa samavAyasa sbanDa avacCinna ADeya tA viSizwa niravacCinna viSezaNatA saMbanDa avacCinna ADeyatA saMbanDena/
   vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	vESizwyam
   svanirūpakanirūpitatvasvāvacchedakakṣaṇāvacchinnatvobhayasambandhena/	sva nirUpaka nirUpita tva sva avacCeda kakzaNa avacCinna tva uBaya sambanDena/
   aspṛśyādiviśeṣaṇatābhramanivṛttaye abhāvaviśeṣaṇamiti/ tathā ca  	aspRSya Adi viSezaNa tA Brama nivRttaye aBAva viSezaNam iti/ taTA ca  
   uktārthakakālīnāntaviśeṣaṇadāne ca/ tatra   yatretyādyuktakāṃsyādau/	ukta arTaka kAlIna anta viSezaNa dAne ca/ tatra  yatra ityAdi ukta kAMsya AdO/
   yāvadityabhāvaviśeṣaṇam/ taditi/ aspṛśyasparśetyarthaḥ/ doṣa iti/	yAvat iti aBAva viSezaNam/ tad iti/ aspRSya sparSA iti arTaH/ dozaH iti/
   śuddhatāpattirūpa ityādiḥ/	SudDa tA Apatti rUpaH ityAdiH/
   svatvasyātiriktapadārthatvakhaṇḍanam	sva tvasya atirikta padArTa tva KaNxanam
   pratīyata iti/	pratIyate iti/
   caitranirūpitasvatvavadidamiti bodhasya tatra jananāditi bhāvaḥ/	cEtra nirUpita sva tva vat idam iti boDasya tatra jananAt iti BAvaH/
   aperdṛṣṭāntatayā uktayuktyā	apeH dRzwAnta tayA ukta yuktyA
   kḷptapadārthāntargatakāṃsyādigataśuddhirūpādheyaśaktilakṣaṇoktārthasamuccāyakatā	k?pta padArTa antargata kAMsi Adi gata SudDi rUpa ADeya Sakti lakzaNa ukta arTa samuccAyaka tA
   na yujayate/ anuktārthāntarasamuccāyakatāsambhave	na yujayate/ anukta arTa antara samuccAyaka tA samBave
   tadayogādityabhisandhāyāha    apineti/	tad ayogAt iti aBisanDAya Aha   apinA iti/
   pratiyogitvādityādinānuyogitvādhikaraṇatvādiparigrahaḥ/	pratiyogi tvAt ityAdinA anuyogi tva aDikaraNa tva Adi parigrahaH/
   tādṛśetyādi/ tādṛśaśabdaḥ yatheṣṭaviniyoganirūpitaparaḥ/ yogya	tAdRSa ityAdi/ tAdRSa SabdaH yaTezwa viniyoga nirUpita paraH/ yogya
   tvāntena tadavacchedakamityatra tacchabdārthakathanam/ avacchedakaśabdaḥ	tvA antena tad avacCedakam iti atra tad Sabda arTa kaTanam/ avacCedaka SabdaH
   prayojakaparaityabhisandhiḥ/ dīpikāyām [369] pratigrahādītyādinā	prayojaka parEti aBisanDiH/ dIpikAyAm [369] pratigraha Adi ityAdinA
   pitrādiparamparāsaṅgrahaḥ/	pitR Adi paramparA saFgrahaH/
   vidhivādaḥ	viDivAdaH
   prakāśikāyām	prakASikAyAm
   [370] sarveṣāmityādi/ atrāyamakhaṇḍaḥ śābdabodhaḥ  	[370] sarvezAm ityAdi/ atra ayam aKaNxaH SAbda boDaH  
   sarvapadārthaṃviśeṣyaka   uktapadārthanirūpita  	sarva padArTaMviSezyakaH  ukta padArTa nirUpitaH  
   yathāyogyāntarbhāvaprakārakapratipattyanukūlavyāpārapratiyogikadhvaṃsaviśiṣṭaḥ,	yaTAyogya antarBAva prakAraka pratipatti anukUla vyApAra pratiyogika DvaMsa viSizwaH,
   yaḥ	yaH
   mūlaviśeṣyakavidhyanirūpakatvātmakanyūnatāpratiyogikābhāvaprakārakecchāviśiṣṭavidhiviśeṣyakalakṣaṇādiprakārakajñānajanakaśabdaḥ,	mUla viSezya kaviDya nirUpaka tva Atma ka nyUna tA pratiyogikA BAva prakAraka icCA viSizwa viDi viSezyaka lakzaNa Adi prakAraka jQAna janaka SabdaH,
   tadanukūlabhaviṣyakālīnakṛtimān,	tad anukUla Bavizya kAlIna kRtimAn,
   śiṣyasamavetaśuśrūṣecchāviśiṣṭavidhinirūpaṇaniṣṭhavartamānakālīnatvāvacchinnaprakāratānirūpitakarmatvaniṣṭhaprakāratākajñānajanakāyetyādigranthābhinnaśabdānukūlavartamānakālīnakṛtimānityevaṃrūpaḥ/	Sizya samaveta SuSrUzA icCA viSizwa viDi nirUpaNa nizWa vartamAna kAlIna tva avacCinna prakAra tA nirUpita karma tva nizWa prakAra tAka jQAna jana kAye
   prathamavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	praTama vESizwyam
   1svāśrayakālāvacchinnavṛttikatvasvapratiyogisamānakartṛkatvobhayasambandhena/	1sva ASraya kAla avacCinna vRttika tva sva pratiyogi samAna kartRkatva uBaya sambanDena/
   dvitīyavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	dvitIya vESizwyam
   2svaprayojyecchāviṣayatvasvaviṣayasamānakartṛkatvobhayasambandhena/ evaṃ	2sva prayojya icCA vizaya tva sva vizaya samAna kartRkatva uBaya sambanDena/ evam
   tṛtīyamapi/ tannirūpaṇamittra tacchabdo vidhiparaḥ/ 3atra svapadaṃ	tRtIyam api/ tad nirUpaNam ittra tad SabdaH viDi paraH/ 3atra sva padam
   sarvamapi naiyāyikaparam/ prayatneti/ pravṛttītyarthaḥ/ viśiṣṭeti/	sarvam api nEyAyika param/ prayatnA iti/ pravRtti iti arTaH/ viSizwa iti/
   sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhenetyadiḥ sādhanatāviśeṣaṇamidam/	sAmAnADikaraNya sambanDena iti adiH sADana tA viSezaNam idam/
   evamagre 'pi/ tādṛśeti/ prayatnajanakacikīrṣājanaketyarthaḥ	evam agre api/ tAdRSA iti/ prayatna janaka cikIrzA janaka iti arTaH
   jñānaviśeṣaṇam/ kāryatvādītyanena tatpratipādaka ityatra	jQAna viSezaNam/ kAryatva Adi iti anena tad pratipAdakaH iti atra
   tacchabdārthakathanam/ tavyādītyādinā tavyadanīyaroḥ parigrahaḥ/ nanu	tad Sabda arTa kaTanam/ tavya Adi iti AdinA tavyadanIyaroH parigrahaH/ nanu
   vastugatyā kṛtisādhyatārahite kṛtisādhyatābhramāt loke	vastu gatyA kRti sADya tA rahite kRti sADya tA BramAt loke
   pravṛttirdṛśyate/ ataḥ [370] kṛtyasādhye pravṛttyadarśanāditi	pravRttiH dRSyate/ atas [370] kRtya sADye pravRtti adarSanAt iti
   dīpikāvākyamayuktamityata āha     kṛtyasādhyatveneti/	dIpikA vAkyam ayuktam iti atas Aha    kRtyasADya tvena iti/
   kṛtyasādhyatvaprakārakajñānaviṣayībhūta ityarthaḥ/	kRtyasADya tva prakAraka jQAna vizayIBUtaH iti arTaH/
   1. svaṃ dhvaṃsaḥ	1. svam DvaMsaH
   tadāśrayakālāvacchedena ākāśavṛttimān śabdaḥ, evaṃ sva dhvaṃsaḥ	tad ASraya kAla avacCedena AkASa vRttimAn SabdaH, evam sva DvaMsaH
   tatpratiyogī pratipattyanukūlaśabdātmakavyāpāraḥ tatsamānakartṛkaśca	tad pratiyogI pratipatti anukUla Sabda Atmaka vyApAraH tad samAna kartRkaH ca
   śabda iti saṃbandhadvayopapattiḥ/	SabdaH iti saMbanDa dvaya upapattiH/
   2. svaṃ	2. svam
   nyūnatāparihārecchā tatprayojyā icchā	nyUna tA parihAra icCA tad prayojyA icCA
   vidhijñānajanakaśabdaviṣayakecchā tadviṣayatvaṃ tādṛśaśabde, evaṃ svaṃ	viDi jQAna janaka Sabda vizayaka icCA tad vizaya tvam tAdRSa Sabde, evam svam
   nyūnatāparihārecchā tadviṣayaḥ nyūnatāparihāraḥ tatsamānakartṛkatvaṃ	nyUna tA parihAra icCA tad vizayaH nyUna tA parihAraH tad samAna kartRka tvam
   ca tādṛśaśabde iti saṃbandhadvayopapattiḥ/	ca tAdRSa Sabde iti saMbanDa dvaya upapattiH/
   3. atra svapadamiti/	3. atra sva padam iti/
   etatprakaraṇe prakāśikāsthāni svapadāni ityarthaḥ/	etad prakaraNe prakASikA sTAni sva padAni iti arTaH/
   'svaparamatasādhāraṇam' 'svamate' ityādau sthitāni svapadāni	asu aparamatasADAraNam a asvamate a ityAdO sTitAni sva padAni
   naiyāyikaparāṇītyarthaḥ/	nEyAyika parANi iti arTaH/
   cikīrṣādvāretyādi/	cikIrzA dvAra ityAdi/
   evamagre 'pi bodhyamiti bhāvaḥ/ kṛtyasādhyatveti/	evam agre api boDyam iti BAvaH/ kRtI asADya tva iti/
   kṛtisādhśyatvābhāvetyarthaḥ/ evamagre 'pi/ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānābhāva	kRti sADSyatva aBAva iti arTaH/ evam agre api/ kRtyasADya tva jQAna aBAva
   evetyevena kṛtisādhyatājñānavyavacchedaḥ/ tattvepravartakatve	eva iti evena kRti sADya tA jQAna vyavacCedaH/ tattva Ipravartaka tve
   gauravāditi/ dvidhā abhāvatvaghaṭitasya	gOrava aditi/ dviDA aBAva tva Gawitasya
   kṛtyasādhyatvābhāvajñānābhāvatvasya	kRtya sADya tva aBAva jQAna aBAva tvasya
   kṛtisādhyatājñānatvamapekṣyetyādiḥ/ tattaditi/ kṛtisādhyatvābhāva	kRti sADya tA ajQAna tvam apekzya ityAdiH/ tad tat iti/ kRti sADya tva aBAva
   kṛtisādhyabhedetyarthaḥ/ vyāpyādītyādinā	kRti sADya Beda iti arTaH/ vyApya Adi ityAdinA
   tattadavacchedakadharmakṛtisādhyatvaviruddhadharmayoḥ saṅgrahaḥ/ digiti/	tad tad avacCedaka Darma kRti sADya tva virudDa DarmayoH saFgrahaH/ diS iti/
   ayamāśayaḥ    yatra kṛtyasādhyatvasya kṛtisādhyatvasya ca jñānaṃ nāsīt	ayam ASayaH   yatra kRtya sADya tvasya kRti sADya tvasya ca jQAnam na AsIt
   tatra pravṛttivāraṇāya kṛtisādhyatājñānasya pravartaṅkatvamāvaśyakamiti/	tatra pravRtti vAraNAya kRti sADya tA jQAnasya pravartaFka tvam AvaSyakam iti/
   tatrāpi viṣabhakṣaṇādāvapi/ ayam jyotiṣṭomādiḥ/ matkṛtiṃ	tatra api viza BakzaNa AdO= api/ ayam jyotizwoma AdiH/ mad kRtim
   vinetyādi/ idaṃ ca puraṣāntarakṛtapākādau vyabhicāravāraṇāya/	vinA iti Adi/ idam ca puraza antara kRta pAka AdO vyaBicAra vAraNAya/
   ānumāniketi/ anumānajanyerthaḥ/ rūpeti nimittaviśeṣaṇam/	AnumAnika iti/ anumAna janyerTaH/ rUpa iti nimitta viSezaNam/

   śucijīvitvādītyatra śucijīvitvādimattvādītyarthaḥ/ ādinā	Suci jIvitvAdi iti atra Suci jIvi tva Adimattva Adi iti arTaH/ AdinA

   uktakarmatrayasthalīyakṛtisādhyatājñānānāṃ pravṛttitvāvacchinnaṃ prati	ukta karma traya sTalIya kRti sADya tA jQAnAnAm pravRtti tva avacCinnam prati
   ekakāraṇatvāsambhava ityarthaḥ/ prakāśikāyām	eka kAraNa tva asamBavaH iti arTaH/ prakASikAyAm

   tasyetyatra	tasya iti atra

      samavāyena vaidikakarmagocarapravṛttitvāvacchinnaṃ prati	  samavAyena vEdika karma gocara pravRtti tva avacCinnam prati

   hetutvopagamādadoṣāt/ ādheyatvaṃ	hetu tva upagamAda dozAt/ ADeya tvam

   prayatnajanakajñānaviṣayaśarīre/ balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvamapi iti/	prayatna janaka jQAna vizaya SarIre/ balavat anizwa an anubanDi tvam api iti/

   jyotiṣṭomayāgahetubhūtasyārthaṃvyayakāyakleśādirūpāniṣṭasya	jyotizwoma yAga hetu BUtasya arTaMvyaya kAya kleSa Adi rUpA anizwasya
   vyāvṛttye balavaditi/ iṣṭotpattiprākkālīṃnabhinnatvamiha balavattvam/	vyAvRttye balavat iti/ izwa utpatti prAk kAlIMna Binna tvam iha balavat tvam/
   apiḥ kṛtisādhyatājñānatveṣṭasādhanatājñānatvayoḥ dṛṣṭāntatvena	apiH kRti sADya tA jQAna tva izwa sADana tA jQAna tvayoH dRzwAnta tvena
   samuccāyakaḥ/ tatra tadantarbhāvaprayojanamāha	samuccAyakaH/ tatra tad antarBAva prayojanam Aha
     teneti/	 tena iti/
   prayatnajanakajñānaviṣayaśarīre	prayatna janaka jQAna vizaya SarIre

   sambandhaḥ/ rūpeṣṭeti karmadhārayaḥ/ viśiṣṭeti/	sambanDaH/ rUpezwa iti karmaDArayaH/ viSizwa iti/

   pravṛttāvityādiḥ/ kṛtisādhyatvādīti/ ādinā	pravRttO= iti AdiH/ kRti sADya tva adi iti/ AdinA

   uktaviśiṣṭajñānatvena kāraṇatvopagame viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāve	ukta viSizwa jQAna tvena kAraNa tva upagame viSezaNa viSezya BAve
   vinigamanāviraheṇa gurudharmāvacchinnanānākāraṇatāsvīkārāpatteriti	vinigamanA viraheNa guru Darma avacCinna nAnA akAraNa tA svIkAra ApatteH iti
   dhyeyam/ pravṛttītyartha iti/ anyathā prayatnasya	Dyeyam/ pravRtti iti arTaH iti/ anyaTA prayatnasya

   vyatirekavyabhicāraprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ/ pratyavāyasyeti/	vyatireka vyaBicAra prasaFgAt iti BAvaH/ pratyavAyasya iti/
   pāpasyetyarthaḥ/ prāgabhāvaḥ   anutpattiḥ/ anyathā yāvadāyuṣaṃ	pApasya iti arTaH/ prAc aBAvaH  anutpattiH/ anyaTA yAvat Ayuzam
   sandhyavandanādikartari pratyavāyājananāt/ prāgabhāvāsambhavena	sanDya vandana Adi kartari pratyavAya ajananAt/ prAgaBAva asamBavena
   tadīyasandhyāvandanāderniṃṣphalatvāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu loke sukha,	tadIya sanDyA vandana AdeH niMzPala tva ApatteH iti BAvaH/ nanu loke suKa,
   duḥkhanivṛtti, duḥkhahetunivṛttīnāmeva phalatvamiṣṭatayā	duHKa nivRtti, duHKa hetu nivRttInAm eva Pala tvam izwa tayA
   dṛṣṭamitikathamuktalakṣaṇaprāgabhāvasya phalatvasambhavaḥ, iṣṭasyaiva	dRzwa miti kaTam ukta lakzaNa prAgaBAvasya Palatva samBavaH, izwasya eva
   phalatvādityatrāha    tasyeti/ duḥkhajanakābhāvatayeti/ duḥkhajanakasya	Pala tvAt iti atra Aha   tasya iti/ duHKa janaka aBAvatayA iti/ duHKa janakasya
   yo 'bhāvaḥ tattvenetyarthaḥ/ taditi duḥkhajanaketyarthaḥ/ phalatvamiti/	yaH aBAvaH tattvena iti arTaH/ tat iti duHKa janaka iti arTaH/ Pala tvam iti/
   pravṛttyuddeśyatvaghaṭitamityādiḥ duḥkhajanakābhāvatayā iṣṭatvaṃ ca	pravRtti uddeSya tva Gawitam ityAdiH duHKa janaka aBAva tayA izwa tvam ca
   tādṛśābhāvatvaprakārakecchāviṣayatvamiti dhyeyam/ nanu	tAdRSa aBAva tva prakAraka icCA vizaya tvam iti Dyeyam/ nanu
   pratyavāyaparihāraśabditasya tatprāgabhāvasya tadanutpattirūpasya kathaṃ	pratyavAya parihAra Sabditasya tad prAgaBAvasya tad anutpatti rUpasya kaTam
   phalatvam/ janyave sati pravṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ hi tat/ uktaprāgabhāvastu na	Pala tvam/ janyave sati pravRti uddeSya tvam hi tat/ ukta prAgaBAvaH tu na
   janya iti śaṅkate   na ceti/ taditi/ pratyavāyetyarthaḥ/ tasya  	janyaH iti SaFkate  na ca iti/ tat iti/ pratyavAya iti arTaH/ tasya

   āśutaravināśina iti/ etadarthastvagre vyaktībhaviṣyati/ bhānam jñānaṃ	ASutara vinASinaH iti/ etad arTaH tu agre vyaktIBavizyati/ BAnam jQAnam
   śābdarūpam/ yadvā bhānaṃ viṣayatā/ evamagre 'pi/ sādhanatvenetyatra	SAbda rUpam/ yat vA BAnaM  vizayatA/ evam agre api/ sADana tvena iti atra

   ayogyatvāditi/ svargasādhanatvābhāvavatvāt/ sādhanatvasya ca	ayogya tvAt iti/ svarga sADanatva aBAvavatvAt/ sADana tvasya ca
   kāryāvyavahitaprākkṣaṇāvacchedena	kArya avyavahita prAkkzaNa avacCedena
   kāryādhikaraṇavṛttyabhāvapratiyogitānavacchedakataddharmavattvarūpatvāt	kArya aDikaraNa vRtti aBAva pratiyogitAnavacCedaka tad Darmavat tva rUpa tvAt
   svargāvyavahitaprākkṣaṇāvacchedena yāgābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/ nanu	svarga avyavahita prAkkzaNa avacCedena yAga aBAvAt iti BAvaH/ nanu
   āśutaravināśitvamatiśīghravināśitvaṃ vināśitvaṃ	ASutara vinASi tvam ati SIGra vinASi tvam vinASi tvam
   nāśapratiyogitvam/ taccāphalasthāyinyapi sambhavati	nASa pratiyogi tvam/ tad ca aPala sTAyinI api samBavati
   tato 'dhikasthāyyapekṣayā tasya tathātvādityato vyācaṣṭe   tṛtīyeti/	tatas aDika sTAyi apekzayA tasya taTA tvAt iti ataH vyAcazwe  tRtIyA iti/
   svotpattikṣaṇetyādiḥ/ anyathā kiñcidapekṣayā tṛtīyatvasyāpi	sva utpatti kzaNa ityAdiH/ anyaTA kiQcid apekzayA tRtIya tvasya api
   sarvakṣaṇasādhāraṇyānapāyāt taddoṣāpatteḥ/ svotpattikṣaṇatṛtīyatvaṃ ca	sarva kzaNa sADAraNyAn apAyAt tad doza ApatteH/ sva utpatti kzaNa tRtIya tvam ca
   svotpattikṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikarakṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇatvam/ na	sva utpatti kzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDika rakzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa tvam/ na
   cātra	ca atra
   svatvaghaṭanayānanugamaḥ/ yataḥ prameyaviśiṣṭatvamāśutaravināśitvamiti	sva tva GawanayA an anugamaH/ yatas prameya viSizwa tvam ASutara vinASi tvam iti
   sthūlo 'nugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	sTUlaH anugamaH/ vESizwyam
   1svatādātmyasvotpattikṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇakṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇakṣaṇavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogitvobhayasambandhena/	1svatAt Atmya sva utpatti kzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa kzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa kzaNa vRtti DvaMsa pratiyogitva uBaya sambanDena/
   1. yāgādeḥ svotpatti	1. yAga AdeH sva utpatti
   tṛtīyakṣaṇavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogitvamupapādanīyam/ tatra prameyapadena	tRtIya kzaNa vRtti DvaMsa pratiyogi tvam upapAdanIyam/ tatra prameya padena
   yāga eva grāhyaḥ tadviśiṣṭatvamubhayasaṃbandhena yāge/ tathā hi svaṃ yāgaḥ	yAgaH eva grAhyaH tad viSizwa tvam uBaya saMbanDena yAge/ taTA hi svam yAgaH
   tattādātmyaṃ yāge, evaṃ svaṃ yāgaḥ tadutpattikṣaṇaḥ prathamakṣaṇaḥ	tad tAdAtmyam yAge, evam svam yAgaH tad utpatti kzaNaH praTama kzaNaH
   taddhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyakṣaṇaḥ	tad DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa kzaNaH dvitIya kzaNaH
   taddhvaṃsotpatyadhikaraṇakṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyakṣaṇaḥ tadvṛttiryoyāgadhvaṃsaḥ	tad DvaMsa utpati aDikaraNa kzaNaH tRtIya kzaNaH tad vRttiH yaH yAga DvaMsaH
   tatpratiyogitvaṃ yāge iti/	tad pratiyogi tvam yAge iti/
   1kṣaṇaviśiṣṭatvamiti	1kzaNa viSizwa tvam iti
   sūkṣmānugamaḥ/ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ	sUkzma anugamaH/ vESizwyam
   svavṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogitvasvanirūpitasvotpattikṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇakṣaṇadhvaṃsotpattyadhikaraṇatvasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvobhayasambandhena/	sva vRtti DvaMsa pratiyogi tva sva nirUpita sva utpatti kzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa kzaNa DvaMsa utpatti aDikaraNa tva sambanDa avacCinna ADeya tva uBay
   ato na doṣaḥ/ anekakṣaṇavṛttitvarūpaṃ sthāyitvam/	atas na dozaH/ aneka kzaNa vRtti tva rUpam sTAyi tvam/

   phaletyasya prakṛtetyādiḥ/	Pala iti asya prakRtA ityAdiH/
   2svotpattikṣaṇadhvaṃsādhikaraṇaprakṛtaphalotpattikṣaṇadhvaṃsānadhikaraṇayāvatkṣaṇavṛttitvam/	2sva utpatti kzaNa DvaMsa aDikaraNa prakRta Pala utpatti kzaNa DvaMsA an aDikaraNa yAvat kzaNa vRtti tvam/
   ādheyatayā tādṛśakṣaṇatvavyāpakatvaparyavasitaṃ phalaparyantasthāyitvam/	ADeya tayA tAdRSakzaNa tva vyApaka tva paryavasitam Pala paryanta sTAyi tvam/
   nanu [377] sthayikāryamapūrvameva iti dīpikāvākyamayuktam/	nanu [377] sTayikAryam apUrvam eva iti dIpikA vAkyam ayuktam /

   tadasambhavādityatrāha   yāga iti/ sākṣāt   kiñcidadvārā/	tad asamBavAt iti atra Aha  yAgaH iti/ sAkzAt  kiQcid advArA/

   ekadeśa iti/ kṛtāviti śeṣaḥ/ tatra   jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti	eka deSaH iti/ kRtO= iti SezaH/ tatra  jyotizwomena yajeta iti

   1. prathamasvapadena	1. praTama sva padena

   svargādisādhanatayā yāgabodhasambhava ityatrāha     prakāśikāyām	svarga Adi sADana tayA yAga boDa samBavaH iti atra Aha    prakASikAyAm
   ayogyateti/ svargādisādhanatvābhāvavattetyarthaḥ/ tasya  	ayogyata iti/ svarga Adi sADanatva aBAvavat tA iti arTaH/ tasya  
   ayogyatāsaṃśayasya/ avighaṭakatvāditi/ avirodhitvādityarthaḥ/	ayogya tA saMSayasya/ aviGawaka tvAt iti/ aviroDi tvAt iti arTaH/
   tadabhāvavattāniṃścayasyaiva tadvattādhīvirodhitvāditi bhāvaḥ/	tad aBAvavat tA niMScayasya eva tadvat tADI vi roDi tvAt iti BAvaH/
   yāgadharmiṅkasvargādisādhanatvaprakārakabuddhāvityādiḥ/ bodha iti/	yAga DarmiFka svarga Adi sADana tva prakAraka budDO= iti AdiH/ boDaH iti/
   jyotiṣṭomādivākyataḥ svargādisādhanatāyā ityādiḥ/	jyotizwoma Adi vAkyataH svarga Adi sADana tAyAH ityAdiH/
   vākyāditi/ jyotiṣṭomādītyādiḥ/ tasya yāgasya/ nanvapūrvasya	vAkyAditi/ jyotizwoma Adi ityAdiH/ tasya yAgasya/ nanu apUrvasya
   yāgavyāpāratve yāgajanyatvaṃ yāgajanyasvargādirūphalajanakatvaṃ dvayamapi	yAga vyApAra tve yAga janya tvam yAga janya svarga Adi rU Pala janaka tvam dvayam api
   kalpanīyam/ yāgadhvaṃsasya yāgavyāpāratāyāṃ tu pratiyogividhayā	kalpanIyam/ yAga DvaMsasya yAga vyApAra tAyAm tu pratiyogi viDayA
   yāgajanyatāyā yāgadhvaṃse kḷptatvāt svargādirūphalajanakatāmātraṃ	yAga janya tAyAH yAga DvaMse k?pta tvAt svarga Adi rUPala janakatA mAtram
   kalpanīyamityubhayakalpanayā pūrvapakṣe gauravamityāśaṅkate    	kalpanIyam iti uBaya kalpanayA pUrva pakze gOravam iti ASaFkate    
   nanviti/ dhvaṃsasyaivetyevenāpūrvavyavacchedaḥ/ vyāpāratvamiti/	nanu iti/ DvaMsasya eva iti evena apUrva vyavacCedaH/ vyApAra tvam iti/
   yāgetyādiḥ/ sparśādītyādinā	yAga ityAdiH/ sparSa Adi ityAdinA
   karatoyātilaṅghanagaṇḍakībāhutaraṇayoḥ saṃgrahaḥ/	karatoyAti laFGana gaNxakI bAhu taraNayoH saMgrahaH/
   dīpikāyām [377] na	dIpikAyAm [377] na
   yāgadhvaṃso vyāpāra iti/ na vyāpāra ityanvayaḥ/ vyāpāra	yAga DvaMsaH vyApAraH iti/ na vyApAraH iti anvayaH/ vyApAra
   ityasya yāgetyādiḥ/ anyathā śrautasya kṣarateḥ naśyatītyarthaparatayā	iti asya yAga ityAdiH/ anyaTA SrOtasya kzarateH naSyati iti arTa para tayA
   dhvaṃsasya nāśaviraheṇa vyāpārasya	DvaMsasya nASa viraheNa vyApArasya
   kīrtanādināśaśrutivirodhaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ/ atra ca na kṣaratiḥ	kIrtana Adi nASa Sruti viroDa prasaFgAt iti BAvaH/ atra ca na kzaratiH
   nāśarūpamukhyakṣaraṇaparaḥ api tu phalāsamarthatvarūpagauṇakṣaraṇaparaḥ/	nASa rUpa muKya kzaraNa paraH api tu Pala asamarTa tva rUpa gONa kzaraNa paraH/
   evaṃ	evam
   ca yāgadhvaṃsasya yāgavyāpāratāyāmapi na kṣatiḥ/ tasya phalāsamarthatvaṃ	ca yAga DvaMsasya yAga vyApAra tAyAm api na kzatiH/ tasya Pala asamarTa tvam
   ca	ca
   bhavati/ dharmakīrtanādeḥ svargādiphalaṃ prati pratibandhakatvakalpanayā/	Bavati/ Darma kIrtana AdeH svarga Adi Palam prati pratibanDaka tva kalpanayA/
   anyathā prāguktakalpanā    apūrvarūpadharmasya nāśakalpanā tannāśaṃ prati	anyaTA prAc ukta kalpanA   apUrva rUpa Darmasya nASa kalpanA tad nASam prati
   kīrtanādeḥ hetutvakalpanā ceti mahāgauravāpatteriti	kIrtana AdeH hetu tva kalpanA ca iti mahA gOrava ApatteH iti
   dīpikoktadūṣaṇaṃ na vicārasahamiti ālocya dhvaṃsasya	dIpikA ukta dUzaNam na vicAra saham iti Alocya DvaMsasya
   vyāpāratāyāmabhedyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ svayamāha   prakāśikāyām dhvaṃsasyeti/	vyApAra tA AyAm aBedyam dUzaNam svayam Aha  prakASikAyAm DvaMsasya iti/
   dūṣaṇāntaram   prāgupāditadūṣaṇātiriktadūṣaṇam/	dUzaNa antaram  prAk upAdita dUzaNa atirikta dUzaNam/
   ākhyātasya	AKyAtasya
   yatnārthakatvasthāpanam	yatna arTaka tva sTApanam
   nanu	nanu

   śaktigraharūpatāyāḥ kriyāyāṃ	Sakti graha rUpa tAyAH kriyAyAm

   vyācaṣṭe   [380] lokavyavahāretyartha iti/ sa ca	vyAcazwe  [380] loka vyavahAra iti arTaH iti/ sa ca
   lokavyavahāraśca/ ityevaṃrūpa ityanenānvayaḥ/	loka vyavahAraH ca/ iti evaMrUpaH iti anena anvayaH/

   tatpadamatra lokavyutpattibalādityetatparam/ tatretīti/ tatra   loke/	tat padam atra loka vyutpatti balAt iti etat param/ tatra iti iti/ tatra  loke/
   dīpikāyām liṅtvenetyataḥ paramādīti śeṣaḥ/ vidhyarthatvamiti/	dIpikAyAm liFtvena iti atas parama Adi iti SezaH/ viDi arTa tvam iti/
   liṅāderityādiḥ/ vidhirathau vācyo yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ/ tathā ca	liFA AdeH ityAdiH/ viDi raTO vAcyaH yasya iti bahuvrIhiH/ taTA ca
   vidhiśabdasya pravartakajñānaviṣayaparatayā	viDi Sabdasya pravartaka jQAna vizaya para tayA

   tannirvakti     prakāśikāyām ākhyātatveneti/ tacca     ākhyātatvaṃ ca/	tat nirvakti    prakASikAyAm AKyAta tvena iti/ tat ca    AKyAta tvam ca/
   saṃketeti/ pāṇinīyetyādiḥ/ śakteti/	saMketa iti/ pANinIya ityAdiH/ Sakta iti/

      viśiṣṭe/ evamagre 'pi/ saṃbandheti/ sambandhaścātrānukūlatā/	  viSizwe/ evam agre api/ saMbanDA iti/ sambanDaH ca atra anukUla tA/

   śeṣaḥ/ anayathā/ kṛtitvāvacchinne pākasaṃbandhabodhakatvavirahe/	SezaH/ anayaTA/ kRti tva avacCinne pAka saMbanDa boDaka tva virahe/

   evena kṛtivyavacchedaḥ/ nanu ratho gacchatītyādau	evena kRti vyavacCedaH/ nanu raTaH gacCati ityAdO

   dīpikākārasyāyuktam/ evamanukūlatve nirūpitatvasaṃmbandhena	dIpikA AkArasya ayuktam/ evam anukUla tve nirUpita tva saMmbanDena
   gamanāderanvayasya vācyatayā tādṛśasaṃbandhasyādhikasya śābdabuddhaiṃ	gamana AdeH anvayasya vAcya tayA tAdRSa saMbanDasya aDikasya SAbda budDEm
   bhānakalpane mahāgauravaṃ cetyatrāha   vyāpāra iti/ etena    	BAna kalpane mahA gOravam ca iti atra aha    vyApAraH iti/ etena

   abhedātiriktasambandhena nānvayaḥ/ tathehāpi nāmārthe	aBeda atirikta sambanDena na anvayaH/ taTA iha api nAma arTe

   rājāpuruṣa ityādau puruṣādipadārtheṃ rājādipadārthasya	rAjA puruzaH iti AdO puruza Adi padArTem rAja Adi padArTasya

   śaktiriti/ tatra prakarṣādau/ tena   uktarītyā upasargāṇāṃ	SaktiH iti/ tatra prakarza AdO/ tena  ukta rItyA upasargANAm
   dyotakatvasthāpanena/ sūcitamityanena sambandhaḥ/ itareti/	dyotaka tva sTApanena/ sUcitam iti anena sambanDaH/ itara iti/
   upasargaṃsaṃjñārahitetyarthaḥ/ nipātanāditi evakārādīnāmiti śeṣaḥ/	upasargaMsaMjQA rahita iti arTaH/ nipAtanAt iti evakAra AdInAm iti SezaH/
   'svarādinipātamavyayam' (pā. sū. 1.1.37) iti	asvara Adi nipAtam avyayam a (pA. sU. 1.1.37) iti
   sūtravihitanipātasaṃjñakānāmityarthaḥ/ evakārādīnāṃ	sUtra vihita nipAta saMjQakAnAm iti arTaH/ eva kAra AdInAm
   vācakatvaprakāramupapādayati   tathā hītyādinā/ ayogavyavacchedaḥ	vAcaka tva prakAram upapAdayati  taTA hi ityAdinA/ ayoga vyavacCedaH
   uddeśyatāvacchedakībhūtaśaṅkhatvādivyāpakatvam/ anyayogeti	uddeSya tAvat CedakIBUta SaFKa tva Adi vyApaka tvam/ anya yoga iti
   evakārasyetyādiranuṣajyate/ vyavacchedaśceti/ artha ityanuṣajyate/	eva kArasya ityAdiH anuzajyate/ vyavacCedaH ceti/ arTaH iti anuzajyate/
   anyayogavyavacchedaḥ uddeśyatāvacchedakapārthatvādivyāpyatvam/	anya yoga vyavacCedaH uddeSya tAvacCeda kapArTa tva Adi vyApya tvam/
   ityādikamityādinā kriyāsaṅgataivakārasyātyantāyogavyavacchedaḥ	iti Adikam ityAdinA kriyA saFga tEvakArasya atyanta ayoga vyavacCedaH
   uddeśyatāvacchedakatvābhimatasarojatvādisāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ/ artha	uddeSya tAvat Cedaka tva aBimata saroja tva Adi sAmAna aDikaraNya rUpaH/ arTa
   ityādikamityarthaḥ/	iti Adikam iti arTaH/
   padārthatattvajñānasya	padArTa tattva jQAnasya
   mokṣahetutvanirūpaṇam	mokza hetu tva nirUpaNam
   [388] prekṣāvaditi/ buddhimadityarthaḥ/ viṣayeti	[388] prekzA vat iti/ budDimat iti arTaH/ vizaya iti
   muktiviśeṣaṇam/ pṛthivyādeḥ jalatvādinā jñānasyātattvajñānasya	mukti viSezaNam/ pRTivI AdeH jala tva AdinA jQAnasya atattva jQAnasya
   muktiprayojakatvāsambhavādāha   padārthatattvajñānasyeti/	mukti prayojaka tva asamBavAt Aha  padArTa tattva jQAnasya iti/
   yathāvasthitākāreṇa padārthajñānasyetyarthaḥ/ anyeṣāmiti/	yaTA avasTita AkAreNa padArTa jQAnasya iti arTaH/ anyezAm iti/
   muktiyapaprayojanādityādiḥ/ avāntareti/ madhyavartītyarthaḥ/ parameti/	mukti yapa prayojanAt ityAdiH/ avAnta reti/ maDya vartI iti arTaH/ parama iti/
   paramatvaṃ ca svānantarotpannatattvajñānasādhyaprayojanakānyatvam/	parama tvam ca sva anantara utpanna tattva jQAna sADya prayojana kAnyatvam/
   sādhyatvaṃ ca sākṣātparamparayā vā bodhyam/ anugamastu sphuṭaḥ/	sADya tvam ca sAkzAt paramparayA vA boDyam/ anugamaH tu sPuwaH/
   śruteriti/ 'ātmā vāre'tyādiḥ/	SruteH iti/ aAtmA vAre atyAdiH/
   nanūpāyasya	nanu upAyasya
   phalaprāgbhāvitvānurodhenopāyapratipādakasya bhāgasya	Pala prAc BAvitva anuroDena upAya pratipAdakasya BAgasya
   phalapratipādakabhāgaprāgbhāvitvamāvaśyakamiti kathaṃ draṣṭavya	Pala pratipAdaka BAga prAgBAvi tvam AvaSyakam iti kaTam drazwavya
   ityādivākyasaṅgatirityatrāha ārtheti/ arthasambandhītyarthaḥ/	ityAdi vAkya saFgatiH iti atra Aha ArTa iti/ arTa sambanDi iti arTaH/
   krameṇeti/ kramaśca paurvāparyam/ uktaśrutivākya ityādiḥ/	krameNa iti/ kramaH ca pOrvAparyam/ ukta Sruti vAkyaH ityAdiH/
   evamagre 'pi/ śabdeti/ śabdasambandhītyarthaḥ/ tyakto bhavatīti/	evam agre api/ Sabda iti/ Sabda sambanDI iti arTaH/ tyaktaH Bavati iti/
   nididhyāsitavyo draṣṭavya iti yojaneti bhāvaḥ/ yuktibhiḥ	nidiDyAsitavyaH drazwavyaH iti yojana iti BAvaH/ yuktiBiH
   bahuyuktiviṣayakaparāmarśajanyānumitidhāretyarthaḥ/ ātmana iti/	bahu yukti vizaya kaparAmarSa janyA anumiti DArA iti arTaH/ AtmanaH iti/
   ātmaviśeṣyaketarabhinnatvaprakārakānumitirityarthaḥ/ tacca  	Atma viSezya ka itara Binna tva prakAraka anum itiH iti arTaH/ tat ca  
   uknarūpānumānaṃ ca/ pratiyogītareti samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ/ tacca	ukna rUpa anumAnam ca/ pratiyogi itarA iti samAna aDikaraNa samAsaH/ tat ca
   uktarūpānupānaṃ ca/ taditi/ ātmana	ukta rUpa anupAnam ca/ tad iti/ Atmana
   itararbhinnatvenānumānatyarthaḥ/ tadanantarami tyatra tacchabdo	itararBinna tvena anumAnatyarTaH/ tad anantarami tyatra tad SabdaH 
   mananapara ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe    mananetyādi/ śrutasyetyādi/	manana paraH iti ASayena vyAcazwe   mananA ityAdi/ Srutasya ityAdi/
   nairantaryaṃ vijātīyapratyayāvyavahitatvam/ vaiśiṣṭye tṛtīyā/ pratyaye	nErantaryam vijAtIya pratyaya avyavahita tvam/ vESizwye tRtIyA/ pratyaye
   vijātīyatvaṃ ca śrutārthātiriktārthaviṣayakatvam/ pratyāhṛtyeti/	vijAtIya tvam ca Sruta arTa atirikta arTa vizayaka tvam/ pratyAhRtya iti/
   pratyāharaṇaṃ sambandhanivṛttyanukūlavyāpāraḥ/ sambandhānvayini	pratyAharaNam sambanDa nivRtti anukUla vyApAraH/ sambanDa anvayini
   anuyogitve pañcamī viṣayebhya ityatra/ evamagre 'pi tadanantaramityatra	anuyogi tve paQcamI vizayeByaH iti atra/ evam agre api tad anantaram iti atra
   tacchabdaḥ nididhyāsanapara ityabhisandhāyāha   [388] nididhyāsaneti/ nanu	tad SabdaH nidiDi Asana paraH iti aBisanDAya Aha  [388] nidiDi Asana iti/ nanu
   mithyājñānamātranāśe 'pi	miTyAjQAna mAtra nASe api
   tadadhīnavāsanāsattve doṣasambhavāt mithyājñānanāśena	tad aDIna vAsanA sattve doza samBavAt miTyAjQAna nASena
   doṣābhāvakathanamayuktamityato vyācaṣṭe     [388] vāsanāsahiteti/	doza aBAva kaTanam ayuktam iti atas vyAcazwe    [388] vAsanA sahita iti/
   jñānaviśeṣaṇam/ vāsanā   saṃskāraḥ/	jQAna viSezaNam/ vAsanA  saMskAraH/
   rāgādirityādinā doṣamohayoḥ parigrahaḥ/ [688] viśeṣeti/	rAga AdiH iti AdinA doza mohayoH parigrahaH/ [688] viSeza iti/
   rajatavyāvartakākāretyarthaḥ/	rajata vyAvartaka AkAra iti arTaH/
   śuktitvādirūpetyādiḥ/ jñānenaivetyevena tādṛ	Sukti tva Adi rUpa ityAdiH/ jQAnena eva iti evena tAdR
